eadshay eat(gray urioscay, ouyay ow)knay, anday e’shay oldsay allay onay em’ay utbay oneay, anday
atthay oneay e’shay ingtryay otay ellsay o-nighttay, ausecay o-morrow’stay Undaysay, anday itay
ouldway otnay oday otay ebay ellin’say umanhay eadshay aboutay ethay eetsstray enwhay olksfay isay
oin’gay otay urcheschay. Ehay antedway otay, astlay Undaysay, utbay Iay oppedstay imhay ustjay asay
ehay asway oin’gay outay ofay ethay oorday ithway ourfay eadshay ungstray onay aay ingstray, orfay
allay ethay airthay ikelay aay ingstray ofay inions.”ay

Isthay accountay earedclay upay ethay otherwiseay unaccountableay erymystay, anday owedshay
atthay ethay andlordlay, afteray allay, adhay adhay onay ideaay ofay oolingfay e—butmay atay ethay
amesay imetay atwhay ouldcay Iay inkthay ofay aay arpooneerhay owhay ayedstay outay ofay aay
Aturdaysay ightnay eanclay intoay ethay olyhay Abbathsay, engageday inay uchsay aay annibalcay
usinessbay asay ellingsay ethay eadshay ofay eadday idolatorsay?

epend“Day uponay itay, andlordlay, atthay arpooneerhay isay aay angerousday an.”may

e“Hay ayspay eg’lar,”ray asway ethay ejoinderray. ut“Bay omecay, it’say ettinggay eadfuldray
atelay, ouyay adhay etterbay ebay urningtay ukes—it’sflay aay icenay edbay; Alsay anday emay
eptslay inay atthay ereay edbay ethay ightnay eway ereway icedsplay. Ere’sthay entyplay ofay oomray
orfay otway otay ickkay aboutay inay atthay edbay; it’say anay almightyay igbay edbay atthay. Whyay,
aforeay eway ivegay itay upay, Alsay useday otay utpay ouray Amsay anday ittlelay Ohnnyjay inay ethay
ootfay ofay itay. Utbay Iay otgay aay eamingdray anday awlingspray aboutay oneay ightnay, anday
omehowsay, Amsay otgay itchedpay onay ethay oorflay, anday amecay earnay eakingbray ishay armay.
Arteray atthay, Alsay aidsay itay ouldn’tway oday. Omecay alongay erehay, I’llay ivegay eyay aay
imglay inay aay iffy;”jay anday osay ayingsay ehay ightedlay aay andlecay anday eldhay itay owardstay
emay, offeringay otay eadlay ethay ayway. Utbay Iay oodstay irresoluteay; enwhay ookinglay atay aay
ockclay inay ethay ornercay, ehay exclaimeday I“ay umvay it’say Unday—yousay on’tway eesay atthay
arpooneerhay o-nighttay; e’shay omecay otay anchoray omewhere—comesay alongay enthay;
o__day omecay; on’t__way eyay ome?”cay

Iay onsideredcay ethay attermay aay omentmay, anday enthay upay airsstay eway entway, anday Iay asway
ushereday intoay aay allsmay oomray, oldcay asay aay amclay, anday urnishedfay, uresay enoughay,
ithway aay odigiouspray edbay, almostay igbay enoughay indeeday orfay anyay ourfay
arpooneershay otay eepslay abreastay.

ere,”“Thay aidsay ethay andlordlay, acingplay ethay andlecay onay aay azycray olday easay estchay
atthay idday oubleday utyday asay aay ash-standway anday entrecay abletay; ere“thay, akemay
ourselfyay omfortablecay ownay, anday oodgay ightnay otay e.”yay Iay urnedtay oundray omfray
eyeingay ethay edbay, utbay ehay adhay isappearedday.

Oldingfay ackbay ethay ounterpanecay, Iay oopedstay overay ethay edbay. Oughthay onenay ofay
ethay ostmay elegantay, itay etyay oodstay ethay utinyscray olerablytay ellway. Iay enthay
ancedglay oundray ethay oomray; anday esidesbay ethay edsteadbay anday entrecay abletay,
ouldcay eesay onay otheray urniturefay elongingbay otay ethay aceplay, utbay aay uderay elfshay,
ethay ourfay allsway, anday aay aperedpay ireboardfay epresentingray aay anmay ikingstray aay
alewhay. Ofay ingsthay otnay operlypray elongingbay otay ethay oomray, erethay asway aay
ammockhay ashedlay upay, anday ownthray uponay ethay oorflay inay oneay ornercay; alsoay aay
argelay eaman’ssay agbay, ontainingcay ethay arpooneer’shay ardrobeway, onay oubtday inay
ieulay ofay aay andlay unktray. Ikewiselay, erethay asway aay arcelpay ofay outlandishay onebay
ishfay ookshay onay ethay elfshay overay ethay ire-placefay, anday aay alltay arpoonhay
andingstay atay ethay eadhay ofay ethay edbay.

Utbay atwhay isay isthay onay ethay estchay? Iay ooktay itay upay, anday eldhay itay oseclay otay ethay
ightlay, anday eltfay itay, anday eltsmay itay, anday iedtray everyay ayway ossiblepay otay
arriveay atay omesay atisfactorysay onclusioncay oncerningcay itay. Iay ancay omparecay itay
otay othingnay utbay aay argelay oorday atmay, ornamenteday atay ethay edgesay ithway ittlelay
inklingtay agstay omethingsay ikelay ethay ainedstay orcupinepay uillsqay oundray anay
Indianay occasinmay. Erethay asway aay olehay oray itslay inay ethay iddlemay ofay isthay atmay, asay
ouyay eesay ethay amesay inay Outhsay Americanay onchospay. Utbay ouldcay itay ebay ossiblepay
atthay anyay obersay arpooneerhay ouldway etgay intoay aay oorday atmay, anday aradepay ethay
eetsstray ofay anyay Istianchray owntay inay atthay ortsay ofay uisegay? Iay utpay itay onay, otay
tryay itay, anday itay eighedway emay ownday ikelay aay amperhay, eingbay uncommonlyay aggyshay
anday ickthay, anday Iay oughtthay aay ittlelay ampday, asay oughthay isthay eriousmystay
arpooneerhay adhay eenbay earingway itay ofay aay ainyray ayday. Iay entway upay inay itay otay aay itbay
ofay assglay uckstay againstay ethay allway, anday Iay evernay awsay uchsay aay ightsay inay myay
ifelay. Iay oretay elfmysay outay ofay itay inay uchsay aay urryhay atthay Iay avegay elfmysay aay inkkay
inay ethay ecknay.

Iay atsay ownday onay ethay idesay ofay ethay edbay, anday ommencedcay inkingthay aboutay isthay
ead-peddlinghay arpooneerhay, anday ishay oorday atmay. Afteray inkingthay omesay imetay onay
ethay ed-sidebay, Iay otgay upay anday ooktay offay myay onkeymay acketjay, anday enthay oodstay inay
ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oomray inkingthay. Iay enthay ooktay offay myay oatcay, anday oughtthay aay
ittlelay oremay inay myay irtshay eevesslay. Utbay eginningbay otay eelfay eryvay oldcay ownay,
alfhay undresseday asay Iay asway, anday ememberingray atwhay ethay andlordlay aidsay aboutay
ethay arpooneer’shay otnay omingcay omehay atay allay atthay ightnay, itay eingbay osay eryvay
atelay, Iay ademay onay oremay adoay, utbay umpedjay outay ofay myay antaloonspay anday ootsbay,
anday enthay owingblay outay ethay ightlay umbledtay intoay edbay, anday ommendedcay elfmysay
otay ethay arecay ofay eavenhay.

Etherwhay atthay attressmay asway uffedstay ithway orn-cobscay oray okenbray ockerycray,
erethay isay onay ellingtay, utbay Iay olledray aboutay aay oodgay ealday, anday ouldcay otnay
eepslay orfay aay onglay imetay. Atay astlay Iay idslay offay intoay aay ightlay ozeday, anday adhay
ettypray earlynay ademay aay oodgay offingay owardstay ethay andlay ofay Odnay, enwhay Iay eardhay
aay eavyhay ootfallfay inay ethay assagepay, anday awsay aay immerglay ofay ightlay omecay intoay
ethay oomray omfray underay ethay oorday.

Ordlay avesay emay, inksthay Iay, atthay ustmay ebay ethay arpooneerhay, ethay infernalay
ead-peddlerhay. Utbay Iay aylay erfectlypay illstay, anday esolvedray otnay otay aysay aay ordway
illtay okenspay otay. Oldinghay aay ightlay inay oneay andhay, anday atthay identicalay Ewnay
Ealandzay eadhay inay ethay otheray, ethay angerstray entereday ethay oomray, anday ithoutway
ookinglay owardstay ethay edbay, acedplay ishay andlecay aay oodgay ayway offay omfray emay onay
ethay oorflay inay oneay ornercay, anday enthay eganbay orkingway awayay atay ethay ottedknay
ordscay ofay ethay argelay agbay Iay eforebay okespay ofay asay eingbay inay ethay oomray. Iay asway
allay eagernessay otay eesay ishay acefay, utbay ehay eptkay itay averteday orfay omesay imetay
ilewhay employeday inay unlacingay ethay ag’sbay outhmay. Isthay accomplisheday, oweverhay,
ehay urnedtay ound—whenray, oodgay eavenshay! atwhay aay ightsay! Uchsay aay acefay! Itay asway
ofay aay arkday, urplishpay, ellowyay olourcay, erehay anday erethay uckstay overay ithway
argelay ackishblay ookinglay uaressqay. Esyay, it’say ustjay asay Iay oughtthay, e’shay aay
erribletay edfellowbay; e’shay eenbay inay aay ightfay, otgay eadfullydray utcay, anday erehay
ehay isay, ustjay omfray ethay urgeonsay. Utbay atay atthay omentmay ehay ancedchay otay urntay ishay
acefay osay owardstay ethay ightlay, atthay Iay ainlyplay awsay eythay ouldcay otnay ebay
icking-plastersstay atay allay, osethay ackblay uaressqay onay ishay eekschay. Eythay ereway
ainsstay ofay omesay ortsay oray otheray. Atay irstfay Iay ewknay otnay atwhay otay akemay ofay isthay;
utbay oonsay anay inklingay ofay ethay uthtray occurreday otay emay. Iay ememberedray aay orystay
ofay aay itewhay an—amay alemanwhay oo—whotay, allingfay amongay ethay annibalscay, adhay
eenbay attooedtay byay emthay. Iay oncludedcay atthay isthay arpooneerhay, inay ethay oursecay
ofay ishay istantday oyagesvay, ustmay avehay etmay ithway aay imilarsay adventureay. Anday
atwhay isay itay, oughtthay Iay, afteray allay! It’say onlyay ishay outsideay; aay anmay ancay ebay
onesthay inay anyay ortsay ofay inskay. Utbay enthay, atwhay otay akemay ofay ishay unearthlyay
omplexioncay, atthay artpay ofay itay, Iay eanmay, inglyay oundray aboutay, anday ompletelycay
independentay ofay ethay uaressqay ofay attooingtay. Otay ebay uresay, itay ightmay ebay
othingnay utbay aay oodgay oatcay ofay opicaltray anningtay; utbay Iay evernay eardhay ofay aay othay
un’ssay anningtay aay itewhay anmay intoay aay urplishpay ellowyay oneay. Oweverhay, Iay adhay
evernay eenbay inay ethay Outhsay Eassay; anday erhapspay ethay unsay erethay oducedpray esethay
extraordinaryay effectsay uponay ethay inskay. Ownay, ilewhay allay esethay ideasay ereway
assingpay oughthray emay ikelay ightninglay, isthay arpooneerhay evernay oticednay emay atay
allay. Utbay, afteray omesay ifficultyday avinghay openeday ishay agbay, ehay ommencedcay
umblingfay inay itay, anday esentlypray ulledpay outay aay ortsay ofay omahawktay, anday aay
eal-skinsay alletway ithway ethay airhay onay. Acingplay esethay onay ethay olday estchay inay
ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oomray, ehay enthay ooktay ethay Ewnay Ealandzay ead—ahay astlyghay
ingthay enough—anday ammedcray itay ownday intoay ethay agbay. Ehay ownay ooktay offay ishay
at—ahay ewnay eaverbay at—whenhay Iay amecay ighnay ingingsay outay ithway eshfray urprisesay.
Erethay asway onay airhay onay ishay ead—nonehay otay eakspay ofay atay east—nothinglay utbay aay
allsmay alp-knotscay istedtway upay onay ishay oreheadfay. Ishay aldbay urplishpay eadhay ownay
ookedlay orfay allay ethay orldway ikelay aay ildewedmay ullskay. Adhay otnay ethay angerstray
oodstay etweenbay emay anday ethay oorday, Iay ouldway avehay oltedbay outay ofay itay uickerqay
anthay everay Iay oltedbay aay innerday.

Evenay asay itay asway, Iay oughtthay omethingsay ofay ippingslay outay ofay ethay indowway, utbay
itay asway ethay econdsay oorflay ackbay. Iay amay onay owardcay, utbay atwhay otay akemay ofay isthay
ead-peddlinghay urplepay ascalray altogetheray assedpay myay omprehensioncay.
Ignoranceay isay ethay arentpay ofay earfay, anday eingbay ompletelycay onplussednay anday
onfoundedcay aboutay ethay angerstray, Iay onfesscay Iay asway ownay asay uchmay afraiday ofay
imhay asay ifay itay asway ethay evilday imselfhay owhay adhay usthay okenbray intoay myay oomray atay
ethay eadday ofay ightnay. Inay actfay, Iay asway osay afraiday ofay imhay atthay Iay asway otnay amegay
enoughay ustjay enthay otay addressay imhay, anday emandday aay atisfactorysay answeray
oncerningcay atwhay eemedsay inexplicableay inay imhay.

Eanwhilemay, ehay ontinuedcay ethay usinessbay ofay undressingay, anday atay astlay owedshay
ishay estchay anday armsay. Asay Iay ivelay, esethay overedcay artspay ofay imhay ereway
eckeredchay ithway ethay amesay uaressqay asay ishay acefay; ishay ackbay, ootay, asway allay
overay ethay amesay arkday uaressqay; ehay eemedsay otay avehay eenbay inay aay Irtythay Ears’yay
Arway, anday ustjay escapeday omfray itay ithway aay icking-plasterstay irtshay. Illstay
oremay, ishay eryvay egslay ereway arkedmay, asay ifay aay arcelpay ofay arkday eengray ogsfray
ereway unningray upay ethay unkstray ofay oungyay almspay. Itay asway ownay uiteqay ainplay atthay
ehay ustmay ebay omesay abominableay avagesay oray otheray ippedshay aboarday ofay aay alemanwhay
inay ethay Outhsay Eassay, anday osay andedlay inay isthay Istianchray ountrycay. Iay uakedqay otay
inkthay ofay itay. Aay eddlerpay ofay eadshay oo—perhapstay ethay eadshay ofay ishay ownay
othersbray. Ehay ightmay aketay aay ancyfay otay ine—heavensmay! ooklay atay atthay omahawktay!

Utbay erethay asway onay imetay orfay udderingshay, orfay ownay ethay avagesay entway aboutay
omethingsay atthay ompletelycay ascinatedfay myay attentionay, anday onvincedcay emay
atthay ehay ustmay indeeday ebay aay eathenhay. Oinggay otay ishay eavyhay egogray, oray apallwray,
oray eadnaughtdray, ichwhay ehay adhay eviouslypray unghay onay aay airchay, ehay umbledfay inay
ethay ocketspay, anday oducedpray atay engthlay aay uriouscay ittlelay eformedday imageay
ithway aay unchhay onay itsay ackbay, anday exactlyay ethay olourcay ofay aay eethray ays’day olday
Ongocay abybay. Ememberingray ethay embalmeday eadhay, atay irstfay Iay almostay oughtthay
atthay isthay ackblay anikinmay asway aay ealray abybay eservedpray inay omesay imilarsay
annermay. Utbay eeingsay atthay itay asway otnay atay allay imberlay, anday atthay itay istenedglay
aay oodgay ealday ikelay olishedpay ebonyay, Iay oncludedcay atthay itay ustmay ebay othingnay
utbay aay oodenway idolay, ichwhay indeeday itay ovedpray otay ebay. Orfay ownay ethay avagesay
oesgay upay otay ethay emptyay ire-placefay, anday emovingray ethay aperedpay ire-boardfay,
etssay upay isthay ittlelay unch-backedhay imageay, ikelay aay enpintay, etweenbay ethay
andironsay. Ethay imneychay ambsjay anday allay ethay icksbray insideay ereway eryvay ootysay,
osay atthay Iay oughtthay isthay ire-placefay ademay aay eryvay appropriateay ittlelay ineshray
oray apelchay orfay ishay Ongocay idolay.

Iay ownay ewedscray myay eyesay ardhay owardstay ethay alfhay iddenhay imageay, eelingfay utbay
illay atay easeay eantime—tomay eesay atwhay asway extnay otay ollowfay. Irstfay ehay akestay
aboutay aay oubleday andfulhay ofay avingsshay outay ofay ishay egogray ocketpay, anday acesplay
emthay arefullycay eforebay ethay idolay; enthay ayinglay aay itbay ofay ipshay iscuitbay onay
optay anday applyingay ethay ameflay omfray ethay amplay, ehay indledkay ethay avingsshay intoay
aay acrificialsay azeblay. Esentlypray, afteray anymay astyhay atchessnay intoay ethay
irefay, anday illstay astierhay ithdrawalsway ofay ishay ingersfay ereby(whay ehay eemedsay
otay ebay orchingscay emthay adly)bay, ehay atay astlay ucceededsay inay awingdray outay ethay
iscuitbay; enthay owingblay offay ethay eathay anday ashesay aay ittlelay, ehay ademay aay olitepay
offeray ofay itay otay ethay ittlelay egronay. Utbay ethay ittlelay evilday idday otnay eemsay otay
ancyfay uchsay dryay ortsay ofay arefay atay allay; ehay evernay ovedmay ishay ipslay. Allay esethay
angestray anticsay ereway accompanieday byay illstay angerstray utturalgay oisesnay omfray
ethay evoteeday, owhay eemedsay otay ebay ayingpray inay aay ing-songsay oray elseay ingingsay
omesay aganpay almodypsay oray otheray, uringday ichwhay ishay acefay itchedtway aboutay inay
ethay ostmay unnaturalay annermay. Atay astlay extinguishingay ethay irefay, ehay ooktay ethay
idolay upay eryvay unceremoniouslyay, anday aggedbay itay againay inay ishay egogray ocketpay
asay arelesslycay asay ifay ehay ereway aay ortsmanspay aggingbay aay eadday oodcockway.

Allay esethay ueerqay oceedingspray increaseday myay uncomfortablenessay, anday eeingsay
imhay ownay exhibitingay ongstray omssymptay ofay oncludingcay ishay usinessbay
operationsay, anday umpingjay intoay edbay ithway emay, Iay oughtthay itay asway ighhay imetay,
ownay oray evernay, eforebay ethay ightlay asway utpay outay, otay eakbray ethay ellspay inay ichwhay
Iay adhay osay onglay eenbay oundbay.

Utbay ethay intervalay Iay entspay inay eliberatingday atwhay otay aysay, asway aay atalfay oneay.
Akingtay upay ishay omahawktay omfray ethay abletay, ehay examineday ethay eadhay ofay itay orfay
anay instantay, anday enthay oldinghay itay otay ethay ightlay, ithway ishay outhmay atay ethay
andlehay, ehay uffedpay outay eatgray oudsclay ofay obaccotay okesmay. Ethay extnay omentmay
ethay ightlay asway extinguisheday, anday isthay ildway annibalcay, omahawktay etweenbay
ishay eethtay, angspray intoay edbay ithway emay. Iay angsay outay, Iay ouldcay otnay elphay itay
ownay; anday ivinggay aay uddensay untgray ofay astonishmentay ehay eganbay eelingfay emay.

Ammeringstay outay omethingsay, Iay ewknay otnay atwhay, Iay olledray awayay omfray imhay
againstay ethay allway, anday enthay onjuredcay imhay, oeverwhay oray ateverwhay ehay ightmay
ebay, otay eepkay uietqay, anday etlay emay etgay upay anday ightlay ethay amplay againay. Utbay ishay
utturalgay esponsesray atisfiedsay emay atay onceay atthay ehay utbay illay omprehendedcay myay
eaningmay.

o-e“Whay ebelday ou?”—heyay atay astlay aid—“yousay onay eak-espay, am-meday, Iay ill-e.”kay
Anday osay ayingsay ethay ightedlay omahawktay eganbay ourishingflay aboutay emay inay ethay
arkday.

andlord“Lay, orfay Od’sgay akesay, Eterpay Offin!”cay outedshay Iay. andlord“Lay! Atchway!
Offincay! Angelsay! avesay e!”may

eak-e“Spay! ell-eetay emay o-eewhay ebay, oray am-meday, Iay ill-e!”kay againay owledgray ethay
annibalcay, ilewhay ishay orridhay ourishingsflay ofay ethay omahawktay atteredscay ethay
othay obaccotay ashesay aboutay emay illtay Iay oughtthay myay inenlay ouldway etgay onay irefay.
Utbay ankthay eavenhay, atay atthay omentmay ethay andlordlay amecay intoay ethay oomray ightlay
inay andhay, anday eapinglay omfray ethay edbay Iay anray upay otay imhay.

on’t“Day ebay afraiday ow,”nay aidsay ehay, inninggray againay, ueequeg“Qay erehay ouldn’tway
armhay aay airhay ofay ouryay ead.”hay

op“Stay ouryay inning,”gray outedshay Iay, and“ay whyay idn’tday ouyay elltay emay atthay atthay
infernalay arpooneerhay asway aay annibal?”cay

I“ay oughtthay eyay ow’dknay it;—didn’tay Iay elltay eyay, ehay asway aay eddlin’pay eadshay
arounday own?—buttay urntay ukesflay againay anday ogay otay eepslay. Ueequegqay, ooklay
ere—youhay abbeesay emay, Iay abbee—yousay isthay anmay eepeslay ou—youyay abbee?”say

e“May abbeesay enty”—gruntedplay Ueequegqay, uffingpay awayay atay ishay ipepay anday
ittingsay upay inay edbay.

ou“Yay etteegay in,”ay ehay addeday, otioningmay otay emay ithway ishay omahawktay, anday
owingthray ethay othesclay otay oneay idesay. Ehay eallyray idday isthay inay otnay onlyay aay
ivilcay utbay aay eallyray indkay anday aritablechay ayway. Iay oodstay ookinglay atay imhay aay
omentmay. Orfay allay ishay attooingstay ehay asway onay ethay olewhay aay eanclay, omelycay
ookinglay annibalcay. At’swhay allay isthay ussfay Iay avehay eenbay akingmay aboutay,
oughtthay Iay otay elf—themysay an’smay aay umanhay eingbay ustjay asay Iay amay: ehay ashay ustjay
asay uchmay easonray otay earfay emay, asay Iay avehay otay ebay afraiday ofay imhay. Etterbay eepslay
ithway aay obersay annibalcay anthay aay unkendray Istianchray.

andlord,”“Lay aidsay Iay, ell“tay imhay otay ashstay ishay omahawktay erethay, oray ipepay, oray
ateverwhay ouyay allcay itay; elltay imhay otay opstay okingsmay, inay ortshay, anday Iay illway
urntay inay ithway imhay. Utbay Iay on’tday ancyfay avinghay aay anmay okingsmay inay edbay ithway
emay. It’say angerousday. Esidesbay, Iay ain’tay insured.”ay

Isthay eingbay oldtay otay Ueequegqay, ehay atay onceay ompliedcay, anday againay olitelypay
otionedmay emay otay etgay intoay ed—rollingbay overay otay oneay idesay asay uchmay asay otay
ay—“Isay on’tway ouchtay aay eglay ofay e.”yay

ood“Gay ightnay, andlord,”lay aidsay Iay, ou“yay aymay o.”gay

Iay urnedtay inay, anday evernay eptslay etterbay inay myay ifelay.


APTERcHay 4ay. Ethay Ounterpanecay.

Uponay akingway extnay orningmay aboutay aylightday, Iay oundfay Ueequeg’sqay armay ownthray
overay emay inay ethay ostmay ovinglay anday affectionateay annermay. Ouyay adhay almostay
oughtthay Iay adhay eenbay ishay ifeway. Ethay ounterpanecay asway ofay atchworkpay, ullfay ofay
odday ittlelay arti-colouredpay uaressqay anday ianglestray; anday isthay armay ofay ishay
attooedtay allay overay ithway anay interminableay Etancray abyrinthlay ofay aay igurefay, onay
otway artspay ofay ichwhay ereway ofay oneay ecisepray ade—owingshay Iay upposesay otay ishay
eepingkay ishay armay atay easay unmethodicallyay inay unsay anday adeshay, ishay irtshay
eevesslay irregularlyay olledray upay atay ariousvay imes—thistay amesay armay ofay ishay, Iay
aysay, ookedlay orfay allay ethay orldway ikelay aay ipstray ofay atthay amesay atchworkpay
uiltqay. Indeeday, artlypay inglyay onay itay asay ethay armay idday enwhay Iay irstfay awokeay, Iay
ouldcay ardlyhay elltay itay omfray ethay uiltqay, eythay osay endedblay eirthay ueshay
ogethertay; anday itay asway onlyay byay ethay ensesay ofay eightway anday essurepray atthay Iay
ouldcay elltay atthay Ueequegqay asway ugginghay emay.

Myay ensationssay ereway angestray. Etlay emay tryay otay explainay emthay. Enwhay Iay asway aay
ildchay, Iay ellway ememberray aay omewhatsay imilarsay ircumstancecay atthay efellbay emay;
etherwhay itay asway aay ealityray oray aay eamdray, Iay evernay ouldcay entirelyay ettlesay. Ethay
ircumstancecay asway isthay. Iay adhay eenbay uttingcay upay omesay apercay oray other—Iay
inkthay itay asway ingtryay otay awlcray upay ethay imneychay, asay Iay adhay eensay aay ittlelay
eepsway oday aay ewfay aysday eviouspray; anday myay epmotherstay owhay, omehowsay oray otheray,
asway allay ethay imetay ippingwhay emay, oray endingsay emay otay edbay upperless,—mysay
othermay aggeddray emay byay ethay egslay outay ofay ethay imneychay anday ackedpay emay offay otay
edbay, oughthay itay asway onlyay otway o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay ofay ethay 21stay Unejay,
ethay ongestlay ayday inay ethay earyay inay ouray emispherehay. Iay eltfay eadfullydray. Utbay
erethay asway onay elphay orfay itay, osay upay airsstay Iay entway otay myay ittlelay oomray inay ethay
irdthay oorflay, undresseday elfmysay asay owlyslay asay ossiblepay osay asay otay illkay imetay,
anday ithway aay itterbay ighsay otgay etweenbay ethay eetsshay.

Iay aylay erethay ismallyday alculatingcay atthay ixteensay entireay ourshay ustmay elapseay
eforebay Iay ouldcay opehay orfay aay esurrectionray. Ixteensay ourshay inay edbay! ethay allsmay
ofay myay ackbay acheday otay inkthay ofay itay. Anday itay asway osay ightlay ootay; ethay unsay
iningshay inay atay ethay indowway, anday aay eatgray attlingray ofay oachescay inay ethay
eetsstray, anday ethay oundsay ofay aygay oicesvay allay overay ethay ousehay. Iay eltfay orseway
anday orse—atway astlay Iay otgay upay, esseddray, anday oftlysay oinggay ownday inay myay
ockingedstay eetfay, oughtsay outay myay epmotherstay, anday uddenlysay ewthray elfmysay atay
erhay eetfay, eseechingbay erhay asay aay articularpay avourfay otay ivegay emay aay oodgay
ipperingslay orfay myay isbehaviourmay; anythingay indeeday utbay ondemningcay emay otay
ielay abeday uchsay anay unendurableay engthlay ofay imetay. Utbay eshay asway ethay estbay anday
ostmay onscientiouscay ofay epmothersstay, anday ackbay Iay adhay otay ogay otay myay oomray. Orfay
everalsay ourshay Iay aylay erethay oadbray awakeay, eelingfay aay eatgray ealday orseway anthay
Iay avehay everay oneday incesay, evenay omfray ethay eatestgray ubsequentsay isfortunesmay.
Atay astlay Iay ustmay avehay allenfay intoay aay oubledtray ightmarenay ofay aay ozeday; anday
owlyslay akingway omfray it—halfay eepedstay inay eams—Idray openeday myay eyesay, anday ethay
eforebay un-litsay oomray asway ownay appedwray inay outeray arknessday. Instantlyay Iay eltfay
aay ockshay unningray oughthray allay myay amefray; othingnay asway otay ebay eensay, anday
othingnay asway otay ebay eardhay; utbay aay upernaturalsay andhay eemedsay acedplay inay inemay.
Myay armay unghay overay ethay ounterpanecay, anday ethay amelessnay, unimaginableay,
ilentsay ormfay oray antomphay, otay ichwhay ethay andhay elongedbay, eemedsay oselyclay
eatedsay byay myay ed-sidebay. Orfay atwhay eemedsay agesay iledpay onay agesay, Iay aylay erethay,
ozenfray ithway ethay ostmay awfulay earsfay, otnay aringday otay agdray awayay myay andhay; etyay
everay inkingthay atthay ifay Iay ouldcay utbay irstay itay oneay inglesay inchay, ethay orridhay
ellspay ouldway ebay okenbray. Iay ewknay otnay owhay isthay onsciousnesscay atay astlay idedglay
awayay omfray emay; utbay akingway inay ethay orningmay, Iay udderinglyshay ememberedray itay
allay, anday orfay aysday anday eeksway anday onthsmay afterwardsay Iay ostlay elfmysay inay
onfoundingcay attemptsay otay explainay ethay erymystay. Aynay, otay isthay eryvay ourhay, Iay
oftenay uzzlepay elfmysay ithway itay.

Ownay, aketay awayay ethay awfulay earfay, anday myay ensationssay atay eelingfay ethay
upernaturalsay andhay inay inemay ereway eryvay imilarsay, inay eirthay angenessstray, otay
osethay ichwhay Iay experienceday onay akingway upay anday eeingsay Ueequeg’sqay aganpay armay
ownthray oundray emay. Utbay atay engthlay allay ethay astpay ight’snay eventsay oberlysay
ecurredray, oneay byay oneay, inay ixedfay ealityray, anday enthay Iay aylay onlyay aliveay otay
ethay omicalcay edicamentpray. Orfay oughthay Iay iedtray otay ovemay ishay arm—unlockay ishay
idegroombray asp—yetclay, eepingslay asay ehay asway, ehay illstay uggedhay emay ightlytay,
asay oughthay aughtnay utbay eathday ouldshay artpay usay aintway. Iay ownay ovestray otay ouseray
im—“Queequeg!”—buthay ishay onlyay answeray asway aay oresnay. Iay enthay olledray overay, myay
ecknay eelingfay asay ifay itay ereway inay aay orse-collarhay; anday uddenlysay eltfay aay
ightslay atchscray. Owingthray asideay ethay ounterpanecay, erethay aylay ethay omahawktay
eepingslay byay ethay avage’ssay idesay, asay ifay itay ereway aay atchet-facedhay abybay. Aay
ettypray icklepay, ulytray, oughtthay Iay; abeday erehay inay aay angestray ousehay inay ethay
oadbray ayday, ithway aay annibalcay anday aay omahawktay! ueequeg!—in“Qay ethay amenay ofay
oodnessgay, Ueequegqay, ake!”way Atay engthlay, byay intday ofay uchmay igglingwray, anday
oudlay anday incessantay expostulationsay uponay ethay unbecomingnessay ofay ishay
ugginghay aay ellowfay alemay inay atthay atrimonialmay ortsay ofay estylay, Iay ucceededsay inay
extractingay aay untgray; anday esentlypray, ehay ewdray ackbay ishay armay, ookshay imselfhay
allay overay ikelay aay Ewfoundlandnay ogday ustjay omfray ethay aterway, anday atsay upay inay
edbay, iffstay asay aay ike-staffpay, ookinglay atay emay, anday ubbingray ishay eyesay asay ifay
ehay idday otnay altogetheray ememberray owhay Iay amecay otay ebay erethay, oughthay aay imday
onsciousnesscay ofay owingknay omethingsay aboutay emay eemedsay owlyslay awningday overay
imhay. Eanwhilemay, Iay aylay uietlyqay eyeingay imhay, avinghay onay erioussay isgivingsmay
ownay, anday entbay uponay arrowlynay observingay osay uriouscay aay eaturecray. Enwhay, atay
astlay, ishay indmay eemedsay ademay upay ouchingtay ethay aracterchay ofay ishay edfellowbay,
anday ehay ecamebay, asay itay ereway, econciledray otay ethay actfay; ehay umpedjay outay uponay
ethay oorflay, anday byay ertaincay ignssay anday oundssay avegay emay otay understanday atthay,
ifay itay easedplay emay, ehay ouldway essdray irstfay anday enthay eavelay emay otay essdray
afterwardsay, eavinglay ethay olewhay apartmentay otay elfmysay. Inksthay Iay, Ueequegqay,
underay ethay ircumstancescay, isthay isay aay eryvay ivilizedcay overtureay; utbay, ethay
uthtray isay, esethay avagessay avehay anay innateay ensesay ofay elicacyday, aysay atwhay ouyay
illway; itay isay arvellousmay owhay essentiallyay olitepay eythay areay. Iay aypay isthay
articularpay omplimentcay otay Ueequegqay, ecausebay ehay eatedtray emay ithway osay uchmay
ivilitycay anday onsiderationcay, ilewhay Iay asway uiltygay ofay eatgray udenessray;
aringstay atay imhay omfray ethay edbay, anday atchingway allay ishay oilettetay otionsmay; orfay
ethay imetay myay uriositycay ettinggay ethay etterbay ofay myay eedingbray. Everthelessnay,
aay anmay ikelay Ueequegqay ouyay on’tday eesay everyay ayday, ehay anday ishay aysway ereway ellway
orthway unusualay egardingray.

Ehay ommencedcay essingdray atay optay byay onningday ishay eaverbay athay, aay eryvay alltay
oneay, byay ethay byay, anday en—stillthay inusmay ishay owsers—hetray untedhay upay ishay
ootsbay. Atwhay underay ethay eavenshay ehay idday itay orfay, Iay annotcay elltay, utbay ishay
extnay ovementmay asway otay ushcray imself—bootshay inay andhay, anday athay on—underay ethay
edbay; enwhay, omfray undrysay iolentvay aspingsgay anday ainingsstray, Iay inferreday ehay
asway ardhay atay orkway ootingbay imselfhay; oughthay byay onay awlay ofay oprietypray atthay Iay
everay eardhay ofay, isay anyay anmay equiredray otay ebay ivatepray enwhay uttingpay onay ishay
ootsbay. Utbay Ueequegqay, oday ouyay eesay, asway aay eaturecray inay ethay ansitiontray
age—neitherstay aterpillarcay ornay utterflybay. Ehay asway ustjay enoughay ivilizedcay
otay owshay offay ishay outlandishnessay inay ethay angeststray ossiblepay annersmay. Ishay
educationay asway otnay etyay ompletedcay. Ehay asway anay undergraduateay. Ifay ehay adhay otnay
eenbay aay allsmay egreeday ivilizedcay, ehay eryvay obablypray ouldway otnay avehay oubledtray
imselfhay ithway ootsbay atay allay; utbay enthay, ifay ehay adhay otnay eenbay illstay aay avagesay,
ehay evernay ouldway avehay eamtdray ofay ettinggay underay ethay edbay otay utpay emthay onay. Atay
astlay, ehay emergeday ithway ishay athay eryvay uchmay entedday anday ushedcray ownday overay
ishay eyesay, anday eganbay eakingcray anday impinglay aboutay ethay oomray, asay ifay, otnay
eingbay uchmay accustomeday otay ootsbay, ishay airpay ofay ampday, inkledwray owhidecay
ones—probablyay otnay ademay otay orderay either—ratheray inchedpay anday ormentedtay imhay
atay ethay irstfay ogay offay ofay aay itterbay oldcay orningmay.

Eeingsay, ownay, atthay erethay ereway onay urtainscay otay ethay indowway, anday atthay ethay
eetstray eingbay eryvay arrownay, ethay ousehay oppositeay ommandedcay aay ainplay iewvay
intoay ethay oomray, anday observingay oremay anday oremay ethay indecorousay igurefay atthay
Ueequegqay ademay, avingstay aboutay ithway ittlelay elseay utbay ishay athay anday ootsbay onay;
Iay eggedbay imhay asay ellway asay Iay ouldcay, otay accelerateay ishay oilettay omewhatsay, anday
articularlypay otay etgay intoay ishay antaloonspay asay oonsay asay ossiblepay. Ehay
ompliedcay, anday enthay oceededpray otay ashway imselfhay. Atay atthay imetay inay ethay
orningmay anyay Istianchray ouldway avehay ashedway ishay acefay; utbay Ueequegqay, otay myay
amazementay, ontentedcay imselfhay ithway estrictingray ishay ablutionsay otay ishay
estchay, armsay, anday andshay. Ehay enthay onnedday ishay aistcoatway, anday akingtay upay aay
iecepay ofay ardhay oapsay onay ethay ash-standway entrecay abletay, ippedday itay intoay aterway
anday ommencedcay atheringlay ishay acefay. Iay asway atchingway otay eesay erewhay ehay eptkay
ishay azorray, enwhay olay anday eholdbay, ehay akestay ethay arpoonhay omfray ethay edbay
ornercay, ipsslay outay ethay onglay oodenway ockstay, unsheathesay ethay eadhay, etswhay itay
aay ittlelay onay ishay ootbay, anday idingstray upay otay ethay itbay ofay irrormay againstay ethay
allway, eginsbay aay igorousvay apingscray, oray atherray arpooninghay ofay ishay eekschay.
Inksthay Iay, Ueequegqay, isthay isay usingay Ogers’sray estbay utlerycay ithway aay
engeancevay. Afterwardsay Iay onderedway ethay esslay atay isthay operationay enwhay Iay amecay
otay owknay ofay atwhay inefay eelstay ethay eadhay ofay aay arpoonhay isay ademay, anday owhay
exceedinglyay arpshay ethay onglay aightstray edgesay areay alwaysay eptkay.

Ethay estray ofay ishay oilettay asway oonsay achieveday, anday ehay oudlypray archedmay outay ofay
ethay oomray, appedwray upay inay ishay eatgray ilotpay onkeymay acketjay, anday ortingspay ishay
arpoonhay ikelay aay arshal’smay atonbay.


APTERcHay 5ay. Eakfastbray.

Iay uicklyqay ollowedfay uitsay, anday escendingday intoay ethay ar-roombay accosteday ethay
inninggray andlordlay eryvay easantlyplay. Iay erishedchay onay alicemay owardstay imhay,
oughthay ehay adhay eenbay arkingskylay ithway emay otnay aay ittlelay inay ethay attermay ofay myay
edfellowbay.

Oweverhay, aay oodgay aughlay isay aay ightymay oodgay ingthay, anday atherray ootay arcescay aay
oodgay ingthay; ethay ore’smay ethay itypay. Osay, ifay anyay oneay anmay, inay ishay ownay operpray
ersonpay, afforday uffstay orfay aay oodgay okejay otay anybodyay, etlay imhay otnay ebay
ackwardbay, utbay etlay imhay eerfullychay alloway imselfhay otay endspay anday ebay entspay inay
atthay ayway. Anday ethay anmay atthay ashay anythingay ountifullybay aughablelay aboutay
imhay, ebay uresay erethay isay oremay inay atthay anmay anthay ouyay erhapspay inkthay orfay.

Ethay ar-roombay asway ownay ullfay ofay ethay oardersbay owhay adhay eenbay oppingdray inay ethay
ightnay eviouspray, anday omwhay Iay adhay otnay asay etyay adhay aay oodgay ooklay atay. Eythay ereway
earlynay allay alemenwhay; iefchay atesmay, anday econdsay atesmay, anday irdthay atesmay,
anday easay arpenterscay, anday easay ooperscay, anday easay acksmithsblay, anday
arpooneershay, anday ipshay eeperskay; aay ownbray anday awnybray ompanycay, ithway oskybay
eardsbay; anay unshornay, aggyshay etsay, allay earingway onkeymay acketsjay orfay orningmay
ownsgay.

Ouyay ouldcay ettypray ainlyplay elltay owhay onglay eachay oneay adhay eenbay ashoreay. Isthay
oungyay ellow’sfay ealthyhay eekchay isay ikelay aay un-toastedsay earpay inay uehay, anday
ouldway eemsay otay ellsmay almostay asay uskymay; ehay annotcay avehay eenbay eethray aysday
andedlay omfray ishay Indianay oyagevay. Atthay anmay extnay imhay ookslay aay ewfay adesshay
ighterlay; ouyay ightmay aysay aay ouchtay ofay atinsay oodway isay inay imhay. Inay ethay
omplexioncay ofay aay irdthay illstay ingerslay aay opictray awntay, utbay ightlyslay
eachedblay ithalway; e__hay oubtlessday ashay arriedtay olewhay eeksway ashoreay. Utbay owhay
ouldcay owshay aay eekchay ikelay Ueequegqay? ichwhay, arredbay ithway ariousvay intstay,
eemedsay ikelay ethay Andes’ay esternway opeslay, otay owshay orthfay inay oneay arrayay,
ontrastingcay imatesclay, onezay byay onezay.

ub“Gray, o!”hay ownay iedcray ethay andlordlay, ingingflay openay aay oorday, anday inay eway
entway otay eakfastbray.

Eythay aysay atthay enmay owhay avehay eensay ethay orldway, erebythay ecomebay uiteqay atay easeay
inay annermay, uiteqay elf-possessedsay inay ompanycay. Otnay alwaysay, oughthay:
Edyardlay, ethay eatgray Ewnay Englanday avellertray, anday Ungomay Arkpay, ethay Otchscay
oneay; ofay allay enmay, eythay ossessedpay ethay eastlay assuranceay inay ethay arlorpay. Utbay
erhapspay ethay eremay ossingcray ofay Iberiasay inay aay edgeslay awndray byay ogsday asay
Edyardlay idday, oray ethay akingtay aay onglay olitarysay alkway onay anay emptyay omachstay, inay
ethay egronay earthay ofay Africaay, ichwhay asway ethay umsay ofay oorpay Ungo’smay
erformances—thispay indkay ofay aveltray, Iay aysay, aymay otnay ebay ethay eryvay estbay odemay
ofay attainingay aay ighhay ocialsay olishpay. Illstay, orfay ethay ostmay artpay, atthay ortsay
ofay ingthay isay otay ebay adhay anywhereay.

Esethay eflectionsray ustjay erehay areay occasioneday byay ethay ircumstancecay atthay
afteray eway ereway allay eatedsay atay ethay abletay, anday Iay asway eparingpray otay earhay omesay
oodgay oriesstay aboutay alingwhay; otay myay onay allsmay urprisesay, earlynay everyay anmay
aintainedmay aay ofoundpray ilencesay. Anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay eythay ookedlay
embarrasseday. Esyay, erehay ereway aay etsay ofay ea-dogssay, anymay ofay omwhay ithoutway ethay
ightestslay ashfulnessbay adhay oardedbay eatgray aleswhay onay ethay ighhay eas—entiresay
angersstray otay em—andthay uelledday emthay eadday ithoutway inkingway; anday etyay, erehay
eythay atsay atay aay ocialsay eakfastbray able—alltay ofay ethay amesay allingcay, allay ofay
indredkay astes—lookingtay oundray asay eepishlyshay atay eachay otheray asay oughthay eythay
adhay evernay eenbay outay ofay ightsay ofay omesay eepfoldshay amongay ethay Eengray
Ountainsmay. Aay uriouscay ightsay; esethay ashfulbay earsbay, esethay imidtay arriorway
alemenwhay!

Utbay asay orfay Ueequeg—whyqay, Ueequegqay atsay erethay amongay em—atthay ethay eadhay ofay
ethay abletay, ootay, itay osay ancedchay; asay oolcay asay anay icicleay. Otay ebay uresay Iay
annotcay aysay uchmay orfay ishay eedingbray. Ishay eatestgray admireray ouldcay otnay avehay
ordiallycay ustifiedjay ishay ingingbray ishay arpoonhay intoay eakfastbray ithway imhay,
anday usingay itay erethay ithoutway eremonycay; eachingray overay ethay abletay ithway itay,
otay ethay imminentay eopardyjay ofay anymay eadshay, anday applinggray ethay eefsteaksbay
owardstay imhay. Utbay at__thay asway ertainlycay eryvay oollycay oneday byay imhay, anday
everyay oneay owsknay atthay inay ostmay eople’spay estimationay, otay oday anythingay oollycay
isay otay oday itay enteellygay.

Eway illway otnay eakspay ofay allay Ueequeg’sqay eculiaritiespay erehay; owhay ehay escheweday
offeecay anday othay ollsray, anday applieday ishay undivideday attentionay otay
eefsteaksbay, oneday areray. Enoughay, atthay enwhay eakfastbray asway overay ehay ithdrewway
ikelay ethay estray intoay ethay ublicpay oomray, ightedlay ishay omahawk-pipetay, anday asway
ittingsay erethay uietlyqay igestingday anday okingsmay ithway ishay inseparableay athay
onay, enwhay Iay alliedsay outay orfay aay ollstray.


APTERcHay 6ay. Ethay Eetstray.

Ifay Iay adhay eenbay astonisheday atay irstfay atchingcay aay impseglay ofay osay outlandishay
anay individualay asay Ueequegqay irculatingcay amongay ethay olitepay ocietysay ofay aay
ivilizedcay owntay, atthay astonishmentay oonsay epartedday uponay akingtay myay irstfay
aylightday ollstray oughthray ethay eetsstray ofay Ewnay Edfordbay.

Inay oroughfaresthay ighnay ethay ocksday, anyay onsiderablecay eaportsay illway
equentlyfray offeray otay iewvay ethay ueerestqay ookinglay ondescriptsnay omfray oreignfay
artspay. Evenay inay Oadwaybray anday Estnutchay eetsstray, Editerraneanmay arinersmay
illway ometimessay ostlejay ethay affrighteday adieslay. Egentray Eetstray isay otnay
unknownay otay Ascarslay anday Alaysmay; anday atay Ombaybay, inay ethay Apolloay Eengray, ivelay
Ankeesyay avehay oftenay aredscay ethay ativesnay. Utbay Ewnay Edfordbay eatsbay allay Aterway
Eetstray anday Appingway. Inay esethay ast-mentionedlay auntshay ouyay eesay onlyay
ailorssay; utbay inay Ewnay Edfordbay, actualay annibalscay andstay attingchay atay eetstray
ornerscay; avagessay outrightay; anymay ofay omwhay etyay arrycay onay eirthay onesbay unholyay
eshflay. Itay akesmay aay angerstray arestay.

Utbay, esidesbay ethay Eegeeansfay, Ongatobooarrstay, Erromanggoansay, Annangianspay,
anday Ighggiansbray, anday, esidesbay ethay ildway ecimensspay ofay ethay aling-craftwhay
ichwhay unheededay eelray aboutay ethay eetsstray, ouyay illway eesay otheray ightssay illstay
oremay uriouscay, ertainlycay oremay omicalcay. Erethay eeklyway arriveay inay isthay owntay
oresscay ofay eengray Ermontersvay anday Ewnay Ampshirehay enmay, allay athirstay orfay aingay
anday oryglay inay ethay isheryfay. Eythay areay ostlymay oungyay, ofay alwartstay amesfray;
ellowsfay owhay avehay elledfay orestsfay, anday ownay eeksay otay opdray ethay axeay anday
atchsnay ethay ale-lancewhay. Anymay areay asay eengray asay ethay Eengray Ountainsmay encewhay
eythay amecay. Inay omesay ingsthay ouyay ouldway inkthay emthay utbay aay ewfay ourshay olday.
Ooklay erethay! atthay apchay uttingstray oundray ethay ornercay. Ehay earsway aay eaverbay athay
anday allow-tailedsway oatcay, irdledgay ithway aay ailor-beltsay anday eath-knifeshay.
Erehay omescay anotheray ithway aay ou’-westersay anday aay ombazinebay oakclay.

Onay own-bredtay andyday illway omparecay ithway aay ountry-bredcay one—Iay eanmay aay
ownrightday umpkinbay andy—aday ellowfay atthay, inay ethay og-daysday, illway owmay ishay
otway acresay inay uckskinbay ovesglay orfay earfay ofay anningtay ishay andshay. Ownay enwhay aay
ountrycay andyday ikelay isthay akestay itay intoay ishay eadhay otay akemay aay istinguishedday
eputationray, anday oinsjay ethay eatgray ale-fisherywhay, ouyay ouldshay eesay ethay
omicalcay ingsthay ehay oesday uponay eachingray ethay eaportsay. Inay espeakingbay ishay
ea-outfitsay, ehay ordersay ell-buttonsbay otay ishay aistcoatsway; apsstray otay ishay
anvascay owserstray. Ahay, oorpay Ay-Seedhay! owhay itterlybay illway urstbay osethay
apsstray inay ethay irstfay owlinghay alegay, enwhay outhay artay ivendray, apsstray,
uttonsbay, anday allay, ownday ethay oatthray ofay ethay empesttay.

Utbay inkthay otnay atthay isthay amousfay owntay ashay onlyay arpooneershay, annibalscay,
anday umpkinsbay otay owshay erhay isitorsvay. Otnay atay allay. Illstay Ewnay Edfordbay isay aay
ueerqay aceplay. Adhay itay otnay eenbay orfay usay alemenwhay, atthay acttray ofay andlay ouldway
isthay ayday erhapspay avehay eenbay inay asay owlinghay onditioncay asay ethay oastcay ofay
Abradorlay. Asay itay isay, artspay ofay erhay ackbay ountrycay areay enoughay otay ightenfray
oneay, eythay ooklay osay onybay. Ethay owntay itselfay isay erhapspay ethay earestday aceplay otay
ivelay inay, inay allay Ewnay Englanday. Itay isay aay andlay ofay oilay, uetray enoughay: utbay otnay
ikelay Anaancay; aay andlay, alsoay, ofay orncay anday ineway. Ethay eetsstray oday otnay unray
ithway ilkmay; ornay inay ethay ing-timespray oday eythay avepay emthay ithway eshfray eggsay.
Etyay, inay itespay ofay isthay, owherenay inay allay Americaay illway ouyay indfay oremay
atrician-likepay ouseshay; arkspay anday ardensgay oremay opulentay, anthay inay Ewnay
Edfordbay. Encewhay amecay eythay? owhay antedplay uponay isthay onceay aggyscray oriascay ofay
aay ountrycay?

Ogay anday azegay uponay ethay ironay emblematicalay arpoonshay oundray onderyay oftylay
ansionmay, anday ouryay uestionqay illway ebay answereday. Esyay; allay esethay avebray
ouseshay anday oweryflay ardensgay amecay omfray ethay Atlanticay, Acificpay, anday Indianay
oceansay. Oneay anday allay, eythay ereway arpoonedhay anday aggeddray upay itherhay omfray ethay
ottombay ofay ethay easay. Ancay Errhay Alexanderay erformpay aay eatfay ikelay atthay?

Inay Ewnay Edfordbay, athersfay, eythay aysay, ivegay aleswhay orfay owersday otay eirthay
aughtersday, anday ortionpay offay eirthay iecesnay ithway aay ewfay orpoisespay a-pieceay.
Ouyay ustmay ogay otay Ewnay Edfordbay otay eesay aay illiantbray eddingway; orfay, eythay aysay,
eythay avehay eservoirsray ofay oilay inay everyay ousehay, anday everyay ightnay ecklesslyray
urnbay eirthay engthslay inay ermacetispay andlescay.

Inay ummersay imetay, ethay owntay isay eetsway otay eesay; ullfay ofay inefay aples—longmay
avenuesay ofay eengray anday oldgay. Anday inay Augustay, ighhay inay airay, ethay eautifulbay
anday ountifulbay orse-chestnutshay, andelabra-wisecay, offerpray ethay asser-bypay
eirthay aperingtay uprightay onescay ofay ongregatedcay ossomsblay. Osay omnipotentay isay
artay; ichwhay inay anymay aay istrictday ofay Ewnay Edfordbay ashay uperinducedsay ightbray
erracestay ofay owersflay uponay ethay arrenbay efuseray ocksray ownthray asideay atay
eation’scray inalfay ayday.

Anday ethay omenway ofay Ewnay Edfordbay, eythay oomblay ikelay eirthay ownay edray osesray. Utbay
osesray onlyay oomblay inay ummersay; ereaswhay ethay inefay arnationcay ofay eirthay eekschay
isay erennialpay asay unlightsay inay ethay eventhsay eavenshay. Elsewhereay atchmay atthay
oomblay ofay eirsthay, eyay annotcay, avesay inay Alemsay, erewhay eythay elltay emay ethay oungyay
irlsgay eathebray uchsay uskmay, eirthay ailorsay eetheartssway ellsmay emthay ilesmay offay
oreshay, asay oughthay eythay ereway awingdray ighnay ethay odorousay Oluccasmay insteaday ofay
ethay Uritanicpay andssay.


APTERcHay 7ay. Ethay Apelchay.

Inay isthay amesay Ewnay Edfordbay erethay andsstay aay Aleman’swhay Apelchay, anday ewfay areay
ethay oodymay ishermenfay, ortlyshay oundbay orfay ethay Indianay Oceanay oray Acificpay, owhay
ailfay otay akemay aay Undaysay isitvay otay ethay otspay. Iay amay uresay atthay Iay idday otnay.

Eturningray omfray myay irstfay orningmay ollstray, Iay againay alliedsay outay uponay isthay
ecialspay erranday. Ethay skyay adhay angedchay omfray earclay, unnysay oldcay, otay ivingdray
eetslay anday istmay. Appingwray elfmysay inay myay aggyshay acketjay ofay ethay othclay alledcay
earskinbay, Iay oughtfay myay ayway againstay ethay ubbornstay ormstay. Enteringay, Iay oundfay
aay allsmay atteredscay ongregationcay ofay ailorssay, anday ailors’say ivesway anday
idowsway. Aay uffledmay ilencesay eignedray, onlyay okenbray atay imestay byay ethay ieksshray
ofay ethay ormstay. Eachay ilentsay orshipperway eemedsay urposelypay ittingsay apartay
omfray ethay otheray, asay ifay eachay ilentsay iefgray ereway insularay anday
incommunicableay. Ethay aplainchay adhay otnay etyay arriveday; anday erethay esethay
ilentsay islandsay ofay enmay anday omenway atsay eadfastlystay eyeingay everalsay arblemay
abletstay, ithway ackblay ordersbay, asonedmay intoay ethay allway onay eitheray idesay ethay
ulpitpay. Eethray ofay emthay anray omethingsay ikelay ethay ollowingfay, utbay Iay oday otnay
etendpray otay uote:—qay

ACREDsay Otay EtHay EMORYmay OFay OHNjay ALBOTtay, Owhay, atay ethay ageay ofay eighteenay, asway
ostlay overboarday, Earnay ethay Isleay ofay Esolationday, offay Atagoniapay, ovember__Nay
1_st_ay, 1836ay. IStHay ABLETtay Isay erecteday otay ishay Emorymay BYay IShay ISTERsay.

ACREDsay Otay EtHay EMORYmay OFay OBERTray ONGlay, ILLISway ELLERYay, ATHANnay OLEMANcay,
ALTERway ANNYcay, ETHsay ACYmay, ANDay AMUELsay EIGgLay, Ormingfay oneay ofay ethay oats’bay
ewscray OFay EtHay IPsHay ELIZAay Owhay ereway owedtay outay ofay ightsay byay aay Alewhay, Onay ethay
Off-shoreay Oundgray inay ethay ACIFICpay, ecember__Day 31_st_ay, 1839ay. IStHay ARBLEmay
Isay erehay acedplay byay eirthay urvivingsay IPMATESsHay.

ACREDsay Otay EtHay EMORYmay OFay Ethay atelay APTAINcay EZEKIELay ARDYhay, Owhay inay ethay owsbay
ofay ishay oatbay asway illedkay byay aay Ermspay Alewhay onay ethay oastcay ofay Apanjay, August__ay
3_d_ay, 1833ay. IStHay ABLETtay Isay erecteday otay ishay Emorymay BYay IShay IDOWway.

Akingshay offay ethay eetslay omfray myay ice-glazeday athay anday acketjay, Iay eatedsay
elfmysay earnay ethay oorday, anday urningtay idewayssay asway urprisedsay otay eesay
Ueequegqay earnay emay. Affecteday byay ethay olemnitysay ofay ethay enescay, erethay asway aay
onderingway azegay ofay incredulousay uriositycay inay ishay ountenancecay. Isthay avagesay
asway ethay onlyay ersonpay esentpray owhay eemedsay otay oticenay myay entranceay; ecausebay
ehay asway ethay onlyay oneay owhay ouldcay otnay eadray, anday, ereforethay, asway otnay eadingray
osethay igidfray inscriptionsay onay ethay allway. Etherwhay anyay ofay ethay elativesray ofay
ethay eamensay osewhay amesnay appeareday erethay ereway ownay amongay ethay ongregationcay,
Iay ewknay otnay; utbay osay anymay areay ethay unrecordeday accidentsay inay ethay isheryfay,
anday osay ainlyplay idday everalsay omenway esentpray earway ethay ountenancecay ifay otnay
ethay appingstray ofay omesay unceasingay iefgray, atthay Iay eelfay uresay atthay erehay
eforebay emay ereway assembleday osethay, inay osewhay unhealingay eartshay ethay ightsay ofay
osethay eakblay abletstay atheticallysympay ausedcay ethay olday oundsway otay eedblay
afreshay.

Ohay! eyay osewhay eadday ielay uriedbay eneathbay ethay eengray assgray; owhay andingstay
amongay owersflay ancay ay—heresay, ere__hay ieslay myay elovedbay; eyay owknay otnay ethay
esolationday atthay oodsbray inay osomsbay ikelay esethay. Atwhay itterbay anksblay inay
osethay ack-borderedblay arblesmay ichwhay overcay onay ashesay! Atwhay espairday inay
osethay immovableay inscriptionsay! Atwhay eadlyday oidsvay anday unbiddenay
infidelitiesay inay ethay ineslay atthay eemsay otay awgnay uponay allay Aithfay, anday efuseray
esurrectionsray otay ethay eingsbay owhay avehay acelesslyplay erishedpay ithoutway aay
avegray. Asay ellway ightmay osethay abletstay andstay inay ethay avecay ofay Elephantaay asay
erehay.

Inay atwhay ensuscay ofay ivinglay eaturescray, ethay eadday ofay ankindmay areay includeday;
whyay itay isay atthay aay universalay overbpray ayssay ofay emthay, atthay eythay elltay onay
alestay, oughthay ontainingcay oremay ecretssay anthay ethay Oodwingay Andssay; owhay itay isay
atthay otay ishay amenay owhay esterdayyay epartedday orfay ethay otheray orldway, eway efixpray
osay ignificantsay anday infidelay aay ordway, anday etyay oday otnay usthay entitleay imhay, ifay
ehay utbay embarksay orfay ethay emotestray Indiesay ofay isthay ivinglay earthay; whyay ethay
Ifelay Insuranceay Ompaniescay aypay eath-forfeituresday uponay immortalsay; inay atwhay
eternalay, unstirringay aralysispay, anday eadlyday, opelesshay ancetray, etyay ieslay
antiqueay Adamay owhay iedday ixtysay oundray enturiescay agoay; owhay itay isay atthay eway
illstay efuseray otay ebay omfortedcay orfay osethay owhay eway everthelessnay aintainmay areay
ellingdway inay unspeakableay issblay; whyay allay ethay ivinglay osay ivestray otay ushhay allay
ethay eadday; ereforewhay utbay ethay umorray ofay aay ockingknay inay aay ombtay illway errifytay
aay olewhay itycay. Allay esethay ingsthay areay otnay ithoutway eirthay eaningsmay.

Utbay Aithfay, ikelay aay ackaljay, eedsfay amongay ethay ombstay, anday evenay omfray esethay
eadday oubtsday eshay athersgay erhay ostmay italvay opehay.

Itay eedsnay arcelyscay otay ebay oldtay, ithway atwhay eelingsfay, onay ethay eveay ofay aay
Antucketnay oyagevay, Iay egardedray osethay arblemay abletstay, anday byay ethay urkymay
ightlay ofay atthay arkenedday, olefulday ayday eadray ethay atefay ofay ethay alemenwhay owhay
adhay onegay eforebay emay. Esyay, Ishmaelay, ethay amesay atefay aymay ebay inethay. Utbay
omehowsay Iay ewgray errymay againay. Elightfulday inducementsay otay embarkay, inefay
ancechay orfay omotionpray, itay eems—ayesay, aay ovestay oatbay illway akemay emay anay
immortalay byay evetbray. Esyay, erethay isay eathday inay isthay usinessbay ofay aling—awhay
eechlesslyspay uickqay aoticchay undlingbay ofay aay anmay intoay Eternityay. Utbay atwhay
enthay? Ethinksmay eway avehay ugelyhay istakenmay isthay attermay ofay Ifelay anday Eathday.
Ethinksmay atthay atwhay eythay allcay myay adowshay erehay onay earthay isay myay uetray
ubstancesay. Ethinksmay atthay inay ookinglay atay ingsthay iritualspay, eway areay ootay
uchmay ikelay oystersay observingay ethay unsay oughthray ethay aterway, anday inkingthay
atthay ickthay aterway ethay innestthay ofay airay. Ethinksmay myay odybay isay utbay ethay eeslay
ofay myay etterbay eingbay. Inay actfay aketay myay odybay owhay illway, aketay itay Iay aysay, itay isay
otnay emay. Anday ereforethay eethray eerschay orfay Antucketnay; anday omecay aay ovestay oatbay
anday ovestay odybay enwhay eythay illway, orfay avestay myay oulsay, Ovejay imselfhay annotcay.


APTERcHay 8ay. Ethay Ulpitpay.

Iay adhay otnay eenbay eatedsay eryvay onglay ereay aay anmay ofay aay ertaincay enerablevay
obustnessray entereday; immediatelyay asay ethay orm-peltedstay oorday ewflay ackbay uponay
admittingay imhay, aay uickqay egardfulray eyeingay ofay imhay byay allay ethay ongregationcay,
ufficientlysay attesteday atthay isthay inefay olday anmay asway ethay aplainchay. Esyay, itay
asway ethay amousfay Atherfay Applemay, osay alledcay byay ethay alemenwhay, amongay omwhay ehay
asway aay eryvay eatgray avouritefay. Ehay adhay eenbay aay ailorsay anday aay arpooneerhay inay
ishay outhyay, utbay orfay anymay earsyay astpay adhay edicatedday ishay ifelay otay ethay
inistrymay. Atay ethay imetay Iay ownay itewray ofay, Atherfay Applemay asway inay ethay ardyhay
interway ofay aay ealthyhay olday ageay; atthay ortsay ofay olday ageay ichwhay eemssay ergingmay
intoay aay econdsay oweringflay outhyay, orfay amongay allay ethay issuresfay ofay ishay
inkleswray, erethay oneshay ertaincay ildmay eamsglay ofay aay ewlynay evelopingday
oom—theblay ingspray erdurevay eepingpay orthfay evenay eneathbay Ebruary’sfay owsnay. Onay
oneay avinghay eviouslypray eardhay ishay istoryhay, ouldcay orfay ethay irstfay imetay
eholdbay Atherfay Applemay ithoutway ethay utmostay interestay, ecausebay erethay ereway
ertaincay engrafteday ericalclay eculiaritiespay aboutay imhay, imputableay otay atthay
adventurousay aritimemay ifelay ehay adhay edlay. Enwhay ehay entereday Iay observeday atthay
ehay arriedcay onay umbrellaay, anday ertainlycay adhay otnay omecay inay ishay arriagecay, orfay
ishay arpaulintay athay anray ownday ithway eltingmay eetslay, anday ishay eatgray ilotpay
othclay acketjay eemedsay almostay otay agdray imhay otay ethay oorflay ithway ethay eightway ofay
ethay aterway itay adhay absorbeday. Oweverhay, athay anday oatcay anday overshoesay ereway oneay
byay oneay emovedray, anday unghay upay inay aay ittlelay acespay inay anay adjacentay ornercay;
enwhay, arrayeday inay aay ecentday uitsay, ehay uietlyqay approacheday ethay ulpitpay.

Ikelay ostmay olday ashionedfay ulpitspay, itay asway aay eryvay oftylay oneay, anday incesay aay
egularray airsstay otay uchsay aay eighthay ouldway, byay itsay onglay angleay ithway ethay
oorflay, eriouslysay ontractcay ethay alreadyay allsmay areaay ofay ethay apelchay, ethay
architectay, itay eemedsay, adhay acteday uponay ethay inthay ofay Atherfay Applemay, anday
inishedfay ethay ulpitpay ithoutway aay airsstay, ubstitutingsay aay erpendicularpay idesay
adderlay, ikelay osethay useday inay ountingmay aay ipshay omfray aay oatbay atay easay. Ethay ifeway
ofay aay alingwhay aptaincay adhay ovidedpray ethay apelchay ithway aay andsomehay airpay ofay
edray orstedway an-ropesmay orfay isthay adderlay, ichwhay, eingbay itselfay icelynay
eadedhay, anday ainedstay ithway aay ahoganymay olourcay, ethay olewhay ontrivancecay,
onsideringcay atwhay annermay ofay apelchay itay asway, eemedsay byay onay eansmay inay adbay
astetay. Altinghay orfay anay instantay atay ethay ootfay ofay ethay adderlay, anday ithway othbay
andshay aspinggray ethay ornamentalay obsknay ofay ethay an-ropesmay, Atherfay Applemay
astcay aay ooklay upwardsay, anday enthay ithway aay ulytray ailor-likesay utbay illstay
everentialray exterityday, andhay overay andhay, ountedmay ethay epsstay asay ifay
ascendingay ethay ain-topmay ofay ishay esselvay.

Ethay erpendicularpay artspay ofay isthay idesay adderlay, asay isay usuallyay ethay asecay
ithway ingingsway onesay, ereway ofay oth-coveredclay operay, onlyay ethay oundsray ereway ofay
oodway, osay atthay atay everyay epstay erethay asway aay ointjay. Atay myay irstfay impseglay ofay
ethay ulpitpay, itay adhay otnay escapeday emay atthay oweverhay onvenientcay orfay aay ipshay,
esethay ointsjay inay ethay esentpray instanceay eemedsay unnecessaryay. Orfay Iay asway otnay
eparedpray otay eesay Atherfay Applemay afteray aininggay ethay eighthay, owlyslay urntay
oundray, anday oopingstay overay ethay ulpitpay, eliberatelyday agdray upay ethay adderlay
epstay byay epstay, illtay ethay olewhay asway epositedday ithinway, eavinglay imhay
impregnableay inay ishay ittlelay Uebecqay.

Iay onderedpay omesay imetay ithoutway ullyfay omprehendingcay ethay easonray orfay isthay.
Atherfay Applemay enjoyeday uchsay aay ideway eputationray orfay inceritysay anday
anctitysay, atthay Iay ouldcay otnay uspectsay imhay ofay ourtingcay otorietynay byay anyay
eremay ickstray ofay ethay agestay. Onay, oughtthay Iay, erethay ustmay ebay omesay obersay
easonray orfay isthay ingthay; urthermorefay, itay ustmay olizesymbay omethingsay unseenay.
Ancay itay ebay, enthay, atthay byay atthay actay ofay icalphysay isolationay, ehay ignifiessay
ishay iritualspay ithdrawalway orfay ethay imetay, omfray allay outwarday orldlyway iestay
anday onnexionscay? Esyay, orfay eplenishedray ithway ethay eatmay anday ineway ofay ethay
ordway, otay ethay aithfulfay anmay ofay Odgay, isthay ulpitpay, Iay eesay, isay aay
elf-containingsay onghold—astray oftylay Ehrenbreitsteinay, ithway aay erennialpay
ellway ofay aterway ithinway ethay allsway.

Utbay ethay idesay adderlay asway otnay ethay onlyay angestray eaturefay ofay ethay aceplay,
orrowedbay omfray ethay aplain’schay ormerfay ea-faringssay. Etweenbay ethay arblemay
enotaphscay onay eitheray andhay ofay ethay ulpitpay, ethay allway ichwhay ormedfay itsay ackbay
asway adorneday ithway aay argelay aintingpay epresentingray aay allantgay ipshay eatingbay
againstay aay erribletay ormstay offay aay eelay oastcay ofay ackblay ocksray anday owysnay
eakersbray. Utbay ighhay aboveay ethay ingflyay udscay anday ark-rollingday oudsclay, erethay
oatedflay aay ittlelay isleay ofay unlightsay, omfray ichwhay eamedbay orthfay anay angel’say
acefay; anday isthay ightbray acefay edshay aay istinctday otspay ofay adianceray uponay ethay
ip’sshay ossedtay eckday, omethingsay ikelay atthay ilversay ateplay ownay inserteday intoay
ethay Ictory’svay ankplay erewhay Elsonnay ellfay. Ah“ay, oblenay ip,”shay ethay angelay
eemedsay otay aysay, eat“bay onay, eatbay onay, outhay oblenay ipshay, anday earbay aay ardyhay
elmhay; orfay olay! ethay unsay isay eakingbray oughthray; ethay oudsclay areay ollingray
off—serenestay azureay isay atay and.”hay

Ornay asway ethay ulpitpay itselfay ithoutway aay acetray ofay ethay amesay ea-tastesay atthay
adhay achieveday ethay adderlay anday ethay icturepay. Itsay anelledpay ontfray asway inay ethay
ikenesslay ofay aay ip’sshay uffblay owsbay, anday ethay Olyhay Iblebay estedray onay aay
ojectingpray iecepay ofay ollscray orkway, ashionedfay afteray aay ip’sshay iddle-headedfay
eakbay.

Atwhay ouldcay ebay oremay ullfay ofay eaning?—formay ethay ulpitpay isay everay isthay earth’say
oremostfay artpay; allay ethay estray omescay inay itsay earray; ethay ulpitpay eadslay ethay
orldway. Omfray encethay itay isay ethay ormstay ofay Od’sgay uickqay athwray isay irstfay
escriedday, anday ethay owbay ustmay earbay ethay earliestay untbray. Omfray encethay itay isay
ethay Odgay ofay eezesbray airfay oray oulfay isay irstfay invokeday orfay avourablefay indsway.
Esyay, ethay orld’sway aay ipshay onay itsay assagepay outay, anday otnay aay oyagevay ompletecay;
anday ethay ulpitpay isay itsay owpray.


APTERcHay 9ay. Ethay Ermonsay.

Atherfay Applemay oseray, anday inay aay ildmay oicevay ofay unassumingay authorityay ordereday
ethay atteredscay eoplepay otay ondensecay. arboard“Stay angwaygay, erethay! idesay awayay
otay arboard—larboardlay angwaygay otay arboardstay! Idshipsmay! idships!”may

Erethay asway aay owlay umblingray ofay eavyhay ea-bootssay amongay ethay enchesbay, anday aay
illstay ighterslay ufflingshay ofay omen’sway oesshay, anday allay asway uietqay againay, anday
everyay eyeay onay ethay eacherpray.

Ehay ausedpay aay ittlelay; enthay eelingknay inay ethay ulpit’spay owsbay, oldedfay ishay
argelay ownbray andshay acrossay ishay estchay, uplifteday ishay osedclay eyesay, anday
offereday aay ayerpray osay eeplyday evoutday atthay ehay eemedsay eelingknay anday ayingpray
atay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay.

Isthay endeday, inay olongedpray olemnsay onestay, ikelay ethay ontinualcay ollingtay ofay aay
ellbay inay aay ipshay atthay isay ounderingfay atay easay inay aay og—infay uchsay onestay ehay
ommencedcay eadingray ethay ollowingfay hymnay; utbay angingchay ishay annermay owardstay
ethay oncludingcay anzasstay, urstbay orthfay ithway aay ealingpay exultationay anday oy—jay


e“Thay ibsray anday errorstay inay ethay alewhay, Archeday overay emay aay ismalday oomglay,
Ilewhay allay Od’sgay un-litsay avesway olledray byay, Anday iftlay emay eepeningday ownday
otay oomday.

I“ay awsay ethay openingay awmay ofay ellhay, Ithway endlessay ainspay anday orrowssay erethay;
Ichwhay onenay utbay eythay atthay eelfay ancay ell—tay Ohay, Iay asway ungingplay otay
espairday.

In“ay ackblay istressday, Iay alledcay myay Odgay, Enwhay Iay ouldcay arcescay elievebay imhay
inemay, Ehay owedbay ishay earay otay myay omplaints—cay Onay oremay ethay alewhay idday emay
onfinecay.

ith“Way eedspay ehay ewflay otay myay eliefray, Asay onay aay adiantray olphinday ornebay;
Awfulay, etyay ightbray, asay ightninglay oneshay Ethay acefay ofay myay Elivererday Odgay.

“Myay ongsay orfay everay allshay ecordray Atthay erribletay, atthay oyfuljay ourhay; Iay
ivegay ethay oryglay otay myay Odgay, Ishay allay ethay ercymay anday ethay ower.”pay




Earlynay allay oinedjay inay ingingsay isthay hymnay, ichwhay elledsway ighhay aboveay ethay
owlinghay ofay ethay ormstay. Aay iefbray ausepay ensueday; ethay eacherpray owlyslay urnedtay
overay ethay eaveslay ofay ethay Iblebay, anday atay astlay, oldingfay ishay andhay ownday uponay
ethay operpray agepay, aidsay: eloved“Bay ipmatesshay, inchclay ethay astlay ersevay ofay ethay
irstfay apterchay ofay Onah—‘Andjay Odgay adhay eparedpray aay eatgray ishfay otay allowsway upay
Onah.’”jay

ipmates“Shay, isthay ookbay, ontainingcay onlyay ourfay apters—fourchay arns—isyay oneay
ofay ethay allestsmay andsstray inay ethay ightymay ablecay ofay ethay Ipturesscray. Etyay atwhay
epthsday ofay ethay oulsay oesday Onah’sjay eepday ealinesay oundsay! atwhay aay egnantpray
essonlay otay usay isay isthay ophetpray! Atwhay aay oblenay ingthay isay atthay anticlecay inay
ethay ish’sfay ellybay! Owhay illow-likebay anday oisterouslybay andgray! Eway eelfay ethay
oodsflay urgingsay overay usay; eway oundsay ithway imhay otay ethay elpykay ottombay ofay ethay
atersway; ea-weedsay anday allay ethay imeslay ofay ethay easay isay aboutay usay! Utbay at__whay
isay isthay essonlay atthay ethay ookbay ofay Onahjay eachestay? Ipmatesshay, itay isay aay
o-strandedtway essonlay; aay essonlay otay usay allay asay infulsay enmay, anday aay essonlay otay
emay asay aay ilotpay ofay ethay ivinglay Odgay. Asay infulsay enmay, itay isay aay essonlay otay usay
allay, ecausebay itay isay aay orystay ofay ethay insay, ard-heartednesshay, uddenlysay
awakeneday earsfay, ethay iftsway unishmentpay, epentanceray, ayerspray, anday inallyfay
ethay eliveranceday anday oyjay ofay Onahjay. Asay ithway allay innerssay amongay enmay, ethay
insay ofay isthay onsay ofay Amittaiay asway inay ishay ilfulway isobedienceday ofay ethay
ommandcay ofay Od—nevergay indmay ownay atwhay atthay ommandcay asway, oray owhay
onveyed—whichcay ehay oundfay aay ardhay ommandcay. Utbay allay ethay ingsthay atthay Odgay
ouldway avehay usay oday areay ardhay orfay usay otay o—rememberday at—andthay encehay, ehay
ofteneray ommandscay usay anthay endeavorsay otay ersuadepay. Anday ifay eway obeyay Odgay, eway
ustmay isobeyday ourselvesay; anday itay isay inay isthay isobeyingday ourselvesay, ereinwhay
ethay ardnesshay ofay obeyingay Odgay onsistscay.

ith“Way isthay insay ofay isobedienceday inay imhay, Onahjay illstay urtherfay outsflay atay
Odgay, byay eekingsay otay eeflay omfray Imhay. Ehay inksthay atthay aay ipshay ademay byay enmay
illway arrycay imhay intoay ountriescay erewhay Odgay oesday otnay eignray, utbay onlyay ethay
Aptainscay ofay isthay earthay. Ehay ulksskay aboutay ethay arveswhay ofay Oppajay, anday eekssay
aay ipshay at’sthay oundbay orfay Arshishtay. Erethay urkslay, erhapspay, aay ithertohay
unheededay eaningmay erehay. Byay allay accountsay Arshishtay ouldcay avehay eenbay onay
otheray itycay anthay ethay odernmay Adizcay. At’sthay ethay opinionay ofay earnedlay enmay.
Anday erewhay isay Adizcay, ipmatesshay? Adizcay isay inay Ainspay; asay arfay byay aterway, omfray
Oppajay, asay Onahjay ouldcay ossiblypay avehay ailedsay inay osethay ancientay aysday, enwhay
ethay Atlanticay asway anay almostay unknownay easay. Ecausebay Oppajay, ethay odernmay
Affajay, ipmatesshay, isay onay ethay ostmay easterlyay oastcay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay,
ethay Iansyray; anday Arshishtay oray Adizcay oremay anthay otway ousandthay ilesmay otay ethay
estwardway omfray atthay, ustjay outsideay ethay Aitsstray ofay Ibraltargay. Eesay eyay otnay
enthay, ipmatesshay, atthay Onahjay oughtsay otay eeflay orld-wideway omfray Odgay?
Iserablemay anmay! Ohay! ostmay ontemptiblecay anday orthyway ofay allay ornscay; ithway
ouchedslay athay anday uiltygay eyeay, ulkingskay omfray ishay Odgay; owlingpray amongay ethay
ippingshay ikelay aay ilevay urglarbay asteninghay otay osscray ethay eassay. Osay
isorderedday, elf-condemningsay isay ishay ooklay, atthay adhay erethay eenbay olicemenpay
inay osethay aysday, Onahjay, onay ethay eremay uspicionsay ofay omethingsay ongwray, adhay
eenbay arresteday ereay ehay ouchedtay aay eckday. Owhay ainlyplay e’shay aay ugitivefay! onay
aggagebay, otnay aay at-boxhay, alisevay, oray arpet-bag,—nocay iendsfray accompanyay imhay
otay ethay arfwhay ithway eirthay adieuxay. Atay astlay, afteray uchmay odgingday earchsay, ehay
indsfay ethay Arshishtay ipshay eceivingray ethay astlay itemsay ofay erhay argocay; anday asay
ehay epsstay onay oardbay otay eesay itsay Aptaincay inay ethay abincay, allay ethay ailorssay orfay
ethay omentmay esistday omfray oistinghay inay ethay oodsgay, otay arkmay ethay anger’sstray
evilay eyeay. Onahjay eessay isthay; utbay inay ainvay ehay iestray otay ooklay allay easeay anday
onfidencecay; inay ainvay essaysay ishay etchedwray ilesmay. Ongstray intuitionsay ofay ethay
anmay assureay ethay arinersmay ehay ancay ebay onay innocentay. Inay eirthay amesomegay utbay
illstay erioussay ayway, oneay isperswhay otay ethay other—“Jackay, e’shay obbedray aay
idow;”way oray, oe“Jay, oday ouyay arkmay imhay; e’shay aay igamist;”bay oray, arry“Hay adlay, Iay
uessgay e’shay ethay adultereray atthay okebray ailjay inay olday Omorrahgay, oray elikebay,
oneay ofay ethay issingmay urderersmay omfray Odom.”say Anotheray unsray otay eadray ethay illbay
at’sthay uckstay againstay ethay ilespay uponay ethay arfwhay otay ichwhay ethay ipshay isay
ooredmay, offeringay ivefay undredhay oldgay oinscay orfay ethay apprehensionay ofay aay
arricidepay, anday ontainingcay aay escriptionday ofay ishay ersonpay. Ehay eadsray, anday
ookslay omfray Onahjay otay ethay illbay; ilewhay allay ishay atheticsympay ipmatesshay ownay
owdcray oundray Onahjay, eparedpray otay aylay eirthay andshay uponay imhay. Ightedfray Onahjay
emblestray, anday ummoningsay allay ishay oldnessbay otay ishay acefay, onlyay ookslay osay
uchmay ethay oremay aay owardcay. Ehay illway otnay onfesscay imselfhay uspectedsay; utbay atthay
itselfay isay ongstray uspicionsay. Osay ehay akesmay ethay estbay ofay itay; anday enwhay ethay
ailorssay indfay imhay otnay otay ebay ethay anmay atthay isay advertiseday, eythay etlay imhay
asspay, anday ehay escendsday intoay ethay abincay.

o’s“‘Whay ere?’thay iescray ethay Aptaincay atay ishay usybay eskday, urriedlyhay akingmay
outay ishay aperspay orfay ethay Ustoms—‘Who’scay ere?’thay Ohay! owhay atthay armlesshay
uestionqay anglesmay Onahjay! Orfay ethay instantay ehay almostay urnstay otay eeflay againay.
Utbay ehay alliesray. I‘ay eeksay aay assagepay inay isthay ipshay otay Arshishtay; owhay oonsay
ailsay eyay, ir?’say Usthay arfay ethay usybay Aptaincay adhay otnay ookedlay upay otay Onahjay,
oughthay ethay anmay ownay andsstay eforebay imhay; utbay onay oonersay oesday ehay earhay atthay
ollowhay oicevay, anthay ehay artsday aay utinizingscray anceglay. e‘Way ailsay ithway ethay
extnay omingcay ide,’tay atay astlay ehay owlyslay answereday, illstay intentlyay eyeingay
imhay. o‘Nay oonersay, ir?’—‘Soonsay enoughay orfay anyay onesthay anmay atthay oesgay aay
assenger.’pay Ahay! Onahjay, at’sthay anotheray abstay. Utbay ehay iftlysway allscay awayay
ethay Aptaincay omfray atthay entscay. I’ll‘ay ailsay ithway e,’—heyay ays,—‘thesay assagepay
oneymay owhay uchmay isay at?—I’llthay aypay ow.’nay Orfay itay isay articularlypay ittenwray,
ipmatesshay, asay ifay itay ereway aay ingthay otnay otay ebay overlookeday inay isthay istoryhay,
at‘thay ehay aidpay ethay arefay ereof’thay ereay ethay aftcray idday ailsay. Anday akentay ithway
ethay ontextcay, isthay isay ullfay ofay eaningmay.

ow“Nay Onah’sjay Aptaincay, ipmatesshay, asway oneay osewhay iscernmentday etectsday
imecray inay anyay, utbay osewhay upiditycay exposesay itay onlyay inay ethay ennilesspay. Inay
isthay orldway, ipmatesshay, insay atthay ayspay itsay ayway ancay aveltray eelyfray, anday
ithoutway aay assportpay; ereaswhay Irtuevay, ifay aay auperpay, isay oppedstay atay allay
ontiersfray. Osay Onah’sjay Aptaincay eparespray otay esttay ethay engthlay ofay Onah’sjay
ursepay, ereay ehay udgejay imhay openlyay. Ehay argeschay imhay icethray ethay usualay umsay;
anday it’say assenteday otay. Enthay ethay Aptaincay owsknay atthay Onahjay isay aay ugitivefay;
utbay atay ethay amesay imetay esolvesray otay elphay aay ightflay atthay avespay itsay earray ithway
oldgay. Etyay enwhay Onahjay airlyfay akestay outay ishay ursepay, udentpray uspicionssay
illstay olestmay ethay Aptaincay. Ehay ingsray everyay oincay otay indfay aay ounterfeitcay.
Otnay aay orgerfay, anyay ayway, ehay uttersmay; anday Onahjay isay utpay ownday orfay ishay
assagepay. oint‘Pay outay myay ate-roomstay, Ir,’say ayssay Onahjay ownay, I’m‘ay
avel-wearytray; Iay eednay eep.’slay ou‘Thay ookestlay ikelay it,’ay ayssay ethay Aptaincay,
ere’s‘thay thyay oom.’ray Onahjay entersay, anday ouldway ocklay ethay oorday, utbay ethay ocklay
ontainscay onay eykay. Earinghay imhay oolishlyfay umblingfay erethay, ethay Aptaincay
aughslay owlylay otay imselfhay, anday uttersmay omethingsay aboutay ethay oorsday ofay
onvicts’cay ellscay eingbay evernay alloweday otay ebay ockedlay ithinway. Allay esseddray
anday ustyday asay ehay isay, Onahjay owsthray imselfhay intoay ishay erthbay, anday indsfay ethay
ittlelay ate-roomstay eilingcay almostay estingray onay ishay oreheadfay. Ethay airay isay
oseclay, anday Onahjay aspsgay. Enthay, inay atthay ontractedcay olehay, unksay, ootay,
eneathbay ethay ip’sshay ater-lineway, Onahjay eelsfay ethay eraldinghay esentimentpray
ofay atthay iflingstay ourhay, enwhay ethay alewhay allshay oldhay imhay inay ethay allestsmay ofay
ishay owels’bay ardsway.

ewed“Scray atay itsay axisay againstay ethay idesay, aay ingingsway amplay ightlyslay
oscillatesay inay Onah’sjay oomray; anday ethay ipshay, eelinghay overay owardstay ethay
arfwhay ithway ethay eightway ofay ethay astlay alesbay eceivedray, ethay amplay, ameflay anday
allay, oughthay inay ightslay otionmay, illstay aintainsmay aay ermanentpay obliquityay
ithway eferenceray otay ethay oomray; oughthay, inay uthtray, infalliblyay aightstray
itselfay, itay utbay ademay obviousay ethay alsefay, inglyay evelslay amongay ichwhay itay
unghay. Ethay amplay alarmsay anday ightensfray Onahjay; asay inglyay inay ishay erthbay ishay
ormentedtay eyesay ollray oundray ethay aceplay, anday isthay usthay arfay uccessfulsay
ugitivefay indsfay onay efugeray orfay ishay estlessray anceglay. Utbay atthay
ontradictioncay inay ethay amplay oremay anday oremay appalsay imhay. Ethay oorflay, ethay
eilingcay, anday ethay idesay, areay allay awryay. Oh‘ay! osay myay onsciencecay angshay inay
e!’may ehay oansgray, aight‘stray upwardsay, osay itay urnsbay; utbay ethay amberschay ofay myay
oulsay areay allay inay ookedness!’cray

ike“Lay oneay owhay afteray aay ightnay ofay unkendray evelryray ieshay otay ishay edbay, illstay
eelingray, utbay ithway onsciencecay etyay ickingpray imhay, asay ethay ungingsplay ofay ethay
Omanray ace-horseray utbay osay uchmay ethay oremay ikestray ishay eelstay agstay intoay imhay;
asay oneay owhay inay atthay iserablemay ightplay illstay urnstay anday urnstay inay iddygay
anguishay, ayingpray Odgay orfay annihilationay untilay ethay itfay ebay assedpay; anday atay
astlay amiday ethay irlwhay ofay oeway ehay eelsfay, aay eepday uporstay ealsstay overay imhay, asay
overay ethay anmay owhay eedsblay otay eathday, orfay onsciencecay isay ethay oundway, anday
ere’sthay aughtnay otay aunchstay itay; osay, afteray oresay estlingswray inay ishay erthbay,
Onah’sjay odigypray ofay onderouspay iserymay agsdray imhay owningdray ownday otay eepslay.

And“ay ownay ethay imetay ofay idetay ashay omecay; ethay ipshay astscay offay erhay ablescay; anday
omfray ethay esertedday arfwhay ethay uncheereday ipshay orfay Arshishtay, allay areeningcay,
idesglay otay easay. Atthay ipshay, myay iendsfray, asway ethay irstfay ofay ecordedray
ugglerssmay! ethay ontrabandcay asway Onahjay. Utbay ethay easay ebelsray; ehay illway otnay
earbay ethay ickedway urdenbay. Aay eadfuldray ormstay omescay onay, ethay ipshay isay ikelay otay
eakbray. Utbay ownay enwhay ethay oatswainbay allscay allay andshay otay ightenlay erhay; enwhay
oxesbay, alesbay, anday arsjay areay atteringclay overboarday; enwhay ethay indway isay
iekingshray, anday ethay enmay areay ellingyay, anday everyay ankplay understhay ithway
amplingtray eetfay ightray overay Onah’sjay eadhay; inay allay isthay agingray umulttay,
Onahjay eepsslay ishay ideoushay eepslay. Ehay eessay onay ackblay skyay anday agingray easay,
eelsfay otnay ethay eelingray imberstay, anday ittlelay earshay ehay oray eedshay ehay ethay arfay
ushray ofay ethay ightymay alewhay, ichwhay evenay ownay ithway openay outhmay isay eavingclay
ethay eassay afteray imhay. Ayeay, ipmatesshay, Onahjay asway onegay ownday intoay ethay idessay
ofay ethay ip—ashay erthbay inay ethay abincay asay Iay avehay akentay itay, anday asway astfay
asleepay. Utbay ethay ightenedfray astermay omescay otay imhay, anday ieksshray inay ishay eadday
earay, at‘Whay eanestmay outhay, Oay, eeperslay! arise!’ay Artledstay omfray ishay ethargylay
byay atthay irefulday cryay, Onahjay aggersstay otay ishay eetfay, anday umblingstay otay ethay
eckday, aspsgray aay oudshray, otay ooklay outay uponay ethay easay. Utbay atay atthay omentmay ehay
isay ungspray uponay byay aay antherpay illowbay eapinglay overay ethay ulwarksbay. Aveway
afteray aveway usthay eapslay intoay ethay ipshay, anday indingfay onay eedyspay entvay unsray
oaringray orefay anday aftay, illtay ethay arinersmay omecay ighnay otay owningdray ilewhay etyay
afloatay. Anday everay, asay ethay itewhay oonmay owsshay erhay affrighteday acefay omfray ethay
eepstay ulliesgay inay ethay acknessblay overheaday, aghastay Onahjay eessay ethay earingray
owspritbay ointingpay ighhay upwarday, utbay oonsay eatbay ownwardday againay owardstay ethay
ormentedtay eepday.

errors“Tay uponay errorstay unray outingshay oughthray ishay oulsay. Inay allay ishay
ingingcray attitudesay, ethay Od-fugitivegay isay ownay ootay ainlyplay ownknay. Ethay
ailorssay arkmay imhay; oremay anday oremay ertaincay owgray eirthay uspicionssay ofay imhay,
anday atay astlay, ullyfay otay esttay ethay uthtray, byay eferringray ethay olewhay attermay otay
ighhay Eavenhay, eythay allfay otay astingcay otslay, otay eesay orfay osewhay ausecay isthay
eatgray empesttay asway uponay emthay. Ethay otlay isay Onah’sjay; atthay iscoveredday, enthay
owhay uriouslyfay eythay obmay imhay ithway eirthay uestionsqay. at‘Whay isay inethay
occupationay? Encewhay omestcay outhay? Thyay ountrycay? Atwhay eoplepay? Utbay arkmay ownay,
myay ipmatesshay, ethay ehaviorbay ofay oorpay Onahjay. Ethay eageray arinersmay utbay askay
imhay owhay ehay isay, anday erewhay omfray; ereaswhay, eythay otnay onlyay eceiveray anay answeray
otay osethay uestionsqay, utbay ikewiselay anotheray answeray otay aay uestionqay otnay utpay
byay emthay, utbay ethay unsoliciteday answeray isay orcedfay omfray Onahjay byay ethay ardhay
andhay ofay Odgay atthay isay uponay imhay.

I“‘ay amay aay Ebrew,’hay ehay ies—andcray en—‘Ithay earfay ethay Ordlay ethay Odgay ofay Eavenhay
owhay athhay ademay ethay easay anday ethay dryay and!’lay Earfay imhay, Oay Onahjay? Ayeay, ellway
ightestmay outhay earfay ethay Ordlay Odgay en!__thay Aightwaystray, ehay ownay oesgay onay otay
akemay aay ullfay onfessioncay; ereuponwhay ethay arinersmay ecamebay oremay anday oremay
appalleday, utbay illstay areay itifulpay. Orfay enwhay Onahjay, otnay etyay upplicatingsay
Odgay orfay ercymay, incesay ehay utbay ootay ellway ewknay ethay arknessday ofay ishay
eserts,—whenday etchedwray Onahjay iescray outay otay emthay otay aketay imhay anday astcay imhay
orthfay intoay ethay easay, orfay ehay ewknay atthay orfay is__hay akesay isthay eatgray empesttay
asway uponay emthay; eythay ercifullymay urntay omfray imhay, anday eeksay byay otheray eansmay
otay avesay ethay ipshay. Utbay allay inay ainvay; ethay indignantay alegay owlshay ouderlay;
enthay, ithway oneay andhay aisedray invokinglyay otay Odgay, ithway ethay otheray eythay otnay
unreluctantlyay aylay oldhay ofay Onahjay.

And“ay ownay eholdbay Onahjay akentay upay asay anay anchoray anday oppeddray intoay ethay easay;
enwhay instantlyay anay oilyay almnesscay oatsflay outay omfray ethay eastay, anday ethay easay
isay illstay, asay Onahjay arriescay ownday ethay alegay ithway imhay, eavinglay oothsmay aterway
ehindbay. Ehay oesgay ownday inay ethay irlingwhay earthay ofay uchsay aay asterlessmay
ommotioncay atthay ehay arcescay eedshay ethay omentmay enwhay ehay opsdray eethingsay intoay
ethay awningyay awsjay awaitingay imhay; anday ethay alewhay oots-toshay allay ishay ivoryay
eethtay, ikelay osay anymay itewhay oltsbay, uponay ishay isonpray. Enthay Onahjay ayedpray
untoay ethay Ordlay outay ofay ethay ish’sfay ellybay. Utbay observeay ishay ayerpray, anday
earnlay aay eightyway essonlay. Orfay infulsay asay ehay isay, Onahjay oesday otnay eepway anday
ailway orfay irectday eliveranceday. Ehay eelsfay atthay ishay eadfuldray unishmentpay isay
ustjay. Ehay eaveslay allay ishay eliveranceday otay Odgay, ontentingcay imselfhay ithway
isthay, atthay itespay ofay allay ishay ainspay anday angspay, ehay illway illstay ooklay owardstay
Ishay olyhay empletay. Anday erehay, ipmatesshay, isay uetray anday aithfulfay epentanceray;
otnay amorousclay orfay ardonpay, utbay atefulgray orfay unishmentpay. Anday owhay easingplay
otay Odgay asway isthay onductcay inay Onahjay, isay ownshay inay ethay eventualay eliveranceday
ofay imhay omfray ethay easay anday ethay alewhay. Ipmatesshay, Iay oday otnay aceplay Onahjay
eforebay ouyay otay ebay opiedcay orfay ishay insay utbay Iay oday aceplay imhay eforebay ouyay asay aay
odelmay orfay epentanceray. Insay otnay; utbay ifay ouyay oday, aketay eedhay otay epentray ofay itay
ikelay Onah.”jay

Ilewhay ehay asway eakingspay esethay ordsway, ethay owlinghay ofay ethay iekingshray,
antingslay ormstay ithoutway eemedsay otay adday ewnay owerpay otay ethay eacherpray, owhay,
enwhay escribingday Onah’sjay ea-stormsay, eemedsay ossedtay byay aay ormstay imselfhay.
Ishay eepday estchay eavedhay asay ithway aay ound-swellgray; ishay ossedtay armsay eemedsay
ethay arringway elementsay atay orkway; anday ethay understhay atthay olledray awayay omfray
offay ishay arthysway owbray, anday ethay ightlay eapinglay omfray ishay eyeay, ademay allay ishay
implesay earershay ooklay onay imhay ithway aay uickqay earfay atthay asway angestray otay emthay.

Erethay ownay amecay aay ulllay inay ishay ooklay, asay ehay ilentlysay urnedtay overay ethay
eaveslay ofay ethay Ookbay onceay oremay; anday, atay astlay, andingstay otionlessmay, ithway
osedclay eyesay, orfay ethay omentmay, eemedsay ommuningcay ithway Odgay anday imselfhay.
