uriouscay orystay, atthay enwhay ehay ailedsay ethay olday Ategutcay alemanwhay, ishay ewcray,
uponay arrivingay omehay, ereway ostlymay allay arriedcay ashoreay otay ethay ospitalhay,
oresay exhausteday anday ornway outay. Orfay aay iouspay anmay, especiallyay orfay aay Uakerqay,
ehay asway ertainlycay atherray ard-heartedhay, otay aysay ethay eastlay. Ehay evernay useday
otay earsway, oughthay, atay ishay enmay, eythay aidsay; utbay omehowsay ehay otgay anay
inordinateay uantityqay ofay uelcray, unmitigateday ardhay orkway outay ofay emthay. Enwhay
Ildadbay asway aay ief-matechay, otay avehay ishay ab-coloureddray eyeay intentlyay ookinglay
atay ouyay, ademay ouyay eelfay ompletelycay ervousnay, illtay ouyay ouldcay utchclay
omething—asay ammerhay oray aay arling-spikemay, anday ogay otay orkway ikelay admay, atay
omethingsay oray otheray, evernay indmay atwhay. Indolenceay anday idlenessay erishedpay
eforebay imhay. Ishay ownay ersonpay asway ethay exactay embodimentay ofay ishay utilitarianay
aracterchay. Onay ishay onglay, auntgay odybay, ehay arriedcay onay arespay eshflay, onay
uperfluoussay eardbay, ishay inchay avinghay aay oftsay, economicalay apnay otay itay, ikelay
ethay ornway apnay ofay ishay oad-brimmedbray athay.

Uchsay, enthay, asway ethay ersonpay atthay Iay awsay eatedsay onay ethay ansomtray enwhay Iay
ollowedfay Aptaincay Elegpay ownday intoay ethay abincay. Ethay acespay etweenbay ethay ecksday
asway allsmay; anday erethay, olt-uprightbay, atsay olday Ildadbay, owhay alwaysay atsay osay,
anday evernay eanedlay, anday isthay otay avesay ishay oatcay ailstay. Ishay oad-brimbray asway
acedplay esidebay imhay; ishay egslay ereway ifflystay ossedcray; ishay abdray esturevay asway
uttonedbay upay otay ishay inchay; anday ectaclesspay onay osenay, ehay eemedsay absorbeday inay
eadingray omfray aay onderouspay olumevay.

ildad,”“Bay iedcray Aptaincay Elegpay, at“ay itay againay, Ildadbay, ehay? Eyay avehay eenbay
udyingstay osethay Ipturesscray, ownay, orfay ethay astlay irtythay earsyay, otay myay
ertaincay owledgeknay. Owhay arfay eyay otgay, Ildad?”bay

Asay ifay onglay abituatedhay otay uchsay ofanepray alktay omfray ishay olday ipmateshay,
Ildadbay, ithoutway oticingnay ishay esentpray irreverenceay, uietlyqay ookedlay upay,
anday eeingsay emay, ancedglay againay inquiringlyay owardstay Elegpay.

e“Hay ayssay e’shay ouray anmay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay, e“hay antsway otay ip.”shay

ost“Day ee?”thay aidsay Ildadbay, inay aay ollowhay onetay, anday urningtay oundray otay emay.

I“ay ost_,”_day aidsay Iay unconsciouslyay, ehay asway osay intenseay aay Uakerqay.

at“Whay oday eyay inkthay ofay imhay, Ildad?”bay aidsay Elegpay.

e’ll“Hay o,”day aidsay Ildadbay, eyeingay emay, anday enthay entway onay ellingspay awayay atay
ishay ookbay inay aay umblingmay onetay uiteqay audibleay.

Iay oughtthay imhay ethay ueerestqay olday Uakerqay Iay everay awsay, especiallyay asay Elegpay,
ishay iendfray anday olday ipmateshay, eemedsay uchsay aay ustererblay. Utbay Iay aidsay
othingnay, onlyay ookinglay oundray emay arplyshay. Elegpay ownay ewthray openay aay estchay,
anday awingdray orthfay ethay ip’sshay articlesay, acedplay enpay anday inkay eforebay imhay,
anday eatedsay imselfhay atay aay ittlelay abletay. Iay eganbay otay inkthay itay asway ighhay imetay
otay ettlesay ithway elfmysay atay atwhay ermstay Iay ouldway ebay illingway otay engageay orfay
ethay oyagevay. Iay asway alreadyay awareay atthay inay ethay alingwhay usinessbay eythay aidpay
onay agesway; utbay allay andshay, includingay ethay aptaincay, eceivedray ertaincay aresshay
ofay ethay ofitspray alledcay ays__lay, anday atthay esethay ayslay ereway oportionedpray otay
ethay egreeday ofay importanceay ertainingpay otay ethay espectiveray utiesday ofay ethay
ip’sshay ompanycay. Iay asway alsoay awareay atthay eingbay aay eengray andhay atay alingwhay, myay
ownay aylay ouldway otnay ebay eryvay argelay; utbay onsideringcay atthay Iay asway useday otay ethay
easay, ouldcay eerstay aay ipshay, icesplay aay operay, anday allay atthay, Iay ademay onay oubtday
atthay omfray allay Iay adhay eardhay Iay ouldshay ebay offereday atay eastlay ethay 275thay
ay—thatlay isay, ethay 275thay artpay ofay ethay earclay etnay oceedspray ofay ethay oyagevay,
ateverwhay atthay ightmay eventuallyay amountay otay. Anday oughthay ethay 275thay aylay asway
atwhay eythay allcay aay atherray ong_lay ay_lay, etyay itay asway etterbay anthay othingnay; anday
ifay eway adhay aay uckylay oyagevay, ightmay ettypray earlynay aypay orfay ethay othingclay Iay
ouldway earway outay onay itay, otnay otay eakspay ofay myay eethray ears’yay eefbay anday oardbay,
orfay ichwhay Iay ouldway otnay avehay otay aypay oneay iverstay.

Itay ightmay ebay oughtthay atthay isthay asway aay oorpay ayway otay accumulateay aay incelypray
ortune—andfay osay itay asway, aay eryvay oorpay ayway indeeday. Utbay Iay amay oneay ofay osethay
atthay evernay aketay onay aboutay incelypray ortunesfay, anday amay uiteqay ontentcay ifay ethay
orldway isay eadyray otay oardbay anday odgelay emay, ilewhay Iay amay uttingpay upay atay isthay
imgray ignsay ofay ethay Underthay Oudclay. Uponay ethay olewhay, Iay oughtthay atthay ethay
275thay aylay ouldway ebay aboutay ethay airfay ingthay, utbay ouldway otnay avehay eenbay
urprisedsay adhay Iay eenbay offereday ethay 200thay, onsideringcay Iay asway ofay aay
oad-shoulderedbray akemay.

Utbay oneay ingthay, everthelessnay, atthay ademay emay aay ittlelay istrustfulday aboutay
eceivingray aay enerousgay areshay ofay ethay ofitspray asway isthay: Ashoreay, Iay adhay eardhay
omethingsay ofay othbay Aptaincay Elegpay anday ishay unaccountableay olday onycray Ildadbay;
owhay atthay eythay eingbay ethay incipalpray oprietorspray ofay ethay Equodpay, ereforethay
ethay otheray anday oremay inconsiderableay anday atteredscay ownersay, eftlay earlynay ethay
olewhay anagementmay ofay ethay ip’sshay affairsay otay esethay otway. Anday Iay idday otnay owknay
utbay atwhay ethay ingystay olday Ildadbay ightmay avehay aay ightymay ealday otay aysay aboutay
ippingshay andshay, especiallyay asay Iay ownay oundfay imhay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay,
uiteqay atay omehay erethay inay ethay abincay, anday eadingray ishay Iblebay asay ifay atay ishay
ownay iresidefay. Ownay ilewhay Elegpay asway ainlyvay ingtryay otay endmay aay enpay ithway ishay
ack-knifejay, olday Ildadbay, otay myay onay allsmay urprisesay, onsideringcay atthay ehay
asway uchsay anay interesteday artypay inay esethay oceedingspray; Ildadbay evernay eededhay
usay, utbay entway onay umblingmay otay imselfhay outay ofay ishay ookbay, ay_“_Lay otnay upay orfay
ourselvesyay easurestray uponay earthay, erewhay oth—”may

ell“Way, Aptaincay Ildad,”bay interrupteday Elegpay, at“whay ed’yay aysay, atwhay aylay
allshay eway ivegay isthay oungyay an?”may

ou“Thay owestknay est,”bay asway ethay epulchralsay eplyray, e“thay evensay undredhay anday
eventy-seventhsay ouldn’tway ebay ootay uchmay, ouldway it?—‘whereay othmay anday ustray oday
orruptcay, utbay ay_—’”_lay

ay__Lay, indeeday, oughtthay Iay, anday uchsay aay aylay! ethay evensay undredhay anday
eventy-seventhsay! Ellway, olday Ildadbay, ouyay areay eterminedday atthay Iay, orfay oneay,
allshay otnay ay__lay upay anymay ays__lay erehay elowbay, erewhay othmay anday ustray oday
orruptcay. Itay asway anay exceedinglyay ong_lay ay_lay atthay, indeeday; anday oughthay omfray
ethay agnitudemay ofay ethay igurefay itay ightmay atay irstfay eceiveday aay andsmanlay, etyay
ethay ightestslay onsiderationcay illway owshay atthay oughthay evensay undredhay anday
eventy-sevensay isay aay ettypray argelay umbernay, etyay, enwhay ouyay omecay otay akemay aay
eenth__tay ofay itay, ouyay illway enthay eesay, Iay aysay, atthay ethay evensay undredhay anday
eventy-seventhsay artpay ofay aay arthingfay isay aay oodgay ealday esslay anthay evensay
undredhay anday eventy-sevensay oldgay oubloonsday; anday osay Iay oughtthay atay ethay imetay.

“Whyay, astblay ouryay eyesay, Ildad,”bay iedcray Elegpay, ou“thay ostday otnay antway otay
indlesway isthay oungyay anmay! ehay ustmay avehay oremay anthay at.”thay

even“Say undredhay anday eventy-seventh,”say againay aidsay Ildadbay, ithoutway iftinglay
ishay eyesay; anday enthay entway onay umbling—“formay erewhay ouryay easuretray isay, erethay
illway ouryay earthay ebay also.”ay

I“ay amay oinggay otay utpay imhay ownday orfay ethay eethray undredth,”hay aidsay Elegpay, o“day
eyay earhay atthay, Ildadbay! Ethay eethray undredthhay aylay, Iay ay.”say

Ildadbay aidlay ownday ishay ookbay, anday urningtay olemnlysay owardstay imhay aidsay,
aptain“Cay Elegpay, outhay asthay aay enerousgay earthay; utbay outhay ustmay onsidercay ethay
utyday outhay owestay otay ethay otheray ownersay ofay isthay ip—widowsshay anday orphansay,
anymay ofay em—andthay atthay ifay eway ootay abundantlyay ewardray ethay aborslay ofay isthay
oungyay anmay, eway aymay ebay akingtay ethay eadbray omfray osethay idowsway anday osethay
orphansay. Ethay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay aylay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay

ou“Thay Ildad!”bay oaredray Elegpay, artingstay upay anday atteringclay aboutay ethay
abincay. ast“Blay eyay, Aptaincay Ildadbay, ifay Iay adhay ollowedfay thyay adviceay inay esethay
attersmay, Iay ouldway aforeay ownay adhay aay onsciencecay otay uglay aboutay atthay ouldway ebay
eavyhay enoughay otay ounderfay ethay argestlay ipshay atthay everay ailedsay oundray Apecay
Orn.”hay

aptain“Cay Eleg,”pay aidsay Ildadbay eadilystay, “thyay onsciencecay aymay ebay awingdray
entay inchesay ofay aterway, oray entay athomsfay, Iay an’tcay elltay; utbay asay outhay artay
illstay anay impenitentay anmay, Aptaincay Elegpay, Iay eatlygray earfay estlay thyay
onsciencecay ebay utbay aay eakylay oneay; anday illway inay ethay enday inksay eethay ounderingfay
ownday otay ethay ieryfay itpay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay

iery“Fay itpay! ieryfay itpay! eyay insultay emay, anmay; astpay allay aturalnay earingbay, eyay
insultay emay. It’say anay all-fireday outrageay otay elltay anyay umanhay eaturecray atthay
e’shay oundbay otay ellhay. Ukesflay anday amesflay! Ildadbay, aysay atthay againay otay emay,
anday artstay myay oul-boltssay, utbay I’ll—I’ll—yesay, I’llay allowsway aay ivelay oatgay
ithway allay ishay airhay anday ornshay onay. Outay ofay ethay abincay, eyay antingcay,
ab-coloureddray onsay ofay aay oodenway un—agay aightstray akeway ithway e!”yay

Asay ehay underedthay outay isthay ehay ademay aay ushray atay Ildadbay, utbay ithway aay
arvellousmay obliqueay, idingslay eleritycay, Ildadbay orfay atthay imetay eludeday imhay.

Alarmeday atay isthay erribletay outburstay etweenbay ethay otway incipalpray anday
esponsibleray ownersay ofay ethay ipshay, anday eelingfay alfhay aay indmay otay ivegay upay allay
ideaay ofay ailingsay inay aay esselvay osay uestionablyqay owneday anday emporarilytay
ommandedcay, Iay eppedstay asideay omfray ethay oorday otay ivegay egressay otay Ildadbay, owhay,
Iay ademay onay oubtday, asway allay eagernessay otay anishvay omfray eforebay ethay awakeneday
athwray ofay Elegpay. Utbay otay myay astonishmentay, ehay atsay ownday againay onay ethay
ansomtray eryvay uietlyqay, anday eemedsay otay avehay otnay ethay ightestslay intentionay ofay
ithdrawingway. Ehay eemedsay uiteqay useday otay impenitentay Elegpay anday ishay aysway. Asay
orfay Elegpay, afteray ettinglay offay ishay ageray asay ehay adhay, erethay eemedsay onay oremay
eftlay inay imhay, anday ehay, ootay, atsay ownday ikelay aay amblay, oughthay ehay itchedtway aay
ittlelay asay ifay illstay ervouslynay agitateday. ew!”“Whay ehay istledwhay atay ast—“thelay
uall’ssqay onegay offay otay eewardlay, Iay inkthay. Ildadbay, outhay useday otay ebay oodgay atay
arpeningshay aay ancelay, endmay atthay enpay, illway eyay. Myay ack-knifejay erehay eedsnay
ethay indstonegray. At’sthay ehay; ankthay eyay, Ildadbay. Ownay enthay, myay oungyay anmay,
Ishmael’say thyay amenay, idn’tday eyay aysay? Ellway enthay, ownday eyay ogay erehay, Ishmaelay,
orfay ethay eethray undredthhay ay.”lay

aptain“Cay Eleg,”pay aidsay Iay, I“ay avehay aay iendfray ithway emay owhay antsway otay ipshay
oo—shalltay Iay ingbray imhay ownday o-morrow?”tay

o“Tay ebay ure,”say aidsay Elegpay. etch“Fay imhay alongay, anday e’llway ooklay atay im.”hay

at“Whay aylay oesday ehay ant?”way oanedgray Ildadbay, ancingglay upay omfray ethay ookbay inay
ichwhay ehay adhay againay eenbay uryingbay imselfhay.

Oh“ay! evernay eethay indmay aboutay atthay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay. as“Hay ehay everay
aledwhay itay any?”ay urningtay otay emay.

illed“Kay oremay aleswhay anthay Iay ancay ountcay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay

ell“Way, ingbray imhay alongay en.”thay

Anday, afteray igningsay ethay aperspay, offay Iay entway; othingnay oubtingday utbay atthay Iay
adhay oneday aay oodgay orning’smay orkway, anday atthay ethay Equodpay asway ethay identicalay
ipshay atthay Ojoyay adhay ovidedpray otay arrycay Ueequegqay anday emay oundray ethay Apecay.

Utbay Iay adhay otnay oceededpray arfay, enwhay Iay eganbay otay ethinkbay emay atthay ethay
Aptaincay ithway omwhay Iay asway otay ailsay etyay emainedray unseenay byay emay; oughthay,
indeeday, inay anymay asescay, aay ale-shipwhay illway ebay ompletelycay ittedfay outay, anday
eceiveray allay erhay ewcray onay oardbay, ereay ethay aptaincay akesmay imselfhay isiblevay byay
arrivingay otay aketay ommandcay; orfay ometimessay esethay oyagesvay areay osay olongedpray,
anday ethay oreshay intervalsay atay omehay osay exceedinglyay iefbray, atthay ifay ethay
aptaincay avehay aay amilyfay, oray anyay absorbingay oncernmentcay ofay atthay ortsay, ehay
oesday otnay oubletray imselfhay uchmay aboutay ishay ipshay inay ortpay, utbay eaveslay erhay otay
ethay ownersay illtay allay isay eadyray orfay easay. Oweverhay, itay isay alwaysay asay ellway otay
avehay aay ooklay atay imhay eforebay irrevocablyay ommittingcay ourselfyay intoay ishay
andshay. Urningtay ackbay Iay accosteday Aptaincay Elegpay, inquiringay erewhay Aptaincay
Ahabay asway otay ebay oundfay.

And“ay atwhay ostday outhay antway ofay Aptaincay Ahabay? It’say allay ightray enoughay; outhay
artay ipped.”shay

es“Yay, utbay Iay ouldshay ikelay otay eesay im.”hay

ut“Bay Iay on’tday inkthay outhay iltway ebay ableay otay atay esentpray. Iay on’tday owknay
exactlyay at’swhay ethay attermay ithway imhay; utbay ehay eepskay oseclay insideay ethay
ousehay; aay ortsay ofay icksay, anday etyay ehay on’tday ooklay osay. Inay actfay, ehay ain’tay
icksay; utbay onay, ehay isn’tay ellway eitheray. Anyay owhay, oungyay anmay, ehay on’tway alwaysay
eesay emay, osay Iay on’tday upposesay ehay illway eethay. E’shay aay ueerqay anmay, Aptaincay
Ahab—soay omesay ink—butthay aay oodgay oneay. Ohay, ou’ltthay ikelay imhay ellway enoughay; onay
earfay, onay earfay. E’shay aay andgray, ungodlyay, od-likegay anmay, Aptaincay Ahabay;
oesn’tday eakspay uchmay; utbay, enwhay ehay oesday eakspay, enthay ouyay aymay ellway istenlay.
Arkmay eyay, ebay orewarnedfay; Ahab’say aboveay ethay ommoncay; Ahab’say eenbay inay
ollegescay, asay ellway asay ong’may ethay annibalscay; eenbay useday otay eeperday ondersway
anthay ethay avesway; ixedfay ishay ieryfay ancelay inay ightiermay, angerstray oesfay anthay
aleswhay. Ishay ancelay! ayeay, ethay eenestkay anday ethay urestsay atthay outay ofay allay ouray
isleay! Ohay! ehay ain’tay Aptaincay Ildadbay; onay, anday ehay ain’tay Aptaincay Elegpay;
e’s_hay Ahab_ay, oybay; anday Ahabay ofay olday, outhay owestknay, asway aay ownedcray ing!”kay

And“ay aay eryvay ilevay oneay. Enwhay atthay ickedway ingkay asway ainslay, ethay ogsday, idday
eythay otnay icklay ishay ood?”blay

ome“Cay itherhay otay e—hithermay, ither,”hay aidsay Elegpay, ithway aay ignificancesay inay
ishay eyeay atthay almostay artledstay emay. ook“Lay eyay, adlay; evernay aysay atthay onay oardbay
ethay Equodpay. Evernay aysay itay anywhereay. Aptaincay Ahabay idday otnay amenay imselfhay.
as’Tway aay oolishfay, ignorantay imwhay ofay ishay azycray, idowedway othermay, owhay iedday
enwhay ehay asway onlyay aay elvemonthtway olday. Anday etyay ethay olday uawsqay Istigtay, atay
Ayheadgay, aidsay atthay ethay amenay ouldway omehowsay ovepray opheticpray. Anday,
erhapspay, otheray oolsfay ikelay erhay aymay elltay eethay ethay amesay. Iay ishway otay arnway
eethay. It’say aay ielay. Iay owknay Aptaincay Ahabay ellway; I’veay ailedsay ithway imhay asay
atemay earsyay agoay; Iay owknay atwhay ehay is—aay oodgay an—notmay aay iouspay, oodgay anmay,
ikelay Ildadbay, utbay aay earingsway oodgay an—somethingmay ikelay e—onlymay ere’sthay aay
oodgay ealday oremay ofay imhay. Ayeay, ayeay, Iay owknay atthay ehay asway evernay eryvay ollyjay;
anday Iay owknay atthay onay ethay assagepay omehay, ehay asway aay ittlelay outay ofay ishay indmay
orfay aay ellspay; utbay itay asway ethay arpshay ootingshay ainspay inay ishay eedingblay umpstay
atthay oughtbray atthay aboutay, asay anyay oneay ightmay eesay. Iay owknay, ootay, atthay everay
incesay ehay ostlay ishay eglay astlay oyagevay byay atthay accurseday alewhay, e’shay eenbay aay
indkay ofay oody—desperatemay oodymay, anday avagesay ometimessay; utbay atthay illway allay
asspay offay. Anday onceay orfay allay, etlay emay elltay eethay anday assureay eethay, oungyay
anmay, it’say etterbay otay ailsay ithway aay oodymay oodgay aptaincay anthay aay aughinglay adbay
oneay. Osay ood-byegay otay ee—andthay ongwray otnay Aptaincay Ahabay, ecausebay ehay appenshay
otay avehay aay ickedway amenay. Esidesbay, myay oybay, ehay ashay aay ife—notway eethray oyagesvay
edded—away eetsway, esignedray irlgay. Inkthay ofay atthay; byay atthay eetsway irlgay atthay
olday anmay ashay aay ildchay: oldhay eyay enthay erethay ancay ebay anyay utteray, opelesshay armhay
inay Ahabay? Onay, onay, myay adlay; ickenstray, astedblay, ifay ehay ebay, Ahabay ashay ishay
umanities!”hay

Asay Iay alkedway awayay, Iay asway ullfay ofay oughtfulnessthay; atwhay adhay eenbay
incidentallyay evealedray otay emay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay, illedfay emay ithway aay ertaincay
ildway aguenessvay ofay ainfulnesspay oncerningcay imhay. Anday omehowsay, atay ethay imetay,
Iay eltfay aay athysympay anday aay orrowsay orfay imhay, utbay orfay Iay on’tday owknay atwhay,
unlessay itay asway ethay uelcray osslay ofay ishay eglay. Anday etyay Iay alsoay eltfay aay angestray
aweay ofay imhay; utbay atthay ortsay ofay aweay, ichwhay Iay annotcay atay allay escribeday, asway
otnay exactlyay aweay; Iay oday otnay owknay atwhay itay asway. Utbay Iay eltfay itay; anday itay idday
otnay isinclineday emay owardstay imhay; oughthay Iay eltfay impatienceay atay atwhay eemedsay
ikelay erymystay inay imhay, osay imperfectlyay asay ehay asway ownknay otay emay enthay.
Oweverhay, myay oughtsthay ereway atay engthlay arriedcay inay otheray irectionsday, osay
atthay orfay ethay esentpray arkday Ahabay ippedslay myay indmay.


APTERcHay 17ay. Ethay Amadanray.

Asay Ueequeg’sqay Amadanray, oray Astingfay anday Umiliationhay, asway otay ontinuecay allay
ayday, Iay idday otnay oosechay otay isturbday imhay illtay owardstay ight-fallnay; orfay Iay
erishchay ethay eatestgray espectray owardstay everybody’say eligiousray obligationsay,
evernay indmay owhay omicalcay, anday ouldcay otnay indfay itay inay myay earthay otay undervalueay
evenay aay ongregationcay ofay antsay orshippingway aay oad-stooltay; oray osethay otheray
eaturescray inay ertaincay artspay ofay ouray earthay, owhay ithway aay egreeday ofay
ootmanismfay uiteqay unprecedenteday inay otheray anetsplay, owbay ownday eforebay ethay
orsotay ofay aay eceasedday andedlay oprietorpray erelymay onay accountay ofay ethay
inordinateay ossessionspay etyay owneday anday entedray inay ishay amenay.

Iay aysay, eway oodgay Esbyterianpray Istianschray ouldshay ebay aritablechay inay esethay
ingsthay, anday otnay ancyfay ourselvesay osay astlyvay uperiorsay otay otheray ortalsmay,
aganspay anday atwhay otnay, ecausebay ofay eirthay alf-crazyhay onceitscay onay esethay
ubjectssay. Erethay asway Ueequegqay, ownay, ertainlycay entertainingay ethay ostmay
absurday otionsnay aboutay Ojoyay anday ishay Amadan;—butray atwhay ofay atthay? Ueequegqay
oughtthay ehay ewknay atwhay ehay asway aboutay, Iay upposesay; ehay eemedsay otay ebay ontentcay;
anday erethay etlay imhay estray. Allay ouray arguingay ithway imhay ouldway otnay availay; etlay
imhay ebay, Iay aysay: anday Eavenhay avehay ercymay onay usay all—Presbyteriansay anday Aganspay
alike—foray eway areay allay omehowsay eadfullydray ackedcray aboutay ethay eadhay, anday
adlysay eednay endingmay.

Owardstay eveningay, enwhay Iay eltfay assureday atthay allay ishay erformancespay anday
itualsray ustmay ebay overay, Iay entway upay otay ishay oomray anday ockedknay atay ethay oorday;
utbay onay answeray. Iay iedtray otay openay itay, utbay itay asway astenedfay insideay.
ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay oftlysay oughthray ethay ey-hole:—allkay ilentsay. I“ay aysay,
Ueequegqay! whyay on’tday ouyay eakspay? It’say I—Ishmael.”ay Utbay allay emainedray illstay
asay eforebay. Iay eganbay otay owgray alarmeday. Iay adhay alloweday imhay uchsay abundantay
imetay; Iay oughtthay ehay ightmay avehay adhay anay apoplecticay itfay. Iay ookedlay oughthray
ethay ey-holekay; utbay ethay oorday openingay intoay anay odday ornercay ofay ethay oomray, ethay
ey-holekay ospectpray asway utbay aay ookedcray anday inistersay oneay. Iay ouldcay onlyay eesay
artpay ofay ethay oot-boardfay ofay ethay edbay anday aay inelay ofay ethay allway, utbay othingnay
oremay. Iay asway urprisedsay otay eholdbay estingray againstay ethay allway ethay oodenway
aftshay ofay Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay, ichwhay ethay andladylay ethay eveningay eviouspray
adhay akentay omfray imhay, eforebay ouray ountingmay otay ethay amberchay. At’sthay angestray,
oughtthay Iay; utbay atay anyay ateray, incesay ethay arpoonhay andsstay onderyay, anday ehay
eldomsay oray evernay oesgay abroaday ithoutway itay, ereforethay ehay ustmay ebay insideay
erehay, anday onay ossiblepay istakemay.

ueequeg!—Queequeg!”—all“Qay illstay. Omethingsay ustmay avehay appenedhay.
Apoplexyay! Iay iedtray otay urstbay openay ethay oorday; utbay itay ubbornlystay esistedray.
Unningray ownday airsstay, Iay uicklyqay atedstay myay uspicionssay otay ethay irstfay ersonpay
Iay et—themay amber-maidchay. a“Lay! a!”lay eshay iedcray, I“ay oughtthay omethingsay ustmay
ebay ethay attermay. Iay entway otay akemay ethay edbay afteray eakfastbray, anday ethay oorday asway
ockedlay; anday otnay aay ousemay otay ebay eardhay; anday it’say eenbay ustjay osay ilentsay everay
incesay. Utbay Iay oughtthay, aymay ebay, ouyay adhay othbay onegay offay anday ockedlay ouryay
aggagebay inay orfay afesay eepingkay. Alay! alay, a’am!—Mistressmay! urdermay! Mrsay.
Usseyhay! apoplexy!”—anday ithway esethay iescray, eshay anray owardstay ethay itchenkay, Iay
ollowingfay.

Mrsay. Usseyhay oonsay appeareday, ithway aay ustard-potmay inay oneay andhay anday aay
inegar-cruetvay inay ethay otheray, avinghay ustjay okenbray awayay omfray ethay occupationay
ofay attendingay otay ethay astorscay, anday oldingscay erhay ittlelay ackblay oybay
eantimemay.

ood-house!”“Way iedcray Iay, ich“whay ayway otay itay? Unray orfay Od’sgay akesay, anday etchfay
omethingsay otay pryay openay ethay oor—theday axe!—theay axeay! e’shay adhay aay okestray;
ependday uponay it!”—anday osay ayingsay Iay asway unmethodicallyay ushingray upay airsstay
againay empty-handeday, enwhay Mrsay. Usseyhay interposeday ethay ustard-potmay anday
inegar-cruetvay, anday ethay entireay astorcay ofay erhay ountenancecay.

at’s“Whay ethay attermay ithway ouyay, oungyay an?”may

et“Gay ethay axeay! Orfay Od’sgay akesay, unray orfay ethay octorday, omesay oneay, ilewhay Iay pryay
itay open!”ay

ook“Lay ere,”hay aidsay ethay andladylay, uicklyqay uttingpay ownday ethay inegar-cruetvay,
osay asay otay avehay oneay andhay eefray; ook“lay erehay; areay ouyay alkingtay aboutay ingpryay
openay anyay ofay myay oors?”—andday ithway atthay eshay eizedsay myay armay. at’s“Whay ethay
attermay ithway ouyay? At’swhay ethay attermay ithway ouyay, ipmate?”shay

Inay asay almcay, utbay apidray aay annermay asay ossiblepay, Iay avegay erhay otay understanday
ethay olewhay asecay. Unconsciouslyay appingclay ethay inegar-cruetvay otay oneay idesay ofay
erhay osenay, eshay uminatedray orfay anay instantay; enthay exclaimed—“Noay! Iay aven’thay
eensay itay incesay Iay utpay itay ere.”thay Unningray otay aay ittlelay osetclay underay ethay
andinglay ofay ethay airsstay, eshay ancedglay inay, anday eturningray, oldtay emay atthay
Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay asway issingmay. e’s“Hay illedkay imself,”hay eshay iedcray. It’s“ay
unfort’nateay Iggsstay oneday overay again—thereay oesgay anotheray ounterpane—Godcay
itypay ishay oorpay other!—itmay illway ebay ethay uinray ofay myay ousehay. Ashay ethay oorpay adlay
aay istersay? Ere’swhay atthay irl?—theregay, Ettybay, ogay otay Arlessnay ethay Ainterpay,
anday elltay imhay otay aintpay emay aay ignsay, ith—“noway uicidessay ermittedpay erehay, anday
onay okingsmay inay ethay arlor;”—mightpay asay ellway illkay othbay irdsbay atay onceay. Illkay?
Ethay Ordlay ebay ercifulmay otay ishay ostghay! At’swhay atthay oisenay erethay? Ouyay, oungyay
anmay, avastay ere!”thay

Anday unningray upay afteray emay, eshay aughtcay emay asay Iay asway againay ingtryay otay orcefay
openay ethay oorday.

I“ay on’tday alloway itay; Iay on’tway avehay myay emisespray oiledspay. Ogay orfay ethay
ocksmithlay, ere’sthay oneay aboutay aay ilemay omfray erehay. Utbay avast!”ay uttingpay erhay
andhay inay erhay ide-pocketsay, ere’s“hay aay eykay at’llthay itfay, Iay uessgay; et’slay
ee.”say Anday ithway atthay, eshay urnedtay itay inay ethay ocklay; utbay, alasay! Ueequeg’sqay
upplementalsay oltbay emainedray unwithdrawnay ithinway.

ave“Hay otay urstbay itay open,”ay aidsay Iay, anday asway unningray ownday ethay entryay aay
ittlelay, orfay aay oodgay artstay, enwhay ethay andladylay aughtcay atay emay, againay owingvay
Iay ouldshay otnay eakbray ownday erhay emisespray; utbay Iay oretay omfray erhay, anday ithway aay
uddensay odilybay ushray ashedday elfmysay ullfay againstay ethay arkmay.

Ithway aay odigiouspray oisenay ethay oorday ewflay openay, anday ethay obknay ammingslay
againstay ethay allway, entsay ethay asterplay otay ethay eilingcay; anday erethay, oodgay
eavenshay! erethay atsay Ueequegqay, altogetheray oolcay anday elf-collectedsay; ightray
inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oomray; uattingsqay onay ishay amshay, anday oldinghay Ojoyay onay
optay ofay ishay eadhay. Ehay ookedlay eithernay oneay ayway ornay ethay otheray ayway, utbay atsay
ikelay aay arvedcay imageay ithway arcescay aay ignsay ofay activeay ifelay.

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay, oinggay upay otay imhay, ueequeg“Qay, at’swhay ethay attermay ithway
ou?”yay

e“Hay ain’thay eenbay aay ittin’say osay allay ayday, ashay e?”hay aidsay ethay andladylay.

Utbay allay eway aidsay, otnay aay ordway ouldcay eway agdray outay ofay imhay; Iay almostay eltfay
ikelay ushingpay imhay overay, osay asay otay angechay ishay ositionpay, orfay itay asway almostay
intolerableay, itay eemedsay osay ainfullypay anday unnaturallyay onstrainedcay;
especiallyay, asay inay allay obabilitypray ehay adhay eenbay ittingsay osay orfay upwardsay ofay
eightay oray entay ourshay, oinggay ootay ithoutway ishay egularray ealsmay.

“Mrsay. Ussey,”hay aidsay Iay, e’s“hay alive__ay atay allay eventsay; osay eavelay usay, ifay ouyay
easeplay, anday Iay illway eesay otay isthay angestray affairay elf.”mysay

Osingclay ethay oorday uponay ethay andladylay, Iay endeavoreday otay evailpray uponay
Ueequegqay otay aketay aay airchay; utbay inay ainvay. Erethay ehay atsay; anday allay ehay ouldcay
o—forday allay myay olitepay artsay anday andishments—heblay ouldway otnay ovemay aay egpay,
ornay aysay aay inglesay ordway, ornay evenay ooklay atay emay, ornay oticenay myay esencepray inay
ethay ightestslay ayway.

Iay onderway, oughtthay Iay, ifay isthay ancay ossiblypay ebay aay artpay ofay ishay Amadanray; oday
eythay astfay onay eirthay amshay atthay ayway inay ishay ativenay islanday. Itay ustmay ebay osay;
esyay, it’say artpay ofay ishay eedcray, Iay upposesay; ellway, enthay, etlay imhay estray; e’llhay
etgay upay oonersay oray aterlay, onay oubtday. Itay an’tcay astlay orfay everay, ankthay Odgay,
anday ishay Amadanray onlyay omescay onceay aay earyay; anday Iay on’tday elievebay it’say eryvay
unctualpay enthay.

Iay entway ownday otay uppersay. Afteray ittingsay aay onglay imetay isteninglay otay ethay onglay
oriesstay ofay omesay ailorssay owhay adhay ustjay omecay omfray aay um-puddingplay oyagevay,
asay eythay alledcay itay at(thay isay, aay ortshay aling-voyagewhay inay aay oonerschay oray
igbray, onfinedcay otay ethay orthnay ofay ethay inelay, inay ethay Atlanticay Oceanay only)ay;
afteray isteninglay otay esethay um-puddingersplay illtay earlynay elevenay o’clockay, Iay
entway upay airsstay otay ogay otay edbay, eelingfay uiteqay uresay byay isthay imetay Ueequegqay
ustmay ertainlycay avehay oughtbray ishay Amadanray otay aay erminationtay. Utbay onay; erethay
ehay asway ustjay erewhay Iay adhay eftlay imhay; ehay adhay otnay irredstay anay inchay. Iay eganbay
otay owgray exedvay ithway imhay; itay eemedsay osay ownrightday enselesssay anday insaneay otay
ebay ittingsay erethay allay ayday anday alfhay ethay ightnay onay ishay amshay inay aay oldcay oomray,
oldinghay aay iecepay ofay oodway onay ishay eadhay.

or“Fay eaven’shay akesay, Ueequegqay, etgay upay anday akeshay ourselfyay; etgay upay anday
avehay omesay uppersay. Ou’llyay arvestay; ou’llyay illkay ourselfyay, Ueequeg.”qay Utbay
otnay aay ordway idday ehay eplyray.

Espairingday ofay imhay, ereforethay, Iay eterminedday otay ogay otay edbay anday otay eepslay;
anday onay oubtday, eforebay aay eatgray ilewhay, ehay ouldway ollowfay emay. Utbay eviouspray otay
urningtay inay, Iay ooktay myay eavyhay earskinbay acketjay, anday ewthray itay overay imhay, asay
itay omisedpray otay ebay aay eryvay oldcay ightnay; anday ehay adhay othingnay utbay ishay
ordinaryay oundray acketjay onay. Orfay omesay imetay, oday allay Iay ouldway, Iay ouldcay otnay
etgay intoay ethay aintestfay ozeday. Iay adhay ownblay outay ethay andlecay; anday ethay eremay
oughtthay ofay Ueequeg—notqay ourfay eetfay off—sittingay erethay inay atthay uneasyay
ositionpay, arkstay aloneay inay ethay oldcay anday arkday; isthay ademay emay eallyray
etchedwray. Inkthay ofay itay; eepingslay allay ightnay inay ethay amesay oomray ithway aay ideway
awakeay aganpay onay ishay amshay inay isthay earydray, unaccountableay Amadanray!

Utbay omehowsay Iay oppeddray offay atay astlay, anday ewknay othingnay oremay illtay eakbray ofay
ayday; enwhay, ookinglay overay ethay edsidebay, erethay uattedsqay Ueequegqay, asay ifay ehay
adhay eenbay ewedscray ownday otay ethay oorflay. Utbay asay oonsay asay ethay irstfay impseglay ofay
unsay entereday ethay indowway, upay ehay otgay, ithway iffstay anday atinggray ointsjay, utbay
ithway aay eerfulchay ooklay; impedlay owardstay emay erewhay Iay aylay; essedpray ishay
oreheadfay againay againstay inemay; anday aidsay ishay Amadanray asway overay.

Ownay, asay Iay eforebay intedhay, Iay avehay onay objectionay otay anyay erson’spay eligionray,
ebay itay atwhay itay aymay, osay onglay asay atthay ersonpay oesday otnay illkay oray insultay anyay
otheray ersonpay, ecausebay atthay otheray ersonpay on’tday elievebay itay alsoay. Utbay enwhay
aay an’smay eligionray ecomesbay eallyray anticfray; enwhay itay isay aay ositivepay ormenttay
otay imhay; anday, inay inefay, akesmay isthay earthay ofay oursay anay uncomfortableay innay otay
odgelay inay; enthay Iay inkthay itay ighhay imetay otay aketay atthay individualay asideay anday
argueay ethay ointpay ithway imhay.

Anday ustjay osay Iay ownay idday ithway Ueequegqay. ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay, et“gay intoay edbay
ownay, anday ielay anday istenlay otay e.”may Iay enthay entway onay, eginningbay ithway ethay iseray
anday ogresspray ofay ethay imitivepray eligionsray, anday omingcay ownday otay ethay ariousvay
eligionsray ofay ethay esentpray imetay, uringday ichwhay imetay Iay aboredlay otay owshay
Ueequegqay atthay allay esethay Entslay, Amadansray, anday olongedpray am-squattingshay
inay oldcay, eerlesschay oomsray ereway arkstay onsensenay; adbay orfay ethay ealthhay;
uselessay orfay ethay oulsay; opposeday, inay ortshay, otay ethay obviousay awslay ofay Ienehygay
anday ommoncay ensesay. Iay oldtay imhay, ootay, atthay ehay eingbay inay otheray ingsthay uchsay
anay extremelyay ensiblesay anday agacioussay avagesay, itay ainedpay emay, eryvay adlybay
ainedpay emay, otay eesay imhay ownay osay eplorablyday oolishfay aboutay isthay idiculousray
Amadanray ofay ishay. Esidesbay, argueday Iay, astingfay akesmay ethay odybay avecay inay;
encehay ethay iritspay avescay inay; anday allay oughtsthay ornbay ofay aay astfay ustmay
ecessarilynay ebay alf-starvedhay. Isthay isay ethay easonray whyay ostmay epticdyspay
eligionistsray erishchay uchsay elancholymay otionsnay aboutay eirthay ereaftershay. Inay
oneay ordway, Ueequegqay, aidsay Iay, atherray igressivelyday; ellhay isay anay ideaay irstfay
ornbay onay anay undigesteday apple-dumplingay; anday incesay enthay erpetuatedpay
oughthray ethay ereditaryhay epsiasdyspay urturednay byay Amadansray.

Iay enthay askeday Ueequegqay etherwhay ehay imselfhay asway everay oubledtray ithway
epsiadyspay; expressingay ethay ideaay eryvay ainlyplay, osay atthay ehay ouldcay aketay itay
inay. Ehay aidsay onay; onlyay uponay oneay emorablemay occasionay. Itay asway afteray aay eatgray
eastfay ivengay byay ishay atherfay ethay ingkay, onay ethay aininggay ofay aay eatgray attlebay
ereinwhay iftyfay ofay ethay enemyay adhay eenbay illedkay byay aboutay otway o’clockay inay ethay
afternoonay, anday allay ookedcay anday eatenay atthay eryvay eveningay.

o“Nay oremay, Ueequeg,”qay aidsay Iay, udderingshay; at“thay illway o;”day orfay Iay ewknay ethay
inferencesay ithoutway ishay urtherfay intinghay emthay. Iay adhay eensay aay ailorsay owhay
adhay isitedvay atthay eryvay islanday, anday ehay oldtay emay atthay itay asway ethay ustomcay,
enwhay aay eatgray attlebay adhay eenbay ainedgay erethay, otay arbecuebay allay ethay ainslay inay
ethay ardyay oray ardengay ofay ethay ictorvay; anday enthay, oneay byay oneay, eythay ereway
acedplay inay eatgray oodenway encherstray, anday arnishedgay oundray ikelay aay ilaupay,
ithway eadfruitbray anday ocoanutscay; anday ithway omesay arsleypay inay eirthay outhsmay,
ereway entsay oundray ithway ethay ictor’svay omplimentscay otay allay ishay iendsfray, ustjay
asay oughthay esethay esentspray ereway osay anymay Istmaschray urkeystay.

Afteray allay, Iay oday otnay inkthay atthay myay emarksray aboutay eligionray ademay uchmay
impressionay uponay Ueequegqay. Ecausebay, inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ehay omehowsay
eemedsay ullday ofay earinghay onay atthay importantay ubjectsay, unlessay onsideredcay
omfray ishay ownay ointpay ofay iewvay; anday, inay ethay econdsay aceplay, ehay idday otnay oremay
anthay oneay irdthay understanday emay, ouchcay myay ideasay implysay asay Iay ouldway; anday,
inallyfay, ehay onay oubtday oughtthay ehay ewknay aay oodgay ealday oremay aboutay ethay uetray
eligionray anthay Iay idday. Ehay ookedlay atay emay ithway aay ortsay ofay ondescendingcay
oncerncay anday ompassioncay, asay oughthay ehay oughtthay itay aay eatgray itypay atthay uchsay
aay ensiblesay oungyay anmay ouldshay ebay osay opelesslyhay ostlay otay evangelicalay aganpay
ietypay.

Atay astlay eway oseray anday esseddray; anday Ueequegqay, akingtay aay odigiouslypray eartyhay
eakfastbray ofay owderschay ofay allay ortssay, osay atthay ethay andladylay ouldshay otnay
akemay uchmay ofitpray byay easonray ofay ishay Amadanray, eway alliedsay outay otay oardbay ethay
Equodpay, aunteringsay alongay, anday ickingpay ouray eethtay ithway alibuthay onesbay.


APTERcHay 18ay. Ishay Arkmay.

Asay eway ereway alkingway ownday ethay enday ofay ethay arfwhay owardstay ethay ipshay, Ueequegqay
arryingcay ishay arpoonhay, Aptaincay Elegpay inay ishay uffgray oicevay oudlylay ailedhay usay
omfray ishay igwamway, ayingsay ehay adhay otnay uspectedsay myay iendfray asway aay annibalcay,
anday urthermorefay announcingay atthay ehay etlay onay annibalscay onay oardbay atthay
aftcray, unlessay eythay eviouslypray oducedpray eirthay aperspay.

at“Whay oday ouyay eanmay byay atthay, Aptaincay Eleg?”pay aidsay Iay, ownay umpingjay onay ethay
ulwarksbay, anday eavinglay myay omradecay andingstay onay ethay arfwhay.

I“ay ean,”may ehay epliedray, e“hay ustmay owshay ishay apers.”pay

es,”“Yay aidsay Aptaincay Ildadbay inay ishay ollowhay oicevay, ickingstay ishay eadhay omfray
ehindbay Eleg’spay, outay ofay ethay igwamway. e“Hay ustmay owshay atthay e’shay onvertedcay.
Onsay ofay arkness,”day ehay addeday, urningtay otay Ueequegqay, art“ay outhay atay esentpray
inay ommunioncay ithway anyay Istianchray urch?”chay

“Why,”ay aidsay Iay, e’s“hay aay embermay ofay ethay irstfay Ongregationalcay Urch.”chay Erehay
ebay itay aidsay, atthay anymay attooedtay avagessay ailingsay inay Antucketnay ipsshay atay
astlay omecay otay ebay onvertedcay intoay ethay urcheschay.

irst“Fay Ongregationalcay Urch,”chay iedcray Ildadbay, at“whay! atthay orshipsway inay
Eaconday Euteronomyday Oleman’scay eeting-house?”may anday osay ayingsay, akingtay outay
ishay ectaclesspay, ehay ubbedray emthay ithway ishay eatgray ellowyay andanabay
andkerchiefhay, anday uttingpay emthay onay eryvay arefullycay, amecay outay ofay ethay
igwamway, anday eaninglay ifflystay overay ethay ulwarksbay, ooktay aay oodgay onglay ooklay atay
Ueequegqay.

ow“Hay onglay athhay ehay eenbay aay ember?”may ehay enthay aidsay, urningtay otay emay; ot“nay
eryvay onglay, Iay atherray uessgay, oungyay an.”may

o,”“Nay aidsay Elegpay, and“ay ehay asn’thay eenbay aptizedbay ightray eitheray, oray itay
ouldway avehay ashedway omesay ofay atthay evil’sday ueblay offay ishay ace.”fay

o“Day elltay, ow,”nay iedcray Ildadbay, is“ay isthay Ilistinephay aay egularray embermay ofay
Eaconday Euteronomy’sday eetingmay? Iay evernay awsay imhay oinggay erethay, anday Iay asspay
itay everyay Ord’slay ay.”day

I“ay on’tday owknay anythingay aboutay Eaconday Euteronomyday oray ishay eeting,”may aidsay
Iay; all“ay Iay owknay isay, atthay Ueequegqay erehay isay aay ornbay embermay ofay ethay Irstfay
Ongregationalcay Urchchay. Ehay isay aay eaconday imselfhay, Ueequegqay is.”ay

oung“Yay an,”may aidsay Ildadbay ernlystay, ou“thay artay arkingskylay ithway e—explainmay
elfthysay, outhay oungyay Ittitehay. Atwhay urchchay ostday eethay eanmay? answeray e.”may

Indingfay elfmysay usthay ardhay ushedpay, Iay epliedray. I“ay eanmay, irsay, ethay amesay
ancientay Atholiccay Urchchay otay ichwhay ouyay anday Iay, anday Aptaincay Elegpay erethay,
anday Ueequegqay erehay, anday allay ofay usay, anday everyay other’smay onsay anday oulsay ofay usay
elongbay; ethay eatgray anday everlastingay Irstfay Ongregationcay ofay isthay olewhay
orshippingway orldway; eway allay elongbay otay atthay; onlyay omesay ofay usay erishchay omesay
ueerqay otchetscray onay aysway ouchingtay ethay andgray eliefbay; inay at__thay eway allay
oinjay ands.”hay

ice“Splay, outhay ean’stmay ice__splay ands,”hay iedcray Elegpay, awingdray earernay.
oung“Yay anmay, ou’dyay etterbay ipshay orfay aay issionarymay, insteaday ofay aay ore-mastfay
andhay; Iay evernay eardhay aay etterbay ermonsay. Eaconday Euteronomy—whyday Atherfay
Applemay imselfhay ouldn’tcay eatbay itay, anday e’shay eckonedray omethingsay. Omecay
aboarday, omecay aboarday; evernay indmay aboutay ethay aperspay. Iay aysay, elltay Uohogqay
ere—what’sthay atthay ouyay allcay imhay? elltay Uohogqay otay epstay alongay. Byay ethay eatgray
anchoray, atwhay aay arpoonhay e’shay otgay erethay! ookslay ikelay oodgay uffstay atthay; anday
ehay andleshay itay aboutay ightray. Iay aysay, Uohogqay, oray ateverwhay ouryay amenay isay, idday
ouyay everay andstay inay ethay eadhay ofay aay ale-boatwhay? idday ouyay everay ikestray aay
ish?”fay

Ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway, Ueequegqay, inay ishay ildway ortsay ofay ayway, umpedjay uponay
ethay ulwarksbay, omfray encethay intoay ethay owsbay ofay oneay ofay ethay ale-boatswhay
anginghay otay ethay idesay; anday enthay acingbray ishay eftlay eeknay, anday oisingpay ishay
arpoonhay, iedcray outay inay omesay uchsay ayway asay is:—thay

ap’ain“Cay, ouyay eesay imhay allsmay opdray artay onay aterway ereday? Ouyay eesay imhay? ellway,
osespay imhay oneay alewhay eyeay, ellway, en!”day anday akingtay arpshay aimay atay itay, ehay
artedday ethay ironay ightray overay olday Ildad’sbay oadbray imbray, eanclay acrossay ethay
ip’sshay ecksday, anday uckstray ethay isteningglay artay otspay outay ofay ightsay.

ow,”“Nay aidsay Ueequegqay, uietlyqay aulinghay inay ethay inelay, os-ee“spay imhay ale-ewhay
eyeay; whyay, adday alewhay ead.”day

uick“Qay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay, ishay artnerpay, owhay, aghastay atay ethay oseclay
icinityvay ofay ethay ingflyay arpoonhay, adhay etreatedray owardstay ethay abincay
angwaygay. uick“Qay, Iay aysay, ouyay Ildadbay, anday etgay ethay ip’sshay aperspay. Eway ustmay
avehay Edgehoghay erethay, Iay eanmay Uohogqay, inay oneay ofay ouray oatsbay. Ooklay eyay,
Uohogqay, e’llway ivegay eyay ethay inetiethnay aylay, anday at’sthay oremay anthay everay asway
ivengay aay arpooneerhay etyay outay ofay Antucket.”nay

Osay ownday eway entway intoay ethay abincay, anday otay myay eatgray oyjay Ueequegqay asway oonsay
enrolleday amongay ethay amesay ip’sshay ompanycay otay ichwhay Iay elfmysay elongedbay.

Enwhay allay eliminariespray ereway overay anday Elegpay adhay otgay everythingay eadyray orfay
igningsay, ehay urnedtay otay emay anday aidsay, I“ay uessgay, Uohogqay erethay on’tday owknay
owhay otay itewray, oesday ehay? Iay aysay, Uohogqay, astblay eyay! ostday outhay ignsay thyay amenay
oray akemay thyay ark?”may

Utbay atay isthay uestionqay, Ueequegqay, owhay adhay icetway oray icethray eforebay akentay
artpay inay imilarsay eremoniescay, ookedlay onay aysway abasheday; utbay akingtay ethay
offereday enpay, opiedcay uponay ethay aperpay, inay ethay operpray aceplay, anay exactay
ounterpartcay ofay aay ueerqay oundray igurefay ichwhay asway attooedtay uponay ishay armay; osay
atthay oughthray Aptaincay Eleg’spay obstinateay istakemay ouchingtay ishay
appellativeay, itay oodstay omethingsay ikelay is:—thay

Uohogqay. ishay Xay arkmay.

Eanwhilemay Aptaincay Ildadbay atsay earnestlyay anday eadfastlystay eyeingay Ueequegqay,
anday atay astlay isingray olemnlysay anday umblingfay inay ethay ugehay ocketspay ofay ishay
oad-skirtedbray abdray oatcay, ooktay outay aay undlebay ofay actstray, anday electingsay oneay
entitleday e“Thay Atterlay Ayday Omingcay; oray Onay Imetay otay Ose,”lay acedplay itay inay
Ueequeg’sqay andshay, anday enthay aspinggray emthay anday ethay ookbay ithway othbay ishay,
ookedlay earnestlyay intoay ishay eyesay, anday aidsay, on“Say ofay arknessday, Iay ustmay oday
myay utyday byay eethay; Iay amay artpay owneray ofay isthay ipshay, anday eelfay oncernedcay orfay
ethay oulssay ofay allay itsay ewcray; ifay outhay illstay ingestclay otay thyay Aganpay aysway,
ichwhay Iay adlysay earfay, Iay eseechbay eethay, emainray otnay orfay ayeay aay Elialbay
ondsmanbay. Urnspay ethay idolay Ellbay, anday ethay ideoushay agondray; urntay omfray ethay
athwray otay omecay; indmay inethay eyeay, Iay aysay; ohay! oodnessgay aciousgray! eerstay
earclay ofay ethay ieryfay it!”pay

Omethingsay ofay ethay altsay easay etyay ingeredlay inay olday Ildad’sbay anguagelay,
eterogeneouslyhay ixedmay ithway Ipturalscray anday omesticday asesphray.

Avast“ay erethay, avastay erethay, Ildadbay, avastay ownay oilingspay ouray arpooneer,”hay
iedcray Elegpay. ious“Pay arpooneershay evernay akemay oodgay oyagers—itvay akestay ethay
arkshay outay ofay em’ay; onay arpooneerhay isay orthway aay awstray owhay aintay ettypray
arkishshay. Erethay asway oungyay Atnay Ainesway, onceay ethay avestbray oat-headerbay outay
ofay allay Antucketnay anday ethay Ineyardvay; ehay oinedjay ethay eetingmay, anday evernay
amecay otay oodgay. Ehay otgay osay ightenedfray aboutay ishay aguyplay oulsay, atthay ehay
inkedshray anday eeredshay awayay omfray aleswhay, orfay earfay ofay after-clapsay, inay asecay
ehay otgay ovestay anday entway otay Avyday Ones.”jay

eleg“Pay! Eleg!”pay aidsay Ildadbay, iftinglay ishay eyesay anday andshay, ou“thay elfthysay,
asay Iay elfmysay, asthay eensay anymay aay erilouspay imetay; outhay owestknay, Elegpay, atwhay
itay isay otay avehay ethay earfay ofay eathday; owhay, enthay, an’stcay outhay atepray inay isthay
ungodlyay uisegay. Outhay eliestbay inethay ownay earthay, Elegpay. Elltay emay, enwhay isthay
amesay Equodpay erehay adhay erhay eethray astsmay overboarday inay atthay oontyphay onay
Apanjay, atthay amesay oyagevay enwhay outhay entway atemay ithway Aptaincay Ahabay, id’stday
outhay otnay inkthay ofay Eathday anday ethay Udgmentjay en?”thay

ear“Hay imhay, earhay imhay ow,”nay iedcray Elegpay, archingmay acrossay ethay abincay, anday
ustingthray ishay andshay arfay ownday intoay ishay ockets,—“hearpay imhay, allay ofay eyay.
Inkthay ofay atthay! Enwhay everyay omentmay eway oughtthay ethay ipshay ouldway inksay! Eathday
anday ethay Udgmentjay enthay? Atwhay? Ithway allay eethray astsmay akingmay uchsay anay
everlastingay underingthay againstay ethay idesay; anday everyay easay eakingbray overay
usay, orefay anday aftay. Inkthay ofay Eathday anday ethay Udgmentjay enthay? Onay! onay imetay otay
inkthay aboutay Eathday enthay. Ifelay asway atwhay Aptaincay Ahabay anday Iay asway inkingthay
ofay; anday owhay otay avesay allay ands—howhay otay igray ury-masts—howjay otay etgay intoay ethay
earestnay ortpay; atthay asway atwhay Iay asway inkingthay of.”ay

Ildadbay aidsay onay oremay, utbay uttoningbay upay ishay oatcay, alkedstay onay eckday, erewhay
eway ollowedfay imhay. Erethay ehay oodstay, eryvay uietlyqay overlookingay omesay
ailmakerssay owhay ereway endingmay aay op-sailtay inay ethay aistway. Ownay anday enthay ehay
oopedstay otay ickpay upay aay atchpay, oray avesay anay enday ofay arredtay inetway, ichwhay
otherwiseay ightmay avehay eenbay astedway.


APTERcHay 19ay. Ethay Ophetpray.

ipmates“Shay, avehay eyay ippedshay inay atthay ip?”shay

Ueequegqay anday Iay adhay ustjay eftlay ethay Equodpay, anday ereway aunteringsay awayay omfray
ethay aterway, orfay ethay omentmay eachay occupieday ithway ishay ownay oughtsthay, enwhay ethay
aboveay ordsway ereway utpay otay usay byay aay angerstray, owhay, ausingpay eforebay usay,
evelledlay ishay assivemay orefingerfay atay ethay esselvay inay uestionqay. Ehay asway utbay
abbilyshay apparelleday inay adedfay acketjay anday atchedpay owserstray; aay agray ofay aay
ackblay andkerchiefhay investingay ishay ecknay. Aay onfluentcay all-poxsmay adhay inay allay
irectionsday owedflay overay ishay acefay, anday eftlay itay ikelay ethay omplicatedcay
ibbedray edbay ofay aay orrenttay, enwhay ethay ushingray atersway avehay eenbay ieddray upay.

ave“Hay eyay ippedshay inay er?”hay ehay epeatedray.

ou“Yay eanmay ethay ipshay Equodpay, Iay uppose,”say aidsay Iay, ingtryay otay aingay aay ittlelay
oremay imetay orfay anay uninterrupteday ooklay atay imhay.

Aye“ay, ethay Equod—thatpay ipshay ere,”thay ehay aidsay, awingdray ackbay ishay olewhay armay,
anday enthay apidlyray ovingshay itay aightstray outay omfray imhay, ithway ethay ixedfay
ayonetbay ofay ishay ointedpay ingerfay artedday ullfay atay ethay objectay.

es,”“Yay aidsay Iay, e“way avehay ustjay ignedsay ethay articles.”ay

Anything“ay ownday erethay aboutay ouryay ouls?”say

About“ay at?”whay

Oh“ay, erhapspay ouyay av’n’thay otgay any,”ay ehay aidsay uicklyqay. o“Nay attermay oughthay,
Iay owknay anymay apschay atthay av’n’thay otgay any,—gooday ucklay otay em’ay; anday eythay areay
allay ethay etterbay offay orfay itay. Aay oul’ssay aay ortsay ofay aay ifthfay eelwhay otay aay
agon.”way

at“Whay areay ouyay abberingjay aboutay, ipmate?”shay aidsay Iay.

e’s_“_Hay otgay enoughay, oughthay, otay akemay upay orfay allay eficienciesday ofay atthay
ortsay inay otheray aps,”chay abruptlyay aidsay ethay angerstray, acingplay aay ervousnay
emphasisay uponay ethay ordway e__hay.

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay, et’s“lay ogay; isthay ellowfay ashay okenbray ooselay omfray
omewheresay; e’shay alkingtay aboutay omethingsay anday omebodysay eway on’tday ow.”knay

op!”“Stay iedcray ethay angerstray. e“Yay aidsay ue—yetray av’n’thay eensay Olday Underthay
etyay, avehay e?”yay

o’s“Whay Olday Under?”thay aidsay Iay, againay ivetedray ithway ethay insaneay earnestnessay
ofay ishay annermay.

aptain“Cay Ahab.”ay

at“Whay! ethay aptaincay ofay ouray ipshay, ethay Equod?”pay

Aye“ay, amongay omesay ofay usay olday ailorsay apschay, ehay oesgay byay atthay amenay. Eyay
av’n’thay eensay imhay etyay, avehay e?”yay

o“Nay, eway av’n’thay. E’shay icksay eythay aysay, utbay isay ettinggay etterbay, anday illway ebay
allay ightray againay eforebay ong.”lay

All“ay ightray againay eforebay ong!”lay aughedlay ethay angerstray, ithway aay olemnlysay
erisiveday ortsay ofay aughlay. ook“Lay eyay; enwhay Aptaincay Ahabay isay allay ightray, enthay
isthay eftlay armay ofay inemay illway ebay allay ightray; otnay efore.”bay

at“Whay oday ouyay owknay aboutay im?”hay

at“Whay idday eythay ell__tay ouyay aboutay imhay? Aysay at!”thay

ey“Thay idn’tday elltay uchmay ofay anythingay aboutay imhay; onlyay I’veay eardhay atthay e’shay
aay oodgay ale-hunterwhay, anday aay oodgay aptaincay otay ishay ew.”cray

at’s“Thay uetray, at’sthay ue—yestray, othbay uetray enoughay. Utbay ouyay ustmay umpjay enwhay
ehay ivesgay anay orderay. Epstay anday owlgray; owlgray anday o—that’sgay ethay ordway ithway
Aptaincay Ahabay. Utbay othingnay aboutay atthay ingthay atthay appenedhay otay imhay offay
Apecay Ornhay, onglay agoay, enwhay ehay aylay ikelay eadday orfay eethray aysday anday ightsnay;
othingnay aboutay atthay eadlyday immageskray ithway ethay Aniardspay aforeay ethay altaray
inay Anta?—heardsay othingnay aboutay atthay, ehay? Othingnay aboutay ethay ilversay
alabashcay ehay atspay intoay? Anday othingnay aboutay ishay osinglay ishay eglay astlay
oyagevay, accordingay otay ethay ophecypray. Idn’tday eyay earhay aay ordway aboutay emthay
attersmay anday omethingsay oremay, ehay? Onay, Iay on’tday inkthay eyay idday; owhay ouldcay eyay?
Owhay owsknay itay? Otnay allay Antucketnay, Iay uessgay. Utbay ows’everhay, ayhapmay, e’veyay
eardhay elltay aboutay ethay eglay, anday owhay ehay ostlay itay; ayeay, eyay avehay eardhay ofay
atthay, Iay areday aysay. Ohay esyay, at__thay everyay oneay owsknay a’most—Iay eanmay eythay
owknay e’shay onlyay oneay eglay; anday atthay aay armacettipay ooktay ethay otheray off.”ay

“Myay iend,”fray aidsay Iay, at“whay allay isthay ibberishgay ofay oursyay isay aboutay, Iay
on’tday owknay, anday Iay on’tday uchmay arecay; orfay itay eemssay otay emay atthay ouyay ustmay ebay
aay ittlelay amagedday inay ethay eadhay. Utbay ifay ouyay areay eakingspay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay,
ofay atthay ipshay erethay, ethay Equodpay, enthay etlay emay elltay ouyay, atthay Iay owknay allay
aboutay ethay osslay ofay ishay eg.”lay

All_“_ay aboutay itay, eh—sureay ouyay o?—all?”day

etty“Pray ure.”say

Ithway ingerfay ointedpay anday eyeay evelledlay atay ethay Equodpay, ethay eggar-likebay
angerstray oodstay aay omentmay, asay ifay inay aay oubledtray everieray; enthay artingstay aay
ittlelay, urnedtay anday aid:—“Ye’vesay ippedshay, avehay eyay? Amesnay ownday onay ethay
aperspay? Ellway, ellway, at’swhay ignedsay, isay ignedsay; anday at’swhay otay ebay, illway
ebay; anday enthay againay, erhapspay itay on’tway ebay, afteray allay. Anyhoway, it’say allay
ixedfay anday arrangeday a’readyay; anday omesay ailorssay oray otheray ustmay ogay ithway imhay,
Iay upposesay; asay ellway esethay asay anyay otheray enmay, Odgay itypay em’ay! Orningmay otay eyay,
ipmatesshay, orningmay; ethay ineffableay eavenshay essblay eyay; I’may orrysay Iay oppedstay
e.”yay

ook“Lay erehay, iend,”fray aidsay Iay, if“ay ouyay avehay anythingay importantay otay elltay
usay, outay ithway itay; utbay ifay ouyay areay onlyay ingtryay otay amboozlebay usay, ouyay areay
istakenmay inay ouryay amegay; at’sthay allay Iay avehay otay ay.”say

And“ay it’say aidsay eryvay ellway, anday Iay ikelay otay earhay aay apchay alktay upay atthay ayway;
ouyay areay ustjay ethay anmay orfay im—thehay ikeslay ofay eyay. Orningmay otay eyay, ipmatesshay,
orningmay! Ohay! enwhay eyay etgay erethay, elltay em’ay I’veay oncludedcay otnay otay akemay oneay
ofay em.”’ay

Ah“ay, myay earday ellowfay, ouyay an’tcay oolfay usay atthay ay—youway an’tcay oolfay usay. Itay
isay ethay easiestay ingthay inay ethay orldway orfay aay anmay otay ooklay asay ifay ehay adhay aay
eatgray ecretsay inay im.”hay

orning“May otay eyay, ipmatesshay, orning.”may

orning“May itay is,”ay aidsay Iay. ome“Cay alongay, Ueequegqay, et’slay eavelay isthay azycray
anmay. Utbay opstay, elltay emay ouryay amenay, illway ou?”yay

Elijah.”“ay

Elijahay! oughtthay Iay, anday eway alkedway awayay, othbay ommentingcay, afteray eachay
other’say ashionfay, uponay isthay aggedray olday ailorsay; anday agreeday atthay ehay asway
othingnay utbay aay umbughay, ingtryay otay ebay aay ugbearbay. Utbay eway adhay otnay onegay
erhapspay aboveay aay undredhay ardsyay, enwhay ancingchay otay urntay aay ornercay, anday
ookinglay ackbay asay Iay idday osay, owhay ouldshay ebay eensay utbay Elijahay ollowingfay usay,
oughthay atay aay istanceday. Omehowsay, ethay ightsay ofay imhay uckstray emay osay, atthay Iay
aidsay othingnay otay Ueequegqay ofay ishay eingbay ehindbay, utbay assedpay onay ithway myay
omradecay, anxiousay otay eesay etherwhay ethay angerstray ouldway urntay ethay amesay ornercay
atthay eway idday. Ehay idday; anday enthay itay eemedsay otay emay atthay ehay asway oggingday usay,
utbay ithway atwhay intentay Iay ouldcay otnay orfay ethay ifelay ofay emay imagineay. Isthay
ircumstancecay, oupledcay ithway ishay ambiguousay, alf-hintinghay, alf-revealinghay,
oudedshray ortsay ofay alktay, ownay egatbay inay emay allay indskay ofay aguevay ondermentsway
anday alf-apprehensionshay, anday allay onnectedcay ithway ethay Equodpay; anday Aptaincay
Ahabay; anday ethay eglay ehay adhay ostlay; anday ethay Apecay Ornhay itfay; anday ethay ilversay
alabashcay; anday atwhay Aptaincay Elegpay adhay aidsay ofay imhay, enwhay Iay eftlay ethay ipshay
ethay ayday eviouspray; anday ethay edictionpray ofay ethay uawsqay Istigtay; anday ethay
oyagevay eway adhay oundbay ourselvesay otay ailsay; anday aay undredhay otheray adowyshay
ingsthay.

Iay asway esolvedray otay atisfysay elfmysay etherwhay isthay aggedray Elijahay asway eallyray
oggingday usay oray otnay, anday ithway atthay intentay ossedcray ethay ayway ithway Ueequegqay,
anday onay atthay idesay ofay itay etracedray ouray epsstay. Utbay Elijahay assedpay onay,
ithoutway eemingsay otay oticenay usay. Isthay elievedray emay; anday onceay oremay, anday
inallyfay asay itay eemedsay otay emay, Iay onouncedpray imhay inay myay earthay, aay umbughay.


APTERcHay 20ay. Allay Astiray.

Aay ayday oray otway assedpay, anday erethay asway eatgray activityay aboarday ethay Equodpay.
Otnay onlyay ereway ethay olday ailssay eingbay endedmay, utbay ewnay ailssay ereway omingcay onay
oardbay, anday oltsbay ofay anvascay, anday oilscay ofay iggingray; inay ortshay, everythingay
etokenedbay atthay ethay ip’sshay eparationspray ereway urryinghay otay aay oseclay.
Aptaincay Elegpay eldomsay oray evernay entway ashoreay, utbay atsay inay ishay igwamway
eepingkay aay arpshay ook-outlay uponay ethay andshay: Ildadbay idday allay ethay urchasingpay
anday ovidingpray atay ethay oresstay; anday ethay enmay employeday inay ethay oldhay anday onay
ethay iggingray ereway orkingway illtay onglay afteray ight-fallnay.

Onay ethay ayday ollowingfay Ueequeg’sqay igningsay ethay articlesay, ordway asway ivengay atay
allay ethay innsay erewhay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay ereway oppingstay, atthay eirthay estschay
ustmay ebay onay oardbay eforebay ightnay, orfay erethay asway onay ellingtay owhay oonsay ethay
esselvay ightmay ebay ailingsay. Osay Ueequegqay anday Iay otgay ownday ouray apstray,
esolvingray, oweverhay, otay eepslay ashoreay illtay ethay astlay. Utbay itay eemssay eythay
alwaysay ivegay eryvay onglay oticenay inay esethay asescay, anday ethay ipshay idday otnay ailsay
orfay everalsay aysday. Utbay onay onderway; erethay asway aay oodgay ealday otay ebay oneday, anday
erethay isay onay ellingtay owhay anymay ingsthay otay ebay oughtthay ofay, eforebay ethay Equodpay
asway ullyfay equippeday.

Everyay oneay owsknay atwhay aay ultitudemay ofay ings—bedsthay, auce-panssay, ivesknay anday
orksfay, ovelsshay anday ongstay, apkinsnay, ut-crackersnay, anday atwhay otnay, areay
indispensableay otay ethay usinessbay ofay ousekeepinghay. Ustjay osay ithway alingwhay,
ichwhay ecessitatesnay aay ee-years’thray ousekeepinghay uponay ethay ideway oceanay, arfay
omfray allay ocersgray, ostermongerscay, octorsday, akersbay, anday ankersbay. Anday
oughthay isthay alsoay oldshay uetray ofay erchantmay esselsvay, etyay otnay byay anyay eansmay
otay ethay amesay extentay asay ithway alemenwhay. Orfay esidesbay ethay eatgray engthlay ofay
ethay alingwhay oyagevay, ethay umerousnay articlesay eculiarpay otay ethay osecutionpray
ofay ethay isheryfay, anday ethay impossibilityay ofay eplacingray emthay atay ethay emoteray
arborshay usuallyay equentedfray, itay ustmay ebay ememberedray, atthay ofay allay ipsshay,
alingwhay esselsvay areay ethay ostmay exposeday otay accidentsay ofay allay indskay, anday
especiallyay otay ethay estructionday anday osslay ofay ethay eryvay ingsthay uponay ichwhay
ethay uccesssay ofay ethay oyagevay ostmay ependsday. Encehay, ethay arespay oatsbay, arespay
arsspay, anday arespay ineslay anday arpoonshay, anday arespay everythingsay, almostay, utbay
aay arespay Aptaincay anday uplicateday ipshay.

Atay ethay eriodpay ofay ouray arrivalay atay ethay Islanday, ethay eaviesthay oragestay ofay ethay
Equodpay adhay eenbay almostay ompletedcay; omprisingcay erhay eefbay, eadbray, aterway,
uelfay, anday ironay oopshay anday avesstay. Utbay, asay eforebay intedhay, orfay omesay imetay
erethay asway aay ontinualcay etchingfay anday arryingcay onay oardbay ofay iversday oddsay anday
endsay ofay ingsthay, othbay argelay anday allsmay.

Iefchay amongay osethay owhay idday isthay etchingfay anday arryingcay asway Aptaincay
Ildad’sbay istersay, aay eanlay olday adylay ofay aay ostmay eterminedday anday indefatigableay
iritspay, utbay ithalway eryvay indheartedkay, owhay eemedsay esolvedray atthay, ifay e__shay
ouldcay elphay itay, othingnay ouldshay ebay oundfay antingway inay ethay Equodpay, afteray
onceay airlyfay ettinggay otay easay. Atay oneay imetay eshay ouldway omecay onay oardbay ithway aay
arjay ofay icklespay orfay ethay eward’sstay antrypay; anotheray imetay ithway aay unchbay ofay
uillsqay orfay ethay iefchay ate’smay eskday, erewhay ehay eptkay ishay oglay; aay irdthay imetay
ithway aay ollray ofay annelflay orfay ethay allsmay ofay omesay one’say eumaticrhay ackbay.
Evernay idday anyay omanway etterbay eserveday erhay amenay, ichwhay asway Arity—Auntchay
Aritychay, asay everybodyay alledcay erhay. Anday ikelay aay istersay ofay aritychay idday isthay
aritablechay Auntay Aritychay ustlebay aboutay itherhay anday itherthay, eadyray otay urntay
erhay andhay anday earthay otay anythingay atthay omisedpray otay ieldyay afetysay, omfortcay,
anday onsolationcay otay allay onay oardbay aay ipshay inay ichwhay erhay elovedbay otherbray
Ildadbay asway oncernedcay, anday inay ichwhay eshay erselfhay owneday aay orescay oray otway ofay
ell-savedway ollarsday.

Utbay itay asway artlingstay otay eesay isthay excellentay eartedhay Uakeressqay omingcay onay
oardbay, asay eshay idday ethay astlay ayday, ithway aay onglay oil-ladleay inay oneay andhay, anday
aay illstay ongerlay alingwhay ancelay inay ethay otheray. Ornay asway Ildadbay imselfhay ornay
Aptaincay Elegpay atay allay ackwardbay. Asay orfay Ildadbay, ehay arriedcay aboutay ithway imhay
aay onglay istlay ofay ethay articlesay eedednay, anday atay everyay eshfray arrivalay, ownday
entway ishay arkmay oppositeay atthay articleay uponay ethay aperpay. Everyay onceay inay aay
ilewhay Elegpay amecay obblinghay outay ofay ishay alebonewhay enday, oaringray atay ethay enmay
ownday ethay atchwayshay, oaringray upay otay ethay iggersray atay ethay ast-headmay, anday
enthay oncludedcay byay oaringray ackbay intoay ishay igwamway.

Uringday esethay aysday ofay eparationpray, Ueequegqay anday Iay oftenay isitedvay ethay
aftcray, anday asay oftenay Iay askeday aboutay Aptaincay Ahabay, anday owhay ehay asway, anday
enwhay ehay asway oinggay otay omecay onay oardbay ishay ipshay. Otay esethay uestionsqay eythay
ouldway answeray, atthay ehay asway ettinggay etterbay anday etterbay, anday asway expecteday
aboarday everyay ayday; eantimemay, ethay otway aptainscay, Elegpay anday Ildadbay, ouldcay
attenday otay everythingay ecessarynay otay itfay ethay esselvay orfay ethay oyagevay. Ifay Iay
adhay eenbay ownrightday onesthay ithway elfmysay, Iay ouldway avehay eensay eryvay ainlyplay
inay myay earthay atthay Iay idday utbay alfhay ancyfay eingbay ommittedcay isthay ayway otay osay
onglay aay oyagevay, ithoutway onceay ayinglay myay eyesay onay ethay anmay owhay asway otay ebay ethay
absoluteay ictatorday ofay itay, osay oonsay asay ethay ipshay ailedsay outay uponay ethay openay
easay. Utbay enwhay aay anmay uspectssay anyay ongwray, itay ometimessay appenshay atthay ifay ehay
ebay alreadyay involveday inay ethay attermay, ehay insensiblyay ivesstray otay overcay upay
ishay uspicionssay evenay omfray imselfhay. Anday uchmay isthay ayway itay asway ithway emay. Iay
aidsay othingnay, anday iedtray otay inkthay othingnay.

Atay astlay itay asway ivengay outay atthay omesay imetay extnay ayday ethay ipshay ouldway
ertainlycay ailsay. Osay extnay orningmay, Ueequegqay anday Iay ooktay aay eryvay earlyay
artstay.


APTERcHay 21ay. Oinggay Aboarday.

Itay asway earlynay ixsay o’clockay, utbay onlyay eygray imperfectay istymay awnday, enwhay eway
ewdray ighnay ethay arfwhay.

ere“Thay areay omesay ailorssay unningray aheaday erethay, ifay Iay eesay ight,”ray aidsay Iay otay
Ueequegqay, it“ay an’tcay ebay adowsshay; e’sshay offay byay unrisesay, Iay uessgay; omecay
on!”ay

Avast!”“ay iedcray aay oicevay, osewhay owneray atay ethay amesay imetay omingcay oseclay
ehindbay usay, aidlay aay andhay uponay othbay ouray ouldersshay, anday enthay insinuatingay
imselfhay etweenbay usay, oodstay oopingstay orwardfay aay ittlelay, inay ethay uncertainay
ilighttway, angelystray eeringpay omfray Ueequegqay otay emay. Itay asway Elijahay.

oing“Gay aboard?”ay

ands“Hay offay, illway ou,”yay aidsay Iay.

ookee“Lay ere,”hay aidsay Ueequegqay, akingshay imselfhay, o“gay ay!”’way

Ain’t“ay oinggay aboarday, en?”thay

es“Yay, eway are,”ay aidsay Iay, ut“bay atwhay usinessbay isay atthay ofay oursyay? Oday ouyay
owknay, Mray. Elijahay, atthay Iay onsidercay ouyay aay ittlelay impertinent?”ay

o“Nay, onay, onay; Iay asn’tway awareay ofay at,”thay aidsay Elijahay, owlyslay anday
onderinglyway ookinglay omfray emay otay Ueequegqay, ithway ethay ostmay unaccountableay
ancesglay.

Elijah,”“ay aidsay Iay, ou“yay illway obligeay myay iendfray anday emay byay ithdrawingway. Eway
areay oinggay otay ethay Indianay anday Acificpay Oceansay, anday ouldway eferpray otnay otay ebay
etained.”day

e“Yay ebay, ebay eyay? Omingcay ackbay aforeay eakfast?”bray

e’s“Hay ackedcray, Ueequeg,”qay aidsay Iay, ome“cay on.”ay

olloa!”“Hay iedcray ationarystay Elijahay, ailinghay usay enwhay eway adhay emovedray aay ewfay
acespay.

ever“Nay indmay im,”hay aidsay Iay, ueequeg“Qay, omecay on.”ay

Utbay ehay olestay upay otay usay againay, anday uddenlysay appingclay ishay andhay onay myay
ouldershay, aid—“Didsay eyay eesay anythingay ookinglay ikelay enmay oinggay owardstay atthay
ipshay aay ilewhay ago?”ay

Uckstray byay isthay ainplay atter-of-factmay uestionqay, Iay answereday, ayingsay, es“Yay,
Iay oughtthay Iay idday eesay ourfay oray ivefay enmay; utbay itay asway ootay imday otay ebay ure.”say

ery“Vay imday, eryvay im,”day aidsay Elijahay. orning“May otay e.”yay

Onceay oremay eway uittedqay imhay; utbay onceay oremay ehay amecay oftlysay afteray usay; anday
ouchingtay myay ouldershay againay, aidsay, ee“Say ifay ouyay ancay indfay em’ay ownay, illway
eyay?

ind“Fay o?”whay

orning“May otay eyay! orningmay otay e!”yay ehay ejoinedray, againay ovingmay offay. Oh“ay! Iay
asway oinggay otay arnway eyay against—butay evernay indmay, evernay ind—it’smay allay oneay,
allay inay ethay amilyfay oo;—sharptay ostfray isthay orningmay, ain’tay itay? Ood-byegay otay
eyay. An’tshay eesay eyay againay eryvay oonsay, Iay uessgay; unlessay it’say eforebay ethay
Andgray Ury.”jay Anday ithway esethay ackedcray ordsway ehay inallyfay epartedday, eavinglay
emay, orfay ethay omentmay, inay onay allsmay ondermentway atay ishay anticfray impudenceay.

Atay astlay, eppingstay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, eway oundfay everythingay inay ofoundpray
uietqay, otnay aay oulsay ovingmay. Ethay abincay entranceay asway ockedlay ithinway; ethay
atcheshay ereway allay onay, anday umberedlay ithway oilscay ofay iggingray. Oinggay orwardfay
otay ethay orecastlefay, eway oundfay ethay ideslay ofay ethay uttlescay openay. Eeingsay aay
ightlay, eway entway ownday, anday oundfay onlyay anay olday iggerray erethay, appedwray inay aay
atteredtay ea-jacketpay. Ehay asway ownthray atay olewhay engthlay uponay otway estschay, ishay
acefay ownwardsday anday incloseday inay ishay oldedfay armsay. Ethay ofoundestpray umberslay
eptslay uponay imhay.

ose“Thay ailorssay eway awsay, Ueequegqay, erewhay ancay eythay avehay onegay o?”tay aidsay Iay,
ookinglay ubiouslyday atay ethay eeperslay. Utbay itay eemedsay atthay, enwhay onay ethay
arfwhay, Ueequegqay adhay otnay atay allay oticednay atwhay Iay ownay alludeday otay; encehay Iay
ouldway avehay oughtthay elfmysay otay avehay eenbay opticallyay eceivedday inay atthay
attermay, ereway itay otnay orfay Elijah’say otherwiseay inexplicableay uestionqay. Utbay Iay
eatbay ethay ingthay ownday; anday againay arkingmay ethay eeperslay, ocularlyjay intedhay otay
Ueequegqay atthay erhapspay eway adhay estbay itsay upay ithway ethay odybay; ellingtay imhay otay
establishay imselfhay accordinglyay. Ehay utpay ishay andhay uponay ethay eeper’sslay earray,
asay oughthay eelingfay ifay itay asway oftsay enoughay; anday enthay, ithoutway oremay adoay,
atsay uietlyqay ownday erethay.

acious“Gray! Ueequegqay, on’tday itsay ere,”thay aidsay Iay.

Oh“ay! errypay oodday eat,”say aidsay Ueequegqay, “myay ountrycay ayway; on’tway urthay imhay
ace.”fay

ace!”“Fay aidsay Iay, all“cay atthay ishay acefay? eryvay enevolentbay ountenancecay enthay;
utbay owhay ardhay ehay eathesbray, e’shay eavinghay imselfhay; etgay offay, Ueequegqay, ouyay
areay eavyhay, it’say indinggray ethay acefay ofay ethay oorpay. Etgay offay, Ueequegqay! Ooklay,
e’llhay itchtway ouyay offay oonsay. Iay onderway ehay on’tday ake.”way

Ueequegqay emovedray imselfhay otay ustjay eyondbay ethay eadhay ofay ethay eeperslay, anday
ightedlay ishay omahawktay ipepay. Iay atsay atay ethay eetfay. Eway eptkay ethay ipepay assingpay
overay ethay eeperslay, omfray oneay otay ethay otheray. Eanwhilemay, uponay uestioningqay
imhay inay ishay okenbray ashionfay, Ueequegqay avegay emay otay understanday atthay, inay ishay
andlay, owingay otay ethay absenceay ofay etteessay anday ofassay ofay allay ortssay, ethay ingkay,
iefschay, anday eatgray eoplepay enerallygay, ereway inay ethay ustomcay ofay atteningfay
omesay ofay ethay owerlay ordersay orfay ottomansay; anday otay urnishfay aay ousehay
omfortablycay inay atthay espectray, ouyay adhay onlyay otay uybay upay eightay oray entay azylay
ellowsfay, anday aylay emthay oundray inay ethay ierspay anday alcovesay. Esidesbay, itay asway
eryvay onvenientcay onay anay excursionay; uchmay etterbay anthay osethay arden-chairsgay
ichwhay areay onvertiblecay intoay alking-sticksway; uponay occasionay, aay iefchay
allingcay ishay attendantay, anday esiringday imhay otay akemay aay etteesay ofay imselfhay
underay aay eadingspray eetray, erhapspay inay omesay ampday arshymay aceplay.

Ilewhay arratingnay esethay ingsthay, everyay imetay Ueequegqay eceivedray ethay omahawktay
omfray emay, ehay ourishedflay ethay atchet-sidehay ofay itay overay ethay eeper’sslay eadhay.

at’s“Whay atthay orfay, Ueequeg?”qay

erry“Pay easyay, ill-ekay; ohay! errypay easy!”ay

Ehay asway oinggay onay ithway omesay ildway eminiscencesray aboutay ishay omahawk-pipetay,
ichwhay, itay eemedsay, adhay inay itsay otway usesay othbay ainedbray ishay oesfay anday oothedsay
ishay oulsay, enwhay eway ereway irectlyday attracteday otay ethay eepingslay iggerray. Ethay
ongstray aporvay ownay ompletelycay illingfay ethay ontractedcay olehay, itay eganbay otay
elltay uponay imhay. Ehay eathedbray ithway aay ortsay ofay ufflednessmay; enthay eemedsay
oubledtray inay ethay osenay; enthay evolvedray overay onceay oray icetway; enthay atsay upay anday
ubbedray ishay eyesay.

olloa!”“Hay ehay eathedbray atay astlay, o“whay ebay eyay okers?”smay

ipped“Shay en,”may answereday Iay, en“whay oesday eshay ail?”say

Aye“ay, ayeay, eyay areay oinggay inay erhay, ebay eyay? Eshay ailssay o-daytay. Ethay Aptaincay
amecay aboarday astlay ight.”nay

at“Whay Aptain?—Ahab?”cay

o“Whay utbay imhay indeed?”ay

Iay asway oinggay otay askay imhay omesay urtherfay uestionsqay oncerningcay Ahabay, enwhay eway
eardhay aay oisenay onay eckday.

olloa“Hay! Arbuck’sstay astir,”ay aidsay ethay iggerray. e’s“Hay aay ivelylay iefchay atemay,
atthay; oodgay anmay, anday aay iouspay; utbay allay aliveay ownay, Iay ustmay urntay o.”tay Anday osay
ayingsay ehay entway onay eckday, anday eway ollowedfay.

Itay asway ownay earclay unrisesay. Oonsay ethay ewcray amecay onay oardbay inay ostway anday
eesthray; ethay iggersray estirredbay emselvesthay; ethay atesmay ereway activelyay
engageday; anday everalsay ofay ethay oreshay eoplepay ereway usybay inay ingingbray ariousvay
astlay ingsthay onay oardbay. Eanwhilemay Aptaincay Ahabay emainedray invisiblyay
enshrineday ithinway ishay abincay.


APTERcHay 22ay. Errymay Istmaschray.

Atay engthlay, owardstay oonnay, uponay ethay inalfay ismissalday ofay ethay ip’sshay
iggersray, anday afteray ethay Equodpay adhay eenbay auledhay outay omfray ethay arfwhay, anday
afteray ethay ever-thoughtfulay Aritychay adhay omecay offay inay aay ale-boatwhay, ithway
erhay astlay ift—agay ight-capnay orfay Ubbstay, ethay econdsay atemay, erhay
other-in-lawbray, anday aay arespay Iblebay orfay ethay eward—afterstay allay isthay, ethay
otway Aptainscay, Elegpay anday Ildadbay, issueday omfray ethay abincay, anday urningtay otay
ethay iefchay atemay, Elegpay aidsay:

ow“Nay, Mray. Arbuckstay, areay ouyay uresay everythingay isay ightray? Aptaincay Ahabay isay
allay eady—justray okespay otay im—nothinghay oremay otay ebay otgay omfray oreshay, ehay?
Ellway, allcay allay andshay, enthay. Ustermay em’ay aftay ere—blasthay em!”’ay

o“Nay eednay ofay ofanepray ordsway, oweverhay eatgray ethay urryhay, Eleg,”pay aidsay
Ildadbay, ut“bay awayay ithway eethay, iendfray Arbuckstay, anday oday ouray idding.”bay

Owhay ownay! Erehay uponay ethay eryvay ointpay ofay artingstay orfay ethay oyagevay, Aptaincay
Elegpay anday Aptaincay Ildadbay ereway oinggay itay ithway aay ighhay andhay onay ethay
uarter-deckqay, ustjay asay ifay eythay ereway otay ebay oint-commandersjay atay easay, asay
ellway asay otay allay appearancesay inay ortpay. Anday, asay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay, onay ignsay
ofay imhay asway etyay otay ebay eensay; onlyay, eythay aidsay ehay asway inay ethay abincay. Utbay
enthay, ethay ideaay asway, atthay ishay esencepray asway byay onay eansmay ecessarynay inay
ettinggay ethay ipshay underay eighway, anday eeringstay erhay ellway outay otay easay. Indeeday,
asay atthay asway otnay atay allay ishay operpray usinessbay, utbay ethay ilot’spay; anday asay ehay
asway otnay etyay ompletelycay ecovered—soray eythay aid—thereforesay, Aptaincay Ahabay
ayedstay elowbay. Anday allay isthay eemedsay aturalnay enoughay; especiallyay asay inay ethay
erchantmay ervicesay anymay aptainscay evernay owshay emselvesthay onay eckday orfay aay
onsiderablecay imetay afteray eavinghay upay ethay anchoray, utbay emainray overay ethay
abincay abletay, avinghay aay arewellfay erry-makingmay ithway eirthay oreshay iendsfray,
eforebay eythay uitqay ethay ipshay orfay oodgay ithway ethay ilotpay.

Utbay erethay asway otnay uchmay ancechay otay inkthay overay ethay attermay, orfay Aptaincay
Elegpay asway ownay allay aliveay. Ehay eemedsay otay oday ostmay ofay ethay alkingtay anday
ommandingcay, anday otnay Ildadbay.

Aft“ay erehay, eyay onssay ofay achelors,”bay ehay iedcray, asay ethay ailorssay ingeredlay atay
ethay ain-mastmay. “Mray. Arbuckstay, ivedray em’ay aft.”ay

ike“Stray ethay enttay ere!”—wasthay ethay extnay orderay. Asay Iay intedhay eforebay, isthay
alebonewhay arqueemay asway evernay itchedpay exceptay inay ortpay; anday onay oardbay ethay
Equodpay, orfay irtythay earsyay, ethay orderay otay ikestray ethay enttay asway ellway ownknay
otay ebay ethay extnay ingthay otay eavinghay upay ethay anchoray.

an“May ethay apstancay! Oodblay anday under!—jump!”—wasthay ethay extnay ommandcay, anday
ethay ewcray angspray orfay ethay andspikeshay.

Ownay inay ettinggay underay eighway, ethay ationstay enerallygay occupieday byay ethay ilotpay
isay ethay orwardfay artpay ofay ethay ipshay. Anday erehay Ildadbay, owhay, ithway Elegpay, ebay
itay ownknay, inay additionay otay ishay otheray officersay, asway oneay ofay ethay icensedlay
ilotspay ofay ethay ort—hepay eingbay uspectedsay otay avehay otgay imselfhay ademay aay ilotpay
inay orderay otay avesay ethay Antucketnay ilot-feepay otay allay ethay ipsshay ehay asway
oncernedcay inay, orfay ehay evernay ilotedpay anyay otheray aft—Bildadcray, Iay aysay, ightmay
ownay ebay eensay activelyay engageday inay ookinglay overay ethay owsbay orfay ethay
approachingay anchoray, anday atay intervalsay ingingsay atwhay eemedsay aay ismalday avestay
ofay almodypsay, otay eerchay ethay andshay atay ethay indlassway, owhay oaredray orthfay omesay
ortsay ofay aay oruschay aboutay ethay irlsgay inay Ooblebay Alleyay, ithway eartyhay oodgay
illway. Everthelessnay, otnay eethray aysday eviouspray, Ildadbay adhay oldtay emthay atthay
onay ofanepray ongssay ouldway ebay alloweday onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, articularlypay inay
ettinggay underay eighway; anday Aritychay, ishay istersay, adhay acedplay aay allsmay oicechay
opycay ofay Attsway inay eachay eaman’ssay erthbay.

Eantimemay, overseeingay ethay otheray artpay ofay ethay ipshay, Aptaincay Elegpay ippedray
anday oresway asternay inay ethay ostmay ightfulfray annermay. Iay almostay oughtthay ehay
ouldway inksay ethay ipshay eforebay ethay anchoray ouldcay ebay otgay upay; involuntarilyay Iay
ausedpay onay myay andspikehay, anday oldtay Ueequegqay otay oday ethay amesay, inkingthay ofay
ethay erilspay eway othbay anray, inay artingstay onay ethay oyagevay ithway uchsay aay evilday orfay
aay ilotpay. Iay asway omfortingcay elfmysay, oweverhay, ithway ethay oughtthay atthay inay
iouspay Ildadbay ightmay ebay oundfay omesay alvationsay, itespay ofay ishay evensay undredhay
anday eventy-seventhsay aylay; enwhay Iay eltfay aay uddensay arpshay okepay inay myay earray,
anday urningtay oundray, asway orrifiedhay atay ethay apparitionay ofay Aptaincay Elegpay inay
ethay actay ofay ithdrawingway ishay eglay omfray myay immediateay icinityvay. Atthay asway myay
irstfay ickkay.

Is“ay atthay ethay ayway eythay eavehay inay ethay archantmay ervice?”say ehay oaredray.
ing“Spray, outhay eep-headshay; ingspray, anday eakbray thyay ackbonebay! Whyay on’tday eyay
ingspray, Iay aysay, allay ofay e—springyay! Uohogqay! ingspray, outhay apchay ithway ethay edray
iskerswhay; ingspray erethay, Otch-capscay; ingspray, outhay eengray antspay. Ingspray, Iay
aysay, allay ofay eyay, anday ingspray ouryay eyesay out!”ay Anday osay ayingsay, ehay ovedmay
alongay ethay indlassway, erehay anday erethay usingay ishay eglay eryvay eelyfray, ilewhay
imperturbableay Ildadbay eptkay eadinglay offay ithway ishay almodypsay. Inksthay Iay,
Aptaincay Elegpay ustmay avehay eenbay inkingdray omethingsay o-daytay.

Atay astlay ethay anchoray asway upay, ethay ailssay ereway etsay, anday offay eway idedglay. Itay
asway aay ortshay, oldcay Istmaschray; anday asay ethay ortshay orthernnay ayday ergedmay intoay
ightnay, eway oundfay ourselvesay almostay oadbray uponay ethay intryway oceanay, osewhay
eezingfray ayspray asedcay usay inay iceay, asay inay olishedpay armoray. Ethay onglay owsray ofay
eethtay onay ethay ulwarksbay istenedglay inay ethay oonlightmay; anday ikelay ethay itewhay
ivoryay uskstay ofay omesay ugehay elephantay, astvay urvingcay iciclesay ependedday omfray
ethay owsbay.

Anklay Ildadbay, asay ilotpay, eadedhay ethay irstfay atchway, anday everay anday anonay, asay
ethay olday aftcray eepday ivedday intoay ethay eengray eassay, anday entsay ethay iveringshay
ostfray allay overay erhay, anday ethay indsway owledhay, anday ethay ordagecay angray, ishay
eadystay otesnay ereway eard,—hay


eet_“Sway ieldsfay eyondbay ethay ellingsway oodflay, Andstay esseddray inay ivinglay
eengray. Osay otay ethay Ewsjay olday Anaancay oodstay, Ilewhay Ordanjay olledray etween.”_bay



Evernay idday osethay eetsway ordsway oundsay oremay eetlysway otay emay anthay enthay. Eythay
ereway ullfay ofay opehay anday uitionfray. Itespay ofay isthay igidfray interway ightnay inay
ethay oisterousbay Atlanticay, itespay ofay myay etway eetfay anday etterway acketjay, erethay
asway etyay, itay enthay eemedsay otay emay, anymay aay easantplay avenhay inay orestay; anday
eadsmay anday adesglay osay eternallyay ernalvay, atthay ethay assgray otshay upay byay ethay
ingspray, untroddenay, unwilteday, emainsray atay idsummermay.

Atay astlay eway ainedgay uchsay anay offingay, atthay ethay otway ilotspay ereway eedednay onay
ongerlay. Ethay outstay ail-boatsay atthay adhay accompanieday usay eganbay angingray
alongsideay.

Itay asway uriouscay anday otnay unpleasingay, owhay Elegpay anday Ildadbay ereway affecteday
atay isthay uncturejay, especiallyay Aptaincay Ildadbay. Orfay oathlay otay epartday, etyay;
eryvay oathlay otay eavelay, orfay oodgay, aay ipshay oundbay onay osay onglay anday erilouspay aay
oyage—beyondvay othbay ormystay Apescay; aay ipshay inay ichwhay omesay ousandsthay ofay ishay
ardhay earneday ollarsday ereway investeday; aay ipshay, inay ichwhay anay olday ipmateshay
ailedsay asay aptaincay; aay anmay almostay asay olday asay ehay, onceay oremay artingstay otay
encounteray allay ethay errorstay ofay ethay itilesspay awjay; oathlay otay aysay ood-byegay otay
aay ingthay osay everyay ayway imfulbray ofay everyay interestay otay im,—poorhay olday Ildadbay
ingeredlay onglay; acedpay ethay eckday ithway anxiousay idesstray; anray ownday intoay ethay
abincay otay eakspay anotheray arewellfay ordway erethay; againay amecay onay eckday, anday
ookedlay otay indwardway; ookedlay owardstay ethay ideway anday endlessay atersway, onlyay
