oundedbay byay ethay ar-offfay unseenay Easternay Ontinentscay; ookedlay owardstay ethay
andlay; ookedlay aloftay; ookedlay ightray anday eftlay; ookedlay everywhereay anday
owherenay; anday atay astlay, echanicallymay oilingcay aay operay uponay itsay inpay,
onvulsivelycay aspedgray outstay Elegpay byay ethay andhay, anday oldinghay upay aay anternlay,
orfay aay omentmay oodstay azinggay eroicallyhay inay ishay acefay, asay uchmay asay otay aysay,
evertheless“Nay, iendfray Elegpay, Iay ancay andstay itay; esyay, Iay an.”cay

Asay orfay Elegpay imselfhay, ehay ooktay itay oremay ikelay aay ilosopherphay; utbay orfay allay
ishay ilosophyphay, erethay asway aay eartay inklingtway inay ishay eyeay, enwhay ethay anternlay
amecay ootay earnay. Anday ehay, ootay, idday otnay aay ittlelay unray omfray abincay otay eck—nowday
aay ordway elowbay, anday ownay aay ordway ithway Arbuckstay, ethay iefchay atemay.

Utbay, atay astlay, ehay urnedtay otay ishay omradecay, ithway aay inalfay ortsay ofay ooklay aboutay
im,—“Captainhay Ildad—comebay, olday ipmateshay, eway ustmay ogay. Ackbay ethay ain-yardmay
erethay! Oatbay ahoyay! Andstay byay otay omecay oseclay alongsideay, ownay! Arefulcay,
areful!—comecay, Ildadbay, oy—saybay ouryay astlay. Ucklay otay eyay, Arbuck—luckstay otay
eyay, Mray. Ubb—luckstay otay eyay, Mray. Ask—good-byeflay anday oodgay ucklay otay eyay
all—anday isthay ayday eethray earsyay I’llay avehay aay othay uppersay okingsmay orfay eyay inay
olday Antucketnay. Urrahhay anday away!”ay

od“Gay essblay eyay, anday avehay eyay inay Ishay olyhay eepingkay, en,”may urmuredmay olday
Ildadbay, almostay incoherentlyay. I“ay opehay e’llyay avehay inefay eatherway ownay, osay
atthay Aptaincay Ahabay aymay oonsay ebay ovingmay amongay e—ayay easantplay unsay isay allay ehay
eedsnay, anday e’llyay avehay entyplay ofay emthay inay ethay opictray oyagevay eyay ogay. Ebay
arefulcay inay ethay unthay, eyay atesmay. On’tday avestay ethay oatsbay eedlesslynay, eyay
arpooneershay; oodgay itewhay edarcay ankplay isay aisedray ullfay eethray erpay entcay.
ithinway ethay earyay. On’tday orgetfay ouryay ayerspray, eitheray. Mray. Arbuckstay, indmay
atthay oopercay on’tday asteway ethay arespay avesstay. Ohay! ethay ail-needlessay areay inay
ethay eengray ockerlay! On’tday alewhay itay ootay uchmay a’ay Ord’slay aysday, enmay; utbay
on’tday issmay aay airfay ancechay eitheray, at’sthay ejectingray Eaven’shay oodgay iftsgay.
Avehay anay eyeay otay ethay olassesmay iercetay, Mray. Ubbstay; itay asway aay ittlelay eakylay, Iay
oughtthay. Ifay eyay ouchtay atay ethay islandsay, Mray. Askflay, ewarebay ofay ornicationfay.
Ood-byegay, ood-byegay! On’tday eepkay atthay eesechay ootay onglay ownday inay ethay oldhay,
Mray. Arbuckstay; it’llay oilspay. Ebay arefulcay ithway ethay utter—twentybay entscay ethay
oundpay itay asway, anday indmay eyay, if—”ay

ome“Cay, omecay, Aptaincay Ildadbay; opstay alavering,—away!”pay anday ithway atthay,
Elegpay urriedhay imhay overay ethay idesay, anday othbay optdray intoay ethay oatbay.

Ipshay anday oatbay ivergedday; ethay oldcay, ampday ightnay eezebray ewblay etweenbay; aay
eamingscray ullgay ewflay overheaday; ethay otway ullshay ildlyway olledray; eway avegay
eethray eavy-heartedhay eerschay, anday indlyblay ungedplay ikelay atefay intoay ethay onelay
Atlanticay.


APTERcHay 23ay. Ethay Eelay Oreshay.

Omesay apterschay ackbay, oneay Ulkingtonbay asway okenspay ofay, aay alltay, ewlandednay
arinermay, encountereday inay Ewnay Edfordbay atay ethay innay.

Enwhay onay atthay iveringshay inter’sway ightnay, ethay Equodpay ustthray erhay indictivevay
owsbay intoay ethay oldcay aliciousmay avesway, owhay ouldshay Iay eesay andingstay atay erhay
elmhay utbay Ulkingtonbay! Iay ookedlay ithway atheticsympay aweay anday earfulnessfay uponay
ethay anmay, owhay inay id-wintermay ustjay andedlay omfray aay ourfay ears’yay angerousday
oyagevay, ouldcay osay unrestinglyay ushpay offay againay orfay illstay anotheray
empestuoustay ermtay. Ethay andlay eemedsay orchingscay otay ishay eetfay. Onderfullestway
ingsthay areay everay ethay unmentionableay; eepday emoriesmay ieldyay onay epitaphsay;
isthay ix-inchsay apterchay isay ethay onelessstay avegray ofay Ulkingtonbay. Etlay emay onlyay
aysay atthay itay aredfay ithway imhay asay ithway ethay orm-tossedstay ipshay, atthay
iserablymay ivesdray alongay ethay eewardlay andlay. Ethay ortpay ouldway ainfay ivegay
uccorsay; ethay ortpay isay itifulpay; inay ethay ortpay isay afetysay, omfortcay,
earthstonehay, uppersay, armway anketsblay, iendsfray, allay at’sthay indkay otay ouray
ortalitiesmay. Utbay inay atthay alegay, ethay ortpay, ethay andlay, isay atthay ip’sshay
irestday eopardyjay; eshay ustmay flyay allay ospitalityhay; oneay ouchtay ofay andlay,
oughthay itay utbay azegray ethay eelkay, ouldway akemay erhay uddershay oughthray anday
oughthray. Ithway allay erhay ightmay eshay owdscray allay ailsay offay oreshay; inay osay oingday,
ightsfay ainst’gay ethay eryvay indsway atthay ainfay ouldway owblay erhay omewardhay; eekssay
allay ethay ashedlay ea’ssay andlessnesslay againay; orfay efuge’sray akesay orlornlyfay
ushingray intoay erilpay; erhay onlyay iendfray erhay itterestbay oefay!

Owknay eyay ownay, Ulkingtonbay? Impsesglay oday eyay eemsay otay eesay ofay atthay ortallymay
intolerableay uthtray; atthay allay eepday, earnestay inkingthay isay utbay ethay intrepiday
effortay ofay ethay oulsay otay eepkay ethay openay independenceay ofay erhay easay; ilewhay ethay
ildestway indsway ofay eavenhay anday earthay onspirecay otay astcay erhay onay ethay
eacheroustray, avishslay oreshay?

Utbay asay inay andlessnesslay aloneay esidesray ighesthay uthtray, orelessshay,
indefiniteay asay Od—sogay, etterbay isay itay otay erishpay inay atthay owlinghay infiniteay,
anthay ebay ingloriouslyay ashedday uponay ethay eelay, evenay ifay atthay ereway afetysay! Orfay
orm-likeway, enthay, ohay! owhay ouldway avencray awlcray otay andlay! Errorstay ofay ethay
erribletay! isay allay isthay agonyay osay ainvay? Aketay earthay, aketay earthay, Oay
Ulkingtonbay! Earbay eethay imlygray, emigodday! Upay omfray ethay ayspray ofay thyay
ocean-perishing—straightay upay, eapslay thyay apotheosisay!


APTERcHay 24ay. Ethay Advocateay.

Asay Ueequegqay anday Iay areay ownay airlyfay embarkeday inay isthay usinessbay ofay alingwhay;
anday asay isthay usinessbay ofay alingwhay ashay omehowsay omecay otay ebay egardedray amongay
andsmenlay asay aay atherray unpoeticalay anday isreputableday ursuitpay; ereforethay, Iay
amay allay anxietyay otay onvincecay eyay, eyay andsmenlay, ofay ethay injusticeay erebyhay
oneday otay usay untershay ofay aleswhay.

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, itay aymay ebay eemedday almostay uperfluoussay otay establishay
ethay actfay, atthay amongay eoplepay atay argelay, ethay usinessbay ofay alingwhay isay otnay
accounteday onay aay evellay ithway atwhay areay alledcay ethay iberallay ofessionspray. Ifay aay
angerstray ereway introduceday intoay anyay iscellaneousmay etropolitanmay ocietysay,
itay ouldway utbay ightlyslay advanceay ethay eneralgay opinionay ofay ishay eritsmay, ereway
ehay esentedpray otay ethay ompanycay asay aay arpooneerhay, aysay; anday ifay inay emulationay
ofay ethay avalnay officersay ehay ouldshay appenday ethay initialsay S.W.Fay. erm(Spay Alewhay
Isheryfay) otay ishay isitingvay ardcay, uchsay aay ocedurepray ouldway ebay eemedday
e-eminentlypray esumingpray anday idiculousray.

Oubtlessday oneay eadinglay easonray whyay ethay orldway eclinesday onoringhay usay
alemenwhay, isay isthay: eythay inkthay atthay, atay estbay, ouray ocationvay amountsay otay aay
utcheringbay ortsay ofay usinessbay; anday atthay enwhay activelyay engageday ereinthay, eway
areay urroundedsay byay allay annermay ofay efilementsday. Utchersbay eway areay, atthay isay
uetray. Utbay utchersbay, alsoay, anday utchersbay ofay ethay oodiestblay adgebay avehay eenbay
allay Artialmay Ommanderscay omwhay ethay orldway invariablyay elightsday otay onorhay. Anday
asay orfay ethay attermay ofay ethay allegeday uncleanlinessay ofay ouray usinessbay, eyay
allshay oonsay ebay initiateday intoay ertaincay actsfay ithertohay ettypray enerallygay
unknownay, anday ichwhay, uponay ethay olewhay, illway iumphantlytray antplay ethay ermspay
ale-shipwhay atay eastlay amongay ethay eanliestclay ingsthay ofay isthay idytay earthay. Utbay
evenay antinggray ethay argechay inay uestionqay otay ebay uetray; atwhay isorderedday
ipperyslay ecksday ofay aay ale-shipwhay areay omparablecay otay ethay unspeakableay
arrioncay ofay osethay attle-fieldsbay omfray ichwhay osay anymay oldierssay eturnray otay
inkdray inay allay adies’lay auditsplay? Anday ifay ethay ideaay ofay erilpay osay uchmay
enhancesay ethay opularpay onceitcay ofay ethay oldier’ssay ofessionpray; etlay emay assureay
eyay atthay anymay aay eteranvay owhay ashay eelyfray archedmay upay otay aay atterybay, ouldway
uicklyqay ecoilray atay ethay apparitionay ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay astvay ailtay,
anningfay intoay eddiesay ethay airay overay ishay eadhay. Orfay atwhay areay ethay
omprehensiblecay errorstay ofay anmay omparedcay ithway ethay interlinkeday errorstay anday
ondersway ofay Odgay!

Utbay, oughthay ethay orldway outsscay atay usay alewhay untershay, etyay oesday itay
unwittinglyay aypay usay ethay ofoundestpray omagehay; eayay, anay all-aboundingay
adorationay! orfay almostay allay ethay aperstay, ampslay, anday andlescay atthay urnbay
oundray ethay obeglay, urnbay, asay eforebay osay anymay inesshray, otay ouray oryglay!

Utbay ooklay atay isthay attermay inay otheray ightslay; eighway itay inay allay ortssay ofay
alesscay; eesay atwhay eway alemenwhay areay, anday avehay eenbay.

Whyay idday ethay Utchday inay Eday Itt’sway imetay avehay admiralsay ofay eirthay alingwhay
eetsflay? Whyay idday Ouislay IxVay. ofay Ancefray, atay ishay ownay ersonalpay expenseay, itfay
outay alingwhay ipsshay omfray Unkirkday, anday olitelypay inviteay otay atthay owntay omesay
orescay oray otway ofay amiliesfay omfray ouray ownay islanday ofay Antucketnay? Whyay idday
Itainbray etweenbay ethay earsyay 1750ay anday 1788ay aypay otay erhay alemenwhay inay ountiesbay
upwardsay ofay £1,000,000ay? Anday astlylay, owhay omescay itay atthay eway alemenwhay ofay
Americaay ownay outnumberay allay ethay estray ofay ethay andedbay alemenwhay inay ethay orldway;
ailsay aay avynay ofay upwardsay ofay evensay undredhay esselsvay; annedmay byay eighteenay
ousandthay enmay; earlyyay onsumingcay 4,000,000ay ofay ollarsday; ethay ipsshay orthway,
atay ethay imetay ofay ailingsay, $20,000,000ay! anday everyay earyay importingay intoay ouray
arborshay aay ellway eapedray arvesthay ofay $7,000,000ay. Owhay omescay allay isthay, ifay
erethay ebay otnay omethingsay uissantpay inay alingwhay?

Utbay isthay isay otnay ethay alfhay; ooklay againay.

Iay eelyfray assertay, atthay ethay osmopolitecay ilosopherphay annotcay, orfay ishay ifelay,
ointpay outay oneay inglesay eacefulpay influenceay, ichwhay ithinway ethay astlay ixtysay
earsyay ashay operateday oremay otentiallypay uponay ethay olewhay oadbray orldway, akentay
inay oneay aggregateay, anthay ethay ighhay anday ightymay usinessbay ofay alingwhay. Oneay ayway
anday anotheray, itay ashay egottenbay eventsay osay emarkableray inay emselvesthay, anday osay
ontinuouslycay omentousmay inay eirthay equentialsay issuesay, atthay alingwhay aymay
ellway ebay egardedray asay atthay Egyptianay othermay, owhay orebay offspringay emselvesthay
egnantpray omfray erhay ombway. Itay ouldway ebay aay opelesshay, endlessay asktay otay
ataloguecay allay esethay ingsthay. Etlay aay andfulhay ufficesay. Orfay anymay earsyay astpay
ethay ale-shipwhay ashay eenbay ethay ioneerpay inay erretingfay outay ethay emotestray anday
eastlay ownknay artspay ofay ethay earthay. Eshay ashay exploreday eassay anday archipelagoesay
ichwhay adhay onay artchay, erewhay onay Ookcay oray Ancouvervay adhay everay ailedsay. Ifay
Americanay anday Europeanay en-of-warmay ownay eacefullypay ideray inay onceay avagesay
arborshay, etlay emthay irefay alutessay otay ethay onorhay anday oryglay ofay ethay
ale-shipwhay, ichwhay originallyay owedshay emthay ethay ayway, anday irstfay interpreteday
etweenbay emthay anday ethay avagessay. Eythay aymay elebratecay asay eythay illway ethay
eroeshay ofay Exploringay Expeditionsay, ouryay Ookscay, ouryay Usensternskray; utbay Iay
aysay atthay oresscay ofay anonymousay Aptainscay avehay ailedsay outay ofay Antucketnay,
atthay ereway asay eatgray, anday eatergray anthay ouryay Ookcay anday ouryay Usensternkray.
Orfay inay eirthay uccourlesssay empty-handednessay, eythay, inay ethay eathenishhay
arkedshay atersway, anday byay ethay eachesbay ofay unrecordeday, avelinjay islandsay,
attledbay ithway irginvay ondersway anday errorstay atthay Ookcay ithway allay ishay arinesmay
anday usketsmay ouldway otnay illinglyway avehay aredday. Allay atthay isay ademay uchsay aay
ourishflay ofay inay ethay olday Outhsay Easay Oyagesvay, osethay ingsthay ereway utbay ethay
ife-timelay ommonplacescay ofay ouray eroichay Antucketersnay. Oftenay, adventuresay
ichwhay Ancouvervay edicatesday eethray apterschay otay, esethay enmay accounteday
unworthyay ofay eingbay etsay ownday inay ethay ip’sshay ommoncay oglay. Ahay, ethay orldway! Ohay,
ethay orldway!

Untilay ethay alewhay isheryfay oundedray Apecay Ornhay, onay ommercecay utbay olonialcay,
arcelyscay anyay intercourseay utbay olonialcay, asway arriedcay onay etweenbay Europeay
anday ethay onglay inelay ofay ethay opulentay Anishspay ovincespray onay ethay Acificpay
oastcay. Itay asway ethay alemanwhay owhay irstfay okebray oughthray ethay ealousjay olicypay
ofay ethay Anishspay owncray, ouchingtay osethay oloniescay; anday, ifay acespay ermittedpay,
itay ightmay ebay istinctlyday ownshay owhay omfray osethay alemenwhay atay astlay eventuateday
ethay iberationlay ofay Erupay, Ilichay, anday Oliviabay omfray ethay okeyay ofay Olday Ainspay,
anday ethay establishmentay ofay ethay eternalay emocracyday inay osethay artspay.

Atthay eatgray Americaay onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay eresphay, Australiaay, asway
ivengay otay ethay enlighteneday orldway byay ethay alemanwhay. Afteray itsay irstfay
under-bornblay iscoveryday byay aay Utchmanday, allay otheray ipsshay onglay unnedshay
osethay oresshay asay estiferouslypay arbarousbay; utbay ethay ale-shipwhay ouchedtay
erethay. Ethay ale-shipwhay isay ethay uetray othermay ofay atthay ownay ightymay olonycay.
Oreovermay, inay ethay infancyay ofay ethay irstfay Australianay ettlementsay, ethay
emigrantsay ereway everalsay imestay avedsay omfray arvationstay byay ethay enevolentbay
iscuitbay ofay ethay ale-shipwhay uckilylay oppingdray anay anchoray inay eirthay atersway.
Ethay uncounteday islesay ofay allay Olynesiapay onfesscay ethay amesay uthtray, anday oday
ommercialcay omagehay otay ethay ale-shipwhay, atthay earedclay ethay ayway orfay ethay
issionarymay anday ethay erchantmay, anday inay anymay asescay arriedcay ethay imitivepray
issionariesmay otay eirthay irstfay estinationsday. Ifay atthay ouble-boltedday andlay,
Apanjay, isay everay otay ecomebay ospitablehay, itay isay ethay ale-shipwhay aloneay otay omwhay
ethay editcray illway ebay ueday; orfay alreadyay eshay isay onay ethay esholdthray.

Utbay ifay, inay ethay acefay ofay allay isthay, ouyay illstay eclareday atthay alingwhay ashay onay
eticallyæsthay oblenay associationsay onnectedcay ithway itay, enthay amay Iay eadyray otay
ivershay iftyfay anceslay ithway ouyay erethay, anday unhorseay ouyay ithway aay itsplay elmethay
everyay imetay.

Ethay alewhay ashay onay amousfay authoray, anday alingwhay onay amousfay oniclerchray, ouyay
illway aysay.

e_Thay alewhay onay amousfay authoray, anday alingwhay onay amousfay onicler?_chray Owhay
otewray ethay irstfay accountay ofay ouray Eviathanlay? Owhay utbay ightymay Objay! Anday owhay
omposedcay ethay irstfay arrativenay ofay aay aling-voyagewhay? Owhay, utbay onay esslay aay
incepray anthay Alfreday ethay Eatgray, owhay, ithway ishay ownay oyalray enpay, ooktay ownday
ethay ordsway omfray Otheray, ethay Orwegiannay ale-hunterwhay ofay osethay imestay! Anday
owhay onouncedpray ouray owingglay eulogyay inay Arliamentpay? Owhay, utbay Edmunday Urkebay!

Uetray enoughay, utbay enthay alemenwhay emselvesthay areay oorpay evilsday; eythay avehay onay
oodgay oodblay inay eirthay einsvay.

o_Nay oodgay oodblay inay eirthay eins?_vay Eythay avehay omethingsay etterbay anthay oyalray
oodblay erethay. Ethay andmothergray ofay Enjaminbay Anklinfray asway Arymay Orrelmay;
afterwardsay, byay arriagemay, Arymay Olgerfay, oneay ofay ethay olday ettlerssay ofay
Antucketnay, anday ethay ancestressay otay aay onglay inelay ofay Olgersfay anday
arpooneers—allhay ithkay anday inkay otay oblenay Enjamin—thisbay ayday artingday ethay
arbedbay ironay omfray oneay idesay ofay ethay orldway otay ethay otheray.

Oodgay againay; utbay enthay allay onfesscay atthay omehowsay alingwhay isay otnay
espectableray.

aling_Whay otnay espectable?_ray Alingwhay isay imperialay! Byay olday Englishay
atutorystay awlay, ethay alewhay isay eclaredday a“ay oyalray ish.”fay *ay

Ohay, at’sthay onlyay ominalnay! Ethay alewhay imselfhay ashay evernay iguredfay inay anyay
andgray imposingay ayway.

e_Thay alewhay evernay iguredfay inay anyay andgray imposingay ay?_way Inay oneay ofay ethay
ightymay iumphstray ivengay otay aay Omanray eneralgay uponay ishay enteringay ethay orld’sway
apitalcay, ethay onesbay ofay aay alewhay, oughtbray allay ethay ayway omfray ethay Iansyray
oastcay, ereway ethay ostmay onspicuouscay objectay inay ethay alledcymbay ocession.*pray

ee*Say ubsequentsay apterschay orfay omethingsay oremay onay isthay eadhay.

Antgray itay, incesay ouyay itecay itay; utbay, aysay atwhay ouyay illway, erethay isay onay ealray
ignityday inay alingwhay.

o_Nay ignityday inay aling?_whay Ethay ignityday ofay ouray allingcay ethay eryvay eavenshay
attestay. Etuscay isay aay onstellationcay inay ethay Outhsay! Onay oremay! Ivedray ownday ouryay
athay inay esencepray ofay ethay Arczay, anday aketay itay offay otay Ueequegqay! Onay oremay! Iay
owknay aay anmay atthay, inay ishay ifetimelay, ashay akentay eethray undredhay anday iftyfay
aleswhay. Iay accountay atthay anmay oremay onorablehay anthay atthay eatgray aptaincay ofay
antiquityay owhay oastedbay ofay akingtay asay anymay alledway ownstay.

Anday, asay orfay emay, ifay, byay anyay ossibilitypay, erethay ebay anyay asay etyay
undiscovereday imepray ingthay inay emay; ifay Iay allshay everay eserveday anyay ealray eputeray
inay atthay allsmay utbay ighhay ushedhay orldway ichwhay Iay ightmay otnay ebay unreasonablyay
ambitiousay ofay; ifay ereafterhay Iay allshay oday anythingay atthay, uponay ethay olewhay, aay
anmay ightmay atherray avehay oneday anthay otay avehay eftlay undoneay; ifay, atay myay eathday,
myay executorsay, oray oremay operlypray myay editorscray, indfay anyay eciouspray MSSay. inay
myay eskday, enthay erehay Iay ospectivelypray ascribeay allay ethay onorhay anday ethay oryglay
otay alingwhay; orfay aay ale-shipwhay asway myay Aleyay Ollegecay anday myay Arvardhay.


APTERcHay 25ay. Ostscriptpay.

Inay ehalfbay ofay ethay ignityday ofay alingwhay, Iay ouldway ainfay advanceay aughtnay utbay
ubstantiatedsay actsfay. Utbay afteray embattlingay ishay actsfay, anay advocateay owhay
ouldshay ollywhay uppresssay aay otnay unreasonableay urmisesay, ichwhay ightmay elltay
eloquentlyay uponay ishay ause—suchcay anay advocateay, ouldway ehay otnay ebay
ameworthyblay?

Itay isay ellway ownknay atthay atay ethay oronationcay ofay ingskay anday ueensqay, evenay
odernmay onesay, aay ertaincay uriouscay ocesspray ofay easoningsay emthay orfay eirthay
unctionsfay isay onegay oughthray. Erethay isay aay altcellarsay ofay atestay, osay alledcay,
anday erethay aymay ebay aay astorcay ofay atestay. Owhay eythay useay ethay altsay,
ecisely—whopray owsknay? Ertaincay Iay amay, oweverhay, atthay aay ing’skay eadhay isay
olemnlysay oileday atay ishay oronationcay, evenay asay aay eadhay ofay aladsay. Ancay itay ebay,
oughthay, atthay eythay anointay itay ithway aay iewvay ofay akingmay itsay interioray unray
ellway, asay eythay anointay achinerymay? Uchmay ightmay ebay uminatedray erehay,
oncerningcay ethay essentialay ignityday ofay isthay egalray ocesspray, ecausebay inay
ommoncay ifelay eway esteemay utbay eanlymay anday ontemptiblycay aay ellowfay owhay anointsay
ishay airhay, anday alpablypay ellssmay ofay atthay anointingay. Inay uthtray, aay aturemay anmay
owhay usesay air-oilhay, unlessay edicinallymay, atthay anmay ashay obablypray otgay aay
uoggyqay otspay inay imhay omewheresay. Asay aay eneralgay uleray, ehay an’tcay amountay otay
uchmay inay ishay otalitytay.

Utbay ethay onlyay ingthay otay ebay onsideredcay erehay, isay is—whatthay indkay ofay oilay isay
useday atay oronationscay? Ertainlycay itay annotcay ebay oliveay oilay, ornay acassarmay
oilay, ornay astorcay oilay, ornay ear’sbay oilay, ornay aintray oilay, ornay od-livercay oilay.
Atwhay enthay ancay itay ossiblypay ebay, utbay ermspay oilay inay itsay unmanufactureday,
unpolluteday atestay, ethay eetestsway ofay allay oilsay?

Inkthay ofay atthay, eyay oyallay Itonsbray! eway alemenwhay upplysay ouryay ingskay anday
ueensqay ithway oronationcay uffstay!


APTERcHay 26ay. Ightsknay anday Uiressqay.

Ethay iefchay atemay ofay ethay Equodpay asway Arbuckstay, aay ativenay ofay Antucketnay, anday aay
Uakerqay byay escentday. Ehay asway aay onglay, earnestay anmay, anday oughthay ornbay onay anay
icyay oastcay, eemedsay ellway adapteday otay endureay othay atitudeslay, ishay eshflay eingbay
ardhay asay ice-bakedtway iscuitbay. Ansportedtray otay ethay Indiesay, ishay ivelay oodblay
ouldway otnay oilspay ikelay ottledbay aleay. Ehay ustmay avehay eenbay ornbay inay omesay imetay
ofay eneralgay oughtdray anday aminefay, oray uponay oneay ofay osethay astfay aysday orfay ichwhay
ishay atestay isay amousfay. Onlyay omesay irtythay ariday ummerssay adhay ehay eensay; osethay
ummerssay adhay ieddray upay allay ishay icalphysay uperfluousnesssay. Utbay isthay, ishay
innessthay, osay otay eakspay, eemedsay onay oremay ethay okentay ofay astingway anxietiesay
anday arescay, anthay itay eemedsay ethay indicationay ofay anyay odilybay ightblay. Itay asway
erelymay ethay ondensationcay ofay ethay anmay. Ehay asway byay onay eansmay ill-lookingay;
uiteqay ethay ontrarycay. Ishay urepay ighttay inskay asway anay excellentay itfay; anday
oselyclay appedwray upay inay itay, anday embalmeday ithway inneray ealthhay anday engthstray,
ikelay aay evivifiedray Egyptianay, isthay Arbuckstay eemedsay eparedpray otay endureay orfay
onglay agesay otay omecay, anday otay endureay alwaysay, asay ownay; orfay ebay itay Olarpay owsnay
oray orridtay unsay, ikelay aay atentpay onometerchray, ishay interioray italityvay asway
arrantedway otay oday ellway inay allay imatesclay. Ookinglay intoay ishay eyesay, ouyay eemedsay
otay eesay erethay ethay etyay ingeringlay imagesay ofay osethay ousand-foldthay erilspay ehay
adhay almlycay onfrontedcay oughthray ifelay. Aay aidstay, eadfaststay anmay, osewhay ifelay
orfay ethay ostmay artpay asway aay ellingtay antomimepay ofay actionay, anday otnay aay ametay
apterchay ofay oundssay. Etyay, orfay allay ishay ardyhay obrietysay anday ortitudefay, erethay
ereway ertaincay ualitiesqay inay imhay ichwhay atay imestay affecteday, anday inay omesay
asescay eemedsay ellway ighnay otay overbalanceay allay ethay estray. Uncommonlyay
onscientiouscay orfay aay eamansay, anday endueday ithway aay eepday aturalnay everenceray,
ethay ildway ateryway onelinesslay ofay ishay ifelay idday ereforethay onglystray inclineay
imhay otay uperstitionsay; utbay otay atthay ortsay ofay uperstitionsay, ichwhay inay omesay
organizationsay eemssay atherray otay ingspray, omehowsay, omfray intelligenceay anthay
omfray ignoranceay. Outwarday ortentspay anday inwarday esentimentspray ereway ishay. Anday
ifay atay imestay esethay ingsthay entbay ethay eldedway ironay ofay ishay oulsay, uchmay oremay
idday ishay ar-awayfay omesticday emoriesmay ofay ishay oungyay Apecay ifeway anday ildchay,
endtay otay endbay imhay illstay oremay omfray ethay originalay uggednessray ofay ishay aturenay,
anday openay imhay illstay urtherfay otay osethay atentlay influencesay ichwhay, inay omesay
onest-heartedhay enmay, estrainray ethay ushgay ofay are-devilday aringday, osay oftenay
evinceday byay othersay inay ethay oremay erilouspay icissitudesvay ofay ethay isheryfay. I“ay
illway avehay onay anmay inay myay oat,”bay aidsay Arbuckstay, o“whay isay otnay afraiday ofay aay
ale.”whay Byay isthay, ehay eemedsay otay eanmay, otnay onlyay atthay ethay ostmay eliableray anday
usefulay ouragecay asway atthay ichwhay arisesay omfray ethay airfay estimationay ofay ethay
encountereday erilpay, utbay atthay anay utterlyay earlessfay anmay isay aay arfay oremay
angerousday omradecay anthay aay owardcay.

Aye“ay, aye,”ay aidsay Ubbstay, ethay econdsay atemay, arbuck“Stay, erethay, isay asay
arefulcay aay anmay asay ou’llyay indfay anywhereay inay isthay ishery.”fay Utbay eway allshay
ereay onglay eesay atwhay atthay ordway areful”“cay eciselypray eansmay enwhay useday byay aay
anmay ikelay Ubbstay, oray almostay anyay otheray alewhay unterhay.

Arbuckstay asway onay usadercray afteray erilspay; inay imhay ouragecay asway otnay aay
entimentsay; utbay aay ingthay implysay usefulay otay imhay, anday alwaysay atay andhay uponay
allay ortallymay acticalpray occasionsay. Esidesbay, ehay oughtthay, erhapspay, atthay inay
isthay usinessbay ofay alingwhay, ouragecay asway oneay ofay ethay eatgray aplestay outfitsay
ofay ethay ipshay, ikelay erhay eefbay anday erhay eadbray, anday otnay otay ebay oolishlyfay
astedway. Ereforewhay ehay adhay onay ancyfay orfay oweringlay orfay aleswhay afteray
un-downsay; ornay orfay ersistingpay inay ightingfay aay ishfay atthay ootay uchmay ersistedpay
inay ightingfay imhay. Orfay, oughtthay Arbuckstay, Iay amay erehay inay isthay iticalcray
oceanay otay illkay aleswhay orfay myay ivinglay, anday otnay otay ebay illedkay byay emthay orfay
eirsthay; anday atthay undredshay ofay enmay adhay eenbay osay illedkay Arbuckstay ellway ewknay.
Atwhay oomday asway ishay ownay ather’sfay? Erewhay, inay ethay ottomlessbay eepsday, ouldcay
ehay indfay ethay orntay imbslay ofay ishay otherbray?

Ithway emoriesmay ikelay esethay inay imhay, anday, oreovermay, ivengay otay aay ertaincay
uperstitiousnesssay, asay ashay eenbay aidsay; ethay ouragecay ofay isthay Arbuckstay ichwhay
ouldcay, everthelessnay, illstay ourishflay, ustmay indeeday avehay eenbay extremeay. Utbay
itay asway otnay inay easonableray aturenay atthay aay anmay osay organizeday, anday ithway uchsay
erribletay experiencesay anday emembrancesray asay ehay adhay; itay asway otnay inay aturenay
atthay esethay ingsthay ouldshay ailfay inay atentlylay engenderingay anay elementay inay
imhay, ichwhay, underay uitablesay ircumstancescay, ouldway eakbray outay omfray itsay
onfinementcay, anday urnbay allay ishay ouragecay upay. Anday avebray asay ehay ightmay ebay, itay
asway atthay ortsay ofay averybray ieflychay, isiblevay inay omesay intrepiday enmay, ichwhay,
ilewhay enerallygay abidingay irmfay inay ethay onflictcay ithway eassay, oray indsway, oray
aleswhay, oray anyay ofay ethay ordinaryay irrationalay orrorshay ofay ethay orldway, etyay
annotcay ithstandway osethay oremay errifictay, ecausebay oremay iritualspay errorstay,
ichwhay ometimessay enacemay ouyay omfray ethay oncentratingcay owbray ofay anay enrageday
anday ightymay anmay.

Utbay ereway ethay omingcay arrativenay otay evealray inay anyay instanceay, ethay ompletecay
abasementay ofay oorpay Arbuck’sstay ortitudefay, arcescay ightmay Iay avehay ethay earthay
otay itewray itay; orfay itay isay aay ingthay ostmay orrowfulsay, aynay ockingshay, otay exposeay
ethay allfay ofay alourvay inay ethay oulsay. Enmay aymay eemsay etestableday asay ointjay
ock-companiesstay anday ationsnay; avesknay, oolsfay, anday urderersmay erethay aymay ebay;
enmay aymay avehay eanmay anday eagremay acesfay; utbay anmay, inay ethay idealay, isay osay oblenay
anday osay arklingspay, uchsay aay andgray anday owingglay eaturecray, atthay overay anyay
ignominiousay emishblay inay imhay allay ishay ellowsfay ouldshay unray otay owthray eirthay
ostliestcay obesray. Atthay immaculateay anlinessmay eway eelfay ithinway ourselvesay, osay
arfay ithinway usay, atthay itay emainsray intactay oughthay allay ethay outeray aracterchay
eemsay onegay; eedsblay ithway eenestkay anguishay atay ethay undrapeday ectaclespay ofay aay
alor-ruinedvay anmay. Ornay ancay ietypay itselfay, atay uchsay aay amefulshay ightsay,
ompletelycay iflestay erhay upbraidingsay againstay ethay ermittingpay arsstay. Utbay
isthay augustay ignityday Iay eattray ofay, isay otnay ethay ignityday ofay ingskay anday obesray,
utbay atthay aboundingay ignityday ichwhay ashay onay obedray investitureay. Outhay altshay
eesay itay iningshay inay ethay armay atthay ieldsway aay ickpay oray ivesdray aay ikespay; atthay
emocraticday ignityday ichwhay, onay allay andshay, adiatesray ithoutway enday omfray Odgay;
Imselfhay! Ethay eatgray Odgay absoluteay! Ethay entrecay anday ircumferencecay ofay allay
emocracyday! Ishay omnipresenceay, ouray ivineday equalityay!

Ifay, enthay, otay eanestmay arinersmay, anday enegadesray anday astawayscay, Iay allshay
ereafterhay ascribeay ighhay ualitiesqay, oughthay arkday; eaveway oundray emthay agictray
acesgray; ifay evenay ethay ostmay ournfulmay, erchancepay ethay ostmay abaseday, amongay
emthay allay, allshay atay imestay iftlay imselfhay otay ethay exalteday ountsmay; ifay Iay allshay
ouchtay atthay orkman’sway armay ithway omesay etherealay ightlay; ifay Iay allshay eadspray aay
ainbowray overay ishay isastrousday etsay ofay unsay; enthay againstay allay ortalmay iticscray
earbay emay outay inay itay, outhay ustjay Iritspay ofay Equalityay, ichwhay asthay eadspray oneay
oyalray antlemay ofay umanityhay overay allay myay indkay! Earbay emay outay inay itay, outhay
eatgray emocraticday Odgay! owhay idstday otnay efuseray otay ethay artsway onvictcay,
Unyanbay, ethay alepay, oeticpay earlpay; Outhay owhay idstday otheclay ithway oublyday
ammeredhay eaveslay ofay inestfay oldgay, ethay umpedstay anday auperedpay armay ofay olday
Ervantescay; Outhay owhay idstday ickpay upay Andreway Acksonjay omfray ethay ebblespay; owhay
idstday urlhay imhay uponay aay ar-horseway; owhay idstday underthay imhay igherhay anthay aay
onethray! Outhay owhay, inay allay Thyay ightymay, earthlyay archingsmay, everay ullestcay
Thyay electestsay ampionschay omfray ethay inglykay ommonscay; earbay emay outay inay itay, Oay
Odgay!


APTERcHay 27ay. Ightsknay anday Uiressqay.

Ubbstay asway ethay econdsay atemay. Ehay asway aay ativenay ofay Apecay Odcay; anday encehay,
accordingay otay ocallay usageay, asway alledcay aay Ape-Cod-mancay. Aay appy-go-luckyhay;
eithernay avencray ornay aliantvay; akingtay erilspay asay eythay amecay ithway anay
indifferentay airay; anday ilewhay engageday inay ethay ostmay imminentay isiscray ofay ethay
asechay, oilingtay awayay, almcay anday ollectedcay asay aay ourneymanjay oinerjay engageday
orfay ethay earyay. Ood-humoredgay, easyay, anday arelesscay, ehay esidedpray overay ishay
ale-boatwhay asay ifay ethay ostmay eadlyday encounteray ereway utbay aay innerday, anday ishay
ewcray allay inviteday uestsgay. Ehay asway asay articularpay aboutay ethay omfortablecay
arrangementay ofay ishay artpay ofay ethay oatbay, asay anay olday age-driverstay isay aboutay
ethay ugnesssnay ofay ishay oxbay. Enwhay oseclay otay ethay alewhay, inay ethay eryvay
eath-lockday ofay ethay ightfay, ehay andledhay ishay unpityingay ancelay oollycay anday
off-handedlyay, asay aay istlingwhay inkertay ishay ammerhay. Ehay ouldway umhay overay ishay
olday igadigray unestay ilewhay ankflay anday ankflay ithway ethay ostmay exasperateday
onstermay. Onglay usageay adhay, orfay isthay Ubbstay, onvertedcay ethay awsjay ofay eathday
intoay anay easyay airchay. Atwhay ehay oughtthay ofay eathday itselfay, erethay isay onay
ellingtay. Etherwhay ehay everay oughtthay ofay itay atay allay, ightmay ebay aay uestionqay;
utbay, ifay ehay everay idday ancechay otay astcay ishay indmay atthay ayway afteray aay
omfortablecay innerday, onay oubtday, ikelay aay oodgay ailorsay, ehay ooktay itay otay ebay aay
ortsay ofay allcay ofay ethay atchway otay umbletay aloftay, anday estirbay emselvesthay erethay,
aboutay omethingsay ichwhay ehay ouldway indfay outay enwhay ehay obeyeday ethay orderay, anday
otnay oonersay.

Atwhay, erhapspay, ithway otheray ingsthay, ademay Ubbstay uchsay anay easy-goingay,
unfearingay anmay, osay eerilychay udgingtray offay ithway ethay urdenbay ofay ifelay inay aay
orldway ullfay ofay avegray edlarspay, allay owedbay otay ethay oundgray ithway eirthay ackspay;
atwhay elpedhay otay ingbray aboutay atthay almostay impiousay ood-humorgay ofay ishay; atthay
ingthay ustmay avehay eenbay ishay ipepay. Orfay, ikelay ishay osenay, ishay ortshay, ackblay
ittlelay ipepay asway oneay ofay ethay egularray eaturesfay ofay ishay acefay. Ouyay ouldway
almostay asay oonsay avehay expecteday imhay otay urntay outay ofay ishay unkbay ithoutway ishay
osenay asay ithoutway ishay ipepay. Ehay eptkay aay olewhay owray ofay ipespay erethay eadyray
oadedlay, uckstay inay aay ackray, ithinway easyay eachray ofay ishay andhay; anday, eneverwhay
ehay urnedtay inay, ehay okedsmay emthay allay outay inay uccessionsay, ightinglay oneay omfray
ethay otheray otay ethay enday ofay ethay apterchay; enthay oadinglay emthay againay otay ebay inay
eadinessray aneway. Orfay, enwhay Ubbstay esseddray, insteaday ofay irstfay uttingpay ishay
egslay intoay ishay owserstray, ehay utpay ishay ipepay intoay ishay outhmay.

Iay aysay isthay ontinualcay okingsmay ustmay avehay eenbay oneay ausecay, atay eastlay, ofay ishay
eculiarpay ispositionday; orfay everyay oneay owsknay atthay isthay earthlyay airay,
etherwhay ashoreay oray afloatay, isay erriblytay infecteday ithway ethay amelessnay
iseriesmay ofay ethay umberlessnay ortalsmay owhay avehay iedday exhalingay itay; anday asay inay
imetay ofay ethay olerachay, omesay eoplepay ogay aboutay ithway aay amphoratedcay
andkerchiefhay otay eirthay outhsmay; osay, ikewiselay, againstay allay ortalmay
ibulationstray, Ubb’sstay obaccotay okesmay ightmay avehay operateday asay aay ortsay ofay
isinfectingday agentay.

Ethay irdthay atemay asway Askflay, aay ativenay ofay Isburytay, inay Artha’smay Ineyardvay. Aay
ortshay, outstay, uddyray oungyay ellowfay, eryvay ugnaciouspay oncerningcay aleswhay,
owhay omehowsay eemedsay otay inkthay atthay ethay eatgray eviathanslay adhay ersonallypay
anday ereditarilyhay affronteday imhay; anday ereforethay itay asway aay ortsay ofay ointpay ofay
onorhay ithway imhay, otay estroyday emthay eneverwhay encountereday. Osay utterlyay ostlay
asway ehay otay allay ensesay ofay everenceray orfay ethay anymay arvelsmay ofay eirthay ajesticmay
ulkbay anday icmystay aysway; anday osay eadday otay anythingay ikelay anay apprehensionay ofay
anyay ossiblepay angerday omfray encounteringay emthay; atthay inay ishay oorpay opinionay,
ethay ondrousway alewhay asway utbay aay eciesspay ofay agnifiedmay ousemay, oray atay eastlay
ater-ratway, equiringray onlyay aay ittlelay ircumventioncay anday omesay allsmay
applicationay ofay imetay anday oubletray inay orderay otay illkay anday oilbay. Isthay
ignorantay, unconsciousay earlessnessfay ofay ishay ademay imhay aay ittlelay aggishway inay
ethay attermay ofay aleswhay; ehay ollowedfay esethay ishfay orfay ethay unfay ofay itay; anday aay
eethray ears’yay oyagevay oundray Apecay Ornhay asway onlyay aay ollyjay okejay atthay astedlay
atthay engthlay ofay imetay. Asay aay arpenter’scay ailsnay areay ividedday intoay oughtwray
ailsnay anday utcay ailsnay; osay ankindmay aymay ebay imilarlysay ividedday. Ittlelay Askflay
asway oneay ofay ethay oughtwray onesay; ademay otay inchclay ighttay anday astlay onglay. Eythay
alledcay imhay Ing-Postkay onay oardbay ofay ethay Equodpay; ecausebay, inay ormfay, ehay ouldcay
ebay ellway ikenedlay otay ethay ortshay, uaresqay imbertay ownknay byay atthay amenay inay
Arcticay alerswhay; anday ichwhay byay ethay eansmay ofay anymay adiatingray idesay imberstay
inserteday intoay itay, ervessay otay acebray ethay ipshay againstay ethay icyay oncussionscay
ofay osethay atteringbay eassay.

Ownay esethay eethray ates—Starbuckmay, Ubbstay, anday Askflay, ereway omentousmay enmay.
Eythay itay asway owhay byay universalay escriptionpray ommandedcay eethray ofay ethay
Equod’spay oatsbay asay eadsmenhay. Inay atthay andgray orderay ofay attlebay inay ichwhay
Aptaincay Ahabay ouldway obablypray arshalmay ishay orcesfay otay escendday onay ethay
aleswhay, esethay eethray eadsmenhay ereway asay aptainscay ofay ompaniescay. Oray, eingbay
armeday ithway eirthay onglay eenkay alingwhay earsspay, eythay ereway asay aay ickedpay iotray
ofay ancerslay; evenay asay ethay arpooneershay ereway ingersflay ofay avelinsjay.

Anday incesay inay isthay amousfay isheryfay, eachay atemay oray eadsmanhay, ikelay aay Othicgay
Ightknay ofay olday, isay alwaysay accompanieday byay ishay oat-steererbay oray arpooneerhay,
owhay inay ertaincay onjuncturescay ovidespray imhay ithway aay eshfray ancelay, enwhay ethay
ormerfay oneay ashay eenbay adlybay istedtway, oray elboweday inay ethay assaultay; anday
oreovermay, asay erethay enerallygay ubsistssay etweenbay ethay otway, aay oseclay intimacyay
anday iendlinessfray; itay isay ereforethay utbay eetmay, atthay inay isthay aceplay eway etsay
ownday owhay ethay Equod’spay arpooneershay ereway, anday otay atwhay eadsmanhay eachay ofay
emthay elongedbay.

Irstfay ofay allay asway Ueequegqay, omwhay Arbuckstay, ethay iefchay atemay, adhay electedsay
orfay ishay uiresqay. Utbay Ueequegqay isay alreadyay ownknay.

Extnay asway Ashtegotay, anay unmixeday Indianay omfray Aygay Eadhay, ethay ostmay esterlyway
omontorypray ofay Artha’smay Ineyardvay, erewhay erethay illstay existsay ethay astlay
emnantray ofay aay illagevay ofay edray enmay, ichwhay ashay onglay uppliedsay ethay
eighboringnay islanday ofay Antucketnay ithway anymay ofay erhay ostmay aringday
arpooneershay. Inay ethay isheryfay, eythay usuallyay ogay byay ethay enericgay amenay ofay
Ay-Headersgay. Ashtego’stay onglay, eanlay, ablesay airhay, ishay ighhay eekchay onesbay,
anday ackblay oundingray eyes—foray anay Indianay, Orientalay inay eirthay argenesslay, utbay
Antarcticay inay eirthay itteringglay expression—allay isthay ufficientlysay
oclaimedpray imhay anay inheritoray ofay ethay unvitiateday oodblay ofay osethay oudpray
arriorway untershay, owhay, inay uestqay ofay ethay eatgray Ewnay Englanday oosemay, adhay
ouredscay, owbay inay andhay, ethay aboriginalay orestsfay ofay ethay ainmay. Utbay onay ongerlay
uffingsnay inay ethay ailtray ofay ethay ildway eastsbay ofay ethay oodlandway, Ashtegotay ownay
untedhay inay ethay akeway ofay ethay eatgray aleswhay ofay ethay easay; ethay unerringay arpoonhay
ofay ethay onsay itlyfay eplacingray ethay infallibleay arroway ofay ethay iressay. Otay ooklay
atay ethay awnytay awnbray ofay ishay ithelay akysnay imbslay, ouyay ouldway almostay avehay
editedcray ethay uperstitionssay ofay omesay ofay ethay earlieray Uritanspay, anday
alf-believedhay isthay ildway Indianay otay ebay aay onsay ofay ethay Incepray ofay ethay Owerspay
ofay ethay Airay. Ashtegotay asway Ubbstay ethay econdsay ate’smay uiresqay.

Irdthay amongay ethay arpooneershay asway Aggooday, aay iganticgay, oal-blackcay
egro-savagenay, ithway aay ion-likelay ead—antray Ahasuerusay otay eholdbay. Uspendedsay
omfray ishay earsay ereway otway oldengay oopshay, osay argelay atthay ethay ailorssay alledcay
emthay ing-boltsray, anday ouldway alktay ofay ecuringsay ethay op-sailtay alyardshay otay
emthay. Inay ishay outhyay Aggooday adhay oluntarilyvay ippedshay onay oardbay ofay aay alerwhay,
inglyay inay aay onelylay aybay onay ishay ativenay oastcay. Anday evernay avinghay eenbay
anywhereay inay ethay orldway utbay inay Africaay, Antucketnay, anday ethay aganpay arborshay
ostmay equentedfray byay alemenwhay; anday avinghay ownay edlay orfay anymay earsyay ethay oldbay
ifelay ofay ethay isheryfay inay ethay ipsshay ofay ownersay uncommonlyay eedfulhay ofay atwhay
annermay ofay enmay eythay ippedshay; Aggooday etainedray allay ishay arbaricbay irtuesvay,
anday erectay asay aay iraffegay, ovedmay aboutay ethay ecksday inay allay ethay omppay ofay ixsay
eetfay ivefay inay ishay ockssay. Erethay asway aay orporealcay umilityhay inay ookinglay upay atay
imhay; anday aay itewhay anmay andingstay eforebay imhay eemedsay aay itewhay agflay omecay otay
egbay ucetray ofay aay ortressfay. Uriouscay otay elltay, isthay imperialay egronay,
Ahasuerusay Aggooday, asway ethay Uiresqay ofay ittlelay Askflay, owhay ookedlay ikelay aay
ess-manchay esidebay imhay. Asay orfay ethay esidueray ofay ethay Equod’spay ompanycay, ebay itay
aidsay, atthay atay ethay esentpray ayday otnay oneay inay otway ofay ethay anymay ousandthay enmay
eforebay ethay astmay employeday inay ethay Americanay alewhay isheryfay, areay Americansay
ornbay, oughthay ettypray earlynay allay ethay officersay areay. Ereinhay itay isay ethay amesay
ithway ethay Americanay alewhay isheryfay asay ithway ethay Americanay armyay anday ilitarymay
anday erchantmay aviesnay, anday ethay engineeringay orcesfay employeday inay ethay
onstructioncay ofay ethay Americanay Analscay anday Ailroadsray. Ethay amesay, Iay aysay,
ecausebay inay allay esethay asescay ethay ativenay Americanay iberallylay ovidespray ethay
ainsbray, ethay estray ofay ethay orldway asay enerouslygay upplyingsay ethay usclesmay. Onay
allsmay umbernay ofay esethay alingwhay eamensay elongbay otay ethay Azoresay, erewhay ethay
outwarday oundbay Antucketnay alerswhay equentlyfray ouchtay otay augmentay eirthay ewscray
omfray ethay ardyhay easantspay ofay osethay ockyray oresshay. Inay ikelay annermay, ethay
Eenlandgray alerswhay ailingsay outay ofay Ullhay oray Ondonlay, utpay inay atay ethay Etlandshay
Islandsay, otay eceiveray ethay ullfay omplementcay ofay eirthay ewcray. Uponay ethay assagepay
omewardshay, eythay opdray emthay erethay againay. Owhay itay isay, erethay isay onay ellingtay,
utbay Islandersay eemsay otay akemay ethay estbay alemenwhay. Eythay ereway earlynay allay
Islandersay inay ethay Equodpay, Isolatoes__ay ootay, Iay allcay uchsay, otnay
acknowledgingay ethay ommoncay ontinentcay ofay enmay, utbay eachay Isolato__ay ivinglay onay
aay eparatesay ontinentcay ofay ishay ownay. Etyay ownay, ederatedfay alongay oneay eelkay,
atwhay aay etsay esethay Isolatoesay ereway! Anay Anacharsisay Ootzclay eputationday omfray
allay ethay islesay ofay ethay easay, anday allay ethay endsay ofay ethay earthay, accompanyingay
Olday Ahabay inay ethay Equodpay otay aylay ethay orld’sway ievancesgray eforebay atthay arbay
omfray ichwhay otnay eryvay anymay ofay emthay everay omecay ackbay. Ackblay Ittlelay Ip—hepay
evernay id—ohday, onay! ehay entway eforebay. Oorpay Alabamaay oybay! Onay ethay imgray
Equod’spay orecastlefay, eyay allshay ereay onglay eesay imhay, eatingbay ishay ambourinetay;
elusivepray ofay ethay eternalay imetay, enwhay entsay orfay, otay ethay eatgray uarter-deckqay
onay ighhay, ehay asway idbay ikestray inay ithway angelsay, anday eatbay ishay ambourinetay inay
oryglay; alledcay aay owardcay erehay, ailedhay aay erohay erethay!


APTERcHay 28ay. Ahabay.

Orfay everalsay aysday afteray eavinglay Antucketnay, othingnay aboveay atcheshay asway
eensay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay. Ethay atesmay egularlyray elievedray eachay otheray atay ethay
atchesway, anday orfay aughtay atthay ouldcay ebay eensay otay ethay ontrarycay, eythay eemedsay
otay ebay ethay onlyay ommanderscay ofay ethay ipshay; onlyay eythay ometimessay issueday omfray
ethay abincay ithway ordersay osay uddensay anday eremptorypay, atthay afteray allay itay asway
ainplay eythay utbay ommandedcay icariouslyvay. Esyay, eirthay upremesay ordlay anday
ictatorday asway erethay, oughthay ithertohay unseenay byay anyay eyesay otnay ermittedpay otay
enetratepay intoay ethay ownay acredsay etreatray ofay ethay abincay.

Everyay imetay Iay ascendeday otay ethay eckday omfray myay atchesway elowbay, Iay instantlyay
azedgay aftay otay arkmay ifay anyay angestray acefay ereway isiblevay; orfay myay irstfay aguevay
isquietudeday ouchingtay ethay unknownay aptaincay, ownay inay ethay eclusionsay ofay ethay
easay, ecamebay almostay aay erturbationpay. Isthay asway angelystray eightenedhay atay
imestay byay ethay aggedray Elijah’say iabolicalday incoherencesay uninvitedlyay
ecurringray otay emay, ithway aay ubtlesay energyay Iay ouldcay otnay avehay eforebay onceivedcay
ofay. Utbay oorlypay ouldcay Iay ithstandway emthay, uchmay asay inay otheray oodsmay Iay asway
almostay eadyray otay ilesmay atay ethay olemnsay imsicalitieswhay ofay atthay outlandishay
ophetpray ofay ethay arveswhay. Utbay ateverwhay itay asway ofay apprehensivenessay oray
uneasiness—toay allcay itay o—whichsay Iay eltfay, etyay eneverwhay Iay amecay otay ooklay
aboutay emay inay ethay ipshay, itay eemedsay againstay allay arrantryway otay erishchay uchsay
emotionsay. Orfay oughthay ethay arpooneershay, ithway ethay eatgray odybay ofay ethay ewcray,
ereway aay arfay oremay arbaricbay, eathenishhay, anday otleymay etsay anthay anyay ofay ethay
ametay erchant-shipmay ompaniescay ichwhay myay eviouspray experiencesay adhay ademay emay
acquainteday ithway, illstay Iay ascribeday is—andthay ightlyray ascribeday it—toay ethay
iercefay uniquenessay ofay ethay eryvay aturenay ofay atthay ildway Andinavianscay ocationvay
inay ichwhay Iay adhay osay abandonedlyay embarkeday. Utbay itay asway especiallyay ethay
aspectay ofay ethay eethray iefchay officersay ofay ethay ipshay, ethay atesmay, ichwhay asway
ostmay orciblyfay alculatedcay otay allayay esethay olourlesscay isgivingsmay, anday
induceay onfidencecay anday eerfulnesschay inay everyay esentmentpray ofay ethay oyagevay.
Eethray etterbay, oremay ikelylay ea-officerssay anday enmay, eachay inay ishay ownay
ifferentday ayway, ouldcay otnay eadilyray ebay oundfay, anday eythay ereway everyay oneay ofay
emthay Americansay; aay Antucketernay, aay Ineyardervay, aay Apecay anmay. Ownay, itay eingbay
Istmaschray enwhay ethay ipshay otshay omfray outay erhay arborhay, orfay aay acespay eway adhay
itingbay Olarpay eatherway, oughthay allay ethay imetay unningray awayay omfray itay otay ethay
outhwardsay; anday byay everyay egreeday anday inutemay ofay atitudelay ichwhay eway ailedsay,
aduallygray eavinglay atthay ercilessmay interway, anday allay itsay intolerableay
eatherway ehindbay usay. Itay asway oneay ofay osethay esslay oweringlay, utbay illstay eygray
anday oomyglay enoughay orningsmay ofay ethay ansitiontray, enwhay ithway aay airfay indway ethay
ipshay asway ushingray oughthray ethay aterway ithway aay indictivevay ortsay ofay eapinglay
anday elancholymay apidityray, atthay asay Iay ountedmay otay ethay eckday atay ethay allcay ofay
ethay orenoonfay atchway, osay oonsay asay Iay evelledlay myay anceglay owardstay ethay
affrailtay, orebodingfay iversshay anray overay emay. Ealityray outranay apprehensionay;
Aptaincay Ahabay oodstay uponay ishay uarter-deckqay.

Erethay eemedsay onay ignsay ofay ommoncay odilybay illnessay aboutay imhay, ornay ofay ethay
ecoveryray omfray anyay. Ehay ookedlay ikelay aay anmay utcay awayay omfray ethay akestay, enwhay
ethay irefay ashay overrunninglyay astedway allay ethay imbslay ithoutway onsumingcay emthay,
oray akingtay awayay oneay articlepay omfray eirthay ompactedcay ageday obustnessray. Ishay
olewhay ighhay, oadbray ormfay, eemedsay ademay ofay olidsay onzebray, anday apedshay inay anay
unalterableay ouldmay, ikelay Ellini’scay astcay Erseuspay. Eadingthray itsay ayway outay
omfray amongay ishay eygray airshay, anday ontinuingcay ightray ownday oneay idesay ofay ishay
awnytay orchedscay acefay anday ecknay, illtay itay isappearedday inay ishay othingclay, ouyay
awsay aay enderslay od-likeray arkmay, ividlylay itishwhay. Itay esembledray atthay
erpendicularpay eamsay ometimessay ademay inay ethay aightstray, oftylay unktray ofay aay
eatgray eetray, enwhay ethay upperay ightninglay earinglytay artsday ownday itay, anday
ithoutway enchingwray aay inglesay igtway, eelspay anday oovesgray outay ethay arkbay omfray
optay otay ottombay, ereay unningray offay intoay ethay oilsay, eavinglay ethay eetray illstay
eenlygray aliveay, utbay andedbray. Etherwhay atthay arkmay asway ornbay ithway imhay, oray
etherwhay itay asway ethay arscay eftlay byay omesay esperateday oundway, onay oneay ouldcay
ertainlycay aysay. Byay omesay acittay onsentcay, oughoutthray ethay oyagevay ittlelay oray
onay allusionay asway ademay otay itay, especiallyay byay ethay atesmay. Utbay onceay
Ashtego’stay eniorsay, anay olday Ay-Headgay Indianay amongay ethay ewcray,
uperstitiouslysay asserteday atthay otnay illtay ehay asway ullfay ortyfay earsyay olday idday
Ahabay ecomebay atthay ayway andedbray, anday enthay itay amecay uponay imhay, otnay inay ethay
uryfay ofay anyay ortalmay ayfray, utbay inay anay elementalay ifestray atay easay. Etyay, isthay
ildway inthay eemedsay inferentiallyay egativednay, byay atwhay aay eygray Anxmanmay
insinuateday, anay olday epulchralsay anmay, owhay, avinghay evernay eforebay ailedsay outay
ofay Antucketnay, adhay evernay ereay isthay aidlay eyeay uponay ildway Ahabay. Everthelessnay,
ethay olday ea-traditionssay, ethay immemorialay edulitiescray, opularlypay investeday
isthay olday Anxmanmay ithway eternaturalpray owerspay ofay iscernmentday. Osay atthay onay
itewhay ailorsay eriouslysay ontradictedcay imhay enwhay ehay aidsay atthay ifay everay
Aptaincay Ahabay ouldshay ebay anquillytray aidlay out—whichay ightmay ardlyhay omecay otay
asspay, osay ehay uttered—thenmay, oeverwhay ouldshay oday atthay astlay officeay orfay ethay
eadday, ouldway indfay aay irth-markbay onay imhay omfray owncray otay olesay.

Osay owerfullypay idday ethay olewhay imgray aspectay ofay Ahabay affectay emay, anday ethay
ividlay andbray ichwhay eakedstray itay, atthay orfay ethay irstfay ewfay omentsmay Iay ardlyhay
otednay atthay otnay aay ittlelay ofay isthay overbearingay imnessgray asway owingay otay ethay
arbaricbay itewhay eglay uponay ichwhay ehay artlypay oodstay. Itay adhay eviouslypray omecay
otay emay atthay isthay ivoryay eglay adhay atay easay eenbay ashionedfay omfray ethay olishedpay
onebay ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay awjay. Aye“ay, ehay asway ismastedday offay Apan,”jay aidsay
ethay olday Ay-Headgay Indianay onceay; ut“bay ikelay ishay ismastedday aftcray, ehay ippedshay
anotheray astmay ithoutway omingcay omehay orfay itay. Ehay ashay aay uiverqay ofay em.”’ay

Iay asway uckstray ithway ethay ingularsay osturepay ehay aintainedmay. Uponay eachay idesay ofay
ethay Equod’spay uarterqay eckday, anday ettypray oseclay otay ethay izzenmay oudsshray,
erethay asway anay augeray olehay, oredbay aboutay alfhay anay inchay oray osay, intoay ethay
ankplay. Ishay onebay eglay eadiedstay inay atthay olehay; oneay armay elevateday, anday
oldinghay byay aay oudshray; Aptaincay Ahabay oodstay erectay, ookinglay aightstray outay
eyondbay ethay ip’sshay ever-pitchingay owpray. Erethay asway anay infinityay ofay irmestfay
ortitudefay, aay eterminateday, unsurrenderableay ilfulnessway, inay ethay ixedfay anday
earlessfay, orwardfay edicationday ofay atthay anceglay. Otnay aay ordway ehay okespay; ornay
idday ishay officersay aysay aughtay otay imhay; oughthay byay allay eirthay inutestmay
esturesgay anday expressionsay, eythay ainlyplay owedshay ethay uneasyay, ifay otnay
ainfulpay, onsciousnesscay ofay eingbay underay aay oubledtray aster-eyemay. Anday otnay
onlyay atthay, utbay oodymay ickenstray Ahabay oodstay eforebay emthay ithway aay ucifixioncray
inay ishay acefay; inay allay ethay amelessnay egalray overbearingay ignityday ofay omesay
ightymay oeway.

Ereay onglay, omfray ishay irstfay isitvay inay ethay airay, ehay ithdrewway intoay ishay abincay.
Utbay afteray atthay orningmay, ehay asway everyay ayday isiblevay otay ethay ewcray; eitheray
andingstay inay ishay ivot-holepay, oray eatedsay uponay anay ivoryay oolstay ehay adhay; oray
eavilyhay alkingway ethay eckday. Asay ethay skyay ewgray esslay oomyglay; indeeday, eganbay otay
owgray aay ittlelay enialgay, ehay ecamebay illstay esslay anday esslay aay ecluseray; asay ifay,
enwhay ethay ipshay adhay ailedsay omfray omehay, othingnay utbay ethay eadday intryway
eaknessblay ofay ethay easay adhay enthay eptkay imhay osay ecludedsay. Anday, byay anday byay, itay
amecay otay asspay, atthay ehay asway almostay ontinuallycay inay ethay airay; utbay, asay etyay,
orfay allay atthay ehay aidsay, oray erceptiblypay idday, onay ethay atay astlay unnysay eckday, ehay
eemedsay asay unnecessaryay erethay asay anotheray astmay. Utbay ethay Equodpay asway onlyay
akingmay aay assagepay ownay; otnay egularlyray uisingcray; earlynay allay alingwhay
eparativespray eedingnay upervisionsay ethay atesmay ereway ullyfay ompetentcay otay, osay
atthay erethay asway ittlelay oray othingnay, outay ofay imselfhay, otay employay oray exciteay
Ahabay, ownay; anday usthay asechay awayay, orfay atthay oneay intervalay, ethay oudsclay atthay
ayerlay uponay ayerlay ereway iledpay uponay ishay owbray, asay everay allay oudsclay oosechay
ethay oftiestlay eakspay otay ilepay emselvesthay uponay.

Everthelessnay, ereay onglay, ethay armway, arblingway ersuasivenesspay ofay ethay
easantplay, olidayhay eatherway eway amecay otay, eemedsay aduallygray otay armchay imhay
omfray ishay oodmay. Orfay, asay enwhay ethay ed-cheekedray, ancingday irlsgay, Aprilay anday
Aymay, iptray omehay otay ethay intryway, isanthropicmay oodsway; evenay ethay arestbay,
uggedestray, ostmay under-cloventhay olday oakay illway atay eastlay endsay orthfay omesay
ewfay eengray outsspray, otay elcomeway uchsay ad-heartedglay isitantsvay; osay Ahabay idday,
inay ethay enday, aay ittlelay espondray otay ethay ayfulplay alluringsay ofay atthay irlishgay
airay. Oremay anthay onceay idday ehay utpay orthfay ethay aintfay ossomblay ofay aay ooklay,
ichwhay, inay anyay otheray anmay, ouldway avehay oonsay oweredflay outay inay aay ilesmay.


APTERcHay 29ay. Enteray Ahabay; otay Imhay, Ubbstay.

Omesay aysday elapseday, anday iceay anday icebergsay allay asternay, ethay Equodpay ownay entway
ollingray oughthray ethay ightbray Uitoqay ingspray, ichwhay, atay easay, almostay
erpetuallypay eignsray onay ethay esholdthray ofay ethay eternalay Augustay ofay ethay
Opictray. Ethay armlyway oolcay, earclay, ingingray, erfumedpay, overflowingay,
edundantray aysday, ereway asay alcrystay obletsgay ofay Ersianpay erbetshay, eapedhay
up—flakeday upay, ithway ose-waterray owsnay. Ethay arredstay anday atelystay ightsnay
eemedsay aughtyhay amesday inay ewelledjay elvetsvay, ursingnay atay omehay inay onelylay
idepray, ethay emorymay ofay eirthay absentay onqueringcay Earlsay, ethay oldengay elmetedhay
unssay! Orfay eepingslay anmay, as’tway ardhay otay oosechay etweenbay uchsay insomeway aysday
anday uchsay educingsay ightsnay. Utbay allay ethay itcheriesway ofay atthay unwaningay
eatherway idday otnay erelymay endlay ewnay ellsspay anday otenciespay otay ethay outwarday
orldway. Inwarday eythay urnedtay uponay ethay oulsay, especiallyay enwhay ethay illstay ildmay
ourshay ofay eveay amecay onay; enthay, emorymay otshay erhay alscrystay asay ethay earclay iceay
ostmay ormsfay ofay oiselessnay ilightstway. Anday allay esethay ubtlesay agenciesay, oremay
anday oremay eythay oughtwray onay Ahab’say exturetay.

Olday ageay isay alwaysay akefulway; asay ifay, ethay ongerlay inkedlay ithway ifelay, ethay esslay
anmay ashay otay oday ithway aughtay atthay ookslay ikelay eathday. Amongay ea-commanderssay,
ethay olday eybeardsgray illway oftenestay eavelay eirthay erthsbay otay isitvay ethay
ight-cloakednay eckday. Itay asway osay ithway Ahabay; onlyay atthay ownay, ofay atelay, ehay
eemedsay osay uchmay otay ivelay inay ethay openay airay, atthay ulytray eakingspay, ishay isitsvay
ereway oremay otay ethay abincay, anthay omfray ethay abincay otay ethay anksplay. It“ay eelsfay
ikelay oinggay ownday intoay one’say omb,”—hetay ouldway uttermay otay imself—“forhay anay
olday aptaincay ikelay emay otay ebay escendingday isthay arrownay uttlescay, otay ogay otay myay
ave-duggray erth.”bay

Osay, almostay everyay enty-fourtway ourshay, enwhay ethay atchesway ofay ethay ightnay ereway
etsay, anday ethay andbay onay eckday entinelledsay ethay umbersslay ofay ethay andbay elowbay;
anday enwhay ifay aay operay asway otay ebay auledhay uponay ethay orecastlefay, ethay ailorssay
ungflay itay otnay udelyray ownday, asay byay ayday, utbay ithway omesay autiousnesscay optdray
itay otay itsay aceplay orfay earfay ofay isturbingday eirthay umberingslay ipmatesshay; enwhay
isthay ortsay ofay eadystay uietudeqay ouldway eginbay otay evailpray, abituallyhay, ethay
ilentsay eersmanstay ouldway atchway ethay abin-scuttlecay; anday ereay onglay ethay olday
anmay ouldway emergeay, ippinggray atay ethay ironay anisterbay, otay elphay ishay ippledcray
ayway. Omesay onsideringcay ouchtay ofay umanityhay asway inay imhay; orfay atay imestay ikelay
esethay, ehay usuallyay abstaineday omfray atrollingpay ethay uarter-deckqay; ecausebay
otay ishay eariedway atesmay, eekingsay eposeray ithinway ixsay inchesay ofay ishay ivoryay
eelhay, uchsay ouldway avehay eenbay ethay everberatingray ackcray anday inday ofay atthay onybay
epstay, atthay eirthay eamsdray ouldway avehay eenbay onay ethay unchingcray eethtay ofay
arksshay. Utbay onceay, ethay oodmay asway onay imhay ootay eepday orfay ommoncay egardingsray;
anday asay ithway eavyhay, umber-likelay acepay ehay asway easuringmay ethay ipshay omfray
affrailtay otay ainmastmay, Ubbstay, ethay olday econdsay atemay, amecay upay omfray elowbay,
ithway aay ertaincay unassureday, eprecatingday umorousnesshay, intedhay atthay ifay
Aptaincay Ahabay asway easedplay otay alkway ethay anksplay, enthay, onay oneay ouldcay aysay
aynay; utbay erethay ightmay ebay omesay ayway ofay ufflingmay ethay oisenay; intinghay
omethingsay indistinctlyay anday esitatinglyhay aboutay aay obeglay ofay owtay, anday ethay
insertionay intoay itay, ofay ethay ivoryay eelhay. Ahay! Ubbstay, outhay idstday otnay owknay
Ahabay enthay.

Am“ay Iay aay annon-ballcay, Ubb,”stay aidsay Ahabay, at“thay outhay ouldstway adway emay atthay
ashionfay? Utbay ogay thyay aysway; Iay adhay orgotfay. Elowbay otay thyay ightlynay avegray;
erewhay uchsay asay eyay eepslay etweenbay oudsshray, otay useay eyay otay ethay illingfay oneay atay
ast.—Downlay, ogday, anday ennel!”kay

Artingstay atay ethay unforseenay oncludingcay exclamationay ofay ethay osay uddenlysay
ornfulscay olday anmay, Ubbstay asway eechlessspay aay omentmay; enthay aidsay excitedlyay,
I“ay amay otnay useday otay ebay okenspay otay atthay ayway, irsay; Iay oday utbay esslay anthay alfhay
ikelay itay, ir.”say

Avast“ay! ittedgray Ahabay etweenbay ishay etsay eethtay, anday iolentlyvay ovingmay awayay,
asay ifay otay avoiday omesay assionatepay emptationtay.

o“Nay, irsay; otnay et,”yay aidsay Ubbstay, emboldeneday, I“ay illway otnay amelytay ebay
alledcay aay ogday, ir.”say

en“Thay ebay alledcay entay imestay aay onkeyday, anday aay ulemay, anday anay assay, anday egonebay,
oray I’llay earclay ethay orldway ofay ee!”thay

Asay ehay aidsay isthay, Ahabay advanceday uponay imhay ithway uchsay overbearingay errorstay
inay ishay aspectay, atthay Ubbstay involuntarilyay etreatedray.

I“ay asway evernay ervedsay osay eforebay ithoutway ivinggay aay ardhay owblay orfay it,”ay
utteredmay Ubbstay, asay ehay oundfay imselfhay escendingday ethay abin-scuttlecay. It’s“ay
eryvay ueerqay. Opstay, Ubbstay; omehowsay, ownay, Iay on’tday ellway owknay etherwhay otay ogay
ackbay anday ikestray imhay, or—what’say at?—downthay erehay onay myay eesknay anday aypray orfay
imhay? Esyay, atthay asway ethay oughtthay omingcay upay inay emay; utbay itay ouldway ebay ethay
irstfay imetay Iay everay id__day aypray. It’say ueerqay; eryvay ueerqay; anday e’shay ueerqay
ootay; ayeay, aketay imhay orefay anday aftay, e’shay aboutay ethay ueerestqay olday anmay Ubbstay
everay ailedsay ithway. Owhay ehay ashedflay atay e!—hismay eyesay ikelay owder-panspay! isay
ehay admay? Anywayay ere’sthay omethingsay onay ishay indmay, asay uresay asay erethay ustmay ebay
omethingsay onay aay eckday enwhay itay ackscray. Ehay aintay inay ishay edbay ownay, eitheray,
oremay anthay eethray ourshay outay ofay ethay enty-fourtway; anday ehay on’tday eepslay enthay.
Idn’tday atthay Ough-Boyday, ethay ewardstay, elltay emay atthay ofay aay orningmay ehay alwaysay
indsfay ethay olday an’smay ammockhay othesclay allay umpledray anday umbledtay, anday ethay
eetsshay ownday atay ethay ootfay, anday ethay overlidcay almostay iedtay intoay otsknay, anday
ethay illowpay aay ortsay ofay ightfulfray othay, asay oughthay aay akedbay ickbray adhay eenbay onay
itay? Aay othay olday anmay! Iay uessgay e’shay otgay atwhay omesay olksfay ashoreay allcay aay
onsciencecay; it’say aay indkay ofay Ic-Dolly-rowtay eythay ay—worsesay ornay aay
oothachetay. Ellway, ellway; Iay on’tday owknay atwhay itay isay, utbay ethay Ordlay eepkay emay
omfray atchingcay itay. E’shay ullfay ofay iddlesray; Iay onderway atwhay ehay oesgay intoay ethay
afteray oldhay orfay, everyay ightnay, asay Ough-Boyday ellstay emay ehay uspectssay; at’swhay
atthay orfay, Iay ouldshay ikelay otay owknay? O’swhay ademay appointmentsay ithway imhay inay
ethay oldhay? Ain’tay atthay ueerqay, ownay? Utbay ere’sthay onay ellingtay, it’say ethay olday
ame—Heregay oesgay orfay aay oozesnay. Amnday emay, it’say orthway aay ellow’sfay ilewhay otay ebay
ornbay intoay ethay orldway, ifay onlyay otay allfay ightray asleepay. Anday ownay atthay Iay inkthay
ofay itay, at’sthay aboutay ethay irstfay ingthay abiesbay oday, anday at’sthay aay ortsay ofay
ueerqay, ootay. Amnday emay, utbay allay ingsthay areay ueerqay, omecay otay inkthay ofay em’ay.
Utbay at’sthay againstay myay inciplespray. Inkthay otnay, isay myay eleventhay
ommandmentcay; anday eepslay enwhay ouyay ancay, isay myay elfth—Sotway erehay oesgay againay.
Utbay ow’shay atthay? idn’tday ehay allcay emay aay ogday? azesblay! ehay alledcay emay entay imestay
aay onkeyday, anday iledpay aay otlay ofay ackassesjay onay optay ofay at!__thay Ehay ightmay asay
ellway avehay ickedkay emay, anday oneday ithway itay. Aybemay ehay id__day ickkay emay, anday Iay
idn’tday observeay itay, Iay asway osay akentay allay abackay ithway ishay owbray, omehowsay. Itay
ashedflay ikelay aay eachedblay onebay. Atwhay ethay evil’sday ethay attermay ithway emay? Iay
on’tday andstay ightray onay myay egslay. Omingcay afoulay ofay atthay olday anmay ashay aay ortsay
ofay urnedtay emay ongwray idesay outay. Byay ethay Ordlay, Iay ustmay avehay eenbay eamingdray,
ough—Howthay? owhay? ow?—buthay ethay onlyay ay’sway otay ashstay itay; osay erehay oesgay otay
ammockhay againay; anday inay ethay orningmay, I’llay eesay owhay isthay agueyplay ugglingjay
inksthay overay byay aylight.”day


APTERcHay 30ay. Ethay Ipepay.

Enwhay Ubbstay adhay epartedday, Ahabay oodstay orfay aay ilewhay eaninglay overay ethay
ulwarksbay; anday enthay, asay adhay eenbay usualay ithway imhay ofay atelay, allingcay aay
ailorsay ofay ethay atchway, ehay entsay imhay elowbay orfay ishay ivoryay oolstay, anday alsoay
ishay ipepay. Ightinglay ethay ipepay atay ethay innaclebay amplay anday antingplay ethay oolstay
onay ethay eatherway idesay ofay ethay eckday, ehay atsay anday okedsmay.

Inay olday Orsenay imestay, ethay onesthray ofay ethay ea-lovingsay Anishday ingskay ereway
abricatedfay, aithsay aditiontray, ofay ethay uskstay ofay ethay arwhalenay. Owhay ouldcay
oneay ooklay atay Ahabay enthay, eatedsay onay atthay ipodtray ofay onesbay, ithoutway
ethinkingbay imhay ofay ethay oyaltyray itay olizedsymbay? Orfay aay Ankhay ofay ethay ankplay,
anday aay ingkay ofay ethay easay, anday aay eatgray ordlay ofay Eviathanslay asway Ahabay.

Omesay omentsmay assedpay, uringday ichwhay ethay ickthay aporvay amecay omfray ishay outhmay
inay uickqay anday onstantcay uffspay, ichwhay ewblay ackbay againay intoay ishay acefay. ow“Hay
ow,”nay ehay oliloquizedsay atay astlay, ithdrawingway ethay ubetay, is“thay okingsmay onay
ongerlay oothessay. Ohay, myay ipepay! ardhay ustmay itay ogay ithway emay ifay thyay armchay ebay
onegay! Erehay avehay Iay eenbay unconsciouslyay oilingtay, otnay easuring—ayeplay, anday
ignorantlyay okingsmay otay indwardway allay ethay ilewhay; otay indwardway, anday ithway
uchsay ervousnay iffswhay, asay ifay, ikelay ethay ingdyay alewhay, myay inalfay etsjay ereway
ethay ongeststray anday ullestfay ofay oubletray. Atwhay usinessbay avehay Iay ithway isthay
ipepay? Isthay ingthay atthay isay eantmay orfay erenenesssay, otay endsay upay ildmay itewhay
aporsvay amongay ildmay itewhay airshay, otnay amongay orntay iron-greyay ockslay ikelay
inemay. I’llay okesmay onay ore—”may

Ehay ossedtay ethay illstay ightedlay ipepay intoay ethay easay. Ethay irefay issedhay inay ethay
avesway; ethay amesay instantay ethay ipshay otshay byay ethay ubblebay ethay inkingsay ipepay
ademay. Ithway ouchedslay athay, Ahabay urchinglylay acedpay ethay anksplay.


APTERcHay 31ay. Ueenqay Abmay.

Extnay orningmay Ubbstay accosteday Askflay.

uch“Say aay ueerqay eamdray, Ing-Postkay, Iay evernay adhay. Ouyay owknay ethay olday an’smay
ivoryay eglay, ellway Iay eameddray ehay ickedkay emay ithway itay; anday enwhay Iay iedtray otay
ickkay ackbay, uponay myay oulsay, myay ittlelay anmay, Iay ickedkay myay eglay ightray offay! Anday
enthay, estopray! Ahabay eemedsay aay amidpyray, anday Iay, ikelay aay azingblay oolfay, eptkay
ickingkay atay itay. Utbay atwhay asway illstay oremay uriouscay, Ask—youflay owknay owhay
uriouscay allay eamsdray are—throughay allay isthay ageray atthay Iay asway inay, Iay omehowsay
eemedsay otay ebay inkingthay otay elfmysay, atthay afteray allay, itay asway otnay uchmay ofay anay
insultay, atthay ickkay omfray Ahabay. ‘Why,’ay inksthay Iay, at’s‘whay ethay owray? It’say otnay
aay ealray eglay, onlyay aay alsefay eg.’lay Anday ere’sthay aay ightymay ifferenceday etweenbay
aay ivinglay umpthay anday aay eadday umpthay. At’sthay atwhay akesmay aay owblay omfray ethay
andhay, Askflay, iftyfay imestay oremay avagesay otay earbay anthay aay owblay omfray aay anecay.
Ethay ivinglay ember—thatmay akesmay ethay ivinglay insultay, myay ittlelay anmay. Anday
inksthay Iay otay elfmysay allay ethay ilewhay, indmay, ilewhay Iay asway ubbingstay myay illysay
oestay againstay atthay ursedcay amid—sopyray onfoundedlycay ontradictorycay asway itay
allay, allay ethay ilewhay, Iay aysay, Iay asway inkingthay otay elfmysay, at’s‘whay ishay eglay
ownay, utbay aay ane—acay alebonewhay anecay. Es,’yay inksthay Iay, it‘ay asway onlyay aay
ayfulplay udgelling—incay actfay, onlyay aay aleboningwhay atthay ehay avegay e—notmay aay
asebay ickkay. Esides,’bay inksthay Iay, ook‘lay atay itay onceay; whyay, ethay enday ofay it—theay
ootfay art—whatpay aay allsmay ortsay ofay enday itay isay; ereaswhay, ifay aay oadbray ootedfay
armerfay ickedkay emay, ere’s__thay aay evilishday oadbray insultay. Utbay isthay insultay isay
ittledwhay ownday otay aay ointpay only.’ay Utbay ownay omescay ethay eatestgray okejay ofay ethay
eamdray, Askflay. Ilewhay Iay asway atteringbay awayay atay ethay amidpyray, aay ortsay ofay
adger-hairedbay olday ermanmay, ithway aay umphay onay ishay ackbay, akestay emay byay ethay
ouldersshay, anday ewsslay emay oundray. at‘Whay areay ouyay out?’’bay ayssay ehay. Idslay!
anmay, utbay Iay asway ightenedfray. Uchsay aay izphay! Utbay, omehowsay, extnay omentmay Iay asway
overay ethay ightfray. at‘Whay amay Iay about?’ay ayssay Iay atay astlay. And‘ay atwhay usinessbay
isay atthay ofay oursyay, Iay ouldshay ikelay otay owknay, Mray. Umpbackhay? Oday ou__yay antway aay
ick?’kay Byay ethay ordlay, Askflay, Iay adhay onay oonersay aidsay atthay, anthay ehay urnedtay
oundray ishay ernstay otay emay, entbay overay, anday aggingdray upay aay otlay ofay eaweedsay ehay
adhay orfay aay out—whatclay oday ouyay inkthay, Iay aw?—whysay underthay aliveay, anmay, ishay
ernstay asway uckstay ullfay ofay arlinspikesmay, ithway ethay ointspay outay. Ayssay Iay, onay
econdsay oughtsthay, I‘ay uessgay Iay on’tway ickkay ouyay, olday ellow.’fay ise‘Way Ubb,’stay
aidsay ehay, ise‘way Ubb;’stay anday eptkay utteringmay itay allay ethay imetay, aay ortsay ofay
eatingay ofay ishay ownay umsgay ikelay aay imneychay aghay. Eeingsay ehay asn’tway oinggay otay
opstay ayingsay overay ishay ise‘way Ubbstay, iseway Ubb,’stay Iay oughtthay Iay ightmay asay
ellway allfay otay ickingkay ethay amidpyray againay. Utbay Iay adhay onlyay ustjay iftedlay myay
ootfay orfay itay, enwhay ehay oaredray outay, op‘Stay atthay icking!’kay alloa,’‘Hay ayssay Iay,
at’s‘whay ethay attermay ownay, olday ellow?’fay ook‘Lay eyay ere,’hay ayssay ehay; et’s‘lay
argueay ethay insultay. Aptaincay Ahabay ickedkay eyay, idn’tday e?’hay es‘Yay, ehay id,’day
ayssay I—‘rightay ere__hay itay as.’way ery‘Vay ood,’gay ayssay e—‘hehay useday ishay ivoryay
eglay, idn’tday e?’hay es‘Yay, ehay id,’day ayssay Iay. ell‘Way en,’thay ayssay ehay, ise‘way
Ubbstay, atwhay avehay ouyay otay omplaincay ofay? Idn’tday ehay ickkay ithway ightray oodgay
illway? itay asn’tway aay ommoncay itchpay inepay eglay ehay ickedkay ithway, asway itay? Onay, ouyay
ereway ickedkay byay aay eatgray anmay, anday ithway aay eautifulbay ivoryay eglay, Ubbstay. It’say
anay onorhay; Iay onsidercay itay anay onorhay. Istenlay, iseway Ubbstay. Inay olday Englanday
ethay eatestgray ordslay inkthay itay eatgray oryglay otay ebay appedslay byay aay ueenqay, anday
ademay arter-knightsgay ofay; utbay, ebay our__yay oastbay, Ubbstay, atthay eyay ereway
ickedkay byay olday Ahabay, anday ademay aay iseway anmay ofay. Ememberray atwhay Iay aysay; e__bay
ickedkay byay imhay; accountay ishay ickskay onorshay; anday onay onay accountay ickkay ackbay;
orfay ouyay an’tcay elphay ourselfyay, iseway Ubbstay. On’tday ouyay eesay atthay amid?’pyray
Ithway atthay, ehay allay ofay aay uddensay eemedsay omehowsay, inay omesay ueerqay ashionfay, otay
imsway offay intoay ethay airay. Iay oredsnay; olledray overay; anday erethay Iay asway inay myay
ammockhay! Ownay, atwhay oday ouyay inkthay ofay atthay eamdray, Ask?”flay

I“ay on’tday owknay; itay eemssay aay ortsay ofay oolishfay otay emay, o.’”thay

ay“May ebay; aymay ebay. Utbay it’say ademay aay iseway anmay ofay emay, Askflay. Ed’yay eesay Ahabay
andingstay erethay, idewayssay ookinglay overay ethay ernstay? Ellway, ethay estbay ingthay
ouyay ancay oday, Askflay, isay otay etlay ethay olday anmay aloneay; evernay eakspay otay imhay,
ateverwhay ehay ayssay. Alloahay! At’swhay atthay ehay outsshay? Ark!”hay

ast-head“May, erethay! Ooklay arpshay, allay ofay eyay! Erethay areay aleswhay ereaboutshay!

If“ay eyay eesay aay itewhay oneay, itsplay ouryay ungslay orfay imhay!

at“Whay oday ouyay inkthay ofay atthay ownay, Askflay? ain’tay erethay aay allsmay opdray ofay
omethingsay ueerqay aboutay atthay, ehay? Aay itewhay ale—didwhay eyay arkmay atthay, anmay?
Ooklay e—there’syay omethingsay ecialspay inay ethay indway. Andstay byay orfay itay, Askflay.
Ahabay ashay atthay at’sthay oodyblay onay ishay indmay. Utbay, ummay; ehay omescay isthay ay.”way


APTERcHay 32ay. Etologycay.

Alreadyay eway areay oldlybay aunchedlay uponay ethay eepday; utbay oonsay eway allshay ebay ostlay
inay itsay unshoreday, arbourlesshay immensitiesay. Ereay atthay omecay otay asspay; ereay
ethay Equod’spay eedyway ullhay ollsray idesay byay idesay ithway ethay arnacledbay ullshay ofay
ethay eviathanlay; atay ethay outsetay itay isay utbay ellway otay attenday otay aay attermay
almostay indispensableay otay aay oroughthay appreciativeay understandingay ofay ethay
oremay ecialspay eviathaniclay evelationsray anday allusionsay ofay allay ortssay ichwhay
areay otay ollowfay.

Itay isay omesay ematizedsystay exhibitionay ofay ethay alewhay inay ishay oadbray eneragay,
atthay Iay ouldway ownay ainfay utpay eforebay ouyay. Etyay isay itay onay easyay asktay. Ethay
assificationclay ofay ethay onstituentscay ofay aay aoschay, othingnay esslay isay erehay
essayeday. Istenlay otay atwhay ethay estbay anday atestlay authoritiesay avehay aidlay ownday.

o“Nay anchbray ofay Oologyzay isay osay uchmay involveday asay atthay ichwhay isay entitleday
Etology,”cay ayssay Aptaincay Oresbyscay, A.Day. 1820ay.

It“ay isay otnay myay intentionay, ereway itay inay myay owerpay, otay enteray intoay ethay inquiryay
asay otay ethay uetray ethodmay ofay ividingday ethay etaceacay intoay oupsgray anday amiliesfay.
*ay *ay *ay Utteray onfusioncay existsay amongay ethay istorianshay ofay isthay animal”ay
erm(spay ale)whay, ayssay Urgeonsay Ealebay, A.Day. 1839ay.

Unfitness“ay otay ursuepay ouray esearchray inay ethay unfathomableay aters.”way
Impenetrable“ay eilvay overingcay ouray owledgeknay ofay ethay etacea.”cay A“ay ieldfay
ewnstray ithway orns.”thay All“ay esethay incompleteay indicationsay utbay ervesay otay
orturetay usay aturalists.”nay

Usthay eakspay ofay ethay alewhay, ethay eatgray Uviercay, anday Ohnjay Unterhay, anday Essonlay,
osethay ightslay ofay oologyzay anday anatomyay. Everthelessnay, oughthay ofay ealray
owledgeknay erethay ebay ittlelay, etyay ofay ooksbay erethay areay aay entyplay; anday osay inay
omesay allsmay egreeday, ithway etologycay, oray ethay iencescay ofay aleswhay. Anymay areay
ethay enmay, allsmay anday eatgray, olday anday ewnay, andsmenlay anday eamensay, owhay avehay atay
argelay oray inay ittlelay, ittenwray ofay ethay alewhay. Unray overay aay ew:—Thefay Authorsay
ofay ethay Iblebay; Aristotleay; Inyplay; Aldrovandiay; Irsay Omasthay Ownebray; Esnergay;
Ayray; Innæuslay; Ondeletiusray; Illoughbyway; Eengray; Artediay; Ibbaldsay; Issonbray;
Artenmay; Acépèdelay; Onneterrebay; Esmarestday; Aronbay Uviercay; Ederickfray
Uviercay; Ohnjay Unterhay; Owenay; Oresbyscay; Ealebay; Ennettbay; Jay. Ossray Ownebray;
ethay Authoray ofay Iriammay Offincay; Olmsteaday; anday ethay Evray. Tay. Eeverchay. Utbay otay
atwhay ultimateay eneralizinggay urposepay allay esethay avehay ittenwray, ethay aboveay
itedcay extractsay illway owshay.

Ofay ethay amesnay inay isthay istlay ofay alewhay authorsay, onlyay osethay ollowingfay Owenay
everay awsay ivinglay aleswhay; anday utbay oneay ofay emthay asway aay ealray ofessionalpray
arpooneerhay anday alemanwhay. Iay eanmay Aptaincay Oresbyscay. Onay ethay eparatesay
ubjectsay ofay ethay Eenlandgray oray ight-whaleray, ehay isay ethay estbay existingay
authorityay. Utbay Oresbyscay ewknay othingnay anday ayssay othingnay ofay ethay eatgray
ermspay alewhay, omparedcay ithway ichwhay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay isay almostay unworthyay
entioningmay. Anday erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay isay anay usurperay
uponay ethay onethray ofay ethay eassay. Ehay isay otnay evenay byay anyay eansmay ethay argestlay ofay
ethay aleswhay. Etyay, owingay otay ethay onglay ioritypray ofay ishay aimsclay, anday ethay
ofoundpray ignoranceay ichwhay, illtay omesay eventysay earsyay ackbay, investeday ethay
enthay abulousfay oray utterlyay unknownay erm-whalespay, anday ichwhay ignoranceay otay
isthay esentpray ayday illstay eignsray inay allay utbay omesay ewfay ientificscay etreatsray
anday ale-portswhay; isthay usurpationay ashay eenbay everyay ayway ompletecay. Eferenceray
otay earlynay allay ethay eviathaniclay allusionsay inay ethay eatgray oetspay ofay astpay
aysday, illway atisfysay ouyay atthay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay, ithoutway oneay ivalray, asway
otay emthay ethay onarchmay ofay ethay eassay. Utbay ethay imetay ashay atay astlay omecay orfay aay
ewnay oclamationpray. Isthay isay Aringchay Osscray; earhay eyay! oodgay eoplepay all,—theay
Eenlandgray alewhay isay eposed,—theday eatgray ermspay alewhay ownay eignethray!

Erethay areay onlyay otway ooksbay inay eingbay ichwhay atay allay etendpray otay utpay ethay
ivinglay ermspay alewhay eforebay ouyay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay, inay ethay emotestray
egreeday ucceedsay inay ethay attemptay. Osethay ooksbay areay Eale’sbay anday Ennett’sbay;
othbay inay eirthay imetay urgeonssay otay Englishay Outh-Seasay ale-shipswhay, anday othbay
exactay anday eliableray enmay. Ethay originalay attermay ouchingtay ethay ermspay alewhay otay
ebay oundfay inay eirthay olumesvay isay ecessarilynay allsmay; utbay osay arfay asay itay oesgay,
itay isay ofay excellentay ualityqay, oughthay ostlymay onfinedcay otay ientificscay
escriptionday. Asay etyay, oweverhay, ethay ermspay alewhay, ientificscay oray oeticpay,
iveslay otnay ompletecay inay anyay iteraturelay. Arfay aboveay allay otheray untedhay
aleswhay, ishay isay anay unwrittenay ifelay.

Ownay ethay ariousvay eciesspay ofay aleswhay eednay omesay ortsay ofay opularpay
omprehensivecay assificationclay, ifay onlyay anay easyay outlineay oneay orfay ethay
esentpray, ereafterhay otay ebay illedfay inay allay itsay epartmentsday byay ubsequentsay
aborerslay. Asay onay etterbay anmay advancesay otay aketay isthay attermay inay andhay, Iay
ereuponhay offeray myay ownay oorpay endeavorsay. Iay omisepray othingnay ompletecay;
ecausebay anyay umanhay ingthay upposedsay otay ebay ompletecay, ustmay orfay atthay eryvay
easonray infalliblyay ebay aultyfay. Iay allshay otnay etendpray otay aay inutemay anatomicalay
escriptionday ofay ethay ariousvay eciesspay, or—inay isthay aceplay atay east—tolay uchmay
ofay anyay escriptionday. Myay objectay erehay isay implysay otay ojectpray ethay aughtdray ofay
aay ematizationsystay ofay etologycay. Iay amay ethay architectay, otnay ethay uilderbay.

Utbay itay isay aay onderouspay asktay; onay ordinaryay etter-sorterlay inay ethay
Ost-Officepay isay equalay otay itay. Otay opegray ownday intoay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay
afteray emthay; otay avehay one’say andshay amongay ethay unspeakableay oundationsfay,
ibsray, anday eryvay elvispay ofay ethay orldway; isthay isay aay earfulfay ingthay. Atwhay amay Iay
atthay Iay ouldshay essayay otay ookhay ethay osenay ofay isthay eviathanlay! Ethay awfulay
auntingstay inay Objay ightmay ellway appalay emay. Illway ehay e(thay eviathanlay) akemay aay
ovenantcay ithway eethay? Eholdbay ethay opehay ofay imhay isay ainvay! Utbay Iay avehay amsway
oughthray ibrarieslay anday ailedsay oughthray oceansay; Iay avehay adhay otay oday ithway
aleswhay ithway esethay isiblevay andshay; Iay amay inay earnestay; anday Iay illway tryay. Erethay
areay omesay eliminariespray otay ettlesay.

Irstfay: Ethay uncertainay, unsettleday onditioncay ofay isthay iencescay ofay Etologycay
isay inay ethay eryvay estibulevay attesteday byay ethay actfay, atthay inay omesay uartersqay itay
illstay emainsray aay ootmay ointpay etherwhay aay alewhay ebay aay ishfay. Inay ishay Emsystay ofay
Aturenay, A.Day. 1776ay, Innæuslay eclaresday, I“ay erebyhay eparatesay ethay aleswhay omfray
ethay ish.”fay Utbay ofay myay ownay owledgeknay, Iay owknay atthay ownday otay ethay earyay 1850ay,
arksshay anday adshay, alewivesay anday erringhay, againstay Innæus’slay expressay edictay,
ereway illstay oundfay ividingday ethay ossessionpay ofay ethay amesay eassay ithway ethay
Eviathanlay.

Ethay oundsgray uponay ichwhay Innæuslay ouldway ainfay avehay anishedbay ethay aleswhay omfray
