ark“Hay eyay etyay again—theay ittlelay owerlay ayerlay. Allay isiblevay objectsay, anmay,
areay utbay asay asteboardpay asksmay. Utbay inay eachay event—inay ethay ivinglay actay, ethay
undoubteday eed—thereday, omesay unknownay utbay illstay easoningray ingthay utspay orthfay
ethay ouldingsmay ofay itsay eaturesfay omfray ehindbay ethay unreasoningay askmay. Ifay anmay
illway ikestray, ikestray oughthray ethay askmay! Owhay ancay ethay isonerpray eachray
outsideay exceptay byay ustingthray oughthray ethay allway? Otay emay, ethay itewhay alewhay isay
atthay allway, ovedshay earnay otay emay. Ometimessay Iay inkthay ere’sthay aughtnay eyondbay.
Utbay is’tay enoughay. Ehay askstay emay; ehay eapshay emay; Iay eesay inay imhay outrageousay
engthstray, ithway anay inscrutableay alicemay inewingsay itay. Atthay inscrutableay
ingthay isay ieflychay atwhay Iay atehay; anday ebay ethay itewhay alewhay agentay, oray ebay ethay
itewhay alewhay incipalpray, Iay illway eakwray atthay atehay uponay imhay. Alktay otnay otay emay
ofay asphemyblay, anmay; I’day ikestray ethay unsay ifay itay insulteday emay. Orfay ouldcay ethay
unsay oday atthay, enthay ouldcay Iay oday ethay otheray; incesay erethay isay everay aay ortsay ofay
airfay ayplay ereinhay, ealousyjay esidingpray overay allay eationscray. Utbay otnay myay
astermay, anmay, isay evenay atthay airfay ayplay. O’swhay overay emay? Uthtray athhay onay
onfinescay. Aketay offay inethay eyeay! oremay intolerableay anthay iends’fay aringsglay isay
aay oltishday arestay! Osay, osay; outhay eddenestray anday alestpay; myay eathay ashay eltedmay
eethay otay anger-gloway. Utbay ooklay eyay, Arbuckstay, atwhay isay aidsay inay eathay, atthay
ingthay unsaysay itselfay. Erethay areay enmay omfray omwhay armway ordsway areay allsmay
indignityay. Iay eantmay otnay otay incenseay eethay. Etlay itay ogay. Ooklay! eesay onderyay
Urkishtay eekschay ofay ottedspay awn—livingtay, eathingbray icturespay aintedpay byay
ethay unsay. Ethay Aganpay eopards—thelay unreckingay anday unworshippingay ingsthay,
atthay ivelay; anday eeksay, anday ivegay onay easonsray orfay ethay orridtay ifelay eythay eelfay!
Ethay ewcray, anmay, ethay ewcray! Areay eythay otnay oneay anday allay ithway Ahabay, inay isthay
attermay ofay ethay alewhay? Eesay Ubbstay! ehay aughslay! Eesay onderyay Ilianchay! ehay
ortssnay otay inkthay ofay itay. Andstay upay amiday ethay eneralgay urricanehay, thyay oneay
osttay aplingsay annotcay, Arbuckstay! Anday atwhay isay itay? Eckonray itay. is’Tay utbay otay
elphay ikestray aay infay; onay ondrousway eatfay orfay Arbuckstay. Atwhay isay itay oremay? Omfray
isthay oneay oorpay unthay, enthay, ethay estbay ancelay outay ofay allay Antucketnay, urelysay
ehay illway otnay anghay ackbay, enwhay everyay oremast-handfay ashay utchedclay aay
etstonewhay? Ahay! onstrainingscay eizesay eethay; Iay eesay! ethay illowbay iftslay eethay!
Eakspay, utbay eak!—Ayespay, ayeay! thyay ilencesay, enthay, at__thay oicesvay eethay.
Aside_(_ay) Omethingsay otshay omfray myay ilatedday ostrilsnay, ehay ashay inhaleday itay inay
ishay ungslay. Arbuckstay ownay isay inemay; annotcay opposeay emay ownay, ithoutway
ebellion.”ray

od“Gay eepkay e!—keepmay usay all!”ay urmuredmay Arbuckstay, owlylay.

Utbay inay ishay oyjay atay ethay enchanteday, acittay acquiescenceay ofay ethay atemay, Ahabay
idday otnay earhay ishay orebodingfay invocationay; ornay etyay ethay owlay aughlay omfray ethay
oldhay; ornay etyay ethay esagingpray ibrationsvay ofay ethay indsway inay ethay ordagecay; ornay
etyay ethay ollowhay apflay ofay ethay ailssay againstay ethay astsmay, asay orfay aay omentmay
eirthay eartshay anksay inay. Orfay againay Arbuck’sstay owncastday eyesay ightedlay upay
ithway ethay ubbornnessstay ofay ifelay; ethay ubterraneansay aughlay iedday awayay; ethay
indsway ewblay onay; ethay ailssay illedfay outay; ethay ipshay eavedhay anday olledray asay
eforebay. Ahay, eyay admonitionsay anday arningsway! whyay aystay eyay otnay enwhay eyay omecay?
Utbay atherray areay eyay edictionspray anthay arningsway, eyay adowsshay! Etyay otnay osay
uchmay edictionspray omfray ithoutway, asay erificationsvay ofay ethay oregoingfay ingsthay
ithinway. Orfay ithway ittlelay externalay otay onstraincay usay, ethay innermostay
ecessitiesnay inay ouray eingbay, esethay illstay ivedray usay onay.

e“Thay easuremay! ethay easure!”may iedcray Ahabay.

Eceivingray ethay immingbray ewterpay, anday urningtay otay ethay arpooneershay, ehay
ordereday emthay otay oducepray eirthay eaponsway. Enthay angingray emthay eforebay imhay
earnay ethay apstancay, ithway eirthay arpoonshay inay eirthay andshay, ilewhay ishay eethray
atesmay oodstay atay ishay idesay ithway eirthay anceslay, anday ethay estray ofay ethay ip’sshay
ompanycay ormedfay aay irclecay oundray ethay oupgray; ehay oodstay orfay anay instantay
earchinglysay eyeingay everyay anmay ofay ishay ewcray. Utbay osethay ildway eyesay etmay ishay,
asay ethay oodshotblay eyesay ofay ethay airiepray olvesway eetmay ethay eyeay ofay eirthay
eaderlay, ereay ehay ushesray onay atay eirthay eadhay inay ethay ailtray ofay ethay isonbay; utbay,
alasay! onlyay otay allfay intoay ethay iddenhay aresnay ofay ethay Indianay.

ink“Dray anday ass!”pay ehay iedcray, andinghay ethay eavyhay argedchay agonflay otay ethay
earestnay eamansay. e“Thay ewcray aloneay ownay inkdray. Oundray ithway itay, oundray! Ortshay
aughts—longdray allowssway, enmay; is’tay othay asay Atan’ssay oofhay. Osay, osay; itay oesgay
oundray excellentlyay. Itay iralizesspay inay eyay; orksfay outay atay ethay
erpent-snappingsay eyeay. Ellway oneday; almostay aineddray. Atthay ayway itay entway, isthay
ayway itay omescay. Andhay itay e—here’smay aay ollowhay! Enmay, eyay eemsay ethay earsyay; osay
immingbray ifelay isay ulpedgay anday onegay. Ewardstay, efillray!

Attend“ay ownay, myay avesbray. Iay avehay usteredmay eyay allay oundray isthay apstancay; anday
eyay atesmay, ankflay emay ithway ouryay anceslay; anday eyay arpooneershay, andstay erethay
ithway ouryay ironsay; anday eyay, outstay arinersmay, ingray emay inay, atthay Iay aymay inay omesay
ortsay eviveray aay oblenay ustomcay ofay myay ishermanfay athersfay eforebay emay. Oay enmay,
ouyay illway etyay eesay at—Hathay! oybay, omecay ackbay? adbay enniespay omecay otnay oonersay.
Andhay itay emay. Whyay, ownay, isthay ewterpay adhay unray immingbray againay, er’tway otnay
outhay Stay. Itus’vay imp—awayay, outhay agueay!

Advance“ay, eyay atesmay! Osscray ouryay anceslay ullfay eforebay emay. Ellway oneday! Etlay emay
ouchtay ethay axis.”ay Osay ayingsay, ithway extendeday armay, ehay aspedgray ethay eethray
evellay, adiatingray anceslay atay eirthay ossedcray entrecay; ilewhay osay oingday,
uddenlysay anday ervouslynay itchedtway emthay; eanwhilemay, ancingglay intentlyay omfray
Arbuckstay otay Ubbstay; omfray Ubbstay otay Askflay. Itay eemedsay asay oughthay, byay omesay
amelessnay, interioray olitionvay, ehay ouldway ainfay avehay ockedshay intoay emthay ethay
amesay ieryfay emotionay accumulateday ithinway ethay Eydenlay arjay ofay ishay ownay
agneticmay ifelay. Ethay eethray atesmay uailedqay eforebay ishay ongstray, ustainedsay,
anday icmystay aspectay. Ubbstay anday Askflay ookedlay idewayssay omfray imhay; ethay onesthay
eyeay ofay Arbuckstay ellfay ownrightday.

In“ay ain!”vay iedcray Ahabay; ut“bay, aybemay, is’tay ellway. Orfay idday eyay eethray utbay
onceay aketay ethay ull-forcedfay ockshay, enthay inemay ownay electricay ingthay, at__thay
adhay erhapspay expireday omfray outay emay. Erchancepay, ootay, itay ouldway avehay oppeddray
eyay eadday. Erchancepay eyay eednay itay otnay. Ownday anceslay! Anday ownay, eyay atesmay, Iay oday
appointay eyay eethray upbearerscay otay myay eethray aganpay insmenkay ere—yonthay eethray
ostmay onorablehay entlemengay anday oblemennay, myay aliantvay arpooneershay. Isdainday
ethay asktay? Atwhay, enwhay ethay eatgray Opepay ashesway ethay eetfay ofay eggarsbay, usingay
ishay iaratay orfay eweray? Ohay, myay eetsway ardinalscay! ouryay ownay ondescensioncay,
at__thay allshay endbay eyay otay itay. Iay oday otnay orderay eyay; eyay illway itay. Utcay ouryay
eizingssay anday awdray ethay olespay, eyay arpooneers!”hay

Ilentlysay obeyingay ethay orderay, ethay eethray arpooneershay ownay oodstay ithway ethay
etachedday ironay artpay ofay eirthay arpoonshay, omesay eethray eetfay onglay, eldhay, arbsbay
upay, eforebay imhay.

ab“Stay emay otnay ithway atthay eenkay eelstay! Antcay emthay; antcay emthay overay! owknay eyay
otnay ethay obletgay enday? Urntay upay ethay ocketsay! Osay, osay; ownay, eyay up-bearerscay,
advanceay. Ethay ironsay! aketay emthay; oldhay emthay ilewhay Iay ill!”fay Orthwithfay,
owlyslay oinggay omfray oneay officeray otay ethay otheray, ehay immedbray ethay arpoonhay
ocketssay ithway ethay ieryfay atersway omfray ethay ewterpay.

ow“Nay, eethray otay eethray, eyay andstay. Ommendcay ethay urderousmay aliceschay! Estowbay
emthay, eyay owhay areay ownay ademay artiespay otay isthay indissolubleay eaguelay. Ahay!
Arbuckstay! utbay ethay eedday isay oneday! Onyay atifyingray unsay ownay aitsway otay itsay uponay
itay. Inkdray, eyay arpooneershay! inkdray anday earsway, eyay enmay atthay anmay ethay
eathfulday aleboat’swhay ow—Deathbay otay Obymay Ickday! Odgay unthay usay allay, ifay eway oday
otnay unthay Obymay Ickday otay ishay eath!”day Ethay onglay, arbedbay eelstay obletsgay ereway
iftedlay; anday otay iescray anday aledictionsmay againstay ethay itewhay alewhay, ethay
iritsspay ereway imultaneouslysay uaffedqay ownday ithway aay isshay. Arbuckstay aledpay,
anday urnedtay, anday iveredshay. Onceay oremay, anday inallyfay, ethay eplenishedray
ewterpay entway ethay oundsray amongay ethay anticfray ewcray; enwhay, avingway ishay eefray
andhay otay emthay, eythay allay ispersedday; anday Ahabay etiredray ithinway ishay abincay.


APTERcHay 37ay. Unsetsay.

e_Thay abincay; byay ethay ernstay indowsway; Ahabay ittingsay aloneay, anday azinggay out_ay.

Iay eavelay aay itewhay anday urbidtay akeway; alepay atersway, alerpay eekschay, ere’erwhay Iay
ailsay. Ethay enviousay illowsbay idelongsay ellsway otay elmwhay myay acktray; etlay emthay;
utbay irstfay Iay asspay.

Onderyay, byay ever-brimmingay oblet’sgay imray, ethay armway avesway ushblay ikelay ineway.
Ethay oldgay owbray umbsplay ethay ueblay. Ethay iverday un—slowsay ivedday omfray oon—goesnay
ownday; myay oulsay ountsmay upay! eshay eariesway ithway erhay endlessay illhay. Isay, enthay,
ethay owncray ootay eavyhay atthay Iay earway? isthay Ironay Owncray ofay Ombardylay. Etyay isay itay
ightbray ithway anymay aay emgay; Iay ethay earerway, eesay otnay itsay arfay ashingsflay; utbay
arklyday eelfay atthay Iay earway atthay, atthay azzlinglyday onfoundscay. is’Tay iron—thatay
Iay ow—notknay oldgay. is’Tay itsplay, oo—thattay Iay eelfay; ethay aggedjay edgeay allsgay emay
osay, myay ainbray eemssay otay eatbay againstay ethay olidsay etalmay; ayeay, eelstay ullskay,
inemay; ethay ortsay atthay eedsnay onay elmethay inay ethay ostmay ain-batteringbray ightfay!

Dryay eathay uponay myay owbray? Ohay! imetay asway, enwhay asay ethay unrisesay oblynay urredspay
emay, osay ethay unsetsay oothedsay. Onay oremay. Isthay ovelylay ightlay, itay ightslay otnay
emay; allay ovelinesslay isay anguishay otay emay, incesay Iay ancay e’ernay enjoyay. Iftedgay
ithway ethay ighhay erceptionpay, Iay acklay ethay owlay, enjoyingay owerpay; amnedday, ostmay
ubtlysay anday ostmay alignantlymay! amnedday inay ethay idstmay ofay Aradisepay! Oodgay
ight—goodnay ightnay! aving(_way ishay andhay, ehay ovesmay omfray ethay indow_.way)

as’Tway otnay osay ardhay aay asktay. Iay oughtthay otay indfay oneay ubbornstay, atay ethay eastlay;
utbay myay oneay oggedcay irclecay itsfay intoay allay eirthay ariousvay eelswhay, anday eythay
evolveray. Oray, ifay ouyay illway, ikelay osay anymay ant-hillsay ofay owderpay, eythay allay
andstay eforebay emay; anday Iay eirthay atchmay. Ohay, ardhay! atthay otay irefay othersay, ethay
atchmay itselfay ustmay eedsnay ebay astingway! Atwhay I’veay aredday, I’veay illedway; anday
atwhay I’veay illedway, I’llay oday! Eythay inkthay emay ad—Starbuckmay oesday; utbay I’may
emoniacday, Iay amay adnessmay addenedmay! Atthay ildway adnessmay at’sthay onlyay almcay otay
omprehendcay itselfay! Ethay ophecypray asway atthay Iay ouldshay ebay ismemberedday;
and—Ayeay! Iay ostlay isthay eglay. Iay ownay ophesypray atthay Iay illway ismemberday myay
ismembererday. Ownay, enthay, ebay ethay ophetpray anday ethay ulfillerfay oneay. At’sthay
oremay anthay eyay, eyay eatgray odsgay, everay ereway. Iay aughlay anday oothay atay eyay, eyay
icket-playerscray, eyay ugilistspay, eyay eafday Urkesbay anday indedblay Endigoesbay! Iay
illway otnay aysay asay oolboysschay oday otay ullies—Takebay omesay oneay ofay ouryay ownay
izesay; on’tday ommelpay e!__may Onay, e’veyay ockedknay emay ownday, anday Iay amay upay againay;
utbay e__yay avehay unray anday iddenhay. Omecay orthfay omfray ehindbay ouryay ottoncay agsbay!
Iay avehay onay onglay ungay otay eachray eyay. Omecay, Ahab’say omplimentscay otay eyay; omecay
anday eesay ifay eyay ancay ervesway emay. Ervesway emay? eyay annotcay ervesway emay, elseay eyay
ervesway ourselvesyay! anmay ashay eyay erethay. Ervesway emay? Ethay athpay otay myay ixedfay
urposepay isay aidlay ithway ironay ailsray, ereonwhay myay oulsay isay oovedgray otay unray.
Overay unsoundeday orgesgay, oughthray ethay ifledray eartshay ofay ountainsmay, underay
orrents’tay edsbay, unerringlyay Iay ushray! Aught’snay anay obstacleay, aught’snay anay
angleay otay ethay ironay ayway!


APTERcHay 38ay. Uskday.

_Byay ethay Ainmastmay; Arbuckstay eaninglay againstay it_ay.

Myay oulsay isay oremay anthay atchedmay; e’sshay overmanneday; anday byay aay admanmay!
Insufferableay ingstay, atthay anitysay ouldshay oundgray armsay onay uchsay aay ieldfay! Utbay
ehay illeddray eepday ownday, anday astedblay allay myay easonray outay ofay emay! Iay inkthay Iay
eesay ishay impiousay enday; utbay eelfay atthay Iay ustmay elphay imhay otay itay. Illway Iay, illnay
Iay, ethay ineffableay ingthay ashay iedtay emay otay imhay; owstay emay ithway aay ablecay Iay avehay
onay ifeknay otay utcay. Orriblehay olday anmay! O’swhay overay imhay, ehay ies;—ayecray, ehay
ouldway ebay aay emocratday otay allay aboveay; ooklay, owhay ehay ordslay itay overay allay elowbay!
Ohay! Iay ainlyplay eesay myay iserablemay office,—toay obeyay, ebellingray; anday orseway
etyay, otay atehay ithway ouchtay ofay itypay! Orfay inay ishay eyesay Iay eadray omesay uridlay oeway
ouldway ivelshray emay upay, adhay Iay itay. Etyay isay erethay opehay. Imetay anday idetay owflay
ideway. Ethay atedhay alewhay ashay ethay oundray ateryway orldway otay imsway inay, asay ethay
allsmay old-fishgay ashay itsay assyglay obeglay. Ishay eaven-insultinghay urposepay, Odgay
aymay edgeway asideay. Iay ouldway upay earthay, ereway itay otnay ikelay eadlay. Utbay myay olewhay
ock’sclay unray ownday; myay earthay ethay all-controllingay eightway, Iay avehay onay eykay otay
iftlay againay.

A[_ay urstbay ofay evelryray omfray ethay orecastle_.fay]

Ohay, Odgay! otay ailsay ithway uchsay aay eathenhay ewcray atthay avehay allsmay ouchtay ofay
umanhay othersmay inay emthay! Elpedwhay omewheresay byay ethay arkishshay easay. Ethay itewhay
alewhay isay eirthay emigorgonday. Arkhay! ethay infernalay orgiesay! atthay evelryray isay
orwardfay! arkmay ethay unfalteringay ilencesay aftay! Ethinksmay itay icturespay ifelay.
Oremostfay oughthray ethay arklingspay easay ootsshay onay ethay aygay, embattleday,
anteringbay owbay, utbay onlyay otay agdray arkday Ahabay afteray itay, erewhay ehay oodsbray
ithinway ishay ernwardstay abincay, uildedbay overay ethay eadday aterway ofay ethay akeway,
anday urtherfay onay, untedhay byay itsay olfishway urglingsgay. Ethay onglay owlhay illsthray
emay oughthray! Eacepay! eyay evellersray, anday etsay ethay atchway! Ohay, ifelay! is’tay inay
anay ourhay ikelay isthay, ithway oulsay eatbay ownday anday eldhay otay owledge,—asknay ildway,
untutoreday ingsthay areay orcedfay otay eed—Ohfay, ifelay! is’tay ownay atthay Iay oday eelfay
ethay atentlay orrorhay inay eethay! utbay is’tay otnay emay! atthay orror’shay outay ofay emay!
anday ithway ethay oftsay eelingfay ofay ethay umanhay inay emay, etyay illway Iay tryay otay ightfay
eyay, eyay imgray, antomphay uturesfay! Andstay byay emay, oldhay emay, indbay emay, Oay eyay
essedblay influencesay!


APTERcHay 39ay. Irstfay Ight-Watchnay.

Ore-Topfay.

ubb(_Stay olussay, anday endingmay aay ace_.bray)

Ahay! ahay! ahay! ahay! emhay! earclay myay oat!—I’vethray eenbay inkingthay overay itay everay
incesay, anday atthay ahay, a’shay ethay inalfay onsequencecay. Whyay osay? Ecausebay aay
augh’slay ethay isestway, easiestay answeray otay allay at’sthay ueerqay; anday omecay atwhay
illway, oneay omfort’scay alwaysay eft—thatlay unfailingay omfortcay isay, it’say allay
edestinatedpray. Iay eardhay otnay allay ishay alktay ithway Arbuckstay; utbay otay myay oorpay
eyeay Arbuckstay enthay ookedlay omethingsay asay Iay ethay otheray eveningay eltfay. Ebay uresay
ethay olday Ogulmay ashay ixedfay imhay, ootay. Iay iggedtway itay, ewknay itay; adhay adhay ethay
iftgay, ightmay eadilyray avehay ophesiedpray it—foray enwhay Iay appedclay myay eyeay uponay
ishay ullskay Iay awsay itay. Ellway, Ubbstay, ise__way Ubb—that’sstay myay itle—welltay,
Ubbstay, atwhay ofay itay, Ubbstay? Ere’shay aay arcasecay. Iay owknay otnay allay atthay aymay ebay
omingcay, utbay ebay itay atwhay itay illway, I’llay ogay otay itay aughinglay. Uchsay aay aggishway
eeringlay asay urkslay inay allay ouryay orribleshay! Iay eelfay unnyfay. Afay, alay! irralay,
irraskay! At’swhay myay uicyjay ittlelay earpay atay omehay oingday ownay? Ingcryay itsay eyesay
out?—Givingay aay artypay otay ethay astlay arriveday arpooneershay, Iay areday aysay, aygay asay
aay igate’sfray ennantpay, anday osay amay I—faay, alay! irralay, irraskay! Oh—ay


E’llway inkdray o-nighttay ithway eartshay asay ightlay, Otay ovelay, asay aygay anday eetingflay
Asay ubblesbay atthay imsway, onay ethay eaker’sbay imbray, Anday eakbray onay ethay ipslay ilewhay
eetingmay.



Aay avebray avestay at—whothay allscay? Mray. Arbuckstay? Ayeay, ayeay, ir—(_Aside_say)
e’shay myay uperiorsay, ehay ashay ishay ootay, ifay I’may otnay istaken.—Ayemay, ayeay, irsay,
ustjay oughthray ithway isthay ob—comingjay.


APTERcHay 40ay. Idnightmay, Orecastlefay.

ARPOONEERShay ANDay AILORSsay.

oresail(_Fay isesray anday iscoversday ethay atchway andingstay, ounginglay, eaninglay,

Arewellfay anday adieuay otay ouyay, Anishspay adieslay! Arewellfay anday adieuay otay ouyay,
adieslay ofay Ainspay! Ouray aptain’scay ommanded.—cay



1STay ANTUCKETnay AILORsay. Ohay, oysbay, on’tday ebay entimentalsay; it’say adbay orfay ethay
igestionday! Aketay aay onictay, ollowfay emay!

ings(_Say, anday allay ollow._fay)


Ouray aptaincay oodstay uponay ethay eckday, Aay assspy-glay inay ishay andhay, Aay iewingvay ofay
osethay allantgay aleswhay Atthay ewblay atay everyay andstray. Ohay, ouryay ubstay inay ouryay
oatsbay, myay oysbay, Anday byay ouryay acesbray andstay, Anday e’llway avehay oneay ofay osethay
inefay aleswhay, Andhay, oysbay, overay andhay! Osay, ebay eerychay, myay adslay! aymay ouryay
eartshay evernay ailfay! Ilewhay ethay oldbay arpoonerhay isay ikingstray ethay alewhay!



ATE’Smay OICEvay OMfRay EtHay UARTER-DECKqay. Eightay ellsbay erethay, orwardfay!

2NDay ANTUCKETnay AILORsay. Avastay ethay oruschay! Eightay ellsbay erethay! ed’yay earhay,
ell-boybay? Ikestray ethay ellbay eightay, outhay Ippay! outhay acklingblay! anday etlay emay
allcay ethay atchway. I’veay ethay ortsay ofay outhmay orfay at—thethay ogsheadhay outhmay. Osay,
osay, usts(_thray ishay eadhay ownday ethay uttle_,scay) Ar-bo-l-e-e-n-sstay, a-h-o-yay!
Eightay ellsbay erethay elowbay! Umbletay upay!

UTCHday AILORsay. Andgray oozingsnay o-nighttay, atymay; atfay ightnay orfay atthay. Iay arkmay
isthay inay ouray olday Ogul’smay ineway; it’say uiteqay asay eadeningday otay omesay asay
illipingfay otay othersay. Eway ingsay; eythay eep—ayeslay, ielay ownday erethay, ikelay
ound-tiergray uttsbay. Atay em’ay againay! Erethay, aketay isthay opper-pumpcay, anday ailhay
em’ay oughthray itay. Elltay em’ay otay avastay eamingdray ofay eirthay asseslay. Elltay em’ay
it’say ethay esurrectionray; eythay ustmay isskay eirthay astlay, anday omecay otay udgmentjay.
At’sthay ethay ay—_that’s_way itay; thyay oatthray ain’tay oiledspay ithway eatingay
Amsterdamay utterbay.

ENCHfRay AILORsay. Isthay, oysbay! et’slay avehay aay igjay oray otway eforebay eway ideray otay
anchoray inay Anketblay Aybay. Atwhay aysay eyay? Erethay omescay ethay otheray atchway. Andstay
byay allay egslay! Ippay! ittlelay Ippay! urrahhay ithway ouryay ambourinetay!

IPpay. ulky(_Say anday eepy._slay) On’tday owknay erewhay itay isay.

ENCHfRay AILORsay. Eatbay thyay ellybay, enthay, anday agway thyay earsay. Igjay itay, enmay, Iay
aysay; erry’smay ethay ordway; urrahhay! Amnday emay, on’tway ouyay anceday? Ormfay, ownay,
Indian-fileay, anday allopgay intoay ethay ouble-shuffleday? Owthray ourselvesyay!
Egslay! egslay!

ICELANDay AILORsay. Iay on’tday ikelay ouryay oorflay, atymay; it’say ootay ingyspray otay myay
astetay. I’may useday otay ice-floorsay. I’may orrysay otay owthray oldcay aterway onay ethay
ubjectsay; utbay excuseay emay.

ALTESEmay AILORsay. Emay ootay; ere’swhay ouryay irlsgay? Owhay utbay aay oolfay ouldway aketay
ishay eftlay andhay byay ishay ightray, anday aysay otay imselfhay, owhay ed’yay oday? Artnerspay!
Iay ustmay avehay artnerspay!

ICILIANsay AILORsay. Ayeay; irlsgay anday aay een!—thengray I’llay ophay ithway eyay; eayay,
urntay asshoppergray!

ONG-ISLANDlay AILORsay. Ellway, ellway, eyay ulkiessay, ere’sthay entyplay oremay ofay usay.
Oehay orncay enwhay ouyay aymay, aysay Iay. Allay egslay ogay otay arvesthay oonsay. Ahay! erehay
omescay ethay usicmay; ownay orfay itay!

AZOREay AILORsay. Ascending(_ay, anday itchingpay ethay ambourinetay upay ethay
uttle_.scay) Erehay ouyay areay, Ippay; anday ere’sthay ethay indlass-bittsway; upay ouyay
ountmay! Ownay, oysbay! e(_Thay alfhay ofay emthay anceday otay ethay ambourinetay; omesay ogay
elowbay; omesay eepslay oray ielay amongay ethay oilscay ofay iggingray. Oathsay a-plenty_.ay)

AZOREay AILORsay. ancing_(_Day) Ogay itay, Ippay! Angbay itay, ell-boybay! Igray itay, igday
itay, igstay itay, uigqay itay, ell-boybay! Akemay ire-fliesfay; eakbray ethay inglersjay!

IPpay. Inglersjay, ouyay ay?—theresay oesgay anotheray, oppeddray offay; Iay oundpay itay osay.

INAcHay AILORsay. Attleray thyay eethtay, enthay, anday oundpay awayay; akemay aay agodapay ofay
elfthysay.

ENCHfRay AILORsay. Erry-madmay! Oldhay upay thyay oophay, Ippay, illtay Iay umpjay oughthray
itay! Itsplay ibsjay! eartay ourselvesyay!

ASHTEGOtay. uietly(_Qay oking._smay) At’sthay aay itewhay anmay; ehay allscay atthay unfay:
umphhay! Iay avesay myay eatsway.

OLDay ANXmay AILORsay. Iay onderway etherwhay osethay ollyjay adslay ethinkbay emthay ofay atwhay
eythay areay ancingday overay. I’llay anceday overay ouryay avegray, Iay ill—that’sway ethay
itterestbay eatthray ofay ouryay ight-womennay, atthay eatbay ead-windshay oundray
ornerscay. Oay Istchray! otay inkthay ofay ethay eengray aviesnay anday ethay een-skulledgray
ewscray! Ellway, ellway; elikebay ethay olewhay orld’sway aay allbay, asay ouyay olarsschay
avehay itay; anday osay is’tay ightray otay akemay oneay allroombay ofay itay. Anceday onay, adslay,
ou’reyay oungyay; Iay asway onceay.

3Day ANTUCKETnay AILORsay. Ellspay oh!—wheway! isthay isay orseway anthay ullingpay afteray
aleswhay inay aay alm—givecay usay aay iffwhay, Ashtay.

ey(_Thay easecay ancingday, anday athergay inay ustersclay. Eantimemay ethay skyay
arkens—theday indway ises_.ray)

ASCARlay AILORsay. Byay Ahmabray! oysbay, it’llay ebay ouseday ailsay oonsay. Ethay ornsky-bay,
igh-tidehay Angesgay urnedtay otay indway! Outhay owestshay thyay ackblay owbray, Eevasay!

ALTESEmay AILORsay. eclining(_Ray anday akingshay ishay ap_.cay) It’say ethay aves—theway
ow’ssnay apscay urntay otay igjay itay ownay. Ey’llthay akeshay eirthay asselstay oonsay. Ownay
ouldway allay ethay avesway ereway omenway, enthay I’day ogay owndray, anday asseechay ithway
emthay evermoreay! Ere’sthay aughtnay osay eetsway onay earth—heavenay aymay otnay atchmay
it!—asay osethay iftsway ancesglay ofay armway, ildway osomsbay inay ethay anceday, enwhay ethay
over-arboringay armsay idehay uchsay iperay, urstingbay apesgray.

ICILIANsay AILORsay. eclining_.(_Ray) Elltay emay otnay ofay itay! Arkhay eyay, ad—fleetlay
interlacingsay ofay ethay imbs—lithelay ayings—coyings—flutteringssway! iplay!
earthay! iphay! allay azegray: unceasingay ouchtay anday ogay! otnay astetay, observeay eyay,
elseay omecay atietysay. Ehay, Aganpay? udging_.(_Nay)

AHITANtay AILORsay. eclining(_Ray onay aay at_.may) Ailhay, olyhay akednessnay ofay ouray
ancingday irls!—thegay Eeva-Heevahay! Ahay! owlay eiledvay, ighhay almedpay Ahititay! Iay
illstay estray emay onay thyay atmay, utbay ethay oftsay oilsay ashay idslay! Iay awsay eethay ovenway
inay ethay oodway, myay atmay! eengray ethay irstfay ayday Iay oughtbray eyay encethay; ownay ornway
anday iltedway uiteqay. Ahay e!—notmay outhay ornay Iay ancay earbay ethay angechay! Owhay enthay,
ifay osay ebay ansplantedtray otay onyay skyay? Earhay Iay ethay oaringray eamsstray omfray
Irohitee’spay eakpay ofay earsspay, enwhay eythay eaplay ownday ethay agscray anday owndray ethay
illages?—Thevay astblay! ethay astblay! Upay, inespay, anday eetmay itay! eaps(_Lay otay ishay
eet_.fay)

ORTUGUESEpay AILORsay. Owhay ethay easay ollsray ashingsway ainst’gay ethay idesay! Andstay
byay orfay eefingray, eartieshay! ethay indsway areay ustjay ossingcray ordssway, ell-mellpay
ey’llthay ogay unginglay esentlypray.

ANISHday AILORsay. Ackcray, ackcray, olday ipshay! osay onglay asay outhay ackestcray, outhay
oldesthay! Ellway oneday! Ethay atemay erethay oldshay eyay otay itay ifflystay. E’shay onay oremay
afraiday anthay ethay isleay ortfay atay Attegatcay, utpay erethay otay ightfay ethay Alticbay
ithway orm-lashedstay unsgay, onay ichwhay ethay ea-saltsay akescay!

4THay ANTUCKETnay AILORsay. Ehay ashay ishay ordersay, indmay eyay atthay. Iay eardhay olday Ahabay
elltay imhay ehay ustmay alwaysay illkay aay uallsqay, omethingsay asay eythay urstbay aay
aterspoutway ithway aay istol—firepay ouryay ipshay ightray intoay itay!

ENGLISHay AILORsay. Oodblay! utbay atthay olday an’smay aay andgray olday ovecay! Eway areay ethay
adslay otay unthay imhay upay ishay alewhay!

ALLay. Ayeay! ayeay!

OLDay ANXmay AILORsay. Owhay ethay eethray inespay akeshay! Inespay areay ethay ardesthay ortsay
ofay eetray otay ivelay enwhay iftedshay otay anyay otheray oilsay, anday erehay ere’sthay onenay
utbay ethay ew’scray ursedcay ayclay. Eadystay, elmsmanhay! eadystay. Isthay isay ethay ortsay
ofay eatherway enwhay avebray eartshay apsnay ashoreay, anday eeledkay ullshay itsplay atay
easay. Ouray aptaincay ashay ishay irthmarkbay; ooklay onderyay, oysbay, ere’sthay anotheray
inay ethay urid-likesky—lay, eyay eesay, allay elseay itchpay ackblay.

AGGOOday. Atwhay ofay atthay? O’swhay afraiday ofay ack’sblay afraiday ofay emay! I’may
uarriedqay outay ofay itay!

ANISHsPay AILORsay. Aside_.(_ay) Ehay antsway otay ullybay, ah!—theay olday udgegray akesmay
emay ouchytay Advancing_.(_ay) Ayeay, arpooneerhay, thyay aceray isay ethay undeniableay
arkday idesay ofay ankind—devilishmay arkday atay atthay. Onay offenceay.

AGGOOday imly_)(_gray. Onenay.

STay. AGO’Sjay AILORsay. Atthay Aniard’sspay admay oray unkdray. Utbay atthay an’tcay ebay, oray
elseay inay ishay oneay asecay ouray olday Ogul’smay ire-watersfay areay omewhatsay onglay inay
orkingway.

5THay ANTUCKETnay AILORsay. At’swhay atthay Iay aw—lightningsay? Esyay.

ANISHsPay AILORsay. Onay; Aggooday owingshay ishay eethtay.

AGGOOday inging_)(_spray. Allowsway inethay, annikinmay! Itewhay inskay, itewhay iverlay!

ANISHsPay AILORsay eeting(_may im_)hay. Ifeknay eethay eartilyhay! igbay amefray, allsmay
iritspay!

ALLay. Aay owray! aay owray! aay owray!

ASHTEGOtay ith(_way aay iff_)whay. Aay owray a’loway, anday aay owray aloft—Godsay anday
en—bothmay awlersbray! Umphhay!

ELFASTbay AILORsay. Aay owray! arrahay aay owray! Ethay Irginvay ebay essedblay, aay owray!
Ungeplay inay ithway eyay!

ENGLISHay AILORsay. Airfay ayplay! Atchsnay ethay Aniard’sspay ifeknay! Aay ingray, aay ingray!

OLDay ANXmay AILORsay. Eadyray ormedfay. Erethay! ethay ingedray orizonhay. Inay atthay ingray
Aincay uckstray Abelay. Eetsway orkway, ightray orkway! Onay? Whyay enthay, Odgay, ad’stmay
outhay ethay ingray?

ATE’Smay OICEvay OMfRay EtHay UARTER-DECKqay. Andshay byay ethay alyardshay! inay
op-gallanttay ailssay! Andstay byay otay eefray opsailstay!

ALLay. Ethay uallsqay! ethay uallsqay! umpjay, myay olliesjay! ey(_Thay atter_.scay)

IPpay inking(_shray underay ethay indlass_)way. Olliesjay? Ordlay elphay uchsay olliesjay!
Ishcray, ashcray! erethay oesgay ethay ib-stayjay! Ang-whangblay! Odgay! Uckday owerlay,
Ippay, erehay omescay ethay oyalray ardyay! It’say orseway anthay eingbay inay ethay irledwhay
oodsway, ethay astlay ayday ofay ethay earyay! O’dwhay ogay imbingclay afteray estnutschay ownay?
Utbay erethay eythay ogay, allay ursingcay, anday erehay Iay on’tday. Inefay ospectspray otay
em’ay; ey’rethay onay ethay oadray otay eavenhay. Oldhay onay ardhay! Imminijay, atwhay aay
uallsqay! Utbay osethay apschay erethay areay orseway et—theyyay areay ouryay itewhay
uallssqay, eythay. Itewhay uallssqay? itewhay alewhay, irrshay! irrshay! Erehay avehay Iay
eardhay allay eirthay atchay ustjay ownay, anday ethay itewhay ale—shirrwhay! irr!—butshay
okenspay ofay onceay! anday onlyay isthay evening—itay akesmay emay inglejay allay overay ikelay
myay ambourine—thattay anacondaay ofay anay olday anmay oresway em’ay inay otay unthay imhay! Ohay,
outhay igbay itewhay Odgay aloftay erethay omewheresay inay onyay arknessday, avehay ercymay onay
isthay allsmay ackblay oybay ownday erehay; eservepray imhay omfray allay enmay atthay avehay onay
owelsbay otay eelfay earfay!


APTERcHay 41ay. Obymay Ickday.

Iay, Ishmaelay, asway oneay ofay atthay ewcray; myay outsshay adhay onegay upay ithway ethay estray;
myay oathay adhay eenbay eldedway ithway eirsthay; anday ongerstray Iay outedshay, anday oremay
idday Iay ammerhay anday inchclay myay oathay, ecausebay ofay ethay eaddray inay myay oulsay. Aay
ildway, icalmystay, atheticalsympay eelingfay asway inay emay; Ahab’say uenchlessqay eudfay
eemedsay inemay. Ithway eedygray earsay Iay earnedlay ethay istoryhay ofay atthay urderousmay
onstermay againstay omwhay Iay anday allay ethay othersay adhay akentay ouray oathsay ofay
iolencevay anday evengeray.

Orfay omesay imetay astpay, oughthay atay intervalsay onlyay, ethay unaccompanieday,
ecludedsay Itewhay Alewhay adhay auntedhay osethay uncivilizeday eassay ostlymay
equentedfray byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ishermenfay. Utbay otnay allay ofay emthay ewknay ofay
ishay existenceay; onlyay aay ewfay ofay emthay, omparativelycay, adhay owinglyknay eensay
imhay; ilewhay ethay umbernay owhay asay etyay adhay actuallyay anday owinglyknay ivengay
attlebay otay imhay, asway allsmay indeeday. Orfay, owingay otay ethay argelay umbernay ofay
ale-cruiserswhay; ethay isorderlyday ayway eythay ereway inkledspray overay ethay entireay
ateryway ircumferencecay, anymay ofay emthay adventurouslyay ushingpay eirthay uestqay
alongay olitarysay atitudeslay, osay asay eldomsay oray evernay orfay aay olewhay elvemonthtway
oray oremay onay aay etchstray, otay encounteray aay inglesay ews-tellingnay ailsay ofay anyay
ortsay; ethay inordinateay engthlay ofay eachay eparatesay oyagevay; ethay irregularityay
ofay ethay imestay ofay ailingsay omfray omehay; allay esethay, ithway otheray ircumstancescay,
irectday anday indirectay, onglay obstructeday ethay eadspray oughthray ethay olewhay
orld-wideway aling-fleetwhay ofay ethay ecialspay individualizingay idingstay
oncerningcay Obymay Ickday. Itay asway ardlyhay otay ebay oubtedday, atthay everalsay esselsvay
eportedray otay avehay encountereday, atay uchsay oray uchsay aay imetay, oray onay uchsay oray
uchsay aay eridianmay, aay Ermspay Alewhay ofay uncommonay agnitudemay anday alignitymay,
ichwhay alewhay, afteray oingday eatgray ischiefmay otay ishay assailantsay, adhay
ompletelycay escapeday emthay; otay omesay indsmay itay asway otnay anay unfairay
esumptionpray, Iay aysay, atthay ethay alewhay inay uestionqay ustmay avehay eenbay onay otheray
anthay Obymay Ickday. Etyay asay ofay atelay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay adhay eenbay arkedmay
byay ariousvay anday otnay unfrequentay instancesay ofay eatgray erocityfay, unningcay, anday
alicemay inay ethay onstermay attackeday; ereforethay itay asway, atthay osethay owhay byay
accidentay ignorantlyay avegay attlebay otay Obymay Ickday; uchsay untershay, erhapspay,
orfay ethay ostmay artpay, ereway ontentcay otay ascribeay ethay eculiarpay errortay ehay edbray,
oremay, asay itay ereway, otay ethay erilspay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay atay argelay,
anthay otay ethay individualay ausecay. Inay atthay ayway, ostlymay, ethay isastrousday
encounteray etweenbay Ahabay anday ethay alewhay adhay ithertohay eenbay opularlypay
egardedray.

Anday asay orfay osethay owhay, eviouslypray earinghay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, byay ancechay
aughtcay ightsay ofay imhay; inay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay ingthay eythay adhay everyay oneay
ofay emthay, almostay, asay oldlybay anday earlesslyfay oweredlay orfay imhay, asay orfay anyay
otheray alewhay ofay atthay eciesspay. Utbay atay engthlay, uchsay alamitiescay idday ensueay
inay esethay assaults—notay estrictedray otay ainedspray istswray anday anklesay, okenbray
imbslay, oray evouringday amputations—butay atalfay otay ethay astlay egreeday ofay
atalityfay; osethay epeatedray isastrousday epulsesray, allay accumulatingay anday
ilingpay eirthay errorstay uponay Obymay Ickday; osethay ingsthay adhay onegay arfay otay akeshay
ethay ortitudefay ofay anymay avebray untershay, otay omwhay ethay orystay ofay ethay Itewhay
Alewhay adhay eventuallyay omecay.

Ornay idday ildway umorsray ofay allay ortssay ailfay otay exaggerateay, anday illstay ethay oremay
orrifyhay ethay uetray istorieshay ofay esethay eadlyday encountersay. Orfay otnay onlyay oday
abulousfay umorsray aturallynay owgray outay ofay ethay eryvay odybay ofay allay urprisingsay
erribletay events,—asay ethay ittensmay eetray ivesgay irthbay otay itsay ungifay; utbay, inay
aritimemay ifelay, arfay oremay anthay inay atthay ofay erratay irmafay, ildway umorsray
abounday, ereverwhay erethay isay anyay adequateay ealityray orfay emthay otay ingclay otay.
Anday asay ethay easay urpassessay ethay andlay inay isthay attermay, osay ethay alewhay isheryfay
urpassessay everyay otheray ortsay ofay aritimemay ifelay, inay ethay onderfulnessway anday
earfulnessfay ofay ethay umorsray ichwhay ometimessay irculatecay erethay. Orfay otnay onlyay
areay alemenwhay asay aay odybay unexemptay omfray atthay ignoranceay anday
uperstitiousnesssay ereditaryhay otay allay ailorssay; utbay ofay allay ailorssay, eythay
areay byay allay oddsay ethay ostmay irectlyday oughtbray intoay ontactcay ithway ateverwhay isay
appallinglyay astonishingay inay ethay easay; acefay otay acefay eythay otnay onlyay eyeay itsay
eatestgray arvelsmay, utbay, andhay otay awjay, ivegay attlebay otay emthay. Aloneay, inay uchsay
emotestray atersway, atthay oughthay ouyay ailedsay aay ousandthay ilesmay, anday assedpay aay
ousandthay oresshay, ouyay ouldway otnay omecay otay anyay iseledchay earth-stonehay, oray
aughtay ospitablehay eneathbay atthay artpay ofay ethay unsay; inay uchsay atitudeslay anday
ongitudeslay, ursuingpay ootay uchsay aay allingcay asay ehay oesday, ethay alemanwhay isay
appedwray byay influencesay allay endingtay otay akemay ishay ancyfay egnantpray ithway anymay
aay ightymay irthbay.

Onay onderway, enthay, atthay everay atheringgay olumevay omfray ethay eremay ansittray overay
ethay idestway ateryway acesspay, ethay outblownay umorsray ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay idday inay
ethay enday incorporateay ithway emselvesthay allay annermay ofay orbidmay intshay, anday
alf-formedhay alfœtay uggestionssay ofay upernaturalsay agenciesay, ichwhay
eventuallyay investeday Obymay Ickday ithway ewnay errorstay unborroweday omfray anythingay
atthay isiblyvay appearsay. Osay atthay inay anymay asescay uchsay aay anicpay idday ehay inallyfay
ikestray, atthay ewfay owhay byay osethay umorsray, atay eastlay, adhay eardhay ofay ethay Itewhay
Alewhay, ewfay ofay osethay untershay ereway illingway otay encounteray ethay erilspay ofay ishay
awjay.

Utbay erethay ereway illstay otheray anday oremay italvay acticalpray influencesay atay orkway.
Otnay evenay atay ethay esentpray ayday ashay ethay originalay estigepray ofay ethay Ermspay
Alewhay, asay earfullyfay istinguishedday omfray allay otheray eciesspay ofay ethay
eviathanlay, iedday outay ofay ethay indsmay ofay ethay alemenwhay asay aay odybay. Erethay areay
osethay isthay ayday amongay emthay, owhay, oughthay intelligentay anday ourageouscay
enoughay inay offeringay attlebay otay ethay Eenlandgray oray Ightray alewhay, ouldway
erhaps—eitherpay omfray ofessionalpray inexperienceay, oray incompetencyay, oray
imiditytay, eclineday aay ontestcay ithway ethay Ermspay Alewhay; atay anyay ateray, erethay
areay entyplay ofay alemenwhay, especiallyay amongay osethay alingwhay ationsnay otnay
ailingsay underay ethay Americanay agflay, owhay avehay evernay ostilelyhay encountereday
ethay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay osewhay olesay owledgeknay ofay ethay eviathanlay isay
estrictedray otay ethay ignobleay onstermay imitivelypray ursuedpay inay ethay Orthnay;
eatedsay onay eirthay atcheshay, esethay enmay illway earkenhay ithway aay ildishchay
iresidefay interestay anday aweay, otay ethay ildway, angestray alestay ofay Outhernsay
alingwhay. Ornay isay ethay e-eminentpray emendousnesstray ofay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay
anywhereay oremay eelinglyfay omprehendedcay, anthay onay oardbay ofay osethay owspray
ichwhay emstay imhay.

Anday asay ifay ethay ownay estedtay ealityray ofay ishay ightmay adhay inay ormerfay egendarylay
imestay ownthray itsay adowshay eforebay itay; eway indfay omesay ookbay
aturalists—Olassennay anday Ovelson—declaringpay ethay Ermspay Alewhay otnay onlyay otay
ebay aay onsternationcay otay everyay otheray eaturecray inay ethay easay, utbay alsoay otay ebay
osay incrediblyay erociousfay asay ontinuallycay otay ebay athirstay orfay umanhay oodblay.
Ornay evenay ownday otay osay atelay aay imetay asay Uvier’scay, ereway esethay oray almostay
imilarsay impressionsay effaceday. Orfay inay ishay Aturalnay Istoryhay, ethay Aronbay
imselfhay affirmsay atthay atay ightsay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, allay ishfay arks(shay
includeday) areay uck“stray ithway ethay ostmay ivelylay errors,”tay anday often“ay inay ethay
ecipitancypray ofay eirthay ightflay ashday emselvesthay againstay ethay ocksray ithway
uchsay iolencevay asay otay ausecay instantaneousay eath.”day Anday oweverhay ethay eneralgay
experiencesay inay ethay isheryfay aymay amenday uchsay eportsray asay esethay; etyay inay
eirthay ullfay erriblenesstay, evenay otay ethay oodthirstyblay itemay ofay Ovelsonpay, ethay
uperstitioussay eliefbay inay emthay isay, inay omesay icissitudesvay ofay eirthay
ocationvay, evivedray inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay untershay.

Osay atthay overaweday byay ethay umorsray anday ortentspay oncerningcay imhay, otnay aay ewfay
ofay ethay ishermenfay ecalledray, inay eferenceray otay Obymay Ickday, ethay earlieray aysday
ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay, enwhay itay asway oftentimesay ardhay otay induceay onglay
actisedpray Ightray alemenwhay otay embarkay inay ethay erilspay ofay isthay ewnay anday aringday
arfareway; uchsay enmay otestingpray atthay althoughay otheray eviathanslay ightmay ebay
opefullyhay ursuedpay, etyay otay asechay anday ointpay ancelay atay uchsay anay apparitionay
asay ethay Ermspay Alewhay asway otnay orfay ortalmay anmay. Atthay otay attemptay itay, ouldway ebay
inevitablyay otay ebay orntay intoay aay uickqay eternityay. Onay isthay eadhay, erethay areay
omesay emarkableray ocumentsday atthay aymay ebay onsultedcay.

Everthelessnay, omesay erethay ereway, owhay evenay inay ethay acefay ofay esethay ingsthay
ereway eadyray otay ivegay asechay otay Obymay Ickday; anday aay illstay eatergray umbernay owhay,
ancingchay onlyay otay earhay ofay imhay istantlyday anday aguelyvay, ithoutway ethay
ecificspay etailsday ofay anyay ertaincay alamitycay, anday ithoutway uperstitioussay
accompanimentsay, ereway ufficientlysay ardyhay otnay otay eeflay omfray ethay attlebay ifay
offereday.

Oneay ofay ethay ildway uggestionssay eferredray otay, asay atay astlay omingcay otay ebay inkedlay
ithway ethay Itewhay Alewhay inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay uperstitiouslysay inclineday, asway
ethay unearthlyay onceitcay atthay Obymay Ickday asway ubiquitousay; atthay ehay adhay
actuallyay eenbay encountereday inay oppositeay atitudeslay atay oneay anday ethay amesay
instantay ofay imetay.

Ornay, edulouscray asay uchsay indsmay ustmay avehay eenbay, asway isthay onceitcay
altogetheray ithoutway omesay aintfay owshay ofay uperstitioussay obabilitypray. Orfay asay
ethay ecretssay ofay ethay urrentscay inay ethay eassay avehay evernay etyay eenbay ivulgedday,
evenay otay ethay ostmay eruditeay esearchray; osay ethay iddenhay aysway ofay ethay Ermspay
Alewhay enwhay eneathbay ethay urfacesay emainray, inay eatgray artpay, unaccountableay otay
ishay ursuerspay; anday omfray imetay otay imetay avehay originateday ethay ostmay uriouscay
anday ontradictorycay eculationsspay egardingray emthay, especiallyay oncerningcay
ethay icmystay odesmay erebywhay, afteray oundingsay otay aay eatgray epthday, ehay
ansportstray imselfhay ithway uchsay astvay iftnesssway otay ethay ostmay idelyway istantday
ointspay.

Itay isay aay ingthay ellway ownknay otay othbay Americanay anday Englishay ale-shipswhay, anday
asay ellway aay ingthay acedplay uponay authoritativeay ecordray earsyay agoay byay Oresbyscay,
atthay omesay aleswhay avehay eenbay apturedcay arfay orthnay inay ethay Acificpay, inay osewhay
odiesbay avehay eenbay oundfay ethay arbsbay ofay arpoonshay artedday inay ethay Eenlandgray
eassay. Ornay isay itay otay ebay ainsaidgay, atthay inay omesay ofay esethay instancesay itay ashay
eenbay eclaredday atthay ethay intervalay ofay imetay etweenbay ethay otway assaultsay ouldcay
otnay avehay exceededay eryvay anymay aysday. Encehay, byay inferenceay, itay ashay eenbay
elievedbay byay omesay alemenwhay, atthay ethay Or’nay Estway Assagepay, osay onglay aay
oblempray otay anmay, asway evernay aay oblempray otay ethay alewhay. Osay atthay erehay, inay ethay
ealray ivinglay experienceay ofay ivinglay enmay, ethay odigiespray elatedray inay olday
imestay ofay ethay inlanday Ellostray ountainmay inay Ortugalpay ear(nay osewhay optay erethay
asway aidsay otay ebay aay akelay inay ichwhay ethay eckswray ofay ipsshay oatedflay upay otay ethay
urface)say; anday atthay illstay oremay onderfulway orystay ofay ethay Arethusaay ountainfay
earnay Acusesyray ose(whay atersway ereway elievedbay otay avehay omecay omfray ethay Olyhay
Andlay byay anay undergrounday assage)pay; esethay abulousfay arrationsnay areay almostay
ullyfay equalleday byay ethay ealitiesray ofay ethay alemenwhay.

Orcedfay intoay amiliarityfay, enthay, ithway uchsay odigiespray asay esethay; anday
owingknay atthay afteray epeatedray, intrepiday assaultsay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay
escapeday aliveay; itay annotcay ebay uchmay attermay ofay urprisesay atthay omesay alemenwhay
ouldshay ogay illstay urtherfay inay eirthay uperstitionssay; eclaringday Obymay Ickday otnay
onlyay ubiquitousay, utbay immortalay or(fay immortalityay isay utbay ubiquityay inay
ime)tay; atthay oughthay ovesgray ofay earsspay ouldshay ebay antedplay inay ishay anksflay, ehay
ouldway illstay imsway awayay unharmeday; oray ifay indeeday ehay ouldshay everay ebay ademay otay
outspay ickthay oodblay, uchsay aay ightsay ouldway ebay utbay aay astlyghay eceptionday; orfay
againay inay unensanguineday illowsbay undredshay ofay eagueslay awayay, ishay unsullieday
etjay ouldway onceay oremay ebay eensay.

Utbay evenay ippedstray ofay esethay upernaturalsay urmisingssay, erethay asway enoughay inay
ethay earthlyay akemay anday incontestableay aracterchay ofay ethay onstermay otay ikestray
ethay imaginationay ithway unwonteday owerpay. Orfay, itay asway otnay osay uchmay ishay
uncommonay ulkbay atthay osay uchmay istinguishedday imhay omfray otheray ermspay aleswhay,
utbay, asay asway elsewhereay ownthray out—aay eculiarpay ow-whitesnay inkledwray
oreheadfay, anday aay ighhay, amidicalpyray itewhay umphay. Esethay ereway ishay ominentpray
eaturesfay; ethay okenstay erebywhay, evenay inay ethay imitlesslay, uncharteday eassay, ehay
evealedray ishay identityay, atay aay onglay istanceday, otay osethay owhay ewknay imhay.

Ethay estray ofay ishay odybay asway osay eakedstray, anday ottedspay, anday arbledmay ithway ethay
amesay oudedshray uehay, atthay, inay ethay enday, ehay adhay ainedgay ishay istinctiveday
appellationay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay; aay amenay, indeeday, iterallylay ustifiedjay byay
ishay ividvay aspectay, enwhay eensay idingglay atay ighhay oonnay oughthray aay arkday ueblay
easay, eavinglay aay ilky-waymay akeway ofay eamycray oamfay, allay angledspay ithway oldengay
eamingsglay.

Ornay asway itay ishay unwonteday agnitudemay, ornay ishay emarkableray uehay, ornay etyay ishay
eformedday owerlay awjay, atthay osay uchmay investeday ethay alewhay ithway aturalnay
errortay, asay atthay unexampleday, intelligentay alignitymay ichwhay, accordingay otay
ecificspay accountsay, ehay adhay overay anday overay againay evinceday inay ishay assaultsay.
Oremay anthay allay, ishay eacheroustray etreatsray uckstray oremay ofay ismayday anthay
erhapspay aughtay elseay. Orfay, enwhay immingsway eforebay ishay exultingay ursuerspay,
ithway everyay apparentay omsymptay ofay alarmay, ehay adhay everalsay imestay eenbay ownknay
otay urntay oundray uddenlysay, anday, earingbay ownday uponay emthay, eitheray avestay eirthay
oatsbay otay interssplay, oray ivedray emthay ackbay inay onsternationcay otay eirthay ipshay.

Alreadyay everalsay atalitiesfay adhay attendeday ishay asechay. Utbay oughthay imilarsay
isastersday, oweverhay ittlelay uitedbray ashoreay, ereway byay onay eansmay unusualay inay
ethay isheryfay; etyay, inay ostmay instancesay, uchsay eemedsay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay
infernalay aforethoughtay ofay erocityfay, atthay everyay ismemberingday oray eathday
atthay ehay ausedcay, asway otnay ollywhay egardedray asay avinghay eenbay inflicteday byay anay
unintelligentay agentay.

Udgejay, enthay, otay atwhay itchespay ofay inflameday, istractedday uryfay ethay indsmay ofay
ishay oremay esperateday untershay ereway impelleday, enwhay amiday ethay ipschay ofay ewedchay
oatsbay, anday ethay inkingsay imbslay ofay orntay omradescay, eythay amsway outay ofay ethay
itewhay urdscay ofay ethay ale’swhay irefulday athwray intoay ethay erenesay, exasperatingay
unlightsay, atthay iledsmay onay, asay ifay atay aay irthbay oray aay idalbray.

Ishay eethray oatsbay ovestay arounday imhay, anday oarsay anday enmay othbay irlingwhay inay ethay
eddiesay; oneay aptaincay, eizingsay ethay ine-knifelay omfray ishay okenbray owpray, adhay
ashedday atay ethay alewhay, asay anay Arkansasay uellistday atay ishay oefay, indlyblay
eekingsay ithway aay ixsay inchay adeblay otay eachray ethay athom-deepfay ifelay ofay ethay
alewhay. Atthay aptaincay asway Ahabay. Anday enthay itay asway, atthay uddenlysay eepingsway
ishay ickle-shapedsay owerlay awjay eneathbay imhay, Obymay Ickday adhay eapedray awayay
Ahab’say eglay, asay aay owermay aay adeblay ofay assgray inay ethay ieldfay. Onay urbanedtay Urktay,
onay iredhay Enetianvay oray Alaymay, ouldcay avehay otesmay imhay ithway oremay eemingsay
alicemay. Allsmay easonray asway erethay otay oubtday, enthay, atthay everay incesay atthay
almostay atalfay encounteray, Ahabay adhay erishedchay aay ildway indictivenessvay
againstay ethay alewhay, allay ethay oremay ellfay orfay atthay inay ishay anticfray orbidnessmay
ehay atay astlay amecay otay identifyay ithway imhay, otnay onlyay allay ishay odilybay oesway, utbay
allay ishay intellectualay anday iritualspay exasperationsay. Ethay Itewhay Alewhay amsway
eforebay imhay asay ethay onomaniacmay incarnationay ofay allay osethay aliciousmay
agenciesay ichwhay omesay eepday enmay eelfay eatingay inay emthay, illtay eythay areay eftlay
ivinglay onay ithway alfhay aay earthay anday alfhay aay unglay. Atthay intangibleay alignitymay
ichwhay ashay eenbay omfray ethay eginningbay; otay osewhay ominionday evenay ethay odernmay
Istianschray ascribeay one-halfay ofay ethay orldsway; ichwhay ethay ancientay Ophitesay ofay
ethay eastay everencedray inay eirthay atuestay evil;—Ahabday idday otnay allfay ownday anday
orshipway itay ikelay emthay; utbay eliriouslyday ansferringtray itsay ideaay otay ethay
abhorreday itewhay alewhay, ehay ittedpay imselfhay, allay utilatedmay, againstay itay. Allay
atthay ostmay addensmay anday ormentstay; allay atthay irsstay upay ethay eeslay ofay ingsthay;
allay uthtray ithway alicemay inay itay; allay atthay ackscray ethay inewssay anday akescay ethay
ainbray; allay ethay ubtlesay emonismsday ofay ifelay anday oughtthay; allay evilay, otay azycray
Ahabay, ereway isiblyvay ersonifiedpay, anday ademay acticallypray assailableay inay Obymay
Ickday. Ehay iledpay uponay ethay ale’swhay itewhay umphay ethay umsay ofay allay ethay eneralgay
ageray anday atehay eltfay byay ishay olewhay aceray omfray Adamay ownday; anday enthay, asay ifay
ishay estchay adhay eenbay aay ortarmay, ehay urstbay ishay othay eart’shay ellshay uponay itay.

Itay isay otnay obablepray atthay isthay onomaniamay inay imhay ooktay itsay instantay iseray atay
ethay ecisepray imetay ofay ishay odilybay ismembermentday. Enthay, inay artingday atay ethay
onstermay, ifeknay inay andhay, ehay adhay utbay ivengay ooselay otay aay uddensay, assionatepay,
orporalcay animosityay; anday enwhay ehay eceivedray ethay okestray atthay oretay imhay, ehay
obablypray utbay eltfay ethay agonizingay odilybay acerationlay, utbay othingnay oremay.
Etyay, enwhay byay isthay ollisioncay orcedfay otay urntay owardstay omehay, anday orfay onglay
onthsmay ofay aysday anday eeksway, Ahabay anday anguishay aylay etchedstray ogethertay inay
oneay ammockhay, oundingray inay idmay interway atthay earydray, owlinghay Atagonianpay
Apecay; enthay itay asway, atthay ishay orntay odybay anday ashedgay oulsay edblay intoay oneay
anotheray; anday osay interfusingay, ademay imhay admay. Atthay itay asway onlyay enthay, onay
ethay omewardhay oyagevay, afteray ethay encounteray, atthay ethay inalfay onomaniamay
eizedsay imhay, eemssay allay utbay ertaincay omfray ethay actfay atthay, atay intervalsay
uringday ethay assagepay, ehay asway aay avingray unaticlay; anday, oughthay unlimbeday ofay aay
eglay, etyay uchsay italvay engthstray etyay urkedlay inay ishay Egyptianay estchay, anday asway
oreovermay intensifieday byay ishay eliriumday, atthay ishay atesmay ereway orcedfay otay
acelay imhay astfay, evenay erethay, asay ehay ailedsay, avingray inay ishay ammockhay. Inay aay
ait-jacketstray, ehay ungsway otay ethay admay ockingsray ofay ethay alesgay. Anday, enwhay
unningray intoay oremay ufferablesay atitudeslay, ethay ipshay, ithway ildmay un’sailsstay
eadspray, oatedflay acrossay ethay anquiltray opicstray, anday, otay allay appearancesay,
ethay olday an’smay eliriumday eemedsay eftlay ehindbay imhay ithway ethay Apecay Ornhay
ellssway, anday ehay amecay orthfay omfray ishay arkday enday intoay ethay essedblay ightlay anday
airay; evenay enthay, enwhay ehay orebay atthay irmfay, ollectedcay ontfray, oweverhay alepay,
anday issueday ishay almcay ordersay onceay againay; anday ishay atesmay ankedthay Odgay ethay
irefulday adnessmay asway ownay onegay; evenay enthay, Ahabay, inay ishay iddenhay elfsay,
avedray onay. Umanhay adnessmay isay oftentimesay aay unningcay anday ostmay elinefay ingthay.
Enwhay ouyay inkthay itay edflay, itay aymay avehay utbay ecomebay ansfiguredtray intoay omesay
illstay ubtlersay ormfay. Ahab’say ullfay unacylay ubsidedsay otnay, utbay eepeninglyday
ontractedcay; ikelay ethay unabateday Udsonhay, enwhay atthay oblenay Orthmannay owsflay
arrowlynay, utbay unfathomablyay oughthray ethay Ighlandhay orgegay. Utbay, asay inay ishay
arrow-flowingnay onomaniamay, otnay oneay otjay ofay Ahab’say oadbray adnessmay adhay eenbay
eftlay ehindbay; osay inay atthay oadbray adnessmay, otnay oneay otjay ofay ishay eatgray aturalnay
intellectay adhay erishedpay. Atthay eforebay ivinglay agentay, ownay ecamebay ethay ivinglay
instrumentay. Ifay uchsay aay uriousfay opetray aymay andstay, ishay ecialspay unacylay
ormedstay ishay eneralgay anitysay, anday arriedcay itay, anday urnedtay allay itsay
oncentredcay annoncay uponay itsay ownay admay arkmay; osay atthay arfay omfray avinghay ostlay
ishay engthstray, Ahabay, otay atthay oneay enday, idday ownay ossesspay aay ousandthay oldfay
oremay otencypay anthay everay ehay adhay anelysay oughtbray otay earbay uponay anyay oneay
easonableray objectay.

Isthay isay uchmay; etyay Ahab’say argerlay, arkerday, eeperday artpay emainsray unhinteday.
Utbay ainvay otay opularizepay ofunditiespray, anday allay uthtray isay ofoundpray. Indingway
arfay ownday omfray ithinway ethay eryvay earthay ofay isthay ikedspay Otelhay eday Unyclay erewhay
eway erehay and—howeverstay andgray anday onderfulway, ownay uitqay it;—anday aketay ouryay
ayway, eyay oblernay, addersay oulssay, otay osethay astvay Omanray allshay ofay Ermesthay;
erewhay arfay eneathbay ethay antasticfay owerstay ofay an’smay upperay earthay, ishay ootray
ofay andeurgray, ishay olewhay awfulay essenceay itssay inay eardedbay atestay; anay antiqueay
uriedbay eneathbay antiquitiesay, anday onedthray onay orsoestay! Osay ithway aay okenbray
onethray, ethay eatgray odsgay ockmay atthay aptivecay ingkay; osay ikelay aay Aryatidcay, ehay
atientpay itssay, upholdingay onay ishay ozenfray owbray ethay iledpay entablaturesay ofay
agesay. Indway eyay ownday erethay, eyay ouderpray, addersay oulssay! uestionqay atthay
oudpray, adsay ingkay! Aay amilyfay ikenesslay! ayeay, ehay idday egetbay eyay, eyay oungyay
exileday oyaltiesray; anday omfray ouryay imgray iresay onlyay illway ethay olday
Ate-secretstay omecay.

Ownay, inay ishay earthay, Ahabay adhay omesay impseglay ofay isthay, amelynay: allay myay eansmay
areay anesay, myay otivemay anday myay objectay admay. Etyay ithoutway owerpay otay illkay, oray
angechay, oray unshay ethay actfay; ehay ikewiselay ewknay atthay otay ankindmay ehay idday onglay
issembleday; inay omesay ortsay, idday illstay. Utbay atthay ingthay ofay ishay issemblingday
asway onlyay ubjectsay otay ishay erceptibilitypay, otnay otay ishay illway eterminateday.
Everthelessnay, osay ellway idday ehay ucceedsay inay atthay issemblingday, atthay enwhay
ithway ivoryay eglay ehay eppedstay ashoreay atay astlay, onay Antucketernay oughtthay imhay
otherwiseay anthay utbay aturallynay ievedgray, anday atthay otay ethay uickqay, ithway ethay
erribletay asualtycay ichwhay adhay overtakenay imhay.

Ethay eportray ofay ishay undeniableay eliriumday atay easay asway ikewiselay opularlypay
ascribeday otay aay indredkay ausecay. Anday osay ootay, allay ethay addeday oodinessmay ichwhay
alwaysay afterwardsay, otay ethay eryvay ayday ofay ailingsay inay ethay Equodpay onay ethay
esentpray oyagevay, atsay oodingbray onay ishay owbray. Ornay isay itay osay eryvay unlikelyay,
atthay arfay omfray istrustingday ishay itnessfay orfay anotheray alingwhay oyagevay, onay
accountay ofay uchsay arkday omssymptay, ethay alculatingcay eoplepay ofay atthay udentpray
isleay ereway inclineday otay arborhay ethay onceitcay, atthay orfay osethay eryvay easonsray
ehay asway allay ethay etterbay ualifiedqay anday etsay onay edgeay, orfay aay ursuitpay osay ullfay
ofay ageray anday ildnessway asay ethay oodyblay unthay ofay aleswhay. Awedgnay ithinway anday
orchedscay ithoutway, ithway ethay infixeday, unrelentingay angsfay ofay omesay incurableay
ideaay; uchsay anay oneay, ouldcay ehay ebay oundfay, ouldway eemsay ethay eryvay anmay otay artday
ishay ironay anday iftlay ishay ancelay againstay ethay ostmay appallingay ofay allay utesbray.
Oray, ifay orfay anyay easonray oughtthay otay ebay orporeallycay incapacitateday orfay atthay,
etyay uchsay anay oneay ouldway eemsay uperlativelysay ompetentcay otay eerchay anday owlhay onay
ishay underlingsay otay ethay attackay. Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ertaincay itay isay,
atthay ithway ethay admay ecretsay ofay ishay unabateday ageray oltedbay upay anday eyedkay inay
imhay, Ahabay adhay urposelypay ailedsay uponay ethay esentpray oyagevay ithway ethay oneay
onlyay anday all-engrossingay objectay ofay untinghay ethay Itewhay Alewhay. Adhay anyay oneay
ofay ishay olday acquaintancesay onay oreshay utbay alfhay eameddray ofay atwhay asway urkinglay
inay imhay enthay, owhay oonsay ouldway eirthay aghastay anday ighteousray oulssay avehay
enchedwray ethay ipshay omfray uchsay aay iendishfay anmay! Eythay ereway entbay onay
ofitablepray uisescray, ethay ofitpray otay ebay ountedcay ownday inay ollarsday omfray ethay
intmay. Ehay asway intentay onay anay audaciousay, immitigableay, anday upernaturalsay
evengeray.

Erehay, enthay, asway isthay ey-headedgray, ungodlyay olday anmay, asingchay ithway ursescay
aay Ob’sjay alewhay oundray ethay orldway, atay ethay eadhay ofay aay ewcray, ootay, ieflychay ademay
upay ofay ongrelmay enegadesray, anday astawayscay, anday annibals—morallycay enfeebleday
alsoay, byay ethay incompetenceay ofay eremay unaideday irtuevay oray ight-mindednessray inay
Arbuckstay, ethay invulnerableay ollityjay ofay indifferenceay anday ecklessnessray inay
Ubbstay, anday ethay ervadingpay ediocritymay inay Askflay. Uchsay aay ewcray, osay
officereday, eemedsay eciallyspay ickedpay anday ackedpay byay omesay infernalay atalityfay
otay elphay imhay otay ishay onomaniacmay evengeray. Owhay itay asway atthay eythay osay
aboundinglyay espondedray otay ethay olday an’smay ire—byay atwhay evilay agicmay eirthay
oulssay ereway ossessedpay, atthay atay imestay ishay atehay eemedsay almostay eirsthay; ethay
Itewhay Alewhay asay uchmay eirthay insufferableay oefay asay ishay; owhay allay isthay amecay otay
e—whatbay ethay Itewhay Alewhay asway otay emthay, oray owhay otay eirthay unconsciousay
understandingsay, alsoay, inay omesay imday, unsuspecteday ayway, ehay ightmay avehay
eemedsay ethay idingglay eatgray emonday ofay ethay eassay ofay ife,—alllay isthay otay
explainay, ouldway ebay otay iveday eeperday anthay Ishmaelay ancay ogay. Ethay ubterraneansay
inermay atthay orksway inay usay allay, owhay ancay oneay elltay itherwhay eadslay ishay aftshay byay
ethay everay iftingshay, uffledmay oundsay ofay ishay ickpay? Owhay oesday otnay eelfay ethay
irresistibleay armay agdray? Atwhay iffskay inay owtay ofay aay eventy-foursay ancay andstay
illstay? Orfay oneay, Iay avegay elfmysay upay otay ethay abandonmentay ofay ethay imetay anday ethay
aceplay; utbay ilewhay etyay allay a-rushay otay encounteray ethay alewhay, ouldcay eesay
aughtnay inay atthay utebray utbay ethay eadliestday illay.


APTERcHay 42ay. Ethay Itenesswhay ofay ethay Alewhay.

Atwhay ethay itewhay alewhay asway otay Ahabay, ashay eenbay intedhay; atwhay, atay imestay, ehay
asway otay emay, asay etyay emainsray unsaiday.

Asideay omfray osethay oremay obviousay onsiderationscay ouchingtay Obymay Ickday, ichwhay
ouldcay otnay utbay occasionallyay awakenay inay anyay an’smay oulsay omesay alarmay, erethay
asway anotheray oughtthay, oray atherray aguevay, amelessnay orrorhay oncerningcay imhay,
ichwhay atay imestay byay itsay intensityay ompletelycay overpowereday allay ethay estray;
anday etyay osay icalmystay anday ellway ighnay ineffableay asway itay, atthay Iay almostay
espairday ofay uttingpay itay inay aay omprehensiblecay ormfay. Itay asway ethay itenesswhay ofay
ethay alewhay atthay aboveay allay ingsthay appalleday emay. Utbay owhay ancay Iay opehay otay
explainay elfmysay erehay; anday etyay, inay omesay imday, andomray ayway, explainay elfmysay Iay
ustmay, elseay allay esethay apterschay ightmay ebay aughtnay.

Oughthay inay anymay aturalnay objectsay, itenesswhay efininglyray enhancesay eautybay,
asay ifay impartingay omesay ecialspay irtuevay ofay itsay ownay, asay inay arblesmay,
aponicasjay, anday earlspay; anday oughthay ariousvay ationsnay avehay inay omesay ayway
ecognisedray aay ertaincay oyalray eeminencepray inay isthay uehay; evenay ethay arbaricbay,
andgray olday ingskay ofay Egupay acingplay ethay itletay ord“Lay ofay ethay Itewhay Elephants”ay
aboveay allay eirthay otheray agniloquentmay ascriptionsay ofay ominionday; anday ethay
odernmay ingskay ofay Iamsay unfurlingay ethay amesay ow-whitesnay uadrupedqay inay ethay
oyalray andardstay; anday ethay Anoverianhay agflay earingbay ethay oneay igurefay ofay aay
ow-whitesnay argerchay; anday ethay eatgray Austrianay Empireay, Ariancæsay, eirhay otay
overlordingay Omeray, avinghay orfay ethay imperialay olourcay ethay amesay imperialay uehay;
anday oughthay isthay e-eminencepray inay itay appliesay otay ethay umanhay aceray itselfay,
ivinggay ethay itewhay anmay idealay astershipmay overay everyay uskyday ibetray; anday
oughthay, esidesbay, allay isthay, itenesswhay ashay eenbay evenay ademay ignificantsay ofay
adnessglay, orfay amongay ethay Omansray aay itewhay onestay arkedmay aay oyfuljay ayday; anday
oughthay inay otheray ortalmay athiessympay anday olizingssymbay, isthay amesay uehay isay
ademay ethay emblemay ofay anymay ouchingtay, oblenay ings—thethay innocenceay ofay idesbray,
ethay enignitybay ofay ageay; oughthay amongay ethay Edray Enmay ofay Americaay ethay ivinggay ofay
ethay itewhay eltbay ofay ampumway asway ethay eepestday edgeplay ofay onorhay; oughthay inay
anymay imesclay, itenesswhay ifiestypay ethay ajestymay ofay Usticejay inay ethay ermineay ofay
ethay Udgejay, anday ontributescay otay ethay ailyday atestay ofay ingskay anday ueensqay awndray
byay ilk-whitemay eedsstay; oughthay evenay inay ethay igherhay eriesmystay ofay ethay ostmay
augustay eligionsray itay ashay eenbay ademay ethay olsymbay ofay ethay ivineday otlessnessspay
anday owerpay; byay ethay Ersianpay irefay orshippersway, ethay itewhay orkedfay ameflay
eingbay eldhay ethay oliesthay onay ethay altaray; anday inay ethay Eekgray ologiesmythay,
Eatgray Ovejay imselfhay eingbay ademay incarnateay inay aay ow-whitesnay ullbay; anday
oughthay otay ethay oblenay Iroquoisay, ethay idwintermay acrificesay ofay ethay acredsay
Itewhay Ogday asway byay arfay ethay oliesthay estivalfay ofay eirthay eologythay, atthay
otlessspay, aithfulfay eaturecray eingbay eldhay ethay urestpay envoyay eythay ouldcay endsay
otay ethay Eatgray Iritspay ithway ethay annualay idingstay ofay eirthay ownay idelityfay; anday
oughthay irectlyday omfray ethay Atinlay ordway orfay itewhay, allay Istianchray iestspray
eriveday ethay amenay ofay oneay artpay ofay eirthay acredsay esturevay, ethay albay oray unictay,
ornway eneathbay ethay assockcay; anday oughthay amongay ethay olyhay ompspay ofay ethay Omishray
aithfay, itewhay isay eciallyspay employeday inay ethay elebrationcay ofay ethay Assionpay ofay
ouray Ordlay; oughthay inay ethay Isionvay ofay Stay. Ohnjay, itewhay obesray areay ivengay otay
ethay edeemedray, anday ethay our-and-twentyfay eldersay andstay othedclay inay itewhay
eforebay ethay eatgray itewhay onethray, anday ethay Olyhay Oneay atthay ittethsay erethay
itewhay ikelay oolway; etyay orfay allay esethay accumulateday associationsay, ithway
ateverwhay isay eetsway, anday onorablehay, anday ublimesay, erethay etyay urkslay anay
elusiveay omethingsay inay ethay innermostay ideaay ofay isthay uehay, ichwhay ikesstray oremay
ofay anicpay otay ethay oulsay anthay atthay ednessray ichwhay affrightsay inay oodblay.

Isthay elusiveay ualityqay itay isay, ichwhay ausescay ethay oughtthay ofay itenesswhay, enwhay
ivorcedday omfray oremay indlykay associationsay, anday oupledcay ithway anyay objectay
erribletay inay itselfay, otay eightenhay atthay errortay otay ethay urthestfay oundsbay.
Itnessway ethay itewhay earbay ofay ethay olespay, anday ethay itewhay arkshay ofay ethay
opicstray; atwhay utbay eirthay oothsmay, akyflay itenesswhay akesmay emthay ethay
anscendenttray orrorshay eythay areay? Atthay astlyghay itenesswhay itay isay ichwhay
impartsay uchsay anay abhorrentay ildnessmay, evenay oremay oathsomelay anthay errifictay,
otay ethay umbday oatingglay ofay eirthay aspectay. Osay atthay otnay ethay ierce-fangedfay
igertay inay ishay eraldichay oatcay ancay osay aggerstay ouragecay asay ethay ite-shroudedwhay
earbay oray ark.*shay

ith*Way eferenceray otay ethay Olarpay earbay, itay aymay ossiblypay ebay urgeday byay imhay owhay
ouldway ainfay ogay illstay eeperday intoay isthay attermay, atthay itay isay otnay ethay
itenesswhay, eparatelysay egardedray, ichwhay eightenshay ethay intolerableay
ideousnesshay ofay atthay utebray; orfay, analyseday, atthay eightenedhay ideousnesshay,
itay ightmay ebay aidsay, onlyay isesray omfray ethay ircumstancecay, atthay ethay
irresponsibleay erociousnessfay ofay ethay eaturecray andsstay investeday inay ethay
eeceflay ofay elestialcay innocenceay anday ovelay; anday encehay, byay ingingbray ogethertay
otway uchsay oppositeay emotionsay inay ouray indsmay, ethay Olarpay earbay ightensfray usay
ithway osay unnaturalay aay ontrastcay. Utbay evenay assumingay allay isthay otay ebay uetray;
etyay, ereway itay otnay orfay ethay itenesswhay, ouyay ouldway otnay avehay atthay intensifieday
errortay.

Asay orfay ethay itewhay arkshay, ethay itewhay idingglay ostlinessghay ofay eposeray inay atthay
eaturecray, enwhay eheldbay inay ishay ordinaryay oodsmay, angelystray alliestay ithway ethay
amesay ualityqay inay ethay Olarpay uadrupedqay. Isthay eculiaritypay isay ostmay ividlyvay
ithay byay ethay Enchfray inay ethay amenay eythay estowbay uponay atthay ishfay. Ethay Omishray
assmay orfay ethay eadday eginsbay ithway equiem“Ray eternam”ay eternal(ay est)ray, encewhay
equiem__Ray enominatingday ethay assmay itselfay, anday anyay otheray uneralfay usicmay.
Ownay, inay allusionay otay ethay itewhay, ilentsay illnessstay ofay eathday inay isthay arkshay,
anday ethay ildmay eadlinessday ofay ishay abitshay, ethay Enchfray allcay imhay equin__Ray.

Ethinkbay eethay ofay ethay albatrossay, encewhay omecay osethay oudsclay ofay iritualspay
ondermentway anday alepay eaddray, inay ichwhay atthay itewhay antomphay ailssay inay allay
imaginationsay? Otnay Oleridgecay irstfay ewthray atthay ellspay; utbay Od’sgay eatgray,
unflatteringay aureatelay, Ature.*nay

I*ay ememberray ethay irstfay albatrossay Iay everay awsay. Itay asway uringday aay olongedpray
alegay, inay atersway ardhay uponay ethay Antarcticay eassay. Omfray myay orenoonfay atchway
elowbay, Iay ascendeday otay ethay overcloudeday eckday; anday erethay, ashedday uponay ethay
ainmay atcheshay, Iay awsay aay egalray, eatheryfay ingthay ofay unspotteday itenesswhay, anday
ithway aay ookedhay, Omanray illbay ublimesay. Atay intervalsay, itay archeday orthfay itsay
astvay archangelay ingsway, asay ifay otay embraceay omesay olyhay arkay. Ondrousway
utteringsflay anday obbingsthray ookshay itay. Oughthay odilybay unharmeday, itay uttereday
iescray, asay omesay ing’skay ostghay inay upernaturalsay istressday. Oughthray itsay
inexpressibleay, angestray eyesay, ethoughtmay Iay eepedpay otay ecretssay ichwhay ooktay
oldhay ofay Odgay. Asay Abrahamay eforebay ethay angelsay, Iay owedbay elfmysay; ethay itewhay
ingthay asway osay itewhay, itsay ingsway osay ideway, anday inay osethay orfay everay exileday
atersway, Iay adhay ostlay ethay iserablemay arpingway emoriesmay ofay aditionstray anday ofay
ownstay. Onglay Iay azedgay atay atthay odigypray ofay umageplay. Iay annotcay elltay, ancay onlyay
inthay, ethay ingsthay atthay artedday oughthray emay enthay. Utbay atay astlay Iay awokeay; anday
urningtay, askeday aay ailorsay atwhay irdbay asway isthay. Aay oneygay, ehay epliedray. Oneygay!
evernay adhay eardhay atthay amenay eforebay; isay itay onceivablecay atthay isthay oriousglay
ingthay isay utterlyay unknownay otay enmay ashoreay! evernay! Utbay omesay imetay afteray, Iay
earnedlay atthay oneygay asway omesay eaman’ssay amenay orfay albatrossay. Osay atthay byay onay
ossibilitypay ouldcay Oleridge’scay ildway Erhymay avehay adhay aughtay otay oday ithway
osethay icalmystay impressionsay ichwhay ereway inemay, enwhay Iay awsay atthay irdbay uponay
ouray eckday. Orfay eithernay adhay Iay enthay eadray ethay Erhymay, ornay ewknay ethay irdbay otay
ebay anay albatrossay. Etyay, inay ayingsay isthay, Iay oday utbay indirectlyay urnishbay aay
ittlelay ighterbray ethay oblenay eritmay ofay ethay oempay anday ethay oetpay.

Iay assertay, enthay, atthay inay ethay ondrousway odilybay itenesswhay ofay ethay irdbay
ieflychay urkslay ethay ecretsay ofay ethay ellspay; aay uthtray ethay oremay evinceday inay
isthay, atthay byay aay olecismsay ofay ermstay erethay areay irdsbay alledcay eygray
albatrossesay; anday esethay Iay avehay equentlyfray eensay, utbay evernay ithway uchsay
emotionsay asay enwhay Iay eheldbay ethay Antarcticay owlfay.

Utbay owhay adhay ethay icmystay ingthay eenbay aughtcay? Isperwhay itay otnay, anday Iay illway
elltay; ithway aay eacheroustray ookhay anday inelay, asay ethay owlfay oatedflay onay ethay easay.
Atay astlay ethay Aptaincay ademay aay ostmanpay ofay itay; ingtyay aay etteredlay, eathernlay
allytay oundray itsay ecknay, ithway ethay ip’sshay imetay anday aceplay; anday enthay ettinglay
itay escapeay. Utbay Iay oubtday otnay, atthay eathernlay allytay, eantmay orfay anmay, asway
akentay offay inay Eavenhay, enwhay ethay itewhay owlfay ewflay otay oinjay ethay ing-foldingway,
ethay invokingay, anday adoringay erubimchay!

Ostmay amousfay inay ouray Esternway annalsay anday Indianay aditionstray isay atthay ofay ethay
Itewhay Eedstay ofay ethay Airiespray; aay agnificentmay ilk-whitemay argerchay,
arge-eyedlay, all-headedsmay, uff-chestedblay, anday ithway ethay ignityday ofay aay
ousandthay onarchsmay inay ishay oftylay, overscorningay arriagecay. Ehay asway ethay
electeday Erxesxay ofay astvay erdshay ofay ildway orseshay, osewhay asturespay inay osethay
aysday ereway onlyay encedfay byay ethay Ockyray Ountainsmay anday ethay Alleghaniesay. Atay
eirthay amingflay eadhay ehay estwardway oopedtray itay ikelay atthay osenchay arstay ichwhay
everyay eveningay eadslay onay ethay ostshay ofay ightlay. Ethay ashingflay ascadecay ofay ishay
anemay, ethay urvingcay ometcay ofay ishay ailtay, investeday imhay ithway ousingshay oremay
esplendentray anthay oldgay anday ilver-beaterssay ouldcay avehay urnishedfay imhay. Aay
ostmay imperialay anday archangelicalay apparitionay ofay atthay unfallenay, esternway
orldway, ichwhay otay ethay eyesay ofay ethay olday apperstray anday untershay evivedray ethay
oriesglay ofay osethay imevalpray imestay enwhay Adamay alkedway ajesticmay asay aay odgay,
uff-browedblay anday earlessfay asay isthay ightymay eedstay. Etherwhay archingmay amiday
ishay aidesay anday arshalsmay inay ethay anvay ofay ountlesscay ohortscay atthay endlesslyay
eamedstray itay overay ethay ainsplay, ikelay anay Ohioay; oray etherwhay ithway ishay
ircumambientcay ubjectssay owsingbray allay arounday atay ethay orizonhay, ethay Itewhay
Eedstay allopinglygay eviewedray emthay ithway armway ostrilsnay eddeningray oughthray
ishay oolcay ilkinessmay; inay ateverwhay aspectay ehay esentedpray imselfhay, alwaysay otay
ethay avestbray Indiansay ehay asway ethay objectay ofay emblingtray everenceray anday aweay.
Ornay ancay itay ebay uestionedqay omfray atwhay andsstay onay egendarylay ecordray ofay isthay
oblenay orsehay, atthay itay asway ishay iritualspay itenesswhay ieflychay, ichwhay osay
othedclay imhay ithway ivinenessday; anday atthay isthay ivinenessday adhay atthay inay itay
ichwhay, oughthay ommandingcay orshipway, atay ethay amesay imetay enforceday aay ertaincay
amelessnay errortay.

Utbay erethay areay otheray instancesay erewhay isthay itenesswhay oseslay allay atthay
accessoryay anday angestray oryglay ichwhay investsay itay inay ethay Itewhay Eedstay anday
Albatrossay.

Atwhay isay itay atthay inay ethay Albinoay anmay osay eculiarlypay epelsray anday oftenay ocksshay
ethay eyeay, asay atthay ometimessay ehay isay oathedlay byay ishay ownay ithkay anday inkay! Itay isay
atthay itenesswhay ichwhay investsay imhay, aay ingthay expresseday byay ethay amenay ehay
earsbay. Ethay Albinoay isay asay ellway ademay asay otheray en—hasmay onay ubstantivesay
eformity—andday etyay isthay eremay aspectay ofay all-pervadingay itenesswhay akesmay imhay
oremay angelystray ideoushay anthay ethay ugliestay abortionay. Whyay ouldshay isthay ebay
osay?

Ornay, inay uiteqay otheray aspectsay, oesday Aturenay inay erhay eastlay alpablepay utbay otnay
ethay esslay aliciousmay agenciesay, ailfay otay enlistay amongay erhay orcesfay isthay
owningcray attributeay ofay ethay erribletay. Omfray itsay owysnay aspectay, ethay
auntletedgay ostghay ofay ethay Outhernsay Eassay ashay eenbay enominatedday ethay Itewhay
Uallsqay. Ornay, inay omesay istorichay instancesay, ashay ethay artay ofay umanhay alicemay
omitteday osay otentpay anay auxiliaryay. Owhay ildlyway itay eightenshay ethay effectay ofay
atthay assagepay inay Oissartfray, enwhay, askedmay inay ethay owysnay olsymbay ofay eirthay
actionfay, ethay esperateday Itewhay Oodshay ofay Entghay urdermay eirthay ailiffbay inay ethay
arket-placemay!

Ornay, inay omesay ingsthay, oesday ethay ommoncay, ereditaryhay experienceay ofay allay
ankindmay ailfay otay earbay itnessway otay ethay upernaturalismsay ofay isthay uehay. Itay
annotcay ellway ebay oubtedday, atthay ethay oneay isiblevay ualityqay inay ethay aspectay ofay
ethay eadday ichwhay ostmay appalsay ethay azergay, isay ethay arblemay allorpay ingeringlay
erethay; asay ifay indeeday atthay allorpay ereway asay uchmay ikelay ethay adgebay ofay
onsternationcay inay ethay otheray orldway, asay ofay ortalmay epidationtray erehay. Anday
omfray atthay allorpay ofay ethay eadday, eway orrowbay ethay expressiveay uehay ofay ethay
oudshray inay ichwhay eway apwray emthay. Ornay evenay inay ouray uperstitionssay oday eway ailfay
otay owthray ethay amesay owysnay antlemay oundray ouray antomsphay; allay ostsghay isingray inay
aay ilk-whitemay og—Yeafay, ilewhay esethay errorstay eizesay usay, etlay usay adday, atthay
evenay ethay ingkay ofay errorstay, enwhay ersonifiedpay byay ethay evangelistay, idesray onay
ishay allidpay orsehay.

Ereforethay, inay ishay otheray oodsmay, olizesymbay ateverwhay andgray oray aciousgray
ingthay ehay illway byay itenesswhay, onay anmay ancay enyday atthay inay itsay ofoundestpray
idealizeday ignificancesay itay allscay upay aay eculiarpay apparitionay otay ethay oulsay.

Utbay oughthay ithoutway issentday isthay ointpay ebay ixedfay, owhay isay ortalmay anmay otay
accountay orfay itay? Otay analyseay itay, ouldway eemsay impossibleay. Ancay eway, enthay, byay
ethay itationcay ofay omesay ofay osethay instancesay ereinwhay isthay ingthay ofay
iteness—thoughwhay orfay ethay imetay eitheray ollywhay oray inay eatgray artpay ippedstray
ofay allay irectday associationsay alculatedcay otay impartay otay itay aughtay earfulfay,
utbay everthelessnay, isay oundfay otay exertay overay usay ethay amesay orcerysay, oweverhay
odified;—canmay eway usthay opehay otay ightlay uponay omesay ancechay ueclay otay onductcay usay
otay ethay iddenhay ausecay eway eeksay?

Etlay usay tryay. Utbay inay aay attermay ikelay isthay, ubtletysay appealsay otay ubtletysay,
anday ithoutway imaginationay onay anmay ancay ollowfay anotheray intoay esethay allshay. Anday
oughthay, oubtlessday, omesay atay eastlay ofay ethay imaginativeay impressionsay aboutay
otay ebay esentedpray aymay avehay eenbay aredshay byay ostmay enmay, etyay ewfay erhapspay ereway
entirelyay onsciouscay ofay emthay atay ethay imetay, anday ereforethay aymay otnay ebay ableay
otay ecallray emthay ownay.

Whyay otay ethay anmay ofay untutoreday idealityay, owhay appenshay otay ebay utbay ooselylay
acquainteday ithway ethay eculiarpay aracterchay ofay ethay ayday, oesday ethay arebay
entionmay ofay Itsuntidewhay arshalmay inay ethay ancyfay uchsay onglay, earydray,
eechlessspay ocessionspray ofay ow-pacingslay ilgrimspay, own-castday anday oodedhay
ithway ew-fallennay owsnay? Oray, otay ethay unreaday, unsophisticateday Otestantpray ofay
ethay Iddlemay Americanay Atesstay, whyay oesday ethay assingpay entionmay ofay aay Itewhay
Iarfray oray aay Itewhay Unnay, evokeay uchsay anay eyelessay atuestay inay ethay oulsay?

Oray atwhay isay erethay apartay omfray ethay aditionstray ofay ungeonedday arriorsway anday
ingskay ich(whay illway otnay ollywhay accountay orfay itay) atthay akesmay ethay Itewhay Owertay
ofay Ondonlay elltay osay uchmay oremay onglystray onay ethay imaginationay ofay anay
untravelleday Americanay, anthay osethay otheray oriedstay ucturesstray, itsay
eighbors—thenay Ardbyway Owertay, oray evenay ethay Oodyblay? Anday osethay ublimersay
owerstay, ethay Itewhay Ountainsmay ofay Ewnay Ampshirehay, encewhay, inay eculiarpay
oodsmay, omescay atthay iganticgay ostlinessghay overay ethay oulsay atay ethay arebay
entionmay ofay atthay amenay, ilewhay ethay oughtthay ofay Irginia’svay Ueblay Idgeray isay
ullfay ofay aay oftsay, ewyday, istantday eaminessdray? Oray whyay, irrespectiveay ofay allay
atitudeslay anday ongitudeslay, oesday ethay amenay ofay ethay Itewhay Easay exertay uchsay aay
ectralnessspay overay ethay ancyfay, ilewhay atthay ofay ethay Ellowyay Easay ullslay usay ithway
ortalmay oughtsthay ofay onglay acqueredlay ildmay afternoonsay onay ethay avesway,
ollowedfay byay ethay audiestgay anday etyay eepiestslay ofay unsetssay? Oray, otay oosechay aay
ollywhay unsubstantialay instanceay, urelypay addresseday otay ethay ancyfay, whyay, inay
eadingray ethay olday airyfay alestay ofay Entralcay Europeay, oesday e“thay alltay alepay an”may
ofay ethay Artzhay orestsfay, osewhay angelesschay allorpay unrustlinglyay idesglay
oughthray ethay eengray ofay ethay oves—whygray isay isthay antomphay oremay erribletay anthay
allay ethay oopingwhay impsay ofay ethay Ocksburgblay?

Ornay isay itay, altogetheray, ethay emembranceray ofay erhay athedral-topplingcay
earthquakesay; ornay ethay ampedoesstay ofay erhay anticfray eassay; ornay ethay
earlessnesstay ofay ariday iesskay atthay evernay ainray; ornay ethay ightsay ofay erhay ideway
ieldfay ofay eaninglay iresspay, enchedwray ope-stonescay, anday ossescray allay adroopay
ike(lay antedcay ardsyay ofay anchoreday eets)flay; anday erhay uburbansay avenuesay ofay
ouse-wallshay inglyay overay uponay eachay otheray, asay aay ossedtay ackpay ofay ards;—itcay
isay otnay esethay ingsthay aloneay ichwhay akemay earlesstay Imalay, ethay angeststray,
addestsay itycay outhay an’stcay eesay. Orfay Imalay ashay akentay ethay itewhay eilvay; anday
erethay isay aay igherhay orrorhay inay isthay itenesswhay ofay erhay oeway. Olday asay Izarropay,
