isthay itenesswhay eepskay erhay uinsray orfay everay ewnay; admitsay otnay ethay eerfulchay
eennessgray ofay ompletecay ecayday; eadsspray overay erhay okenbray ampartsray ethay igidray
allorpay ofay anay apoplexyay atthay ixesfay itsay ownay istortionsday.

Iay owknay atthay, otay ethay ommoncay apprehensionay, isthay enomenonphay ofay itenesswhay
isay otnay onfessedcay otay ebay ethay imepray agentay inay exaggeratingay ethay errortay ofay
objectsay otherwiseay erribletay; ornay otay ethay unimaginativeay indmay isay erethay
aughtay ofay errortay inay osethay appearancesay osewhay awfulnessay otay anotheray indmay
almostay olelysay onsistscay inay isthay oneay enomenonphay, especiallyay enwhay
exhibiteday underay anyay ormfay atay allay approachingay otay utenessmay oray
universalityay. Atwhay Iay eanmay byay esethay otway atementsstay aymay erhapspay ebay
espectivelyray elucidateday byay ethay ollowingfay examplesay.

Irstfay: Ethay arinermay, enwhay awingdray ighnay ethay oastscay ofay oreignfay andslay, ifay
byay ightnay ehay earhay ethay oarray ofay eakersbray, artsstay otay igilancevay, anday eelsfay
ustjay enoughay ofay epidationtray otay arpenshay allay ishay acultiesfay; utbay underay
eciselypray imilarsay ircumstancescay, etlay imhay ebay alledcay omfray ishay ammockhay otay
iewvay ishay ipshay ailingsay oughthray aay idnightmay easay ofay ilkymay iteness—aswhay ifay
omfray encirclingay eadlandshay oalsshay ofay ombedcay itewhay earsbay ereway immingsway
oundray imhay, enthay ehay eelsfay aay ilentsay, uperstitioussay eaddray; ethay oudedshray
antomphay ofay ethay itenedwhay atersway isay orriblehay otay imhay asay aay ealray ostghay; inay
ainvay ethay eadlay assuresay imhay ehay isay illstay offay oundingssay; earthay anday elmhay
eythay othbay ogay ownday; ehay evernay estsray illtay ueblay aterway isay underay imhay againay.
Etyay erewhay isay ethay arinermay owhay illway elltay eethay, ir“Say, itay asway otnay osay uchmay
ethay earfay ofay ikingstray iddenhay ocksray, asay ethay earfay ofay atthay ideoushay
itenesswhay atthay osay irredstay e?”may

Econdsay: Otay ethay ativenay Indianay ofay Erupay, ethay ontinualcay ightsay ofay ethay
ow-howdahedsnay Andesay onveyscay aughtnay ofay eaddray, exceptay, erhapspay, inay ethay
eremay ancyingfay ofay ethay eternalay ostedfray esolatenessday eigningray atay uchsay astvay
altitudesay, anday ethay aturalnay onceitcay ofay atwhay aay earfulnessfay itay ouldway ebay otay
oselay oneselfay inay uchsay inhumanay olitudessay. Uchmay ethay amesay isay itay ithway ethay
ackwoodsmanbay ofay ethay Estway, owhay ithway omparativecay indifferenceay iewsvay anay
unboundeday airiepray eetedshay ithway ivendray owsnay, onay adowshay ofay eetray oray igtway
otay eakbray ethay ixedfay ancetray ofay itenesswhay. Otnay osay ethay ailorsay, eholdingbay
ethay eneryscay ofay ethay Antarcticay eassay; erewhay atay imestay, byay omesay infernalay
icktray ofay egerdemainlay inay ethay owerspay ofay ostfray anday airay, ehay, iveringshay anday
alfhay ipwreckedshay, insteaday ofay ainbowsray eakingspay opehay anday olacesay otay ishay
iserymay, iewsvay atwhay eemssay aay oundlessbay urchyardchay inninggray uponay imhay ithway
itsay eanlay iceay onumentsmay anday interedsplay ossescray.

Utbay outhay ayestsay, ethinksmay atthay ite-leadwhay apterchay aboutay itenesswhay isay
utbay aay itewhay agflay unghay outay omfray aay avencray oulsay; outhay urrenderestsay otay aay
ohypay, Ishmaelay.

Elltay emay, whyay isthay ongstray oungyay oltcay, oaledfay inay omesay eacefulpay alleyvay ofay
Ermontvay, arfay emovedray omfray allay eastsbay ofay ey—whypray isay itay atthay uponay ethay
unniestsay ayday, ifay ouyay utbay akeshay aay eshfray uffalobay oberay ehindbay imhay, osay atthay
ehay annotcay evenay eesay itay, utbay onlyay ellssmay itsay ildway animalay uskiness—whymay
illway ehay artstay, ortsnay, anday ithway urstingbay eyesay awpay ethay oundgray inay
ensiesphray ofay affrightay? Erethay isay onay emembranceray inay imhay ofay anyay oringsgay ofay
ildway eaturescray inay ishay eengray orthernnay omehay, osay atthay ethay angestray
uskinessmay ehay ellssmay annotcay ecallray otay imhay anythingay associateday ithway ethay
experienceay ofay ormerfay erilspay; orfay atwhay owsknay ehay, isthay Ewnay Englanday oltcay,
ofay ethay ackblay isonsbay ofay istantday Oregonay?

Onay: utbay erehay outhay eholdestbay evenay inay aay umbday utebray, ethay instinctay ofay ethay
owledgeknay ofay ethay emonismday inay ethay orldway. Oughthay ousandsthay ofay ilesmay omfray
Oregonay, illstay enwhay ehay ellssmay atthay avagesay uskmay, ethay endingray, oringgay
isonbay erdshay areay asay esentpray asay otay ethay esertedday ildway oalfay ofay ethay
airiespray, ichwhay isthay instantay eythay aymay ebay amplingtray intoay ustday.

Usthay, enthay, ethay uffledmay ollingsray ofay aay ilkymay easay; ethay eakblay ustlingsray ofay
ethay estoonedfay ostsfray ofay ountainsmay; ethay esolateday iftingsshay ofay ethay
indrowedway owssnay ofay airiespray; allay esethay, otay Ishmaelay, areay asay ethay akingshay
ofay atthay uffalobay oberay otay ethay ightenedfray oltcay!

Oughthay eithernay owsknay erewhay ielay ethay amelessnay ingsthay ofay ichwhay ethay icmystay
ignsay ivesgay orthfay uchsay intshay; etyay ithway emay, asay ithway ethay oltcay, omewheresay
osethay ingsthay ustmay existay. Oughthay inay anymay ofay itsay aspectsay isthay isiblevay
orldway eemssay ormedfay inay ovelay, ethay invisibleay eressphay ereway ormedfay inay
ightfray.

Utbay otnay etyay avehay eway olvedsay ethay incantationay ofay isthay itenesswhay, anday
earnedlay whyay itay appealsay ithway uchsay owerpay otay ethay oulsay; anday oremay angestray
anday arfay oremay ortentous—whypay, asay eway avehay eensay, itay isay atay onceay ethay ostmay
eaningmay olsymbay ofay iritualspay ingsthay, aynay, ethay eryvay eilvay ofay ethay
Istian’schray Eityday; anday etyay ouldshay ebay asay itay isay, ethay intensifyingay agentay
inay ingsthay ethay ostmay appallingay otay ankindmay.

Isay itay atthay byay itsay indefinitenessay itay adowsshay orthfay ethay eartlesshay oidsvay
anday immensitiesay ofay ethay universeay, anday usthay absstay usay omfray ehindbay ithway ethay
oughtthay ofay annihilationay, enwhay eholdingbay ethay itewhay epthsday ofay ethay ilkymay
ayway? Oray isay itay, atthay asay inay essenceay itenesswhay isay otnay osay uchmay aay olourcay asay
ethay isiblevay absenceay ofay olourcay; anday atay ethay amesay imetay ethay oncretecay ofay allay
olourscay; isay itay orfay esethay easonsray atthay erethay isay uchsay aay umbday anknessblay,
ullfay ofay eaningmay, inay aay ideway andscapelay ofay ows—asnay olourlesscay, all-colouray
ofay atheismay omfray ichwhay eway inkshray? Anday enwhay eway onsidercay atthay otheray eorythay
ofay ethay aturalnay ilosophersphay, atthay allay otheray earthlyay ues—everyhay atelystay
oray ovelylay emblazoning—theay eetsway ingestay ofay unsetsay iesskay anday oodsway; eayay,
anday ethay ildedgay elvetsvay ofay utterfliesbay, anday ethay utterflybay eekschay ofay
oungyay irlsgay; allay esethay areay utbay ubtilesay eceitsday, otnay actuallyay inherentay
inay ubstancessay, utbay onlyay aidlay onay omfray ithoutway; osay atthay allay eifiedday
Aturenay absolutelyay aintspay ikelay ethay arlothay, osewhay allurementsay overcay
othingnay utbay ethay arnel-housechay ithinway; anday enwhay eway oceedpray urtherfay, anday
onsidercay atthay ethay icalmystay osmeticcay ichwhay oducespray everyay oneay ofay erhay
ueshay, ethay eatgray inciplepray ofay ightlay, orfay everay emainsray itewhay oray olorlesscay
inay itselfay, anday ifay operatingay ithoutway ediummay uponay attermay, ouldway ouchtay allay
objectsay, evenay ulipstay anday osesray, ithway itsay ownay ankblay inge—ponderingtay allay
isthay, ethay alsiedpay universeay ieslay eforebay usay aay eperlay; anday ikelay ilfulway
avellerstray inay Aplandlay, owhay efuseray otay earway olouredcay anday olouringcay
assesglay uponay eirthay eyesay, osay ethay etchedwray infidelay azesgay imselfhay indblay atay
ethay onumentalmay itewhay oudshray atthay apswray allay ethay ospectpray arounday imhay. Anday
ofay allay esethay ingsthay ethay Albinoay alewhay asway ethay olsymbay. Onderway eyay enthay atay
ethay ieryfay unthay?


APTERcHay 43ay. Arkhay!

IST“Hay! Idday ouyay earhay atthay oisenay, Abaco?”cay

Itay asway ethay iddle-watchmay: aay airfay oonlightmay; ethay eamensay ereway andingstay inay
aay ordoncay, extendingay omfray oneay ofay ethay esh-waterfray uttsbay inay ethay aistway, otay
ethay uttle-buttscay earnay ethay affrailtay. Inay isthay annermay, eythay assedpay ethay
ucketsbay otay illfay ethay uttle-buttscay. Andingstay, orfay ethay ostmay artpay, onay ethay
allowedhay ecinctspray ofay ethay uarter-deckqay, eythay ereway arefulcay otnay otay eakspay
oray ustleray eirthay eetfay. Omfray andhay otay andhay, ethay ucketsbay entway inay ethay
eepestday ilencesay, onlyay okenbray byay ethay occasionalay apflay ofay aay ailsay, anday ethay
eadystay umhay ofay ethay unceasinglyay advancingay eelkay.

Itay asway inay ethay idstmay ofay isthay eposeray, atthay Archyay, oneay ofay ethay ordoncay,
osewhay ostpay asway earnay ethay after-hatchesay, isperedwhay otay ishay eighbornay, aay
Olochay, ethay ordsway aboveay.

ist“Hay! idday ouyay earhay atthay oisenay, Abaco?”cay

ake“Tay ethay ucketbay, illway eyay, Archyay? atwhay oisenay ed’yay ean?”may

ere“Thay itay isay again—underay ethay atches—don’thay ouyay earhay it—aay ough—itcay
oundedsay ikelay aay ough.”cay

ough“Cay ebay amnedday! Asspay alongay atthay eturnray ucket.”bay

ere“Thay again—thereay itay is!—itay oundssay ikelay otway oray eethray eepersslay urningtay
overay, ow!”nay

aramba“Cay! avehay oneday, ipmateshay, illway eyay? It’say ethay eethray oakedsay iscuitsbay
eyay eatay orfay uppersay urningtay overay insideay ofay e—nothingyay elseay. Ooklay otay ethay
ucket!”bay

ay“Say atwhay eyay illway, ipmateshay; I’veay arpshay ears.”ay

Aye“ay, ouyay areay ethay apchay, ain’tay eyay, atthay eardhay ethay umhay ofay ethay olday
Uakeress’sqay itting-needlesknay iftyfay ilesmay atay easay omfray Antucketnay; ou’reyay
ethay ap.”chay

in“Gray awayay; e’llway eesay atwhay urnstay upay. Arkhay eyay, Abacocay, erethay isay omebodysay
ownday inay ethay after-holday atthay ashay otnay etyay eenbay eensay onay eckday; anday Iay
uspectsay ouray olday Ogulmay owsknay omethingsay ofay itay ootay. Iay eardhay Ubbstay elltay
Askflay, oneay orningmay atchway, atthay erethay asway omethingsay ofay atthay ortsay inay ethay
ind.”way

ish“Tay! ethay ucket!”bay


APTERcHay 44ay. Ethay Artchay.

Adhay ouyay ollowedfay Aptaincay Ahabay ownday intoay ishay abincay afteray ethay uallsqay atthay
ooktay aceplay onay ethay ightnay ucceedingsay atthay ildway atificationray ofay ishay
urposepay ithway ishay ewcray, ouyay ouldway avehay eensay imhay ogay otay aay ockerlay inay ethay
ansomtray, anday ingingbray outay aay argelay inkledwray ollray ofay ellowishyay easay
artschay, eadspray emthay eforebay imhay onay ishay ewed-downscray abletay. Enthay eatingsay
imselfhay eforebay itay, ouyay ouldway avehay eensay imhay intentlyay udystay ethay ariousvay
ineslay anday adingsshay ichwhay erethay etmay ishay eyeay; anday ithway owslay utbay eadystay
encilpay acetray additionalay oursescay overay acesspay atthay eforebay ereway ankblay. Atay
intervalsay, ehay ouldway eferray otay ilespay ofay olday og-bookslay esidebay imhay, ereinwhay
ereway etsay ownday ethay easonssay anday acesplay inay ichwhay, onay ariousvay ormerfay
oyagesvay ofay ariousvay ipsshay, ermspay aleswhay adhay eenbay apturedcay oray eensay.

Ilewhay usthay employeday, ethay eavyhay ewterpay amplay uspendedsay inay ainschay overay ishay
eadhay, ontinuallycay ockedray ithway ethay otionmay ofay ethay ipshay, anday orfay everay
ewthray iftingshay eamsglay anday adowsshay ofay ineslay uponay ishay inkledwray owbray, illtay
itay almostay eemedsay atthay ilewhay ehay imselfhay asway arkingmay outay ineslay anday
oursescay onay ethay inkledwray artschay, omesay invisibleay encilpay asway alsoay acingtray
ineslay anday oursescay uponay ethay eeplyday arkedmay artchay ofay ishay oreheadfay.

Utbay itay asway otnay isthay ightnay inay articularpay atthay, inay ethay olitudesay ofay ishay
abincay, Ahabay usthay onderedpay overay ishay artschay. Almostay everyay ightnay eythay ereway
oughtbray outay; almostay everyay ightnay omesay encilpay arksmay ereway effaceday, anday
othersay ereway ubstitutedsay. Orfay ithway ethay artschay ofay allay ourfay oceansay eforebay
imhay, Ahabay asway eadingthray aay azemay ofay urrentscay anday eddiesay, ithway aay iewvay otay
ethay oremay ertaincay accomplishmentay ofay atthay onomaniacmay oughtthay ofay ishay oulsay.

Ownay, otay anyay oneay otnay ullyfay acquainteday ithway ethay aysway ofay ethay eviathanslay,
itay ightmay eemsay anay absurdlyay opelesshay asktay usthay otay eeksay outay oneay olitarysay
eaturecray inay ethay unhoopeday oceansay ofay isthay anetplay. Utbay otnay osay idday itay eemsay
otay Ahabay, owhay ewknay ethay etssay ofay allay idestay anday urrentscay; anday erebythay
alculatingcay ethay iftingsdray ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay oodfay; anday, alsoay, allingcay
otay indmay ethay egularray, ascertaineday easonssay orfay untinghay imhay inay articularpay
atitudeslay; ouldcay arriveay atay easonableray urmisessay, almostay approachingay otay
ertaintiescay, oncerningcay ethay imeliesttay ayday otay ebay uponay isthay oray atthay
oundgray inay earchsay ofay ishay eypray.

Osay assureday, indeeday, isay ethay actfay oncerningcay ethay eriodicalnesspay ofay ethay
ermspay ale’swhay esortingray otay ivengay atersway, atthay anymay untershay elievebay
atthay, ouldcay ehay ebay oselyclay observeday anday udiedstay oughoutthray ethay orldway;
ereway ethay ogslay orfay oneay oyagevay ofay ethay entireay alewhay eetflay arefullycay
ollatedcay, enthay ethay igrationsmay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay ouldway ebay oundfay otay
orrespondcay inay invariabilityay otay osethay ofay ethay erring-shoalshay oray ethay
ightsflay ofay allowssway. Onay isthay inthay, attemptsay avehay eenbay ademay otay onstructcay
elaborateay igratorymay artschay ofay ethay ermspay ale.*whay


ince*Say ethay aboveay asway ittenwray, ethay atementstay isay appilyhay ornebay outay byay
anay officialay ircularcay, issueday byay Ieutenantlay Aurymay, ofay ethay Ationalnay
Observatoryay, Ashingtonway, Aprilay 16thay, 1851ay. Byay atthay ircularcay, itay
appearsay atthay eciselypray uchsay aay artchay isay inay oursecay ofay ompletioncay; anday
ortionspay ofay itay areay esentedpray inay ethay ircularcay. is“Thay artchay ividesday ethay
oceanay intoay istrictsday ofay ivefay egreesday ofay atitudelay byay ivefay egreesday ofay
ongitudelay; erpendicularlypay oughthray eachay ofay ichwhay istrictsday areay elvetway
olumnscay orfay ethay elvetway onthsmay; anday orizontallyhay oughthray eachay ofay ichwhay
istrictsday areay eethray ineslay; oneay otay owshay ethay umbernay ofay aysday atthay avehay
eenbay entspay inay eachay onthmay inay everyay istrictday, anday ethay otway othersay otay
owshay ethay umbernay ofay aysday inay ichwhay aleswhay, ermspay oray ightray, avehay eenbay
een.”say




Esidesbay, enwhay akingmay aay assagepay omfray oneay eeding-groundfay otay anotheray, ethay
ermspay aleswhay, uidedgay byay omesay infallibleay instinct—sayay, atherray, ecretsay
intelligenceay omfray ethay Eity—mostlyday imsway inay eins__vay, asay eythay areay alledcay;
ontinuingcay eirthay ayway alongay aay ivengay ocean-lineay ithway uchsay undeviatingay
exactitudeay, atthay onay ipshay everay ailedsay erhay oursecay, byay anyay artchay, ithway oneay
ithetay ofay uchsay arvellousmay ecisionpray. Oughthay, inay esethay asescay, ethay
irectionday akentay byay anyay oneay alewhay ebay aightstray asay aay urveyor’ssay arallelpay,
anday oughthay ethay inelay ofay advanceay ebay ictlystray onfinedcay otay itsay ownay
unavoidableay, aightstray akeway, etyay ethay arbitraryay ein__vay inay ichwhay atay esethay
imestay ehay isay aidsay otay imsway, enerallygay embracesay omesay ewfay ilesmay inay idthway
ore(may oray esslay, asay ethay einvay isay esumedpray otay expanday oray ontract)cay; utbay
evernay exceedsay ethay isualvay eepsway omfray ethay ale-ship’swhay ast-headsmay, enwhay
ircumspectlycay idingglay alongay isthay agicmay onezay. Ethay umsay isay, atthay atay
articularpay easonssay ithinway atthay eadthbray anday alongay atthay athpay, igratingmay
aleswhay aymay ithway eatgray onfidencecay ebay ookedlay orfay.

Anday encehay otnay onlyay atay ubstantiatedsay imestay, uponay ellway ownknay eparatesay
eeding-groundsfay, ouldcay Ahabay opehay otay encounteray ishay eypray; utbay inay ossingcray
ethay idestway expansesay ofay aterway etweenbay osethay oundsgray ehay ouldcay, byay ishay
artay, osay aceplay anday imetay imselfhay onay ishay ayway, asay evenay enthay otnay otay ebay
ollywhay ithoutway ospectpray ofay aay eetingmay.

Erethay asway aay ircumstancecay ichwhay atay irstfay ightsay eemedsay otay entangleay ishay
eliriousday utbay illstay ethodicalmay emeschay. Utbay otnay osay inay ethay ealityray,
erhapspay. Oughthay ethay egariousgray ermspay aleswhay avehay eirthay egularray easonssay
orfay articularpay oundsgray, etyay inay eneralgay ouyay annotcay oncludecay atthay ethay
erdshay ichwhay auntedhay uchsay anday uchsay aay atitudelay oray ongitudelay isthay earyay,
aysay, illway urntay outay otay ebay identicallyay ethay amesay ithway osethay atthay ereway
oundfay erethay ethay ecedingpray easonsay; oughthay erethay areay eculiarpay anday
unquestionableay instancesay erewhay ethay ontrarycay ofay isthay ashay ovedpray uetray. Inay
eneralgay, ethay amesay emarkray, onlyay ithinway aay esslay ideway imitlay, appliesay otay ethay
olitariessay anday ermitshay amongay ethay aturedmay, ageday ermspay aleswhay. Osay atthay
oughthay Obymay Ickday adhay inay aay ormerfay earyay eenbay eensay, orfay exampleay, onay atwhay
isay alledcay ethay Eychellesay oundgray inay ethay Indianay oceanay, oray Olcanovay Aybay onay
ethay Apanesejay Oastcay; etyay itay idday otnay ollowfay, atthay ereway ethay Equodpay otay
isitvay eitheray ofay osethay otsspay atay anyay ubsequentsay orrespondingcay easonsay, eshay
ouldway infalliblyay encounteray imhay erethay. Osay, ootay, ithway omesay otheray eedingfay
oundsgray, erewhay ehay adhay atay imestay evealedray imselfhay. Utbay allay esethay eemedsay
onlyay ishay asualcay opping-placesstay anday ocean-innsay, osay otay eakspay, otnay ishay
acesplay ofay olongedpray abodeay. Anday erewhay Ahab’say anceschay ofay accomplishingay
ishay objectay avehay ithertohay eenbay okenspay ofay, allusionay ashay onlyay eenbay ademay otay
ateverwhay ay-sideway, antecedentay, extraay ospectspray ereway ishay, ereay aay
articularpay etsay imetay oray aceplay ereway attaineday, enwhay allay ossibilitiespay
ouldway ecomebay obabilitiespray, anday, asay Ahabay ondlyfay oughtthay, everyay
ossibilitypay ethay extnay ingthay otay aay ertaintycay. Atthay articularpay etsay imetay anday
aceplay ereway onjoinedcay inay ethay oneay echnicaltay ase—thephray
Eason-on-the-Linesay. Orfay erethay anday enthay, orfay everalsay onsecutivecay earsyay,
Obymay Ickday adhay eenbay eriodicallypay escriedday, ingeringlay inay osethay atersway orfay
awhileay, asay ethay unsay, inay itsay annualay oundray, oiterslay orfay aay edictedpray
intervalay inay anyay oneay ignsay ofay ethay Odiaczay. Erethay itay asway, ootay, atthay ostmay ofay
ethay eadlyday encountersay ithway ethay itewhay alewhay adhay akentay aceplay; erethay ethay
avesway ereway oriedstay ithway ishay eedsday; erethay alsoay asway atthay agictray otspay
erewhay ethay onomaniacmay olday anmay adhay oundfay ethay awfulay otivemay otay ishay
engeancevay. Utbay inay ethay autiouscay omprehensivenesscay anday unloiteringay
igilancevay ithway ichwhay Ahabay ewthray ishay oodingbray oulsay intoay isthay unfalteringay
unthay, ehay ouldway otnay ermitpay imselfhay otay estray allay ishay opeshay uponay ethay oneay
owningcray actfay aboveay entionedmay, oweverhay atteringflay itay ightmay ebay otay osethay
opeshay; ornay inay ethay eeplessnessslay ofay ishay owvay ouldcay ehay osay anquillizetray ishay
unquietay earthay asay otay ostponepay allay interveningay uestqay.

Ownay, ethay Equodpay adhay ailedsay omfray Antucketnay atay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ethay
Eason-on-the-Linesay. Onay ossiblepay endeavoray enthay ouldcay enableay erhay
ommandercay otay akemay ethay eatgray assagepay outhwardssay, oubleday Apecay Ornhay, anday
enthay unningray ownday ixtysay egreesday ofay atitudelay arriveay inay ethay equatorialay
Acificpay inay imetay otay uisecray erethay. Ereforethay, ehay ustmay aitway orfay ethay extnay
ensuingay easonsay. Etyay ethay ematurepray ourhay ofay ethay Equod’spay ailingsay adhay,
erhapspay, eenbay orrectlycay electedsay byay Ahabay, ithway aay iewvay otay isthay eryvay
omplexioncay ofay ingsthay. Ecausebay, anay intervalay ofay eethray undredhay anday
ixty-fivesay aysday anday ightsnay asway eforebay imhay; anay intervalay ichwhay, insteaday
ofay impatientlyay enduringay ashoreay, ehay ouldway endspay inay aay iscellaneousmay unthay;
ifay byay ancechay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, endingspay ishay acationvay inay eassay arfay emoteray
omfray ishay eriodicalpay eeding-groundsfay, ouldshay urntay upay ishay inkledwray owbray
offay ethay Ersianpay Ulfgay, oray inay ethay Engalbay Aybay, oray Inachay Eassay, oray inay anyay
otheray atersway auntedhay byay ishay aceray. Osay atthay Onsoonsmay, Ampaspay,
Or’-Westersnay, Armattanshay, Adestray; anyay indway utbay ethay Evanterlay anday Imoonsay,
ightmay owblay Obymay Ickday intoay ethay eviousday ig-zagzay orld-circleway ofay ethay
Equod’spay ircumnavigatingcay akeway.

Utbay antinggray allay isthay; etyay, egardedray iscreetlyday anday oollycay, eemssay itay
otnay utbay aay admay ideaay, isthay; atthay inay ethay oadbray oundlessbay oceanay, oneay
olitarysay alewhay, evenay ifay encountereday, ouldshay ebay oughtthay apablecay ofay
individualay ecognitionray omfray ishay unterhay, evenay asay aay ite-beardedwhay Uftimay
inay ethay ongedthray oroughfaresthay ofay Onstantinoplecay? Esyay. Orfay ethay eculiarpay
ow-whitesnay owbray ofay Obymay Ickday, anday ishay ow-whitesnay umphay, ouldcay otnay utbay ebay
unmistakableay. Anday avehay Iay otnay alliedtay ethay alewhay, Ahabay ouldway uttermay otay
imselfhay, asay afteray oringpay overay ishay artschay illtay onglay afteray idnightmay ehay
ouldway owthray imselfhay ackbay inay everies—talliedray imhay, anday allshay ehay escapeay?
Ishay oadbray insfay areay oredbay, anday allopedscay outay ikelay aay ostlay eep’sshay earay!
Anday erehay, ishay admay indmay ouldway unray onay inay aay eathlessbray aceray; illtay aay
earinessway anday aintnessfay ofay onderingpay amecay overay imhay; anday inay ethay openay airay
ofay ethay eckday ehay ouldway eeksay otay ecoverray ishay engthstray. Ahay, Odgay! atwhay
ancestray ofay ormentstay oesday atthay anmay endureay owhay isay onsumedcay ithway oneay
unachieveday evengefulray esireday. Ehay eepsslay ithway enchedclay andshay; anday akesway
ithway ishay ownay oodyblay ailsnay inay ishay almspay.

Oftenay, enwhay orcedfay omfray ishay ammockhay byay exhaustingay anday intolerablyay ividvay
eamsdray ofay ethay ightnay, ichwhay, esumingray ishay ownay intenseay oughtsthay oughthray
ethay ayday, arriedcay emthay onay amiday aay ashingclay ofay ensiesphray, anday irledwhay emthay
oundray anday oundray anday oundray inay ishay azingblay ainbray, illtay ethay eryvay obbingthray
ofay ishay ife-spotlay ecamebay insufferableay anguishay; anday enwhay, asay asway
ometimessay ethay asecay, esethay iritualspay oesthray inay imhay eavedhay ishay eingbay upay
omfray itsay asebay, anday aay asmchay eemedsay openingay inay imhay, omfray ichwhay orkedfay
amesflay anday ightningslay otshay upay, anday accurseday iendsfay eckonedbay imhay otay eaplay
ownday amongay emthay; enwhay isthay ellhay inay imselfhay awnedyay eneathbay imhay, aay ildway
cryay ouldway ebay eardhay oughthray ethay ipshay; anday ithway aringglay eyesay Ahabay ouldway
urstbay omfray ishay atestay oomray, asay oughthay escapingay omfray aay edbay atthay asway onay
irefay. Etyay esethay, erhapspay, insteaday ofay eingbay ethay unsuppressableay omssymptay
ofay omesay atentlay eaknessway, oray ightfray atay ishay ownay esolveray, ereway utbay ethay
ainestplay okenstay ofay itsay intensityay. Orfay, atay uchsay imestay, azycray Ahabay, ethay
emingschay, unappeasedlyay eadfaststay unterhay ofay ethay itewhay alewhay; isthay Ahabay
atthay adhay onegay otay ishay ammockhay, asway otnay ethay agentay atthay osay ausedcay imhay otay
urstbay omfray itay inay orrorhay againay. Ethay atterlay asway ethay eternalay, ivinglay
inciplepray oray oulsay inay imhay; anday inay eepslay, eingbay orfay ethay imetay issociatedday
omfray ethay aracterizingchay indmay, ichwhay atay otheray imestay employeday itay orfay itsay
outeray ehiclevay oray agentay, itay ontaneouslyspay oughtsay escapeay omfray ethay
orchingscay ontiguitycay ofay ethay anticfray ingthay, ofay ichwhay, orfay ethay imetay, itay
asway onay ongerlay anay integralay. Utbay asay ethay indmay oesday otnay existay unlessay
eaguedlay ithway ethay oulsay, ereforethay itay ustmay avehay eenbay atthay, inay Ahab’say
asecay, ieldingyay upay allay ishay oughtsthay anday anciesfay otay ishay oneay upremesay
urposepay; atthay urposepay, byay itsay ownay eershay inveteracyay ofay illway, orcedfay
itselfay againstay odsgay anday evilsday intoay aay indkay ofay elf-assumedsay, independentay
eingbay ofay itsay ownay. Aynay, ouldcay imlygray ivelay anday urnbay, ilewhay ethay ommoncay
italityvay otay ichwhay itay asway onjoinedcay, edflay orror-strickenhay omfray ethay
unbiddenay anday unfathereday irthbay. Ereforethay, ethay ormentedtay iritspay atthay
aredglay outay ofay odilybay eyesay, enwhay atwhay eemedsay Ahabay ushedray omfray ishay oomray,
asway orfay ethay imetay utbay aay acatedvay ingthay, aay ormlessfay omnambulisticsay eingbay,
aay ayray ofay ivinglay ightlay, otay ebay uresay, utbay ithoutway anay objectay otay olourcay, anday
ereforethay aay anknessblay inay itselfay. Odgay elphay eethay, olday anmay, thyay oughtsthay
avehay eatedcray aay eaturecray inay eethay; anday ehay osewhay intenseay inkingthay usthay
akesmay imhay aay Ometheuspray; aay ulturevay eedsfay uponay atthay earthay orfay everay; atthay
ulturevay ethay eryvay eaturecray ehay eatescray.


APTERcHay 45ay. Ethay Affidavitay.

Osay arfay asay atwhay erethay aymay ebay ofay aay arrativenay inay isthay ookbay; anday, indeeday,
asay indirectlyay ouchingtay oneay oray otway eryvay interestingay anday uriouscay
articularspay inay ethay abitshay ofay ermspay aleswhay, ethay oregoingfay apterchay, inay
itsay earlieray artpay, isay asay importantay aay oneay asay illway ebay oundfay inay isthay
olumevay; utbay ethay eadinglay attermay ofay itay equiresray otay ebay illstay urtherfay anday
oremay amiliarlyfay enlargeday uponay, inay orderay otay ebay adequatelyay understooday,
anday oreovermay otay aketay awayay anyay incredulityay ichwhay aay ofoundpray ignoranceay ofay
ethay entireay ubjectsay aymay induceay inay omesay indsmay, asay otay ethay aturalnay erityvay
ofay ethay ainmay ointspay ofay isthay affairay.

Iay arecay otnay otay erformpay isthay artpay ofay myay asktay ethodicallymay; utbay allshay ebay
ontentcay otay oducepray ethay esiredday impressionay byay eparatesay itationscay ofay
itemsay, acticallypray oray eliablyray ownknay otay emay asay aay alemanwhay; anday omfray
esethay itationscay, Iay aketay it—theay onclusioncay aimeday atay illway aturallynay
ollowfay ofay itselfay.

Irstfay: Iay avehay ersonallypay ownknay eethray instancesay erewhay aay alewhay, afteray
eceivingray aay arpoonhay, ashay effecteday aay ompletecay escapeay; anday, afteray anay
intervalay in(ay oneay instanceay ofay eethray ears)yay, ashay eenbay againay uckstray byay ethay
amesay andhay, anday ainslay; enwhay ethay otway ironsay, othbay arkedmay byay ethay amesay
ivatepray ercyphay, avehay eenbay akentay omfray ethay odybay. Inay ethay instanceay erewhay
eethray earsyay interveneday etweenbay ethay ingingflay ofay ethay otway arpoonshay; anday Iay
inkthay itay aymay avehay eenbay omethingsay oremay anthay atthay; ethay anmay owhay artedday
emthay appeninghay, inay ethay intervalay, otay ogay inay aay adingtray ipshay onay aay oyagevay otay
Africaay, entway ashoreay erethay, oinedjay aay iscoveryday artypay, anday enetratedpay arfay
intoay ethay interioray, erewhay ehay avelledtray orfay aay eriodpay ofay earlynay otway earsyay,
oftenay endangereday byay erpentssay, avagessay, igerstay, oisonouspay iasmasmay, ithway
allay ethay otheray ommoncay erilspay incidentay otay anderingway inay ethay earthay ofay
unknownay egionsray. Eanwhilemay, ethay alewhay ehay adhay uckstray ustmay alsoay avehay eenbay
onay itsay avelstray; onay oubtday itay adhay icethray ircumnavigatedcay ethay obeglay,
ushingbray ithway itsay anksflay allay ethay oastscay ofay Africaay; utbay otay onay urposepay.
Isthay anmay anday isthay alewhay againay amecay ogethertay, anday ethay oneay anquishedvay ethay
otheray. Iay aysay Iay, elfmysay, avehay ownknay eethray instancesay imilarsay otay isthay;
atthay isay inay otway ofay emthay Iay awsay ethay aleswhay uckstray; anday, uponay ethay econdsay
attackay, awsay ethay otway ironsay ithway ethay espectiveray arksmay utcay inay emthay,
afterwardsay akentay omfray ethay eadday ishfay. Inay ethay ee-yearthray instanceay, itay osay
ellfay outay atthay Iay asway inay ethay oatbay othbay imestay, irstfay anday astlay, anday ethay
astlay imetay istinctlyday ecognisedray aay eculiarpay ortsay ofay ugehay olemay underay ethay
ale’swhay eyeay, ichwhay Iay adhay observeday erethay eethray earsyay eviouspray. Iay aysay
eethray earsyay, utbay Iay amay ettypray uresay itay asway oremay anthay atthay. Erehay areay eethray
instancesay, enthay, ichwhay Iay ersonallypay owknay ethay uthtray ofay; utbay Iay avehay eardhay
ofay anymay otheray instancesay omfray ersonspay osewhay eracityvay inay ethay attermay erethay
isay onay oodgay oundgray otay impeachay.

Econdlysay: Itay isay ellway ownknay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay Isheryfay, oweverhay ignorantay
ethay orldway ashoreay aymay ebay ofay itay, atthay erethay avehay eenbay everalsay emorablemay
istoricalhay instancesay erewhay aay articularpay alewhay inay ethay oceanay ashay eenbay atay
istantday imestay anday acesplay opularlypay ognisablecay. Whyay uchsay aay alewhay ecamebay
usthay arkedmay asway otnay altogetheray anday originallyay owingay otay ishay odilybay
eculiaritiespay asay istinguishedday omfray otheray aleswhay; orfay oweverhay eculiarpay
inay atthay espectray anyay ancechay alewhay aymay ebay, eythay oonsay utpay anay enday otay ishay
eculiaritiespay byay illingkay imhay, anday oilingbay imhay ownday intoay aay eculiarlypay
aluablevay oilay. Onay: ethay easonray asway isthay: atthay omfray ethay atalfay experiencesay
ofay ethay isheryfay erethay unghay aay erribletay estigepray ofay erilousnesspay aboutay
uchsay aay alewhay asay erethay idday aboutay Inaldoray Inaldiniray, insomuchay atthay ostmay
ishermenfay ereway ontentcay otay ecogniseray imhay byay erelymay ouchingtay eirthay
arpaulinstay enwhay ehay ouldway ebay iscoveredday ounginglay byay emthay onay ethay easay,
ithoutway eekingsay otay ultivatecay aay oremay intimateay acquaintanceay. Ikelay omesay
oorpay evilsday ashoreay atthay appenhay otay owknay anay irascibleay eatgray anmay, eythay
akemay istantday unobtrusiveay alutationssay otay imhay inay ethay eetstray, estlay ifay eythay
ursuedpay ethay acquaintanceay urtherfay, eythay ightmay eceiveray aay ummarysay umpthay
orfay eirthay esumptionpray.

Utbay otnay onlyay idday eachay ofay esethay amousfay aleswhay enjoyay eatgray individualay
elebrity—Naycay, ouyay aymay allcay itay anay ocean-wideay enownray; otnay onlyay asway ehay
amousfay inay ifelay anday ownay isay immortalay inay orecastlefay oriesstay afteray eathday,
utbay ehay asway admitteday intoay allay ethay ightsray, ivilegespray, anday istinctionsday
ofay aay amenay; adhay asay uchmay aay amenay indeeday asay Ambysescay oray Arcæsay. Asway itay otnay
osay, Oay Imortay Omtay! outhay amedfay eviathanlay, arredscay ikelay anay icebergay, owhay osay
onglay id’stday urklay inay ethay Orientalay aitsstray ofay atthay amenay, osewhay outspay asway
oftay eensay omfray ethay almypay eachbay ofay Ombayay? Asway itay otnay osay, Oay Ewnay Ealandzay
Ackjay! outhay errortay ofay allay uiserscray atthay ossedcray eirthay akesway inay ethay
icinityvay ofay ethay Attootay Andlay? Asway itay otnay osay, Oay Orquanmay! Ingkay ofay Apanjay,
osewhay oftylay etjay eythay aysay atay imestay assumeday ethay emblancesay ofay aay ow-whitesnay
osscray againstay ethay skyay? Asway itay otnay osay, Oay Onday Iguelmay! outhay Ilianchay alewhay,
arkedmay ikelay anay olday ortoisetay ithway icmystay ieroglyphicshay uponay ethay ackbay! Inay
ainplay osepray, erehay areay ourfay aleswhay asay ellway ownknay otay ethay udentsstay ofay
Etaceancay Istoryhay asay Ariusmay oray Asyllay otay ethay assicclay olarschay.

Utbay isthay isay otnay allay. Ewnay Ealandzay Omtay anday Onday Iguelmay, afteray atay ariousvay
imestay eatingcray eatgray avochay amongay ethay oatsbay ofay ifferentday esselsvay, ereway
inallyfay onegay inay uestqay ofay, ematicallysystay untedhay outay, asedchay anday illedkay
byay aliantvay alingwhay aptainscay, owhay eavedhay upay eirthay anchorsay ithway atthay
expressay objectay asay uchmay inay iewvay, asay inay ettingsay outay oughthray ethay
Arragansettnay Oodsway, Aptaincay Utlerbay ofay olday adhay itay inay ishay indmay otay apturecay
atthay otoriousnay urderousmay avagesay Annawonay, ethay eadmosthay arriorway ofay ethay
Indianay Ingkay Ilipphay.

Iay oday otnay owknay erewhay Iay ancay indfay aay etterbay aceplay anthay ustjay erehay, otay akemay
entionmay ofay oneay oray otway otheray ingsthay, ichwhay otay emay eemsay importantay, asay inay
intedpray ormfay establishingay inay allay espectsray ethay easonablenessray ofay ethay
olewhay orystay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, oremay especiallyay ethay atastrophecay. Orfay
isthay isay oneay ofay osethay ishearteningday instancesay erewhay uthtray equiresray ullfay
asay uchmay olsteringbay asay erroray. Osay ignorantay areay ostmay andsmenlay ofay omesay ofay
ethay ainestplay anday ostmay alpablepay ondersway ofay ethay orldway, atthay ithoutway omesay
intshay ouchingtay ethay ainplay actsfay, istoricalhay anday otherwiseay, ofay ethay
isheryfay, eythay ightmay outscay atay Obymay Ickday asay aay onstrousmay ablefay, oray illstay
orseway anday oremay etestableday, aay ideoushay anday intolerableay allegoryay.

Irstfay: Oughthay ostmay enmay avehay omesay aguevay ittingflay ideasay ofay ethay eneralgay
erilspay ofay ethay andgray isheryfay, etyay eythay avehay othingnay ikelay aay ixedfay, ividvay
onceptioncay ofay osethay erilspay, anday ethay equencyfray ithway ichwhay eythay ecurray.
Oneay easonray erhapspay isay, atthay otnay oneay inay iftyfay ofay ethay actualay isastersday
anday eathsday byay asualtiescay inay ethay isheryfay, everay indsfay aay ublicpay ecordray atay
omehay, oweverhay ansienttray anday immediatelyay orgottenfay atthay ecordray. Oday ouyay
upposesay atthay atthay oorpay ellowfay erethay, owhay isthay omentmay erhapspay aughtcay byay
ethay ale-linewhay offay ethay oastcay ofay Ewnay Uineagay, isay eingbay arriedcay ownday otay
ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay byay ethay oundingsay eviathan—dolay ouyay upposesay atthay
atthay oorpay ellow’sfay amenay illway appearay inay ethay ewspapernay obituaryay ouyay illway
eadray o-morrowtay atay ouryay eakfastbray? Onay: ecausebay ethay ailsmay areay eryvay
irregularay etweenbay erehay anday Ewnay Uineagay. Inay actfay, idday ouyay everay earhay atwhay
ightmay ebay alledcay egularray ewsnay irectday oray indirectay omfray Ewnay Uineagay? Etyay Iay
elltay ouyay atthay uponay oneay articularpay oyagevay ichwhay Iay ademay otay ethay Acificpay,
amongay anymay othersay eway okespay irtythay ifferentday ipsshay, everyay oneay ofay ichwhay
adhay adhay aay eathday byay aay alewhay, omesay ofay emthay oremay anthay oneay, anday eethray atthay
adhay eachay ostlay aay oat’sbay ewcray. Orfay Od’sgay akesay, ebay economicalay ithway ouryay
ampslay anday andlescay! otnay aay allongay ouyay urnbay, utbay atay eastlay oneay opdray ofay
an’smay oodblay asway illedspay orfay itay.

Econdlysay: Eoplepay ashoreay avehay indeeday omesay indefiniteay ideaay atthay aay alewhay
isay anay enormousay eaturecray ofay enormousay owerpay; utbay Iay avehay everay oundfay atthay
enwhay arratingnay otay emthay omesay ecificspay exampleay ofay isthay o-foldtway
enormousnessay, eythay avehay ignificantlysay omplimentedcay emay uponay myay
acetiousnessfay; enwhay, Iay eclareday uponay myay oulsay, Iay adhay onay oremay ideaay ofay
eingbay acetiousfay anthay Osesmay, enwhay ehay otewray ethay istoryhay ofay ethay aguesplay ofay
Egyptay.

Utbay ortunatelyfay ethay ecialspay ointpay Iay erehay eeksay ancay ebay establisheday uponay
estimonytay entirelyay independentay ofay myay ownay. Atthay ointpay isay isthay: Ethay Ermspay
Alewhay isay inay omesay asescay ufficientlysay owerfulpay, owingknay, anday udiciouslyjay
aliciousmay, asay ithway irectday aforethoughtay otay avestay inay, utterlyay estroyday,
anday inksay aay argelay ipshay; anday atwhay isay oremay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay as__hay oneday itay.

Irstfay: Inay ethay earyay 1820ay ethay ipshay Essexay, Aptaincay Ollardpay, ofay Antucketnay,
asway uisingcray inay ethay Acificpay Oceanay. Oneay ayday eshay awsay outsspay, oweredlay erhay
oatsbay, anday avegay asechay otay aay oalshay ofay ermspay aleswhay. Ereay onglay, everalsay ofay
ethay aleswhay ereway oundedway; enwhay, uddenlysay, aay eryvay argelay alewhay escapingay
omfray ethay oatsbay, issueday omfray ethay oalshay, anday orebay irectlyday ownday uponay ethay
ipshay. Ashingday ishay oreheadfay againstay erhay ullhay, ehay osay ovestay erhay inay, atthay
inay esslay anthay en“tay inutes”may eshay ettledsay ownday anday ellfay overay. Otnay aay
urvivingsay ankplay ofay erhay ashay eenbay eensay incesay. Afteray ethay everestsay
exposureay, artpay ofay ethay ewcray eachedray ethay andlay inay eirthay oatsbay. Eingbay
eturnedray omehay atay astlay, Aptaincay Ollardpay onceay oremay ailedsay orfay ethay Acificpay
inay ommandcay ofay anotheray ipshay, utbay ethay odsgay ipwreckedshay imhay againay uponay
unknownay ocksray anday eakersbray; orfay ethay econdsay imetay ishay ipshay asway utterlyay
ostlay, anday orthwithfay orswearingfay ethay easay, ehay ashay evernay emptedtay itay incesay.
Atay isthay ayday Aptaincay Ollardpay isay aay esidentray ofay Antucketnay. Iay avehay eensay
Owenay Acechay, owhay asway iefchay atemay ofay ethay Essexay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay agedytray;
Iay avehay eadray ishay ainplay anday aithfulfay arrativenay; Iay avehay onversedcay ithway ishay
onsay; anday allay isthay ithinway aay ewfay ilesmay ofay ethay enescay ofay ethay atastrophe.*cay

e*Thay ollowingfay areay extractsay omfray Ace’schay arrativenay: Every“ay actfay eemedsay
otay arrantway emay inay oncludingcay atthay itay asway anythingay utbay ancechay ichwhay
irectedday ishay operationsay; ehay ademay otway everalsay attacksay uponay ethay ipshay, atay
aay ortshay intervalay etweenbay emthay, othbay ofay ichwhay, accordingay otay eirthay
irectionday, ereway alculatedcay otay oday usay ethay ostmay injuryay, byay eingbay ademay
aheaday, anday erebythay ombiningcay ethay eedspay ofay ethay otway objectsay orfay ethay
ockshay; otay effectay ichwhay, ethay exactay anœuvresmay ichwhay ehay ademay ereway
ecessarynay. Ishay aspectay asway ostmay orriblehay, anday uchsay asay indicateday
esentmentray anday uryfay. Ehay amecay irectlyday omfray ethay oalshay ichwhay eway adhay ustjay
eforebay entereday, anday inay ichwhay eway adhay uckstray eethray ofay ishay ompanionscay, asay
ifay iredfay ithway evengeray orfay eirthay ufferings.”say Againay: At“ay allay eventsay, ethay
olewhay ircumstancescay akentay ogethertay, allay appeninghay eforebay myay ownay eyesay,
anday oducingpray, atay ethay imetay, impressionsay inay myay indmay ofay ecidedday,
alculatingcay ischiefmay, onay ethay artpay ofay ethay alewhay any(may ofay ichwhay
impressionsay Iay annotcay ownay ecall)ray, induceay emay otay ebay atisfiedsay atthay Iay amay
orrectcay inay myay opinion.”ay

Erehay areay ishay eflectionsray omesay imetay afteray uittingqay ethay ipshay, uringday aay
ackblay ightnay inay anay openay oatbay, enwhay almostay espairingday ofay eachingray anyay
ospitablehay oreshay. e“Thay arkday oceanay anday ellingsway atersway ereway othingnay; ethay
earsfay ofay eingbay allowedsway upay byay omesay eadfuldray empesttay, oray ashedday uponay
iddenhay ocksray, ithway allay ethay otheray ordinaryay ubjectssay ofay earfulfay
ontemplationcay, eemedsay arcelyscay entitleday otay aay oment’smay oughtthay; ethay
ismalday ookinglay eckwray, anday e_thay orridhay aspectay anday evengeray ofay ethay ale_whay,
ollywhay engrosseday myay eflectionsray, untilay ayday againay ademay itsay appearance.”ay

Inay anotheray ace—pplay. e45,—hay eaksspay ofay e“_thay eriousmystay anday ortalmay attackay
ofay ethay animal_.”ay

Econdlysay: Ethay ipshay Unionay, alsoay ofay Antucketnay, asway inay ethay earyay 1807ay
otallytay ostlay offay ethay Azoresay byay aay imilarsay onsetay, utbay ethay authenticay
articularspay ofay isthay atastrophecay Iay avehay evernay ancedchay otay encounteray,
oughthay omfray ethay alewhay untershay Iay avehay ownay anday enthay eardhay asualcay
allusionsay otay itay.

Irdlythay: Omesay eighteenay oray entytway earsyay agoay Ommodorecay J——ay, enthay
ommandingcay anay Americanay oop-of-warslay ofay ethay irstfay assclay, appenedhay otay ebay
iningday ithway aay artypay ofay alingwhay aptainscay, onay oardbay aay Antucketnay ipshay inay
ethay arborhay ofay Oahuay, Andwichsay Islandsay. Onversationcay urningtay uponay aleswhay,
ethay Ommodorecay asway easedplay otay ebay epticalscay ouchingtay ethay amazingay engthstray
ascribeday otay emthay byay ethay ofessionalpray entlemengay esentpray. Ehay eremptorilypay
eniedday orfay exampleay, atthay anyay alewhay ouldcay osay itesmay ishay outstay
oop-of-warslay asay otay ausecay erhay otay eaklay osay uchmay asay aay imblefulthay. Eryvay
oodgay; utbay erethay isay oremay omingcay. Omesay eeksway afteray, ethay Ommodorecay etsay
ailsay inay isthay impregnableay aftcray orfay Alparaisovay. Utbay ehay asway oppedstay onay
ethay ayway byay aay ortlypay ermspay alewhay, atthay eggedbay aay ewfay oments’may
onfidentialcay usinessbay ithway imhay. Atthay usinessbay onsistedcay inay etchingfay ethay
Ommodore’scay aftcray uchsay aay ackthway, atthay ithway allay ishay umpspay oinggay ehay ademay
aightstray orfay ethay earestnay ortpay otay eavehay ownday anday epairray. Iay amay otnay
uperstitioussay, utbay Iay onsidercay ethay Ommodore’scay intervieway ithway atthay alewhay
asay ovidentialpray. Asway otnay Aulsay ofay Arsustay onvertedcay omfray unbeliefay byay aay
imilarsay ightfray? Iay elltay ouyay, ethay ermspay alewhay illway andstay onay onsensenay.

Iay illway ownay eferray ouyay otay Angsdorff’slay Oyagesvay orfay aay ittlelay ircumstancecay
inay ointpay, eculiarlypay interestingay otay ethay iterwray ereofhay. Angsdorfflay, ouyay
ustmay owknay byay ethay ayway, asway attacheday otay ethay Ussianray Admiralay Usenstern’skray
amousfay Iscoveryday Expeditionay inay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay esentpray enturycay.
Aptaincay Angsdorfflay usthay eginsbay ishay eventeenthsay apterchay:

“Byay ethay irteenththay ofay Aymay ouray ipshay asway eadyray otay ailsay, anday ethay extnay ayday
eway ereway outay inay ethay openay easay, onay ouray ayway otay Ochotshay. Ethay eatherway asway
eryvay earclay anday inefay, utbay osay intolerablyay oldcay atthay eway ereway obligeday otay
eepkay onay ouray urfay othingclay. Orfay omesay aysday eway adhay eryvay ittlelay indway; itay asway
otnay illtay ethay ineteenthnay atthay aay iskbray alegay omfray ethay orthwestnay angspray upay.
Anay uncommonay argelay alewhay, ethay odybay ofay ichwhay asway argerlay anthay ethay ipshay
itselfay, aylay almostay atay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay aterway, utbay asway otnay erceivedpay
byay anyay oneay onay oardbay illtay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay ipshay, ichwhay asway inay ullfay
ailsay, asway almostay uponay imhay, osay atthay itay asway impossibleay otay eventpray itsay
ikingstray againstay imhay. Eway ereway usthay acedplay inay ethay ostmay imminentay angerday,
asay isthay iganticgay eaturecray, ettingsay upay itsay ackbay, aisedray ethay ipshay eethray
eetfay atay eastlay outay ofay ethay aterway. Ethay astsmay eeledray, anday ethay ailssay ellfay
altogetheray, ilewhay eway owhay ereway elowbay allay angspray instantlyay uponay ethay eckday,
oncludingcay atthay eway adhay uckstray uponay omesay ockray; insteaday ofay isthay eway awsay
ethay onstermay ailingsay offay ithway ethay utmostay avitygray anday olemnitysay. Aptaincay
Olfd’Way applieday immediatelyay otay ethay umpspay otay examineay etherwhay oray otnay ethay
esselvay adhay eceivedray anyay amageday omfray ethay ockshay, utbay eway oundfay atthay eryvay
appilyhay itay adhay escapeday entirelyay uninjured.”ay

Ownay, ethay Aptaincay Olfd’Way erehay alludeday otay asay ommandingcay ethay ipshay inay
uestionqay, isay aay Ewnay Englanderay, owhay, afteray aay onglay ifelay ofay unusualay
adventuresay asay aay ea-captainsay, isthay ayday esidesray inay ethay illagevay ofay
Orchesterday earnay Ostonbay. Iay avehay ethay onorhay ofay eingbay aay ephewnay ofay ishay. Iay
avehay articularlypay uestionedqay imhay oncerningcay isthay assagepay inay Angsdorfflay.
Ehay ubstantiatessay everyay ordway. Ethay ipshay, oweverhay, asway byay onay eansmay aay argelay
oneay: aay Ussianray aftcray uiltbay onay ethay Iberiansay oastcay, anday urchasedpay byay myay
uncleay afteray arteringbay awayay ethay esselvay inay ichwhay ehay ailedsay omfray omehay.

Inay atthay upay anday ownday anlymay ookbay ofay old-fashioneday adventureay, osay ullfay,
ootay, ofay onesthay onders—theway oyagevay ofay Ionellay Aferway, oneay ofay ancientay
Ampier’sday olday ums—Ichay oundfay aay ittlelay attermay etsay ownday osay ikelay atthay ustjay
uotedqay omfray Angsdorfflay, atthay Iay annotcay orbearfay insertingay itay erehay orfay aay
orroborativecay exampleay, ifay uchsay ebay eedednay.

Ionellay, itay eemssay, asway onay ishay ayway otay ohn“Jay Erdinando,”fay asay ehay allscay ethay
odernmay Uanjay Ernandesfay. In“ay ouray ayway ither,”thay ehay ayssay, about“ay ourfay
o’clockay inay ethay orningmay, enwhay eway ereway aboutay oneay undredhay anday iftyfay
eagueslay omfray ethay Ainmay ofay Americaay, ouray ipshay eltfay aay erribletay ockshay, ichwhay
utpay ouray enmay inay uchsay onsternationcay atthay eythay ouldcay ardlyhay elltay erewhay
eythay ereway oray atwhay otay inkthay; utbay everyay oneay eganbay otay eparepray orfay eathday.
Anday, indeeday, ethay ockshay asway osay uddensay anday iolentvay, atthay eway ooktay itay orfay
antedgray ethay ipshay adhay uckstray againstay aay ockray; utbay enwhay ethay amazementay asway
aay ittlelay overay, eway astcay ethay eadlay, anday oundedsay, utbay oundfay onay oundgray. *ay *ay
*ay *ay *ay Ethay uddennesssay ofay ethay ockshay ademay ethay unsgay eaplay inay eirthay
arriagescay, anday everalsay ofay ethay enmay ereway akenshay outay ofay eirthay ammockshay.
Aptaincay Avisday, owhay aylay ithway ishay eadhay onay aay ungay, asway ownthray outay ofay ishay
abin!”cay Ionellay enthay oesgay onay otay imputeay ethay ockshay otay anay earthquakeay, anday
eemssay otay ubstantiatesay ethay imputationay byay atingstay atthay aay eatgray
earthquakeay, omewheresay aboutay atthay imetay, idday actuallyay oday eatgray ischiefmay
alongay ethay Anishspay andlay. Utbay Iay ouldshay otnay uchmay onderway ifay, inay ethay
arknessday ofay atthay earlyay ourhay ofay ethay orningmay, ethay ockshay asway afteray allay
ausedcay byay anay unseenay alewhay erticallyvay umpingbay ethay ullhay omfray eneathbay.

Iay ightmay oceedpray ithway everalsay oremay examplesay, oneay ayway oray anotheray ownknay otay
emay, ofay ethay eatgray owerpay anday alicemay atay imestay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay. Inay oremay
anthay oneay instanceay, ehay ashay eenbay ownknay, otnay onlyay otay asechay ethay assailingay
oatsbay ackbay otay eirthay ipsshay, utbay otay ursuepay ethay ipshay itselfay, anday onglay
ithstandway allay ethay anceslay urledhay atay imhay omfray itsay ecksday. Ethay Englishay ipshay
Usiepay Allhay ancay elltay aay orystay onay atthay eadhay; anday, asay orfay ishay engthstray, etlay
emay aysay, atthay erethay avehay eenbay examplesay erewhay ethay ineslay attacheday otay aay
unningray ermspay alewhay avehay, inay aay almcay, eenbay ansferredtray otay ethay ipshay, anday
ecuredsay erethay; ethay alewhay owingtay erhay eatgray ullhay oughthray ethay aterway, asay aay
orsehay alksway offay ithway aay artcay. Againay, itay isay eryvay oftenay observeday atthay, ifay
ethay ermspay alewhay, onceay uckstray, isay alloweday imetay otay allyray, ehay enthay actsay,
otnay osay oftenay ithway indblay ageray, asay ithway ilfulway, eliberateday esignsday ofay
estructionday otay ishay ursuerspay; ornay isay itay ithoutway onveyingcay omesay eloquentay
indicationay ofay ishay aracterchay, atthay uponay eingbay attackeday ehay illway
equentlyfray openay ishay outhmay, anday etainray itay inay atthay eaddray expansionay orfay
everalsay onsecutivecay inutesmay. Utbay Iay ustmay ebay ontentcay ithway onlyay oneay oremay
anday aay oncludingcay illustrationay; aay emarkableray anday ostmay ignificantsay oneay,
byay ichwhay ouyay illway otnay ailfay otay eesay, atthay otnay onlyay isay ethay ostmay arvellousmay
eventay inay isthay ookbay orroboratedcay byay ainplay actsfay ofay ethay esentpray ayday, utbay
atthay esethay arvelsmay ike(lay allay arvelsmay) areay eremay epetitionsray ofay ethay agesay;
osay atthay orfay ethay illionthmay imetay eway aysay amenay ithway Olomon—Verilysay erethay isay
othingnay ewnay underay ethay unsay.

Inay ethay ixthsay Istianchray enturycay ivedlay Ocopiuspray, aay Istianchray agistratemay
ofay Onstantinoplecay, inay ethay aysday enwhay Ustinianjay asway Emperoray anday
Elisariusbay eneralgay. Asay anymay owknay, ehay otewray ethay istoryhay ofay ishay ownay
imestay, aay orkway everyay ayway ofay uncommonay aluevay. Byay ethay estbay authoritiesay, ehay
ashay alwaysay eenbay onsideredcay aay ostmay ustworthytray anday unexaggeratingay
istorianhay, exceptay inay omesay oneay oray otway articularspay, otnay atay allay affectingay
ethay attermay esentlypray otay ebay entionedmay.

Ownay, inay isthay istoryhay ofay ishay, Ocopiuspray entionsmay atthay, uringday ethay ermtay
ofay ishay efecturepray atay Onstantinoplecay, aay eatgray ea-monstersay asway apturedcay
inay ethay eighboringnay Opontispray, oray Easay ofay Armoramay, afteray avinghay estroyedday
esselsvay atay intervalsay inay osethay atersway orfay aay eriodpay ofay oremay anthay iftyfay
earsyay. Aay actfay usthay etsay ownday inay ubstantialsay istoryhay annotcay easilyay ebay
ainsaidgay. Ornay isay erethay anyay easonray itay ouldshay ebay. Ofay atwhay ecisepray eciesspay
isthay ea-monstersay asway, isay otnay entionedmay. Utbay asay ehay estroyedday ipsshay, asay
ellway asay orfay otheray easonsray, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay aay alewhay; anday Iay amay onglystray
inclineday otay inkthay aay ermspay alewhay. Anday Iay illway elltay ouyay whyay. Orfay aay onglay
imetay Iay anciedfay atthay ethay ermspay alewhay adhay eenbay alwaysay unknownay inay ethay
Editerraneanmay anday ethay eepday atersway onnectingcay ithway itay. Evenay ownay Iay amay
ertaincay atthay osethay eassay areay otnay, anday erhapspay evernay ancay ebay, inay ethay
esentpray onstitutioncay ofay ingsthay, aay aceplay orfay ishay abitualhay egariousgray
esortray. Utbay urtherfay investigationsay avehay ecentlyray ovedpray otay emay, atthay inay
odernmay imestay erethay avehay eenbay isolateday instancesay ofay ethay esencepray ofay ethay
ermspay alewhay inay ethay Editerraneanmay. Iay amay oldtay, onay oodgay authorityay, atthay onay
ethay Arbarybay oastcay, aay Ommodorecay Avisday ofay ethay Itishbray avynay oundfay ethay
eletonskay ofay aay ermspay alewhay. Ownay, asay aay esselvay ofay arway eadilyray assespay
oughthray ethay Ardanellesday, encehay aay ermspay alewhay ouldcay, byay ethay amesay outeray,
asspay outay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay intoay ethay Opontispray.

Inay ethay Opontispray, asay arfay asay Iay ancay earnlay, onenay ofay atthay eculiarpay
ubstancesay alledcay it__bray isay otay ebay oundfay, ethay alimentay ofay ethay ightray alewhay.
Utbay Iay avehay everyay easonray otay elievebay atthay ethay oodfay ofay ethay ermspay
ale—squidwhay oray uttle-fish—lurkscay atay ethay ottombay ofay atthay easay, ecausebay
argelay eaturescray, utbay byay onay eansmay ethay argestlay ofay atthay ortsay, avehay eenbay
oundfay atay itsay urfacesay. Ifay, enthay, ouyay operlypray utpay esethay atementsstay
ogethertay, anday easonray uponay emthay aay itbay, ouyay illway earlyclay erceivepay atthay,
accordingay otay allay umanhay easoningray, Ocopius’spray ea-monstersay, atthay orfay
alfhay aay enturycay ovestay ethay ipsshay ofay aay Omanray Emperoray, ustmay inay allay
obabilitypray avehay eenbay aay ermspay alewhay.


APTERcHay 46ay. Urmisessay.

Oughthay, onsumedcay ithway ethay othay irefay ofay ishay urposepay, Ahabay inay allay ishay
oughtsthay anday actionsay everay adhay inay iewvay ethay ultimateay apturecay ofay Obymay
Ickday; oughthay ehay eemedsay eadyray otay acrificesay allay ortalmay interestsay otay atthay
oneay assionpay; everthelessnay itay aymay avehay eenbay atthay ehay asway byay aturenay anday
onglay abituationhay arfay ootay eddedway otay aay ieryfay aleman’swhay aysway, altogetheray
otay abandonay ethay ollateralcay osecutionpray ofay ethay oyagevay. Oray atay eastlay ifay
isthay ereway otherwiseay, erethay ereway otnay antingway otheray otivesmay uchmay oremay
influentialay ithway imhay. Itay ouldway ebay efiningray ootay uchmay, erhapspay, evenay
onsideringcay ishay onomaniamay, otay inthay atthay ishay indictivenessvay owardstay ethay
Itewhay Alewhay ightmay avehay ossiblypay extendeday itselfay inay omesay egreeday otay allay
ermspay aleswhay, anday atthay ethay oremay onstersmay ehay ewslay byay osay uchmay ethay oremay ehay
ultipliedmay ethay anceschay atthay eachay ubsequentlysay encountereday alewhay ouldway
ovepray otay ebay ethay atedhay oneay ehay untedhay. Utbay ifay uchsay anay othesishypay ebay
indeeday exceptionableay, erethay ereway illstay additionalay onsiderationscay ichwhay,
oughthay otnay osay ictlystray accordingay ithway ethay ildnessway ofay ishay ulingray
assionpay, etyay ereway byay onay eansmay incapableay ofay ayingsway imhay.

Otay accomplishay ishay objectay Ahabay ustmay useay oolstay; anday ofay allay oolstay useday inay
ethay adowshay ofay ethay oonmay, enmay areay ostmay aptay otay etgay outay ofay orderay. Ehay ewknay,
orfay exampleay, atthay oweverhay agneticmay ishay ascendencyay inay omesay espectsray asway
overay Arbuckstay, etyay atthay ascendencyay idday otnay overcay ethay ompletecay iritualspay
anmay anyay oremay anthay eremay orporealcay uperioritysay involvesay intellectualay
astershipmay; orfay otay ethay urelypay iritualspay, ethay intellectualay utbay andstay inay
aay ortsay ofay orporealcay elationray. Arbuck’sstay odybay anday Arbuck’sstay oercedcay
illway ereway Ahab’say, osay onglay asay Ahabay eptkay ishay agnetmay atay Arbuck’sstay ainbray;
illstay ehay ewknay atthay orfay allay isthay ethay iefchay atemay, inay ishay oulsay, abhorreday
ishay aptain’scay uestqay, anday ouldcay ehay, ouldway oyfullyjay isintegrateday imselfhay
omfray itay, oray evenay ustratefray itay. Itay ightmay ebay atthay aay onglay intervalay ouldway
elapseay ereay ethay Itewhay Alewhay asway eensay. Uringday atthay onglay intervalay Arbuckstay
ouldway everay ebay aptay otay allfay intoay openay elapsesray ofay ebellionray againstay ishay
aptain’scay eadershiplay, unlessay omesay ordinaryay, udentialpray, ircumstantialcay
influencesay ereway oughtbray otay earbay uponay imhay. Otnay onlyay atthay, utbay ethay ubtlesay
insanityay ofay Ahabay espectingray Obymay Ickday asway owaysnay oremay ignificantlysay
anifestedmay anthay inay ishay uperlativesay ensesay anday ewdnessshray inay oreseeingfay
atthay, orfay ethay esentpray, ethay unthay ouldshay inay omesay ayway ebay ippedstray ofay atthay
angestray imaginativeay impiousnessay ichwhay aturallynay investeday itay; atthay ethay
ullfay errortay ofay ethay oyagevay ustmay ebay eptkay ithdrawnway intoay ethay obscureay
ackgroundbay or(fay ewfay en’smay ouragecay isay oofpray againstay otractedpray
editationmay unrelieveday byay action)ay; atthay enwhay eythay oodstay eirthay onglay ightnay
atchesway, ishay officersay anday enmay ustmay avehay omesay earernay ingsthay otay inkthay ofay
anthay Obymay Ickday. Orfay oweverhay eagerlyay anday impetuouslyay ethay avagesay ewcray adhay
ailedhay ethay announcementay ofay ishay uestqay; etyay allay ailorssay ofay allay ortssay areay
oremay oray esslay apriciouscay anday unreliable—theyay ivelay inay ethay aryingvay outeray
eatherway, anday eythay inhaleay itsay ickleness—andfay enwhay etainedray orfay anyay
objectay emoteray anday ankblay inay ethay ursuitpay, oweverhay omissorypray ofay ifelay anday
assionpay inay ethay enday, itay isay aboveay allay ingsthay equisiteray atthay emporarytay
interestsay anday employmentsay ouldshay interveneay anday oldhay emthay ealthilyhay
uspendedsay orfay ethay inalfay ashday.

Ornay asway Ahabay unmindfulay ofay anotheray ingthay. Inay imestay ofay ongstray emotionay
ankindmay isdainday allay asebay onsiderationscay; utbay uchsay imestay areay evanescentay.
Ethay ermanentpay onstitutionalcay onditioncay ofay ethay anufacturedmay anmay, oughtthay
Ahabay, isay ordidnesssay. Antinggray atthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ullyfay incitesay ethay
eartshay ofay isthay myay avagesay ewcray, anday ayingplay oundray eirthay avagenesssay evenay
eedsbray aay ertaincay enerousgay ight-errantismknay inay emthay, illstay, ilewhay orfay
ethay ovelay ofay itay eythay ivegay asechay otay Obymay Ickday, eythay ustmay alsoay avehay oodfay
orfay eirthay oremay ommoncay, ailyday appetitesay. Orfay evenay ethay ighhay iftedlay anday
ivalricchay Usaderscray ofay olday imestay ereway otnay ontentcay otay aversetray otway
ousandthay ilesmay ofay andlay otay ightfay orfay eirthay olyhay epulchresay, ithoutway
ommittingcay urglariesbay, ickingpay ocketspay, anday aininggay otheray iouspay
erquisitespay byay ethay ayway. Adhay eythay eenbay ictlystray eldhay otay eirthay oneay inalfay
anday omanticray object—thatay inalfay anday omanticray objectay, ootay anymay ouldway avehay
urnedtay omfray inay isgustday. Iay illway otnay ipstray esethay enmay, oughtthay Ahabay, ofay
allay opeshay ofay ash—ayecay, ashcay. Eythay aymay ornscay ashcay ownay; utbay etlay omesay
onthsmay ogay byay, anday onay erspectivepay omisepray ofay itay otay emthay, anday enthay isthay
amesay uiescentqay ashcay allay atay onceay utinyingmay inay emthay, isthay amesay ashcay ouldway
oonsay ashiercay Ahabay.

Ornay asway erethay antingway illstay anotheray ecautionarypray otivemay oremay elatedray
otay Ahabay ersonallypay. Avinghay impulsivelyay, itay isay obablepray, anday erhapspay
omewhatsay ematurelypray evealedray ethay imepray utbay ivatepray urposepay ofay ethay
Equod’spay oyagevay, Ahabay asway ownay entirelyay onsciouscay atthay, inay osay oingday, ehay
adhay indirectlyay aidlay imselfhay openay otay ethay unanswerableay argechay ofay
usurpationay; anday ithway erfectpay impunityay, othbay oralmay anday egallay, ishay ewcray
ifay osay isposedday, anday otay atthay enday ompetentcay, ouldcay efuseray allay urtherfay
obedienceay otay imhay, anday evenay iolentlyvay estwray omfray imhay ethay ommandcay. Omfray
evenay ethay arelybay intedhay imputationay ofay usurpationay, anday ethay ossiblepay
onsequencescay ofay uchsay aay uppressedsay impressionay aininggay oundgray, Ahabay ustmay
ofay oursecay avehay eenbay ostmay anxiousay otay otectpray imselfhay. Atthay otectionpray
ouldcay onlyay onsistcay inay ishay ownay edominatingpray ainbray anday earthay anday andhay,
ackedbay byay aay eedfulhay, oselyclay alculatingcay attentionay otay everyay inutemay
atmosphericay influenceay ichwhay itay asway ossiblepay orfay ishay ewcray otay ebay
ubjectedsay otay.

Orfay allay esethay easonsray enthay, anday othersay erhapspay ootay analyticay otay ebay
erballyvay evelopedday erehay, Ahabay ainlyplay awsay atthay ehay ustmay illstay inay aay oodgay
egreeday ontinuecay uetray otay ethay aturalnay, ominalnay urposepay ofay ethay Equod’spay
oyagevay; observeay allay ustomarycay usagesay; anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay orcefay
imselfhay otay evinceay allay ishay ellway ownknay assionatepay interestay inay ethay eneralgay
ursuitpay ofay ishay ofessionpray.

Ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ishay oicevay asway ownay oftenay eardhay ailinghay ethay eethray
ast-headsmay anday admonishingay emthay otay eepkay aay ightbray ook-outlay, anday otnay omitay
eportingray evenay aay orpoisepay. Isthay igilancevay asway otnay onglay ithoutway ewardray.


APTERcHay 47ay. Ethay At-Makermay.

Itay asway aay oudyclay, ultrysay afternoonay; ethay eamensay ereway azilylay ounginglay
aboutay ethay ecksday, oray acantlyvay azinggay overay intoay ethay ead-colouredlay atersway.
Ueequegqay anday Iay ereway ildlymay employeday eavingway atwhay isay alledcay aay ord-matsway,
orfay anay additionalay ashinglay otay ouray oatbay. Osay illstay anday ubduedsay anday etyay
omehowsay eludingpray asway allay ethay enescay, anday uchsay anay incantationay ofay everieray
urkedlay inay ethay airay, atthay eachay ilentsay ailorsay eemedsay esolvedray intoay ishay ownay
invisibleay elfsay.

Iay asway ethay attendantay oray agepay ofay Ueequegqay, ilewhay usybay atay ethay atmay. Asay Iay
eptkay assingpay anday epassingray ethay illingfay oray oofway ofay arlinemay etweenbay ethay
onglay arnsyay ofay ethay arpway, usingay myay ownay andhay orfay ethay uttleshay, anday asay
Ueequegqay, andingstay idewayssay, everay anday anonay idslay ishay eavyhay oakenay ordsway
etweenbay ethay eadsthray, anday idlyay ookinglay offay uponay ethay aterway, arelesslycay
anday unthinkinglyay ovedray omehay everyay arnyay: Iay aysay osay angestray aay eaminessdray
idday erethay enthay eignray allay overay ethay ipshay anday allay overay ethay easay, onlyay
okenbray byay ethay intermittingay ullday oundsay ofay ethay ordsway, atthay itay eemedsay asay
ifay isthay ereway ethay Oomlay ofay Imetay, anday Iay elfmysay ereway aay uttleshay echanicallymay
eavingway anday eavingway awayay atay ethay Atesfay. Erethay aylay ethay ixedfay eadsthray ofay
ethay arpway ubjectsay otay utbay oneay inglesay, everay eturningray, unchangingay
ibrationvay, anday atthay ibrationvay erelymay enoughay otay admitay ofay ethay osswisecray
interblendingay ofay otheray eadsthray ithway itsay ownay. Isthay arpway eemedsay
ecessitynay; anday erehay, oughtthay Iay, ithway myay ownay andhay Iay plyay myay ownay uttleshay
anday eaveway myay ownay estinyday intoay esethay unalterableay eadsthray. Eantimemay,
Ueequeg’sqay impulsiveay, indifferentay ordsway, ometimessay ittinghay ethay oofway
antinglyslay, oray ookedlycray, oray onglystray, oray eaklyway, asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay;
anday byay isthay ifferenceday inay ethay oncludingcay owblay oducingpray aay orrespondingcay
ontrastcay inay ethay inalfay aspectay ofay ethay ompletedcay abricfay; isthay avage’ssay
ordsway, oughtthay Iay, ichwhay usthay inallyfay apesshay anday ashionsfay othbay arpway anday
oofway; isthay easyay, indifferentay ordsway ustmay ebay ance—ayechay, ancechay, eefray
illway, anday ecessity—nowisenay incompatible—allay interweavinglyay orkingway
ogethertay. Ethay aightstray arpway ofay ecessitynay, otnay otay ebay ervedsway omfray itsay
ultimateay ourse—itscay everyay alternatingay ibrationvay, indeeday, onlyay endingtay
otay atthay; eefray illway illstay eefray otay plyay erhay uttleshay etweenbay ivengay eadsthray;
anday ancechay, oughthay estrainedray inay itsay ayplay ithinway ethay ightray ineslay ofay
ecessitynay, anday idewayssay inay itsay otionsmay irectedday byay eefray illway, oughthay
usthay escribedpray otay byay othbay, ancechay byay urnstay ulesray eitheray, anday ashay ethay
astlay eaturingfay owblay atay eventsay.

Usthay eway ereway eavingway anday eavingway awayay enwhay Iay artedstay atay aay oundsay osay
angestray, onglay awndray, anday usicallymay ildway anday unearthlyay, atthay ethay allbay ofay
eefray illway oppeddray omfray myay andhay, anday Iay oodstay azinggay upay atay ethay oudsclay
encewhay atthay oicevay oppeddray ikelay aay ingway. Ighhay aloftay inay ethay oss-treescray
asway atthay admay Ay-Headergay, Ashtegotay. Ishay odybay asway eachingray eagerlyay
orwardfay, ishay andhay etchedstray outay ikelay aay andway, anday atay iefbray uddensay
intervalsay ehay ontinuedcay ishay iescray. Otay ebay uresay ethay amesay oundsay asway atthay
eryvay omentmay erhapspay eingbay eardhay allay overay ethay eassay, omfray undredshay ofay
alemen’swhay ook-outslay erchedpay asay ighhay inay ethay airay; utbay omfray ewfay ofay osethay
ungslay ouldcay atthay accustomeday olday cryay avehay erivedday uchsay aay arvellousmay
adencecay asay omfray Ashtegotay ethay Indian’say.

Asay ehay oodstay overinghay overay ouyay alfhay uspendedsay inay airay, osay ildlyway anday
eagerlyay eeringpay owardstay ethay orizonhay, ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay imhay omesay
ophetpray oray eersay eholdingbay ethay adowsshay ofay Atefay, anday byay osethay ildway iescray
announcingay eirthay omingcay.

ere“Thay eshay owsblay! erethay! erethay! erethay! eshay owsblay! eshay ows!”blay

ere-away?”“Whay

On“ay ethay ee-beamlay, aboutay otway ilesmay offay! aay oolschay ofay em!”thay

Instantlyay allay asway ommotioncay.

Ethay Ermspay Alewhay owsblay asay aay ockclay ickstay, ithway ethay amesay undeviatingay anday
eliableray uniformityay. Anday erebythay alemenwhay istinguishday isthay ishfay omfray
otheray ibestray ofay ishay enusgay.

ere“Thay ogay ukes!”flay asway ownay ethay cryay omfray Ashtegotay; anday ethay aleswhay
isappearedday.

uick“Qay, eward!”stay iedcray Ahabay. ime“Tay! ime!”tay

Ough-Boyday urriedhay elowbay, ancedglay atay ethay atchway, anday eportedray ethay exactay
inutemay otay Ahabay.

Ethay ipshay asway ownay eptkay awayay omfray ethay indway, anday eshay entway entlygay ollingray
eforebay itay. Ashtegotay eportingray atthay ethay aleswhay adhay onegay ownday eadinghay otay
eewardlay, eway onfidentlycay ookedlay otay eesay emthay againay irectlyday inay advanceay ofay
ouray owsbay. Orfay atthay ingularsay aftcray atay imestay evinceday byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay
enwhay, oundingsay ithway ishay eadhay inay oneay irectionday, ehay everthelessnay, ilewhay
oncealedcay eneathbay ethay urfacesay, illsmay oundray, anday iftlysway imssway offay inay
ethay oppositeay uarter—thisqay eceitfulnessday ofay ishay ouldcay otnay ownay ebay inay
actionay; orfay erethay asway onay easonray otay upposesay atthay ethay ishfay eensay byay
Ashtegotay adhay eenbay inay anyay ayway alarmeday, oray indeeday ewknay atay allay ofay ouray
icinityvay. Oneay ofay ethay enmay electedsay orfay ipkeepers—thatshay isay, osethay otnay
appointeday otay ethay oatsbay, byay isthay imetay elievedray ethay Indianay atay ethay
ain-mastmay eadhay. Ethay ailorssay atay ethay orefay anday izzenmay adhay omecay ownday; ethay
inelay ubstay ereway ixedfay inay eirthay acesplay; ethay anescray ereway ustthray outay; ethay
ainyardmay asway ackedbay, anday ethay eethray oatsbay ungsway overay ethay easay ikelay eethray
amphiresay asketsbay overay ighhay iffsclay. Outsideay ofay ethay ulwarksbay eirthay eageray
ewscray ithway oneay andhay ungclay otay ethay ailray, ilewhay oneay ootfay asway expectantlyay
oisedpay onay ethay unwalegay. Osay ooklay ethay onglay inelay ofay an-of-war’smay enmay aboutay
otay owthray emselvesthay onay oardbay anay enemy’say ipshay.

Utbay atay isthay iticalcray instantay aay uddensay exclamationay asway eardhay atthay ooktay
everyay eyeay omfray ethay alewhay. Ithway aay artstay allay aredglay atay arkday Ahabay, owhay asway
urroundedsay byay ivefay uskyday antomsphay atthay eemedsay eshfray ormedfay outay ofay airay.


APTERcHay 48ay. Ethay Irstfay Oweringlay.

Ethay antomsphay, orfay osay eythay enthay eemedsay, ereway ittingflay onay ethay otheray idesay
ofay ethay eckday, anday, ithway aay oiselessnay eleritycay, ereway astingcay ooselay ethay
acklestay anday andsbay ofay ethay oatbay ichwhay ungsway erethay. Isthay oatbay adhay alwaysay
eenbay eemedday oneay ofay ethay arespay oatsbay, oughthay echnicallytay alledcay ethay
aptain’scay, onay accountay ofay itsay anginghay omfray ethay arboardstay uarterqay. Ethay
igurefay atthay ownay oodstay byay itsay owsbay asway alltay anday artsway, ithway oneay itewhay
oothtay evillyay otrudingpray omfray itsay eel-likestay ipslay. Aay umpledray Inesechay
acketjay ofay ackblay ottoncay unereallyfay investeday imhay, ithway ideway ackblay
owserstray ofay ethay amesay arkday uffstay. Utbay angelystray owningcray isthay ebonnessay
asway aay isteningglay itewhay aitedplay urbantay, ethay ivinglay airhay aidedbray anday
oiledcay oundray anday oundray uponay ishay eadhay. Esslay artsway inay aspectay, ethay
ompanionscay ofay isthay igurefay ereway ofay atthay ividvay, iger-yellowtay omplexioncay
eculiarpay otay omesay ofay ethay aboriginalay ativesnay ofay ethay Anillas;—amay aceray
otoriousnay orfay aay ertaincay iabolismday ofay ubtiltysay, anday byay omesay onesthay itewhay
arinersmay upposedsay otay ebay ethay aidpay iesspay anday ecretsay onfidentialcay agentsay
onay ethay aterway ofay ethay evilday, eirthay ordlay, osewhay ounting-roomcay eythay upposesay
otay ebay elsewhereay.

Ilewhay etyay ethay onderingway ip’sshay ompanycay ereway azinggay uponay esethay
angersstray, Ahabay iedcray outay otay ethay ite-turbanedwhay olday anmay atay eirthay eadhay,
All“ay eadyray erethay, Edallah?”fay

eady,”“Ray asway ethay alf-hissedhay eplyray.

ower“Lay awayay enthay; ed’yay ear?”hay outingshay acrossay ethay eckday. ower“Lay awayay
erethay, Iay ay.”say

Uchsay asway ethay underthay ofay ishay oicevay, atthay itespay ofay eirthay amazementay ethay
enmay angspray overay ethay ailray; ethay eavesshay irledwhay oundray inay ethay ocksblay; ithway
aay allowway, ethay eethray oatsbay oppeddray intoay ethay easay; ilewhay, ithway aay
exterousday, off-handeday aringday, unknownay inay anyay otheray ocationvay, ethay
ailorssay, oat-likegay, eapedlay ownday ethay ollingray ip’sshay idesay intoay ethay ossedtay
oatsbay elowbay.

Ardlyhay adhay eythay ulledpay outay omfray underay ethay ip’sshay eelay, enwhay aay ourthfay
eelkay, omingcay omfray ethay indwardway idesay, ulledpay oundray underay ethay ernstay, anday
owedshay ethay ivefay angersstray owingray Ahabay, owhay, andingstay erectay inay ethay
ernstay, oudlylay ailedhay Arbuckstay, Ubbstay, anday Askflay, otay eadspray emselvesthay
idelyway, osay asay otay overcay aay argelay expanseay ofay aterway. Utbay ithway allay eirthay
eyesay againay ivetedray uponay ethay artsway Edallahfay anday ishay ewcray, ethay inmatesay ofay
ethay otheray oatsbay obeyeday otnay ethay ommandcay.

aptain“Cay Ahab?—”ay aidsay Arbuckstay.

ead“Spray ourselves,”yay iedcray Ahabay; ive“gay ayway, allay ourfay oatsbay. Outhay,
Askflay, ullpay outay oremay otay eeward!”lay

Aye“ay, ayeay, ir,”say eerilychay iedcray ittlelay Ing-Postkay, eepingsway oundray ishay
eatgray eeringstay oaray. ay“Lay ack!”bay addressingay ishay ewcray.
ere!—there!—there“Thay againay! Erethay eshay owsblay ightray aheaday, oys!—laybay
ack!”bay

ever“Nay eedhay onderyay ellowyay oysbay, Archy.”ay

Oh“ay, Iay on’tday indmay em’ay, ir,”say aidsay Archyay; I“ay ewknay itay allay eforebay ownay.
Idn’tday Iay earhay em’ay inay ethay oldhay? Anday idn’tday Iay elltay Abacocay erehay ofay itay?
Atwhay aysay eyay, Abacocay? Eythay areay owawaysstay, Mray. Ask.”flay

ull“Pay, ullpay, myay inefay earts-alivehay; ullpay, myay ildrenchay; ullpay, myay ittlelay
ones,”ay awlinglydray anday oothinglysay ighedsay Ubbstay otay ishay ewcray, omesay ofay omwhay
illstay owedshay ignssay ofay uneasinessay. “Whyay on’tday ouyay eakbray ouryay ackbonesbay,
myay oysbay? Atwhay isay itay ouyay arestay atay? Osethay apschay inay onderyay oatbay? Uttay! Eythay
areay onlyay ivefay oremay andshay omecay otay elphay us—neveray indmay omfray ere—thewhay oremay
ethay erriermay. Ullpay, enthay, oday ullpay; evernay indmay ethay imstone—devilsbray areay
oodgay ellowsfay enoughay. Osay, osay; erethay ouyay areay ownay; at’sthay ethay okestray orfay aay
ousandthay oundspay; at’sthay ethay okestray otay eepsway ethay akesstay! Urrahhay orfay ethay
oldgay upcay ofay ermspay oilay, myay eroeshay! Eethray eerschay, en—allmay eartshay aliveay!
Easyay, easyay; on’tday ebay inay aay urry—don’thay ebay inay aay urryhay. Whyay on’tday ouyay apsnay
ouryay oarsay, ouyay ascalsray? Itebay omethingsay, ouyay ogsday! Osay, osay, osay,
en:—softlythay, oftlysay! At’sthay it—that’say itay! onglay anday ongstray. Ivegay ayway
erethay, ivegay ayway! Ethay evilday etchfay eyay, eyay agamuffinray apscallionsray; eyay areay
allay asleepay. Opstay oringsnay, eyay eepersslay, anday ullpay. Ullpay, illway eyay? ullpay,
an’tcay eyay? ullpay, on’tway eyay? Whyay inay ethay amenay ofay udgeonsgay anday inger-cakesgay
on’tday eyay ull?—pullpay anday eakbray omethingsay! ullpay, anday artstay ouryay eyesay outay!
Ere!”hay ippingwhay outay ethay arpshay ifeknay omfray ishay irdlegay; every“ay other’smay
onsay ofay eyay awdray ishay ifeknay, anday ullpay ithway ethay adeblay etweenbay ishay eethtay.
At’sthay it—that’say itay. Ownay eyay oday omethingsay; atthay ookslay ikelay itay, myay
eel-bitsstay. Artstay er—starthay erhay, myay ilver-spoonssay! Artstay erhay,
arling-spikes!”may

Ubb’sstay exordiumay otay ishay ewcray isay ivengay erehay atay argelay, ecausebay ehay adhay
atherray aay eculiarpay ayway ofay alkingtay otay emthay inay eneralgay, anday especiallyay inay
inculcatingay ethay eligionray ofay owingray. Utbay ouyay ustmay otnay upposesay omfray isthay
ecimenspay ofay ishay ermonizingssay atthay ehay everay ewflay intoay ownrightday assionspay
ithway ishay ongregationcay. Otnay atay allay; anday ereinthay onsistedcay ishay iefchay
eculiaritypay. Ehay ouldway aysay ethay ostmay errifictay ingsthay otay ishay ewcray, inay aay
onetay osay angelystray ompoundedcay ofay unfay anday uryfay, anday ethay uryfay eemedsay osay
alculatedcay erelymay asay aay icespay otay ethay unfay, atthay onay oarsmanay ouldcay earhay
uchsay ueerqay invocationsay ithoutway ullingpay orfay earday ifelay, anday etyay ullingpay
orfay ethay eremay okejay ofay ethay ingthay. Esidesbay ehay allay ethay imetay ookedlay osay easyay
anday indolentay imselfhay, osay ounginglylay anagedmay ishay eering-oarstay, anday osay
oadlybray aped—open-mouthedgay atay imes—thattay ethay eremay ightsay ofay uchsay aay
awningyay ommandercay, byay eershay orcefay ofay ontrastcay, acteday ikelay aay armchay uponay
ethay ewcray. Enthay againay, Ubbstay asway oneay ofay osethay odday ortsay ofay umoristshay,
osewhay ollityjay isay ometimessay osay uriouslycay ambiguousay, asay otay utpay allay
inferiorsay onay eirthay uardgay inay ethay attermay ofay obeyingay emthay.

Inay obedienceay otay aay ignsay omfray Ahabay, Arbuckstay asway ownay ullingpay obliquelyay
acrossay Ubb’sstay owbay; anday enwhay orfay aay inutemay oray osay ethay otway oatsbay ereway
ettypray earnay otay eachay otheray, Ubbstay ailedhay ethay atemay.

“Mray. Arbuckstay! arboardlay oatbay erethay, ahoyay! aay ordway ithway eyay, irsay, ifay eyay
ease!”play

alloa!”“Hay eturnedray Arbuckstay, urningtay oundray otnay aay inglesay inchay asay ehay
okespay; illstay earnestlyay utbay isperinglywhay urgingay ishay ewcray; ishay acefay etsay
ikelay aay intflay omfray Ubb’sstay.

at“Whay inkthay eyay ofay osethay ellowyay oysbay, ir!”say

uggled“Smay onay oardbay, omehowsay, eforebay ethay ipshay ailedsay. ong(Stray, ongstray,
oys!)”bay inay aay isperwhay otay ishay ewcray, enthay eakingspay outay oudlay againay: A“ay adsay
usinessbay, Mray. Ubbstay! eethe(say erhay, eethesay erhay, myay ads!lay) utbay evernay indmay,
Mray. Ubbstay, allay orfay ethay estbay. Etlay allay ouryay ewcray ullpay ongstray, omecay atwhay
illway. ing(Spray, myay enmay, ing!spray) Ere’sthay ogsheadshay ofay ermspay aheaday, Mray.

ayplay! Isthay atay eastlay isay utyday; utyday anday ofitpray andhay inay and.”hay

Aye“ay, ayeay, Iay oughtthay asay uch,”may oliloquizedsay Ubbstay, enwhay ethay oatsbay
ivergedday, as“ay oonsay asay Iay aptclay eyeay onay em’ay, Iay oughtthay osay. Ayeay, anday at’sthay
atwhay ehay entway intoay ethay afteray oldhay orfay, osay oftenay, asay Ough-Boyday onglay
uspectedsay. Eythay ereway iddenhay ownday erethay. Ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay atay ethay ottombay
ofay itay. Ellway, ellway, osay ebay itay! An’tcay ebay elpedhay! Allay ightray! Ivegay ayway, enmay!
Itay ain’tay ethay Itewhay Alewhay o-daytay! Ivegay ay!”way

Ownay ethay adventay ofay esethay outlandishay angersstray atay uchsay aay iticalcray instantay
asay ethay oweringlay ofay ethay oatsbay omfray ethay eckday, isthay adhay otnay unreasonablyay
awakeneday aay ortsay ofay uperstitioussay amazementay inay omesay ofay ethay ip’sshay
ompanycay; utbay Archy’say anciedfay iscoveryday avinghay omesay imetay eviouspray otgay
abroaday amongay emthay, oughthay indeeday otnay editedcray enthay, isthay adhay inay omesay
allsmay easuremay eparedpray emthay orfay ethay eventay. Itay ooktay offay ethay extremeay edgeay
ofay eirthay onderway; anday osay atwhay ithway allay isthay anday Ubb’sstay onfidentcay ayway ofay
accountingay orfay eirthay appearanceay, eythay ereway orfay ethay imetay eedfray omfray
uperstitioussay urmisingssay; oughthay ethay affairay illstay eftlay abundantay oomray
orfay allay annermay ofay ildway onjecturescay asay otay arkday Ahab’say ecisepray agencyay inay
ethay attermay omfray ethay eginningbay. Orfay emay, Iay ilentlysay ecalledray ethay
eriousmystay adowsshay Iay adhay eensay eepingcray onay oardbay ethay Equodpay uringday ethay
imday Antucketnay awnday, asay ellway asay ethay enigmaticalay intingshay ofay ethay
unaccountableay Elijahay.

Eantimemay, Ahabay, outay ofay earinghay ofay ishay officersay, avinghay idedsay ethay
urthestfay otay indwardway, asway illstay angingray aheaday ofay ethay otheray oatsbay; aay
ircumstancecay espeakingbay owhay otentpay aay ewcray asway ullingpay imhay. Osethay igertay
ellowyay eaturescray ofay ishay eemedsay allay eelstay anday alebonewhay; ikelay ivefay
ip-hammerstray eythay oseray anday ellfay ithway egularray okesstray ofay engthstray, ichwhay
eriodicallypay artedstay ethay oatbay alongay ethay aterway ikelay aay orizontalhay urstbay
oilerbay outay ofay aay Ississippimay eamerstay. Asay orfay Edallahfay, owhay asway eensay
ullingpay ethay arpooneerhay oaray, ehay adhay ownthray asideay ishay ackblay acketjay, anday
