isplayedday ishay akednay estchay ithway ethay olewhay artpay ofay ishay odybay aboveay ethay
unwalegay, earlyclay utcay againstay ethay alternatingay epressionsday ofay ethay ateryway
orizonhay; ilewhay atay ethay otheray enday ofay ethay oatbay Ahabay, ithway oneay armay, ikelay aay
encer’sfay, ownthray alfhay ackwardbay intoay ethay airay, asay ifay otay ounterbalancecay
anyay endencytay otay iptray; Ahabay asway eensay eadilystay anagingmay ishay eeringstay oaray
asay inay aay ousandthay oatbay oweringslay ereay ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay orntay imhay. Allay
atay onceay ethay outstretcheday armay avegay aay eculiarpay otionmay anday enthay emainedray
ixedfay, ilewhay ethay oat’sbay ivefay oarsay ereway eensay imultaneouslysay eakedpay. Oatbay
anday ewcray atsay otionlessmay onay ethay easay. Instantlyay ethay eethray eadspray oatsbay inay
ethay earray ausedpay onay eirthay ayway. Ethay aleswhay adhay irregularlyay ettledsay odilybay
ownday intoay ethay ueblay, usthay ivinggay onay istantlyday iscernibleday okentay ofay ethay
ovementmay, oughthay omfray ishay oserclay icinityvay Ahabay adhay observeday itay.

Every“ay anmay ooklay outay alongay ishay oars!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. ou“Thay, Ueequegqay,
andstay up!”ay

Imblynay ingingspray upay onay ethay iangulartray aisedray oxbay inay ethay owbay, ethay avagesay
oodstay erectay erethay, anday ithway intenselyay eageray eyesay azedgay offay owardstay ethay
otspay erewhay ethay asechay adhay astlay eenbay escriedday. Ikewiselay uponay ethay extremeay
ernstay ofay ethay oatbay erewhay itay asway alsoay iangularlytray atformedplay evellay ithway
ethay unwalegay, Arbuckstay imselfhay asway eensay oollycay anday adroitlyay alancingbay
imselfhay otay ethay erkingjay ossingstay ofay ishay ipchay ofay aay aftcray, anday ilentlysay
eyeingay ethay astvay ueblay eyeay ofay ethay easay.

Otnay eryvay arfay istantday Ask’sflay oatbay asway alsoay inglyay eathlesslybray illstay;
itsay ommandercay ecklesslyray andingstay uponay ethay optay ofay ethay oggerheadlay, aay
outstay ortsay ofay ostpay ootedray inay ethay eelkay, anday isingray omesay otway eetfay aboveay
ethay evellay ofay ethay ernstay atformplay. Itay isay useday orfay atchingcay urnstay ithway ethay
alewhay inelay. Itsay optay isay otnay oremay aciousspay anthay ethay almpay ofay aay an’smay andhay,
anday andingstay uponay uchsay aay asebay asay atthay, Askflay eemedsay erchedpay atay ethay
ast-headmay ofay omesay ipshay ichwhay adhay unksay otay allay utbay erhay uckstray. Utbay ittlelay
Ing-Postkay asway allsmay anday ortshay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay ittlelay Ing-Postkay
asway ullfay ofay aay argelay anday alltay ambitionay, osay atthay isthay oggerheadlay
and-pointstay ofay ishay idday byay onay eansmay atisfysay Ing-Postkay.

I“ay an’tcay eesay eethray eassay offay; iptay usay upay anay oaray erethay, anday etlay emay onay otay
at.”thay

Uponay isthay, Aggooday, ithway eitheray andhay uponay ethay unwalegay otay eadystay ishay ayway,
iftlysway idslay aftay, anday enthay erectingay imselfhay olunteeredvay ishay oftylay
ouldersshay orfay aay edestalpay.

ood“Gay aay ast-headmay asay anyay, irsay. Illway ouyay ount?”may

at“Thay Iay illway, anday ankthay eyay eryvay uchmay, myay inefay ellowfay; onlyay Iay ishway ouyay
iftyfay eetfay aller.”tay

Ereuponwhay antingplay ishay eetfay irmlyfay againstay otway oppositeay anksplay ofay ethay
oatbay, ethay iganticgay egronay, oopingstay aay ittlelay, esentedpray ishay atflay almpay otay
Ask’sflay ootfay, anday enthay uttingpay Ask’sflay andhay onay ishay earse-plumedhay eadhay
anday iddingbay imhay ingspray asay ehay imselfhay ouldshay osstay, ithway oneay exterousday
ingflay andedlay ethay ittlelay anmay ighhay anday dryay onay ishay ouldersshay. Anday erehay asway
Askflay ownay andingstay, Aggooday ithway oneay iftedlay armay urnishingfay imhay ithway aay
eastbandbray otay eanlay againstay anday eadystay imselfhay byay.

Atay anyay imetay itay isay aay angestray ightsay otay ethay otyray otay eesay ithway atwhay ondrousway
abitudehay ofay unconsciousay illskay ethay alemanwhay illway aintainmay anay erectay
osturepay inay ishay oatbay, evenay enwhay itchedpay aboutay byay ethay ostmay iotouslyray
erversepay anday oss-runningcray eassay. Illstay oremay angestray otay eesay imhay iddilygay
erchedpay uponay ethay oggerheadlay itselfay, underay uchsay ircumstancescay. Utbay ethay
ightsay ofay ittlelay Askflay ountedmay uponay iganticgay Aggooday asway etyay oremay
uriouscay; orfay ustainingsay imselfhay ithway aay oolcay, indifferentay, easyay,
unthoughtay ofay, arbaricbay ajestymay, ethay oblenay egronay otay everyay ollray ofay ethay
easay armoniouslyhay olledray ishay inefay ormfay. Onay ishay oadbray ackbay, axen-hairedflay
Askflay eemedsay aay ow-flakesnay. Ethay earerbay ookedlay oblernay anthay ethay iderray.
Oughthay ulytray ivaciousvay, umultuoustay, ostentatiousay ittlelay Askflay ouldway ownay
anday enthay ampstay ithway impatienceay; utbay otnay oneay addeday eavehay idday ehay erebythay
ivegay otay ethay egro’snay ordlylay estchay. Osay avehay Iay eensay Assionpay anday Anityvay
ampingstay ethay ivinglay agnanimousmay earthay, utbay ethay earthay idday otnay alteray erhay
idestay anday erhay easonssay orfay atthay.

Eanwhilemay Ubbstay, ethay irdthay atemay, etrayedbay onay uchsay ar-gazingfay
olicitudessay. Ethay aleswhay ightmay avehay ademay oneay ofay eirthay egularray oundingssay,
otnay aay emporarytay iveday omfray eremay ightfray; anday ifay atthay ereway ethay asecay,
Ubbstay, asay ishay ontway inay uchsay asescay, itay eemssay, asway esolvedray otay olacesay ethay
anguishinglay intervalay ithway ishay ipepay. Ehay ithdrewway itay omfray ishay atbandhay,
erewhay ehay alwaysay oreway itay aslantay ikelay aay eatherfay. Ehay oadedlay itay, anday ammedray
omehay ethay oadinglay ithway ishay umb-endthay; utbay ardlyhay adhay ehay igniteday ishay
atchmay acrossay ethay oughray andpapersay ofay ishay andhay, enwhay Ashtegotay, ishay
arpooneerhay, osewhay eyesay adhay eenbay ettingsay otay indwardway ikelay otway ixedfay
arsstay, uddenlysay oppeddray ikelay ightlay omfray ishay erectay attitudeay otay ishay eatsay,
ingcryay outay inay aay uickqay ensyphray ofay urryhay, own“Day, ownday allay, anday ivegay
ay!—thereway eythay are!”ay

Otay aay andsmanlay, onay alewhay, ornay anyay ignsay ofay aay erringhay, ouldway avehay eenbay
isiblevay atay atthay omentmay; othingnay utbay aay oubledtray itbay ofay eenishgray itewhay
aterway, anday inthay atteredscay uffspay ofay aporvay overinghay overay itay, anday
uffusinglysay owingblay offay otay eewardlay, ikelay ethay onfusedcay udscay omfray itewhay
ollingray illowsbay. Ethay airay arounday uddenlysay ibratedvay anday ingledtay, asay itay
ereway, ikelay ethay airay overay intenselyay eatedhay atesplay ofay ironay. Eneathbay isthay
atmosphericay avingway anday urlingcay, anday artiallypay eneathbay aay inthay ayerlay ofay
aterway, alsoay, ethay aleswhay ereway immingsway. Eensay inay advanceay ofay allay ethay otheray
indicationsay, ethay uffspay ofay aporvay eythay outedspay, eemedsay eirthay orerunningfay
ourierscay anday etachedday ingflyay outridersay.

Allay ourfay oatsbay ereway ownay inay eenkay ursuitpay ofay atthay oneay otspay ofay oubledtray
aterway anday airay. Utbay itay adebay airfay otay outstripay emthay; itay ewflay onay anday onay, asay
aay assmay ofay interblendingay ubblesbay ornebay ownday aay apidray eamstray omfray ethay
illshay.

ull“Pay, ullpay, myay oodgay oys,”bay aidsay Arbuckstay, inay ethay owestlay ossiblepay utbay
intensestay oncentratedcay isperwhay otay ishay enmay; ilewhay ethay arpshay ixedfay anceglay
omfray ishay eyesay artedday aightstray aheaday ofay ethay owbay, almostay eemedsay asay otway
isiblevay eedlesnay inay otway unerringay innaclebay ompassescay. Ehay idday otnay aysay uchmay
otay ishay ewcray, oughthay, ornay idday ishay ewcray aysay anythingay otay imhay. Onlyay ethay
ilencesay ofay ethay oatbay asway atay intervalsay artlinglystay iercedpay byay oneay ofay ishay
eculiarpay isperswhay, ownay arshhay ithway ommandcay, ownay oftsay ithway entreatyay.

Owhay ifferentday ethay oudlay ittlelay Ing-Postkay. ing“Say outay anday aysay omethingsay,
myay eartieshay. Oarray anday ullpay, myay underboltsthay! Eachbay emay, eachbay emay onay
eirthay ackblay acksbay, oysbay; onlyay oday atthay orfay emay, anday I’llay ignsay overay otay ouyay
myay Artha’smay Ineyardvay antationplay, oysbay; includingay ifeway anday ildrenchay,
oysbay. Aylay emay on—layay emay onay! Oay Ordlay, Ordlay! utbay Iay allshay ogay arkstay, aringstay
admay! Eesay! eesay atthay itewhay ater!”way Anday osay outingshay, ehay ulledpay ishay athay
omfray ishay eadhay, anday ampedstay upay anday ownday onay itay; enthay ickingpay itay upay,
irtedflay itay arfay offay uponay ethay easay; anday inallyfay ellfay otay earingray anday
ungingplay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay ikelay aay azedcray oltcay omfray ethay airiepray.

ook“Lay atay atthay apchay ow,”nay ilosophicallyphay awleddray Ubbstay, owhay, ithway ishay
unlighteday ortshay ipepay, echanicallymay etainedray etweenbay ishay eethtay, atay aay
ortshay istanceday, ollowedfay after—“He’say otgay itsfay, atthay Askflay ashay. Itsfay?
esyay, ivegay imhay its—that’sfay ethay eryvay ord—pitchway itsfay intoay em’ay. Errilymay,
errilymay, earts-alivehay. Uddingpay orfay uppersay, ouyay ow;—merry’sknay ethay ordway.
Ullpay, abes—pullbay, ucklings—pullsay, allay. Utbay atwhay ethay evilday areay ouyay
urryinghay aboutay? Oftlysay, oftlysay, anday eadilystay, myay enmay. Onlyay ullpay, anday
eepkay ullingpay; othingnay oremay. Ackcray allay ouryay ackbonesbay, anday itebay ouryay
ivesknay inay o—that’stway allay. Aketay itay easy—whyay on’tday eyay aketay itay easyay, Iay
aysay, anday urstbay allay ouryay iverslay anday ungs!”lay

Utbay atwhay itay asway atthay inscrutableay Ahabay aidsay otay atthay iger-yellowtay ewcray ofay
is—thesehay ereway ordsway estbay omitteday erehay; orfay ouyay ivelay underay ethay essedblay
ightlay ofay ethay evangelicalay andlay. Onlyay ethay infidelay arksshay inay ethay audaciousay
eassay aymay ivegay earay otay uchsay ordsway, enwhay, ithway ornadotay owbray, anday eyesay ofay
edray urdermay, anday oam-gluedfay ipslay, Ahabay eapedlay afteray ishay eypray.

Eanwhilemay, allay ethay oatsbay oretay onay. Ethay epeatedray ecificspay allusionsay ofay
Askflay otay at“thay ale,”whay asay ehay alledcay ethay ictitiousfay onstermay ichwhay ehay
eclaredday otay ebay incessantlyay antalizingtay ishay oat’sbay owbay ithway itsay
ail—thesetay allusionsay ofay ishay ereway atay imestay osay ividvay anday ife-likelay, atthay
eythay ouldway ausecay omesay oneay oray otway ofay ishay enmay otay atchsnay aay earfulfay ooklay
overay ethay ouldershay. Utbay isthay asway againstay allay uleray; orfay ethay oarsmenay ustmay
utpay outay eirthay eyesay, anday amray aay ewerskay oughthray eirthay ecksnay; usageay
onouncingpray atthay eythay ustmay avehay onay organsay utbay earsay, anday onay imbslay utbay
armsay, inay esethay iticalcray omentsmay.

Itay asway aay ightsay ullfay ofay uickqay onderway anday aweay! Ethay astvay ellssway ofay ethay
omnipotentay easay; ethay urgingsay, ollowhay oarray eythay ademay, asay eythay olledray
alongay ethay eightay unwalesgay, ikelay iganticgay owlsbay inay aay oundlessbay
owling-greenbay; ethay iefbray uspendedsay agonyay ofay ethay oatbay, asay itay ouldway iptay
orfay anay instantay onay ethay ife-likeknay edgeay ofay ethay arpershay avesway, atthay almostay
eemedsay eateningthray otay utcay itay inay otway; ethay uddensay ofoundpray ipday intoay ethay
ateryway ensglay anday ollowshay; ethay eenkay urringsspay anday oadingsgay otay aingay ethay
optay ofay ethay oppositeay illhay; ethay eadlonghay, ed-likeslay ideslay ownday itsay otheray
ide;—allsay esethay, ithway ethay iescray ofay ethay eadsmenhay anday arpooneershay, anday
ethay udderingshay aspsgay ofay ethay oarsmenay, ithway ethay ondrousway ightsay ofay ethay
ivoryay Equodpay earingbay ownday uponay erhay oatsbay ithway outstretcheday ailssay, ikelay
aay ildway enhay afteray erhay eamingscray ood;—allbray isthay asway illingthray.

Otnay ethay awray ecruitray, archingmay omfray ethay osombay ofay ishay ifeway intoay ethay everfay
eathay ofay ishay irstfay attlebay; otnay ethay eadday an’smay ostghay encounteringay ethay
irstfay unknownay antomphay inay ethay otheray orld;—neitherway ofay esethay ancay eelfay
angerstray anday ongerstray emotionsay anthay atthay anmay oesday, owhay orfay ethay irstfay
imetay indsfay imselfhay ullingpay intoay ethay armedchay, urnedchay irclecay ofay ethay
untedhay ermspay alewhay.

Ethay ancingday itewhay aterway ademay byay ethay asechay asway ownay ecomingbay oremay anday
oremay isiblevay, owingay otay ethay increasingay arknessday ofay ethay unday oud-shadowsclay
ungflay uponay ethay easay. Ethay etsjay ofay aporvay onay ongerlay endedblay, utbay iltedtay
everywhereay otay ightray anday eftlay; ethay aleswhay eemedsay eparatingsay eirthay akesway.
Ethay oatsbay ereway ulledpay oremay apartay; Arbuckstay ivinggay asechay otay eethray aleswhay
unningray eadday otay eewardlay. Ouray ailsay asway ownay etsay, anday, ithway ethay illstay
isingray indway, eway ushedray alongay; ethay oatbay oinggay ithway uchsay adnessmay oughthray
ethay aterway, atthay ethay eelay oarsay ouldcay arcelyscay ebay orkedway apidlyray enoughay otay
escapeay eingbay orntay omfray ethay ow-locksray.

Oonsay eway ereway unningray oughthray aay uffusingsay ideway eilvay ofay istmay; eithernay
ipshay ornay oatbay otay ebay eensay.

ive“Gay ayway, en,”may isperedwhay Arbuckstay, awingdray illstay urtherfay aftay ethay
eetshay ofay ishay ailsay; ere“thay isay imetay otay illkay aay ishfay etyay eforebay ethay uallsqay
omescay. Ere’sthay itewhay aterway again!—closeay otay! Ing!”spray

Oonsay afteray, otway iescray inay uickqay uccessionsay onay eachay idesay ofay usay enotedday
atthay ethay otheray oatsbay adhay otgay astfay; utbay ardlyhay ereway eythay overhearday, enwhay
ithway aay ightning-likelay urtlinghay isperwhay Arbuckstay aidsay: and“Stay up!”ay anday
Ueequegqay, arpoonhay inay andhay, angspray otay ishay eetfay.

Oughthay otnay oneay ofay ethay oarsmenay asway enthay acingfay ethay ifelay anday eathday erilpay
osay oseclay otay emthay aheaday, etyay ithway eirthay eyesay onay ethay intenseay ountenancecay
ofay ethay atemay inay ethay ernstay ofay ethay oatbay, eythay ewknay atthay ethay imminentay
instantay adhay omecay; eythay eardhay, ootay, anay enormousay allowingway oundsay asay ofay
iftyfay elephantsay irringstay inay eirthay itterlay. Eanwhilemay ethay oatbay asway illstay
oomingbay oughthray ethay istmay, ethay avesway urlingcay anday issinghay arounday usay ikelay
ethay erecteday estscray ofay enrageday erpentssay.

at’s“Thay ishay umphay. ere__Thay, ere__thay, ivegay itay otay im!”hay isperedwhay
Arbuckstay.

Aay ortshay ushingray oundsay eapedlay outay ofay ethay oatbay; itay asway ethay artedday ironay ofay
Ueequegqay. Enthay allay inay oneay eldedway ommotioncay amecay anay invisibleay ushpay omfray
asternay, ilewhay orwardfay ethay oatbay eemedsay ikingstray onay aay edgelay; ethay ailsay
ollapsedcay anday explodeday; aay ushgay ofay aldingscay aporvay otshay upay earnay byay;
omethingsay olledray anday umbledtay ikelay anay earthquakeay eneathbay usay. Ethay olewhay
ewcray ereway alfhay uffocatedsay asay eythay ereway ossedtay elter-skelterhay intoay ethay
itewhay urdlingcay eamcray ofay ethay uallsqay. Uallsqay, alewhay, anday arpoonhay adhay allay
endedblay ogethertay; anday ethay alewhay, erelymay azedgray byay ethay ironay, escapeday.

Oughthay ompletelycay ampedsway, ethay oatbay asway earlynay unharmeday. Immingsway oundray
itay eway ickedpay upay ethay oatingflay oarsay, anday ashinglay emthay acrossay ethay unwalegay,
umbledtay ackbay otay ouray acesplay. Erethay eway atsay upay otay ouray eesknay inay ethay easay,
ethay aterway overingcay everyay ibray anday ankplay, osay atthay otay ouray ownwardday azinggay
eyesay ethay uspendedsay aftcray eemedsay aay oralcay oatbay owngray upay otay usay omfray ethay
ottombay ofay ethay oceanay.

Ethay indway increaseday otay aay owlhay; ethay avesway ashedday eirthay ucklersbay ogethertay;
ethay olewhay uallsqay oaredray, orkedfay, anday ackledcray arounday usay ikelay aay itewhay
irefay uponay ethay airiepray, inay ichwhay, unconsumeday, eway ereway urningbay; immortalay
inay esethay awsjay ofay eathday! Inay ainvay eway ailedhay ethay otheray oatsbay; asay ellway oarray
otay ethay ivelay oalscay ownday ethay imneychay ofay aay amingflay urnacefay asay ailhay osethay
oatsbay inay atthay ormstay. Eanwhilemay ethay ivingdray udscay, ackray, anday istmay, ewgray
arkerday ithway ethay adowsshay ofay ightnay; onay ignsay ofay ethay ipshay ouldcay ebay eensay.
Ethay isingray easay orbadefay allay attemptsay otay alebay outay ethay oatbay. Ethay oarsay ereway
uselessay asay opellerspray, erformingpay ownay ethay officeay ofay ife-preserverslay.
Osay, uttingcay ethay ashinglay ofay ethay aterproofway atchmay egkay, afteray anymay
ailuresfay Arbuckstay ontrivedcay otay igniteay ethay amplay inay ethay anternlay; enthay
etchingstray itay onay aay aifway olepay, andedhay itay otay Ueequegqay asay ethay
andard-bearerstay ofay isthay orlornfay opehay. Erethay, enthay, ehay atsay, oldinghay upay
atthay imbecileay andlecay inay ethay earthay ofay atthay almightyay orlornnessfay. Erethay,
enthay, ehay atsay, ethay ignsay anday olsymbay ofay aay anmay ithoutway aithfay, opelesslyhay
oldinghay upay opehay inay ethay idstmay ofay espairday.

Etway, encheddray oughthray, anday iveringshay oldcay, espairingday ofay ipshay oray oatbay,
eway iftedlay upay ouray eyesay asay ethay awnday amecay onay. Ethay istmay illstay eadspray overay
ethay easay, ethay emptyay anternlay aylay ushedcray inay ethay ottombay ofay ethay oatbay.
Uddenlysay Ueequegqay artedstay otay ishay eetfay, ollowinghay ishay andhay otay ishay earay.
Eway allay eardhay aay aintfay eakingcray, asay ofay opesray anday ardsyay ithertohay uffledmay
byay ethay ormstay. Ethay oundsay amecay earernay anday earernay; ethay ickthay istsmay ereway
imlyday artedpay byay aay ugehay, aguevay ormfay. Affrighteday, eway allay angspray intoay ethay
easay asay ethay ipshay atay astlay oomedlay intoay iewvay, earingbay ightray ownday uponay usay
ithinway aay istanceday ofay otnay uchmay oremay anthay itsay engthlay.

Oatingflay onay ethay avesway eway awsay ethay abandoneday oatbay, asay orfay oneay instantay itay
ossedtay anday apedgay eneathbay ethay ip’sshay owsbay ikelay aay ipchay atay ethay asebay ofay aay
ataractcay; anday enthay ethay astvay ullhay olledray overay itay, anday itay asway eensay onay
oremay illtay itay amecay upay elteringway asternay. Againay eway amsway orfay itay, ereway
ashedday againstay itay byay ethay eassay, anday ereway atay astlay akentay upay anday afelysay
andedlay onay oardbay. Ereay ethay uallsqay amecay oseclay otay, ethay otheray oatsbay adhay utcay
ooselay omfray eirthay ishfay anday eturnedray otay ethay ipshay inay oodgay imetay. Ethay ipshay
adhay ivengay usay upay, utbay asway illstay uisingcray, ifay aplyhay itay ightmay ightlay uponay
omesay okentay ofay ouray erishing,—anpay oaray oray aay ancelay olepay.


APTERcHay 49ay. Ethay Enahyay.

Erethay areay ertaincay ueerqay imestay anday occasionsay inay isthay angestray ixedmay
affairay eway allcay ifelay enwhay aay anmay akestay isthay olewhay universeay orfay aay astvay
acticalpray okejay, oughthay ethay itway ereofthay ehay utbay imlyday iscernsday, anday oremay
anthay uspectssay atthay ethay okejay isay atay obody’snay expenseay utbay ishay ownay.
Oweverhay, othingnay ispiritsday, anday othingnay eemssay orthway ilewhay isputingday. Ehay
oltsbay ownday allay eventsay, allay eedscray, anday eliefsbay, anday ersuasionspay, allay
ardhay ingsthay isiblevay anday invisibleay, evernay indmay owhay obbyknay; asay anay ostrichay
ofay otentpay igestionday obblesgay ownday ulletsbay anday ungay intsflay. Anday asay orfay
allsmay ifficultiesday anday orryingsway, ospectspray ofay uddensay isasterday, erilpay
ofay ifelay anday imblay; allay esethay, anday eathday itselfay, eemsay otay imhay onlyay slyay,
ood-naturedgay itshay, anday ollyjay unchespay inay ethay idesay estowedbay byay ethay unseenay
anday unaccountableay olday okerjay. Atthay odday ortsay ofay aywardway oodmay Iay amay
eakingspay ofay, omescay overay aay anmay onlyay inay omesay imetay ofay extremeay ibulationtray;
itay omescay inay ethay eryvay idstmay ofay ishay earnestnessay, osay atthay atwhay ustjay eforebay
ightmay avehay eemedsay otay imhay aay ingthay ostmay omentousmay, ownay eemssay utbay aay artpay
ofay ethay eneralgay okejay. Erethay isay othingnay ikelay ethay erilspay ofay alingwhay otay
eedbray isthay eefray anday easyay ortsay ofay enialgay, esperadoday ilosophyphay; anday ithway
itay Iay ownay egardedray isthay olewhay oyagevay ofay ethay Equodpay, anday ethay eatgray Itewhay
Alewhay itsay objectay.

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay, enwhay eythay adhay aggeddray emay, ethay astlay anmay, otay ethay
eckday, anday Iay asway illstay akingshay elfmysay inay myay acketjay otay ingflay offay ethay
aterway; ueequeg“Qay, myay inefay iendfray, oesday isthay ortsay ofay ingthay oftenay
appen?”hay Ithoutway uchmay emotionay, oughthay oakedsay oughthray ustjay ikelay emay, ehay
avegay emay otay understanday atthay uchsay ingsthay idday oftenay appenhay.

“Mray. Ubb,”stay aidsay Iay, urningtay otay atthay orthyway, owhay, uttonedbay upay inay ishay
oil-jacketay, asway ownay almlycay okingsmay ishay ipepay inay ethay ainray; “Mray. Ubbstay, Iay
inkthay Iay avehay eardhay ouyay aysay atthay ofay allay alemenwhay ouyay everay etmay, ouray iefchay
atemay, Mray. Arbuckstay, isay byay arfay ethay ostmay arefulcay anday udentpray. Iay upposesay
enthay, atthay oinggay umpplay onay aay ingflyay alewhay ithway ouryay ailsay etsay inay aay oggyfay
uallsqay isay ethay eighthay ofay aay aleman’swhay iscretion?”day

ertain“Cay. I’veay oweredlay orfay aleswhay omfray aay eakinglay ipshay inay aay alegay offay
Apecay Orn.”hay

“Mray. Ask,”flay aidsay Iay, urningtay otay ittlelay Ing-Postkay, owhay asway andingstay
oseclay byay; ou“yay areay experienceday inay esethay ingsthay, anday Iay amay otnay. Illway ouyay
elltay emay etherwhay itay isay anay unalterableay awlay inay isthay isheryfay, Mray. Askflay,
orfay anay oarsmanay otay eakbray ishay ownay ackbay ullingpay imselfhay ack-foremostbay intoay
eath’sday aws?”jay

an’t“Cay ouyay isttway atthay aller?”smay aidsay Askflay. es“Yay, at’sthay ethay awlay. Iay
ouldshay ikelay otay eesay aay oat’sbay ewcray ackingbay aterway upay otay aay alewhay acefay
oremostfay. Ahay, ahay! ethay alewhay ouldway ivegay emthay uintsqay orfay uintsqay, indmay
at!”thay

Erehay enthay, omfray eethray impartialay itnessesway, Iay adhay aay eliberateday atementstay
ofay ethay entireay asecay. Onsideringcay, ereforethay, atthay uallssqay anday apsizingscay
inay ethay aterway anday onsequentcay ivouacksbay onay ethay eepday, ereway attersmay ofay
ommoncay occurrenceay inay isthay indkay ofay ifelay; onsideringcay atthay atay ethay
uperlativelysay iticalcray instantay ofay oinggay onay otay ethay alewhay Iay ustmay esignray
myay ifelay intoay ethay andshay ofay imhay owhay eeredstay ethay oat—oftentimesbay aay ellowfay
owhay atay atthay eryvay omentmay isay inay ishay impetuousnessay uponay ethay ointpay ofay
uttlingscay ethay aftcray ithway ishay ownay anticfray ampingsstay; onsideringcay atthay
ethay articularpay isasterday otay ouray ownay articularpay oatbay asway ieflychay otay ebay
imputeday otay Arbuck’sstay ivingdray onay otay ishay alewhay almostay inay ethay eethtay ofay aay
uallsqay, anday onsideringcay atthay Arbuckstay, otwithstandingnay, asway amousfay orfay
ishay eatgray eedfulnesshay inay ethay isheryfay; onsideringcay atthay Iay elongedbay otay
isthay uncommonlyay udentpray Arbuck’sstay oatbay; anday inallyfay onsideringcay inay
atwhay aay evil’sday asechay Iay asway implicateday, ouchingtay ethay Itewhay Alewhay: akingtay
allay ingsthay ogethertay, Iay aysay, Iay oughtthay Iay ightmay asay ellway ogay elowbay anday akemay
aay oughray aftdray ofay myay illway. ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay Iay, ome“cay alongay, ouyay allshay ebay
myay awyerlay, executoray, anday egatee.”lay

Itay aymay eemsay angestray atthay ofay allay enmay ailorssay ouldshay ebay inkeringtay atay
eirthay astlay illsway anday estamentstay, utbay erethay areay onay eoplepay inay ethay orldway
oremay ondfay ofay atthay iversionday. Isthay asway ethay ourthfay imetay inay myay auticalnay
ifelay atthay Iay adhay oneday ethay amesay ingthay. Afteray ethay eremonycay asway oncludedcay
uponay ethay esentpray occasionay, Iay eltfay allay ethay easieray; aay onestay asway olledray
awayay omfray myay earthay. Esidesbay, allay ethay aysday Iay ouldshay ownay ivelay ouldway ebay asay
oodgay asay ethay aysday atthay Azaruslay ivedlay afteray ishay esurrectionray; aay
upplementarysay eanclay aingay ofay osay anymay onthsmay oray eeksway asay ethay asecay ightmay
ebay. Iay urvivedsay elfmysay; myay eathday anday urialbay ereway ockedlay upay inay myay estchay.
Iay ookedlay oundray emay anquillytray anday ontentedlycay, ikelay aay uietqay ostghay ithway aay
eanclay onsciencecay ittingsay insideay ethay arsbay ofay aay ugsnay amilyfay aultvay.

Ownay enthay, oughtthay Iay, unconsciouslyay ollingray upay ethay eevesslay ofay myay ockfray,
erehay oesgay orfay aay oolcay, ollectedcay iveday atay eathday anday estructionday, anday ethay
evilday etchfay ethay indmosthay.


APTERcHay 50ay. Ahab’say Oatbay anday Ewcray. Edallahfay.

o“Whay ouldway avehay oughtthay itay, Ask!”flay iedcray Ubbstay; if“ay Iay adhay utbay oneay eglay
ouyay ouldway otnay atchcay emay inay aay oatbay, unlessay aybemay otay opstay ethay ug-holeplay
ithway myay imbertay oetay. Ohay! e’shay aay onderfulway olday an!”may

I“ay on’tday inkthay itay osay angestray, afteray allay, onay atthay account,”ay aidsay Askflay.
If“ay ishay eglay ereway offay atay ethay iphay, ownay, itay ouldway ebay aay ifferentday ingthay.
Atthay ouldway isableday imhay; utbay ehay ashay oneay eeknay, anday oodgay artpay ofay ethay otheray
eftlay, ouyay ow.”knay

I“ay on’tday owknay atthay, myay ittlelay anmay; Iay evernay etyay awsay imhay eel.”knay

Amongay ale-wisewhay eoplepay itay ashay oftenay eenbay argueday etherwhay, onsideringcay
ethay aramountpay importanceay ofay ishay ifelay otay ethay uccesssay ofay ethay oyagevay, itay
isay ightray orfay aay alingwhay aptaincay otay eopardizejay atthay ifelay inay ethay activeay
erilspay ofay ethay asechay. Osay Amerlane’stay oldierssay oftenay argueday ithway earstay inay
eirthay eyesay, etherwhay atthay invaluableay ifelay ofay ishay oughtay otay ebay arriedcay
intoay ethay ickestthay ofay ethay ightfay.

Utbay ithway Ahabay ethay uestionqay assumeday aay odifiedmay aspectay. Onsideringcay atthay
ithway otway egslay anmay isay utbay aay obblinghay ightway inay allay imestay ofay angerday;
onsideringcay atthay ethay ursuitpay ofay aleswhay isay alwaysay underay eatgray anday
extraordinaryay ifficultiesday; atthay everyay individualay omentmay, indeeday, enthay
omprisescay aay erilpay; underay esethay ircumstancescay isay itay iseway orfay anyay aimedmay
anmay otay enteray aay ale-boatwhay inay ethay unthay? Asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ethay
oint-ownersjay ofay ethay Equodpay ustmay avehay ainlyplay oughtthay otnay.

Ahabay ellway ewknay atthay althoughay ishay iendsfray atay omehay ouldway inkthay ittlelay ofay
ishay enteringay aay oatbay inay ertaincay omparativelycay armlesshay icissitudesvay ofay
ethay asechay, orfay ethay akesay ofay eingbay earnay ethay enescay ofay actionay anday ivinggay
ishay ordersay inay ersonpay, etyay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay otay avehay aay oatbay actuallyay
apportioneday otay imhay asay aay egularray eadsmanhay inay ethay unt—abovehay allay orfay
Aptaincay Ahabay otay ebay uppliedsay ithway ivefay extraay enmay, asay atthay amesay oat’sbay
ewcray, ehay ellway ewknay atthay uchsay enerousgay onceitscay evernay entereday ethay eadshay
ofay ethay ownersay ofay ethay Equodpay. Ereforethay ehay adhay otnay olicitedsay aay oat’sbay
ewcray omfray emthay, ornay adhay ehay inay anyay ayway intedhay ishay esiresday onay atthay eadhay.
Everthelessnay ehay adhay akentay ivatepray easuresmay ofay ishay ownay ouchingtay allay atthay
attermay. Untilay Abaco’scay ublishedpay iscoveryday, ethay ailorssay adhay ittlelay
oreseenfay itay, oughthay otay ebay uresay enwhay, afteray eingbay aay ittlelay ilewhay outay ofay
ortpay, allay andshay adhay oncludedcay ethay ustomarycay usinessbay ofay ittingfay ethay
aleboatswhay orfay ervicesay; enwhay omesay imetay afteray isthay Ahabay asway ownay anday enthay
oundfay estirringbay imselfhay inay ethay attermay ofay akingmay ole-pinsthay ithway ishay
ownay andshay orfay atwhay asway oughtthay otay ebay oneay ofay ethay arespay oatsbay, anday evenay
olicitouslysay uttingcay ethay allsmay oodenway ewersskay, ichwhay enwhay ethay inelay isay
unningray outay areay innedpay overay ethay oovegray inay ethay owbay: enwhay allay isthay asway
observeday inay imhay, anday articularlypay ishay olicitudesay inay avinghay anay extraay
oatcay ofay eathingshay inay ethay ottombay ofay ethay oatbay, asay ifay otay akemay itay etterbay
ithstandway ethay ointedpay essurepray ofay ishay ivoryay imblay; anday alsoay ethay anxietyay
ehay evinceday inay exactlyay apingshay ethay ighthay oardbay, oray umsyclay eatclay, asay itay
isay ometimessay alledcay, ethay orizontalhay iecepay inay ethay oat’sbay owbay orfay acingbray
ethay eeknay againstay inay artingday oray abbingstay atay ethay alewhay; enwhay itay asway
observeday owhay oftenay ehay oodstay upay inay atthay oatbay ithway ishay olitarysay eeknay
ixedfay inay ethay emi-circularsay epressionday inay ethay eatclay, anday ithway ethay
arpenter’scay iselchay ougedgay outay aay ittlelay erehay anday aightenedstray itay aay
ittlelay erethay; allay esethay ingsthay, Iay aysay, adhay awakeneday uchmay interestay anday
uriositycay atay ethay imetay. Utbay almostay everybodyay upposedsay atthay isthay
articularpay eparativepray eedfulnesshay inay Ahabay ustmay onlyay ebay ithway aay iewvay otay
ethay ultimateay asechay ofay Obymay Ickday; orfay ehay adhay alreadyay evealedray ishay
intentionay otay unthay atthay ortalmay onstermay inay ersonpay. Utbay uchsay aay uppositionsay
idday byay onay eansmay involveay ethay emotestray uspicionsay asay otay anyay oat’sbay ewcray
eingbay assigneday otay atthay oatbay.

Ownay, ithway ethay ubordinatesay antomsphay, atwhay onderway emainedray oonsay anedway
awayay; orfay inay aay alerwhay ondersway oonsay aneway. Esidesbay, ownay anday enthay uchsay
unaccountableay oddsay anday endsay ofay angestray ationsnay omecay upay omfray ethay unknownay
ooksnay anday ash-holesay ofay ethay earthay otay anmay esethay oatingflay outlawsay ofay
alerswhay; anday ethay ipsshay emselvesthay oftenay ickpay upay uchsay ueerqay astawaycay
eaturescray oundfay ossingtay aboutay ethay openay easay onay anksplay, itsbay ofay eckwray,
oarsay, aleboatswhay, anoescay, own-offblay Apanesejay unksjay, anday atwhay otnay; atthay
Eelzebubbay imselfhay ightmay imbclay upay ethay idesay anday epstay ownday intoay ethay abincay
otay atchay ithway ethay aptaincay, anday itay ouldway otnay eatecray anyay unsubduableay
excitementay inay ethay orecastlefay.

Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ertaincay itay isay atthay ilewhay ethay ubordinatesay
antomsphay oonsay oundfay eirthay aceplay amongay ethay ewcray, oughthay illstay asay itay ereway
omehowsay istinctday omfray emthay, etyay atthay air-turbanedhay Edallahfay emainedray aay
uffledmay erymystay otay ethay astlay. Encewhay ehay amecay inay aay annerlymay orldway ikelay
isthay, byay atwhay ortsay ofay unaccountableay ietay ehay oonsay evinceday imselfhay otay ebay
inkedlay ithway Ahab’say eculiarpay ortunesfay; aynay, osay arfay asay otay avehay omesay ortsay
ofay aay alf-hintedhay influenceay; Eavenhay owsknay, utbay itay ightmay avehay eenbay evenay
authorityay overay imhay; allay isthay onenay ewknay. Utbay oneay annotcay ustainsay anay
indifferentay airay oncerningcay Edallahfay. Ehay asway uchsay aay eaturecray asay
ivilizedcay, omesticday eoplepay inay ethay emperatetay onezay onlyay eesay inay eirthay
eamsdray, anday atthay utbay imlyday; utbay ethay ikelay ofay omwhay ownay anday enthay ideglay
amongay ethay unchangingay Asiaticay ommunitiescay, especiallyay ethay Orientalay islesay
otay ethay eastay ofay ethay ontinent—thosecay insulateday, immemorialay, unalterableay
ountriescay, ichwhay evenay inay esethay odernmay aysday illstay eservepray uchmay ofay ethay
ostlyghay aboriginalnessay ofay earth’say imalpray enerationsgay, enwhay ethay emorymay
ofay ethay irstfay anmay asway aay istinctday ecollectionray, anday allay enmay ishay
escendantsday, unknowingay encewhay ehay amecay, eyeday eachay otheray asay ealray
antomsphay, anday askeday ofay ethay unsay anday ethay oonmay whyay eythay ereway eatedcray anday
otay atwhay enday; enwhay oughthay, accordingay otay Enesisgay, ethay angelsay indeeday
onsortedcay ithway ethay aughtersday ofay enmay, ethay evilsday alsoay, adday ethay
uncanonicalay Abbinsray, indulgeday inay undanemay amoursay.


APTERcHay 51ay. Ethay Irit-Spoutspay.

Aysday, eeksway assedpay, anday underay easyay ailsay, ethay ivoryay Equodpay adhay owlyslay
eptsway acrossay ourfay everalsay uising-groundscray; atthay offay ethay Azoresay; offay
ethay Apecay eday Erdesvay; onay ethay Ateplay o(say alled)cay, eingbay offay ethay outhmay ofay
ethay Ioray eday alay Ataplay; anday ethay Arrolcay Oundgray, anay unstakeday, ateryway
ocalitylay, outherlysay omfray Stay. Elenahay.

Itay asway ilewhay idingglay oughthray esethay atterlay atersway atthay oneay erenesay anday
oonlightmay ightnay, enwhay allay ethay avesway olledray byay ikelay ollsscray ofay ilversay;
anday, byay eirthay oftsay, uffusingsay eethingssay, ademay atwhay eemedsay aay ilverysay
ilencesay, otnay aay olitudesay; onay uchsay aay ilentsay ightnay aay ilverysay etjay asway eensay
arfay inay advanceay ofay ethay itewhay ubblesbay atay ethay owbay. Itlay upay byay ethay oonmay, itay
ookedlay elestialcay; eemedsay omesay umedplay anday itteringglay odgay uprisingay omfray
ethay easay. Edallahfay irstfay escriedday isthay etjay. Orfay ofay esethay oonlightmay
ightsnay, itay asway ishay ontway otay ountmay otay ethay ain-mastmay eadhay, anday andstay aay
ook-outlay erethay, ithway ethay amesay ecisionpray asay ifay itay adhay eenbay ayday. Anday etyay,
oughthay erdshay ofay aleswhay ereway eensay byay ightnay, otnay oneay alemanwhay inay aay
undredhay ouldway enturevay aay oweringlay orfay emthay. Ouyay aymay inkthay ithway atwhay
emotionsay, enthay, ethay eamensay eheldbay isthay olday Orientalay erchedpay aloftay atay
uchsay unusualay ourshay; ishay urbantay anday ethay oonmay, ompanionscay inay oneay skyay. Utbay
enwhay, afteray endingspay ishay uniformay intervalay erethay orfay everalsay uccessivesay
ightsnay ithoutway utteringay aay inglesay oundsay; enwhay, afteray allay isthay ilencesay,
ishay unearthlyay oicevay asway eardhay announcingay atthay ilverysay, oon-litmay etjay,
everyay ecliningray arinermay artedstay otay ishay eetfay asay ifay omesay ingedway iritspay
adhay ightedlay inay ethay iggingray, anday ailedhay ethay ortalmay ewcray. ere“Thay eshay
ows!”blay Adhay ethay umptray ofay udgmentjay ownblay, eythay ouldcay otnay avehay uiveredqay
oremay; etyay illstay eythay eltfay onay errortay; atherray easureplay. Orfay oughthay itay asway
aay ostmay unwonteday ourhay, etyay osay impressiveay asway ethay cryay, anday osay eliriouslyday
excitingay, atthay almostay everyay oulsay onay oardbay instinctivelyay esiredday aay
oweringlay.

Alkingway ethay eckday ithway uickqay, ide-lungingsay idesstray, Ahabay ommandedcay ethay
allantt’gay ailssay anday oyalsray otay ebay etsay, anday everyay unsailstay eadspray. Ethay
estbay anmay inay ethay ipshay ustmay aketay ethay elmhay. Enthay, ithway everyay ast-headmay
annedmay, ethay iled-uppay aftcray olledray ownday eforebay ethay indway. Ethay angestray,
upheavingay, iftinglay endencytay ofay ethay affrailtay eezebray illingfay ethay ollowshay
ofay osay anymay ailssay, ademay ethay uoyantbay, overinghay eckday otay eelfay ikelay airay
eneathbay ethay eetfay; ilewhay illstay eshay ushedray alongay, asay ifay otway antagonisticay
influencesay ereway ugglingstray inay er—onehay otay ountmay irectday otay eavenhay, ethay
otheray otay ivedray awinglyyay otay omesay orizontalhay oalgay. Anday adhay ouyay atchedway
Ahab’say acefay atthay ightnay, ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay atthay inay imhay alsoay otway
ifferentday ingsthay ereway arringway. Ilewhay ishay oneay ivelay eglay ademay ivelylay
echoesay alongay ethay eckday, everyay okestray ofay ishay eadday imblay oundedsay ikelay aay
offin-tapcay. Onay ifelay anday eathday isthay olday anmay alkedway. Utbay oughthay ethay ipshay
osay iftlysway edspay, anday oughthay omfray everyay eyeay, ikelay arrowsay, ethay eageray
ancesglay otshay, etyay ethay ilverysay etjay asway onay oremay eensay atthay ightnay. Everyay
ailorsay oresway ehay awsay itay onceay, utbay otnay aay econdsay imetay.

Isthay idnight-spoutmay adhay almostay owngray aay orgottenfay ingthay, enwhay, omesay aysday
afteray, olay! atay ethay amesay ilentsay ourhay, itay asway againay announceday: againay itay
asway escriedday byay allay; utbay uponay akingmay ailsay otay overtakeay itay, onceay oremay itay
isappearedday asay ifay itay adhay evernay eenbay. Anday osay itay ervedsay usay ightnay afteray
ightnay, illtay onay oneay eededhay itay utbay otay onderway atay itay. Eriouslymystay ettedjay
intoay ethay earclay oonlightmay, oray arlightstay, asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay;
isappearingday againay orfay oneay olewhay ayday, oray otway aysday, oray eethray; anday
omehowsay eemingsay atay everyay istinctday epetitionray otay ebay advancingay illstay
urtherfay anday urtherfay inay ouray anvay, isthay olitarysay etjay eemedsay orfay everay
alluringay usay onay.

Ornay ithway ethay immemorialay uperstitionsay ofay eirthay aceray, anday inay accordanceay
ithway ethay eternaturalnesspray, asay itay eemedsay, ichwhay inay anymay ingsthay investeday
ethay Equodpay, ereway erethay antingway omesay ofay ethay eamensay owhay oresway atthay
eneverwhay anday ereverwhay escriedday; atay oweverhay emoteray imestay, oray inay oweverhay
arfay apartay atitudeslay anday ongitudeslay, atthay unnearableay outspay asway astcay byay
oneay elf-samesay alewhay; anday atthay alewhay, Obymay Ickday. Orfay aay imetay, erethay
eignedray, ootay, aay ensesay ofay eculiarpay eaddray atay isthay ittingflay apparitionay, asay
ifay itay ereway eacherouslytray eckoningbay usay onay anday onay, inay orderay atthay ethay
onstermay ightmay urntay oundray uponay usay, anday endray usay atay astlay inay ethay emotestray
anday ostmay avagesay eassay.

Esethay emporarytay apprehensionsay, osay aguevay utbay osay awfulay, erivedday aay
ondrousway otencypay omfray ethay ontrastingcay erenitysay ofay ethay eatherway, inay
ichwhay, eneathbay allay itsay ueblay andnessblay, omesay oughtthay erethay urkedlay aay
evilishday armchay, asay orfay aysday anday aysday eway oyagedvay alongay, oughthray eassay osay
earilyway, onesomelylay ildmay, atthay allay acespay, inay epugnanceray otay ouray engefulvay
erranday, eemedsay acatingvay itselfay ofay ifelay eforebay ouray urn-likeay owpray.

Utbay, atay astlay, enwhay urningtay otay ethay eastwarday, ethay Apecay indsway eganbay
owlinghay arounday usay, anday eway oseray anday ellfay uponay ethay onglay, oubledtray eassay
atthay areay erethay; enwhay ethay ivory-tuskeday Equodpay arplyshay owedbay otay ethay
astblay, anday oredgay ethay arkday avesway inay erhay adnessmay, illtay, ikelay owersshay ofay
ilversay ipschay, ethay oam-flakesfay ewflay overay erhay ulwarksbay; enthay allay isthay
esolateday acuityvay ofay ifelay entway awayay, utbay avegay aceplay otay ightssay oremay
ismalday anthay eforebay.

Oseclay otay ouray owsbay, angestray ormsfay inay ethay aterway artedday itherhay anday itherthay
eforebay usay; ilewhay ickthay inay ouray earray ewflay ethay inscrutableay ea-ravenssay. Anday
everyay orningmay, erchedpay onay ouray aysstay, owsray ofay esethay irdsbay ereway eensay; anday
itespay ofay ouray ootingshay, orfay aay onglay imetay obstinatelyay ungclay otay ethay emphay,
asay oughthay eythay eemedday ouray ipshay omesay iftingdray, uninhabiteday aftcray; aay
ingthay appointeday otay esolationday, anday ereforethay itfay oosting-placeray orfay
eirthay omelesshay elvessay. Anday eavedhay anday eavedhay, illstay unrestinglyay eavedhay
ethay ackblay easay, asay ifay itsay astvay idestay ereway aay onsciencecay; anday ethay eatgray
undanemay oulsay ereway inay anguishay anday emorseray orfay ethay onglay insay anday ufferingsay
itay adhay edbray.

Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay, oday eythay allcay eyay? Atherray Apecay Ormentosotay, asay alledcay
ofay oreyay; orfay onglay allureday byay ethay erfidiouspay ilencessay atthay eforebay adhay
attendeday usay, eway oundfay ourselvesay aunchedlay intoay isthay ormentedtay easay, erewhay
uiltygay eingsbay ansformedtray intoay osethay owlsfay anday esethay ishfay, eemedsay
ondemnedcay otay imsway onay everlastinglyay ithoutway anyay avenhay inay orestay, oray eatbay
atthay ackblay airay ithoutway anyay orizonhay. Utbay almcay, ow-whitesnay, anday
unvaryingay; illstay irectingday itsay ountainfay ofay eathersfay otay ethay skyay; illstay
eckoningbay usay onay omfray eforebay, ethay olitarysay etjay ouldway atay imestay ebay
escriedday.

Uringday allay isthay acknessblay ofay ethay elementsay, Ahabay, oughthay assumingay orfay
ethay imetay ethay almostay ontinualcay ommandcay ofay ethay encheddray anday angerousday
eckday, anifestedmay ethay oomiestglay eserveray; anday oremay eldomsay anthay everay
addresseday ishay atesmay. Inay empestuoustay imestay ikelay esethay, afteray everythingay
aboveay anday aloftay ashay eenbay ecuredsay, othingnay oremay ancay ebay oneday utbay
assivelypay otay awaitay ethay issueay ofay ethay alegay. Enthay Aptaincay anday ewcray ecomebay
acticalpray atalistsfay. Osay, ithway ishay ivoryay eglay inserteday intoay itsay
accustomeday olehay, anday ithway oneay andhay irmlyfay aspinggray aay oudshray, Ahabay orfay
ourshay anday ourshay ouldway andstay azinggay eadday otay indwardway, ilewhay anay
occasionalay uallsqay ofay eetslay oray owsnay ouldway allay utbay ongealcay ishay eryvay
eyelashesay ogethertay. Eantimemay, ethay ewcray ivendray omfray ethay orwardfay artpay ofay
ethay ipshay byay ethay erilouspay eassay atthay urstinglybay okebray overay itsay owsbay,
oodstay inay aay inelay alongay ethay ulwarksbay inay ethay aistway; anday ethay etterbay otay
uardgay againstay ethay eapinglay avesway, eachay anmay adhay ippedslay imselfhay intoay aay
ortsay ofay owlinebay ecuredsay otay ethay ailray, inay ichwhay ehay ungsway asay inay aay oosenedlay
eltbay. Ewfay oray onay ordsway ereway okenspay; anday ethay ilentsay ipshay, asay ifay annedmay byay
aintedpay ailorssay inay axway, ayday afteray ayday oretay onay oughthray allay ethay iftsway
adnessmay anday adnessglay ofay ethay emoniacday avesway. Byay ightnay ethay amesay utenessmay
ofay umanityhay eforebay ethay ieksshray ofay ethay oceanay evailedpray; illstay inay ilencesay
ethay enmay ungsway inay ethay owlinesbay; illstay ordlessway Ahabay oodstay upay otay ethay
astblay. Evenay enwhay eariedway aturenay eemedsay emandingday eposeray ehay ouldway otnay
eeksay atthay eposeray inay ishay ammockhay. Evernay ouldcay Arbuckstay orgetfay ethay olday
an’smay aspectay, enwhay oneay ightnay oinggay ownday intoay ethay abincay otay arkmay owhay ethay
arometerbay oodstay, ehay awsay imhay ithway osedclay eyesay ittingsay aightstray inay ishay
oor-screwedflay airchay; ethay ainray anday alf-meltedhay eetslay ofay ethay ormstay omfray
ichwhay ehay adhay omesay imetay eforebay emergeday, illstay owlyslay ippingdray omfray ethay
unremoveday athay anday oatcay. Onay ethay abletay esidebay imhay aylay unrolleday oneay ofay
osethay artschay ofay idestay anday urrentscay ichwhay avehay eviouslypray eenbay okenspay
ofay. Ishay anternlay ungsway omfray ishay ightlytay enchedclay andhay. Oughthay ethay odybay
asway erectay, ethay eadhay asway ownthray ackbay osay atthay ethay osedclay eyesay ereway
ointedpay owardstay ethay eedlenay ofay ethay ell-taletay atthay ungsway omfray aay eambay inay
ethay eiling.*cay

e*Thay abin-compasscay isay alledcay ethay ell-taletay, ecausebay ithoutway oinggay otay
ethay ompasscay atay ethay elmhay, ethay Aptaincay, ilewhay elowbay, ancay informay imselfhay
ofay ethay oursecay ofay ethay ipshay.

Erribletay olday anmay! oughtthay Arbuckstay ithway aay uddershay, eepingslay inay isthay
alegay, illstay outhay eadfastlystay eyestay thyay urposepay.


APTERcHay 52ay. Ethay Albatrossay.

Outh-eastwardsay omfray ethay Apecay, offay ethay istantday Ozettscray, aay oodgay uisingcray
oundgray orfay Ightray Alemenwhay, aay ailsay oomedlay aheaday, ethay Oneygay Albatross(ay)
byay amenay. Asay eshay owlyslay ewdray ighnay, omfray myay oftylay erchpay atay ethay
ore-mast-headfay, Iay adhay aay oodgay iewvay ofay atthay ightsay osay emarkableray otay aay otyray
inay ethay arfay oceanay isheries—afay alerwhay atay easay, anday onglay absentay omfray omehay.

Asay ifay ethay avesway adhay eenbay ullersfay, isthay aftcray asway eachedblay ikelay ethay
eletonskay ofay aay andedstray alrusway. Allay ownday erhay idessay, isthay ectralspay
appearanceay asway acedtray ithway onglay annelschay ofay eddenedray ustray, ilewhay allay
erhay arsspay anday erhay iggingray ereway ikelay ethay ickthay anchesbray ofay eestray urredfay
overay ithway oar-frosthay. Onlyay erhay owerlay ailssay ereway etsay. Aay ildway ightsay itay
asway otay eesay erhay ong-beardedlay ook-outslay atay osethay eethray ast-headsmay. Eythay
eemedsay adclay inay ethay insskay ofay eastsbay, osay orntay anday epatchedbay ethay aimentray
atthay adhay urvivedsay earlynay ourfay earsyay ofay uisingcray. Andingstay inay ironay oopshay
ailednay otay ethay astmay, eythay ayedsway anday ungsway overay aay athomlessfay easay; anday
oughthay, enwhay ethay ipshay owlyslay idedglay oseclay underay ouray ernstay, eway ixsay enmay
inay ethay airay amecay osay ighnay otay eachay otheray atthay eway ightmay almostay avehay eapedlay
omfray ethay ast-headsmay ofay oneay ipshay otay osethay ofay ethay otheray; etyay, osethay
orlorn-lookingfay ishermenfay, ildlymay eyeingay usay asay eythay assedpay, aidsay otnay
oneay ordway otay ouray ownay ook-outslay, ilewhay ethay uarter-deckqay ailhay asway eingbay
eardhay omfray elowbay.

ip“Shay ahoyay! Avehay eyay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

Utbay asay ethay angestray aptaincay, eaninglay overay ethay allidpay ulwarksbay, asway inay
ethay actay ofay uttingpay ishay umpettray otay ishay outhmay, itay omehowsay ellfay omfray ishay
andhay intoay ethay easay; anday ethay indway ownay isingray amainay, ehay inay ainvay ovestray otay
akemay imselfhay eardhay ithoutway itay. Eantimemay ishay ipshay asway illstay increasingay
ethay istanceday etweenbay. Ilewhay inay ariousvay ilentsay aysway ethay eamensay ofay ethay
Equodpay ereway evincingay eirthay observanceay ofay isthay ominousay incidentay atay ethay
irstfay eremay entionmay ofay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay amenay otay anotheray ipshay, Ahabay orfay
aay omentmay ausedpay; itay almostay eemedsay asay oughthay ehay ouldway avehay oweredlay aay
oatbay otay oardbay ethay angerstray, adhay otnay ethay eateningthray indway orbadefay. Utbay
akingtay advantageay ofay ishay indwardway ositionpay, ehay againay eizedsay ishay umpettray,
anday owingknay byay erhay aspectay atthay ethay angerstray esselvay asway aay Antucketernay
anday ortlyshay oundbay omehay, ehay oudlylay ailed—“Ahoyhay erethay! Isthay isay ethay
Equodpay, oundbay oundray ethay orldway! Elltay emthay otay addressay allay uturefay etterslay
otay ethay Acificpay oceanay! anday isthay imetay eethray earsyay, ifay Iay amay otnay atay omehay,
elltay emthay otay addressay emthay otay ——”ay

Atay atthay omentmay ethay otway akesway ereway airlyfay ossedcray, anday instantlyay, enthay,
inay accordanceay ithway eirthay ingularsay aysway, oalsshay ofay allsmay armlesshay ishfay,
atthay orfay omesay aysday eforebay adhay eenbay acidlyplay immingsway byay ouray idesay,
artedday awayay ithway atwhay eemedsay udderingshay insfay, anday angedray emselvesthay
orefay anday aftay ithway ethay anger’sstray anksflay. Oughthay inay ethay oursecay ofay ishay
ontinualcay oyagingsvay Ahabay ustmay oftenay eforebay avehay oticednay aay imilarsay
ightsay, etyay, otay anyay onomaniacmay anmay, ethay eriestvay iflestray apriciouslycay
arrycay eaningsmay.

im“Sway awayay omfray emay, oday e?”yay urmuredmay Ahabay, azinggay overay intoay ethay aterway.
Erethay eemedsay utbay ittlelay inay ethay ordsway, utbay ethay onetay onveyedcay oremay ofay
eepday elplesshay adnesssay anthay ethay insaneay olday anmay adhay everay eforebay evinceday.
Utbay urningtay otay ethay eersmanstay, owhay usthay arfay adhay eenbay oldinghay ethay ipshay inay
ethay indway otay iminishday erhay eadwayhay, ehay iedcray outay inay ishay olday ionlay
oice,—“Upvay elmhay! Eepkay erhay offay oundray ethay orld!”way

Oundray ethay orldway! Erethay isay uchmay inay atthay oundsay otay inspireay oudpray eelingsfay;
utbay eretowhay oesday allay atthay ircumnavigationcay onductcay? Onlyay oughthray
umberlessnay erilspay otay ethay eryvay ointpay encewhay eway artedstay, erewhay osethay atthay
eway eftlay ehindbay ecuresay, ereway allay ethay imetay eforebay usay.

Ereway isthay orldway anay endlessay ainplay, anday byay ailingsay eastwarday eway ouldcay orfay
everay eachray ewnay istancesday, anday iscoverday ightssay oremay eetsway anday angestray
anthay anyay Adescyclay oray Islandsay ofay Ingkay Olomonsay, enthay erethay ereway omisepray
inay ethay oyagevay. Utbay inay ursuitpay ofay osethay arfay eriesmystay eway eamdray ofay, oray inay
ormentedtay asechay ofay atthay emonday antomphay atthay, omesay imetay oray otheray, imssway
eforebay allay umanhay eartshay; ilewhay asingchay uchsay overay isthay oundray obeglay, eythay
eitheray eadlay usay onay inay arrenbay azesmay oray idwaymay eavelay usay elmedwhay.


APTERcHay 53ay. Ethay Amgay.

Ethay ostensibleay easonray whyay Ahabay idday otnay ogay onay oardbay ofay ethay alerwhay eway adhay
okenspay asway isthay: ethay indway anday easay etokenedbay ormsstay. Utbay evenay adhay isthay
otnay eenbay ethay asecay, ehay ouldway otnay afteray allay, erhapspay, avehay oardedbay
er—judginghay byay ishay ubsequentsay onductcay onay imilarsay occasions—ifay osay itay adhay
eenbay atthay, byay ethay ocesspray ofay ailinghay, ehay adhay obtaineday aay egativenay answeray
otay ethay uestionqay ehay utpay. Orfay, asay itay eventuallyay urnedtay outay, ehay aredcay otnay
otay onsortcay, evenay orfay ivefay inutesmay, ithway anyay angerstray aptaincay, exceptay ehay
ouldcay ontributecay omesay ofay atthay informationay ehay osay absorbinglyay oughtsay. Utbay
allay isthay ightmay emainray inadequatelyay estimateday, ereway otnay omethingsay aidsay
erehay ofay ethay eculiarpay usagesay ofay aling-vesselswhay enwhay eetingmay eachay otheray
inay oreignfay eassay, anday especiallyay onay aay ommoncay uising-groundcray.

Ifay otway angersstray ossingcray ethay Inepay Arrensbay inay Ewnay Orkyay Atestay, oray ethay
equallyay esolateday Alisburysay Ainplay inay Englanday; ifay asuallycay encounteringay
eachay otheray inay uchsay inhospitableay ildsway, esethay aintway, orfay ethay ifelay ofay
emthay, annotcay ellway avoiday aay utualmay alutationsay; anday oppingstay orfay aay omentmay
otay interchangeay ethay ewsnay; anday, erhapspay, ittingsay ownday orfay aay ilewhay anday
estingray inay oncertcay: enthay, owhay uchmay oremay aturalnay atthay uponay ethay
illimitableay Inepay Arrensbay anday Alisburysay Ainsplay ofay ethay easay, otway alingwhay
esselsvay escryingday eachay otheray atay ethay endsay ofay ethay earth—offay onelay
Anning’sfay Islanday, oray ethay arfay awayay Ing’skay Illsmay; owhay uchmay oremay aturalnay,
Iay aysay, atthay underay uchsay ircumstancescay esethay ipsshay ouldshay otnay onlyay
interchangeay ailshay, utbay omecay intoay illstay oserclay, oremay iendlyfray anday
ociablesay ontactcay. Anday especiallyay ouldway isthay eemsay otay ebay aay attermay ofay
oursecay, inay ethay asecay ofay esselsvay owneday inay oneay eaportsay, anday osewhay
aptainscay, officersay, anday otnay aay ewfay ofay ethay enmay areay ersonallypay ownknay otay
eachay otheray; anday onsequentlycay, avehay allay ortssay ofay earday omesticday ingsthay otay
alktay aboutay.

Orfay ethay onglay absentay ipshay, ethay outward-bounderay, erhapspay, ashay etterslay onay
oardbay; atay anyay ateray, eshay illway ebay uresay otay etlay erhay avehay omesay aperspay ofay aay
ateday aay earyay oray otway aterlay anthay ethay astlay oneay onay erhay urredblay anday
umb-wornthay ilesfay. Anday inay eturnray orfay atthay ourtesycay, ethay outward-bounday
ipshay ouldway eceiveray ethay atestlay alingwhay intelligenceay omfray ethay
uising-groundcray otay ichwhay eshay aymay ebay estinedday, aay ingthay ofay ethay utmostay
importanceay otay erhay. Anday inay egreeday, allay isthay illway oldhay uetray oncerningcay
alingwhay esselsvay ossingcray eachay other’say acktray onay ethay uising-groundcray
itselfay, evenay oughthay eythay areay equallyay onglay absentay omfray omehay. Orfay oneay ofay
emthay aymay avehay eceivedray aay ansfertray ofay etterslay omfray omesay irdthay, anday ownay
arfay emoteray esselvay; anday omesay ofay osethay etterslay aymay ebay orfay ethay eoplepay ofay
ethay ipshay eshay ownay eetsmay. Esidesbay, eythay ouldway exchangeay ethay alingwhay ewsnay,
anday avehay anay agreeableay atchay. Orfay otnay onlyay ouldway eythay eetmay ithway allay ethay
athiessympay ofay ailorssay, utbay ikewiselay ithway allay ethay eculiarpay
ongenialitiescay arisingay omfray aay ommoncay ursuitpay anday utuallymay aredshay
ivationspray anday erilspay.

Ornay ouldway ifferenceday ofay ountrycay akemay anyay eryvay essentialay ifferenceday;
atthay isay, osay onglay asay othbay artiespay eakspay oneay anguagelay, asay isay ethay asecay
ithway Americansay anday Englishay. Oughthay, otay ebay uresay, omfray ethay allsmay umbernay
ofay Englishay alerswhay, uchsay eetingsmay oday otnay eryvay oftenay occuray, anday enwhay
eythay oday occuray erethay isay ootay aptay otay ebay aay ortsay ofay essshynay etweenbay emthay;
orfay ouryay Englishmanay isay atherray eservedray, anday ouryay Ankeeyay, ehay oesday otnay
ancyfay atthay ortsay ofay ingthay inay anybodyay utbay imselfhay. Esidesbay, ethay Englishay
alerswhay ometimessay affectay aay indkay ofay etropolitanmay uperioritysay overay ethay
Americanay alerswhay; egardingray ethay onglay, eanlay Antucketernay, ithway ishay
ondescriptnay ovincialismspray, asay aay ortsay ofay ea-peasantsay. Utbay erewhay isthay
uperioritysay inay ethay Englishay alemenwhay oesday eallyray onsistcay, itay ouldway ebay
ardhay otay aysay, eeingsay atthay ethay Ankeesyay inay oneay ayday, ollectivelycay, illkay
oremay aleswhay anthay allay ethay Englishay, ollectivelycay, inay entay earsyay. Utbay isthay
isay aay armlesshay ittlelay oiblefay inay ethay Englishay ale-hunterswhay, ichwhay ethay
Antucketernay oesday otnay aketay uchmay otay earthay; obablypray, ecausebay ehay owsknay
atthay ehay ashay aay ewfay oiblesfay imselfhay.

Osay, enthay, eway eesay atthay ofay allay ipsshay eparatelysay ailingsay ethay easay, ethay
alerswhay avehay ostmay easonray otay ebay ociable—andsay eythay areay osay. Ereaswhay, omesay
erchantmay ipsshay ossingcray eachay other’say akeway inay ethay id-Atlanticmay, illway
oftentimesay asspay onay ithoutway osay uchmay asay aay inglesay ordway ofay ecognitionray,
utuallymay uttingcay eachay otheray onay ethay ighhay eassay, ikelay aay acebray ofay andiesday
inay Oadwaybray; anday allay ethay imetay indulgingay, erhapspay, inay inicalfay iticismcray
uponay eachay other’say igray. Asay orfay En-of-Warmay, enwhay eythay ancechay otay eetmay atay
easay, eythay irstfay ogay oughthray uchsay aay ingstray ofay illysay owingsbay anday
apingsscray, uchsay aay uckingday ofay ensignsay, atthay erethay oesday otnay eemsay otay ebay
uchmay ight-downray eartyhay ood-willgay anday otherlybray ovelay aboutay itay atay allay. Asay
ouchingtay Ave-shipsslay eetingmay, whyay, eythay areay inay uchsay aay odigiouspray urryhay,
eythay unray awayay omfray eachay otheray asay oonsay asay ossiblepay. Anday asay orfay Iratespay,
enwhay eythay ancechay otay osscray eachay other’say oss-bonescray, ethay irstfay ailhay
is—“Howay anymay ulls?”—theskay amesay ayway atthay alerswhay ail—“Howhay anymay
arrels?”bay Anday atthay uestionqay onceay answereday, iratespay aightwaystray eerstay
apartay, orfay eythay areay infernalay illainsvay onay othbay idessay, anday on’tday ikelay otay
eesay overmuchay ofay eachay other’say illanousvay ikenesseslay.

Utbay ooklay atay ethay odlygay, onesthay, unostentatiousay, ospitablehay, ociablesay,
ee-and-easyfray alerwhay! Atwhay oesday ethay alerwhay oday enwhay eshay eetsmay anotheray
alerwhay inay anyay ortsay ofay ecentday eatherway? Eshay ashay aay am_,”“_Gay aay ingthay osay
utterlyay unknownay otay allay otheray ipsshay atthay eythay evernay eardhay ofay ethay amenay
evenay; anday ifay byay ancechay eythay ouldshay earhay ofay itay, eythay onlyay ingray atay itay,
anday epeatray amesomegay uffstay aboutay outers”“spay anday ubber-boilers,”“blay anday
uchsay ikelay ettypray exclamationsay. Whyay itay isay atthay allay Erchant-seamenmay, anday
alsoay allay Iratespay anday An-of-War’smay enmay, anday Ave-shipslay ailorssay, erishchay
uchsay aay ornfulscay eelingfay owardstay Ale-shipswhay; isthay isay aay uestionqay itay
ouldway ebay ardhay otay answeray. Ecausebay, inay ethay asecay ofay iratespay, aysay, Iay ouldshay
ikelay otay owknay etherwhay atthay ofessionpray ofay eirsthay ashay anyay eculiarpay oryglay
aboutay itay. Itay ometimessay endsay inay uncommonay elevationay, indeeday; utbay onlyay atay
ethay allowsgay. Anday esidesbay, enwhay aay anmay isay elevateday inay atthay odday ashionfay,
ehay ashay onay operpray oundationfay orfay ishay uperiorsay altitudeay. Encehay, Iay
oncludecay, atthay inay oastingbay imselfhay otay ebay ighhay iftedlay aboveay aay alemanwhay,
inay atthay assertionay ethay iratepay ashay onay olidsay asisbay otay andstay onay.

Utbay atwhay isay aay am?__Gay Ouyay ightmay earway outay ouryay index-fingeray unningray upay
anday ownday ethay olumnscay ofay ictionariesday, anday evernay indfay ethay ordway. Dray.
Ohnsonjay evernay attaineday otay atthay eruditionay; Oahnay Ebster’sway arkay oesday otnay
oldhay itay. Everthelessnay, isthay amesay expressiveay ordway ashay ownay orfay anymay earsyay
eenbay inay onstantcay useay amongay omesay ifteenfay ousandthay uetray ornbay Ankeesyay.
Ertainlycay, itay eedsnay aay efinitionday, anday ouldshay ebay incorporateday intoay ethay
Exiconlay. Ithway atthay iewvay, etlay emay earnedlylay efineday itay.

AMgay. OUN—_Anay ocialsay eetingmay ofay o_tway or(_ay ore_may) aleships_Whay, enerallygay
onay aay uising-groundcray; enwhay, afteray exchangingay ailshay, eythay exchangeay
isitsvay byay oats’bay ewscray: ethay otway aptainscay emainingray, orfay ethay imetay, onay
oardbay ofay oneay ipshay, anday ethay otway iefchay atesmay onay ethay other._ay

Erethay isay anotheray ittlelay itemay aboutay Amminggay ichwhay ustmay otnay ebay orgottenfay
erehay. Allay ofessionspray avehay eirthay ownay ittlelay eculiaritiespay ofay etailday; osay
ashay ethay alewhay isheryfay. Inay aay iratepay, an-of-warmay, oray aveslay ipshay, enwhay ethay
aptaincay isay owedray anywhereay inay ishay oatbay, ehay alwaysay itssay inay ethay ernstay
eetsshay onay aay omfortablecay, ometimessay ushionedcay eatsay erethay, anday oftenay
eersstay imselfhay ithway aay ettypray ittlelay illiner’smay illertay ecoratedday ithway
aygay ordscay anday ibbonsray. Utbay ethay ale-boatwhay ashay onay eatsay asternay, onay ofasay
ofay atthay ortsay ateverwhay, anday onay illertay atay allay. Ighhay imestay indeeday, ifay
alingwhay aptainscay ereway eeledwhay aboutay ethay aterway onay astorscay ikelay outygay olday
aldermenay inay atentpay airschay. Anday asay orfay aay illertay, ethay ale-boatwhay evernay
admitsay ofay anyay uchsay effeminacyay; anday ereforethay asay inay amminggay aay ompletecay
oat’sbay ewcray ustmay eavelay ethay ipshay, anday encehay asay ethay oatbay eererstay oray
arpooneerhay isay ofay ethay umbernay, atthay ubordinatesay isay ethay eersmanstay uponay ethay
occasionay, anday ethay aptaincay, avinghay onay aceplay otay itsay inay, isay ulledpay offay otay
ishay isitvay allay andingstay ikelay aay inepay eetray. Anday oftenay ouyay illway oticenay atthay
eingbay onsciouscay ofay ethay eyesay ofay ethay olewhay isiblevay orldway estingray onay imhay
omfray ethay idessay ofay ethay otway ipsshay, isthay andingstay aptaincay isay allay aliveay otay
ethay importanceay ofay ustainingsay ishay ignityday byay aintainingmay ishay egslay. Ornay
isay isthay anyay eryvay easyay attermay; orfay inay ishay earray isay ethay immenseay ojectingpray
eeringstay oaray ittinghay imhay ownay anday enthay inay ethay allsmay ofay ishay ackbay, ethay
after-oaray eciprocatingray byay appingray ishay eesknay inay ontfray. Ehay isay usthay
ompletelycay edgedway eforebay anday ehindbay, anday ancay onlyay expanday imselfhay
idewayssay byay ettlingsay ownday onay ishay etchedstray egslay; utbay aay uddensay, iolentvay
itchpay ofay ethay oatbay illway oftenay ogay arfay otay oppletay imhay, ecausebay engthlay ofay
oundationfay isay othingnay ithoutway orrespondingcay eadthbray. Erelymay akemay aay
eadspray angleay ofay otway olespay, anday ouyay annotcay andstay emthay upay. Enthay, againay,
itay ouldway evernay oday inay ainplay ightsay ofay ethay orld’sway ivetedray eyesay, itay ouldway
evernay oday, Iay aysay, orfay isthay addlingstray aptaincay otay ebay eensay eadyingstay
imselfhay ethay ightestslay articlepay byay atchingcay oldhay ofay anythingay ithway ishay
andshay; indeeday, asay okentay ofay ishay entireay, uoyantbay elf-commandsay, ehay
enerallygay arriescay ishay andshay inay ishay owsers’tray ocketspay; utbay erhapspay eingbay
enerallygay eryvay argelay, eavyhay andshay, ehay arriescay emthay erethay orfay allastbay.
Everthelessnay erethay avehay occurreday instancesay, ellway authenticateday onesay
ootay, erewhay ethay aptaincay ashay eenbay ownknay orfay anay uncommonlyay iticalcray omentmay
oray otway, inay aay uddensay uallsqay ay—tosay eizesay oldhay ofay ethay earestnay oarsman’say
airhay, anday oldhay onay erethay ikelay imgray eathday.


APTERcHay 54ay. Ethay Own-Ho’stay Orystay.

As(_ay oldtay atay ethay Oldengay Inn._ay)

Ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay, anday allay ethay ateryway egionray oundray aboutay erethay, isay
uchmay ikelay omesay otednay ourfay ornerscay ofay aay eatgray ighwayhay, erewhay ouyay eetmay
oremay avellerstray anthay inay anyay otheray artpay.

Itay asway otnay eryvay onglay afteray eakingspay ethay Oneygay atthay anotheray
omeward-boundhay alemanwhay, ethay Own-Ho,*tay asway encountereday. Eshay asway annedmay
almostay ollywhay byay Olynesianspay. Inay ethay ortshay amgay atthay ensueday eshay avegay usay
ongstray ewsnay ofay Obymay Ickday. Otay omesay ethay eneralgay interestay inay ethay Itewhay
Alewhay asway ownay ildlyway eightenedhay byay aay ircumstancecay ofay ethay Own-Ho’stay
orystay, ichwhay eemedsay obscurelyay otay involveay ithway ethay alewhay aay ertaincay
ondrousway, inverteday isitationvay ofay oneay ofay osethay osay alledcay udgmentsjay ofay
Odgay ichwhay atay imestay areay aidsay otay overtakeay omesay enmay. Isthay atterlay
ircumstancecay, ithway itsay ownay articularpay accompanimentsay, ormingfay atwhay aymay
ebay alledcay ethay ecretsay artpay ofay ethay agedytray aboutay otay ebay arratednay, evernay
eachedray ethay earsay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay oray ishay atesmay. Orfay atthay ecretsay artpay ofay
ethay orystay asway unknownay otay ethay aptaincay ofay ethay Own-Hotay imselfhay. Itay asway ethay
ivatepray opertypray ofay eethray onfederatecay itewhay eamensay ofay atthay ipshay, oneay ofay
omwhay, itay eemssay, ommunicatedcay itay otay Ashtegotay ithway Omishray injunctionsay ofay
ecrecysay, utbay ethay ollowingfay ightnay Ashtegotay ambledray inay ishay eepslay, anday
evealedray osay uchmay ofay itay inay atthay ayway, atthay enwhay ehay asway akenedway ehay ouldcay
otnay ellway ithholdway ethay estray. Everthelessnay, osay otentpay anay influenceay idday
isthay ingthay avehay onay osethay eamensay inay ethay Equodpay owhay amecay otay ethay ullfay
owledgeknay ofay itay, anday byay uchsay aay angestray elicacyday, otay allcay itay osay, ereway
eythay overnedgay inay isthay attermay, atthay eythay eptkay ethay ecretsay amongay
emselvesthay osay atthay itay evernay anspiredtray abaftay ethay Equod’spay ain-mastmay.
Interweavingay inay itsay operpray aceplay isthay arkerday eadthray ithway ethay orystay asay
ubliclypay arratednay onay ethay ipshay, ethay olewhay ofay isthay angestray affairay Iay ownay
oceedpray otay utpay onay astinglay ecordray.

e*Thay ancientay ale-crywhay uponay irstfay ightingsay aay alewhay omfray ethay ast-headmay,
illstay useday byay alemenwhay inay untinghay ethay amousfay Allipagosgay errapintay.

Orfay myay umor’shay akesay, Iay allshay eservepray ethay estylay inay ichwhay Iay onceay
arratednay itay atay Imalay, otay aay ounginglay irclecay ofay myay Anishspay iendsfray, oneay
aint’ssay eveay, okingsmay uponay ethay ick-giltthay iledtay iazzapay ofay ethay Oldengay
Innay. Ofay osethay inefay avalierscay, ethay oungyay Onsday, Edropay anday Ebastiansay, ereway
onay ethay oserclay ermstay ithway emay; anday encehay ethay interludingay uestionsqay eythay
occasionallyay utpay, anday ichwhay areay ulyday answereday atay ethay imetay.

ome“Say otway earsyay iorpray otay myay irstfay earninglay ethay eventsay ichwhay Iay amay aboutay
ehearsingray otay ouyay, entlemengay, ethay Own-Hotay, Ermspay Alerwhay ofay Antucketnay,
asway uisingcray inay ouryay Acificpay erehay, otnay eryvay anymay ays’day ailsay eastwarday
omfray ethay eavesay ofay isthay oodgay Oldengay Innay. Eshay asway omewheresay otay ethay
orthwardnay ofay ethay Inelay. Oneay orningmay uponay andlinghay ethay umpspay, accordingay
otay ailyday usageay, itay asway observeday atthay eshay ademay oremay aterway inay erhay oldhay
anthay ommoncay. Eythay upposedsay aay ord-fishsway adhay abbedstay erhay, entlemengay. Utbay
ethay aptaincay, avinghay omesay unusualay easonray orfay elievingbay atthay areray oodgay
ucklay awaiteday imhay inay osethay atitudeslay; anday ereforethay eingbay eryvay averseay otay
uitqay emthay, anday ethay eaklay otnay eingbay enthay onsideredcay atay allay angerousday,
oughthay, indeeday, eythay ouldcay otnay indfay itay afteray earchingsay ethay oldhay asay owlay
ownday asay asway ossiblepay inay atherray eavyhay eatherway, ethay ipshay illstay ontinuedcay
erhay uisingscray, ethay arinersmay orkingway atay ethay umpspay atay ideway anday easyay
intervalsay; utbay onay oodgay ucklay amecay; oremay aysday entway byay, anday otnay onlyay asway
ethay eaklay etyay undiscovereday, utbay itay ensiblysay increaseday. Osay uchmay osay, atthay
ownay akingtay omesay alarmay, ethay aptaincay, akingmay allay ailsay, oodstay awayay orfay ethay
earestnay arborhay amongay ethay islandsay, erethay otay avehay ishay ullhay ovehay outay anday
epairedray.

ough“Thay onay allsmay assagepay asway eforebay erhay, etyay, ifay ethay ommonestcay ancechay
avouredfay, ehay idday otnay atay allay earfay atthay ishay ipshay ouldway ounderfay byay ethay
ayway, ecausebay ishay umpspay ereway ofay ethay estbay, anday eingbay eriodicallypay
elievedray atay emthay, osethay ix-and-thirtysay enmay ofay ishay ouldcay easilyay eepkay ethay
ipshay eefray; evernay indmay ifay ethay eaklay ouldshay oubleday onay erhay. Inay uthtray, ellway
ighnay ethay olewhay ofay isthay assagepay eingbay attendeday byay eryvay osperouspray
eezesbray, ethay Own-Hotay adhay allay utbay ertainlycay arriveday inay erfectpay afetysay atay
erhay ortpay ithoutway ethay occurrenceay ofay ethay eastlay atalityfay, adhay itay otnay eenbay
orfay ethay utalbray overbearingay ofay Adneyray, ethay atemay, aay Ineyardervay, anday ethay
itterlybay ovokedpray engeancevay ofay Eelkiltstay, aay Akemanlay anday esperadoday omfray
Uffalobay.

akeman!—Buffalo“‘Lay! Aypray, atwhay isay aay Akemanlay, anday erewhay isay Uffalo?’bay
aidsay Onday Ebastiansay, isingray inay ishay ingingsway atmay ofay assgray.

On“ay ethay easternay oreshay ofay ouray Akelay Erieay, Onday; ut—Ibay avecray ouryay
ourtesy—maycay ebay, ouyay allshay oonsay earhay urtherfay ofay allay atthay. Ownay,
entlemengay, inay uare-sailsqay igsbray anday ee-mastedthray ipsshay, ell-nighway asay
argelay anday outstay asay anyay atthay everay ailedsay outay ofay ouryay olday Allaocay otay arfay
Anillamay; isthay Akemanlay, inay ethay and-lockedlay earthay ofay ouray Americaay, adhay etyay
eenbay urturednay byay allay osethay agrarianay eebootingfray impressionsay opularlypay
onnectedcay ithway ethay openay oceanay. Orfay inay eirthay interflowingay aggregateay,
osethay andgray esh-waterfray eassay ofay ours,—Erieay, anday Ontarioay, anday Uronhay, anday
Uperiorsay, anday Ichigan,—possessmay anay ocean-likeay expansivenessay, ithway anymay
ofay ethay ocean’say oblestnay aitstray; ithway anymay ofay itsay immedray arietiesvay ofay
acesray anday ofay imesclay. Eythay ontaincay oundray archipelagoesay ofay omanticray
islesay, evenay asay ethay Olynesianpay atersway oday; inay argelay artpay, areay oredshay byay
otway eatgray ontrastingcay ationsnay, asay ethay Atlanticay isay; eythay urnishfay onglay
aritimemay approachesay otay ouray umerousnay erritorialtay oloniescay omfray ethay Eastay,
ottedday allay oundray eirthay anksbay; erehay anday erethay areay ownedfray uponay byay
atteriesbay, anday byay ethay oat-likegay aggycray unsgay ofay oftylay Ackinawmay; eythay
avehay eardhay ethay eetflay underingsthay ofay avalnay ictoriesvay; atay intervalsay, eythay
ieldyay eirthay eachesbay otay ildway arbariansbay, osewhay edray aintedpay acesfay ashflay
omfray outay eirthay eltrypay igwamsway; orfay eagueslay anday eagueslay areay ankedflay byay
ancientay anday unentereday orestsfay, erewhay ethay auntgay inespay andstay ikelay erriedsay
ineslay ofay ingskay inay Othicgay enealogiesgay; osethay amesay oodsway arboringhay ildway
Africay eastsbay ofay eypray, anday ilkensay eaturescray osewhay exporteday ursfay ivegay
obesray otay Artartay Emperorsay; eythay irrormay ethay avedpay apitalscay ofay Uffalobay anday
Evelandclay, asay ellway asay Innebagoway illagesvay; eythay oatflay alikeay ethay
ull-riggedfay erchantmay ipshay, ethay armeday uisercray ofay ethay Atestay, ethay eamerstay,
anday ethay eechbay anoecay; eythay areay eptsway byay Oreanbay anday ismastingday astsblay asay
irefulday asay anyay atthay ashlay ethay altedsay aveway; eythay owknay atwhay ipwrecksshay
areay, orfay outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay, oweverhay inlanday, eythay avehay owneddray ullfay
anymay aay idnightmay ipshay ithway allay itsay iekingshray ewcray. Usthay, entlemengay,
oughthay anay inlanderay, Eelkiltstay asway ild-oceanway ornbay, anday ild-oceanway
urturednay; asay uchmay ofay anay audaciousay arinermay asay anyay. Anday orfay Adneyray,
oughthay inay ishay infancyay ehay aymay avehay aidlay imhay ownday onay ethay onelay Antucketnay
eachbay, otay ursenay atay ishay aternalmay easay; oughthay inay afteray ifelay ehay adhay onglay
ollowedfay ouray austereay Atlanticay anday ouryay ontemplativecay Acificpay; etyay asway
ehay uiteqay asay engefulvay anday ullfay ofay ocialsay uarrelqay asay ethay ackwoodsbay
eamansay, eshfray omfray ethay atitudeslay ofay uck-hornbay andledhay Owie-knivesbay. Etyay
asway isthay Antucketernay aay anmay ithway omesay ood-heartedgay aitstray; anday isthay
Akemanlay, aay arinermay, owhay oughthay aay ortsay ofay evilday indeeday, ightmay etyay byay
inflexibleay irmnessfay, onlyay emperedtay byay atthay ommoncay ecencyday ofay umanhay
ecognitionray ichwhay isay ethay eanestmay ave’sslay ightray; usthay eatedtray, isthay
Eelkiltstay adhay onglay eenbay etainedray armlesshay anday ocileday. Atay allay eventsay, ehay
adhay ovedpray osay usthay arfay; utbay Adneyray asway oomedday anday ademay admay, anday
Eelkilt—butstay, entlemengay, ouyay allshay earhay.

It“ay asway otnay oremay anthay aay ayday oray otway atay ethay urthestfay afteray ointingpay erhay
owpray orfay erhay islanday avenhay, atthay ethay Own-Ho’stay eaklay eemedsay againay
increasingay, utbay onlyay osay asay otay equireray anay ourhay oray oremay atay ethay umpspay
everyay ayday. Ouyay ustmay owknay atthay inay aay ettledsay anday ivilizedcay oceanay ikelay ouray
Atlanticay, orfay exampleay, omesay ippersskay inkthay ittlelay ofay umpingpay eirthay
olewhay ayway acrossay itay; oughthay ofay aay illstay, eepyslay ightnay, ouldshay ethay
officeray ofay ethay eckday appenhay otay orgetfay ishay utyday inay atthay espectray, ethay
obabilitypray ouldway ebay atthay ehay anday ishay ipmatesshay ouldway evernay againay
ememberray itay, onay accountay ofay allay andshay entlygay ubsidingsay otay ethay ottombay.
Ornay inay ethay olitarysay anday avagesay eassay arfay omfray ouyay otay ethay estwardway,
entlemengay, isay itay altogetheray unusualay orfay ipsshay otay eepkay angingclay atay eirthay
ump-handlespay inay ullfay oruschay evenay orfay aay oyagevay ofay onsiderablecay engthlay;
atthay isay, ifay itay ielay alongay aay olerablytay accessibleay oastcay, oray ifay anyay otheray
easonableray etreatray isay affordeday emthay. Itay isay onlyay enwhay aay eakylay esselvay isay
inay omesay eryvay outay ofay ethay ayway artpay ofay osethay atersway, omesay eallyray andlesslay
atitudelay, atthay erhay aptaincay eginsbay otay eelfay aay ittlelay anxiousay.

uch“May isthay ayway adhay itay eenbay ithway ethay Own-Hotay; osay enwhay erhay eaklay asway oundfay
aininggay onceay oremay, erethay asway inay uthtray omesay allsmay oncerncay anifestedmay byay
everalsay ofay erhay ompanycay; especiallyay byay Adneyray ethay atemay. Ehay ommandedcay ethay
upperay ailssay otay ebay ellway oistedhay, eetedshay omehay aneway, anday everyay ayway
expandeday otay ethay eezebray. Ownay isthay Adneyray, Iay upposesay, asway asay ittlelay ofay aay
owardcay, anday asay ittlelay inclineday otay anyay ortsay ofay ervousnay apprehensivenessay
ouchingtay ishay ownay ersonpay asay anyay earlessfay, unthinkingay eaturecray onay andlay oray
onay easay atthay ouyay ancay onvenientlycay imagineay, entlemengay. Ereforethay enwhay ehay
etrayedbay isthay olicitudesay aboutay ethay afetysay ofay ethay ipshay, omesay ofay ethay
eamensay eclaredday atthay itay asway onlyay onay accountay ofay ishay eingbay aay artpay owneray
inay erhay. Osay enwhay eythay ereway orkingway atthay eveningay atay ethay umpspay, erethay asway
onay isthay eadhay onay allsmay amesomenessgay ilyslay oinggay onay amongay emthay, asay eythay
oodstay ithway eirthay eetfay ontinuallycay overfloweday byay ethay ipplingray earclay
aterway; earclay asay anyay ountainmay ingspray, entlemen—thatgay ubblingbay omfray ethay
umpspay anray acrossay ethay eckday, anday ouredpay itselfay outay inay eadystay outsspay atay
ethay eelay upper-holesscay.

ow“Nay, asay ouyay ellway owknay, itay isay otnay eldomsay ethay asecay inay isthay onventionalcay
orldway ofay ours—wateryay oray otherwiseay; atthay enwhay aay ersonpay acedplay inay ommandcay
overay ishay ellow-menfay indsfay oneay ofay emthay otay ebay eryvay ignificantlysay ishay
uperiorsay inay eneralgay idepray ofay anhoodmay, aightwaystray againstay atthay anmay ehay
onceivescay anay unconquerableay islikeday anday itternessbay; anday ifay ehay avehay aay
ancechay ehay illway ullpay ownday anday ulverizepay atthay ubaltern’ssay owertay, anday akemay
aay ittlelay eaphay ofay ustday ofay itay. Ebay isthay onceitcay ofay inemay asay itay aymay,
entlemengay, atay allay eventsay Eelkiltstay asway aay alltay anday oblenay animalay ithway aay
eadhay ikelay aay Omanray, anday aay owingflay oldengay eardbay ikelay ethay asseledtay
ousingshay ofay ouryay astlay iceroy’svay ortingsnay argerchay; anday aay ainbray, anday aay
earthay, anday aay oulsay inay imhay, entlemengay, ichwhay adhay ademay Eelkiltstay
Arlemagnechay, adhay ehay eenbay ornbay onsay otay Arlemagne’schay atherfay. Utbay Adneyray,
ethay atemay, asway uglyay asay aay ulemay; etyay asay ardyhay, asay ubbornstay, asay aliciousmay.
Ehay idday otnay ovelay Eelkiltstay, anday Eelkiltstay ewknay itay.

Espying“ay ethay atemay awingdray earnay asay ehay asway oilingtay atay ethay umppay ithway ethay
estray, ethay Akemanlay affecteday otnay otay oticenay imhay, utbay unaweday, entway onay ithway
ishay aygay anteringsbay.

Aye“‘ay, ayeay, myay errymay adslay, it’say aay ivelylay eaklay isthay; oldhay aay annikincay,
oneay ofay eyay, anday et’slay avehay aay astetay. Byay ethay Ordlay, it’say orthway ottlingbay! Iay
elltay eyay atwhay, enmay, olday Ad’sray investmentay ustmay ogay orfay itay! ehay adhay estbay utcay
awayay ishay artpay ofay ethay ullhay anday owtay itay omehay. Ethay actfay isay, oysbay, atthay
ord-fishsway onlyay eganbay ethay objay; e’shay omecay ackbay againay ithway aay anggay ofay
ip-carpentersshay, aw-fishsay, anday ile-fishfay, anday atwhay otnay; anday ethay olewhay
ossepay ofay em’ay areay ownay ardhay atay orkway uttingcay anday ashingslay atay ethay ottombay;
akingmay improvementsay, Iay upposesay. Ifay olday Adray ereway erehay ownay, I’day elltay imhay
otay umpjay overboarday anday atterscay em’ay. Ey’rethay ayingplay ethay evilday ithway ishay
estateay, Iay ancay elltay imhay. Utbay e’shay aay implesay olday oul,—Radsay, anday aay eautybay
ootay. Oysbay, eythay aysay ethay estray ofay ishay opertypray isay investeday inay
ooking-glasseslay. Iay onderway ifay e’dhay ivegay aay oorpay evilday ikelay emay ethay odelmay
ofay ishay ose.’nay

amn“‘Day ouryay eyesay! at’swhay atthay umppay oppingstay or?’fay oaredray Adneyray,
etendingpray otnay otay avehay eardhay ethay ailors’say alktay. under‘Thay awayay atay it!’ay

Aye“‘ay, ayeay, ir,’say aidsay Eelkiltstay, errymay asay aay icketcray. ively‘Lay, oysbay,
ivelylay, ow!’nay Anday ithway atthay ethay umppay angedclay ikelay iftyfay ire-enginesfay;
ethay enmay ossedtay eirthay atshay offay otay itay, anday ereay onglay atthay eculiarpay aspinggay
ofay ethay ungslay asway eardhay ichwhay enotesday ethay ullestfay ensiontay ofay ife’slay
utmostay energiesay.

uitting“Qay ethay umppay atay astlay, ithway ethay estray ofay ishay andbay, ethay Akemanlay entway
orwardfay allay antingpay, anday atsay imselfhay ownday onay ethay indlassway; ishay acefay
ieryfay edray, ishay eyesay oodshotblay, anday ipingway ethay ofusepray eatsway omfray ishay
owbray. Ownay atwhay ozeningcay iendfay itay asway, entlemengay, atthay ossessedpay Adneyray
otay eddlemay ithway uchsay aay anmay inay atthay orporeallycay exasperateday atestay, Iay owknay
otnay; utbay osay itay appenedhay. Intolerablyay idingstray alongay ethay eckday, ethay atemay
ommandedcay imhay otay etgay aay oombray anday eepsway ownday ethay anksplay, anday alsoay aay
