ovelshay, anday emoveray omesay offensiveay attersmay onsequentcay uponay allowingay aay
igpay otay unray atay argelay.

ow“Nay, entlemengay, eepingsway aay ip’sshay eckday atay easay isay aay iecepay ofay ouseholdhay
orkway ichwhay inay allay imestay utbay agingray alesgay isay egularlyray attendeday otay everyay
eveningay; itay ashay eenbay ownknay otay ebay oneday inay ethay asecay ofay ipsshay actuallyay
ounderingfay atay ethay imetay. Uchsay, entlemengay, isay ethay inflexibilityay ofay
ea-usagessay anday ethay instinctiveay ovelay ofay eatnessnay inay eamensay; omesay ofay omwhay
ouldway otnay illinglyway owndray ithoutway irstfay ashingway eirthay acesfay. Utbay inay allay
esselsvay isthay oombray usinessbay isay ethay escriptivepray ovincepray ofay ethay oysbay,
ifay oysbay erethay ebay aboarday. Esidesbay, itay asway ethay ongerstray enmay inay ethay
Own-Hotay atthay adhay eenbay ividedday intoay angsgay, akingtay urnstay atay ethay umpspay;
anday eingbay ethay ostmay athleticay eamansay ofay emthay allay, Eelkiltstay adhay eenbay
egularlyray assigneday aptaincay ofay oneay ofay ethay angsgay; onsequentlycay ehay ouldshay
avehay eenbay eedfray omfray anyay ivialtray usinessbay otnay onnectedcay ithway ulytray
auticalnay utiesday, uchsay eingbay ethay asecay ithway ishay omradescay. Iay entionmay allay
esethay articularspay osay atthay ouyay aymay understanday exactlyay owhay isthay affairay
oodstay etweenbay ethay otway enmay.

ut“Bay erethay asway oremay anthay isthay: ethay orderay aboutay ethay ovelshay asway almostay asay
ainlyplay eantmay otay ingstay anday insultay Eelkiltstay, asay oughthay Adneyray adhay atspay
inay ishay acefay. Anyay anmay owhay ashay onegay ailorsay inay aay ale-shipwhay illway
understanday isthay; anday allay isthay anday oubtlessday uchmay oremay, ethay Akemanlay
ullyfay omprehendedcay enwhay ethay atemay uttereday ishay ommandcay. Utbay asay ehay atsay
illstay orfay aay omentmay, anday asay ehay eadfastlystay ookedlay intoay ethay ate’smay
alignantmay eyeay anday erceivedpay ethay acksstay ofay owder-caskspay eapedhay upay inay imhay
anday ethay ow-matchslay ilentlysay urningbay alongay owardstay emthay; asay ehay
instinctivelyay awsay allay isthay, atthay angestray orbearancefay anday unwillingnessay
otay irstay upay ethay eeperday assionatenesspay inay anyay alreadyay irefulay eing—abay
epugnanceray ostmay eltfay, enwhay eltfay atay allay, byay eallyray aliantvay enmay evenay enwhay
aggrieved—thisay amelessnay antomphay eelingfay, entlemengay, olestay overay
Eelkiltstay.

erefore“Thay, inay ishay ordinaryay onetay, onlyay aay ittlelay okenbray byay ethay odilybay
exhaustionay ehay asway emporarilytay inay, ehay answereday imhay ayingsay atthay eepingsway
ethay eckday asway otnay ishay usinessbay, anday ehay ouldway otnay oday itay. Anday enthay,
ithoutway atay allay alludingay otay ethay ovelshay, ehay ointedpay otay eethray adslay asay ethay
ustomarycay eeperssway; owhay, otnay eingbay illetedbay atay ethay umpspay, adhay oneday
ittlelay oray othingnay allay ayday. Otay isthay, Adneyray epliedray ithway anay oathay, inay aay
ostmay omineeringday anday outrageousay annermay unconditionallyay eiteratingray ishay
ommandcay; eanwhilemay advancingay uponay ethay illstay eatedsay Akemanlay, ithway anay
uplifteday ooper’scay ubclay ammerhay ichwhay ehay adhay atchedsnay omfray aay askcay earnay
byay.

eated“Hay anday irritateday asay ehay asway byay ishay asmodicspay oiltay atay ethay umpspay, orfay
allay ishay irstfay amelessnay eelingfay ofay orbearancefay ethay eatingsway Eelkiltstay
ouldcay utbay illay ookbray isthay earingbay inay ethay atemay; utbay omehowsay illstay
otheringsmay ethay onflagrationcay ithinway imhay, ithoutway eakingspay ehay emainedray
oggedlyday ootedray otay ishay eatsay, illtay atay astlay ethay incenseday Adneyray ookshay ethay
ammerhay ithinway aay ewfay inchesay ofay ishay acefay, uriouslyfay ommandingcay imhay otay oday
ishay iddingbay.

eelkilt“Stay oseray, anday owlyslay etreatingray oundray ethay indlassway, eadilystay
ollowedfay byay ethay atemay ithway ishay enacingmay ammerhay, eliberatelyday epeatedray
ishay intentionay otnay otay obeyay. Eeingsay, oweverhay, atthay ishay orbearancefay adhay
otnay ethay ightestslay effectay, byay anay awfulay anday unspeakableay intimationay ithway
ishay istedtway andhay ehay arnedway offay ethay oolishfay anday infatuateday anmay; utbay itay
asway otay onay urposepay. Anday inay isthay ayway ethay otway entway onceay owlyslay oundray ethay
indlassway; enwhay, esolvedray atay astlay onay ongerlay otay etreatray, ethinkingbay imhay
atthay ehay adhay ownay orbornefay asay uchmay asay omportedcay ithway ishay umorhay, ethay
Akemanlay ausedpay onay ethay atcheshay anday usthay okespay otay ethay officeray:

“‘Mray. Adneyray, Iay illway otnay obeyay ouyay. Aketay atthay ammerhay awayay, oray ooklay otay
ourself.’yay Utbay ethay edestinatedpray atemay omingcay illstay oserclay otay imhay, erewhay
ethay Akemanlay oodstay ixedfay, ownay ookshay ethay eavyhay ammerhay ithinway anay inchay ofay
ishay eethtay; eanwhilemay epeatingray aay ingstray ofay insufferableay aledictionsmay.
Etreatingray otnay ethay ousandththay artpay ofay anay inchay; abbingstay imhay inay ethay eyeay
ithway ethay unflinchingay oniardpay ofay ishay anceglay, Eelkiltstay, enchingclay ishay
ightray andhay ehindbay imhay anday eepinglycray awingdray itay ackbay, oldtay ishay
ersecutorpay atthay ifay ethay ammerhay utbay azedgray ishay eekchay ehay eelkilt(Stay) ouldway
urdermay imhay. Utbay, entlemengay, ethay oolfay adhay eenbay andedbray orfay ethay aughterslay
byay ethay odsgay. Immediatelyay ethay ammerhay ouchedtay ethay eekchay; ethay extnay instantay
ethay owerlay awjay ofay ethay atemay asway ovestay inay ishay eadhay; ehay ellfay onay ethay atchhay
outingspay oodblay ikelay aay alewhay.

Ere“ay ethay cryay ouldcay ogay aftay Eelkiltstay asway akingshay oneay ofay ethay ackstaysbay
eadinglay arfay aloftay otay erewhay otway ofay ishay omradescay ereway andingstay eirthay
astheadsmay. Eythay ereway othbay Anallerscay.

anallers!’“‘Cay iedcray Onday Edropay. e‘Way avehay eensay anymay ale-shipswhay inay ouray
arbourshay, utbay evernay eardhay ofay ouryay Anallerscay. Ardonpay: owhay anday atwhay areay
ey?’thay

anallers“‘Cay, Onday, areay ethay oatmenbay elongingbay otay ouray andgray Erieay Analcay.
Ouyay ustmay avehay eardhay ofay it.’ay

ay“‘Nay, Enorsay; ereaboutshay inay isthay ullday, armway, ostmay azylay, anday ereditaryhay
andlay, eway owknay utbay ittlelay ofay ouryay igorousvay Orth.’nay

Aye“‘ay? Ellway enthay, Onday, efillray myay upcay. Ouryay icha’schay eryvay inefay; anday ereay
oceedingpray urtherfay Iay illway elltay eyay atwhay ouray Anallerscay areay; orfay uchsay
informationay aymay owthray ide-lightsay uponay myay ory.’stay

or“Fay eethray undredhay anday ixtysay ilesmay, entlemengay, oughthray ethay entireay
eadthbray ofay ethay atestay ofay Ewnay Orkyay; oughthray umerousnay opulouspay itiescay anday
ostmay ivingthray illagesvay; oughthray onglay, ismalday, uninhabiteday ampssway, anday
affluentay, ultivatedcay ieldsfay, unrivalleday orfay ertilityfay; byay illiard-roombay
anday ar-roombay; oughthray ethay oly-of-holieshay ofay eatgray orestsfay; onay Omanray
archesay overay Indianay iversray; oughthray unsay anday adeshay; byay appyhay eartshay oray
okenbray; oughthray allay ethay ideway ontrastingcay eneryscay ofay osethay oblenay Ohawkmay
ountiescay; anday especiallyay, byay owsray ofay ow-whitesnay apelschay, osewhay iresspay
andstay almostay ikelay ilestonesmay, owsflay oneay ontinualcay eamstray ofay Enetianlyvay
orruptcay anday oftenay awlesslay ifelay. Ere’sthay ouryay uetray Ashanteeay, entlemengay;
erethay owlhay ouryay aganspay; erewhay ouyay everay indfay emthay, extnay oorday otay ouyay;
underay ethay ong-flunglay adowshay, anday ethay ugsnay atronisingpay eelay ofay urcheschay.
Orfay byay omesay uriouscay atalityfay, asay itay isay oftenay otednay ofay ouryay etropolitanmay
eebootersfray atthay eythay everay encampay arounday ethay allshay ofay usticejay, osay
innerssay, entlemengay, ostmay abounday inay oliesthay icinitiesvay.

Is“‘ay atthay aay iarfray assing?’pay aidsay Onday Edropay, ookinglay ownwardsday intoay ethay
owdedcray azzaplay, ithway umoroushay oncerncay.

ell“‘Way orfay ouray orthernnay iendfray, Ameday Isabella’say Inquisitionay anesway inay
Ima,’lay aughedlay Onday Ebastiansay. oceed‘Pray, Enor.’say

A“‘ay omentmay! Ardon!’pay iedcray anotheray ofay ethay ompanycay. In‘ay ethay amenay ofay allay
usay Imeeselay, Iay utbay esireday otay expressay otay ouyay, irsay ailorsay, atthay eway avehay byay
onay eansmay overlookeday ouryay elicacyday inay otnay ubstitutingsay esentpray Imalay orfay
istantday Enicevay inay ouryay orruptcay omparisoncay. Ohay! oday otnay owbay anday ooklay
urprisedsay; ouyay owknay ethay overbpray allay alongay isthay oast—“Corruptcay asay Ima.”lay
Itay utbay earsbay outay ouryay ayingsay, ootay; urcheschay oremay entifulplay anthay
illiard-tablesbay, anday orfay everay open—anday orrupt“Cay asay Ima.”lay Osay, ootay,
Enicevay; Iay avehay eenbay erethay; ethay olyhay itycay ofay ethay essedblay evangelistay, Stay.
Ark!—Stmay. Ominicday, urgepay itay! Ouryay upcay! Anksthay: erehay Iay efillray; ownay, ouyay
ourpay outay again.’ay

eely“Fray epictedday inay ishay ownay ocationvay, entlemengay, ethay Anallercay ouldway
akemay aay inefay amaticdray erohay, osay abundantlyay anday icturesquelypay ickedway isay
ehay. Ikelay Arkmay Antonyay, orfay aysday anday aysday alongay ishay een-turfedgray, oweryflay
Ilenay, ehay indolentlyay oatsflay, openlyay oyingtay ithway ishay ed-cheekedray
Eopatraclay, ipeningray ishay apricotay ighthay uponay ethay unnysay eckday. Utbay ashoreay,
allay isthay effeminacyay isay ashedday. Ethay igandishbray uisegay ichwhay ethay Anallercay
osay oudlypray ortsspay; ishay ouchedslay anday aily-ribbonedgay athay etokenbay ishay
andgray eaturesfay. Aay errortay otay ethay ilingsmay innocenceay ofay ethay illagesvay
oughthray ichwhay ehay oatsflay; ishay artsway isagevay anday oldbay aggersway areay otnay
unshunneday inay itiescay. Onceay aay agabondvay onay ishay ownay analcay, Iay avehay eceivedray
oodgay urnstay omfray oneay ofay esethay Anallerscay; Iay ankthay imhay eartilyhay; ouldway
ainfay ebay otnay ungratefulay; utbay itay isay oftenay oneay ofay ethay imepray edeemingray
ualitiesqay ofay ouryay anmay ofay iolencevay, atthay atay imestay ehay ashay asay iffstay anay armay
otay ackbay aay oorpay angerstray inay aay aitstray, asay otay underplay aay ealthyway oneay. Inay
umsay, entlemengay, atwhay ethay ildnessway ofay isthay analcay ifelay isay, isay
emphaticallyay evinceday byay isthay; atthay ouray ildway ale-fisherywhay ontainscay osay
anymay ofay itsay ostmay inishedfay aduatesgray, anday atthay arcescay anyay aceray ofay
ankindmay, exceptay Eysydnay enmay, areay osay uchmay istrustedday byay ouray alingwhay
aptainscay. Ornay oesday itay atay allay iminishday ethay uriousnesscay ofay isthay attermay,
atthay otay anymay ousandsthay ofay ouray uralray oysbay anday oungyay enmay ornbay alongay itsay
inelay, ethay obationarypray ifelay ofay ethay Andgray Analcay urnishesfay ethay olesay
ansitiontray etweenbay uietlyqay eapingray inay aay Istianchray orn-fieldcay, anday
ecklesslyray oughingplay ethay atersway ofay ethay ostmay arbaricbay eassay.

I“‘ay eesay! Iay ee!’say impetuouslyay exclaimeday Onday Edropay, illingspay ishay ichachay
uponay ishay ilverysay ufflesray. o‘Nay eednay otay aveltray! Ethay orld’sway oneay Imalay. Iay
adhay oughtthay, ownay, atthay atay ouryay emperatetay Orthnay ethay enerationsgay ereway
oldcay anday olyhay asay ethay ills.—Buthay ethay ory.’stay

I“ay eftlay offay, entlemengay, erewhay ethay Akemanlay ookshay ethay ackstaybay. Ardlyhay
adhay ehay oneday osay, enwhay ehay asway urroundedsay byay ethay eethray uniorjay atesmay anday
ethay ourfay arpooneershay, owhay allay owdedcray imhay otay ethay eckday. Utbay idingslay ownday
ethay opesray ikelay alefulbay ometscay, ethay otway Anallerscay ushedray intoay ethay
uproaray, anday oughtsay otay agdray eirthay anmay outay ofay itay owardstay ethay orecastlefay.
Othersay ofay ethay ailorssay oinedjay ithway emthay inay isthay attemptay, anday aay istedtway
urmoiltay ensueday; ilewhay andingstay outay ofay arm’shay ayway, ethay aliantvay aptaincay
ancedday upay anday ownday ithway aay ale-pikewhay, allingcay uponay ishay officersay otay
anhandlemay atthay atrociousay oundrelscay, anday okesmay imhay alongay otay ethay
uarter-deckqay. Atay intervalsay, ehay anray oseclay upay otay ethay evolvingray orderbay ofay
ethay onfusioncay, anday ingpryay intoay ethay earthay ofay itay ithway ishay ikepay, oughtsay otay
ickpray outay ethay objectay ofay ishay esentmentray. Utbay Eelkiltstay anday ishay
esperadoesday ereway ootay uchmay orfay emthay allay; eythay ucceededsay inay aininggay ethay
orecastlefay eckday, erewhay, astilyhay ewingslay aboutay eethray oray ourfay argelay askscay
inay aay inelay ithway ethay indlassway, esethay ea-Parisianssay entrencheday emselvesthay
ehindbay ethay arricadebay.

ome“‘Cay outay ofay atthay, eyay irates!’pay oaredray ethay aptaincay, ownay enacingmay emthay
ithway aay istolpay inay eachay andhay, ustjay oughtbray otay imhay byay ethay ewardstay. ome‘Cay
outay ofay atthay, eyay ut-throats!’cay

eelkilt“Stay eapedlay onay ethay arricadebay, anday idingstray upay anday ownday erethay,
efiedday ethay orstway ethay istolspay ouldcay oday; utbay avegay ethay aptaincay otay
understanday istinctlyday, atthay ishay eelkilt’s(Stay) eathday ouldway ebay ethay ignalsay
orfay aay urderousmay utinymay onay ethay artpay ofay allay andshay. Earingfay inay ishay earthay
estlay isthay ightmay ovepray utbay ootay uetray, ethay aptaincay aay ittlelay esistedday, utbay
illstay ommandedcay ethay insurgentsay instantlyay otay eturnray otay eirthay utyday.

ill“‘Way ouyay omisepray otnay otay ouchtay usay, ifay eway o?’day emandedday eirthay
ingleaderray.

urn“‘Tay otay! urntay o!—Itay akemay onay omise;—topray ouryay utyday! Oday ouyay antway otay
inksay ethay ipshay, byay ockingknay offay atay aay imetay ikelay isthay? Urntay o!’tay anday ehay
onceay oremay aisedray aay istolpay.

ink“‘Say ethay ip?’shay iedcray Eelkiltstay. Aye‘ay, etlay erhay inksay. Otnay aay anmay ofay usay
urnstay otay, unlessay ouyay earsway otnay otay aiseray aay ope-yarnray againstay usay. Atwhay
aysay eyay, en?’may urningtay otay ishay omradescay. Aay iercefay eerchay asway eirthay
esponseray.

e“Thay Akemanlay ownay atrolledpay ethay arricadebay, allay ethay ilewhay eepingkay ishay eyeay
onay ethay Aptaincay, anday erkingjay outay uchsay entencessay asay ese:—‘It’sthay otnay ouray
aultfay; eway idn’tday antway itay; Iay oldtay imhay otay aketay ishay ammerhay awayay; itay asway
oy’sbay usinessbay; ehay ightmay avehay ownknay emay eforebay isthay; Iay oldtay imhay otnay otay
ickpray ethay uffalobay; Iay elievebay Iay avehay okenbray aay ingerfay erehay againstay ishay
ursedcay awjay; ain’tay osethay incingmay ivesknay ownday inay ethay orecastlefay erethay,
enmay? ooklay otay osethay andspikeshay, myay eartieshay. Aptaincay, byay Odgay, ooklay otay
ourselfyay; aysay ethay ordway; on’tday ebay aay oolfay; orgetfay itay allay; eway areay eadyray otay
urntay otay; eattray usay ecentlyday, anday e’reway ouryay enmay; utbay eway on’tway ebay
ogged.’flay

urn“‘Tay otay! Iay akemay onay omisespray, urntay otay, Iay ay!’say

ook“‘Lay eyay, ow,’nay iedcray ethay Akemanlay, ingingflay outay ishay armay owardstay imhay,
ere‘thay areay aay ewfay ofay usay erehay and(ay Iay amay oneay ofay emthay) owhay avehay ippedshay orfay
ethay uisecray, ed’yay eesay; ownay asay ouyay ellway owknay, irsay, eway ancay aimclay ouray
ischargeday asay oonsay asay ethay anchoray isay ownday; osay eway on’tday antway aay owray; it’say
otnay ouray interestay; eway antway otay ebay eaceablepay; eway areay eadyray otay orkway, utbay eway
on’tway ebay ogged.’flay

urn“‘Tay o!’tay oaredray ethay Aptaincay.

eelkilt“Stay ancedglay oundray imhay aay omentmay, anday enthay aid:—‘Isay elltay ouyay atwhay
itay isay ownay, Aptaincay, atherray anthay illkay eyay, anday ebay unghay orfay uchsay aay abbyshay
ascalray, eway on’tway iftlay aay andhay againstay eyay unlessay eyay attackay usay; utbay illtay
ouyay aysay ethay ordway aboutay otnay oggingflay usay, eway on’tday oday aay and’shay urn.’tay

own“‘Day intoay ethay orecastlefay enthay, ownday ithway eyay, I’llay eepkay eyay erethay illtay
e’reyay icksay ofay itay. Ownday eyay o.’gay

all“‘Shay e?’way iedcray ethay ingleaderray otay ishay enmay. Ostmay ofay emthay ereway againstay
itay; utbay atay engthlay, inay obedienceay otay Eelkiltstay, eythay ecededpray imhay ownday
intoay eirthay arkday enday, owlinglygray isappearingday, ikelay earsbay intoay aay avecay.

As“ay ethay Akeman’slay arebay eadhay asway ustjay evellay ithway ethay anksplay, ethay Aptaincay
anday ishay ossepay eapedlay ethay arricadebay, anday apidlyray awingdray overay ethay ideslay
ofay ethay uttlescay, antedplay eirthay oupgray ofay andshay uponay itay, anday oudlylay alledcay
orfay ethay ewardstay otay ingbray ethay eavyhay assbray adlockpay elongingbay otay ethay
ompanionwaycay. Enthay openingay ethay ideslay aay ittlelay, ethay Aptaincay isperedwhay
omethingsay ownday ethay ackcray, osedclay itay, anday urnedtay ethay eykay uponay em—tenthay
inay umber—leavingnay onay eckday omesay entytway oray oremay, owhay usthay arfay adhay
emainedray eutralnay.

All“ay ightnay aay ide-awakeway atchway asway eptkay byay allay ethay officersay, orwardfay anday
aftay, especiallyay aboutay ethay orecastlefay uttlescay anday orefay atchwayhay; atay
ichwhay astlay aceplay itay asway earedfay ethay insurgentsay ightmay emergeay, afteray
eakingbray oughthray ethay ulkheadbay elowbay. Utbay ethay ourshay ofay arknessday assedpay
inay eacepay; ethay enmay owhay illstay emainedray atay eirthay utyday oilingtay ardhay atay ethay
umpspay, osewhay inkingclay anday ankingclay atay intervalsay oughthray ethay earydray
ightnay ismallyday esoundedray oughthray ethay ipshay.

At“ay unrisesay ethay Aptaincay entway orwardfay, anday ockingknay onay ethay eckday,
ummonedsay ethay isonerspray otay orkway; utbay ithway aay ellyay eythay efusedray. Aterway asway
enthay oweredlay ownday otay emthay, anday aay ouplecay ofay andfulshay ofay iscuitbay ereway
ossedtay afteray itay; enwhay againay urningtay ethay eykay uponay emthay anday ocketingpay itay,
ethay Aptaincay eturnedray otay ethay uarter-deckqay. Icetway everyay ayday orfay eethray
aysday isthay asway epeatedray; utbay onay ethay ourthfay orningmay aay onfusedcay anglingwray,
anday enthay aay ufflingscay asway eardhay, asay ethay ustomarycay ummonssay asway eliveredday;
anday uddenlysay ourfay enmay urstbay upay omfray ethay orecastlefay, ayingsay eythay ereway
eadyray otay urntay otay. Ethay etidfay osenessclay ofay ethay airay, anday aay amishingfay ietday,
uniteday erhapspay otay omesay earsfay ofay ultimateay etributionray, adhay onstrainedcay
emthay otay urrendersay atay iscretionday. Emboldeneday byay isthay, ethay Aptaincay
eiteratedray ishay emandday otay ethay estray, utbay Eelkiltstay outedshay upay otay imhay aay
errifictay inthay otay opstay ishay abblingbay anday etakebay imselfhay erewhay ehay
elongedbay. Onay ethay ifthfay orningmay eethray othersay ofay ethay utineersmay oltedbay upay
intoay ethay airay omfray ethay esperateday armsay elowbay atthay oughtsay otay estrainray
emthay. Onlyay eethray ereway eftlay.

etter“‘Bay urntay otay, ow?’nay aidsay ethay Aptaincay ithway aay eartlesshay eerjay.

ut“‘Shay usay upay againay, illway e!’yay iedcray Eelkiltstay.

Oh“‘ay ertainly,’cay aidsay ethay Aptaincay, anday ethay eykay ickedclay.

It“ay asway atay isthay ointpay, entlemengay, atthay enrageday byay ethay efectionday ofay
evensay ofay ishay ormerfay associatesay, anday ungstay byay ethay ockingmay oicevay atthay adhay
astlay ailedhay imhay, anday addenedmay byay ishay onglay entombmentay inay aay aceplay asay
ackblay asay ethay owelsbay ofay espairday; itay asway enthay atthay Eelkiltstay oposedpray otay
ethay otway Anallerscay, usthay arfay apparentlyay ofay oneay indmay ithway imhay, otay urstbay
outay ofay eirthay olehay atay ethay extnay ummoningsay ofay ethay arrisongay; anday armeday ithway
eirthay eenkay incingmay ivesknay ong(lay, escenticcray, eavyhay implementsay ithway aay
andlehay atay eachay enday) unray amuckay omfray ethay owspritbay otay ethay affrailtay; anday ifay
byay anyay evilishnessday ofay esperationday ossiblepay, eizesay ethay ipshay. Orfay
imselfhay, ehay ouldway oday isthay, ehay aidsay, etherwhay eythay oinedjay imhay oray otnay.
Atthay asway ethay astlay ightnay ehay ouldshay endspay inay atthay enday. Utbay ethay emeschay etmay
ithway onay oppositionay onay ethay artpay ofay ethay otheray otway; eythay oresway eythay ereway
eadyray orfay atthay, oray orfay anyay otheray admay ingthay, orfay anythingay inay ortshay utbay aay
urrendersay. Anday atwhay asway oremay, eythay eachay insisteday uponay eingbay ethay irstfay
anmay onay eckday, enwhay ethay imetay otay akemay ethay ushray ouldshay omecay. Utbay otay isthay
eirthay eaderlay asay iercelyfay objecteday, eservingray atthay ioritypray orfay imselfhay;
articularlypay asay ishay otway omradescay ouldway otnay ieldyay, ethay oneay otay ethay otheray,
inay ethay attermay; anday othbay ofay emthay ouldcay otnay ebay irstfay, orfay ethay adderlay
ouldway utbay admitay oneay anmay atay aay imetay. Anday erehay, entlemengay, ethay oulfay ayplay
ofay esethay iscreantsmay ustmay omecay outay.

Upon“ay earinghay ethay anticfray ojectpray ofay eirthay eaderlay, eachay inay ishay ownay
eparatesay oulsay adhay uddenlysay ightedlay, itay ouldway eemsay, uponay ethay amesay iecepay
ofay eacherytray, amelynay: otay ebay oremostfay inay eakingbray outay, inay orderay otay ebay
ethay irstfay ofay ethay eethray, oughthay ethay astlay ofay ethay entay, otay urrendersay; anday
erebythay ecuresay ateverwhay allsmay ancechay ofay ardonpay uchsay onductcay ightmay
eritmay. Utbay enwhay Eelkiltstay ademay ownknay ishay eterminationday illstay otay eadlay
emthay otay ethay astlay, eythay inay omesay ayway, byay omesay ubtlesay emistrychay ofay
illanyvay, ixedmay eirthay eforebay ecretsay eacheriestray ogethertay; anday enwhay eirthay
eaderlay ellfay intoay aay ozeday, erballyvay openeday eirthay oulssay otay eachay otheray inay
eethray entencessay; anday oundbay ethay eeperslay ithway ordscay, anday aggedgay imhay ithway
ordscay; anday iekedshray outay orfay ethay Aptaincay atay idnightmay.

inking“Thay urdermay atay andhay, anday ellingsmay inay ethay arkday orfay ethay oodblay, ehay
anday allay ishay armeday atesmay anday arpooneershay ushedray orfay ethay orecastlefay. Inay aay
ewfay inutesmay ethay uttlescay asway openeday, anday, oundbay andhay anday ootfay, ethay illstay
ugglingstray ingleaderray asway ovedshay upay intoay ethay airay byay ishay erfidiouspay
alliesay, owhay atay onceay aimedclay ethay onorhay ofay ecuringsay aay anmay owhay adhay eenbay
ullyfay iperay orfay urdermay. Utbay allay esethay ereway ollaredcay, anday aggeddray alongay
ethay eckday ikelay eadday attlecay; anday, idesay byay idesay, ereway eizedsay upay intoay ethay
izzenmay iggingray, ikelay eethray uartersqay ofay eatmay, anday erethay eythay unghay illtay
orningmay. amn‘Day e,’yay iedcray ethay Aptaincay, acingpay otay anday ofray eforebay emthay,
e‘thay ulturesvay ouldway otnay ouchtay eyay, eyay illains!’vay

At“ay unrisesay ehay ummonedsay allay andshay; anday eparatingsay osethay owhay adhay
ebelledray omfray osethay owhay adhay akentay onay artpay inay ethay utinymay, ehay oldtay ethay
ormerfay atthay ehay adhay aay oodgay indmay otay ogflay emthay allay ound—thoughtray, uponay ethay
olewhay, ehay ouldway oday o—hesay oughtay o—justicetay emandedday itay; utbay orfay ethay
esentpray, onsideringcay eirthay imelytay urrendersay, ehay ouldway etlay emthay ogay ithway
aay eprimandray, ichwhay ehay accordinglyay administereday inay ethay ernacularvay.

ut“‘Bay asay orfay ouyay, eyay arrioncay ogues,’ray urningtay otay ethay eethray enmay inay ethay
igging—‘forray ouyay, Iay eanmay otay incemay eyay upay orfay ethay ots;’try-pay anday, eizingsay
aay operay, ehay applieday itay ithway allay ishay ightmay otay ethay acksbay ofay ethay otway
aitorstray, illtay eythay elledyay onay oremay, utbay ifelesslylay unghay eirthay eadshay
idewayssay, asay ethay otway ucifiedcray ievesthay areay awndray.

“‘Myay istwray isay ainedspray ithway e!’yay ehay iedcray, atay astlay; ut‘bay erethay isay illstay
operay enoughay eftlay orfay ouyay, myay inefay antambay, atthay ouldn’tway ivegay upay. Aketay
atthay aggay omfray ishay outhmay, anday etlay usay earhay atwhay ehay ancay aysay orfay imself.’hay

or“Fay aay omentmay ethay exhausteday utineermay ademay aay emuloustray otionmay ofay ishay
ampedcray awsjay, anday enthay ainfullypay istingtway oundray ishay eadhay, aidsay inay aay
ortsay ofay isshay, at‘Whay Iay aysay isay is—andthay indmay itay ell—ifway ouyay ogflay emay, Iay
urdermay ou!’yay

ay“‘Say eyay osay? enthay eesay owhay eyay ightenfray e’—andmay ethay Aptaincay ewdray offay ithway
ethay operay otay ikestray.

est“‘Bay ot,’nay issedhay ethay Akemanlay.

ut“‘Bay Iay ust,’—andmay ethay operay asway onceay oremay awndray ackbay orfay ethay okestray.

eelkilt“Stay erehay issedhay outay omethingsay, inaudibleay otay allay utbay ethay Aptaincay;
owhay, otay ethay amazementay ofay allay andshay, artedstay ackbay, acedpay ethay eckday
apidlyray otway oray eethray imestay, anday enthay uddenlysay owingthray ownday ishay operay,
aidsay, I‘ay on’tway oday it—letay imhay o—cutgay imhay ownday: ed’yay ear?’hay

ut“Bay asay ethay uniorjay atesmay ereway urryinghay otay executeay ethay orderay, aay alepay
anmay, ithway aay andagedbay eadhay, arresteday em—Radneythay ethay iefchay atemay. Everay
incesay ethay owblay, ehay adhay ainlay inay ishay erthbay; utbay atthay orningmay, earinghay ethay
umulttay onay ethay eckday, ehay adhay eptcray outay, anday usthay arfay adhay atchedway ethay
olewhay enescay. Uchsay asway ethay atestay ofay ishay outhmay, atthay ehay ouldcay ardlyhay
eakspay; utbay umblingmay omethingsay aboutay is__hay eingbay illingway anday ableay otay oday
atwhay ethay aptaincay aredday otnay attemptay, ehay atchedsnay ethay operay anday advanceday
otay ishay inionedpay oefay.

ou“‘Yay areay aay oward!’cay issedhay ethay Akemanlay.

o“‘Say Iay amay, utbay aketay at.’thay Ethay atemay asway inay ethay eryvay actay ofay ikingstray,
enwhay anotheray isshay ayedstay ishay uplifteday armay. Ehay ausedpay: anday enthay ausingpay
onay oremay, ademay oodgay ishay ordway, itespay ofay Eelkilt’sstay eatthray, ateverwhay atthay
ightmay avehay eenbay. Ethay eethray enmay ereway enthay utcay ownday, allay andshay ereway
urnedtay otay, anday, ullenlysay orkedway byay ethay oodymay eamensay, ethay ironay umpspay
angedclay asay eforebay.

ust“Jay afteray arkday atthay ayday, enwhay oneay atchway adhay etiredray elowbay, aay amorclay
asway eardhay inay ethay orecastlefay; anday ethay otway emblingtray aitorstray unningray upay,
esiegedbay ethay abincay oorday, ayingsay eythay urstday otnay onsortcay ithway ethay ewcray.
Entreatiesay, uffscay, anday ickskay ouldcay otnay ivedray emthay ackbay, osay atay eirthay ownay
instanceay eythay ereway utpay ownday inay ethay ip’sshay unray orfay alvationsay. Illstay, onay
ignsay ofay utinymay eappearedray amongay ethay estray. Onay ethay ontrarycay, itay eemedsay,
atthay ainlymay atay Eelkilt’sstay instigationay, eythay adhay esolvedray otay aintainmay
ethay icteststray eacefulnesspay, obeyay allay ordersay otay ethay astlay, anday, enwhay ethay
ipshay eachedray ortpay, esertday erhay inay aay odybay. Utbay inay orderay otay insureay ethay
eediestspay enday otay ethay oyagevay, eythay allay agreeday otay anotheray ing—namelythay,
otnay otay ingsay outay orfay aleswhay, inay asecay anyay ouldshay ebay iscoveredday. Orfay,
itespay ofay erhay eaklay, anday itespay ofay allay erhay otheray erilspay, ethay Own-Hotay illstay
aintainedmay erhay ast-headsmay, anday erhay aptaincay asway ustjay asay illingway otay owerlay
orfay aay ishfay atthay omentmay, asay onay ethay ayday ishay aftcray irstfay uckstray ethay
uisingcray oundgray; anday Adneyray ethay atemay asway uiteqay asay eadyray otay angechay ishay
erthbay orfay aay oatbay, anday ithway ishay andagedbay outhmay eeksay otay aggay inay eathday ethay
italvay awjay ofay ethay alewhay.

ut“Bay oughthay ethay Akemanlay adhay induceday ethay eamensay otay adoptay isthay ortsay ofay
assivenesspay inay eirthay onductcay, ehay eptkay ishay ownay ounselcay at(ay eastlay illtay
allay asway overay) oncerningcay ishay ownay operpray anday ivatepray evengeray uponay ethay
anmay owhay adhay ungstay imhay inay ethay entriclesvay ofay ishay earthay. Ehay asway inay Adneyray
ethay iefchay ate’smay atchway; anday asay ifay ethay infatuateday anmay oughtsay otay unray oremay
anthay alfhay ayway otay eetmay ishay oomday, afteray ethay enescay atay ethay iggingray, ehay
insisteday, againstay ethay expressay ounselcay ofay ethay aptaincay, uponay esumingray ethay
eadhay ofay ishay atchway atay ightnay. Uponay isthay, anday oneay oray otway otheray
ircumstancescay, Eelkiltstay ematicallysystay uiltbay ethay anplay ofay ishay evengeray.

uring“Day ethay ightnay, Adneyray adhay anay unseamanlikeay ayway ofay ittingsay onay ethay
ulwarksbay ofay ethay uarter-deckqay, anday eaninglay ishay armay uponay ethay unwalegay ofay
ethay oatbay ichwhay asway oistedhay upay erethay, aay ittlelay aboveay ethay ip’sshay idesay. Inay
isthay attitudeay, itay asway ellway ownknay, ehay ometimessay ozedday. Erethay asway aay
onsiderablecay acancyvay etweenbay ethay oatbay anday ethay ipshay, anday ownday etweenbay
isthay asway ethay easay. Eelkiltstay alculatedcay ishay imetay, anday oundfay atthay ishay
extnay icktray atay ethay elmhay ouldway omecay oundray atay otway o’clockay, inay ethay orningmay
ofay ethay irdthay ayday omfray atthay inay ichwhay ehay adhay eenbay etrayedbay. Atay ishay
eisurelay, ehay employeday ethay intervalay inay aidingbray omethingsay eryvay arefullycay
inay ishay atchesway elowbay.

at“‘Whay areay ouyay akingmay ere?’thay aidsay aay ipmateshay.

at“‘Whay oday ouyay inkthay? atwhay oesday itay ooklay ike?’lay

ike“‘Lay aay anyardlay orfay ouryay agbay; utbay it’say anay odday oneay, eemssay otay e.’may

es“‘Yay, atherray oddish,’ay aidsay ethay Akemanlay, oldinghay itay atay arm’say engthlay
eforebay imhay; ut‘bay Iay inkthay itay illway answeray. Ipmateshay, Iay aven’thay enoughay
ine,—havetway ouyay any?’ay

ut“Bay erethay asway onenay inay ethay orecastlefay.

en“‘Thay Iay ustmay etgay omesay omfray olday Ad;’ray anday ehay oseray otay ogay aftay.

ou“‘Yay on’tday eanmay otay ogay aay eggingbay otay im!_’_hay aidsay aay ailorsay.

“‘Whyay otnay? Oday ouyay inkthay ehay on’tway oday emay aay urntay, enwhay it’say otay elphay
imselfhay inay ethay enday, ipmate?’shay anday oinggay otay ethay atemay, ehay ookedlay atay imhay
uietlyqay, anday askeday imhay orfay omesay inetway otay endmay ishay ammockhay. Itay asway ivengay
im—neitherhay inetway ornay anyardlay ereway eensay againay; utbay ethay extnay ightnay anay
ironay allbay, oselyclay ettednay, artlypay olledray omfray ethay ocketpay ofay ethay
Akeman’slay onkeymay acketjay, asay ehay asway uckingtay ethay oatcay intoay ishay ammockhay
orfay aay illowpay. Enty-fourtway ourshay afteray, ishay icktray atay ethay ilentsay
elm—nighhay otay ethay anmay owhay asway aptay otay ozeday overay ethay avegray alwaysay eadyray
ugday otay ethay eaman’ssay and—thathay atalfay ourhay asway enthay otay omecay; anday inay ethay
ore-ordainingfay oulsay ofay Eelkiltstay, ethay atemay asway alreadyay arkstay anday
etchedstray asay aay orpsecay, ithway ishay oreheadfay ushedcray inay.

ut“Bay, entlemengay, aay oolfay avedsay ethay ould-beway urderermay omfray ethay oodyblay
eedday ehay adhay annedplay. Etyay ompletecay evengeray ehay adhay, anday ithoutway eingbay ethay
avengeray. Orfay byay aay eriousmystay atalityfay, Eavenhay itselfay eemedsay otay epstay inay
otay aketay outay ofay ishay andshay intoay itsay ownay ethay amningday ingthay ehay ouldway avehay
oneday.

It“ay asway ustjay etweenbay aybreakday anday unrisesay ofay ethay orningmay ofay ethay econdsay
ayday, enwhay eythay ereway ashingway ownday ethay ecksday, atthay aay upidstay Eneriffetay
anmay, awingdray aterway inay ethay ain-chainsmay, allay atay onceay outedshay outay, ere‘Thay
eshay ollsray! erethay eshay olls!’ray Esujay, atwhay aay alewhay! Itay asway Obymay Ickday.

oby“‘May Ick!’day iedcray Onday Ebastiansay; ‘Stay. Ominicday! Irsay ailorsay, utbay oday
aleswhay avehay isteningschray? Omwhay allcay ouyay Obymay Ick?’day

A“‘ay eryvay itewhay, anday amousfay, anday ostmay eadlyday immortalay onstermay, On;—butday
atthay ouldway ebay ootay onglay aay ory.’stay

ow“‘Hay? ow?’hay iedcray allay ethay oungyay Aniardsspay, owdingcray.

ay“‘Nay, Onsday, Ons—nayday, aynay! Iay annotcay ehearseray atthay ownay. Etlay emay etgay oremay
intoay ethay airay, Irs.’say

e“‘Thay ichachay! ethay icha!’chay iedcray Onday Edropay; our‘ay igorousvay iendfray ookslay
aint;—fillfay upay ishay emptyay ass!’glay

o“Nay eednay, entlemengay; oneay omentmay, anday Iay oceed.—Nowpray, entlemengay, osay
uddenlysay erceivingpay ethay owysnay alewhay ithinway iftyfay ardsyay ofay ethay
ip—forgetfulshay ofay ethay ompactcay amongay ethay ew—incray ethay excitementay ofay ethay
omentmay, ethay Eneriffetay anmay adhay instinctivelyay anday involuntarilyay iftedlay
ishay oicevay orfay ethay onstermay, oughthay orfay omesay ittlelay imetay astpay itay adhay eenbay
ainlyplay eheldbay omfray ethay eethray ullensay ast-headsmay. Allay asway ownay aay ensyphray.
e‘Thay Itewhay Ale—thewhay Itewhay Ale!’whay asway ethay cryay omfray aptaincay, atesmay, anday
arpooneershay, owhay, undeterreday byay earfulfay umoursray, ereway allay anxiousay otay
apturecay osay amousfay anday eciouspray aay ishfay; ilewhay ethay oggedday ewcray eyeday
askanceay, anday ithway ursescay, ethay appallingay eautybay ofay ethay astvay ilkymay assmay,
atthay itlay upay byay aay orizontalhay anglingspay unsay, iftedshay anday istenedglay ikelay aay
ivinglay opalay inay ethay ueblay orningmay easay. Entlemengay, aay angestray atalityfay
ervadespay ethay olewhay areercay ofay esethay eventsay, asay ifay erilyvay appedmay outay
eforebay ethay orldway itselfay asway artedchay. Ethay utineermay asway ethay owsmanbay ofay
ethay atemay, anday enwhay astfay otay aay ishfay, itay asway ishay utyday otay itsay extnay imhay,
ilewhay Adneyray oodstay upay ithway ishay ancelay inay ethay owpray, anday aulhay inay oray
ackenslay ethay inelay, atay ethay ordway ofay ommandcay. Oreovermay, enwhay ethay ourfay oatsbay
ereway oweredlay, ethay ate’smay otgay ethay artstay; anday onenay owledhay oremay iercelyfay
ithway elightday anthay idday Eelkiltstay, asay ehay ainedstray atay ishay oaray. Afteray aay
iffstay ullpay, eirthay arpooneerhay otgay astfay, anday, earspay inay andhay, Adneyray
angspray otay ethay owbay. Ehay asway alwaysay aay uriousfay anmay, itay eemssay, inay aay oatbay.
Anday ownay ishay andagedbay cryay asway, otay eachbay imhay onay ethay ale’swhay opmosttay ackbay.
Othingnay oathlay, ishay owsmanbay auledhay imhay upay anday upay, oughthray aay indingblay
oamfay atthay entblay otway itenesseswhay ogethertay; illtay ofay aay uddensay ethay oatbay
uckstray asay againstay aay unkensay edgelay, anday eelingkay overay, illedspay outay ethay
andingstay atemay. Atthay instantay, asay ehay ellfay onay ethay ale’swhay ipperyslay ackbay,
ethay oatbay ightedray, anday asway ashedday asideay byay ethay ellsway, ilewhay Adneyray asway
ossedtay overay intoay ethay easay, onay ethay otheray ankflay ofay ethay alewhay. Ehay uckstray
outay oughthray ethay ayspray, anday, orfay anay instantay, asway imlyday eensay oughthray atthay
eilvay, ildlyway eekingsay otay emoveray imselfhay omfray ethay eyeay ofay Obymay Ickday. Utbay
ethay alewhay ushedray oundray inay aay uddensay aelstrommay; eizedsay ethay immersway
etweenbay ishay awsjay; anday earingray ighhay upay ithway imhay, ungedplay eadlonghay againay,
anday entway ownday.

eantime“May, atay ethay irstfay aptay ofay ethay oat’sbay ottombay, ethay Akemanlay adhay
ackenedslay ethay inelay, osay asay otay opdray asternay omfray ethay irlpoolwhay; almlycay
ookinglay onay, ehay oughtthay ishay ownay oughtsthay. Utbay aay uddensay, errifictay,
ownwardday erkingjay ofay ethay oatbay, uicklyqay oughtbray ishay ifeknay otay ethay inelay. Ehay
utcay itay; anday ethay alewhay asway eefray. Utbay, atay omesay istanceday, Obymay Ickday oseray
againay, ithway omesay atterstay ofay Adney’sray edray oollenway irtshay, aughtcay inay ethay
eethtay atthay adhay estroyedday imhay. Allay ourfay oatsbay avegay asechay againay; utbay ethay
alewhay eludeday emthay, anday inallyfay ollywhay isappearedday.

In“ay oodgay imetay, ethay Own-Hotay eachedray erhay ort—apay avagesay, olitarysay
ace—whereplay onay ivilizedcay eaturecray esidedray. Erethay, eadedhay byay ethay
Akemanlay, allay utbay ivefay oray ixsay ofay ethay oremastmenfay eliberatelyday esertedday
amongay ethay almspay; eventuallyay, asay itay urnedtay outay, eizingsay aay argelay oubleday
ar-canoeway ofay ethay avagessay, anday ettingsay ailsay orfay omesay otheray arborhay.

e“Thay ip’sshay ompanycay eingbay educedray otay utbay aay andfulhay, ethay aptaincay alledcay
uponay ethay Islandersay otay assistay imhay inay ethay aboriouslay usinessbay ofay eavinghay
ownday ethay ipshay otay opstay ethay eaklay. Utbay otay uchsay unrestingay igilancevay overay
eirthay angerousday alliesay asway isthay allsmay andbay ofay iteswhay ecessitatednay, othbay
byay ightnay anday byay ayday, anday osay extremeay asway ethay ardhay orkway eythay underwentay,
atthay uponay ethay esselvay eingbay eadyray againay orfay easay, eythay ereway inay uchsay aay
eakenedway onditioncay atthay ethay aptaincay urstday otnay utpay offay ithway emthay inay osay
eavyhay aay esselvay. Afteray akingtay ounselcay ithway ishay officersay, ehay anchoreday ethay
ipshay asay arfay offay oreshay asay ossiblepay; oadedlay anday anray outay ishay otway annoncay
omfray ethay owsbay; ackedstay ishay usketsmay onay ethay ooppay; anday arningway ethay
Islandersay otnay otay approachay ethay ipshay atay eirthay erilpay, ooktay oneay anmay ithway
imhay, anday ettingsay ethay ailsay ofay ishay estbay ale-boatwhay, eeredstay aightstray
eforebay ethay indway orfay Ahititay, ivefay undredhay ilesmay istantday, otay ocurepray aay
einforcementray otay ishay ewcray.

On“ay ethay ourthfay ayday ofay ethay ailsay, aay argelay anoecay asway escriedday, ichwhay
eemedsay otay avehay ouchedtay atay aay owlay isleay ofay oralscay. Ehay eeredstay awayay omfray
itay; utbay ethay avagesay aftcray orebay ownday onay imhay; anday oonsay ethay oicevay ofay
Eelkiltstay ailedhay imhay otay eavehay otay, oray ehay ouldway unray imhay underay aterway. Ethay
aptaincay esentedpray aay istolpay. Ithway oneay ootfay onay eachay owpray ofay ethay okedyay
ar-canoesway, ethay Akemanlay aughedlay imhay otay ornscay; assuringay imhay atthay ifay ethay
istolpay osay uchmay asay ickedclay inay ethay ocklay, ehay ouldway urybay imhay inay ubblesbay anday
oamfay.

at“‘Whay oday ouyay antway ofay e?’may iedcray ethay aptaincay.

ere“‘Whay areay ouyay oundbay? anday orfay atwhay areay ouyay ound?’bay emandedday Eelkiltstay;
o‘nay ies.’lay

I“‘ay amay oundbay otay Ahititay orfay oremay en.’may

ery“‘Vay oodgay. Etlay emay oardbay ouyay aay oment—Imay omecay inay eace.’pay Ithway atthay ehay
eapedlay omfray ethay anoecay, amsway otay ethay oatbay; anday imbingclay ethay unwalegay,
oodstay acefay otay acefay ithway ethay aptaincay.

oss“‘Cray ouryay armsay, irsay; owthray ackbay ouryay eadhay. Ownay, epeatray afteray emay. Asay
oonsay asay Eelkiltstay eaveslay emay, Iay earsway otay eachbay isthay oatbay onay onderyay
islanday, anday emainray erethay ixsay aysday. Ifay Iay oday otnay, aymay ightningslay ikestray
e!’may

A“‘ay ettypray olar,’schay aughedlay ethay Akemanlay. Adios‘ay, Enor!’say anday eapinglay
intoay ethay easay, ehay amsway ackbay otay ishay omradescay.

atching“Way ethay oatbay illtay itay asway airlyfay eachedbay, anday awndray upay otay ethay
ootsray ofay ethay ocoa-nutcay eestray, Eelkiltstay ademay ailsay againay, anday inay ueday
imetay arriveday atay Ahititay, ishay ownay aceplay ofay estinationday. Erethay, ucklay
efriendedbay imhay; otway ipsshay ereway aboutay otay ailsay orfay Ancefray, anday ereway
ovidentiallypray inay antway ofay eciselypray atthay umbernay ofay enmay ichwhay ethay ailorsay
eadedhay. Eythay embarkeday; anday osay orfay everay otgay ethay artstay ofay eirthay ormerfay
aptaincay, adhay ehay eenbay atay allay indedmay otay orkway emthay egallay etributionray.

ome“Say entay aysday afteray ethay Enchfray ipsshay ailedsay, ethay ale-boatwhay arriveday,
anday ethay aptaincay asway orcedfay otay enlistay omesay ofay ethay oremay ivilizedcay
Ahitianstay, owhay adhay eenbay omewhatsay useday otay ethay easay. Arteringchay aay allsmay
ativenay oonerschay, ehay eturnedray ithway emthay otay ishay esselvay; anday indingfay allay
ightray erethay, againay esumedray ishay uisingscray.

ere“Whay Eelkiltstay ownay isay, entlemengay, onenay owknay; utbay uponay ethay islanday ofay
Antucketnay, ethay idowway ofay Adneyray illstay urnstay otay ethay easay ichwhay efusesray otay
ivegay upay itsay eadday; illstay inay eamsdray eessay ethay awfulay itewhay alewhay atthay
estroyedday imhay. *ay *ay *ay *ay

Are“‘ay ouyay ough?’thray aidsay Onday Ebastiansay, uietlyqay.

I“‘ay amay, On.’day

en“‘Thay Iay entreatay ouyay, elltay emay ifay otay ethay estbay ofay ouryay ownay onvictionscay,
isthay ouryay orystay isay inay ubstancesay eallyray uetray? Itay isay osay assingpay
onderfulway! Idday ouyay etgay itay omfray anay unquestionableay ourcesay? Earbay ithway emay
ifay Iay eemsay otay ess.’pray

Also“‘ay earbay ithway allay ofay usay, irsay ailorsay; orfay eway allay oinjay inay Onday
Ebastian’ssay uit,’say iedcray ethay ompanycay, ithway exceedingay interestay.

Is“‘ay erethay aay opycay ofay ethay Olyhay Evangelistsay inay ethay Oldengay Innay,
entlemen?’gay

ay,’“‘Nay aidsay Onday Ebastiansay; ut‘bay Iay owknay aay orthyway iestpray earnay byay, owhay
illway uicklyqay ocurepray oneay orfay emay. Iay ogay orfay itay; utbay areay ouyay ellway adviseday?
isthay aymay owgray ootay erious.’say

ill“‘Way ouyay ebay osay oodgay asay otay ingbray ethay iestpray alsoay, On?’day

ough“‘Thay erethay areay onay Auto-da-Fésay inay Imalay ow,’nay aidsay oneay ofay ethay ompanycay
otay anotheray; I‘ay earfay ouray ailorsay iendfray unsray iskray ofay ethay archiepiscopacyay.
Etlay usay ithdrawway oremay outay ofay ethay oonlightmay. Iay eesay onay eednay ofay is.’thay

Excuse“‘ay emay orfay unningray afteray ouyay, Onday Ebastiansay; utbay aymay Iay alsoay egbay
atthay ouyay illway ebay articularpay inay ocuringpray ethay argestlay izedsay Evangelistsay
ouyay an.’cay

*ay *ay *ay *ay *ay *ay

is“‘Thay isay ethay iestpray, ehay ingsbray ouyay ethay Evangelists,’ay aidsay Onday
Ebastiansay, avelygray, eturningray ithway aay alltay anday olemnsay igurefay.

et“‘Lay emay emoveray myay athay. Ownay, enerablevay iestpray, urtherfay intoay ethay ightlay,
anday oldhay ethay Olyhay Ookbay eforebay emay atthay Iay aymay ouchtay itay.

o“‘Say elphay emay Eavenhay, anday onay myay onorhay ethay orystay Iay avehay oldtay eyay,
entlemengay, isay inay ubstancesay anday itsay eatgray itemsay, uetray. Iay owknay itay otay ebay
uetray; itay appenedhay onay isthay allbay; Iay odtray ethay ipshay; Iay ewknay ethay ewcray; Iay
avehay eensay anday alkedtay ithway Eelkiltstay incesay ethay eathday ofay Adney.’”ray


APTERcHay 55ay. Ofay ethay Onstrousmay Icturespay ofay Aleswhay.

Iay allshay ereay onglay aintpay otay ouyay asay ellway asay oneay ancay ithoutway anvascay,
omethingsay ikelay ethay uetray ormfay ofay ethay alewhay asay ehay actuallyay appearsay otay ethay
eyeay ofay ethay alemanwhay enwhay inay ishay ownay absoluteay odybay ethay alewhay isay ooredmay
alongsideay ethay ale-shipwhay osay atthay ehay ancay ebay airlyfay eppedstay uponay erethay.
Itay aymay ebay orthway ilewhay, ereforethay, eviouslypray otay advertay otay osethay uriouscay
imaginaryay ortraitspay ofay imhay ichwhay evenay ownday otay ethay esentpray ayday
onfidentlycay allengechay ethay aithfay ofay ethay andsmanlay. Itay isay imetay otay etsay ethay
orldway ightray inay isthay attermay, byay ovingpray uchsay icturespay ofay ethay alewhay allay
ongwray.

Itay aymay ebay atthay ethay imalpray ourcesay ofay allay osethay ictorialpay elusionsday illway
ebay oundfay amongay ethay oldestay Indoohay, Egyptianay, anday Eciangray ulpturesscay. Orfay
everay incesay osethay inventiveay utbay unscrupulousay imestay enwhay onay ethay arblemay
anellingspay ofay emplestay, ethay edestalspay ofay atuesstay, anday onay ieldsshay,
edallionsmay, upscay, anday oinscay, ethay olphinday asway awndray inay alesscay ofay
ain-armorchay ikelay Aladin’ssay, anday aay elmetedhay eadhay ikelay Stay. Eorge’sgay; everay
incesay enthay ashay omethingsay ofay ethay amesay ortsay ofay icenselay evailedpray, otnay
onlyay inay ostmay opularpay icturespay ofay ethay alewhay, utbay inay anymay ientificscay
esentationspray ofay imhay.

Ownay, byay allay oddsay, ethay ostmay ancientay extantay ortraitpay anywaysay urportingpay
otay ebay ethay ale’swhay, isay otay ebay oundfay inay ethay amousfay avern-pagodacay ofay
Elephantaay, inay Indiaay. Ethay Ahminsbray aintainmay atthay inay ethay almostay endlessay
ulpturesscay ofay atthay immemorialay agodapay, allay ethay adestray anday ursuitspay,
everyay onceivablecay avocationay ofay anmay, ereway efiguredpray agesay eforebay anyay ofay
emthay actuallyay amecay intoay eingbay. Onay onderway enthay, atthay inay omesay ortsay ouray
oblenay ofessionpray ofay alingwhay ouldshay avehay eenbay erethay adowedshay orthfay. Ethay
Indoohay alewhay eferredray otay, occursay inay aay eparatesay epartmentday ofay ethay allway,
epictingday ethay incarnationay ofay Ishnuvay inay ethay ormfay ofay eviathanlay, earnedlylay
ownknay asay ethay Atsemay Avataray. Utbay oughthay isthay ulpturescay isay alfhay anmay anday
alfhay alewhay, osay asay onlyay otay ivegay ethay ailtay ofay ethay atterlay, etyay atthay allsmay
ectionsay ofay imhay isay allay ongwray. Itay ookslay oremay ikelay ethay aperingtay ailtay ofay anay
anacondaay, anthay ethay oadbray almspay ofay ethay uetray ale’swhay ajesticmay ukesflay.

Utbay ogay otay ethay olday Alleriesgay, anday ooklay ownay atay aay eatgray Istianchray
ainter’spay ortraitpay ofay isthay ishfay; orfay ehay ucceedssay onay etterbay anthay ethay
antediluvianay Indoohay. Itay isay Uido’sgay icturepay ofay Erseuspay escuingray
Andromedaay omfray ethay ea-monstersay oray alewhay. Erewhay idday Uidogay etgay ethay odelmay
ofay uchsay aay angestray eaturecray asay atthay? Ornay oesday Ogarthhay, inay aintingpay ethay
amesay enescay inay ishay ownay erseus“Pay Escending,”day akemay outay oneay itwhay etterbay.
Ethay ugehay orpulencecay ofay atthay Ogarthianhay onstermay undulatesay onay ethay
urfacesay, arcelyscay awingdray oneay inchay ofay aterway. Itay ashay aay ortsay ofay owdahhay onay
itsay ackbay, anday itsay istendedday uskedtay outhmay intoay ichwhay ethay illowsbay areay
ollingray, ightmay ebay akentay orfay ethay Aitors’tray Ategay eadinglay omfray ethay Amesthay
byay aterway intoay ethay Owertay. Enthay, erethay areay ethay Odromuspray aleswhay ofay olday
Otchscay Ibbaldsay, anday Onah’sjay alewhay, asay epictedday inay ethay intspray ofay olday
Iblesbay anday ethay utscay ofay olday imerspray. Atwhay allshay ebay aidsay ofay esethay? Asay orfay
ethay ook-binder’sbay alewhay indingway ikelay aay ine-stalkvay oundray ethay ockstay ofay aay
escendingday anchor—asay ampedstay anday ildedgay onay ethay acksbay anday itle-pagestay ofay
anymay ooksbay othbay olday anday ew—thatnay isay aay eryvay icturesquepay utbay urelypay
abulousfay eaturecray, imitateday, Iay aketay itay, omfray ethay ikelay iguresfay onay
antiqueay asesvay. Oughthay universallyay enominatedday aay olphinday, Iay everthelessnay
allcay isthay ook-binder’sbay ishfay anay attemptay atay aay alewhay; ecausebay itay asway osay
intendeday enwhay ethay eviceday asway irstfay introduceday. Itay asway introduceday byay anay
olday Italianay ublisherpay omewheresay aboutay ethay 15thay enturycay, uringday ethay
Evivalray ofay Earninglay; anday inay osethay aysday, anday evenay ownday otay aay
omparativelycay atelay eriodpay, olphinsday ereway opularlypay upposedsay otay ebay aay
eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay.

Inay ethay ignettesvay anday otheray embellishmentsay ofay omesay ancientay ooksbay ouyay
illway atay imestay eetmay ithway eryvay uriouscay ouchestay atay ethay alewhay, erewhay allay
annermay ofay outsspay, etsjay eaud’ay, othay ingsspray anday oldcay, Aratogasay anday
Aden-Badenbay, omecay ubblingbay upay omfray ishay unexhausteday ainbray. Inay ethay
itle-pagetay ofay ethay originalay editionay ofay ethay Advancement“ay ofay Earning”lay ouyay
illway indfay omesay uriouscay aleswhay.

Utbay uittingqay allay esethay unprofessionalay attemptsay, etlay usay anceglay atay osethay
icturespay ofay eviathanlay urportingpay otay ebay obersay, ientificscay elineationsday,
byay osethay owhay owknay. Inay olday Arris’shay ollectioncay ofay oyagesvay erethay areay omesay
atesplay ofay aleswhay extracteday omfray aay Utchday ookbay ofay oyagesvay, A.Day. 1671ay,
entitleday A“ay Alingwhay Oyagevay otay Itzbergenspay inay ethay ipshay Onasjay inay ethay
Alewhay, Eterpay Etersonpay ofay Ieslandfray, aster.”may Inay oneay ofay osethay atesplay ethay
aleswhay, ikelay eatgray aftsray ofay ogslay, areay epresentedray inglyay amongay
ice-islesay, ithway itewhay earsbay unningray overay eirthay ivinglay acksbay. Inay anotheray
ateplay, ethay odigiouspray underblay isay ademay ofay epresentingray ethay alewhay ithway
erpendicularpay ukesflay.

Enthay againay, erethay isay anay imposingay uartoqay, ittenwray byay oneay Aptaincay
Olnettcay, aay Ostpay Aptaincay inay ethay Englishay avynay, entitleday A“ay Oyagevay oundray
Apecay Ornhay intoay ethay Outhsay Eassay, orfay ethay urposepay ofay extendingay ethay
Ermacetispay Alewhay Isheries.”fay Inay isthay ookbay isay anay outlineay urportingpay otay
ebay aay icture“Pay ofay aay Eterphysay oray Ermacetispay alewhay, awndray byay alescay omfray
oneay illedkay onay ethay oastcay ofay Exicomay, Augustay, 1793ay, anday oistedhay onay eck.”day
Iay oubtday otnay ethay aptaincay adhay isthay eraciousvay icturepay akentay orfay ethay
enefitbay ofay ishay arinesmay. Otay entionmay utbay oneay ingthay aboutay itay, etlay emay aysay
atthay itay ashay anay eyeay ichwhay applieday, accordingay otay ethay accompanyingay alescay,
otay aay ullfay owngray ermspay alewhay, ouldway akemay ethay eyeay ofay atthay alewhay aay
ow-windowbay omesay ivefay eetfay onglay. Ahay, myay allantgay aptaincay, whyay idday eyay otnay
ivegay usay Onahjay ookinglay outay ofay atthay eyeay!

Ornay areay ethay ostmay onscientiouscay ompilationscay ofay Aturalnay Istoryhay orfay ethay
enefitbay ofay ethay oungyay anday endertay, eefray omfray ethay amesay einousnesshay ofay
istakemay. Ooklay atay atthay opularpay orkway oldsmith’s“Gay Animateday Ature.”nay Inay
ethay abridgeday Ondonlay editionay ofay 1807ay, erethay areay atesplay ofay anay allegeday
ale”“whay anday aay arwhale.”“nay Iay oday otnay ishway otay eemsay inelegantay, utbay isthay
unsightlyay alewhay ookslay uchmay ikelay anay amputateday owsay; anday, asay orfay ethay
arwhalenay, oneay impseglay atay itay isay enoughay otay amazeay oneay, atthay inay isthay
ineteenthnay enturycay uchsay aay ippogriffhay ouldcay ebay almedpay orfay enuinegay uponay
anyay intelligentay ublicpay ofay oolboysschay.

Enthay, againay, inay 1825ay, Ernardbay Ermaingay, Ountcay eday Acépèdelay, aay eatgray
aturalistnay, ublishedpay aay ientificscay emizedsystay alewhay ookbay, ereinwhay areay
everalsay icturespay ofay ethay ifferentday eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay. Allay esethay
areay otnay onlyay incorrectay, utbay ethay icturepay ofay ethay Icetusmystay oray Eenlandgray
alewhay at(thay isay otay aysay, ethay Ightray ale)whay, evenay Oresbyscay, aay onglay
experienceday anmay asay ouchingtay atthay eciesspay, eclaresday otnay otay avehay itsay
ounterpartcay inay aturenay.

Utbay ethay acingplay ofay ethay ap-sheafcay otay allay isthay underingblay usinessbay asway
eservedray orfay ethay ientificscay Ederickfray Uviercay, otherbray otay ethay amousfay
Aronbay. Inay 1836ay, ehay ublishedpay aay Aturalnay Istoryhay ofay Aleswhay, inay ichwhay ehay
ivesgay atwhay ehay allscay aay icturepay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Eforebay owingshay atthay
icturepay otay anyay Antucketernay, ouyay adhay estbay ovidepray orfay ouryay ummarysay
etreatray omfray Antucketnay. Inay aay ordway, Ederickfray Uvier’scay Ermspay Alewhay isay
otnay aay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay aay uashsqay. Ofay oursecay, ehay evernay adhay ethay enefitbay ofay
aay alingwhay oyagevay uch(say enmay eldomsay ave)hay, utbay encewhay ehay erivedday atthay
icturepay, owhay ancay elltay? Erhapspay ehay otgay itay asay ishay ientificscay edecessorpray
inay ethay amesay ieldfay, Esmarestday, otgay oneay ofay ishay authenticay abortionsay; atthay
isay, omfray aay Inesechay awingdray. Anday atwhay ortsay ofay ivelylay adslay ithway ethay
encilpay osethay Inesechay areay, anymay ueerqay upscay anday aucerssay informay usay.

Asay orfay ethay ign-painters’say aleswhay eensay inay ethay eetsstray anginghay overay ethay
opsshay ofay oil-dealersay, atwhay allshay ebay aidsay ofay emthay? Eythay areay enerallygay
Ichardray IIIay. aleswhay, ithway omedarydray umpshay, anday eryvay avagesay;
eakfastingbray onay eethray oray ourfay ailorsay artstay, atthay isay aleboatswhay ullfay ofay
arinersmay: eirthay eformitiesday ounderingflay inay eassay ofay oodblay anday ueblay
aintpay.

Utbay esethay anifoldmay istakesmay inay epictingday ethay alewhay areay otnay osay eryvay
urprisingsay afteray allay. Onsidercay! Ostmay ofay ethay ientificscay awingsdray avehay
eenbay akentay omfray ethay andedstray ishfay; anday esethay areay aboutay asay orrectcay asay aay
awingdray ofay aay eckedwray ipshay, ithway okenbray ackbay, ouldway orrectlycay epresentray
ethay oblenay animalay itselfay inay allay itsay undasheday idepray ofay ullhay anday arsspay.
Oughthay elephantsay avehay oodstay orfay eirthay ull-lengthsfay, ethay ivinglay
Eviathanlay ashay evernay etyay airlyfay oatedflay imselfhay orfay ishay ortraitpay. Ethay
ivinglay alewhay, inay ishay ullfay ajestymay anday ignificancesay, isay onlyay otay ebay eensay
atay easay inay unfathomableay atersway; anday afloatay ethay astvay ulkbay ofay imhay isay outay
ofay ightsay, ikelay aay aunchedlay ine-of-battlelay ipshay; anday outay ofay atthay elementay
itay isay aay ingthay eternallyay impossibleay orfay ortalmay anmay otay oisthay imhay odilybay
intoay ethay airay, osay asay otay eservepray allay ishay ightymay ellssway anday undulationsay.
Anday, otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay ighlyhay esumablepray ifferenceday ofay ontourcay
etweenbay aay oungyay uckingsay alewhay anday aay ull-grownfay Atonianplay Eviathanlay;
etyay, evenay inay ethay asecay ofay oneay ofay osethay oungyay uckingsay aleswhay oistedhay otay aay
ip’sshay eckday, uchsay isay enthay ethay outlandishay, eel-likeay, imberedlay, aryingvay
apeshay ofay imhay, atthay ishay ecisepray expressionay ethay evilday imselfhay ouldcay otnay
atchcay.

Utbay itay aymay ebay anciedfay, atthay omfray ethay akednay eletonskay ofay ethay andedstray
alewhay, accurateay intshay aymay ebay erivedday ouchingtay ishay uetray ormfay. Otnay atay
allay. Orfay itay isay oneay ofay ethay oremay uriouscay ingsthay aboutay isthay Eviathanlay,
atthay ishay eletonskay ivesgay eryvay ittlelay ideaay ofay ishay eneralgay apeshay. Oughthay
Eremyjay Entham’sbay eletonskay, ichwhay angshay orfay andelabracay inay ethay ibrarylay ofay
oneay ofay ishay executorsay, orrectlycay onveyscay ethay ideaay ofay aay urly-browedbay
utilitarianay olday entlemangay, ithway allay Eremy’sjay otheray eadinglay ersonalpay
aracteristicschay; etyay othingnay ofay isthay indkay ouldcay ebay inferreday omfray anyay
eviathan’slay articulateday onesbay. Inay actfay, asay ethay eatgray Unterhay ayssay, ethay
eremay eletonskay ofay ethay alewhay earsbay ethay amesay elationray otay ethay ullyfay
investeday anday addedpay animalay asay ethay insectay oesday otay ethay alischrysay atthay osay
oundinglyray envelopesay itay. Isthay eculiaritypay isay ikinglystray evinceday inay ethay
eadhay, asay inay omesay artpay ofay isthay ookbay illway ebay incidentallyay ownshay. Itay isay
alsoay eryvay uriouslycay isplayedday inay ethay idesay infay, ethay onesbay ofay ichwhay
almostay exactlyay answeray otay ethay onesbay ofay ethay umanhay andhay, inusmay onlyay ethay
umbthay. Isthay infay ashay ourfay egularray one-fingersbay, ethay indexay, iddlemay, ingray,
anday ittlelay ingerfay. Utbay allay esethay areay ermanentlypay odgedlay inay eirthay eshyflay
overingcay, asay ethay umanhay ingersfay inay anay artificialay overingcay. owever“Hay
ecklesslyray ethay alewhay aymay ometimessay ervesay us,”ay aidsay umoroushay Ubbstay oneay
ayday, e“hay ancay evernay ebay ulytray aidsay otay andlehay usay ithoutway ittens.”may

Orfay allay esethay easonsray, enthay, anyay ayway ouyay aymay ooklay atay itay, ouyay ustmay eedsnay
oncludecay atthay ethay eatgray Eviathanlay isay atthay oneay eaturecray inay ethay orldway
ichwhay ustmay emainray unpainteday otay ethay astlay. Uetray, oneay ortraitpay aymay ithay ethay
arkmay uchmay earernay anthay anotheray, utbay onenay ancay ithay itay ithway anyay eryvay
onsiderablecay egreeday ofay exactnessay. Osay erethay isay onay earthlyay ayway ofay indingfay
outay eciselypray atwhay ethay alewhay eallyray ookslay ikelay. Anday ethay onlyay odemay inay
ichwhay ouyay ancay eriveday evenay aay olerabletay ideaay ofay ishay ivinglay ontourcay, isay byay
oinggay aay alingwhay ourselfyay; utbay byay osay oingday, ouyay unray onay allsmay iskray ofay
eingbay eternallyay ovestay anday unksay byay imhay. Ereforewhay, itay eemssay otay emay ouyay
adhay estbay otnay ebay ootay astidiousfay inay ouryay uriositycay ouchingtay isthay
Eviathanlay.


APTERcHay 56ay. Ofay ethay Esslay Erroneousay Icturespay ofay Aleswhay, anday ethay Uetray
Icturespay ofay Alingwhay Enesscay.

Inay onnexioncay ithway ethay onstrousmay icturespay ofay aleswhay, Iay amay onglystray
emptedtay erehay otay enteray uponay osethay illstay oremay onstrousmay oriesstay ofay emthay
ichwhay areay otay ebay oundfay inay ertaincay ooksbay, othbay ancientay anday odernmay,
especiallyay inay Inyplay, Urchaspay, Ackluythay, Arrishay, Uviercay, etcay. Utbay Iay asspay
atthay attermay byay.

Iay owknay ofay onlyay ourfay ublishedpay outlinesay ofay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay;
Olnett’scay, Uggins’shay, Ederickfray Uvier’scay, anday Eale’sbay. Inay ethay eviouspray
apterchay Olnettcay anday Uviercay avehay eenbay eferredray otay. Uggins’shay isay arfay
etterbay anthay eirsthay; utbay, byay eatgray oddsay, Eale’sbay isay ethay estbay. Allay
Eale’sbay awingsdray ofay isthay alewhay areay oodgay, exceptingay ethay iddlemay igurefay inay
ethay icturepay ofay eethray aleswhay inay ariousvay attitudesay, appingcay ishay econdsay
apterchay. Ishay ontispiecefray, oatsbay attackingay Ermspay Aleswhay, oughthay onay
oubtday alculatedcay otay exciteay ethay ivilcay epticismscay ofay omesay arlorpay enmay, isay
admirablyay orrectcay anday ife-likelay inay itsay eneralgay effectay. Omesay ofay ethay
Ermspay Alewhay awingsdray inay Jay. Ossray Ownebray areay ettypray orrectcay inay ontourcay;
utbay eythay areay etchedlywray engraveday. Atthay isay otnay ishay aultfay oughthay.

Ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay, ethay estbay outlineay icturespay areay inay Oresbyscay; utbay eythay
areay awndray onay ootay allsmay aay alescay otay onveycay aay esirableday impressionay. Ehay ashay
utbay oneay icturepay ofay alingwhay enesscay, anday isthay isay aay adsay eficiencyday,
ecausebay itay isay byay uchsay icturespay onlyay, enwhay atay allay ellway oneday, atthay ouyay
ancay eriveday anythingay ikelay aay uthfultray ideaay ofay ethay ivinglay alewhay asay eensay byay
ishay ivinglay untershay.

Utbay, akentay orfay allay inay allay, byay arfay ethay inestfay, oughthay inay omesay etailsday
otnay ethay ostmay orrectcay, esentationspray ofay aleswhay anday alingwhay enesscay otay ebay
anywhereay oundfay, areay otway argelay Enchfray engravingsay, ellway executeday, anday
akentay omfray aintingspay byay oneay Arnerygay. Espectivelyray, eythay epresentray
attacksay onay ethay Ermspay anday Ightray Alewhay. Inay ethay irstfay engravingay aay oblenay
Ermspay Alewhay isay epictedday inay ullfay ajestymay ofay ightmay, ustjay isenray eneathbay
ethay oatbay omfray ethay ofunditiespray ofay ethay oceanay, anday earingbay ighhay inay ethay
airay uponay ishay ackbay ethay errifictay eckwray ofay ethay ovenstay anksplay. Ethay owpray ofay
ethay oatbay isay artiallypay unbrokenay, anday isay awndray ustjay alancingbay uponay ethay
onster’smay inespay; anday andingstay inay atthay owpray, orfay atthay oneay inglesay
incomputableay ashflay ofay imetay, ouyay eholdbay anay oarsmanay, alfhay oudedshray byay ethay
incenseday oilingbay outspay ofay ethay alewhay, anday inay ethay actay ofay eapinglay, asay ifay
omfray aay ecipicepray. Ethay actionay ofay ethay olewhay ingthay isay onderfullyway oodgay anday
uetray. Ethay alf-emptiedhay ine-tublay oatsflay onay ethay itenedwhay easay; ethay oodenway
olespay ofay ethay illedspay arpoonshay obliquelyay obbay inay itay; ethay eadshay ofay ethay
immingsway ewcray areay atteredscay aboutay ethay alewhay inay ontrastingcay expressionsay
ofay affrightay; ilewhay inay ethay ackblay ormystay istanceday ethay ipshay isay earingbay
ownday uponay ethay enescay. Erioussay aultfay ightmay ebay oundfay ithway ethay anatomicalay
etailsday ofay isthay alewhay, utbay etlay atthay asspay; incesay, orfay ethay ifelay ofay emay, Iay
ouldcay otnay awdray osay oodgay aay oneay.

Inay ethay econdsay engravingay, ethay oatbay isay inay ethay actay ofay awingdray alongsideay
ethay arnacledbay ankflay ofay aay argelay unningray Ightray Alewhay, atthay ollsray ishay
ackblay eedyway ulkbay inay ethay easay ikelay omesay ossymay ock-slideray omfray ethay
Atagonianpay iffsclay. Ishay etsjay areay erectay, ullfay, anday ackblay ikelay ootsay; osay
atthay omfray osay aboundingay aay okesmay inay ethay imneychay, ouyay ouldway inkthay erethay
ustmay ebay aay avebray uppersay ookingcay inay ethay eatgray owelsbay elowbay. Easay owlsfay areay
eckingpay atay ethay allsmay abscray, ell-fishshay, anday otheray easay andiescay anday
accaronimay, ichwhay ethay Ightray Alewhay ometimessay arriescay onay ishay estilentpay
ackbay. Anday allay ethay ilewhay ethay ick-lippedthay eviathanlay isay ushingray oughthray
ethay eepday, eavinglay onstay ofay umultuoustay itewhay urdscay inay ishay akeway, anday
ausingcay ethay ightslay oatbay otay ockray inay ethay ellssway ikelay aay iffskay aughtcay ighnay
ethay addle-wheelspay ofay anay oceanay eamerstay. Usthay, ethay oregroundfay isay allay
agingray ommotioncay; utbay ehindbay, inay admirableay artisticay ontrastcay, isay ethay
assyglay evellay ofay aay easay ecalmedbay, ethay oopingdray unstarcheday ailssay ofay ethay
owerlesspay ipshay, anday ethay inertay assmay ofay aay eadday alewhay, aay onqueredcay
ortressfay, ithway ethay agflay ofay apturecay azilylay anginghay omfray ethay ale-polewhay
inserteday intoay ishay out-holespay.

Owhay Arnerygay ethay ainterpay isay, oray asway, Iay owknay otnay. Utbay myay ifelay orfay itay ehay
asway eitheray acticallypray onversantcay ithway ishay ubjectsay, oray elseay
arvellouslymay utoredtay byay omesay experienceday alemanwhay. Ethay Enchfray areay ethay
adslay orfay aintingpay actionay. Ogay anday azegay uponay allay ethay aintingspay ofay Europeay,
anday erewhay illway ouyay indfay uchsay aay allerygay ofay ivinglay anday eathingbray
ommotioncay onay anvascay, asay inay atthay iumphaltray allhay atay Ersaillesvay; erewhay ethay
eholderbay ightsfay ishay ayway, ell-mellpay, oughthray ethay onsecutivecay eatgray
attlesbay ofay Ancefray; erewhay everyay ordsway eemssay aay ashflay ofay ethay Orthernnay
Ightslay, anday ethay uccessivesay armeday ingskay anday Emperorsay ashday byay, ikelay aay
argechay ofay ownedcray entaurscay? Otnay ollywhay unworthyay ofay aay aceplay inay atthay
allerygay, areay esethay easay attle-piecesbay ofay Arnerygay.

Ethay aturalnay aptitudeay ofay ethay Enchfray orfay eizingsay ethay icturesquenesspay ofay
ingsthay eemssay otay ebay eculiarlypay evinceday inay atwhay aintingspay anday engravingsay
eythay avehay ofay eirthay alingwhay enesscay. Ithway otnay oneay enthtay ofay England’say
experienceay inay ethay isheryfay, anday otnay ethay ousandththay artpay ofay atthay ofay ethay
Americansay, eythay avehay everthelessnay urnishedfay othbay ationsnay ithway ethay onlyay
inishedfay etchesskay atay allay apablecay ofay onveyingcay ethay ealray iritspay ofay ethay
alewhay unthay. Orfay ethay ostmay artpay, ethay Englishay anday Americanay alewhay
aughtsmendray eemsay entirelyay ontentcay ithway esentingpray ethay echanicalmay
outlineay ofay ingsthay, uchsay asay ethay acantvay ofilepray ofay ethay alewhay; ichwhay, osay
arfay asay icturesquenesspay ofay effectay isay oncernedcay, isay aboutay antamounttay otay
etchingskay ethay ofilepray ofay aay amidpyray. Evenay Oresbyscay, ethay ustlyjay enownedray
Ightray alemanwhay, afteray ivinggay usay aay iffstay ullfay engthlay ofay ethay Eenlandgray
alewhay, anday eethray oray ourfay elicateday iniaturesmay ofay arwhalesnay anday
orpoisespay, eatstray usay otay aay eriessay ofay assicalclay engravingsay ofay oatbay ookshay,
oppingchay ivesknay, anday apnelsgray; anday ithway ethay icroscopicmay iligenceday ofay aay
Euwenhoecklay ubmitssay otay ethay inspectionay ofay aay iveringshay orldway inety-sixnay
ac-similesfay ofay agnifiedmay Arcticay owsnay alscrystay. Iay eanmay onay isparagementday
otay ethay excellentay oyagervay I(ay onorhay imhay orfay aay eteran)vay, utbay inay osay
importantay aay attermay itay asway ertainlycay anay oversightay otnay otay avehay ocuredpray
orfay everyay alcrystay aay ornsway affidavitay akentay eforebay aay Eenlandgray Usticejay ofay
ethay Eacepay.

Inay additionay otay osethay inefay engravingsay omfray Arnerygay, erethay areay otway otheray
Enchfray engravingsay orthyway ofay otenay, byay omesay oneay owhay ubscribessay imselfhay
“Hay. Urand.”day Oneay ofay emthay, oughthay otnay eciselypray adapteday otay ouray esentpray
urposepay, everthelessnay eservesday entionmay onay otheray accountsay. Itay isay aay uietqay
oon-scenenay amongay ethay islesay ofay ethay Acificpay; aay Enchfray alerwhay anchoreday,
inshoreay, inay aay almcay, anday azilylay akingtay aterway onay oardbay; ethay oosenedlay
ailssay ofay ethay ipshay, anday ethay onglay eaveslay ofay ethay almspay inay ethay ackgroundbay,
othbay oopingdray ogethertay inay ethay eezelessbray airay. Ethay effectay isay eryvay inefay,
enwhay onsideredcay ithway eferenceray otay itsay esentingpray ethay ardyhay ishermenfay
underay oneay ofay eirthay ewfay aspectsay ofay orientalay eposeray. Ethay otheray engravingay
isay uiteqay aay ifferentday affairay: ethay ipshay ove-tohay uponay ethay openay easay, anday inay
ethay eryvay earthay ofay ethay Eviathaniclay ifelay, ithway aay Ightray Alewhay alongsideay;
ethay esselvay in(ay ethay actay ofay utting-incay) ovehay overay otay ethay onstermay asay ifay otay
aay uayqay; anday aay oatbay, urriedlyhay ushingpay offay omfray isthay enescay ofay activityay,
isay aboutay ivinggay asechay otay aleswhay inay ethay istanceday. Ethay arpoonshay anday
anceslay ielay evelledlay orfay useay; eethray oarsmenay areay ustjay ettingsay ethay astmay inay
itsay olehay; ilewhay omfray aay uddensay ollray ofay ethay easay, ethay ittlelay aftcray andsstay
alf-erecthay outay ofay ethay aterway, ikelay aay earingray orsehay. Omfray ethay ipshay, ethay
okesmay ofay ethay ormentstay ofay ethay oilingbay alewhay isay oinggay upay ikelay ethay okesmay
overay aay illagevay ofay ithiessmay; anday otay indwardway, aay ackblay oudclay, isingray upay
ithway earnestay ofay uallssqay anday ainsray, eemssay otay uickenqay ethay activityay ofay ethay
exciteday eamensay.


APTERcHay 57ay. Ofay Aleswhay inay Aintpay; inay Eethtay; inay Oodway; inay Eet-Ironshay; inay
Onestay; inay Ountainsmay; inay Arsstay.

Onay Ower-hilltay, asay ouyay ogay ownday otay ethay Ondonlay ocksday, ouyay aymay avehay eensay aay
ippledcray eggarbay or(ay edger__kay, asay ethay ailorssay aysay) oldinghay aay aintedpay
oardbay eforebay imhay, epresentingray ethay agictray enescay inay ichwhay ehay ostlay ishay
eglay. Erethay areay eethray aleswhay anday eethray oatsbay; anday oneay ofay ethay oatsbay
esumed(pray otay ontaincay ethay issingmay eglay inay allay itsay originalay integrityay) isay
eingbay unchedcray byay ethay awsjay ofay ethay oremostfay alewhay. Anyay imetay esethay entay
earsyay, eythay elltay emay, ashay atthay anmay eldhay upay atthay icturepay, anday exhibiteday
atthay umpstay otay anay incredulousay orldway. Utbay ethay imetay ofay ishay ustificationjay
ashay ownay omecay. Ishay eethray aleswhay areay asay oodgay aleswhay asay ereway everay
ublishedpay inay Appingway, atay anyay ateray; anday ishay umpstay asay unquestionableay aay
umpstay asay anyay ouyay illway indfay inay ethay esternway earingsclay. Utbay, oughthay orfay
everay ountedmay onay atthay umpstay, evernay aay ump-speechstay oesday ethay oorpay alemanwhay
akemay; utbay, ithway owncastday eyesay, andsstay uefullyray ontemplatingcay ishay ownay
amputationay.

Oughoutthray ethay Acificpay, anday alsoay inay Antucketnay, anday Ewnay Edfordbay, anday Agsay
Arborhay, ouyay illway omecay acrossay ivelylay etchesskay ofay aleswhay anday
aling-sceneswhay, avengray byay ethay ishermenfay emselvesthay onay Ermspay
Ale-teethwhay, oray adies’lay usksbay oughtwray outay ofay ethay Ightray Ale-bonewhay, anday
otheray ikelay imshanderskray articlesay, asay ethay alemenwhay allcay ethay umerousnay
ittlelay ingeniousay ontrivancescay eythay elaboratelyay arvecay outay ofay ethay oughray
aterialmay, inay eirthay ourshay ofay oceanay eisurelay. Omesay ofay emthay avehay ittlelay
oxesbay ofay entistical-lookingday implementsay, eciallyspay intendeday orfay ethay
imshanderingskray usinessbay. Utbay, inay eneralgay, eythay oiltay ithway eirthay
ack-knivesjay aloneay; anday, ithway atthay almostay omnipotentay ooltay ofay ethay ailorsay,
eythay illway urntay ouyay outay anythingay ouyay easeplay, inay ethay ayway ofay aay ariner’smay
ancyfay.

Onglay exileay omfray Istendomchray anday ivilizationcay inevitablyay estoresray aay anmay
otay atthay onditioncay inay ichwhay Odgay acedplay imhay, i.e.__ay atwhay isay alledcay
avagerysay. Ouryay uetray ale-hunterwhay isay asay uchmay aay avagesay asay anay Iroquoisay. Iay
elfmysay amay aay avagesay, owningay onay allegianceay utbay otay ethay Ingkay ofay ethay
Annibalscay; anday eadyray atay anyay omentmay otay ebelray againstay imhay.

Ownay, oneay ofay ethay eculiarpay aracteristicschay ofay ethay avagesay inay ishay omesticday
ourshay, isay ishay onderfulway atiencepay ofay industryay. Anay ancientay Awaiianhay
ar-clubway oray ear-paddlespay, inay itsay ullfay ultiplicitymay anday elaborationay ofay
arvingcay, isay asay eatgray aay ophytray ofay umanhay erseverancepay asay aay Atinlay exiconlay.
Orfay, ithway utbay aay itbay ofay okenbray ea-shellsay oray aay ark’sshay oothtay, atthay
iraculousmay intricacyay ofay oodenway et-worknay ashay eenbay achieveday; anday itay ashay
ostcay eadystay earsyay ofay eadystay applicationay.

Asay ithway ethay Awaiianhay avagesay, osay ithway ethay itewhay ailor-savagesay. Ithway ethay
amesay arvellousmay atiencepay, anday ithway ethay amesay inglesay ark’sshay oothtay, ofay
ishay oneay oorpay ack-knifejay, ehay illway arvecay ouyay aay itbay ofay onebay ulpturescay, otnay
uiteqay asay orkmanlikeway, utbay asay oseclay ackedpay inay itsay azinessmay ofay esignday, asay
ethay Eekgray avagesay, Achilles’say ieldshay; anday ullfay ofay arbaricbay iritspay anday
uggestivenesssay, asay ethay intspray ofay atthay inefay olday Utchday avagesay, Albertay
Urerday.

Oodenway aleswhay, oray aleswhay utcay inay ofilepray outay ofay ethay allsmay arkday absslay ofay
ethay oblenay Outhsay Easay ar-woodway, areay equentlyfray etmay ithway inay ethay
orecastlesfay ofay Americanay alerswhay. Omesay ofay emthay areay oneday ithway uchmay
accuracyay.

Atay omesay olday able-roofedgay ountrycay ouseshay ouyay illway eesay assbray aleswhay unghay
byay ethay ailtay orfay ockersknay otay ethay oad-sideray oorday. Enwhay ethay orterpay isay
eepyslay, ethay anvil-headeday alewhay ouldway ebay estbay. Utbay esethay ockingknay aleswhay
areay eldomsay emarkableray asay aithfulfay essaysay. Onay ethay iresspay ofay omesay
old-fashioneday urcheschay ouyay illway eesay eet-ironshay aleswhay acedplay erethay orfay
eather-cocksway; utbay eythay areay osay elevateday, anday esidesbay atthay areay otay allay
intentsay anday urposespay osay abelledlay ithway ands“_Hay off!_”ay ouyay annotcay examineay
emthay oselyclay enoughay otay ecideday uponay eirthay eritmay.

Inay onybay, ibbyray egionsray ofay ethay earthay, erewhay atay ethay asebay ofay ighhay okenbray
iffsclay assesmay ofay ockray ielay ewnstray inay antasticfay oupingsgray uponay ethay ainplay,
ouyay illway oftenay iscoverday imagesay asay ofay ethay etrifiedpay ormsfay ofay ethay
Eviathanlay artlypay ergedmay inay assgray, ichwhay ofay aay indyway ayday eaksbray againstay
emthay inay aay urfsay ofay eengray urgessay.

Enthay, againay, inay ountainousmay ountriescay erewhay ethay avellertray isay
ontinuallycay irdledgay byay amphitheatricalay eightshay; erehay anday erethay omfray
omesay uckylay ointpay ofay iewvay ouyay illway atchcay assingpay impsesglay ofay ethay
ofilespray ofay aleswhay efinedday alongay ethay undulatingay idgesray. Utbay ouyay ustmay ebay
aay oroughthay alemanwhay, otay eesay esethay ightssay; anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay ifay ouyay
ishway otay eturnray otay uchsay aay ightsay againay, ouyay ustmay ebay uresay anday aketay ethay
exactay intersectingay atitudelay anday ongitudelay ofay ouryay irstfay and-pointstay,
elseay osay ance-likechay areay uchsay observationsay ofay ethay illshay, atthay ouryay
ecisepray, eviouspray and-pointstay ouldway equireray aay aboriouslay e-discoveryray;
ikelay ethay Olomasay Islandsay, ichwhay illstay emainray incognitaay, oughthay onceay
igh-ruffedhay Endannamay odtray emthay anday olday Iguerafay onicledchray emthay.

Ornay enwhay expandinglyay iftedlay byay ouryay ubjectsay, ancay ouyay ailfay otay acetray outay
eatgray aleswhay inay ethay arrystay eavenshay, anday oatsbay inay ursuitpay ofay emthay; asay
enwhay onglay illedfay ithway oughtsthay ofay arway ethay Easternay ationsnay awsay armiesay
ockedlay inay attlebay amongay ethay oudsclay. Usthay atay ethay Orthnay avehay Iay asedchay
Eviathanlay oundray anday oundray ethay Olepay ithway ethay evolutionsray ofay ethay ightbray
ointspay atthay irstfay efinedday imhay otay emay. Anday eneathbay ethay effulgentay
Antarcticay iesskay Iay avehay oardedbay ethay Argo-Navisay, anday oinedjay ethay asechay
againstay ethay arrystay Etuscay arfay eyondbay ethay utmostay etchstray ofay Ushydray anday
ethay Ingflyay Ishfay.

Ithway aay igate’sfray anchorsay orfay myay idle-bittsbray anday ascesfay ofay arpoonshay orfay
ursspay, ouldway Iay ouldcay ountmay atthay alewhay anday eaplay ethay opmosttay iesskay, otay
eesay etherwhay ethay abledfay eavenshay ithway allay eirthay ountlesscay entstay eallyray
ielay encampeday eyondbay myay ortalmay ightsay!


APTERcHay 58ay. Itbray.

Eeringstay orth-eastwardnay omfray ethay Ozettscray, eway ellfay inay ithway astvay eadowsmay
ofay itbray, ethay inutemay, ellowyay ubstancesay, uponay ichwhay ethay Ightray Alewhay
argelylay eedsfay. Orfay eagueslay anday eagueslay itay undulateday oundray usay, osay atthay
eway eemedsay otay ebay ailingsay oughthray oundlessbay ieldsfay ofay iperay anday oldengay
eatwhay.

Onay ethay econdsay ayday, umbersnay ofay Ightray Aleswhay ereway eensay, owhay, ecuresay omfray
ethay attackay ofay aay Ermspay Alerwhay ikelay ethay Equodpay, ithway openay awsjay uggishlyslay
amsway oughthray ethay itbray, ichwhay, adheringay otay ethay ingingfray ibresfay ofay atthay
ondrousway Enetianvay indblay inay eirthay outhsmay, asway inay atthay annermay eparatedsay
omfray ethay aterway atthay escapeday atay ethay iplay.

Asay orningmay owersmay, owhay idesay byay idesay owlyslay anday eethinglysay advanceay eirthay
esscythay oughthray ethay onglay etway assgray ofay arshymay eadsmay; evenay osay esethay
onstersmay amsway, akingmay aay angestray, assygray, uttingcay oundsay; anday eavinglay
ehindbay emthay endlessay athssway ofay ueblay uponay ethay ellowyay ea.*say

at*Thay artpay ofay ethay easay ownknay amongay alemenwhay asay ethay azil“Bray Anks”bay oesday
otnay earbay atthay amenay asay ethay Anksbay ofay Ewfoundlandnay oday, ecausebay ofay erethay
eingbay allowsshay anday oundingssay erethay, utbay ecausebay ofay isthay emarkableray
eadow-likemay appearanceay, ausedcay byay ethay astvay iftsdray ofay itbray ontinuallycay
oatingflay inay osethay atitudeslay, erewhay ethay Ightray Alewhay isay oftenay asedchay.

Utbay itay asway onlyay ethay oundsay eythay ademay asay eythay artedpay ethay itbray ichwhay atay
allay emindedray oneay ofay owersmay. Eensay omfray ethay ast-headsmay, especiallyay enwhay
eythay ausedpay anday ereway ationarystay orfay aay ilewhay, eirthay astvay ackblay ormsfay
ookedlay oremay ikelay ifelesslay assesmay ofay ockray anthay anythingay elseay. Anday asay inay
ethay eatgray untinghay ountriescay ofay Indiaay, ethay angerstray atay aay istanceday illway
ometimessay asspay onay ethay ainsplay ecumbentray elephantsay ithoutway owingknay emthay
otay ebay uchsay, akingtay emthay orfay arebay, ackenedblay elevationsay ofay ethay oilsay;
evenay osay, oftenay, ithway imhay, owhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eholdsbay isthay eciesspay
ofay ethay eviathanslay ofay ethay easay. Anday evenay enwhay ecognisedray atay astlay, eirthay
immenseay agnitudemay endersray itay eryvay ardhay eallyray otay elievebay atthay uchsay
ulkybay assesmay ofay overgrowthay ancay ossiblypay ebay instinctay, inay allay artspay, ithway
ethay amesay ortsay ofay ifelay atthay iveslay inay aay ogday oray aay orsehay.

Indeeday, inay otheray espectsray, ouyay ancay ardlyhay egardray anyay eaturescray ofay ethay
eepday ithway ethay amesay eelingsfay atthay ouyay oday osethay ofay ethay oreshay. Orfay oughthay
omesay olday aturalistsnay avehay aintainedmay atthay allay eaturescray ofay ethay andlay areay
ofay eirthay indkay inay ethay easay; anday oughthay akingtay aay oadbray eneralgay iewvay ofay ethay
ingthay, isthay aymay eryvay ellway ebay; etyay omingcay otay ecialtiesspay, erewhay, orfay
exampleay, oesday ethay oceanay urnishfay anyay ishfay atthay inay ispositionday answersay otay
ethay agacioussay indnesskay ofay ethay ogday? Ethay accurseday arkshay aloneay ancay inay anyay
