enericgay espectray ebay aidsay otay earbay omparativecay analogyay otay imhay.

Utbay oughthay, otay andsmenlay inay eneralgay, ethay ativenay inhabitantsay ofay ethay eassay
avehay everay eenbay egardedray ithway emotionsay unspeakablyay unsocialay anday
epellingray; oughthay eway owknay ethay easay otay ebay anay everlastingay erratay incognitaay,
osay atthay Olumbuscay ailedsay overay umberlessnay unknownay orldsway otay iscoverday ishay
oneay uperficialsay esternway oneay; oughthay, byay astvay oddsay, ethay ostmay errifictay ofay
allay ortalmay isastersday avehay immemoriallyay anday indiscriminatelyay efallenbay
enstay anday undredshay ofay ousandsthay ofay osethay owhay avehay onegay uponay ethay atersway;
oughthay utbay aay oment’smay onsiderationcay illway eachtay, atthay oweverhay abybay anmay
aymay agbray ofay ishay iencescay anday illskay, anday oweverhay uchmay, inay aay atteringflay
uturefay, atthay iencescay anday illskay aymay augmentay; etyay orfay everay anday orfay everay,
otay ethay ackcray ofay oomday, ethay easay illway insultay anday urdermay imhay, anday ulverizepay
ethay atelieststay, iffeststay igatefray ehay ancay akemay; everthelessnay, byay ethay
ontinualcay epetitionray ofay esethay eryvay impressionsay, anmay ashay ostlay atthay ensesay
ofay ethay ullfay awfulnessay ofay ethay easay ichwhay aboriginallyay elongsbay otay itay.

Ethay irstfay oatbay eway eadray ofay, oatedflay onay anay oceanay, atthay ithway Ortuguesepay
engeancevay adhay elmedwhay aay olewhay orldway ithoutway eavinglay osay uchmay asay aay idowway.
Atthay amesay oceanay ollsray ownay; atthay amesay oceanay estroyedday ethay eckedwray ipsshay
ofay astlay earyay. Eayay, oolishfay ortalsmay, Oah’snay oodflay isay otnay etyay ubsidedsay;
otway irdsthay ofay ethay airfay orldway itay etyay overscay.

Ereinwhay ifferday ethay easay anday ethay andlay, atthay aay iraclemay uponay oneay isay otnay aay
iraclemay uponay ethay otheray? Eternaturalpray errorstay estedray uponay ethay Ebrewshay,
enwhay underay ethay eetfay ofay Orahkay anday ishay ompanycay ethay ivelay oundgray openeday anday
allowedsway emthay upay orfay everay; etyay otnay aay odernmay unsay everay etssay, utbay inay
eciselypray ethay amesay annermay ethay ivelay easay allowssway upay ipsshay anday ewscray.

Utbay otnay onlyay isay ethay easay uchsay aay oefay otay anmay owhay isay anay alienay otay itay, utbay itay
isay alsoay aay iendfay otay itsay ownay off-springay; orseway anthay ethay Ersianpay osthay owhay
urderedmay ishay ownay uestsgay; aringspay otnay ethay eaturescray ichwhay itselfay athhay
awnedspay. Ikelay aay avagesay igresstay atthay ossingtay inay ethay unglejay overlaysay erhay
ownay ubscay, osay ethay easay ashesday evenay ethay ightiestmay aleswhay againstay ethay
ocksray, anday eaveslay emthay erethay idesay byay idesay ithway ethay itsplay eckswray ofay
ipsshay. Onay ercymay, onay owerpay utbay itsay ownay ontrolscay itay. Antingpay anday ortingsnay
ikelay aay admay attlebay eedstay atthay ashay ostlay itsay iderray, ethay asterlessmay oceanay
overrunsay ethay obeglay.

Onsidercay ethay ubtlenesssay ofay ethay easay; owhay itsay ostmay eadeddray eaturescray
ideglay underay aterway, unapparentay orfay ethay ostmay artpay, anday eacherouslytray
iddenhay eneathbay ethay oveliestlay intstay ofay azureay. Onsidercay alsoay ethay evilishday
illiancebray anday eautybay ofay anymay ofay itsay ostmay emorselessray ibestray, asay ethay
aintyday embellisheday apeshay ofay anymay eciesspay ofay arksshay. Onsidercay, onceay
oremay, ethay universalay annibalismcay ofay ethay easay; allay osewhay eaturescray eypray
uponay eachay otheray, arryingcay onay eternalay arway incesay ethay orldway eganbay.

Onsidercay allay isthay; anday enthay urntay otay isthay eengray, entlegay, anday ostmay ocileday
earthay; onsidercay emthay othbay, ethay easay anday ethay andlay; anday oday ouyay otnay indfay aay
angestray analogyay otay omethingsay inay ourselfyay? Orfay asay isthay appallingay oceanay
urroundssay ethay erdantvay andlay, osay inay ethay oulsay ofay anmay erethay ieslay oneay
insularay Ahititay, ullfay ofay eacepay anday oyjay, utbay encompasseday byay allay ethay
orrorshay ofay ethay alfhay ownknay ifelay. Odgay eepkay eethay! Ushpay otnay offay omfray atthay
isleay, outhay anstcay evernay eturnray!


APTERcHay 59ay. Uidsqay.

Owlyslay adingway oughthray ethay eadowsmay ofay itbray, ethay Equodpay illstay eldhay onay erhay
ayway orth-eastwardnay owardstay ethay islanday ofay Avajay; aay entlegay airay impellingay
erhay eelkay, osay atthay inay ethay urroundingsay erenitysay erhay eethray alltay aperingtay
astsmay ildlymay avedway otay atthay anguidlay eezebray, asay eethray ildmay almspay onay aay
ainplay. Anday illstay, atay ideway intervalsay inay ethay ilverysay ightnay, ethay onelylay,
alluringay etjay ouldway ebay eensay.

Utbay oneay ansparenttray ueblay orningmay, enwhay aay illnessstay almostay eternaturalpray
eadspray overay ethay easay, oweverhay unattendeday ithway anyay agnantstay almcay; enwhay
ethay onglay urnishedbay un-gladesay onay ethay atersway eemedsay aay oldengay ingerfay aidlay
acrossay emthay, enjoiningay omesay ecrecysay; enwhay ethay ipperedslay avesway isperedwhay
ogethertay asay eythay oftlysay anray onay; inay isthay ofoundpray ushhay ofay ethay isiblevay
eresphay aay angestray ectrespay asway eensay byay Aggooday omfray ethay ain-mast-headmay.

Inay ethay istanceday, aay eatgray itewhay assmay azilylay oseray, anday isingray igherhay anday
igherhay, anday isentanglingday itselfay omfray ethay azureay, atay astlay eamedglay eforebay
ouray owpray ikelay aay ow-slidesnay, ewnay idslay omfray ethay illshay. Usthay isteningglay
orfay aay omentmay, asay owlyslay itay ubsidedsay, anday anksay. Enthay onceay oremay aroseay,
anday ilentlysay eamedglay. Itay eemedsay otnay aay alewhay; anday etyay isay isthay Obymay Ickday?
oughtthay Aggooday. Againay ethay antomphay entway ownday, utbay onay e-appearingray onceay
oremay, ithway aay iletto-likestay cryay atthay artledstay everyay anmay omfray ishay odnay,
ethay egronay elledyay out—“Thereay! erethay againay! erethay eshay eachesbray! ightray
aheaday! Ethay Itewhay Alewhay, ethay Itewhay Ale!”whay

Uponay isthay, ethay eamensay ushedray otay ethay ard-armsyay, asay inay arming-timesway ethay
eesbay ushray otay ethay oughsbay. Are-headedbay inay ethay ultrysay unsay, Ahabay oodstay onay
ethay owspritbay, anday ithway oneay andhay ushedpay arfay ehindbay inay eadinessray otay aveway
ishay ordersay otay ethay elmsmanhay, astcay ishay eageray anceglay inay ethay irectionday
indicateday aloftay byay ethay outstretcheday otionlessmay armay ofay Aggooday.

Etherwhay ethay ittingflay attendanceay ofay ethay oneay illstay anday olitarysay etjay adhay
aduallygray orkedway uponay Ahabay, osay atthay ehay asway ownay eparedpray otay onnectcay ethay
ideasay ofay ildnessmay anday eposeray ithway ethay irstfay ightsay ofay ethay articularpay
alewhay ehay ursuedpay; oweverhay isthay asway, oray etherwhay ishay eagernessay etrayedbay
imhay; icheverwhay ayway itay ightmay avehay eenbay, onay oonersay idday ehay istinctlyday
erceivepay ethay itewhay assmay, anthay ithway aay uickqay intensityay ehay instantlyay avegay
ordersay orfay oweringlay.

Ethay ourfay oatsbay ereway oonsay onay ethay aterway; Ahab’say inay advanceay, anday allay
iftlysway ullingpay owardstay eirthay eypray. Oonsay itay entway ownday, anday ilewhay, ithway
oarsay uspendedsay, eway ereway awaitingay itsay eappearanceray, olay! inay ethay amesay otspay
erewhay itay anksay, onceay oremay itay owlyslay oseray. Almostay orgettingfay orfay ethay
omentmay allay oughtsthay ofay Obymay Ickday, eway ownay azedgay atay ethay ostmay ondrousway
enomenonphay ichwhay ethay ecretsay eassay avehay ithertohay evealedray otay ankindmay. Aay
astvay ulpypay assmay, urlongsfay inay engthlay anday eadthbray, ofay aay ancingglay
eam-colourcray, aylay oatingflay onay ethay aterway, innumerableay onglay armsay
adiatingray omfray itsay entrecay, anday urlingcay anday istingtway ikelay aay estnay ofay
anacondasay, asay ifay indlyblay otay utchclay atay anyay aplesshay objectay ithinway eachray.
Onay erceptiblepay acefay oray ontfray idday itay avehay; onay onceivablecay okentay ofay
eitheray ensationsay oray instinctay; utbay undulateday erethay onay ethay illowsbay, anay
unearthlyay, ormlessfay, ance-likechay apparitionay ofay ifelay.

Asay ithway aay owlay uckingsay oundsay itay owlyslay isappearedday againay, Arbuckstay illstay
azinggay atay ethay agitateday atersway erewhay itay adhay unksay, ithway aay ildway oicevay
exclaimed—“Almostay atherray adhay Iay eensay Obymay Ickday anday oughtfay imhay, anthay otay
avehay eensay eethay, outhay itewhay ost!”ghay

at“Whay asway itay, Ir?”say aidsay Askflay.

e“Thay eatgray ivelay uidsqay, ichwhay, eythay aysay, ewfay ale-shipswhay everay eheldbay,
anday eturnedray otay eirthay ortspay otay elltay ofay it.”ay

Utbay Ahabay aidsay othingnay; urningtay ishay oatbay, ehay ailedsay ackbay otay ethay esselvay;
ethay estray asay ilentlysay ollowingfay.

Ateverwhay uperstitionssay ethay ermspay alemenwhay inay eneralgay avehay onnectedcay
ithway ethay ightsay ofay isthay objectay, ertaincay itay isay, atthay aay impseglay ofay itay
eingbay osay eryvay unusualay, atthay ircumstancecay ashay onegay arfay otay investay itay ithway
ortentousnesspay. Osay arelyray isay itay eheldbay, atthay oughthay oneay anday allay ofay emthay
eclareday itay otay ebay ethay argestlay animateday ingthay inay ethay oceanay, etyay eryvay ewfay
ofay emthay avehay anyay utbay ethay ostmay aguevay ideasay oncerningcay itsay uetray aturenay
anday ormfay; otwithstandingnay, eythay elievebay itay otay urnishfay otay ethay ermspay
alewhay ishay onlyay oodfay. Orfay oughthay otheray eciesspay ofay aleswhay indfay eirthay oodfay
aboveay aterway, anday aymay ebay eensay byay anmay inay ethay actay ofay eedingfay, ethay
ermacetispay alewhay obtainsay ishay olewhay oodfay inay unknownay oneszay elowbay ethay
urfacesay; anday onlyay byay inferenceay isay itay atthay anyay oneay ancay elltay ofay atwhay,
eciselypray, atthay oodfay onsistscay. Atay imestay, enwhay oselyclay ursuedpay, ehay illway
isgorgeday atwhay areay upposedsay otay ebay ethay etachedday armsay ofay ethay uidsqay; omesay
ofay emthay usthay exhibiteday exceedingay entytway anday irtythay eetfay inay engthlay. Eythay
ancyfay atthay ethay onstermay otay ichwhay esethay armsay elongedbay ordinarilyay ingsclay
byay emthay otay ethay edbay ofay ethay oceanay; anday atthay ethay ermspay alewhay, unlikeay otheray
eciesspay, isay uppliedsay ithway eethtay inay orderay otay attackay anday eartay itay.

Erethay eemssay omesay oundgray otay imagineay atthay ethay eatgray Akenkray ofay Ishopbay
Ontoppodanpay aymay ultimatelyay esolveray itselfay intoay Uidsqay. Ethay annermay inay
ichwhay ethay Ishopbay escribesday itay, asay alternatelyay isingray anday inkingsay, ithway
omesay otheray articularspay ehay arratesnay, inay allay isthay ethay otway orrespondcay. Utbay
uchmay abatementay isay ecessarynay ithway espectray otay ethay incredibleay ulkbay ehay
assignsay itay.

Byay omesay aturalistsnay owhay avehay aguelyvay eardhay umorsray ofay ethay eriousmystay
eaturecray, erehay okenspay ofay, itay isay includeday amongay ethay assclay ofay
uttle-fishcay, otay ichwhay, indeeday, inay ertaincay externalay espectsray itay ouldway
eemsay otay elongbay, utbay onlyay asay ethay Anakay ofay ethay ibetray.


APTERcHay 60ay. Ethay Inelay.

Ithway eferenceray otay ethay alingwhay enescay ortlyshay otay ebay escribedday, asay ellway asay
orfay ethay etterbay understandingay ofay allay imilarsay enesscay elsewhereay esentedpray,
Iay avehay erehay otay eakspay ofay ethay agicalmay, ometimessay orriblehay ale-linewhay.

Ethay inelay originallyay useday inay ethay isheryfay asway ofay ethay estbay emphay, ightlyslay
aporedvay ithway artay, otnay impregnateday ithway itay, asay inay ethay asecay ofay ordinaryay
opesray; orfay ilewhay artay, asay ordinarilyay useday, akesmay ethay emphay oremay iableplay
otay ethay ope-makerray, anday alsoay endersray ethay operay itselfay oremay onvenientcay otay
ethay ailorsay orfay ommoncay ipshay useay; etyay, otnay onlyay ouldway ethay ordinaryay
uantityqay ootay uchmay iffenstay ethay ale-linewhay orfay ethay oseclay oilingcay otay ichwhay
itay ustmay ebay ubjectedsay; utbay asay ostmay eamensay areay eginningbay otay earnlay, artay inay
eneralgay byay onay eansmay addsay otay ethay ope’sray urabilityday oray engthstray, oweverhay
uchmay itay aymay ivegay itay ompactnesscay anday ossglay.

Ofay atelay earsyay ethay Anillamay operay ashay inay ethay Americanay isheryfay almostay
entirelyay upersededsay emphay asay aay aterialmay orfay ale-lineswhay; orfay, oughthay otnay
osay urableday asay emphay, itay isay ongerstray, anday arfay oremay oftsay anday elasticay; anday
Iay illway adday ince(say erethay isay anay eticsæsthay inay allay ings)thay, isay uchmay oremay
andsomehay anday ecomingbay otay ethay oatbay, anthay emphay. Emphay isay aay uskyday, arkday
ellowfay, aay ortsay ofay Indianay; utbay Anillamay isay asay aay olden-hairedgay Ircassiancay
otay eholdbay.

Ethay ale-linewhay isay onlyay o-thirdstway ofay anay inchay inay icknessthay. Atay irstfay
ightsay, ouyay ouldway otnay inkthay itay osay ongstray asay itay eallyray isay. Byay experimentay
itsay oneay anday iftyfay arnsyay illway eachay uspendsay aay eightway ofay oneay undredhay anday
entytway oundspay; osay atthay ethay olewhay operay illway earbay aay ainstray earlynay equalay
otay eethray onstay. Inay engthlay, ethay ommoncay ermspay ale-linewhay easuresmay
omethingsay overay otway undredhay athomsfay. Owardstay ethay ernstay ofay ethay oatbay itay isay
irallyspay oiledcay awayay inay ethay ubtay, otnay ikelay ethay orm-pipeway ofay aay illstay
oughthay, utbay osay asay otay ormfay oneay oundray, eese-shapedchay assmay ofay enselyday
eddedbay eaves,”“shay oray ayerslay ofay oncentriccay iralizationsspay, ithoutway anyay
ollowhay utbay ethay eart,”“hay oray inutemay erticalvay ubetay ormedfay atay ethay axisay ofay
ethay eesechay. Asay ethay eastlay angletay oray inkkay inay ethay oilingcay ouldway, inay
unningray outay, infalliblyay aketay omebody’ssay armay, eglay, oray entireay odybay offay,
ethay utmostay ecautionpray isay useday inay owingstay ethay inelay inay itsay ubtay. Omesay
arpooneershay illway onsumecay almostay anay entireay orningmay inay isthay usinessbay,
arryingcay ethay inelay ighhay aloftay anday enthay eevingray itay ownwardsday oughthray aay
ockblay owardstay ethay ubtay, osay asay inay ethay actay ofay oilingcay otay eefray itay omfray allay
ossiblepay inkleswray anday iststway.

Inay ethay Englishay oatsbay otway ubstay areay useday insteaday ofay oneay; ethay amesay inelay
eingbay ontinuouslycay oiledcay inay othbay ubstay. Erethay isay omesay advantageay inay
isthay; ecausebay esethay in-tubstway eingbay osay allsmay eythay itfay oremay eadilyray intoay
ethay oatbay, anday oday otnay ainstray itay osay uchmay; ereaswhay, ethay Americanay ubtay,
earlynay eethray eetfay inay iameterday anday ofay oportionatepray epthday, akesmay aay
atherray ulkybay eightfray orfay aay aftcray osewhay anksplay areay utbay oneay alf-inchhay inay
icknessthay; orfay ethay ottombay ofay ethay ale-boatwhay isay ikelay iticalcray iceay, ichwhay
illway earbay upay aay onsiderablecay istributedday eightway, utbay otnay eryvay uchmay ofay aay
oncentratedcay oneay. Enwhay ethay aintedpay anvascay overcay isay appedclay onay ethay
Americanay ine-tublay, ethay oatbay ookslay asay ifay itay ereway ullingpay offay ithway aay
odigiouspray eatgray edding-cakeway otay esentpray otay ethay aleswhay.

Othbay endsay ofay ethay inelay areay exposeday; ethay owerlay enday erminatingtay inay anay
eye-spliceay oray ooplay omingcay upay omfray ethay ottombay againstay ethay idesay ofay ethay
ubtay, anday anginghay overay itsay edgeay ompletelycay isengagedday omfray everythingay.
Isthay arrangementay ofay ethay owerlay enday isay ecessarynay onay otway accountsay. Irstfay:
Inay orderay otay acilitatefay ethay asteningfay otay itay ofay anay additionalay inelay omfray aay
eighboringnay oatbay, inay asecay ethay ickenstray alewhay ouldshay oundsay osay eepday asay otay
eatenthray otay arrycay offay ethay entireay inelay originallyay attacheday otay ethay
arpoonhay. Inay esethay instancesay, ethay alewhay ofay oursecay isay iftedshay ikelay aay ugmay
ofay aleay, asay itay ereway, omfray ethay oneay oatbay otay ethay otheray; oughthay ethay irstfay
oatbay alwaysay overshay atay andhay otay assistay itsay onsortcay. Econdsay: Isthay
arrangementay isay indispensableay orfay ommoncay afety’ssay akesay; orfay ereway ethay
owerlay enday ofay ethay inelay inay anyay ayway attacheday otay ethay oatbay, anday ereway ethay
alewhay enthay otay unray ethay inelay outay otay ethay enday almostay inay aay inglesay, okingsmay
inutemay asay ehay ometimessay oesday, ehay ouldway otnay opstay erethay, orfay ethay oomedday
oatbay ouldway infalliblyay ebay aggeddray ownday afteray imhay intoay ethay ofunditypray ofay
ethay easay; anday inay atthay asecay onay own-criertay ouldway everay indfay erhay againay.

Eforebay oweringlay ethay oatbay orfay ethay asechay, ethay upperay enday ofay ethay inelay isay
akentay aftay omfray ethay ubtay, anday assingpay oundray ethay oggerheadlay erethay, isay
againay arriedcay orwardfay ethay entireay engthlay ofay ethay oatbay, estingray osswisecray
uponay ethay oomlay oray andlehay ofay everyay an’smay oaray, osay atthay itay ogsjay againstay ishay
istwray inay owingray; anday alsoay assingpay etweenbay ethay enmay, asay eythay alternatelyay
itsay atay ethay oppositeay unwalesgay, otay ethay eadedlay ockschay oray oovesgray inay ethay
extremeay ointedpay owpray ofay ethay oatbay, erewhay aay oodenway inpay oray ewerskay ethay izesay
ofay aay ommoncay uillqay, eventspray itay omfray ippingslay outay. Omfray ethay ockschay itay
angshay inay aay ightslay estoonfay overay ethay owsbay, anday isay enthay assedpay insideay ethay
oatbay againay; anday omesay entay oray entytway athomsfay alled(cay ox-linebay) eingbay
oiledcay uponay ethay oxbay inay ethay owsbay, itay ontinuescay itsay ayway otay ethay unwalegay
illstay aay ittlelay urtherfay aftay, anday isay enthay attacheday otay ethay ort-warp—theshay
operay ichwhay isay immediatelyay onnectedcay ithway ethay arpoonhay; utbay eviouspray otay
atthay onnexioncay, ethay ort-warpshay oesgay oughthray undrysay ificationsmystay ootay
edioustay otay etailday.

Usthay ethay ale-linewhay oldsfay ethay olewhay oatbay inay itsay omplicatedcay oilscay,
istingtway anday ithingwray arounday itay inay almostay everyay irectionday. Allay ethay
oarsmenay areay involveday inay itsay erilouspay ontortionscay; osay atthay otay ethay imidtay
eyeay ofay ethay andsmanlay, eythay eemsay asay Indianay ugglersjay, ithway ethay eadliestday
akessnay ortivelyspay estooningfay eirthay imbslay. Ornay ancay anyay onsay ofay ortalmay
omanway, orfay ethay irstfay imetay, eatsay imselfhay amiday osethay empenhay intricaciesay,
anday ilewhay ainingstray ishay utmostay atay ethay oaray, ethinkbay imhay atthay atay anyay
unknownay instantay ethay arpoonhay aymay ebay artedday, anday allay esethay orriblehay
ontortionscay ebay utpay inay ayplay ikelay ingedray ightningslay; ehay annotcay ebay usthay
ircumstancedcay ithoutway aay uddershay atthay akesmay ethay eryvay arrowmay inay ishay onesbay
otay uiverqay inay imhay ikelay aay akenshay ellyjay. Etyay abit—strangehay ingthay! atwhay
annotcay abithay accomplish?—Gayeray alliessay, oremay errymay irthmay, etterbay okesjay,
anday ighterbray eparteesray, ouyay evernay eardhay overay ouryay ahoganymay, anthay ouyay
illway earhay overay ethay alf-inchhay itewhay edarcay ofay ethay ale-boatwhay, enwhay usthay
unghay inay angman’shay oosesnay; anday, ikelay ethay ixsay urghersbay ofay Alaiscay eforebay
Ingkay Edwarday, ethay ixsay enmay omposingcay ethay ewcray ullpay intoay ethay awsjay ofay
eathday, ithway aay alterhay arounday everyay ecknay, asay ouyay aymay aysay.

Erhapspay aay eryvay ittlelay oughtthay illway ownay enableay ouyay otay accountay orfay osethay
epeatedray alingwhay isasters—someday ewfay ofay ichwhay areay asuallycay onicled—ofchray
isthay anmay oray atthay anmay eingbay akentay outay ofay ethay oatbay byay ethay inelay, anday ostlay.
Orfay, enwhay ethay inelay isay artingday outay, otay ebay eatedsay enthay inay ethay oatbay, isay
ikelay eingbay eatedsay inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay anifoldmay izzingswhay ofay aay
eam-enginestay inay ullfay ayplay, enwhay everyay ingflyay eambay, anday aftshay, anday
eelwhay, isay azinggray ouyay. Itay isay orseway; orfay ouyay annotcay itsay otionlessmay inay
ethay earthay ofay esethay erilspay, ecausebay ethay oatbay isay ockingray ikelay aay adlecray,
anday ouyay areay itchedpay oneay ayway anday ethay otheray, ithoutway ethay ightestslay
arningway; anday onlyay byay aay ertaincay elf-adjustingsay uoyancybay anday
imultaneousnesssay ofay olitionvay anday actionay, ancay ouyay escapeay eingbay ademay aay
Azeppamay ofay, anday unray awayay ithway erewhay ethay all-seeingay unsay imselfhay ouldcay
evernay iercepay ouyay outay.

Againay: asay ethay ofoundpray almcay ichwhay onlyay apparentlyay ecedespray anday
ophesiespray ofay ethay ormstay, isay erhapspay oremay awfulay anthay ethay ormstay itselfay;
orfay, indeeday, ethay almcay isay utbay ethay apperwray anday envelopeay ofay ethay ormstay; anday
ontainscay itay inay itselfay, asay ethay eeminglysay armlesshay ifleray oldshay ethay atalfay
owderpay, anday ethay allbay, anday ethay explosionay; osay ethay acefulgray eposeray ofay ethay
inelay, asay itay ilentlysay erpentinessay aboutay ethay oarsmenay eforebay eingbay oughtbray
intoay actualay ay—thisplay isay aay ingthay ichwhay arriescay oremay ofay uetray errortay anthay
anyay otheray aspectay ofay isthay angerousday affairay. Utbay whyay aysay oremay? Allay enmay
ivelay envelopeday inay ale-lineswhay. Allay areay ornbay ithway altershay oundray eirthay
ecksnay; utbay itay isay onlyay enwhay aughtcay inay ethay iftsway, uddensay urntay ofay eathday,
atthay ortalsmay ealizeray ethay ilentsay, ubtlesay, ever-presentay erilspay ofay ifelay.
Anday ifay ouyay ebay aay ilosopherphay, oughthay eatedsay inay ethay ale-boatwhay, ouyay ouldway
otnay atay earthay eelfay oneay itwhay oremay ofay errortay, anthay oughthay eatedsay eforebay
ouryay eveningay irefay ithway aay okerpay, anday otnay aay arpoonhay, byay ouryay idesay.


APTERcHay 61ay. Ubbstay Illskay aay Alewhay.

Ifay otay Arbuckstay ethay apparitionay ofay ethay Uidsqay asway aay ingthay ofay ortentspay, otay
Ueequegqay itay asway uiteqay aay ifferentday objectay.

en“Whay ouyay eesay imhay uid,”’qay aidsay ethay avagesay, oninghay ishay arpoonhay inay ethay
owbay ofay ishay oistedhay oatbay, en“thay ouyay uickqay eesay imhay arm’pay ale.”whay

Ethay extnay ayday asway exceedinglyay illstay anday ultrysay, anday ithway othingnay ecialspay
otay engageay emthay, ethay Equod’spay ewcray ouldcay ardlyhay esistray ethay ellspay ofay
eepslay induceday byay uchsay aay acantvay easay. Orfay isthay artpay ofay ethay Indianay Oceanay
oughthray ichwhay eway enthay ereway oyagingvay isay otnay atwhay alemenwhay allcay aay ivelylay
oundgray; atthay isay, itay affordsay ewerfay impsesglay ofay orpoisespay, olphinsday,
ing-fishflyay, anday otheray ivaciousvay enizensday ofay oremay irringstay atersway, anthay
osethay offay ethay Ioray eday alay Ataplay, oray ethay in-shoreay oundgray offay Erupay.

Itay asway myay urntay otay andstay atay ethay oremast-headfay; anday ithway myay ouldersshay
eaninglay againstay ethay ackenedslay oyalray oudsshray, otay anday ofray Iay idlyay ayedsway
inay atwhay eemedsay anay enchanteday airay. Onay esolutionray ouldcay ithstandway itay; inay
atthay eamydray oodmay osinglay allay onsciousnesscay, atay astlay myay oulsay entway outay ofay
myay odybay; oughthay myay odybay illstay ontinuedcay otay aysway asay aay endulumpay illway,
onglay afteray ethay owerpay ichwhay irstfay ovedmay itay isay ithdrawnway.

Ereay orgetfulnessfay altogetheray amecay overay emay, Iay adhay oticednay atthay ethay
eamensay atay ethay ainmay anday izzen-mast-headsmay ereway alreadyay owsydray. Osay atthay
atay astlay allay eethray ofay usay ifelesslylay ungsway omfray ethay arsspay, anday orfay everyay
ingsway atthay eway ademay erethay asway aay odnay omfray elowbay omfray ethay umberingslay
elmsmanhay. Ethay avesway, ootay, oddednay eirthay indolentay estscray; anday acrossay ethay
ideway ancetray ofay ethay easay, eastay oddednay otay estway, anday ethay unsay overay allay.

Uddenlysay ubblesbay eemedsay urstingbay eneathbay myay osedclay eyesay; ikelay icesvay myay
andshay aspedgray ethay oudsshray; omesay invisibleay, aciousgray agencyay eservedpray
emay; ithway aay ockshay Iay amecay ackbay otay ifelay. Anday olay! oseclay underay ouray eelay, otnay
ortyfay athomsfay offay, aay iganticgay Ermspay Alewhay aylay ollingray inay ethay aterway ikelay
ethay apsizedcay ullhay ofay aay igatefray, ishay oadbray, ossyglay ackbay, ofay anay Ethiopianay
uehay, isteningglay inay ethay un’ssay aysray ikelay aay irrormay. Utbay azilylay undulatingay
inay ethay oughtray ofay ethay easay, anday everay anday anonay anquillytray outingspay ishay
aporyvay etjay, ethay alewhay ookedlay ikelay aay ortlypay urgherbay okingsmay ishay ipepay ofay
aay armway afternoonay. Utbay atthay ipepay, oorpay alewhay, asway thyay astlay. Asay ifay uckstray
byay omesay enchanter’say andway, ethay eepyslay ipshay anday everyay eeperslay inay itay allay
atay onceay artedstay intoay akefulnessway; anday oremay anthay aay orescay ofay oicesvay omfray
allay artspay ofay ethay esselvay, imultaneouslysay ithway ethay eethray otesnay omfray
aloftay, outedshay orthfay ethay accustomeday cryay, asay ethay eatgray ishfay owlyslay anday
egularlyray outedspay ethay arklingspay inebray intoay ethay airay.

ear“Clay awayay ethay oatsbay! Uff!”lay iedcray Ahabay. Anday obeyingay ishay ownay orderay, ehay
ashedday ethay elmhay ownday eforebay ethay elmsmanhay ouldcay andlehay ethay okesspay.

Ethay uddensay exclamationsay ofay ethay ewcray ustmay avehay alarmeday ethay alewhay; anday
ereay ethay oatsbay ereway ownday, ajesticallymay urningtay, ehay amsway awayay otay ethay
eewardlay, utbay ithway uchsay aay eadystay anquillitytray, anday akingmay osay ewfay ipplesray
asay ehay amsway, atthay inkingthay afteray allay ehay ightmay otnay asay etyay ebay alarmeday,
Ahabay avegay ordersay atthay otnay anay oaray ouldshay ebay useday, anday onay anmay ustmay eakspay
utbay inay isperswhay. Osay eatedsay ikelay Ontarioay Indiansay onay ethay unwalesgay ofay ethay
oatsbay, eway iftlysway utbay ilentlysay addledpay alongay; ethay almcay otnay admittingay ofay
ethay oiselessnay ailssay eingbay etsay. Esentlypray, asay eway usthay idedglay inay asechay,
ethay onstermay erpendicularlypay ittedflay ishay ailtay ortyfay eetfay intoay ethay airay,
anday enthay anksay outay ofay ightsay ikelay aay owertay allowedsway upay.

ere“Thay ogay ukes!”flay asway ethay cryay, anay announcementay immediatelyay ollowedfay byay
Ubb’sstay oducingpray ishay atchmay anday ignitingay ishay ipepay, orfay ownay aay espiteray
asway antedgray. Afteray ethay ullfay intervalay ofay ishay oundingsay adhay elapseday, ethay
alewhay oseray againay, anday eingbay ownay inay advanceay ofay ethay oker’ssmay oatbay, anday
uchmay earernay otay itay anthay otay anyay ofay ethay othersay, Ubbstay ountedcay uponay ethay
onorhay ofay ethay apturecay. Itay asway obviousay, ownay, atthay ethay alewhay adhay atay engthlay
ecomebay awareay ofay ishay ursuerspay. Allay ilencesay ofay autiousnesscay asway ereforethay
onay ongerlay ofay useay. Addlespay ereway oppeddray, anday oarsay amecay oudlylay intoay ayplay.
Anday illstay uffingpay atay ishay ipepay, Ubbstay eeredchay onay ishay ewcray otay ethay
assaultay.

Esyay, aay ightymay angechay adhay omecay overay ethay ishfay. Allay aliveay otay ishay eopardyjay,
ehay asway oinggay ead“hay out”ay; atthay artpay obliquelyay ojectingpray omfray ethay admay
eastyay ichwhay ehay ewed.*bray

It*ay illway ebay eensay inay omesay otheray aceplay ofay atwhay aay eryvay ightlay ubstancesay ethay
entireay interioray ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay enormousay eadhay onsistscay. Oughthay
apparentlyay ethay ostmay assivemay, itay isay byay arfay ethay ostmay uoyantbay artpay aboutay
imhay. Osay atthay ithway easeay ehay elevatesay itay inay ethay airay, anday invariablyay oesday
osay enwhay oinggay atay ishay utmostay eedspay. Esidesbay, uchsay isay ethay eadthbray ofay ethay
upperay artpay ofay ethay ontfray ofay ishay eadhay, anday uchsay ethay aperingtay ut-watercay
ormationfay ofay ethay owerlay artpay, atthay byay obliquelyay elevatingay ishay eadhay, ehay
erebythay aymay ebay aidsay otay ansformtray imselfhay omfray aay uff-bowedblay uggishslay
alliotgay intoay aay arppointedshay Ewnay Orkyay ilot-boatpay.

art“Stay erhay, artstay erhay, myay enmay! On’tday urryhay ourselvesyay; aketay entyplay ofay
ime—buttay artstay erhay; artstay erhay ikelay under-clapsthay, at’sthay all,”ay iedcray
Ubbstay, utteringsplay outay ethay okesmay asay ehay okespay. art“Stay erhay, ownay; ivegay em’ay
ethay onglay anday ongstray okestray, Ashtegotay. Artstay erhay, Ashtay, myay oy—startbay
erhay, allay; utbay eepkay oolcay, eepkay ool—cucumberscay isay ethay ord—easyway,
easy—onlyay artstay erhay ikelay imgray eathday anday inninggray evilsday, anday aiseray ethay
uriedbay eadday erpendicularpay outay ofay eirthay avesgray, oys—that’sbay allay. Artstay
er!”hay

oo-hoo“Way! A-hee!”way eamedscray ethay Ay-Headergay inay eplyray, aisingray omesay olday
ar-whoopway otay ethay iesskay; asay everyay oarsmanay inay ethay ainedstray oatbay
involuntarilyay ouncedbay orwardfay ithway ethay oneay emendoustray eadinglay okestray
ichwhay ethay eageray Indianay avegay.

Utbay ishay ildway eamsscray ereway answereday byay othersay uiteqay asay ildway. ee-hee“Kay!
Ee-hee!”kay elledyay Aggooday, ainingstray orwardsfay anday ackwardsbay onay ishay eatsay,
ikelay aay acingpay igertay inay ishay agecay.

a-la“Kay! Oo-loo!”kay owledhay Ueequegqay, asay ifay ackingsmay ishay ipslay overay aay
outhfulmay ofay Enadier’sgray eakstay. Anday usthay ithway oarsay anday ellsyay ethay eelskay
utcay ethay easay. Eanwhilemay, Ubbstay etainingray ishay aceplay inay ethay anvay, illstay
encourageday ishay enmay otay ethay onsetay, allay ethay ilewhay uffingpay ethay okesmay omfray
ishay outhmay. Ikelay esperadoesday eythay uggedtay anday eythay ainedstray, illtay ethay
elcomeway cryay asway eard—“Standhay upay, Ashtego!—givetay itay otay im!”hay Ethay arpoonhay
asway urledhay. ern“Stay all!”ay Ethay oarsmenay ackedbay aterway; ethay amesay omentmay
omethingsay entway othay anday issinghay alongay everyay oneay ofay eirthay istswray. Itay asway
ethay agicalmay inelay. Anay instantay eforebay, Ubbstay adhay iftlysway aughtcay otway
additionalay urnstay ithway itay oundray ethay oggerheadlay, encewhay, byay easonray ofay itsay
increaseday apidray irclingscay, aay empenhay ueblay okesmay ownay ettedjay upay anday
ingledmay ithway ethay eadystay umesfay omfray ishay ipepay. Asay ethay inelay assedpay oundray
anday oundray ethay oggerheadlay; osay alsoay, ustjay eforebay eachingray atthay ointpay, itay
isteringlyblay assedpay oughthray anday oughthray othbay ofay Ubb’sstay andshay, omfray
ichwhay ethay and-clothshay, oray uaressqay ofay uiltedqay anvascay ometimessay ornway atay
esethay imestay, adhay accidentallyay oppeddray. Itay asway ikelay oldinghay anay enemy’say
arpshay o-edgedtway ordsway byay ethay adeblay, anday atthay enemyay allay ethay imetay
ivingstray otay estwray itay outay ofay ouryay utchclay.

et“Way ethay inelay! etway ethay ine!”lay iedcray Ubbstay otay ethay ubtay oarsmanay im(hay
eatedsay byay ethay ubtay) owhay, atchingsnay offay ishay athay, ashedday ea-watersay intoay
it.*ay Oremay urnstay ereway akentay, osay atthay ethay inelay eganbay oldinghay itsay aceplay.
Ethay oatbay ownay ewflay oughthray ethay oilingbay aterway ikelay aay arkshay allay insfay.
Ubbstay anday Ashtegotay erehay angedchay aces—stemplay orfay ern—astay aggeringstay
usinessbay ulytray inay atthay ockingray ommotioncay.

artly*Pay otay owshay ethay indispensablenessay ofay isthay actay, itay aymay erehay ebay
atedstay, atthay, inay ethay olday Utchday isheryfay, aay opmay asway useday otay ashday ethay
unningray inelay ithway aterway; inay anymay otheray ipsshay, aay oodenway igginpay, oray
ailerbay, isay etsay apartay orfay atthay urposepay. Ouryay athay, oweverhay, isay ethay ostmay
onvenientcay.

Omfray ethay ibratingvay inelay extendingay ethay entireay engthlay ofay ethay upperay artpay
ofay ethay oatbay, anday omfray itsay ownay eingbay oremay ighttay anthay aay arpstringhay, ouyay
ouldway avehay oughtthay ethay aftcray adhay otway eels—onekay eavingclay ethay aterway, ethay
otheray ethay air—asay ethay oatbay urnedchay onay oughthray othbay opposingay elementsay atay
onceay. Aay ontinualcay ascadecay ayedplay atay ethay owsbay; aay easelesscay irlingwhay eddyay
inay erhay akeway; anday, atay ethay ightestslay otionmay omfray ithinway, evenay utbay ofay aay
ittlelay ingerfay, ethay ibratingvay, ackingcray aftcray antedcay overay erhay asmodicspay
unwalegay intoay ethay easay. Usthay eythay ushedray; eachay anmay ithway ightmay anday ainmay
ingingclay otay ishay eatsay, otay eventpray eingbay ossedtay otay ethay oamfay; anday ethay alltay
ormfay ofay Ashtegotay atay ethay eeringstay oaray ouchingcray almostay oubleday, inay orderay
otay ingbray ownday ishay entrecay ofay avitygray. Olewhay Atlanticsay anday Acificspay
eemedsay assedpay asay eythay otshay onay eirthay ayway, illtay atay engthlay ethay alewhay
omewhatsay ackenedslay ishay ightflay.

aul“Hay in—haulay in!”ay iedcray Ubbstay otay ethay owsmanbay! anday, acingfay oundray
owardstay ethay alewhay, allay andshay eganbay ullingpay ethay oatbay upay otay imhay, ilewhay
etyay ethay oatbay asway eingbay owedtay onay. Oonsay angingray upay byay ishay ankflay, Ubbstay,
irmlyfay antingplay ishay eeknay inay ethay umsyclay eatclay, artedday artday afteray artday
intoay ethay ingflyay ishfay; atay ethay ordway ofay ommandcay, ethay oatbay alternatelyay
erningstay outay ofay ethay ayway ofay ethay ale’swhay orriblehay allowway, anday enthay
angingray upay orfay anotheray ingflay.

Ethay edray idetay ownay ouredpay omfray allay idessay ofay ethay onstermay ikelay ooksbray ownday
aay illhay. Ishay ormentedtay odybay olledray otnay inay inebray utbay inay oodblay, ichwhay
ubbledbay anday eethedsay orfay urlongsfay ehindbay inay eirthay akeway. Ethay antingslay unsay
ayingplay uponay isthay imsoncray ondpay inay ethay easay, entsay ackbay itsay eflectionray
intoay everyay acefay, osay atthay eythay allay owedglay otay eachay otheray ikelay edray enmay.
Anday allay ethay ilewhay, etjay afteray etjay ofay itewhay okesmay asway agonizinglyay otshay
omfray ethay iraclespay ofay ethay alewhay, anday ehementvay uffpay afteray uffpay omfray ethay
outhmay ofay ethay exciteday eadsmanhay; asay atay everyay artday, aulinghay inay uponay ishay
ookedcray ancelay (byay ethay inelay attacheday otay it)ay, Ubbstay aightenedstray itay againay
anday againay, byay aay ewfay apidray owsblay againstay ethay unwalegay, enthay againay anday
againay entsay itay intoay ethay alewhay.

ull“Pay up—pullay up!”ay ehay ownay iedcray otay ethay owsmanbay, asay ethay aningway alewhay
elaxedray inay ishay athwray. ull“Pay up!—closeay o!”tay anday ethay oatbay angedray alongay
ethay ish’sfay ankflay. Enwhay eachingray arfay overay ethay owbay, Ubbstay owlyslay urnedchay
ishay onglay arpshay ancelay intoay ethay ishfay, anday eptkay itay erethay, arefullycay
urningchay anday urningchay, asay ifay autiouslycay eekingsay otay eelfay afteray omesay oldgay
atchway atthay ethay alewhay ightmay avehay allowedsway, anday ichwhay ehay asway earfulfay ofay
eakingbray ereay ehay ouldcay ookhay itay outay. Utbay atthay oldgay atchway ehay oughtsay asway
ethay innermostay ifelay ofay ethay ishfay. Anday ownay itay isay uckstray; orfay, artingstay
omfray ishay ancetray intoay atthay unspeakableay ingthay alledcay ishay urry,”“flay ethay
onstermay orriblyhay allowedway inay ishay oodblay, overwrappeday imselfhay inay
impenetrableay, admay, oilingbay ayspray, osay atthay ethay imperilleday aftcray,
instantlyay oppingdray asternay, adhay uchmay adoay indlyblay otay ugglestray outay omfray
atthay ensiedphray ilighttway intoay ethay earclay airay ofay ethay ayday.

Anday ownay abatingay inay ishay urryflay, ethay alewhay onceay oremay olledray outay intoay
iewvay; urgingsay omfray idesay otay idesay; asmodicallyspay ilatingday anday ontractingcay
ishay out-holespay, ithway arpshay, ackingcray, agonizeday espirationsray. Atay astlay,
ushgay afteray ushgay ofay ottedclay edray oregay, asay ifay itay adhay eenbay ethay urplepay eeslay
ofay edray ineway, otshay intoay ethay ightedfray airay; anday allingfay ackbay againay, anray
ippingdray ownday ishay otionlessmay anksflay intoay ethay easay. Ishay earthay adhay urstbay!

e’s“Hay eadday, Mray. Ubb,”stay aidsay Aggooday.

es“Yay; othbay ipespay okedsmay out!”ay anday ithdrawingway ishay ownay omfray ishay outhmay,
Ubbstay atteredscay ethay eadday ashesay overay ethay aterway; anday, orfay aay omentmay, oodstay
oughtfullythay eyeingay ethay astvay orpsecay ehay adhay ademay.


APTERcHay 62ay. Ethay Artday.

Aay ordway oncerningcay anay incidentay inay ethay astlay apterchay.

Accordingay otay ethay invariableay usageay ofay ethay isheryfay, ethay ale-boatwhay ushespay
offay omfray ethay ipshay, ithway ethay eadsmanhay oray ale-killerwhay asay emporarytay
eersmanstay, anday ethay arpooneerhay oray ale-fastenerwhay ullingpay ethay oremostfay
oaray, ethay oneay ownknay asay ethay arpooneer-oarhay. Ownay itay eedsnay aay ongstray,
ervousnay armay otay ikestray ethay irstfay ironay intoay ethay ishfay; orfay oftenay, inay atwhay
isay alledcay aay onglay artday, ethay eavyhay implementay ashay otay ebay ungflay otay ethay
istanceday ofay entytway oray irtythay eetfay. Utbay oweverhay olongedpray anday exhaustingay
ethay asechay, ethay arpooneerhay isay expecteday otay ullpay ishay oaray eanwhilemay otay ethay
uttermostay; indeeday, ehay isay expecteday otay etsay anay exampleay ofay uperhumansay
activityay otay ethay estray, otnay onlyay byay incredibleay owingray, utbay byay epeatedray
oudlay anday intrepiday exclamationsay; anday atwhay itay isay otay eepkay outingshay atay ethay
optay ofay one’say ompasscay, ilewhay allay ethay otheray usclesmay areay ainedstray anday alfhay
arted—whatstay atthay isay onenay owknay utbay osethay owhay avehay iedtray itay. Orfay oneay, Iay
annotcay awlbay eryvay eartilyhay anday orkway eryvay ecklesslyray atay oneay anday ethay amesay
imetay. Inay isthay ainingstray, awlingbay atestay, enthay, ithway ishay ackbay otay ethay
ishfay, allay atay onceay ethay exhausteday arpooneerhay earshay ethay excitingay
andcry—“Stay upay, anday ivegay itay otay im!”hay Ehay ownay ashay otay opdray anday ecuresay ishay
oaray, urntay oundray onay ishay entrecay alfhay ayway, eizesay ishay arpoonhay omfray ethay
otchcray, anday ithway atwhay ittlelay engthstray aymay emainray, ehay essaysay otay itchpay itay
omehowsay intoay ethay alewhay. Onay onderway, akingtay ethay olewhay eetflay ofay alemenwhay
inay aay odybay, atthay outay ofay iftyfay airfay anceschay orfay aay artday, otnay ivefay areay
uccessfulsay; onay onderway atthay osay anymay aplesshay arpooneershay areay adlymay ursedcay
anday isratedday; onay onderway atthay omesay ofay emthay actuallyay urstbay eirthay
ood-vesselsblay inay ethay oatbay; onay onderway atthay omesay ermspay alemenwhay areay
absentay ourfay earsyay ithway ourfay arrelsbay; onay onderway atthay otay anymay ipshay
ownersay, alingwhay isay utbay aay osinglay oncerncay; orfay itay isay ethay arpooneerhay atthay
akesmay ethay oyagevay, anday ifay ouyay aketay ethay eathbray outay ofay ishay odybay owhay ancay
ouyay expectay otay indfay itay erethay enwhay ostmay antedway!

Againay, ifay ethay artday ebay uccessfulsay, enthay atay ethay econdsay iticalcray instantay,
atthay isay, enwhay ethay alewhay artsstay otay unray, ethay oatheaderbay anday arpooneerhay
ikewiselay artstay otay unningray orefay anday aftay, otay ethay imminentay eopardyjay ofay
emselvesthay anday everyay oneay elseay. Itay isay enthay eythay angechay acesplay; anday ethay
eadsmanhay, ethay iefchay officeray ofay ethay ittlelay aftcray, akestay ishay operpray
ationstay inay ethay owsbay ofay ethay oatbay.

Ownay, Iay arecay otnay owhay aintainsmay ethay ontrarycay, utbay allay isthay isay othbay
oolishfay anday unnecessaryay. Ethay eadsmanhay ouldshay aystay inay ethay owsbay omfray
irstfay otay astlay; ehay ouldshay othbay artday ethay arpoonhay anday ethay ancelay, anday onay
owingray ateverwhay ouldshay ebay expecteday ofay imhay, exceptay underay ircumstancescay
obviousay otay anyay ishermanfay. Iay owknay atthay isthay ouldway ometimessay involveay aay
ightslay osslay ofay eedspay inay ethay asechay; utbay onglay experienceay inay ariousvay
alemenwhay ofay oremay anthay oneay ationnay ashay onvincedcay emay atthay inay ethay astvay
ajoritymay ofay ailuresfay inay ethay isheryfay, itay ashay otnay byay anyay eansmay eenbay osay
uchmay ethay eedspay ofay ethay alewhay asay ethay eforebay escribedday exhaustionay ofay ethay
arpooneerhay atthay ashay ausedcay emthay.

Otay insureay ethay eatestgray efficiencyay inay ethay artday, ethay arpooneershay ofay isthay
orldway ustmay artstay otay eirthay eetfay omfray outay ofay idlenessay, anday otnay omfray outay
ofay oiltay.


APTERcHay 63ay. Ethay Otchcray.

Outay ofay ethay unktray, ethay anchesbray owgray; outay ofay emthay, ethay igstway. Osay, inay
oductivepray ubjectssay, owgray ethay apterschay.

Ethay otchcray alludeday otay onay aay eviouspray agepay eservesday independentay entionmay.
Itay isay aay otchednay ickstay ofay aay eculiarpay ormfay, omesay otway eetfay inay engthlay,
ichwhay isay erpendicularlypay inserteday intoay ethay arboardstay unwalegay earnay ethay
owbay, orfay ethay urposepay ofay urnishingfay aay estray orfay ethay oodenway extremityay ofay
ethay arpoonhay, osewhay otheray akednay, arbedbay enday opinglyslay ojectspray omfray ethay
owpray. Erebythay ethay eaponway isay instantlyay atay andhay otay itsay urlerhay, owhay
atchessnay itay upay asay eadilyray omfray itsay estray asay aay ackwoodsmanbay ingssway ishay
ifleray omfray ethay allway. Itay isay ustomarycay otay avehay otway arpoonshay eposingray inay
ethay otchcray, espectivelyray alledcay ethay irstfay anday econdsay ironsay.

Utbay esethay otway arpoonshay, eachay byay itsay ownay ordcay, areay othbay onnectedcay ithway
ethay inelay; ethay objectay eingbay isthay: otay artday emthay othbay, ifay ossiblepay, oneay
instantlyay afteray ethay otheray intoay ethay amesay alewhay; osay atthay ifay, inay ethay
omingcay agdray, oneay ouldshay awdray outay, ethay otheray aymay illstay etainray aay oldhay. Itay
isay aay oublingday ofay ethay anceschay. Utbay itay eryvay oftenay appenshay atthay owingay otay
ethay instantaneousay, iolentvay, onvulsivecay unningray ofay ethay alewhay uponay
eceivingray ethay irstfay ironay, itay ecomesbay impossibleay orfay ethay arpooneerhay,
oweverhay ightning-likelay inay ishay ovementsmay, otay itchpay ethay econdsay ironay intoay
imhay. Everthelessnay, asay ethay econdsay ironay isay alreadyay onnectedcay ithway ethay
inelay, anday ethay inelay isay unningray, encehay atthay eaponway ustmay, atay allay eventsay,
ebay anticipatinglyay ossedtay outay ofay ethay oatbay, omehowsay anday omewheresay; elseay
ethay ostmay erribletay eopardyjay ouldway involveay allay andshay. Umbledtay intoay ethay
aterway, itay accordinglyay isay inay uchsay asescay; ethay arespay oilscay ofay oxbay inelay
entioned(may inay aay ecedingpray apterchay) akingmay isthay eatfay, inay ostmay instancesay,
udentlypray acticablepray. Utbay isthay iticalcray actay isay otnay alwaysay unattendeday
ithway ethay addestsay anday ostmay atalfay asualtiescay.

Urthermorefay: ouyay ustmay owknay atthay enwhay ethay econdsay ironay isay ownthray
overboarday, itay enceforththay ecomesbay aay anglingday, arp-edgedshay errortay,
ittishlyskay urvettingcay aboutay othbay oatbay anday alewhay, entanglingay ethay ineslay,
oray uttingcay emthay, anday akingmay aay odigiouspray ensationsay inay allay irectionsday.
Ornay, inay eneralgay, isay itay ossiblepay otay ecuresay itay againay untilay ethay alewhay isay
airlyfay apturedcay anday aay orpsecay.

Onsidercay, ownay, owhay itay ustmay ebay inay ethay asecay ofay ourfay oatsbay allay engagingay
oneay unusuallyay ongstray, activeay, anday owingknay alewhay; enwhay owingay otay esethay
ualitiesqay inay imhay, asay ellway asay otay ethay ousandthay oncurringcay accidentsay ofay
uchsay anay audaciousay enterpriseay, eightay oray entay ooselay econdsay ironsay aymay ebay
imultaneouslysay anglingday aboutay imhay. Orfay, ofay oursecay, eachay oatbay isay
uppliedsay ithway everalsay arpoonshay otay endbay onay otay ethay inelay ouldshay ethay irstfay
oneay ebay ineffectuallyay artedday ithoutway ecoveryray. Allay esethay articularspay areay
aithfullyfay arratednay erehay, asay eythay illway otnay ailfay otay elucidateay everalsay
ostmay importantay, oweverhay intricateay assagespay, inay enesscay ereafterhay otay ebay
aintedpay.


APTERcHay 64ay. Ubb’sstay Uppersay.

Ubb’sstay alewhay adhay eenbay illedkay omesay istanceday omfray ethay ipshay. Itay asway aay
almcay; osay, ormingfay aay andemtay ofay eethray oatsbay, eway ommencedcay ethay owslay
usinessbay ofay owingtay ethay ophytray otay ethay Equodpay. Anday ownay, asay eway eighteenay
enmay ithway ouray irty-sixthay armsay, anday oneay undredhay anday eightyay umbsthay anday
ingersfay, owlyslay oiledtay ourhay afteray ourhay uponay atthay inertay, uggishslay orpsecay
inay ethay easay; anday itay eemedsay ardlyhay otay udgebay atay allay, exceptay atay onglay
intervalsay; oodgay evidenceay asway erebyhay urnishedfay ofay ethay enormousnessay ofay
ethay assmay eway ovedmay. Orfay, uponay ethay eatgray analcay ofay Ang-Hohay, oray ateverwhay
eythay allcay itay, inay Inachay, ourfay oray ivefay aborerslay onay ethay oot-pathfay illway
awdray aay ulkybay eightedfray unkjay atay ethay ateray ofay aay ilemay anay ourhay; utbay isthay
andgray argosyay eway owedtay eavilyhay orgedfay alongay, asay ifay adenlay ithway ig-leadpay
inay ulkbay.

Arknessday amecay onay; utbay eethray ightslay upay anday ownday inay ethay Equod’spay
ain-riggingmay imlyday uidedgay ouray ayway; illtay awingdray earernay eway awsay Ahabay
oppingdray oneay ofay everalsay oremay anternslay overay ethay ulwarksbay. Acantlyvay
eyeingay ethay eavinghay alewhay orfay aay omentmay, ehay issueday ethay usualay ordersay orfay
ecuringsay itay orfay ethay ightnay, anday enthay andinghay ishay anternlay otay aay eamansay,
entway ishay ayway intoay ethay abincay, anday idday otnay omecay orwardfay againay untilay
orningmay.

Oughthay, inay overseeingay ethay ursuitpay ofay isthay alewhay, Aptaincay Ahabay adhay
evinceday ishay ustomarycay activityay, otay allcay itay osay; etyay ownay atthay ethay
eaturecray asway eadday, omesay aguevay issatisfactionday, oray impatienceay, oray
espairday, eemedsay orkingway inay imhay; asay ifay ethay ightsay ofay atthay eadday odybay
emindedray imhay atthay Obymay Ickday asway etyay otay ebay ainslay; anday oughthay aay ousandthay
otheray aleswhay ereway oughtbray otay ishay ipshay, allay atthay ouldway otnay oneay otjay
advanceay ishay andgray, onomaniacmay objectay. Eryvay oonsay ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay
omfray ethay oundsay onay ethay Equod’spay ecksday, atthay allay andshay ereway eparingpray otay
astcay anchoray inay ethay eepday; orfay eavyhay ainschay areay eingbay aggeddray alongay ethay
eckday, anday ustthray attlingray outay ofay ethay ort-holespay. Utbay byay osethay ankingclay
inkslay, ethay astvay orpsecay itselfay, otnay ethay ipshay, isay otay ebay ooredmay. Iedtay byay
ethay eadhay otay ethay ernstay, anday byay ethay ailtay otay ethay owsbay, ethay alewhay ownay ieslay
ithway itsay ackblay ullhay oseclay otay ethay essel’svay anday eensay oughthray ethay arknessday
ofay ethay ightnay, ichwhay obscureday ethay arsspay anday iggingray aloftay, ethay o—shiptway
anday alewhay, eemedsay okedyay ogethertay ikelay olossalcay ullocksbay, ereofwhay oneay
eclinesray ilewhay ethay otheray emainsray anding.*stay

A*ay ittlelay itemay aymay asay ellway ebay elatedray erehay. Ethay ongeststray anday ostmay
eliableray oldhay ichwhay ethay ipshay ashay uponay ethay alewhay enwhay ooredmay alongsideay,
isay byay ethay ukesflay oray ailtay; anday asay omfray itsay eatergray ensityday atthay artpay isay
elativelyray eavierhay anthay anyay otheray excepting(ay ethay ide-fins)say, itsay
exibilityflay evenay inay eathday, ausescay itay otay inksay owlay eneathbay ethay urfacesay;
osay atthay ithway ethay andhay ouyay annotcay etgay atay itay omfray ethay oatbay, inay orderay otay
utpay ethay ainchay oundray itay. Utbay isthay ifficultyday isay ingeniouslyay overcomeay: aay
allsmay, ongstray inelay isay eparedpray ithway aay oodenway oatflay atay itsay outeray enday,
anday aay eightway inay itsay iddlemay, ilewhay ethay otheray enday isay ecuredsay otay ethay ipshay.
Byay adroitay anagementmay ethay oodenway oatflay isay ademay otay iseray onay ethay otheray idesay
ofay ethay assmay, osay atthay ownay avinghay irdledgay ethay alewhay, ethay ainchay isay eadilyray
ademay otay ollowfay uitsay; anday eingbay ippedslay alongay ethay odybay, isay atay astlay
ockedlay astfay oundray ethay allestsmay artpay ofay ethay ailtay, atay ethay ointpay ofay
unctionjay ithway itsay oadbray ukesflay oray obeslay.

Ifay oodymay Ahabay asway ownay allay uiescenceqay, atay eastlay osay arfay asay ouldcay ebay ownknay
onay eckday, Ubbstay, ishay econdsay atemay, ushedflay ithway onquestcay, etrayedbay anay
unusualay utbay illstay ood-naturedgay excitementay. Uchsay anay unwonteday ustlebay asway
ehay inay atthay ethay aidstay Arbuckstay, ishay officialay uperiorsay, uietlyqay esignedray
otay imhay orfay ethay imetay ethay olesay anagementmay ofay affairsay. Oneay allsmay, elpinghay
ausecay ofay allay isthay ivelinesslay inay Ubbstay, asway oonsay ademay angelystray
anifestmay. Ubbstay asway aay ighhay iverlay; ehay asway omewhatsay intemperatelyay ondfay ofay
ethay alewhay asay aay avorishflay ingthay otay ishay alatepay.

A“ay eakstay, aay eakstay, ereay Iay eepslay! Ouyay, Aggooday! overboarday ouyay ogay, anday utcay
emay oneay omfray ishay all!”smay

Erehay ebay itay ownknay, atthay oughthay esethay ildway ishermenfay oday otnay, asay aay eneralgay
ingthay, anday accordingay otay ethay eatgray ilitarymay aximmay, akemay ethay enemyay efrayday
ethay urrentcay expensesay ofay ethay arway at(ay eastlay eforebay ealizingray ethay oceedspray
ofay ethay oyage)vay, etyay ownay anday enthay ouyay indfay omesay ofay esethay Antucketersnay
owhay avehay aay enuinegay elishray orfay atthay articularpay artpay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay
esignatedday byay Ubbstay; omprisingcay ethay aperingtay extremityay ofay ethay odybay.

Aboutay idnightmay atthay eakstay asway utcay anday ookedcay; anday ightedlay byay otway
anternslay ofay ermspay oilay, Ubbstay outlystay oodstay upay otay ishay ermacetispay uppersay
atay ethay apstan-headcay, asay ifay atthay apstancay ereway aay ideboardsay. Ornay asway Ubbstay
ethay onlyay anqueterbay onay ale’swhay eshflay atthay ightnay. Inglingmay eirthay
umblingsmay ithway ishay ownay asticationsmay, ousandsthay onay ousandsthay ofay arksshay,
armingsway oundray ethay eadday eviathanlay, ackinglysmay eastedfay onay itsay atnessfay.
Ethay ewfay eepersslay elowbay inay eirthay unksbay ereway oftenay artledstay byay ethay arpshay
appingslay ofay eirthay ailstay againstay ethay ullhay, ithinway aay ewfay inchesay ofay ethay
eepers’slay eartshay. Eeringpay overay ethay idesay ouyay ouldcay ustjay eesay emthay as(ay
eforebay ouyay eardhay emthay) allowingway inay ethay ullensay, ackblay atersway, anday
urningtay overay onay eirthay acksbay asay eythay oopedscay outay ugehay obularglay iecespay ofay
ethay alewhay ofay ethay ignessbay ofay aay umanhay eadhay. Isthay articularpay eatfay ofay ethay
arkshay eemssay allay utbay iraculousmay. Owhay atay uchsay anay apparentlyay unassailableay
urfacesay, eythay ontrivecay otay ougegay outay uchsay etricalsymmay outhfulsmay, emainsray
aay artpay ofay ethay universalay oblempray ofay allay ingsthay. Ethay arkmay eythay usthay eavelay
onay ethay alewhay, aymay estbay ebay ikenedlay otay ethay ollowhay ademay byay aay arpentercay inay
ountersinkingcay orfay aay ewscray.

Oughthay amiday allay ethay okingsmay orrorhay anday iabolismday ofay aay ea-fightsay, arksshay
illway ebay eensay onginglylay azinggay upay otay ethay ip’sshay ecksday, ikelay ungryhay ogsday
oundray aay abletay erewhay edray eatmay isay eingbay arvedcay, eadyray otay oltbay ownday everyay
illedkay anmay atthay isay ossedtay otay emthay; anday oughthay, ilewhay ethay aliantvay
utchersbay overay ethay eck-tableday areay usthay anniballycay arvingcay eachay other’say
ivelay eatmay ithway arving-knivescay allay ildedgay anday asselledtay, ethay arksshay,
alsoay, ithway eirthay ewel-hiltedjay outhsmay, areay uarrelsomelyqay arvingcay awayay
underay ethay abletay atay ethay eadday eatmay; anday oughthay, ereway ouyay otay urntay ethay
olewhay affairay upsideay ownday, itay ouldway illstay ebay ettypray uchmay ethay amesay ingthay,
atthay isay otay aysay, aay ockingshay arkishshay usinessbay enoughay orfay allay artiespay;
anday oughthay arksshay alsoay areay ethay invariableay outridersay ofay allay aveslay ipsshay
ossingcray ethay Atlanticay, ematicallysystay ottingtray alongsideay, otay ebay andyhay
inay asecay aay arcelpay isay otay ebay arriedcay anywhereay, oray aay eadday aveslay otay ebay
ecentlyday uriedbay; anday oughthay oneay oray otway otheray ikelay instancesay ightmay ebay
etsay ownday, ouchingtay ethay etsay ermstay, acesplay, anday occasionsay, enwhay arksshay oday
ostmay ociallysay ongregatecay, anday ostmay ilariouslyhay eastfay; etyay isay erethay onay
onceivablecay imetay oray occasionay enwhay ouyay illway indfay emthay inay uchsay ountlesscay
umbersnay, anday inay ayergay oray oremay ovialjay iritsspay, anthay arounday aay eadday ermspay
alewhay, ooredmay byay ightnay otay aay aleshipwhay atay easay. Ifay ouyay avehay evernay eensay
atthay ightsay, enthay uspendsay ouryay ecisionday aboutay ethay oprietypray ofay
evil-worshipday, anday ethay expediencyay ofay onciliatingcay ethay evilday.

Utbay, asay etyay, Ubbstay eededhay otnay ethay umblingsmay ofay ethay anquetbay atthay asway
oinggay onay osay ighnay imhay, onay oremay anthay ethay arksshay eededhay ethay ackingsmay ofay
ishay ownay epicureanay ipslay.

ook“Cay, ook!—where’scay atthay olday Eece?”flay ehay iedcray atay engthlay, ideningway ishay
egslay illstay urtherfay, asay ifay otay ormfay aay oremay ecuresay asebay orfay ishay uppersay;
anday, atay ethay amesay imetay artingday ishay orkfay intoay ethay ishday, asay ifay abbingstay
ithway ishay ancelay; ook“cay, ouyay ook!—sailcay isthay ayway, ook!”cay

Ethay olday ackblay, otnay inay anyay eryvay ighhay eeglay atay avinghay eenbay eviouslypray
ousedray omfray ishay armway ammockhay atay aay ostmay unseasonableay ourhay, amecay
amblingshay alongay omfray ishay alleygay, orfay, ikelay anymay olday acksblay, erethay asway
omethingsay ethay attermay ithway ishay ee-pansknay, ichwhay ehay idday otnay eepkay ellway
ouredscay ikelay ishay otheray anspay; isthay olday Eeceflay, asay eythay alledcay imhay, amecay
ufflingshay anday impinglay alongay, assistingay ishay epstay ithway ishay ongstay, ichwhay,
afteray aay umsyclay ashionfay, ereway ademay ofay aightenedstray ironay oopshay; isthay olday
Ebonyay ounderedflay alongay, anday inay obedienceay otay ethay ordway ofay ommandcay, amecay
otay aay eadday opstay onay ethay oppositeay idesay ofay Ubb’sstay ideboardsay; enwhay, ithway
othbay andshay oldedfay eforebay imhay, anday estingray onay ishay o-leggedtway anecay, ehay
owedbay ishay archeday ackbay illstay urtherfay overay, atay ethay amesay imetay idewayssay
incliningay ishay eadhay, osay asay otay ingbray ishay estbay earay intoay ayplay.

ook,”“Cay aidsay Ubbstay, apidlyray iftinglay aay atherray eddishray orselmay otay ishay
outhmay, on’t“day ouyay inkthay isthay eakstay isay atherray overdoneay? Ou’veyay eenbay
eatingbay isthay eakstay ootay uchmay, ookcay; it’say ootay endertay. On’tday Iay alwaysay aysay
atthay otay ebay oodgay, aay ale-steakwhay ustmay ebay oughtay? Erethay areay osethay arksshay
ownay overay ethay idesay, on’tday ouyay eesay eythay eferpray itay oughtay anday areray? Atwhay aay
indyshay eythay areay ickingkay upay! Ookcay, ogay anday alktay otay em’ay; elltay em’ay eythay areay
elcomeway otay elphay emselvesthay ivillycay, anday inay oderationmay, utbay eythay ustmay
eepkay uietqay. Astblay emay, ifay Iay ancay earhay myay ownay oicevay. Awayay, ookcay, anday
eliverday myay essagemay. Erehay, aketay isthay antern,”lay atchingsnay oneay omfray ishay
ideboardsay; ow“nay enthay, ogay anday eachpray otay em!”’ay

Ullenlysay akingtay ethay offereday anternlay, olday Eeceflay impedlay acrossay ethay eckday
otay ethay ulwarksbay; anday enthay, ithway oneay andhay oppingdray ishay ightlay owlay overay
ethay easay, osay asay otay etgay aay oodgay iewvay ofay ishay ongregationcay, ithway ethay otheray
andhay ehay olemnlysay ourishedflay ishay ongstay, anday eaninglay arfay overay ethay idesay inay
aay umblingmay oicevay eganbay addressingay ethay arksshay, ilewhay Ubbstay, oftlysay
awlingcray ehindbay, overhearday allay atthay asway aidsay.

ellow-critters“Fay: I’seay ordereday erehay otay aysay atday ouyay ustmay opstay atday amday
oisenay areday. Ouyay earhay? Opstay atday amday ackin’smay obay eday iplay! Assamay Ubbstay aysay
atday ouyay ancay illfay ouryay amday elliesbay upay otay eday atchingshay, utbay byay Orgay! ouyay
ustmay opstay atday amday acket!”ray

ook,”“Cay erehay interposeday Ubbstay, accompanyingay ethay ordway ithway aay uddensay apslay
onay ethay oulder,—“Cookshay! whyay, amnday ouryay eyesay, ouyay ustn’tmay earsway atthay ayway
enwhay ou’reyay eachingpray. At’sthay onay ayway otay onvertcay innerssay, ook!”cay

o“Whay atday? Enday eachpray otay imhay ourself,”yay ullenlysay urningtay otay ogay.

o“Nay, ookcay; ogay onay, ogay on.”ay

ell“Way, enday, Elubedbay ellow-critters:”—fay

ight!”“Ray exclaimeday Ubbstay, approvinglyay, oax“cay em’ay otay itay; tryay at,”thay anday
Eeceflay ontinuedcay.

o“Day ouyay isay allay arksshay, anday byay aturnay eryway oraciousway, etyay Iay ayzay otay ouyay,
ellow-crittersfay, atday atday oraciousness—’topway atday amday appin’slay obay eday
ailtay! Owhay ouyay inktay otay earhay, osespay ouyay eepkay upay uchsay aay amday appin’slay anday
itin’bay are?”day

ook,”“Cay iedcray Ubbstay, ollaringcay imhay, I“ay on’tway avehay atthay earingsway. Alktay
otay em’ay entlemanly.”gay

Onceay oremay ethay ermonsay oceededpray.

our“Yay oraciousnessway, ellow-crittersfay, Iay on’tday ameblay eyay osay uchmay orfay; atday
isay aturnay, anday an’tcay ebay elpedhay; utbay otay oberngay atday ickedway aturnay, atday isay
eday intpay. Ouyay isay arksshay, artinsay; utbay ifay ouyay oberngay eday arkshay inay ouyay, whyay
enday ouyay ebay angelay; orfay allay angelay isay ot’ingnay oremay anday eday arkshay ellway
obernedgay. Ownay, ooklay erehay, ed’renbray, ustjay tryay onstway otay ebay ibilcay, aay
elpinghay ourselbsyay omfray atday alewhay. On’tday ebay earin’tay eday ubberblay outay ouryay
eighbour’snay outmay, Iay aysay. Isay otnay oneay arkshay oodday ightray asay odertay otay atday
alewhay? Anday, byay Orgay, onenay onay ouyay ashay eday ightray otay atday alewhay; atday alewhay
elongbay otay omesay oneay elseay. Iay owknay omesay o’ay ouyay ashay errybay igbray outmay,
iggerbray anday odersay; utbay enday eday igbray outsmay ometimessay ashay eday allsmay
elliesbay; osay atday eday ignessbray ofay eday outmay isay otnay otay allersway idway, utbay otay
itbay offay eday ubberblay orfay eday allsmay fryay obay arksshay, atday an’tcay etgay intoay eday
ougescray otay elphay emselves.”day

ell“Way oneday, olday Eece!”flay iedcray Ubbstay, at’s“thay Istianitychray; ogay on.”ay

o“Nay useay oin’gay onay; eday amday illainsway illway eepkay aay ougin’scay anday appin’slay
eachay oderay, Assamay Ubbstay; eyday on’tday earhay oneay ordway; onay useay a-preachin’ay otay
uchsay amday uttonsg’ay asay ouyay allcay em’ay, illtay areday elliesbay isay ullfay, anday areday
elliesbay isay ottomlessbay; anday enwhay eyday oday etgay em’ay ullfay, eyday ontway earhay ouyay
enday; orfay enday eyday inksay inay eday easay, ogay astfay otay eepslay onay eday oralcay, anday
an’tcay earhay ot’ingnay atay allay, onay oremay, orfay eberay anday eber.”ay

Upon“ay myay oulsay, Iay amay aboutay ofay ethay amesay opinionay; osay ivegay ethay enedictionbay,
Eeceflay, anday I’llay awayay otay myay upper.”say

Uponay isthay, Eeceflay, oldinghay othbay andshay overay ethay ishyfay obmay, aisedray ishay
illshray oicevay, anday ied—cray

ussed“Cay ellow-crittersfay! Ickkay upay eday amndestday owray asay everay ouyay ancay; illfay
ouryay am’day elliesbay ill’tay eyday ust—andbay enday ie.”day

ow“Nay, ook,”cay aidsay Ubbstay, esumingray ishay uppersay atay ethay apstancay; and“stay
ustjay erewhay ouyay oodstay eforebay, erethay, overay againstay emay, anday aypay articularpay
attention.”ay

All“ay ention,”day aidsay Eeceflay, againay oopingstay overay uponay ishay ongstay inay ethay
esiredday ositionpay.

ell,”“Way aidsay Ubbstay, elpinghay imselfhay eelyfray eanwhilemay; I“ay allshay ownay ogay
ackbay otay ethay ubjectsay ofay isthay eakstay. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, owhay olday areay ouyay,
ook?”cay

at“Whay atday oday idway eday eak,”’tay aidsay ethay olday ackblay, estilytay.

ilence“Say! Owhay olday areay ouyay, ook?”cay

out“’Bay inetynay, eyday ay,”say ehay oomilyglay utteredmay.

And“ay ouyay avehay ivedlay inay isthay orldway ardhay uponay oneay undredhay earsyay, ookcay,
anday on’tday owknay etyay owhay otay ookcay aay ale-steak?”whay apidlyray oltingbay anotheray
outhfulmay atay ethay astlay ordway, osay atthay orselmay eemedsay aay ontinuationcay ofay ethay
uestionqay. ere“Whay ereway ouyay ornbay, ook?”cay

ind“’Hay eday atchwayhay, inay erry-boatfay, oin’gay oberay eday Oanoke.”ray

orn“Bay inay aay erry-boatfay! At’sthay ueerqay, ootay. Utbay Iay antway otay owknay atwhay
ountrycay ouyay ereway ornbay inay, ook!”cay

idn’t“Day Iay aysay eday Oanokeray ountry?”cay ehay iedcray arplyshay.

o“Nay, ouyay idn’tday, ookcay; utbay I’llay elltay ouyay atwhay I’may omingcay otay, ookcay. Ouyay
ustmay ogay omehay anday ebay ornbay overay againay; ouyay on’tday owknay owhay otay ookcay aay
ale-steakwhay et.”yay

ess“Bray myay oulsay, ifay Iay ookcay odernay one,”ay ehay owledgray, angrilyay, urningtay
oundray otay epartday.

ome“Cay ackbay, ook;—herecay, andhay emay osethay ongs;—nowtay aketay atthay itbay ofay eakstay
erethay, anday elltay emay ifay ouyay inkthay atthay eakstay ookedcay asay itay ouldshay ebay? Aketay
itay, Iay ay”—holdingsay ethay ongstay owardstay im—“takehay itay, anday astetay it.”ay

Aintlyfay ackingsmay ishay itheredway ipslay overay itay orfay aay omentmay, ethay olday egronay
utteredmay, est“Bay ookedcay eak’tay Iay eberay astetay; oosyjay, errybay oosy.”jay

ook,”“Cay aidsay Ubbstay, uaringsqay imselfhay onceay oremay; o“day ouyay elongbay otay ethay
urch?”chay

assed“Pay oneay onceay inay Ape-Down,”cay aidsay ethay olday anmay ullenlysay.

And“ay ouyay avehay onceay inay ouryay ifelay assedpay aay olyhay urchchay inay Ape-Towncay,
erewhay ouyay oubtlessday overhearday aay olyhay arsonpay addressingay ishay earershay asay
ishay elovedbay ellow-creaturesfay, avehay ouyay, ookcay! Anday etyay ouyay omecay erehay,
anday elltay emay uchsay aay eadfuldray ielay asay ouyay idday ustjay ownay, eh?”ay aidsay Ubbstay.
ere“Whay oday ouyay expectay otay ogay otay, ook?”cay

o“Gay otay edbay errybay oon,”say ehay umbledmay, alf-turninghay asay ehay okespay.

Avast“ay! eavehay otay! Iay eanmay enwhay ouyay ieday, ookcay. It’say anay awfulay uestionqay.
Ownay at’swhay ouryay answer?”ay

en“Whay isday olday ackbray anmay ies,”day aidsay ethay egronay owlyslay, angingchay ishay
olewhay airay anday emeanorday, e“hay isselfhay on’tway ogay owherenay; utbay omesay essedbray
angelay illway omecay anday etchfay im.”hay

etch“Fay imhay? Owhay? Inay aay oachcay anday ourfay, asay eythay etchedfay Elijahay? Anday etchfay
imhay ere?”whay

Up“ay ere,”day aidsay Eeceflay, oldinghay ishay ongstay aightstray overay ishay eadhay, anday
eepingkay itay erethay eryvay olemnlysay.

o“Say, enthay, ouyay expectay otay ogay upay intoay ouray ain-topmay, oday ouyay, ookcay, enwhay
ouyay areay eadday? Utbay on’tday ouyay owknay ethay igherhay ouyay imbclay, ethay oldercay itay
etsgay? Ain-topmay, eh?”ay

idn’t“Day aysay atday all,”t’ay aidsay Eeceflay, againay inay ethay ulkssay.

ou“Yay aidsay upay erethay, idn’tday ouyay? anday ownay ooklay ourselfyay, anday eesay erewhay
ouryay ongstay areay ointingpay. Utbay, erhapspay ouyay expectay otay etgay intoay eavenhay byay
awlingcray oughthray ethay ubber’slay olehay, ookcay; utbay, onay, onay, ookcay, ouyay on’tday
etgay erethay, exceptay ouyay ogay ethay egularray ayway, oundray byay ethay iggingray. It’say aay
icklishtay usinessbay, utbay ustmay ebay oneday, oray elseay it’say onay ogay. Utbay onenay ofay usay
areay inay eavenhay etyay. Opdray ouryay ongstay, ookcay, anday earhay myay ordersay. Oday eyay
earhay? Oldhay ouryay athay inay oneay andhay, anday apclay othert’ay a’topay ofay ouryay earthay,
enwhay I’may ivinggay myay ordersay, ookcay. Atwhay! atthay ouryay earthay, ere?—that’sthay
ouryay izzardgay! Aloftay! aloft!—that’say it—noway ouyay avehay itay. Oldhay itay erethay
ownay, anday aypay attention.”ay

All“ay ention,”’day aidsay ethay olday ackblay, ithway othbay andshay acedplay asay esiredday,
ainlyvay igglingwray ishay izzledgray eadhay, asay ifay otay etgay othbay earsay inay ontfray atay
oneay anday ethay amesay imetay.

ell“Way enthay, ookcay, ouyay eesay isthay ale-steakwhay ofay oursyay asway osay eryvay adbay,
atthay Iay avehay utpay itay outay ofay ightsay asay oonsay asay ossiblepay; ouyay eesay atthay,
on’tday ouyay? Ellway, orfay ethay uturefay, enwhay ouyay ookcay anotheray ale-steakwhay orfay
myay ivatepray abletay erehay, ethay apstancay, I’llay elltay ouyay atwhay otay oday osay asay otnay
otay oilspay itay byay overdoingay. Oldhay ethay eakstay inay oneay andhay, anday owshay aay ivelay
oalcay otay itay ithway ethay otheray; atthay oneday, ishday itay; ed’yay earhay? Anday ownay
o-morrowtay, ookcay, enwhay eway areay uttingcay inay ethay ishfay, ebay uresay ouyay andstay byay
otay etgay ethay ipstay ofay ishay insfay; avehay emthay utpay inay icklepay. Asay orfay ethay endsay
ofay ethay ukesflay, avehay emthay ousedsay, ookcay. Erethay, ownay eyay aymay o.”gay

Utbay Eeceflay adhay ardlyhay otgay eethray acespay offay, enwhay ehay asway ecalledray.

ook“Cay, ivegay emay utletscay orfay uppersay o-morrowtay ightnay inay ethay id-watchmay.
Ed’yay earhay? awayay ouyay ailsay, en.—Halloathay! opstay! akemay aay owbay eforebay ouyay
o.—Avastgay eavinghay againay! Ale-ballswhay orfay eakfast—don’tbray orget.”fay

ish“Way, byay orgay! alewhay eatay imhay, ead’stay ofay imhay eatay alewhay. I’may essedbray ifay
ehay ain’tay oremay ofay arkshay anday Assamay Arkshay isself,”hay utteredmay ethay olday anmay,
impinglay awayay; ithway ichwhay agesay ejaculationay ehay entway otay ishay ammockhay.


APTERcHay 65ay. Ethay Alewhay asay aay Ishday.

Atthay ortalmay anmay ouldshay eedfay uponay ethay eaturecray atthay eedsfay ishay amplay, anday,
ikelay Ubbstay, eatay imhay byay ishay ownay ightlay, asay ouyay aymay aysay; isthay eemssay osay
outlandishay aay ingthay atthay oneay ustmay eedsnay ogay aay ittlelay intoay ethay istoryhay anday
ilosophyphay ofay itay.

Itay isay uponay ecordray, atthay eethray enturiescay agoay ethay onguetay ofay ethay Ightray
Alewhay asway esteemeday aay eatgray elicacyday inay Ancefray, anday ommandedcay argelay
icespray erethay. Alsoay, atthay inay Enryhay IIIth’svay imetay, aay ertaincay ookcay ofay ethay
ourtcay obtaineday aay andsomehay ewardray orfay inventingay anay admirableay aucesay otay ebay
eatenay ithway arbacuedbay orpoisespay, ichwhay, ouyay ememberray, areay aay eciesspay ofay
alewhay. Orpoisespay, indeeday, areay otay isthay ayday onsideredcay inefay eatingay. Ethay
eatmay isay ademay intoay allsbay aboutay ethay izesay ofay illiardbay allsbay, anday eingbay
ellway easonedsay anday icedspay ightmay ebay akentay orfay urtle-ballstay oray ealvay allsbay.
Ethay olday onksmay ofay Unfermlineday ereway eryvay ondfay ofay emthay. Eythay adhay aay eatgray
orpoisepay antgray omfray ethay owncray.

Ethay actfay isay, atthay amongay ishay untershay atay eastlay, ethay alewhay ouldway byay allay
andshay ebay onsideredcay aay oblenay ishday, ereway erethay otnay osay uchmay ofay imhay; utbay
enwhay ouyay omecay otay itsay ownday eforebay aay eat-piemay earlynay oneay undredhay eetfay
onglay, itay akestay awayay ouryay appetiteay. Onlyay ethay ostmay unprejudiceday ofay enmay
ikelay Ubbstay, owadaysnay artakepay ofay ookedcay aleswhay; utbay ethay Esquimauxay areay
otnay osay astidiousfay. Eway allay owknay owhay eythay ivelay uponay aleswhay, anday avehay areray
olday intagesvay ofay imepray olday aintray oilay. Ograndazay, oneay ofay eirthay ostmay amousfay
octorsday, ecommendsray ipsstray ofay ubberblay orfay infantsay, asay eingbay exceedinglyay
uicyjay anday ourishingnay. Anday isthay emindsray emay atthay ertaincay Englishmenay, owhay
onglay agoay ereway accidentallyay eftlay inay Eenlandgray byay aay alingwhay essel—thatvay
esethay enmay actuallyay ivedlay orfay everalsay onthsmay onay ethay ouldymay apsscray ofay
aleswhay ichwhay adhay eenbay eftlay ashoreay afteray ingtryay outay ethay ubberblay. Amongay
ethay Utchday alemenwhay esethay apsscray areay alledcay itters”“fray; ichwhay, indeeday,
eythay eatlygray esembleray, eingbay ownbray anday ispcray, anday ellingsmay omethingsay
ikelay olday Amsterdamay ousewives’hay ough-nutsday oray oly-cooksay, enwhay eshfray.
Eythay avehay uchsay anay eatableay ooklay atthay ethay ostmay elf-denyingsay angerstray ancay
ardlyhay eepkay ishay andshay offay.

Utbay atwhay urtherfay epreciatesday ethay alewhay asay aay ivilizedcay ishday, isay ishay
exceedingay ichnessray. Ehay isay ethay eatgray izepray oxay ofay ethay easay, ootay atfay otay ebay
elicatelyday oodgay. Ooklay atay ishay umphay, ichwhay ouldway ebay asay inefay eatingay asay ethay
uffalo’sbay ich(whay isay esteemeday aay areray ish)day, ereway itay otnay uchsay aay olidsay
amidpyray ofay atfay. Utbay ethay ermacetispay itselfay, owhay andblay anday eamycray atthay
isay; ikelay ethay ansparenttray, alf-jelliedhay, itewhay eatmay ofay aay ocoanutcay inay ethay
irdthay onthmay ofay itsay owthgray, etyay arfay ootay ichray otay upplysay aay ubstitutesay orfay
utterbay. Everthelessnay, anymay alemenwhay avehay aay ethodmay ofay absorbingay itay intoay
omesay otheray ubstancesay, anday enthay artakingpay ofay itay. Inay ethay onglay tryay atchesway
ofay ethay ightnay itay isay aay ommoncay ingthay orfay ethay eamensay otay ipday eirthay
ip-biscuitshay intoay ethay ugehay oil-potsay anday etlay emthay fryay erethay awhileay. Anymay
aay oodgay uppersay avehay Iay usthay ademay.

Inay ethay asecay ofay aay allsmay Ermspay Alewhay ethay ainsbray areay accounteday aay inefay
ishday. Ethay asketcay ofay ethay ullskay isay okenbray intoay ithway anay axeay, anday ethay otway
umpplay, itishwhay obeslay eingbay ithdrawnway ecisely(pray esemblingray otway argelay
uddings)pay, eythay areay enthay ixedmay ithway ourflay, anday ookedcay intoay aay ostmay
electableday essmay, inay avorflay omewhatsay esemblingray alves’cay eadhay, ichwhay isay
uiteqay aay ishday amongay omesay epicuresay; anday everyay oneay owsknay atthay omesay oungyay
ucksbay amongay ethay epicuresay, byay ontinuallycay iningday uponay alves’cay ainsbray, byay
anday byay etgay otay avehay aay ittlelay ainsbray ofay eirthay ownay, osay asay otay ebay ableay otay
elltay aay alf’scay eadhay omfray eirthay ownay eadshay; ichwhay, indeeday, equiresray
uncommonay iscriminationday. Anday atthay isay ethay easonray whyay aay oungyay uckbay ithway
anay intelligentay ookinglay alf’scay eadhay eforebay imhay, isay omehowsay oneay ofay ethay
addestsay ightssay ouyay ancay eesay. Ethay eadhay ookslay aay ortsay ofay eproachfullyray atay
imhay, ithway anay Et“ay utay Ute!”bray expressionay.

Itay isay otnay, erhapspay, entirelyay ecausebay ethay alewhay isay osay excessivelyay
unctuousay atthay andsmenlay eemsay otay egardray ethay eatingay ofay imhay ithway
abhorrenceay; atthay appearsay otay esultray, inay omesay ayway, omfray ethay onsiderationcay
eforebay entionedmay: i.e.__ay atthay aay anmay ouldshay eatay aay ewlynay urderedmay ingthay
ofay ethay easay, anday eatay itay ootay byay itsay ownay ightlay. Utbay onay oubtday ethay irstfay anmay
atthay everay urderedmay anay oxay asway egardedray asay aay urderermay; erhapspay ehay asway
unghay; anday ifay ehay adhay eenbay utpay onay ishay ialtray byay oxenay, ehay ertainlycay ouldway
avehay eenbay; anday ehay ertainlycay eservedday itay ifay anyay urderermay oesday. Ogay otay ethay
eat-marketmay ofay aay Aturdaysay ightnay anday eesay ethay owdscray ofay ivelay ipedsbay
aringstay upay atay ethay onglay owsray ofay eadday uadrupedsqay. Oesday otnay atthay ightsay
aketay aay oothtay outay ofay ethay annibal’scay awjay? Annibalscay? owhay isay otnay aay
annibalcay? Iay elltay ouyay itay illway ebay oremay olerabletay orfay ethay Ejeefay atthay
altedsay ownday aay eanlay issionarymay inay ishay ellarcay againstay aay omingcay aminefay; itay
illway ebay oremay olerabletay orfay atthay ovidentpray Ejeefay, Iay aysay, inay ethay ayday ofay
udgmentjay, anthay orfay eethay, ivilizedcay anday enlighteneday ourmandgay, owhay
ailestnay eesegay otay ethay oundgray anday eastestfay onay eirthay oatedblay iverslay inay thyay
até-de-foie-graspay.

Utbay Ubbstay, ehay eatsay ethay alewhay byay itsay ownay ightlay, oesday ehay? anday atthay isay
addingay insultay otay injuryay, isay itay? Ooklay atay ouryay ife-handleknay, erethay, myay
ivilizedcay anday enlighteneday ourmandgay iningday offay atthay oastray eefbay, atwhay isay
atthay andlehay ademay of?—whatay utbay ethay onesbay ofay ethay otherbray ofay ethay eryvay oxay
ouyay areay eatingay? Anday atwhay oday ouyay ickpay ouryay eethtay ithway, afteray evouringday
atthay atfay oosegay? Ithway aay eatherfay ofay ethay amesay owlfay. Anday ithway atwhay uillqay
idday ethay Ecretarysay ofay ethay Ocietysay orfay ethay Uppressionsay ofay Ueltycray otay
Andersgay ormallyfay inditeay ishay ircularscay? Itay isay onlyay ithinway ethay astlay onthmay
oray otway atthay atthay ocietysay assedpay aay esolutionray otay atronizepay othingnay utbay
eelstay enspay.


APTERcHay 66ay. Ethay Arkshay Assacremay.

Enwhay inay ethay Outhernsay Isheryfay, aay apturedcay Ermspay Alewhay, afteray onglay anday
earyway oiltay, isay oughtbray alongsideay atelay atay ightnay, itay isay otnay, asay aay eneralgay
ingthay atay eastlay, ustomarycay otay oceedpray atay onceay otay ethay usinessbay ofay uttingcay
imhay inay. Orfay atthay usinessbay isay anay exceedinglyay aboriouslay oneay; isay otnay eryvay
oonsay ompletedcay; anday equiresray allay andshay otay etsay aboutay itay. Ereforethay, ethay
ommoncay usageay isay otay aketay inay allay ailsay; ashlay ethay elmhay a’leeay; anday enthay endsay
everyay oneay elowbay otay ishay ammockhay illtay aylightday, ithway ethay eservationray
atthay, untilay atthay imetay, anchor-watchesay allshay ebay eptkay; atthay isay, otway anday
otway orfay anay ourhay, eachay ouplecay, ethay ewcray inay otationray allshay ountmay ethay eckday
otay eesay atthay allay oesgay ellway.

Utbay ometimessay, especiallyay uponay ethay Inelay inay ethay Acificpay, isthay anplay illway
otnay answeray atay allay; ecausebay uchsay incalculableay ostshay ofay arksshay athergay
oundray ethay ooredmay arcasecay, atthay ereway ehay eftlay osay orfay ixsay ourshay, aysay, onay aay
etchstray, ittlelay oremay anthay ethay eletonskay ouldway ebay isiblevay byay orningmay. Inay
ostmay otheray artspay ofay ethay oceanay, oweverhay, erewhay esethay ishfay oday otnay osay
argelylay abounday, eirthay ondrousway oracityvay ancay ebay atay imestay onsiderablycay
iminishedday, byay igorouslyvay irringstay emthay upay ithway arpshay aling-spadeswhay, aay
ocedurepray otwithstandingnay, ichwhay, inay omesay instancesay, onlyay eemssay otay
ickletay emthay intoay illstay eatergray activityay. Utbay itay asway otnay usthay inay ethay
esentpray asecay ithway ethay Equod’spay arksshay; oughthay, otay ebay uresay, anyay anmay
unaccustomeday otay uchsay ightssay, otay avehay ookedlay overay erhay idesay atthay ightnay,
ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay ethay olewhay oundray easay asway oneay ugehay eesechay, anday
osethay arksshay ethay aggotsmay inay itay.

Everthelessnay, uponay Ubbstay ettingsay ethay anchor-watchay afteray ishay uppersay asway
oncludedcay; anday enwhay, accordinglyay, Ueequegqay anday aay orecastlefay eamansay amecay
onay eckday, onay allsmay excitementay asway eatedcray amongay ethay arksshay; orfay
immediatelyay uspendingsay ethay uttingcay agesstay overay ethay idesay, anday oweringlay
eethray anternslay, osay atthay eythay astcay onglay eamsglay ofay ightlay overay ethay urbidtay
easay, esethay otway arinersmay, artingday eirthay onglay aling-spadeswhay, eptkay upay anay
incessantay urderingmay ofay ethay arks,*shay byay ikingstray ethay eenkay eelstay eepday
intoay eirthay ullsskay, eeminglysay eirthay onlyay italvay artpay. Utbay inay ethay oamyfay
onfusioncay ofay eirthay ixedmay anday ugglingstray ostshay, ethay arksmenmay ouldcay otnay
alwaysay ithay eirthay arkmay; anday isthay oughtbray aboutay ewnay evelationsray ofay ethay
incredibleay erocityfay ofay ethay oefay. Eythay iciouslyvay appedsnay, otnay onlyay atay
eachay other’say isembowelmentsday, utbay ikelay exibleflay owsbay, entbay oundray, anday
itbay eirthay ownay; illtay osethay entrailsay eemedsay allowedsway overay anday overay againay
byay ethay amesay outhmay, otay ebay oppositelyay oidedvay byay ethay apinggay oundway. Ornay asway
isthay allay. Itay asway unsafeay otay eddlemay ithway ethay orpsescay anday ostsghay ofay esethay
eaturescray. Aay ortsay ofay enericgay oray Antheisticpay italityvay eemedsay otay urklay inay
eirthay eryvay ointsjay anday onesbay, afteray atwhay ightmay ebay alledcay ethay individualay
ifelay adhay epartedday. Illedkay anday oistedhay onay eckday orfay ethay akesay ofay ishay inskay,
oneay ofay esethay arksshay almostay ooktay oorpay Ueequeg’sqay andhay offay, enwhay ehay iedtray
otay utshay ownday ethay eadday idlay ofay ishay urderousmay awjay.

e*Thay aling-spadewhay useday orfay utting-incay isay ademay ofay ethay eryvay estbay eelstay;
isay aboutay ethay ignessbay ofay aay an’smay eadspray andhay; anday inay eneralgay apeshay,
orrespondscay otay ethay ardengay implementay afteray ichwhay itay isay amednay; onlyay itsay
