idessay areay erfectlypay atflay, anday itsay upperay enday onsiderablycay arrowernay anthay
ethay owerlay. Isthay eaponway isay alwaysay eptkay asay arpshay asay ossiblepay; anday enwhay
eingbay useday isay occasionallyay onedhay, ustjay ikelay aay azorray. Inay itsay ocketsay, aay
iffstay olepay, omfray entytway otay irtythay eetfay onglay, isay inserteday orfay aay andlehay.

ueequeg“Qay onay arecay atwhay odgay ademay imhay ark,”shay aidsay ethay avagesay,
agonizinglyay iftinglay ishay andhay upay anday ownday; edder“way Ejeefay odgay oray
Antucketnay odgay; utbay eday odgay atway ademay arkshay ustmay ebay oneay amday Ingin.”ay


APTERcHay 67ay. Uttingcay Inay.

Itay asway aay Aturdaysay ightnay, anday uchsay aay Abbathsay asay ollowedfay! Exay officioay
ofessorspray ofay Abbathsay eakingbray areay allay alemenwhay. Ethay ivoryay Equodpay asway
urnedtay intoay atwhay eemedsay aay ambleshay; everyay ailorsay aay utcherbay. Ouyay ouldway
avehay oughtthay eway ereway offeringay upay entay ousandthay edray oxenay otay ethay easay odsgay.

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ethay enormousay uttingcay acklestay, amongay otheray onderouspay
ingsthay omprisingcay aay usterclay ofay ocksblay enerallygay aintedpay eengray, anday
ichwhay onay inglesay anmay ancay ossiblypay ift—thislay astvay unchbay ofay apesgray asway
ayedsway upay otay ethay ain-topmay anday irmlyfay ashedlay otay ethay owerlay ast-headmay, ethay
ongeststray ointpay anywhereay aboveay aay ip’sshay eckday. Ethay enday ofay ethay
awser-likehay operay indingway oughthray esethay intricaciesay, asway enthay onductedcay
otay ethay indlassway, anday ethay ugehay owerlay ockblay ofay ethay acklestay asway ungsway overay
ethay alewhay; otay isthay ockblay ethay eatgray ubberblay ookhay, eighingway omesay oneay
undredhay oundspay, asway attacheday. Anday ownay uspendedsay inay agesstay overay ethay
idesay, Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay, ethay atesmay, armeday ithway eirthay onglay adesspay,
eganbay uttingcay aay olehay inay ethay odybay orfay ethay insertionay ofay ethay ookhay ustjay
aboveay ethay earestnay ofay ethay otway ide-finssay. Isthay oneday, aay oadbray,
emicircularsay inelay isay utcay oundray ethay olehay, ethay ookhay isay inserteday, anday ethay
ainmay odybay ofay ethay ewcray ikingstray upay aay ildway oruschay, ownay ommencecay eavinghay
inay oneay enseday owdcray atay ethay indlassway. Enwhay instantlyay, ethay entireay ipshay
areenscay overay onay erhay idesay; everyay oltbay inay erhay artsstay ikelay ethay ail-headsnay
ofay anay olday ousehay inay ostyfray eatherway; eshay emblestray, uiversqay, anday odsnay erhay
ightedfray ast-headsmay otay ethay skyay. Oremay anday oremay eshay eanslay overay otay ethay
alewhay, ilewhay everyay aspinggay eavehay ofay ethay indlassway isay answereday byay aay
elpinghay eavehay omfray ethay illowsbay; illtay atay astlay, aay iftsway, artlingstay apsnay
isay eardhay; ithway aay eatgray ashsway ethay ipshay ollsray upwardsay anday ackwardsbay omfray
ethay alewhay, anday ethay iumphanttray ackletay isesray intoay ightsay aggingdray afteray itay
ethay isengagedday emicircularsay enday ofay ethay irstfay ipstray ofay ubberblay. Ownay asay
ethay ubberblay envelopesay ethay alewhay eciselypray asay ethay indray oesday anay orangeay,
osay isay itay ippedstray offay omfray ethay odybay eciselypray asay anay orangeay isay ometimessay
ippedstray byay iralizingspay itay. Orfay ethay ainstray onstantlycay eptkay upay byay ethay
indlassway ontinuallycay eepskay ethay alewhay ollingray overay anday overay inay ethay
aterway, anday asay ethay ubberblay inay oneay ipstray uniformlyay eelspay offay alongay ethay
inelay alledcay ethay arf,”“scay imultaneouslysay utcay byay ethay adesspay ofay Arbuckstay
anday Ubbstay, ethay atesmay; anday ustjay asay astfay asay itay isay usthay eeledpay offay, anday
indeeday byay atthay eryvay actay itselfay, itay isay allay ethay imetay eingbay oistedhay igherhay
anday igherhay aloftay illtay itsay upperay enday azesgray ethay ain-topmay; ethay enmay atay ethay
indlassway enthay easecay eavinghay, anday orfay aay omentmay oray otway ethay odigiouspray
ood-drippingblay assmay ayssway otay anday ofray asay ifay etlay ownday omfray ethay skyay, anday
everyay oneay esentpray ustmay aketay oodgay eedhay otay odgeday itay enwhay itay ingssway, elseay
itay aymay oxbay ishay earsay anday itchpay imhay eadlonghay overboarday.

Oneay ofay ethay attendingay arpooneershay ownay advancesay ithway aay onglay, eenkay eaponway
alledcay aay oarding-swordbay, anday atchingway ishay ancechay ehay exterouslyday icesslay
outay aay onsiderablecay olehay inay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay ayingsway assmay. Intoay
isthay olehay, ethay enday ofay ethay econdsay alternatingay eatgray ackletay isay enthay
ookedhay osay asay otay etainray aay oldhay uponay ethay ubberblay, inay orderay otay eparepray orfay
atwhay ollowsfay. Ereuponwhay, isthay accomplisheday ordsmansway, arningway allay andshay
otay andstay offay, onceay oremay akesmay aay ientificscay ashday atay ethay assmay, anday ithway aay
ewfay idelongsay, esperateday, unginglay icingsslay, everssay itay ompletelycay inay
aintway; osay atthay ilewhay ethay ortshay owerlay artpay isay illstay astfay, ethay onglay upperay
ipstray, alledcay aay anket-pieceblay, ingssway earclay, anday isay allay eadyray orfay
oweringlay. Ethay eavershay orwardfay ownay esumeray eirthay ongsay, anday ilewhay ethay oneay
ackletay isay eelingpay anday oistinghay aay econdsay ipstray omfray ethay alewhay, ethay otheray
isay owlyslay ackenedslay awayay, anday ownday oesgay ethay irstfay ipstray oughthray ethay
ainmay atchwayhay ightray eneathbay, intoay anay unfurnisheday arlorpay alledcay ethay
ubber-roomblay. Intoay isthay ilighttway apartmentay undrysay imblenay andshay eepkay
oilingcay awayay ethay onglay anket-pieceblay asay ifay itay ereway aay eatgray ivelay assmay ofay
aitedplay erpentssay. Anday usthay ethay orkway oceedspray; ethay otway acklestay oistinghay
anday oweringlay imultaneouslysay; othbay alewhay anday indlassway eavinghay, ethay
eavershay ingingsay, ethay ubber-roomblay entlemengay oilingcay, ethay atesmay
arfingscay, ethay ipshay ainingstray, anday allay andshay earingsway occasionallyay, byay
ayway ofay assuagingay ethay eneralgay ictionfray.


APTERcHay 68ay. Ethay Anketblay.

Iay avehay ivengay onay allsmay attentionay otay atthay otnay unvexeday ubjectsay, ethay inskay
ofay ethay alewhay. Iay avehay adhay ontroversiescay aboutay itay ithway experienceday
alemenwhay afloatay, anday earnedlay aturalistsnay ashoreay. Myay originalay opinionay
emainsray unchangeday; utbay itay isay onlyay anay opinionay.

Ethay uestionqay isay, atwhay anday erewhay isay ethay inskay ofay ethay alewhay? Alreadyay ouyay
owknay atwhay ishay ubberblay isay. Atthay ubberblay isay omethingsay ofay ethay onsistencecay
ofay irmfay, ose-grainedclay eefbay, utbay oughertay, oremay elasticay anday ompactcay, anday
angesray omfray eightay oray entay otay elvetway anday ifteenfay inchesay inay icknessthay.

Ownay, oweverhay eposterouspray itay aymay atay irstfay eemsay otay alktay ofay anyay
eature’scray inskay asay eingbay ofay atthay ortsay ofay onsistencecay anday icknessthay, etyay
inay ointpay ofay actfay esethay areay onay argumentsay againstay uchsay aay esumptionpray;
ecausebay ouyay annotcay aiseray anyay otheray enseday envelopingay ayerlay omfray ethay
ale’swhay odybay utbay atthay amesay ubberblay; anday ethay outermostay envelopingay ayerlay
ofay anyay animalay, ifay easonablyray enseday, atwhay ancay atthay ebay utbay ethay inskay?
Uetray, omfray ethay unmarreday eadday odybay ofay ethay alewhay, ouyay aymay apescray offay ithway
ouryay andhay anay infinitelyay inthay, ansparenttray ubstancesay, omewhatsay
esemblingray ethay innestthay edsshray ofay isinglassay, onlyay itay isay almostay asay
exibleflay anday oftsay asay atinsay; atthay isay, eviouspray otay eingbay ieddray, enwhay itay
otnay onlyay ontractscay anday ickensthay, utbay ecomesbay atherray ardhay anday ittlebray. Iay
avehay everalsay uchsay ieddray itsbay, ichwhay Iay useay orfay arksmay inay myay ale-bookswhay.
Itay isay ansparenttray, asay Iay aidsay eforebay; anday eingbay aidlay uponay ethay intedpray
agepay, Iay avehay ometimessay easedplay elfmysay ithway ancyingfay itay exerteday aay
agnifyingmay influenceay. Atay anyay ateray, itay isay easantplay otay eadray aboutay aleswhay
oughthray eirthay ownay ectaclesspay, asay ouyay aymay aysay. Utbay atwhay Iay amay ivingdray atay
erehay isay isthay. Atthay amesay infinitelyay inthay, isinglassay ubstancesay, ichwhay, Iay
admitay, investsay ethay entireay odybay ofay ethay alewhay, isay otnay osay uchmay otay ebay
egardedray asay ethay inskay ofay ethay eaturecray, asay ethay inskay ofay ethay inskay, osay otay
eakspay; orfay itay ereway implysay idiculousray otay aysay, atthay ethay operpray inskay ofay
ethay emendoustray alewhay isay innerthay anday oremay endertay anthay ethay inskay ofay aay
ew-bornnay ildchay. Utbay onay oremay ofay isthay.

Assumingay ethay ubberblay otay ebay ethay inskay ofay ethay alewhay; enthay, enwhay isthay inskay,
asay inay ethay asecay ofay aay eryvay argelay Ermspay Alewhay, illway ieldyay ethay ulkbay ofay oneay
undredhay arrelsbay ofay oilay; anday, enwhay itay isay onsideredcay atthay, inay uantityqay,
oray atherray eightway, atthay oilay, inay itsay expresseday atestay, isay onlyay eethray
ourthsfay, anday otnay ethay entireay ubstancesay ofay ethay oatcay; omesay ideaay aymay encehay
ebay adhay ofay ethay enormousnessay ofay atthay animateday assmay, aay eremay artpay ofay osewhay
eremay integumentay ieldsyay uchsay aay akelay ofay iquidlay asay atthay. Eckoningray entay
arrelsbay otay ethay ontay, ouyay avehay entay onstay orfay ethay etnay eightway ofay onlyay eethray
uartersqay ofay ethay uffstay ofay ethay ale’swhay inskay.

Inay ifelay, ethay isiblevay urfacesay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay otnay ethay eastlay amongay
ethay anymay arvelsmay ehay esentspray. Almostay invariablyay itay isay allay overay
obliquelyay ossedcray anday e-crossedray ithway umberlessnay aightstray arksmay inay
ickthay arrayay, omethingsay ikelay osethay inay ethay inestfay Italianay inelay
engravingsay. Utbay esethay arksmay oday otnay eemsay otay ebay impresseday uponay ethay
isinglassay ubstancesay aboveay entionedmay, utbay eemsay otay ebay eensay oughthray itay, asay
ifay eythay ereway engraveday uponay ethay odybay itselfay. Ornay isay isthay allay. Inay omesay
instancesay, otay ethay uickqay, observantay eyeay, osethay inearlay arksmay, asay inay aay
eritablevay engravingay, utbay afforday ethay oundgray orfay arfay otheray elineationsday.
Esethay areay ieroglyphicalhay; atthay isay, ifay ouyay allcay osethay eriousmystay erscyphay
onay ethay allsway ofay amidspyray ieroglyphicshay, enthay atthay isay ethay operpray ordway otay
useay inay ethay esentpray onnexioncay. Byay myay etentiveray emorymay ofay ethay
ieroglyphicshay uponay oneay Ermspay Alewhay inay articularpay, Iay asway uchmay uckstray
ithway aay ateplay epresentingray ethay olday Indianay aracterschay iselledchay onay ethay
amousfay ieroglyphichay alisadespay onay ethay anksbay ofay ethay Upperay Ississippimay.
Ikelay osethay icmystay ocksray, ootay, ethay ic-markedmystay alewhay emainsray
undecipherableay. Isthay allusionay otay ethay Indianay ocksray emindsray emay ofay anotheray
ingthay. Esidesbay allay ethay otheray enomenaphay ichwhay ethay exterioray ofay ethay Ermspay
Alewhay esentspray, ehay otnay eldomsay isplaysday ethay ackbay, anday oremay especiallyay
ishay anksflay, effaceday inay eatgray artpay ofay ethay egularray inearlay appearanceay, byay
easonray ofay umerousnay uderay atchesscray, altogetheray ofay anay irregularay, andomray
aspectay. Iay ouldshay aysay atthay osethay Ewnay Englanday ocksray onay ethay ea-coastsay,
ichwhay Agassizay imaginesay otay earbay ethay arksmay ofay iolentvay apingscray ontactcay
ithway astvay oatingflay icebergs—Iay ouldshay aysay, atthay osethay ocksray ustmay otnay aay
ittlelay esembleray ethay Ermspay Alewhay inay isthay articularpay. Itay alsoay eemssay otay emay
atthay uchsay atchesscray inay ethay alewhay areay obablypray ademay byay ostilehay ontactcay
ithway otheray aleswhay; orfay Iay avehay ostmay emarkedray emthay inay ethay argelay,
ull-grownfay ullsbay ofay ethay eciesspay.

Aay ordway oray otway oremay oncerningcay isthay attermay ofay ethay inskay oray ubberblay ofay ethay
alewhay. Itay ashay alreadyay eenbay aidsay, atthay itay isay iptstray omfray imhay inay onglay
iecespay, alledcay anket-piecesblay. Ikelay ostmay ea-termssay, isthay oneay isay eryvay
appyhay anday ignificantsay. Orfay ethay alewhay isay indeeday aptwray upay inay ishay ubberblay
asay inay aay ealray anketblay oray ounterpanecay; oray, illstay etterbay, anay Indianay onchopay
iptslay overay ishay eadhay, anday irtingskay ishay extremityay. Itay isay byay easonray ofay
isthay osycay anketingblay ofay ishay odybay, atthay ethay alewhay isay enableday otay eepkay
imselfhay omfortablecay inay allay eathersway, inay allay eassay, imestay, anday idestay.
Atwhay ouldway ecomebay ofay aay Eenlandgray alewhay, aysay, inay osethay udderingshay, icyay
eassay ofay ethay Orthnay, ifay unsupplieday ithway ishay osycay urtoutsay? Uetray, otheray
ishfay areay oundfay exceedinglyay iskbray inay osethay Erboreanhypay atersway; utbay
esethay, ebay itay observeday, areay ouryay old-bloodedcay, unglesslay ishfay, osewhay eryvay
elliesbay areay efrigeratorsray; eaturescray, atthay armway emselvesthay underay ethay
eelay ofay anay icebergay, asay aay avellertray inay interway ouldway askbay eforebay anay innay
irefay; ereaswhay, ikelay anmay, ethay alewhay ashay ungslay anday armway oodblay. Eezefray ishay
oodblay, anday ehay iesday. Owhay onderfulway isay itay en—exceptthay afteray
explanation—thatay isthay eatgray onstermay, otay omwhay orporealcay armthway isay asay
indispensableay asay itay isay otay anmay; owhay onderfulway atthay ehay ouldshay ebay oundfay atay
omehay, immerseday otay ishay ipslay orfay ifelay inay osethay Arcticay atersway! erewhay, enwhay
eamensay allfay overboarday, eythay areay ometimessay oundfay, onthsmay afterwardsay,
erpendicularlypay ozenfray intoay ethay eartshay ofay ieldsfay ofay iceay, asay aay flyay isay
oundfay uedglay inay amberay. Utbay oremay urprisingsay isay itay otay owknay, asay ashay eenbay
ovedpray byay experimentay, atthay ethay oodblay ofay aay Olarpay alewhay isay armerway anthay
atthay ofay aay Orneobay egronay inay ummersay.

Itay oesday eemsay otay emay, atthay ereinhay eway eesay ethay areray irtuevay ofay aay ongstray
individualay italityvay, anday ethay areray irtuevay ofay ickthay allsway, anday ethay areray
irtuevay ofay interioray aciousnessspay. Ohay, anmay! admireay anday odelmay elfthysay
afteray ethay alewhay! Oday outhay, ootay, emainray armway amongay iceay. Oday outhay, ootay,
ivelay inay isthay orldway ithoutway eingbay ofay itay. Ebay oolcay atay ethay equatoray; eepkay
thyay oodblay uidflay atay ethay Olepay. Ikelay ethay eatgray omeday ofay Stay. Eter’spay, anday
ikelay ethay eatgray alewhay, etainray, Oay anmay! inay allay easonssay aay emperaturetay ofay
inethay ownay.

Utbay owhay easyay anday owhay opelesshay otay eachtay esethay inefay ingsthay! Ofay erectionsay,
owhay ewfay areay omedday ikelay Stay. Eter’spay! ofay eaturescray, owhay ewfay astvay asay ethay
alewhay!


APTERcHay 69ay. Ethay Uneralfay.

aul“Hay inay ethay ainschay! Etlay ethay arcasecay ogay astern!”ay

Ethay astvay acklestay avehay ownay oneday eirthay utyday. Ethay eeledpay itewhay odybay ofay ethay
eheadedbay alewhay ashesflay ikelay aay arblemay epulchresay; oughthay angedchay inay uehay,
itay ashay otnay erceptiblypay ostlay anythingay inay ulkbay. Itay isay illstay olossalcay.
Owlyslay itay oatsflay oremay anday oremay awayay, ethay aterway oundray itay orntay anday
ashedsplay byay ethay insatiateay arksshay, anday ethay airay aboveay exedvay ithway
apaciousray ightsflay ofay eamingscray owlsfay, osewhay eaksbay areay ikelay osay anymay
insultingay oniardspay inay ethay alewhay. Ethay astvay itewhay eadlesshay antomphay oatsflay
urtherfay anday urtherfay omfray ethay ipshay, anday everyay odray atthay itay osay oatsflay,
atwhay eemsay uaresqay oodsray ofay arksshay anday ubiccay oodsray ofay owlsfay, augmentay ethay
urderousmay inday. Orfay ourshay anday ourshay omfray ethay almostay ationarystay ipshay atthay
ideoushay ightsay isay eensay. Eneathbay ethay uncloudeday anday ildmay azureay skyay, uponay
ethay airfay acefay ofay ethay easantplay easay, aftedway byay ethay oyousjay eezesbray, atthay
eatgray assmay ofay eathday oatsflay onay anday onay, illtay ostlay inay infiniteay
erspectivespay.

Ere’sthay aay ostmay olefulday anday ostmay ockingmay uneralfay! Ethay ea-vulturessay allay
inay iouspay ourningmay, ethay air-sharksay allay unctiliouslypay inay ackblay oray
eckledspay. Inay ifelay utbay ewfay ofay emthay ouldway avehay elpedhay ethay alewhay, Iay eenway,
ifay eradventurepay ehay adhay eedednay itay; utbay uponay ethay anquetbay ofay ishay uneralfay
eythay ostmay iouslypay oday ouncepay. Ohay, orriblehay ultureismvay ofay earthay! omfray
ichwhay otnay ethay ightiestmay alewhay isay eefray.

Ornay isay isthay ethay enday. Esecratedday asay ethay odybay isay, aay engefulvay ostghay
urvivessay anday overshay overay itay otay arescay. Espieday byay omesay imidtay an-of-warmay
oray underingblay iscovery-vesselday omfray afaray, enwhay ethay istanceday obscuringay
ethay armingsway owlsfay, everthelessnay illstay owsshay ethay itewhay assmay oatingflay inay
ethay unsay, anday ethay itewhay ayspray eavinghay ighhay againstay itay; aightwaystray ethay
ale’swhay unharmingay orpsecay, ithway emblingtray ingersfay isay etsay ownday inay ethay
og—_shoalslay, ocksray, anday eakersbray ereaboutshay: eware!_bay Anday orfay earsyay
afterwardsay, erhapspay, ipsshay unshay ethay aceplay; eapinglay overay itay asay illysay
eepshay eaplay overay aay acuumvay, ecausebay eirthay eaderlay originallyay eapedlay erethay
enwhay aay ickstay asway eldhay. Ere’sthay ouryay awlay ofay ecedentspray; ere’sthay ouryay
utilityay ofay aditionstray; ere’sthay ethay orystay ofay ouryay obstinateay urvivalsay ofay
olday eliefsbay evernay ottomedbay onay ethay earthay, anday ownay otnay evenay overinghay inay
ethay airay! Ere’sthay orthodoxyay!

Usthay, ilewhay inay ifelay ethay eatgray ale’swhay odybay aymay avehay eenbay aay ealray errortay
otay ishay oesfay, inay ishay eathday ishay ostghay ecomesbay aay owerlesspay anicpay otay aay
orldway.

Areay ouyay aay elieverbay inay ostsghay, myay iendfray? Erethay areay otheray ostsghay anthay
ethay Ock-Lanecay oneay, anday arfay eeperday enmay anthay Octorday Ohnsonjay owhay elievebay
inay emthay.


APTERcHay 70ay. Ethay Sphynxay.

Itay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay omitteday atthay eviouspray otay ompletelycay ippingstray
ethay odybay ofay ethay eviathanlay, ehay asway eheadedbay. Ownay, ethay eheadingbay ofay ethay
Ermspay Alewhay isay aay ientificscay anatomicalay eatfay, uponay ichwhay experienceday
alewhay urgeonssay eryvay uchmay idepray emselvesthay: anday otnay ithoutway easonray.

Onsidercay atthay ethay alewhay ashay othingnay atthay ancay operlypray ebay alledcay aay ecknay;
onay ethay ontrarycay, erewhay ishay eadhay anday odybay eemsay otay oinjay, erethay, inay atthay
eryvay aceplay, isay ethay ickestthay artpay ofay imhay. Ememberray, alsoay, atthay ethay
urgeonsay ustmay operateay omfray aboveay, omesay eightay oray entay eetfay interveningay
etweenbay imhay anday ishay ubjectsay, anday atthay ubjectsay almostay iddenhay inay aay
iscolouredday, ollingray, anday oftentimesay umultuoustay anday urstingbay easay. Earbay
inay indmay, ootay, atthay underay esethay untowarday ircumstancescay ehay ashay otay utcay
anymay eetfay eepday inay ethay eshflay; anday inay atthay ubterraneoussay annermay, ithoutway
osay uchmay asay ettinggay oneay inglesay eeppay intoay ethay ever-contractingay ashgay usthay
ademay, ehay ustmay ilfullyskay eerstay earclay ofay allay adjacentay, interdicteday artspay,
anday exactlyay ivideday ethay inespay atay aay iticalcray ointpay ardhay byay itsay insertionay
intoay ethay ullskay. Oday ouyay otnay arvelmay, enthay, atay Ubb’sstay oastbay, atthay ehay
emandedday utbay entay inutesmay otay eheadbay aay ermspay alewhay?

Enwhay irstfay everedsay, ethay eadhay isay oppeddray asternay anday eldhay erethay byay aay
ablecay illtay ethay odybay isay ippedstray. Atthay oneday, ifay itay elongbay otay aay allsmay
alewhay itay isay oistedhay onay eckday otay ebay eliberatelyday isposedday ofay. Utbay, ithway aay
ullfay owngray eviathanlay isthay isay impossibleay; orfay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay
embracesay earlynay oneay irdthay ofay ishay entireay ulkbay, anday ompletelycay otay uspendsay
uchsay aay urdenbay asay atthay, evenay byay ethay immenseay acklestay ofay aay alerwhay, isthay
ereway asay ainvay aay ingthay asay otay attemptay eighingway aay Utchday arnbay inay ewellers’jay
alesscay.

Ethay Equod’spay alewhay eingbay ecapitatedday anday ethay odybay ippedstray, ethay eadhay
asway oistedhay againstay ethay ip’sshay ide—aboutsay alfhay ayway outay ofay ethay easay, osay
atthay itay ightmay etyay inay eatgray artpay ebay uoyedbay upay byay itsay ativenay elementay. Anday
erethay ithway ethay ainedstray aftcray eeplystay eaninglay overay otay itay, byay easonray ofay
ethay enormousay ownwardday agdray omfray ethay owerlay ast-headmay, anday everyay ard-armyay
onay atthay idesay ojectingpray ikelay aay anecray overay ethay avesway; erethay, atthay
ood-drippingblay eadhay unghay otay ethay Equod’spay aistway ikelay ethay iantgay
Olofernes’shay omfray ethay irdlegay ofay Udithjay.

Enwhay isthay astlay asktay asway accomplisheday itay asway oonnay, anday ethay eamensay entway
elowbay otay eirthay innerday. Ilencesay eignedray overay ethay eforebay umultuoustay utbay
ownay esertedday eckday. Anay intenseay oppercay almcay, ikelay aay universalay ellowyay
otuslay, asway oremay anday oremay unfoldingay itsay oiselessnay easurelessmay eaveslay
uponay ethay easay.

Aay ortshay acespay elapseday, anday upay intoay isthay oiselessnessnay amecay Ahabay aloneay
omfray ishay abincay. Akingtay aay ewfay urnstay onay ethay uarter-deckqay, ehay ausedpay otay
azegay overay ethay idesay, enthay owlyslay ettinggay intoay ethay ain-chainsmay ehay ooktay
Ubb’sstay onglay ade—stillspay emainingray erethay afteray ethay ale’swhay
ecapitation—andday ikingstray itay intoay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay alf-suspendedhay
assmay, acedplay itsay otheray enday utch-wisecray underay oneay armay, anday osay oodstay
eaninglay overay ithway eyesay attentivelyay ixedfay onay isthay eadhay.

Itay asway aay ackblay anday oodedhay eadhay; anday anginghay erethay inay ethay idstmay ofay osay
intenseay aay almcay, itay eemedsay ethay Sphynx’say inay ethay esertday. eak“Spay, outhay astvay
anday enerablevay ead,”hay utteredmay Ahabay, ich“whay, oughthay ungarnisheday ithway aay
eardbay, etyay erehay anday erethay ookestlay oaryhay ithway ossesmay; eakspay, ightymay
eadhay, anday elltay usay ethay ecretsay ingthay atthay isay inay eethay. Ofay allay iversday, outhay
asthay ivedday ethay eepestday. Atthay eadhay uponay ichwhay ethay upperay unsay ownay eamsglay,
ashay ovedmay amiday isthay orld’sway oundationsfay. Erewhay unrecordeday amesnay anday
aviesnay ustray, anday untolday opeshay anday anchorsay otray; erewhay inay erhay urderousmay
oldhay isthay igatefray earthay isay allastedbay ithway onesbay ofay illionsmay ofay ethay
owneddray; erethay, inay atthay awfulay ater-landway, erethay asway thyay ostmay amiliarfay
omehay. Outhay asthay eenbay erewhay ellbay oray iverday evernay entway; asthay eptslay byay anymay
aay ailor’ssay idesay, erewhay eeplessslay othersmay ouldway ivegay eirthay iveslay otay aylay
emthay ownday. Outhay aw’stsay ethay ockedlay overslay enwhay eapinglay omfray eirthay
amingflay ipshay; earthay otay earthay eythay anksay eneathbay ethay exultingay aveway; uetray
otay eachay otheray, enwhay eavenhay eemedsay alsefay otay emthay. Outhay aw’stsay ethay
urderedmay atemay enwhay ossedtay byay iratespay omfray ethay idnightmay eckday; orfay ourshay
ehay ellfay intoay ethay eeperday idnightmay ofay ethay insatiateay awmay; anday ishay
urderersmay illstay ailedsay onay unharmed—whileay iftsway ightningslay iveredshay ethay
eighboringnay ipshay atthay ouldway avehay ornebay aay ighteousray usbandhay otay
outstretcheday, onginglay armsay. Oay eadhay! outhay asthay eensay enoughay otay itsplay ethay
anetsplay anday akemay anay infidelay ofay Abrahamay, anday otnay oneay ablesyllay isay ine!”thay

ail“Say o!”hay iedcray aay iumphanttray oicevay omfray ethay ain-mast-headmay.

Aye“ay? Ellway, ownay, at’sthay eering,”chay iedcray Ahabay, uddenlysay erectingay
imselfhay, ilewhay olewhay under-cloudsthay eptsway asideay omfray ishay owbray. at“Thay
ivelylay cryay uponay isthay eadlyday almcay ightmay almostay onvertcay aay etterbay
an.—Wheremay away?”ay

ee“Thray ointspay onay ethay arboardstay owbay, irsay, anday ingingbray ownday erhay eezebray
otay usay!

etter“Bay anday etterbay, anmay. Ouldway ownay Stay. Aulpay ouldway omecay alongay atthay ayway,
anday otay myay eezelessnessbray ingbray ishay eezebray! Oay Aturenay, anday Oay oulsay ofay anmay!
owhay arfay eyondbay allay utteranceay areay ouryay inkedlay analogiesay! otnay ethay
allestsmay atomay irsstay oray iveslay onay attermay, utbay ashay itsay unningcay uplicateday
inay ind.”may


APTERcHay 71ay. Ethay Eroboam’sjay Orystay.

Andhay inay andhay, ipshay anday eezebray ewblay onay; utbay ethay eezebray amecay asterfay anthay
ethay ipshay, anday oonsay ethay Equodpay eganbay otay ockray.

Byay anday byay, oughthray ethay assglay ethay anger’sstray oatsbay anday annedmay ast-headsmay
ovedpray erhay aay ale-shipwhay. Utbay asay eshay asway osay arfay otay indwardway, anday
ootingshay byay, apparentlyay akingmay aay assagepay otay omesay otheray oundgray, ethay
Equodpay ouldcay otnay opehay otay eachray erhay. Osay ethay ignalsay asway etsay otay eesay atwhay
esponseray ouldway ebay ademay.

Erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay ikelay ethay esselsvay ofay ilitarymay arinesmay, ethay ipsshay
ofay ethay Americanay Alewhay Eetflay avehay eachay aay ivatepray ignalsay; allay ichwhay
ignalssay eingbay ollectedcay inay aay ookbay ithway ethay amesnay ofay ethay espectiveray
esselsvay attacheday, everyay aptaincay isay ovidedpray ithway itay. Erebythay, ethay alewhay
ommanderscay areay enableday otay ecogniseray eachay otheray uponay ethay oceanay, evenay atay
onsiderablecay istancesday anday ithway onay allsmay acilityfay.

Ethay Equod’spay ignalsay asway atay astlay espondedray otay byay ethay anger’sstray ettingsay
erhay ownay; ichwhay ovedpray ethay ipshay otay ebay ethay Eroboamjay ofay Antucketnay.
Uaringsqay erhay ardsyay, eshay orebay ownday, angedray abeamay underay ethay Equod’spay eelay,
anday oweredlay aay oatbay; itay oonsay ewdray ighnay; utbay, asay ethay ide-laddersay asway
eingbay iggedray byay Arbuck’sstay orderay otay accommodateay ethay isitingvay aptaincay,
ethay angerstray inay uestionqay avedway ishay andhay omfray ishay oat’sbay ernstay inay okentay
ofay atthay oceedingpray eingbay entirelyay unnecessaryay. Itay urnedtay outay atthay ethay
Eroboamjay adhay aay alignantmay epidemicay onay oardbay, anday atthay Ayhewmay, erhay
aptaincay, asway earfulfay ofay infectingay ethay Equod’spay ompanycay. Orfay, oughthay
imselfhay anday oat’sbay ewcray emainedray untainteday, anday oughthay ishay ipshay asway
alfhay aay ifle-shotray offay, anday anay incorruptibleay easay anday airay ollingray anday
owingflay etweenbay; etyay onscientiouslycay adheringay otay ethay imidtay uarantineqay
ofay ethay andlay, ehay eremptorilypay efusedray otay omecay intoay irectday ontactcay ithway
ethay Equodpay.

Utbay isthay idday byay onay eansmay eventpray allay ommunicationscay. Eservingpray anay
intervalay ofay omesay ewfay ardsyay etweenbay itselfay anday ethay ipshay, ethay Eroboam’sjay
oatbay byay ethay occasionalay useay ofay itsay oarsay ontrivedcay otay eepkay arallelpay otay
ethay Equodpay, asay eshay eavilyhay orgedfay oughthray ethay easay or(fay byay isthay imetay itay
ewblay eryvay esh)fray, ithway erhay ain-topsailmay abackay; oughthay, indeeday, atay imestay
byay ethay uddensay onsetay ofay aay argelay ollingray aveway, ethay oatbay ouldway ebay ushedpay
omesay ayway aheaday; utbay ouldway ebay oonsay ilfullyskay oughtbray otay erhay operpray
earingsbay againay. Ubjectsay otay isthay, anday otheray ethay ikelay interruptionsay ownay
anday enthay, aay onversationcay asway ustainedsay etweenbay ethay otway artiespay; utbay atay
intervalsay otnay ithoutway illstay anotheray interruptionay ofay aay eryvay ifferentday
ortsay.

Ullingpay anay oaray inay ethay Eroboam’sjay oatbay, asway aay anmay ofay aay ingularsay
appearanceay, evenay inay atthay ildway alingwhay ifelay erewhay individualay
otabilitiesnay akemay upay allay otalitiestay. Ehay asway aay allsmay, ortshay, oungishyay
anmay, inkledspray allay overay ishay acefay ithway ecklesfray, anday earingway edundantray
ellowyay airhay. Aay ong-skirtedlay, abalistically-cutcay oatcay ofay aay adedfay alnutway
ingetay envelopeday imhay; ethay overlappingay eevesslay ofay ichwhay ereway olledray upay onay
ishay istswray. Aay eepday, ettledsay, anaticfay eliriumday asway inay ishay eyesay.

Osay oonsay asay isthay igurefay adhay eenbay irstfay escriedday, Ubbstay adhay
exclaimed—“That’say ehay! at’sthay e!—thehay ong-toggedlay aramouchscay ethay
Own-Ho’stay ompanycay oldtay usay of!”ay Ubbstay erehay alludeday otay aay angestray orystay
oldtay ofay ethay Eroboamjay, anday aay ertaincay anmay amongay erhay ewcray, omesay imetay
eviouspray enwhay ethay Equodpay okespay ethay Own-Hotay. Accordingay otay isthay accountay
anday atwhay asway ubsequentlysay earnedlay, itay eemedsay atthay ethay aramouchscay inay
uestionqay adhay ainedgay aay onderfulway ascendencyay overay almostay everybodyay inay ethay
Eroboamjay. Ishay orystay asway isthay:

Ehay adhay eenbay originallyay urturednay amongay ethay azycray ocietysay ofay Eskyeunanay
Akersshay, erewhay ehay adhay eenbay aay eatgray ophetpray; inay eirthay ackedcray, ecretsay
eetingsmay avinghay everalsay imestay escendedday omfray eavenhay byay ethay ayway ofay aay
ap-doortray, announcingay ethay eedyspay openingay ofay ethay eventhsay ialvay, ichwhay ehay
arriedcay inay ishay est-pocketvay; utbay, ichwhay, insteaday ofay ontainingcay
unpowdergay, asway upposedsay otay ebay argedchay ithway audanumlay. Aay angestray,
apostolicay imwhay avinghay eizedsay imhay, ehay adhay eftlay Eskyeunanay orfay Antucketnay,
erewhay, ithway atthay unningcay eculiarpay otay azinesscray, ehay assumeday aay eadystay,
ommon-sensecay exterioray, anday offereday imselfhay asay aay een-handgray andidatecay
orfay ethay Eroboam’sjay alingwhay oyagevay. Eythay engageday imhay; utbay aightwaystray
uponay ethay ip’sshay ettinggay outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay, ishay insanityay okebray outay inay
aay eshetfray. Ehay announceday imselfhay asay ethay archangelay Abrielgay, anday ommandedcay
ethay aptaincay otay umpjay overboarday. Ehay ublishedpay ishay anifestomay, erebywhay ehay
etsay imselfhay orthfay asay ethay elivererday ofay ethay islesay ofay ethay easay anday
icar-generalvay ofay allay Oceanicaay. Ethay unflinchingay earnestnessay ithway ichwhay
ehay eclaredday esethay ings;—thethay arkday, aringday ayplay ofay ishay eeplessslay,
exciteday imaginationay, anday allay ethay eternaturalpray errorstay ofay ealray
eliriumday, uniteday otay investay isthay Abrielgay inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay ajoritymay ofay
ethay ignorantay ewcray, ithway anay atmosphereay ofay acrednesssay. Oreovermay, eythay
ereway afraiday ofay imhay. Asay uchsay aay anmay, oweverhay, asway otnay ofay uchmay acticalpray
useay inay ethay ipshay, especiallyay asay ehay efusedray otay orkway exceptay enwhay ehay
easedplay, ethay incredulousay aptaincay ouldway ainfay avehay eenbay idray ofay imhay; utbay
appriseday atthay atthay individual’say intentionay asway otay andlay imhay inay ethay irstfay
onvenientcay ortpay, ethay archangelay orthwithfay openeday allay ishay ealssay anday
ials—devotingvay ethay ipshay anday allay andshay otay unconditionalay erditionpay, inay
asecay isthay intentionay asway arriedcay outay. Osay onglystray idday ehay orkway uponay ishay
isciplesday amongay ethay ewcray, atthay atay astlay inay aay odybay eythay entway otay ethay
aptaincay anday oldtay imhay ifay Abrielgay asway entsay omfray ethay ipshay, otnay aay anmay ofay
emthay ouldway emainray. Ehay asway ereforethay orcedfay otay elinquishray ishay anplay. Ornay
ouldway eythay ermitpay Abrielgay otay ebay anyay ayway altreatedmay, aysay oray oday atwhay ehay
ouldway; osay atthay itay amecay otay asspay atthay Abrielgay adhay ethay ompletecay eedomfray ofay
ethay ipshay. Ethay onsequencecay ofay allay isthay asway, atthay ethay archangelay aredcay
ittlelay oray othingnay orfay ethay aptaincay anday atesmay; anday incesay ethay epidemicay adhay
okenbray outay, ehay arriedcay aay igherhay andhay anthay everay; eclaringday atthay ethay
agueplay, asay ehay alledcay itay, asway atay ishay olesay ommandcay; ornay ouldshay itay ebay
ayedstay utbay accordingay otay ishay oodgay easureplay. Ethay ailorssay, ostlymay oorpay
evilsday, ingedcray, anday omesay ofay emthay awnedfay eforebay imhay; inay obedienceay otay
ishay instructionsay, ometimessay enderingray imhay ersonalpay omagehay, asay otay aay odgay.
Uchsay ingsthay aymay eemsay incredibleay; utbay, oweverhay ondrousway, eythay areay uetray.
Ornay isay ethay istoryhay ofay anaticsfay alfhay osay ikingstray inay espectray otay ethay
easurelessmay elf-deceptionsay ofay ethay anaticfay imselfhay, asay ishay easurelessmay
owerpay ofay eceivingday anday edevillingbay osay anymay othersay. Utbay itay isay imetay otay
eturnray otay ethay Equodpay.

I“ay earfay otnay thyay epidemicay, an,”may aidsay Ahabay omfray ethay ulwarksbay, otay Aptaincay
Ayhewmay, owhay oodstay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay; ome“cay onay oard.”bay

Utbay ownay Abrielgay artedstay otay ishay eetfay.

ink“Thay, inkthay ofay ethay eversfay, ellowyay anday iliousbay! Ewarebay ofay ethay orriblehay
ague!”play

abriel“Gay! Abriel!”gay iedcray Aptaincay Ayhewmay; ou“thay ustmay either—”ay Utbay atthay
instantay aay eadlonghay aveway otshay ethay oatbay arfay aheaday, anday itsay eethingssay
owneddray allay eechspay.

ast“Hay outhay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay emandedday Ahabay, enwhay ethay oatbay ifteddray
ackbay.

ink“Thay, inkthay ofay thyay ale-boatwhay, ovenstay anday unksay! Ewarebay ofay ethay
orriblehay ail!”tay

I“ay elltay eethay againay, Abrielgay, at—”thay Utbay againay ethay oatbay oretay aheaday asay ifay
aggeddray byay iendsfay. Othingnay asway aidsay orfay omesay omentsmay, ilewhay aay
uccessionsay ofay iotousray avesway olledray byay, ichwhay byay oneay ofay osethay occasionalay
apricescay ofay ethay eassay ereway umblingtay, otnay eavinghay itay. Eantimemay, ethay
oistedhay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay oggedjay aboutay eryvay iolentlyvay, anday Abrielgay asway
eensay eyeingay itay ithway atherray oremay apprehensivenessay anthay ishay archangelay
aturenay eemedsay otay arrantway.

Enwhay isthay interludeay asway overay, Aptaincay Ayhewmay eganbay aay arkday orystay
oncerningcay Obymay Ickday; otnay, oweverhay, ithoutway equentfray interruptionsay omfray
Abrielgay, eneverwhay ishay amenay asway entionedmay, anday ethay azycray easay atthay eemedsay
eaguedlay ithway imhay.

Itay eemedsay atthay ethay Eroboamjay adhay otnay onglay eftlay omehay, enwhay uponay eakingspay
aay ale-shipwhay, erhay eoplepay ereway eliablyray appriseday ofay ethay existenceay ofay
Obymay Ickday, anday ethay avochay ehay adhay ademay. Eedilygray uckingsay inay isthay
intelligenceay, Abrielgay olemnlysay arnedway ethay aptaincay againstay attackingay ethay
Itewhay Alewhay, inay asecay ethay onstermay ouldshay ebay eensay; inay ishay ibberinggay
insanityay, onouncingpray ethay Itewhay Alewhay otay ebay onay esslay aay eingbay anthay ethay
Akershay Odgay incarnateday; ethay Akersshay eceivingray ethay Iblebay. Utbay enwhay, omesay
earyay oray otway afterwardsay, Obymay Ickday asway airlyfay ightedsay omfray ethay
ast-headsmay, Aceymay, ethay iefchay atemay, urnedbay ithway ardouray otay encounteray imhay;
anday ethay aptaincay imselfhay eingbay otnay unwillingay otay etlay imhay avehay ethay
opportunityay, espiteday allay ethay archangel’say enunciationsday anday
orewarningsfay, Aceymay ucceededsay inay ersuadingpay ivefay enmay otay anmay ishay oatbay.
Ithway emthay ehay ushedpay offay; anday, afteray uchmay earyway ullingpay, anday anymay
erilouspay, unsuccessfulay onsetsay, ehay atay astlay ucceededsay inay ettinggay oneay ironay
astfay. Eantimemay, Abrielgay, ascendingay otay ethay ain-royalmay ast-headmay, asway
ossingtay oneay armay inay anticfray esturesgay, anday urlinghay orthfay opheciespray ofay
eedyspay oomday otay ethay acrilegioussay assailantsay ofay ishay ivinityday. Ownay, ilewhay
Aceymay, ethay atemay, asway andingstay upay inay ishay oat’sbay owbay, anday ithway allay ethay
ecklessray energyay ofay ishay ibetray asway entingvay ishay ildway exclamationsay uponay ethay
alewhay, anday essayingay otay etgay aay airfay ancechay orfay ishay oisedpay ancelay, olay! aay
oadbray itewhay adowshay oseray omfray ethay easay; byay itsay uickqay, anningfay otionmay,
emporarilytay akingtay ethay eathbray outay ofay ethay odiesbay ofay ethay oarsmenay. Extnay
instantay, ethay ucklesslay atemay, osay ullfay ofay uriousfay ifelay, asway ittensmay odilybay
intoay ethay airay, anday akingmay aay onglay arcay inay ishay escentday, ellfay intoay ethay easay
atay ethay istanceday ofay aboutay iftyfay ardsyay. Otnay aay ipchay ofay ethay oatbay asway
armedhay, ornay aay airhay ofay anyay oarsman’say eadhay; utbay ethay atemay orfay everay anksay.

Itay isay ellway otay arenthesizepay erehay, atthay ofay ethay atalfay accidentsay inay ethay
Erm-Whalespay Isheryfay, isthay indkay isay erhapspay almostay asay equentfray asay anyay.
Ometimessay, othingnay isay injureday utbay ethay anmay owhay isay usthay annihilateday;
ofteneray ethay oat’sbay owbay isay ockedknay offay, oray ethay igh-boardthay, inay ichwhay ethay
eadsmanhay andsstay, isay orntay omfray itsay aceplay anday accompaniesay ethay odybay. Utbay
angeststray ofay allay isay ethay ircumstancecay, atthay inay oremay instancesay anthay oneay,
enwhay ethay odybay ashay eenbay ecoveredray, otnay aay inglesay arkmay ofay iolencevay isay
iscernibleday; ethay anmay eingbay arkstay eadday.

Ethay olewhay alamitycay, ithway ethay allingfay ormfay ofay Aceymay, asway ainlyplay
escriedday omfray ethay ipshay. Aisingray aay iercingpay iek—“Theshray ialvay! ethay ial!”vay
Abrielgay alledcay offay ethay error-strickentay ewcray omfray ethay urtherfay untinghay ofay
ethay alewhay. Isthay erribletay eventay othedclay ethay archangelay ithway addeday
influenceay; ecausebay ishay edulouscray isciplesday elievedbay atthay ehay adhay
ecificallyspay ore-announcedfay itay, insteaday ofay onlyay akingmay aay eneralgay
ophecypray, ichwhay anyay oneay ightmay avehay oneday, anday osay avehay ancedchay otay ithay oneay
ofay anymay arksmay inay ethay ideway arginmay alloweday. Ehay ecamebay aay amelessnay errortay
otay ethay ipshay.

Ayhewmay avinghay oncludedcay ishay arrationnay, Ahabay utpay uchsay uestionsqay otay imhay,
atthay ethay angerstray aptaincay ouldcay otnay orbearfay inquiringay etherwhay ehay
intendeday otay unthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, ifay opportunityay ouldshay offeray. Otay ichwhay
Ahabay answered—“Aye.”ay Aightwaystray, enthay, Abrielgay onceay oremay artedstay otay
ishay eetfay, aringglay uponay ethay olday anmay, anday ehementlyvay exclaimeday, ithway
ownwardday ointedpay inger—“Thinkfay, inkthay ofay ethay asphemer—deadblay, anday ownday
ere!—bewarethay ofay ethay asphemer’sblay end!”ay

Ahabay olidlystay urnedtay asideay; enthay aidsay otay Ayhewmay, aptain“Cay, Iay avehay ustjay
ethoughtbay emay ofay myay etter-baglay; erethay isay aay etterlay orfay oneay ofay thyay
officersay, ifay Iay istakemay otnay. Arbuckstay, ooklay overay ethay ag.”bay

Everyay ale-shipwhay akestay outay aay oodlygay umbernay ofay etterslay orfay ariousvay
ipsshay, osewhay eliveryday otay ethay ersonspay otay omwhay eythay aymay ebay addresseday,
ependsday uponay ethay eremay ancechay ofay encounteringay emthay inay ethay ourfay oceansay.
Usthay, ostmay etterslay evernay eachray eirthay arkmay; anday anymay areay onlyay eceivedray
afteray attainingay anay ageay ofay otway oray eethray earsyay oray oremay.

Oonsay Arbuckstay eturnedray ithway aay etterlay inay ishay andhay. Itay asway orelysay
umbledtay, ampday, anday overedcay ithway aay ullday, ottedspay, eengray ouldmay, inay
onsequencecay ofay eingbay eptkay inay aay arkday ockerlay ofay ethay abincay. Ofay uchsay aay
etterlay, Eathday imselfhay ightmay ellway avehay eenbay ethay ost-boypay.

an’st“Cay otnay eadray it?”ay iedcray Ahabay. ive“Gay itay emay, anmay. Ayeay, ayeay, it’say utbay
aay imday awl;—what’sscray is?”thay Asay ehay asway udyingstay itay outay, Arbuckstay ooktay aay
onglay utting-spadecay olepay, anday ithway ishay ifeknay ightlyslay itsplay ethay enday, otay
insertay ethay etterlay erethay, anday inay atthay ayway, andhay itay otay ethay oatbay, ithoutway
itsay omingcay anyay oserclay otay ethay ipshay.

Eantimemay, Ahabay oldinghay ethay etterlay, utteredmay, “Mray. Ar—yeshay, Mray. Arry—(ahay
oman’sway innypay and,—thehay an’smay ifeway, I’llay ager)—Aye—Mrway. Arryhay Aceymay,
Ipshay Eroboam;—whyjay it’say Aceymay, anday e’shay ead!”day

oor“Pay ellowfay! oorpay ellowfay! anday omfray ishay ife,”way ighedsay Ayhewmay; ut“bay etlay
emay avehay it.”ay

ay“Nay, eepkay itay elf,”thysay iedcray Abrielgay otay Ahabay; ou“thay artay oonsay oinggay
atthay ay.”way

urses“Cay ottlethray ee!”thay elledyay Ahabay. aptain“Cay Ayhewmay, andstay byay ownay otay
eceiveray it”ay; anday akingtay ethay atalfay issivemay omfray Arbuck’sstay andshay, ehay
aughtcay itay inay ethay itslay ofay ethay olepay, anday eachedray itay overay owardstay ethay
oatbay. Utbay asay ehay idday osay, ethay oarsmenay expectantlyay esistedday omfray owingray;
ethay oatbay ifteddray aay ittlelay owardstay ethay ip’sshay ernstay; osay atthay, asay ifay byay
agicmay, ethay etterlay uddenlysay angedray alongay ithway Abriel’sgay eageray andhay. Ehay
utchedclay itay inay anay instantay, eizedsay ethay oat-knifebay, anday impalingay ethay
etterlay onay itay, entsay itay usthay oadedlay ackbay intoay ethay ipshay. Itay ellfay atay Ahab’say
eetfay. Enthay Abrielgay iekedshray outay otay ishay omradescay otay ivegay ayway ithway eirthay
oarsay, anday inay atthay annermay ethay utinousmay oatbay apidlyray otshay awayay omfray ethay
Equodpay.

Asay, afteray isthay interludeay, ethay eamensay esumedray eirthay orkway uponay ethay acketjay
ofay ethay alewhay, anymay angestray ingsthay ereway intedhay inay eferenceray otay isthay ildway
affairay.


APTERcHay 72ay. Ethay Onkey-Ropemay.

Inay ethay umultuoustay usinessbay ofay utting-incay anday attendingay otay aay alewhay,
erethay isay uchmay unningray ackwardsbay anday orwardsfay amongay ethay ewcray. Ownay andshay
areay antedway erehay, anday enthay againay andshay areay antedway erethay. Erethay isay onay
ayingstay inay anyay oneay aceplay; orfay atay oneay anday ethay amesay imetay everythingay ashay
otay ebay oneday everywhereay. Itay isay uchmay ethay amesay ithway imhay owhay endeavorsay ethay
escriptionday ofay ethay enescay. Eway ustmay ownay etraceray ouray ayway aay ittlelay. Itay asway
entionedmay atthay uponay irstfay eakingbray oundgray inay ethay ale’swhay ackbay, ethay
ubber-hookblay asway inserteday intoay ethay originalay olehay erethay utcay byay ethay
adesspay ofay ethay atesmay. Utbay owhay idday osay umsyclay anday eightyway aay assmay asay atthay
amesay ookhay etgay ixedfay inay atthay olehay? Itay asway inserteday erethay byay myay
articularpay iendfray Ueequegqay, osewhay utyday itay asway, asay arpooneerhay, otay
escendday uponay ethay onster’smay ackbay orfay ethay ecialspay urposepay eferredray otay.
Utbay inay eryvay anymay asescay, ircumstancescay equireray atthay ethay arpooneerhay allshay
emainray onay ethay alewhay illtay ethay olewhay ensingflay oray ippingstray operationay isay
oncludedcay. Ethay alewhay, ebay itay observeday, ieslay almostay entirelyay ubmergedsay,
exceptingay ethay immediateay artspay operateday uponay. Osay ownday erethay, omesay entay
eetfay elowbay ethay evellay ofay ethay eckday, ethay oorpay arpooneerhay oundersflay aboutay,
alfhay onay ethay alewhay anday alfhay inay ethay aterway, asay ethay astvay assmay evolvesray ikelay
aay ead-milltray eneathbay imhay. Onay ethay occasionay inay uestionqay, Ueequegqay iguredfay
inay ethay Ighlandhay ostume—acay irtshay anday ocks—insay ichwhay otay myay eyesay, atay
eastlay, ehay appeareday otay uncommonay advantageay; anday onay oneay adhay aay etterbay
ancechay otay observeay imhay, asay illway esentlypray ebay eensay.

Eingbay ethay avage’ssay owsmanbay, atthay isay, ethay ersonpay owhay ulledpay ethay ow-oarbay
inay ishay oatbay e(thay econdsay oneay omfray orward)fay, itay asway myay eerfulchay utyday otay
attenday uponay imhay ilewhay akingtay atthay ard-scrabblehay amblescray uponay ethay eadday
ale’swhay ackbay. Ouyay avehay eensay Italianay organ-boysay oldinghay aay ancing-apeday byay
aay onglay ordcay. Ustjay osay, omfray ethay ip’sshay eepstay idesay, idday Iay oldhay Ueequegqay
ownday erethay inay ethay easay, byay atwhay isay echnicallytay alledcay inay ethay isheryfay aay
onkey-ropemay, attacheday otay aay ongstray ipstray ofay anvascay eltedbay oundray ishay
aistway.

Itay asway aay umorouslyhay erilouspay usinessbay orfay othbay ofay usay. Orfay, eforebay eway
oceedpray urtherfay, itay ustmay ebay aidsay atthay ethay onkey-ropemay asway astfay atay othbay
endsay; astfay otay Ueequeg’sqay oadbray anvascay eltbay, anday astfay otay myay arrownay
eatherlay oneay. Osay atthay orfay etterbay oray orfay orseway, eway otway, orfay ethay imetay,
ereway eddedway; anday ouldshay oorpay Ueequegqay inksay otay iseray onay oremay, enthay othbay
usageay anday onorhay emandedday, atthay insteaday ofay uttingcay ethay ordcay, itay ouldshay
agdray emay ownday inay ishay akeway. Osay, enthay, anay elongateday Iamesesay igaturelay
uniteday usay. Ueequegqay asway myay ownay inseparableay intway otherbray; ornay ouldcay Iay
anyay ayway etgay idray ofay ethay angerousday iabilitieslay ichwhay ethay empenhay ondbay
entaileday.

Osay onglystray anday etaphysicallymay idday Iay onceivecay ofay myay ituationsay enthay,
atthay ilewhay earnestlyay atchingway ishay otionsmay, Iay eemedsay istinctlyday otay
erceivepay atthay myay ownay individualityay asway ownay ergedmay inay aay ointjay ockstay
ompanycay ofay otway; atthay myay eefray illway adhay eceivedray aay ortalmay oundway; anday atthay
another’say istakemay oray isfortunemay ightmay ungeplay innocentay emay intoay unmeriteday
isasterday anday eathday. Ereforethay, Iay awsay atthay erehay asway aay ortsay ofay
interregnumay inay Ovidencepray; orfay itsay even-handeday equityay evernay ouldcay avehay
osay ossgray anay injusticeay. Anday etyay illstay urtherfay ondering—whilepay Iay erkedjay
imhay ownay anday enthay omfray etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ipshay, ichwhay ouldway eatenthray
otay amjay im—stillhay urtherfay onderingpay, Iay aysay, Iay awsay atthay isthay ituationsay ofay
inemay asway ethay ecisepray ituationsay ofay everyay ortalmay atthay eathesbray; onlyay, inay
ostmay asescay, ehay, oneay ayway oray otheray, ashay isthay Iamesesay onnexioncay ithway aay
uralityplay ofay otheray ortalsmay. Ifay ouryay ankerbay eaksbray, ouyay apsnay; ifay ouryay
apothecaryay byay istakemay endssay ouyay oisonpay inay ouryay illspay, ouyay ieday. Uetray,
ouyay aymay aysay atthay, byay exceedingay autioncay, ouyay aymay ossiblypay escapeay esethay
anday ethay ultitudinousmay otheray evilay anceschay ofay ifelay. Utbay andlehay Ueequeg’sqay
onkey-ropemay eedfullyhay asay Iay ouldway, ometimessay ehay erkedjay itay osay, atthay Iay
amecay eryvay earnay idingslay overboarday. Ornay ouldcay Iay ossiblypay orgetfay atthay, oday
atwhay Iay ouldway, Iay onlyay adhay ethay anagementmay ofay oneay enday ofay it.*ay

e*Thay onkey-ropemay isay oundfay inay allay alerswhay; utbay itay asway onlyay inay ethay Equodpay
atthay ethay onkeymay anday ishay olderhay ereway everay iedtay ogethertay. Isthay
improvementay uponay ethay originalay usageay asway introduceday byay onay esslay aay anmay
anthay Ubbstay, inay orderay otay afforday ethay imperilleday arpooneerhay ethay ongeststray
ossiblepay uaranteegay orfay ethay aithfulnessfay anday igilancevay ofay ishay
onkey-ropemay olderhay.

Iay avehay intedhay atthay Iay ouldway oftenay erkjay oorpay Ueequegqay omfray etweenbay ethay
alewhay anday ethay ip—whereshay ehay ouldway occasionallyay allfay, omfray ethay incessantay
ollingray anday ayingsway ofay othbay. Utbay isthay asway otnay ethay onlyay ammingjay eopardyjay
ehay asway exposeday otay. Unappalleday byay ethay assacremay ademay uponay emthay uringday ethay
ightnay, ethay arksshay ownay eshlyfray anday oremay eenlykay allureday byay ethay eforebay
entpay oodblay ichwhay eganbay otay owflay omfray ethay arcass—thecay abidray eaturescray
armedsway oundray itay ikelay eesbay inay aay eehivebay.

Anday ightray inay amongay osethay arksshay asway Ueequegqay; owhay oftenay ushedpay emthay
asideay ithway ishay ounderingflay eetfay. Aay ingthay altogetheray incredibleay ereway itay
otnay atthay attracteday byay uchsay eypray asay aay eadday alewhay, ethay otherwiseay
iscellaneouslymay arnivorouscay arkshay illway eldomsay ouchtay aay anmay.

Everthelessnay, itay aymay ellway ebay elievedbay atthay incesay eythay avehay uchsay aay
avenousray ingerfay inay ethay iepay, itay isay eemedday utbay iseway otay ooklay arpshay otay
emthay. Accordinglyay, esidesbay ethay onkey-ropemay, ithway ichwhay Iay ownay anday enthay
erkedjay ethay oorpay ellowfay omfray ootay oseclay aay icinityvay otay ethay awmay ofay atwhay
eemedsay aay eculiarlypay erociousfay ark—heshay asway ovidedpray ithway illstay anotheray
otectionpray. Uspendedsay overay ethay idesay inay oneay ofay ethay agesstay, Ashtegotay anday
Aggooday ontinuallycay ourishedflay overay ishay eadhay aay ouplecay ofay eenkay
ale-spadeswhay, erewithwhay eythay aughteredslay asay anymay arksshay asay eythay ouldcay
eachray. Isthay ocedurepray ofay eirsthay, otay ebay uresay, asway eryvay isinterestedday anday
enevolentbay ofay emthay. Eythay eantmay Ueequeg’sqay estbay appinesshay, Iay admitay; utbay
inay eirthay astyhay ealzay otay efriendbay imhay, anday omfray ethay ircumstancecay atthay
othbay ehay anday ethay arksshay ereway atay imestay alfhay iddenhay byay ethay ood-muddledblay
aterway, osethay indiscreetay adesspay ofay eirsthay ouldway omecay earernay amputatingay aay
eglay anthay aay ailtay. Utbay oorpay Ueequegqay, Iay upposesay, ainingstray anday aspinggay
erethay ithway atthay eatgray ironay ook—poorhay Ueequegqay, Iay upposesay, onlyay ayedpray
otay ishay Ojoyay, anday avegay upay ishay ifelay intoay ethay andshay ofay ishay odsgay.

Ellway, ellway, myay earday omradecay anday in-brothertway, oughtthay Iay, asay Iay ewdray inay
anday enthay ackedslay offay ethay operay otay everyay ellsway ofay ethay ea—whatsay attersmay
itay, afteray allay? Areay ouyay otnay ethay eciouspray imageay ofay eachay anday allay ofay usay enmay
inay isthay alingwhay orldway? Atthay unsoundeday oceanay ouyay aspgay inay, isay Ifelay; osethay
arksshay, ouryay oesfay; osethay adesspay, ouryay iendsfray; anday atwhay etweenbay arksshay
anday adesspay ouyay areay inay aay adsay icklepay anday erilpay, oorpay adlay.

Utbay ouragecay! erethay isay oodgay eerchay inay orestay orfay ouyay, Ueequegqay. Orfay ownay,
asay ithway ueblay ipslay anday ood-shotblay eyesay ethay exhausteday avagesay atay astlay
imbsclay upay ethay ainschay anday andsstay allay ippingdray anday involuntarilyay
emblingtray overay ethay idesay; ethay ewardstay advancesay, anday ithway aay enevolentbay,
onsolatorycay anceglay andshay im—whathay? Omesay othay Ognaccay? Onay! andshay imhay, eyay
odsgay! andshay imhay aay upcay ofay epidtay ingergay anday aterway!

inger“Gay? Oday Iay ellsmay inger?”gay uspiciouslysay askeday Ubbstay, omingcay earnay.
es“Yay, isthay ustmay ebay inger,”gay eeringpay intoay ethay asay etyay untasteday upcay. Enthay
andingstay asay ifay incredulousay orfay aay ilewhay, ehay almlycay alkedway owardstay ethay
astonisheday ewardstay owlyslay ayingsay, inger“Gay? ingergay? anday illway ouyay avehay
ethay oodnessgay otay elltay emay, Mray. Ough-Boyday, erewhay ieslay ethay irtuevay ofay
ingergay? Ingergay! isay ingergay ethay ortsay ofay uelfay ouyay useay, Ough-boyday, otay
indlekay aay irefay inay isthay iveringshay annibalcay? Inger!—whatgay ethay evilday isay
ingergay? Ea-coalsay? irewood?—luciferfay atches?—tinder?—gunpowder?—whatmay
ethay evilday isay ingergay, Iay aysay, atthay ouyay offeray isthay upcay otay ouray oorpay
Ueequegqay ere.”hay

ere“Thay isay omesay eakingsnay Emperancetay Ocietysay ovementmay aboutay isthay
usiness,”bay ehay uddenlysay addeday, ownay approachingay Arbuckstay, owhay adhay ustjay
omecay omfray orwardfay. ill“Way ouyay ooklay atay atthay annakinkay, irsay: ellsmay ofay itay,
ifay ouyay ease.”play Enthay atchingway ethay ate’smay ountenancecay, ehay addeday, e“Thay
ewardstay, Mray. Arbuckstay, adhay ethay acefay otay offeray atthay alomelcay anday alapjay otay
Ueequegqay, erethay, isthay instantay offay ethay alewhay. Isay ethay ewardstay anay
apothecaryay, irsay? anday aymay Iay askay etherwhay isthay isay ethay ortsay ofay ittersbay byay
ichwhay ehay owsblay ackbay ethay ifelay intoay aay alf-drownedhay an?”may

I“ay usttray ot,”nay aidsay Arbuckstay, it“ay isay oorpay uffstay enough.”ay

Aye“ay, ayeay, eward,”stay iedcray Ubbstay, e’ll“way eachtay ouyay otay ugdray aay
arpooneerhay; onenay ofay ouryay apothecary’say edicinemay erehay; ouyay antway otay oisonpay
usay, oday eyay? Ouyay avehay otgay outay insurancesay onay ouray iveslay anday antway otay urdermay
usay allay, anday ocketpay ethay oceedspray, oday e?”yay

It“ay asway otnay e,”may iedcray Ough-Boyday, it“ay asway Auntay Aritychay atthay oughtbray ethay
ingergay onay oardbay; anday adebay emay evernay ivegay ethay arpooneershay anyay iritsspay,
utbay onlyay isthay inger-jub—sogay eshay alledcay it.”ay

inger-jub“Gay! ouyay ingerlygay ascalray! aketay atthay! anday unray alongay ithway eyay otay
ethay ockerslay, anday etgay omethingsay etterbay. Iay opehay Iay oday onay ongwray, Mray.
Arbuckstay. Itay isay ethay aptain’scay orders—grogay orfay ethay arpooneerhay onay aay
ale.”whay

Enough,”“ay epliedray Arbuckstay, only“ay on’tday ithay imhay againay, ut—”bay

Oh“ay, Iay evernay urthay enwhay Iay ithay, exceptay enwhay Iay ithay aay alewhay oray omethingsay ofay
atthay ortsay; anday isthay ellow’sfay aay eazelway. Atwhay ereway ouyay aboutay ayingsay,
ir?”say

Only“ay isthay: ogay ownday ithway imhay, anday etgay atwhay outhay antestway elf.”thysay

Enwhay Ubbstay eappearedray, ehay amecay ithway aay arkday askflay inay oneay andhay, anday aay
ortsay ofay ea-caddytay inay ethay otheray. Ethay irstfay ontainedcay ongstray iritsspay, anday
asway andedhay otay Ueequegqay; ethay econdsay asway Auntay Arity’schay iftgay, anday atthay
asway eelyfray ivengay otay ethay avesway.


APTERcHay 73ay. Ubbstay anday Askflay illkay aay Ightray Alewhay; anday Enthay Avehay aay Alktay
overay Imhay.

Itay ustmay ebay ornebay inay indmay atthay allay isthay imetay eway avehay aay Ermspay Ale’swhay
odigiouspray eadhay anginghay otay ethay Equod’spay idesay. Utbay eway ustmay etlay itay
ontinuecay anginghay erethay aay ilewhay illtay eway ancay etgay aay ancechay otay attenday otay
itay. Orfay ethay esentpray otheray attersmay esspray, anday ethay estbay eway ancay oday ownay orfay
ethay eadhay, isay otay aypray eavenhay ethay acklestay aymay oldhay.

Ownay, uringday ethay astpay ightnay anday orenoonfay, ethay Equodpay adhay aduallygray
ifteddray intoay aay easay, ichwhay, byay itsay occasionalay atchespay ofay ellowyay itbray,
avegay unusualay okenstay ofay ethay icinityvay ofay Ightray Aleswhay, aay eciesspay ofay ethay
Eviathanlay atthay utbay ewfay upposedsay otay ebay atay isthay articularpay imetay urkinglay
anywhereay earnay. Anday oughthay allay andshay ommonlycay isdainedday ethay apturecay ofay
osethay inferioray eaturescray; anday oughthay ethay Equodpay asway otnay ommissionedcay otay
uisecray orfay emthay atay allay, anday oughthay eshay adhay assedpay umbersnay ofay emthay earnay
ethay Ozettscray ithoutway oweringlay aay oatbay; etyay ownay atthay aay Ermspay Alewhay adhay
eenbay oughtbray alongsideay anday eheadedbay, otay ethay urprisesay ofay allay, ethay
announcementay asway ademay atthay aay Ightray Alewhay ouldshay ebay apturedcay atthay ayday,
ifay opportunityay offereday.

Ornay asway isthay onglay antingway. Alltay outsspay ereway eensay otay eewardlay; anday otway
oatsbay, Ubb’sstay anday Ask’sflay, ereway etachedday inay ursuitpay. Ullingpay urtherfay
anday urtherfay awayay, eythay atay astlay ecamebay almostay invisibleay otay ethay enmay atay
ethay ast-headmay. Utbay uddenlysay inay ethay istanceday, eythay awsay aay eatgray eaphay ofay
umultuoustay itewhay aterway, anday oonsay afteray ewsnay amecay omfray aloftay atthay oneay oray
othbay ethay oatsbay ustmay ebay astfay. Anay intervalay assedpay anday ethay oatsbay ereway inay
ainplay ightsay, inay ethay actay ofay eingbay aggeddray ightray owardstay ethay ipshay byay ethay
owingtay alewhay. Osay oseclay idday ethay onstermay omecay otay ethay ullhay, atthay atay irstfay
itay eemedsay asay ifay ehay eantmay itay alicemay; utbay uddenlysay oinggay ownday inay aay
aelstrommay, ithinway eethray odsray ofay ethay anksplay, ehay ollywhay isappearedday omfray
iewvay, asay ifay ivingday underay ethay eelkay. ut“Cay, ut!”cay asway ethay cryay omfray ethay
ipshay otay ethay oatsbay, ichwhay, orfay oneay instantay, eemedsay onay ethay ointpay ofay eingbay
oughtbray ithway aay eadlyday ashday againstay ethay essel’svay idesay. Utbay avinghay entyplay
ofay inelay etyay inay ethay ubstay, anday ethay alewhay otnay oundingsay eryvay apidlyray, eythay
aidpay outay abundanceay ofay operay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay ulledpay ithway allay eirthay
ightmay osay asay otay etgay aheaday ofay ethay ipshay. Orfay aay ewfay inutesmay ethay ugglestray
asway intenselyay iticalcray; orfay ilewhay eythay illstay ackedslay outay ethay ightenedtay
inelay inay oneay irectionday, anday illstay iedplay eirthay oarsay inay anotheray, ethay
ontendingcay ainstray eatenedthray otay aketay emthay underay. Utbay itay asway onlyay aay ewfay
eetfay advanceay eythay oughtsay otay aingay. Anday eythay uckstay otay itay illtay eythay idday
aingay itay; enwhay instantlyay, aay iftsway emortray asway eltfay unningray ikelay ightninglay
alongay ethay eelkay, asay ethay ainedstray inelay, apingscray eneathbay ethay ipshay,
uddenlysay oseray otay iewvay underay erhay owsbay, appingsnay anday uiveringqay; anday osay
ingingflay offay itsay ippingsdray, atthay ethay opsdray ellfay ikelay itsbay ofay okenbray
assglay onay ethay aterway, ilewhay ethay alewhay eyondbay alsoay oseray otay ightsay, anday onceay
oremay ethay oatsbay ereway eefray otay flyay. Utbay ethay aggedfay alewhay abateday ishay eedspay,
anday indlyblay alteringay ishay oursecay, entway oundray ethay ernstay ofay ethay ipshay
owingtay ethay otway oatsbay afteray imhay, osay atthay eythay erformedpay aay ompletecay
ircuitcay.

Eantimemay, eythay auledhay oremay anday oremay uponay eirthay ineslay, illtay oseclay
ankingflay imhay onay othbay idessay, Ubbstay answereday Askflay ithway ancelay orfay ancelay;
anday usthay oundray anday oundray ethay Equodpay ethay attlebay entway, ilewhay ethay
ultitudesmay ofay arksshay atthay adhay eforebay umsway oundray ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay odybay,
ushedray otay ethay eshfray oodblay atthay asway illedspay, irstilythay inkingdray atay everyay
ewnay ashgay, asay ethay eageray Israelitesay idday atay ethay ewnay urstingbay ountainsfay
atthay ouredpay omfray ethay ittensmay ockray.

Atay astlay ishay outspay ewgray ickthay, anday ithway aay ightfulfray ollray anday omitvay, ehay
urnedtay uponay ishay ackbay aay orpsecay.

Ilewhay ethay otway eadsmenhay ereway engageday inay akingmay astfay ordscay otay ishay ukesflay,
anday inay otheray aysway ettinggay ethay assmay inay eadinessray orfay owingtay, omesay
onversationcay ensueday etweenbay emthay.

I“ay onderway atwhay ethay olday anmay antsway ithway isthay umplay ofay oulfay ard,”lay aidsay
Ubbstay, otnay ithoutway omesay isgustday atay ethay oughtthay ofay avinghay otay oday ithway osay
ignobleay aay eviathanlay.

ants“Way ithway it?”ay aidsay Askflay, oilingcay omesay arespay inelay inay ethay oat’sbay owbay,
id“day ouyay evernay earhay atthay ethay ipshay ichwhay utbay onceay ashay aay Ermspay Ale’swhay
eadhay oistedhay onay erhay arboardstay idesay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay aay Ightray
Ale’swhay onay ethay arboardlay; idday ouyay evernay earhay, Ubbstay, atthay atthay ipshay ancay
evernay afterwardsay apsize?”cay

“Whyay otnay?

I“ay on’tday owknay, utbay Iay eardhay atthay ambogegay ostghay ofay aay Edallahfay ayingsay osay,
anday ehay eemssay otay owknay allay aboutay ips’shay armschay. Utbay Iay ometimessay inkthay
e’llhay armchay ethay ipshay otay onay oodgay atay astlay. Iay on’tday alfhay ikelay atthay apchay,
Ubbstay. Idday ouyay everay oticenay owhay atthay usktay ofay ishay isay aay ortsay ofay arvedcay
intoay aay ake’ssnay eadhay, Ubb?”stay

ink“Say imhay! Iay evernay ooklay atay imhay atay allay; utbay ifay everay Iay etgay aay ancechay ofay aay
arkday ightnay, anday ehay andingstay ardhay byay ethay ulwarksbay, anday onay oneay byay; ooklay
ownday erethay, Ask”—pointingflay intoay ethay easay ithway aay eculiarpay otionmay ofay othbay
ands—“Ayehay, illway Iay! Askflay, Iay aketay atthay Edallahfay otay ebay ethay evilday inay
isguiseday. Oday ouyay elievebay atthay ockcay anday ullbay orystay aboutay ishay avinghay eenbay
owedstay awayay onay oardbay ipshay? E’shay ethay evilday, Iay aysay. Ethay easonray whyay ouyay
on’tday eesay ishay ailtay, isay ecausebay ehay uckstay itay upay outay ofay ightsay; ehay arriescay
itay oiledcay awayay inay ishay ocketpay, Iay uessgay. Astblay imhay! ownay atthay Iay inkthay ofay
itay, e’shay alwaysay antingway oakumay otay uffstay intoay ethay oestay ofay ishay oots.”bay

e“Hay eepsslay inay ishay ootsbay, on’tday ehay? Ehay asn’thay otgay anyay ammockhay; utbay I’veay
eensay imhay aylay ofay ightsnay inay aay oilcay ofay igging.”ray

o“Nay oubtday, anday it’say ecausebay ofay ishay ursedcay ailtay; ehay oilscay itay ownday, oday eyay
eesay, inay ethay eyeay ofay ethay igging.”ray

at’s“Whay ethay olday anmay avehay osay uchmay otay oday ithway imhay or?”fay

iking“Stray upay aay apsway oray aay argainbay, Iay uppose.”say

argain?—about“Bay at?”whay

“Whyay, oday eyay eesay, ethay olday anmay isay ardhay entbay afteray atthay Itewhay Alewhay, anday
ethay evilday erethay isay ingtryay otay omecay oundray imhay, anday etgay imhay otay apsway awayay
ishay ilversay atchway, oray ishay oulsay, oray omethingsay ofay atthay ortsay, anday enthay
e’llhay urrendersay Obymay Ick.”day

ooh“Pay! Ubbstay, ouyay areay arkingskylay; owhay ancay Edallahfay oday at?”thay

I“ay on’tday owknay, Askflay, utbay ethay evilday isay aay uriouscay apchay, anday aay ickedway
oneay, Iay elltay eyay. Whyay, eythay aysay asay owhay ehay entway aay aunteringsay intoay ethay olday
ag-shipflay onceay, itchingsway ishay ailtay aboutay evilishday easyay anday
entlemanlikegay, anday inquiringay ifay ethay olday overnorgay asway atay omehay. Ellway, ehay
asway atay omehay, anday askeday ethay evilday atwhay ehay antedway. Ethay evilday, itchingsway
ishay oofshay, upay anday ayssay, I‘ay antway Ohn.’jay at‘Whay or?’fay ayssay ethay olday
overnorgay. at‘Whay usinessbay isay atthay ofay ours,’yay ayssay ethay evilday, ettinggay
ad,—‘Imay antway otay useay im.’hay ake‘Tay im,’hay ayssay ethay overnor—andgay byay ethay
Ordlay, Askflay, ifay ethay evilday idn’tday ivegay Ohnjay ethay Asiaticay olerachay eforebay
ehay otgay oughthray ithway imhay, I’llay eatay isthay alewhay inay oneay outhfulmay. Utbay ooklay
arp—ain’tshay ouyay allay eadyray erethay? Ellway, enthay, ullpay aheaday, anday et’slay etgay
ethay alewhay alongside.”ay

I“ay inkthay Iay ememberray omesay uchsay orystay asay ouyay ereway elling,”tay aidsay Askflay,
enwhay atay astlay ethay otway oatsbay ereway owlyslay advancingay ithway eirthay urdenbay
owardstay ethay ipshay, ut“bay Iay an’tcay ememberray ere.”whay

ee“Thray Aniardsspay? Adventuresay ofay osethay eethray oody-mindedblay oldadoessay?
Idday eyay eadray itay erethay, Askflay? Iay uessgay eyay id?”day

o“Nay: evernay awsay uchsay aay ookbay; eardhay ofay itay, oughthay. Utbay ownay, elltay emay,
Ubbstay, oday ouyay upposesay atthay atthay evilday ouyay asway eakingspay ofay ustjay ownay, asway
ethay amesay ouyay aysay isay ownay onay oardbay ethay Equod?”pay

Am“ay Iay ethay amesay anmay atthay elpedhay illkay isthay alewhay? Oesn’tday ethay evilday ivelay
orfay everay; owhay everay eardhay atthay ethay evilday asway eadday? Idday ouyay everay eesay anyay
arsonpay aay earingway ourningmay orfay ethay evilday? Anday ifay ethay evilday ashay aay
atch-keylay otay etgay intoay ethay admiral’say abincay, on’tday ouyay upposesay ehay ancay
awlcray intoay aay ortholepay? Elltay emay atthay, Mray. Ask?”flay

ow“Hay olday oday ouyay upposesay Edallahfay isay, Ubb?”stay

o“Day ouyay eesay atthay ainmastmay ere?”thay ointingpay otay ethay ipshay; ell“way, at’sthay
ethay igurefay oneay; ownay aketay allay ethay oopshay inay ethay Equod’spay oldhay, anday ingstray
alongay inay aay owray ithway atthay astmay, orfay oughtsay, oday ouyay eesay; ellway, atthay
ouldn’tway eginbay otay ebay Edallah’sfay ageay. Ornay allay ethay ooperscay inay eationcray
ouldn’tcay owshay oopshay enoughay otay akemay oughtsay enough.”ay

ut“Bay eesay erehay, Ubbstay, Iay oughtthay ouyay aay ittlelay oastedbay ustjay ownay, atthay ouyay
eantmay otay ivegay Edallahfay aay ea-tosssay, ifay ouyay otgay aay oodgay ancechay. Ownay, ifay
e’shay osay olday asay allay osethay oopshay ofay oursyay omecay otay, anday ifay ehay isay oinggay otay
ivelay orfay everay, atwhay oodgay illway itay oday otay itchpay imhay overboard—tellay emay
atthay?

ive“Gay imhay aay oodgay uckingday, anyhow.”ay

ut“Bay e’dhay awlcray ack.”bay

uck“Day imhay againay; anday eepkay uckingday im.”hay

uppose“Say ehay ouldshay aketay itay intoay ishay eadhay otay uckday ouyay, ough—yesthay, anday
owndray ou—whatyay en?”thay

I“ay ouldshay ikelay otay eesay imhay tryay itay; I’day ivegay imhay uchsay aay airpay ofay ackblay
eyesay atthay ehay ouldn’tway areday otay owshay ishay acefay inay ethay admiral’say abincay
againay orfay aay onglay ilewhay, etlay aloneay ownday inay ethay orlopay erethay, erewhay ehay
iveslay, anday ereaboutshay onay ethay upperay ecksday erewhay ehay eakssnay osay uchmay. Amnday
ethay evilday, Askflay; osay ouyay upposesay I’may afraiday ofay ethay evilday? O’swhay afraiday
ofay imhay, exceptay ethay olday overnorgay owhay aresn’tday atchcay imhay anday utpay imhay inay
ouble-darbiesday, asay ehay eservesday, utbay etslay imhay ogay aboutay idnappingkay
eoplepay; ayeay, anday ignedsay aay ondbay ithway imhay, atthay allay ethay eoplepay ethay evilday
idnappedkay, e’dhay oastray orfay imhay? Ere’sthay aay overnor!”gay

o“Day ouyay upposesay Edallahfay antsway otay idnapkay Aptaincay Ahab?”ay

o“Day Iay upposesay itay? Ou’llyay owknay itay eforebay onglay, Askflay. Utbay Iay amay oinggay ownay
otay eepkay aay arpshay ook-outlay onay imhay; anday ifay Iay eesay anythingay eryvay uspicioussay
oinggay onay, I’llay ustjay aketay imhay byay ethay apenay ofay ishay ecknay, anday ay—Looksay
erehay, Eelzebubbay, ouyay on’tday oday itay; anday ifay ehay akesmay anyay ussfay, byay ethay Ordlay
I’llay akemay aay abgray intoay ishay ocketpay orfay ishay ailtay, aketay itay otay ethay apstancay,
anday ivegay imhay uchsay aay enchingwray anday eavinghay, atthay ishay ailtay illway omecay
ortshay offay atay ethay ump—dostay ouyay eesay; anday enthay, Iay atherray uessgay enwhay ehay
indsfay imselfhay ockedday inay atthay ueerqay ashionfay, e’llhay eaksnay offay ithoutway ethay
oorpay atisfactionsay ofay eelingfay ishay ailtay etweenbay ishay egs.”lay

And“ay atwhay illway ouyay oday ithway ethay ailtay, Ubb?”stay

o“Day ithway itay? Ellsay itay orfay anay oxay ipwhay enwhay eway etgay ome;—whathay else?”ay

ow“Nay, oday ouyay eanmay atwhay ouyay aysay, anday avehay eenbay ayingsay allay alongay, Ubb?”stay

ean“May oray otnay eanmay, erehay eway areay atay ethay ip.”shay

Ethay oatsbay ereway erehay ailedhay, otay owtay ethay alewhay onay ethay arboardlay idesay,
erewhay ukeflay ainschay anday otheray ecessariesnay ereway alreadyay eparedpray orfay
ecuringsay imhay.

idn’t“Day Iay elltay ouyay o?”say aidsay Askflay; es“yay, ou’llyay oonsay eesay isthay ightray
ale’swhay eadhay oistedhay upay oppositeay atthay armacetti’s.”pay

Inay oodgay imetay, Ask’sflay ayingsay ovedpray uetray. Asay eforebay, ethay Equodpay eeplystay
eanedlay overay owardstay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay, ownay, byay ethay ounterpoisecay ofay
othbay eadshay, eshay egainedray erhay evenay eelkay; oughthay orelysay ainedstray, ouyay aymay
ellway elievebay. Osay, enwhay onay oneay idesay ouyay oisthay inay Ocke’slay eadhay, ouyay ogay
overay atthay ayway; utbay ownay, onay ethay otheray idesay, oisthay inay Ant’skay anday ouyay omecay
ackbay againay; utbay inay eryvay oorpay ightplay. Usthay, omesay indsmay orfay everay eepkay
immingtray oatbay. Ohay, eyay oolishfay! owthray allay esethay under-headsthay overboarday,
anday enthay ouyay illway oatflay ightlay anday ightray.

Inay isposingday ofay ethay odybay ofay aay ightray alewhay, enwhay oughtbray alongsideay ethay
ipshay, ethay amesay eliminarypray oceedingspray ommonlycay aketay aceplay asay inay ethay
asecay ofay aay ermspay alewhay; onlyay, inay ethay atterlay instanceay, ethay eadhay isay utcay
offay olewhay, utbay inay ethay ormerfay ethay ipslay anday onguetay areay eparatelysay emovedray
anday oistedhay onay eckday, ithway allay ethay ellway ownknay ackblay onebay attacheday otay
atwhay isay alledcay ethay own-piececray. Utbay othingnay ikelay isthay, inay ethay esentpray
asecay, adhay eenbay oneday. Ethay arcasescay ofay othbay aleswhay adhay oppeddray asternay;
anday ethay ead-ladenhay ipshay otnay aay ittlelay esembledray aay ulemay arryingcay aay airpay
ofay overburdeningay annierspay.

Eantimemay, Edallahfay asway almlycay eyeingay ethay ightray ale’swhay eadhay, anday everay
anday anonay ancingglay omfray ethay eepday inkleswray erethay otay ethay ineslay inay ishay ownay
andhay. Anday Ahabay ancedchay osay otay andstay, atthay ethay Arseepay occupieday ishay
adowshay; ilewhay, ifay ethay Arsee’spay adowshay asway erethay atay allay itay eemedsay onlyay
otay endblay ithway, anday engthenlay Ahab’say. Asay ethay ewcray oiledtay onay, Aplandishlay
eculationsspay ereway andiedbay amongay emthay, oncerningcay allay esethay assingpay
ingsthay.


APTERcHay 74ay. Ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay Ead—Contrastedhay Iewvay.

Erehay, ownay, areay otway eatgray aleswhay, ayinglay eirthay eadshay ogethertay; etlay usay
oinjay emthay, anday aylay ogethertay ouray ownay.

Ofay ethay andgray orderay ofay oliofay eviathanslay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay anday ethay Ightray
Alewhay areay byay arfay ethay ostmay oteworthynay. Eythay areay ethay onlyay aleswhay
egularlyray untedhay byay anmay. Otay ethay Antucketernay, eythay esentpray ethay otway
extremesay ofay allay ethay ownknay arietiesvay ofay ethay alewhay. Asay ethay externalay
ifferenceday etweenbay emthay isay ainlymay observableay inay eirthay eadshay; anday asay aay
eadhay ofay eachay isay isthay omentmay anginghay omfray ethay Equod’spay idesay; anday asay eway
aymay eelyfray ogay omfray oneay otay ethay otheray, byay erelymay eppingstay acrossay ethay
eck:—whereday, Iay ouldshay ikelay otay owknay, illway ouyay obtainay aay etterbay ancechay otay
udystay acticalpray etologycay anthay erehay?

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ouyay areay uckstray byay ethay eneralgay ontrastcay etweenbay
esethay eadshay. Othbay areay assivemay enoughay inay allay onsciencecay; utbay erethay isay aay
ertaincay athematicalmay etrysymmay inay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay ichwhay ethay Ightray
Ale’swhay adlysay ackslay. Erethay isay oremay aracterchay inay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay.
Asay ouyay eholdbay itay, ouyay involuntarilyay ieldyay ethay immenseay uperioritysay otay
imhay, inay ointpay ofay ervadingpay ignityday. Inay ethay esentpray instanceay, ootay, isthay
ignityday isay eightenedhay byay ethay epperpay anday altsay olourcay ofay ishay eadhay atay ethay
ummitsay, ivinggay okentay ofay advanceday ageay anday argelay experienceay. Inay ortshay, ehay
isay atwhay ethay ishermenfay echnicallytay allcay aay ey-headed“gray ale.”whay

Etlay usay ownay otenay atwhay isay eastlay issimilarday inay esethay eads—namelyhay, ethay otway
ostmay importantay organsay, ethay eyeay anday ethay earay. Arfay ackbay onay ethay idesay ofay ethay
eadhay, anday owlay ownday, earnay ethay angleay ofay eitheray ale’swhay awjay, ifay ouyay
arrowlynay earchsay, ouyay illway atay astlay eesay aay ashlesslay eyeay, ichwhay ouyay ouldway
ancyfay otay ebay aay oungyay olt’scay eyeay; osay outay ofay allay oportionpray isay itay otay ethay
agnitudemay ofay ethay eadhay.

Ownay, omfray isthay eculiarpay idewaysay ositionpay ofay ethay ale’swhay eyesay, itay isay
ainplay atthay ehay ancay evernay eesay anay objectay ichwhay isay exactlyay aheaday, onay oremay
anthay ehay ancay oneay exactlyay asternay. Inay aay ordway, ethay ositionpay ofay ethay ale’swhay
eyesay orrespondscay otay atthay ofay aay an’smay earsay; anday ouyay aymay ancyfay, orfay
ourselfyay, owhay itay ouldway arefay ithway ouyay, idday ouyay idewayssay urveysay objectsay
oughthray ouryay earsay. Ouyay ouldway indfay atthay ouyay ouldcay onlyay ommandcay omesay
irtythay egreesday ofay isionvay inay advanceay ofay ethay aightstray ide-linesay ofay ightsay;
anday aboutay irtythay oremay ehindbay itay. Ifay ouryay itterestbay oefay ereway alkingway
aightstray owardstay ouyay, ithway aggerday uplifteday inay oadbray ayday, ouyay ouldway otnay
ebay ableay otay eesay imhay, anyay oremay anthay ifay ehay ereway ealingstay uponay ouyay omfray
ehindbay. Inay aay ordway, ouyay ouldway avehay otway acksbay, osay otay eakspay; utbay, atay ethay
amesay imetay, alsoay, otway ontsfray ide(say onts)fray: orfay atwhay isay itay atthay akesmay
ethay ontfray ofay aay an—whatmay, indeeday, utbay ishay eyesay?

Oreovermay, ilewhay inay ostmay otheray animalsay atthay Iay ancay ownay inkthay ofay, ethay eyesay
areay osay antedplay asay imperceptiblyay otay endblay eirthay isualvay owerpay, osay asay otay
oducepray oneay icturepay anday otnay otway otay ethay ainbray; ethay eculiarpay ositionpay ofay
ethay ale’swhay eyesay, effectuallyay ividedday asay eythay areay byay anymay ubiccay eetfay ofay
olidsay eadhay, ichwhay owerstay etweenbay emthay ikelay aay eatgray ountainmay eparatingsay
otway akeslay inay alleysvay; isthay, ofay oursecay, ustmay ollywhay eparatesay ethay
impressionsay ichwhay eachay independentay organay impartsay. Ethay alewhay, ereforethay,
ustmay eesay oneay istinctday icturepay onay isthay idesay, anday anotheray istinctday
icturepay onay atthay idesay; ilewhay allay etweenbay ustmay ebay ofoundpray arknessday anday
othingnessnay otay imhay. Anmay aymay, inay effectay, ebay aidsay otay ooklay outay onay ethay
orldway omfray aay entry-boxsay ithway otway oinedjay ashessay orfay ishay indowway. Utbay ithway
ethay alewhay, esethay otway ashessay areay eparatelysay inserteday, akingmay otway
istinctday indowsway, utbay adlysay impairingay ethay iewvay. Isthay eculiaritypay ofay ethay
ale’swhay eyesay isay aay ingthay alwaysay otay ebay ornebay inay indmay inay ethay isheryfay; anday
otay ebay ememberedray byay ethay eaderray inay omesay ubsequentsay enesscay.

Aay uriouscay anday ostmay uzzlingpay uestionqay ightmay ebay artedstay oncerningcay isthay
isualvay attermay asay ouchingtay ethay Eviathanlay. Utbay Iay ustmay ebay ontentcay ithway aay
inthay. Osay onglay asay aay an’smay eyesay areay openay inay ethay ightlay, ethay actay ofay eeingsay
isay involuntaryay; atthay isay, ehay annotcay enthay elphay echanicallymay eeingsay
ateverwhay objectsay areay eforebay imhay. Everthelessnay, anyay one’say experienceay
illway eachtay imhay, atthay oughthay ehay ancay aketay inay anay undiscriminatingay eepsway ofay
ingsthay atay oneay anceglay, itay isay uiteqay impossibleay orfay imhay, attentivelyay, anday
ompletelycay, otay examineay anyay otway ings—howeverthay argelay oray oweverhay all—atsmay
oneay anday ethay amesay instantay ofay imetay; evernay indmay ifay eythay ielay idesay byay idesay
anday ouchtay eachay otheray. Utbay ifay ouyay ownay omecay otay eparatesay esethay otway
objectsay, anday urroundsay eachay byay aay irclecay ofay ofoundpray arknessday; enthay, inay
orderay otay eesay oneay ofay emthay, inay uchsay aay annermay asay otay ingbray ouryay indmay otay
earbay onay itay, ethay otheray illway ebay utterlyay excludeday omfray ouryay ontemporarycay
onsciousnesscay. Owhay isay itay, enthay, ithway ethay alewhay? Uetray, othbay ishay eyesay, inay
emselvesthay, ustmay imultaneouslysay actay; utbay isay ishay ainbray osay uchmay oremay
omprehensivecay, ombiningcay, anday ubtlesay anthay an’smay, atthay ehay ancay atay ethay
amesay omentmay ofay imetay attentivelyay examineay otway istinctday ospectspray, oneay onay
oneay idesay ofay imhay, anday ethay otheray inay anay exactlyay oppositeay irectionday? Ifay ehay
ancay, enthay isay itay asay arvellousmay aay ingthay inay imhay, asay ifay aay anmay ereway ableay
imultaneouslysay otay ogay oughthray ethay emonstrationsday ofay otway istinctday
oblemspray inay Eucliday. Ornay, ictlystray investigateday, isay erethay anyay
incongruityay inay isthay omparisoncay.

Itay aymay ebay utbay anay idleay imwhay, utbay itay ashay alwaysay eemedsay otay emay, atthay ethay
extraordinaryay acillationsvay ofay ovementmay isplayedday byay omesay aleswhay enwhay
esetbay byay eethray oray ourfay oatsbay; ethay imiditytay anday iabilitylay otay ueerqay
ightsfray, osay ommoncay otay uchsay aleswhay; Iay inkthay atthay allay isthay indirectlyay
oceedspray omfray ethay elplesshay erplexitypay ofay olitionvay, inay ichwhay eirthay
ividedday anday iametricallyday oppositeay owerspay ofay isionvay ustmay involveay emthay.

Utbay ethay earay ofay ethay alewhay isay ullfay asay uriouscay asay ethay eyeay. Ifay ouyay areay anay
entireay angerstray otay eirthay aceray, ouyay ightmay unthay overay esethay otway eadshay orfay
ourshay, anday evernay iscoverday atthay organay. Ethay earay ashay onay externalay eaflay
ateverwhay; anday intoay ethay olehay itselfay ouyay ancay ardlyhay insertay aay uillqay, osay
ondrouslyway inutemay isay itay. Itay isay odgedlay aay ittlelay ehindbay ethay eyeay. Ithway
espectray otay eirthay earsay, isthay importantay ifferenceday isay otay ebay observeday
etweenbay ethay ermspay alewhay anday ethay ightray. Ilewhay ethay earay ofay ethay ormerfay ashay
