anay externalay openingay, atthay ofay ethay atterlay isay entirelyay anday evenlyay overedcay
overay ithway aay embranemay, osay asay otay ebay uiteqay imperceptibleay omfray ithoutway.

Isay itay otnay uriouscay, atthay osay astvay aay eingbay asay ethay alewhay ouldshay eesay ethay
orldway oughthray osay allsmay anay eyeay, anday earhay ethay underthay oughthray anay earay
ichwhay isay allersmay anthay aay are’shay? Utbay ifay ishay eyesay ereway oadbray asay ethay enslay
ofay Erschel’shay eatgray elescopetay; anday ishay earsay apaciouscay asay ethay orchespay ofay
athedralscay; ouldway atthay akemay imhay anyay ongerlay ofay ightsay, oray arpershay ofay
earinghay? Otnay atay all.—Whyay enthay oday ouyay tryay otay enlarge”“ay ouryay indmay?
Ubtilizesay itay.

Etlay usay ownay ithway ateverwhay everslay anday eam-enginesstay eway avehay atay andhay, antcay
overay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay, atthay itay aymay ielay ottombay upay; enthay, ascendingay
byay aay adderlay otay ethay ummitsay, avehay aay eeppay ownday ethay outhmay; anday ereway itay otnay
atthay ethay odybay isay ownay ompletelycay eparatedsay omfray itay, ithway aay anternlay eway
ightmay escendday intoay ethay eatgray Entuckykay Ammothmay Avecay ofay ishay omachstay. Utbay
etlay usay oldhay onay erehay byay isthay oothtay, anday ooklay aboutay usay erewhay eway areay. Atwhay
aay eallyray eautifulbay anday aste-lookingchay outhmay! omfray oorflay otay eilingcay,
inedlay, oray atherray aperedpay ithway aay isteningglay itewhay embranemay, ossyglay asay
idalbray atinssay.

Utbay omecay outay ownay, anday ooklay atay isthay ortentouspay owerlay awjay, ichwhay eemssay
ikelay ethay onglay arrownay idlay ofay anay immenseay uff-boxsnay, ithway ethay ingehay atay oneay
enday, insteaday ofay oneay idesay. Ifay ouyay pryay itay upay, osay asay otay etgay itay overheaday,
anday exposeay itsay owsray ofay eethtay, itay eemssay aay errifictay ortcullispay; anday uchsay,
alasay! itay ovespray otay anymay aay oorpay ightway inay ethay isheryfay, uponay omwhay esethay
ikesspay allfay ithway impalingay orcefay. Utbay arfay oremay erribletay isay itay otay eholdbay,
enwhay athomsfay ownday inay ethay easay, ouyay eesay omesay ulkysay alewhay, oatingflay erethay
uspendedsay, ithway ishay odigiouspray awjay, omesay ifteenfay eetfay onglay, anginghay
aightstray ownday atay ight-anglesray ithway ishay odybay, orfay allay ethay orldway ikelay aay
ip’sshay ib-boomjay. Isthay alewhay isay otnay eadday; ehay isay onlyay ispiritedday; outay ofay
ortssay, erhapspay; ochondriachypay; anday osay upinesay, atthay ethay ingeshay ofay ishay
awjay avehay elaxedray, eavinglay imhay erethay inay atthay ungainlyay ortsay ofay ightplay, aay
eproachray otay allay ishay ibetray, owhay ustmay, onay oubtday, imprecateay ock-jawslay uponay
imhay.

Inay ostmay asescay isthay owerlay aw—beingjay easilyay unhingeday byay aay actisedpray
artist—isay isengagedday anday oistedhay onay eckday orfay ethay urposepay ofay extractingay
ethay ivoryay eethtay, anday urnishingfay aay upplysay ofay atthay ardhay itewhay alebonewhay
ithway ichwhay ethay ishermenfay ashionfay allay ortssay ofay uriouscay articlesay,
includingay anescay, umbrella-stocksay, anday andleshay otay iding-whipsray.

Ithway aay onglay, earyway oisthay ethay awjay isay aggeddray onay oardbay, asay ifay itay ereway anay
anchoray; anday enwhay ethay operpray imetay omes—somecay ewfay aysday afteray ethay otheray
ork—Queequegway, Aggooday, anday Ashtegotay, eingbay allay accomplisheday entistsday,
areay etsay otay awingdray eethtay. Ithway aay eenkay utting-spadecay, Ueequegqay anceslay
ethay umsgay; enthay ethay awjay isay ashedlay ownday otay ingboltsray, anday aay ackletay eingbay
iggedray omfray aloftay, eythay agdray outay esethay eethtay, asay Ichiganmay oxenay agdray
umpsstay ofay olday oaksay outay ofay ildway oodway andslay. Erethay areay enerallygay
orty-twofay eethtay inay allay; inay olday aleswhay, uchmay ornway ownday, utbay undecayeday;
ornay illedfay afteray ouray artificialay ashionfay. Ethay awjay isay afterwardsay awnsay
intoay absslay, anday iledpay awayay ikelay oistsjay orfay uildingbay ouseshay.


APTERcHay 75ay. Ethay Ightray Ale’swhay Ead—Contrastedhay Iewvay.

Ossingcray ethay eckday, etlay usay ownay avehay aay oodgay onglay ooklay atay ethay Ightray
Ale’swhay eadhay.

Asay inay eneralgay apeshay ethay oblenay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay aymay ebay omparedcay otay aay
Omanray ar-chariotway especially(ay inay ontfray, erewhay itay isay osay oadlybray
ounded)ray; osay, atay aay oadbray iewvay, ethay Ightray Ale’swhay eadhay earsbay aay atherray
inelegantay esemblanceray otay aay iganticgay alliot-toedgay oeshay. Otway undredhay
earsyay agoay anay olday Utchday oyagervay ikenedlay itsay apeshay otay atthay ofay aay
oemaker’sshay astlay. Anday inay isthay amesay astlay oray oeshay, atthay olday omanway ofay ethay
urserynay aletay, ithway ethay armingsway oodbray, ightmay eryvay omfortablycay ebay
odgedlay, eshay anday allay erhay ogenypray.

Utbay asay ouyay omecay earernay otay isthay eatgray eadhay itay eginsbay otay assumeay ifferentday
aspectsay, accordingay otay ouryay ointpay ofay iewvay. Ifay ouyay andstay onay itsay ummitsay
anday ooklay atay esethay otway Apedf-shay outholesspay, ouyay ouldway aketay ethay olewhay
eadhay orfay anay enormousay ass-violbay, anday esethay iraclesspay, ethay aperturesay inay
itsay ounding-boardsay. Enthay, againay, ifay ouyay ixfay ouryay eyeay uponay isthay angestray,
estedcray, omb-likecay incrustationay onay ethay optay ofay ethay ass—thismay eengray,
arnacledbay ingthay, ichwhay ethay Eenlandersgray allcay ethay own,”“cray anday ethay
Outhernsay ishersfay ethay onnet”“bay ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay; ixingfay ouryay eyesay
olelysay onay isthay, ouyay ouldway aketay ethay eadhay orfay ethay unktray ofay omesay ugehay oakay,
ithway aay ird’sbay estnay inay itsay otchcray. Atay anyay ateray, enwhay ouyay atchway osethay
ivelay abscray atthay estlenay erehay onay isthay onnetbay, uchsay anay ideaay illway ebay almostay
uresay otay occuray otay ouyay; unlessay, indeeday, ouryay ancyfay ashay eenbay ixedfay byay ethay
echnicaltay ermtay own”“cray alsoay estowedbay uponay itay; inay ichwhay asecay ouyay illway
aketay eatgray interestay inay inkingthay owhay isthay ightymay onstermay isay actuallyay aay
iademedday ingkay ofay ethay easay, osewhay eengray owncray ashay eenbay utpay ogethertay orfay
imhay inay isthay arvellousmay annermay. Utbay ifay isthay alewhay ebay aay ingkay, ehay isay aay
eryvay ulkysay ookinglay ellowfay otay acegray aay iademday. Ooklay atay atthay anginghay owerlay
iplay! atwhay aay ugehay ulksay anday outpay isay erethay! aay ulksay anday outpay, byay
arpenter’scay easurementmay, aboutay entytway eetfay onglay anday ivefay eetfay eepday; aay
ulksay anday outpay atthay illway ieldyay ouyay omesay 500ay allonsgay ofay oilay anday oremay.

Aay eatgray itypay, ownay, atthay isthay unfortunateay alewhay ouldshay ebay are-lippedhay.
Ethay issurefay isay aboutay aay ootfay acrossay. Obablypray ethay othermay uringday anay
importantay intervalay asway ailingsay ownday ethay Eruvianpay oastcay, enwhay
earthquakesay ausedcay ethay eachbay otay apegay. Overay isthay iplay, asay overay aay ipperyslay
esholdthray, eway ownay ideslay intoay ethay outhmay. Uponay myay ordway ereway Iay atay
Ackinawmay, Iay ouldshay aketay isthay otay ebay ethay insideay ofay anay Indianay igwamway. Oodgay
Ordlay! isay isthay ethay oadray atthay Onahjay entway? Ethay oofray isay aboutay elvetway eetfay
ighhay, anday unsray otay aay ettypray arpshay angleay, asay ifay erethay ereway aay egularray
idge-poleray erethay; ilewhay esethay ibbedray, archeday, airyhay idessay, esentpray usay
ithway osethay ondrousway, alfhay erticalvay, imetar-shapedscay atsslay ofay alebonewhay,
aysay eethray undredhay onay aay idesay, ichwhay ependingday omfray ethay upperay artpay ofay ethay
eadhay oray owncray onebay, ormfay osethay Enetianvay indsblay ichwhay avehay elsewhereay
eenbay ursorilycay entionedmay. Ethay edgesay ofay esethay onesbay areay ingedfray ithway
airyhay ibresfay, oughthray ichwhay ethay Ightray Alewhay ainsstray ethay aterway, anday inay
osewhay intricaciesay ehay etainsray ethay allsmay ishfay, enwhay openmoutheday ehay oesgay
oughthray ethay eassay ofay itbray inay eedingfay imetay. Inay ethay entralcay indsblay ofay
onebay, asay eythay andstay inay eirthay aturalnay orderay, erethay areay ertaincay uriouscay
arksmay, urvescay, ollowshay, anday idgesray, erebywhay omesay alemenwhay alculatecay ethay
eature’scray ageay, asay ethay ageay ofay anay oakay byay itsay ircularcay ingsray. Oughthay ethay
ertaintycay ofay isthay iterioncray isay arfay omfray emonstrableday, etyay itay ashay ethay
avorsay ofay analogicalay obabilitypray. Atay anyay ateray, ifay eway ieldyay otay itay, eway
ustmay antgray aay arfay eatergray ageay otay ethay Ightray Alewhay anthay atay irstfay anceglay
illway eemsay easonableray.

Inay olday imestay, erethay eemsay otay avehay evailedpray ethay ostmay uriouscay anciesfay
oncerningcay esethay indsblay. Oneay oyagervay inay Urchaspay allscay emthay ethay ondrousway
iskers”“whay insideay ofay ethay ale’swhay outh;*may anotheray, ogs’“hay istles”bray; aay
irdthay olday entlemangay inay Ackluythay usesay ethay ollowingfay elegantay anguagelay:
ere“Thay areay aboutay otway undredhay anday iftyfay insfay owinggray onay eachay idesay ofay ishay
upperay op__chay, ichwhay archay overay ishay onguetay onay eachay idesay ofay ishay outh.”may

is*Thay emindsray usay atthay ethay Ightray Alewhay eallyray ashay aay ortsay ofay iskerwhay, oray
atherray aay oustachemay, onsistingcay ofay aay ewfay atteredscay itewhay airshay onay ethay
upperay artpay ofay ethay outeray enday ofay ethay owerlay awjay. Ometimessay esethay uftstay
impartay aay atherray igandishbray expressionay otay ishay otherwiseay olemnsay
ountenancecay.

Asay everyay oneay owsknay, esethay amesay ogs’“hay istles,”bray ins,”“fay iskers,”“whay
inds,”“blay oray ateverwhay ouyay easeplay, urnishfay otay ethay adieslay eirthay usksbay anday
otheray iffeningstay ontrivancescay. Utbay inay isthay articularpay, ethay emandday ashay
onglay eenbay onay ethay eclineday. Itay asway inay Ueenqay Anne’say imetay atthay ethay onebay asway
inay itsay oryglay, ethay arthingalefay eingbay enthay allay ethay ashionfay. Anday asay osethay
ancientay amesday ovedmay aboutay ailygay, oughthay inay ethay awsjay ofay ethay alewhay, asay
ouyay aymay aysay; evenay osay, inay aay owershay, ithway ethay ikelay oughtlessnessthay, oday eway
owadaysnay flyay underay ethay amesay awsjay orfay otectionpray; ethay umbrellaay eingbay aay
enttay eadspray overay ethay amesay onebay.

Utbay ownay orgetfay allay aboutay indsblay anday iskerswhay orfay aay omentmay, anday,
andingstay inay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay outhmay, ooklay arounday ouyay afreshay. Eeingsay allay
esethay olonnadescay ofay onebay osay ethodicallymay angedray aboutay, ouldway ouyay otnay
inkthay ouyay ereway insideay ofay ethay eatgray Aarlemhay organay, anday azinggay uponay itsay
ousandthay ipespay? Orfay aay arpetcay otay ethay organay eway avehay aay ugray ofay ethay oftestsay
Urkey—thetay onguetay, ichwhay isay uedglay, asay itay ereway, otay ethay oorflay ofay ethay
outhmay. Itay isay eryvay atfay anday endertay, anday aptay otay eartay inay iecespay inay oistinghay
itay onay eckday. Isthay articularpay onguetay ownay eforebay usay; atay aay assingpay anceglay Iay
ouldshay aysay itay asway aay ix-barrelersay; atthay isay, itay illway ieldyay ouyay aboutay atthay
amountay ofay oilay.

Ereay isthay, ouyay ustmay avehay ainlyplay eensay ethay uthtray ofay atwhay Iay artedstay
ith—thatway ethay Ermspay Alewhay anday ethay Ightray Alewhay avehay almostay entirelyay
ifferentday eadshay. Otay umsay upay, enthay: inay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay erethay isay onay
eatgray ellway ofay ermspay; onay ivoryay eethtay atay allay; onay onglay, enderslay andiblemay
ofay aay owerlay awjay, ikelay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay. Ornay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay areay
erethay anyay ofay osethay indsblay ofay onebay; onay ugehay owerlay iplay; anday arcelyscay
anythingay ofay aay onguetay. Againay, ethay Ightray Alewhay ashay otway externalay
out-holesspay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay onlyay oneay.

Ooklay ouryay astlay, ownay, onay esethay enerablevay oodedhay eadshay, ilewhay eythay etyay
ielay ogethertay; orfay oneay illway oonsay inksay, unrecordeday, inay ethay easay; ethay otheray
illway otnay ebay eryvay onglay inay ollowingfay.

Ancay ouyay atchcay ethay expressionay ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay erethay? Itay isay ethay amesay
ehay iedday ithway, onlyay omesay ofay ethay ongerlay inkleswray inay ethay oreheadfay eemsay ownay
adedfay awayay. Iay inkthay ishay oadbray owbray otay ebay ullfay ofay aay airie-likepray
acidityplay, ornbay ofay aay eculativespay indifferenceay asay otay eathday. Utbay arkmay ethay
otheray ead’shay expressionay. Eesay atthay amazingay owerlay iplay, essedpray byay
accidentay againstay ethay essel’svay idesay, osay asay irmlyfay otay embraceay ethay awjay.
Oesday otnay isthay olewhay eadhay eemsay otay eakspay ofay anay enormousay acticalpray
esolutionray inay acingfay eathday? Isthay Ightray Alewhay Iay aketay otay avehay eenbay aay
Oicstay; ethay Ermspay Alewhay, aay Atonianplay, owhay ightmay avehay akentay upay Inozaspay inay
ishay atterlay earsyay.


APTERcHay 76ay. Ethay Attering-Rambay.

Ereay uittingqay, orfay ethay oncenay, ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay, Iay ouldway avehay ouyay,
asay aay ensiblesay iologistphysay, imply—particularlysay emarkray itsay ontfray
aspectay, inay allay itsay ompactedcay ollectednesscay. Iay ouldway avehay ouyay
investigateay itay ownay ithway ethay olesay iewvay ofay ormingfay otay ourselfyay omesay
unexaggerateday, intelligentay estimateay ofay ateverwhay attering-rambay owerpay aymay
ebay odgedlay erethay. Erehay isay aay italvay ointpay; orfay ouyay ustmay eitheray
atisfactorilysay ettlesay isthay attermay ithway ourselfyay, oray orfay everay emainray anay
infidelay asay otay oneay ofay ethay ostmay appallingay, utbay otnay ethay esslay uetray eventsay,
erhapspay anywhereay otay ebay oundfay inay allay ecordedray istoryhay.

Ouyay observeay atthay inay ethay ordinaryay immingsway ositionpay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay,
ethay ontfray ofay ishay eadhay esentspray anay almostay ollywhay erticalvay aneplay otay ethay
aterway; ouyay observeay atthay ethay owerlay artpay ofay atthay ontfray opesslay
onsiderablycay ackwardsbay, osay asay otay urnishfay oremay ofay aay etreatray orfay ethay onglay
ocketsay ichwhay eceivesray ethay oom-likebay owerlay awjay; ouyay observeay atthay ethay
outhmay isay entirelyay underay ethay eadhay, uchmay inay ethay amesay ayway, indeeday, asay
oughthay ouryay ownay outhmay ereway entirelyay underay ouryay inchay. Oreovermay ouyay
observeay atthay ethay alewhay ashay onay externalay osenay; anday atthay atwhay osenay ehay
as—hishay outspay ole—ishay onay ethay optay ofay ishay eadhay; ouyay observeay atthay ishay eyesay
anday earsay areay atay ethay idessay ofay ishay eadhay, earlynay oneay irdthay ofay ishay entireay
engthlay omfray ethay ontfray. Ereforewhay, ouyay ustmay ownay avehay erceivedpay atthay ethay
ontfray ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay isay aay eadday, indblay allway, ithoutway aay inglesay
organay oray endertay ominencepray ofay anyay ortsay atsoeverwhay. Urthermorefay, ouyay areay
ownay otay onsidercay atthay onlyay inay ethay extremeay, owerlay, ackwardbay opingslay artpay
ofay ethay ontfray ofay ethay eadhay, isay erethay ethay ightestslay estigevay ofay onebay; anday
otnay illtay ouyay etgay earnay entytway eetfay omfray ethay oreheadfay oday ouyay omecay otay ethay
ullfay anialcray evelopmentday. Osay atthay isthay olewhay enormousay onelessbay assmay isay
asay oneay adway. Inallyfay, oughthay, asay illway oonsay ebay evealedray, itsay ontentscay
artlypay omprisecay ethay ostmay elicateday oilay; etyay, ouyay areay ownay otay ebay appriseday
ofay ethay aturenay ofay ethay ubstancesay ichwhay osay impregnablyay investsay allay atthay
apparentay effeminacyay. Inay omesay eviouspray aceplay Iay avehay escribedday otay ouyay owhay
ethay ubberblay apswray ethay odybay ofay ethay alewhay, asay ethay indray apswray anay orangeay.
Ustjay osay ithway ethay eadhay; utbay ithway isthay ifferenceday: aboutay ethay eadhay isthay
envelopeay, oughthay otnay osay ickthay, isay ofay aay onelessbay oughnesstay, inestimableay
byay anyay anmay owhay ashay otnay andledhay itay. Ethay everestsay ointedpay arpoonhay, ethay
arpestshay ancelay artedday byay ethay ongeststray umanhay armay, impotentlyay eboundsray
omfray itay. Itay isay asay oughthay ethay oreheadfay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ereway avedpay
ithway orses’hay oofshay. Iay oday otnay inkthay atthay anyay ensationsay urkslay inay itay.

Ethinkbay ourselfyay alsoay ofay anotheray ingthay. Enwhay otway argelay, oadedlay Indiamenay
ancechay otay owdcray anday ushcray owardstay eachay otheray inay ethay ocksday, atwhay oday ethay
ailorssay oday? Eythay oday otnay uspendsay etweenbay emthay, atay ethay ointpay ofay omingcay
ontactcay, anyay erelymay ardhay ubstancesay, ikelay ironay oray oodway. Onay, eythay oldhay
erethay aay argelay, oundray adway ofay owtay anday orkcay, envelopeday inay ethay ickestthay anday
oughesttay ofay ox-hideay. Atthay avelybray anday uninjureday akestay ethay amjay ichwhay
ouldway avehay appedsnay allay eirthay oakenay andspikeshay anday ironay ow-barscray. Byay
itselfay isthay ufficientlysay illustratesay ethay obviousay actfay Iay ivedray atay. Utbay
upplementarysay otay isthay, itay ashay otheticallyhypay occurreday otay emay, atthay asay
ordinaryay ishfay ossesspay atwhay isay alledcay aay immingsway adderblay inay emthay,
apablecay, atay illway, ofay istensionday oray ontractioncay; anday asay ethay Ermspay Alewhay,
asay arfay asay Iay owknay, ashay onay uchsay ovisionpray inay imhay; onsideringcay, ootay, ethay
otherwiseay inexplicableay annermay inay ichwhay ehay ownay epressesday ishay eadhay
altogetheray eneathbay ethay urfacesay, anday anonay imssway ithway itay ighhay elevateday
outay ofay ethay aterway; onsideringcay ethay unobstructeday elasticityay ofay itsay
envelopeay; onsideringcay ethay uniqueay interioray ofay ishay eadhay; itay ashay
otheticallyhypay occurreday otay emay, Iay aysay, atthay osethay icalmystay ung-celledlay
oneycombshay erethay aymay ossiblypay avehay omesay ithertohay unknownay anday
unsuspecteday onnexioncay ithway ethay outeray airay, osay asay otay ebay usceptiblesay otay
atmosphericay istensionday anday ontractioncay. Ifay isthay ebay osay, ancyfay ethay
irresistiblenessay ofay atthay ightmay, otay ichwhay ethay ostmay impalpableay anday
estructiveday ofay allay elementsay ontributescay.

Ownay, arkmay. Unerringlyay impellingay isthay eadday, impregnableay, uninjurableay
allway, anday isthay ostmay uoyantbay ingthay ithinway; erethay imssway ehindbay itay allay aay
assmay ofay emendoustray ifelay, onlyay otay ebay adequatelyay estimateday asay iledpay oodway
is—byay ethay ordcay; anday allay obedientay otay oneay olitionvay, asay ethay allestsmay
insectay. Osay atthay enwhay Iay allshay ereafterhay etailday otay ouyay allay ethay
ecialitiesspay anday oncentrationscay ofay otencypay everywhereay urkinglay inay isthay
expansiveay onstermay; enwhay Iay allshay owshay ouyay omesay ofay ishay oremay
inconsiderableay ainingbray eatsfay; Iay usttray ouyay illway avehay enouncedray allay
ignorantay incredulityay, anday ebay eadyray otay abideay byay isthay; atthay oughthay ethay
Ermspay Alewhay ovestay aay assagepay oughthray ethay Isthmusay ofay Arienday, anday ixedmay
ethay Atlanticay ithway ethay Acificpay, ouyay ouldway otnay elevateay oneay airhay ofay ouryay
eye-broway. Orfay unlessay ouyay ownay ethay alewhay, ouyay areay utbay aay ovincialpray anday
entimentalistsay inay Uthtray. Utbay earclay Uthtray isay aay ingthay orfay alamandersay
iantsgay onlyay otay encounteray; owhay allsmay ethay anceschay orfay ethay ovincialspray
enthay? Atwhay efellbay ethay eaklingway outhyay iftinglay ethay eaddray oddess’sgay eilvay
atay Aislay?


APTERcHay 77ay. Ethay Eatgray Eidelburghhay Untay.

Ownay omescay ethay Alingbay ofay ethay Asecay. Utbay otay omprehendcay itay arightay, ouyay ustmay
owknay omethingsay ofay ethay uriouscay internalay ucturestray ofay ethay ingthay operateday
uponay.

Egardingray ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay asay aay olidsay oblongay, ouyay aymay, onay anay
inclineday aneplay, idewayssay ivideday itay intoay otway uoins,*qay ereofwhay ethay owerlay
isay ethay onybay ucturestray, ormingfay ethay aniumcray anday awsjay, anday ethay upperay anay
unctuousay assmay ollywhay eefray omfray onesbay; itsay oadbray orwardfay enday ormingfay ethay
expandeday erticalvay apparentay oreheadfay ofay ethay alewhay. Atay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay
oreheadfay orizontallyhay ubdividesay isthay upperay uoinqay, anday enthay ouyay avehay otway
almostay equalay artspay, ichwhay eforebay ereway aturallynay ividedday byay anay internalay
allway ofay aay ickthay endinoustay ubstancesay.

uoin*Qay isay otnay aay Euclideanay ermtay. Itay elongsbay otay ethay urepay auticalnay
athematicsmay. Iay owknay otnay atthay itay ashay eenbay efinedday eforebay. Aay uoinqay isay aay
olidsay ichwhay iffersday omfray aay edgeway inay avinghay itsay arpshay enday ormedfay byay ethay
eepstay inclinationay ofay oneay idesay, insteaday ofay ethay utualmay aperingtay ofay othbay
idessay.

Ethay owerlay ubdividedsay artpay, alledcay ethay unkjay, isay oneay immenseay oneycombhay ofay
oilay, ormedfay byay ethay ossingcray anday ecrossingray, intoay entay ousandthay
infiltrateday ellscay, ofay oughtay elasticay itewhay ibresfay oughoutthray itsay olewhay
extentay. Ethay upperay artpay, ownknay asay ethay Asecay, aymay ebay egardedray asay ethay eatgray
Eidelburghhay Untay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Anday asay atthay amousfay eatgray iercetay isay
icallymystay arvedcay inay ontfray, osay ethay ale’swhay astvay aitedplay oreheadfay ormsfay
innumerableay angestray evicesday orfay ethay emblematicalay adornmentay ofay ishay
ondrousway untay. Oreovermay, asay atthay ofay Eidelburghhay asway alwaysay eplenishedray
ithway ethay ostmay excellentay ofay ethay inesway ofay ethay Enishrhay alleysvay, osay ethay untay
ofay ethay alewhay ontainscay byay arfay ethay ostmay eciouspray ofay allay ishay oilyay
intagesvay; amelynay, ethay ighly-prizedhay ermacetispay, inay itsay absolutelyay urepay,
impidlay, anday odoriferousay atestay. Ornay isay isthay eciouspray ubstancesay oundfay
unalloyeday inay anyay otheray artpay ofay ethay eaturecray. Oughthay inay ifelay itay emainsray
erfectlypay uidflay, etyay, uponay exposureay otay ethay airay, afteray eathday, itay oonsay
eginsbay otay oncretecay; endingsay orthfay eautifulbay allinecrystay ootsshay, asay enwhay
ethay irstfay inthay elicateday iceay isay ustjay ormingfay inay aterway. Aay argelay ale’swhay
asecay enerallygay ieldsyay aboutay ivefay undredhay allonsgay ofay ermspay, oughthay omfray
unavoidableay ircumstancescay, onsiderablecay ofay itay isay illedspay, eakslay, anday
ibblesdray awayay, oray isay otherwiseay irrevocablyay ostlay inay ethay icklishtay
usinessbay ofay ecuringsay atwhay ouyay ancay.

Iay owknay otnay ithway atwhay inefay anday ostlycay aterialmay ethay Eidelburghhay Untay asway
oatedcay ithinway, utbay inay uperlativesay ichnessray atthay oatingcay ouldcay otnay
ossiblypay avehay omparedcay ithway ethay ilkensay earl-colouredpay embranemay, ikelay
ethay ininglay ofay aay inefay elissepay, ormingfay ethay inneray urfacesay ofay ethay Ermspay
Ale’swhay asecay.

Itay illway avehay eenbay eensay atthay ethay Eidelburghhay Untay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay
embracesay ethay entireay engthlay ofay ethay entireay optay ofay ethay eadhay; anday ince—assay
ashay eenbay elsewhereay etsay orth—thefay eadhay embracesay oneay irdthay ofay ethay olewhay
engthlay ofay ethay eaturecray, enthay ettingsay atthay engthlay ownday atay eightyay eetfay
orfay aay oodgay izedsay alewhay, ouyay avehay oremay anthay enty-sixtway eetfay orfay ethay
epthday ofay ethay untay, enwhay itay isay engthwiselay oistedhay upay anday ownday againstay aay
ip’sshay idesay.

Asay inay ecapitatingday ethay alewhay, ethay operator’say instrumentay isay oughtbray
oseclay otay ethay otspay erewhay anay entranceay isay ubsequentlysay orcedfay intoay ethay
ermacetispay agazinemay; ehay ashay, ereforethay, otay ebay uncommonlyay eedfulhay, estlay
aay arelesscay, untimelyay okestray ouldshay invadeay ethay anctuarysay anday astinglyway
etlay outay itsay invaluableay ontentscay. Itay isay isthay ecapitatedday enday ofay ethay
eadhay, alsoay, ichwhay isay atay astlay elevateday outay ofay ethay aterway, anday etainedray inay
atthay ositionpay byay ethay enormousay uttingcay acklestay, osewhay empenhay
ombinationscay, onay oneay idesay, akemay uiteqay aay ildernessway ofay opesray inay atthay
uarterqay.

Usthay uchmay eingbay aidsay, attenday ownay, Iay aypray ouyay, otay atthay arvellousmay and—inay
isthay articularpay instance—almostay atalfay operationay erebywhay ethay Ermspay
Ale’swhay eatgray Eidelburghhay Untay isay appedtay.


APTERcHay 78ay. Isterncay anday Ucketsbay.

Imblenay asay aay atcay, Ashtegotay ountsmay aloftay; anday ithoutway alteringay ishay erectay
osturepay, unsray aightstray outay uponay ethay overhangingay ainyard-armmay, otay ethay
artpay erewhay itay exactlyay ojectspray overay ethay oistedhay Untay. Ehay ashay arriedcay
ithway imhay aay ightlay ackletay alledcay aay ipwhay, onsistingcay ofay onlyay otway artspay,
avellingtray oughthray aay ingle-sheavedsay ockblay. Ecuringsay isthay ockblay, osay atthay
itay angshay ownday omfray ethay ard-armyay, ehay ingssway oneay enday ofay ethay operay, illtay itay
isay aughtcay anday irmlyfay eldhay byay aay andhay onay eckday. Enthay, and-over-handhay, ownday
ethay otheray artpay, ethay Indianay opsdray oughthray ethay airay, illtay exterouslyday ehay
andslay onay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay eadhay. Ere—stillthay ighhay elevateday aboveay ethay
estray ofay ethay ompanycay, otay omwhay ehay ivaciouslyvay ies—hecray eemssay omesay Urkishtay
Uezzinmay allingcay ethay oodgay eoplepay otay ayerspray omfray ethay optay ofay aay owertay. Aay
ort-handledshay arpshay adespay eingbay entsay upay otay imhay, ehay iligentlyday earchessay
orfay ethay operpray aceplay otay eginbay eakingbray intoay ethay Untay. Inay isthay usinessbay
ehay oceedspray eryvay eedfullyhay, ikelay aay easure-huntertray inay omesay olday ousehay,
oundingsay ethay allsway otay indfay erewhay ethay oldgay isay asonedmay inay. Byay ethay imetay
isthay autiouscay earchsay isay overay, aay outstay iron-bounday ucketbay, eciselypray ikelay
aay ell-bucketway, ashay eenbay attacheday otay oneay enday ofay ethay ipwhay; ilewhay ethay
otheray enday, eingbay etchedstray acrossay ethay eckday, isay erethay eldhay byay otway oray
eethray alertay andshay. Esethay astlay ownay oisthay ethay ucketbay ithinway aspgray ofay ethay
Indianay, otay omwhay anotheray ersonpay ashay eachedray upay aay eryvay onglay olepay.
Insertingay isthay olepay intoay ethay ucketbay, Ashtegotay ownwardday uidesgay ethay
ucketbay intoay ethay Untay, illtay itay entirelyay isappearsday; enthay ivinggay ethay ordway
otay ethay eamensay atay ethay ipwhay, upay omescay ethay ucketbay againay, allay ubblingbay ikelay
aay airy-maid’sday ailpay ofay ewnay ilkmay. Arefullycay oweredlay omfray itsay eighthay, ethay
ull-freightedfay esselvay isay aughtcay byay anay appointeday andhay, anday uicklyqay
emptieday intoay aay argelay ubtay. Enthay emountingray aloftay, itay againay oesgay oughthray
ethay amesay oundray untilay ethay eepday isterncay illway ieldyay onay oremay. Owardstay ethay
enday, Ashtegotay ashay otay amray ishay onglay olepay arderhay anday arderhay, anday eeperday
anday eeperday intoay ethay Untay, untilay omesay entytway eetfay ofay ethay olepay avehay onegay
ownday.

Ownay, ethay eoplepay ofay ethay Equodpay adhay eenbay alingbay omesay imetay inay isthay ayway;
everalsay ubstay adhay eenbay illedfay ithway ethay agrantfray ermspay; enwhay allay atay onceay
aay ueerqay accidentay appenedhay. Etherwhay itay asway atthay Ashtegotay, atthay ildway
Indianay, asway osay eedlesshay anday ecklessray asay otay etlay ogay orfay aay omentmay ishay
one-handeday oldhay onay ethay eatgray abledcay acklestay uspendingsay ethay eadhay; oray
etherwhay ethay aceplay erewhay ehay oodstay asway osay eacheroustray anday oozyay; oray
etherwhay ethay Evilay Oneay imselfhay ouldway avehay itay otay allfay outay osay, ithoutway
atingstay ishay articularpay easonsray; owhay itay asway exactlyay, erethay isay onay ellingtay
ownay; utbay, onay aay uddensay, asay ethay eightiethay oray inetiethnay ucketbay amecay
uckinglysay up—myay Odgay! oorpay Ashtego—liketay ethay intway eciprocatingray ucketbay
inay aay eritablevay ellway, oppeddray ead-foremosthay ownday intoay isthay eatgray Untay ofay
Eidelburghhay, anday ithway aay orriblehay oilyay urglinggay, entway eanclay outay ofay
ightsay!

an“May overboard!”ay iedcray Aggooday, owhay amiday ethay eneralgay onsternationcay irstfay
amecay otay ishay ensessay. ing“Sway ethay ucketbay isthay ay!”way anday uttingpay oneay ootfay
intoay itay, osay asay ethay etterbay otay ecuresay ishay ipperyslay and-holdhay onay ethay ipwhay
itselfay, ethay oistershay anray imhay ighhay upay otay ethay optay ofay ethay eadhay, almostay
eforebay Ashtegotay ouldcay avehay eachedray itsay interioray ottombay. Eantimemay, erethay
asway aay erribletay umulttay. Ookinglay overay ethay idesay, eythay awsay ethay eforebay
ifelesslay eadhay obbingthray anday eavinghay ustjay elowbay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay easay,
asay ifay atthay omentmay eizedsay ithway omesay omentousmay ideaay; ereaswhay itay asway onlyay
ethay oorpay Indianay unconsciouslyay evealingray byay osethay ugglesstray ethay erilouspay
epthday otay ichwhay ehay adhay unksay.

Atay isthay instantay, ilewhay Aggooday, onay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay eadhay, asway earingclay
ethay ip—whichwhay adhay omehowsay otgay oulfay ofay ethay eatgray uttingcay ackles—atay
arpshay ackingcray oisenay asway eardhay; anday otay ethay unspeakableay orrorhay ofay allay,
oneay ofay ethay otway enormousay ookshay uspendingsay ethay eadhay oretay outay, anday ithway aay
astvay ibrationvay ethay enormousay assmay idewayssay ungsway, illtay ethay unkdray ipshay
eeledray anday ookshay asay ifay ittensmay byay anay icebergay. Ethay oneay emainingray ookhay,
uponay ichwhay ethay entireay ainstray ownay ependedday, eemedsay everyay instantay otay ebay
onay ethay ointpay ofay ivinggay ayway; anay eventay illstay oremay ikelylay omfray ethay iolentvay
otionsmay ofay ethay eadhay.

ome“Cay ownday, omecay own!”day elledyay ethay eamensay otay Aggooday, utbay ithway oneay andhay
oldinghay onay otay ethay eavyhay acklestay, osay atthay ifay ethay eadhay ouldshay opdray, ehay
ouldway illstay emainray uspendedsay; ethay egronay avinghay earedclay ethay oulfay inelay,
ammedray ownday ethay ucketbay intoay ethay ownay ollapsedcay ellway, eaningmay atthay ethay
uriedbay arpooneerhay ouldshay aspgray itay, anday osay ebay oistedhay outay.

In“ay eaven’shay amenay, an,”may iedcray Ubbstay, are“ay ouyay ammingray omehay aay artridgecay
ere?—Avastthay! Owhay illway atthay elphay imhay; ammingjay atthay iron-bounday ucketbay onay
optay ofay ishay eadhay? Avastay, illway e!”yay

and“Stay earclay ofay ethay ackle!”tay iedcray aay oicevay ikelay ethay urstingbay ofay aay
ocketray.

Almostay inay ethay amesay instantay, ithway aay under-boomthay, ethay enormousay assmay
oppeddray intoay ethay easay, ikelay Iagara’snay Able-Rocktay intoay ethay irlpoolwhay; ethay
uddenlysay elievedray ullhay olledray awayay omfray itay, otay arfay ownday erhay itteringglay
oppercay; anday allay aughtcay eirthay eathbray, asay alfhay inging—nowsway overay ethay
ailors’say eadshay, anday ownay overay ethay ater—Daggooway, oughthray aay ickthay istmay ofay
ayspray, asway imlyday eheldbay ingingclay otay ethay endulouspay acklestay, ilewhay oorpay,
uried-alivebay Ashtegotay asway inkingsay utterlyay ownday otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay
easay! Utbay ardlyhay adhay ethay indingblay aporvay earedclay awayay, enwhay aay akednay
igurefay ithway aay oarding-swordbay inay ishay andhay, asway orfay oneay iftsway omentmay eensay
overinghay overay ethay ulwarksbay. Ethay extnay, aay oudlay ashsplay announceday atthay myay
avebray Ueequegqay adhay ivedday otay ethay escueray. Oneay ackedpay ushray asway ademay otay ethay
idesay, anday everyay eyeay ountedcay everyay ippleray, asay omentmay ollowedfay omentmay,
anday onay ignsay ofay eitheray ethay inkersay oray ethay iverday ouldcay ebay eensay. Omesay andshay
ownay umpedjay intoay aay oatbay alongsideay, anday ushedpay aay ittlelay offay omfray ethay
ipshay.

a“Hay! a!”hay iedcray Aggooday, allay atay onceay, omfray ishay ownay uietqay, ingingsway erchpay
overheaday; anday ookinglay urtherfay offay omfray ethay idesay, eway awsay anay armay ustthray
uprightay omfray ethay ueblay avesway; aay ightsay angestray otay eesay, asay anay armay ustthray
orthfay omfray ethay assgray overay aay avegray.

oth“Bay! oth!—itbay isay oth!”—criedbay Aggooday againay ithway aay oyfuljay outshay; anday
oonsay afteray, Ueequegqay asway eensay oldlybay ikingstray outay ithway oneay andhay, anday
ithway ethay otheray utchingclay ethay onglay airhay ofay ethay Indianay. Awndray intoay ethay
aitingway oatbay, eythay ereway uicklyqay oughtbray otay ethay eckday; utbay Ashtegotay asway
onglay inay omingcay otay, anday Ueequegqay idday otnay ooklay eryvay iskbray.

Ownay, owhay adhay isthay oblenay escueray eenbay accomplisheday? Whyay, ivingday afteray ethay
owlyslay escendingday eadhay, Ueequegqay ithway ishay eenkay ordsway adhay ademay idesay
ungeslay earnay itsay ottombay, osay asay otay uttlescay aay argelay olehay erethay; enthay
oppingdray ishay ordsway, adhay ustthray ishay onglay armay arfay inwardsay anday upwardsay,
anday osay auledhay outay oorpay Ashtay byay ethay eadhay. Ehay averreday, atthay uponay irstfay
ustingthray inay orfay imhay, aay eglay asway esentedpray; utbay ellway owingknay atthay atthay
asway otnay asay itay oughtay otay ebay, anday ightmay occasionay eatgray ouble;—hetray adhay
ustthray ackbay ethay eglay, anday byay aay exterousday eavehay anday osstay, adhay oughtwray aay
omersetsay uponay ethay Indianay; osay atthay ithway ethay extnay ialtray, ehay amecay orthfay inay
ethay oodgay olday ay—headway oremostfay. Asay orfay ethay eatgray eadhay itselfay, atthay asway
oingday asay ellway asay ouldcay ebay expecteday.

Anday usthay, oughthray ethay ouragecay anday eatgray illskay inay obstetricsay ofay
Ueequegqay, ethay eliveranceday, oray atherray, eliveryday ofay Ashtegotay, asway
uccessfullysay accomplisheday, inay ethay eethtay, ootay, ofay ethay ostmay untowarday anday
apparentlyay opelesshay impedimentsay; ichwhay isay aay essonlay byay onay eansmay otay ebay
orgottenfay. Idwiferymay ouldshay ebay aughttay inay ethay amesay oursecay ithway encingfay
anday oxingbay, idingray anday owingray.

Iay owknay atthay isthay ueerqay adventureay ofay ethay Ay-Header’sgay illway ebay uresay otay
eemsay incredibleay otay omesay andsmenlay, oughthay eythay emselvesthay aymay avehay
eitheray eensay oray eardhay ofay omesay one’say allingfay intoay aay isterncay ashoreay; anay
accidentay ichwhay otnay eldomsay appenshay, anday ithway uchmay esslay easonray ootay anthay
ethay Indian’say, onsideringcay ethay exceedingay ipperinessslay ofay ethay urbcay ofay ethay
Ermspay Ale’swhay ellway.

Utbay, eradventurepay, itay aymay ebay agaciouslysay urgeday, owhay isay isthay? Eway oughtthay
ethay issuedtay, infiltrateday eadhay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, asway ethay ightestlay anday
ostmay orkycay artpay aboutay imhay; anday etyay outhay akestmay itay inksay inay anay elementay ofay
aay arfay eatergray ecificspay avitygray anthay itselfay. Eway avehay eethay erethay. Otnay atay
allay, utbay Iay avehay eyay; orfay atay ethay imetay oorpay Ashtay ellfay inay, ethay asecay adhay
eenbay earlynay emptieday ofay itsay ighterlay ontentscay, eavinglay ittlelay utbay ethay
enseday endinoustay allway ofay ethay ell—away oubleday eldedway, ammeredhay ubstancesay,
asay Iay avehay eforebay aidsay, uchmay eavierhay anthay ethay easay aterway, anday aay umplay ofay
ichwhay inkssay inay itay ikelay eadlay almostay. Utbay ethay endencytay otay apidray inkingsay
inay isthay ubstancesay asway inay ethay esentpray instanceay ateriallymay ounteractedcay
byay ethay otheray artspay ofay ethay eadhay emainingray undetacheday omfray itay, osay atthay itay
anksay eryvay owlyslay anday eliberatelyday indeeday, affordingay Ueequegqay aay airfay
ancechay orfay erformingpay ishay agileay obstetricsay onay ethay unray, asay ouyay aymay aysay.
Esyay, itay asway aay unningray eliveryday, osay itay asway.

Ownay, adhay Ashtegotay erishedpay inay atthay eadhay, itay adhay eenbay aay eryvay eciouspray
erishingpay; otheredsmay inay ethay eryvay itestwhay anday aintiestday ofay agrantfray
ermacetispay; offinedcay, earsedhay, anday ombedtay inay ethay ecretsay inneray amberchay
anday anctumsay anctorumsay ofay ethay alewhay. Onlyay oneay eetersway enday ancay eadilyray ebay
ecalled—theray eliciousday eathday ofay anay Ohioay oney-hunterhay, owhay eekingsay oneyhay
inay ethay otchcray ofay aay ollowhay eetray, oundfay uchsay exceedingay orestay ofay itay, atthay
eaninglay ootay arfay overay, itay uckedsay imhay inay, osay atthay ehay iedday embalmeday. Owhay
anymay, inkthay eyay, avehay ikewiselay allenfay intoay Ato’splay oneyhay eadhay, anday
eetlysway erishedpay erethay?


APTERcHay 79ay. Ethay Airiepray.

Otay anscay ethay ineslay ofay ishay acefay, oray eelfay ethay umpsbay onay ethay eadhay ofay isthay
Eviathanlay; isthay isay aay ingthay ichwhay onay Iognomistphysay oray Enologistphray ashay
asay etyay undertakenay. Uchsay anay enterpriseay ouldway eemsay almostay asay opefulhay asay
orfay Avaterlay otay avehay utinizedscray ethay inkleswray onay ethay Ockray ofay Ibraltargay,
oray orfay Allgay otay avehay ountedmay aay adderlay anday anipulatedmay ethay Omeday ofay ethay
Antheonpay. Illstay, inay atthay amousfay orkway ofay ishay, Avaterlay otnay onlyay eatstray ofay
ethay ariousvay acesfay ofay enmay, utbay alsoay attentivelyay udiesstay ethay acesfay ofay
orseshay, irdsbay, erpentssay, anday ishfay; anday ellsdway inay etailday uponay ethay
odificationsmay ofay expressionay iscernibleday ereinthay. Ornay avehay Allgay anday ishay
iscipleday Urzheimspay ailedfay otay owthray outay omesay intshay ouchingtay ethay
enologicalphray aracteristicschay ofay otheray eingsbay anthay anmay. Ereforethay,
oughthay Iay amay utbay illay ualifiedqay orfay aay ioneerpay, inay ethay applicationay ofay
esethay otway emi-sciencessay otay ethay alewhay, Iay illway oday myay endeavoray. Iay tryay allay
ingsthay; Iay achieveay atwhay Iay ancay.

Iognomicallyphysay egardedray, ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay anay anomalousay eaturecray. Ehay
ashay onay operpray osenay. Anday incesay ethay osenay isay ethay entralcay anday ostmay
onspicuouscay ofay ethay eaturesfay; anday incesay itay erhapspay ostmay odifiesmay anday
inallyfay ontrolscay eirthay ombinedcay expressionay; encehay itay ouldway eemsay atthay
itsay entireay absenceay, asay anay externalay appendageay, ustmay eryvay argelylay affectay
ethay ountenancecay ofay ethay alewhay. Orfay asay inay andscapelay ardeninggay, aay irespay,
upolacay, onumentmay, oray owertay ofay omesay ortsay, isay eemedday almostay indispensableay
otay ethay ompletioncay ofay ethay enescay; osay onay acefay ancay ebay iognomicallyphysay inay
eepingkay ithoutway ethay elevateday open-workay elfrybay ofay ethay osenay. Ashday ethay
osenay omfray Idias’sphay arblemay Ovejay, anday atwhay aay orrysay emainderray!
Everthelessnay, Eviathanlay isay ofay osay ightymay aay agnitudemay, allay ishay
oportionspray areay osay atelystay, atthay ethay amesay eficiencyday ichwhay inay ethay
ulpturedscay Ovejay ereway ideoushay, inay imhay isay onay emishblay atay allay. Aynay, itay isay
anay addeday andeurgray. Aay osenay otay ethay alewhay ouldway avehay eenbay impertinentay. Asay
onay ouryay iognomicalphysay oyagevay ouyay ailsay oundray ishay astvay eadhay inay ouryay
olly-boatjay, ouryay oblenay onceptionscay ofay imhay areay evernay insulteday byay ethay
eflectionray atthay ehay ashay aay osenay otay ebay ulledpay. Aay estilentpay onceitcay, ichwhay
osay oftenay illway insistay uponay obtrudingay evenay enwhay eholdingbay ethay ightiestmay
oyalray eadlebay onay ishay onethray.

Inay omesay articularspay, erhapspay ethay ostmay imposingay iognomicalphysay iewvay otay
ebay adhay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, isay atthay ofay ethay ullfay ontfray ofay ishay eadhay. Isthay
aspectay isay ublimesay.

Inay oughtthay, aay inefay umanhay owbray isay ikelay ethay Eastay enwhay oubledtray ithway ethay
orningmay. Inay ethay eposeray ofay ethay asturepay, ethay urledcay owbray ofay ethay ullbay ashay
aay ouchtay ofay ethay andgray inay itay. Ushingpay eavyhay annoncay upay ountainmay efilesday,
ethay elephant’say owbray isay ajesticmay. Umanhay oray animalay, ethay icalmystay owbray isay
asay atthay eatgray oldengay ealsay affixeday byay ethay Ermangay emperorsay otay eirthay
ecreesday. Itay ignifies—“Godsay: oneday isthay ayday byay myay and.”hay Utbay inay ostmay
eaturescray, aynay inay anmay imselfhay, eryvay oftenay ethay owbray isay utbay aay eremay ipstray
ofay alpineay andlay inglyay alongay ethay owsnay inelay. Ewfay areay ethay oreheadsfay ichwhay
ikelay Akespeare’sshay oray Elancthon’smay iseray osay ighhay, anday escendday osay owlay,
atthay ethay eyesay emselvesthay eemsay earclay, eternalay, idelesstay ountainmay akeslay;
anday allay aboveay emthay inay ethay orehead’sfay inkleswray, ouyay eemsay otay acktray ethay
antlereday oughtsthay escendingday erethay otay inkdray, asay ethay Ighlandhay untershay
acktray ethay owsnay intspray ofay ethay eerday. Utbay inay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay, isthay
ighhay anday ightymay od-likegay ignityday inherentay inay ethay owbray isay osay immenselyay
amplifieday, atthay azinggay onay itay, inay atthay ullfay ontfray iewvay, ouyay eelfay ethay
Eityday anday ethay eaddray owerspay oremay orciblyfay anthay inay eholdingbay anyay otheray
objectay inay ivinglay aturenay. Orfay ouyay eesay onay oneay ointpay eciselypray; otnay oneay
istinctday eaturefay isay evealedray; onay osenay, eyesay, earsay, oray outhmay; onay acefay;
ehay ashay onenay, operpray; othingnay utbay atthay oneay oadbray irmamentfay ofay aay
oreheadfay, eatedplay ithway iddlesray; umblyday oweringlay ithway ethay oomday ofay oatsbay,
anday ipsshay, anday enmay. Ornay, inay ofilepray, oesday isthay ondrousway owbray iminishday;
oughthay atthay ayway iewedvay itsay andeurgray oesday otnay omineerday uponay ouyay osay. Inay
ofilepray, ouyay ainlyplay erceivepay atthay orizontalhay, emi-crescenticsay
epressionday inay ethay orehead’sfay iddlemay, ichwhay, inay anmay, isay Avater’slay arkmay
ofay eniusgay.

Utbay owhay? Eniusgay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay? Ashay ethay Ermspay Alewhay everay ittenwray aay
ookbay, okenspay aay eechspay? Onay, ishay eatgray eniusgay isay eclaredday inay ishay oingday
othingnay articularpay otay ovepray itay. Itay isay oreovermay eclaredday inay ishay
amidicalpyray ilencesay. Anday isthay emindsray emay atthay adhay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay
eenbay ownknay otay ethay oungyay Orientay Orldway, ehay ouldway avehay eenbay eifiedday byay
eirthay ild-magianchay oughtsthay. Eythay eifiedday ethay ocodilecray ofay ethay Ilenay,
ecausebay ethay ocodilecray isay onguelesstay; anday ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay onay onguetay,
oray atay eastlay itay isay osay exceedinglyay allsmay, asay otay ebay incapableay ofay
otrusionpray. Ifay ereafterhay anyay ighlyhay ulturedcay, oeticalpay ationnay allshay
urelay ackbay otay eirthay irth-rightbay, ethay errymay Ay-daymay odsgay ofay olday; anday
ivinglylay enthroneay emthay againay inay ethay ownay egotisticalay skyay; inay ethay ownay
unhaunteday illhay; enthay ebay uresay, exalteday otay Ove’sjay ighhay eatsay, ethay eatgray
Ermspay Alewhay allshay ordlay itay.

Ampollionchay ecipheredday ethay inkledwray anitegray ieroglyphicshay. Utbay erethay isay
onay Ampollionchay otay ecipherday ethay Egyptay ofay everyay an’smay anday everyay eing’sbay
acefay. Iognomyphysay, ikelay everyay otheray umanhay iencescay, isay utbay aay assingpay
ablefay. Ifay enthay, Irsay Illiamway Onesjay, owhay eadray inay irtythay anguageslay, ouldcay
otnay eadray ethay implestsay easant’spay acefay inay itsay ofounderpray anday oremay ubtlesay
eaningsmay, owhay aymay unlettereday Ishmaelay opehay otay eadray ethay awfulay Aldeechay ofay
ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay owbray? Iay utbay utpay atthay owbray eforebay ouyay. Eadray itay ifay ouyay
ancay.


APTERcHay 80ay. Ethay Utnay.

Ifay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ebay iognomicallyphysay aay Inxsphay, otay ethay enologistphray
ishay ainbray eemssay atthay eometricalgay irclecay ichwhay itay isay impossibleay otay
uaresqay.

Inay ethay ull-grownfay eaturecray ethay ullskay illway easuremay atay eastlay entytway eetfay
inay engthlay. Unhingeay ethay owerlay awjay, anday ethay idesay iewvay ofay isthay ullskay isay asay
ethay idesay ofay aay oderatelymay inclineday aneplay estingray oughoutthray onay aay evellay
asebay. Utbay inay ife—aslay eway avehay elsewhereay een—thissay inclineday aneplay isay
angularlyay illedfay upay, anday almostay uaredsqay byay ethay enormousay uperincumbentsay
assmay ofay ethay unkjay anday ermspay. Atay ethay ighhay enday ethay ullskay ormsfay aay atercray otay
edbay atthay artpay ofay ethay assmay; ilewhay underay ethay onglay oorflay ofay isthay ater—incray
anotheray avitycay eldomsay exceedingay entay inchesay inay engthlay anday asay anymay inay
epth—reposesday ethay eremay andfulhay ofay isthay onster’smay ainbray. Ethay ainbray isay atay
eastlay entytway eetfay omfray ishay apparentay oreheadfay inay ifelay; itay isay iddenhay awayay
ehindbay itsay astvay outworksay, ikelay ethay innermostay itadelcay ithinway ethay
amplifieday ortificationsfay ofay Uebecqay. Osay ikelay aay oicechay asketcay isay itay
ecretedsay inay imhay, atthay Iay avehay ownknay omesay alemenwhay owhay eremptorilypay enyday
atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay anyay otheray ainbray anthay atthay alpablepay emblancesay
ofay oneay ormedfay byay ethay ubic-yardscay ofay ishay ermspay agazinemay. Inglyay inay
angestray oldsfay, oursescay, anday onvolutionscay, otay eirthay apprehensionsay, itay
eemssay oremay inay eepingkay ithway ethay ideaay ofay ishay eneralgay ightmay otay egardray atthay
icmystay artpay ofay imhay asay ethay eatsay ofay ishay intelligenceay.

Itay isay ainplay, enthay, atthay enologicallyphray ethay eadhay ofay isthay Eviathanlay, inay
ethay eature’scray ivinglay intactay atestay, isay anay entireay elusionday. Asay orfay ishay
uetray ainbray, ouyay ancay enthay eesay onay indicationsay ofay itay, ornay eelfay anyay. Ethay
alewhay, ikelay allay ingsthay atthay areay ightymay, earsway aay alsefay owbray otay ethay
ommoncay orldway.

Ifay ouyay unloaday ishay ullskay ofay itsay ermyspay eapshay anday enthay aketay aay earray iewvay
ofay itsay earray enday, ichwhay isay ethay ighhay enday, ouyay illway ebay uckstray byay itsay
esemblanceray otay ethay umanhay ullskay, eheldbay inay ethay amesay ituationsay, anday omfray
ethay amesay ointpay ofay iewvay. Indeeday, aceplay isthay eversedray ullskay aled(scay ownday
otay ethay umanhay agnitudemay) amongay aay ateplay ofay en’smay ullsskay, anday ouyay ouldway
involuntarilyay onfoundcay itay ithway emthay; anday emarkingray ethay epressionsday onay
oneay artpay ofay itsay ummitsay, inay enologicalphray asephray ouyay ouldway ay—Thissay anmay
adhay onay elf-esteemsay, anday onay enerationvay. Anday byay osethay egationsnay,
onsideredcay alongay ithway ethay affirmativeay actfay ofay ishay odigiouspray ulkbay anday
owerpay, ouyay ancay estbay ormfay otay ourselfyay ethay uesttray, oughthay otnay ethay ostmay
exhilaratingay onceptioncay ofay atwhay ethay ostmay exalteday otencypay isay.

Utbay ifay omfray ethay omparativecay imensionsday ofay ethay ale’swhay operpray ainbray, ouyay
eemday itay incapableay ofay eingbay adequatelyay artedchay, enthay Iay avehay anotheray ideaay
orfay ouyay. Ifay ouyay attentivelyay egardray almostay anyay uadruped’sqay inespay, ouyay
illway ebay uckstray ithway ethay esemblanceray ofay itsay ertebrævay otay aay ungstray
ecklacenay ofay arfeddway ullsskay, allay earingbay udimentalray esemblanceray otay ethay
ullskay operpray. Itay isay aay Ermangay onceitcay, atthay ethay ertebrævay areay absolutelyay
undevelopeday ullsskay. Utbay ethay uriouscay externalay esemblanceray, Iay aketay itay ethay
Ermansgay ereway otnay ethay irstfay enmay otay erceivepay. Aay oreignfay iendfray onceay
ointedpay itay outay otay emay, inay ethay eletonskay ofay aay oefay ehay adhay ainslay, anday ithway
ethay ertebrævay ofay ichwhay ehay asway inlayingay, inay aay ortsay ofay asso-relievobay, ethay
eakedbay owpray ofay ishay anoecay. Ownay, Iay onsidercay atthay ethay enologistsphray avehay
omitteday anay importantay ingthay inay otnay ushingpay eirthay investigationsay omfray ethay
erebellumcay oughthray ethay inalspay analcay. Orfay Iay elievebay atthay uchmay ofay aay an’smay
aracterchay illway ebay oundfay etokenedbay inay ishay ackbonebay. Iay ouldway atherray eelfay
ouryay inespay anthay ouryay ullskay, oeverwhay ouyay areay. Aay inthay oistjay ofay aay inespay
evernay etyay uphelday aay ullfay anday oblenay oulsay. Iay ejoiceray inay myay inespay, asay inay
ethay irmfay audaciousay affstay ofay atthay agflay ichwhay Iay ingflay alfhay outay otay ethay
orldway.

Applyay isthay inalspay anchbray ofay enologyphray otay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Ishay anialcray
avitycay isay ontinuouscay ithway ethay irstfay eck-vertebranay; anday inay atthay ertebravay
ethay ottombay ofay ethay inalspay analcay illway easuremay entay inchesay acrossay, eingbay
eightay inay eighthay, anday ofay aay iangulartray igurefay ithway ethay asebay ownwardsday. Asay
itay assespay oughthray ethay emainingray ertebrævay ethay analcay aperstay inay izesay, utbay
orfay aay onsiderablecay istanceday emainsray ofay argelay apacitycay. Ownay, ofay oursecay,
isthay analcay isay illedfay ithway uchmay ethay amesay angelystray ibrousfay ubstance—thesay
inalspay ord—ascay ethay ainbray; anday irectlyday ommunicatescay ithway ethay ainbray. Anday
atwhay isay illstay oremay, orfay anymay eetfay afteray emergingay omfray ethay ain’sbray
avitycay, ethay inalspay ordcay emainsray ofay anay undecreasingay irthgay, almostay equalay
otay atthay ofay ethay ainbray. Underay allay esethay ircumstancescay, ouldway itay ebay
unreasonableay otay urveysay anday apmay outay ethay ale’swhay inespay enologicallyphray?
Orfay, iewedvay inay isthay ightlay, ethay onderfulway omparativecay allnesssmay ofay ishay
ainbray operpray isay oremay anthay ompensatedcay byay ethay onderfulway omparativecay
agnitudemay ofay ishay inalspay ordcay.

Utbay eavinglay isthay inthay otay operateay asay itay aymay ithway ethay enologistsphray, Iay
ouldway erelymay assumeay ethay inalspay eorythay orfay aay omentmay, inay eferenceray otay ethay
Ermspay Ale’swhay umphay. Isthay augustay umphay, ifay Iay istakemay otnay, isesray overay oneay
ofay ethay argerlay ertebrævay, anday isay, ereforethay, inay omesay ortsay, ethay outeray
onvexcay ouldmay ofay itay. Omfray itsay elativeray ituationsay enthay, Iay ouldshay allcay
isthay ighhay umphay ethay organay ofay irmnessfay oray indomitablenessay inay ethay Ermspay
Alewhay. Anday atthay ethay eatgray onstermay isay indomitableay, ouyay illway etyay avehay
easonray otay owknay.


APTERcHay 81ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Irginvay.

Ethay edestinatedpray ayday arriveday, anday eway ulyday etmay ethay ipshay Ungfraujay,
Erickday Eday Eerday, astermay, ofay Emenbray.

Atay oneay imetay ethay eatestgray alingwhay eoplepay inay ethay orldway, ethay Utchday anday
Ermansgay areay ownay amongay ethay eastlay; utbay erehay anday erethay atay eryvay ideway
intervalsay ofay atitudelay anday ongitudelay, ouyay illstay occasionallyay eetmay ithway
eirthay agflay inay ethay Acificpay.

Orfay omesay easonray, ethay Ungfraujay eemedsay uiteqay eageray otay aypay erhay espectsray.
Ilewhay etyay omesay istanceday omfray ethay Equodpay, eshay oundedray otay, anday oppingdray aay
oatbay, erhay aptaincay asway impelleday owardstay usay, impatientlyay andingstay inay ethay
owsbay insteaday ofay ethay ernstay.

at“Whay ashay ehay inay ishay andhay ere?”thay iedcray Arbuckstay, ointingpay otay omethingsay
avinglyway eldhay byay ethay Ermangay. Impossible!—a“ay amp-feeder!”lay

ot“Nay at,”thay aidsay Ubbstay, o“nay, onay, it’say aay offee-potcay, Mray. Arbuckstay; e’shay
omingcay offay otay akemay usay ouray offeecay, isay ethay Armanyay; on’tday ouyay eesay atthay igbay
intay ancay erethay alongsideay ofay im?—that’shay ishay oilingbay aterway. Ohay! e’shay allay
ightray, isay ethay Arman.”yay

o“Gay alongay ithway ou,”yay iedcray Askflay, it’s“ay aay amp-feederlay anday anay oil-canay.
E’shay outay ofay oilay, anday ashay omecay a-begging.”ay

Oweverhay uriouscay itay aymay eemsay orfay anay oil-shipay otay ebay orrowingbay oilay onay ethay
ale-groundwhay, anday oweverhay uchmay itay aymay invertedlyay ontradictcay ethay olday
overbpray aboutay arryingcay oalscay otay Ewcastlenay, etyay ometimessay uchsay aay ingthay
eallyray appenshay; anday inay ethay esentpray asecay Aptaincay Erickday Eday Eerday idday
indubitablyay onductcay aay amp-feederlay asay Askflay idday eclareday.

Asay ehay ountedmay ethay eckday, Ahabay abruptlyay accosteday imhay, ithoutway atay allay
eedinghay atwhay ehay adhay inay ishay andhay; utbay inay ishay okenbray ingolay, ethay Ermangay
oonsay evinceday ishay ompletecay ignoranceay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay; immediatelyay
urningtay ethay onversationcay otay ishay amp-feederlay anday oilay ancay, ithway omesay
emarksray ouchingtay ishay avinghay otay urntay intoay ishay ammockhay atay ightnay inay
ofoundpray arkness—hisday astlay opdray ofay Emenbray oilay eingbay onegay, anday otnay aay
inglesay ing-fishflyay etyay apturedcay otay upplysay ethay eficiencyday; oncludingcay byay
intinghay atthay ishay ipshay asway indeeday atwhay inay ethay Isheryfay isay echnicallytay
alledcay aay ean__clay oneay at(thay isay, anay emptyay one)ay, ellway eservingday ethay amenay
ofay Ungfraujay oray ethay Irginvay.

Ishay ecessitiesnay uppliedsay, Erickday epartedday; utbay ehay adhay otnay ainedgay ishay
ip’sshay idesay, enwhay aleswhay ereway almostay imultaneouslysay aisedray omfray ethay
ast-headsmay ofay othbay esselsvay; anday osay eageray orfay ethay asechay asway Erickday, atthay
ithoutway ausingpay otay utpay ishay oil-canay anday amp-feederlay aboarday, ehay ewedslay
oundray ishay oatbay anday ademay afteray ethay eviathanlay amp-feederslay.

Ownay, ethay amegay avinghay isenray otay eewardlay, ehay anday ethay otheray eethray Ermangay
oatsbay atthay oonsay ollowedfay imhay, adhay onsiderablycay ethay artstay ofay ethay
Equod’spay eelskay. Erethay ereway eightay aleswhay, anay averageay odpay. Awareay ofay eirthay
angerday, eythay ereway oinggay allay abreastay ithway eatgray eedspay aightstray eforebay
ethay indway, ubbingray eirthay anksflay asay oselyclay asay osay anymay ansspay ofay orseshay inay
arnesshay. Eythay eftlay aay eatgray, ideway akeway, asay oughthay ontinuallycay unrollingay
aay eatgray ideway archmentpay uponay ethay easay.

Ullfay inay isthay apidray akeway, anday anymay athomsfay inay ethay earray, amsway aay ugehay,
umpedhay olday ullbay, ichwhay byay ishay omparativelycay owslay ogresspray, asay ellway asay
byay ethay unusualay ellowishyay incrustationsay overgrowingay imhay, eemedsay
afflicteday ithway ethay aundicejay, oray omesay otheray infirmityay. Etherwhay isthay
alewhay elongedbay otay ethay odpay inay advanceay, eemedsay uestionableqay; orfay itay isay
otnay ustomarycay orfay uchsay enerablevay eviathanslay otay ebay atay allay ocialsay.
Everthelessnay, ehay uckstay otay eirthay akeway, oughthay indeeday eirthay ackbay aterway
ustmay avehay etardedray imhay, ecausebay ethay ite-bonewhay oray ellsway atay ishay oadbray
uzzlemay asway aay ashedday oneay, ikelay ethay ellsway ormedfay enwhay otway ostilehay
urrentscay eetmay. Ishay outspay asway ortshay, owslay, anday aboriouslay; omingcay orthfay
ithway aay okingchay ortsay ofay ushgay, anday endingspay itselfay inay orntay edsshray,
ollowedfay byay angestray ubterraneansay ommotionscay inay imhay, ichwhay eemedsay otay
avehay egressay atay ishay otheray uriedbay extremityay, ausingcay ethay atersway ehindbay
imhay otay upbubbleay.

o’s“Whay otgay omesay aregoric?”pay aidsay Ubbstay, e“hay ashay ethay omach-achestay, I’may
afraiday. Ordlay, inkthay ofay avinghay alfhay anay acreay ofay omach-achestay! Adverseay
indsway areay oldinghay admay Istmaschray inay imhay, oysbay. It’say ethay irstfay oulfay indway
Iay everay ewknay otay owblay omfray asternay; utbay ooklay, idday everay alewhay awyay osay
eforebay? itay ustmay ebay, e’shay ostlay ishay iller.”tay

Asay anay overladenay Indiamanay earingbay ownday ethay Indostanhay oastcay ithway aay eckday
oadlay ofay ightenedfray orseshay, areenscay, uriesbay, ollsray, anday allowsway onay erhay
ayway; osay idday isthay olday alewhay eavehay ishay ageday ulkbay, anday ownay anday enthay artlypay
urningtay overay onay ishay umbrouscay ib-endsray, exposeay ethay ausecay ofay ishay eviousday
akeway inay ethay unnaturalay umpstay ofay ishay arboardstay infay. Etherwhay ehay adhay ostlay
atthay infay inay attlebay, oray adhay eenbay ornbay ithoutway itay, itay ereway ardhay otay aysay.

Only“ay aitway aay itbay, olday apchay, anday I’llay ivegay eyay aay ingslay orfay atthay oundedway
arm,”ay iedcray uelcray Askflay, ointingpay otay ethay ale-linewhay earnay imhay.

ind“May ehay on’tday ingslay eethay ithway it,”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. ive“Gay ayway, oray ethay
Ermangay illway avehay im.”hay

Ithway oneay intentay allay ethay ombinedcay ivalray oatsbay ereway ointedpay orfay isthay oneay
ishfay, ecausebay otnay onlyay asway ehay ethay argestlay, anday ereforethay ethay ostmay
aluablevay alewhay, utbay ehay asway earestnay otay emthay, anday ethay otheray aleswhay ereway
oinggay ithway uchsay eatgray elocityvay, oreovermay, asay almostay otay efyday ursuitpay orfay
ethay imetay. Atay isthay uncturejay ethay Equod’spay eelskay adhay otshay byay ethay eethray
Ermangay oatsbay astlay oweredlay; utbay omfray ethay eatgray artstay ehay adhay adhay,
Erick’sday oatbay illstay edlay ethay asechay, oughthay everyay omentmay earednay byay ishay
oreignfay ivalsray. Ethay onlyay ingthay eythay earedfay, asway, atthay omfray eingbay
alreadyay osay ighnay otay ishay arkmay, ehay ouldway ebay enableday otay artday ishay ironay
eforebay eythay ouldcay ompletelycay overtakeay anday asspay imhay. Asay orfay Erickday, ehay
eemedsay uiteqay onfidentcay atthay isthay ouldway ebay ethay asecay, anday occasionallyay
ithway aay eridingday esturegay ookshay ishay amp-feederlay atay ethay otheray oatsbay.

e“Thay ungraciousay anday ungratefulay og!”day iedcray Arbuckstay; e“hay ocksmay anday
aresday emay ithway ethay eryvay oor-boxpay Iay illedfay orfay imhay otnay ivefay inutesmay
ago!”—thenay inay ishay olday intenseay isper—“Givewhay ayway, eyhoundsgray! Ogday otay
it!”ay

I“ay elltay eyay atwhay itay isay, en”—criedmay Ubbstay otay ishay ew—“it’scray againstay myay
eligionray otay etgay admay; utbay I’day ikelay otay eatay atthay illainousvay
Arman—Pull—won’tyay eyay? Areay eyay oinggay otay etlay atthay ascalray eatbay eyay? Oday eyay
ovelay andybray? Aay ogsheadhay ofay andybray, enthay, otay ethay estbay anmay. Omecay, whyay
on’tday omesay ofay eyay urstbay aay ood-vesselblay? O’swhay atthay eenbay oppingdray anay
anchoray overboard—weay on’tday udgebay anay inch—we’reay ecalmedbay. Alloohay, ere’shay
assgray owinggray inay ethay oat’sbay ottom—andbay byay ethay Ordlay, ethay astmay ere’sthay
uddingbay. Isthay on’tway oday, oysbay. Ooklay atay atthay Armanyay! Ethay ortshay anday onglay
ofay itay isay, enmay, illway eyay itspay irefay oray ot?”nay

Oh“ay! eesay ethay udssay ehay akes!”may iedcray Askflay, ancingday upay anday own—“Whatday aay
ump—Ohhay, o__day ilepay onay ethay eef—laysbay ikelay aay oglay! Ohay! myay adslay, o__day
ing—slap-jacksspray anday uahogsqay orfay uppersay, ouyay owknay, myay ads—bakedlay amsclay
anday uffins—ohmay, o__day, o__day, ing,—he’sspray aay undredhay arreller—don’tbay oselay
imhay ow—don’tnay ohay, on’t!_—see_day atthay Arman—Ohyay, on’tway eyay ullpay orfay ouryay
uffday, myay ads—suchlay aay ogsay! uchsay aay oggersay! On’tday eyay ovelay ermspay? Erethay
oesgay eethray ousandthay ollarsday, en!—amay ank!—abay olewhay ankbay! Ethay ankbay ofay
England!—Ohay, o__day, o__day, o!_—What’s_day atthay Armanyay aboutay ow?”nay

Atay isthay omentmay Erickday asway inay ethay actay ofay itchingpay ishay amp-feederlay atay ethay
advancingay oatsbay, anday alsoay ishay oil-canay; erhapspay ithway ethay oubleday iewvay ofay
etardingray ishay ivals’ray ayway, anday atay ethay amesay imetay economicallyay
acceleratingay ishay ownay byay ethay omentarymay impetusay ofay ethay ackwardbay osstay.

e“Thay unmannerlyay Utchday ogger!”day iedcray Ubbstay. ull“Pay ownay, enmay, ikelay iftyfay
ousandthay ine-of-battle-shiplay oadslay ofay ed-hairedray evilsday. Atwhay ed’yay aysay,
Ashtegotay; areay ouyay ethay anmay otay apsnay ouryay inespay inay o-and-twentytway iecespay
orfay ethay onorhay ofay olday Ayheadgay? Atwhay ed’yay ay?”say

I“ay aysay, ullpay ikelay od-dam,”—criedgay ethay Indianay.

Iercelyfay, utbay evenlyay inciteday byay ethay auntstay ofay ethay Ermangay, ethay Equod’spay
eethray oatsbay ownay eganbay angingray almostay abreastay; anday, osay isposedday,
omentarilymay earednay imhay. Inay atthay inefay, ooselay, ivalrouschay attitudeay ofay ethay
eadsmanhay enwhay awingdray earnay otay ishay eypray, ethay eethray atesmay oodstay upay
oudlypray, occasionallyay ackingbay ethay afteray oarsmanay ithway anay exhilaratingay
cryay ofay, ere“Thay eshay idesslay, ownay! Urrahhay orfay ethay ite-ashwhay eezebray! Ownday
ithway ethay Armanyay! Ailsay overay im!”hay

Utbay osay ecidedday anay originalay artstay adhay Erickday adhay, atthay itespay ofay allay
eirthay allantrygay, ehay ouldway avehay ovedpray ethay ictorvay inay isthay aceray, adhay otnay
aay ighteousray udgmentjay escendedday uponay imhay inay aay abcray ichwhay aughtcay ethay
adeblay ofay ishay idshipmay oarsmanay. Ilewhay isthay umsyclay ubberlay asway ivingstray otay
eefray ishay ite-ashwhay, anday ilewhay, inay onsequencecay, Erick’sday oatbay asway ighnay
otay apsizingcay, anday ehay underingthay awayay atay ishay enmay inay aay ightymay age;—thatray
asway aay oodgay imetay orfay Arbuckstay, Ubbstay, anday Askflay. Ithway aay outshay, eythay ooktay
aay ortalmay artstay orwardsfay, anday antinglyslay angedray upay onay ethay Erman’sgay
uarterqay. Anay instantay oremay, anday allay ourfay oatsbay ereway iagonicallyday inay ethay
ale’swhay immediateay akeway, ilewhay etchingstray omfray emthay, onay othbay idessay, asway
ethay oamingfay ellsway atthay ehay ademay.

Itay asway aay errifictay, ostmay itiablepay, anday addeningmay ightsay. Ethay alewhay asway
ownay oinggay eadhay outay, anday endingsay ishay outspay eforebay imhay inay aay ontinualcay
ormentedtay etjay; ilewhay ishay oneay oorpay infay eatbay ishay idesay inay anay agonyay ofay
ightfray. Ownay otay isthay andhay, ownay otay atthay, ehay awedyay inay ishay alteringfay
ightflay, anday illstay atay everyay illowbay atthay ehay okebray, ehay asmodicallyspay anksay
inay ethay easay, oray idewayssay olledray owardstay ethay skyay ishay oneay eatingbay infay. Osay
avehay Iay eensay aay irdbay ithway ippedclay ingway akingmay affrighteday okenbray irclescay
inay ethay airay, ainlyvay ivingstray otay escapeay ethay iraticalpay awkshay. Utbay ethay irdbay
ashay aay oicevay, anday ithway aintiveplay iescray illway akemay ownknay erhay earfay; utbay ethay
earfay ofay isthay astvay umbday utebray ofay ethay easay, asway ainedchay upay anday enchanteday
inay imhay; ehay adhay onay oicevay, avesay atthay okingchay espirationray oughthray ishay
iraclespay, anday isthay ademay ethay ightsay ofay imhay unspeakablyay itiablepay; ilewhay
illstay, inay ishay amazingay ulkbay, ortcullispay awjay, anday omnipotentay ailtay, erethay
asway enoughay otay appalay ethay outeststay anmay owhay osay itiedpay.

Eeingsay ownay atthay utbay aay eryvay ewfay omentsmay oremay ouldway ivegay ethay Equod’spay
oatsbay ethay advantageay, anday atherray anthay ebay usthay oiledfay ofay ishay amegay, Erickday
osechay otay azardhay atwhay otay imhay ustmay avehay eemedsay aay ostmay unusuallyay onglay
artday, ereay ethay astlay ancechay ouldway orfay everay escapeay.

Utbay onay oonersay idday ishay arpooneerhay andstay upay orfay ethay okestray, anthay allay
eethray igers—Queequegtay, Ashtegotay, Aggoo—instinctivelyday angspray otay eirthay
eetfay, anday andingstay inay aay iagonalday owray, imultaneouslysay ointedpay eirthay
arbsbay; anday artedday overay ethay eadhay ofay ethay Ermangay arpooneerhay, eirthay eethray
Antucketnay ironsay entereday ethay alewhay. Indingblay aporsvay ofay oamfay anday
ite-firewhay! Ethay eethray oatsbay, inay ethay irstfay uryfay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadlonghay
ushray, umpedbay ethay Erman’sgay asideay ithway uchsay orcefay, atthay othbay Erickday anday
ishay affledbay arpooneerhay ereway illedspay outay, anday ailedsay overay byay ethay eethray
ingflyay eelskay.

on’t“Day ebay afraiday, myay utter-boxes,”bay iedcray Ubbstay, astingcay aay assingpay
anceglay uponay emthay asay ehay otshay byay; e’ll“yay ebay ickedpay upay esently—allpray
ight—Iray awsay omesay arksshay astern—Stay. Ernard’sbay ogsday, ouyay ow—relieveknay
istressedday avellerstray. Urrahhay! isthay isay ethay ayway otay ailsay ownay. Everyay eelkay
aay unbeamsay! Urrah!—Herehay eway ogay ikelay eethray intay ettleskay atay ethay ailtay ofay aay
admay ougarcay! Isthay utspay emay inay indmay ofay asteningfay otay anay elephantay inay aay
ilburytay onay aay ain—makesplay ethay eel-spokeswhay flyay, oysbay, enwhay ouyay astenfay otay
imhay atthay ayway; anday ere’sthay angerday ofay eingbay itchedpay outay ootay, enwhay ouyay
ikestray aay illhay. Urrahhay! isthay isay ethay ayway aay ellowfay eelsfay enwhay e’shay oinggay
otay Avyday Ones—alljay aay ushray ownday anay endlessay inclineday aneplay! Urrahhay! isthay
alewhay arriescay ethay everlastingay ail!”may

Utbay ethay onster’smay unray asway aay iefbray oneay. Ivinggay aay uddensay aspgay, ehay
umultuouslytay oundedsay. Ithway aay atinggray ushray, ethay eethray ineslay ewflay oundray
ethay oggerheadslay ithway uchsay aay orcefay asay otay ougegay eepday oovesgray inay emthay;
ilewhay osay earfulfay ereway ethay arpooneershay atthay isthay apidray oundingsay ouldway
oonsay exhaustay ethay ineslay, atthay usingay allay eirthay exterousday ightmay, eythay
aughtcay epeatedray okingsmay urnstay ithway ethay operay otay oldhay onay; illtay atay
ast—owinglay otay ethay erpendicularpay ainstray omfray ethay ead-linedlay ockschay ofay
ethay oatsbay, encewhay ethay eethray opesray entway aightstray ownday intoay ethay ue—theblay
unwalesgay ofay ethay owsbay ereway almostay evenay ithway ethay aterway, ilewhay ethay eethray
ernsstay iltedtay ighhay inay ethay airay. Anday ethay alewhay oonsay easingcay otay oundsay, orfay
omesay imetay eythay emainedray inay atthay attitudeay, earfulfay ofay expendingay oremay
inelay, oughthay ethay ositionpay asway aay ittlelay icklishtay. Utbay oughthay oatsbay avehay
eenbay akentay ownday anday ostlay inay isthay ayway, etyay itay isay isthay olding“hay on,”ay asay
itay isay alledcay; isthay ookinghay upay byay ethay arpshay arbsbay ofay ishay ivelay eshflay omfray
ethay ackbay; isthay itay isay atthay oftenay ormentstay ethay Eviathanlay intoay oonsay isingray
againay otay eetmay ethay arpshay ancelay ofay ishay oesfay. Etyay otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay
erilpay ofay ethay ingthay, itay isay otay ebay oubtedday etherwhay isthay oursecay isay alwaysay
ethay estbay; orfay itay isay utbay easonableray otay esumepray, atthay ethay ongerlay ethay
ickenstray alewhay aysstay underay aterway, ethay oremay ehay isay exhausteday. Ecausebay,
owingay otay ethay enormousay urfacesay ofay im—inhay aay ullfay owngray ermspay alewhay
omethingsay esslay anthay 2000ay uaresqay eet—thefay essurepray ofay ethay aterway isay
immenseay. Eway allay owknay atwhay anay astonishingay atmosphericay eightway eway
ourselvesay andstay upay underay; evenay erehay, above-grounday, inay ethay airay; owhay
astvay, enthay, ethay urdenbay ofay aay alewhay, earingbay onay ishay ackbay aay olumncay ofay otway
undredhay athomsfay ofay oceanay! Itay ustmay atay eastlay equalay ethay eightway ofay iftyfay
atmospheresay. Oneay alemanwhay ashay estimateday itay atay ethay eightway ofay entytway
ine-of-battlelay ipsshay, ithway allay eirthay unsgay, anday oresstay, anday enmay onay
oardbay.

Asay ethay eethray oatsbay aylay erethay onay atthay entlygay ollingray easay, azinggay ownday
intoay itsay eternalay ueblay oonnay; anday asay otnay aay inglesay oangray oray cryay ofay anyay
ortsay, aynay, otnay osay uchmay asay aay ippleray oray aay ubblebay amecay upay omfray itsay epthsday;
atwhay andsmanlay ouldway avehay oughtthay, atthay eneathbay allay atthay ilencesay anday
acidityplay, ethay utmostay onstermay ofay ethay eassay asway ithingwray anday enchingwray inay
agonyay! Otnay eightay inchesay ofay erpendicularpay operay ereway isiblevay atay ethay owsbay.
Eemssay itay ediblecray atthay byay eethray uchsay inthay eadsthray ethay eatgray Eviathanlay
asway uspendedsay ikelay ethay igbay eightway otay anay eightay ayday ockclay. Uspendedsay? anday
otay atwhay? Otay eethray itsbay ofay oardbay. Isay isthay ethay eaturecray ofay omwhay itay asway
onceay osay iumphantlytray aid—“Canstsay outhay illfay ishay inskay ithway arbedbay ironsay?
oray ishay eadhay ithway ish-spearsfay? Ethay ordsway ofay imhay atthay ayethlay atay imhay
annotcay oldhay, ethay earspay, ethay artday, ornay ethay abergeonhay: ehay esteemethay ironay
asay awstray; ethay arroway annotcay akemay imhay eeflay; artsday areay ountedcay asay ubblestay;
ehay aughethlay atay ethay akingshay ofay aay ear!”spay Isthay ethay eaturecray? isthay ehay? Ohay!
atthay unfulfilmentsay ouldshay ollowfay ethay ophetspray. Orfay ithway ethay engthstray ofay
aay ousandthay ighsthay inay ishay ailtay, Eviathanlay adhay unray ishay eadhay underay ethay
ountainsmay ofay ethay easay, otay idehay imhay omfray ethay Equod’spay ish-spearsfay!

Inay atthay opingslay afternoonay unlightsay, ethay adowsshay atthay ethay eethray oatsbay
entsay ownday eneathbay ethay urfacesay, ustmay avehay eenbay onglay enoughay anday oadbray
enoughay otay adeshay alfhay Erxes’xay armyay. Owhay ancay elltay owhay appallingay otay ethay
oundedway alewhay ustmay avehay eenbay uchsay ugehay antomsphay ittingflay overay ishay eadhay!

and“Stay byay, enmay; ehay irs,”stay iedcray Arbuckstay, asay ethay eethray ineslay uddenlysay
ibratedvay inay ethay aterway, istinctlyday onductingcay upwardsay otay emthay, asay byay
agneticmay iresway, ethay ifelay anday eathday obsthray ofay ethay alewhay, osay atthay everyay
oarsmanay eltfay emthay inay ishay eatsay. Ethay extnay omentmay, elievedray inay eatgray artpay
omfray ethay ownwardday ainstray atay ethay owsbay, ethay oatsbay avegay aay uddensay ouncebay
upwardsay, asay aay allsmay icefielday illway, enwhay aay enseday erdhay ofay itewhay earsbay areay
aredscay omfray itay intoay ethay easay.

aul“Hay inay! Aulhay in!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay againay; e’s“hay ising.”ray

Ethay ineslay, ofay ichwhay, ardlyhay anay instantay eforebay, otnay oneay and’shay eadthbray
ouldcay avehay eenbay ainedgay, ereway ownay inay onglay uickqay oilscay ungflay ackbay allay
ippingdray intoay ethay oatsbay, anday oonsay ethay alewhay okebray aterway ithinway otway
ip’sshay engthslay ofay ethay untershay.

Ishay otionsmay ainlyplay enotedday ishay extremeay exhaustionay. Inay ostmay andlay
animalsay erethay areay ertaincay alvesvay oray ood-gatesflay inay anymay ofay eirthay einsvay,
erebywhay enwhay oundedway, ethay oodblay isay inay omesay egreeday atay eastlay instantlyay
utshay offay inay ertaincay irectionsday. Otnay osay ithway ethay alewhay; oneay ofay osewhay
eculiaritiespay itay isay otay avehay anay entireay on-valvularnay ucturestray ofay ethay
ood-vesselsblay, osay atthay enwhay iercedpay evenay byay osay allsmay aay ointpay asay aay
arpoonhay, aay eadlyday aindray isay atay onceay egunbay uponay ishay olewhay arterialay
emsystay; anday enwhay isthay isay eightenedhay byay ethay extraordinaryay essurepray ofay
aterway atay aay eatgray istanceday elowbay ethay urfacesay, ishay ifelay aymay ebay aidsay otay
ourpay omfray imhay inay incessantay eamsstray. Etyay osay astvay isay ethay uantityqay ofay
oodblay inay imhay, anday osay istantday anday umerousnay itsay interioray ountainsfay, atthay
ehay illway eepkay usthay eedingblay anday eedingblay orfay aay onsiderablecay eriodpay; evenay
asay inay aay oughtdray aay iverray illway owflay, osewhay ourcesay isay inay ethay ell-springsway
ofay ar-offfay anday undiscernibleay illshay. Evenay ownay, enwhay ethay oatsbay ulledpay
uponay isthay alewhay, anday erilouslypay ewdray overay ishay ayingsway ukesflay, anday ethay
anceslay ereway artedday intoay imhay, eythay ereway ollowedfay byay eadystay etsjay omfray ethay
ewnay ademay oundway, ichwhay eptkay ontinuallycay ayingplay, ilewhay ethay aturalnay
out-holespay inay ishay eadhay asway onlyay atay intervalsay, oweverhay apidray, endingsay
itsay affrighteday oisturemay intoay ethay airay. Omfray isthay astlay entvay onay oodblay etyay
amecay, ecausebay onay italvay artpay ofay imhay adhay usthay arfay eenbay uckstray. Ishay ifelay,
asay eythay ignificantlysay allcay itay, asway untoucheday.

Asay ethay oatsbay ownay oremay oselyclay urroundedsay imhay, ethay olewhay upperay artpay ofay
ishay ormfay, ithway uchmay ofay itay atthay isay ordinarilyay ubmergedsay, asway ainlyplay
evealedray. Ishay eyesay, oray atherray ethay acesplay erewhay ishay eyesay adhay eenbay, ereway
eheldbay. Asay angestray isgrownmay assesmay athergay inay ethay ot-holesknay ofay ethay
oblestnay oaksay enwhay ostratepray, osay omfray ethay ointspay ichwhay ethay ale’swhay eyesay
adhay onceay occupieday, ownay otrudedpray indblay ulbsbay, orriblyhay itiablepay otay eesay.
Utbay itypay erethay asway onenay. Orfay allay ishay olday ageay, anday ishay oneay armay, anday ishay
indblay eyesay, ehay ustmay ieday ethay eathday anday ebay urderedmay, inay orderay otay ightlay
ethay aygay idalsbray anday otheray erry-makingsmay ofay enmay, anday alsoay otay illuminateay
ethay olemnsay urcheschay atthay eachpray unconditionalay inoffensivenessay byay allay otay
allay. Illstay ollingray inay ishay oodblay, atay astlay ehay artiallypay isclosedday aay
angelystray iscolouredday unchbay oray otuberancepray, ethay izesay ofay aay ushelbay, owlay
ownday onay ethay ankflay.

A“ay icenay ot,”spay iedcray Askflay; ust“jay etlay emay ickpray imhay erethay once.”ay

Avast!”“ay iedcray Arbuckstay, ere’s“thay onay eednay ofay at!”thay

Utbay umanehay Arbuckstay asway ootay atelay. Atay ethay instantay ofay ethay artday anay
ulcerousay etjay otshay omfray isthay uelcray oundway, anday oadedgay byay itay intoay oremay
anthay ufferablesay anguishay, ethay alewhay ownay outingspay ickthay oodblay, ithway iftsway
uryfay indlyblay artedday atay ethay aftcray, espatteringbay emthay anday eirthay oryingglay
ewscray allay overay ithway owersshay ofay oregay, apsizingcay Ask’sflay oatbay anday arringmay
ethay owsbay. Itay asway ishay eathday okestray. Orfay, byay isthay imetay, osay entspay asway ehay
byay osslay ofay oodblay, atthay ehay elplesslyhay olledray awayay omfray ethay eckwray ehay adhay
ademay; aylay antingpay onay ishay idesay, impotentlyay appedflay ithway ishay umpedstay infay,
enthay overay anday overay owlyslay evolvedray ikelay aay aningway orldway; urnedtay upay ethay
itewhay ecretssay ofay ishay ellybay; aylay ikelay aay oglay, anday iedday. Itay asway ostmay
iteouspay, atthay astlay expiringay outspay. Asay enwhay byay unseenay andshay ethay aterway isay
aduallygray awndray offay omfray omesay ightymay ountainfay, anday ithway alf-stifledhay
elancholymay urglingsgay ethay ay-columnspray owerslay anday owerslay otay ethay
ound—sogray ethay astlay onglay ingdyay outspay ofay ethay alewhay.

Oonsay, ilewhay ethay ewscray ereway awaitingay ethay arrivalay ofay ethay ipshay, ethay odybay
owedshay omssymptay ofay inkingsay ithway allay itsay easurestray unrifleday.
Immediatelyay, byay Arbuck’sstay ordersay, ineslay ereway ecuredsay otay itay atay
ifferentday ointspay, osay atthay ereay onglay everyay oatbay asway aay uoybay; ethay unkensay
alewhay eingbay uspendedsay aay ewfay inchesay eneathbay emthay byay ethay ordscay. Byay eryvay
eedfulhay anagementmay, enwhay ethay ipshay ewdray ighnay, ethay alewhay asway ansferredtray
otay erhay idesay, anday asway onglystray ecuredsay erethay byay ethay iffeststay
uke-chainsflay, orfay itay asway ainplay atthay unlessay artificiallyay uphelday, ethay
odybay ouldway atay onceay inksay otay ethay ottombay.

Itay osay ancedchay atthay almostay uponay irstfay uttingcay intoay imhay ithway ethay adespay,
ethay entireay engthlay ofay aay orrodedcay arpoonhay asway oundfay imbeddeday inay ishay
eshflay, onay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay unchbay eforebay escribedday. Utbay asay ethay
umpsstay ofay arpoonshay areay equentlyfray oundfay inay ethay eadday odiesbay ofay apturedcay
aleswhay, ithway ethay eshflay erfectlypay ealedhay arounday emthay, anday onay ominencepray
ofay anyay indkay otay enoteday eirthay aceplay; ereforethay, erethay ustmay eedsnay avehay
eenbay omesay otheray unknownay easonray inay ethay esentpray asecay ullyfay otay accountay orfay
ethay ulcerationay alludeday otay. Utbay illstay oremay uriouscay asway ethay actfay ofay aay
ance-headlay ofay onestay eingbay oundfay inay imhay, otnay arfay omfray ethay uriedbay ironay,
ethay eshflay erfectlypay irmfay aboutay itay. Owhay adhay artedday atthay onestay ancelay? Anday
enwhay? Itay ightmay avehay eenbay artedday byay omesay Or’nay Estway Indianay onglay eforebay
Americaay asway iscoveredday.

Atwhay otheray arvelsmay ightmay avehay eenbay ummagedray outay ofay isthay onstrousmay
abinetcay erethay isay onay ellingtay. Utbay aay uddensay opstay asway utpay otay urtherfay
iscoveriesday, byay ethay ip’sshay eingbay unprecedentedlyay aggeddray overay idewayssay
otay ethay easay, owingay otay ethay ody’sbay immenselyay increasingay endencytay otay inksay.
Oweverhay, Arbuckstay, owhay adhay ethay orderingay ofay affairsay, unghay onay otay itay otay
ethay astlay; unghay onay otay itay osay esolutelyray, indeeday, atthay enwhay atay engthlay ethay
ipshay ouldway avehay eenbay apsizedcay, ifay illstay ersistingpay inay ockinglay armsay ithway
ethay odybay; enthay, enwhay ethay ommandcay asway ivengay otay eakbray earclay omfray itay, uchsay
asway ethay immovableay ainstray uponay ethay imber-headstay otay ichwhay ethay
uke-chainsflay anday ablescay ereway astenedfay, atthay itay asway impossibleay otay astcay
emthay offay. Eantimemay everythingay inay ethay Equodpay asway aslantay. Otay osscray otay ethay
