otheray idesay ofay ethay eckday asway ikelay alkingway upay ethay eepstay abledgay oofray ofay aay
ousehay. Ethay ipshay oanedgray anday aspedgay. Anymay ofay ethay ivoryay inlayingsay ofay erhay
ulwarksbay anday abinscay ereway artedstay omfray eirthay acesplay, byay ethay unnaturalay
islocationday. Inay ainvay andspikeshay anday owscray ereway oughtbray otay earbay uponay ethay
immovableay uke-chainsflay, otay pryay emthay adriftay omfray ethay imberheadstay; anday osay
owlay adhay ethay alewhay ownay ettledsay atthay ethay ubmergedsay endsay ouldcay otnay ebay atay
allay approacheday, ilewhay everyay omentmay olewhay onstay ofay onderositypay eemedsay
addeday otay ethay inkingsay ulkbay, anday ethay ipshay eemedsay onay ethay ointpay ofay oinggay
overay.

old“Hay onay, oldhay onay, on’tway e?”yay iedcray Ubbstay otay ethay odybay, on’t“day ebay inay
uchsay aay evilday ofay aay urryhay otay inksay! Byay underthay, enmay, eway ustmay oday omethingsay
oray ogay orfay itay. Onay useay ingpryay erethay; avastay, Iay aysay ithway ouryay andspikeshay,
anday unray oneay ofay eyay orfay aay ayerpray ookbay anday aay en-knifepay, anday utcay ethay igbay
ains.”chay

ife“Knay? Ayeay, aye,”ay iedcray Ueequegqay, anday eizingsay ethay arpenter’scay eavyhay
atchethay, ehay eanedlay outay ofay aay ortholepay, anday eelstay otay ironay, eganbay ashingslay
atay ethay argestlay uke-chainsflay. Utbay aay ewfay okesstray, ullfay ofay arksspay, ereway
ivengay, enwhay ethay exceedingay ainstray effecteday ethay estray. Ithway aay errifictay
apsnay, everyay asteningfay entway adriftay; ethay ipshay ightedray, ethay arcasecay anksay.

Ownay, isthay occasionalay inevitableay inkingsay ofay ethay ecentlyray illedkay Ermspay
Alewhay isay aay eryvay uriouscay ingthay; ornay ashay anyay ishermanfay etyay adequatelyay
accounteday orfay itay. Usuallyay ethay eadday Ermspay Alewhay oatsflay ithway eatgray
uoyancybay, ithway itsay idesay oray ellybay onsiderablycay elevateday aboveay ethay
urfacesay. Ifay ethay onlyay aleswhay atthay usthay anksay ereway olday, eagremay, anday
oken-heartedbray eaturescray, eirthay adspay ofay ardlay iminishedday anday allay eirthay
onesbay eavyhay anday eumaticrhay; enthay ouyay ightmay ithway omesay easonray assertay atthay
isthay inkingsay isay ausedcay byay anay uncommonay ecificspay avitygray inay ethay ishfay osay
inkingsay, onsequentcay uponay isthay absenceay ofay uoyantbay attermay inay imhay. Utbay itay
isay otnay osay. Orfay oungyay aleswhay, inay ethay ighesthay ealthhay, anday ellingsway ithway
oblenay aspirationsay, ematurelypray utcay offay inay ethay armway ushflay anday Aymay ofay
ifelay, ithway allay eirthay antingpay ardlay aboutay emthay; evenay esethay awnybray,
uoyantbay eroeshay oday ometimessay inksay.

Ebay itay aidsay, oweverhay, atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay arfay esslay iablelay otay isthay
accidentay anthay anyay otheray eciesspay. Erewhay oneay ofay atthay ortsay ogay ownday, entytway
Ightray Aleswhay oday. Isthay ifferenceday inay ethay eciesspay isay onay oubtday imputableay
inay onay allsmay egreeday otay ethay eatergray uantityqay ofay onebay inay ethay Ightray Alewhay;
ishay Enetianvay indsblay aloneay ometimessay eighingway oremay anthay aay ontay; omfray isthay
incumbranceay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay ollywhay eefray. Utbay erethay areay instancesay
erewhay, afteray ethay apselay ofay anymay ourshay oray everalsay aysday, ethay unkensay alewhay
againay isesray, oremay uoyantbay anthay inay ifelay. Utbay ethay easonray ofay isthay isay
obviousay. Asesgay areay eneratedgay inay imhay; ehay ellssway otay aay odigiouspray
agnitudemay; ecomesbay aay ortsay ofay animalay alloonbay. Aay ine-of-battlelay ipshay
ouldcay ardlyhay eepkay imhay underay enthay. Inay ethay Oreshay Alingwhay, onay oundingssay,
amongay ethay Aysbay ofay Ewnay Ealandzay, enwhay aay Ightray Alewhay ivesgay okentay ofay
inkingsay, eythay astenfay uoysbay otay imhay, ithway entyplay ofay operay; osay atthay enwhay
ethay odybay ashay onegay ownday, eythay owknay erewhay otay ooklay orfay itay enwhay itay allshay
avehay ascendeday againay.

Itay asway otnay onglay afteray ethay inkingsay ofay ethay odybay atthay aay cryay asway eardhay omfray
ethay Equod’spay ast-headsmay, announcingay atthay ethay Ungfraujay asway againay
oweringlay erhay oatsbay; oughthay ethay onlyay outspay inay ightsay asway atthay ofay aay
In-Backfay, elongingbay otay ethay eciesspay ofay uncapturableay aleswhay, ecausebay ofay
itsay incredibleay owerpay ofay immingsway. Everthelessnay, ethay In-Back’sfay outspay isay
osay imilarsay otay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay, atthay byay unskilfulay ishermenfay itay isay
oftenay istakenmay orfay itay. Anday onsequentlycay Erickday anday allay ishay osthay ereway
ownay inay aliantvay asechay ofay isthay unnearableay utebray. Ethay Irginvay owdingcray allay
ailsay, ademay afteray erhay ourfay oungyay eelskay, anday usthay eythay allay isappearedday
arfay otay eewardlay, illstay inay oldbay, opefulhay asechay.

Ohay! anymay areay ethay In-Backsfay, anday anymay areay ethay Ericksday, myay iendfray.


APTERcHay 82ay. Ethay Onorhay anday Oryglay ofay Alingwhay.

Erethay areay omesay enterprisesay inay ichwhay aay arefulcay isorderlinessday isay ethay
uetray ethodmay.

Ethay oremay Iay iveday intoay isthay attermay ofay alingwhay, anday ushpay myay esearchesray upay
otay ethay eryvay ing-headspray ofay itay osay uchmay ethay oremay amay Iay impresseday ithway itsay
eatgray onorablenesshay anday antiquityay; anday especiallyay enwhay Iay indfay osay anymay
eatgray emi-godsday anday eroeshay, ophetspray ofay allay ortssay, owhay oneay ayway oray otheray
avehay edshay istinctionday uponay itay, Iay amay ansportedtray ithway ethay eflectionray
atthay Iay elfmysay elongbay, oughthay utbay ubordinatelysay, otay osay emblazoneday aay
aternityfray.

Ethay allantgay Erseuspay, aay onsay ofay Upiterjay, asway ethay irstfay alemanwhay; anday otay
ethay eternalay onorhay ofay ouray allingcay ebay itay aidsay, atthay ethay irstfay alewhay
attackeday byay ouray otherhoodbray asway otnay illedkay ithway anyay ordidsay intentay.
Osethay ereway ethay ightlyknay aysday ofay ouray ofessionpray, enwhay eway onlyay orebay armsay
otay uccorsay ethay istressedday, anday otnay otay illfay en’smay amp-feederslay. Everyay oneay
owsknay ethay inefay orystay ofay Erseuspay anday Andromedaay; owhay ethay ovelylay
Andromedaay, ethay aughterday ofay aay ingkay, asway iedtay otay aay ockray onay ethay ea-coastsay,
anday asay Eviathanlay asway inay ethay eryvay actay ofay arryingcay erhay offay, Erseuspay, ethay
incepray ofay alemenwhay, intrepidlyay advancingay, arpoonedhay ethay onstermay, anday
eliveredday anday arriedmay ethay aidmay. Itay asway anay admirableay artisticay exploitay,
arelyray achieveday byay ethay estbay arpooneershay ofay ethay esentpray ayday; inasmuchay asay
isthay Eviathanlay asway ainslay atay ethay eryvay irstfay artday. Anday etlay onay anmay oubtday
isthay Arkiteay orystay; orfay inay ethay ancientay Oppajay, ownay Affajay, onay ethay Iansyray
oastcay, inay oneay ofay ethay Aganpay emplestay, erethay oodstay orfay anymay agesay ethay astvay
eletonskay ofay aay alewhay, ichwhay ethay ity’scay egendslay anday allay ethay inhabitantsay
asserteday otay ebay ethay identicalay onesbay ofay ethay onstermay atthay Erseuspay ewslay.
Enwhay ethay Omansray ooktay Oppajay, ethay amesay eletonskay asway arriedcay otay Italyay inay
iumphtray. Atwhay eemssay ostmay ingularsay anday uggestivelysay importantay inay isthay
orystay, isay isthay: itay asway omfray Oppajay atthay Onahjay etsay ailsay.

Akinay otay ethay adventureay ofay Erseuspay anday Andromeda—indeeday, byay omesay upposedsay
otay ebay indirectlyay erivedday omfray it—isay atthay amousfay orystay ofay Stay. Eorgegay anday
ethay Agondray; ichwhay agondray Iay aintainmay otay avehay eenbay aay alewhay; orfay inay anymay
olday onicleschray aleswhay anday agonsdray areay angelystray umbledjay ogethertay, anday
oftenay andstay orfay eachay otheray. ou“Thay artay asay aay ionlay ofay ethay atersway, anday asay aay
agondray ofay ethay ea,”say aithsay Ezekielay; erebyhay, ainlyplay eaningmay aay alewhay; inay
uthtray, omesay ersionsvay ofay ethay Iblebay useay atthay ordway itselfay. Esidesbay, itay
ouldway uchmay ubtractsay omfray ethay oryglay ofay ethay exploitay adhay Stay. Eorgegay utbay
encountereday aay awlingcray eptileray ofay ethay andlay, insteaday ofay oingday attlebay
ithway ethay eatgray onstermay ofay ethay eepday. Anyay anmay aymay illkay aay akesnay, utbay onlyay
aay Erseuspay, aay Stay. Eorgegay, aay Offincay, avehay ethay earthay inay emthay otay archmay
oldlybay upay otay aay alewhay.

Etlay otnay ethay odernmay aintingspay ofay isthay enescay isleadmay usay; orfay oughthay ethay
eaturecray encountereday byay atthay aliantvay alemanwhay ofay olday isay aguelyvay
epresentedray ofay aay iffin-likegray apeshay, anday oughthay ethay attlebay isay epictedday
onay andlay anday ethay aintsay onay orsebackhay, etyay onsideringcay ethay eatgray ignoranceay
ofay osethay imestay, enwhay ethay uetray ormfay ofay ethay alewhay asway unknownay otay artistsay;
anday onsideringcay atthay asay inay Erseus’pay asecay, Stay. Eorge’sgay alewhay ightmay avehay
awledcray upay outay ofay ethay easay onay ethay eachbay; anday onsideringcay atthay ethay animalay
iddenray byay Stay. Eorgegay ightmay avehay eenbay onlyay aay argelay ealsay, oray ea-horsesay;
earingbay allay isthay inay indmay, itay illway otnay appearay altogetheray incompatibleay
ithway ethay acredsay egendlay anday ethay ancientestay aughtsdray ofay ethay enescay, otay
oldhay isthay o-calledsay agondray onay otheray anthay ethay eatgray Eviathanlay imselfhay.
Inay actfay, acedplay eforebay ethay ictstray anday iercingpay uthtray, isthay olewhay orystay
illway arefay ikelay atthay ishfay, eshflay, anday owlfay idolay ofay ethay Ilistinesphay,
Agonday byay amenay; owhay eingbay antedplay eforebay ethay arkay ofay Israelay, ishay orse’shay
eadhay anday othbay ethay almspay ofay ishay andshay ellfay offay omfray imhay, anday onlyay ethay
umpstay oray ishyfay artpay ofay imhay emainedray. Usthay, enthay, oneay ofay ouray ownay oblenay
ampstay, evenay aay alemanwhay, isay ethay utelarytay uardiangay ofay Englanday; anday byay
oodgay ightsray, eway arpooneershay ofay Antucketnay ouldshay ebay enrolleday inay ethay ostmay
oblenay orderay ofay Stay. Eorgegay. Anday ereforethay, etlay otnay ethay ightsknay ofay atthay
onorablehay ompanycay one(nay ofay omwhay, Iay enturevay otay aysay, avehay everay adhay otay oday
ithway aay alewhay ikelay eirthay eatgray atron)pay, etlay emthay evernay eyeay aay Antucketernay
ithway isdainday, incesay evenay inay ouray oollenway ocksfray anday arredtay owserstray eway
areay uchmay etterbay entitleday otay Stay. Eorge’sgay ecorationday anthay eythay.

Etherwhay otay admitay Erculeshay amongay usay oray otnay, oncerningcay isthay Iay onglay
emainedray ubiousday: orfay oughthay accordingay otay ethay Eekgray ologiesmythay, atthay
antiqueay Ockettcray anday Itkay Arson—thatcay awnybray oerday ofay ejoicingray oodgay
eedsday, asway allowedsway ownday anday ownthray upay byay aay alewhay; illstay, etherwhay atthay
ictlystray akesmay aay alemanwhay ofay imhay, atthay ightmay ebay ootedmay. Itay owherenay
appearsay atthay ehay everay actuallyay arpoonedhay ishay ishfay, unlessay, indeeday, omfray
ethay insideay. Everthelessnay, ehay aymay ebay eemedday aay ortsay ofay involuntaryay
alemanwhay; atay anyay ateray ethay alewhay aughtcay imhay, ifay ehay idday otnay ethay alewhay. Iay
aimclay imhay orfay oneay ofay ouray anclay.

Utbay, byay ethay estbay ontradictorycay authoritiesay, isthay Eciangray orystay ofay
Erculeshay anday ethay alewhay isay onsideredcay otay ebay erivedday omfray ethay illstay oremay
ancientay Ebrewhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay; anday icevay ersâvay; ertainlycay
eythay areay eryvay imilarsay. Ifay Iay aimclay ethay emi-godday enthay, whyay otnay ethay
ophetpray?

Ornay oday eroeshay, aintssay, emigodsday, anday ophetspray aloneay omprisecay ethay olewhay
ollray ofay ouray orderay. Ouray andgray astermay isay illstay otay ebay amednay; orfay ikelay
oyalray ingskay ofay olday imestay, eway indfay ethay eadhay atersway ofay ouray aternityfray inay
othingnay ortshay ofay ethay eatgray odsgay emselvesthay. Atthay ondrousway orientalay
orystay isay ownay otay ebay ehearsedray omfray ethay Astershay, ichwhay ivesgay usay ethay eaddray
Ishnoovay, oneay ofay ethay eethray ersonspay inay ethay odheadgay ofay ethay Indooshay; ivesgay
usay isthay ivineday Ishnoovay imselfhay orfay ouray Ord;—Vishnoolay, owhay, byay ethay irstfay
ofay ishay entay earthlyay incarnationsay, ashay orfay everay etsay apartay anday anctifiedsay
ethay alewhay. Enwhay Ahmabray, oray ethay Odgay ofay Odsgay, aithsay ethay Astershay, esolvedray
otay ecreateray ethay orldway afteray oneay ofay itsay eriodicalpay issolutionsday, ehay avegay
irthbay otay Ishnoovay, otay esidepray overay ethay orkway; utbay ethay Edasvay, oray icalmystay
ooksbay, osewhay erusalpay ouldway eemsay otay avehay eenbay indispensableay otay Ishnoovay
eforebay eginningbay ethay eationcray, anday ichwhay ereforethay ustmay avehay ontainedcay
omethingsay inay ethay apeshay ofay acticalpray intshay otay oungyay architectsay, esethay
Edasvay ereway inglyay atay ethay ottombay ofay ethay atersway; osay Ishnoovay ecamebay
incarnateay inay aay alewhay, anday oundingsay ownday inay imhay otay ethay uttermostay epthsday,
escuedray ethay acredsay olumesvay. Asway otnay isthay Ishnoovay aay alemanwhay, enthay? evenay
asay aay anmay owhay idesray aay orsehay isay alledcay aay orsemanhay?

Erseuspay, Stay. Eorgegay, Erculeshay, Onahjay, anday Ishnoovay! ere’sthay aay
ember-rollmay orfay ouyay! Atwhay ubclay utbay ethay aleman’swhay ancay eadhay offay ikelay
atthay?


APTERcHay 83ay. Onahjay Istoricallyhay Egardedray.

Eferenceray asway ademay otay ethay istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay inay
ethay ecedingpray apterchay. Ownay omesay Antucketersnay atherray istrustday isthay
istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay. Utbay enthay erethay ereway omesay
epticalscay Eeksgray anday Omansray, owhay, andingstay outay omfray ethay orthodoxay aganspay
ofay eirthay imestay, equallyay oubtedday ethay orystay ofay Erculeshay anday ethay alewhay,
anday Arionay anday ethay olphinday; anday etyay eirthay oubtingday osethay aditionstray idday
otnay akemay osethay aditionstray oneay itwhay ethay esslay actsfay, orfay allay atthay.

Oneay olday Ag-Harborsay aleman’swhay iefchay easonray orfay uestioningqay ethay Ebrewhay
orystay asway is:—Hethay adhay oneay ofay osethay uaintqay old-fashioneday Iblesbay,
embellisheday ithway uriouscay, unscientificay atesplay; oneay ofay ichwhay epresentedray
Onah’sjay alewhay ithway otway outsspay inay ishay ead—ahay eculiaritypay onlyay uetray ithway
espectray otay aay eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay e(thay Ightray Alewhay, anday ethay
arietiesvay ofay atthay order)ay, oncerningcay ichwhay ethay ishermenfay avehay isthay
ayingsay, A“ay ennypay ollray ouldway okechay im”hay; ishay allowsway isay osay eryvay allsmay.
Utbay, otay isthay, Ishopbay Ebb’sjay anticipativeay answeray isay eadyray. Itay isay otnay
ecessarynay, intshay ethay Ishopbay, atthay eway onsidercay Onahjay asay ombedtay inay ethay
ale’swhay ellybay, utbay asay emporarilytay odgedlay inay omesay artpay ofay ishay outhmay. Anday
isthay eemssay easonableray enoughay inay ethay oodgay Ishopbay. Orfay ulytray, ethay Ightray
Ale’swhay outhmay ouldway accommodateay aay ouplecay ofay ist-tableswhay, anday
omfortablycay eatsay allay ethay ayersplay. Ossiblypay, ootay, Onahjay ightmay avehay
ensconceday imselfhay inay aay ollowhay oothtay; utbay, onay econdsay oughtsthay, ethay Ightray
Alewhay isay oothlesstay.

Anotheray easonray ichwhay Ag-Harborsay e(hay entway byay atthay amenay) urgeday orfay ishay
antway ofay aithfay inay isthay attermay ofay ethay ophetpray, asway omethingsay obscurelyay inay
eferenceray otay ishay incarcerateday odybay anday ethay ale’swhay astricgay uicesjay. Utbay
isthay objectionay ikewiselay allsfay otay ethay oundgray, ecausebay aay Ermangay exegetistay
upposessay atthay Onahjay ustmay avehay akentay efugeray inay ethay oatingflay odybay ofay aay
ead__day ale—evenwhay asay ethay Enchfray oldierssay inay ethay Ussianray ampaigncay urnedtay
eirthay eadday orseshay intoay entstay, anday awledcray intoay emthay. Esidesbay, itay ashay
eenbay ivinedday byay otheray ontinentalcay ommentatorscay, atthay enwhay Onahjay asway
ownthray overboarday omfray ethay Oppajay ipshay, ehay aightwaystray effecteday ishay
escapeay otay anotheray esselvay earnay byay, omesay esselvay ithway aay alewhay orfay aay
igure-headfay; anday, Iay ouldway adday, ossiblypay alledcay e“Thay Ale,”whay asay omesay
aftcray areay owadaysnay istenedchray ethay ark,”“Shay ethay ull,”“Gay ethay Eagle.”“ay Ornay
avehay erethay eenbay antingway earnedlay exegetistsay owhay avehay opineday atthay ethay
alewhay entionedmay inay ethay ookbay ofay Onahjay erelymay eantmay aay ife-preserver—anlay
inflateday agbay ofay ind—whichway ethay endangereday ophetpray amsway otay, anday osay asway
avedsay omfray aay ateryway oomday. Oorpay Ag-Harborsay, ereforethay, eemssay orstedway allay
oundray. Utbay ehay adhay illstay anotheray easonray orfay ishay antway ofay aithfay. Itay asway
isthay, ifay Iay ememberray ightray: Onahjay asway allowedsway byay ethay alewhay inay ethay
Editerraneanmay Easay, anday afteray eethray aysday ehay asway omitedvay upay omewheresay
ithinway eethray ays’day ourneyjay ofay Inevehnay, aay itycay onay ethay Igristay, eryvay uchmay
oremay anthay eethray ays’day ourneyjay acrossay omfray ethay earestnay ointpay ofay ethay
Editerraneanmay oastcay. Owhay isay atthay?

Utbay asway erethay onay otheray ayway orfay ethay alewhay otay andlay ethay ophetpray ithinway
atthay ortshay istanceday ofay Inevehnay? Esyay. Ehay ightmay avehay arriedcay imhay oundray byay
ethay ayway ofay ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay. Utbay otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay assagepay
oughthray ethay olewhay engthlay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay, anday anotheray assagepay upay
ethay Ersianpay Ulfgay anday Edray Easay, uchsay aay uppositionsay ouldway involveay ethay
ompletecay ircumnavigationcay ofay allay Africaay inay eethray aysday, otnay otay eakspay ofay
ethay Igristay atersway, earnay ethay itesay ofay Inevehnay, eingbay ootay allowshay orfay anyay
alewhay otay imsway inay. Esidesbay, isthay ideaay ofay Onah’sjay eatheringway ethay Apecay ofay
Oodgay Opehay atay osay earlyay aay ayday ouldway estwray ethay onorhay ofay ethay iscoveryday ofay
atthay eatgray eadlandhay omfray Artholomewbay Iazday, itsay eputedray iscovererday, anday
osay akemay odernmay istoryhay aay iarlay.

Utbay allay esethay oolishfay argumentsay ofay olday Ag-Harborsay onlyay evinceday ishay
oolishfay idepray ofay eason—aray ingthay illstay oremay eprehensibleray inay imhay, eeingsay
atthay ehay adhay utbay ittlelay earninglay exceptay atwhay ehay adhay ickedpay upay omfray ethay
unsay anday ethay easay. Iay aysay itay onlyay owsshay ishay oolishfay, impiousay idepray, anday
abominableay, evilishday ebellionray againstay ethay everendray ergyclay. Orfay byay aay
Ortuguesepay Atholiccay iestpray, isthay eryvay ideaay ofay Onah’sjay oinggay otay Inevehnay
iavay ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay asway advanceday asay aay ignalsay agnificationmay ofay ethay
eneralgay iraclemay. Anday osay itay asway. Esidesbay, otay isthay ayday, ethay ighlyhay
enlighteneday Urkstay evoutlyday elievebay inay ethay istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay.
Anday omesay eethray enturiescay agoay, anay Englishay avellertray inay olday Arris’shay
Oyagesvay, eaksspay ofay aay Urkishtay Osquemay uiltbay inay onorhay ofay Onahjay, inay ichwhay
Osquemay asway aay iraculousmay amplay atthay urntbay ithoutway anyay oilay.


APTERcHay 84ay. Itchpolingpay.

Otay akemay emthay unray easilyay anday iftlysway, ethay axlesay ofay arriagescay areay
anointeday; anday orfay uchmay ethay amesay urposepay, omesay alerswhay erformpay anay
analogousay operationay uponay eirthay oatbay; eythay easegray ethay ottombay. Ornay isay itay
otay ebay oubtedday atthay asay uchsay aay ocedurepray ancay oday onay armhay, itay aymay ossiblypay
ebay ofay onay ontemptiblecay advantageay; onsideringcay atthay oilay anday aterway areay
ostilehay; atthay oilay isay aay idingslay ingthay, anday atthay ethay objectay inay iewvay isay otay
akemay ethay oatbay ideslay avelybray. Ueequegqay elievedbay onglystray inay anointingay
ishay oatbay, anday oneay orningmay otnay onglay afteray ethay Ermangay ipshay Ungfraujay
isappearedday, ooktay oremay anthay ustomarycay ainspay inay atthay occupationay;
awlingcray underay itsay ottombay, erewhay itay unghay overay ethay idesay, anday ubbingray inay
ethay unctuousnessay asay oughthay iligentlyday eekingsay otay insureay aay opcray ofay airhay
omfray ethay aft’scray aldbay eelkay. Ehay eemedsay otay ebay orkingway inay obedienceay otay
omesay articularpay esentimentpray. Ornay idday itay emainray unwarranteday byay ethay
eventay.

Owardstay oonnay aleswhay ereway aisedray; utbay osay oonsay asay ethay ipshay ailedsay ownday otay
emthay, eythay urnedtay anday edflay ithway iftsway ecipitancypray; aay isorderedday
ightflay, asay ofay Eopatra’sclay argesbay omfray Actiumay.

Everthelessnay, ethay oatsbay ursuedpay, anday Ubb’sstay asway oremostfay. Byay eatgray
exertionay, Ashtegotay atay astlay ucceededsay inay antingplay oneay ironay; utbay ethay
ickenstray alewhay, ithoutway atay allay oundingsay, illstay ontinuedcay ishay orizontalhay
ightflay, ithway addeday eetnessflay. Uchsay unintermitteday ainingsstray uponay ethay
antedplay ironay ustmay oonersay oray aterlay inevitablyay extractay itay. Itay ecamebay
imperativeay otay ancelay ethay ingflyay alewhay, oray ebay ontentcay otay oselay imhay. Utbay otay
aulhay ethay oatbay upay otay ishay ankflay asway impossibleay, ehay amsway osay astfay anday
uriousfay. Atwhay enthay emainedray?

Ofay allay ethay ondrousway evicesday anday exteritiesday, ethay eightsslay ofay andhay anday
ountlesscay ubtletiessay, otay ichwhay ethay eteranvay alemanwhay isay osay oftenay orcedfay,
onenay exceeday atthay inefay anœuvremay ithway ethay ancelay alledcay itchpolingpay. Allsmay
ordsway, oray oadbray ordsway, inay allay itsay exercisesay oastsbay othingnay ikelay itay. Itay
isay onlyay indispensableay ithway anay inveterateay unningray alewhay; itsay andgray actfay
anday eaturefay isay ethay onderfulway istanceday otay ichwhay ethay onglay ancelay isay
accuratelyay artedday omfray aay iolentlyvay ockingray, erkingjay oatbay, underay extremeay
eadwayhay. Eelstay anday oodway includeday, ethay entireay earspay isay omesay entay oray
elvetway eetfay inay engthlay; ethay affstay isay uchmay ighterslay anthay atthay ofay ethay
arpoonhay, anday alsoay ofay aay ighterlay aterial—pinemay. Itay isay urnishedfay ithway aay
allsmay operay alledcay aay arpway, ofay onsiderablecay engthlay, byay ichwhay itay ancay ebay
auledhay ackbay otay ethay andhay afteray artingday.

Utbay eforebay oinggay urtherfay, itay isay importantay otay entionmay erehay, atthay oughthay
ethay arpoonhay aymay ebay itchpoledpay inay ethay amesay ayway ithway ethay ancelay, etyay itay isay
eldomsay oneday; anday enwhay oneday, isay illstay esslay equentlyfray uccessfulsay, onay
accountay ofay ethay eatergray eightway anday inferioray engthlay ofay ethay arpoonhay asay
omparedcay ithway ethay ancelay, ichwhay inay effectay ecomebay erioussay awbacksdray. Asay aay
eneralgay ingthay, ereforethay, ouyay ustmay irstfay etgay astfay otay aay alewhay, eforebay
anyay itchpolingpay omescay intoay ayplay.

Ooklay ownay atay Ubbstay; aay anmay owhay omfray ishay umoroushay, eliberateday oolnesscay anday
equanimityay inay ethay irestday emergenciesay, asway eciallyspay ualifiedqay otay excelay
inay itchpolingpay. Ooklay atay imhay; ehay andsstay uprightay inay ethay ossedtay owbay ofay ethay
ingflyay oatbay; aptwray inay eecyflay oamfay, ethay owingtay alewhay isay ortyfay eetfay
aheaday. Andlinghay ethay onglay ancelay ightlylay, ancingglay icetway oray icethray alongay
itsay engthlay otay eesay ifay itay ebay exactlyay aightstray, Ubbstay istlinglywhay athersgay
upay ethay oilcay ofay ethay arpway inay oneay andhay, osay asay otay ecuresay itsay eefray enday inay
ishay aspgray, eavinglay ethay estray unobstructeday. Enthay oldinghay ethay ancelay ullfay
eforebay ishay aistband’sway iddlemay, ehay evelslay itay atay ethay alewhay; enwhay,
overingcay imhay ithway itay, ehay eadilystay epressesday ethay utt-endbay inay ishay andhay,
erebythay elevatingay ethay ointpay illtay ethay eaponway andsstay airlyfay alancedbay uponay
ishay almpay, ifteenfay eetfay inay ethay airay. Ehay indsmay ouyay omewhatsay ofay aay ugglerjay,
alancingbay aay onglay affstay onay ishay inchay. Extnay omentmay ithway aay apidray, amelessnay
impulseay, inay aay uperbsay oftylay archay ethay ightbray eelstay ansspay ethay oamingfay
istanceday, anday uiversqay inay ethay ifelay otspay ofay ethay alewhay. Insteaday ofay
arklingspay aterway, ehay ownay outsspay edray oodblay.

at“Thay ovedray ethay igotspay outay ofay im!”hay iedcray Ubbstay. is“’Tay Uly’sjay immortalay
Ourthfay; allay ountainsfay ustmay unray ineway odaytay! Ouldway ownay, itay ereway olday
Orleansay iskeywhay, oray olday Ohioay, oray unspeakableay olday Onongahelamay! Enthay,
Ashtegotay, adlay, I’day avehay eyay oldhay aay anakincay otay ethay etjay, anday e’dway inkdray
oundray itay! Eayay, erilyvay, eartshay aliveay, e’dway ewbray oicechay unchpay inay ethay
eadspray ofay ishay out-holespay erethay, anday omfray atthay ivelay unch-bowlpay uaffqay ethay
ivinglay uff.”stay

Againay anday againay otay uchsay amesomegay alktay, ethay exterousday artday isay epeatedray,
ethay earspay eturningray otay itsay astermay ikelay aay eyhoundgray eldhay inay ilfulskay
eashlay. Ethay agonizeday alewhay oesgay intoay ishay urryflay; ethay ow-linetay isay
ackenedslay, anday ethay itchpolerpay oppingdray asternay, oldsfay ishay andshay, anday
utelymay atchesway ethay onstermay ieday.


APTERcHay 85ay. Ethay Ountainfay.

Atthay orfay ixsay ousandthay ears—andyay onay oneay owsknay owhay anymay illionsmay ofay agesay
efore—thebay eatgray aleswhay ouldshay avehay eenbay outingspay allay overay ethay easay, anday
inklingspray anday istifyingmay ethay ardensgay ofay ethay eepday, asay ithway osay anymay
inklingspray oray istifyingmay otspay; anday atthay orfay omesay enturiescay ackbay,
ousandsthay ofay untershay ouldshay avehay eenbay oseclay byay ethay ountainfay ofay ethay
alewhay, atchingway esethay inklingsspray anday outings—thatspay allay isthay ouldshay
ebay, anday etyay, atthay ownday otay isthay essedblay inutemay ifteen(fay anday aay uarterqay
inutesmay astpay oneay o’clockay P.May. ofay isthay ixteenthsay ayday ofay Ecemberday, A.Day.
1851)ay, itay ouldshay illstay emainray aay oblempray, etherwhay esethay outingsspay areay,
afteray allay, eallyray aterway, oray othingnay utbay apor—thisvay isay urelysay aay
oteworthynay ingthay.

Etlay usay, enthay, ooklay atay isthay attermay, alongay ithway omesay interestingay itemsay
ontingentcay. Everyay oneay owsknay atthay byay ethay eculiarpay unningcay ofay eirthay
illsgay, ethay innyfay ibestray inay eneralgay eathebray ethay airay ichwhay atay allay imestay
isay ombinedcay ithway ethay elementay inay ichwhay eythay imsway; encehay, aay erringhay oray aay
odcay ightmay ivelay aay enturycay, anday evernay onceay aiseray itsay eadhay aboveay ethay
urfacesay. Utbay owingay otay ishay arkedmay internalay ucturestray ichwhay ivesgay imhay
egularray ungslay, ikelay aay umanhay eing’sbay, ethay alewhay ancay onlyay ivelay byay
inhalingay ethay isengagedday airay inay ethay openay atmosphereay. Ereforewhay ethay
ecessitynay orfay ishay eriodicalpay isitsvay otay ethay upperay orldway. Utbay ehay annotcay
inay anyay egreeday eathebray oughthray ishay outhmay, orfay, inay ishay ordinaryay attitudeay,
ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay outhmay isay uriedbay atay eastlay eightay eetfay eneathbay ethay
urfacesay; anday atwhay isay illstay oremay, ishay indpipeway ashay onay onnexioncay ithway ishay
outhmay. Onay, ehay eathesbray oughthray ishay iraclespay aloneay; anday isthay isay onay ethay
optay ofay ishay eadhay.

Ifay Iay aysay, atthay inay anyay eaturecray eathingbray isay onlyay aay unctionfay
indispensableay otay italityvay, inasmuchay asay itay ithdrawsway omfray ethay airay aay
ertaincay elementay, ichwhay eingbay ubsequentlysay oughtbray intoay ontactcay ithway ethay
oodblay impartsay otay ethay oodblay itsay ivifyingvay inciplepray, Iay oday otnay inkthay Iay
allshay erray; oughthay Iay aymay ossiblypay useay omesay uperfluoussay ientificscay ordsway.
Assumeay itay, anday itay ollowsfay atthay ifay allay ethay oodblay inay aay anmay ouldcay ebay
aerateday ithway oneay eathbray, ehay ightmay enthay ealsay upay ishay ostrilsnay anday otnay
etchfay anotheray orfay aay onsiderablecay imetay. Atthay isay otay aysay, ehay ouldway enthay
ivelay ithoutway eathingbray. Anomalousay asay itay aymay eemsay, isthay isay eciselypray ethay
asecay ithway ethay alewhay, owhay ematicallysystay iveslay, byay intervalsay, ishay ullfay
ourhay anday oremay en(whay atay ethay ottombay) ithoutway awingdray aay inglesay eathbray, oray
osay uchmay asay inay anyay ayway inhalingay aay articlepay ofay airay; orfay, ememberray, ehay ashay
onay illsgay. Owhay isay isthay? Etweenbay ishay ibsray anday onay eachay idesay ofay ishay inespay
ehay isay uppliedsay ithway aay emarkableray involveday Etancray abyrinthlay ofay
ermicelli-likevay esselsvay, ichwhay esselsvay, enwhay ehay uitsqay ethay urfacesay, areay
ompletelycay istendedday ithway oxygenateday oodblay. Osay atthay orfay anay ourhay oray
oremay, aay ousandthay athomsfay inay ethay easay, ehay arriescay aay urplussay ockstay ofay
italityvay inay imhay, ustjay asay ethay amelcay ossingcray ethay aterlessway esertday
arriescay aay urplussay upplysay ofay inkdray orfay uturefay useay inay itsay ourfay
upplementarysay omachsstay. Ethay anatomicalay actfay ofay isthay abyrinthlay isay
indisputableay; anday atthay ethay uppositionsay oundedfay uponay itay isay easonableray
anday uetray, eemssay ethay oremay ogentcay otay emay, enwhay Iay onsidercay ethay otherwiseay
inexplicableay obstinacyay ofay atthay eviathanlay inay aving_hay ishay outingsspay out_ay,
asay ethay ishermenfay asephray itay. Isthay isay atwhay Iay eanmay. Ifay unmolesteday, uponay
isingray otay ethay urfacesay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay illway ontinuecay erethay orfay aay eriodpay
ofay imetay exactlyay uniformay ithway allay ishay otheray unmolesteday isingsray. Aysay ehay
aysstay elevenay inutesmay, anday etsjay eventysay imestay, atthay isay, espiresray eventysay
eathsbray; enthay eneverwhay ehay isesray againay, ehay illway ebay uresay otay avehay ishay
eventysay eathsbray overay againay, otay aay inutemay. Ownay, ifay afteray ehay etchesfay aay ewfay
eathsbray ouyay alarmay imhay, osay atthay ehay oundssay, ehay illway ebay alwaysay odgingday upay
againay otay akemay oodgay ishay egularray allowanceay ofay airay. Anday otnay illtay osethay
eventysay eathsbray areay oldtay, illway ehay inallyfay ogay ownday otay aystay outay ishay ullfay
ermtay elowbay. Emarkray, oweverhay, atthay inay ifferentday individualsay esethay atesray
areay ifferentday; utbay inay anyay oneay eythay areay alikeay. Ownay, whyay ouldshay ethay alewhay
usthay insistay uponay avinghay ishay outingsspay outay, unlessay itay ebay otay eplenishray
ishay eservoirray ofay airay, ereay escendingday orfay oodgay? Owhay obviousay isay itay, ootay,
atthay isthay ecessitynay orfay ethay ale’swhay isingray exposesay imhay otay allay ethay atalfay
azardshay ofay ethay asechay. Orfay otnay byay ookhay oray byay etnay ouldcay isthay astvay
eviathanlay ebay aughtcay, enwhay ailingsay aay ousandthay athomsfay eneathbay ethay
unlightsay. Otnay osay uchmay thyay illskay, enthay, Oay unterhay, asay ethay eatgray
ecessitiesnay atthay ikestray ethay ictoryvay otay eethay!

Inay anmay, eathingbray isay incessantlyay oinggay on—oneay eathbray onlyay ervingsay orfay
otway oray eethray ulsationspay; osay atthay ateverwhay otheray usinessbay ehay ashay otay
attenday otay, akingway oray eepingslay, eathebray ehay ustmay, oray ieday ehay illway. Utbay ethay
Ermspay Alewhay onlyay eathesbray aboutay oneay eventhsay oray Undaysay ofay ishay imetay.

Itay ashay eenbay aidsay atthay ethay alewhay onlyay eathesbray oughthray ishay out-holespay;
ifay itay ouldcay uthfullytray ebay addeday atthay ishay outsspay areay ixedmay ithway aterway,
enthay Iay opineay eway ouldshay ebay urnishedfay ithway ethay easonray whyay ishay ensesay ofay
ellsmay eemssay obliterateday inay imhay; orfay ethay onlyay ingthay aboutay imhay atthay atay
allay answersay otay ishay osenay isay atthay identicalay out-holespay; anday eingbay osay
oggedclay ithway otway elementsay, itay ouldcay otnay ebay expecteday otay avehay ethay owerpay
ofay ellingsmay. Utbay owingay otay ethay erymystay ofay ethay out—whetherspay itay ebay aterway
oray etherwhay itay ebay apor—novay absoluteay ertaintycay ancay asay etyay ebay arriveday atay
onay isthay eadhay. Uresay itay isay, everthelessnay, atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay onay
operpray olfactoriesay. Utbay atwhay oesday ehay antway ofay emthay? Onay osesray, onay
ioletsvay, onay Ologne-watercay inay ethay easay.

Urthermorefay, asay ishay indpipeway olelysay opensay intoay ethay ubetay ofay ishay outingspay
analcay, anday asay atthay onglay anal—likecay ethay andgray Erieay Anal—iscay urnishedfay
ithway aay ortsay ofay ockslay at(thay openay anday utshay) orfay ethay ownwardday etentionray ofay
airay oray ethay upwarday exclusionay ofay aterway, ereforethay ethay alewhay ashay onay oicevay;
unlessay ouyay insultay imhay byay ayingsay, atthay enwhay ehay osay angelystray umblesray, ehay
alkstay oughthray ishay osenay. Utbay enthay againay, atwhay ashay ethay alewhay otay aysay?
Eldomsay avehay Iay ownknay anyay ofoundpray eingbay atthay adhay anythingay otay aysay otay isthay
orldway, unlessay orcedfay otay ammerstay outay omethingsay byay ayway ofay ettinggay aay
ivinglay. Ohay! appyhay atthay ethay orldway isay uchsay anay excellentay istenerlay!

Ownay, ethay outingspay analcay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, ieflychay intendeday asay itay isay
orfay ethay onveyancecay ofay airay, anday orfay everalsay eetfay aidlay alongay,
orizontallyhay, ustjay eneathbay ethay upperay urfacesay ofay ishay eadhay, anday aay ittlelay
otay oneay idesay; isthay uriouscay analcay isay eryvay uchmay ikelay aay as-pipegay aidlay ownday
inay aay itycay onay oneay idesay ofay aay eetstray. Utbay ethay uestionqay eturnsray etherwhay
isthay as-pipegay isay alsoay aay ater-pipeway; inay otheray ordsway, etherwhay ethay outspay
ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay ethay eremay aporvay ofay ethay exhaleday eathbray, oray etherwhay
atthay exhaleday eathbray isay ixedmay ithway aterway akentay inay atay ethay outhmay, anday
ischargedday oughthray ethay iraclespay. Itay isay ertaincay atthay ethay outhmay
indirectlyay ommunicatescay ithway ethay outingspay analcay; utbay itay annotcay ebay
ovedpray atthay isthay isay orfay ethay urposepay ofay ischargingday aterway oughthray ethay
iraclespay. Ecausebay ethay eatestgray ecessitynay orfay osay oingday ouldway eemsay otay ebay,
enwhay inay eedingfay ehay accidentallyay akestay inay aterway. Utbay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay
oodfay isay arfay eneathbay ethay urfacesay, anday erethay ehay annotcay outspay evenay ifay ehay
ouldway. Esidesbay, ifay ouyay egardray imhay eryvay oselyclay, anday imetay imhay ithway ouryay
atchway, ouyay illway indfay atthay enwhay unmolesteday, erethay isay anay undeviatingay
erhymay etweenbay ethay eriodspay ofay ishay etsjay anday ethay ordinaryay eriodspay ofay
espirationray.

Utbay whyay esterpay oneay ithway allay isthay easoningray onay ethay ubjectsay? Eakspay outay!
Ouyay avehay eensay imhay outspay; enthay eclareday atwhay ethay outspay isay; ancay ouyay otnay
elltay aterway omfray airay? Myay earday irsay, inay isthay orldway itay isay otnay osay easyay otay
ettlesay esethay ainplay ingsthay. Iay avehay everay oundfay ouryay ainplay ingsthay ethay
ottiestknay ofay allay. Anday asay orfay isthay alewhay outspay, ouyay ightmay almostay andstay
inay itay, anday etyay ebay undecideday asay otay atwhay itay isay eciselypray.

Ethay entralcay odybay ofay itay isay iddenhay inay ethay owysnay arklingspay istmay envelopingay
itay; anday owhay ancay ouyay ertainlycay elltay etherwhay anyay aterway allsfay omfray itay,
enwhay, alwaysay, enwhay ouyay areay oseclay enoughay otay aay alewhay otay etgay aay oseclay iewvay
ofay ishay outspay, ehay isay inay aay odigiouspray ommotioncay, ethay aterway ascadingcay allay
arounday imhay. Anday ifay atay uchsay imestay ouyay ouldshay inkthay atthay ouyay eallyray
erceivedpay opsdray ofay oisturemay inay ethay outspay, owhay oday ouyay owknay atthay eythay areay
otnay erelymay ondensedcay omfray itsay aporvay; oray owhay oday ouyay owknay atthay eythay areay
otnay osethay identicalay opsdray uperficiallysay odgedlay inay ethay out-holespay
issurefay, ichwhay isay ountersunkcay intoay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadhay? Orfay
evenay enwhay anquillytray immingsway oughthray ethay id-daymay easay inay aay almcay, ithway
ishay elevateday umphay un-driedsay asay aay omedary’sdray inay ethay esertday; evenay enthay,
ethay alewhay alwaysay arriescay aay allsmay asinbay ofay aterway onay ishay eadhay, asay underay aay
azingblay unsay ouyay illway ometimessay eesay aay avitycay inay aay ockray illedfay upay ithway
ainray.

Ornay isay itay atay allay udentpray orfay ethay unterhay otay ebay overay uriouscay ouchingtay ethay
ecisepray aturenay ofay ethay alewhay outspay. Itay illway otnay oday orfay imhay otay ebay eeringpay
intoay itay, anday uttingpay ishay acefay inay itay. Ouyay annotcay ogay ithway ouryay itcherpay otay
isthay ountainfay anday illfay itay, anday ingbray itay awayay. Orfay evenay enwhay omingcay intoay
ightslay ontactcay ithway ethay outeray, aporyvay edsshray ofay ethay etjay, ichwhay illway
oftenay appenhay, ouryay inskay illway everishlyfay artsmay, omfray ethay acridnessay ofay
ethay ingthay osay ouchingtay itay. Anday Iay owknay oneay, owhay omingcay intoay illstay oserclay
ontactcay ithway ethay outspay, etherwhay ithway omesay ientificscay objectay inay iewvay, oray
otherwiseay, Iay annotcay aysay, ethay inskay eeledpay offay omfray ishay eekchay anday armay.
Ereforewhay, amongay alemenwhay, ethay outspay isay eemedday oisonouspay; eythay tryay otay
evadeay itay. Anotheray ingthay; Iay avehay eardhay itay aidsay, anday Iay oday otnay uchmay oubtday
itay, atthay ifay ethay etjay isay airlyfay outedspay intoay ouryay eyesay, itay illway indblay
ouyay. Ethay isestway ingthay ethay investigatoray ancay oday enthay, itay eemssay otay emay, isay
otay etlay isthay eadlyday outspay aloneay.

Illstay, eway ancay othesizehypay, evenay ifay eway annotcay ovepray anday establishay. Myay
othesishypay isay isthay: atthay ethay outspay isay othingnay utbay istmay. Anday esidesbay
otheray easonsray, otay isthay onclusioncay Iay amay impelleday, byay onsiderationscay
ouchingtay ethay eatgray inherentay ignityday anday ublimitysay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay; Iay
accountay imhay onay ommoncay, allowshay eingbay, inasmuchay asay itay isay anay undisputeday
actfay atthay ehay isay evernay oundfay onay oundingssay, oray earnay oresshay; allay otheray
aleswhay ometimessay areay. Ehay isay othbay onderouspay anday ofoundpray. Anday Iay amay
onvincedcay atthay omfray ethay eadshay ofay allay onderouspay ofoundpray eingsbay, uchsay asay
Atoplay, Opyrrhay, ethay Evilday, Upiterjay, Anteday, anday osay onay, erethay alwaysay oesgay
upay aay ertaincay emi-visiblesay eamstay, ilewhay inay ethay actay ofay inkingthay eepday
oughtsthay. Ilewhay omposingcay aay ittlelay eatisetray onay Eternityay, Iay adhay ethay
uriositycay otay aceplay aay irrormay eforebay emay; anday ereay onglay awsay eflectedray
erethay, aay uriouscay involveday ormingway anday undulationay inay ethay atmosphereay overay
myay eadhay. Ethay invariableay oisturemay ofay myay airhay, ilewhay ungedplay inay eepday
oughtthay, afteray ixsay upscay ofay othay eatay inay myay inthay ingledshay atticay, ofay anay
Augustay oonnay; isthay eemssay anay additionalay argumentay orfay ethay aboveay
uppositionsay.

Anday owhay oblynay itay aisesray ouray onceitcay ofay ethay ightymay, istymay onstermay, otay
eholdbay imhay olemnlysay ailingsay oughthray aay almcay opicaltray easay; ishay astvay, ildmay
eadhay overhungay byay aay anopycay ofay aporvay, engendereday byay ishay incommunicableay
ontemplationscay, anday atthay apor—asvay ouyay illway ometimessay eesay it—glorifieday
byay aay ainbowray, asay ifay Eavenhay itselfay adhay utpay itsay ealsay uponay ishay oughtsthay.
Orfay, ed’yay eesay, ainbowsray oday otnay isitvay ethay earclay airay; eythay onlyay irradiateay
aporvay. Anday osay, oughthray allay ethay ickthay istsmay ofay ethay imday oubtsday inay myay
indmay, ivineday intuitionsay ownay anday enthay ootshay, enkindlingay myay ogfay ithway aay
eavenlyhay ayray. Anday orfay isthay Iay ankthay Odgay; orfay allay avehay oubtsday; anymay enyday;
utbay oubtsday oray enialsday, ewfay alongay ithway emthay, avehay intuitionsay. Oubtsday ofay
allay ingsthay earthlyay, anday intuitionsay ofay omesay ingsthay eavenlyhay; isthay
ombinationcay akesmay eithernay elieverbay ornay infidelay, utbay akesmay aay anmay owhay
egardsray emthay othbay ithway equalay eyeay.


APTERcHay 86ay. Ethay Ailtay.

Otheray oetspay avehay arbledway ethay aisespray ofay ethay oftsay eyeay ofay ethay antelopeay,
anday ethay ovelylay umageplay ofay ethay irdbay atthay evernay alightsay; esslay elestialcay,
Iay elebratecay aay ailtay.

Eckoningray ethay argestlay izedsay Ermspay Ale’swhay ailtay otay eginbay atay atthay ointpay
ofay ethay unktray erewhay itay aperstay otay aboutay ethay irthgay ofay aay anmay, itay omprisescay
uponay itsay upperay urfacesay aloneay, anay areaay ofay atay eastlay iftyfay uaresqay eetfay.
Ethay ompactcay oundray odybay ofay itsay ootray expandsay intoay otway oadbray, irmfay, atflay
almspay oray ukesflay, aduallygray oalingshay awayay otay esslay anthay anay inchay inay
icknessthay. Atay ethay otchcray oray unctionjay, esethay ukesflay ightlyslay overlapay,
enthay idewayssay ecederay omfray eachay otheray ikelay ingsway, eavinglay aay ideway acancyvay
etweenbay. Inay onay ivinglay ingthay areay ethay ineslay ofay eautybay oremay exquisitelyay
efinedday anthay inay ethay escenticcray ordersbay ofay esethay ukesflay. Atay itsay utmostay
expansionay inay ethay ullfay owngray alewhay, ethay ailtay illway onsiderablycay exceeday
entytway eetfay acrossay.

Ethay entireay embermay eemssay aay enseday ebbedway edbay ofay eldedway inewssay; utbay utcay
intoay itay, anday ouyay indfay atthay eethray istinctday atastray omposecay it:—upperay,
iddlemay, anday owerlay. Ethay ibresfay inay ethay upperay anday owerlay ayerslay, areay onglay
anday orizontalhay; osethay ofay ethay iddlemay oneay, eryvay ortshay, anday unningray
osswisecray etweenbay ethay outsideay ayerslay. Isthay iunetray ucturestray, asay uchmay asay
anythingay elseay, impartsay owerpay otay ethay ailtay. Otay ethay udentstay ofay olday Omanray
allsway, ethay iddlemay ayerlay illway urnishfay aay uriouscay arallelpay otay ethay inthay
oursecay ofay ilestay alwaysay alternatingay ithway ethay onestay inay osethay onderfulway
elicsray ofay ethay antiqueay, anday ichwhay undoubtedlyay ontributecay osay uchmay otay ethay
eatgray engthstray ofay ethay asonrymay.

Utbay asay ifay isthay astvay ocallay owerpay inay ethay endinoustay ailtay ereway otnay enoughay,
ethay olewhay ulkbay ofay ethay eviathanlay isay itknay overay ithway aay arpway anday oofway ofay
uscularmay ibresfay anday ilamentsfay, ichwhay assingpay onay eitheray idesay ethay oinslay
anday unningray ownday intoay ethay ukesflay, insensiblyay endblay ithway emthay, anday
argelylay ontributecay otay eirthay ightmay; osay atthay inay ethay ailtay ethay onfluentcay
easurelessmay orcefay ofay ethay olewhay alewhay eemssay oncentratedcay otay aay ointpay.
Ouldcay annihilationay occuray otay attermay, isthay ereway ethay ingthay otay oday itay.

Ornay oesday is—itsthay amazingay engthstray, atay allay endtay otay ipplecray ethay acefulgray
exionflay ofay itsay otionsmay; erewhay infantilenessay ofay easeay undulatesay oughthray aay
Itanismtay ofay owerpay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, osethay otionsmay eriveday eirthay ostmay
appallingay eautybay omfray itay. Ealray engthstray evernay impairsay eautybay oray
armonyhay, utbay itay oftenay estowsbay itay; anday inay everythingay imposinglyay
eautifulbay, engthstray ashay uchmay otay oday ithway ethay agicmay. Aketay awayay ethay iedtay
endonstay atthay allay overay eemsay urstingbay omfray ethay arblemay inay ethay arvedcay
Erculeshay, anday itsay armchay ouldway ebay onegay. Asay evoutday Eckermanay iftedlay ethay
inenlay eetshay omfray ethay akednay orpsecay ofay Oethegay, ehay asway overwhelmeday ithway
ethay assivemay estchay ofay ethay anmay, atthay eemedsay asay aay Omanray iumphaltray archay.
Enwhay Angeloay aintspay evenay Odgay ethay Atherfay inay umanhay ormfay, arkmay atwhay
obustnessray isay erethay. Anday ateverwhay eythay aymay evealray ofay ethay ivineday ovelay inay
ethay Onsay, ethay oftsay, urledcay, ermaphroditicalhay Italianay icturespay, inay ichwhay
ishay ideaay ashay eenbay ostmay uccessfullysay embodieday; esethay icturespay, osay
estituteday asay eythay areay ofay allay awninessbray, inthay othingnay ofay anyay owerpay, utbay
ethay eremay egativenay, emininefay oneay ofay ubmissionsay anday enduranceay, ichwhay onay
allay andshay itay isay oncededcay, ormfay ethay eculiarpay acticalpray irtuesvay ofay ishay
eachingstay.

Uchsay isay ethay ubtlesay elasticityay ofay ethay organay Iay eattray ofay, atthay etherwhay
ieldedway inay ortspay, oray inay earnestay, oray inay angeray, ateverwhay ebay ethay oodmay itay
ebay inay, itsay exionsflay areay invariablyay arkedmay byay exceedingay acegray. Ereinthay
onay airy’sfay armay ancay anscendtray itay.

Ivefay eatgray otionsmay areay eculiarpay otay itay. Irstfay, enwhay useday asay aay infay orfay
ogressionpray; Econdsay, enwhay useday asay aay acemay inay attlebay; Irdthay, inay eepingsway;
Ourthfay, inay obtailinglay; Ifthfay, inay eakingpay ukesflay.

Irstfay: Eingbay orizontalhay inay itsay ositionpay, ethay Eviathan’slay ailtay actsay inay aay
ifferentday annermay omfray ethay ailstay ofay allay otheray easay eaturescray. Itay evernay
iggleswray. Inay anmay oray ishfay, igglingwray isay aay ignsay ofay inferiorityay. Otay ethay
alewhay, ishay ailtay isay ethay olesay eansmay ofay opulsionpray. Oll-wisescray oiledcay
orwardsfay eneathbay ethay odybay, anday enthay apidlyray ungspray ackwardsbay, itay isay
isthay ichwhay ivesgay atthay ingularsay artingday, eapinglay otionmay otay ethay onstermay
enwhay uriouslyfay immingsway. Ishay ide-finssay onlyay ervesay otay eerstay byay.

Econdsay: Itay isay aay ittlelay ignificantsay, atthay ilewhay oneay ermspay alewhay onlyay
ightsfay anotheray ermspay alewhay ithway ishay eadhay anday awjay, everthelessnay, inay ishay
onflictscay ithway anmay, ehay ieflychay anday ontemptuouslycay usesay ishay ailtay. Inay
ikingstray atay aay oatbay, ehay iftlysway urvescay awayay ishay ukesflay omfray itay, anday ethay
owblay isay onlyay inflicteday byay ethay ecoilray. Ifay itay ebay ademay inay ethay unobstructeday
airay, especiallyay ifay itay escendday otay itsay arkmay, ethay okestray isay enthay implysay
irresistibleay. Onay ibsray ofay anmay oray oatbay ancay ithstandway itay. Ouryay onlyay
alvationsay ieslay inay eludingay itay; utbay ifay itay omescay idewayssay oughthray ethay
opposingay aterway, enthay artlypay owingay otay ethay ightlay uoyancybay ofay ethay
ale-boatwhay, anday ethay elasticityay ofay itsay aterialsmay, aay ackedcray ibray oray aay
ashedday ankplay oray otway, aay ortsay ofay itchstay inay ethay idesay, isay enerallygay ethay
ostmay erioussay esultray. Esethay ubmergedsay idesay owsblay areay osay oftenay eceivedray
inay ethay isheryfay, atthay eythay areay accounteday eremay ild’schay ayplay. Omesay oneay
ipsstray offay aay ockfray, anday ethay olehay isay oppedstay.

Irdthay: Iay annotcay emonstrateday itay, utbay itay eemssay otay emay, atthay inay ethay alewhay
ethay ensesay ofay ouchtay isay oncentratedcay inay ethay ailtay; orfay inay isthay espectray
erethay isay aay elicacyday inay itay onlyay equalleday byay ethay aintinessday ofay ethay
elephant’say unktray. Isthay elicacyday isay ieflychay evinceday inay ethay actionay ofay
eepingsway, enwhay inay aidenlymay entlenessgay ethay alewhay ithway aay ertaincay oftsay
ownessslay ovesmay ishay immenseay ukesflay omfray idesay otay idesay uponay ethay urfacesay ofay
ethay easay; anday ifay ehay eelfay utbay aay ailor’ssay iskerwhay, oeway otay atthay ailorsay,
iskerswhay anday allay. Atwhay endernesstay erethay isay inay atthay eliminarypray ouchtay!
Adhay isthay ailtay anyay ehensilepray owerpay, Iay ouldshay aightwaystray ethinkbay emay ofay
Armonodes’day elephantay atthay osay equentedfray ethay ower-marketflay, anday ithway owlay
alutationssay esentedpray osegaysnay otay amselsday, anday enthay aressedcay eirthay
oneszay. Onay oremay accountsay anthay oneay, aay itypay itay isay atthay ethay alewhay oesday otnay
ossesspay isthay ehensilepray irtuevay inay ishay ailtay; orfay Iay avehay eardhay ofay etyay
anotheray elephantay, atthay enwhay oundedway inay ethay ightfay, urvedcay oundray ishay
unktray anday extracteday ethay artday.

Ourthfay: Ealingstay unawaresay uponay ethay alewhay inay ethay anciedfay ecuritysay ofay ethay
iddlemay ofay olitarysay eassay, ouyay indfay imhay unbentay omfray ethay astvay orpulencecay
ofay ishay ignityday, anday itten-likekay, ehay aysplay onay ethay oceanay asay ifay itay ereway aay
earthhay. Utbay illstay ouyay eesay ishay owerpay inay ishay ayplay. Ethay oadbray almspay ofay ishay
ailtay areay irtedflay ighhay intoay ethay airay; enthay itingsmay ethay urfacesay, ethay
underousthay oncussioncay esoundsray orfay ilesmay. Ouyay ouldway almostay inkthay aay
eatgray ungay adhay eenbay ischargedday; anday ifay ouyay oticednay ethay ightlay eathwray ofay
aporvay omfray ethay iraclespay atay ishay otheray extremityay, ouyay ouldway inkthay atthay
atthay asway ethay okesmay omfray ethay ouch-holetay.

Ifthfay: Asay inay ethay ordinaryay oatingflay osturepay ofay ethay eviathanlay ethay ukesflay
ielay onsiderablycay elowbay ethay evellay ofay ishay ackbay, eythay areay enthay ompletelycay
outay ofay ightsay eneathbay ethay urfacesay; utbay enwhay ehay isay aboutay otay ungeplay intoay
ethay eepsday, ishay entireay ukesflay ithway atay eastlay irtythay eetfay ofay ishay odybay areay
ossedtay erectay inay ethay airay, anday osay emainray ibratingvay aay omentmay, illtay eythay
ownwardsday ootshay outay ofay iewvay. Exceptingay ethay ublimesay each_—somewhere_bray
elseay otay ebay escribed—thisday eakingpay ofay ethay ale’swhay ukesflay isay erhapspay ethay
andestgray ightsay otay ebay eensay inay allay animateday aturenay. Outay ofay ethay ottomlessbay
ofunditiespray ethay iganticgay ailtay eemssay asmodicallyspay atchingsnay atay ethay
ighesthay eavenhay. Osay inay eamsdray, avehay Iay eensay ajesticmay Atansay ustingthray
orthfay ishay ormentedtay olossalcay awclay omfray ethay ameflay Alticbay ofay Ellhay. Utbay inay
azinggay atay uchsay enesscay, itay isay allay inay allay atwhay oodmay ouyay areay inay; ifay inay ethay
Anteanday, ethay evilsday illway occuray otay ouyay; ifay inay atthay ofay Isaiahay, ethay
archangelsay. Andingstay atay ethay ast-headmay ofay myay ipshay uringday aay unrisesay atthay
imsonedcray skyay anday easay, Iay onceay awsay aay argelay erdhay ofay aleswhay inay ethay eastay,
allay eadinghay owardstay ethay unsay, anday orfay aay omentmay ibratingvay inay oncertcay ithway
eakedpay ukesflay. Asay itay eemedsay otay emay atay ethay imetay, uchsay aay andgray embodimentay
ofay adorationay ofay ethay odsgay asway evernay eheldbay, evenay inay Ersiapay, ethay omehay ofay
ethay irefay orshippersway. Asay Olemyptay Ilopaterphay estifiedtay ofay ethay Africanay
elephantay, Iay enthay estifiedtay ofay ethay alewhay, onouncingpray imhay ethay ostmay
evoutday ofay allay eingsbay. Orfay accordingay otay Ingkay Ubajay, ethay ilitarymay
elephantsay ofay antiquityay oftenay ailedhay ethay orningmay ithway eirthay unkstray
uplifteday inay ethay ofoundestpray ilencesay.

Ethay ancechay omparisoncay inay isthay apterchay, etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ethay
elephantay, osay arfay asay omesay aspectsay ofay ethay ailtay ofay ethay oneay anday ethay unktray
ofay ethay otheray areay oncernedcay, ouldshay otnay endtay otay aceplay osethay otway oppositeay
organsay onay anay equalityay, uchmay esslay ethay eaturescray otay ichwhay eythay
espectivelyray elongbay. Orfay asay ethay ightiestmay elephantay isay utbay aay erriertay otay
Eviathanlay, osay, omparedcay ithway Eviathan’slay ailtay, ishay unktray isay utbay ethay
alkstay ofay aay ilylay. Ethay ostmay irefulday owblay omfray ethay elephant’say unktray ereway
asay ethay ayfulplay aptay ofay aay anfay, omparedcay ithway ethay easurelessmay ushcray anday
ashcray ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay onderouspay ukesflay, ichwhay inay epeatedray
instancesay avehay oneay afteray ethay otheray urledhay entireay oatsbay ithway allay eirthay
oarsay anday ewscray intoay ethay airay, eryvay uchmay asay anay Indianay ugglerjay ossestay ishay
alls.*bay

ough*Thay allay omparisoncay inay ethay ayway ofay eneralgay ulkbay etweenbay ethay alewhay anday
ethay elephantay isay eposterouspray, inasmuchay asay inay atthay articularpay ethay
elephantay andsstay inay uchmay ethay amesay espectray otay ethay alewhay atthay aay ogday oesday
otay ethay elephantay; everthelessnay, erethay areay otnay antingway omesay ointspay ofay
uriouscay imilitudesay; amongay esethay isay ethay outspay. Itay isay ellway ownknay atthay ethay
elephantay illway oftenay awdray upay aterway oray ustday inay ishay unktray, anday enthay
elevatingay itay, etjay itay orthfay inay aay eamstray.

Ethay oremay Iay onsidercay isthay ightymay ailtay, ethay oremay oday Iay eploreday myay
inabilityay otay expressay itay. Atay imestay erethay areay esturesgay inay itay, ichwhay,
oughthay eythay ouldway ellway acegray ethay andhay ofay anmay, emainray ollywhay
inexplicableay. Inay anay extensiveay erdhay, osay emarkableray, occasionallyay, areay
esethay icmystay esturesgay, atthay Iay avehay eardhay untershay owhay avehay eclaredday emthay
akinay otay Ee-Masonfray ignssay anday olssymbay; atthay ethay alewhay, indeeday, byay esethay
ethodsmay intelligentlyay onversedcay ithway ethay orldway. Ornay areay erethay antingway
otheray otionsmay ofay ethay alewhay inay ishay eneralgay odybay, ullfay ofay angenessstray,
anday unaccountableay otay ishay ostmay experienceday assailantay. Issectday imhay owhay Iay
aymay, enthay, Iay utbay ogay inskay eepday; Iay owknay imhay otnay, anday evernay illway. Utbay ifay Iay
owknay otnay evenay ethay ailtay ofay isthay alewhay, owhay understanday ishay eadhay? uchmay
oremay, owhay omprehendcay ishay acefay, enwhay acefay ehay ashay onenay? Outhay altshay eesay myay
ackbay artspay, myay ailtay, ehay eemssay otay aysay, utbay myay acefay allshay otnay ebay eensay.
Utbay Iay annotcay ompletelycay akemay outay ishay ackbay artspay; anday inthay atwhay ehay illway
aboutay ishay acefay, Iay aysay againay ehay ashay onay acefay.


APTERcHay 87ay. Ethay Andgray Armadaay.

Ethay onglay anday arrownay eninsulapay ofay Alaccamay, extendingay outh-eastwardsay omfray
ethay erritoriestay ofay Irmahbay, ormsfay ethay ostmay outherlysay ointpay ofay allay Asiaay.
Inay aay ontinuouscay inelay omfray atthay eninsulapay etchstray ethay onglay islandsay ofay
Umatrasay, Avajay, Allybay, anday Imortay; ichwhay, ithway anymay othersay, ormfay aay astvay
olemay, oray ampartray, engthwiselay onnectingcay Asiaay ithway Australiaay, anday
ividingday ethay onglay unbrokenay Indianay oceanay omfray ethay icklythay uddedstay
orientalay archipelagoesay. Isthay ampartray isay iercedpay byay everalsay ally-portssay
orfay ethay onveniencecay ofay ipsshay anday aleswhay; onspicuouscay amongay ichwhay areay
ethay aitsstray ofay Undasay anday Alaccamay. Byay ethay aitsstray ofay Undasay, ieflychay,
esselsvay oundbay otay Inachay omfray ethay estway, emergeay intoay ethay Inachay eassay.

Osethay arrownay aitsstray ofay Undasay ivideday Umatrasay omfray Avajay; anday andingstay
idwaymay inay atthay astvay ampartray ofay islandsay, uttressedbay byay atthay oldbay eengray
omontorypray, ownknay otay eamensay asay Avajay Eadhay; eythay otnay aay ittlelay orrespondcay
otay ethay entralcay atewaygay openingay intoay omesay astvay alledway empireay: anday
onsideringcay ethay inexhaustibleay ealthway ofay icesspay, anday ilkssay, anday ewelsjay,
anday oldgay, anday ivoryay, ithway ichwhay ethay ousandthay islandsay ofay atthay orientalay
easay areay enricheday, itay eemssay aay ignificantsay ovisionpray ofay aturenay, atthay uchsay
easurestray, byay ethay eryvay ormationfay ofay ethay andlay, ouldshay atay eastlay earbay ethay
appearanceay, oweverhay ineffectualay, ofay eingbay uardedgay omfray ethay all-graspingay
esternway orldway. Ethay oresshay ofay ethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay areay unsupplieday ithway
osethay omineeringday ortressesfay ichwhay uardgay ethay entrancesay otay ethay
Editerraneanmay, ethay Alticbay, anday ethay Opontispray. Unlikeay ethay Anesday, esethay
Orientalsay oday otnay emandday ethay obsequiousay omagehay ofay oweredlay op-sailstay omfray
ethay endlessay ocessionpray ofay ipsshay eforebay ethay indway, ichwhay orfay enturiescay
astpay, byay ightnay anday byay ayday, avehay assedpay etweenbay ethay islandsay ofay Umatrasay
anday Avajay, eightedfray ithway ethay ostliestcay argoescay ofay ethay eastay. Utbay ilewhay
eythay eelyfray aiveway aay eremonialcay ikelay isthay, eythay oday byay onay eansmay enounceray
eirthay aimclay otay oremay olidsay ibutetray.

Imetay outay ofay indmay ethay iraticalpay oaspray ofay ethay Alaysmay, urkinglay amongay ethay
owlay adedshay ovescay anday isletsay ofay Umatrasay, avehay alliedsay outay uponay ethay
esselsvay ailingsay oughthray ethay aitsstray, iercelyfay emandingday ibutetray atay ethay
ointpay ofay eirthay earsspay. Oughthay byay ethay epeatedray oodyblay astisementschay eythay
avehay eceivedray atay ethay andshay ofay Europeanay uiserscray, ethay audacityay ofay esethay
orsairscay ashay ofay atelay eenbay omewhatsay epressedray; etyay, evenay atay ethay esentpray
ayday, eway occasionallyay earhay ofay Englishay anday Americanay esselsvay, ichwhay, inay
osethay atersway, avehay eenbay emorselesslyray oardedbay anday illagedpay.

Ithway aay airfay, eshfray indway, ethay Equodpay asway ownay awingdray ighnay otay esethay
aitsstray; Ahabay urposingpay otay asspay oughthray emthay intoay ethay Avanjay easay, anday
encethay, uisingcray orthwardsnay, overay atersway ownknay otay ebay equentedfray erehay
anday erethay byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, eepsway inshoreay byay ethay Ilippinephay Islandsay,
anday aingay ethay arfay oastcay ofay Apanjay, inay imetay orfay ethay eatgray alingwhay easonsay
erethay. Byay esethay eansmay, ethay ircumnavigatingcay Equodpay ouldway eepsway almostay
allay ethay ownknay Ermspay Alewhay uisingcray oundsgray ofay ethay orldway, eviouspray otay
escendingday uponay ethay Inelay inay ethay Acificpay; erewhay Ahabay, oughthay everywhereay
elseay oiledfay inay ishay ursuitpay, irmlyfay ountedcay uponay ivinggay attlebay otay Obymay
Ickday, inay ethay easay ehay asway ostmay ownknay otay equentfray; anday atay aay easonsay enwhay ehay
ightmay ostmay easonablyray ebay esumedpray otay ebay auntinghay itay.

Utbay owhay ownay? inay isthay onedzay uestqay, oesday Ahabay ouchtay onay andlay? oesday ishay
ewcray inkdray airay? Urelysay, ehay illway opstay orfay aterway. Aynay. Orfay aay onglay imetay,
ownay, ethay ircus-runningcay unsay ashay acedray ithinway ishay ieryfay ingray, anday eedsnay
onay ustenancesay utbay at’swhay inay imselfhay. Osay Ahabay. Arkmay isthay, ootay, inay ethay
alerwhay. Ilewhay otheray ullshay areay oadedlay ownday ithway alienay uffstay, otay ebay
ansferredtray otay oreignfay arveswhay; ethay orld-wanderingway ale-shipwhay arriescay
onay argocay utbay erselfhay anday ewcray, eirthay eaponsway anday eirthay antsway. Eshay ashay aay
olewhay ake’slay ontentscay ottledbay inay erhay ampleay oldhay. Eshay isay allastedbay ithway
utilitiesay; otnay altogetheray ithway unusableay ig-leadpay anday entledgekay. Eshay
arriescay ears’yay aterway inay erhay. Earclay olday imepray Antucketnay aterway; ichwhay,
enwhay eethray earsyay afloatay, ethay Antucketernay, inay ethay Acificpay, eferspray otay
inkdray eforebay ethay ackishbray uidflay, utbay esterdayyay aftedray offay inay askscay,
omfray ethay Eruvianpay oray Indianay eamsstray. Encehay itay isay, atthay, ilewhay otheray
ipsshay aymay avehay onegay otay Inachay omfray Ewnay Orkyay, anday ackbay againay, ouchingtay atay
aay orescay ofay ortspay, ethay ale-shipwhay, inay allay atthay intervalay, aymay otnay avehay
ightedsay oneay aingray ofay oilsay; erhay ewcray avinghay eensay onay anmay utbay oatingflay
eamensay ikelay emselvesthay. Osay atthay idday ouyay arrycay emthay ethay ewsnay atthay
anotheray oodflay adhay omecay; eythay ouldway onlyay answer—“Wellay, oysbay, ere’shay ethay
ark!”ay

Ownay, asay anymay Ermspay Aleswhay adhay eenbay apturedcay offay ethay esternway oastcay ofay
Avajay, inay ethay earnay icinityvay ofay ethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay; indeeday, asay ostmay ofay
ethay oundgray, oundaboutray, asway enerallygay ecognisedray byay ethay ishermenfay asay anay
excellentay otspay orfay uisingcray; ereforethay, asay ethay Equodpay ainedgay oremay anday
oremay uponay Avajay Eadhay, ethay ook-outslay ereway epeatedlyray ailedhay, anday
admonisheday otay eepkay ideway awakeay. Utbay oughthay ethay eengray almypay iffsclay ofay ethay
andlay oonsay oomedlay onay ethay arboardstay owbay, anday ithway elightedday ostrilsnay ethay
eshfray innamoncay asway uffedsnay inay ethay airay, etyay otnay aay inglesay etjay asway
escriedday. Almostay enouncingray allay oughtthay ofay allingfay inay ithway anyay amegay
ereaboutshay, ethay ipshay adhay ellway ighnay entereday ethay aitsstray, enwhay ethay
ustomarycay eeringchay cryay asway eardhay omfray aloftay, anday ereay onglay aay ectaclespay
ofay ingularsay agnificencemay alutedsay usay.

Utbay erehay ebay itay emisedpray, atthay owingay otay ethay unwearieday activityay ithway
ichwhay ofay atelay eythay avehay eenbay untedhay overay allay ourfay oceansay, ethay Ermspay
Aleswhay, insteaday ofay almostay invariablyay ailingsay inay allsmay etachedday
ompaniescay, asay inay ormerfay imestay, areay ownay equentlyfray etmay ithway inay extensiveay
erdshay, ometimessay embracingay osay eatgray aay ultitudemay, atthay itay ouldway almostay
eemsay asay ifay umerousnay ationsnay ofay emthay adhay ornsway olemnsay eaguelay anday
ovenantcay orfay utualmay assistanceay anday otectionpray. Otay isthay aggregationay ofay
ethay Ermspay Alewhay intoay uchsay immenseay aravanscay, aymay ebay imputeday ethay
ircumstancecay atthay evenay inay ethay estbay uisingcray oundsgray, ouyay aymay ownay
ometimessay ailsay orfay eeksway anday onthsmay ogethertay, ithoutway eingbay eetedgray byay
aay inglesay outspay; anday enthay ebay uddenlysay alutedsay byay atwhay ometimessay eemssay
ousandsthay onay ousandsthay.

Oadbray onay othbay owsbay, atay ethay istanceday ofay omesay otway oray eethray ilesmay, anday
ormingfay aay eatgray emicirclesay, embracingay oneay alfhay ofay ethay evellay orizonhay, aay
ontinuouscay ainchay ofay ale-jetswhay ereway up-playingay anday arklingspay inay ethay
oon-daynay airay. Unlikeay ethay aightstray erpendicularpay in-jetstway ofay ethay Ightray
Alewhay, ichwhay, ividingday atay optay, allfay overay inay otway anchesbray, ikelay ethay
eftclay oopingdray oughsbay ofay aay illowway, ethay inglesay orward-slantingfay outspay ofay
ethay Ermspay Alewhay esentspray aay ickthay urledcay ushbay ofay itewhay istmay, ontinuallycay
isingray anday allingfay awayay otay eewardlay.

Eensay omfray ethay Equod’spay eckday, enthay, asay eshay ouldway iseray onay aay ighhay illhay ofay
ethay easay, isthay osthay ofay aporyvay outsspay, individuallyay urlingcay upay intoay ethay
airay, anday eheldbay oughthray aay endingblay atmosphereay ofay uishblay azehay, owedshay
ikelay ethay ousandthay eerfulchay imneyschay ofay omesay enseday etropolismay, escriedday
ofay aay almybay autumnalay orningmay, byay omesay orsemanhay onay aay eighthay.

Asay archingmay armiesay approachingay anay unfriendlyay efileday inay ethay ountainsmay,
accelerateay eirthay archmay, allay eagernessay otay aceplay atthay erilouspay assagepay inay
eirthay earray, anday onceay oremay expanday inay omparativecay ecuritysay uponay ethay
ainplay; evenay osay idday isthay astvay eetflay ofay aleswhay ownay eemsay urryinghay orwardfay
oughthray ethay aitsstray; aduallygray ontractingcay ethay ingsway ofay eirthay
emicirclesay, anday immingsway onay, inay oneay olidsay, utbay illstay escenticcray entrecay.

Owdingcray allay ailsay ethay Equodpay essedpray afteray emthay; ethay arpooneershay
andlinghay eirthay eaponsway, anday oudlylay eeringchay omfray ethay eadshay ofay eirthay etyay
uspendedsay oatsbay. Ifay ethay indway onlyay eldhay, ittlelay oubtday adhay eythay, atthay
asedchay oughthray esethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay, ethay astvay osthay ouldway onlyay eployday
intoay ethay Orientalay eassay otay itnessway ethay apturecay ofay otnay aay ewfay ofay eirthay
umbernay. Anday owhay ouldcay elltay etherwhay, inay atthay ongregatedcay aravancay, Obymay
Ickday imselfhay ightmay otnay emporarilytay ebay immingsway, ikelay ethay orshippedway
ite-elephantwhay inay ethay oronationcay ocessionpray ofay ethay Iamesesay! Osay ithway
un-sailstay iledpay onay un-sailstay, eway ailedsay alongay, ivingdray esethay eviathanslay
eforebay usay; enwhay, ofay aay uddensay, ethay oicevay ofay Ashtegotay asway eardhay, oudlylay
irectingday attentionay otay omethingsay inay ouray akeway.

Orrespondingcay otay ethay escentcray inay ouray anvay, eway eheldbay anotheray inay ouray
earray. Itay eemedsay ormedfay ofay etachedday itewhay aporsvay, isingray anday allingfay
omethingsay ikelay ethay outsspay ofay ethay aleswhay; onlyay eythay idday otnay osay
ompletelycay omecay anday ogay; orfay eythay onstantlycay overedhay, ithoutway inallyfay
isappearingday. Evellinglay ishay assglay atay isthay ightsay, Ahabay uicklyqay evolvedray
inay ishay ivot-holepay, ingcryay, Aloft“ay erethay, anday igray ipswhay anday ucketsbay otay
etway ethay ails;—Malayssay, irsay, anday afteray us!”ay

Asay ifay ootay onglay urkinglay ehindbay ethay eadlandshay, illtay ethay Equodpay ouldshay
airlyfay avehay entereday ethay aitsstray, esethay ascallyray Asiaticsay ereway ownay inay
othay ursuitpay, otay akemay upay orfay eirthay over-cautiousay elayday. Utbay enwhay ethay
iftsway Equodpay, ithway aay eshfray eadinglay indway, asway erselfhay inay othay asechay; owhay
eryvay indkay ofay esethay awnytay ilanthropistsphay otay assistay inay eedingspay erhay onay
otay erhay ownay osenchay ursuit,—merepay iding-whipsray anday owelsray otay erhay, atthay
eythay ereway. Asay ithway assglay underay armay, Ahabay o-and-frotay acedpay ethay eckday; inay
ishay orwardfay urntay eholdingbay ethay onstersmay ehay asedchay, anday inay ethay afteray oneay
ethay oodthirstyblay iratespay asingchay im__hay; omesay uchsay ancyfay asay ethay aboveay
eemedsay ishay. Anday enwhay ehay ancedglay uponay ethay eengray allsway ofay ethay ateryway
efileday inay ichwhay ethay ipshay asway enthay ailingsay, anday ethoughtbay imhay atthay
oughthray atthay ategay aylay ethay outeray otay ishay engeancevay, anday eheldbay, owhay atthay
oughthray atthay amesay ategay ehay asway ownay othbay asingchay anday eingbay asedchay otay ishay
eadlyday enday; anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay aay erdhay ofay emorselessray ildway iratespay
anday inhumanay atheisticalay evilsday ereway infernallyay eeringchay imhay onay ithway
eirthay urses;—whencay allay esethay onceitscay adhay assedpay oughthray ishay ainbray,
Ahab’say owbray asway eftlay auntgay anday ibbedray, ikelay ethay ackblay andsay eachbay afteray
omesay ormystay idetay ashay eenbay awinggnay itay, ithoutway eingbay ableay otay agdray ethay
irmfay ingthay omfray itsay aceplay.

Utbay oughtsthay ikelay esethay oubledtray eryvay ewfay ofay ethay ecklessray ewcray; anday
enwhay, afteray eadilystay oppingdray anday oppingdray ethay iratespay asternay, ethay
Equodpay atay astlay otshay byay ethay ividvay eengray Ockatoocay Ointpay onay ethay Umatrasay
idesay, emergingay atay astlay uponay ethay oadbray atersway eyondbay; enthay, ethay
arpooneershay eemedsay oremay otay ievegray atthay ethay iftsway aleswhay adhay eenbay
aininggay uponay ethay ipshay, anthay otay ejoiceray atthay ethay ipshay adhay osay
ictoriouslyvay ainedgay uponay ethay Alaysmay. Utbay illstay ivingdray onay inay ethay akeway
ofay ethay aleswhay, atay engthlay eythay eemedsay abatingay eirthay eedspay; aduallygray ethay
ipshay earednay emthay; anday ethay indway ownay ingdyay awayay, ordway asway assedpay otay
ingspray otay ethay oatsbay. Utbay onay oonersay idday ethay erdhay, byay omesay esumedpray
onderfulway instinctay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, ecomebay otifiednay ofay ethay eethray
eelskay atthay ereway afteray em,—thoughthay asay etyay aay ilemay inay eirthay ear,—thanray
eythay alliedray againay, anday ormingfay inay oseclay anksray anday attalionsbay, osay atthay
eirthay outsspay allay ookedlay ikelay ashingflay ineslay ofay ackedstay ayonetsbay, ovedmay
onay ithway edoubledray elocityvay.

Ippedstray otay ouray irtsshay anday awersdray, eway angspray otay ethay ite-ashwhay, anday
afteray everalsay ours’hay ullingpay ereway almostay isposedday otay enounceray ethay
asechay, enwhay aay eneralgay ausingpay ommotioncay amongay ethay aleswhay avegay animatingay
okentay atthay eythay ereway ownay atay astlay underay ethay influenceay ofay atthay angestray
erplexitypay ofay inertay irresolutionay, ichwhay, enwhay ethay ishermenfay erceivepay itay
inay ethay alewhay, eythay aysay ehay isay alliedgay. Ethay ompactcay artialmay olumnscay inay
ichwhay eythay adhay eenbay ithertohay apidlyray anday eadilystay immingsway, ereway ownay
okenbray upay inay oneay easurelessmay outray; anday ikelay Ingkay Orus’pay elephantsay inay
ethay Indianay attlebay ithway Alexanderay, eythay eemedsay oinggay admay ithway
onsternationcay. Inay allay irectionsday expandingay inay astvay irregularay irclescay,
anday aimlesslyay immingsway itherhay anday itherthay, byay eirthay ortshay ickthay
outingsspay, eythay ainlyplay etrayedbay eirthay istractionday ofay anicpay. Isthay asway
illstay oremay angelystray evinceday byay osethay ofay eirthay umbernay, owhay, ompletelycay
aralysedpay asay itay ereway, elplesslyhay oatedflay ikelay ater-loggedway ismantledday
ipsshay onay ethay easay. Adhay esethay Eviathanslay eenbay utbay aay ockflay ofay implesay
eepshay, ursuedpay overay ethay asturepay byay eethray iercefay olvesway, eythay ouldcay otnay
ossiblypay avehay evinceday uchsay excessiveay ismayday. Utbay isthay occasionalay
imiditytay isay aracteristicchay ofay almostay allay erdinghay eaturescray. Oughthay
andingbay ogethertay inay enstay ofay ousandsthay, ethay ion-manedlay uffaloesbay ofay ethay
Estway avehay edflay eforebay aay olitarysay orsemanhay. Itnessway, ootay, allay umanhay
eingsbay, owhay enwhay erdedhay ogethertay inay ethay eepfoldshay ofay aay eatre’sthay itpay,
eythay illway, atay ethay ightestslay alarmay ofay irefay, ushray elter-skelterhay orfay ethay
outletsay, owdingcray, amplingtray, ammingjay, anday emorselesslyray ashingday eachay
otheray otay eathday. Estbay, ereforethay, ithholdway anyay amazementay atay ethay
angelystray alliedgay aleswhay eforebay usay, orfay erethay isay onay ollyfay ofay ethay eastsbay
ofay ethay earthay ichwhay isay otnay infinitelyay outdoneay byay ethay adnessmay ofay enmay.

Oughthay anymay ofay ethay aleswhay, asay ashay eenbay aidsay, ereway inay iolentvay otionmay,
etyay itay isay otay ebay observeday atthay asay aay olewhay ethay erdhay eithernay advanceday ornay
etreatedray, utbay ollectivelycay emainedray inay oneay aceplay. Asay isay ustomarycay inay
osethay asescay, ethay oatsbay atay onceay eparatedsay, eachay akingmay orfay omesay oneay onelay
alewhay onay ethay outskirtsay ofay ethay oalshay. Inay aboutay eethray inutes’may imetay,
Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay asway ungflay; ethay ickenstray ishfay artedday indingblay ayspray
inay ouray acesfay, anday enthay unningray awayay ithway usay ikelay ightlay, eeredstay
aightstray orfay ethay earthay ofay ethay erdhay. Oughthay uchsay aay ovementmay onay ethay artpay
ofay ethay alewhay uckstray underay uchsay ircumstancescay, isay inay onay iseway
unprecedenteday; anday indeeday isay almostay alwaysay oremay oray esslay anticipateday;
etyay oesday itay esentpray oneay ofay ethay oremay erilouspay icissitudesvay ofay ethay
isheryfay. Orfay asay ethay iftsway onstermay agsdray ouyay eeperday anday eeperday intoay ethay
anticfray oalshay, ouyay idbay adieuay otay ircumspectcay ifelay anday onlyay existay inay aay
eliriousday obthray.

Asay, indblay anday eafday, ethay alewhay ungedplay orwardfay, asay ifay byay eershay owerpay ofay
eedspay otay idray imselfhay ofay ethay ironay eechlay atthay adhay astenedfay otay imhay; asay eway
usthay oretay aay itewhay ashgay inay ethay easay, onay allay idessay enacedmay asay eway ewflay, byay
ethay azedcray eaturescray otay anday ofray ushingray aboutay usay; ouray esetbay oatbay asway
ikelay aay ipshay obbedmay byay ice-islesay inay aay empesttay, anday ivingstray otay eerstay
oughthray eirthay omplicatedcay annelschay anday aitsstray, owingknay otnay atay atwhay
omentmay itay aymay ebay ockedlay inay anday ushedcray.

Utbay otnay aay itbay auntedday, Ueequegqay eeredstay usay anfullymay; ownay eeringshay offay
omfray isthay onstermay irectlyday acrossay ouray outeray inay advanceay; ownay edgingay awayay
omfray atthay, osewhay olossalcay ukesflay ereway uspendedsay overheaday, ilewhay allay ethay
imetay, Arbuckstay oodstay upay inay ethay owsbay, ancelay inay andhay, ickingpray outay ofay ouray
ayway ateverwhay aleswhay ehay ouldcay eachray byay ortshay artsday, orfay erethay asway onay
imetay otay akemay onglay onesay. Ornay ereway ethay oarsmenay uiteqay idleay, oughthay eirthay
ontedway utyday asway ownay altogetheray ispensedday ithway. Eythay ieflychay attendeday otay
ethay outingshay artpay ofay ethay usinessbay. Out“ay ofay ethay ayway, Ommodore!”cay iedcray
oneay, otay aay eatgray omedarydray atthay ofay aay uddensay oseray odilybay otay ethay urfacesay,
anday orfay anay instantay eatenedthray otay ampsway usay. ard“Hay ownday ithway ouryay ailtay,
ere!”thay iedcray aay econdsay otay anotheray, ichwhay, oseclay otay ouray unwalegay, eemedsay
almlycay oolingcay imselfhay ithway ishay ownay an-likefay extremityay.

Allay aleboatswhay arrycay ertaincay uriouscay ontrivancescay, originallyay inventeday
byay ethay Antucketnay Indiansay, alledcay uggsdray. Otway ickthay uaressqay ofay oodway ofay
equalay izesay areay outlystay enchedclay ogethertay, osay atthay eythay osscray eachay
other’say aingray atay ightray anglesay; aay inelay ofay onsiderablecay engthlay isay enthay
attacheday otay ethay iddlemay ofay isthay ockblay, anday ethay otheray enday ofay ethay inelay
eingbay oopedlay, itay ancay inay aay omentmay ebay astenedfay otay aay arpoonhay. Itay isay
ieflychay amongay alliedgay aleswhay atthay isthay uggdray isay useday. Orfay enthay, oremay
aleswhay areay oseclay oundray ouyay anthay ouyay ancay ossiblypay asechay atay oneay imetay. Utbay
ermspay aleswhay areay otnay everyay ayday encountereday; ilewhay ouyay aymay, enthay, ouyay
ustmay illkay allay ouyay ancay. Anday ifay ouyay annotcay illkay emthay allay atay onceay, ouyay
ustmay ingway emthay, osay atthay eythay ancay ebay afterwardsay illedkay atay ouryay eisurelay.
Encehay itay isay, atthay atay imestay ikelay esethay ethay uggdray, omescay intoay
equisitionray. Ouray oatbay asway urnishedfay ithway eethray ofay emthay. Ethay irstfay anday
econdsay ereway uccessfullysay artedday, anday eway awsay ethay aleswhay aggeringlystay
unningray offay, etteredfay byay ethay enormousay idelongsay esistanceray ofay ethay owingtay
uggdray. Eythay ereway ampedcray ikelay alefactorsmay ithway ethay ainchay anday allbay. Utbay
uponay ingingflay ethay irdthay, inay ethay actay ofay ossingtay overboarday ethay umsyclay
oodenway ockblay, itay aughtcay underay oneay ofay ethay eatssay ofay ethay oatbay, anday inay anay
instantay oretay itay outay anday arriedcay itay awayay, oppingdray ethay oarsmanay inay ethay
oat’sbay ottombay asay ethay eatsay idslay omfray underay imhay. Onay othbay idessay ethay easay
amecay inay atay ethay oundedway anksplay, utbay eway uffedstay otway oray eethray awersdray anday
irtsshay inay, anday osay oppedstay ethay eakslay orfay ethay imetay.

Itay adhay eenbay extnay otay impossibleay otay artday esethay ugged-harpoonsdray, ereway itay
otnay atthay asay eway advanceday intoay ethay erdhay, ouray ale’swhay ayway eatlygray
iminishedday; oreovermay, atthay asay eway entway illstay urtherfay anday urtherfay omfray
ethay ircumferencecay ofay ommotioncay, ethay irefulday isordersday eemedsay aningway. Osay
atthay enwhay atay astlay ethay erkingjay arpoonhay ewdray outay, anday ethay owingtay alewhay
idewayssay anishedvay; enthay, ithway ethay aperingtay orcefay ofay ishay artingpay
omentummay, eway idedglay etweenbay otway aleswhay intoay ethay innermostay earthay ofay ethay
oalshay, asay ifay omfray omesay ountainmay orrenttay eway adhay idslay intoay aay erenesay
alleyvay akelay. Erehay ethay ormsstay inay ethay oaringray ensglay etweenbay ethay outermostay
aleswhay, ereway eardhay utbay otnay eltfay. Inay isthay entralcay expanseay ethay easay
esentedpray atthay oothsmay atin-likesay urfacesay, alledcay aay eekslay, oducedpray byay
ethay ubtlesay oisturemay ownthray offay byay ethay alewhay inay ishay oremay uietqay oodsmay.
Esyay, eway ereway ownay inay atthay enchanteday almcay ichwhay eythay aysay urkslay atay ethay
earthay ofay everyay ommotioncay. Anday illstay inay ethay istractedday istanceday eway
eheldbay ethay umultstay ofay ethay outeray oncentriccay irclescay, anday awsay uccessivesay
odspay ofay aleswhay, eightay oray entay inay eachay, iftlysway oinggay oundray anday oundray,
ikelay ultipliedmay ansspay ofay orseshay inay aay ingray; anday osay oselyclay ouldershay otay
ouldershay, atthay aay Itanictay ircus-ridercay ightmay easilyay avehay over-archeday ethay
iddlemay onesay, anday osay avehay onegay oundray onay eirthay acksbay. Owingay otay ethay
ensityday ofay ethay owdcray ofay eposingray aleswhay, oremay immediatelyay urroundingsay
ethay embayeday axisay ofay ethay erdhay, onay ossiblepay ancechay ofay escapeay asway atay
esentpray affordeday usay. Eway ustmay atchway orfay aay eachbray inay ethay ivinglay allway atthay
emmedhay usay inay; ethay allway atthay adhay onlyay admitteday usay inay orderay otay utshay usay
