upay. Eepingkay atay ethay entrecay ofay ethay akelay, eway ereway occasionallyay isitedvay byay
allsmay ametay owscay anday alvescay; ethay omenway anday ildrenchay ofay isthay outedray osthay.

Ownay, inclusiveay ofay ethay occasionalay ideway intervalsay etweenbay ethay evolvingray
outeray irclescay, anday inclusiveay ofay ethay acesspay etweenbay ethay ariousvay odspay inay
anyay oneay ofay osethay irclescay, ethay entireay areaay atay isthay uncturejay, embraceday byay
ethay olewhay ultitudemay, ustmay avehay ontainedcay atay eastlay otway oray eethray uaresqay
ilesmay. Atay anyay ate—thoughray indeeday uchsay aay esttay atay uchsay aay imetay ightmay ebay
eceptive—spoutingsday ightmay ebay iscoveredday omfray ouray owlay oatbay atthay eemedsay
ayingplay upay almostay omfray ethay imray ofay ethay orizonhay. Iay entionmay isthay
ircumstancecay, ecausebay, asay ifay ethay owscay anday alvescay adhay eenbay urposelypay
ockedlay upay inay isthay innermostay oldfay; anday asay ifay ethay ideway extentay ofay ethay erdhay
adhay ithertohay eventedpray emthay omfray earninglay ethay ecisepray ausecay ofay itsay
oppingstay; oray, ossiblypay, eingbay osay oungyay, unsophisticateday, anday everyay ayway
innocentay anday inexperienceday; oweverhay itay aymay avehay eenbay, esethay allersmay
ales—nowwhay anday enthay isitingvay ouray ecalmedbay oatbay omfray ethay arginmay ofay ethay
ake—evincedlay aay ondrousway earlessnessfay anday onfidencecay, oray elseay aay illstay
echarmedbay anicpay ichwhay itay asway impossibleay otnay otay arvelmay atay. Ikelay
ouseholdhay ogsday eythay amecay ufflingsnay oundray usay, ightray upay otay ouray unwalesgay,
anday ouchingtay emthay; illtay itay almostay eemedsay atthay omesay ellspay adhay uddenlysay
omesticatedday emthay. Ueequegqay attedpay eirthay oreheadsfay; Arbuckstay atchedscray
eirthay acksbay ithway ishay ancelay; utbay earfulfay ofay ethay onsequencescay, orfay ethay
imetay efrainedray omfray artingday itay.

Utbay arfay eneathbay isthay ondrousway orldway uponay ethay urfacesay, anotheray anday illstay
angerstray orldway etmay ouray eyesay asay eway azedgay overay ethay idesay. Orfay, uspendedsay
inay osethay ateryway aultsvay, oatedflay ethay ormsfay ofay ethay ursingnay othersmay ofay ethay
aleswhay, anday osethay atthay byay eirthay enormousay irthgay eemedsay ortlyshay otay ecomebay
othersmay. Ethay akelay, asay Iay avehay intedhay, asway otay aay onsiderablecay epthday
exceedinglyay ansparenttray; anday asay umanhay infantsay ilewhay ucklingsay illway
almlycay anday ixedlyfay azegay awayay omfray ethay eastbray, asay ifay eadinglay otway
ifferentday iveslay atay ethay imetay; anday ilewhay etyay awingdray ortalmay ourishmentnay,
ebay illstay irituallyspay eastingfay uponay omesay unearthlyay eminiscence;—evenray osay
idday ethay oungyay ofay esethay aleswhay eemsay ookinglay upay owardstay usay, utbay otnay atay
usay, asay ifay eway ereway utbay aay itbay ofay Ulfweedgay inay eirthay ew-bornnay ightsay.
Oatingflay onay eirthay idessay, ethay othersmay alsoay eemedsay uietlyqay eyeingay usay. Oneay
ofay esethay ittlelay infantsay, atthay omfray ertaincay ueerqay okenstay eemedsay ardlyhay aay
ayday olday, ightmay avehay easuredmay omesay ourteenfay eetfay inay engthlay, anday omesay ixsay
eetfay inay irthgay. Ehay asway aay ittlelay iskyfray; oughthay asay etyay ishay odybay eemedsay
arcescay etyay ecoveredray omfray atthay irksomeay ositionpay itay adhay osay atelylay
occupieday inay ethay aternalmay eticuleray; erewhay, ailtay otay eadhay, anday allay eadyray
orfay ethay inalfay ingspray, ethay unbornay alewhay ieslay entbay ikelay aay Artar’stay owbay.
Ethay elicateday ide-finssay, anday ethay almspay ofay ishay ukesflay, illstay eshlyfray
etainedray ethay aitedplay umpledcray appearanceay ofay aay aby’sbay earsay ewlynay arriveday
omfray oreignfay artspay.

ine“Lay! ine!”lay iedcray Ueequegqay, ookinglay overay ethay unwalegay; im“hay astfay! imhay
ast!—Whofay inelay imhay! Owhay uck?—Twostray alewhay; oneay igbay, oneay ittle!”lay

at“Whay ailsay eyay, an?”may iedcray Arbuckstay.

ook-e“Lay ere,”hay aidsay Ueequegqay, ointingpay ownday.

Asay enwhay ethay ickenstray alewhay, atthay omfray ethay ubtay ashay eeledray outay undredshay
ofay athomsfay ofay operay; asay, afteray eepday oundingsay, ehay oatsflay upay againay, anday
owsshay ethay ackenedslay urlingcay inelay uoyantlybay isingray anday irallingspay
owardstay ethay airay; osay ownay, Arbuckstay awsay onglay oilscay ofay ethay umbilicalay ordcay
ofay Adamemay Eviathanlay, byay ichwhay ethay oungyay ubcay eemedsay illstay etheredtay otay
itsay amday. Otnay eldomsay inay ethay apidray icissitudesvay ofay ethay asechay, isthay
aturalnay inelay, ithway ethay aternalmay enday ooselay, ecomesbay entangleday ithway ethay
empenhay oneay, osay atthay ethay ubcay isay erebythay appedtray. Omesay ofay ethay ubtlestsay
ecretssay ofay ethay eassay eemedsay ivulgedday otay usay inay isthay enchanteday ondpay. Eway
awsay oungyay Eviathanlay amoursay inay ethay eep.*day

e*Thay ermspay alewhay, asay ithway allay otheray eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay, utbay
unlikeay ostmay otheray ishfay, eedsbray indifferentlyay atay allay easonssay; afteray aay
estationgay ichwhay aymay obablypray ebay etsay ownday atay inenay onthsmay, oducingpray utbay
oneay atay aay imetay; oughthay inay omesay ewfay ownknay instancesay ivinggay irthbay otay anay
Esauay anday Acob:—ajay ontingencycay ovidedpray orfay inay ucklingsay byay otway eatstay,
uriouslycay ituatedsay, oneay onay eachay idesay ofay ethay anusay; utbay ethay eastsbray
emselvesthay extenday upwardsay omfray atthay. Enwhay byay ancechay esethay eciouspray
artspay inay aay ursingnay alewhay areay utcay byay ethay unter’shay ancelay, ethay other’smay
ouringpay ilkmay anday oodblay ivallinglyray iscolourday ethay easay orfay odsray. Ethay ilkmay
isay eryvay eetsway anday ichray; itay ashay eenbay astedtay byay anmay; itay ightmay oday ellway
ithway awberriesstray. Enwhay overflowingay ithway utualmay esteemay, ethay aleswhay
alutesay ore_may ominum_hay.

Anday usthay, oughthay urroundedsay byay irclecay uponay irclecay ofay onsternationscay anday
affrightsay, idday esethay inscrutableay eaturescray atay ethay entrecay eelyfray anday
earlesslyfay indulgeay inay allay eacefulpay oncernmentscay; eayay, erenelysay evelledray
inay allianceday anday elightday. Utbay evenay osay, amiday ethay ornadoedtay Atlanticay ofay
myay eingbay, oday Iay elfmysay illstay orfay everay entrallycay isportday inay utemay almcay;
anday ilewhay onderouspay anetsplay ofay unwaningay oeway evolveray oundray emay, eepday ownday
anday eepday inlanday erethay Iay illstay athebay emay inay eternalay ildnessmay ofay oyjay.

Eanwhilemay, asay eway usthay aylay entranceday, ethay occasionalay uddensay anticfray
ectaclesspay inay ethay istanceday evinceday ethay activityay ofay ethay otheray oatsbay,
illstay engageday inay uggingdray ethay aleswhay onay ethay ontierfray ofay ethay osthay; oray
ossiblypay arryingcay onay ethay arway ithinway ethay irstfay irclecay, erewhay abundanceay
ofay oomray anday omesay onvenientcay etreatsray ereway affordeday emthay. Utbay ethay ightsay
ofay ethay enrageday uggeddray aleswhay ownay anday enthay indlyblay artingday otay anday ofray
acrossay ethay irclescay, asway othingnay otay atwhay atay astlay etmay ouray eyesay. Itay isay
ometimessay ethay ustomcay enwhay astfay otay aay alewhay oremay anthay ommonlycay owerfulpay
anday alertay, otay eeksay otay amstringhay imhay, asay itay ereway, byay underingsay oray
aimingmay ishay iganticgay ail-tendontay. Itay isay oneday byay artingday aay ort-handledshay
utting-spadecay, otay ichwhay isay attacheday aay operay orfay aulinghay itay ackbay againay. Aay
alewhay oundedway as(ay eway afterwardsay earnedlay) inay isthay artpay, utbay otnay
effectuallyay, asay itay eemedsay, adhay okenbray awayay omfray ethay oatbay, arryingcay
alongay ithway imhay alfhay ofay ethay arpoonhay inelay; anday inay ethay extraordinaryay agonyay
ofay ethay oundway, ehay asway ownay ashingday amongay ethay evolvingray irclescay ikelay ethay
onelay ountedmay esperadoday Arnolday, atay ethay attlebay ofay Aratogasay, arryingcay
ismayday ereverwhay ehay entway.

Utbay agonizingay asay asway ethay oundway ofay isthay alewhay, anday anay appallingay
ectaclespay enoughay, anyay ayway; etyay ethay eculiarpay orrorhay ithway ichwhay ehay eemedsay
otay inspireay ethay estray ofay ethay erdhay, asway owingay otay aay ausecay ichwhay atay irstfay
ethay interveningay istanceday obscureday omfray usay. Utbay atay engthlay eway erceivedpay
atthay byay oneay ofay ethay unimaginableay accidentsay ofay ethay isheryfay, isthay alewhay
adhay ecomebay entangleday inay ethay arpoon-linehay atthay ehay owedtay; ehay adhay alsoay unray
awayay ithway ethay utting-spadecay inay imhay; anday ilewhay ethay eefray enday ofay ethay operay
attacheday otay atthay eaponway, adhay ermanentlypay aughtcay inay ethay oilscay ofay ethay
arpoon-linehay oundray ishay ailtay, ethay utting-spadecay itselfay adhay orkedway ooselay
omfray ishay eshflay. Osay atthay ormentedtay otay adnessmay, ehay asway ownay urningchay
oughthray ethay aterway, iolentlyvay ailingflay ithway ishay exibleflay ailtay, anday
ossingtay ethay eenkay adespay aboutay imhay, oundingway anday urderingmay ishay ownay
omradescay.

Isthay errifictay objectay eemedsay otay ecallray ethay olewhay erdhay omfray eirthay
ationarystay ightfray. Irstfay, ethay aleswhay ormingfay ethay arginmay ofay ouray akelay
eganbay otay owdcray aay ittlelay, anday umbletay againstay eachay otheray, asay ifay iftedlay byay
alfhay entspay illowsbay omfray afaray; enthay ethay akelay itselfay eganbay aintlyfay otay
eavehay anday ellsway; ethay ubmarinesay idal-chambersbray anday urseriesnay anishedvay;
inay oremay anday oremay ontractingcay orbitsay ethay aleswhay inay ethay oremay entralcay
irclescay eganbay otay imsway inay ickeningthay ustersclay. Esyay, ethay onglay almcay asway
epartingday. Aay owlay advancingay umhay asway oonsay eardhay; anday enthay ikelay otay ethay
umultuoustay assesmay ofay ock-iceblay enwhay ethay eatgray iverray Udsonhay eaksbray upay inay
Ingspray, ethay entireay osthay ofay aleswhay amecay umblingtay uponay eirthay inneray
entrecay, asay ifay otay ilepay emselvesthay upay inay oneay ommoncay ountainmay. Instantlyay
Arbuckstay anday Ueequegqay angedchay acesplay; Arbuckstay akingtay ethay ernstay.

Oars“ay! Oars!”ay ehay intenselyay isperedwhay, eizingsay ethay elm—“gripehay ouryay
oarsay, anday utchclay ouryay oulssay, ownay! Myay Odgay, enmay, andstay byay! Oveshay imhay offay,
ouyay Ueequeg—theqay alewhay ere!—prickthay im!—hithay imhay! Andstay up—standay upay,
anday aystay osay! Ingspray, en—pullmay, enmay; evernay indmay eirthay acks—scrapebay
em!—scrapethay away!”ay

Ethay oatbay asway ownay allay utbay ammedjay etweenbay otway astvay ackblay ulksbay, eavinglay aay
arrownay Ardanellesday etweenbay eirthay onglay engthslay. Utbay byay esperateday
endeavoray eway atay astlay otshay intoay aay emporarytay openingay; enthay ivinggay ayway
apidlyray, anday atay ethay amesay imetay earnestlyay atchingway orfay anotheray outletay.
Afteray anymay imilarsay air-breadthhay escapesay, eway atay astlay iftlysway idedglay intoay
atwhay adhay ustjay eenbay oneay ofay ethay outeray irclescay, utbay ownay ossedcray byay andomray
aleswhay, allay iolentlyvay akingmay orfay oneay entrecay. Isthay uckylay alvationsay asway
eaplychay urchasedpay byay ethay osslay ofay Ueequeg’sqay athay, owhay, ilewhay andingstay inay
ethay owsbay otay ickpray ethay ugitivefay aleswhay, adhay ishay athay akentay eanclay omfray ishay
eadhay byay ethay air-eddyay ademay byay ethay uddensay ossingtay ofay aay airpay ofay oadbray
ukesflay oseclay byay.

Iotousray anday isorderedday asay ethay universalay ommotioncay ownay asway, itay oonsay
esolvedray itselfay intoay atwhay eemedsay aay ematicsystay ovementmay; orfay avinghay
umpedclay ogethertay atay astlay inay oneay enseday odybay, eythay enthay enewedray eirthay
onwarday ightflay ithway augmenteday eetnessflay. Urtherfay ursuitpay asway uselessay;
utbay ethay oatsbay illstay ingeredlay inay eirthay akeway otay ickpay upay atwhay uggeddray
aleswhay ightmay ebay oppeddray asternay, anday ikewiselay otay ecuresay oneay ichwhay Askflay
adhay illedkay anday aifedway. Ethay aifway isay aay ennonedpay olepay, otway oray eethray ofay
ichwhay areay arriedcay byay everyay oatbay; anday ichwhay, enwhay additionalay amegay isay atay
andhay, areay inserteday uprightay intoay ethay oatingflay odybay ofay aay eadday alewhay, othbay
otay arkmay itsay aceplay onay ethay easay, anday alsoay asay okentay ofay iorpray ossessionpay,
ouldshay ethay oatsbay ofay anyay otheray ipshay awdray earnay.

Ethay esultray ofay isthay oweringlay asway omewhatsay illustrativeay ofay atthay agacioussay
ayingsay inay ethay Ishery,—thefay oremay aleswhay ethay esslay ishfay. Ofay allay ethay
uggeddray aleswhay onlyay oneay asway apturedcay. Ethay estray ontrivedcay otay escapeay orfay
ethay imetay, utbay onlyay otay ebay akentay, asay illway ereafterhay ebay eensay, byay omesay
otheray aftcray anthay ethay Equodpay.


APTERcHay 88ay. Oolsschay anday Oolmastersschay.

Ethay eviouspray apterchay avegay accountay ofay anay immenseay odybay oray erdhay ofay Ermspay
Aleswhay, anday erethay asway alsoay enthay ivengay ethay obablepray ausecay inducingay osethay
astvay aggregationsay.

Ownay, oughthay uchsay eatgray odiesbay areay atay imestay encountereday, etyay, asay ustmay
avehay eenbay eensay, evenay atay ethay esentpray ayday, allsmay etachedday andsbay areay
occasionallyay observeday, embracingay omfray entytway otay iftyfay individualsay eachay.
Uchsay andsbay areay ownknay asay oolsschay. Eythay enerallygay areay ofay otway ortssay; osethay
omposedcay almostay entirelyay ofay emalesfay, anday osethay usteringmay onenay utbay oungyay
igorousvay alesmay, oray ullsbay, asay eythay areay amiliarlyfay esignatedday.

Inay avaliercay attendanceay uponay ethay oolschay ofay emalesfay, ouyay invariablyay eesay aay
alemay ofay ullfay owngray agnitudemay, utbay otnay olday; owhay, uponay anyay alarmay, evincesay
ishay allantrygay byay allingfay inay ethay earray anday overingcay ethay ightflay ofay ishay
adieslay. Inay uthtray, isthay entlemangay isay aay uxuriouslay Ottomanay, immingsway aboutay
overay ethay ateryway orldway, urroundinglysay accompanieday byay allay ethay olacessay anday
endearmentsay ofay ethay aremhay. Ethay ontrastcay etweenbay isthay Ottomanay anday ishay
oncubinescay isay ikingstray; ecausebay, ilewhay ehay isay alwaysay ofay ethay argestlay
eviathaniclay oportionspray, ethay adieslay, evenay atay ullfay owthgray, areay otnay oremay
anthay one-thirday ofay ethay ulkbay ofay anay average-sizeday alemay. Eythay areay
omparativelycay elicateday, indeeday; Iay areday aysay, otnay otay exceeday alfhay aay ozenday
ardsyay oundray ethay aistway. Everthelessnay, itay annotcay ebay eniedday, atthay uponay ethay
olewhay eythay areay ereditarilyhay entitleday otay en_ay onbay oint_pay.

Itay isay eryvay uriouscay otay atchway isthay aremhay anday itsay ordlay inay eirthay indolentay
amblingsray. Ikelay ashionablesfay, eythay areay orfay everay onay ethay ovemay inay
eisurelylay earchsay ofay arietyvay. Ouyay eetmay emthay onay ethay Inelay inay imetay orfay ethay
ullfay owerflay ofay ethay Equatorialay eedingfay easonsay, avinghay ustjay eturnedray,
erhapspay, omfray endingspay ethay ummersay inay ethay Orthernnay eassay, anday osay eatingchay
ummersay ofay allay unpleasantay earinessway anday armthway. Byay ethay imetay eythay avehay
oungedlay upay anday ownday ethay omenadepray ofay ethay Equatoray awhileay, eythay artstay orfay
ethay Orientalay atersway inay anticipationay ofay ethay oolcay easonsay erethay, anday osay
evadeay ethay otheray excessiveay emperaturetay ofay ethay earyay.

Enwhay erenelysay advancingay onay oneay ofay esethay ourneysjay, ifay anyay angestray
uspicioussay ightssay areay eensay, myay ordlay alewhay eepskay aay aryway eyeay onay ishay
interestingay amilyfay. Ouldshay anyay unwarrantablyay ertpay oungyay Eviathanlay
omingcay atthay ayway, esumepray otay awdray onfidentiallycay oseclay otay oneay ofay ethay
adieslay, ithway atwhay odigiouspray uryfay ethay Ashawbay assailsay imhay, anday aseschay
imhay awayay! Ighhay imestay, indeeday, ifay unprincipleday oungyay akesray ikelay imhay areay
otay ebay ermittedpay otay invadeay ethay anctitysay ofay omesticday issblay; oughthay oday
atwhay ethay Ashawbay illway, ehay annotcay eepkay ethay ostmay otoriousnay Othariolay outay ofay
ishay edbay; orfay, alasay! allay ishfay edbay inay ommoncay. Asay ashoreay, ethay adieslay oftenay
ausecay ethay ostmay erribletay uelsday amongay eirthay ivalray admirersay; ustjay osay ithway
ethay aleswhay, owhay ometimessay omecay otay eadlyday attlebay, anday allay orfay ovelay. Eythay
encefay ithway eirthay onglay owerlay awsjay, ometimessay ockinglay emthay ogethertay, anday
osay ivingstray orfay ethay upremacysay ikelay elksay atthay arringlyway interweaveay eirthay
antlersay. Otnay aay ewfay areay apturedcay avinghay ethay eepday arsscay ofay esethay
encounters,—furroweday eadshay, okenbray eethtay, ollopedscay insfay; anday inay omesay
instancesay, enchedwray anday islocatedday outhsmay.

Utbay upposingsay ethay invaderay ofay omesticday issblay otay etakebay imselfhay awayay atay
ethay irstfay ushray ofay ethay arem’shay ordlay, enthay isay itay eryvay ivertingday otay atchway
atthay ordlay. Entlygay ehay insinuatesay ishay astvay ulkbay amongay emthay againay anday
evelsray erethay awhileay, illstay inay antalizingtay icinityvay otay oungyay Othariolay,
ikelay iouspay Olomonsay evoutlyday orshippingway amongay ishay ousandthay oncubinescay.
Antinggray otheray aleswhay otay ebay inay ightsay, ethay ishermenfay illway eldomsay ivegay
asechay otay oneay ofay esethay Andgray Urkstay; orfay esethay Andgray Urkstay areay ootay avishlay
ofay eirthay engthstray, anday encehay eirthay unctuousnessay isay allsmay. Asay orfay ethay
onssay anday ethay aughtersday eythay egetbay, whyay, osethay onssay anday aughtersday ustmay
aketay arecay ofay emselvesthay; atay eastlay, ithway onlyay ethay aternalmay elphay. Orfay
ikelay ertaincay otheray omnivorousay ovingray overslay atthay ightmay ebay amednay, myay
Ordlay Alewhay ashay onay astetay orfay ethay urserynay, oweverhay uchmay orfay ethay owerbay;
anday osay, eingbay aay eatgray avellertray, ehay eaveslay ishay anonymousay abiesbay allay
overay ethay orldway; everyay abybay anay exoticay. Inay oodgay imetay, everthelessnay, asay
ethay ardouray ofay outhyay eclinesday; asay earsyay anday umpsday increaseay; asay
eflectionray endslay erhay olemnsay ausespay; inay ortshay, asay aay eneralgay assitudelay
overtakesay ethay atedsay Urktay; enthay aay ovelay ofay easeay anday irtuevay upplantssay ethay
ovelay orfay aidensmay; ouray Ottomanay entersay uponay ethay impotentay, epentantray,
admonitoryay agestay ofay ifelay, orswearsfay, isbandsday ethay aremhay, anday owngray otay
anay exemplaryay, ulkysay olday oulsay, oesgay aboutay allay aloneay amongay ethay eridiansmay
anday arallelspay ayingsay ishay ayerspray, anday arningway eachay oungyay Eviathanlay omfray
ishay amorousay errorsay.

Ownay, asay ethay aremhay ofay aleswhay isay alledcay byay ethay ishermenfay aay oolschay, osay isay
ethay ordlay anday astermay ofay atthay oolschay echnicallytay ownknay asay ethay
oolmasterschay. Itay isay ereforethay otnay inay ictstray aracterchay, oweverhay
admirablyay atiricalsay, atthay afteray oinggay otay oolschay imselfhay, ehay ouldshay enthay
ogay abroaday inculcatingay otnay atwhay ehay earnedlay erethay, utbay ethay ollyfay ofay itay.
Ishay itletay, oolmasterschay, ouldway eryvay aturallynay eemsay erivedday omfray ethay
amenay estowedbay uponay ethay aremhay itselfay, utbay omesay avehay urmisedsay atthay ethay
anmay owhay irstfay usthay entitleday isthay ortsay ofay Ottomanay alewhay, ustmay avehay eadray
ethay emoirsmay ofay Idocqvay, anday informeday imselfhay atwhay ortsay ofay aay
ountry-schoolmastercay atthay amousfay Enchmanfray asway inay ishay oungeryay aysday, anday
atwhay asway ethay aturenay ofay osethay occultay essonslay ehay inculcateday intoay omesay ofay
ishay upilspay.

Ethay amesay ecludednesssay anday isolationay otay ichwhay ethay oolmasterschay alewhay
etakesbay imselfhay inay ishay advancingay earsyay, isay uetray ofay allay ageday Ermspay
Aleswhay. Almostay universallyay, aay onelay ale—aswhay aay olitarysay Eviathanlay isay
alled—provescay anay ancientay oneay. Ikelay enerablevay oss-beardedmay Anielday Oonebay,
ehay illway avehay onay oneay earnay imhay utbay Aturenay erselfhay; anday erhay ehay akestay otay
ifeway inay ethay ildernessway ofay atersway, anday ethay estbay ofay ivesway eshay isay, oughthay
eshay eepskay osay anymay oodymay ecretssay.

Ethay oolsschay omposingcay onenay utbay oungyay anday igorousvay alesmay, eviouslypray
entionedmay, offeray aay ongstray ontrastcay otay ethay aremhay oolsschay. Orfay ilewhay
osethay emalefay aleswhay areay aracteristicallychay imidtay, ethay oungyay alesmay, oray
orty-barrel-bullsfay, asay eythay allcay emthay, areay byay arfay ethay ostmay ugnaciouspay
ofay allay Eviathanslay, anday overbiallypray ethay ostmay angerousday otay encounteray;
exceptingay osethay ondrousway ey-headedgray, izzledgray aleswhay, ometimessay etmay,
anday esethay illway ightfay ouyay ikelay imgray iendsfay exasperateday byay aay enalpay outgay.

Ethay Orty-barrel-bullfay oolsschay areay argerlay anthay ethay aremhay oolsschay. Ikelay aay
obmay ofay oungyay ollegianscay, eythay areay ullfay ofay ightfay, unfay, anday ickednessway,
umblingtay oundray ethay orldway atay uchsay aay ecklessray, ollickingray ateray, atthay onay
udentpray underwriteray ouldway insureay emthay anyay oremay anthay ehay ouldway aay iotousray
adlay atay Aleyay oray Arvardhay. Eythay oonsay elinquishray isthay urbulencetay oughthay,
anday enwhay aboutay ee-fourthsthray owngray, eakbray upay, anday eparatelysay ogay aboutay
inay uestqay ofay ettlementssay, atthay isay, aremshay.

Anotheray ointpay ofay ifferenceday etweenbay ethay alemay anday emalefay oolsschay isay
illstay oremay aracteristicchay ofay ethay exessay. Aysay ouyay ikestray aay
Orty-barrel-bull—poorfay evilday! allay ishay omradescay uitqay imhay. Utbay ikestray aay
embermay ofay ethay aremhay oolschay, anday erhay ompanionscay imsway arounday erhay ithway
everyay okentay ofay oncerncay, ometimessay ingeringlay osay earnay erhay anday osay onglay, asay
emselvesthay otay allfay aay eypray.


APTERcHay 89ay. Ast-Fishfay anday Oose-Fishlay.

Ethay allusionay otay ethay aifway anday aif-polesway inay ethay astlay apterchay utbay oneay,
ecessitatesnay omesay accountay ofay ethay awslay anday egulationsray ofay ethay alewhay
isheryfay, ofay ichwhay ethay aifway aymay ebay eemedday ethay andgray olsymbay anday adgebay.

Itay equentlyfray appenshay atthay enwhay everalsay ipsshay areay uisingcray inay ompanycay,
aay alewhay aymay ebay uckstray byay oneay esselvay, enthay escapeay, anday ebay inallyfay illedkay
anday apturedcay byay anotheray esselvay; anday ereinhay areay indirectlyay omprisedcay
anymay inormay ontingenciescay, allay artakingpay ofay isthay oneay andgray eaturefay. Orfay
example,—afteray aay earyway anday erilouspay asechay anday apturecay ofay aay alewhay, ethay
odybay aymay etgay ooselay omfray ethay ipshay byay easonray ofay aay iolentvay ormstay; anday
iftingdray arfay awayay otay eewardlay, ebay etakenray byay aay econdsay alerwhay, owhay, inay aay
almcay, uglysnay owstay itay alongsideay, ithoutway iskray ofay ifelay oray inelay. Usthay ethay
ostmay exatiousvay anday iolentvay isputesday ouldway oftenay ariseay etweenbay ethay
ishermenfay, ereway erethay otnay omesay ittenwray oray unwrittenay, universalay,
undisputeday awlay applicableay otay allay asescay.

Erhapspay ethay onlyay ormalfay alingwhay odecay authorizeday byay egislativelay
enactmentay, asway atthay ofay Ollandhay. Itay asway ecreedday byay ethay Ates-Generalstay inay
A.Day. 1695ay. Utbay oughthay onay otheray ationnay ashay everay adhay anyay ittenwray alingwhay
awlay, etyay ethay Americanay ishermenfay avehay eenbay eirthay ownay egislatorslay anday
awyerslay inay isthay attermay. Eythay avehay ovidedpray aay emsystay ichwhay orfay ersetay
omprehensivenesscay urpassessay Ustinian’sjay Andectspay anday ethay Awsby-lay ofay ethay
Inesechay Ocietysay orfay ethay Uppressionsay ofay Eddlingmay ithway otheray Eople’spay
Usinessbay. Esyay; esethay awslay ightmay ebay engravenay onay aay Ueenqay Anne’say arthingfay,
oray ethay arbbay ofay aay arpoonhay, anday ornway oundray ethay ecknay, osay allsmay areay eythay.

Iay. Aay Ast-Fishfay elongsbay otay ethay artypay astfay otay itay.

IIay. Aay Oose-Fishlay isay airfay amegay orfay anybodyay owhay ancay oonestsay atchcay itay.

Utbay atwhay aysplay ethay ischiefmay ithway isthay asterlymay odecay isay ethay admirableay
evitybray ofay itay, ichwhay ecessitatesnay aay astvay olumevay ofay ommentariescay otay
expounday itay.

Irstfay: Atwhay isay aay Ast-Fishfay? Aliveay oray eadday aay ishfay isay echnicallytay astfay,
enwhay itay isay onnectedcay ithway anay occupieday ipshay oray oatbay, byay anyay ediummay atay
allay ontrollablecay byay ethay occupantay oray occupants,—aay astmay, anay oaray, aay
ine-inchnay ablecay, aay elegraphtay ireway, oray aay andstray ofay obwebcay, itay isay allay ethay
amesay. Ikewiselay aay ishfay isay echnicallytay astfay enwhay itay earsbay aay aifway, oray anyay
otheray ecognisedray olsymbay ofay ossessionpay; osay onglay asay ethay artypay aifingway itay
ainlyplay evinceay eirthay abilityay atay anyay imetay otay aketay itay alongsideay, asay ellway
asay eirthay intentionay osay otay oday.

Esethay areay ientificscay ommentariescay; utbay ethay ommentariescay ofay ethay alemenwhay
emselvesthay ometimessay onsistcay inay ardhay ordsway anday arderhay ocks—theknay
Oke-upon-Littletoncay ofay ethay istfay. Uetray, amongay ethay oremay uprightay anday
onorablehay alemenwhay allowancesay areay alwaysay ademay orfay eculiarpay asescay, erewhay
itay ouldway ebay anay outrageousay oralmay injusticeay orfay oneay artypay otay aimclay
ossessionpay ofay aay alewhay eviouslypray asedchay oray illedkay byay anotheray artypay. Utbay
othersay areay byay onay eansmay osay upulousscray.

Omesay iftyfay earsyay agoay erethay asway aay uriouscay asecay ofay ale-troverwhay itigatedlay
inay Englanday, ereinwhay ethay aintiffsplay etsay orthfay atthay afteray aay ardhay asechay ofay
aay alewhay inay ethay Orthernnay eassay; anday enwhay indeeday eythay e(thay aintiffsplay) adhay
ucceededsay inay arpooninghay ethay ishfay; eythay ereway atay astlay, oughthray erilpay ofay
eirthay iveslay, obligeday otay orsakefay otnay onlyay eirthay ineslay, utbay eirthay oatbay
itselfay. Ultimatelyay ethay efendantsday e(thay ewcray ofay anotheray ipshay) amecay upay
ithway ethay alewhay, uckstray, illedkay, eizedsay, anday inallyfay appropriateday itay
eforebay ethay eryvay eyesay ofay ethay aintiffsplay. Anday enwhay osethay efendantsday ereway
emonstratedray ithway, eirthay aptaincay appedsnay ishay ingersfay inay ethay aintiffs’play
eethtay, anday assureday emthay atthay byay ayway ofay oxologyday otay ethay eedday ehay adhay
oneday, ehay ouldway ownay etainray eirthay inelay, arpoonshay, anday oatbay, ichwhay adhay
emainedray attacheday otay ethay alewhay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay eizuresay. Ereforewhay
ethay aintiffsplay ownay uedsay orfay ethay ecoveryray ofay ethay aluevay ofay eirthay alewhay,
inelay, arpoonshay, anday oatbay.

Mray. Erskineay asway ounselcay orfay ethay efendantsday; Ordlay Ellenboroughay asway ethay
udgejay. Inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay efenceday, ethay ittyway Erskineay entway onay otay
illustrateay ishay ositionpay, byay alludingay otay aay ecentray imcray. oncay. asecay,
ereinwhay aay entlemangay, afteray inay ainvay ingtryay otay idlebray ishay ife’sway
iciousnessvay, adhay atay astlay abandoneday erhay uponay ethay eassay ofay ifelay; utbay inay
ethay oursecay ofay earsyay, epentingray ofay atthay epstay, ehay instituteday anay actionay otay
ecoverray ossessionpay ofay erhay. Erskineay asway onay ethay otheray idesay; anday ehay enthay
upportedsay itay byay ayingsay, atthay oughthay ethay entlemangay adhay originallyay
arpoonedhay ethay adylay, anday adhay onceay adhay erhay astfay, anday onlyay byay easonray ofay
ethay eatgray essstray ofay erhay ungingplay iciousnessvay, adhay atay astlay abandoneday
erhay; etyay abandonay erhay ehay idday, osay atthay eshay ecamebay aay oose-fishlay; anday
ereforethay enwhay aay ubsequentsay entlemangay e-harpoonedray erhay, ethay adylay enthay
ecamebay atthay ubsequentsay entleman’sgay opertypray, alongay ithway ateverwhay
arpoonhay ightmay avehay eenbay oundfay ickingstay inay erhay.

Ownay inay ethay esentpray asecay Erskineay ontendedcay atthay ethay examplesay ofay ethay
alewhay anday ethay adylay ereway eciprocallyray illustrativeay ofay eachay otheray.

Esethay eadingsplay, anday ethay ountercay eadingsplay, eingbay ulyday eardhay, ethay eryvay
earnedlay udgejay inay etsay ermstay ecidedday, otay it,—Thatway asay orfay ethay oatbay, ehay
awardeday itay otay ethay aintiffsplay, ecausebay eythay adhay erelymay abandoneday itay otay
avesay eirthay iveslay; utbay atthay ithway egardray otay ethay ontrovertedcay alewhay,
arpoonshay, anday inelay, eythay elongedbay otay ethay efendantsday; ethay alewhay, ecausebay
itay asway aay Oose-Fishlay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay inalfay apturecay; anday ethay arpoonshay
anday inelay ecausebay enwhay ethay ishfay ademay offay ithway emthay, itay e(thay ishfay)
acquireday aay opertypray inay osethay articlesay; anday encehay anybodyay owhay afterwardsay
ooktay ethay ishfay adhay aay ightray otay emthay. Ownay ethay efendantsday afterwardsay ooktay
ethay ishfay; ergoay, ethay aforesaiday articlesay ereway eirsthay.

Aay ommoncay anmay ookinglay atay isthay ecisionday ofay ethay eryvay earnedlay Udgejay, ightmay
ossiblypay objectay otay itay. Utbay oughedplay upay otay ethay imarypray ockray ofay ethay
attermay, ethay otway eatgray inciplespray aidlay ownday inay ethay intway alingwhay awslay
eviouslypray uotedqay, anday applieday anday elucidateday byay Ordlay Ellenboroughay inay
ethay aboveay itedcay asecay; esethay otway awslay ouchingtay Ast-Fishfay anday Oose-Fishlay,
Iay aysay, illway, onay eflectionray, ebay oundfay ethay undamentalsfay ofay allay umanhay
urisprudencejay; orfay otwithstandingnay itsay omplicatedcay acerytray ofay
ulpturescay, ethay Empletay ofay ethay Awlay, ikelay ethay Empletay ofay ethay Ilistinesphay,
ashay utbay otway opspray otay andstay onay.

Isay itay otnay aay ayingsay inay everyay one’say outhmay, Ossessionpay isay alfhay ofay ethay awlay:
atthay isay, egardlessray ofay owhay ethay ingthay amecay intoay ossessionpay? Utbay oftenay
ossessionpay isay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay. Atwhay areay ethay inewssay anday oulssay ofay
Ussianray erfssay anday Epublicanray avesslay utbay Ast-Fishfay, ereofwhay ossessionpay
isay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay? Atwhay otay ethay apaciousray andlordlay isay ethay idow’sway
astlay itemay utbay aay Ast-Fishfay? Atwhay isay onderyay undetecteday illain’svay arblemay
ansionmay ithway aay oor-plateday orfay aay aifway; atwhay isay atthay utbay aay Ast-Fishfay?
Atwhay isay ethay uinousray iscountday ichwhay Ordecaimay, ethay okerbray, etsgay omfray oorpay
Oebegoneway, ethay ankruptbay, onay aay oanlay otay eepkay Oebegone’sway amilyfay omfray
arvationstay; atwhay isay atthay uinousray iscountday utbay aay Ast-Fishfay? Atwhay isay ethay
Archbishopay ofay Avesoul’ssay incomeay ofay £100,000ay eizedsay omfray ethay antscay eadbray
anday eesechay ofay undredshay ofay ousandsthay ofay oken-backedbray aborerslay all(ay uresay
ofay eavenhay ithoutway anyay ofay Avesoul’ssay elphay) atwhay isay atthay obularglay
£100,000ay utbay aay Ast-Fishfay? Atwhay areay ethay Ukeday ofay Under’sday ereditaryhay
ownstay anday amletshay utbay Ast-Fishfay? Atwhay otay atthay edoubtedray arpooneerhay,
Ohnjay Ullbay, isay oorpay Irelanday, utbay aay Ast-Fishfay? Atwhay otay atthay apostolicay
ancerlay, Otherbray Onathanjay, isay Exastay utbay aay Ast-Fishfay? Anday oncerningcay allay
esethay, isay otnay Ossessionpay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay?

Utbay ifay ethay octrineday ofay Ast-Fishfay ebay ettypray enerallygay applicableay, ethay
indredkay octrineday ofay Oose-Fishlay isay illstay oremay idelyway osay. Atthay isay
internationallyay anday universallyay applicableay.

Atwhay asway Americaay inay 1492ay utbay aay Oose-Fishlay, inay ichwhay Olumbuscay uckstray ethay
Anishspay andardstay byay ayway ofay aifingway itay orfay ishay oyalray astermay anday
istressmay? Atwhay asway Olandpay otay ethay Arczay? Atwhay Eecegray otay ethay Urktay? Atwhay
Indiaay otay Englanday? Atwhay atay astlay illway Exicomay ebay otay ethay Uniteday Atesstay? Allay
Oose-Fishlay.

Atwhay areay ethay Ightsray ofay Anmay anday ethay Ibertieslay ofay ethay Orldway utbay
Oose-Fishlay? Atwhay allay en’smay indsmay anday opinionsay utbay Oose-Fishlay? Atwhay isay
ethay inciplepray ofay eligiousray eliefbay inay emthay utbay aay Oose-Fishlay? Atwhay otay ethay
ostentatiousay ugglingsmay erbalistsvay areay ethay oughtsthay ofay inkersthay utbay
Oose-Fishlay? Atwhay isay ethay eatgray obeglay itselfay utbay aay Oose-Fishlay? Anday atwhay
areay ouyay, eaderray, utbay aay Oose-Fishlay anday aay Ast-Fishfay, ootay?


APTERcHay 90ay. Eadshay oray Ailstay.

e“Day alenabay erovay ufficitsay, isay exray abeathay aputcay, etay eginaray audam.”cay
acton_Bray, lay. 3ay, cay. 3._ay

Atinlay omfray ethay ooksbay ofay ethay Awslay ofay Englanday, ichwhay akentay alongay ithway ethay
ontextcay, eansmay, atthay ofay allay aleswhay apturedcay byay anybodyay onay ethay oastcay ofay
atthay andlay, ethay Ingkay, asay Onoraryhay Andgray Arpooneerhay, ustmay avehay ethay eadhay,
anday ethay Ueenqay ebay espectfullyray esentedpray ithway ethay ailtay. Aay ivisionday
ichwhay, inay ethay alewhay, isay uchmay ikelay alvinghay anay appleay; erethay isay onay
intermediateay emainderray. Ownay asay isthay awlay, underay aay odifiedmay ormfay, isay otay
isthay ayday inay orcefay inay Englanday; anday asay itay offersay inay ariousvay espectsray aay
angestray anomalyay ouchingtay ethay eneralgay awlay ofay Astfay anday Oose-Fishlay, itay isay
erehay eatedtray ofay inay aay eparatesay apterchay, onay ethay amesay ourteouscay inciplepray
atthay omptspray ethay Englishay ailwaysray otay ebay atay ethay expenseay ofay aay eparatesay
arcay, eciallyspay eservedray orfay ethay accommodationay ofay oyaltyray. Inay ethay irstfay
aceplay, inay uriouscay oofpray ofay ethay actfay atthay ethay above-mentioneday awlay isay
illstay inay orcefay, Iay oceedpray otay aylay eforebay ouyay aay ircumstancecay atthay
appenedhay ithinway ethay astlay otway earsyay.

Itay eemssay atthay omesay onesthay arinersmay ofay Overday, oray Andwichsay, oray omesay oneay
ofay ethay Inquecay Ortspay, adhay afteray aay ardhay asechay ucceededsay inay illingkay anday
eachingbay aay inefay alewhay ichwhay eythay adhay originallyay escriedday afaray offay omfray
ethay oreshay. Ownay ethay Inquecay Ortspay areay artiallypay oray omehowsay underay ethay
urisdictionjay ofay aay ortsay ofay olicemanpay oray eadlebay, alledcay aay Ordlay Ardenway.
Oldinghay ethay officeay irectlyday omfray ethay owncray, Iay elievebay, allay ethay oyalray
emolumentsay incidentay otay ethay Inquecay Ortpay erritoriestay ecomebay byay assignmentay
ishay. Byay omesay iterswray isthay officeay isay alledcay aay inecuresay. Utbay otnay osay.
Ecausebay ethay Ordlay Ardenway isay usilybay employeday atay imestay inay obbingfay ishay
erquisitespay; ichwhay areay ishay ieflychay byay irtuevay ofay atthay amesay obbingfay ofay
emthay.

Ownay enwhay esethay oorpay un-burntsay arinersmay, are-footedbay, anday ithway eirthay
owserstray olledray ighhay upay onay eirthay eelyay egslay, adhay earilyway auledhay eirthay
atfay ishfay ighhay anday dryay, omisingpray emselvesthay aay oodgay £150ay omfray ethay
eciouspray oilay anday onebay; anday inay antasyfay ippingsay areray eatay ithway eirthay
ivesway, anday oodgay aleay ithway eirthay oniescray, uponay ethay engthstray ofay eirthay
espectiveray aresshay; upay epsstay aay eryvay earnedlay anday ostmay Istianchray anday
aritablechay entlemangay, ithway aay opycay ofay Ackstoneblay underay ishay armay; anday
ayinglay itay uponay ethay ale’swhay eadhay, ehay ays—“Handssay offay! isthay ishfay, myay
astersmay, isay aay Ast-Fishfay. Iay eizesay itay asay ethay Ordlay Arden’s.”way Uponay isthay
ethay oorpay arinersmay inay eirthay espectfulray onsternation—socay ulytray
English—knowingay otnay atwhay otay aysay, allfay otay igorouslyvay atchingscray eirthay
eadshay allay oundray; eanwhilemay uefullyray ancingglay omfray ethay alewhay otay ethay
angerstray. Utbay atthay idday inay owisenay endmay ethay attermay, oray atay allay oftensay ethay
ardhay earthay ofay ethay earnedlay entlemangay ithway ethay opycay ofay Ackstoneblay. Atay
engthlay oneay ofay emthay, afteray onglay atchingscray aboutay orfay ishay ideasay, ademay
oldbay otay eakspay,

ease“Play, irsay, owhay isay ethay Ordlay Arden?”way

e“Thay Uke.”day

ut“Bay ethay ukeday adhay othingnay otay oday ithway akingtay isthay ish?”fay

It“ay isay is.”hay

e“Way avehay eenbay atay eatgray oubletray, anday erilpay, anday omesay expenseay, anday isay allay
atthay otay ogay otay ethay Uke’sday enefitbay; eway ettinggay othingnay atay allay orfay ouray
ainspay utbay ouray isters?”blay

It“ay isay is.”hay

Is“ay ethay Ukeday osay eryvay oorpay asay otay ebay orcedfay otay isthay esperateday odemay ofay
ettinggay aay ivelihood?”lay

It“ay isay is.”hay

I“ay oughtthay otay elieveray myay olday ed-riddenbay othermay byay artpay ofay myay areshay ofay
isthay ale.”whay

It“ay isay is.”hay

on’t“Way ethay Ukeday ebay ontentcay ithway aay uarterqay oray aay alf?”hay

It“ay isay is.”hay

Inay aay ordway, ethay alewhay asway eizedsay anday oldsay, anday ishay Acegray ethay Ukeday ofay
Ellingtonway eceivedray ethay oneymay. Inkingthay atthay iewedvay inay omesay articularpay
ightslay, ethay asecay ightmay byay aay arebay ossibilitypay inay omesay allsmay egreeday ebay
eemedday, underay ethay ircumstancescay, aay atherray ardhay oneay, anay onesthay ergymanclay
ofay ethay owntay espectfullyray addresseday aay otenay otay ishay Acegray, eggingbay imhay otay
aketay ethay asecay ofay osethay unfortunateay arinersmay intoay ullfay onsiderationcay. Otay
ichwhay myay Ordlay Ukeday inay ubstancesay epliedray oth(bay etterslay ereway ublishedpay)
atthay ehay adhay alreadyay oneday osay, anday eceivedray ethay oneymay, anday ouldway ebay
obligeday otay ethay everendray entlemangay ifay orfay ethay uturefay ehay e(thay everendray
entlemangay) ouldway eclineday eddlingmay ithway otheray eople’spay usinessbay. Isay isthay
ethay illstay ilitantmay olday anmay, andingstay atay ethay ornerscay ofay ethay eethray
ingdomskay, onay allay andshay oercingcay almsay ofay eggarsbay?

Itay illway eadilyray ebay eensay atthay inay isthay asecay ethay allegeday ightray ofay ethay Ukeday
otay ethay alewhay asway aay elegatedday oneay omfray ethay Overeignsay. Eway ustmay eedsnay
inquireay enthay onay atwhay inciplepray ethay Overeignsay isay originallyay investeday
ithway atthay ightray. Ethay awlay itselfay ashay alreadyay eenbay etsay orthfay. Utbay Owdonplay
ivesgay usay ethay easonray orfay itay. Ayssay Owdonplay, ethay alewhay osay aughtcay elongsbay
otay ethay Ingkay anday Ueenqay, ecause“bay ofay itsay uperiorsay excellence.”ay Anday byay ethay
oundestsay ommentatorscay isthay ashay everay eenbay eldhay aay ogentcay argumentay inay uchsay
attersmay.

Utbay whyay ouldshay ethay Ingkay avehay ethay eadhay, anday ethay Ueenqay ethay ailtay? Aay easonray
orfay atthay, eyay awyerslay!

Inay ishay eatisetray onay ueen-Gold,”“Qay oray Ueen-pinmoneyqay, anay olday Ing’skay Enchbay
authoray, oneay Illiamway Eprynnay, usthay iscoursethday: e“Yay ailtay isay eyay Ueen’sqay,
atthay eyay Ueen’sqay ardrobeway aymay ebay uppliedsay ithway eyay alebone.”whay Ownay isthay
asway ittenwray atay aay imetay enwhay ethay ackblay imberlay onebay ofay ethay Eenlandgray oray
Ightray alewhay asway argelylay useday inay adies’lay odicesbay. Utbay isthay amesay onebay isay
otnay inay ethay ailtay; itay isay inay ethay eadhay, ichwhay isay aay adsay istakemay orfay aay
agacioussay awyerlay ikelay Eprynnay. Utbay isay ethay Ueenqay aay ermaidmay, otay ebay
esentedpray ithway aay ailtay? Anay allegoricalay eaningmay aymay urklay erehay.

Erethay areay otway oyalray ishfay osay edstylay byay ethay Englishay awlay iters—thewray alewhay
anday ethay urgeonstay; othbay oyalray opertypray underay ertaincay imitationslay, anday
ominallynay upplyingsay ethay enthtay anchbray ofay ethay own’scray ordinaryay evenueray. Iay
owknay otnay atthay anyay otheray authoray ashay intedhay ofay ethay attermay; utbay byay
inferenceay itay eemssay otay emay atthay ethay urgeonstay ustmay ebay ividedday inay ethay amesay
ayway asay ethay alewhay, ethay Ingkay eceivingray ethay ighlyhay enseday anday elasticay eadhay
eculiarpay otay atthay ishfay, ichwhay, olicallysymbay egardedray, aymay ossiblypay ebay
umorouslyhay oundedgray uponay omesay esumedpray ongenialitycay. Anday usthay erethay
eemssay aay easonray inay allay ingsthay, evenay inay awlay.


APTERcHay 91ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Ose-Budray.

In“ay ainvay itay asway otay akeray orfay Ambergrieseay inay ethay aunchpay ofay isthay
Eviathanlay, insufferableay etorfay enyingday otnay inquiry.”ay ir_Say Tay. Ownebray,
E._v.ay

Itay asway aay eekway oray otway afteray ethay astlay alingwhay enescay ecountedray, anday enwhay
eway ereway owlyslay ailingsay overay aay eepyslay, aporyvay, id-daymay easay, atthay ethay
anymay osesnay onay ethay Equod’spay eckday ovedpray oremay igilantvay iscoverersday anthay
ethay eethray airspay ofay eyesay aloftay. Aay eculiarpay anday otnay eryvay easantplay ellsmay
asway eltsmay inay ethay easay.

I“ay illway etbay omethingsay ow,”nay aidsay Ubbstay, at“thay omewheresay ereaboutshay areay
omesay ofay osethay uggeddray aleswhay eway ickledtay ethay otheray ayday. Iay oughtthay eythay
ouldway eelkay upay eforebay ong.”lay

Esentlypray, ethay aporsvay inay advanceay idslay asideay; anday erethay inay ethay istanceday
aylay aay ipshay, osewhay urledfay ailssay etokenedbay atthay omesay ortsay ofay alewhay ustmay
ebay alongsideay. Asay eway idedglay earernay, ethay angerstray owedshay Enchfray olourscay
omfray ishay eakpay; anday byay ethay eddyingay oudclay ofay ulturevay ea-fowlsay atthay
ircledcay, anday overedhay, anday oopedsway arounday imhay, itay asway ainplay atthay ethay
alewhay alongsideay ustmay ebay atwhay ethay ishermenfay allcay aay astedblay alewhay, atthay
isay, aay alewhay atthay ashay iedday unmolesteday onay ethay easay, anday osay oatedflay anay
unappropriateday orpsecay. Itay aymay ellway ebay onceivedcay, atwhay anay unsavoryay odoray
uchsay aay assmay ustmay exhaleay; orseway anthay anay Assyrianay itycay inay ethay agueplay,
enwhay ethay ivinglay areay incompetentay otay urybay ethay epartedday. Osay intolerableay
indeeday isay itay egardedray byay omesay, atthay onay upiditycay ouldcay ersuadepay emthay otay
oormay alongsideay ofay itay. Etyay areay erethay osethay owhay illway illstay oday itay;
otwithstandingnay ethay actfay atthay ethay oilay obtaineday omfray uchsay ubjectssay isay ofay
aay eryvay inferioray ualityqay, anday byay onay eansmay ofay ethay aturenay ofay
attar-of-roseay.

Omingcay illstay earernay ithway ethay expiringay eezebray, eway awsay atthay ethay Enchmanfray
adhay aay econdsay alewhay alongsideay; anday isthay econdsay alewhay eemedsay evenay oremay ofay
aay osegaynay anthay ethay irstfay. Inay uthtray, itay urnedtay outay otay ebay oneay ofay osethay
oblematicalpray aleswhay atthay eemsay otay dryay upay anday ieday ithway aay ortsay ofay
odigiouspray epsiadyspay, oray indigestionay; eavinglay eirthay efunctday odiesbay
almostay entirelyay ankruptbay ofay anythingay ikelay oilay. Everthelessnay, inay ethay
operpray aceplay eway allshay eesay atthay onay owingknay ishermanfay illway everay urntay upay
ishay osenay atay uchsay aay alewhay asay isthay, oweverhay uchmay ehay aymay unshay astedblay
aleswhay inay eneralgay.

Ethay Equodpay adhay ownay eptsway osay ighnay otay ethay angerstray, atthay Ubbstay owedvay ehay
ecognisedray ishay uttingcay ade-polespay entangleday inay ethay ineslay atthay ereway
ottedknay oundray ethay ailtay ofay oneay ofay esethay aleswhay.

ere’s“Thay aay ettypray ellowfay, ow,”nay ehay anteringlybay aughedlay, andingstay inay ethay
ip’sshay owsbay, ere’s“thay aay ackaljay orfay eyay! Iay ellway owknay atthay esethay Appoescray
ofay Enchmenfray areay utbay oorpay evilsday inay ethay isheryfay; ometimessay oweringlay
eirthay oatsbay orfay eakersbray, istakingmay emthay orfay Ermspay Alewhay outsspay; esyay,
anday ometimessay ailingsay omfray eirthay ortpay ithway eirthay oldhay ullfay ofay oxesbay ofay
allowtay andlescay, anday asescay ofay ufferssnay, oreseeingfay atthay allay ethay oilay eythay
illway etgay on’tway ebay enoughay otay ipday ethay Aptain’scay ickway intoay; ayeay, eway allay
owknay esethay ingsthay; utbay ooklay eyay, ere’shay aay Appocray atthay isay ontentcay ithway
ouray eavingslay, ethay uggeddray alewhay erethay, Iay eanmay; ayeay, anday isay ontentcay ootay
ithway apingscray ethay dryay onesbay ofay atthay otheray eciouspray ishfay ehay ashay erethay.
Oorpay evilday! Iay aysay, asspay oundray aay athay, omesay oneay, anday et’slay akemay imhay aay
esentpray ofay aay ittlelay oilay orfay earday arity’schay akesay. Orfay atwhay oilay e’llhay etgay
omfray atthay uggeddray alewhay erethay, ouldn’tway ebay itfay otay urnbay inay aay ailjay; onay,
otnay inay aay ondemnedcay ellcay. Anday asay orfay ethay otheray alewhay, whyay, I’llay agreeay otay
etgay oremay oilay byay oppingchay upay anday ingtryay outay esethay eethray astsmay ofay oursay,
anthay e’llhay etgay omfray atthay undlebay ofay onesbay; oughthay, ownay atthay Iay inkthay ofay
itay, itay aymay ontaincay omethingsay orthway aay oodgay ealday oremay anthay oilay; esyay,
ambergrisay. Iay onderway ownay ifay ouray olday anmay ashay oughtthay ofay atthay. It’say orthway
ingtryay. Esyay, I’may orfay it;”ay anday osay ayingsay ehay artedstay orfay ethay
uarter-deckqay.

Byay isthay imetay ethay aintfay airay adhay ecomebay aay ompletecay almcay; osay atthay etherwhay
oray onay, ethay Equodpay asway ownay airlyfay entrappeday inay ethay ellsmay, ithway onay opehay
ofay escapingay exceptay byay itsay eezingbray upay againay. Issuingay omfray ethay abincay,
Ubbstay ownay alledcay ishay oat’sbay ewcray, anday ulledpay offay orfay ethay angerstray.
Awingdray acrossay erhay owbay, ehay erceivedpay atthay inay accordanceay ithway ethay
ancifulfay Enchfray astetay, ethay upperay artpay ofay erhay em-piecestay asway arvedcay inay
ethay ikenesslay ofay aay ugehay oopingdray alkstay, asway aintedpay eengray, anday orfay
ornsthay adhay oppercay ikesspay ojectingpray omfray itay erehay anday erethay; ethay olewhay
erminatingtay inay aay etricalsymmay oldedfay ulbbay ofay aay ightbray edray olourcay. Uponay
erhay eadhay oardsbay, inay argelay iltgay etterslay, ehay eadray outon“Bay eday
Ose,”—Rose-buttonray, oray Ose-budray; anday isthay asway ethay omanticray amenay ofay isthay
aromaticay ipshay.

Oughthay Ubbstay idday otnay understanday ethay outon__Bay artpay ofay ethay inscriptionay,
etyay ethay ordway ose__ray, anday ethay ulbousbay igure-headfay utpay ogethertay,
ufficientlysay explaineday ethay olewhay otay imhay.

A“ay oodenway ose-budray, eh?”ay ehay iedcray ithway ishay andhay otay ishay osenay, at“thay illway
oday eryvay ellway; utbay owhay ikelay allay eationcray itay ells!”smay

Ownay inay orderay otay oldhay irectday ommunicationcay ithway ethay eoplepay onay eckday, ehay
adhay otay ullpay oundray ethay owsbay otay ethay arboardstay idesay, anday usthay omecay oseclay
otay ethay astedblay alewhay; anday osay alktay overay itay.

Arriveday enthay atay isthay otspay, ithway oneay andhay illstay otay ishay osenay, ehay
awled—“Bouton-de-Rosebay, ahoyay! areay erethay anyay ofay ouyay Outon-de-Rosesbay atthay
eakspay English?”ay

es,”“Yay ejoinedray aay Uernsey-mangay omfray ethay ulwarksbay, owhay urnedtay outay otay ebay
ethay ief-matechay.

ell“Way, enthay, myay Outon-de-Rose-budbay, avehay ouyay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

at_“_Whay ale?”whay

e“Thay ite__Whay Ale—awhay Ermspay Ale—Mobywhay Ickday, avehay eyay eensay imhay?

ever“Nay eardhay ofay uchsay aay alewhay. Achalotcay Ancheblay! Itewhay Ale—no.”whay

ery“Vay oodgay, enthay; oodgay ebyay ownay, anday I’llay allcay againay inay aay inute.”may

Enthay apidlyray ullingpay ackbay owardstay ethay Equodpay, anday eeingsay Ahabay eaninglay
overay ethay uarter-deckqay ailray awaitingay ishay eportray, ehay ouldedmay ishay otway
andshay intoay aay umpettray anday outed—“Noshay, Irsay! O!”nay Uponay ichwhay Ahabay
etiredray, anday Ubbstay eturnedray otay ethay Enchmanfray.

Ehay ownay erceivedpay atthay ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay adhay ustjay otgay intoay ethay
ainschay, anday asway usingay aay utting-spadecay, adhay ungslay ishay osenay inay aay ortsay ofay
agbay.

at’s“Whay ethay attermay ithway ouryay osenay, ere?”thay aidsay Ubbstay. oke“Bray it?”ay

I“ay ishway itay asway okenbray, oray atthay Iay idn’tday avehay anyay osenay atay all!”ay answereday
ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay idday otnay eemsay otay elishray ethay objay ehay asway atay eryvay
uchmay. ut“Bay atwhay areay ouyay oldinghay ours__yay or?”fay

Oh“ay, othingnay! It’say aay axway osenay; Iay avehay otay oldhay itay onay. Inefay ayday, ain’tay
itay? Airay atherray ardennygay, Iay ouldshay aysay; owthray usay aay unchbay ofay osiespay, illway
eyay, Outon-de-Rose?”bay

at“Whay inay ethay evil’sday amenay oday ouyay antway ere?”hay oaredray ethay Uernseymangay,
ingflyay intoay aay uddensay assionpay.

Oh“ay! eepkay ool—coolcay? esyay, at’sthay ethay ordway! whyay on’tday ouyay ackpay osethay
aleswhay inay iceay ilewhay ou’reyay orkingway atay em’ay? Utbay okingjay asideay, oughthay; oday
ouyay owknay, Ose-budray, atthay it’say allay onsensenay ingtryay otay etgay anyay oilay outay ofay
uchsay aleswhay? Asay orfay atthay ieddray upay oneay, erethay, ehay asn’thay aay illgay inay ishay
olewhay arcase.”cay

I“ay owknay atthay ellway enoughay; utbay, ed’yay eesay, ethay Aptaincay erehay on’tway elievebay
itay; isthay isay ishay irstfay oyagevay; ehay asway aay Olognecay anufacturermay eforebay. Utbay
omecay aboarday, anday ayhapmay e’llhay elievebay ouyay, ifay ehay on’tway emay; anday osay I’llay
etgay outay ofay isthay irtyday ape.”scray

Anything“ay otay obligeay eyay, myay eetsway anday easantplay ellow,”fay ejoinedray Ubbstay,
anday ithway atthay ehay oonsay ountedmay otay ethay eckday. Erethay aay ueerqay enescay
esentedpray itselfay. Ethay ailorssay, inay asselledtay apscay ofay edray orstedway, ereway
ettinggay ethay eavyhay acklestay inay eadinessray orfay ethay aleswhay. Utbay eythay orkedway
atherray owslay anday alkedtay eryvay astfay, anday eemedsay inay anythingay utbay aay oodgay
umorhay. Allay eirthay osesnay upwardlyay ojectedpray omfray eirthay acesfay ikelay osay anymay
ib-boomsjay. Ownay anday enthay airspay ofay emthay ouldway opdray eirthay orkway, anday unray upay
otay ethay ast-headmay otay etgay omesay eshfray airay. Omesay inkingthay eythay ouldway atchcay
ethay agueplay, ippedday oakumay inay oal-tarcay, anday atay intervalsay eldhay itay otay eirthay
ostrilsnay. Othersay avinghay okenbray ethay emsstay ofay eirthay ipespay almostay ortshay
offay atay ethay owlbay, ereway igorouslyvay uffingpay obacco-smoketay, osay atthay itay
onstantlycay illedfay eirthay olfactoriesay.

Ubbstay asway uckstray byay aay owershay ofay outcriesay anday anathemasay oceedingpray omfray
ethay Aptain’scay ound-houseray abaftay; anday ookinglay inay atthay irectionday awsay aay
ieryfay acefay ustthray omfray ehindbay ethay oorday, ichwhay asway eldhay ajaray omfray
ithinway. Isthay asway ethay ormentedtay urgeonsay, owhay, afteray inay ainvay
emonstratingray againstay ethay oceedingspray ofay ethay ayday, adhay etakenbay imselfhay
otay ethay Aptain’scay ound-houseray abinet_(_cay ehay alledcay itay) otay avoiday ethay
estpay; utbay illstay, ouldcay otnay elphay ellingyay outay ishay entreatiesay anday
indignationsay atay imestay.

Arkingmay allay isthay, Ubbstay argueday ellway orfay ishay emeschay, anday urningtay otay ethay
Uernsey-mangay adhay aay ittlelay atchay ithway imhay, uringday ichwhay ethay angerstray atemay
expresseday ishay etestationday ofay ishay Aptaincay asay aay onceitedcay ignoramusay, owhay
adhay oughtbray emthay allay intoay osay unsavoryay anday unprofitableay aay icklepay.
Oundingsay imhay arefullycay, Ubbstay urtherfay erceivedpay atthay ethay Uernsey-mangay
adhay otnay ethay ightestslay uspicionsay oncerningcay ethay ambergrisay. Ehay ereforethay
eldhay ishay eacepay onay atthay eadhay, utbay otherwiseay asway uiteqay ankfray anday
onfidentialcay ithway imhay, osay atthay ethay otway uicklyqay oncoctedcay aay ittlelay anplay
orfay othbay ircumventingcay anday atirizingsay ethay Aptaincay, ithoutway ishay atay allay
eamingdray ofay istrustingday eirthay inceritysay. Accordingay otay isthay ittlelay anplay
ofay eirsthay, ethay Uernsey-mangay, underay overcay ofay anay interpreter’say officeay,
asway otay elltay ethay Aptaincay atwhay ehay easedplay, utbay asay omingcay omfray Ubbstay; anday
asay orfay Ubbstay, ehay asway otay utteray anyay onsensenay atthay ouldshay omecay uppermostay
inay imhay uringday ethay intervieway.

Byay isthay imetay eirthay estinedday ictimvay appeareday omfray ishay abincay. Ehay asway aay
allsmay anday arkday, utbay atherray elicateday ookinglay anmay orfay aay ea-captainsay, ithway
argelay iskerswhay anday oustachemay, oweverhay; anday oreway aay edray ottoncay elvetvay
estvay ithway atch-sealsway atay ishay idesay. Otay isthay entlemangay, Ubbstay asway ownay
olitelypay introduceday byay ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay atay onceay ostentatiouslyay utpay
onay ethay aspectay ofay interpretingay etweenbay emthay.

at“Whay allshay Iay aysay otay imhay irst?”fay aidsay ehay.

“Why,”ay aidsay Ubbstay, eyeingay ethay elvetvay estvay anday ethay atchway anday ealssay, ou“yay
aymay asay ellway eginbay byay ellingtay imhay atthay ehay ookslay aay ortsay ofay abyishbay otay emay,
oughthay Iay on’tday etendpray otay ebay aay udge.”jay

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieur,”may aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay, inay Enchfray, urningtay otay ishay
aptaincay, at“thay onlyay esterdayyay ishay ipshay okespay aay esselvay, osewhay aptaincay
anday ief-matechay, ithway ixsay ailorssay, adhay allay iedday ofay aay everfay aughtcay omfray aay
astedblay alewhay eythay adhay oughtbray alongside.”ay

Uponay isthay ethay aptaincay artedstay, anday eagerlyay esiredday otay owknay oremay.

at“Whay ow?”nay aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay otay Ubbstay.

“Whyay, incesay ehay akestay itay osay easyay, elltay imhay atthay ownay Iay avehay eyeday imhay
arefullycay, I’may uiteqay ertaincay atthay e’shay onay oremay itfay otay ommandcay aay
ale-shipwhay anthay aay Stay. Agojay onkeymay. Inay actfay, elltay imhay omfray emay e’shay aay
aboon.”bay

e“Hay owsvay anday eclaresday, Onsieurmay, atthay ethay otheray alewhay, ethay ieddray oneay,
isay arfay oremay eadlyday anthay ethay astedblay oneay; inay inefay, Onsieurmay, ehay onjurescay
usay, asay eway aluevay ouray iveslay, otay utcay ooselay omfray esethay ish.”fay

Instantlyay ethay aptaincay anray orwardfay, anday inay aay oudlay oicevay ommandedcay ishay
ewcray otay esistday omfray oistinghay ethay utting-tacklescay, anday atay onceay astcay
ooselay ethay ablescay anday ainschay onfiningcay ethay aleswhay otay ethay ipshay.

at“Whay ow?”nay aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay, enwhay ethay Aptaincay adhay eturnedray otay
emthay.

“Whyay, etlay emay eesay; esyay, ouyay aymay asay ellway elltay imhay ownay at—that—inthay actfay,
elltay imhay I’veay iddledday imhay, anday aside(ay otay imselfhay) erhapspay omebodysay
else.”ay

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieurmay, atthay e’shay eryvay appyhay otay avehay eenbay ofay anyay ervicesay otay
us.”ay

Earinghay isthay, ethay aptaincay owedvay atthay eythay ereway ethay atefulgray artiespay
eaning(may imselfhay anday atemay) anday oncludedcay byay invitingay Ubbstay ownday intoay
ishay abincay otay inkdray aay ottlebay ofay Ordeauxbay.

e“Hay antsway ouyay otay aketay aay assglay ofay ineway ithway im,”hay aidsay ethay interpreteray.

ank“Thay imhay eartilyhay; utbay elltay imhay it’say againstay myay inciplespray otay inkdray
ithway ethay anmay I’veay iddledday. Inay actfay, elltay imhay Iay ustmay o.”gay

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieurmay, atthay ishay inciplespray on’tway admitay ofay ishay inkingdray;
utbay atthay ifay Onsieurmay antsway otay ivelay anotheray ayday otay inkdray, enthay Onsieurmay
adhay estbay opdray allay ourfay oatsbay, anday ullpay ethay ipshay awayay omfray esethay aleswhay,
orfay it’say osay almcay eythay on’tway ift.”dray

Byay isthay imetay Ubbstay asway overay ethay idesay, anday ettinggay intoay ishay oatbay, ailedhay
ethay Uernsey-mangay otay isthay effect,—thatay avinghay aay onglay ow-linetay inay ishay
oatbay, ehay ouldway oday atwhay ehay ouldcay otay elphay emthay, byay ullingpay outay ethay
ighterlay alewhay ofay ethay otway omfray ethay ip’sshay idesay. Ilewhay ethay Enchman’sfray
oatsbay, enthay, ereway engageday inay owingtay ethay ipshay oneay ayway, Ubbstay
enevolentlybay owedtay awayay atay ishay alewhay ethay otheray ayway, ostentatiouslyay
ackingslay outay aay ostmay unusuallyay onglay ow-linetay.

Esentlypray aay eezebray angspray upay; Ubbstay eignedfay otay astcay offay omfray ethay alewhay;
oistinghay ishay oatsbay, ethay Enchmanfray oonsay increaseday ishay istanceday, ilewhay
ethay Equodpay idslay inay etweenbay imhay anday Ubb’sstay alewhay. Ereuponwhay Ubbstay
uicklyqay ulledpay otay ethay oatingflay odybay, anday ailinghay ethay Equodpay otay ivegay
oticenay ofay ishay intentionsay, atay onceay oceededpray otay eapray ethay uitfray ofay ishay
unrighteousay unningcay. Eizingsay ishay arpshay oat-spadebay, ehay ommencedcay anay
excavationay inay ethay odybay, aay ittlelay ehindbay ethay idesay infay. Ouyay ouldway almostay
avehay oughtthay ehay asway iggingday aay ellarcay erethay inay ethay easay; anday enwhay atay
engthlay ishay adespay uckstray againstay ethay auntgay ibsray, itay asway ikelay urningtay upay
olday Omanray ilestay anday otterypay uriedbay inay atfay Englishay oamlay. Ishay oat’sbay ewcray
ereway allay inay ighhay excitementay, eagerlyay elpinghay eirthay iefchay, anday ookinglay
asay anxiousay asay old-huntersgay.

Anday allay ethay imetay umberlessnay owlsfay ereway ivingday, anday uckingday, anday
eamingscray, anday ellingyay, anday ightingfay arounday emthay. Ubbstay asway eginningbay
otay ooklay isappointedday, especiallyay asay ethay orriblehay osegaynay increaseday,
enwhay uddenlysay omfray outay ethay eryvay earthay ofay isthay agueplay, erethay olestay aay
aintfay eamstray ofay erfumepay, ichwhay owedflay oughthray ethay idetay ofay adbay ellssmay
ithoutway eingbay absorbeday byay itay, asay oneay iverray illway owflay intoay anday enthay
alongay ithway anotheray, ithoutway atay allay endingblay ithway itay orfay aay imetay.

I“ay avehay itay, Iay avehay it,”ay iedcray Ubbstay, ithway elightday, ikingstray omethingsay
inay ethay ubterraneansay egionsray, a“ay ursepay! aay urse!”pay

Oppingdray ishay adespay, ehay ustthray othbay andshay inay, anday ewdray outay andfulshay ofay
omethingsay atthay ookedlay ikelay iperay Indsorway oapsay, oray ichray ottledmay olday
eesechay; eryvay unctuousay anday avorysay ithalway. Ouyay ightmay easilyay entday itay ithway
ouryay umbthay; itay isay ofay aay uehay etweenbay ellowyay anday ashay olourcay. Anday isthay,
oodgay iendsfray, isay ambergrisay, orthway aay oldgay uineagay anay ounceay otay anyay
uggistdray. Omesay ixsay andfulshay ereway obtaineday; utbay oremay asway unavoidablyay
ostlay inay ethay easay, anday illstay oremay, erhapspay, ightmay avehay eenbay ecuredsay ereway
itay otnay orfay impatientay Ahab’say oudlay ommandcay otay Ubbstay otay esistday, anday omecay
onay oardbay, elseay ethay ipshay ouldway idbay emthay oodgay ebyay.


APTERcHay 92ay. Ambergrisay.

Ownay isthay ambergrisay isay aay eryvay uriouscay ubstancesay, anday osay importantay asay anay
articleay ofay ommercecay, atthay inay 1791ay aay ertaincay Antucket-bornnay Aptaincay
Offincay asway examineday atay ethay arbay ofay ethay Englishay Ousehay ofay Ommonscay onay atthay
ubjectsay. Orfay atay atthay imetay, anday indeeday untilay aay omparativelycay atelay ayday,
ethay ecisepray originay ofay ambergrisay emainedray, ikelay amberay itselfay, aay oblempray
otay ethay earnedlay. Oughthay ethay ordway ambergrisay isay utbay ethay Enchfray ompoundcay
orfay eygray amberay, etyay ethay otway ubstancessay areay uiteqay istinctday. Orfay amberay,
oughthay atay imestay oundfay onay ethay ea-coastsay, isay alsoay ugday upay inay omesay arfay
inlanday oilssay, ereaswhay ambergrisay isay evernay oundfay exceptay uponay ethay easay.
Esidesbay, amberay isay aay ardhay, ansparenttray, ittlebray, odorlessay ubstancesay,
useday orfay outh-piecesmay otay ipespay, orfay eadsbay anday ornamentsay; utbay ambergrisay
isay oftsay, axyway, anday osay ighlyhay agrantfray anday icyspay, atthay itay isay argelylay
useday inay erfumerypay, inay astilespay, eciouspray andlescay, air-powdershay, anday
omatumpay. Ethay Urkstay useay itay inay ookingcay, anday alsoay arrycay itay otay Eccamay, orfay
ethay amesay urposepay atthay ankincensefray isay arriedcay otay Stay. Eter’spay inay Omeray.
Omesay ineway erchantsmay opdray aay ewfay ainsgray intoay aretclay, otay avorflay itay.

Owhay ouldway inkthay, enthay, atthay uchsay inefay adieslay anday entlemengay ouldshay
egaleray emselvesthay ithway anay essenceay oundfay inay ethay ingloriousay owelsbay ofay aay
icksay alewhay! Etyay osay itay isay. Byay omesay, ambergrisay isay upposedsay otay ebay ethay
ausecay, anday byay othersay ethay effectay, ofay ethay epsiadyspay inay ethay alewhay. Owhay otay
urecay uchsay aay epsiadyspay itay ereway ardhay otay aysay, unlessay byay administeringay
eethray oray ourfay oatbay oadslay ofay Andreth’sbray illspay, anday enthay unningray outay ofay
arm’shay ayway, asay aborerslay oday inay astingblay ocksray.

Iay avehay orgottenfay otay aysay atthay erethay ereway oundfay inay isthay ambergrisay,
ertaincay ardhay, oundray, onybay atesplay, ichwhay atay irstfay Ubbstay oughtthay ightmay ebay
ailors’say owserstray uttonsbay; utbay itay afterwardsay urnedtay outay atthay eythay ereway
othingnay oremay anthay iecespay ofay allsmay uidsqay onesbay embalmeday inay atthay annermay.

Ownay atthay ethay incorruptionay ofay isthay ostmay agrantfray ambergrisay ouldshay ebay
oundfay inay ethay earthay ofay uchsay ecayday; isay isthay othingnay? Ethinkbay eethay ofay atthay
ayingsay ofay Stay. Aulpay inay Orinthianscay, aboutay orruptioncay anday incorruptionay;
owhay atthay eway areay ownsay inay ishonorday, utbay aisedray inay oryglay. Anday ikewiselay
allcay otay indmay atthay ayingsay ofay Aracelsuspay aboutay atwhay itay isay atthay akethmay ethay
estbay uskmay. Alsoay orgetfay otnay ethay angestray actfay atthay ofay allay ingsthay ofay
ill-savoray, Ologne-watercay, inay itsay udimentalray anufacturingmay agesstay, isay
ethay orstway.

Iay ouldshay ikelay otay oncludecay ethay apterchay ithway ethay aboveay appealay, utbay
annotcay, owingay otay myay anxietyay otay epelray aay argechay oftenay ademay againstay
alemenwhay, anday ichwhay, inay ethay estimationay ofay omesay alreadyay iasedbay indsmay,
ightmay ebay onsideredcay asay indirectlyay ubstantiatedsay byay atwhay ashay eenbay aidsay
ofay ethay Enchman’sfray otway aleswhay. Elsewhereay inay isthay olumevay ethay anderousslay
aspersionay ashay eenbay isprovedday, atthay ethay ocationvay ofay alingwhay isay
oughoutthray aay atternlyslay, untidyay usinessbay. Utbay erethay isay anotheray ingthay otay
ebutray. Eythay inthay atthay allay aleswhay alwaysay ellsmay adbay. Ownay owhay idday isthay
odiousay igmastay originateay?

Iay opineay, atthay itay isay ainlyplay aceabletray otay ethay irstfay arrivalay ofay ethay
Eenlandgray alingwhay ipsshay inay Ondonlay, oremay anthay otway enturiescay agoay. Ecausebay
osethay alemenwhay idday otnay enthay, anday oday otnay ownay, tryay outay eirthay oilay atay easay
asay ethay Outhernsay ipsshay avehay alwaysay oneday; utbay uttingcay upay ethay eshfray
ubberblay inay allsmay itsbay, ustthray itay oughthray ethay ungbay oleshay ofay argelay askscay,
anday arrycay itay omehay inay atthay annermay; ethay ortnessshay ofay ethay easonsay inay osethay
Icyay Eassay, anday ethay uddensay anday iolentvay ormsstay otay ichwhay eythay areay exposeday,
orbiddingfay anyay otheray oursecay. Ethay onsequencecay isay, atthay uponay eakingbray
intoay ethay oldhay, anday unloadingay oneay ofay esethay alewhay emeteriescay, inay ethay
Eenlandgray ockday, aay avorsay isay ivengay orthfay omewhatsay imilarsay otay atthay arisingay
omfray excavatingay anay olday itycay ave-yardgray, orfay ethay oundationsfay ofay aay
Ing-inlyay Ospitalhay.

Iay artlypay urmisesay alsoay, atthay isthay ickedway argechay againstay alerswhay aymay ebay
ikewiselay imputeday otay ethay existenceay onay ethay oastcay ofay Eenlandgray, inay ormerfay
imestay, ofay aay Utchday illagevay alledcay Erenburghschmay oray Eerenbergsmay, ichwhay
atterlay amenay isay ethay oneay useday byay ethay earnedlay Ogofay Onvay Ackslay, inay ishay eatgray
orkway onay Ellssmay, aay ext-booktay onay atthay ubjectsay. Asay itsay amenay importsay
eer(smay, atfay; ergbay, otay utpay up)ay, isthay illagevay asway oundedfay inay orderay otay
afforday aay aceplay orfay ethay ubberblay ofay ethay Utchday alewhay eetflay otay ebay iedtray
outay, ithoutway eingbay akentay omehay otay Ollandhay orfay atthay urposepay. Itay asway aay
ollectioncay ofay urnacesfay, at-kettlesfay, anday oilay edsshay; anday enwhay ethay orksway
ereway inay ullfay operationay ertainlycay avegay orthfay onay eryvay easantplay avorsay. Utbay
allay isthay isay uiteqay ifferentday ithway aay Outhsay Easay Ermspay Alerwhay; ichwhay inay aay
oyagevay ofay ourfay earsyay erhapspay, afteray ompletelycay illingfay erhay oldhay ithway
oilay, oesday otnay, erhapspay, onsumecay iftyfay aysday inay ethay usinessbay ofay oilingbay
outay; anday inay ethay atestay atthay itay isay askedcay, ethay oilay isay earlynay entlessscay.
Ethay uthtray isay, atthay ivinglay oray eadday, ifay utbay ecentlyday eatedtray, aleswhay asay aay
eciesspay areay byay onay eansmay eaturescray ofay illay odoray; ornay ancay alemenwhay ebay
ecognisedray, asay ethay eoplepay ofay ethay iddlemay agesay affecteday otay etectday aay Ewjay
inay ethay ompanycay, byay ethay osenay. Ornay indeeday ancay ethay alewhay ossiblypay ebay
otherwiseay anthay agrantfray, enwhay, asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ehay enjoysay uchsay ighhay
ealthhay; akingtay abundanceay ofay exerciseay; alwaysay outay ofay oorsday; oughthay, itay
isay uetray, eldomsay inay ethay openay airay. Iay aysay, atthay ethay otionmay ofay aay Ermspay
Ale’swhay ukesflay aboveay aterway ispensesday aay erfumepay, asay enwhay aay usk-scentedmay
adylay ustlesray erhay essdray inay aay armway arlorpay. Atwhay enthay allshay Iay ikenlay ethay
Ermspay Alewhay otay orfay agrancefray, onsideringcay ishay agnitudemay? Ustmay itay otnay ebay
otay atthay amousfay elephantay, ithway ewelledjay uskstay, anday edolentray ithway myrrhay,
ichwhay asway edlay outay ofay anay Indianay owntay otay oday onorhay otay Alexanderay ethay Eatgray?


APTERcHay 93ay. Ethay Astawaycay.

Itay asway utbay omesay ewfay aysday afteray encounteringay ethay Enchmanfray, atthay aay ostmay
ignificantsay eventay efellbay ethay ostmay insignificantay ofay ethay Equod’spay ewcray;
anay eventay ostmay amentablelay; anday ichwhay endeday inay ovidingpray ethay ometimessay
adlymay errymay anday edestinatedpray aftcray ithway aay ivinglay anday everay accompanyingay
ophecypray ofay ateverwhay atteredshay equelsay ightmay ovepray erhay ownay.

Ownay, inay ethay alewhay ipshay, itay isay otnay everyay oneay atthay oesgay inay ethay oatsbay.
Omesay ewfay andshay areay eservedray alledcay ip-keepersshay, osewhay ovincepray itay isay
otay orkway ethay esselvay ilewhay ethay oatsbay areay ursuingpay ethay alewhay. Asay aay eneralgay
ingthay, esethay ip-keepersshay areay asay ardyhay ellowsfay asay ethay enmay omprisingcay
ethay oats’bay ewscray. Utbay ifay erethay appenhay otay ebay anay undulyay enderslay, umsyclay,
oray imoroustay ightway inay ethay ipshay, atthay ightway isay ertaincay otay ebay ademay aay
ip-keepershay. Itay asway osay inay ethay Equodpay ithway ethay ittlelay egronay Ippinpay byay
ick-namenay, Ippay byay abbreviationay. Oorpay Ippay! eyay avehay eardhay ofay imhay eforebay;
eyay ustmay ememberray ishay ambourinetay onay atthay amaticdray idnightmay, osay
oomy-jollyglay.

Inay outeray aspectay, Ippay anday Ough-Boyday ademay aay atchmay, ikelay aay ackblay onypay anday
aay itewhay oneay, ofay equalay evelopmentsday, oughthay ofay issimilarday olourcay, ivendray
inay oneay eccentricay anspay. Utbay ilewhay aplesshay Ough-Boyday asway byay aturenay ullday
anday orpidtay inay ishay intellectsay, Ippay, oughthay overay ender-heartedtay, asway atay
ottombay eryvay ightbray, ithway atthay easantplay, enialgay, ollyjay ightnessbray
eculiarpay otay ishay ibetray; aay ibetray, ichwhay everay enjoyay allay olidayshay anday
estivitiesfay ithway inerfay, eerfray elishray anthay anyay otheray aceray. Orfay acksblay,
ethay ear’syay alendarcay ouldshay owshay aughtnay utbay eethray undredhay anday ixty-fivesay
Ourthfay ofay Ulysjay anday Ewnay Ear’syay Aysday. Ornay ilesmay osay, ilewhay Iay itewray atthay
isthay ittlelay ackblay asway illiantbray, orfay evenay acknessblay ashay itsay illiancybray;
eholdbay onyay ustrouslay ebonyay, anelledpay inay ing’skay abinetscay. Utbay Ippay ovedlay
ifelay, anday allay ife’slay eaceablepay ecuritiessay; osay atthay ethay anic-strikingpay
usinessbay inay ichwhay ehay adhay omehowsay unaccountablyay ecomebay entrappeday, adhay
ostmay adlysay urredblay ishay ightnessbray; oughthay, asay ereay onglay illway ebay eensay,
atwhay asway usthay emporarilytay ubduedsay inay imhay, inay ethay enday asway estinedday otay ebay
uridlylay illumineday byay angestray ildway iresfay, atthay ictitiouslyfay owedshay imhay
offay otay entay imestay ethay aturalnay ustrelay ithway ichwhay inay ishay ativenay Ollandtay
Ountycay inay Onnecticutcay, ehay adhay onceay enliveneday anymay aay iddler’sfay olicfray onay
ethay eengray; anday atay elodiousmay even-tideay, ithway ishay aygay a-hahay! adhay urnedtay
ethay oundray orizonhay intoay oneay ar-belledstay ambourinetay. Osay, oughthay inay ethay
earclay airay ofay ayday, uspendedsay againstay aay ue-veinedblay ecknay, ethay
ure-wateredpay iamondday opdray illway ealthfulhay owglay; etyay, enwhay ethay unningcay
ewellerjay ouldway owshay ouyay ethay iamondday inay itsay ostmay impressiveay ustrelay, ehay
ayslay itay againstay aay oomyglay oundgray, anday enthay ightslay itay upay, otnay byay ethay unsay,
utbay byay omesay unnaturalay asesgay. Enthay omecay outay osethay ieryfay effulgencesay,
infernallyay uperbsay; enthay ethay evil-blazingay iamondday, onceay ethay ivinestday
olsymbay ofay ethay alcrystay iesskay, ookslay ikelay omesay own-jewelcray olenstay omfray
ethay Ingkay ofay Ellhay. Utbay etlay usay otay ethay orystay.

Itay amecay otay asspay, atthay inay ethay ambergrisay affairay Ubb’sstay after-oarsmanay
ancedchay osay otay ainspray ishay andhay, asay orfay aay imetay otay ecomebay uiteqay aimedmay;
anday, emporarilytay, Ippay asway utpay intoay ishay aceplay.

Ethay irstfay imetay Ubbstay oweredlay ithway imhay, Ippay evinceday uchmay ervousnessnay;
utbay appilyhay, orfay atthay imetay, escapeday oseclay ontactcay ithway ethay alewhay; anday
ereforethay amecay offay otnay altogetheray iscreditablyday; oughthay Ubbstay observingay
imhay, ooktay arecay, afterwardsay, otay exhortay imhay otay erishchay ishay ourageousnesscay
otay ethay utmostay, orfay ehay ightmay oftenay indfay itay eedfulnay.

Ownay uponay ethay econdsay oweringlay, ethay oatbay addledpay uponay ethay alewhay; anday asay
ethay ishfay eceivedray ethay artedday ironay, itay avegay itsay ustomarycay apray, ichwhay
appenedhay, inay isthay instanceay, otay ebay ightray underay oorpay Ip’spay eatsay. Ethay
involuntaryay onsternationcay ofay ethay omentmay ausedcay imhay otay eaplay, addlepay inay
andhay, outay ofay ethay oatbay; anday inay uchsay aay ayway, atthay artpay ofay ethay ackslay alewhay
inelay omingcay againstay ishay estchay, ehay eastedbray itay overboarday ithway imhay, osay asay
otay ecomebay entangleday inay itay, enwhay atay astlay umpingplay intoay ethay aterway. Atthay
instantay ethay ickenstray alewhay artedstay onay aay iercefay unray, ethay inelay iftlysway
aightenedstray; anday estopray! oorpay Ippay amecay allay oamingfay upay otay ethay ockschay ofay
ethay oatbay, emorselesslyray aggeddray erethay byay ethay inelay, ichwhay adhay akentay
everalsay urnstay arounday ishay estchay anday ecknay.

Ashtegotay oodstay inay ethay owsbay. Ehay asway ullfay ofay ethay irefay ofay ethay unthay. Ehay
atedhay Ippay orfay aay oltroonpay. Atchingsnay ethay oat-knifebay omfray itsay eathshay, ehay
uspendedsay itsay arpshay edgeay overay ethay inelay, anday urningtay owardstay Ubbstay,
exclaimeday interrogativelyay, ut?”“Cay Eantimemay Ip’spay ueblay, okedchay acefay
ainlyplay ookedlay, Oday, orfay Od’sgay akesay! Allay assedpay inay aay ashflay. Inay esslay anthay
alfhay aay inutemay, isthay entireay ingthay appenedhay.

amn“Day imhay, ut!”cay oaredray Ubbstay; anday osay ethay alewhay asway ostlay anday Ippay asway
avedsay.

Osay oonsay asay ehay ecoveredray imselfhay, ethay oorpay ittlelay egronay asway assaileday byay
ellsyay anday execrationsay omfray ethay ewcray. Anquillytray ermittingpay esethay
irregularay ursingscay otay evaporateay, Ubbstay enthay inay aay ainplay, usiness-likebay,
utbay illstay alfhay umoroushay annermay, ursedcay Ippay officiallyay; anday atthay oneday,
unofficiallyay avegay imhay uchmay olesomewhay adviceay. Ethay ubstancesay asway, Evernay
umpjay omfray aay oatbay, Ippay, except—butay allay ethay estray asway indefiniteay, asay ethay
oundestsay adviceay everay isay. Ownay, inay eneralgay, ick_Stay otay ethay oat_bay, isay ouryay
uetray ottomay inay alingwhay; utbay asescay illway ometimessay appenhay enwhay eap_Lay omfray
ethay oat_bay, isay illstay etterbay. Oreovermay, asay ifay erceivingpay atay astlay atthay ifay
ehay ouldshay ivegay undiluteday onscientiouscay adviceay otay Ippay, ehay ouldway ebay
eavinglay imhay ootay ideway aay arginmay otay umpjay inay orfay ethay uturefay; Ubbstay uddenlysay
oppeddray allay adviceay, anday oncludedcay ithway aay eremptorypay ommandcay, ick“Stay otay
ethay oatbay, Ippay, oray byay ethay Ordlay, Iay on’tway ickpay ouyay upay ifay ouyay umpjay; indmay
atthay. Eway an’tcay afforday otay oselay aleswhay byay ethay ikeslay ofay ouyay; aay alewhay ouldway
ellsay orfay irtythay imestay atwhay ouyay ouldway, Ippay, inay Alabamaay. Earbay atthay inay
indmay, anday on’tday umpjay anyay ore.”may Erebyhay erhapspay Ubbstay indirectlyay intedhay,
atthay oughthay anmay ovedlay ishay ellowfay, etyay anmay isay aay oney-makingmay animalay,
ichwhay opensitypray ootay oftenay interferesay ithway ishay enevolencebay.

Utbay eway areay allay inay ethay andshay ofay ethay Odsgay; anday Ippay umpedjay againay. Itay asway
underay eryvay imilarsay ircumstancescay otay ethay irstfay erformancepay; utbay isthay
imetay ehay idday otnay eastbray outay ethay inelay; anday encehay, enwhay ethay alewhay artedstay
otay unray, Ippay asway eftlay ehindbay onay ethay easay, ikelay aay urriedhay aveller’stray
unktray. Alasay! Ubbstay asway utbay ootay uetray otay ishay ordway. Itay asway aay eautifulbay,
ounteousbay, ueblay ayday; ethay angledspay easay almcay anday oolcay, anday atlyflay
etchingstray awayay, allay oundray, otay ethay orizonhay, ikelay old-beater’sgay inskay
ammeredhay outay otay ethay extremestay. Obbingbay upay anday ownday inay atthay easay, Ip’spay
ebonay eadhay owedshay ikelay aay eadhay ofay ovesclay. Onay oat-knifebay asway iftedlay enwhay
ehay ellfay osay apidlyray asternay. Ubb’sstay inexorableay ackbay asway urnedtay uponay imhay;
anday ethay alewhay asway ingedway. Inay eethray inutesmay, aay olewhay ilemay ofay orelessshay
oceanay asway etweenbay Ippay anday Ubbstay. Outay omfray ethay entrecay ofay ethay easay, oorpay
Ippay urnedtay ishay ispcray, urlingcay, ackblay eadhay otay ethay unsay, anotheray onelylay
astawaycay, oughthay ethay oftiestlay anday ethay ightestbray.

Ownay, inay almcay eatherway, otay imsway inay ethay openay oceanay isay asay easyay otay ethay
actisedpray immersway asay otay ideray inay aay ing-carriagespray ashoreay. Utbay ethay awfulay
onesomenesslay isay intolerableay. Ethay intenseay oncentrationcay ofay elfsay inay ethay
iddlemay ofay uchsay aay eartlesshay immensityay, myay Odgay! owhay ancay elltay itay? Arkmay,
owhay enwhay ailorssay inay aay eadday almcay athebay inay ethay openay ea—marksay owhay oselyclay
eythay ughay eirthay ipshay anday onlyay oastcay alongay erhay idessay.

Utbay adhay Ubbstay eallyray abandoneday ethay oorpay ittlelay egronay otay ishay atefay? Onay;
ehay idday otnay eanmay otay, atay eastlay. Ecausebay erethay ereway otway oatsbay inay ishay akeway,
anday ehay upposedsay, onay oubtday, atthay eythay ouldway ofay oursecay omecay upay otay Ippay
eryvay uicklyqay, anday ickpay imhay upay; oughthay, indeeday, uchsay onsiderationscay
owardstay oarsmenay eopardizedjay oughthray eirthay ownay imiditytay, isay otnay alwaysay
anifestedmay byay ethay untershay inay allay imilarsay instancesay; anday uchsay instancesay
otnay unfrequentlyay occuray; almostay invariablyay inay ethay isheryfay, aay owardcay, osay
alledcay, isay arkedmay ithway ethay amesay uthlessray etestationday eculiarpay otay
ilitarymay aviesnay anday armiesay.

Utbay itay osay appenedhay, atthay osethay oatsbay, ithoutway eeingsay Ippay, uddenlysay
ingspyay aleswhay oseclay otay emthay onay oneay idesay, urnedtay, anday avegay asechay; anday
Ubb’sstay oatbay asway ownay osay arfay awayay, anday ehay anday allay ishay ewcray osay intentay
uponay ishay ishfay, atthay Ip’spay ingedray orizonhay eganbay otay expanday arounday imhay
iserablymay. Byay ethay erestmay ancechay ethay ipshay itselfay atay astlay escuedray imhay;
utbay omfray atthay ourhay ethay ittlelay egronay entway aboutay ethay eckday anay idiotay; uchsay,
atay eastlay, eythay aidsay ehay asway. Ethay easay adhay eeringlyjay eptkay ishay initefay odybay
upay, utbay owneddray ethay infiniteay ofay ishay oulsay. Otnay owneddray entirelyay, oughthay.
Atherray arriedcay ownday aliveay otay ondrousway epthsday, erewhay angestray apesshay ofay
ethay unwarpeday imalpray orldway idedglay otay anday ofray eforebay ishay assivepay eyesay;
anday ethay iser-mermanmay, Isdomway, evealedray ishay oardedhay eapshay; anday amongay ethay
oyousjay, eartlesshay, ever-juvenileay eternitiesay, Ippay awsay ethay ultitudinousmay,
