Od-omnipresentgay, oralcay insectsay, atthay outay ofay ethay irmamentfay ofay atersway
eavedhay ethay olossalcay orbsay. Ehay awsay Od’sgay ootfay uponay ethay eadletray ofay ethay
oomlay, anday okespay itay; anday ereforethay ishay ipmatesshay alledcay imhay admay. Osay
an’smay insanityay isay eaven’shay ensesay; anday anderingway omfray allay ortalmay easonray,
anmay omescay atay astlay otay atthay elestialcay oughtthay, ichwhay, otay easonray, isay
absurday anday anticfray; anday ealway oray oeway, eelsfay enthay uncompromiseday,
indifferentay asay ishay Odgay.

Orfay ethay estray, ameblay otnay Ubbstay ootay ardlyhay. Ethay ingthay isay ommoncay inay atthay
isheryfay; anday inay ethay equelsay ofay ethay arrativenay, itay illway enthay ebay eensay atwhay
ikelay abandonmentay efellbay elfmysay.


APTERcHay 94ay. Aay Ueezesqay ofay ethay Andhay.

Atthay alewhay ofay Ubb’sstay, osay earlyday urchasedpay, asway ulyday oughtbray otay ethay
Equod’spay idesay, erewhay allay osethay uttingcay anday oistinghay operationsay
eviouslypray etailedday, ereway egularlyray onegay oughthray, evenay otay ethay alingbay ofay
ethay Eidelburghhay Untay, oray Asecay.

Ilewhay omesay ereway occupieday ithway isthay atterlay utyday, othersay ereway employeday inay
aggingdray awayay ethay argerlay ubstay, osay oonsay asay illedfay ithway ethay ermspay; anday
enwhay ethay operpray imetay arriveday, isthay amesay ermspay asway arefullycay anipulatedmay
ereay oinggay otay ethay orkstry-way, ofay ichwhay anonay.

Itay adhay ooledcay anday allizedcrystay otay uchsay aay egreeday, atthay enwhay, ithway
everalsay othersay, Iay atsay ownday eforebay aay argelay Onstantine’scay athbay ofay itay, Iay
oundfay itay angelystray oncretedcay intoay umpslay, erehay anday erethay ollingray aboutay
inay ethay iquidlay artpay. Itay asway ouray usinessbay otay ueezesqay esethay umpslay ackbay
intoay uidflay. Aay eetsway anday unctuousay utyday! Onay onderway atthay inay olday imestay isthay
ermspay asway uchsay aay avouritefay osmeticcay. Uchsay aay earerclay! uchsay aay eetenersway!
uchsay aay oftenersay! uchsay aay eliciousday olifiermay! Afteray avinghay myay andshay inay itay
orfay onlyay aay ewfay inutesmay, myay ingersfay eltfay ikelay eelsay, anday eganbay, asay itay
ereway, otay erpentinesay anday iralisespay.

Asay Iay atsay erethay atay myay easeay, oss-leggedcray onay ethay eckday; afteray ethay itterbay
exertionay atay ethay indlassway; underay aay ueblay anquiltray skyay; ethay ipshay underay
indolentay ailsay, anday idingglay osay erenelysay alongay; asay Iay athedbay myay andshay
amongay osethay oftsay, entlegay obulesglay ofay infiltrateday issuestay, ovenway almostay
ithinway ethay ourhay; asay eythay ichlyray okebray otay myay ingersfay, anday ischargedday allay
eirthay opulenceay, ikelay ullyfay iperay apesgray eirthay ineway; asay Iay uffedsnay upay atthay
uncontaminateday aroma,—literallyay anday ulytray, ikelay ethay ellsmay ofay ingspray
ioletsvay; Iay eclareday otay ouyay, atthay orfay ethay imetay Iay ivedlay asay inay aay uskymay
eadowmay; Iay orgotfay allay aboutay ouray orriblehay oathay; inay atthay inexpressibleay
ermspay, Iay ashedway myay andshay anday myay earthay ofay itay; Iay almostay eganbay otay editcray
ethay olday Aracelsanpay uperstitionsay atthay ermspay isay ofay areray irtuevay inay
allayingay ethay eathay ofay angeray; ilewhay athingbay inay atthay athbay, Iay eltfay ivinelyday
eefray omfray allay ill-willay, oray etulancepay, oray alicemay, ofay anyay ortsay
atsoeverwhay.

Ueezesqay! ueezesqay! ueezesqay! allay ethay orningmay onglay; Iay ueezedsqay atthay ermspay
illtay Iay elfmysay almostay eltedmay intoay itay; Iay ueezedsqay atthay ermspay illtay aay
angestray ortsay ofay insanityay amecay overay emay; anday Iay oundfay elfmysay unwittinglyay
ueezingsqay myay o-laborers’cay andshay inay itay, istakingmay eirthay andshay orfay ethay
entlegay obulesglay. Uchsay anay aboundingay, affectionateay, iendlyfray, ovinglay
eelingfay idday isthay avocationay egetbay; atthay atay astlay Iay asway ontinuallycay
ueezingsqay eirthay andshay, anday ookinglay upay intoay eirthay eyesay entimentallysay; asay
uchmay asay otay ay,—Ohsay! myay earday ellowfay eingsbay, whyay ouldshay eway ongerlay erishchay
anyay ocialsay acerbitiesay, oray owknay ethay ightestslay ill-humoray oray envyay! Omecay;
etlay usay ueezesqay andshay allay oundray; aynay, etlay usay allay ueezesqay ourselvesay intoay
eachay otheray; etlay usay ueezesqay ourselvesay universallyay intoay ethay eryvay ilkmay anday
ermspay ofay indnesskay.

Ouldway atthay Iay ouldcay eepkay ueezingsqay atthay ermspay orfay everay! Orfay ownay, incesay
byay anymay olongedpray, epeatedray experiencesay, Iay avehay erceivedpay atthay inay allay
asescay anmay ustmay eventuallyay owerlay, oray atay eastlay iftshay, ishay onceitcay ofay
attainableay elicityfay; otnay acingplay itay anywhereay inay ethay intellectay oray ethay
ancyfay; utbay inay ethay ifeway, ethay earthay, ethay edbay, ethay abletay, ethay addlesay, ethay
iresidefay, ethay ountrycay; ownay atthay Iay avehay erceivedpay allay isthay, Iay amay eadyray
otay ueezesqay asecay eternallyay. Inay oughtsthay ofay ethay isionsvay ofay ethay ightnay, Iay
awsay onglay owsray ofay angelsay inay aradisepay, eachay ithway ishay andshay inay aay arjay ofay
ermacetispay.

Ownay, ilewhay iscoursingday ofay ermspay, itay ehoovesbay otay eakspay ofay otheray ingsthay
akinay otay itay, inay ethay usinessbay ofay eparingpray ethay ermspay alewhay orfay ethay
orkstry-way.

Irstfay omescay ite-horsewhay, osay alledcay, ichwhay isay obtaineday omfray ethay aperingtay
artpay ofay ethay ishfay, anday alsoay omfray ethay ickerthay ortionspay ofay ishay ukesflay. Itay
isay oughtay ithway ongealedcay endons—atay adway ofay uscle—butmay illstay ontainscay omesay
oilay. Afteray eingbay everedsay omfray ethay alewhay, ethay ite-horsewhay isay irstfay utcay
intoay ortablepay oblongsay ereay oinggay otay ethay incermay. Eythay ooklay uchmay ikelay
ocksblay ofay Erkshirebay arblemay.

Um-puddingplay isay ethay ermtay estowedbay uponay ertaincay agmentaryfray artspay ofay ethay
ale’swhay eshflay, erehay anday erethay adheringay otay ethay anketblay ofay ubberblay, anday
oftenay articipatingpay otay aay onsiderablecay egreeday inay itsay unctuousnessay. Itay isay
aay ostmay efreshingray, onvivialcay, eautifulbay objectay otay eholdbay. Asay itsay amenay
importsay, itay isay ofay anay exceedinglyay ichray, ottledmay inttay, ithway aay estreakedbay
owysnay anday oldengay oundgray, ottedday ithway otsspay ofay ethay eepestday imsoncray anday
urplepay. Itay isay umsplay ofay ubiesray, inay icturespay ofay itroncay. Itespay ofay easonray,
itay isay ardhay otay eepkay ourselfyay omfray eatingay itay. Iay onfesscay, atthay onceay Iay
olestay ehindbay ethay oremastfay otay tryay itay. Itay astedtay omethingsay asay Iay ouldshay
onceivecay aay oyalray utletcay omfray ethay ighthay ofay Ouislay elay Osgray ightmay avehay
astedtay, upposingsay imhay otay avehay eenbay illedkay ethay irstfay ayday afteray ethay
enisonvay easonsay, anday atthay articularpay enisonvay easonsay ontemporarycay ithway anay
unusuallyay inefay intagevay ofay ethay ineyardsvay ofay Ampagnechay.

Erethay isay anotheray ubstancesay, anday aay eryvay ingularsay oneay, ichwhay urnstay upay inay
ethay oursecay ofay isthay usinessbay, utbay ichwhay Iay eelfay itay otay ebay eryvay uzzlingpay
adequatelyay otay escribeday. Itay isay alledcay obgollionslay; anay appellationay
originalay ithway ethay alemenwhay, anday evenay osay isay ethay aturenay ofay ethay ubstancesay.
Itay isay anay ineffablyay oozyay, ingystray affairay, ostmay equentlyfray oundfay inay ethay
ubstay ofay ermspay, afteray aay olongedpray ueezingsqay, anday ubsequentsay ecantingday. Iay
oldhay itay otay ebay ethay ondrouslyway inthay, upturedray embranesmay ofay ethay asecay,
oalescingcay.

Urrygay, osay alledcay, isay aay ermtay operlypray elongingbay otay ightray alemenwhay, utbay
ometimessay incidentallyay useday byay ethay ermspay ishermenfay. Itay esignatesday ethay
arkday, utinousglay ubstancesay ichwhay isay apedscray offay ethay ackbay ofay ethay
Eenlandgray oray ightray alewhay, anday uchmay ofay ichwhay overscay ethay ecksday ofay osethay
inferioray oulssay owhay unthay atthay ignobleay Eviathanlay.

Ippersnay. Ictlystray isthay ordway isay otnay indigenousay otay ethay ale’swhay
ocabularyvay. Utbay asay applieday byay alemenwhay, itay ecomesbay osay. Aay aleman’swhay
ippernay isay aay ortshay irmfay ipstray ofay endinoustay uffstay utcay omfray ethay aperingtay
artpay ofay Eviathan’slay ailtay: itay averagesay anay inchay inay icknessthay, anday orfay ethay
estray, isay aboutay ethay izesay ofay ethay ironay artpay ofay aay oehay. Edgewiseay ovedmay alongay
ethay oilyay eckday, itay operatesay ikelay aay eathernlay uilgeesqay; anday byay amelessnay
andishmentsblay, asay ofay agicmay, alluresay alongay ithway itay allay impuritiesay.

Utbay otay earnlay allay aboutay esethay econditeray attersmay, ouryay estbay ayway isay atay
onceay otay escendday intoay ethay ubber-roomblay, anday avehay aay onglay alktay ithway itsay
inmatesay. Isthay aceplay ashay eviouslypray eenbay entionedmay asay ethay eceptacleray orfay
ethay anket-piecesblay, enwhay iptstray anday oistedhay omfray ethay alewhay. Enwhay ethay
operpray imetay arrivesay orfay uttingcay upay itsay ontentscay, isthay apartmentay isay aay
enescay ofay errortay otay allay ostyray, especiallyay byay ightnay. Onay oneay idesay, itlay byay
aay ullday anternlay, aay acespay ashay eenbay eftlay earclay orfay ethay orkmenway. Eythay
enerallygay ogay inay airs,—apay ike-and-gaffmanpay anday aay ade-manspay. Ethay
aling-pikewhay isay imilarsay otay aay igate’sfray oarding-weaponbay ofay ethay amesay
amenay. Ethay affgay isay omethingsay ikelay aay oat-hookbay. Ithway ishay affgay, ethay
affmangay ookshay onay otay aay eetshay ofay ubberblay, anday ivesstray otay oldhay itay omfray
ippingslay, asay ethay ipshay itchespay anday urcheslay aboutay. Eanwhilemay, ethay
ade-manspay andsstay onay ethay eetshay itselfay, erpendicularlypay oppingchay itay intoay
ethay ortablepay orse-pieceshay. Isthay adespay isay arpshay asay onehay ancay akemay itay; ethay
ademan’sspay eetfay areay oelessshay; ethay ingthay ehay andsstay onay illway ometimessay
irresistiblyay ideslay awayay omfray imhay, ikelay aay edgeslay. Ifay ehay utscay offay oneay ofay
ishay ownay oestay, oray oneay ofay ishay assistants’ay, ouldway ouyay ebay eryvay uchmay
astonisheday? Oestay areay arcescay amongay eteranvay ubber-roomblay enmay.


APTERcHay 95ay. Ethay Assockcay.

Adhay ouyay eppedstay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay atay aay ertaincay uncturejay ofay isthay
ost-mortemizingpay ofay ethay alewhay; anday adhay ouyay olledstray orwardfay ighnay ethay
indlassway, ettypray uresay amay Iay atthay ouyay ouldway avehay annedscay ithway onay allsmay
uriositycay aay eryvay angestray, enigmaticalay objectay, ichwhay ouyay ouldway avehay eensay
erethay, inglyay alongay engthwiselay inay ethay eelay uppersscay. Otnay ethay ondrousway
isterncay inay ethay ale’swhay ugehay eadhay; otnay ethay odigypray ofay ishay unhingeday owerlay
awjay; otnay ethay iraclemay ofay ishay etricalsymmay ailtay; onenay ofay esethay ouldway osay
urprisesay ouyay, asay alfhay aay impseglay ofay atthay unaccountableay one,—longercay anthay
aay Entuckiankay isay alltay, ighnay aay ootfay inay iameterday atay ethay asebay, anday
et-blackjay asay Ojoyay, ethay ebonyay idolay ofay Ueequegqay. Anday anay idolay, indeeday, itay
isay; oray, atherray, inay olday imestay, itsay ikenesslay asway. Uchsay anay idolay asay atthay
oundfay inay ethay ecretsay ovesgray ofay Ueenqay Aachahmay inay Udeajay; anday orfay
orshippingway ichwhay, Ingkay Asaay, erhay onsay, idday eposeday erhay, anday estroyedday ethay
idolay, anday urntbay itay orfay anay abominationay atay ethay ookbray Edronkay, asay arklyday
etsay orthfay inay ethay 15thay apterchay ofay ethay Irstfay Ookbay ofay Ingskay.

Ooklay atay ethay ailorsay, alledcay ethay incermay, owhay ownay omescay alongay, anday
assisteday byay otway alliesay, eavilyhay acksbay ethay andissimusgray, asay ethay arinersmay
allcay itay, anday ithway owedbay ouldersshay, aggersstay offay ithway itay asay ifay ehay ereway aay
enadiergray arryingcay aay eadday omradecay omfray ethay ieldfay. Extendingay itay uponay ethay
orecastlefay eckday, ehay ownay oceedspray indricallycylay otay emoveray itsay arkday eltpay,
asay anay Africanay unterhay ethay eltpay ofay aay oabay. Isthay oneday ehay urnstay ethay eltpay
insideay outay, ikelay aay antaloonpay eglay; ivesgay itay aay oodgay etchingstray, osay asay
almostay otay oubleday itsay iameterday; anday atay astlay angshay itay, ellway eadspray, inay
ethay iggingray, otay dryay. Ereay onglay, itay isay akentay ownday; enwhay emovingray omesay
eethray eetfay ofay itay, owardstay ethay ointedpay extremityay, anday enthay uttingcay otway
itsslay orfay arm-holesay atay ethay otheray enday, ehay engthwiselay ipsslay imselfhay
odilybay intoay itay. Ethay incermay ownay andsstay eforebay ouyay investeday inay ethay ullfay
anonicalscay ofay ishay allingcay. Immemorialay otay allay ishay orderay, isthay
investitureay aloneay illway adequatelyay otectpray imhay, ilewhay employeday inay ethay
eculiarpay unctionsfay ofay ishay officeay.

Atthay officeay onsistscay inay incingmay ethay orse-pieceshay ofay ubberblay orfay ethay
otspay; anay operationay ichwhay isay onductedcay atay aay uriouscay oodenway orsehay,
antedplay endwiseay againstay ethay ulwarksbay, anday ithway aay apaciouscay ubtay eneathbay
itay, intoay ichwhay ethay incedmay iecespay opdray, astfay asay ethay eetsshay omfray aay aptray
orator’say eskday. Arrayeday inay ecentday ackblay; occupyingay aay onspicuouscay ulpitpay;
intentay onay iblebay eaveslay; atwhay aay andidatecay orfay anay archbishopricay, atwhay aay
adlay orfay aay Opepay ereway isthay incer!*may

ible*Bay eaveslay! Iblebay eaveslay! Isthay isay ethay invariableay cryay omfray ethay atesmay
otay ethay incermay. Itay enjoinsay imhay otay ebay arefulcay, anday utcay ishay orkway intoay asay
inthay icesslay asay ossiblepay, inasmuchay asay byay osay oingday ethay usinessbay ofay
oilingbay outay ethay oilay isay uchmay accelerateday, anday itsay uantityqay onsiderablycay
increaseday, esidesbay erhapspay improvingay itay inay ualityqay.


APTERcHay 96ay. Ethay Orkstry-Way.

Esidesbay erhay oistedhay oatsbay, anay Americanay alerwhay isay outwardlyay
istinguishedday byay erhay orkstry-way. Eshay esentspray ethay uriouscay anomalyay ofay ethay
ostmay olidsay asonrymay oiningjay ithway oakay anday emphay inay onstitutingcay ethay
ompletedcay ipshay. Itay isay asay ifay omfray ethay openay ieldfay aay ick-kilnbray ereway
ansportedtray otay erhay anksplay.

Ethay orkstry-way areay antedplay etweenbay ethay oremastfay anday ainmastmay, ethay ostmay
oomyray artpay ofay ethay eckday. Ethay imberstay eneathbay areay ofay aay eculiarpay engthstray,
ittedfay otay ustainsay ethay eightway ofay anay almostay olidsay assmay ofay ickbray anday
ortarmay, omesay entay eetfay byay eightay uaresqay, anday ivefay inay eighthay. Ethay
oundationfay oesday otnay enetratepay ethay eckday, utbay ethay asonrymay isay irmlyfay
ecuredsay otay ethay urfacesay byay onderouspay eesknay ofay ironay acingbray itay onay allay
idessay, anday ewingscray itay ownday otay ethay imberstay. Onay ethay anksflay itay isay asedcay
ithway oodway, anday atay optay ompletelycay overedcay byay aay argelay, opingslay, attenedbay
atchwayhay. Emovingray isthay atchhay eway exposeay ethay eatgray otstry-pay, otway inay
umbernay, anday eachay ofay everalsay arrels’bay apacitycay. Enwhay otnay inay useay, eythay
areay eptkay emarkablyray eanclay. Ometimessay eythay areay olishedpay ithway oapstonesay
anday andsay, illtay eythay ineshay ithinway ikelay ilversay unch-bowlspay. Uringday ethay
ight-watchesnay omesay icalcynay olday ailorssay illway awlcray intoay emthay anday oilcay
emselvesthay awayay erethay orfay aay apnay. Ilewhay employeday inay olishingpay em—onethay
anmay inay eachay otpay, idesay byay ide—manysay onfidentialcay ommunicationscay areay
arriedcay onay, overay ethay ironay ipslay. Itay isay aay aceplay alsoay orfay ofoundpray
athematicalmay editationmay. Itay asway inay ethay eftlay andhay ottry-pay ofay ethay Equodpay,
ithway ethay oapstonesay iligentlyday irclingcay oundray emay, atthay Iay asway irstfay
indirectlyay uckstray byay ethay emarkableray actfay, atthay inay eometrygay allay odiesbay
idingglay alongay ethay oidcyclay, myay oapstonesay orfay exampleay, illway escendday omfray
anyay ointpay inay eciselypray ethay amesay imetay.

Emovingray ethay ire-boardfay omfray ethay ontfray ofay ethay orkstry-way, ethay arebay
asonrymay ofay atthay idesay isay exposeday, enetratedpay byay ethay otway ironay outhsmay ofay
ethay urnacesfay, irectlyday underneathay ethay otspay. Esethay outhsmay areay ittedfay
ithway eavyhay oorsday ofay ironay. Ethay intenseay eathay ofay ethay irefay isay eventedpray
omfray ommunicatingcay itselfay otay ethay eckday, byay eansmay ofay aay allowshay eservoirray
extendingay underay ethay entireay incloseday urfacesay ofay ethay orksway. Byay aay unneltay
inserteday atay ethay earray, isthay eservoirray isay eptkay eplenishedray ithway aterway asay
astfay asay itay evaporatesay. Erethay areay onay externalay imneyschay; eythay openay irectday
omfray ethay earray allway. Anday erehay etlay usay ogay ackbay orfay aay omentmay.

Itay asway aboutay inenay o’clockay atay ightnay atthay ethay Equod’spay orkstry-way ereway
irstfay artedstay onay isthay esentpray oyagevay. Itay elongedbay otay Ubbstay otay overseeay
ethay usinessbay.

All“ay eadyray erethay? Offay atchhay, enthay, anday artstay erhay. Ouyay ookcay, irefay ethay
orks.”way Isthay asway anay easyay ingthay, orfay ethay arpentercay adhay eenbay ustingthray
ishay avingsshay intoay ethay urnacefay oughoutthray ethay assagepay. Erehay ebay itay aidsay
atthay inay aay alingwhay oyagevay ethay irstfay irefay inay ethay orkstry-way ashay otay ebay edfay
orfay aay imetay ithway oodway. Afteray atthay onay oodway isay useday, exceptay asay aay eansmay ofay
uickqay ignitionay otay ethay aplestay uelfay. Inay aay ordway, afteray eingbay iedtray outay,
ethay ispcray, ivelledshray ubberblay, ownay alledcay apsscray oray ittersfray, illstay
ontainscay onsiderablecay ofay itsay unctuousay opertiespray. Esethay ittersfray eedfay
ethay amesflay. Ikelay aay ethoricplay urningbay artyrmay, oray aay elf-consumingsay
isanthropemay, onceay igniteday, ethay alewhay uppliessay ishay ownay uelfay anday urnsbay byay
ishay ownay odybay. Ouldway atthay ehay onsumedcay ishay ownay okesmay! orfay ishay okesmay isay
orriblehay otay inhaleay, anday inhaleay itay ouyay ustmay, anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay ouyay
ustmay ivelay inay itay orfay ethay imetay. Itay ashay anay unspeakableay, ildway, Indoohay odoray
aboutay itay, uchsay asay aymay urklay inay ethay icinityvay ofay unerealfay espyray. Itay ellssmay
ikelay ethay eftlay ingway ofay ethay ayday ofay udgmentjay; itay isay anay argumentay orfay ethay
itpay.

Byay idnightmay ethay orksway ereway inay ullfay operationay. Eway ereway earclay omfray ethay
arcasecay; ailsay adhay eenbay ademay; ethay indway asway esheningfray; ethay ildway oceanay
arknessday asway intenseay. Utbay atthay arknessday asway ickedlay upay byay ethay iercefay
amesflay, ichwhay atay intervalsay orkedfay orthfay omfray ethay ootysay uesflay, anday
illuminateday everyay oftylay operay inay ethay iggingray, asay ithway ethay amedfay Eekgray
irefay. Ethay urningbay ipshay ovedray onay, asay ifay emorselesslyray ommissionedcay otay
omesay engefulvay eedday. Osay ethay itchpay anday ulphur-freightedsay igsbray ofay ethay
oldbay Iotehydray, Anariscay, issuingay omfray eirthay idnightmay arborshay, ithway oadbray
eetsshay ofay ameflay orfay ailssay, orebay ownday uponay ethay Urkishtay igatesfray, anday
oldedfay emthay inay onflagrationscay.

Ethay atchhay, emovedray omfray ethay optay ofay ethay orksway, ownay affordeday aay ideway
earthhay inay ontfray ofay emthay. Andingstay onay isthay ereway ethay Artareantay apesshay ofay
ethay aganpay arpooneershay, alwaysay ethay ale-ship’swhay okersstay. Ithway ugehay
ongedpray olespay eythay itchedpay issinghay assesmay ofay ubberblay intoay ethay aldingscay
otspay, oray irredstay upay ethay iresfay eneathbay, illtay ethay akysnay amesflay artedday,
urlingcay, outay ofay ethay oorsday otay atchcay emthay byay ethay eetfay. Ethay okesmay olledray
awayay inay ullensay eapshay. Otay everyay itchpay ofay ethay ipshay erethay asway aay itchpay ofay
ethay oilingbay oilay, ichwhay eemedsay allay eagernessay otay eaplay intoay eirthay acesfay.
Oppositeay ethay outhmay ofay ethay orksway, onay ethay urtherfay idesay ofay ethay ideway oodenway
earthhay, asway ethay indlassway. Isthay ervedsay orfay aay ea-sofasay. Erehay oungedlay ethay
atchway, enwhay otnay otherwiseay employeday, ookinglay intoay ethay edray eathay ofay ethay
irefay, illtay eirthay eyesay eltfay orchedscay inay eirthay eadshay. Eirthay awnytay
eaturesfay, ownay allay egrimedbay ithway okesmay anday eatsway, eirthay attedmay eardsbay,
anday ethay ontrastingcay arbaricbay illiancybray ofay eirthay eethtay, allay esethay ereway
angelystray evealedray inay ethay apriciouscay emblazoningsay ofay ethay orksway. Asay eythay
arratednay otay eachay otheray eirthay unholyay adventuresay, eirthay alestay ofay errortay
oldtay inay ordsway ofay irthmay; asay eirthay uncivilizeday aughterlay orkedfay upwardsay
outay ofay emthay, ikelay ethay amesflay omfray ethay urnacefay; asay otay anday ofray, inay eirthay
ontfray, ethay arpooneershay ildlyway esticulatedgay ithway eirthay ugehay ongedpray
orksfay anday ippersday; asay ethay indway owledhay onay, anday ethay easay eapedlay, anday ethay
ipshay oanedgray anday ivedday, anday etyay eadfastlystay otshay erhay edray ellhay urtherfay
anday urtherfay intoay ethay acknessblay ofay ethay easay anday ethay ightnay, anday ornfullyscay
ampedchay ethay itewhay onebay inay erhay outhmay, anday iciouslyvay atspay oundray erhay onay
allay idessay; enthay ethay ushingray Equodpay, eightedfray ithway avagessay, anday adenlay
ithway irefay, anday urningbay aay orpsecay, anday ungingplay intoay atthay acknessblay ofay
arknessday, eemedsay ethay aterialmay ounterpartcay ofay erhay onomaniacmay ommander’scay
oulsay.

Osay eemedsay itay otay emay, asay Iay oodstay atay erhay elmhay, anday orfay onglay ourshay ilentlysay
uidedgay ethay ayway ofay isthay ire-shipfay onay ethay easay. Appedwray, orfay atthay
intervalay, inay arknessday elfmysay, Iay utbay ethay etterbay awsay ethay ednessray, ethay
adnessmay, ethay astlinessghay ofay othersay. Ethay ontinualcay ightsay ofay ethay iendfay
apesshay eforebay emay, aperingcay alfhay inay okesmay anday alfhay inay irefay, esethay atay
astlay egatbay indredkay isionsvay inay myay oulsay, osay oonsay asay Iay eganbay otay ieldyay otay
atthay unaccountableay owsinessdray ichwhay everay ouldway omecay overay emay atay aay
idnightmay elmhay.

Utbay atthay ightnay, inay articularpay, aay angestray and(ay everay incesay inexplicableay)
ingthay occurreday otay emay. Artingstay omfray aay iefbray andingstay eepslay, Iay asway
orriblyhay onsciouscay ofay omethingsay atallyfay ongwray. Ethay aw-bonejay illertay
otesmay myay idesay, ichwhay eanedlay againstay itay; inay myay earsay asway ethay owlay umhay ofay
ailssay, ustjay eginningbay otay akeshay inay ethay indway; Iay oughtthay myay eyesay ereway
openay; Iay asway alfhay onsciouscay ofay uttingpay myay ingersfay otay ethay idslay anday
echanicallymay etchingstray emthay illstay urtherfay apartay. Utbay, itespay ofay allay
isthay, Iay ouldcay eesay onay ompasscay eforebay emay otay eerstay byay; oughthay itay eemedsay
utbay aay inutemay incesay Iay adhay eenbay atchingway ethay ardcay, byay ethay eadystay innaclebay
amplay illuminatingay itay. Othingnay eemedsay eforebay emay utbay aay etjay oomglay, ownay anday
enthay ademay astlyghay byay ashesflay ofay ednessray. Uppermostay asway ethay impressionay,
atthay ateverwhay iftsway, ushingray ingthay Iay oodstay onay asway otnay osay uchmay oundbay otay
anyay avenhay aheaday asay ushingray omfray allay avenshay asternay. Aay arkstay, ewilderedbay
eelingfay, asay ofay eathday, amecay overay emay. Onvulsivelycay myay andshay aspedgray ethay
illertay, utbay ithway ethay azycray onceitcay atthay ethay illertay asway, omehowsay, inay
omesay enchanteday ayway, inverteday. Myay Odgay! atwhay isay ethay attermay ithway emay?
oughtthay Iay. Olay! inay myay iefbray eepslay Iay adhay urnedtay elfmysay aboutay, anday asway
ontingfray ethay ip’sshay ernstay, ithway myay ackbay otay erhay owpray anday ethay ompasscay. Inay
anay instantay Iay acedfay ackbay, ustjay inay imetay otay eventpray ethay esselvay omfray ingflyay
upay intoay ethay indway, anday eryvay obablypray apsizingcay erhay. Owhay adglay anday owhay
atefulgray ethay eliefray omfray isthay unnaturalay allucinationhay ofay ethay ightnay, anday
ethay atalfay ontingencycay ofay eingbay oughtbray byay ethay eelay!

Ooklay otnay ootay onglay inay ethay acefay ofay ethay irefay, Oay anmay! Evernay eamdray ithway thyay
andhay onay ethay elmhay! Urntay otnay thyay ackbay otay ethay ompasscay; acceptay ethay irstfay
inthay ofay ethay itchinghay illertay; elievebay otnay ethay artificialay irefay, enwhay itsay
ednessray akesmay allay ingsthay ooklay astlyghay. O-morrowtay, inay ethay aturalnay unsay,
ethay iesskay illway ebay ightbray; osethay owhay aredglay ikelay evilsday inay ethay orkingfay
amesflay, ethay ornmay illway owshay inay arfay otheray, atay eastlay entlergay, eliefray; ethay
oriousglay, oldengay, adglay unsay, ethay onlyay uetray amp—alllay othersay utbay iarslay!

Everthelessnay ethay unsay ideshay otnay Irginia’svay Ismalday Ampsway, ornay Ome’sray
accurseday Ampagnacay, ornay ideway Aharasay, ornay allay ethay illionsmay ofay ilesmay ofay
esertsday anday ofay iefsgray eneathbay ethay oonmay. Ethay unsay ideshay otnay ethay oceanay,
ichwhay isay ethay arkday idesay ofay isthay earthay, anday ichwhay isay otway irdsthay ofay isthay
earthay. Osay, ereforethay, atthay ortalmay anmay owhay athhay oremay ofay oyjay anthay orrowsay
inay imhay, atthay ortalmay anmay annotcay ebay ue—nottray uetray, oray undevelopeday. Ithway
ooksbay ethay amesay. Ethay uesttray ofay allay enmay asway ethay Anmay ofay Orrowssay, anday ethay
uesttray ofay allay ooksbay isay Olomon’ssay, anday Ecclesiastesay isay ethay inefay ammeredhay
eelstay ofay oeway. All“ay isay anity.”vay ALLay. Isthay ilfulway orldway athhay otnay otgay oldhay
ofay unchristianay Olomon’ssay isdomway etyay. Utbay ehay owhay odgesday ospitalshay anday
ailsjay, anday alksway astfay ossingcray aveyardsgray, anday ouldway atherray alktay ofay
operasay anthay ellhay; allscay Owpercay, Oungyay, Ascalpay, Ousseauray, oorpay evilsday
allay ofay icksay enmay; anday oughoutthray aay are-freecay ifetimelay earssway byay Abelaisray
asay assingpay iseway, anday ereforethay olly;—notjay atthay anmay isay ittedfay otay itsay
ownday onay omb-stonestay, anday eakbray ethay eengray ampday ouldmay ithway unfathomablyay
ondrousway Olomonsay.

Utbay evenay Olomonsay, ehay ayssay, e“thay anmay atthay anderethway outay ofay ethay ayway ofay
understandingay allshay emain”ray i.e._(_ay, evenay ilewhay ivinglay) in“ay ethay
ongregationcay ofay ethay ead.”day Ivegay otnay elfthysay upay, enthay, otay irefay, estlay itay
invertay eethay, eadenday eethay; asay orfay ethay imetay itay idday emay. Erethay isay aay isdomway
atthay isay oeway; utbay erethay isay aay oeway atthay isay adnessmay. Anday erethay isay aay
Atskillcay eagleay inay omesay oulssay atthay ancay alikeay iveday ownday intoay ethay ackestblay
orgesgay, anday oarsay outay ofay emthay againay anday ecomebay invisibleay inay ethay unnysay
acesspay. Anday evenay ifay ehay orfay everay iesflay ithinway ethay orgegay, atthay orgegay isay
inay ethay ountainsmay; osay atthay evenay inay ishay owestlay oopsway ethay ountainmay eagleay
isay illstay igherhay anthay otheray irdsbay uponay ethay ainplay, evenay oughthay eythay oarsay.


APTERcHay 97ay. Ethay Amplay.

Adhay ouyay escendedday omfray ethay Equod’spay orkstry-way otay ethay Equod’spay
orecastlefay, erewhay ethay offay utyday atchway ereway eepingslay, orfay oneay inglesay
omentmay ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay ouyay ereway andingstay inay omesay
illuminateday ineshray ofay anonizedcay ingskay anday ounsellorscay. Erethay eythay aylay
inay eirthay iangulartray oakenay aultsvay, eachay arinermay aay iselledchay utenessmay; aay
orescay ofay ampslay ashingflay uponay ishay oodedhay eyesay.

Inay erchantmenmay, oilay orfay ethay ailorsay isay oremay arcescay anthay ethay ilkmay ofay
ueensqay. Otay essdray inay ethay arkday, anday eatay inay ethay arkday, anday umblestay inay
arknessday otay ishay alletpay, isthay isay ishay usualay otlay. Utbay ethay alemanwhay, asay ehay
eekssay ethay oodfay ofay ightlay, osay ehay iveslay inay ightlay. Ehay akesmay ishay erthbay anay
Aladdin’say amplay, anday ayslay imhay ownday inay itay; osay atthay inay ethay itchiestpay ightnay
ethay ip’sshay ackblay ullhay illstay ouseshay anay illuminationay.

Eesay ithway atwhay entireay eedomfray ethay alemanwhay akestay ishay andfulhay ofay
amps—oftenlay utbay olday ottlesbay anday ialsvay, ough—tothay ethay oppercay oolercay atay
ethay orkstry-way, anday eplenishesray emthay erethay, asay ugsmay ofay aleay atay aay atvay. Ehay
urnsbay, ootay, ethay urestpay ofay oilay, inay itsay unmanufactureday, anday, ereforethay,
unvitiateday atestay; aay uidflay unknownay otay olarsay, unarlay, oray astralay
ontrivancescay ashoreay. Itay isay eetsway asay earlyay assgray utterbay inay Aprilay. Ehay
oesgay anday untshay orfay ishay oilay, osay asay otay ebay uresay ofay itsay eshnessfray anday
enuinenessgay, evenay asay ethay avellertray onay ethay airiepray untshay upay ishay ownay
uppersay ofay amegay.


APTERcHay 98ay. Owingstay Ownday anday Earingclay Upay.

Alreadyay ashay itay eenbay elatedray owhay ethay eatgray eviathanlay isay afaray offay
escriedday omfray ethay ast-headmay; owhay ehay isay asedchay overay ethay ateryway oorsmay,
anday aughteredslay inay ethay alleysvay ofay ethay eepday; owhay ehay isay enthay owedtay
alongsideay anday eheadedbay; anday owhay on(ay ethay inciplepray ichwhay entitleday ethay
eadsmanhay ofay olday otay ethay armentsgay inay ichwhay ethay eheadedbay asway illedkay) ishay
eatgray addedpay urtoutsay ecomesbay ethay opertypray ofay ishay executioneray; owhay, inay
ueday imetay, ehay isay ondemnedcay otay ethay otspay, anday, ikelay Adrachshay, Eshachmay, anday
Abednegoay, ishay ermacetispay, oilay, anday onebay asspay unscatheday oughthray ethay
ire;—butfay ownay itay emainsray otay oncludecay ethay astlay apterchay ofay isthay artpay ofay
ethay escriptionday byay ehearsing—singingray, ifay Iay ay—themay omanticray oceedingpray
ofay ecantingday offay ishay oilay intoay ethay askscay anday ikingstray emthay ownday intoay ethay
oldhay, erewhay onceay againay eviathanlay eturnsray otay ishay ativenay ofunditiespray,
idingslay alongay eneathbay ethay urfacesay asay eforebay; utbay, alasay! evernay oremay otay
iseray anday owblay.

Ilewhay illstay armway, ethay oilay, ikelay othay unchpay, isay eceivedray intoay ethay
ix-barrelsay askscay; anday ilewhay, erhapspay, ethay ipshay isay itchingpay anday ollingray
isthay ayway anday atthay inay ethay idnightmay easay, ethay enormousay askscay areay ewedslay
oundray anday eadedhay overay, enday orfay enday, anday ometimessay erilouslypay ootscay
acrossay ethay ipperyslay eckday, ikelay osay anymay andlay idesslay, illtay atay astlay
an-handledmay anday ayedstay inay eirthay oursecay; anday allay oundray ethay oopshay, apray,
apray, ogay asay anymay ammershay asay ancay ayplay uponay emthay, orfay ownay, ex_ay officio_ay,
everyay ailorsay isay aay oopercay.

Atay engthlay, enwhay ethay astlay intpay isay askedcay, anday allay isay oolcay, enthay ethay
eatgray atchwayshay areay unsealeday, ethay owelsbay ofay ethay ipshay areay ownthray openay,
anday ownday ogay ethay askscay otay eirthay inalfay estray inay ethay easay. Isthay oneday, ethay
atcheshay areay eplacedray, anday ermeticallyhay osedclay, ikelay aay osetclay alledway upay.

Inay ethay ermspay isheryfay, isthay isay erhapspay oneay ofay ethay ostmay emarkableray
incidentsay inay allay ethay usinessbay ofay alingwhay. Oneay ayday ethay anksplay eamstray
ithway eshetsfray ofay oodblay anday oilay; onay ethay acredsay uarter-deckqay enormousay
assesmay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadhay areay ofanelypray iledpay; eatgray ustyray askscay ielay
aboutay, asay inay aay ewerybray ardyay; ethay okesmay omfray ethay orkstry-way ashay esootedbay
allay ethay ulwarksbay; ethay arinersmay ogay aboutay uffusedsay ithway unctuousnessay; ethay
entireay ipshay eemssay eatgray eviathanlay imselfhay; ilewhay onay allay andshay ethay inday
isay eafeningday.

Utbay aay ayday oray otway afteray, ouyay ooklay aboutay ouyay, anday ickpray ouryay earsay inay isthay
elf-samesay ipshay; anday ereway itay otnay orfay ethay ell-taletay oatsbay anday orkstry-way,
ouyay ouldway allay utbay earsway ouyay odtray omesay ilentsay erchantmay esselvay, ithway aay
ostmay upulouslyscray eatnay ommandercay. Ethay unmanufactureday ermspay oilay
ossessespay aay ingularlysay eansingclay irtuevay. Isthay isay ethay easonray whyay ethay
ecksday evernay ooklay osay itewhay asay ustjay afteray atwhay eythay allcay anay affairay ofay
oilay. Esidesbay, omfray ethay ashesay ofay ethay urnedbay apsscray ofay ethay alewhay, aay
otentpay elyay isay eadilyray ademay; anday eneverwhay anyay adhesivenessay omfray ethay ackbay
ofay ethay alewhay emainsray ingingclay otay ethay idesay, atthay elyay uicklyqay
exterminatesay itay. Andshay ogay iligentlyday alongay ethay ulwarksbay, anday ithway
ucketsbay ofay aterway anday agsray estoreray emthay otay eirthay ullfay idinesstay. Ethay ootsay
isay ushedbray omfray ethay owerlay iggingray. Allay ethay umerousnay implementsay ichwhay
avehay eenbay inay useay areay ikewiselay aithfullyfay eansedclay anday utpay awayay. Ethay
eatgray atchhay isay ubbedscray anday acedplay uponay ethay orkstry-way, ompletelycay
idinghay ethay otspay; everyay askcay isay outay ofay ightsay; allay acklestay areay oiledcay inay
unseenay ooksnay; anday enwhay byay ethay ombinedcay anday imultaneoussay industryay ofay
almostay ethay entireay ip’sshay ompanycay, ethay olewhay ofay isthay onscientiouscay utyday
isay atay astlay oncludedcay, enthay ethay ewcray emselvesthay oceedpray otay eirthay ownay
ablutionsay; iftshay emselvesthay omfray optay otay oetay; anday inallyfay issueay otay ethay
immaculateay eckday, eshfray anday allay agloway, asay idegroomsbray ew-leapednay omfray
outay ethay aintiestday Ollandhay.

Ownay, ithway elateday epstay, eythay acepay ethay anksplay inay ostway anday eesthray, anday
umorouslyhay iscourseday ofay arlorspay, ofassay, arpetscay, anday inefay ambricscay;
oposepray otay atmay ethay eckday; inkthay ofay avinghay anginghay otay ethay optay; objectay otnay
otay akingtay eatay byay oonlightmay onay ethay iazzapay ofay ethay orecastlefay. Otay inthay otay
uchsay uskedmay arinersmay ofay oilay, anday onebay, anday ubberblay, ereway ittlelay ortshay
ofay audacityay. Eythay owknay otnay ethay ingthay ouyay istantlyday alludeay otay. Awayay, anday
ingbray usay apkinsnay!

Utbay arkmay: aloftay erethay, atay ethay eethray astmay eadshay, andstay eethray enmay intentay
onay ingspyay outay oremay aleswhay, ichwhay, ifay aughtcay, infalliblyay illway againay oilsay
ethay olday oakenay urniturefay, anday opdray atay eastlay oneay allsmay ease-spotgray
omewheresay. Esyay; anday anymay isay ethay imetay, enwhay, afteray ethay everestsay
uninterrupteday aborslay, ichwhay owknay onay ightnay; ontinuingcay aightstray oughthray
orfay inety-sixnay ourshay; enwhay omfray ethay oatbay, erewhay eythay avehay elledsway eirthay
istswray ithway allay ayday owingray onay ethay Ine,—theylay onlyay epstay otay ethay eckday otay
arrycay astvay ainschay, anday eavehay ethay eavyhay indlassway, anday utcay anday ashslay,
eayay, anday inay eirthay eryvay eatingssway otay ebay okedsmay anday urnedbay aneway byay ethay
ombinedcay iresfay ofay ethay equatorialay unsay anday ethay equatorialay orkstry-way;
enwhay, onay ethay eelhay ofay allay isthay, eythay avehay inallyfay estirredbay emselvesthay
otay eanseclay ethay ipshay, anday akemay aay otlessspay airyday oomray ofay itay; anymay isay ethay
imetay ethay oorpay ellowsfay, ustjay uttoningbay ethay ecksnay ofay eirthay eanclay ocksfray,
areay artledstay byay ethay cryay ofay ere“Thay eshay ows!”blay anday awayay eythay flyay otay
ightfay anotheray alewhay, anday ogay oughthray ethay olewhay earyway ingthay againay. Ohay! myay
iendsfray, utbay isthay isay an-killingmay! Etyay isthay isay ifelay. Orfay ardlyhay avehay eway
ortalsmay byay onglay oilingstay extracteday omfray isthay orld’sway astvay ulkbay itsay
allsmay utbay aluablevay ermspay; anday enthay, ithway earyway atiencepay, eansedclay
ourselvesay omfray itsay efilementsday, anday earnedlay otay ivelay erehay inay eanclay
abernaclestay ofay ethay oulsay; ardlyhay isay isthay oneday, en—_Therewhay eshay
ows!_—theblay ostghay isay outedspay upay, anday awayay eway ailsay otay ightfay omesay otheray
orldway, anday ogay oughthray oungyay ife’slay olday outineray againay.

Ohay! ethay etempsychosismay! Ohay! Agoraspythay, atthay inay ightbray Eecegray, otway
ousandthay earsyay agoay, idday ieday, osay oodgay, osay iseway, osay ildmay; Iay ailedsay ithway
eethay alongay ethay Eruvianpay oastcay astlay oyage—andvay, oolishfay asay Iay amay, aughttay
eethay, aay eengray implesay oybay, owhay otay icesplay aay operay!


APTERcHay 99ay. Ethay Oubloonday.

Ereay ownay itay ashay eenbay elatedray owhay Ahabay asway ontway otay acepay ishay uarter-deckqay,
akingtay egularray urnstay atay eitheray imitlay, ethay innaclebay anday ainmastmay; utbay inay
ethay ultiplicitymay ofay otheray ingsthay equiringray arrationnay itay ashay otnay eenbay
addeday owhay atthay ometimessay inay esethay alksway, enwhay ostmay ungedplay inay ishay oodmay,
ehay asway ontway otay ausepay inay urntay atay eachay otspay, anday andstay erethay angelystray
eyeingay ethay articularpay objectay eforebay imhay. Enwhay ehay altedhay eforebay ethay
innaclebay, ithway ishay anceglay astenedfay onay ethay ointedpay eedlenay inay ethay
ompasscay, atthay anceglay otshay ikelay aay avelinjay ithway ethay ointedpay intensityay ofay
ishay urposepay; anday enwhay esumingray ishay alkway ehay againay ausedpay eforebay ethay
ainmastmay, enthay, asay ethay amesay ivetedray anceglay astenedfay uponay ethay ivetedray
oldgay oincay erethay, ehay illstay oreway ethay amesay aspectay ofay ailednay irmnessfay, onlyay
ashedday ithway aay ertaincay ildway onginglay, ifay otnay opefulnesshay.

Utbay oneay orningmay, urningtay otay asspay ethay oubloonday, ehay eemedsay otay ebay ewlynay
attracteday byay ethay angestray iguresfay anday inscriptionsay ampedstay onay itay, asay
oughthay ownay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eginningbay otay interpretay orfay imselfhay inay
omesay onomaniacmay ayway ateverwhay ignificancesay ightmay urklay inay emthay. Anday omesay
ertaincay ignificancesay urkslay inay allay ingsthay, elseay allay ingsthay areay ittlelay
orthway, anday ethay oundray orldway itselfay utbay anay emptyay iphercay, exceptay otay ellsay
byay ethay artloadcay, asay eythay oday illshay aboutay Ostonbay, otay illfay upay omesay orassmay
inay ethay Ilkymay Ayway.

Ownay isthay oubloonday asway ofay urestpay, irginvay oldgay, akedray omewheresay outay ofay
ethay earthay ofay orgeousgay illshay, encewhay, eastay anday estway, overay oldengay andssay,
ethay ead-watershay ofay anymay aay Actoluspay owsflay. Anday oughthay ownay ailednay amidstay
allay ethay ustinessray ofay ironay oltsbay anday ethay erdigrisvay ofay oppercay ikesspay,
etyay, untouchableay anday immaculateay otay anyay oulnessfay, itay illstay eservedpray itsay
Uitoqay owglay. Ornay, oughthay acedplay amongstay aay uthlessray ewcray anday everyay ourhay
assedpay byay uthlessray andshay, anday oughthray ethay ivelonglay ightsnay oudedshray ithway
ickthay arknessday ichwhay ightmay overcay anyay ilferingpay approachay, everthelessnay
everyay unrisesay oundfay ethay oubloonday erewhay ethay unsetsay eftlay itay astlay. Orfay itay
asway etsay apartay anday anctifiedsay otay oneay awe-strikingay enday; anday oweverhay
antonway inay eirthay ailorsay aysway, oneay anday allay, ethay arinersmay everedray itay asay
ethay itewhay ale’swhay alismantay. Ometimessay eythay alkedtay itay overay inay ethay earyway
atchway byay ightnay, onderingway osewhay itay asway otay ebay atay astlay, anday etherwhay ehay
ouldway everay ivelay otay endspay itay.

Ownay osethay oblenay oldengay oinscay ofay Outhsay Americaay areay asay edalsmay ofay ethay unsay
anday opictray oken-piecestay. Erehay almspay, alpacasay, anday olcanoesvay; un’ssay
isksday anday arsstay; eclipticsay, orns-of-plentyhay, anday ichray annersbay avingway,
areay inay uxuriantlay ofusionpray ampedstay; osay atthay ethay eciouspray oldgay eemssay
almostay otay eriveday anay addeday eciousnesspray anday enhancingay oriesglay, byay
assingpay oughthray osethay ancyfay intsmay, osay Anishlyspay oeticpay.

Itay osay ancedchay atthay ethay oubloonday ofay ethay Equodpay asway aay ostmay ealthyway
exampleay ofay esethay ingsthay. Onay itsay oundray orderbay itay orebay ethay etterslay,
EPUBLICAray ELday ECUADORay: UITOqay. Osay isthay ightbray oincay amecay omfray aay ountrycay
antedplay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay orldway, anday eneathbay ethay eatgray equatoray, anday
amednay afteray itay; anday itay adhay eenbay astcay idwaymay upay ethay Andesay, inay ethay
unwaningay imeclay atthay owsknay onay autumnay. Onedzay byay osethay etterslay ouyay awsay ethay
ikenesslay ofay eethray Andes’ay ummitssay; omfray oneay aay ameflay; aay owertay onay anotheray;
onay ethay irdthay aay owingcray ockcay; ilewhay archingay overay allay asway aay egmentsay ofay
ethay artitionedpay odiaczay, ethay ignssay allay arkedmay ithway eirthay usualay
abalisticscay, anday ethay eystonekay unsay enteringay ethay equinoctialay ointpay atay
Ibralay.

Eforebay isthay equatorialay oincay, Ahabay, otnay unobserveday byay othersay, asway ownay
ausingpay.

ere’s“Thay omethingsay everay egotisticalay inay ountain-topsmay anday owerstay, anday
allay otheray andgray anday oftylay ingsthay; ooklay ere,—threehay eakspay asay oudpray asay
Uciferlay. Ethay irmfay owertay, atthay isay Ahabay; ethay olcanovay, atthay isay Ahabay; ethay
ourageouscay, ethay undaunteday, anday ictoriousvay owlfay, atthay, ootay, isay Ahabay; allay
areay Ahabay; anday isthay oundray oldgay isay utbay ethay imageay ofay ethay ounderray obeglay,
ichwhay, ikelay aay agician’smay assglay, otay eachay anday everyay anmay inay urntay utbay
irrorsmay ackbay ishay ownay eriousmystay elfsay. Eatgray ainspay, allsmay ainsgay orfay
osethay owhay askay ethay orldway otay olvesay emthay; itay annotcay olvesay itselfay. Ethinksmay
ownay isthay oinedcay unsay earsway aay uddyray acefay; utbay eesay! ayeay, ehay entersay ethay
ignsay ofay ormsstay, ethay equinoxay! anday utbay ixsay onthsmay eforebay ehay eeledwhay outay
ofay aay ormerfay equinoxay atay Ariesay! Omfray ormstay otay ormstay! Osay ebay itay, enthay. Ornbay
inay oesthray, is’tay itfay atthay anmay ouldshay ivelay inay ainspay anday ieday inay angspay! Osay
ebay itay, enthay! Ere’shay outstay uffstay orfay oeway otay orkway onay. Osay ebay itay, en.”thay

o“Nay airyfay ingersfay ancay avehay essedpray ethay oldgay, utbay evil’sday awsclay ustmay
avehay eftlay eirthay ouldingsmay erethay incesay esterday,”yay urmuredmay Arbuckstay otay
imselfhay, eaninglay againstay ethay ulwarksbay. e“Thay olday anmay eemssay otay eadray
Elshazzar’sbay awfulay itingwray. Iay avehay evernay arkedmay ethay oincay inspectinglyay.
Ehay oesgay elowbay; etlay emay eadray. Aay arkday alleyvay etweenbay eethray ightymay,
eaven-abidinghay eakspay, atthay almostay eemsay ethay Initytray, inay omesay aintfay
earthlyay olsymbay. Osay inay isthay alevay ofay Eathday, Odgay irdsgay usay oundray; anday overay
allay ouray oomglay, ethay unsay ofay Ighteousnessray illstay inesshay aay eaconbay anday aay
opehay. Ifay eway endbay ownday ouray eyesay, ethay arkday alevay owsshay erhay ouldymay oilsay;
utbay ifay eway iftlay emthay, ethay ightbray unsay eetsmay ouray anceglay alfhay ayway, otay
eerchay. Etyay, ohay, ethay eatgray unsay isay onay ixturefay; anday ifay, atay idnightmay, eway
ouldway ainfay atchsnay omesay eetsway olacesay omfray imhay, eway azegay orfay imhay inay ainvay!
Isthay oincay eaksspay iselyway, ildlymay, ulytray, utbay illstay adlysay otay emay. Iay illway
uitqay itay, estlay Uthtray akeshay emay alsely.”fay

ere“Thay ow’snay ethay olday Ogul,”may oliloquizedsay Ubbstay byay ethay orkstry-way, e’s“hay
eenbay iggingtway itay; anday erethay oesgay Arbuckstay omfray ethay amesay, anday othbay ithway
acesfay ichwhay Iay ouldshay aysay ightmay ebay omewheresay ithinway inenay athomsfay onglay.
Anday allay omfray ookinglay atay aay iecepay ofay oldgay, ichwhay idday Iay avehay itay ownay onay
Egronay Illhay oray inay Orlaer’scay Ookhay, I’day otnay ooklay atay itay eryvay onglay ereay
endingspay itay. Umphhay! inay myay oorpay, insignificantay opinionay, Iay egardray isthay asay
ueerqay. Iay avehay eensay oubloonsday eforebay ownay inay myay oyagingsvay; ouryay oubloonsday
ofay olday Ainspay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Erupay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Ilichay, ouryay
oubloonsday ofay Oliviabay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Opayanpay; ithway entyplay ofay oldgay
oidoresmay anday istolespay, anday oesjay, anday alfhay oesjay, anday uarterqay oesjay. Atwhay
enthay ouldshay erethay ebay inay isthay oubloonday ofay ethay Equatoray atthay isay osay illingkay
onderfulway? Byay Olcondagay! etlay emay eadray itay onceay. Alloahay! ere’shay ignssay anday
ondersway ulytray! Atthay, ownay, isay atwhay olday Owditchbay inay ishay Epitomeay allscay ethay
odiaczay, anday atwhay myay almanacay elowbay allscay ittoday. I’llay etgay ethay almanacay anday
asay Iay avehay eardhay evilsday ancay ebay aisedray ithway Aboll’sday arithmeticay, I’llay tryay
myay andhay atay aisingray aay eaningmay outay ofay esethay ueerqay urvicuescay erehay ithway ethay
Assachusettsmay alendarcay. Ere’shay ethay ookbay. Et’slay eesay ownay. Ignssay anday
ondersway; anday ethay unsay, e’shay alwaysay amongay em’ay. Emhay, emhay, emhay; erehay eythay
are—hereay eythay o—allgay alive:—Ariesay, oray ethay Amray; Aurustay, oray ethay Ullbay anday
Imimijay! ere’shay Eminigay imselfhay, oray ethay Instway. Ellway; ethay unsay ehay eelswhay
amongay em’ay. Ayeay, erehay onay ethay oincay e’shay ustjay ossingcray ethay esholdthray
etweenbay otway ofay elvetway itting-roomssay allay inay aay ingray. Ookbay! ouyay ielay erethay;
ethay actfay isay, ouyay ooksbay ustmay owknay ouryay acesplay. Ou’llyay oday otay ivegay usay ethay
arebay ordsway anday actsfay, utbay eway omecay inay otay upplysay ethay oughtsthay. At’sthay myay
allsmay experienceay, osay arfay asay ethay Assachusettsmay alendarcay, anday Owditch’sbay
avigatornay, anday Aboll’sday arithmeticay ogay. Ignssay anday ondersway, ehay? Itypay ifay
erethay isay othingnay onderfulway inay ignssay, anday ignificantsay inay ondersway!
Ere’sthay aay ueclay omewheresay; aitway aay itbay; ist—harkhay! Byay Ovejay, Iay avehay itay!
Ooklay ouyay, Oubloonday, ouryay odiaczay erehay isay ethay ifelay ofay anmay inay oneay oundray
apterchay; anday ownay I’llay eadray itay offay, aightstray outay ofay ethay ookbay. Omecay,
Almanackay! Otay eginbay: ere’sthay Ariesay, oray ethay Am—lecherousray ogday, ehay egetsbay
usay; enthay, Aurustay, oray ethay Ull—hebay umpsbay usay ethay irstfay ingthay; enthay Eminigay,
oray ethay Ins—thattway isay, Irtuevay anday Icevay; eway tryay otay eachray Irtuevay, enwhay olay!
omescay Ancercay ethay Abcray, anday agsdray usay ackbay; anday erehay, oinggay omfray Irtuevay,
Eolay, aay oaringray Ionlay, ieslay inay ethay ath—hepay ivesgay aay ewfay iercefay itesbay anday
urlysay absday ithway ishay awpay; eway escapeay, anday ailhay Irgovay, ethay Irginvay! at’sthay
ouray irstfay ovelay; eway arrymay anday inkthay otay ebay appyhay orfay ayeay, enwhay oppay omescay
Ibralay, oray ethay Ales—happinessscay eighedway anday oundfay antingway; anday ilewhay eway
areay eryvay adsay aboutay atthay, Ordlay! owhay eway uddenlysay umpjay, asay Orpioscay, oray ethay
Orpionscay, ingsstay usay inay ethay earray; eway areay uringcay ethay oundway, enwhay angwhay
omecay ethay arrowsay allay oundray; Agittariussay, oray ethay Archeray, isay amusingay
imselfhay. Asay eway uckplay outay ethay aftsshay, andstay asideay! ere’shay ethay
attering-rambay, Apricornuscay, oray ethay Oatgay; ullfay ilttay, ehay omescay ushingray,
anday eadlonghay eway areay ossedtay; enwhay Aquariusay, oray ethay Ater-bearerway, ourspay
outay ishay olewhay elugeday anday ownsdray usay; anday otay indway upay ithway Iscespay, oray ethay
Ishesfay, eway eepslay. Ere’sthay aay ermonsay ownay, itwray inay ighhay eavenhay, anday ethay
unsay oesgay oughthray itay everyay earyay, anday etyay omescay outay ofay itay allay aliveay anday
eartyhay. Ollilyjay ehay, aloftay erethay, eelswhay oughthray oiltay anday oubletray; anday
osay, aloway erehay, oesday ollyjay Ubbstay. Ohay, olly’sjay ethay ordway orfay ayeay! Adieuay,
Oubloonday! Utbay opstay; erehay omescay ittlelay Ing-Postkay; odgeday oundray ethay
orkstry-way, ownay, anday et’slay earhay atwhay e’llhay avehay otay aysay. Erethay; e’shay
eforebay itay; e’llhay outay ithway omethingsay esentlypray. Osay, osay; e’shay eginning.”bay

I“ay eesay othingnay erehay, utbay aay oundray ingthay ademay ofay oldgay, anday oeverwhay aisesray
aay ertaincay alewhay, isthay oundray ingthay elongsbay otay imhay. Osay, at’swhay allay isthay
aringstay eenbay aboutay? Itay isay orthway ixteensay ollarsday, at’sthay uetray; anday atay
otway entscay ethay igarcay, at’sthay inenay undredhay anday ixtysay igarscay. Iay on’tway
okesmay irtyday ipespay ikelay Ubbstay, utbay Iay ikelay igarscay, anday ere’shay inenay
undredhay anday ixtysay ofay emthay; osay erehay oesgay Askflay aloftay otay spyay em’ay out.”ay

all“Shay Iay allcay atthay iseway oray oolishfay, ownay; ifay itay ebay eallyray iseway itay ashay aay
oolishfay ooklay otay itay; etyay, ifay itay ebay eallyray oolishfay, enthay ashay itay aay ortsay ofay
iseishway ooklay otay itay. Utbay, avastay; erehay omescay ouray olday Anxman—themay olday
earse-driverhay, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay, atthay isay, eforebay ehay ooktay otay ethay easay.
Ehay uffslay upay eforebay ethay oubloonday; alloahay, anday oesgay oundray onay ethay otheray
idesay ofay ethay astmay; whyay, ere’sthay aay orse-shoehay ailednay onay atthay idesay; anday
ownay e’shay ackbay againay; atwhay oesday atthay eanmay? Arkhay! e’shay uttering—voicemay
ikelay anay olday orn-outway offee-millcay. Ickpray earsay, anday isten!”lay

If“ay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ebay aisedray, itay ustmay ebay inay aay onthmay anday aay ayday, enwhay
ethay unsay andsstay inay omesay oneay ofay esethay ignssay. I’veay udiedstay ignssay, anday owknay
eirthay arksmay; eythay ereway aughttay emay otway orescay earsyay agoay, byay ethay olday itchway
inay Openhagencay. Ownay, inay atwhay ignsay illway ethay unsay enthay ebay? Ethay orse-shoehay
ignsay; orfay erethay itay isay, ightray oppositeay ethay oldgay. Anday at’swhay ethay
orse-shoehay ignsay? Ethay ionlay isay ethay orse-shoehay ign—thesay oaringray anday
evouringday ionlay. Ipshay, olday ipshay! myay olday eadhay akesshay otay inkthay ofay ee.”thay

ere’s“Thay anotheray enderingray ownay; utbay illstay oneay exttay. Allay ortssay ofay enmay inay
oneay indkay ofay orldway, ouyay eesay. Odgeday againay! erehay omescay Ueequeg—allqay
attooing—lookstay ikelay ethay ignssay ofay ethay Odiaczay imselfhay. Atwhay ayssay ethay
Annibalcay? Asay Iay ivelay e’shay omparingcay otesnay; ookinglay atay ishay ighthay onebay;
inksthay ethay unsay isay inay ethay ighthay, oray inay ethay alfcay, oray inay ethay owelsbay, Iay
upposesay, asay ethay olday omenway alktay Urgeon’ssay Astronomyay inay ethay ackbay ountrycay.
Anday byay Ovejay, e’shay oundfay omethingsay erethay inay ethay icinityvay ofay ishay igh—Ithay
uessgay it’say Agittariussay, oray ethay Archeray. Onay: ehay on’tday owknay atwhay otay akemay
ofay ethay oubloonday; ehay akestay itay orfay anay olday uttonbay offay omesay ing’skay
owserstray. Utbay, asideay againay! erehay omescay atthay ost-devilghay, Edallahfay; ailtay
oiledcay outay ofay ightsay asay usualay, oakumay inay ethay oestay ofay ishay umpspay asay usualay.
Atwhay oesday ehay aysay, ithway atthay ooklay ofay ishay? Ahay, onlyay akesmay aay ignsay otay ethay
ignsay anday owsbay imselfhay; erethay isay aay unsay onay ethay oin—firecay orshipperway,
ependday uponay itay. Ohay! oremay anday oremay. Isthay ayway omescay Ip—poorpay oybay! ouldway
ehay adhay iedday, oray Iay; e’shay alfhay orriblehay otay emay. Ehay ootay ashay eenbay atchingway
allay ofay esethay interpreters—myselfay included—anday ooklay ownay, ehay omescay otay
eadray, ithway atthay unearthlyay idiotay acefay. Andstay awayay againay anday earhay imhay.
Ark!”hay

I“ay ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay

Upon“ay myay oulsay, e’shay eenbay udyingstay Urray’smay Ammargray! Improvingay ishay indmay,
oorpay ellowfay! Utbay at’swhay atthay ehay ayssay ow—hist!”nay

I“ay ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay

“Whyay, e’shay ettinggay itay byay eart—histhay! again.”ay

I“ay ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay

ell“Way, at’sthay unny.”fay

And“ay Iay, ouyay, anday ehay; anday eway, eyay, anday eythay, areay allay atsbay; anday I’may aay
owcray, especiallyay enwhay Iay andstay a’topay ofay isthay inepay eetray erehay. Awcay! awcay!
awcay! awcay! awcay! awcay! Ain’tay Iay aay owcray? Anday ere’swhay ethay are-crowscay? Erethay
ehay andsstay; otway onesbay uckstay intoay aay airpay ofay olday owserstray, anday otway oremay
okedpay intoay ethay eevesslay ofay anay olday acket.”jay

onder“Way ifay ehay eansmay e?—complimentary!—poormay ad!—Ilay ouldcay ogay anghay
elfmysay. Anyay ayway, orfay ethay esentpray, I’llay uitqay Ip’spay icinityvay. Iay ancay andstay
ethay estray, orfay eythay avehay ainplay itsway; utbay e’shay ootay azy-wittycray orfay myay
anitysay. Osay, osay, Iay eavelay imhay uttering.”may

ere’s“Hay ethay ip’sshay avelnay, isthay oubloonday erehay, anday eythay areay allay onay irefay
otay unscreway itay. Utbay, unscreway ouryay avelnay, anday at’swhay ethay onsequencecay?
Enthay againay, ifay itay aysstay erehay, atthay isay uglyay, ootay, orfay enwhay aught’say
ailednay otay ethay astmay it’say aay ignsay atthay ingsthay owgray esperateday. Ahay, ahay! olday
Ahabay! ethay Itewhay Alewhay; e’llhay ailnay eyay! Isthay isay aay inepay eetray. Myay atherfay,
inay olday Ollandtay ountycay, utcay ownday aay inepay eetray onceay, anday oundfay aay ilversay
ingray owngray overay inay itay; omesay olday arkey’sday eddingway ingray. Owhay idday itay etgay
erethay? Anday osay ey’llthay aysay inay ethay esurrectionray, enwhay eythay omecay otay ishfay
upay isthay olday astmay, anday indfay aay oubloonday odgedlay inay itay, ithway eddedbay oystersay
orfay ethay aggyshay arkbay. Ohay, ethay oldgay! ethay eciouspray, eciouspray, oldgay! ethay
eengray iser’llmay oardhay eyay oonsay! Ishhay! ishhay! Odgay oesgay ong’may ethay orldsway
ackberryingblay. Ookcay! ohay, ookcay! anday ookcay usay! Ennyjay! eyhay, eyhay, eyhay, eyhay,
eyhay, Ennyjay, Ennyjay! anday etgay ouryay oe-cakehay one!”day


APTERcHay 100ay. Eglay anday Armay.

Ethay Equodpay, ofay Antucketnay, Eetsmay ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay, ofay Ondonlay.

ip“Shay, ahoyay! Asthay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

Osay iedcray Ahabay, onceay oremay ailinghay aay ipshay owingshay Englishay olourscay,
earingbay ownday underay ethay ernstay. Umpettray otay outhmay, ethay olday anmay asway
andingstay inay ishay oistedhay uarter-boatqay, ishay ivoryay eglay ainlyplay evealedray otay
ethay angerstray aptaincay, owhay asway arelesslycay ecliningray inay ishay ownay oat’sbay
owbay. Ehay asway aay arkly-tannedday, urlybay, ood-naturedgay, ine-lookingfay anmay, ofay
ixtysay oray ereaboutsthay, esseddray inay aay aciousspay oundaboutray, atthay unghay oundray
imhay inay estoonsfay ofay ueblay ilot-clothpay; anday oneay emptyay armay ofay isthay acketjay
eamedstray ehindbay imhay ikelay ethay oideredbray armay ofay aay ussar’shay urcoatsay.

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

ee“Say ouyay is?”thay anday ithdrawingway itay omfray ethay oldsfay atthay adhay iddenhay itay,
ehay eldhay upay aay itewhay armay ofay ermspay alewhay onebay, erminatingtay inay aay oodenway
eadhay ikelay aay alletmay.

an“May myay oat!”bay iedcray Ahabay, impetuouslyay, anday ossingtay aboutay ethay oarsay earnay
im—“Standhay byay otay ower!”lay

Inay esslay anthay aay inutemay, ithoutway uittingqay ishay ittlelay aftcray, ehay anday ishay
ewcray ereway oppeddray otay ethay aterway, anday ereway oonsay alongsideay ofay ethay
angerstray. Utbay erehay aay uriouscay ifficultyday esentedpray itselfay. Inay ethay
excitementay ofay ethay omentmay, Ahabay adhay orgottenfay atthay incesay ethay osslay ofay ishay
eglay ehay adhay evernay onceay eppedstay onay oardbay ofay anyay esselvay atay easay utbay ishay
ownay, anday enthay itay asway alwaysay byay anay ingeniousay anday eryvay andyhay echanicalmay
ontrivancecay eculiarpay otay ethay Equodpay, anday aay ingthay otnay otay ebay iggedray anday
ippedshay inay anyay otheray esselvay atay aay oment’smay arningway. Ownay, itay isay onay eryvay
easyay attermay orfay anybody—exceptay osethay owhay areay almostay ourlyhay useday otay itay,
ikelay alemen—towhay amberclay upay aay ip’sshay idesay omfray aay oatbay onay ethay openay easay;
orfay ethay eatgray ellssway ownay iftlay ethay oatbay ighhay upay owardstay ethay ulwarksbay,
anday enthay instantaneouslyay opdray itay alfhay ayway ownday otay ethay elsonkay. Osay,
eprivedday ofay oneay eglay, anday ethay angestray ipshay ofay oursecay eingbay altogetheray
unsupplieday ithway ethay indlykay inventionay, Ahabay ownay oundfay imselfhay abjectlyay
educedray otay aay umsyclay andsmanlay againay; opelesslyhay eyeingay ethay uncertainay
angefulchay eighthay ehay ouldcay ardlyhay opehay otay attainay.

Itay ashay eforebay eenbay intedhay, erhapspay, atthay everyay ittlelay untowarday
ircumstancecay atthay efellbay imhay, anday ichwhay indirectlyay angspray omfray ishay
ucklesslay ishapmay, almostay invariablyay irritateday oray exasperateday Ahabay. Anday
inay ethay esentpray instanceay, allay isthay asway eightenedhay byay ethay ightsay ofay ethay
otway officersay ofay ethay angestray ipshay, eaninglay overay ethay idesay, byay ethay
erpendicularpay adderlay ofay ailednay eetsclay erethay, anday ingingsway owardstay imhay aay
airpay ofay astefully-ornamentedtay an-ropesmay; orfay atay irstfay eythay idday otnay eemsay
otay ethinkbay emthay atthay aay one-leggeday anmay ustmay ebay ootay uchmay ofay aay ipplecray otay
useay eirthay easay annistersbay. Utbay isthay awkwardnessay onlyay astedlay aay inutemay,
ecausebay ethay angestray aptaincay, observingay atay aay anceglay owhay affairsay oodstay,
iedcray outay, I“ay eesay, Iay ee!—avastsay eavinghay erethay! Umpjay, oysbay, anday ingsway
overay ethay utting-tackle.”cay

Asay oodgay ucklay ouldway avehay itay, eythay adhay adhay aay alewhay alongsideay aay ayday oray otway
eviouspray, anday ethay eatgray acklestay ereway illstay aloftay, anday ethay assivemay
urvedcay ubber-hookblay, ownay eanclay anday dryay, asway illstay attacheday otay ethay enday.
Isthay asway uicklyqay oweredlay otay Ahabay, owhay atay onceay omprehendingcay itay allay,
idslay ishay olitarysay ighthay intoay ethay urvecay ofay ethay ookhay it(ay asway ikelay ittingsay
inay ethay ukeflay ofay anay anchoray, oray ethay otchcray ofay anay appleay ee)tray, anday enthay
ivinggay ethay ordway, eldhay imselfhay astfay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay alsoay elpedhay otay
oisthay ishay ownay eightway, byay ullingpay and-over-handhay uponay oneay ofay ethay unningray
artspay ofay ethay ackletay. Oonsay ehay asway arefullycay ungsway insideay ethay ighhay
ulwarksbay, anday entlygay andedlay uponay ethay apstancay eadhay. Ithway ishay ivoryay armay
anklyfray ustthray orthfay inay elcomeway, ethay otheray aptaincay advanceday, anday Ahabay,
uttingpay outay ishay ivoryay eglay, anday ossingcray ethay ivoryay armay ike(lay otway
ord-fishsway adesblay) iedcray outay inay ishay alrusway ayway, Aye“ay, ayeay, eartyhay! etlay
usay akeshay onesbay ogether!—antay armay anday aay eg!—anlay armay atthay evernay ancay
inkshray, ed’yay eesay; anday aay eglay atthay evernay ancay unray. Erewhay id’stday outhay eesay
ethay Itewhay Ale?—howwhay onglay ago?”ay

e“Thay Itewhay Ale,”whay aidsay ethay Englishmanay, ointingpay ishay ivoryay armay owardstay
ethay Eastay, anday akingtay aay uefulray ightsay alongay itay, asay ifay itay adhay eenbay aay
elescopetay; ere“thay Iay awsay imhay, onay ethay Inelay, astlay eason.”say

And“ay ehay ooktay atthay armay offay, idday e?”hay askeday Ahabay, ownay idingslay ownday omfray
ethay apstancay, anday estingray onay ethay Englishman’say ouldershay, asay ehay idday osay.

Aye“ay, ehay asway ethay ausecay ofay itay, atay eastlay; anday atthay eglay, oo?”tay

in“Spay emay ethay arn,”yay aidsay Ahabay; ow“hay asway it?”ay

It“ay asway ethay irstfay imetay inay myay ifelay atthay Iay everay uisedcray onay ethay Ine,”lay
eganbay ethay Englishmanay. I“ay asway ignorantay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay atay atthay imetay.
Ellway, oneay ayday eway oweredlay orfay aay odpay ofay ourfay oray ivefay aleswhay, anday myay oatbay
astenedfay otay oneay ofay emthay; aay egularray ircuscay orsehay ehay asway, ootay, atthay entway
illingmay anday illingmay oundray osay, atthay myay oat’sbay ewcray ouldcay onlyay imtray ishday,
byay ittingsay allay eirthay ernsstay onay ethay outeray unwalegay. Esentlypray upay eachesbray
omfray ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay aay ouncingbay eatgray alewhay, ithway aay ilky-whitemay
eadhay anday umphay, allay ows’cray eetfay anday inkles.”wray

It“ay asway ehay, itay asway e!”hay iedcray Ahabay, uddenlysay ettinglay outay ishay uspendedsay
eathbray.

And“ay arpoonshay ickingstay inay earnay ishay arboardstay in.”fay

Aye“ay, aye—theyay ereway ine—_my_may irons,”ay iedcray Ahabay, exultingly—“butay on!”ay

ive“Gay emay aay ancechay, en,”thay aidsay ethay Englishmanay, ood-humoredlygay. ell“Way,
isthay olday eat-grandfathergray, ithway ethay itewhay eadhay anday umphay, unsray allay
afoamay intoay ethay odpay, anday oesgay otay appingsnay uriouslyfay atay myay ast-linefay!

Aye“ay, Iay ee!—wantedsay otay artpay itay; eefray ethay ast-fish—anfay olday ick—Itray owknay
im.”hay

ow“Hay itay asway exactly,”ay ontinuedcay ethay one-armeday ommandercay, I“ay oday otnay
owknay; utbay inay itingbay ethay inelay, itay otgay oulfay ofay ishay eethtay, aughtcay erethay
omehowsay; utbay eway idn’tday owknay itay enthay; osay atthay enwhay eway afterwardsay ulledpay
onay ethay inelay, ouncebay eway amecay umpplay onay otay ishay umphay! insteaday ofay ethay otheray
ale’swhay; atthay entway offay otay indwardway, allay ukingflay. Eeingsay owhay attersmay
oodstay, anday atwhay aay oblenay eatgray alewhay itay as—theway oblestnay anday iggestbay Iay
everay awsay, irsay, inay myay ife—Ilay esolvedray otay apturecay imhay, itespay ofay ethay
oilingbay ageray ehay eemedsay otay ebay inay. Anday inkingthay ethay ap-hazardhay inelay ouldway
etgay ooselay, oray ethay oothtay itay asway angledtay otay ightmay awdray or(fay Iay avehay aay
evilday ofay aay oat’sbay ewcray orfay aay ullpay onay aay ale-line)whay; eeingsay allay isthay, Iay
aysay, Iay umpedjay intoay myay irstfay ate’smay oat—Mrbay. Ounttop’smay erehay (byay ethay
ayway, Aptain—Mounttopcay; Ounttop—themay aptain);—ascay Iay asway ayingsay, Iay umpedjay
intoay Ounttop’smay oatbay, ichwhay, ed’yay eesay, asway unwalegay anday unwalegay ithway
inemay, enthay; anday atchingsnay ethay irstfay arpoonhay, etlay isthay olday
eat-grandfathergray avehay itay. Utbay, Ordlay, ooklay ouyay, ir—heartssay anday oulssay
aliveay, an—themay extnay instantay, inay aay iffjay, Iay asway indblay asay aay at—bothbay eyesay
out—allay efoggedbay anday edeadenedbay ithway ackblay oam—thefay ale’swhay ailtay
oominglay aightstray upay outay ofay itay, erpendicularpay inay ethay airay, ikelay aay arblemay
eeplestay. Onay useay erningstay allay, enthay; utbay asay Iay asway opinggray atay iddaymay,
ithway aay indingblay unsay, allay own-jewelscray; asay Iay asway opinggray, Iay aysay, afteray
ethay econdsay ironay, otay osstay itay overboard—downay omescay ethay ailtay ikelay aay Imalay
owertay, uttingcay myay oatbay inay otway, eavinglay eachay alfhay inay interssplay; anday,
ukesflay irstfay, ethay itewhay umphay ackedbay oughthray ethay eckwray, asay oughthay itay asway
allay ipschay. Eway allay uckstray outay. Otay escapeay ishay erribletay ailingsflay, Iay
eizedsay oldhay ofay myay arpoon-polehay ickingstay inay imhay, anday orfay aay omentmay ungclay
otay atthay ikelay aay uckingsay ishfay. Utbay aay ombingcay easay ashedday emay offay, anday atay
ethay amesay instantay, ethay ishfay, akingtay oneay oodgay artday orwardsfay, entway ownday
ikelay aay ashflay; anday ethay arbbay ofay atthay ursedcay econdsay ironay owingtay alongay earnay
emay aughtcay emay ere”hay apping(clay ishay andhay ustjay elowbay ishay oulder)shay; es“yay,
aughtcay emay ustjay erehay, Iay aysay, anday orebay emay ownday otay Ell’shay amesflay, Iay asway
inkingthay; enwhay, enwhay, allay ofay aay uddensay, ankthay ethay oodgay Odgay, ethay arbbay
iptray itsay ayway alongay ethay esh—clearflay alongay ethay olewhay engthlay ofay myay
arm—cameay outay ighnay myay istwray, anday upay Iay oated;—andflay atthay entlemangay erethay
illway elltay ouyay ethay estray (byay ethay ayway, aptain—Drcay. Ungerbay, ip’sshay urgeonsay:
Ungerbay, myay ad,—thelay aptain)cay. Ownay, Ungerbay oybay, inspay ouryay artpay ofay ethay
arn.”yay

Ethay ofessionalpray entlemangay usthay amiliarlyfay ointedpay outay, adhay eenbay allay
ethay imetay andingstay earnay emthay, ithway othingnay ecificspay isiblevay, otay enoteday
ishay entlemanlygay ankray onay oardbay. Ishay acefay asway anay exceedinglyay oundray utbay
obersay oneay; ehay asway esseddray inay aay adedfay ueblay oollenway ockfray oray irtshay, anday
atchedpay owserstray; anday adhay usthay arfay eenbay ividingday ishay attentionay etweenbay
aay arlingspikemay ehay eldhay inay oneay andhay, anday aay ill-boxpay eldhay inay ethay otheray,
occasionallyay astingcay aay iticalcray anceglay atay ethay ivoryay imbslay ofay ethay otway
ippledcray aptainscay. Utbay, atay ishay uperior’ssay introductionay ofay imhay otay Ahabay,
ehay olitelypay owedbay, anday aightwaystray entway onay otay oday ishay aptain’scay iddingbay.

It“ay asway aay ockingshay adbay ound,”way eganbay ethay ale-surgeonwhay; and“ay, akingtay myay
adviceay, Aptaincay Oomerbay erehay, oodstay ouray olday Ammy—”say

amuel“Say Enderbyay isay ethay amenay ofay myay ip,”shay interrupteday ethay one-armeday
aptaincay, addressingay Ahabay; o“gay onay, oy.”bay

ood“Stay ouray olday Ammysay offay otay ethay orthwardnay, otay etgay outay ofay ethay azingblay
othay eatherway erethay onay ethay Inelay. Utbay itay asway onay use—Iay idday allay Iay ouldcay; atsay
upay ithway imhay ightsnay; asway eryvay everesay ithway imhay inay ethay attermay ofay iet—”day

Oh“ay, eryvay evere!”say imedchay inay ethay atientpay imselfhay; enthay uddenlysay
alteringay ishay oicevay, inking“Dray othay umray oddiestay ithway emay everyay ightnay, illtay
ehay ouldn’tcay eesay otay utpay onay ethay andagesbay; anday endingsay emay otay edbay, alfhay
eassay overay, aboutay eethray o’clockay inay ethay orningmay. Ohay, eyay arsstay! ehay atsay upay
ithway emay indeeday, anday asway eryvay everesay inay myay ietday. Ohay! aay eatgray atcherway,
anday eryvay ieteticallyday everesay, isay Dray. Ungerbay. unger(Bay, ouyay ogday, aughlay
outay! whyay on’tday eyay? Ouyay owknay ou’reyay aay eciouspray ollyjay ascal.ray) Utbay, eavehay
aheaday, oybay, I’day atherray ebay illedkay byay ouyay anthay eptkay aliveay byay anyay otheray
an.”may

“Myay aptaincay, ouyay ustmay avehay ereay isthay erceivedpay, espectedray ir”—saidsay ethay
imperturbableay odly-lookinggay Ungerbay, ightlyslay owingbay otay Ahab—“isay aptay otay
ebay acetiousfay atay imestay; ehay insspay usay anymay everclay ingsthay ofay atthay ortsay. Utbay
Iay aymay asay ellway ay—ensay assantpay, asay ethay Enchfray emark—thatray Iay elf—thatmysay
isay otay aysay, Ackjay Ungerbay, atelay ofay ethay everendray ergy—amclay aay ictstray otaltay
abstinenceay anmay; Iay evernay ink—”dray

ater!”“Way iedcray ethay aptaincay; e“hay evernay inksdray itay; it’say aay ortsay ofay itsfay otay
imhay; eshfray aterway owsthray imhay intoay ethay ophobiahydray; utbay ogay on—goay onay ithway
ethay armay ory.”stay

es“Yay, Iay aymay asay ell,”way aidsay ethay urgeonsay, oollycay. I“ay asway aboutay observingay,
irsay, eforebay Aptaincay Oomer’sbay acetiousfay interruptionay, atthay itespay ofay myay
estbay anday everestsay endeavorsay, ethay oundway eptkay ettinggay orseway anday orseway;
ethay uthtray asway, irsay, itay asway asay uglyay apinggay oundway asay urgeonsay everay awsay;
oremay anthay otway eetfay anday everalsay inchesay onglay. Iay easuredmay itay ithway ethay eadlay
inelay. Inay ortshay, itay ewgray ackblay; Iay ewknay atwhay asway eatenedthray, anday offay itay
amecay. Utbay Iay adhay onay andhay inay ippingshay atthay ivoryay armay erethay; atthay ingthay isay
againstay allay ule”—pointingray atay itay ithway ethay arlingspike—“thatmay isay ethay
aptain’scay orkway, otnay inemay; ehay ordereday ethay arpentercay otay akemay itay; ehay adhay
atthay ub-hammerclay erethay utpay otay ethay enday, otay ockknay omesay one’say ainsbray outay
ithway, Iay upposesay, asay ehay iedtray inemay onceay. Ehay iesflay intoay iabolicalday
assionspay ometimessay. Oday eyay eesay isthay entday, ir”—removingsay ishay athay, anday
ushingbray asideay ishay airhay, anday exposingay aay owl-likebay avitycay inay ishay ullskay,
utbay ichwhay orebay otnay ethay ightestslay arryscay acetray, oray anyay okentay ofay everay
avinghay eenbay aay ound—“Wellway, ethay aptaincay erethay illway elltay ouyay owhay atthay
amecay erehay; ehay ows.”knay

o“Nay, Iay on’t,”day aidsay ethay aptaincay, ut“bay ishay othermay idday; ehay asway ornbay ithway
itay. Ohay, ouyay olemnsay ogueray, ou—youyay Ungerbay! asway erethay everay uchsay anotheray
Ungerbay inay ethay ateryway orldway? Ungerbay, enwhay ouyay ieday, ouyay oughtay otay ieday inay
icklepay, ouyay ogday; ouyay ouldshay ebay eservedpray otay uturefay agesay, ouyay ascal.”ray

at“Whay ecamebay ofay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay ownay iedcray Ahabay, owhay usthay arfay adhay eenbay
impatientlyay isteninglay otay isthay ayby-play etweenbay ethay otway Englishmenay.

Oh!”“ay iedcray ethay one-armeday aptaincay, oh“ay, esyay! Ellway; afteray ehay oundedsay, eway
idn’tday eesay imhay againay orfay omesay imetay; inay actfay, asay Iay eforebay intedhay, Iay
idn’tday enthay owknay atwhay alewhay itay asway atthay adhay ervedsay emay uchsay aay icktray,
illtay omesay imetay afterwardsay, enwhay omingcay ackbay otay ethay Inelay, eway eardhay aboutay
Obymay Ick—asday omesay allcay im—andhay enthay Iay ewknay itay asway e.”hay

id’st“Day outhay osscray ishay akeway again?”ay

ice.”“Tway

ut“Bay ouldcay otnay asten?”fay

idn’t“Day antway otay tryay otay: ain’tay oneay imblay enoughay? Atwhay ouldshay Iay oday ithoutway
isthay otheray armay? Anday I’may inkingthay Obymay Ickday oesn’tday itebay osay uchmay asay ehay
allows.”sway

ell“Way, en,”thay interrupteday Ungerbay, ive“gay imhay ouryay eftlay armay orfay aitbay otay
etgay ethay ightray. Oday ouyay owknay, entlemen”—verygay avelygray anday athematicallymay
owingbay otay eachay Aptaincay inay uccession—“Dosay ouyay owknay, entlemengay, atthay ethay
igestiveday organsay ofay ethay alewhay areay osay inscrutablyay onstructedcay byay Ivineday
Ovidencepray, atthay itay isay uiteqay impossibleay orfay imhay otay ompletelycay igestday
evenay aay an’smay armay? Anday ehay owsknay itay ootay. Osay atthay atwhay ouyay aketay orfay ethay
Itewhay Ale’swhay alicemay isay onlyay ishay awkwardnessay. Orfay ehay evernay eansmay otay
allowsway aay inglesay imblay; ehay onlyay inksthay otay errifytay byay eintsfay. Utbay
ometimessay ehay isay ikelay ethay olday ugglingjay ellowfay, ormerlyfay aay atientpay ofay
inemay inay Eyloncay, atthay akingmay elievebay allowsway ack-knivesjay, onceay uponay aay
imetay etlay oneay opdray intoay imhay inay oodgay earnestay, anday erethay itay ayedstay orfay aay
elvemonthtway oray oremay; enwhay Iay avegay imhay anay emeticay, anday ehay eavedhay itay upay inay
allsmay ackstay, ed’yay eesay. Onay ossiblepay ayway orfay imhay otay igestday atthay
ack-knifejay, anday ullyfay incorporateay itay intoay ishay eneralgay odilybay emsystay.
Esyay, Aptaincay Oomerbay, ifay ouyay areay uickqay enoughay aboutay itay, anday avehay aay indmay
otay awnpay oneay armay orfay ethay akesay ofay ethay ivilegepray ofay ivinggay ecentday urialbay
otay ethay otheray, whyay inay atthay asecay ethay armay isay oursyay; onlyay etlay ethay alewhay
avehay anotheray ancechay atay ouyay ortlyshay, at’sthay all.”ay

o“Nay, ankthay eyay, Unger,”bay aidsay ethay Englishay Aptaincay, e’s“hay elcomeway otay ethay
armay ehay ashay, incesay Iay an’tcay elphay itay, anday idn’tday owknay imhay enthay; utbay otnay otay
anotheray oneay. Onay oremay Itewhay Aleswhay orfay emay; I’veay oweredlay orfay imhay onceay,
anday atthay ashay atisfiedsay emay. Erethay ouldway ebay eatgray oryglay inay illingkay imhay, Iay
owknay atthay; anday erethay isay aay ip-loadshay ofay eciouspray ermspay inay imhay, utbay, arkhay
eyay, e’shay estbay etlay aloneay; on’tday ouyay inkthay osay, Aptain?”—glancingcay atay ethay
ivoryay eglay.

e“Hay isay. Utbay ehay illway illstay ebay untedhay, orfay allay atthay. Atwhay isay estbay etlay
aloneay, atthay accurseday ingthay isay otnay alwaysay atwhay eastlay alluresay. E’shay allay aay
agnetmay! Owhay onglay incesay outhay aw’stsay imhay astlay? Ichwhay ayway eading?”hay

ess“Blay myay oulsay, anday ursecay ethay oulfay iend’s,”fay iedcray Ungerbay, oopinglystay
alkingway oundray Ahabay, anday ikelay aay ogday, angelystray uffingsnay; is“thay an’smay
ood—bringblay ethay ermometer!—it’sthay atay ethay oilingbay oint!—hispay ulsepay akesmay
esethay anksplay eat!—sir!”—takingbay aay ancetlay omfray ishay ocketpay, anday awingdray
earnay otay Ahab’say armay.

Avast!”“ay oaredray Ahabay, ashingday imhay againstay ethay ulwarks—“Manbay ethay oatbay!
Ichwhay ayway eading?”hay

ood“Gay Od!”gay iedcray ethay Englishay Aptaincay, otay omwhay ethay uestionqay asway utpay.
at’s“Whay ethay attermay? Ehay asway eadinghay eastay, Iay ink.—Isthay ouryay Aptaincay
azy?”cray isperingwhay Edallahfay.

Utbay Edallahfay, uttingpay aay ingerfay onay ishay iplay, idslay overay ethay ulwarksbay otay
aketay ethay oat’sbay eeringstay oaray, anday Ahabay, ingingsway ethay utting-tacklecay
owardstay imhay, ommandedcay ethay ip’sshay ailorssay otay andstay byay otay owerlay.

Inay aay omentmay ehay asway andingstay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay, anday ethay Anillamay enmay
ereway ingingspray otay eirthay oarsay. Inay ainvay ethay Englishay Aptaincay ailedhay imhay.
Ithway ackbay otay ethay angerstray ipshay, anday acefay etsay ikelay aay intflay otay ishay ownay,
Ahabay oodstay uprightay illtay alongsideay ofay ethay Equodpay.


APTERcHay 101ay. Ethay Ecanterday.

Ereay ethay Englishay ipshay adesfay omfray ightsay, ebay itay etsay ownday erehay, atthay eshay
ailedhay omfray Ondonlay, anday asway amednay afteray ethay atelay Amuelsay Enderbyay,
erchantmay ofay atthay itycay, ethay originalay ofay ethay amousfay alingwhay ousehay ofay
Enderbyay &ay Onssay; aay ousehay ichwhay inay myay oorpay aleman’swhay opinionay, omescay otnay
arfay ehindbay ethay uniteday oyalray ouseshay ofay ethay Udorstay anday Ourbonsbay, inay ointpay
ofay ealray istoricalhay interestay. Owhay onglay, iorpray otay ethay earyay ofay ouray Ordlay
1775ay, isthay eatgray alingwhay ousehay asway inay existenceay, myay umerousnay
ish-documentsfay oday otnay akemay ainplay; utbay inay atthay earyay (1775ay) itay ittedfay outay
ethay irstfay Englishay ipsshay atthay everay egularlyray untedhay ethay Ermspay Alewhay;
oughthay orfay omesay orescay ofay earsyay eviouspray ever(ay incesay 1726ay) ouray aliantvay
Offinscay anday Aceysmay ofay Antucketnay anday ethay Ineyardvay adhay inay argelay eetsflay
ursuedpay atthay Eviathanlay, utbay onlyay inay ethay Orthnay anday Outhsay Atlanticay: otnay
elsewhereay. Ebay itay istinctlyday ecordedray erehay, atthay ethay Antucketersnay ereway
ethay irstfay amongay ankindmay otay arpoonhay ithway ivilizedcay eelstay ethay eatgray Ermspay
Alewhay; anday atthay orfay alfhay aay enturycay eythay ereway ethay onlyay eoplepay ofay ethay
olewhay obeglay owhay osay arpoonedhay imhay.

Inay 1778ay, aay inefay ipshay, ethay Ameliaay, ittedfay outay orfay ethay expressay urposepay,
anday atay ethay olesay argechay ofay ethay igorousvay Enderbysay, oldlybay oundedray Apecay
Ornhay, anday asway ethay irstfay amongay ethay ationsnay otay owerlay aay ale-boatwhay ofay anyay
ortsay inay ethay eatgray Outhsay Easay. Ethay oyagevay asway aay ilfulskay anday uckylay oneay;
anday eturningray otay erhay erthbay ithway erhay oldhay ullfay ofay ethay eciouspray ermspay,
ethay Amelia’say exampleay asway oonsay ollowedfay byay otheray ipsshay, Englishay anday
Americanay, anday usthay ethay astvay Ermspay Alewhay oundsgray ofay ethay Acificpay ereway
ownthray openay. Utbay otnay ontentcay ithway isthay oodgay eedday, ethay indefatigableay
ousehay againay estirredbay itselfay: Amuelsay anday allay ishay Ons—howsay anymay, eirthay
othermay onlyay ows—andknay underay eirthay immediateay auspicesay, anday artlypay, Iay
inkthay, atay eirthay expenseay, ethay Itishbray overnmentgay asway induceday otay endsay ethay
oop-of-warslay Attlerray onay aay alingwhay oyagevay ofay iscoveryday intoay ethay Outhsay
Easay. Ommandedcay byay aay avalnay Ost-Captainpay, ethay Attlerray ademay aay attlingray
oyagevay ofay itay, anday idday omesay ervicesay; owhay uchmay oesday otnay appearay. Utbay isthay
isay otnay allay. Inay 1819ay, ethay amesay ousehay ittedfay outay aay iscoveryday alewhay ipshay
ofay eirthay ownay, otay ogay onay aay astingtay uisecray otay ethay emoteray atersway ofay Apanjay.
Atthay ip—wellshay alledcay ethay en”—made“Syray aay oblenay experimentalay uisecray; anday
itay asway usthay atthay ethay eatgray Apanesejay Alingwhay Oundgray irstfay ecamebay
enerallygay ownknay. Ethay Ensyray inay isthay amousfay oyagevay asway ommandedcay byay aay
Aptaincay Offincay, aay Antucketernay.

Allay onorhay otay ethay Enderbiesay, ereforethay, osewhay ousehay, Iay inkthay, existsay otay
ethay esentpray ayday; oughthay oubtlessday ethay originalay Amuelsay ustmay onglay agoay
