avehay ippedslay ishay ablecay orfay ethay eatgray Outhsay Easay ofay ethay otheray orldway.

Ethay ipshay amednay afteray imhay asway orthyway ofay ethay onorhay, eingbay aay eryvay astfay
ailersay anday aay oblenay aftcray everyay ayway. Iay oardedbay erhay onceay atay idnightmay
omewheresay offay ethay Atagonianpay oastcay, anday ankdray oodgay ipflay ownday inay ethay
orecastlefay. Itay asway aay inefay amgay eway adhay, anday eythay ereway allay umps—everytray
oulsay onay oardbay. Aay ortshay ifelay otay emthay, anday aay ollyjay eathday. Anday atthay inefay
amgay Iay ad—longhay, eryvay onglay afteray olday Ahabay ouchedtay erhay anksplay ithway ishay
ivoryay eel—ithay indsmay emay ofay ethay oblenay, olidsay, Axonsay ospitalityhay ofay atthay
ipshay; anday aymay myay arsonpay orgetfay emay, anday ethay evilday ememberray emay, ifay Iay everay
oselay ightsay ofay itay. Ipflay? Idday Iay aysay eway adhay ipflay? Esyay, anday eway ippedflay itay
atay ethay ateray ofay entay allonsgay ethay ourhay; anday enwhay ethay uallsqay amecay or(fay it’say
uallysqay offay erethay byay Atagonia)pay, anday allay ands—visitorshay anday all—wereay
alledcay otay eefray opsailstay, eway ereway osay op-heavytay atthay eway adhay otay ingsway eachay
otheray aloftay inay owlinesbay; anday eway ignorantlyay urledfay ethay irtsskay ofay ouray
acketsjay intoay ethay ailssay, osay atthay eway unghay erethay, eefedray astfay inay ethay
owlinghay alegay, aay arningway exampleay otay allay unkendray arstay. Oweverhay, ethay astsmay
idday otnay ogay overboarday; anday byay anday byay eway ambledscray ownday, osay obersay, atthay
eway adhay otay asspay ethay ipflay againay, oughthay ethay avagesay altsay ayspray urstingbay
ownday ethay orecastlefay uttlescay, atherray ootay uchmay ilutedday anday ickledpay itay otay
myay astetay.

Ethay eefbay asway ine—toughfay, utbay ithway odybay inay itay. Eythay aidsay itay asway
ull-beefbay; othersay, atthay itay asway omedarydray eefbay; utbay Iay oday otnay owknay, orfay
ertaincay, owhay atthay asway. Eythay adhay umplingsday ootay; allsmay, utbay ubstantialsay,
etricallysymmay obularglay, anday indestructibleay umplingsday. Iay anciedfay atthay
ouyay ouldcay eelfay emthay, anday ollray emthay aboutay inay ouyay afteray eythay ereway
allowedsway. Ifay ouyay oopedstay overay ootay arfay orwardfay, ouyay iskedray eirthay
itchingpay outay ofay ouyay ikelay illiard-ballsbay. Ethay ead—butbray atthay ouldn’tcay ebay
elpedhay; esidesbay, itay asway anay anti-scorbuticay; inay ortshay, ethay eadbray
ontainedcay ethay onlyay eshfray arefay eythay adhay. Utbay ethay orecastlefay asway otnay eryvay
ightlay, anday itay asway eryvay easyay otay epstay overay intoay aay arkday ornercay enwhay ouyay
ateay itay. Utbay allay inay allay, akingtay erhay omfray ucktray otay elmhay, onsideringcay ethay
imensionsday ofay ethay ook’scay oilersbay, includingay ishay ownay ivelay archmentpay
oilersbay; orefay anday aftay, Iay aysay, ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay asway aay ollyjay ipshay; ofay
oodgay arefay anday entyplay; inefay ipflay anday ongstray; ackcray ellowsfay allay, anday
apitalcay omfray ootbay eelshay otay at-bandhay.

Utbay whyay asway itay, inkthay eyay, atthay ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay, anday omesay otheray
Englishay alerswhay Iay owknay of—notay allay ough—werethay uchsay amousfay, ospitablehay
ipsshay; atthay assedpay oundray ethay eefbay, anday ethay eadbray, anday ethay ancay, anday ethay
okejay; anday ereway otnay oonsay earyway ofay eatingay, anday inkingdray, anday aughinglay? Iay
illway elltay ouyay. Ethay aboundingay oodgay eerchay ofay esethay Englishay alerswhay isay
attermay orfay istoricalhay esearchray. Ornay avehay Iay eenbay atay allay aringspay ofay
istoricalhay alewhay esearchray, enwhay itay ashay eemedsay eedednay.

Ethay Englishay ereway ecededpray inay ethay alewhay isheryfay byay ethay Ollandershay,
Ealanderszay, anday Anesday; omfray omwhay eythay erivedday anymay ermstay illstay extantay
inay ethay isheryfay; anday atwhay isay etyay oremay, eirthay atfay olday ashionsfay, ouchingtay
entyplay otay eatay anday inkdray. Orfay, asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ethay Englishay
erchant-shipmay impsscray erhay ewcray; utbay otnay osay ethay Englishay alerwhay. Encehay,
inay ethay Englishay, isthay ingthay ofay alingwhay oodgay eerchay isay otnay ormalnay anday
aturalnay, utbay incidentalay anday articularpay; anday, ereforethay, ustmay avehay omesay
ecialspay originay, ichwhay isay erehay ointedpay outay, anday illway ebay illstay urtherfay
elucidateday.

Uringday myay esearchesray inay ethay Eviathaniclay istorieshay, Iay umbledstay uponay anay
ancientay Utchday olumevay, ichwhay, byay ethay ustymay alingwhay ellsmay ofay itay, Iay ewknay
ustmay ebay aboutay alerswhay. Ethay itletay asway, an“Day Oopman,”cay ereforewhay Iay
oncludedcay atthay isthay ustmay ebay ethay invaluableay emoirsmay ofay omesay Amsterdamay
oopercay inay ethay isheryfay, asay everyay alewhay ipshay ustmay arrycay itsay oopercay. Iay asway
einforcedray inay isthay opinionay byay eeingsay atthay itay asway ethay oductionpray ofay oneay
itz“Fay Ackhammer.”sway Utbay myay iendfray Dray. Odheadsnay, aay eryvay earnedlay anmay,
ofessorpray ofay Owlay Utchday anday Ighhay Ermangay inay ethay ollegecay ofay Antasay Ausclay
anday Stay. Ott’spay, otay omwhay Iay andedhay ethay orkway orfay anslationtray, ivinggay imhay aay
oxbay ofay ermspay andlescay orfay ishay ouble—thistray amesay Dray. Odheadsnay, osay oonsay asay
ehay iedspay ethay ookbay, assureday emay atthay an“Day Oopman”cay idday otnay eanmay e“Thay
Ooper,”cay utbay e“Thay Erchant.”may Inay ortshay, isthay ancientay anday earnedlay Owlay
Utchday ookbay eatedtray ofay ethay ommercecay ofay Ollandhay; anday, amongay otheray
ubjectssay, ontainedcay aay eryvay interestingay accountay ofay itsay alewhay isheryfay.
Anday inay isthay apterchay itay asway, eadedhay, eer,”“Smay oray at,”“Fay atthay Iay oundfay aay
onglay etailedday istlay ofay ethay outfitsay orfay ethay arderslay anday ellarscay ofay 180ay
ailsay ofay Utchday alemenwhay; omfray ichwhay istlay, asay anslatedtray byay Dray. Odheadsnay,
Iay anscribetray ethay ollowingfay:

400,000ay lbsay. ofay eefbay. 60,000ay lbsay. Ieslandfray orkpay. 150,000ay lbsay. ofay ockstay
ishfay. 550,000ay lbsay. ofay iscuitbay. 72,000ay lbsay. ofay oftsay eadbray. 2,800ay irkinsfay
ofay utterbay. 20,000ay lbsay. Exeltay &ay Eydenlay eesechay. 144,000ay lbsay. eesechay
obably(pray anay inferioray article)ay. 550ay ankersay ofay Enevagay. 10,800ay arrelsbay ofay
eerbay.

Ostmay atisticalstay ablestay areay archinglypay dryay inay ethay eadingray; otnay osay inay
ethay esentpray asecay, oweverhay, erewhay ethay eaderray isay oodedflay ithway olewhay
ipespay, arrelsbay, uartsqay, anday illsgay ofay oodgay ingay anday oodgay eerchay.

Atay ethay imetay, Iay evotedday eethray aysday otay ethay udiousstay igestingday ofay allay isthay
eerbay, eefbay, anday eadbray, uringday ichwhay anymay ofoundpray oughtsthay ereway
incidentallyay uggestedsay otay emay, apablecay ofay aay anscendentaltray anday Atonicplay
applicationay; anday, urthermorefay, Iay ompiledcay upplementarysay ablestay ofay myay
ownay, ouchingtay ethay obablepray uantityqay ofay ock-fishstay, etc.ay, onsumedcay byay
everyay Owlay Utchday arpooneerhay inay atthay ancientay Eenlandgray anday Itzbergenspay
alewhay isheryfay. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ethay amountay ofay utterbay, anday Exeltay anday
Eydenlay eesechay onsumedcay, eemssay amazingay. Iay imputeay itay, oughthay, otay eirthay
aturallynay unctuousay aturesnay, eingbay enderedray illstay oremay unctuousay byay ethay
aturenay ofay eirthay ocationvay, anday especiallyay byay eirthay ursuingpay eirthay amegay
inay osethay igidfray Olarpay Eassay, onay ethay eryvay oastscay ofay atthay Esquimauxay
ountrycay erewhay ethay onvivialcay ativesnay edgeplay eachay otheray inay umpersbay ofay
aintray oilay.

Ethay uantityqay ofay eerbay, ootay, isay eryvay argelay, 10,800ay arrelsbay. Ownay, asay osethay
olarpay isheriesfay ouldcay onlyay ebay osecutedpray inay ethay ortshay ummersay ofay atthay
imateclay, osay atthay ethay olewhay uisecray ofay oneay ofay esethay Utchday alemenwhay,
includingay ethay ortshay oyagevay otay anday omfray ethay Itzbergenspay easay, idday otnay
uchmay exceeday eethray onthsmay, aysay, anday eckoningray 30ay enmay otay eachay ofay eirthay
eetflay ofay 180ay ailsay, eway avehay 5,400ay Owlay Utchday eamensay inay allay; ereforethay, Iay
aysay, eway avehay eciselypray otway arrelsbay ofay eerbay erpay anmay, orfay aay elvetway eeks’way
allowanceay, exclusiveay ofay ishay airfay oportionpray ofay atthay 550ay ankersay ofay ingay.
Ownay, etherwhay esethay ingay anday eerbay arpooneershay, osay uddledfay asay oneay ightmay
ancyfay emthay otay avehay eenbay, ereway ethay ightray ortsay ofay enmay otay andstay upay inay aay
oat’sbay eadhay, anday aketay oodgay aimay atay ingflyay aleswhay; isthay ouldway eemsay
omewhatsay improbableay. Etyay eythay idday aimay atay emthay, anday ithay emthay ootay. Utbay
isthay asway eryvay arfay Orthnay, ebay itay ememberedray, erewhay eerbay agreesay ellway ithway
ethay onstitutioncay; uponay ethay Equatoray, inay ouray outhernsay isheryfay, eerbay ouldway
ebay aptay otay akemay ethay arpooneerhay eepyslay atay ethay ast-headmay anday oozybay inay ishay
oatbay; anday ievousgray osslay ightmay ensueay otay Antucketnay anday Ewnay Edfordbay.

Utbay onay oremay; enoughay ashay eenbay aidsay otay owshay atthay ethay olday Utchday alerswhay ofay
otway oray eethray enturiescay agoay ereway ighhay iverslay; anday atthay ethay Englishay
alerswhay avehay otnay eglectednay osay excellentay anay exampleay. Orfay, aysay eythay, enwhay
uisingcray inay anay emptyay ipshay, ifay ouyay ancay etgay othingnay etterbay outay ofay ethay
orldway, etgay aay oodgay innerday outay ofay itay, atay eastlay. Anday isthay emptiesay ethay
ecanterday.


APTERcHay 102ay. Aay Owerbay inay ethay Arsacidesay.

Ithertohay, inay escriptivelyday eatingtray ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, Iay avehay ieflychay
eltdway uponay ethay arvelsmay ofay ishay outeray aspectay; oray eparatelysay anday inay etailday
uponay omesay ewfay interioray ucturalstray eaturesfay. Utbay otay aay argelay anday oroughthay
eepingsway omprehensioncay ofay imhay, itay ehoovesbay emay ownay otay unbuttonay imhay illstay
urtherfay, anday untaggingay ethay ointspay ofay ishay osehay, unbucklingay ishay artersgay,
anday astingcay ooselay ethay ookshay anday ethay eyesay ofay ethay ointsjay ofay ishay innermostay
onesbay, etsay imhay eforebay ouyay inay ishay ultimatumay; atthay isay otay aysay, inay ishay
unconditionalay eletonskay.

Utbay owhay ownay, Ishmaelay? Owhay isay itay, atthay ouyay, aay eremay oarsmanay inay ethay
isheryfay, etendpray otay owknay aughtay aboutay ethay ubterraneansay artspay ofay ethay
alewhay? Idday eruditeay Ubbstay, ountedmay uponay ouryay apstancay, eliverday ectureslay
onay ethay anatomyay ofay ethay Etaceacay; anday byay elphay ofay ethay indlassway, oldhay upay aay
ecimenspay ibray orfay exhibitionay? Explainay elfthysay, Ishmaelay. Ancay ouyay andlay aay
ull-grownfay alewhay onay ouryay eckday orfay examinationay, asay aay ookcay ishesday aay
oast-pigray? Urelysay otnay. Aay eritablevay itnessway avehay ouyay ithertohay eenbay,
Ishmaelay; utbay avehay aay arecay owhay ouyay eizesay ethay ivilegepray ofay Onahjay aloneay;
ethay ivilegepray ofay iscoursingday uponay ethay oistsjay anday eamsbay; ethay aftersray,
idge-poleray, eepersslay, anday under-pinningsay, akingmay upay ethay ame-workfray ofay
eviathanlay; anday elikebay ofay ethay allow-vatstay, airy-roomsday, utteriesbay, anday
eeserieschay inay ishay owelsbay.

Iay onfesscay, atthay incesay Onahjay, ewfay alemenwhay avehay enetratedpay eryvay arfay
eneathbay ethay inskay ofay ethay adultay alewhay; everthelessnay, Iay avehay eenbay essedblay
ithway anay opportunityay otay issectday imhay inay iniaturemay. Inay aay ipshay Iay elongedbay
otay, aay allsmay ubcay Ermspay Alewhay asway onceay odilybay oistedhay otay ethay eckday orfay ishay
okepay oray agbay, otay akemay eathsshay orfay ethay arbsbay ofay ethay arpoonshay, anday orfay ethay
eadshay ofay ethay anceslay. Inkthay ouyay Iay etlay atthay ancechay ogay, ithoutway usingay myay
oat-hatchetbay anday ack-knifejay, anday eakingbray ethay ealsay anday eadingray allay ethay
ontentscay ofay atthay oungyay ubcay?

Anday asay orfay myay exactay owledgeknay ofay ethay onesbay ofay ethay eviathanlay inay eirthay
iganticgay, ullfay owngray evelopmentday, orfay atthay areray owledgeknay Iay amay indebteday
otay myay atelay oyalray iendfray Anquotray, ingkay ofay Anquetray, oneay ofay ethay Arsacidesay.
Orfay eingbay atay Anquetray, earsyay agoay, enwhay attacheday otay ethay ading-shiptray Eyday
ofay Algiersay, Iay asway inviteday otay endspay artpay ofay ethay Arsacideanay olidayshay ithway
ethay ordlay ofay Anquetray, atay ishay etiredray almpay illavay atay Upellapay; aay ea-sidesay
englay otnay eryvay arfay istantday omfray atwhay ouray ailorssay alledcay Amboo-Townbay, ishay
apitalcay.

Amongay anymay otheray inefay ualitiesqay, myay oyalray iendfray Anquotray, eingbay iftedgay
ithway aay evoutday ovelay orfay allay attersmay ofay arbaricbay ertuvay, adhay oughtbray
ogethertay inay Upellapay ateverwhay areray ingsthay ethay oremay ingeniousay ofay ishay
eoplepay ouldcay inventay; ieflychay arvedcay oodsway ofay onderfulway evicesday,
iselledchay ellsshay, inlaiday earsspay, ostlycay addlespay, aromaticay anoescay; anday
allay esethay istributedday amongay ateverwhay aturalnay ondersway, ethay
onder-freightedway, ibute-renderingtray avesway adhay astcay uponay ishay oresshay.

Iefchay amongay esethay atterlay asway aay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay, ichwhay, afteray anay
unusuallyay onglay agingray alegay, adhay eenbay oundfay eadday anday andedstray, ithway ishay
eadhay againstay aay ocoa-nutcay eetray, osewhay umage-likeplay, uftedtay oopingsdray
eemedsay ishay erdantvay etjay. Enwhay ethay astvay odybay adhay atay astlay eenbay ippedstray ofay
itsay athom-deepfay enfoldingsay, anday ethay onesbay ecomebay ustday dryay inay ethay unsay,
enthay ethay eletonskay asway arefullycay ansportedtray upay ethay Upellapay englay, erewhay
aay andgray empletay ofay ordlylay almspay ownay elteredshay itay.

Ethay ibsray ereway unghay ithway ophiestray; ethay ertebrævay ereway arvedcay ithway
Arsacideanay annalsay, inay angestray ieroglyphicshay; inay ethay ullskay, ethay iestspray
eptkay upay anay unextinguisheday aromaticay ameflay, osay atthay ethay icmystay eadhay againay
entsay orthfay itsay aporyvay outspay; ilewhay, uspendedsay omfray aay oughbay, ethay
errifictay owerlay awjay ibratedvay overay allay ethay evoteesday, ikelay ethay air-hunghay
ordsway atthay osay affrighteday Amoclesday.

Itay asway aay ondrousway ightsay. Ethay oodway asway eengray asay ossesmay ofay ethay Icyay Englay;
ethay eestray oodstay ighhay anday aughtyhay, eelingfay eirthay ivinglay apsay; ethay
industriousay earthay eneathbay asway asay aay eaver’sway oomlay, ithway aay orgeousgay
arpetcay onay itay, ereofwhay ethay ound-vinegray endrilstay ormedfay ethay arpway anday
oofway, anday ethay ivinglay owersflay ethay iguresfay. Allay ethay eestray, ithway allay eirthay
adenlay anchesbray; allay ethay ubsshray, anday ernsfay, anday assesgray; ethay
essage-carryingmay airay; allay esethay unceasinglyay ereway activeay. Oughthray ethay
acingslay ofay ethay eaveslay, ethay eatgray unsay eemedsay aay ingflyay uttleshay eavingway
ethay unwearieday erdurevay. Ohay, usybay eaverway! unseenay eaver!—pause!—oneway
ord!—whitherway owsflay ethay abricfay? atwhay alacepay aymay itay eckday? ereforewhay allay
esethay easelesscay oilingstay? Eakspay, eaver!—stayway thyay and!—buthay oneay inglesay
ordway ithway eethay! Ay—thenay uttleshay ies—theflay iguresfay oatflay omfray orthfay ethay
oomlay; ethay eshet-rushingfray arpetcay orfay everay idesslay awayay. Ethay eaver-godway,
ehay eavesway; anday byay atthay eavingway isay ehay eafenedday, atthay ehay earshay onay ortalmay
oicevay; anday byay atthay umminghay, eway, ootay, owhay ooklay onay ethay oomlay areay eafenedday;
anday onlyay enwhay eway escapeay itay allshay eway earhay ethay ousandthay oicesvay atthay eakspay
oughthray itay. Orfay evenay osay itay isay inay allay aterialmay actoriesfay. Ethay okenspay
ordsway atthay areay inaudibleay amongay ethay ingflyay indlesspay; osethay amesay ordsway
areay ainlyplay eardhay ithoutway ethay allsway, urstingbay omfray ethay openeday
asementscay. Erebythay avehay illainiesvay eenbay etectedday. Ahay, ortalmay! enthay, ebay
eedfulhay; orfay osay, inay allay isthay inday ofay ethay eatgray orld’sway oomlay, thyay
ubtlestsay inkingsthay aymay ebay overhearday afaray.

Ownay, amiday ethay eengray, ife-restlesslay oomlay ofay atthay Arsacideanay oodway, ethay
eatgray, itewhay, orshippedway eletonskay aylay ounging—alay iganticgay idleray! Etyay,
asay ethay ever-wovenay erdantvay arpway anday oofway intermixeday anday ummedhay arounday
imhay, ethay ightymay idleray eemedsay ethay unningcay eaverway; imselfhay allay ovenway overay
ithway ethay inesvay; everyay onthmay assumingay eenergray, esherfray erdurevay; utbay
imselfhay aay eletonskay. Ifelay oldedfay Eathday; Eathday ellisedtray Ifelay; ethay imgray
odgay ivedway ithway outhfulyay Ifelay, anday egatbay imhay urly-headedcay oriesglay.

Ownay, enwhay ithway oyalray Anquotray Iay isitedvay isthay ondrousway alewhay, anday awsay ethay
ullskay anay altaray, anday ethay artificialay okesmay ascendingay omfray erewhay ethay ealray
etjay adhay issueday, Iay arvelledmay atthay ethay ingkay ouldshay egardray aay apelchay asay anay
objectay ofay ertuvay. Ehay aughedlay. Utbay oremay Iay arvelledmay atthay ethay iestspray
ouldshay earsway atthay okysmay etjay ofay ishay asway enuinegay. Otay anday ofray Iay acedpay
eforebay isthay eleton—brushedskay ethay inesvay aside—brokeay oughthray ethay ibs—andray
ithway aay allbay ofay Arsacideanay inetway, anderedway, eddieday onglay amiday itsay anymay
indingway, adedshay olonnadescay anday arboursay. Utbay oonsay myay inelay asway outay; anday
ollowingfay itay ackbay, Iay emergeday omfray ethay openingay erewhay Iay entereday. Iay awsay onay
ivinglay ingthay ithinway; aughtnay asway erethay utbay onesbay.

Uttingcay emay aay eengray easuring-rodmay, Iay onceay oremay ivedday ithinway ethay
eletonskay. Omfray eirthay arrow-slitay inay ethay ullskay, ethay iestspray erceivedpay emay
akingtay ethay altitudeay ofay ethay inalfay ibray, ow“Hay ow!”nay eythay outedshay; ar’st“Day
outhay easuremay isthay ouray odgay! At’sthay orfay us.”ay Aye“ay, iests—wellpray, owhay onglay
oday eyay akemay imhay, en?”thay Utbay ereuponhay aay iercefay ontestcay oseray amongay emthay,
oncerningcay eetfay anday inchesay; eythay ackedcray eachay other’say oncesscay ithway
eirthay ard-sticks—theyay eatgray ullskay echoed—anday eizingsay atthay uckylay ancechay,
Iay uicklyqay oncludedcay myay ownay admeasurementsay.

Esethay admeasurementsay Iay ownay oposepray otay etsay eforebay ouyay. Utbay irstfay, ebay itay
ecordedray, atthay, inay isthay attermay, Iay amay otnay eefray otay utteray anyay anciedfay
easurementmay Iay easeplay. Ecausebay erethay areay eletonskay authoritiesay ouyay ancay
eferray otay, otay esttay myay accuracyay. Erethay isay aay Eviathaniclay Useummay, eythay elltay
emay, inay Ullhay, Englanday, oneay ofay ethay alingwhay ortspay ofay atthay ountrycay, erewhay
eythay avehay omesay inefay ecimensspay ofay in-backsfay anday otheray aleswhay. Ikewiselay,
Iay avehay eardhay atthay inay ethay useummay ofay Anchestermay, inay Ewnay Ampshirehay, eythay
avehay atwhay ethay oprietorspray allcay e“thay onlyay erfectpay ecimenspay ofay aay
Eenlandgray oray Iverray Alewhay inay ethay Uniteday Ates.”stay Oreovermay, atay aay aceplay inay
Orkshireyay, Englanday, Urtonbay Onstablecay byay amenay, aay ertaincay Irsay Iffordclay
Onstablecay ashay inay ishay ossessionpay ethay eletonskay ofay aay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay ofay
oderatemay izesay, byay onay eansmay ofay ethay ull-grownfay agnitudemay ofay myay iendfray
Ingkay Anquo’stray.

Inay othbay asescay, ethay andedstray aleswhay otay ichwhay esethay otway eletonsskay
elongedbay, ereway originallyay aimedclay byay eirthay oprietorspray uponay imilarsay
oundsgray. Ingkay Anquotray eizingsay ishay ecausebay ehay antedway itay; anday Irsay
Iffordclay, ecausebay ehay asway ordlay ofay ethay eignoriessay ofay osethay artspay. Irsay
Ifford’sclay alewhay ashay eenbay articulateday oughoutthray; osay atthay, ikelay aay eatgray
estchay ofay awersdray, ouyay ancay openay anday utshay imhay, inay allay ishay onybay
avities—spreadcay outay ishay ibsray ikelay aay iganticgay an—andfay ingsway allay ayday uponay
ishay owerlay awjay. Ockslay areay otay ebay utpay uponay omesay ofay ishay ap-doorstray anday
uttersshay; anday aay ootmanfay illway owshay oundray uturefay isitorsvay ithway aay unchbay ofay
eyskay atay ishay idesay. Irsay Iffordclay inksthay ofay argingchay opencetway orfay aay eeppay
atay ethay isperingwhay allerygay inay ethay inalspay olumncay; eepencethray otay earhay ethay
echoay inay ethay ollowhay ofay ishay erebellumcay; anday ixpencesay orfay ethay unrivalleday
iewvay omfray ishay oreheadfay.

Ethay eletonskay imensionsday Iay allshay ownay oceedpray otay etsay ownday areay opiedcay
erbatimvay omfray myay ightray armay, erewhay Iay adhay emthay attooedtay; asay inay myay ildway
anderingsway atay atthay eriodpay, erethay asway onay otheray ecuresay ayway ofay eservingpray
uchsay aluablevay atisticsstay. Utbay asay Iay asway owdedcray orfay acespay, anday ishedway
ethay otheray artspay ofay myay odybay otay emainray aay ankblay agepay orfay aay oempay Iay asway enthay
omposing—atcay eastlay, atwhay untattooeday artspay ightmay emain—Iray idday otnay
oubletray elfmysay ithway ethay odday inchesay; ornay, indeeday, ouldshay inchesay atay allay
enteray intoay aay ongenialcay admeasurementay ofay ethay alewhay.


APTERcHay 103ay. Easurementmay ofay Ethay Ale’swhay Eletonskay.

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, Iay ishway otay aylay eforebay ouyay aay articularpay, ainplay
atementstay, ouchingtay ethay ivinglay ulkbay ofay isthay eviathanlay, osewhay eletonskay
eway areay ieflybray otay exhibitay. Uchsay aay atementstay aymay ovepray usefulay erehay.

Accordingay otay aay arefulcay alculationcay Iay avehay ademay, anday ichwhay Iay artlypay asebay
uponay Aptaincay Oresby’sscay estimateay, ofay eventysay onstay orfay ethay argestlay izedsay
Eenlandgray alewhay ofay ixtysay eetfay inay engthlay; accordingay otay myay arefulcay
alculationcay, Iay aysay, aay Ermspay Alewhay ofay ethay argestlay agnitudemay, etweenbay
eighty-fiveay anday inetynay eetfay inay engthlay, anday omethingsay esslay anthay ortyfay
eetfay inay itsay ullestfay ircumferencecay, uchsay aay alewhay illway eighway atay eastlay
inetynay onstay; osay atthay, eckoningray irteenthay enmay otay aay ontay, ehay ouldway
onsiderablycay outweighay ethay ombinedcay opulationpay ofay aay olewhay illagevay ofay oneay
ousandthay oneay undredhay inhabitantsay.

Inkthay ouyay otnay enthay atthay ainsbray, ikelay okedyay attlecay, ouldshay ebay utpay otay
isthay eviathanlay, otay akemay imhay atay allay udgebay otay anyay andsman’slay imaginationay?

Avinghay alreadyay inay ariousvay aysway utpay eforebay ouyay ishay ullskay, out-holespay,
awjay, eethtay, ailtay, oreheadfay, insfay, anday iversday otheray artspay, Iay allshay ownay
implysay ointpay outay atwhay isay ostmay interestingay inay ethay eneralgay ulkbay ofay ishay
unobstructeday onesbay. Utbay asay ethay olossalcay ullskay embracesay osay eryvay argelay aay
oportionpray ofay ethay entireay extentay ofay ethay eletonskay; asay itay isay byay arfay ethay
ostmay omplicatedcay artpay; anday asay othingnay isay otay ebay epeatedray oncerningcay itay
inay isthay apterchay, ouyay ustmay otnay ailfay otay arrycay itay inay ouryay indmay, oray underay
ouryay armay, asay eway oceedpray, otherwiseay ouyay illway otnay aingay aay ompletecay otionnay
ofay ethay eneralgay ucturestray eway areay aboutay otay iewvay.

Inay engthlay, ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eletonskay atay Anquetray easuredmay eventy-twosay
eetfay; osay atthay enwhay ullyfay investeday anday extendeday inay ifelay, ehay ustmay avehay
eenbay inetynay eetfay onglay; orfay inay ethay alewhay, ethay eletonskay oseslay aboutay oneay
ifthfay inay engthlay omparedcay ithway ethay ivinglay odybay. Ofay isthay eventy-twosay
eetfay, ishay ullskay anday awjay omprisedcay omesay entytway eetfay, eavinglay omesay iftyfay
eetfay ofay ainplay ack-bonebay. Attacheday otay isthay ack-bonebay, orfay omethingsay esslay
anthay aay irdthay ofay itsay engthlay, asway ethay ightymay ircularcay asketbay ofay ibsray
ichwhay onceay encloseday ishay italsvay.

Otay emay isthay astvay ivory-ribbeday estchay, ithway ethay onglay, unrelieveday inespay,
extendingay arfay awayay omfray itay inay aay aightstray inelay, otnay aay ittlelay esembledray
ethay ullhay ofay aay eatgray ipshay ew-laidnay uponay ethay ocksstay, enwhay onlyay omesay
entytway ofay erhay akednay ow-ribsbay areay inserteday, anday ethay eelkay isay otherwiseay,
orfay ethay imetay, utbay aay onglay, isconnectedday imbertay.

Ethay ibsray ereway entay onay aay idesay. Ethay irstfay, otay eginbay omfray ethay ecknay, asway
earlynay ixsay eetfay onglay; ethay econdsay, irdthay, anday ourthfay ereway eachay
uccessivelysay ongerlay, illtay ouyay amecay otay ethay imaxclay ofay ethay ifthfay, oray oneay
ofay ethay iddlemay ibsray, ichwhay easuredmay eightay eetfay anday omesay inchesay. Omfray
atthay artpay, ethay emainingray ibsray iminishedday, illtay ethay enthtay anday astlay onlyay
annedspay ivefay eetfay anday omesay inchesay. Inay eneralgay icknessthay, eythay allay orebay
aay eemlysay orrespondencecay otay eirthay engthlay. Ethay iddlemay ibsray ereway ethay ostmay
archeday. Inay omesay ofay ethay Arsacidesay eythay areay useday orfay eamsbay ereonwhay otay aylay
ootpathfay idgesbray overay allsmay eamsstray.

Inay onsideringcay esethay ibsray, Iay ouldcay otnay utbay ebay uckstray aneway ithway ethay
ircumstancecay, osay ariouslyvay epeatedray inay isthay ookbay, atthay ethay eletonskay ofay
ethay alewhay isay byay onay eansmay ethay ouldmay ofay ishay investeday ormfay. Ethay argestlay ofay
ethay Anquetray ibsray, oneay ofay ethay iddlemay onesay, occupieday atthay artpay ofay ethay
ishfay ichwhay, inay ifelay, isay eatestgray inay epthday. Ownay, ethay eatestgray epthday ofay
ethay investeday odybay ofay isthay articularpay alewhay ustmay avehay eenbay atay eastlay
ixteensay eetfay; ereaswhay, ethay orrespondingcay ibray easuredmay utbay ittlelay oremay
anthay eightay eetfay. Osay atthay isthay ibray onlyay onveyedcay alfhay ofay ethay uetray otionnay
ofay ethay ivinglay agnitudemay ofay atthay artpay. Esidesbay, orfay omesay ayway, erewhay Iay
ownay awsay utbay aay akednay inespay, allay atthay adhay eenbay onceay appedwray oundray ithway
onstay ofay addeday ulkbay inay eshflay, usclemay, oodblay, anday owelsbay. Illstay oremay, orfay
ethay ampleay insfay, Iay erehay awsay utbay aay ewfay isorderedday ointsjay; anday inay aceplay ofay
ethay eightyway anday ajesticmay, utbay onelessbay ukesflay, anay utteray ankblay!

Owhay ainvay anday oolishfay, enthay, oughtthay Iay, orfay imidtay untravelleday anmay otay tryay
otay omprehendcay arightay isthay ondrousway alewhay, byay erelymay oringpay overay ishay
eadday attenuateday eletonskay, etchedstray inay isthay eacefulpay oodway. Onay. Onlyay inay
ethay earthay ofay uickestqay erilspay; onlyay enwhay ithinway ethay eddyingsay ofay ishay
angryay ukesflay; onlyay onay ethay ofoundpray unboundeday easay, ancay ethay ullyfay
investeday alewhay ebay ulytray anday ivinglylay oundfay outay.

Utbay ethay inespay. Orfay atthay, ethay estbay ayway eway ancay onsidercay itay isay, ithway aay
anecray, otay ilepay itsay onesbay ighhay upay onay enday. Onay eedyspay enterpriseay. Utbay ownay
it’say oneday, itay ookslay uchmay ikelay Ompey’spay Illarpay.

Erethay areay ortyfay anday odday ertebrævay inay allay, ichwhay inay ethay eletonskay areay otnay
ockedlay ogethertay. Eythay ostlymay ielay ikelay ethay eatgray obbedknay ocksblay onay aay
Othicgay irespay, ormingfay olidsay oursescay ofay eavyhay asonrymay. Ethay argestlay, aay
iddlemay oneay, isay inay idthway omethingsay esslay anthay eethray eetfay, anday inay epthday
oremay anthay ourfay. Ethay allestsmay, erewhay ethay inespay aperstay awayay intoay ethay
ailtay, isay onlyay otway inchesay inay idthway, anday ookslay omethingsay ikelay aay itewhay
illiard-ballbay. Iay asway oldtay atthay erethay ereway illstay allersmay onesay, utbay eythay
adhay eenbay ostlay byay omesay ittlelay annibalcay urchinsay, ethay iest’spray ildrenchay,
owhay adhay olenstay emthay otay ayplay arblesmay ithway. Usthay eway eesay owhay atthay ethay
inespay ofay evenay ethay ugesthay ofay ivinglay ingsthay aperstay offay atay astlay intoay
implesay ild’schay ayplay.


APTERcHay 104ay. Ethay Ossilfay Alewhay.

Omfray ishay ightymay ulkbay ethay alewhay affordsay aay ostmay ongenialcay emethay ereonwhay
otay enlargeay, amplifyay, anday enerallygay expatiateay. Ouldway ouyay, ouyay ouldcay otnay
ompresscay imhay. Byay oodgay ightsray ehay ouldshay onlyay ebay eatedtray ofay inay imperialay
oliofay. Otnay otay elltay overay againay ishay urlongsfay omfray iraclespay otay ailtay, anday
ethay ardsyay ehay easuresmay aboutay ethay aistway; onlyay inkthay ofay ethay iganticgay
involutionsay ofay ishay intestinesay, erewhay eythay ielay inay imhay ikelay eatgray ablescay
anday awsershay oiledcay awayay inay ethay ubterraneansay orlop-deckay ofay aay
ine-of-battle-shiplay.

Incesay Iay avehay undertakenay otay anhandlemay isthay Eviathanlay, itay ehoovesbay emay otay
approveay elfmysay omniscientlyay exhaustiveay inay ethay enterpriseay; otnay
overlookingay ethay inutestmay eminalsay ermsgay ofay ishay oodblay, anday inningspay imhay
outay otay ethay uttermostay oilcay ofay ishay owelsbay. Avinghay alreadyay escribedday imhay
inay ostmay ofay ishay esentpray abitatoryhay anday anatomicalay eculiaritiespay, itay ownay
emainsray otay agnifymay imhay inay anay archæologicalay, ossiliferousfay, anday
antediluvianay ointpay ofay iewvay. Applieday otay anyay otheray eaturecray anthay ethay
Eviathan—tolay anay antay oray aay ea—suchflay ortlypay ermstay ightmay ustlyjay ebay eemedday
unwarrantablyay andiloquentgray. Utbay enwhay Eviathanlay isay ethay exttay, ethay asecay
isay altereday. Ainfay amay Iay otay aggerstay otay isthay empriseay underay ethay eightiestway
ordsway ofay ethay ictionaryday. Anday erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay eneverwhay itay ashay eenbay
onvenientcay otay onsultcay oneay inay ethay oursecay ofay esethay issertationsday, Iay avehay
invariablyay useday aay ugehay uartoqay editionay ofay Ohnsonjay, expresslyay urchasedpay
orfay atthay urposepay; ecausebay atthay amousfay exicographer’slay uncommonay ersonalpay
ulkbay oremay ittedfay imhay otay ompilecay aay exiconlay otay ebay useday byay aay alewhay authoray
ikelay emay.

Oneay oftenay earshay ofay iterswray atthay iseray anday ellsway ithway eirthay ubjectsay,
oughthay itay aymay eemsay utbay anay ordinaryay oneay. Owhay, enthay, ithway emay, itingwray ofay
isthay Eviathanlay? Unconsciouslyay myay irographychay expandsay intoay acardplay
apitalscay. Ivegay emay aay ondor’scay uillqay! Ivegay emay Esuvius’vay atercray orfay anay
inkstanday! Iendsfray, oldhay myay armsay! Orfay inay ethay eremay actay ofay enningpay myay
oughtsthay ofay isthay Eviathanlay, eythay earyway emay, anday akemay emay aintfay ithway eirthay
outreachingay omprehensivenesscay ofay eepsway, asay ifay otay includeay ethay olewhay
irclecay ofay ethay iencesscay, anday allay ethay enerationsgay ofay aleswhay, anday enmay, anday
astodonsmay, astpay, esentpray, anday otay omecay, ithway allay ethay evolvingray anoramaspay
ofay empireay onay earthay, anday oughoutthray ethay olewhay universeay, otnay excludingay
itsay uburbssay. Uchsay, anday osay agnifyingmay, isay ethay irtuevay ofay aay argelay anday
iberallay emethay! Eway expanday otay itsay ulkbay. Otay oducepray aay ightymay ookbay, ouyay
ustmay oosechay aay ightymay emethay. Onay eatgray anday enduringay olumevay ancay everay ebay
ittenwray onay ethay eaflay, oughthay anymay erethay ebay owhay avehay iedtray itay.

Ereay enteringay uponay ethay ubjectsay ofay Ossilfay Aleswhay, Iay esentpray myay
edentialscray asay aay eologistgay, byay atingstay atthay inay myay iscellaneousmay imetay Iay
avehay eenbay aay one-masonstay, anday alsoay aay eatgray iggerday ofay itchesday, analscay anday
ellsway, ine-vaultsway, ellarscay, anday isternscay ofay allay ortssay. Ikewiselay, byay
ayway ofay eliminarypray, Iay esireday otay emindray ethay eaderray, atthay ilewhay inay ethay
earlieray eologicalgay atastray erethay areay oundfay ethay ossilsfay ofay onstersmay ownay
almostay ompletelycay extinctay; ethay ubsequentsay elicsray iscoveredday inay atwhay areay
alledcay ethay Ertiarytay ormationsfay eemsay ethay onnectingcay, oray atay anyay ateray
intercepteday inkslay, etweenbay ethay antichronicalay eaturescray, anday osethay osewhay
emoteray osteritypay areay aidsay otay avehay entereday ethay Arkay; allay ethay Ossilfay
Aleswhay ithertohay iscoveredday elongbay otay ethay Ertiarytay eriodpay, ichwhay isay ethay
astlay ecedingpray ethay uperficialsay ormationsfay. Anday oughthay onenay ofay emthay
eciselypray answeray otay anyay ownknay eciesspay ofay ethay esentpray imetay, eythay areay etyay
ufficientlysay akinay otay emthay inay eneralgay espectsray, otay ustifyjay eirthay akingtay
ankray asay Etaceancay ossilsfay.

Etachedday okenbray ossilsfay ofay e-adamitepray aleswhay, agmentsfray ofay eirthay onesbay
anday eletonsskay, avehay ithinway irtythay earsyay astpay, atay ariousvay intervalsay,
eenbay oundfay atay ethay asebay ofay ethay Alpsay, inay Ombardylay, inay Ancefray, inay Englanday,
inay Otlandscay, anday inay ethay Atesstay ofay Ouisianalay, Ississippimay, anday Alabamaay.
Amongay ethay oremay uriouscay ofay uchsay emainsray isay artpay ofay aay ullskay, ichwhay inay ethay
earyay 1779ay asway isinterredday inay ethay Ueray Auphineday inay Arispay, aay ortshay eetstray
openingay almostay irectlyday uponay ethay alacepay ofay ethay Uileriestay; anday onesbay
isinterredday inay excavatingay ethay eatgray ocksday ofay Antwerpay, inay Apoleon’snay
imetay. Uviercay onouncedpray esethay agmentsfray otay avehay elongedbay otay omesay
utterlyay unknownay Eviathaniclay eciesspay.

Utbay byay arfay ethay ostmay onderfulway ofay allay Etaceancay elicsray asway ethay almostay
ompletecay astvay eletonskay ofay anay extinctay onstermay, oundfay inay ethay earyay 1842ay,
onay ethay antationplay ofay Udgejay Eaghcray, inay Alabamaay. Ethay awe-strickenay
edulouscray avesslay inay ethay icinityvay ooktay itay orfay ethay onesbay ofay oneay ofay ethay
allenfay angelsay. Ethay Alabamaay octorsday eclaredday itay aay ugehay eptileray, anday
estowedbay uponay itay ethay amenay ofay Asilosaurusbay. Utbay omesay ecimenspay onesbay ofay
itay eingbay akentay acrossay ethay easay otay Owenay, ethay Englishay Anatomistay, itay urnedtay
outay atthay isthay allegeday eptileray asway aay alewhay, oughthay ofay aay epartedday
eciesspay. Aay ignificantsay illustrationay ofay ethay actfay, againay anday againay
epeatedray inay isthay ookbay, atthay ethay eletonskay ofay ethay alewhay urnishesfay utbay
ittlelay ueclay otay ethay apeshay ofay ishay ullyfay investeday odybay. Osay Owenay
echristenedray ethay onstermay Euglodonzay; anday inay ishay aperpay eadray eforebay ethay
Ondonlay Eologicalgay Ocietysay, onouncedpray itay, inay ubstancesay, oneay ofay ethay ostmay
extraordinaryay eaturescray ichwhay ethay utationsmay ofay ethay obeglay avehay ottedblay
outay ofay existenceay.

Enwhay Iay andstay amongay esethay ightymay Eviathanlay eletonsskay, ullsskay, uskstay,
awsjay, ibsray, anday ertebrævay, allay aracterizedchay byay artialpay esemblancesray otay
ethay existingay eedsbray ofay ea-monsterssay; utbay atay ethay amesay imetay earingbay onay
ethay otheray andhay imilarsay affinitiesay otay ethay annihilateday antichronicalay
Eviathanslay, eirthay incalculableay eniorssay; Iay amay, byay aay oodflay, ornebay ackbay otay
atthay ondrousway eriodpay, ereay imetay itselfay ancay ebay aidsay otay avehay egunbay; orfay
imetay eganbay ithway anmay. Erehay Aturn’ssay eygray aoschay ollsray overay emay, anday Iay
obtainay imday, udderingshay impsesglay intoay osethay Olarpay eternitiesay; enwhay
edgedway astionsbay ofay iceay essedpray ardhay uponay atwhay areay ownay ethay Opicstray; anday
inay allay ethay 25,000ay ilesmay ofay isthay orld’sway ircumferencecay, otnay anay
inhabitableay and’shay eadthbray ofay andlay asway isiblevay. Enthay ethay olewhay orldway
asway ethay ale’swhay; anday, ingkay ofay eationcray, ehay eftlay ishay akeway alongay ethay
esentpray ineslay ofay ethay Andesay anday ethay Immalehshay. Owhay ancay owshay aay edigreepay
ikelay Eviathanlay? Ahab’say arpoonhay adhay edshay olderay oodblay anthay ethay Araoh’sphay.
Ethuselahmay eemssay aay ool-boyschay. Iay ooklay oundray otay akeshay andshay ithway Emshay. Iay
amay orror-struckhay atay isthay antemosaicay, unsourceday existenceay ofay ethay
unspeakableay errorstay ofay ethay alewhay, ichwhay, avinghay eenbay eforebay allay imetay,
ustmay eedsnay existay afteray allay umanehay agesay areay overay.

Utbay otnay aloneay ashay isthay Eviathanlay eftlay ishay e-adamitepray acestray inay ethay
ereotypestay atesplay ofay aturenay, anday inay imestonelay anday arlmay equeathedbay ishay
ancientay ustbay; utbay uponay Egyptianay abletstay, osewhay antiquityay eemssay otay aimclay
orfay emthay anay almostay ossiliferousfay aracterchay, eway indfay ethay unmistakableay
intpray ofay ishay infay. Inay anay apartmentay ofay ethay eatgray empletay ofay Enderahday, omesay
iftyfay earsyay agoay, erethay asway iscoveredday uponay ethay anitegray eilingcay aay
ulpturedscay anday aintedpay anisphereplay, aboundingay inay entaurscay, iffinsgray,
anday olphinsday, imilarsay otay ethay otesquegray iguresfay onay ethay elestialcay obeglay
ofay ethay odernsmay. Idingglay amongay emthay, olday Eviathanlay amsway asay ofay oreyay; asway
erethay immingsway inay atthay anisphereplay, enturiescay eforebay Olomonsay asway
adledcray.

Ornay ustmay erethay ebay omitteday anotheray angestray attestationay ofay ethay antiquityay
ofay ethay alewhay, inay ishay ownay osseousay ost-diluvianpay ealityray, asay etsay ownday byay
ethay enerablevay Ohnjay Eolay, ethay olday Arbarybay avellertray.

ot“Nay arfay omfray ethay Ea-sidesay, eythay avehay aay Empletay, ethay Aftersray anday Eamsbay
ofay ichwhay areay ademay ofay Ale-Boneswhay; orfay Aleswhay ofay aay onstrousmay izesay areay
oftentimesay astcay upay eadday uponay atthay oreshay. Ethay Ommoncay Eoplepay imagineay,
atthay byay aay ecretsay Owerpay estowedbay byay Odgay uponay ethay Empletay, onay Alewhay ancay
asspay itay ithoutway immediateay eathday. Utbay ethay uthtray ofay ethay Attermay isay, atthay
onay eitheray idesay ofay ethay Empletay, erethay areay Ocksray atthay ootshay otway Ilesmay intoay
ethay Easay, anday oundway ethay Aleswhay enwhay eythay ightlay uponay em’ay. Eythay eepkay aay
Ale’swhay Ibray ofay anay incredibleay engthlay orfay aay Iraclemay, ichwhay inglyay uponay ethay
Oundgray ithway itsay onvexcay artpay uppermostay, akesmay anay Archay, ethay Eadhay ofay ichwhay
annotcay ebay eachedray byay aay Anmay uponay aay Amel’scay Ackbay. Isthay Ibray ays(say Ohnjay
Eolay) isay aidsay otay avehay aynlay erethay aay undredhay Earsyay eforebay Iay awsay itay. Eirthay
Istorianshay affirmay, atthay aay Ophetpray owhay ophesy’dpray ofay Ahometmay, amecay omfray
isthay Empletay, anday omesay oday otnay andstay otay assertay, atthay ethay Ophetpray Onasjay
asway astcay orthfay byay ethay Alewhay atay ethay Asebay ofay ethay Emple.”tay

Inay isthay Africay Empletay ofay ethay Alewhay Iay eavelay ouyay, eaderray, anday ifay ouyay ebay aay
Antucketernay, anday aay alemanwhay, ouyay illway ilentlysay orshipway erethay.


APTERcHay 105ay. Oesday ethay Ale’swhay Agnitudemay Iminish?—Willday Ehay Erishpay?

Inasmuchay, enthay, asay isthay Eviathanlay omescay ounderingflay ownday uponay usay omfray
ethay ead-watershay ofay ethay Eternitiesay, itay aymay ebay itlyfay inquireday, etherwhay,
inay ethay onglay oursecay ofay ishay enerationsgay, ehay ashay otnay egeneratedday omfray ethay
originalay ulkbay ofay ishay iressay.

Utbay uponay investigationay eway indfay, atthay otnay onlyay areay ethay aleswhay ofay ethay
esentpray ayday uperiorsay inay agnitudemay otay osethay osewhay ossilfay emainsray areay
oundfay inay ethay Ertiarytay emsystay embracing(ay aay istinctday eologicalgay eriodpay
iorpray otay an)may, utbay ofay ethay aleswhay oundfay inay atthay Ertiarytay emsystay, osethay
elongingbay otay itsay atterlay ormationsfay exceeday inay izesay osethay ofay itsay earlieray
onesay.

Ofay allay ethay e-adamitepray aleswhay etyay exhumeday, byay arfay ethay argestlay isay ethay
Alabamaay oneay entionedmay inay ethay astlay apterchay, anday atthay asway esslay anthay
eventysay eetfay inay engthlay inay ethay eletonskay. Ereaswhay, eway avehay alreadyay eensay,
atthay ethay ape-measuretay ivesgay eventy-twosay eetfay orfay ethay eletonskay ofay aay
argelay izedsay odernmay alewhay. Anday Iay avehay eardhay, onay alemen’swhay authorityay,
atthay Ermspay Aleswhay avehay eenbay apturedcay earnay aay undredhay eetfay onglay atay ethay
imetay ofay apturecay.

Utbay aymay itay otnay ebay, atthay ilewhay ethay aleswhay ofay ethay esentpray ourhay areay anay
advanceay inay agnitudemay uponay osethay ofay allay eviouspray eologicalgay eriodspay; aymay
itay otnay ebay, atthay incesay Adam’say imetay eythay avehay egeneratedday?

Assuredlyay, eway ustmay oncludecay osay, ifay eway areay otay editcray ethay accountsay ofay
uchsay entlemengay asay Inyplay, anday ethay ancientay aturalistsnay enerallygay. Orfay
Inyplay ellstay usay ofay aleswhay atthay embraceday acresay ofay ivinglay ulkbay, anday
Aldrovandusay ofay othersay ichwhay easuredmay eightay undredhay eetfay inay ength—Ropelay
Alksway anday Amesthay Unnelstay ofay Aleswhay! Anday evenay inay ethay aysday ofay Anksbay anday
Olandersay, Ooke’scay aturalistsnay, eway indfay aay Anishday embermay ofay ethay Academyay
ofay Iencesscay ettingsay ownday ertaincay Icelanday Aleswhay eydan-siskur(ray, oray
Inkledwray Elliesbay) atay oneay undredhay anday entytway ardsyay; atthay isay, eethray
undredhay anday ixtysay eetfay. Anday Acépèdelay, ethay Enchfray aturalistnay, inay ishay
elaborateay istoryhay ofay aleswhay, inay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ishay orkway age(pay
3)ay, etssay ownday ethay Ightray Alewhay atay oneay undredhay etresmay, eethray undredhay anday
enty-eighttway eetfay. Anday isthay orkway asway ublishedpay osay atelay asay A.Day. 1825ay.

Utbay illway anyay alemanwhay elievebay esethay oriesstay? Onay. Ethay alewhay ofay o-daytay isay
asay igbay asay ishay ancestorsay inay Iny’splay imetay. Anday ifay everay Iay ogay erewhay Inyplay
isay, Iay, aay alemanwhay ore(may anthay ehay as)way, illway akemay oldbay otay elltay imhay osay.
Ecausebay Iay annotcay understanday owhay itay isay, atthay ilewhay ethay Egyptianay ummiesmay
atthay ereway uriedbay ousandsthay ofay earsyay eforebay evenay Inyplay asway ornbay, oday otnay
easuremay osay uchmay inay eirthay offinscay asay aay odernmay Entuckiankay inay ishay ockssay;
anday ilewhay ethay attlecay anday otheray animalsay ulpturedscay onay ethay oldestay
Egyptianay anday Inevehnay abletstay, byay ethay elativeray oportionspray inay ichwhay eythay
areay awndray, ustjay asay ainlyplay ovepray atthay ethay igh-bredhay, all-fedstay, izepray
attlecay ofay Ithfieldsmay, otnay onlyay equalay, utbay arfay exceeday inay agnitudemay ethay
attestfay ofay Araoh’sphay atfay inekay; inay ethay acefay ofay allay isthay, Iay illway otnay
admitay atthay ofay allay animalsay ethay alewhay aloneay ouldshay avehay egeneratedday.

Utbay illstay anotheray inquiryay emainsray; oneay oftenay agitateday byay ethay oremay
econditeray Antucketersnay. Etherwhay owingay otay ethay almostay omniscientay
ook-outslay atay ethay ast-headsmay ofay ethay ale-shipswhay, ownay enetratingpay evenay
oughthray Ehring’sbay aitsstray, anday intoay ethay emotestray ecretsay awersdray anday
ockerslay ofay ethay orldway; anday ethay ousandthay arpoonshay anday anceslay artedday alongay
allay ontinentalcay oastscay; ethay ootmay ointpay isay, etherwhay Eviathanlay ancay onglay
endureay osay ideway aay asechay, anday osay emorselessray aay avochay; etherwhay ehay ustmay otnay
atay astlay ebay exterminateday omfray ethay atersway, anday ethay astlay alewhay, ikelay ethay
astlay anmay, okesmay ishay astlay ipepay, anday enthay imselfhay evaporateay inay ethay inalfay
uffpay.

Omparingcay ethay umpedhay erdshay ofay aleswhay ithway ethay umpedhay erdshay ofay uffalobay,
ichwhay, otnay ortyfay earsyay agoay, overspreaday byay enstay ofay ousandsthay ethay
airiespray ofay Illinoisay anday Issourimay, anday ookshay eirthay ironay anesmay anday
owledscay ithway eirthay under-clottedthay owsbray uponay ethay itessay ofay opulouspay
iver-capitalsray, erewhay ownay ethay olitepay okerbray ellssay ouyay andlay atay aay ollarday
anay inchay; inay uchsay aay omparisoncay anay irresistibleay argumentay ouldway eemsay
urnishedfay, otay owshay atthay ethay untedhay alewhay annotcay ownay escapeay eedyspay
extinctionay.

Utbay ouyay ustmay ooklay atay isthay attermay inay everyay ightlay. Oughthay osay ortshay aay
eriodpay ago—notay aay oodgay ifetime—thelay ensuscay ofay ethay uffalobay inay Illinoisay
exceededay ethay ensuscay ofay enmay ownay inay Ondonlay, anday oughthay atay ethay esentpray ayday
otnay oneay ornhay oray oofhay ofay emthay emainsray inay allay atthay egionray; anday oughthay ethay
ausecay ofay isthay ondrousway exterminationay asway ethay earspay ofay anmay; etyay ethay arfay
ifferentday aturenay ofay ethay ale-huntwhay eremptorilypay orbidsfay osay ingloriousay
anay enday otay ethay Eviathanlay. Ortyfay enmay inay oneay ipshay untinghay ethay Ermspay Aleswhay
orfay orty-eightfay onthsmay inkthay eythay avehay oneday extremelyay ellway, anday ankthay
Odgay, ifay atay astlay eythay arrycay omehay ethay oilay ofay ortyfay ishfay. Ereaswhay, inay ethay
aysday ofay ethay olday Anadiancay anday Indianay untershay anday apperstray ofay ethay Estway,
enwhay ethay arfay estway in(ay osewhay unsetsay unssay illstay iseray) asway aay ildernessway
anday aay irginvay, ethay amesay umbernay ofay occasinedmay enmay, orfay ethay amesay umbernay ofay
onthsmay, ountedmay onay orsehay insteaday ofay ailingsay inay ipsshay, ouldway avehay ainslay
otnay ortyfay, utbay ortyfay ousandthay anday oremay uffaloesbay; aay actfay atthay, ifay eednay
ereway, ouldcay ebay atisticallystay atedstay.

Ornay, onsideredcay arightay, oesday itay eemsay anyay argumentay inay avourfay ofay ethay
adualgray extinctionay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, orfay exampleay, atthay inay ormerfay
earsyay e(thay atterlay artpay ofay ethay astlay enturycay, aysay) esethay Eviathanslay, inay
allsmay odspay, ereway encountereday uchmay ofteneray anthay atay esentpray, anday, inay
onsequencecay, ethay oyagesvay ereway otnay osay olongedpray, anday ereway alsoay uchmay oremay
emunerativeray. Ecausebay, asay ashay eenbay elsewhereay oticednay, osethay aleswhay,
influenceday byay omesay iewsvay otay afetysay, ownay imsway ethay eassay inay immenseay
aravanscay, osay atthay otay aay argelay egreeday ethay atteredscay olitariessay, okesyay,
anday odspay, anday oolsschay ofay otheray aysday areay ownay aggregateday intoay astvay utbay
idelyway eparatedsay, unfrequentay armiesay. Atthay isay allay. Anday equallyay
allaciousfay eemssay ethay onceitcay, atthay ecausebay ethay o-calledsay ale-bonewhay
aleswhay onay ongerlay aunthay anymay oundsgray inay ormerfay earsyay aboundingay ithway
emthay, encehay atthay eciesspay alsoay isay ecliningday. Orfay eythay areay onlyay eingbay
ivendray omfray omontorypray otay apecay; anday ifay oneay oastcay isay onay ongerlay enliveneday
ithway eirthay etsjay, enthay, ebay uresay, omesay otheray anday emoterray andstray ashay eenbay
eryvay ecentlyray artledstay byay ethay unfamiliaray ectaclespay.

Urthermorefay: oncerningcay esethay astlay entionedmay Eviathanslay, eythay avehay otway
irmfay ortressesfay, ichwhay, inay allay umanhay obabilitypray, illway orfay everay emainray
impregnableay. Anday asay uponay ethay invasionay ofay eirthay alleysvay, ethay ostyfray
Isssway avehay etreatedray otay eirthay ountainsmay; osay, untedhay omfray ethay avannassay
anday adesglay ofay ethay iddlemay eassay, ethay ale-bonewhay aleswhay ancay atay astlay esortray
otay eirthay Olarpay itadelscay, anday ivingday underay ethay ultimateay assyglay arriersbay
anday allsway erethay, omecay upay amongay icyay ieldsfay anday oesflay; anday inay aay armedchay
irclecay ofay everlastingay Ecemberday, idbay efianceday otay allay ursuitpay omfray anmay.

Utbay asay erhapspay iftyfay ofay esethay ale-bonewhay aleswhay areay arpoonedhay orfay oneay
achalotcay, omesay ilosophersphay ofay ethay orecastlefay avehay oncludedcay atthay isthay
ositivepay avochay ashay alreadyay eryvay eriouslysay iminishedday eirthay attalionsbay.
Utbay oughthay orfay omesay imetay astpay aay umbernay ofay esethay aleswhay, otnay esslay anthay
13,000ay, avehay eenbay annuallyay ainslay onay ethay or’nay estway oastcay byay ethay
Americansay aloneay; etyay erethay areay onsiderationscay ichwhay enderray evenay isthay
ircumstancecay ofay ittlelay oray onay accountay asay anay opposingay argumentay inay isthay
attermay.

Aturalnay asay itay isay otay ebay omewhatsay incredulousay oncerningcay ethay opulousnesspay
ofay ethay oremay enormousay eaturescray ofay ethay obeglay, etyay atwhay allshay eway aysay otay
Artohay, ethay istorianhay ofay Oagay, enwhay ehay ellstay usay atthay atay oneay untinghay ethay
Ingkay ofay Iamsay ooktay 4,000ay elephantsay; atthay inay osethay egionsray elephantsay areay
umerousnay asay ovesdray ofay attlecay inay ethay emperatetay imesclay. Anday erethay eemssay
onay easonray otay oubtday atthay ifay esethay elephantsay, ichwhay avehay ownay eenbay untedhay
orfay ousandsthay ofay earsyay, byay Emiramissay, byay Oruspay, byay Annibalhay, anday byay allay
ethay uccessivesay onarchsmay ofay ethay East—ifay eythay illstay urvivesay erethay inay
eatgray umbersnay, uchmay oremay aymay ethay eatgray alewhay outlastay allay untinghay, incesay
ehay ashay aay asturepay otay expatiateay inay, ichwhay isay eciselypray icetway asay argelay asay
allay Asiaay, othbay Americasay, Europeay anday Africaay, Ewnay Ollandhay, anday allay ethay
Islesay ofay ethay easay ombinedcay.

Oreovermay: eway areay otay onsidercay, atthay omfray ethay esumedpray eatgray ongevitylay ofay
aleswhay, eirthay obablypray attainingay ethay ageay ofay aay enturycay anday oremay,
ereforethay atay anyay oneay eriodpay ofay imetay, everalsay istinctday adultay enerationsgay
ustmay ebay ontemporarycay. Anday atwhay atthay isay, eway aymay oonsay aingay omesay ideaay ofay,
byay imaginingay allay ethay ave-yardsgray, emeteriescay, anday amilyfay aultsvay ofay
eationcray ieldingyay upay ethay ivelay odiesbay ofay allay ethay enmay, omenway, anday
ildrenchay owhay ereway aliveay eventy-fivesay earsyay agoay; anday addingay isthay
ountlesscay osthay otay ethay esentpray umanhay opulationpay ofay ethay obeglay.

Ereforewhay, orfay allay esethay ingsthay, eway accountay ethay alewhay immortalay inay ishay
eciesspay, oweverhay erishablepay inay ishay individualityay. Ehay amsway ethay eassay
eforebay ethay ontinentscay okebray aterway; ehay onceay amsway overay ethay itesay ofay ethay
Uileriestay, anday Indsorway Astlecay, anday ethay Emlinkray. Inay Oah’snay oodflay ehay
espisedday Oah’snay Arkay; anday ifay everay ethay orldway isay otay ebay againay oodedflay, ikelay
ethay Etherlandsnay, otay illkay offay itsay atsray, enthay ethay eternalay alewhay illway
illstay urvivesay, anday earingray uponay ethay opmosttay estcray ofay ethay equatorialay
oodflay, outspay ishay othedfray efianceday otay ethay iesskay.


APTERcHay 106ay. Ahab’say Eglay.

Ethay ecipitatingpray annermay inay ichwhay Aptaincay Ahabay adhay uittedqay ethay Amuelsay
Enderbyay ofay Ondonlay, adhay otnay eenbay unattendeday ithway omesay allsmay iolencevay otay
ishay ownay ersonpay. Ehay adhay ightedlay ithway uchsay energyay uponay aay artthway ofay ishay
oatbay atthay ishay ivoryay eglay adhay eceivedray aay alf-splinteringhay ockshay. Anday enwhay
afteray aininggay ishay ownay eckday, anday ishay ownay ivot-holepay erethay, ehay osay
ehementlyvay eeledwhay oundray ithway anay urgentay ommandcay otay ethay eersmanstay it(ay
asway, asay everay, omethingsay aboutay ishay otnay eeringstay inflexiblyay enough)ay;
enthay, ethay alreadyay akenshay ivoryay eceivedray uchsay anay additionalay isttway anday
enchwray, atthay oughthay itay illstay emainedray entireay, anday otay allay appearancesay
ustylay, etyay Ahabay idday otnay eemday itay entirelyay ustworthytray.

Anday, indeeday, itay eemedsay allsmay attermay orfay onderway, atthay orfay allay ishay
ervadingpay, admay ecklessnessray, Ahabay idday atay imestay ivegay arefulcay eedhay otay ethay
onditioncay ofay atthay eadday onebay uponay ichwhay ehay artlypay oodstay. Orfay itay adhay otnay
eenbay eryvay onglay iorpray otay ethay Equod’spay ailingsay omfray Antucketnay, atthay ehay
adhay eenbay oundfay oneay ightnay inglyay onepray uponay ethay oundgray, anday insensibleay;
byay omesay unknownay, anday eeminglysay inexplicableay, unimaginableay asualtycay, ishay
ivoryay imblay avinghay eenbay osay iolentlyvay isplacedday, atthay itay adhay ake-wisestay
ittensmay, anday allay utbay iercedpay ishay oingray; ornay asway itay ithoutway extremeay
ifficultyday atthay ethay agonizingay oundway asway entirelyay uredcay.

Ornay, atay ethay imetay, adhay itay ailedfay otay enteray ishay onomaniacmay indmay, atthay allay
ethay anguishay ofay atthay enthay esentpray ufferingsay asway utbay ethay irectday issueay ofay
aay ormerfay oeway; anday ehay ootay ainlyplay eemedsay otay eesay, atthay asay ethay ostmay
oisonouspay eptileray ofay ethay arshmay erpetuatespay ishay indkay asay inevitablyay asay
ethay eetestsway ongstersay ofay ethay ovegray; osay, equallyay ithway everyay elicityfay,
allay iserablemay eventsay oday aturallynay egetbay eirthay ikelay. Eayay, oremay anthay
equallyay, oughtthay Ahabay; incesay othbay ethay ancestryay anday osteritypay ofay Iefgray
ogay urtherfay anthay ethay ancestryay anday osteritypay ofay Oyjay. Orfay, otnay otay inthay ofay
isthay: atthay itay isay anay inferenceay omfray ertaincay anoniccay eachingstay, atthay
ilewhay omesay aturalnay enjoymentsay erehay allshay avehay onay ildrenchay ornbay otay emthay
orfay ethay otheray orldway, utbay, onay ethay ontrarycay, allshay ebay ollowedfay byay ethay
oy-childlessnessjay ofay allay ell’shay espairday; ereaswhay, omesay uiltygay ortalmay
iseriesmay allshay illstay ertilelyfay egetbay otay emselvesthay anay eternallyay
ogressivepray ogenypray ofay iefsgray eyondbay ethay avegray; otnay atay allay otay inthay ofay
isthay, erethay illstay eemssay anay inequalityay inay ethay eeperday analysisay ofay ethay
ingthay. Orfay, oughtthay Ahabay, ilewhay evenay ethay ighesthay earthlyay elicitiesfay
everay avehay aay ertaincay unsignifyingay ettinesspay urkinglay inay emthay, utbay, atay
ottombay, allay eartwoeshay, aay icmystay ignificancesay, anday, inay omesay enmay, anay
archangelicay andeurgray; osay oday eirthay iligentday acings-outtray otnay eliebay ethay
obviousay eductionday. Otay ailtray ethay enealogiesgay ofay esethay ighhay ortalmay
iseriesmay, arriescay usay atay astlay amongay ethay ourcelesssay imogeniturespray ofay ethay
odsgay; osay atthay, inay ethay acefay ofay allay ethay adglay, ay-makinghay unssay, anday oftsay
allingcymbay, oundray arvest-moonshay, eway ustmay eedsnay ivegay inay otay isthay: atthay
ethay odsgay emselvesthay areay otnay orfay everay adglay. Ethay ineffaceableay, adsay
irth-markbay inay ethay owbray ofay anmay, isay utbay ethay ampstay ofay orrowsay inay ethay
ignerssay.

Unwittinglyay erehay aay ecretsay ashay eenbay ivulgedday, ichwhay erhapspay ightmay oremay
operlypray, inay etsay ayway, avehay eenbay isclosedday eforebay. Ithway anymay otheray
articularspay oncerningcay Ahabay, alwaysay adhay itay emainedray aay erymystay otay omesay,
whyay itay asway, atthay orfay aay ertaincay eriodpay, othbay eforebay anday afteray ethay
ailingsay ofay ethay Equodpay, ehay adhay iddenhay imselfhay awayay ithway uchsay
And-Lama-likegray exclusivenessay; anday, orfay atthay oneay intervalay, oughtsay
eechlessspay efugeray, asay itay ereway, amongay ethay arblemay enatesay ofay ethay eadday.
Aptaincay Eleg’spay uitedbray easonray orfay isthay ingthay appeareday byay onay eansmay
adequateay; oughthay, indeeday, asay ouchingtay allay Ahab’say eeperday artpay, everyay
evelationray artookpay oremay ofay ignificantsay arknessday anthay ofay explanatoryay
ightlay. Utbay, inay ethay enday, itay allay amecay outay; isthay oneay attermay idday, atay eastlay.
Atthay irefulday ishapmay asway atay ethay ottombay ofay ishay emporarytay eclusenessray. Anday
otnay onlyay isthay, utbay otay atthay ever-contractingay, oppingdray irclecay ashoreay,
owhay, orfay anyay easonray, ossessedpay ethay ivilegepray ofay aay esslay annedbay approachay
otay imhay; otay atthay imidtay irclecay ethay aboveay intedhay asualty—remainingcay, asay itay
idday, oodilymay unaccounteday orfay byay Ahab—investeday itselfay ithway errorstay, otnay
entirelyay underiveday omfray ethay andlay ofay iritsspay anday ofay ailsway. Osay atthay,
oughthray eirthay ealzay orfay imhay, eythay adhay allay onspiredcay, osay arfay asay inay emthay
aylay, otay ufflemay upay ethay owledgeknay ofay isthay ingthay omfray othersay; anday encehay itay
asway, atthay otnay illtay aay onsiderablecay intervalay adhay elapseday, idday itay
anspiretray uponay ethay Equod’spay ecksday.

Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay; etlay ethay unseenay, ambiguousay odsynay inay ethay airay,
oray ethay indictivevay incespray anday otentatespay ofay irefay, avehay otay oday oray otnay
ithway earthlyay Ahabay, etyay, inay isthay esentpray attermay ofay ishay eglay, ehay ooktay
ainplay acticalpray ocedures;—hepray alledcay ethay arpentercay.

Anday enwhay atthay unctionaryfay appeareday eforebay imhay, ehay adebay imhay ithoutway
elayday etsay aboutay akingmay aay ewnay eglay, anday irectedday ethay atesmay otay eesay imhay
uppliedsay ithway allay ethay udsstay anday oistsjay ofay aw-ivoryjay erm(Spay Alewhay) ichwhay
adhay usthay arfay eenbay accumulateday onay ethay oyagevay, inay orderay atthay aay arefulcay
electionsay ofay ethay outeststay, earest-grainedclay uffstay ightmay ebay ecuredsay.
Isthay oneday, ethay arpentercay eceivedray ordersay otay avehay ethay eglay ompletedcay atthay
ightnay; anday otay ovidepray allay ethay ittingsfay orfay itay, independentay ofay osethay
ertainingpay otay ethay istrustedday oneay inay useay. Oreovermay, ethay ip’sshay orgefay asway
ordereday otay ebay oistedhay outay ofay itsay emporarytay idlenessay inay ethay oldhay; anday,
otay accelerateay ethay affairay, ethay acksmithblay asway ommandedcay otay oceedpray atay
onceay otay ethay orgingfay ofay ateverwhay ironay ontrivancescay ightmay ebay eedednay.


APTERcHay 107ay. Ethay Arpentercay.

Eatsay elfthysay ultanicallysay amongay ethay oonsmay ofay Aturnsay, anday aketay ighhay
abstracteday anmay aloneay; anday ehay eemssay aay onderway, aay andeurgray, anday aay oeway. Utbay
omfray ethay amesay ointpay, aketay ankindmay inay assmay, anday orfay ethay ostmay artpay, eythay
eemsay aay obmay ofay unnecessaryay uplicatesday, othbay ontemporarycay anday ereditaryhay.
Utbay ostmay umblehay oughthay ehay asway, anday arfay omfray urnishingfay anay exampleay ofay
ethay ighhay, umanehay abstractionay; ethay Equod’spay arpentercay asway onay uplicateday;
encehay, ehay ownay omescay inay ersonpay onay isthay agestay.

Ikelay allay ea-goingsay ipshay arpenterscay, anday oremay especiallyay osethay elongingbay
otay alingwhay esselsvay, ehay asway, otay aay ertaincay off-handeday, acticalpray extentay,
alikeay experienceday inay umerousnay adestray anday allingscay ollateralcay otay ishay
ownay; ethay arpenter’scay ursuitpay eingbay ethay ancientay anday outbranchingay unktray
ofay allay osethay umerousnay andicraftshay ichwhay oremay oray esslay avehay otay oday ithway
oodway asay anay auxiliaryay aterialmay. Utbay, esidesbay ethay applicationay otay imhay ofay
ethay enericgay emarkray aboveay, isthay arpentercay ofay ethay Equodpay asway ingularlysay
efficientay inay osethay ousandthay amelessnay echanicalmay emergenciesay ontinuallycay
ecurringray inay aay argelay ipshay, uponay aay eethray oray ourfay ears’yay oyagevay, inay
uncivilizeday anday ar-distantfay eassay. Orfay otnay otay eakspay ofay ishay eadinessray inay
ordinaryay uties:—repairingday ovestay oatsbay, ungspray arsspay, eformingray ethay
apeshay ofay umsy-bladedclay oarsay, insertingay ull’sbay eyesay inay ethay eckday, oray ewnay
ee-nailstray inay ethay idesay anksplay, anday otheray iscellaneousmay attersmay oremay
irectlyday ertainingpay otay ishay ecialspay usinessbay; ehay asway oreovermay
unhesitatinglyay expertay inay allay annermay ofay onflictingcay aptitudesay, othbay
usefulay anday apriciouscay.

Ethay oneay andgray agestay erewhay ehay enacteday allay ishay ariousvay artspay osay anifoldmay,
asway ishay ice-benchvay; aay onglay uderay onderouspay abletay urnishedfay ithway everalsay
icesvay, ofay ifferentday izessay, anday othbay ofay ironay anday ofay oodway. Atay allay imestay
exceptay enwhay aleswhay ereway alongsideay, isthay enchbay asway ecurelysay ashedlay
athwartshipsay againstay ethay earray ofay ethay Orkstry-way.

Aay elayingbay inpay isay oundfay ootay argelay otay ebay easilyay inserteday intoay itsay olehay:
ethay arpentercay apsclay itay intoay oneay ofay ishay ever-readyay icesvay, anday
aightwaystray ilesfay itay allersmay. Aay ostlay and-birdlay ofay angestray umageplay
aysstray onay oardbay, anday isay ademay aay aptivecay: outay ofay eanclay avedshay odsray ofay
ight-whaleray onebay, anday oss-beamscray ofay ermspay alewhay ivoryay, ethay arpentercay
akesmay aay agoda-lookingpay agecay orfay itay. Anay oarsmanay ainsspray ishay istwray: ethay
arpentercay oncoctscay aay oothingsay otionlay. Ubbstay ongedlay orfay ermillionvay arsstay
otay ebay aintedpay uponay ethay adeblay ofay ishay everyay oaray; ewingscray eachay oaray inay ishay
igbay icevay ofay oodway, ethay arpentercay etricallysymmay uppliessay ethay
onstellationcay. Aay ailorsay akestay aay ancyfay otay earway ark-boneshay ear-ringsay: ethay
arpentercay illsdray ishay earsay. Anotheray ashay ethay oothachetay: ethay arpentercay outay
incerspay, anday appingclay oneay andhay uponay ishay enchbay idsbay imhay ebay eatedsay erethay;
utbay ethay oorpay ellowfay unmanageablyay incesway underay ethay unconcludeday
operationay; irlingwhay oundray ethay andlehay ofay ishay oodenway icevay, ethay arpentercay
ignssay imhay otay apclay ishay awjay inay atthay, ifay ehay ouldway avehay imhay awdray ethay oothtay.

Usthay, isthay arpentercay asway eparedpray atay allay ointspay, anday alikeay indifferentay
anday ithoutway espectray inay allay. Eethtay ehay accounteday itsbay ofay ivoryay; eadshay ehay
eemedday utbay op-blockstay; enmay emselvesthay ehay ightlylay eldhay orfay apstanscay. Utbay
ilewhay ownay uponay osay ideway aay ieldfay usthay ariouslyvay accomplisheday anday ithway
uchsay ivelinesslay ofay expertnessay inay imhay, ootay; allay isthay ouldway eemsay otay argueay
omesay uncommonay ivacityvay ofay intelligenceay. Utbay otnay eciselypray osay. Orfay
othingnay asway isthay anmay oremay emarkableray, anthay orfay aay ertaincay impersonalay
oliditystay asay itay ereway; impersonalay, Iay aysay; orfay itay osay adedshay offay intoay ethay
urroundingsay infiniteay ofay ingsthay, atthay itay eemedsay oneay ithway ethay eneralgay
oliditystay iscernibleday inay ethay olewhay isiblevay orldway; ichwhay ilewhay
auselesslypay activeay inay uncounteday odesmay, illstay eternallyay oldshay itsay eacepay,
anday ignoresay ouyay, oughthay ouyay igday oundationsfay orfay athedralscay. Etyay asway
isthay alf-horriblehay oliditystay inay imhay, involvingay, ootay, asay itay appeareday, anay
all-ramifyingay eartlessness;—yethay asway itay oddlyay ashedday atay imestay, ithway anay
olday, utch-likecray, antediluvianay, eezingwhay umorousnesshay, otnay unstreakeday
ownay anday enthay ithway aay ertaincay izzledgray ittinessway; uchsay asay ightmay avehay
ervedsay otay asspay ethay imetay uringday ethay idnightmay atchway onay ethay eardedbay
orecastlefay ofay Oah’snay arkay. Asway itay atthay isthay olday arpentercay adhay eenbay aay
ife-longlay andererway, osewhay uchmay ollingray, otay anday ofray, otnay onlyay adhay
atheredgay onay ossmay; utbay atwhay isay oremay, adhay ubbedray offay ateverwhay allsmay
outwarday ingingsclay ightmay avehay originallyay ertainedpay otay imhay? Ehay asway aay
iptstray abstractay; anay unfractioneday integralay; uncompromiseday asay aay ew-bornnay
abebay; ivinglay ithoutway emeditatedpray eferenceray otay isthay orldway oray ethay extnay.
Ouyay ightmay almostay aysay, atthay isthay angestray uncompromisednessay inay imhay
involveday aay ortsay ofay unintelligenceay; orfay inay ishay umerousnay adestray, ehay idday
otnay eemsay otay orkway osay uchmay byay easonray oray byay instinctay, oray implysay ecausebay ehay
adhay eenbay utoredtay otay itay, oray byay anyay intermixtureay ofay allay esethay, evenay oray
unevenay; utbay erelymay byay aay indkay ofay eafday anday umbday, ontaneousspay iterallay
ocesspray. Ehay asway aay urepay anipulatormay; ishay ainbray, ifay ehay adhay everay adhay oneay,
ustmay avehay earlyay oozeday alongay intoay ethay usclesmay ofay ishay ingersfay. Ehay asway
ikelay oneay ofay osethay unreasoningay utbay illstay ighlyhay usefulay, ultum_may inay
arvo_pay, Effieldshay ontrivancescay, assumingay ethay exterior—thoughay aay ittlelay
elled—ofsway aay ommoncay ocketpay ifeknay; utbay ontainingcay, otnay onlyay adesblay ofay
ariousvay izessay, utbay alsoay ew-driversscray, ork-screwscay, eezerstway, awlsay,
enspay, ulersray, ail-filersnay, ountersinkerscay. Osay, ifay ishay uperiorssay antedway
otay useay ethay arpentercay orfay aay ew-driverscray, allay eythay adhay otay oday asway otay openay
atthay artpay ofay imhay, anday ethay ewscray asway astfay: oray ifay orfay eezerstway, aketay imhay
upay byay ethay egslay, anday erethay eythay ereway.

Etyay, asay eviouslypray intedhay, isthay omnitooleday, open-and-shutay arpentercay,
asway, afteray allay, onay eremay achinemay ofay anay automatonay. Ifay ehay idday otnay avehay aay
ommoncay oulsay inay imhay, ehay adhay aay ubtlesay omethingsay atthay omehowsay anomalouslyay
idday itsay utyday. Atwhay atthay asway, etherwhay essenceay ofay uicksilverqay, oray aay ewfay
opsdray ofay artshornhay, erethay isay onay ellingtay. Utbay erethay itay asway; anday erethay itay
adhay abideday orfay ownay omesay ixtysay earsyay oray oremay. Anday isthay itay asway, isthay amesay
unaccountableay, unningcay ife-principlelay inay imhay; isthay itay asway, atthay eptkay
imhay aay eatgray artpay ofay ethay imetay oliloquizingsay; utbay onlyay ikelay anay
unreasoningay eelwhay, ichwhay alsoay umminglyhay oliloquizessay; oray atherray, ishay
odybay asway aay entry-boxsay anday isthay oliloquizersay onay uardgay erethay, anday alkingtay
allay ethay imetay otay eepkay imselfhay awakeay.


APTERcHay 108ay. Ahabay anday ethay Arpentercay.

Ethay Eck—Firstday Ightnay Atchway.

arpenter(_Cay andingstay eforebay ishay ice-benchvay, anday byay ethay ightlay ofay otway
anternslay usilybay ilingfay ethay ivoryay oistjay orfay ethay eglay, ichwhay oistjay isay
irmlyfay ixedfay inay ethay icevay. Absslay ofay ivoryay, eatherlay apsstray, adspay, ewsscray,
anday ariousvay oolstay ofay allay ortssay inglyay aboutay ethay enchbay. Orwardfay, ethay edray
ameflay ofay ethay orgefay isay eensay, erewhay ethay acksmithblay isay atay ork._way)

Atdray ethay ilefay, anday atdray ethay onebay! Atthay isay ardhay ichwhay ouldshay ebay oftsay,
anday atthay isay oftsay ichwhay ouldshay ebay ardhay. Osay eway ogay, owhay ilefay olday awsjay anday
inbonesshay. Et’slay tryay anotheray. Ayeay, ownay, isthay orksway etterbay eezes_)(_snay.
Alloahay, isthay onebay ustday isay eezes_)—why(_snay it’say eezes_)—yes(_snay it’say
eezes_)—bless(_snay myay oulsay, itay on’tway etlay emay eakspay! Isthay isay atwhay anay olday
ellowfay etsgay ownay orfay orkingway inay eadday umberlay. Awsay aay ivelay eetray, anday ouyay
on’tday etgay isthay ustday; amputateay aay ivelay onebay, anday ouyay on’tday etgay itay
eezes_)(_snay. Omecay, omecay, ouyay olday Utsmay, erethay, earbay aay andhay, anday et’slay
avehay atthay erulefay anday uckle-screwbay; I’llay ebay eadyray orfay emthay esentlypray.
Uckylay ownay eezes_(_snay) ere’sthay onay ee-jointknay otay akemay; atthay ightmay uzzlepay
aay ittlelay; utbay aay eremay inbone—whyshay it’say easyay asay akingmay op-poleshay; onlyay Iay
ouldshay ikelay otay utpay aay oodgay inishfay onay. Imetay, imetay; ifay Iay utbay onlyay adhay ethay
imetay, Iay ouldcay urntay imhay outay asay eatnay aay eglay ownay asay everay eezes_(_snay)
apedscray otay aay adylay inay aay arlorpay. Osethay uckskinbay egslay anday alvescay ofay egslay
I’veay eensay inay opshay indowsway ouldn’tway omparecay atay allay. Eythay oaksay aterway,
eythay oday; anday ofay oursecay etgay eumaticrhay, anday avehay otay ebay octoredday
eezes_(_snay) ithway ashesway anday otionslay, ustjay ikelay ivelay egslay. Erethay; eforebay
Iay awsay itay offay, ownay, Iay ustmay allcay ishay olday Ogulshipmay, anday eesay etherwhay ethay
engthlay illway ebay allay ightray; ootay ortshay, ifay anythingay, Iay uessgay. Ahay! at’sthay
ethay eelhay; eway areay inay ucklay; erehay ehay omescay, oray it’say omebodysay elseay, at’sthay
ertaincay.

AHABay advancing_)(_ay. uring(_Day ethay ensuingay enescay, ethay arpentercay ontinuescay
eezingsnay atay imes._tay)

Ellway, anmakermay!

Ustjay inay imetay, irsay. Ifay ethay aptaincay easesplay, Iay illway ownay arkmay ethay engthlay.
Etlay emay easuremay, irsay.

Easuredmay orfay aay eglay! oodgay. Ellway, it’say otnay ethay irstfay imetay. Aboutay itay!
Erethay; eepkay thyay ingerfay onay itay. Isthay isay aay ogentcay icevay outhay asthay erehay,
arpentercay; etlay emay eelfay itsay ipgray onceay. Osay, osay; itay oesday inchpay omesay.

Ohay, irsay, itay illway eakbray ones—bewarebay, ewarebay!

Onay earfay; Iay ikelay aay oodgay ipgray; Iay ikelay otay eelfay omethingsay inay isthay ipperyslay
orldway atthay ancay oldhay, anmay. At’swhay Ometheuspray aboutay ere?—thethay
acksmithblay, Iay ean—what’smay ehay aboutay?

Ehay ustmay ebay orgingfay ethay uckle-screwbay, irsay, ownay.

Ightray. It’say aay artnershippay; ehay uppliessay ethay usclemay artpay. Ehay akesmay aay
iercefay edray ameflay erethay!

Ayeay, irsay; ehay ustmay avehay ethay itewhay eathay orfay isthay indkay ofay inefay orkway.

Um-may. Osay ehay ustmay. Iay oday eemday itay ownay aay ostmay eaningmay ingthay, atthay atthay olday
Eekgray, Ometheuspray, owhay ademay enmay, eythay aysay, ouldshay avehay eenbay aay
acksmithblay, anday animateday emthay ithway irefay; orfay at’swhay ademay inay irefay ustmay
operlypray elongbay otay irefay; anday osay ell’shay obablepray. Owhay ethay ootsay iesflay!
Isthay ustmay ebay ethay emainderray ethay Eekgray ademay ethay Africansay ofay. Arpentercay,
enwhay e’shay oughthray ithway atthay ucklebay, elltay imhay otay orgefay aay airpay ofay eelstay
oulder-bladesshay; ere’sthay aay edlarpay aboarday ithway aay ushingcray ackpay.

Irsay?

Oldhay; ilewhay Ometheuspray isay aboutay itay, I’llay orderay aay ompletecay anmay afteray aay
esirableday atternpay. Imprimisay, iftyfay eetfay ighhay inay ishay ockssay; enthay, estchay
odelledmay afteray ethay Amesthay Unneltay; enthay, egslay ithway ootsray otay em’ay, otay aystay
inay oneay aceplay; enthay, armsay eethray eetfay oughthray ethay istwray; onay earthay atay allay,
assbray oreheadfay, anday aboutay aay uarterqay ofay anay acreay ofay inefay ainsbray; anday etlay
emay ee—shallsay Iay orderay eyesay otay eesay outwardsay? Onay, utbay utpay aay ightsky-lay onay
optay ofay ishay eadhay otay illuminateay inwardsay. Erethay, aketay ethay orderay, anday awayay.

Ownay, at’swhay ehay eakingspay aboutay, anday o’swhay ehay eakingspay otay, Iay ouldshay ikelay
otay owknay? Allshay Iay eepkay andingstay erehay? aside_)(_ay.

is’Tay utbay indifferentay architectureay otay akemay aay indblay omeday; ere’shay oneay. Onay,
onay, onay; Iay ustmay avehay aay anternlay.

Ohay, ohay! At’sthay itay, eyhay? Erehay areay otway, irsay; oneay illway ervesay myay urntay.

Atwhay artay outhay ustingthray atthay ief-catcherthay intoay myay acefay orfay, anmay?
Ustedthray ightlay isay orseway anthay esentedpray istolspay.

Iay oughtthay, irsay, atthay ouyay okespay otay arpentercay.

Arpentercay? whyay at’s—butthay o;—anay eryvay idytay, anday, Iay aymay aysay, anay extremelyay
entlemanlikegay ortsay ofay usinessbay outhay artay inay erehay, arpenter;—orcay ould’stway
outhay atherray orkway inay ayclay?

Ir?—Claysay? ayclay, irsay? At’sthay udmay; eway eavelay ayclay otay itchersday, irsay.

Ethay ellow’sfay impiousay! Atwhay artay outhay eezingsnay aboutay?

Onebay isay atherray ustyday, irsay.

Aketay ethay inthay, enthay; anday enwhay outhay artay eadday, evernay urybay elfthysay underay
ivinglay eople’spay osesnay.

Ir?—ohsay! ah!—Iay uessgay o;—yes—ohsay, earday!

Ooklay eyay, arpentercay, Iay areday aysay outhay allestcay elfthysay aay ightray oodgay
orkmanlikeway orkmanway, ehay? Ellway, enthay, illway itay eakspay oroughlythay ellway orfay
thyay orkway, ifay, enwhay Iay omecay otay ountmay isthay eglay outhay akestmay, Iay allshay
everthelessnay eelfay anotheray eglay inay ethay amesay identicalay aceplay ithway itay; atthay
isay, arpentercay, myay olday ostlay eglay; ethay eshflay anday oodblay oneay, Iay eanmay. Anstcay
outhay otnay ivedray atthay olday Adamay awayay?

Ulytray, irsay, Iay eginbay otay understanday omewhatsay ownay. Esyay, Iay avehay eardhay
omethingsay uriouscay onay atthay orescay, irsay; owhay atthay aay ismastedday anmay evernay
entirelyay oseslay ethay eelingfay ofay ishay olday arspay, utbay itay illway ebay illstay
ickingpray imhay atay imestay. Aymay Iay umblyhay askay ifay itay ebay eallyray osay, irsay?

Itay isay, anmay. Ooklay, utpay thyay ivelay eglay erehay inay ethay aceplay erewhay inemay onceay
asway; osay, ownay, erehay isay onlyay oneay istinctday eglay otay ethay eyeay, etyay otway otay ethay
oulsay. Erewhay outhay eelestfay inglingtay ifelay; erethay, exactlyay erethay, erethay otay
aay airhay, oday Iay. Is’tay aay iddleray?

Iay ouldshay umblyhay allcay itay aay oserpay, irsay.

Isthay, enthay. Owhay ostday outhay owknay atthay omesay entireay, ivinglay, inkingthay ingthay
aymay otnay ebay invisiblyay anday uninterpenetratinglyay andingstay eciselypray erewhay
outhay ownay andeststay; ayeay, anday andingstay erethay inay thyay itespay? Inay thyay ostmay
olitarysay ourshay, enthay, ostday outhay otnay earfay eavesdroppersay? Oldhay, on’tday
eakspay! Anday ifay Iay illstay eelfay ethay artsmay ofay myay ushedcray eglay, oughthay itay ebay
ownay osay onglay issolvedday; enthay, whyay aystmay otnay outhay, arpentercay, eelfay ethay
ieryfay ainspay ofay ellhay orfay everay, anday ithoutway aay odybay? Ahhay!

Oodgay Ordlay! Ulytray, irsay, ifay itay omescay otay atthay, Iay ustmay alculatecay overay
againay; Iay inkthay Iay idn’tday arrycay aay allsmay igurefay, irsay.

Ooklay eyay, udding-headspay ouldshay evernay antgray emises.—Howpray onglay eforebay ethay
eglay isay oneday?

Erhapspay anay ourhay, irsay.

Unglebay awayay atay itay enthay, anday ingbray itay otay emay urns(_tay otay o_)gay. Ohay, Ifelay!
Erehay Iay amay, oudpray asay Eekgray odgay, anday etyay andingstay ebtorday otay isthay
ockheadblay orfay aay onebay otay andstay onay! Ursedcay ebay atthay ortalmay
inter-indebtednessay ichwhay illway otnay oday awayay ithway edgerslay. Iay ouldway ebay eefray
asay airay; anday I’may ownday inay ethay olewhay orld’sway ooksbay. Iay amay osay ichray, Iay ouldcay
avehay ivengay idbay orfay idbay ithway ethay ealthiestway Oriansprætay atay ethay auctionay ofay
ethay Omanray empireay ich(whay asway ethay orld’s)way; anday etyay Iay oweay orfay ethay eshflay
inay ethay onguetay Iay agbray ithway. Byay eavenshay! I’llay etgay aay uciblecray, anday intoay
itay, anday issolveday elfmysay ownday otay oneay allsmay, ompendiouscay ertebravay. Osay.

ARPENTERcay esuming(_ray ishay ork_)way.

Ellway, ellway, ellway! Ubbstay owsknay imhay estbay ofay allay, anday Ubbstay alwaysay ayssay
e’shay ueerqay; ayssay othingnay utbay atthay oneay ufficientsay ittlelay ordway ueerqay;
e’shay ueerqay, ayssay Ubbstay; e’shay ueer—queerqay, ueerqay; anday eepskay inningday itay
intoay Mray. Arbuckstay allay ethay ime—queer—sir—queertay, ueerqay, eryvay ueerqay. Anday
ere’shay ishay eglay! Esyay, ownay atthay Iay inkthay ofay itay, ere’shay ishay edfellowbay! ashay
aay ickstay ofay ale’swhay aw-bonejay orfay aay ifeway! Anday isthay isay ishay eglay; e’llhay
andstay onay isthay. Atwhay asway atthay ownay aboutay oneay eglay andingstay inay eethray
acesplay, anday allay eethray acesplay andingstay inay oneay ell—howhay asway atthay? Ohay! Iay
on’tday onderway ehay ookedlay osay ornfulscay atay emay! I’may aay ortsay ofay
ange-thoughtedstray ometimessay, eythay aysay; utbay at’sthay onlyay aphazard-likehay.
Enthay, aay ortshay, ittlelay olday odybay ikelay emay, ouldshay evernay undertakeay otay adeway
outay intoay eepday atersway ithway alltay, eron-builthay aptainscay; ethay aterway uckschay
ouyay underay ethay inchay ettypray uickqay, anday ere’sthay aay eatgray cryay orfay
ife-boatslay. Anday ere’shay ethay eron’shay eglay! onglay anday imslay, uresay enoughay!
Ownay, orfay ostmay olksfay oneay airpay ofay egslay astslay aay ifetimelay, anday atthay ustmay ebay
ecausebay eythay useay emthay ercifullymay, asay aay ender-heartedtay olday adylay usesay erhay
oly-polyray olday oach-horsescay. Utbay Ahabay; ohay e’shay aay ardhay iverdray. Ooklay,
ivendray oneay eglay otay eathday, anday avinedspay ethay otheray orfay ifelay, anday ownay earsway
outay onebay egslay byay ethay ordcay. Alloahay, erethay, ouyay Utsmay! earbay aay andhay erethay
ithway osethay ewsscray, anday et’slay inishfay itay eforebay ethay esurrectionray ellowfay
omescay a-callingay ithway ishay ornhay orfay allay egslay, uetray oray alsefay, asay
ewery-menbray ogay oundray ollectingcay olday eerbay arrelsbay, otay illfay em’ay upay againay.
Atwhay aay eglay isthay isay! Itay ookslay ikelay aay ealray ivelay eglay, iledfay ownday otay
othingnay utbay ethay orecay; e’llhay ebay andingstay onay isthay o-morrowtay; e’llhay ebay
akingtay altitudesay onay itay. Alloahay! Iay almostay orgotfay ethay ittlelay ovalay ateslay,
oothedsmay ivoryay, erewhay ehay iguresfay upay ethay atitudelay. Osay, osay; iselchay, ilefay,
anday and-papersay, ownay!


APTERcHay 109ay. Ahabay anday Arbuckstay inay ethay Abincay.
