Accordingay otay usageay eythay ereway umpingpay ethay ipshay extnay orningmay; anday olay! onay
inconsiderableay oilay amecay upay ithway ethay aterway; ethay askscay elowbay ustmay avehay
ungspray aay adbay eaklay. Uchmay oncerncay asway ownshay; anday Arbuckstay entway ownday intoay
ethay abincay otay eportray isthay unfavourableay affair.*ay

In*ay Erm-whalemenspay ithway anyay onsiderablecay uantityqay ofay oilay onay oardbay, itay
isay aay egularray emi-weeklysay utyday otay onductcay aay osehay intoay ethay oldhay, anday
enchdray ethay askscay ithway ea-watersay; ichwhay afterwardsay, atay aryingvay
intervalsay, isay emovedray byay ethay ip’sshay umpspay. Erebyhay ethay askscay areay oughtsay
otay ebay eptkay amplyday ighttay; ilewhay byay ethay angedchay aracterchay ofay ethay
ithdrawnway aterway, ethay arinersmay eadilyray etectday anyay erioussay eakagelay inay ethay
eciouspray argocay.

Ownay, omfray ethay Outhsay anday Estway ethay Equodpay asway awingdray ighnay otay Ormosafay anday
ethay Asheebay Islesay, etweenbay ichwhay ieslay oneay ofay ethay opicaltray outletsay omfray
ethay Inachay atersway intoay ethay Acificpay. Anday osay Arbuckstay oundfay Ahabay ithway aay
eneralgay artchay ofay ethay orientalay archipelagoesay eadspray eforebay imhay; anday
anotheray eparatesay oneay epresentingray ethay onglay easternay oastscay ofay ethay
Apanesejay islands—Niphonay, Atsmaimay, anday Ikokesay. Ithway ishay ow-whitesnay ewnay
ivoryay eglay acedbray againstay ethay ewedscray eglay ofay ishay abletay, anday ithway aay onglay
uning-hookpray ofay aay ack-knifejay inay ishay andhay, ethay ondrousway olday anmay, ithway
ishay ackbay otay ethay angwaygay oorday, asway inklingwray ishay owbray, anday acingtray ishay
olday oursescay againay.

o’s“Whay ere?”thay earinghay ethay ootstepfay atay ethay oorday, utbay otnay urningtay oundray
otay itay. On“ay eckday! Egone!”bay

aptain“Cay Ahabay istakesmay; itay isay Iay. Ethay oilay inay ethay oldhay isay eakinglay, irsay.
Eway ustmay upay Urtonsbay anday eakbray out.”ay

Up“ay Urtonsbay anday eakbray outay? Ownay atthay eway areay earingnay Apanjay; eave-tohay erehay
orfay aay eekway otay inkertay aay arcelpay ofay olday oops?”hay

Either“ay oday atthay, irsay, oray asteway inay oneay ayday oremay oilay anthay eway aymay akemay
oodgay inay aay earyay. Atwhay eway omecay entytway ousandthay ilesmay otay etgay isay orthway
avingsay, ir.”say

o“Say itay isay, osay itay isay; ifay eway etgay it.”ay

I“ay asway eakingspay ofay ethay oilay inay ethay oldhay, ir.”say

And“ay Iay asway otnay eakingspay oray inkingthay ofay atthay atay allay. Egonebay! Etlay itay
eaklay! I’may allay aleakay elfmysay. Ayeay! eakslay inay eakslay! otnay onlyay ullfay ofay eakylay
askscay, utbay osethay eakylay askscay areay inay aay eakylay ipshay; anday at’sthay aay arfay
orseway ightplay anthay ethay Equod’spay, anmay. Etyay Iay on’tday opstay otay ugplay myay eaklay;
orfay owhay ancay indfay itay inay ethay eep-loadedday ullhay; oray owhay opehay otay ugplay itay,
evenay ifay oundfay, inay isthay ife’slay owlinghay alegay? Arbuckstay! I’llay otnay avehay ethay
Urtonsbay oisted.”hay

at“Whay illway ethay ownersay aysay, ir?”say

et“Lay ethay ownersay andstay onay Antucketnay eachbay anday outyellay ethay Oonstyphay. Atwhay
arescay Ahabay? Ownersay, ownersay? Outhay artay alwaysay atingpray otay emay, Arbuckstay,
aboutay osethay iserlymay ownersay, asay ifay ethay ownersay ereway myay onsciencecay. Utbay
ooklay eyay, ethay onlyay ealray owneray ofay anythingay isay itsay ommandercay; anday arkhay eyay,
myay onsciencecay isay inay isthay ip’sshay eel.—Onkay eck!”day

aptain“Cay Ahab,”ay aidsay ethay eddeningray atemay, ovingmay urtherfay intoay ethay abincay,
ithway aay aringday osay angelystray espectfulray anday autiouscay atthay itay almostay
eemedsay otnay onlyay everyay ayway eekingsay otay avoiday ethay ightestslay outwarday
anifestationmay ofay itselfay, utbay ithinway alsoay eemedsay oremay anthay alfhay
istrustfulday ofay itselfay; A“ay etterbay anmay anthay Iay ightmay ellway asspay overay inay
eethay atwhay ehay ouldway uicklyqay enoughay esentray inay aay oungeryay anmay; ayeay, anday inay
aay appierhay, Aptaincay Ahab.”ay

evils“Day! Ostday outhay enthay osay uchmay asay areday otay iticallycray inkthay ofay e?—Onmay
eck!”day

ay“Nay, irsay, otnay etyay; Iay oday entreatay. Anday Iay oday areday, ir—tosay ebay orbearingfay!
Allshay eway otnay understanday eachay otheray etterbay anthay ithertohay, Aptaincay Ahab?”ay

Ahabay eizedsay aay oadedlay usketmay omfray ethay ackray orming(fay artpay ofay ostmay
Outh-Sea-men’ssay abincay urniture)fay, anday ointingpay itay owardstay Arbuckstay,
exclaimeday: ere“Thay isay oneay Odgay atthay isay Ordlay overay ethay earthay, anday oneay
Aptaincay atthay isay ordlay overay ethay Equod.—Onpay eck!”day

Orfay anay instantay inay ethay ashingflay eyesay ofay ethay atemay, anday ishay ieryfay eekschay,
ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay atthay ehay adhay eallyray eceivedray ethay azeblay ofay
ethay evelledlay ubetay. Utbay, asteringmay ishay emotionay, ehay alfhay almlycay oseray, anday
asay ehay uittedqay ethay abincay, ausedpay orfay anay instantay anday aidsay: ou“Thay asthay
outrageday, otnay insulteday emay, irsay; utbay orfay atthay Iay askay eethay otnay otay ewarebay
ofay Arbuckstay; outhay ouldstway utbay aughlay; utbay etlay Ahabay ewarebay ofay Ahabay;
ewarebay ofay elfthysay, olday an.”may

e“Hay axesway avebray, utbay everthelessnay obeysay; ostmay arefulcay averybray at!”thay
urmuredmay Ahabay, asay Arbuckstay isappearedday. at’s“Whay atthay ehay aid—Ahabsay
ewarebay ofay Ahab—there’say omethingsay ere!”thay Enthay unconsciouslyay usingay ethay
usketmay orfay aay affstay, ithway anay ironay owbray ehay acedpay otay anday ofray inay ethay ittlelay
abincay; utbay esentlypray ethay ickthay aitsplay ofay ishay oreheadfay elaxedray, anday
eturningray ethay ungay otay ethay ackray, ehay entway otay ethay eckday.

ou“Thay artay utbay ootay oodgay aay ellowfay, Arbuck,”stay ehay aidsay owlylay otay ethay atemay;
enthay aisingray ishay oicevay otay ethay ewcray: url“Fay ethay allant-sailst’gay, anday
ose-reefclay ethay op-sailstay, orefay anday aftay; ackbay ethay ain-yardmay; upay Urtonbay,
anday eakbray outay inay ethay ain-hold.”may

Itay ereway erhapspay ainvay otay urmisesay exactlyay whyay itay asway, atthay asay espectingray
Arbuckstay, Ahabay usthay acteday. Itay aymay avehay eenbay aay ashflay ofay onestyhay inay imhay;
oray eremay udentialpray olicypay ichwhay, underay ethay ircumstancecay, imperiouslyay
orbadefay ethay ightestslay omsymptay ofay openay isaffectionday, oweverhay ansienttray,
inay ethay importantay iefchay officeray ofay ishay ipshay. Oweverhay itay asway, ishay ordersay
ereway executeday; anday ethay Urtonsbay ereway oistedhay.


APTERcHay 110ay. Ueequegqay inay Ishay Offincay.

Uponay earchingsay, itay asway oundfay atthay ethay askscay astlay uckstray intoay ethay oldhay
ereway erfectlypay oundsay, anday atthay ethay eaklay ustmay ebay urtherfay offay. Osay, itay
eingbay almcay eatherway, eythay okebray outay eeperday anday eeperday, isturbingday ethay
umbersslay ofay ethay ugehay ound-tiergray uttsbay; anday omfray atthay ackblay idnightmay
endingsay osethay iganticgay olesmay intoay ethay aylightday aboveay. Osay eepday idday eythay
ogay; anday osay ancientay, anday orrodedcay, anday eedyway ethay aspectay ofay ethay owermostlay
uncheonspay, atthay ouyay almostay ookedlay extnay orfay omesay ouldymay orner-stonecay
askcay ontainingcay oinscay ofay Aptaincay Oahnay, ithway opiescay ofay ethay ostedpay
acardsplay, ainlyvay arningway ethay infatuateday olday orldway omfray ethay oodflay.
Iercetay afteray iercetay, ootay, ofay aterway, anday eadbray, anday eefbay, anday ooksshay ofay
avesstay, anday ironay undlesbay ofay oopshay, ereway oistedhay outay, illtay atay astlay ethay
iledpay ecksday ereway ardhay otay etgay aboutay; anday ethay ollowhay ullhay echoeday underay
ootfay, asay ifay ouyay ereway eadingtray overay emptyay atacombscay, anday eeledray anday
olledray inay ethay easay ikelay anay air-freighteday emijohnday. Op-heavytay asway ethay
ipshay asay aay innerlessday udentstay ithway allay Aristotleay inay ishay eadhay. Ellway asway
itay atthay ethay Oonstyphay idday otnay isitvay emthay enthay.

Ownay, atay isthay imetay itay asway atthay myay oorpay aganpay ompanioncay, anday astfay
osom-friendbay, Ueequegqay, asway eizedsay ithway aay everfay, ichwhay oughtbray imhay ighnay
otay ishay endlessay enday.

Ebay itay aidsay, atthay inay isthay ocationvay ofay alingwhay, inecuressay areay unknownay;
ignityday anday angerday ogay andhay inay andhay; illtay ouyay etgay otay ebay Aptaincay, ethay
igherhay ouyay iseray ethay arderhay ouyay oiltay. Osay ithway oorpay Ueequegqay, owhay, asay
arpooneerhay, ustmay otnay onlyay acefay allay ethay ageray ofay ethay ivinglay alewhay, ut—asbay
eway avehay elsewhereay een—mountsay ishay eadday ackbay inay aay ollingray easay; anday
inallyfay escendday intoay ethay oomglay ofay ethay oldhay, anday itterlybay eatingsway allay
ayday inay atthay ubterraneoussay onfinementcay, esolutelyray anhandlemay ethay
umsiestclay askscay anday eesay otay eirthay owagestay. Otay ebay ortshay, amongay alemenwhay,
ethay arpooneershay areay ethay oldershay, osay alledcay.

Oorpay Ueequegqay! enwhay ethay ipshay asway aboutay alfhay isembowelledday, ouyay ouldshay
avehay oopedstay overay ethay atchwayhay, anday eeredpay ownday uponay imhay erethay; erewhay,
ippedstray otay ishay oollenway awersdray, ethay attooedtay avagesay asway awlingcray aboutay
amiday atthay ampnessday anday imeslay, ikelay aay eengray ottedspay izardlay atay ethay ottombay
ofay aay ellway. Anday aay ellway, oray anay ice-houseay, itay omehowsay ovedpray otay imhay, oorpay
aganpay; erewhay, angestray otay aysay, orfay allay ethay eathay ofay ishay eatingssway, ehay
aughtcay aay erribletay illchay ichwhay apsedlay intoay aay everfay; anday atay astlay, afteray
omesay ays’day ufferingsay, aidlay imhay inay ishay ammockhay, oseclay otay ethay eryvay illsay
ofay ethay oorday ofay eathday. Owhay ehay astedway anday astedway awayay inay osethay ewfay
ong-lingeringlay aysday, illtay erethay eemedsay utbay ittlelay eftlay ofay imhay utbay ishay
amefray anday attooingtay. Utbay asay allay elseay inay imhay innedthay, anday ishay
eek-boneschay ewgray arpershay, ishay eyesay, everthelessnay, eemedsay owinggray ullerfay
anday ullerfay; eythay ecamebay ofay aay angestray oftnesssay ofay ustrelay; anday ildlymay utbay
eeplyday ookedlay outay atay ouyay erethay omfray ishay icknesssay, aay ondrousway estimonytay
otay atthay immortalay ealthhay inay imhay ichwhay ouldcay otnay ieday, oray ebay eakenedway. Anday
ikelay irclescay onay ethay aterway, ichwhay, asay eythay owgray ainterfay, expanday; osay ishay
eyesay eemedsay oundingray anday oundingray, ikelay ethay ingsray ofay Eternityay. Anay aweay
atthay annotcay ebay amednay ouldway ealstay overay ouyay asay ouyay atsay byay ethay idesay ofay
isthay aningway avagesay, anday awsay asay angestray ingsthay inay ishay acefay, asay anyay
eheldbay owhay ereway andersbystay enwhay Oroasterzay iedday. Orfay ateverwhay isay ulytray
ondrousway anday earfulfay inay anmay, evernay etyay asway utpay intoay ordsway oray ooksbay. Anday
ethay awingdray earnay ofay Eathday, ichwhay alikeay evelslay allay, alikeay impressesay allay
ithway aay astlay evelationray, ichwhay onlyay anay authoray omfray ethay eadday ouldcay
adequatelyay elltay. Osay at—letthay usay aysay itay again—noay ingdyay Aldeechay oray Eekgray
adhay igherhay anday olierhay oughtsthay anthay osethay, osewhay eriousmystay adesshay ouyay
awsay eepingcray overay ethay acefay ofay oorpay Ueequegqay, asay ehay uietlyqay aylay inay ishay
ayingsway ammockhay, anday ethay ollingray easay eemedsay entlygay ockingray imhay otay ishay
inalfay estray, anday ethay ocean’say invisibleay ood-tideflay iftedlay imhay igherhay anday
igherhay owardstay ishay estinedday eavenhay.

Otnay aay anmay ofay ethay ewcray utbay avegay imhay upay; anday, asay orfay Ueequegqay imselfhay,
atwhay ehay oughtthay ofay ishay asecay asway orciblyfay ownshay byay aay uriouscay avourfay ehay
askeday. Ehay alledcay oneay otay imhay inay ethay eygray orningmay atchway, enwhay ethay ayday asway
ustjay eakingbray, anday akingtay ishay andhay, aidsay atthay ilewhay inay Antucketnay ehay adhay
ancedchay otay eesay ertaincay ittlelay anoescay ofay arkday oodway, ikelay ethay ichray
ar-woodway ofay ishay ativenay isleay; anday uponay inquiryay, ehay adhay earnedlay atthay allay
alemenwhay owhay iedday inay Antucketnay, ereway aidlay inay osethay amesay arkday anoescay,
anday atthay ethay ancyfay ofay eingbay osay aidlay adhay uchmay easedplay imhay; orfay itay asway
otnay unlikeay ethay ustomcay ofay ishay ownay aceray, owhay, afteray embalmingay aay eadday
arriorway, etchedstray imhay outay inay ishay anoecay, anday osay eftlay imhay otay ebay oatedflay
awayay otay ethay arrystay archipelagoesay; orfay otnay onlyay oday eythay elievebay atthay ethay
arsstay areay islesay, utbay atthay arfay eyondbay allay isiblevay orizonshay, eirthay ownay
ildmay, uncontinenteday eassay, interfloway ithway ethay ueblay eavenshay; anday osay ormfay
ethay itewhay eakersbray ofay ethay ilkymay ayway. Ehay addeday, atthay ehay udderedshay atay ethay
oughtthay ofay eingbay uriedbay inay ishay ammockhay, accordingay otay ethay usualay
ea-customsay, ossedtay ikelay omethingsay ilevay otay ethay eath-devouringday arksshay.
Onay: ehay esiredday aay anoecay ikelay osethay ofay Antucketnay, allay ethay oremay ongenialcay
otay imhay, eingbay aay alemanwhay, atthay ikelay aay ale-boatwhay esethay offin-canoescay
ereway ithoutway aay eelkay; oughthay atthay involveday utbay uncertainay eeringstay, anday
uchmay ee-waylay adownay ethay imday agesay.

Ownay, enwhay isthay angestray ircumstancecay asway ademay ownknay aftay, ethay arpentercay
asway atay onceay ommandedcay otay oday Ueequeg’sqay iddingbay, ateverwhay itay ightmay
includeay. Erethay asway omesay eathenishhay, offin-colouredcay olday umberlay aboarday,
ichwhay, uponay aay onglay eviouspray oyagevay, adhay eenbay utcay omfray ethay aboriginalay
ovesgray ofay ethay Ackadaylay islandsay, anday omfray esethay arkday anksplay ethay offincay
asway ecommendedray otay ebay ademay. Onay oonersay asway ethay arpentercay appriseday ofay ethay
orderay, anthay akingtay ishay uleray, ehay orthwithfay ithway allay ethay indifferentay
omptitudepray ofay ishay aracterchay, oceededpray intoay ethay orecastlefay anday ooktay
Ueequeg’sqay easuremay ithway eatgray accuracyay, egularlyray alkingchay Ueequeg’sqay
ersonpay asay ehay iftedshay ethay uleray.

Ah“ay! oorpay ellowfay! e’llhay avehay otay ieday ow,”nay ejaculateday ethay Onglay Islanday
ailorsay.

Oinggay otay ishay ice-benchvay, ethay arpentercay orfay onveniencecay akesay anday eneralgay
eferenceray, ownay ansferringlytray easuredmay onay itay ethay exactay engthlay ethay
offincay asway otay ebay, anday enthay ademay ethay ansfertray ermanentpay byay uttingcay otway
otchesnay atay itsay extremitiesay. Isthay oneday, ehay arshalledmay ethay anksplay anday ishay
oolstay, anday otay orkway.

Enwhay ethay astlay ailnay asway ivendray, anday ethay idlay ulyday anedplay anday ittedfay, ehay
ightlylay oulderedshay ethay offincay anday entway orwardfay ithway itay, inquiringay
etherwhay eythay ereway eadyray orfay itay etyay inay atthay irectionday.

Overhearingay ethay indignantay utbay alf-humoroushay iescray ithway ichwhay ethay eoplepay
onay eckday eganbay otay ivedray ethay offincay awayay, Ueequegqay, otay everyay one’say
onsternationcay, ommandedcay atthay ethay ingthay ouldshay ebay instantlyay oughtbray otay
imhay, ornay asway erethay anyay enyingday imhay; eeingsay atthay, ofay allay ortalsmay, omesay
ingdyay enmay areay ethay ostmay annicaltyray; anday ertainlycay, incesay eythay illway
ortlyshay oubletray usay osay ittlelay orfay evermoreay, ethay oorpay ellowsfay oughtay otay ebay
indulgeday.

Eaninglay overay inay ishay ammockhay, Ueequegqay onglay egardedray ethay offincay ithway anay
attentiveay eyeay. Ehay enthay alledcay orfay ishay arpoonhay, adhay ethay oodenway ockstay
awndray omfray itay, anday enthay adhay ethay ironay artpay acedplay inay ethay offincay alongay
ithway oneay ofay ethay addlespay ofay ishay oatbay. Allay byay ishay ownay equestray, alsoay,
iscuitsbay ereway enthay angedray oundray ethay idessay ithinway: aay askflay ofay eshfray
aterway asway acedplay atay ethay eadhay, anday aay allsmay agbay ofay oodyway earthay apedscray upay
inay ethay oldhay atay ethay ootfay; anday aay iecepay ofay ail-clothsay eingbay olledray upay orfay
aay illowpay, Ueequegqay ownay entreateday otay ebay iftedlay intoay ishay inalfay edbay, atthay
ehay ightmay akemay ialtray ofay itsay omfortscay, ifay anyay itay adhay. Ehay aylay ithoutway
ovingmay aay ewfay inutesmay, enthay oldtay oneay otay ogay otay ishay agbay anday ingbray outay ishay
ittlelay odgay, Ojoyay. Enthay ossingcray ishay armsay onay ishay eastbray ithway Ojoyay
etweenbay, ehay alledcay orfay ethay offincay idlay atch(hay ehay alledcay itay) otay ebay acedplay
overay imhay. Ethay eadhay artpay urnedtay overay ithway aay eatherlay ingehay, anday erethay aylay
Ueequegqay inay ishay offincay ithway ittlelay utbay ishay omposedcay ountenancecay inay
iewvay. armai”“Ray it(ay illway oday; itay isay easy)ay, ehay urmuredmay atay astlay, anday
ignedsay otay ebay eplacedray inay ishay ammockhay.

Utbay ereay isthay asway oneday, Ippay, owhay adhay eenbay ilyslay overinghay earnay byay allay
isthay ilewhay, ewdray ighnay otay imhay erewhay ehay aylay, anday ithway oftsay obbingssay, ooktay
imhay byay ethay andhay; inay ethay otheray, oldinghay ishay ambourinetay.

oor“Pay overray! illway eyay evernay avehay oneday ithway allay isthay earyway ovingray? erewhay
ogay eyay ownay? Utbay ifay ethay urrentscay arrycay eyay otay osethay eetsway Antillesay erewhay
ethay eachesbay areay onlyay eatbay ithway ater-liliesway, illway eyay oday oneay ittlelay
erranday orfay emay? Eeksay outay oneay Ippay, o’swhay ownay eenbay issingmay onglay: Iay inkthay
e’shay inay osethay arfay Antillesay. Ifay eyay indfay imhay, enthay omfortcay imhay; orfay ehay
ustmay ebay eryvay adsay; orfay ooklay! e’shay eftlay ishay ambourinetay ehind;—Ibay oundfay
itay. Ig-a-digray, igday, igday! Ownay, Ueequegqay, ieday; anday I’llay eatbay eyay ouryay
ingdyay arch.”may

I“ay avehay eard,”hay urmuredmay Arbuckstay, azinggay ownday ethay uttlescay, at“thay inay
iolentvay eversfay, enmay, allay ignoranceay, avehay alkedtay inay ancientay onguestay; anday
atthay enwhay ethay erymystay isay obedpray, itay urnstay outay alwaysay atthay inay eirthay
ollywhay orgottenfay ildhoodchay osethay ancientay onguestay adhay eenbay eallyray okenspay
inay eirthay earinghay byay omesay oftylay olarsschay. Osay, otay myay ondfay aithfay, oorpay
Ippay, inay isthay angestray eetnesssway ofay ishay unacylay, ingsbray eavenlyhay ouchersvay
ofay allay ouray eavenlyhay omeshay. Erewhay earnedlay ehay atthay, utbay ere?—Harkthay! ehay
eaksspay againay: utbay oremay ildlyway ow.”nay

orm“Fay otway anday otway! Et’slay akemay aay Eneralgay ofay imhay! Ohay, ere’swhay ishay
arpoonhay? Aylay itay acrossay ere.—Rig-a-dighay, igday, igday! uzzahay! Ohay orfay aay amegay
ockcay ownay otay itsay uponay ishay eadhay anday owcray! Ueequegqay iesday ame!—mindgay eyay
atthay; Ueequegqay iesday ame!—takegay eyay oodgay eedhay ofay atthay; Ueequegqay iesday
amegay! Iay aysay; amegay, amegay, amegay! utbay asebay ittlelay Ippay, ehay iedday aay owardcay;
iedday allay a’shiver;—outay uponay Ippay! Arkhay eyay; ifay eyay indfay Ippay, elltay allay ethay
Antillesay e’shay aay unawayray; aay owardcay, aay owardcay, aay owardcay! Elltay emthay ehay
umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay! I’day evernay eatbay myay ambourinetay overay asebay Ippay,
anday ailhay imhay Eneralgay, ifay ehay ereway onceay oremay ingdyay erehay. Onay, onay! ameshay
uponay allay owards—shamecay uponay emthay! Etlay em’ay ogay owndray ikelay Ippay, atthay
umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay. Ameshay! ame!”shay

Uringday allay isthay, Ueequegqay aylay ithway osedclay eyesay, asay ifay inay aay eamdray. Ippay
asway edlay awayay, anday ethay icksay anmay asway eplacedray inay ishay ammockhay.

Utbay ownay atthay ehay adhay apparentlyay ademay everyay eparationpray orfay eathday; ownay
atthay ishay offincay asway ovedpray aay oodgay itfay, Ueequegqay uddenlysay alliedray; oonsay
erethay eemedsay onay eednay ofay ethay arpenter’scay oxbay: anday ereuponthay, enwhay omesay
expresseday eirthay elightedday urprisesay, ehay, inay ubstancesay, aidsay, atthay ethay
ausecay ofay ishay uddensay onvalescencecay asway is;—atthay aay iticalcray omentmay, ehay
adhay ustjay ecalledray aay ittlelay utyday ashoreay, ichwhay ehay asway eavinglay undoneay;
anday ereforethay adhay angedchay ishay indmay aboutay ingdyay: ehay ouldcay otnay ieday etyay,
ehay averreday. Eythay askeday imhay, enthay, etherwhay otay ivelay oray ieday asway aay attermay
ofay ishay ownay overeignsay illway anday easureplay. Ehay answereday, ertainlycay. Inay aay
ordway, itay asway Ueequeg’sqay onceitcay, atthay ifay aay anmay ademay upay ishay indmay otay
ivelay, eremay icknesssay ouldcay otnay illkay imhay: othingnay utbay aay alewhay, oray aay alegay,
oray omesay iolentvay, ungovernableay, unintelligentay estroyerday ofay atthay ortsay.

Ownay, erethay isay isthay oteworthynay ifferenceday etweenbay avagesay anday ivilizedcay;
atthay ilewhay aay icksay, ivilizedcay anmay aymay ebay ixsay onthsmay onvalescingcay,
enerallygay eakingspay, aay icksay avagesay isay almostay alf-wellhay againay inay aay ayday.
Osay, inay oodgay imetay myay Ueequegqay ainedgay engthstray; anday atay engthlay afteray
ittingsay onay ethay indlassway orfay aay ewfay indolentay aysday ut(bay eatingay ithway aay
igorousvay appetiteay) ehay uddenlysay eapedlay otay ishay eetfay, ewthray outay ishay armsay
anday egslay, avegay imselfhay aay oodgay etchingstray, awnedyay aay ittlelay itbay, anday enthay
ingingspray intoay ethay eadhay ofay ishay oistedhay oatbay, anday oisingpay aay arpoonhay,
onouncedpray imselfhay itfay orfay aay ightfay.

Ithway aay ildway imsinesswhay, ehay ownay useday ishay offincay orfay aay ea-chestsay; anday
emptyingay intoay itay ishay anvascay agbay ofay othesclay, etsay emthay inay orderay erethay.
Anymay arespay ourshay ehay entspay, inay arvingcay ethay idlay ithway allay annermay ofay
otesquegray iguresfay anday awingsdray; anday itay eemedsay atthay erebyhay ehay asway
ivingstray, inay ishay uderay ayway, otay opycay artspay ofay ethay istedtway attooingtay onay
ishay odybay. Anday isthay attooingtay adhay eenbay ethay orkway ofay aay epartedday ophetpray
anday eersay ofay ishay islanday, owhay, byay osethay ieroglyphichay arksmay, adhay ittenwray
outay onay ishay odybay aay ompletecay eorythay ofay ethay eavenshay anday ethay earthay, anday aay
icalmystay eatisetray onay ethay artay ofay attainingay uthtray; osay atthay Ueequegqay inay
ishay ownay operpray ersonpay asway aay iddleray otay unfolday; aay ondrousway orkway inay oneay
olumevay; utbay osewhay eriesmystay otnay evenay imselfhay ouldcay eadray, oughthay ishay ownay
ivelay earthay eatbay againstay emthay; anday esethay eriesmystay ereway ereforethay
estinedday inay ethay enday otay ouldermay awayay ithway ethay ivinglay archmentpay ereonwhay
eythay ereway inscribeday, anday osay ebay unsolveday otay ethay astlay. Anday isthay oughtthay
itay ustmay avehay eenbay ichwhay uggestedsay otay Ahabay atthay ildway exclamationay ofay ishay,
enwhay oneay orningmay urningtay awayay omfray urveyingsay oorpay Ueequeg—“Ohqay,
evilishday antalizationtay ofay ethay ods!”gay


APTERcHay 111ay. Ethay Acificpay.

Enwhay idingglay byay ethay Asheebay islesay eway emergeday atay astlay uponay ethay eatgray
Outhsay Easay; ereway itay otnay orfay otheray ingsthay, Iay ouldcay avehay eetedgray myay earday
Acificpay ithway uncounteday anksthay, orfay ownay ethay onglay upplicationsay ofay myay
outhyay asway answereday; atthay erenesay oceanay olledray eastwardsay omfray emay aay
ousandthay eagueslay ofay ueblay.

Erethay isay, oneay owsknay otnay atwhay eetsway erymystay aboutay isthay easay, osewhay entlygay
awfulay irringsstay eemsay otay eakspay ofay omesay iddenhay oulsay eneathbay; ikelay osethay
abledfay undulationsay ofay ethay Ephesianay odsay overay ethay uriedbay Evangelistay Stay.
Ohnjay. Anday eetmay itay isay, atthay overay esethay ea-pasturessay, ide-rollingway ateryway
airiespray anday Otters’pay Ieldsfay ofay allay ourfay ontinentscay, ethay avesway ouldshay
iseray anday allfay, anday ebbay anday owflay unceasinglyay; orfay erehay, illionsmay ofay
ixedmay adesshay anday adowsshay, owneddray eamsdray, omnambulismssay, everiesray; allay
atthay eway allcay iveslay anday oulssay, ielay eamingdray, eamingdray, illstay; ossingtay
ikelay umberersslay inay eirthay edsbay; ethay ever-rollingay avesway utbay ademay osay byay
eirthay estlessnessray.

Otay anyay editativemay Agianmay overray, isthay erenesay Acificpay, onceay eheldbay, ustmay
everay afteray ebay ethay easay ofay ishay adoptionay. Itay ollsray ethay idmostmay atersway ofay
ethay orldway, ethay Indianay oceanay anday Atlanticay eingbay utbay itsay armsay. Ethay amesay
avesway ashway ethay olesmay ofay ethay ew-builtnay Aliforniancay ownstay, utbay esterdayyay
antedplay byay ethay ecentestray aceray ofay enmay, anday avelay ethay adedfay utbay illstay
orgeousgay irtsskay ofay Asiaticay andslay, olderay anthay Abrahamay; ilewhay allay etweenbay
oatflay ilky-waysmay ofay oralcay islesay, anday ow-lyinglay, endlessay, unknownay
Archipelagoesay, anday impenetrableay Apansjay. Usthay isthay eriousmystay, ivineday
Acificpay oneszay ethay orld’sway olewhay ulkbay aboutay; akesmay allay oastscay oneay aybay otay
itay; eemssay ethay ide-beatingtay earthay ofay earthay. Iftedlay byay osethay eternalay
ellssway, ouyay eedsnay ustmay ownay ethay eductivesay odgay, owingbay ouryay eadhay otay Anpay.

Utbay ewfay oughtsthay ofay Anpay irredstay Ahab’say ainbray, asay andingstay ikelay anay ironay
atuestay atay ishay accustomeday aceplay esidebay ethay izenmay iggingray, ithway oneay
ostrilnay ehay unthinkinglyay uffedsnay ethay ugarysay uskmay omfray ethay Asheebay islesay
in(ay osewhay eetsway oodsway ildmay overslay ustmay ebay alking)way, anday ithway ethay otheray
onsciouslycay inhaleday ethay altsay eathbray ofay ethay ewnay oundfay easay; atthay easay inay
ichwhay ethay atedhay Itewhay Alewhay ustmay evenay enthay ebay immingsway. Aunchedlay atay
engthlay uponay esethay almostay inalfay atersway, anday idingglay owardstay ethay Apanesejay
uising-groundcray, ethay olday an’smay urposepay intensifieday itselfay. Ishay irmfay
ipslay etmay ikelay ethay ipslay ofay aay icevay; ethay Eltaday ofay ishay orehead’sfay einsvay
elledsway ikelay overladenay ooksbray; inay ishay eryvay eepslay, ishay ingingray cryay anray
oughthray ethay aultedvay ullhay, ern“Stay allay! ethay Itewhay Alewhay outsspay ickthay
ood!”blay


APTERcHay 112ay. Ethay Acksmithblay.

Availingay imselfhay ofay ethay ildmay, ummer-coolsay eatherway atthay ownay eignedray inay
esethay atitudeslay, anday inay eparationpray orfay ethay eculiarlypay activeay ursuitspay
ortlyshay otay ebay anticipateday, Erthpay, ethay egrimedbay, isteredblay olday
acksmithblay, adhay otnay emovedray ishay ortablepay orgefay otay ethay oldhay againay, afteray
oncludingcay ishay ontributorycay orkway orfay Ahab’say eglay, utbay illstay etainedray itay
onay eckday, astfay ashedlay otay ingboltsray byay ethay oremastfay; eingbay ownay almostay
incessantlyay invokeday byay ethay eadsmenhay, anday arpooneershay, anday owsmenbay otay oday
omesay ittlelay objay orfay emthay; alteringay, oray epairingray, oray ewnay apingshay eirthay
ariousvay eaponsway anday oatbay urniturefay. Oftenay ehay ouldway ebay urroundedsay byay anay
eageray irclecay, allay aitingway otay ebay ervedsay; oldinghay oat-spadesbay,
ike-headspay, arpoonshay, anday anceslay, anday ealouslyjay atchingway ishay everyay
ootysay ovementmay, asay ehay oiledtay. Everthelessnay, isthay olday an’smay asway aay
atientpay ammerhay ieldedway byay aay atientpay armay. Onay urmurmay, onay impatienceay, onay
etulancepay idday omecay omfray imhay. Ilentsay, owslay, anday olemnsay; owingbay overay
illstay urtherfay ishay onicallychray okenbray ackbay, ehay oiledtay awayay, asay ifay oiltay
ereway ifelay itselfay, anday ethay eavyhay eatingbay ofay ishay ammerhay ethay eavyhay eatingbay
ofay ishay earthay. Anday osay itay as.—Mostway iserablemay!

Aay eculiarpay alkway inay isthay olday anmay, aay ertaincay ightslay utbay ainfulpay appearingay
awingyay inay ishay aitgay, adhay atay anay earlyay eriodpay ofay ethay oyagevay exciteday ethay
uriositycay ofay ethay arinersmay. Anday otay ethay importunityay ofay eirthay ersistedpay
uestioningsqay ehay adhay inallyfay ivengay inay; anday osay itay amecay otay asspay atthay everyay
oneay ownay ewknay ethay amefulshay orystay ofay ishay etchedwray atefay.

Elatedbay, anday otnay innocentlyay, oneay itterbay inter’sway idnightmay, onay ethay oadray
unningray etweenbay otway ountrycay ownstay, ethay acksmithblay alf-stupidlyhay eltfay
ethay eadlyday umbnessnay ealingstay overay imhay, anday oughtsay efugeray inay aay eaninglay,
ilapidatedday arnbay. Ethay issueay asway, ethay osslay ofay ethay extremitiesay ofay othbay
eetfay. Outay ofay isthay evelationray, artpay byay artpay, atay astlay amecay outay ethay ourfay
actsay ofay ethay adnessglay, anday ethay oneay onglay, anday asay etyay uncatastrophieday
ifthfay actay ofay ethay iefgray ofay ishay ife’slay amadray.

Ehay asway anay olday anmay, owhay, atay ethay ageay ofay earlynay ixtysay, adhay ostponedlypay
encountereday atthay ingthay inay orrow’ssay echnicalstay alledcay uinray. Ehay adhay eenbay
anay artisanay ofay amedfay excellenceay, anday ithway entyplay otay oday; owneday aay ousehay
anday ardengay; embraceday aay outhfulyay, aughter-likeday, ovinglay ifeway, anday eethray
itheblay, uddyray ildrenchay; everyay Undaysay entway otay aay eerful-lookingchay urchchay,
antedplay inay aay ovegray. Utbay oneay ightnay, underay overcay ofay arknessday, anday urtherfay
oncealedcay inay aay ostmay unningcay isguisementday, aay esperateday urglarbay idslay intoay
ishay appyhay omehay, anday obbedray emthay allay ofay everythingay. Anday arkerday etyay otay
elltay, ethay acksmithblay imselfhay idday ignorantlyay onductcay isthay urglarbay intoay
ishay amily’sfay earthay. Itay asway ethay Ottlebay Onjurorcay! Uponay ethay openingay ofay
atthay atalfay orkcay, orthfay ewflay ethay iendfay, anday ivelledshray upay ishay omehay. Ownay,
orfay udentpray, ostmay iseway, anday economicay easonsray, ethay acksmith’sblay opshay asway
inay ethay asementbay ofay ishay ellingdway, utbay ithway aay eparatesay entranceay otay itay; osay
atthay alwaysay adhay ethay oungyay anday ovinglay ealthyhay ifeway istenedlay ithway onay
unhappyay ervousnessnay, utbay ithway igorousvay easureplay, otay ethay outstay ingingray
ofay erhay oung-armedyay olday usband’shay ammerhay; osewhay everberationsray, uffledmay
byay assingpay oughthray ethay oorsflay anday allsway, amecay upay otay erhay, otnay unsweetlyay,
inay erhay urserynay; anday osay, otay outstay Abor’slay ironay ullabylay, ethay acksmith’sblay
infantsay ereway ockedray otay umberslay.

Ohay, oeway onay oeway! Ohay, Eathday, whyay anstcay outhay otnay ometimessay ebay imelytay?
Adsthay outhay akentay isthay olday acksmithblay otay elfthysay ereay ishay ullfay uinray amecay
uponay imhay, enthay adhay ethay oungyay idowway adhay aay eliciousday iefgray, anday erhay
orphansay aay ulytray enerablevay, egendarylay iresay otay eamdray ofay inay eirthay afteray
earsyay; anday allay ofay emthay aay are-killingcay ompetencycay. Utbay Eathday uckedplay
ownday omesay irtuousvay elderay otherbray, onay osewhay istlingwhay ailyday oiltay olelysay
unghay ethay esponsibilitiesray ofay omesay otheray amilyfay, anday eftlay ethay orseway anthay
uselessay olday anmay andingstay, illtay ethay ideoushay otray ofay ifelay ouldshay akemay imhay
easieray otay arvesthay.

Whyay elltay ethay olewhay? Ethay owsblay ofay ethay asementbay ammerhay everyay ayday ewgray
oremay anday oremay etweenbay; anday eachay owblay everyay ayday ewgray ainterfay anthay ethay
astlay; ethay ifeway atsay ozenfray atay ethay indowway, ithway earlesstay eyesay,
itteringlyglay azinggay intoay ethay eepingway acesfay ofay erhay ildrenchay; ethay ellowsbay
ellfay; ethay orgefay okedchay upay ithway inderscay; ethay ousehay asway oldsay; ethay othermay
ivedday ownday intoay ethay onglay urch-yardchay assgray; erhay ildrenchay icetway ollowedfay
erhay itherthay; anday ethay ouselesshay, amilylessfay olday anmay aggeredstay offay aay
agabondvay inay apecray; ishay everyay oeway unreverenceday; ishay eygray eadhay aay ornscay otay
axenflay urlscay!

Eathday eemssay ethay onlyay esirableday equelsay orfay aay areercay ikelay isthay; utbay Eathday
isay onlyay aay aunchinglay intoay ethay egionray ofay ethay angestray Untrieday; itay isay utbay
ethay irstfay alutationsay otay ethay ossibilitiespay ofay ethay immenseay Emoteray, ethay
Ildway, ethay Ateryway, ethay Unshoreday; ereforethay, otay ethay eath-longingday eyesay ofay
uchsay enmay, owhay illstay avehay eftlay inay emthay omesay interioray ompunctionscay
againstay uicidesay, oesday ethay all-contributeday anday all-receptiveay oceanay
alluringlyay eadspray orthfay ishay olewhay ainplay ofay unimaginableay, akingtay
errorstay, anday onderfulway, ew-lifenay adventuresay; anday omfray ethay eartshay ofay
infiniteay Acificspay, ethay ousandthay ermaidsmay ingsay otay em—“Comethay itherhay,
oken-heartedbray; erehay isay anotheray ifelay ithoutway ethay uiltgay ofay intermediateay
eathday; erehay areay ondersway upernaturalsay, ithoutway ingdyay orfay emthay. Omecay
itherhay! urybay elfthysay inay aay ifelay ichwhay, otay ouryay ownay equallyay abhorreday anday
abhorringay, andedlay orldway, isay oremay obliviousay anthay eathday. Omecay itherhay! utpay
upay _thy_ay avestonegray, ootay, ithinway ethay urchyardchay, anday omecay itherhay, illtay
eway arrymay ee!”thay

Earkeninghay otay esethay oicesvay, Eastay anday Estway, byay earlyay unrisesay, anday byay
allfay ofay eveay, ethay acksmith’sblay oulsay espondedray, Ayeay, Iay omecay! Anday osay Erthpay
entway a-whalingay.


APTERcHay 113ay. Ethay Orgefay.

Ithway attedmay eardbay, anday athedsway inay aay istlingbray ark-skinshay apronay, aboutay
id-daymay, Erthpay asway andingstay etweenbay ishay orgefay anday anvilay, ethay atterlay
acedplay uponay anay iron-wooday oglay, ithway oneay andhay oldinghay aay ike-headpay inay ethay
oalscay, anday ithway ethay otheray atay ishay orge’sfay ungslay, enwhay Aptaincay Ahabay amecay
alongay, arryingcay inay ishay andhay aay allsmay usty-lookingray eathernlay agbay. Ilewhay
etyay aay ittlelay istanceday omfray ethay orgefay, oodymay Ahabay ausedpay; illtay atay astlay,
Erthpay, ithdrawingway ishay ironay omfray ethay irefay, eganbay ammeringhay itay uponay ethay
anvil—theay edray assmay endingsay offay ethay arksspay inay ickthay overinghay ightsflay,
omesay ofay ichwhay ewflay oseclay otay Ahabay.

Are“ay esethay thyay Othermay Arey’scay ickenschay, Erthpay? eythay areay alwaysay ingflyay
inay thyay akeway; irdsbay ofay oodgay omenay, ootay, utbay otnay otay all;—lookay erehay, eythay
urnbay; utbay ou—thouthay iv’stlay amongay emthay ithoutway aay orch.”scay

ecause“Bay Iay amay orchedscay allay overay, Aptaincay Ahab,”ay answereday Erthpay, estingray
orfay aay omentmay onay ishay ammerhay; I“ay amay astpay orchingscay; otnay easilyay an’stcay
outhay orchscay aay ar.”scay

ell“Way, ellway; onay oremay. Thyay unkshray oicevay oundssay ootay almlycay, anelysay oefulway
otay emay. Inay onay Aradisepay elfmysay, Iay amay impatientay ofay allay iserymay inay othersay
atthay isay otnay admay. Outhay ould’stshay ogay admay, acksmithblay; aysay, whyay ostday outhay
otnay ogay admay? Owhay an’stcay outhay endureay ithoutway eingbay admay? Oday ethay eavenshay
etyay atehay eethay, atthay outhay an’stcay otnay ogay ad?—Whatmay ertway outhay akingmay
ere?”thay

elding“Way anay olday ike-headpay, irsay; erethay ereway eamssay anday entsday inay it.”ay

And“ay an’stcay outhay akemay itay allay oothsmay againay, acksmithblay, afteray uchsay ardhay
usageay asay itay ad?”hay

I“ay inkthay osay, ir.”say

And“ay Iay upposesay outhay an’stcay oothesmay almostay anyay eamssay anday entsday; evernay
indmay owhay ardhay ethay etalmay, acksmith?”blay

Aye“ay, irsay, Iay inkthay Iay ancay; allay eamssay anday entsday utbay one.”ay

ook“Lay eyay erehay, en,”thay iedcray Ahabay, assionatelypay advancingay, anday eaninglay
ithway othbay andshay onay Erth’spay ouldersshay; ook“lay eyay ere—_here_—canhay eyay
oothesmay outay aay eamsay ikelay isthay, acksmith,”blay eepingsway oneay andhay acrossay ishay
ibbedray owbray; if“ay outhay ould’stcay, acksmithblay, adglay enoughay ouldway Iay aylay myay
eadhay uponay thyay anvilay, anday eelfay thyay eaviesthay ammerhay etweenbay myay eyesay.
Answeray! An’stcay outhay oothesmay isthay eam?”say

Oh“ay! atthay isay ethay oneay, irsay! Aidsay Iay otnay allay eamssay anday entsday utbay one?”ay

Aye“ay, acksmithblay, itay isay ethay oneay; ayeay, anmay, itay isay unsmoothableay; orfay
oughthay outhay onlyay ee’stsay itay erehay inay myay eshflay, itay ashay orkedway ownday intoay
ethay onebay ofay myay ull—_that_skay isay allay inkleswray! Utbay, awayay ithway ild’schay
ayplay; onay oremay affsgay anday ikespay o-daytay. Ooklay eyay ere!”hay inglingjay ethay
eathernlay agbay, asay ifay itay ereway ullfay ofay oldgay oinscay. I“ay, ootay, antway aay arpoonhay
ademay; oneay atthay aay ousandthay okeyay ofay iendsfay ouldcay otnay artpay, Erthpay;
omethingsay atthay illway ickstay inay aay alewhay ikelay ishay ownay in-bonefay. Ere’sthay ethay
uff,”stay ingingflay ethay ouchpay uponay ethay anvilay. ook“Lay eyay, acksmithblay, esethay
areay ethay atheredgay ail-stubbsnay ofay ethay eelstay oesshay ofay acingray orses.”hay

orse-shoe“Hay ubbsstay, irsay? Whyay, Aptaincay Ahabay, outhay asthay erehay, enthay, ethay
estbay anday ubborneststay uffstay eway acksmithsblay everay ork.”way

I“ay owknay itay, olday anmay; esethay ubbsstay illway eldway ogethertay ikelay ueglay omfray ethay
eltedmay onesbay ofay urderersmay. Uickqay! orgefay emay ethay arpoonhay. Anday orgefay emay
irstfay, elvetway odsray orfay itsay ankshay; enthay indway, anday isttway, anday ammerhay
esethay elvetway ogethertay ikelay ethay arnsyay anday andsstray ofay aay ow-linetay. Uickqay!
I’llay owblay ethay ire.”fay

Enwhay atay astlay ethay elvetway odsray ereway ademay, Ahabay iedtray emthay, oneay byay oneay, byay
irallingspay emthay, ithway ishay ownay andhay, oundray aay onglay, eavyhay ironay oltbay. A“ay
aw!”flay ejectingray ethay astlay oneay. ork“Way atthay overay againay, Erth.”pay

Isthay oneday, Erthpay asway aboutay otay eginbay eldingway ethay elvetway intoay oneay, enwhay
Ahabay ayedstay ishay andhay, anday aidsay ehay ouldway eldway ishay ownay ironay. Asay, enthay,
ithway egularray, aspinggay emshay, ehay ammeredhay onay ethay anvilay, Erthpay assingpay otay
imhay ethay owingglay odsray, oneay afteray ethay otheray, anday ethay ardhay essedpray orgefay
ootingshay upay itsay intenseay aightstray ameflay, ethay Arseepay assedpay ilentlysay, anday
owingbay overay ishay eadhay owardstay ethay irefay, eemedsay invokingay omesay ursecay oray
omesay essingblay onay ethay oiltay. Utbay, asay Ahabay ookedlay upay, ehay idslay asideay.

at’s“Whay atthay unchbay ofay uciferslay odgingday aboutay erethay or?”fay utteredmay
Ubbstay, ookinglay onay omfray ethay orecastlefay. at“Thay Arseepay ellssmay irefay ikelay aay
useefay; anday ellssmay ofay itay imselfhay, ikelay aay othay usket’smay owder-pan.”pay

Atay astlay ethay ankshay, inay oneay ompletecay odray, eceivedray itsay inalfay eathay; anday asay
Erthpay, otay empertay itay, ungedplay itay allay issinghay intoay ethay askcay ofay aterway earnay
byay, ethay aldingscay eamstay otshay upay intoay Ahab’say entbay acefay.

ould’st“Way outhay andbray emay, Erth?”pay incingway orfay aay omentmay ithway ethay ainpay;
ave“hay Iay eenbay utbay orgingfay myay ownay anding-ironbray, en?”thay

ay“Pray Odgay, otnay atthay; etyay Iay earfay omethingsay, Aptaincay Ahabay. Isay otnay isthay
arpoonhay orfay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

or“Fay ethay itewhay iendfay! Utbay ownay orfay ethay arbsbay; outhay ustmay akemay emthay
elfthysay, anmay. Erehay areay myay azors—theray estbay ofay eelstay; erehay, anday akemay ethay
arbsbay arpshay asay ethay eedle-sleetnay ofay ethay Icyay Ea.”say

Orfay aay omentmay, ethay olday acksmithblay eyeday ethay azorsray asay oughthay ehay ouldway
ainfay otnay useay emthay.

ake“Tay emthay, anmay, Iay avehay onay eednay orfay emthay; orfay Iay ownay eithernay aveshay, upsay,
ornay aypray ill—buttay ere—tohay ork!”way

Ashionedfay atay astlay intoay anay arrowyay apeshay, anday eldedway byay Erthpay otay ethay
ankshay, ethay eelstay oonsay ointedpay ethay enday ofay ethay ironay; anday asay ethay
acksmithblay asway aboutay ivinggay ethay arbsbay eirthay inalfay eathay, iorpray otay
emperingtay emthay, ehay iedcray otay Ahabay otay aceplay ethay ater-caskway earnay.

o“Nay, o—nonay aterway orfay atthay; Iay antway itay ofay ethay uetray eath-temperday. Ahoyay,
erethay! Ashtegotay, Ueequegqay, Aggooday! Atwhay aysay eyay, aganspay! Illway eyay ivegay emay
asay uchmay oodblay asay illway overcay isthay arb?”bay oldinghay itay ighhay upay. Aay usterclay
ofay arkday odsnay epliedray, Esyay. Eethray uncturespay ereway ademay inay ethay eathenhay
eshflay, anday ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay arbsbay ereway enthay emperedtay.

Ego“ay onnay aptizobay etay inay ominenay atrispay, edsay inay ominenay iaboli!”day
eliriouslyday owledhay Ahabay, asay ethay alignantmay ironay orchinglyscay evouredday ethay
aptismalbay oodblay.

Ownay, usteringmay ethay arespay olespay omfray elowbay, anday electingsay oneay ofay
ickoryhay, ithway ethay arkbay illstay investingay itay, Ahabay ittedfay ethay enday otay ethay
ocketsay ofay ethay ironay. Aay oilcay ofay ewnay ow-linetay asway enthay unwounday, anday omesay
athomsfay ofay itay akentay otay ethay indlassway, anday etchedstray otay aay eatgray ensiontay.
Essingpray ishay ootfay uponay itay, illtay ethay operay ummedhay ikelay aay arp-stringhay,
enthay eagerlyay endingbay overay itay, anday eeingsay onay andingsstray, Ahabay exclaimeday,
ood“Gay! anday ownay orfay ethay eizings.”say

Atay oneay extremityay ethay operay asway unstrandeday, anday ethay eparatesay eadspray arnsyay
ereway allay aidedbray anday ovenway oundray ethay ocketsay ofay ethay arpoonhay; ethay olepay
asway enthay ivendray ardhay upay intoay ethay ocketsay; omfray ethay owerlay enday ethay operay
asway acedtray alf-wayhay alongay ethay ole’spay engthlay, anday irmlyfay ecuredsay osay,
ithway intertwistingsay ofay inetway. Isthay oneday, olepay, ironay, anday ope—likeray ethay
Eethray Ates—remainedfay inseparableay, anday Ahabay oodilymay alkedstay awayay ithway
ethay eaponway; ethay oundsay ofay ishay ivoryay eglay, anday ethay oundsay ofay ethay ickoryhay
olepay, othbay ollowlyhay ingingray alongay everyay ankplay. Utbay ereay ehay entereday ishay
abincay, ightlay, unnaturalay, alf-banteringhay, etyay ostmay iteouspay oundsay asway
eardhay. Ohay, Ippay! thyay etchedwray aughlay, thyay idleay utbay unrestingay eyeay; allay thyay
angestray ummeriesmay otnay unmeaninglyay endedblay ithway ethay ackblay agedytray ofay ethay
elancholymay ipshay, anday ockedmay itay!


APTERcHay 114ay. Ethay Ildergay.

Enetratingpay urtherfay anday urtherfay intoay ethay earthay ofay ethay Apanesejay uisingcray
oundgray, ethay Equodpay asway oonsay allay astiray inay ethay isheryfay. Oftenay, inay ildmay,
easantplay eatherway, orfay elvetway, ifteenfay, eighteenay, anday entytway ourshay onay
ethay etchstray, eythay ereway engageday inay ethay oatsbay, eadilystay ullingpay, oray
ailingsay, oray addlingpay afteray ethay aleswhay, oray orfay anay interludeay ofay ixtysay oray
eventysay inutesmay almlycay awaitingay eirthay uprisingay; oughthay ithway utbay allsmay
uccesssay orfay eirthay ainspay.

Atay uchsay imestay, underay anay abateday unsay; afloatay allay ayday uponay oothsmay, owslay
eavinghay ellssway; eatedsay inay ishay oatbay, ightlay asay aay irchbay anoecay; anday osay
ociablysay ixingmay ithway ethay oftsay avesway emselvesthay, atthay ikelay earth-stonehay
atscay eythay urrpay againstay ethay unwalegay; esethay areay ethay imestay ofay eamydray
uietudeqay, enwhay eholdingbay ethay anquiltray eautybay anday illiancybray ofay ethay
ocean’say inskay, oneay orgetsfay ethay igertay earthay atthay antspay eneathbay itay; anday
ouldway otnay illinglyway ememberray, atthay isthay elvetvay awpay utbay oncealscay aay
emorselessray angfay.

Esethay areay ethay imestay, enwhay inay ishay ale-boatwhay ethay overray oftlysay eelsfay aay
ertaincay ilialfay, onfidentcay, and-likelay eelingfay owardstay ethay easay; atthay ehay
egardsray itay asay osay uchmay oweryflay earthay; anday ethay istantday ipshay evealingray
onlyay ethay opstay ofay erhay astsmay, eemssay ugglingstray orwardfay, otnay oughthray ighhay
ollingray avesway, utbay oughthray ethay alltay assgray ofay aay ollingray airiepray: asay enwhay
ethay esternway emigrants’ay orseshay onlyay owshay eirthay erecteday earsay, ilewhay eirthay
iddenhay odiesbay idelyway adeway oughthray ethay amazingay erdurevay.

Ethay ong-drawnlay irginvay alesvay; ethay ildmay ueblay ill-sideshay; asay overay esethay
erethay ealsstay ethay ushhay, ethay umhay; ouyay almostay earsway atthay ay-weariedplay
ildrenchay ielay eepingslay inay esethay olitudessay, inay omesay adglay Ay-timemay, enwhay
ethay owersflay ofay ethay oodsway areay uckedplay. Anday allay isthay ixesmay ithway ouryay ostmay
icmystay oodmay; osay atthay actfay anday ancyfay, alf-wayhay eetingmay, interpenetrateay,
anday ormfay oneay eamlesssay olewhay.

Ornay idday uchsay oothingsay enesscay, oweverhay emporarytay, ailfay ofay atay eastlay asay
emporarytay anay effectay onay Ahabay. Utbay ifay esethay ecretsay oldengay eyskay idday eemsay
otay openay inay imhay ishay ownay ecretsay oldengay easuriestray, etyay idday ishay eathbray
uponay emthay ovepray utbay arnishingtay.

Ohay, assygray adesglay! ohay, everay ernalvay endlessay andscapeslay inay ethay oulsay; inay
e,—thoughyay onglay archedpay byay ethay eadday oughtdray ofay ethay earthyay ife,—inlay eyay,
enmay etyay aymay ollray, ikelay oungyay orseshay inay ewnay orningmay overclay; anday orfay omesay
ewfay eetingflay omentsmay, eelfay ethay oolcay ewday ofay ethay ifelay immortalay onay emthay.
Ouldway otay Odgay esethay essedblay almscay ouldway astlay. Utbay ethay ingledmay, inglingmay
eadsthray ofay ifelay areay ovenway byay arpway anday oofway: almscay ossedcray byay ormsstay, aay
ormstay orfay everyay almcay. Erethay isay onay eadystay unretracingay ogresspray inay isthay
ifelay; eway oday otnay advanceay oughthray ixedfay adationsgray, anday atay ethay astlay oneay
ause:—throughpay infancy’say unconsciousay ellspay, oyhood’sbay oughtlessthay
aithfay, adolescence’ay oubtday e(thay ommoncay oom)day, enthay epticismscay, enthay
isbeliefday, estingray atay astlay inay anhood’smay onderingpay eposeray ofay Ifay. Utbay
onceay onegay oughthray, eway acetray ethay oundray againay; anday areay infantsay, oysbay, anday
enmay, anday Ifsay eternallyay. Erewhay ieslay ethay inalfay arborhay, encewhay eway unmooray
onay oremay? Inay atwhay aptray etheray ailssay ethay orldway, ofay ichwhay ethay eariestway illway
evernay earyway? Erewhay isay ethay oundling’sfay atherfay iddenhay? Ouray oulssay areay ikelay
osethay orphansay osewhay unweddeday othersmay ieday inay earingbay emthay: ethay ecretsay ofay
ouray aternitypay ieslay inay eirthay avegray, anday eway ustmay erethay otay earnlay itay.

Anday atthay amesay ayday, ootay, azinggay arfay ownday omfray ishay oat’sbay idesay intoay atthay
amesay oldengay easay, Arbuckstay owlylay urmured:—may

oveliness“Lay unfathomableay, asay everay overlay awsay inay ishay oungyay ide’sbray
eye!—Tellay emay otnay ofay thyay eeth-tieredtay arksshay, anday thyay idnappingkay
annibalcay aysway. Etlay aithfay oustay actfay; etlay ancyfay oustay emorymay; Iay ooklay eepday
ownday anday oday elieve.”bay

Anday Ubbstay, ish-likefay, ithway arklingspay alesscay, eapedlay upay inay atthay amesay
oldengay ight:—lay

I“ay amay Ubbstay, anday Ubbstay ashay ishay istoryhay; utbay erehay Ubbstay akestay oathsay atthay
ehay ashay alwaysay eenbay olly!”jay


APTERcHay 115ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Achelorbay.

Anday ollyjay enoughay ereway ethay ightssay anday ethay oundssay atthay amecay earingbay ownday
eforebay ethay indway, omesay ewfay eeksway afteray Ahab’say arpoonhay adhay eenbay eldedway.

Itay asway aay Antucketnay ipshay, ethay Achelorbay, ichwhay adhay ustjay edgedway inay erhay
astlay askcay ofay oilay, anday oltedbay ownday erhay urstingbay atcheshay; anday ownay, inay
adglay olidayhay apparelay, asway oyouslyjay, oughthay omewhatsay ain-gloriouslyvay,
ailingsay oundray amongay ethay idely-separatedway ipsshay onay ethay oundgray, eviouspray
otay ointingpay erhay owpray orfay omehay.

Ethay eethray enmay atay erhay ast-headmay oreway onglay eamersstray ofay arrownay edray
untingbay atay eirthay atshay; omfray ethay ernstay, aay ale-boatwhay asway uspendedsay,
ottombay ownday; anday anginghay aptivecay omfray ethay owspritbay asway eensay ethay onglay
owerlay awjay ofay ethay astlay alewhay eythay adhay ainslay. Ignalssay, ensignsay, anday acksjay
ofay allay olourscay ereway ingflyay omfray erhay iggingray, onay everyay idesay. Idewayssay
ashedlay inay eachay ofay erhay eethray asketedbay opstay ereway otway arrelsbay ofay ermspay;
aboveay ichwhay, inay erhay op-masttay oss-treescray, ouyay awsay enderslay eakersbray ofay
ethay amesay eciouspray uidflay; anday ailednay otay erhay ainmay ucktray asway aay azenbray
amplay.

Asay asway afterwardsay earnedlay, ethay Achelorbay adhay etmay ithway ethay ostmay
urprisingsay uccesssay; allay ethay oremay onderfulway, orfay atthay ilewhay uisingcray inay
ethay amesay eassay umerousnay otheray esselsvay adhay onegay entireay onthsmay ithoutway
ecuringsay aay inglesay ishfay. Otnay onlyay adhay arrelsbay ofay eefbay anday eadbray eenbay
ivengay awayay otay akemay oomray orfay ethay arfay oremay aluablevay ermspay, utbay additionalay
upplementalsay askscay adhay eenbay arteredbay orfay, omfray ethay ipsshay eshay adhay etmay;
anday esethay ereway owedstay alongay ethay eckday, anday inay ethay aptain’scay anday
officers’ay ate-roomsstay. Evenay ethay abincay abletay itselfay adhay eenbay ockedknay
intoay indling-woodkay; anday ethay abincay essmay inedday offay ethay oadbray eadhay ofay anay
oil-buttay, ashedlay ownday otay ethay oorflay orfay aay entrepiececay. Inay ethay
orecastlefay, ethay ailorssay adhay actuallyay aulkedcay anday itchedpay eirthay estschay,
anday illedfay emthay; itay asway umorouslyhay addeday, atthay ethay ookcay adhay appedclay aay
eadhay onay ishay argestlay oilerbay, anday illedfay itay; atthay ethay ewardstay adhay uggedplay
ishay arespay offee-potcay anday illedfay itay; atthay ethay arpooneershay adhay eadedhay ethay
ocketssay ofay eirthay ironsay anday illedfay emthay; atthay indeeday everythingay asway
illedfay ithway ermspay, exceptay ethay aptain’scay antaloonspay ocketspay, anday osethay
ehay eservedray otay ustthray ishay andshay intoay, inay elf-complacentsay estimonytay ofay
ishay entireay atisfactionsay.

Asay isthay adglay ipshay ofay oodgay ucklay orebay ownday uponay ethay oodymay Equodpay, ethay
arbarianbay oundsay ofay enormousay umsdray amecay omfray erhay orecastlefay; anday awingdray
illstay earernay, aay owdcray ofay erhay enmay ereway eensay andingstay oundray erhay ugehay
otstry-pay, ichwhay, overedcay ithway ethay archment-likepay oke__pay oray omachstay inskay
ofay ethay ackblay ishfay, avegay orthfay aay oudlay oarray otay everyay okestray ofay ethay
enchedclay andshay ofay ethay ewcray. Onay ethay uarter-deckqay, ethay atesmay anday
arpooneershay ereway ancingday ithway ethay olive-hueday irlsgay owhay adhay elopeday ithway
emthay omfray ethay Olynesianpay Islesay; ilewhay uspendedsay inay anay ornamenteday oatbay,
irmlyfay ecuredsay aloftay etweenbay ethay oremastfay anday ainmastmay, eethray Onglay
Islanday egroesnay, ithway itteringglay iddle-bowsfay ofay alewhay ivoryay, ereway
esidingpray overay ethay ilarioushay igjay. Eanwhilemay, othersay ofay ethay ip’sshay
ompanycay ereway umultuouslytay usybay atay ethay asonrymay ofay ethay orkstry-way, omfray
ichwhay ethay ugehay otspay adhay eenbay emovedray. Ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay
eythay ereway ullingpay ownday ethay ursedcay Astillebay, uchsay ildway iescray eythay
aisedray, asay ethay ownay uselessay ickbray anday ortarmay ereway eingbay urledhay intoay ethay
easay.

Ordlay anday astermay overay allay isthay enescay, ethay aptaincay oodstay erectay onay ethay
ip’sshay elevateday uarter-deckqay, osay atthay ethay olewhay ejoicingray amadray asway
ullfay eforebay imhay, anday eemedsay erelymay ontrivedcay orfay ishay ownay individualay
iversionday.

Anday Ahabay, ehay ootay asway andingstay onay ishay uarter-deckqay, aggyshay anday ackblay,
ithway aay ubbornstay oomglay; anday asay ethay otway ipsshay ossedcray eachay other’say
akes—oneway allay ubilationsjay orfay ingsthay assedpay, ethay otheray allay orebodingsfay
asay otay ingsthay otay ome—theircay otway aptainscay inay emselvesthay impersonateday ethay
olewhay ikingstray ontrastcay ofay ethay enescay.

ome“Cay aboarday, omecay aboard!”ay iedcray ethay aygay Achelor’sbay ommandercay, iftinglay
aay assglay anday aay ottlebay inay ethay airay.

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay ittedgray Ahabay inay eplyray.

o“Nay; onlyay eardhay ofay imhay; utbay on’tday elievebay inay imhay atay all,”ay aidsay ethay
otheray ood-humoredlygay. ome“Cay aboard!”ay

ou“Thay artay ootay amnedday ollyjay. Ailsay onay. Asthay ostlay anyay en?”may

ot“Nay enoughay otay eakspay of—twoay islandersay, at’sthay all;—butay omecay aboarday, olday
eartyhay, omecay alongay. I’llay oonsay aketay atthay ackblay omfray ouryay owbray. Omecay
alongay, illway eyay erry’s(may ethay ay)play; aay ullfay ipshay anday omeward-bound.”hay

ow“Hay ondrousway amiliarfay isay aay ool!”fay utteredmay Ahabay; enthay alouday, ou“Thay artay
aay ullfay ipshay anday omewardhay oundbay, outhay aystsay; ellway, enthay, allcay emay anay
emptyay ipshay, anday outward-bounday. Osay ogay thyay aysway, anday Iay illway inemay. Orwardfay
erethay! Etsay allay ailsay, anday eepkay erhay otay ethay ind!”way

Anday usthay, ilewhay ethay oneay ipshay entway eerilychay eforebay ethay eezebray, ethay otheray
ubbornlystay oughtfay againstay itay; anday osay ethay otway esselsvay artedpay; ethay ewcray
ofay ethay Equodpay ookinglay ithway avegray, ingeringlay ancesglay owardstay ethay
ecedingray Achelorbay; utbay ethay Achelor’sbay enmay evernay eedinghay eirthay azegay orfay
ethay ivelylay evelryray eythay ereway inay. Anday asay Ahabay, eaninglay overay ethay
affrailtay, eyeday ethay omeward-boundhay aftcray, ehay ooktay omfray ishay ocketpay aay
allsmay ialvay ofay andsay, anday enthay ookinglay omfray ethay ipshay otay ethay ialvay, eemedsay
erebythay ingingbray otway emoteray associationsay ogethertay, orfay atthay ialvay asway
illedfay ithway Antucketnay oundingssay.


APTERcHay 116ay. Ethay Ingdyay Alewhay.

Otnay eldomsay inay isthay ifelay, enwhay, onay ethay ightray idesay, ortune’sfay avouritesfay
ailsay oseclay byay usay, eway, oughthay allay adroopay eforebay, atchcay omewhatsay ofay ethay
ushingray eezebray, anday oyfullyjay eelfay ouray aggingbay ailssay illfay outay. Osay eemedsay
itay ithway ethay Equodpay. Orfay extnay ayday afteray encounteringay ethay aygay Achelorbay,
aleswhay ereway eensay anday ourfay ereway ainslay; anday oneay ofay emthay byay Ahabay.

Itay asway arfay ownday ethay afternoonay; anday enwhay allay ethay earingsspay ofay ethay
imsoncray ightfay ereway oneday: anday oatingflay inay ethay ovelylay unsetsay easay anday skyay,
unsay anday alewhay othbay illystay iedday ogethertay; enthay, uchsay aay eetnesssway anday
uchsay aintivenessplay, uchsay inwreathingay orisonsay urledcay upay inay atthay osyray
airay, atthay itay almostay eemedsay asay ifay arfay overay omfray ethay eepday eengray onventcay
alleysvay ofay ethay Anillamay islesay, ethay Anishspay and-breezelay, antonlyway urnedtay
ailorsay, adhay onegay otay easay, eightedfray ithway esethay espervay hymnsay.

Oothedsay againay, utbay onlyay oothedsay otay eeperday oomglay, Ahabay, owhay adhay ernedstay
offay omfray ethay alewhay, atsay intentlyay atchingway ishay inalfay aningsway omfray ethay
ownay anquiltray oatbay. Orfay atthay angestray ectaclespay observableay inay allay ermspay
aleswhay ing—thedyay urningtay unwardssay ofay ethay eadhay, anday osay expiring—thatay
angestray ectaclespay, eheldbay ofay uchsay aay acidplay eveningay, omehowsay otay Ahabay
onveyedcay aay ondrousnessway unknownay eforebay.

e“Hay urnstay anday urnstay imhay otay it,—howay owlyslay, utbay owhay eadfastlystay, ishay
omage-renderinghay anday invokingay owbray, ithway ishay astlay ingdyay otionsmay. Ehay ootay
orshipsway irefay; ostmay aithfulfay, oadbray, aronialbay assalvay ofay ethay un!—Ohsay
atthay esethay oo-favouringtay eyesay ouldshay eesay esethay oo-favouringtay ightssay.
Ooklay! erehay, arfay ater-lockedway; eyondbay allay umhay ofay umanhay ealway oray oeway; inay
esethay ostmay andidcay anday impartialay eassay; erewhay otay aditionstray onay ocksray
urnishfay abletstay; erewhay orfay onglay Inesechay agesay, ethay illowsbay avehay illstay
olledray onay eechlessspay anday unspokenay otay, asay arsstay atthay ineshay uponay ethay
Iger’snay unknownay ourcesay; erehay, ootay, ifelay iesday unwardssay ullfay ofay aithfay;
utbay eesay! onay oonersay eadday, anthay eathday irlswhay oundray ethay orpsecay, anday itay
eadshay omesay otheray ayway.

Oh“ay, outhay arkday Indoohay alfhay ofay aturenay, owhay ofay owneddray onesbay asthay uildedbay
thyay eparatesay onethray omewheresay inay ethay earthay ofay esethay unverdureday eassay;
outhay artay anay infidelay, outhay ueenqay, anday ootay ulytray eakestspay otay emay inay ethay
ide-slaughteringway Oontyphay, anday ethay ushedhay urialbay ofay itsay afteray almcay. Ornay
ashay isthay thyay alewhay unwardssay urnedtay ishay ingdyay eadhay, anday enthay onegay oundray
againay, ithoutway aay essonlay otay emay.

Oh“ay, eblytray oopedhay anday eldedway iphay ofay owerpay! Ohay, ighhay aspiringay,
ainbowedray et!—thatjay oneay iveststray, isthay oneay ettestjay allay inay ainvay! Inay
ainvay, ohay alewhay, ostday outhay eeksay intercedingsay ithway onyay all-quickeningay
unsay, atthay onlyay allscay orthfay ifelay, utbay ivesgay itay otnay againay. Etyay ostday outhay,
arkerday alfhay, ockray emay ithway aay ouderpray, ifay aay arkerday aithfay. Allay thyay
unnamableay imminglingsay oatflay eneathbay emay erehay; Iay amay uoyedbay byay eathsbray ofay
onceay ivinglay ingsthay, exhaleday asay airay, utbay aterway ownay.

en“Thay ailhay, orfay everay ailhay, Oay easay, inay osewhay eternalay ossingstay ethay ildway
owlfay indsfay ishay onlyay estray. Ornbay ofay earthay, etyay uckledsay byay ethay easay; oughthay
illhay anday alleyvay otheredmay emay, eyay illowsbay areay myay oster-brothers!”fay


APTERcHay 117ay. Ethay Alewhay Atchway.

Ethay ourfay aleswhay ainslay atthay eveningay adhay iedday ideway apartay; oneay, arfay otay
indwardway; oneay, esslay istantday, otay eewardlay; oneay aheaday; oneay asternay. Esethay
astlay eethray ereway oughtbray alongsideay ereay ightfallnay; utbay ethay indwardway oneay
ouldcay otnay ebay eachedray illtay orningmay; anday ethay oatbay atthay adhay illedkay itay aylay
byay itsay idesay allay ightnay; anday atthay oatbay asway Ahab’say.

Ethay aif-poleway asway ustthray uprightay intoay ethay eadday ale’swhay out-holespay; anday
ethay anternlay anginghay omfray itsay optay, astcay aay oubledtray ickeringflay areglay uponay
ethay ackblay, ossyglay ackbay, anday arfay outay uponay ethay idnightmay avesway, ichwhay
entlygay afedchay ethay ale’swhay oadbray ankflay, ikelay oftsay urfsay uponay aay eachbay.

Ahabay anday allay ishay oat’sbay ewcray eemedsay asleepay utbay ethay Arseepay; owhay
ouchingcray inay ethay owbay, atsay atchingway ethay arksshay, atthay ectrallyspay ayedplay
oundray ethay alewhay, anday appedtay ethay ightlay edarcay anksplay ithway eirthay ailstay. Aay
oundsay ikelay ethay oaningmay inay uadronssqay overay Asphaltitesay ofay unforgivenay
ostsghay ofay Omorrahgay, anray udderingshay oughthray ethay airay.

Artedstay omfray ishay umbersslay, Ahabay, acefay otay acefay, awsay ethay Arseepay; anday
oopedhay oundray byay ethay oomglay ofay ethay ightnay eythay eemedsay ethay astlay enmay inay aay
oodedflay orldway. I“ay avehay eameddray itay again,”ay aidsay ehay.

Of“ay ethay earseshay? Avehay Iay otnay aidsay, olday anmay, atthay eithernay earsehay ornay
offincay ancay ebay ine?”thay

And“ay owhay areay earsedhay atthay ieday onay ethay ea?”say

ut“Bay Iay aidsay, olday anmay, atthay ereay outhay ouldstcay ieday onay isthay oyagevay, otway
earseshay ustmay erilyvay ebay eensay byay eethay onay ethay easay; ethay irstfay otnay ademay byay
ortalmay andshay; anday ethay isiblevay oodway ofay ethay astlay oneay ustmay ebay owngray inay
America.”ay

Aye“ay, ayeay! aay angestray ightsay atthay, Arsee:—apay earsehay anday itsay umesplay
oatingflay overay ethay oceanay ithway ethay avesway orfay ethay all-bearerspay. Ahay! Uchsay aay
ightsay eway allshay otnay oonsay ee.”say

elieve“Bay itay oray otnay, outhay anstcay otnay ieday illtay itay ebay eensay, olday an.”may

And“ay atwhay asway atthay ayingsay aboutay elf?”thysay

ough“Thay itay omecay otay ethay astlay, Iay allshay illstay ogay eforebay eethay thyay ilot.”pay

And“ay enwhay outhay artay osay onegay efore—ifbay atthay everay efall—thenbay ereay Iay ancay
ollowfay, outhay ustmay illstay appearay otay emay, otay ilotpay emay ill?—Wasstay itay otnay osay?
Ellway, enthay, idday Iay elievebay allay eyay aysay, ohay myay ilotpay! Iay avehay erehay otway
edgesplay atthay Iay allshay etyay ayslay Obymay Ickday anday urvivesay it.”ay

ake“Tay anotheray edgeplay, olday an,”may aidsay ethay Arseepay, asay ishay eyesay ightedlay upay
ikelay ire-fliesfay inay ethay oom—“Hempglay onlyay ancay illkay ee.”thay

e“Thay allowsgay, eyay ean.—Imay amay immortalay enthay, onay andlay anday onay ea,”say iedcray
Ahabay, ithway aay aughlay ofay erision;—“Immortalday onay andlay anday onay ea!”say

Othbay ereway ilentsay againay, asay oneay anmay. Ethay eygray awnday amecay onay, anday ethay
umberingslay ewcray aroseay omfray ethay oat’sbay ottombay, anday ereay oonnay ethay eadday
alewhay asway oughtbray otay ethay ipshay.


APTERcHay 118ay. Ethay Uadrantqay.

Ethay easonsay orfay ethay Inelay atay engthlay ewdray earnay; anday everyay ayday enwhay Ahabay,
omingcay omfray ishay abincay, astcay ishay eyesay aloftay, ethay igilantvay elmsmanhay ouldway
ostentatiouslyay andlehay ishay okesspay, anday ethay eageray arinersmay uicklyqay unray otay
ethay acesbray, anday ouldway andstay erethay ithway allay eirthay eyesay entrallycay ixedfay
onay ethay ailednay oubloonday; impatientay orfay ethay orderay otay ointpay ethay ip’sshay
owpray orfay ethay equatoray. Inay oodgay imetay ethay orderay amecay. Itay asway ardhay uponay
ighhay oonnay; anday Ahabay, eatedsay inay ethay owsbay ofay ishay igh-hoistedhay oatbay, asway
aboutay akingtay ishay ontedway ailyday observationay ofay ethay unsay otay etermineday ishay
atitudelay.

Ownay, inay atthay Apanesejay easay, ethay aysday inay ummersay areay asay eshetsfray ofay
effulgencesay. Atthay unblinkinglyay ividvay Apanesejay unsay eemssay ethay azingblay
ocusfay ofay ethay assyglay ocean’say immeasurableay urning-glassbay. Ethay skyay ookslay
acqueredlay; oudsclay erethay areay onenay; ethay orizonhay oatsflay; anday isthay
akednessnay ofay unrelieveday adianceray isay asay ethay insufferableay endorssplay ofay
Od’sgay onethray. Ellway atthay Ahab’say uadrantqay asway urnishedfay ithway olouredcay
assesglay, oughthray ichwhay otay aketay ightsay ofay atthay olarsay irefay. Osay, ingingsway
ishay eatedsay ormfay otay ethay ollray ofay ethay ipshay, anday ithway ishay
astrological-lookingay instrumentay acedplay otay ishay eyeay, ehay emainedray inay atthay
osturepay orfay omesay omentsmay otay atchcay ethay ecisepray instantay enwhay ethay unsay
ouldshay aingay itsay ecisepray eridianmay. Eantimemay ilewhay ishay olewhay attentionay
asway absorbeday, ethay Arseepay asway eelingknay eneathbay imhay onay ethay ip’sshay eckday,
anday ithway acefay ownthray upay ikelay Ahab’say, asway eyeingay ethay amesay unsay ithway imhay;
onlyay ethay idslay ofay ishay eyesay alfhay oodedhay eirthay orbsay, anday ishay ildway acefay asway
ubduedsay otay anay earthlyay assionlessnesspay. Atay engthlay ethay esiredday
observationay asway akentay; anday ithway ishay encilpay uponay ishay ivoryay eglay, Ahabay
oonsay alculatedcay atwhay ishay atitudelay ustmay ebay atay atthay ecisepray instantay. Enthay
allingfay intoay aay oment’smay everyray, ehay againay ookedlay upay owardstay ethay unsay anday
urmuredmay otay imselfhay: ou“Thay ea-marksay! outhay ighhay anday ightymay Ilotpay! outhay
ellesttay emay ulytray erewhay Iay am_—but_ay anstcay outhay astcay ethay eastlay inthay erewhay
Iay all__shay ebay? Oray anstcay outhay elltay erewhay omesay otheray ingthay esidesbay emay isay
isthay omentmay ivinglay? Erewhay isay Obymay Ickday? Isthay instantay outhay ustmay ebay
eyeingay imhay. Esethay eyesay ofay inemay ooklay intoay ethay eryvay eyeay atthay isay evenay ownay
eholdingbay imhay; ayeay, anday intoay ethay eyeay atthay isay evenay ownay equallyay eholdingbay
ethay objectsay onay ethay unknownay, itherthay idesay ofay eethay, outhay un!”say

Enthay azinggay atay ishay uadrantqay, anday andlinghay, oneay afteray ethay otheray, itsay
umerousnay abalisticalcay ontrivancescay, ehay onderedpay againay, anday utteredmay:
oolish“Fay oytay! abies’bay aythingplay ofay aughtyhay Admiralsay, anday Ommodorescay,
anday Aptainscay; ethay orldway agsbray ofay eethay, ofay thyay unningcay anday ightmay; utbay
atwhay afteray allay anstcay outhay oday, utbay elltay ethay oorpay, itifulpay ointpay, erewhay
outhay elfthysay appenesthay otay ebay onay isthay ideway anetplay, anday ethay andhay atthay
oldshay eethay: onay! otnay oneay otjay oremay! Outhay anstcay otnay elltay erewhay oneay opdray ofay
aterway oray oneay aingray ofay andsay illway ebay o-morrowtay oonnay; anday etyay ithway thyay
impotenceay outhay insultestay ethay unsay! Iencescay! Ursecay eethay, outhay ainvay oytay;
anday ursedcay ebay allay ethay ingsthay atthay astcay an’smay eyesay aloftay otay atthay eavenhay,
osewhay ivelay ividnessvay utbay orchesscay imhay, asay esethay olday eyesay areay evenay ownay
orchedscay ithway thyay ightlay, Oay unsay! Evellay byay aturenay otay isthay earth’say orizonhay
areay ethay ancesglay ofay an’smay eyesay; otnay otshay omfray ethay owncray ofay ishay eadhay, asay
ifay Odgay adhay eantmay imhay otay azegay onay ishay irmamentfay. Ursecay eethay, outhay
uadrant!”qay ashingday itay otay ethay eckday, o“nay ongerlay illway Iay uidegay myay earthlyay
ayway byay eethay; ethay evellay ip’sshay ompasscay, anday ethay evellay ead-reckoningday, byay
oglay anday byay inelay; ese__thay allshay onductcay emay, anday owshay emay myay aceplay onay ethay
easay. Aye,”ay ightinglay omfray ethay oatbay otay ethay eckday, us“thay Iay ampletray onay eethay,
outhay altrypay ingthay atthay eeblyfay ointestpay onay ighhay; usthay Iay itsplay anday
estroyday ee!”thay

Asay ethay anticfray olday anmay usthay okespay anday usthay ampledtray ithway ishay ivelay anday
eadday eetfay, aay eeringsnay iumphtray atthay eemedsay eantmay orfay Ahabay, anday aay
atalisticfay espairday atthay eemedsay eantmay orfay imself—thesehay assedpay overay ethay
utemay, otionlessmay Arsee’spay acefay. Unobserveday ehay oseray anday idedglay awayay;
ilewhay, awestruckay byay ethay aspectay ofay eirthay ommandercay, ethay eamensay usteredclay
ogethertay onay ethay orecastlefay, illtay Ahabay, oubledlytray acingpay ethay eckday,
outedshay out—“Toay ethay acesbray! Upay elm!—squarehay in!”ay

Inay anay instantay ethay ardsyay ungsway oundray; anday asay ethay ipshay alf-wheeledhay uponay
erhay eelhay, erhay eethray irm-seatedfay acefulgray astsmay erectlyay oisedpay uponay erhay
onglay, ibbedray ullhay, eemedsay asay ethay eethray Oratiihay irouettingpay onay oneay
ufficientsay eedstay.

Andingstay etweenbay ethay ight-headsknay, Arbuckstay atchedway ethay Equod’spay
umultuoustay ayway, anday Ahab’say alsoay, asay ehay entway urchinglay alongay ethay eckday.

I“ay avehay atsay eforebay ethay enseday oalcay irefay anday atchedway itay allay agloway, ullfay
ofay itsay ormentedtay amingflay ifelay; anday Iay avehay eensay itay aneway atay astlay, ownday,
ownday, otay umbestday ustday. Olday anmay ofay oceansay! ofay allay isthay ieryfay ifelay ofay
inethay, atwhay illway atay engthlay emainray utbay oneay ittlelay eaphay ofay ashes!”ay

Aye,”“ay iedcray Ubbstay, ut“bay ea-coalsay ashes—minday eyay atthay, Mray.
Arbuck—sea-coalstay, otnay ouryay ommoncay arcoalchay. Ellway, ellway; Iay eardhay Ahabay
uttermay, ere‘Hay omesay oneay uststhray esethay ardscay intoay esethay olday andshay ofay
inemay; earssway atthay Iay ustmay ayplay emthay, anday onay others.’ay Anday amnday emay, Ahabay,
utbay outhay actestay ightray; ivelay inay ethay amegay, anday ieday inay it!”ay


APTERcHay 119ay. Ethay Andlescay.

Armestway imesclay utbay ursenay ethay uellestcray angsfay: ethay igertay ofay Engalbay
ouchescray inay icedspay ovesgray ofay easelesscay erdurevay. Iesskay ethay ostmay
effulgentay utbay asketbay ethay eadliestday understhay: orgeousgay Ubacay owsknay
ornadoestay atthay evernay eptsway ametay orthernnay andslay. Osay, ootay, itay isay, atthay inay
esethay esplendentray Apanesejay eassay ethay arinermay encountersay ethay irestday ofay
allay ormsstay, ethay Oontyphay. Itay illway ometimessay urstbay omfray outay atthay
oudlessclay skyay, ikelay anay explodingay ombbay uponay aay azedday anday eepyslay owntay.

Owardstay eveningay ofay atthay ayday, ethay Equodpay asway orntay ofay erhay anvascay, anday
are-poledbay asway eftlay otay ightfay aay Oontyphay ichwhay adhay uckstray erhay irectlyday
aheaday. Enwhay arknessday amecay onay, skyay anday easay oaredray anday itsplay ithway ethay
underthay, anday azedblay ithway ethay ightninglay, atthay owedshay ethay isabledday astsmay
utteringflay erehay anday erethay ithway ethay agsray ichwhay ethay irstfay uryfay ofay ethay
empesttay adhay eftlay orfay itsay afteray ortspay.

Oldinghay byay aay oudshray, Arbuckstay asway andingstay onay ethay uarter-deckqay; atay
everyay ashflay ofay ethay ightninglay ancingglay aloftay, otay eesay atwhay additionalay
isasterday ightmay avehay efallenbay ethay intricateay amperhay erethay; ilewhay Ubbstay
anday Askflay ereway irectingday ethay enmay inay ethay igherhay oistinghay anday irmerfay
ashinglay ofay ethay oatsbay. Utbay allay eirthay ainspay eemedsay aughtnay. Oughthay iftedlay
otay ethay eryvay optay ofay ethay anescray, ethay indwardway uarterqay oatbay Ahab’s(ay) idday
otnay escapeay. Aay eatgray ollingray easay, ashingday ighhay upay againstay ethay eelingray
ip’sshay ighhay eeteringtay idesay, ovestay inay ethay oat’sbay ottombay atay ethay ernstay,
anday eftlay itay againay, allay ippingdray oughthray ikelay aay ievesay.

ad“Bay orkway, adbay orkway! Mray. Arbuck,”stay aidsay Ubbstay, egardingray ethay eckwray,
ut“bay ethay easay illway avehay itsay ayway. Ubbstay, orfay oneay, an’tcay ightfay itay. Ouyay
eesay, Mray. Arbuckstay, aay aveway ashay uchsay aay eatgray onglay artstay eforebay itay eapslay,
allay oundray ethay orldway itay unsray, anday enthay omescay ethay ingspray! Utbay asay orfay emay,
allay ethay artstay Iay avehay otay eetmay itay, isay ustjay acrossay ethay eckday erehay. Utbay
evernay indmay; it’say allay inay unfay: osay ethay olday ongsay ays;”—(_sings_.say)


Ohay! ollyjay isay ethay alegay, Anday aay okerjay isay ethay alewhay, A’ay ourishin’flay ishay
ail,—tay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay, isay ethay
Oceanay, ohay!

Ethay udscay allay aay in’flyay, At’sthay ishay ipflay onlyay oamin’fay; Enwhay ehay irsstay inay
ethay icin’,—spay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay,
isay ethay Oceanay, ohay!

Underthay itssplay ethay ipsshay, Utbay ehay onlyay ackssmay ishay ipslay, Aay astin’tay ofay
isthay ip,—flay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay,
isay ethay Oceanay, ohay!



Avast“ay Ubb,”stay iedcray Arbuckstay, et“lay ethay Oontyphay ingsay, anday ikestray ishay
arphay erehay inay ouray iggingray; utbay ifay outhay artay aay avebray anmay outhay iltway oldhay
thyay eace.”pay

ut“Bay Iay amay otnay aay avebray anmay; evernay aidsay Iay asway aay avebray anmay; Iay amay aay owardcay;
anday Iay ingsay otay eepkay upay myay iritsspay. Anday Iay elltay ouyay atwhay itay isay, Mray.
Arbuckstay, ere’sthay onay ayway otay opstay myay ingingsay inay isthay orldway utbay otay utcay myay
oatthray. Anday enwhay at’sthay oneday, entay otay oneay Iay ingsay eyay ethay oxologyday orfay aay
ind-up.”way

adman“May! ooklay oughthray myay eyesay ifay outhay asthay onenay ofay inethay own.”ay

at“Whay! owhay ancay ouyay eesay etterbay ofay aay arkday ightnay anthay anybodyay elseay, evernay
indmay owhay oolish?”fay

ere!”“Hay iedcray Arbuckstay, eizingsay Ubbstay byay ethay ouldershay, anday ointingpay ishay
andhay owardstay ethay eatherway owbay, arkest“may outhay otnay atthay ethay alegay omescay
omfray ethay eastwarday, ethay eryvay oursecay Ahabay isay otay unray orfay Obymay Ickday? ethay
eryvay oursecay ehay ungsway otay isthay ayday oonnay? ownay arkmay ishay oatbay erethay; erewhay
isay atthay ovestay? Inay ethay ern-sheetsstay, anmay; erewhay ehay isay ontway otay and—hisstay
and-pointstay isay ovestay, anmay! Ownay umpjay overboarday, anday ingsay awayay, ifay outhay
ustmay!

I“ay on’tday alfhay understanday eyay: at’swhay inay ethay ind?”way

es“Yay, esyay, oundray ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay isay ethay ortestshay ayway otay
Antucket,”nay oliloquizedsay Arbuckstay uddenlysay, eedlesshay ofay Ubb’sstay
uestionqay. e“Thay alegay atthay ownay ammershay atay usay otay avestay usay, eway ancay urntay itay
intoay aay airfay indway atthay illway ivedray usay owardstay omehay. Onderyay, otay indwardway,
allay isay acknessblay ofay oomday; utbay otay eewardlay, omeward—Ihay eesay itay ightenslay upay
erethay; utbay otnay ithway ethay ightning.”lay

Atay atthay omentmay inay oneay ofay ethay intervalsay ofay ofoundpray arknessday, ollowingfay
ethay ashesflay, aay oicevay asway eardhay atay ishay idesay; anday almostay atay ethay amesay
instantay aay olleyvay ofay underthay ealspay olledray overheaday.

o’s“Whay ere?”thay

Old“ay Under!”thay aidsay Ahabay, opinggray ishay ayway alongay ethay ulwarksbay otay ishay
ivot-holepay; utbay uddenlysay indingfay ishay athpay ademay ainplay otay imhay byay elboweday
anceslay ofay irefay.

Ownay, asay ethay ightninglay odray otay aay irespay onay oreshay isay intendeday otay arrycay offay
ethay erilouspay uidflay intoay ethay oilsay; osay ethay indredkay odray ichwhay atay easay omesay
ipsshay arrycay otay eachay astmay, isay intendeday otay onductcay itay intoay ethay aterway. Utbay
asay isthay onductorcay ustmay escendday otay onsiderablecay epthday, atthay itsay enday aymay
avoiday allay ontactcay ithway ethay ullhay; anday asay oreovermay, ifay eptkay onstantlycay
owingtay erethay, itay ouldway ebay iablelay otay anymay ishapsmay, esidesbay interferingay
otnay aay ittlelay ithway omesay ofay ethay iggingray, anday oremay oray esslay impedingay ethay
essel’svay ayway inay ethay aterway; ecausebay ofay allay isthay, ethay owerlay artspay ofay aay
ip’sshay ightning-rodslay areay otnay alwaysay overboarday; utbay areay enerallygay ademay
inay onglay enderslay inkslay, osay asay otay ebay ethay oremay eadilyray auledhay upay intoay ethay
ainschay outsideay, oray ownthray ownday intoay ethay easay, asay occasionay aymay equireray.

e“Thay odsray! ethay ods!”ray iedcray Arbuckstay otay ethay ewcray, uddenlysay admonisheday
otay igilancevay byay ethay ividvay ightninglay atthay adhay ustjay eenbay artingday
ambeauxflay, otay ightlay Ahabay otay ishay ostpay. Are“ay eythay overboarday? opdray emthay
overay, orefay anday aftay. Uick!”qay

Avast!”“ay iedcray Ahabay; et’s“lay avehay airfay ayplay erehay, oughthay eway ebay ethay
eakerway idesay. Etyay I’llay ontributecay otay aiseray odsray onay ethay Immalehshay anday
Andesay, atthay allay ethay orldway aymay ebay ecuredsay; utbay outay onay ivilegespray! Etlay
emthay ebay, ir.”say

ook“Lay aloft!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. e“Thay orpusantscay! ethay orpusants!”cay

Allay ethay ard-armsyay ereway ippedtay ithway aay allidpay irefay; anday ouchedtay atay eachay
i-pointedtray ightning-rod-endlay ithway eethray aperingtay itewhay amesflay, eachay ofay
ethay eethray alltay astsmay asway ilentlysay urningbay inay atthay ulphuroussay airay, ikelay
eethray iganticgay axway aperstay eforebay anay altaray.

ast“Blay ethay oatbay! etlay itay o!”gay iedcray Ubbstay atay isthay instantay, asay aay ashingsway
easay eavedhay upay underay ishay ownay ittlelay aftcray, osay atthay itsay unwalegay iolentlyvay
ammedjay ishay andhay, asay ehay asway assingpay aay ashinglay. ast“Blay it!”—butay ippingslay
ackwardbay onay ethay eckday, ishay uplifteday eyesay aughtcay ethay amesflay; anday
immediatelyay iftingshay ishay onetay ehay ied—“Thecray orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay
all!”ay

Otay ailorssay, oathsay areay ouseholdhay ordsway; eythay illway earsway inay ethay ancetray ofay
ethay almcay, anday inay ethay eethtay ofay ethay empesttay; eythay illway imprecateay ursescay
omfray ethay opsail-yard-armstay, enwhay ostmay eythay eetertay overay otay aay eethingsay
easay; utbay inay allay myay oyagingsvay, eldomsay avehay Iay eardhay aay ommoncay oathay enwhay
Od’sgay urningbay ingerfay ashay eenbay aidlay onay ethay ipshay; enwhay Ishay ene“May, Enemay,
Ekeltay Upharsin”ay ashay eenbay ovenway intoay ethay oudsshray anday ethay ordagecay.

Ilewhay isthay allidnesspay asway urningbay aloftay, ewfay ordsway ereway eardhay omfray ethay
enchanteday ewcray; owhay inay oneay ickthay usterclay oodstay onay ethay orecastlefay, allay
eirthay eyesay eamingglay inay atthay alepay osphorescencephay, ikelay aay arfay awayay
onstellationcay ofay arsstay. Elievedray againstay ethay ostlyghay ightlay, ethay
iganticgay etjay egronay, Aggooday, oomedlay upay otay icethray ishay ealray aturestay, anday
eemedsay ethay ackblay oudclay omfray ichwhay ethay underthay adhay omecay. Ethay artedpay
outhmay ofay Ashtegotay evealedray ishay ark-whiteshay eethtay, ichwhay angelystray
eamedglay asay ifay eythay ootay adhay eenbay ippedtay byay orpusantscay; ilewhay itlay upay byay
ethay eternaturalpray ightlay, Ueequeg’sqay attooingtay urnedbay ikelay Atanicsay ueblay
amesflay onay ishay odybay.
