Ethay ableautay allay anedway atay astlay ithway ethay allidnesspay aloftay; anday onceay oremay
ethay Equodpay anday everyay oulsay onay erhay ecksday ereway appedwray inay aay allpay. Aay omentmay
oray otway assedpay, enwhay Arbuckstay, oinggay orwardfay, ushedpay againstay omesay oneay.
Itay asway Ubbstay. at“Whay inkestthay outhay ownay, anmay; Iay eardhay thyay cryay; itay asway otnay
ethay amesay inay ethay ong.”say

o“Nay, onay, itay asn’tway; Iay aidsay ethay orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay allay; anday Iay
opehay eythay illway, illstay. Utbay oday eythay onlyay avehay ercymay onay onglay aces?—havefay
eythay onay owelsbay orfay aay aughlay? Anday ooklay eyay, Mray. Arbuck—butstay it’say ootay arkday
otay ooklay. Earhay emay, enthay: Iay aketay atthay ast-headmay ameflay eway awsay orfay aay ignsay
ofay oodgay ucklay; orfay osethay astsmay areay ootedray inay aay oldhay atthay isay oinggay otay ebay
ockchay a’ay ockblay ithway erm-oilspay, ed’yay eesay; anday osay, allay atthay ermspay illway
orkway upay intoay ethay astsmay, ikelay apsay inay aay eetray. Esyay, ouray eethray astsmay illway
etyay ebay asay eethray ermacetispay andles—that’scay ethay oodgay omisepray eway aw.”say

Atay atthay omentmay Arbuckstay aughtcay ightsay ofay Ubb’sstay acefay owlyslay eginningbay
otay immerglay intoay ightsay. Ancingglay upwardsay, ehay iedcray: ee“Say! ee!”say anday onceay
oremay ethay ighhay aperingtay amesflay ereway eheldbay ithway atwhay eemedsay edoubledray
upernaturalnesssay inay eirthay allorpay.

e“Thay orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay all,”ay iedcray Ubbstay, againay.

Atay ethay asebay ofay ethay ainmastmay, ullfay eneathbay ethay oubloonday anday ethay ameflay,
ethay Arseepay asway eelingknay inay Ahab’say ontfray, utbay ithway ishay eadhay owedbay awayay
omfray imhay; ilewhay earnay byay, omfray ethay archeday anday overhangingay iggingray, erewhay
eythay adhay ustjay eenbay engageday ecuringsay aay arspay, aay umbernay ofay ethay eamensay,
arresteday byay ethay areglay, ownay oheredcay ogethertay, anday unghay endulouspay, ikelay aay
otknay ofay umbednay aspsway omfray aay oopingdray, orcharday igtway. Inay ariousvay
enchanteday attitudesay, ikelay ethay andingstay, oray eppingstay, oray unningray
eletonsskay inay Erculaneumhay, othersay emainedray ootedray otay ethay eckday; utbay allay
eirthay eyesay upcastay.

Aye“ay, ayeay, en!”may iedcray Ahabay. ook“Lay upay atay itay; arkmay itay ellway; ethay itewhay
ameflay utbay ightslay ethay ayway otay ethay Itewhay Alewhay! Andhay emay osethay ainmastmay
inkslay erethay; Iay ouldway ainfay eelfay isthay ulsepay, anday etlay inemay eatbay againstay
itay; oodblay againstay irefay! O.”say

Enthay urning—thetay astlay inklay eldhay astfay inay ishay eftlay andhay, ehay utpay ishay ootfay
uponay ethay Arseepay; anday ithway ixedfay upwarday eyeay, anday igh-flunghay ightray armay,
ehay oodstay erectay eforebay ethay oftylay i-pointedtray initytray ofay amesflay.

Oh“ay! outhay earclay iritspay ofay earclay irefay, omwhay onay esethay eassay Iay asay Ersianpay
onceay idday orshipway, illtay inay ethay acramentalsay actay osay urnedbay byay eethay, atthay
otay isthay ourhay Iay earbay ethay arscay; Iay ownay owknay eethay, outhay earclay iritspay, anday Iay
ownay owknay atthay thyay ightray orshipway isay efianceday. Otay eithernay ovelay ornay
everenceray iltway outhay ebay indkay; anday e’enay orfay atehay outhay anstcay utbay illkay; anday
allay areay illedkay. Onay earlessfay oolfay ownay ontsfray eethay. Iay ownay thyay eechlessspay,
acelessplay owerpay; utbay otay ethay astlay aspgay ofay myay earthquakeay ifelay illway
isputeday itsay unconditionalay, unintegralay asterymay inay emay. Inay ethay idstmay ofay
ethay ersonifiedpay impersonalay, aay ersonalitypay andsstay erehay. Oughthay utbay aay
ointpay atay estbay; encesoe’erwhay Iay amecay; eresoe’erwhay Iay ogay; etyay ilewhay Iay
earthlyay ivelay, ethay ueenlyqay ersonalitypay iveslay inay emay, anday eelsfay erhay oyalray
ightsray. Utbay arway isay ainpay, anday atehay isay oeway. Omecay inay thyay owestlay ormfay ofay
ovelay, anday Iay illway eelknay anday isskay eethay; utbay atay thyay ighesthay, omecay asay eremay
upernalsay owerpay; anday oughthay outhay aunchestlay aviesnay ofay ull-freightedfay
orldsway, ere’sthay atthay inay erehay atthay illstay emainsray indifferentay. Ohay, outhay
earclay iritspay, ofay thyay irefay outhay adestmay emay, anday ikelay aay uetray ildchay ofay
irefay, Iay eathebray itay ackbay otay ee.”thay

udden[_Say, epeatedray ashesflay ofay ightninglay; ethay inenay amesflay eaplay
engthwiselay otay icethray eirthay eviouspray eighthay; Ahabay, ithway ethay estray, osesclay
ishay eyesay, ishay ightray andhay essedpray ardhay uponay em._thay]

I“ay ownay thyay eechlessspay, acelessplay owerpay; aidsay Iay otnay osay? Ornay asway itay ungwray
omfray emay; ornay oday Iay ownay opdray esethay inkslay. Outhay anstcay indblay; utbay Iay ancay
enthay opegray. Outhay anstcay onsumecay; utbay Iay ancay enthay ebay ashesay. Aketay ethay
omagehay ofay esethay oorpay eyesay, anday utter-handsshay. Iay ouldway otnay aketay itay. Ethay
ightninglay ashesflay oughthray myay ullskay; inemay eye-ballsay acheay anday acheay; myay
olewhay eatenbay ainbray eemssay asay eheadedbay, anday ollingray onay omesay unningstay
oundgray. Ohay, ohay! Etyay indfoldblay, etyay illway Iay alktay otay eethay. Ightlay oughthay
outhay ebay, outhay eapestlay outay ofay arknessday; utbay Iay amay arknessday eapinglay outay ofay
ightlay, eapinglay outay ofay eethay! Ethay avelinsjay easecay; openay eyesay; eesay, oray otnay?
Erethay urnbay ethay amesflay! Ohay, outhay agnanimousmay! ownay Iay oday oryglay inay myay
enealogygay. Utbay outhay artay utbay myay ieryfay atherfay; myay eetsway othermay, Iay owknay
otnay. Ohay, uelcray! atwhay asthay outhay oneday ithway erhay? Erethay ieslay myay uzzlepay; utbay
inethay isay eatergray. Outhay owestknay otnay owhay amecay eyay, encehay allestcay elfthysay
unbegottenay; ertainlycay owestknay otnay thyay eginningbay, encehay allestcay elfthysay
unbegunay. Iay owknay atthay ofay emay, ichwhay outhay owestknay otnay ofay elfthysay, ohay, outhay
omnipotentay. Erethay isay omesay unsuffusingay ingthay eyondbay eethay, outhay earclay
iritspay, otay omwhay allay thyay eternityay isay utbay imetay, allay thyay eativenesscray
echanicalmay. Oughthray eethay, thyay amingflay elfsay, myay orchedscay eyesay oday imlyday
eesay itay. Ohay, outhay oundlingfay irefay, outhay ermithay immemorialay, outhay ootay asthay
thyay incommunicableay iddleray, thyay unparticipateday iefgray. Erehay againay ithway
aughtyhay agonyay, Iay eadray myay iresay. Eaplay! eaplay upay, anday icklay ethay skyay! Iay eaplay
ithway eethay; Iay urnbay ithway eethay; ouldway ainfay ebay eldedway ithway eethay; efyinglyday
Iay orshipway ee!”thay

e“Thay oatbay! ethay oat!”bay iedcray Arbuckstay, ook“lay atay thyay oatbay, olday an!”may

Ahab’say arpoonhay, ethay oneay orgedfay atay Erth’spay irefay, emainedray irmlyfay ashedlay
inay itsay onspicuouscay otchcray, osay atthay itay ojectedpray eyondbay ishay ale-boat’swhay
owbay; utbay ethay easay atthay adhay ovestay itsay ottombay adhay ausedcay ethay ooselay eatherlay
eathshay otay opdray offay; anday omfray ethay eenkay eelstay arbbay erethay ownay amecay aay
evelledlay ameflay ofay alepay, orkedfay irefay. Asay ethay ilentsay arpoonhay urnedbay erethay
ikelay aay erpent’ssay onguetay, Arbuckstay aspedgray Ahabay byay ethay arm—“Goday, Odgay isay
againstay eethay, olday anmay; orbearfay! is’tay anay illay oyagevay! illay egunbay, illay
ontinuedcay; etlay emay uaresqay ethay ardsyay, ilewhay eway aymay, olday anmay, anday akemay aay
airfay indway ofay itay omewardshay, otay ogay onay aay etterbay oyagevay anthay is.”thay

Overhearingay Arbuckstay, ethay anic-strickenpay ewcray instantlyay anray otay ethay
aces—thoughbray otnay aay ailsay asway eftlay aloftay. Orfay ethay omentmay allay ethay aghastay
ate’smay oughtsthay eemedsay eirsthay; eythay aisedray aay alfhay utinousmay cryay. Utbay
ashingday ethay attlingray ightninglay inkslay otay ethay eckday, anday atchingsnay ethay
urningbay arpoonhay, Ahabay avedway itay ikelay aay orchtay amongay emthay; earingsway otay
ansfixtray ithway itay ethay irstfay ailorsay atthay utbay astcay ooselay aay ope’sray enday.
Etrifiedpay byay ishay aspectay, anday illstay oremay inkingshray omfray ethay ieryfay artday
atthay ehay eldhay, ethay enmay ellfay ackbay inay ismayday, anday Ahabay againay oke:—spay

All“ay ouryay oathsay otay unthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay areay asay indingbay asay inemay; anday
earthay, oulsay, anday odybay, ungslay anday ifelay, olday Ahabay isay oundbay. Anday atthay eyay
aymay owknay otay atwhay unetay isthay earthay eatsbay; ooklay eyay erehay; usthay Iay owblay outay
ethay astlay ear!”fay Anday ithway oneay astblay ofay ishay eathbray ehay extinguisheday ethay
ameflay.

Asay inay ethay urricanehay atthay eepssway ethay ainplay, enmay flyay ethay eighborhoodnay ofay
omesay onelay, iganticgay elmay, osewhay eryvay eighthay anday engthstray utbay enderray itay
osay uchmay ethay oremay unsafeay, ecausebay osay uchmay ethay oremay aay arkmay orfay
underboltsthay; osay atay osethay astlay ordsway ofay Ahab’say anymay ofay ethay arinersmay idday
unray omfray imhay inay aay errortay ofay ismayday.


APTERcHay 120ay. Ethay Eckday Owardstay ethay Enday ofay ethay Irstfay Ightnay Atchway.

Ahab_ay andingstay byay ethay elmhay. Arbuckstay approachingay im._hay

e“Way ustmay endsay ownday ethay ain-top-sailmay ardyay, irsay. Ethay andbay isay orkingway
ooselay anday ethay eelay iftlay isay alf-strandedhay. Allshay Iay ikestray itay, ir?”say

ike“Stray othingnay; ashlay itay. Ifay Iay adhay ailsky-say olespay, I’day aysway emthay upay
ow.”nay

ir!—in“Say Od’sgay ame!—sir?”nay

ell.”“Way

e“Thay anchorsay areay orkingway, irsay. Allshay Iay etgay emthay inboard?”ay

ike“Stray othingnay, anday irstay othingnay, utbay ashlay everythingay. Ethay indway isesray,
utbay itay ashay otnay otgay upay otay myay able-landstay etyay. Uickqay, anday eesay otay it.—Byay
astsmay anday eelskay! ehay akestay emay orfay ethay unch-backedhay ipperskay ofay omesay
oastingcay acksmay. Endsay ownday myay ain-top-sailmay ardyay! Ohay, uepotsglay! Oftiestlay
uckstray ereway ademay orfay ildestway indsway, anday isthay ain-truckbray ofay inemay ownay
ailssay amiday ethay oud-scudclay. Allshay Iay ikestray atthay? Ohay, onenay utbay owardscay
endsay ownday eirthay ain-trucksbray inay empesttay imetay. Atwhay aay oorooshhay aloftay
erethay! Iay ouldway e’enay aketay itay orfay ublimesay, idday Iay otnay owknay atthay ethay oliccay
isay aay oisynay aladymay. Ohay, aketay edicinemay, aketay edicine!”may


APTERcHay 121ay. Idnight.—Themay Orecastlefay Ulwarksbay.

ubb_Stay anday Askflay ountedmay onay emthay, anday assingpay additionalay ashingslay overay
ethay anchorsay erethay anging._hay

o“Nay, Ubbstay; ouyay aymay oundpay atthay otknay erethay asay uchmay asay ouyay easeplay, utbay
ouyay illway evernay oundpay intoay emay atwhay ouyay ereway ustjay ownay ayingsay. Anday owhay
onglay agoay isay itay incesay ouyay aidsay ethay eryvay ontrarycay? Idn’tday ouyay onceay aysay
atthay ateverwhay ipshay Ahabay ailssay inay, atthay ipshay ouldshay aypay omethingsay extraay
onay itsay insuranceay olicypay, ustjay asay oughthay itay ereway oadedlay ithway owderpay
arrelsbay aftay anday oxesbay ofay uciferslay orwardfay? Opstay, ownay; idn’tday ouyay aysay
o?”say

ell“Way, upposesay Iay idday? Atwhay enthay? I’veay artpay angedchay myay eshflay incesay atthay
imetay, whyay otnay myay indmay? Esidesbay, upposingsay eway are__ay oadedlay ithway owderpay
arrelsbay aftay anday uciferslay orwardfay; owhay ethay evilday ouldcay ethay uciferslay etgay
afireay inay isthay enchingdray ayspray erehay? Whyay, myay ittlelay anmay, ouyay avehay ettypray
edray airhay, utbay ouyay ouldn’tcay etgay afireay ownay. Akeshay ourselfyay; ou’reyay
Aquariusay, oray ethay ater-bearerway, Askflay; ightmay illfay itcherspay atay ouryay oatcay
ollarcay. On’tday ouyay eesay, enthay, atthay orfay esethay extraay isksray ethay Arinemay
Insuranceay ompaniescay avehay extraay uaranteesgay? Erehay areay antshydray, Askflay.
Utbay arkhay, againay, anday I’llay answeray eyay ethay otheray ingthay. Irstfay aketay ouryay
eglay offay omfray ethay owncray ofay ethay anchoray erehay, oughthay, osay Iay ancay asspay ethay
operay; ownay istenlay. At’swhay ethay ightymay ifferenceday etweenbay oldinghay aay ast’smay
ightning-rodlay inay ethay ormstay, anday andingstay oseclay byay aay astmay atthay asn’thay
otgay anyay ightning-rodlay atay allay inay aay ormstay? On’tday ouyay eesay, ouyay
imber-headtay, atthay onay armhay ancay omecay otay ethay olderhay ofay ethay odray, unlessay ethay
astmay isay irstfay uckstray? Atwhay areay ouyay alkingtay aboutay, enthay? Otnay oneay ipshay inay
aay undredhay arriescay odsray, anday Ahab,—ayeay, anmay, anday allay ofay us,—wereay inay onay
oremay angerday enthay, inay myay oorpay opinionay, anthay allay ethay ewscray inay entay
ousandthay ipsshay ownay ailingsay ethay eassay. Whyay, ouyay Ing-Postkay, ouyay, Iay upposesay
ouyay ouldway avehay everyay anmay inay ethay orldway ogay aboutay ithway aay allsmay
ightning-rodlay unningray upay ethay ornercay ofay ishay athay, ikelay aay ilitiamay
officer’say eweredskay eatherfay, anday ailingtray ehindbay ikelay ishay ashsay. Whyay
on’tday eyay ebay ensiblesay, Askflay? it’say easyay otay ebay ensiblesay; whyay on’tday eyay,
enthay? anyay anmay ithway alfhay anay eyeay ancay ebay ensible.”say

I“ay on’tday owknay atthay, Ubbstay. Ouyay ometimessay indfay itay atherray ard.”hay

es“Yay, enwhay aay ellow’sfay oakedsay oughthray, it’say ardhay otay ebay ensiblesay, at’sthay
aay actfay. Anday Iay amay aboutay encheddray ithway isthay ayspray. Evernay indmay; atchcay ethay
urntay erethay, anday asspay itay. Eemssay otay emay eway areay ashinglay ownday esethay anchorsay
ownay asay ifay eythay ereway evernay oinggay otay ebay useday againay. Ingtyay esethay otway
anchorsay erehay, Askflay, eemssay ikelay ingtyay aay an’smay andshay ehindbay imhay. Anday
atwhay igbay enerousgay andshay eythay areay, otay ebay uresay. Esethay areay ouryay ironay
istsfay, eyhay? Atwhay aay oldhay eythay avehay, ootay! Iay onderway, Askflay, etherwhay ethay
orldway isay anchoreday anywhereay; ifay eshay isay, eshay ingssway ithway anay uncommonay onglay
ablecay, oughthay. Erethay, ammerhay atthay otknay ownday, anday e’veway oneday. Osay; extnay
otay ouchingtay andlay, ightinglay onay eckday isay ethay ostmay atisfactorysay. Iay aysay,
ustjay ingwray outay myay acketjay irtsskay, illway eyay? Ankthay eyay. Eythay aughlay atay
ong-togslay osay, Askflay; utbay eemssay otay emay, aay onglay ailedtay oatcay oughtay alwaysay
otay ebay ornway inay allay ormsstay afloatay. Ethay ailstay aperingtay ownday atthay ayway,
ervesay otay arrycay offay ethay aterway, ed’yay eesay. Amesay ithway ockedcay atshay; ethay
ockscay ormfay able-endgay eave-troughsay, Askflay. Onay oremay onkey-jacketsmay anday
arpaulinstay orfay emay; Iay ustmay ountmay aay allow-tailsway, anday ivedray ownday aay
eaverbay; osay. Alloahay! ewwhay! erethay oesgay myay arpaulintay overboarday; Ordlay,
Ordlay, atthay ethay indsway atthay omecay omfray eavenhay ouldshay ebay osay unmannerlyay!
Isthay isay aay astynay ightnay, ad.”lay


APTERcHay 122ay. Idnightmay Aloft.—Thunderay anday Ightninglay.

e_Thay ain-top-sailmay ard_.—_Tashtegoyay assingpay ewnay ashingslay arounday it_ay.

Um“ay, umay, umay. Opstay atthay underthay! Entyplay ootay uchmay underthay upay erehay. At’swhay
ethay useay ofay underthay? Umay, umay, umay. Eway on’tday antway underthay; eway antway umray;
ivegay usay aay assglay ofay umray. Umay, umay, um!”ay


APTERcHay 123ay. Ethay Usketmay.

Uringday ethay ostmay iolentvay ocksshay ofay ethay Oontyphay, ethay anmay atay ethay Equod’spay
aw-bonejay illertay adhay everalsay imestay eenbay eelinglyray urledhay otay ethay eckday byay
itsay asmodicspay otionsmay, evenay oughthay eventerpray acklestay adhay eenbay attacheday
otay it—foray eythay ereway ack—becauseslay omesay ayplay otay ethay illertay asway
indispensableay.

Inay aay everesay alegay ikelay isthay, ilewhay ethay ipshay isay utbay aay ossedtay uttlecockshay
otay ethay astblay, itay isay byay onay eansmay uncommonay otay eesay ethay eedlesnay inay ethay
ompassescay, atay intervalsay, ogay oundray anday oundray. Itay asway usthay ithway ethay
Equod’spay; atay almostay everyay ockshay ethay elmsmanhay adhay otnay ailedfay otay oticenay
ethay irlingwhay elocityvay ithway ichwhay eythay evolvedray uponay ethay ardscay; itay isay aay
ightsay atthay ardlyhay anyoneay ancay eholdbay ithoutway omesay ortsay ofay unwonteday
emotionay.

Omesay ourshay afteray idnightmay, ethay Oontyphay abateday osay uchmay, atthay oughthray ethay
enuousstray exertionsay ofay Arbuckstay anday Ubb—onestay engageday orwardfay anday ethay
otheray aft—theay iveredshay emnantsray ofay ethay ibjay anday orefay anday ain-top-sailsmay
ereway utcay adriftay omfray ethay arsspay, anday entway eddyingay awayay otay eewardlay, ikelay
ethay eathersfay ofay anay albatrossay, ichwhay ometimessay areay astcay otay ethay indsway
enwhay atthay orm-tossedstay irdbay isay onay ethay ingway.

Ethay eethray orrespondingcay ewnay ailssay ereway ownay entbay anday eefedray, anday aay
orm-trysailstay asway etsay urtherfay aftay; osay atthay ethay ipshay oonsay entway oughthray
ethay aterway ithway omesay ecisionpray againay; anday ethay ourse—forcay ethay esentpray,
East-south-east—whichay ehay asway otay eerstay, ifay acticablepray, asway onceay oremay
ivengay otay ethay elmsmanhay. Orfay uringday ethay iolencevay ofay ethay alegay, ehay adhay onlyay
eeredstay accordingay otay itsay icissitudesvay. Utbay asay ehay asway ownay ingingbray ethay
ipshay asay earnay erhay oursecay asay ossiblepay, atchingway ethay ompasscay eanwhilemay,
olay! aay oodgay ignsay! ethay indway eemedsay omingcay oundray asternay; ayeay, ethay oulfay
eezebray ecamebay airfay!

Instantlyay ethay ardsyay ereway uaredsqay, otay ethay ivelylay ongsay ofay o“_Hay! ethay airfay
indway! oh-ye-hoay, eerlychay en!_”may ethay ewcray ingingsay orfay oyjay, atthay osay
omisingpray anay eventay ouldshay osay oonsay avehay alsifiedfay ethay evilay ortentspay
ecedingpray itay.

Inay ompliancecay ithway ethay andingstay orderay ofay ishay ommander—tocay eportray
immediatelyay, anday atay anyay oneay ofay ethay enty-fourtway ourshay, anyay ecidedday
angechay inay ethay affairsay ofay ethay eck,—Starbuckday adhay onay oonersay immedtray ethay
ardsyay otay ethay eeze—howeverbray eluctantlyray anday oomily,—thanglay ehay
echanicallymay entway elowbay otay appriseay Aptaincay Ahabay ofay ethay ircumstancecay.

Ereay ockingknay atay ishay ate-roomstay, ehay involuntarilyay ausedpay eforebay itay aay
omentmay. Ethay abincay amp—takinglay onglay ingssway isthay ayway anday at—wasthay urningbay
itfullyfay, anday astingcay itfulfay adowsshay uponay ethay olday an’smay oltedbay oor,—aday
inthay oneay, ithway ixedfay indsblay inserteday, inay aceplay ofay upperay anelspay. Ethay
isolateday ubterraneousnesssay ofay ethay abincay ademay aay ertaincay umminghay ilencesay
otay eignray erethay, oughthay itay asway oopedhay oundray byay allay ethay oarray ofay ethay
elementsay. Ethay oadedlay usketsmay inay ethay ackray ereway ininglyshay evealedray, asay
eythay oodstay uprightay againstay ethay orwardfay ulkheadbay. Arbuckstay asway anay
onesthay, uprightay anmay; utbay outay ofay Arbuck’sstay earthay, atay atthay instantay enwhay
ehay awsay ethay usketsmay, erethay angelystray evolveday anay evilay oughtthay; utbay osay
entblay ithway itsay eutralnay oray oodgay accompanimentsay atthay orfay ethay instantay ehay
ardlyhay ewknay itay orfay itselfay.

e“Hay ouldway avehay otshay emay once,”ay ehay urmuredmay, es“yay, ere’sthay ethay eryvay
usketmay atthay ehay ointedpay atay e;—thatmay oneay ithway ethay uddedstay ockstay; etlay emay
ouchtay it—liftay itay. Angestray, atthay Iay, owhay avehay andledhay osay anymay eadlyday
anceslay, angestray, atthay Iay ouldshay akeshay osay ownay. Oadedlay? Iay ustmay eesay. Ayeay,
ayeay; anday owderpay inay ethay an;—that’spay otnay oodgay. Estbay illspay it?—waitay. I’llay
urecay elfmysay ofay isthay. I’llay oldhay ethay usketmay oldlybay ilewhay Iay ink.—Ithay omecay
otay eportray aay airfay indway otay imhay. Utbay owhay airfay? Airfay orfay eathday anday
oom,—_that’s_day airfay orfay Obymay Ickday. It’say aay airfay indway at’sthay onlyay airfay
orfay atthay accurseday ish.—Thefay eryvay ubetay ehay ointedpay atay e!—themay eryvay oneay;
is__thay one—Iay oldhay itay erehay; ehay ouldway avehay illedkay emay ithway ethay eryvay ingthay
Iay andlehay ow.—Ayenay anday ehay ouldway ainfay illkay allay ishay ewcray. Oesday ehay otnay aysay
ehay illway otnay ikestray ishay arsspay otay anyay alegay? Ashay ehay otnay ashedday ishay
eavenlyhay uadrantqay? anday inay esethay amesay erilouspay eassay, opesgray ehay otnay ishay
ayway byay eremay eadday eckoningray ofay ethay error-aboundingay oglay? anday inay isthay eryvay
Oontyphay, idday ehay otnay earsway atthay ehay ouldway avehay onay ightning-rodslay? Utbay
allshay isthay azedcray olday anmay ebay amelytay ufferedsay otay agdray aay olewhay ip’sshay
ompanycay ownday otay oomday ithway im?—Yeshay, itay ouldway akemay imhay ethay ilfulway
urderermay ofay irtythay enmay anday oremay, ifay isthay ipshay omecay otay anyay eadlyday armhay;
anday omecay otay eadlyday armhay, myay oulsay earssway isthay ipshay illway, ifay Ahabay avehay
ishay ayway. Ifay, enthay, ehay ereway isthay instant—putay asideay, atthay imecray ouldway otnay
ebay ishay. Ahay! isay ehay utteringmay inay ishay eepslay? Esyay, ustjay ere,—inthay erethay,
e’shay eepingslay. Eepingslay? ayeay, utbay illstay aliveay, anday oonsay awakeay againay. Iay
an’tcay ithstandway eethay, enthay, olday anmay. Otnay easoningray; otnay emonstranceray;
otnay entreatyay iltway outhay earkenhay otay; allay isthay outhay ornestscay. Atflay
obedienceay otay thyay ownay atflay ommandscay, isthay isay allay outhay eathestbray. Ayeay,
anday ay’stsay ethay enmay avehay ow’dvay thyay owvay; ay’stsay allay ofay usay areay Ahabsay.
Eatgray Odgay orbid!—Butfay isay erethay onay otheray ayway? onay awfullay ay?—Makeway imhay aay
isonerpray otay ebay akentay omehay? Atwhay! opehay otay estwray isthay olday an’smay ivinglay
owerpay omfray ishay ownay ivinglay andshay? Onlyay aay oolfay ouldway tryay itay. Aysay ehay ereway
inionedpay evenay; ottedknay allay overay ithway opesray anday awsershay; ainedchay ownday otay
ing-boltsray onay isthay abincay oorflay; ehay ouldway ebay oremay ideoushay anthay aay agedcay
igertay, enthay. Iay ouldcay otnay endureay ethay ightsay; ouldcay otnay ossiblypay flyay ishay
owlingshay; allay omfortcay, eepslay itselfay, inestimableay easonray ouldway eavelay emay
onay ethay onglay intolerableay oyagevay. Atwhay, enthay, emainsray? Ethay andlay isay
undredshay ofay eagueslay awayay, anday ockedlay Apanjay ethay earestnay. Iay andstay aloneay
erehay uponay anay openay easay, ithway otway oceansay anday aay olewhay ontinentcay etweenbay emay
anday aw.—Ayelay, ayeay, is’tay o.—Issay eavenhay aay urderermay enwhay itsay ightninglay
ikesstray aay ould-beway urderermay inay ishay edbay, inderingtay eetsshay anday inskay
ogether?—Andtay ouldway Iay ebay aay urderermay, enthay, if”—anday owlyslay, ealthilystay,
anday alfhay idewayssay ookinglay, ehay acedplay ethay oadedlay usket’smay enday againstay
ethay oorday.

On“ay isthay evellay, Ahab’say ammockhay ingssway ithinway; ishay eadhay isthay ayway. Aay
ouchtay, anday Arbuckstay aymay urvivesay otay ughay ishay ifeway anday ildchay again.—Ohay
Arymay! Ary!—boymay! oybay! oy!—Butbay ifay Iay akeway eethay otnay otay eathday, olday anmay,
owhay ancay elltay otay atwhay unsoundeday eepsday Arbuck’sstay odybay isthay ayday eekway aymay
inksay, ithway allay ethay ewcray! Eatgray Odgay, erewhay artay Outhay? Allshay Iay? allshay
I?—Theay indway ashay onegay ownday anday iftedshay, irsay; ethay orefay anday ainmay opsailstay
areay eefedray anday etsay; eshay eadshay erhay ourse.”cay

ern“Stay allay! Ohay Obymay Ickday, Iay utchclay thyay earthay atay ast!”lay

Uchsay ereway ethay oundssay atthay ownay amecay urtlinghay omfray outay ethay olday an’smay
ormentedtay eepslay, asay ifay Arbuck’sstay oicevay adhay ausedcay ethay onglay umbday eamdray
otay eakspay.

Ethay etyay evelledlay usketmay ookshay ikelay aay unkard’sdray armay againstay ethay anelpay;
Arbuckstay eemedsay estlingwray ithway anay angelay; utbay urningtay omfray ethay oorday, ehay
acedplay ethay eath-tubeday inay itsay ackray, anday eftlay ethay aceplay.

e’s“Hay ootay oundsay asleepay, Mray. Ubbstay; ogay outhay ownday, anday akeway imhay, anday elltay
imhay. Iay ustmay eesay otay ethay eckday erehay. Outhay ow’stknay atwhay otay ay.”say


APTERcHay 124ay. Ethay Eedlenay.

Extnay orningmay ethay ot-yet-subsidednay easay olledray inay onglay owslay illowsbay ofay
ightymay ulkbay, anday ivingstray inay ethay Equod’spay urglinggay acktray, ushedpay erhay onay
ikelay iants’gay almspay outspreaday. Ethay ongstray, unstaggeringay eezebray aboundeday
osay, atthay skyay anday airay eemedsay astvay outbellyingay ailssay; ethay olewhay orldway
oomedbay eforebay ethay indway. Uffledmay inay ethay ullfay orningmay ightlay, ethay
invisibleay unsay asway onlyay ownknay byay ethay eadspray intensityay ofay ishay aceplay;
erewhay ishay ayonetbay aysray ovedmay onay inay acksstay. Emblazoningsay, asay ofay ownedcray
Abylonianbay ingskay anday ueensqay, eignedray overay everythingay. Ethay easay asway asay aay
uciblecray ofay oltenmay oldgay, atthay ubblinglybay eapslay ithway ightlay anday eathay.

Onglay aintainingmay anay enchanteday ilencesay, Ahabay oodstay apartay; anday everyay imetay
ethay eteringtay ipshay oweringlylay itchedpay ownday erhay owspritbay, ehay urnedtay otay
eyeay ethay ightbray un’ssay aysray oducedpray aheaday; anday enwhay eshay ofoundlypray
ettledsay byay ethay ernstay, ehay urnedtay ehindbay, anday awsay ethay un’ssay earwardray
aceplay, anday owhay ethay amesay ellowyay aysray ereway endingblay ithway ishay undeviatingay
akeway.

a“Hay, ahay, myay ipshay! outhay ightestmay ellway ebay akentay ownay orfay ethay ea-chariotsay
ofay ethay unsay. Ohay, ohay! allay eyay ationsnay eforebay myay owpray, Iay ingbray ethay unsay otay
eyay! Okeyay onay ethay urtherfay illowsbay; allohay! aay andemtay, Iay ivedray ethay ea!”say

Utbay uddenlysay einedray ackbay byay omesay ountercay oughtthay, ehay urriedhay owardstay
ethay elmhay, uskilyhay emandingday owhay ethay ipshay asway eadinghay.

East-sou-east“ay, ir,”say aidsay ethay ightenedfray eersmanstay.

ou“Thay iest!”lay itingsmay imhay ithway ishay enchedclay istfay. eading“Hay Eastay atay isthay
ourhay inay ethay orningmay, anday ethay unsay astern?”ay

Uponay isthay everyay oulsay asway onfoundedcay; orfay ethay enomenonphay ustjay enthay
observeday byay Ahabay adhay unaccountablyay escapeday everyay oneay elseay; utbay itsay eryvay
indingblay alpablenesspay ustmay avehay eenbay ethay ausecay.

Ustingthray ishay eadhay alfhay ayway intoay ethay innaclebay, Ahabay aughtcay oneay impseglay
ofay ethay ompassescay; ishay uplifteday armay owlyslay ellfay; orfay aay omentmay ehay almostay
eemedsay otay aggerstay. Andingstay ehindbay imhay Arbuckstay ookedlay, anday olay! ethay otway
ompassescay ointedpay Eastay, anday ethay Equodpay asway asay infalliblyay oinggay Estway.

Utbay ereay ethay irstfay ildway alarmay ouldcay etgay outay abroaday amongay ethay ewcray, ethay
olday anmay ithway aay igidray aughlay exclaimeday, I“ay avehay itay! Itay ashay appenedhay
eforebay. Mray. Arbuckstay, astlay ight’snay underthay urnedtay ouray ompasses—that’scay
allay. Outhay asthay eforebay ownay eardhay ofay uchsay aay ingthay, Iay aketay it.”ay

Aye“ay; utbay evernay eforebay ashay itay appenedhay otay emay, ir,”say aidsay ethay alepay atemay,
oomilyglay.

Erehay, itay ustmay eedsnay ebay aidsay, atthay accidentsay ikelay isthay avehay inay oremay anthay
oneay asecay occurreday otay ipsshay inay iolentvay ormsstay. Ethay agneticmay energyay, asay
evelopedday inay ethay ariner’smay eedlenay, isay, asay allay owknay, essentiallyay oneay
ithway ethay electricityay eheldbay inay eavenhay; encehay itay isay otnay otay ebay uchmay
arvelledmay atay, atthay uchsay ingsthay ouldshay ebay. Instancesay erewhay ethay ightninglay
ashay actuallyay uckstray ethay esselvay, osay asay otay itesmay ownday omesay ofay ethay arsspay
anday iggingray, ethay effectay uponay ethay eedlenay ashay atay imestay eenbay illstay oremay
atalfay; allay itsay oadstonelay irtuevay eingbay annihilateday, osay atthay ethay eforebay
agneticmay eelstay asway ofay onay oremay useay anthay anay olday ife’sway ittingknay eedlenay.
Utbay inay eitheray asecay, ethay eedlenay evernay againay, ofay itselfay, ecoversray ethay
originalay irtuevay usthay arredmay oray ostlay; anday ifay ethay innaclebay ompassescay ebay
affecteday, ethay amesay atefay eachesray allay ethay othersay atthay aymay ebay inay ethay ipshay;
evenay ereway ethay owermostlay oneay inserteday intoay ethay elsonkay.

Eliberatelyday andingstay eforebay ethay innaclebay, anday eyeingay ethay anspointedtray
ompassescay, ethay olday anmay, ithway ethay arpshay ofay ishay extendeday andhay, ownay ooktay
ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay unsay, anday atisfiedsay atthay ethay eedlesnay ereway
exactlyay inverteday, outedshay outay ishay ordersay orfay ethay ip’sshay oursecay otay ebay
angedchay accordinglyay. Ethay ardsyay ereway ardhay upay; anday onceay oremay ethay Equodpay
ustthray erhay undaunteday owsbay intoay ethay opposingay indway, orfay ethay upposedsay airfay
oneay adhay onlyay eenbay ugglingjay erhay.

Eanwhilemay, ateverwhay ereway ishay ownay ecretsay oughtsthay, Arbuckstay aidsay
othingnay, utbay uietlyqay ehay issueday allay equisiteray ordersay; ilewhay Ubbstay anday
Ask—whoflay inay omesay allsmay egreeday eemedsay enthay otay ebay aringshay ishay
eelings—likewisefay unmurmuringlyay acquiesceday. Asay orfay ethay enmay, oughthay omesay
ofay emthay owlylay umbledray, eirthay earfay ofay Ahabay asway eatergray anthay eirthay earfay
ofay Atefay. Utbay asay everay eforebay, ethay aganpay arpooneershay emainedray almostay
ollywhay unimpresseday; oray ifay impresseday, itay asway onlyay ithway aay ertaincay
agnetismmay otshay intoay eirthay ongenialcay eartshay omfray inflexibleay Ahab’say.

Orfay aay acespay ethay olday anmay alkedway ethay eckday inay ollingray everiesray. Utbay
ancingchay otay ipslay ithway ishay ivoryay eelhay, ehay awsay ethay ushedcray oppercay
ight-tubessay ofay ethay uadrantqay ehay adhay ethay ayday eforebay ashedday otay ethay eckday.

ou“Thay oorpay, oudpray eaven-gazerhay anday un’ssay ilotpay! esterdayyay Iay eckedwray
eethay, anday o-daytay ethay ompassescay ouldway ainfay avehay eckedwray emay. Osay, osay. Utbay
Ahabay isay ordlay overay ethay evellay oadstonelay etyay. Mray. Arbuck—astay ancelay ithoutway
aay olepay; aay op-maultay, anday ethay allestsmay ofay ethay ail-maker’ssay eedlesnay.
Uick!”qay

Accessoryay, erhapspay, otay ethay impulseay ictatingday ethay ingthay ehay asway ownay aboutay
otay oday, ereway ertaincay udentialpray otivesmay, osewhay objectay ightmay avehay eenbay otay
eviveray ethay iritsspay ofay ishay ewcray byay aay okestray ofay ishay ubtilesay illskay, inay aay
attermay osay ondrousway asay atthay ofay ethay inverteday ompassescay. Esidesbay, ethay olday
anmay ellway ewknay atthay otay eerstay byay anspointedtray eedlesnay, oughthay umsilyclay
acticablepray, asway otnay aay ingthay otay ebay assedpay overay byay uperstitioussay
ailorssay, ithoutway omesay udderingsshay anday evilay ortentspay.

en,”“May aidsay ehay, eadilystay urningtay uponay ethay ewcray, asay ethay atemay andedhay imhay
ethay ingsthay ehay adhay emandedday, “myay enmay, ethay underthay urnedtay olday Ahab’say
eedlesnay; utbay outay ofay isthay itbay ofay eelstay Ahabay ancay akemay oneay ofay ishay ownay,
atthay illway ointpay asay uetray asay any.”ay

Abasheday ancesglay ofay ervilesay onderway ereway exchangeday byay ethay ailorssay, asay
isthay asway aidsay; anday ithway ascinatedfay eyesay eythay awaiteday ateverwhay agicmay
ightmay ollowfay. Utbay Arbuckstay ookedlay awayay.

Ithway aay owblay omfray ethay op-maultay Ahabay ockedknay offay ethay eelstay eadhay ofay ethay
ancelay, anday enthay andinghay otay ethay atemay ethay onglay ironay odray emainingray, adebay
imhay oldhay itay uprightay, ithoutway itsay ouchingtay ethay eckday. Enthay, ithway ethay
aulmay, afteray epeatedlyray itingsmay ethay upperay enday ofay isthay ironay odray, ehay
acedplay ethay untedblay eedlenay endwiseay onay ethay optay ofay itay, anday esslay onglystray
ammeredhay atthay, everalsay imestay, ethay atemay illstay oldinghay ethay odray asay eforebay.
Enthay oinggay oughthray omesay allsmay angestray otionsmay ithway it—whetheray
indispensableay otay ethay agnetizingmay ofay ethay eelstay, oray erelymay intendeday otay
augmentay ethay aweay ofay ethay ewcray, isay uncertain—heay alledcay orfay inenlay eadthray;
anday ovingmay otay ethay innaclebay, ippedslay outay ethay otway eversedray eedlesnay erethay,
anday orizontallyhay uspendedsay ethay ail-needlesay byay itsay iddlemay, overay oneay ofay
ethay ompass-cardscay. Atay irstfay, ethay eelstay entway oundray anday oundray, uiveringqay
anday ibratingvay atay eitheray enday; utbay atay astlay itay ettledsay otay itsay aceplay, enwhay
Ahabay, owhay adhay eenbay intentlyay atchingway orfay isthay esultray, eppedstay anklyfray
ackbay omfray ethay innaclebay, anday ointingpay ishay etchedstray armay owardstay itay,
exclaimed,—“Lookay eyay, orfay ourselvesyay, ifay Ahabay ebay otnay ordlay ofay ethay evellay
oadstonelay! Ethay unsay isay Eastay, anday atthay ompasscay earssway it!”ay

Oneay afteray anotheray eythay eeredpay inay, orfay othingnay utbay eirthay ownay eyesay ouldcay
ersuadepay uchsay ignoranceay asay eirsthay, anday oneay afteray anotheray eythay unkslay
awayay.

Inay ishay ieryfay eyesay ofay ornscay anday iumphtray, ouyay enthay awsay Ahabay inay allay ishay
atalfay idepray.


APTERcHay 125ay. Ethay Oglay anday Inelay.

Ilewhay ownay ethay atedfay Equodpay adhay eenbay osay onglay afloatay isthay oyagevay, ethay oglay
anday inelay adhay utbay eryvay eldomsay eenbay inay useay. Owingay otay aay onfidentcay elianceray
uponay otheray eansmay ofay eterminingday ethay essel’svay aceplay, omesay erchantmenmay,
anday anymay alemenwhay, especiallyay enwhay uisingcray, ollywhay eglectnay otay eavehay
ethay oglay; oughthay atay ethay amesay imetay, anday equentlyfray oremay orfay orm’sfay akesay
anthay anythingay elseay, egularlyray uttingpay ownday uponay ethay ustomarycay ateslay ethay
oursecay eeredstay byay ethay ipshay, asay ellway asay ethay esumedpray averageay ateray ofay
ogressionpray everyay ourhay. Itay adhay eenbay usthay ithway ethay Equodpay. Ethay oodenway
eelray anday angularay oglay attacheday unghay, onglay untoucheday, ustjay eneathbay ethay
ailingray ofay ethay afteray ulwarksbay. Ainsray anday ayspray adhay ampedday itay; unsay anday
indway adhay arpedway itay; allay ethay elementsay adhay ombinedcay otay otray aay ingthay atthay
unghay osay idlyay. Utbay eedlesshay ofay allay isthay, ishay oodmay eizedsay Ahabay, asay ehay
appenedhay otay anceglay uponay ethay eelray, otnay anymay ourshay afteray ethay agnetmay
enescay, anday ehay ememberedray owhay ishay uadrantqay asway onay oremay, anday ecalledray ishay
anticfray oathay aboutay ethay evellay oglay anday inelay. Ethay ipshay asway ailingsay
unginglyplay; asternay ethay illowsbay olledray inay iotsray.

orward“Fay, erethay! Eavehay ethay og!”lay

Otway eamensay amecay. Ethay olden-huedgay Ahitiantay anday ethay izzlygray Anxmanmay.
ake“Tay ethay eelray, oneay ofay eyay, I’llay eave.”hay

Eythay entway owardstay ethay extremeay ernstay, onay ethay ip’sshay eelay idesay, erewhay ethay
eckday, ithway ethay obliqueay energyay ofay ethay indway, asway ownay almostay ippingday intoay
ethay eamycray, idelong-rushingsay easay.

Ethay Anxmanmay ooktay ethay eelray, anday oldinghay itay ighhay upay, byay ethay ojectingpray
andle-endshay ofay ethay indlespay, oundray ichwhay ethay oolspay ofay inelay evolvedray, osay
oodstay ithway ethay angularay oglay anginghay ownwardsday, illtay Ahabay advanceday otay
imhay.

Ahabay oodstay eforebay imhay, anday asway ightlylay unwindingay omesay irtythay oray ortyfay
urnstay otay ormfay aay eliminarypray and-coilhay otay osstay overboarday, enwhay ethay olday
Anxmanmay, owhay asway intentlyay eyeingay othbay imhay anday ethay inelay, ademay oldbay otay
eakspay.

ir“Say, Iay istrustmay itay; isthay inelay ookslay arfay onegay, onglay eathay anday etway avehay
oiledspay it.”ay

ill“’Tway oldhay, olday entlemangay. Onglay eathay anday etway, avehay eythay oiledspay eethay?
Outhay eem’stsay otay oldhay. Oray, uertray erhapspay, ifelay oldshay eethay; otnay outhay it.”ay

I“ay oldhay ethay oolspay, irsay. Utbay ustjay asay myay aptaincay ayssay. Ithway esethay eygray
airshay ofay inemay is’tay otnay orthway ilewhay isputingday, ecially’spay ithway aay
uperiorsay, o’llwhay e’ernay onfess.”cay

at’s“Whay atthay? Erethay ow’snay aay atchedpay ofessorpray inay Ueenqay Ature’snay
anite-foundedgray Ollegecay; utbay ethinksmay e’shay ootay ubservientsay. Erewhay ertway
outhay orn?”bay

In“ay ethay ittlelay ockyray Isleay ofay Anmay, ir.”say

Excellent“ay! Ou’stthay ithay ethay orldway byay at.”thay

I“ay owknay otnay, irsay, utbay Iay asway ornbay ere.”thay

In“ay ethay Isleay ofay Anmay, eyhay? Ellway, ethay otheray ayway, it’say oodgay. Ere’shay aay anmay
omfray Anmay; aay anmay ornbay inay onceay independentay Anmay, anday ownay unmanneday ofay Anmay;
ichwhay isay uckedsay in—byay atwhay? Upay ithway ethay eelray! Ethay eadday, indblay allway
uttsbay allay inquiringay eadshay atay astlay. Upay ithway itay! O.”say

Ethay oglay asway eavedhay. Ethay ooselay oilscay apidlyray aightenedstray outay inay aay onglay
aggingdray inelay asternay, anday enthay, instantlyay, ethay eelray eganbay otay irlwhay. Inay
urntay, erkinglyjay aisedray anday oweredlay byay ethay ollingray illowsbay, ethay owingtay
esistanceray ofay ethay oglay ausedcay ethay olday eelmanray otay aggerstay angelystray.

old“Hay ard!”hay

Apsnay! ethay overstraineday inelay aggedsay ownday inay oneay onglay estoonfay; ethay
uggingtay oglay asway onegay.

I“ay ushcray ethay uadrantqay, ethay underthay urnstay ethay eedlesnay, anday ownay ethay admay
easay artspay ethay og-linelay. Utbay Ahabay ancay endmay allay. Aulhay inay erehay, Ahitiantay;
eelray upay, Anxmanmay. Anday ooklay eyay, etlay ethay arpentercay akemay anotheray oglay, anday
endmay outhay ethay inelay. Eesay otay it.”ay

ere“Thay ehay oesgay ownay; otay imhay othing’snay appenedhay; utbay otay emay, ethay ewerskay
eemssay ooseninglay outay ofay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay orldway. Aulhay inay, aulhay inay,
Ahitiantay! Esethay ineslay unray olewhay, anday irlingwhay outay: omecay inay okenbray, anday
aggingdray owslay. Ahay, Ippay? omecay otay elphay; ehay, Ip?”pay

ip“Pay? omwhay allcay eyay Ippay? Ippay umpedjay omfray ethay ale-boatwhay. Ip’spay issingmay.
Et’slay eesay ownay ifay eyay aven’thay ishedfay imhay upay erehay, ishermanfay. Itay agsdray
ardhay; Iay uessgay e’shay oldinghay onay. Erkjay imhay, Ahititay! Erkjay imhay offay; eway aulhay
inay onay owardscay erehay. Ohay! ere’sthay ishay armay ustjay eakingbray aterway. Aay atchethay!
aay atchethay! utcay itay off—weay aulhay inay onay owardscay erehay. Aptaincay Ahabay! irsay,
irsay! ere’shay Ippay, ingtryay otay etgay onay oardbay again.”ay

eace“Pay, outhay azycray oon,”lay iedcray ethay Anxmanmay, eizingsay imhay byay ethay armay.
Away“ay omfray ethay uarter-deck!”qay

e“Thay eatergray idiotay everay oldsscay ethay esser,”lay utteredmay Ahabay, advancingay.
ands“Hay offay omfray atthay olinesshay! Erewhay ayestsay outhay Ippay asway, oybay?

Astern“ay erethay, irsay, asternay! Olay! o!”lay

And“ay owhay artay outhay, oybay? Iay eesay otnay myay eflectionray inay ethay acantvay upilspay ofay
thyay eyesay. Ohay Odgay! atthay anmay ouldshay ebay aay ingthay orfay immortalay oulssay otay
ievesay oughthray! Owhay artay outhay, oy?”bay

ell-boy“Bay, irsay; ip’s-criershay; ingday, ongday, ingday! Ippay! Ippay! Ippay! Oneay
undredhay oundspay ofay ayclay ewardray orfay Ippay; ivefay eetfay igh—lookshay
owardly—quickestcay ownknay byay atthay! Ingday, ongday, ingday! O’swhay eensay Ippay ethay
oward?”cay

ere“Thay ancay ebay onay eartshay aboveay ethay ow-linesnay. Ohay, eyay ozenfray eavenshay!
ooklay ownday erehay. Eyay idday egetbay isthay ucklesslay ildchay, anday avehay abandoneday
imhay, eyay eativecray ibertineslay. Erehay, oybay; Ahab’say abincay allshay ebay Ip’spay
omehay enceforthhay, ilewhay Ahabay iveslay. Outhay ouchesttay myay inmostay entrecay, oybay;
outhay artay iedtay otay emay byay ordscay ovenway ofay myay eart-stringshay. Omecay, et’slay
own.”day

at’s“Whay isthay? ere’shay elvetvay ark-skin,”shay intentlyay azinggay atay Ahab’say
andhay, anday eelingfay itay. Ah“ay, ownay, adhay oorpay Ippay utbay eltfay osay indkay aay ingthay
asay isthay, erhapspay ehay adhay e’ernay eenbay ostlay! Isthay eemssay otay emay, irsay, asay aay
an-ropemay; omethingsay atthay eakway oulssay aymay oldhay byay. Ohay, irsay, etlay olday Erthpay
ownay omecay anday ivetray esethay otway andshay ogethertay; ethay ackblay oneay ithway ethay
itewhay, orfay Iay illway otnay etlay isthay o.”gay

Oh“ay, oybay, ornay illway Iay eethay, unlessay Iay ouldshay erebythay agdray eethay otay orseway
orrorshay anthay areay erehay. Omecay, enthay, otay myay abincay. Olay! eyay elieversbay inay
odsgay allay oodnessgay, anday inay anmay allay illay, olay ouyay! eesay ethay omniscientay odsgay
obliviousay ofay ufferingsay anmay; anday anmay, oughthay idioticay, anday owingknay otnay
atwhay ehay oesday, etyay ullfay ofay ethay eetsway ingsthay ofay ovelay anday atitudegray. Omecay!
Iay eelfay ouderpray eadinglay eethay byay thyay ackblay andhay, anthay oughthay Iay aspedgray anay
Emperor’s!”ay

ere“Thay ogay otway aftday onesay ow,”nay utteredmay ethay olday Anxmanmay. One“ay aftday ithway
engthstray, ethay otheray aftday ithway eaknessway. Utbay ere’shay ethay enday ofay ethay
ottenray ine—alllay ippingdray, ootay. Endmay itay, ehay? Iay inkthay eway adhay estbay avehay aay
ewnay inelay altogetheray. I’llay eesay Mray. Ubbstay aboutay it.”ay


APTERcHay 126ay. Ethay Ife-Buoylay.

Eeringstay ownay outh-eastwardsay byay Ahab’say evelledlay eelstay, anday erhay ogresspray
olelysay eterminedday byay Ahab’say evellay oglay anday inelay; ethay Equodpay eldhay onay erhay
athpay owardstay ethay Equatoray. Akingmay osay onglay aay assagepay oughthray uchsay
unfrequenteday atersway, escryingday onay ipsshay, anday ereay onglay, idewayssay
impelleday byay unvaryingay adetray indsway, overay avesway onotonouslymay ildmay; allay
esethay eemedsay ethay angestray almcay ingsthay eludingpray omesay iotousray anday
esperateday enescay.

Atay astlay, enwhay ethay ipshay ewdray earnay otay ethay outskirtsay, asay itay ereway, ofay ethay
Equatorialay ishing-groundfay, anday inay ethay eepday arknessday atthay oesgay eforebay
ethay awnday, asway ailingsay byay aay usterclay ofay ockyray isletsay; ethay atch—thenway
eadedhay byay Ask—wasflay artledstay byay aay cryay osay aintivelyplay ildway anday
unearthly—likeay alf-articulatedhay ailingsway ofay ethay ostsghay ofay allay Erod’shay
urderedmay Innocents—thatay oneay anday allay, eythay artedstay omfray eirthay everiesray,
anday orfay ethay acespay ofay omesay omentsmay oodstay, oray atsay, oray eanedlay allay
ansfixedlytray isteninglay, ikelay ethay arvedcay Omanray aveslay, ilewhay atthay ildway
cryay emainedray ithinway earinghay. Ethay Istianchray oray ivilizedcay artpay ofay ethay
ewcray aidsay itay asway ermaidsmay, anday udderedshay; utbay ethay aganpay arpooneershay
emainedray unappalleday. Etyay ethay eygray Anxman—themay oldestay arinermay ofay
all—declareday atthay ethay ildway illingthray oundssay atthay ereway eardhay, ereway ethay
oicesvay ofay ewlynay owneddray enmay inay ethay easay.

Elowbay inay ishay ammockhay, Ahabay idday otnay earhay ofay isthay illtay eygray awnday, enwhay ehay
amecay otay ethay eckday; itay asway enthay ecountedray otay imhay byay Askflay, otnay
unaccompanieday ithway intedhay arkday eaningsmay. Ehay ollowlyhay aughedlay, anday usthay
explaineday ethay onderway.

Osethay ockyray islandsay ethay ipshay adhay assedpay ereway ethay esortray ofay eatgray
umbersnay ofay ealssay, anday omesay oungyay ealssay atthay adhay ostlay eirthay amsday, oray
omesay amsday atthay adhay ostlay eirthay ubscay, ustmay avehay isenray ighnay ethay ipshay anday
eptkay ompanycay ithway erhay, ingcryay anday obbingsay ithway eirthay umanhay ortsay ofay
ailway. Utbay isthay onlyay ethay oremay affecteday omesay ofay emthay, ecausebay ostmay
arinersmay erishchay aay eryvay uperstitioussay eelingfay aboutay ealssay, arisingay otnay
onlyay omfray eirthay eculiarpay onestay enwhay inay istressday, utbay alsoay omfray ethay
umanhay ooklay ofay eirthay oundray eadshay anday emi-intelligentsay acesfay, eensay
eeringlypay uprisingay omfray ethay aterway alongsideay. Inay ethay easay, underay ertaincay
ircumstancescay, ealssay avehay oremay anthay onceay eenbay istakenmay orfay enmay.

Utbay ethay odingsbay ofay ethay ewcray ereway estinedday otay eceiveray aay ostmay ausibleplay
onfirmationcay inay ethay atefay ofay oneay ofay eirthay umbernay atthay orningmay. Atay
un-risesay isthay anmay entway omfray ishay ammockhay otay ishay ast-headmay atay ethay orefay;
anday etherwhay itay asway atthay ehay asway otnay etyay alfhay akedway omfray ishay eepslay or(fay
ailorssay ometimessay ogay aloftay inay aay ansitiontray ate)stay, etherwhay itay asway usthay
ithway ethay anmay, erethay isay ownay onay ellingtay; utbay, ebay atthay asay itay aymay, ehay adhay
otnay eenbay onglay atay ishay erchpay, enwhay aay cryay asway eard—ahay cryay anday aay
ushing—andray ookinglay upay, eythay awsay aay allingfay antomphay inay ethay airay; anday
ookinglay ownday, aay ittlelay ossedtay eaphay ofay itewhay ubblesbay inay ethay ueblay ofay ethay
easay.

Ethay ife-buoy—alay onglay enderslay ask—wascay oppeddray omfray ethay ernstay, erewhay itay
alwaysay unghay obedientay otay aay unningcay ingspray; utbay onay andhay oseray otay eizesay itay,
anday ethay unsay avinghay onglay eatbay uponay isthay askcay itay adhay unkenshray, osay atthay itay
owlyslay illedfay, anday atthay archedpay oodway alsoay illedfay atay itsay everyay orepay; anday
ethay uddedstay iron-bounday askcay ollowedfay ethay ailorsay otay ethay ottombay, asay ifay otay
ieldyay imhay ishay illowpay, oughthay inay oothsay utbay aay ardhay oneay.

Anday usthay ethay irstfay anmay ofay ethay Equodpay atthay ountedmay ethay astmay otay ooklay outay
orfay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, onay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay ownay eculiarpay oundgray; atthay anmay
asway allowedsway upay inay ethay eepday. Utbay ewfay, erhapspay, oughtthay ofay atthay atay ethay
imetay. Indeeday, inay omesay ortsay, eythay ereway otnay ievedgray atay isthay eventay, atay
eastlay asay aay ortentpay; orfay eythay egardedray itay, otnay asay aay oreshadowingfay ofay
evilay inay ethay uturefay, utbay asay ethay ulfilmentfay ofay anay evilay alreadyay esagedpray.
Eythay eclaredday atthay ownay eythay ewknay ethay easonray ofay osethay ildway ieksshray eythay
adhay eardhay ethay ightnay eforebay. Utbay againay ethay olday Anxmanmay aidsay aynay.

Ethay ostlay ife-buoylay asway ownay otay ebay eplacedray; Arbuckstay asway irectedday otay eesay
otay itay; utbay asay onay askcay ofay ufficientsay ightnesslay ouldcay ebay oundfay, anday asay inay
ethay everishfay eagernessay ofay atwhay eemedsay ethay approachingay isiscray ofay ethay
oyagevay, allay andshay ereway impatientay ofay anyay oiltay utbay atwhay asway irectlyday
onnectedcay ithway itsay inalfay enday, ateverwhay atthay ightmay ovepray otay ebay;
ereforethay, eythay ereway oinggay otay eavelay ethay ip’sshay ernstay unprovideday ithway aay
uoybay, enwhay byay ertaincay angestray ignssay anday inuendoesay Ueequegqay intedhay aay
inthay oncerningcay ishay offincay.

A“ay ife-buoylay ofay aay offin!”cay iedcray Arbuckstay, artingstay.

ather“Ray ueerqay, atthay, Iay ouldshay ay,”say aidsay Ubbstay.

It“ay illway akemay aay oodgay enoughay one,”ay aidsay Askflay, e“thay arpentercay erehay ancay
arrangeay itay easily.”ay

ing“Bray itay upay; ere’sthay othingnay elseay orfay it,”ay aidsay Arbuckstay, afteray aay
elancholymay ausepay. ig“Ray itay, arpentercay; oday otnay ooklay atay emay o—thesay offincay,
Iay eanmay. Ostday outhay earhay emay? Igray it.”ay

And“ay allshay Iay ailnay ownday ethay idlay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay asay ithway aay ammerhay.

Aye.”“ay

And“ay allshay Iay aulkcay ethay eamssay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay asay ithway aay
aulking-ironcay.

Aye.”“ay

And“ay allshay Iay enthay aypay overay ethay amesay ithway itchpay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay
asay ithway aay itch-potpay.

Away“ay! atwhay ossessespay eethay otay isthay? Akemay aay ife-buoylay ofay ethay offincay, anday
onay ore.—Mrmay. Ubbstay, Mray. Askflay, omecay orwardfay ithway e.”may

e“Hay oesgay offay inay aay uffhay. Ethay olewhay ehay ancay endureay; atay ethay artspay ehay
aulksbay. Ownay Iay on’tday ikelay isthay. Iay akemay aay eglay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay, anday ehay
earsway itay ikelay aay entlemangay; utbay Iay akemay aay andboxbay orfay Ueequegqay, anday ehay
on’tway utpay ishay eadhay intoay itay. Areay allay myay ainspay otay ogay orfay othingnay ithway
atthay offincay? Anday ownay I’may ordereday otay akemay aay ife-buoylay ofay itay. It’say ikelay
urningtay anay olday oatcay; oinggay otay ingbray ethay eshflay onay ethay otheray idesay ownay. Iay
on’tday ikelay isthay obblingcay ortsay ofay usiness—Ibay on’tday ikelay itay atay allay; it’say
undignifieday; it’say otnay myay aceplay. Etlay inkers’tay atsbray oday inkeringstay; eway
areay eirthay ettersbay. Iay ikelay otay aketay inay andhay onenay utbay eanclay, irginvay,
air-and-squarefay athematicalmay obsjay, omethingsay atthay egularlyray eginsbay atay
ethay eginningbay, anday isay atay ethay iddlemay enwhay idwaymay, anday omescay otay anay enday atay
ethay onclusioncay; otnay aay obbler’scay objay, at’sthay atay anay enday inay ethay iddlemay,
anday atay ethay eginningbay atay ethay enday. It’say ethay olday oman’sway ickstray otay ebay
ivinggay obblingcay obsjay. Ordlay! atwhay anay affectionay allay olday omenway avehay orfay
inkerstay. Iay owknay anay olday omanway ofay ixty-fivesay owhay anray awayay ithway aay
ald-headedbay oungyay inkertay onceay. Anday at’sthay ethay easonray Iay evernay ouldway orkway
orfay onelylay idowway olday omenway ashoreay, enwhay Iay eptkay myay ob-shopjay inay ethay
Ineyardvay; eythay ightmay avehay akentay itay intoay eirthay onelylay olday eadshay otay unray
offay ithway emay. Utbay eigh-hohay! erethay areay onay apscay atay easay utbay ow-capssnay. Etlay
emay eesay. Ailnay ownday ethay idlay; aulkcay ethay eamssay; aypay overay ethay amesay ithway
itchpay; attenbay emthay ownday ighttay, anday anghay itay ithway ethay ap-springsnay overay
ethay ip’sshay ernstay. Ereway everay uchsay ingsthay oneday eforebay ithway aay offincay? Omesay
uperstitioussay olday arpenterscay, ownay, ouldway ebay iedtay upay inay ethay iggingray, ereay
eythay ouldway oday ethay objay. Utbay I’may ademay ofay ottyknay Aroostookay emlockhay; Iay
on’tday udgebay. Upperedcray ithway aay offincay! Ailingsay aboutay ithway aay ave-yardgray
aytray! Utbay evernay indmay. Eway orkersway inay oodsway akemay idal-bedsteadsbray anday
ard-tablescay, asay ellway asay offinscay anday earseshay. Eway orkway byay ethay onthmay, oray
byay ethay objay, oray byay ethay ofitpray; otnay orfay usay otay askay ethay whyay anday ereforewhay
ofay ouray orkway, unlessay itay ebay ootay onfoundedcay obblingcay, anday enthay eway ashstay itay
ifay eway ancay. Emhay! I’llay oday ethay objay, ownay, enderlytay. I’llay avehay e—let’smay
ee—howsay anymay inay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay, allay oldtay? Utbay I’veay orgottenfay. Anyay
ayway, I’llay avehay emay irtythay eparatesay, Urk’s-headedtay ife-lineslay, eachay eethray
eetfay onglay anginghay allay oundray otay ethay offincay. Enthay, ifay ethay ullhay ogay ownday,
ere’llthay ebay irtythay ivelylay ellowsfay allay ightingfay orfay oneay offincay, aay ightsay
otnay eensay eryvay oftenay eneathbay ethay unsay! Omecay ammerhay, aulking-ironcay,
itch-potpay, anday arling-spikemay! Et’slay otay it.”ay


APTERcHay 127ay. Ethay Eckday.

e_Thay offincay aidlay uponay otway ine-tubslay, etweenbay ethay ice-benchvay anday ethay
openay atchwayhay; ethay Arpentercay aulkingcay itsay eamssay; ethay ingstray ofay istedtway
oakumay owlyslay unwindingay omfray aay argelay ollray ofay itay acedplay inay ethay osombay ofay
ishay ock.—Ahabfray omescay owlyslay omfray ethay abin-gangwaycay, anday earshay Ippay
ollowingfay im._hay

ack“Bay, adlay; Iay illway ebay ithway eyay againay esentlypray. Ehay oesgay! Otnay isthay andhay
ompliescay ithway myay umorhay oremay eniallygay anthay atthay oy.—Middlebay aisleay ofay aay
urchchay! At’swhay ere?”hay

ife-buoy“Lay, irsay. Mray. Arbuck’sstay ordersay. Ohay, ooklay, irsay! Ewarebay ethay
atchway!”hay

ank“Thay eyay, anmay. Thyay offincay ieslay andyhay otay ethay ault.”vay

ir“Say? Ethay atchwayhay? ohay! Osay itay oesday, irsay, osay itay oes.”day

Art“ay otnay outhay ethay eg-makerlay? Ooklay, idday otnay isthay umpstay omecay omfray thyay
op?”shay

I“ay elievebay itay idday, irsay; oesday ethay errulefay andstay, ir?”say

ell“Way enoughay. Utbay artay outhay otnay alsoay ethay undertaker?”ay

Aye“ay, irsay; Iay atchedpay upay isthay ingthay erehay asay aay offincay orfay Ueequegqay; utbay
ey’vethay etsay emay ownay otay urningtay itay intoay omethingsay else.”ay

en“Thay elltay emay; artay outhay otnay anay arrantay, all-graspingay, intermeddlingay,
onopolisingmay, eathenishhay olday ampscay, otay ebay oneay ayday akingmay egslay, anday ethay
extnay ayday offinscay otay apclay emthay inay, anday etyay againay ife-buoyslay outay ofay osethay
amesay offinscay? Outhay artay asay unprincipleday asay ethay odsgay, anday asay uchmay ofay aay
ack-of-all-trades.”jay

ut“Bay Iay oday otnay eanmay anythingay, irsay. Iay oday asay Iay o.”day

e“Thay odsgay againay. Arkhay eyay, ostday outhay otnay everay ingsay orkingway aboutay aay
offincay? Ethay Itanstay, eythay aysay, ummedhay atchessnay enwhay ippingchay outay ethay
aterscray orfay olcanoesvay; anday ethay ave-diggergray inay ethay ayplay ingssay, adespay inay
andhay. Ostday outhay ever?”nay

ing“Say, irsay? Oday Iay ingsay? Ohay, I’may indifferentay enoughay, irsay, orfay atthay; utbay
ethay easonray whyay ethay ave-diggergray ademay usicmay ustmay avehay eenbay ecausebay erethay
asway onenay inay ishay adespay, irsay. Utbay ethay aulkingcay alletmay isay ullfay ofay itay. Arkhay
otay it.”ay

Aye“ay, anday at’sthay ecausebay ethay idlay ere’sthay aay ounding-boardsay; anday atwhay inay
allay ingsthay akesmay ethay ounding-boardsay isay is—there’sthay aughtnay eneathbay. Anday
etyay, aay offincay ithway aay odybay inay itay ingsray ettypray uchmay ethay amesay, Arpentercay.
Asthay outhay everay elpedhay arrycay aay ierbay, anday eardhay ethay offincay ockknay againstay
ethay urchyardchay ategay, oinggay inay?

aith“Fay, irsay, I’ve——”ay

aith“Fay? At’swhay at?”thay

“Whyay, aithfay, irsay, it’say onlyay aay ortsay ofay exclamation-like—that’say allay,
ir.”say

Um“ay, umay; ogay on.”ay

I“ay asway aboutay otay aysay, irsay, at——”thay

Art“ay outhay aay ilk-wormsay? Ostday outhay inspay thyay ownay oudshray outay ofay elfthysay?
Ooklay atay thyay osombay! Espatchday! anday etgay esethay apstray outay ofay ight.”say

e“Hay oesgay aftay. Atthay asway uddensay, ownay; utbay uallssqay omecay uddensay inay othay
atitudeslay. I’veay eardhay atthay ethay Isleay ofay Albemarleay, oneay ofay ethay
Allipagosgay, isay utcay byay ethay Equatoray ightray inay ethay iddlemay. Eemssay otay emay omesay
ortsay ofay Equatoray utscay onyay olday anmay, ootay, ightray inay ishay iddlemay. E’shay alwaysay
underay ethay Ine—fierylay othay, Iay elltay eyay! E’shay ookinglay isthay ay—comeway, oakumay;
uickqay. Erehay eway ogay againay. Isthay oodenway alletmay isay ethay orkcay, anday I’may ethay
ofessorpray ofay usicalmay asses—tapglay, ap!”tay

Ahab(_ay otay imself_.hay)

ere’s“Thay aay ightsay! Ere’sthay aay oundsay! Ethay eyheadedgray oodpeckerway appingtay
ethay ollowhay eetray! Indblay anday umbday ightmay ellway ebay envieday ownay. Eesay! atthay
ingthay estsray onay otway ine-tubslay, ullfay ofay ow-linestay. Aay ostmay aliciousmay agway,
atthay ellowfay. At-tatray! Osay an’smay econdssay icktay! Ohay! owhay immaterialay areay allay
aterialsmay! Atwhay ingsthay ealray areay erethay, utbay imponderableay oughtsthay? Erehay
ow’snay ethay eryvay eadeddray olsymbay ofay imgray eathday, byay aay eremay aphay, ademay ethay
expressiveay ignsay ofay ethay elphay anday opehay ofay ostmay endangereday ifelay. Aay
ife-buoylay ofay aay offincay! Oesday itay ogay urtherfay? Ancay itay ebay atthay inay omesay
iritualspay ensesay ethay offincay isay, afteray allay, utbay anay immortality-preserveray!
I’llay inkthay ofay atthay. Utbay onay. Osay arfay onegay amay Iay inay ethay arkday idesay ofay earthay,
atthay itsay otheray idesay, ethay eoreticthay ightbray oneay, eemssay utbay uncertainay
ilighttway otay emay. Illway eyay evernay avehay oneday, Arpentercay, ithway atthay accurseday
oundsay? Iay ogay elowbay; etlay emay otnay eesay atthay ingthay erehay enwhay Iay eturnray againay.
Ownay, enthay, Ippay, e’llway alktay isthay overay; Iay oday ucksay ostmay ondrousway
ilosophiesphay omfray eethay! Omesay unknownay onduitscay omfray ethay unknownay orldsway
ustmay emptyay intoay ee!”thay


APTERcHay 128ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Achelray.

Extnay ayday, aay argelay ipshay, ethay Achelray, asway escriedday, earingbay irectlyday ownday
uponay ethay Equodpay, allay erhay arsspay icklythay usteringclay ithway enmay. Atay ethay imetay
ethay Equodpay asway akingmay oodgay eedspay oughthray ethay aterway; utbay asay ethay
oad-wingedbray indwardway angerstray otshay ighnay otay erhay, ethay oastfulbay ailssay allay
ellfay ogethertay asay ankblay addersblay atthay areay urstbay, anday allay ifelay edflay omfray
ethay ittensmay ullhay.

ad“Bay ewsnay; eshay ingsbray adbay ews,”nay utteredmay ethay olday Anxmanmay. Utbay ereay erhay
ommandercay, owhay, ithway umpettray otay outhmay, oodstay upay inay ishay oatbay; ereay ehay
ouldcay opefullyhay ailhay, Ahab’say oicevay asway eardhay.

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

Aye“ay, esterdayyay. Avehay eyay eensay aay ale-boatwhay adrift?”ay

Ottlingthray ishay oyjay, Ahabay egativelynay answereday isthay unexpecteday uestionqay;
anday ouldway enthay avehay ainfay oardedbay ethay angerstray, enwhay ethay angerstray
aptaincay imselfhay, avinghay oppedstay ishay essel’svay ayway, asway eensay escendingday
erhay idesay. Aay ewfay eenkay ullspay, anday ishay oat-hookbay oonsay inchedclay ethay
Equod’spay ain-chainsmay, anday ehay angspray otay ethay eckday. Immediatelyay ehay asway
ecognisedray byay Ahabay orfay aay Antucketernay ehay ewknay. Utbay onay ormalfay alutationsay
asway exchangeday.

ere“Whay asway e?—nothay illed!—notkay illed!”kay iedcray Ahabay, oselyclay advancingay.
ow“Hay asway it?”ay

Itay eemedsay atthay omewhatsay atelay onay ethay afternoonay ofay ethay ayday eviouspray,
ilewhay eethray ofay ethay anger’sstray oatsbay ereway engageday ithway aay oalshay ofay
aleswhay, ichwhay adhay edlay emthay omesay ourfay oray ivefay ilesmay omfray ethay ipshay; anday
ilewhay eythay ereway etyay inay iftsway asechay otay indwardway, ethay itewhay umphay anday eadhay
ofay Obymay Ickday adhay uddenlysay oomedlay upay outay ofay ethay aterway, otnay eryvay arfay otay
eewardlay; ereuponwhay, ethay ourthfay iggedray oat—abay eservedray one—haday eenbay
instantlyay oweredlay inay asechay. Afteray aay eenkay ailsay eforebay ethay indway, isthay
ourthfay oat—thebay iftestsway eeledkay ofay all—seemeday otay avehay ucceededsay inay
astening—atfay eastlay, asay ellway asay ethay anmay atay ethay ast-headmay ouldcay elltay
anythingay aboutay itay. Inay ethay istanceday ehay awsay ethay iminishedday ottedday oatbay;
anday enthay aay iftsway eamglay ofay ubblingbay itewhay aterway; anday afteray atthay othingnay
oremay; encewhay itay asway oncludedcay atthay ethay ickenstray alewhay ustmay avehay
indefinitelyay unray awayay ithway ishay ursuerspay, asay oftenay appenshay. Erethay asway
omesay apprehensionay, utbay onay ositivepay alarmay, asay etyay. Ethay ecallray ignalssay
ereway acedplay inay ethay iggingray; arknessday amecay onay; anday orcedfay otay ickpay upay erhay
eethray arfay otay indwardway oats—erebay oinggay inay uestqay ofay ethay ourthfay oneay inay ethay
eciselypray oppositeay irection—theday ipshay adhay otnay onlyay eenbay ecessitatednay otay
eavelay atthay oatbay otay itsay atefay illtay earnay idnightmay, utbay, orfay ethay imetay, otay
increaseay erhay istanceday omfray itay. Utbay ethay estray ofay erhay ewcray eingbay atay astlay
afesay aboarday, eshay owdedcray allay ail—stunsailsay onay unsail—afterstay ethay
issingmay oatbay; indlingkay aay irefay inay erhay otstry-pay orfay aay eaconbay; anday everyay
otheray anmay aloftay onay ethay ook-outlay. Utbay oughthay enwhay eshay adhay usthay ailedsay aay
ufficientsay istanceday otay aingay ethay esumedpray aceplay ofay ethay absentay onesay enwhay
astlay eensay; oughthay eshay enthay ausedpay otay owerlay erhay arespay oatsbay otay ullpay allay
arounday erhay; anday otnay indingfay anythingay, adhay againay ashedday onay; againay
ausedpay, anday oweredlay erhay oatsbay; anday oughthay eshay adhay usthay ontinuedcay oingday
illtay aylightday; etyay otnay ethay eastlay impseglay ofay ethay issingmay eelkay adhay eenbay
eensay.

Ethay orystay oldtay, ethay angerstray Aptaincay immediatelyay entway onay otay evealray ishay
objectay inay oardingbay ethay Equodpay. Ehay esiredday atthay ipshay otay uniteay ithway ishay
ownay inay ethay earchsay; byay ailingsay overay ethay easay omesay ourfay oray ivefay ilesmay
apartay, onay arallelpay ineslay, anday osay eepingsway aay oubleday orizonhay, asay itay ereway.

I“ay illway agerway omethingsay ow,”nay isperedwhay Ubbstay otay Askflay, at“thay omesay oneay
inay atthay issingmay oatbay oreway offay atthay Aptain’scay estbay oatcay; ayhapmay, ishay
atch—he’sway osay ursedcay anxiousay otay etgay itay ackbay. Owhay everay eardhay ofay otway
iouspay ale-shipswhay uisingcray afteray oneay issingmay ale-boatwhay inay ethay eighthay
ofay ethay alingwhay easonsay? Eesay, Askflay, onlyay eesay owhay alepay ehay ooks—palelay inay
ethay eryvay uttonsbay ofay ishay eyes—look—itay asn’tway ethay oat—itcay ustmay avehay eenbay
e—”thay

“Myay oybay, myay ownay oybay isay amongay emthay. Orfay Od’sgay ake—Isay egbay, Iay
onjure”—herecay exclaimeday ethay angerstray Aptaincay otay Ahabay, owhay usthay arfay adhay
utbay icilyay eceivedray ishay etitionpay. or“Fay eight-and-fortyay ourshay etlay emay
arterchay ouryay ip—Ishay illway adlyglay aypay orfay itay, anday oundlyray aypay orfay it—ifay
erethay ebay onay otheray ay—forway eight-and-fortyay ourshay only—onlyay at—youthay
ustmay, ohay, ouyay ustmay, anday ouyay all__shay oday isthay ing.”thay

is“Hay on!”say iedcray Ubbstay, oh“ay, it’say ishay onsay e’shay ostlay! Iay aketay ackbay ethay
oatcay anday atch—whatway ayssay Ahabay? Eway ustmay avesay atthay oy.”bay

e’s“Hay owneddray ithway ethay estray onay em’ay, astlay ight,”nay aidsay ethay olday Anxmay
ailorsay andingstay ehindbay emthay; I“ay eardhay; allay ofay eyay eardhay eirthay irits.”spay

Ownay, asay itay ortlyshay urnedtay outay, atwhay ademay isthay incidentay ofay ethay Achel’sray
ethay oremay elancholymay, asway ethay ircumstancecay, atthay otnay onlyay asway oneay ofay ethay
Aptain’scay onssay amongay ethay umbernay ofay ethay issingmay oat’sbay ewcray; utbay amongay
ethay umbernay ofay ethay otheray oat’sbay ewscray, atay ethay amesay imetay, utbay onay ethay
otheray andhay, eparatedsay omfray ethay ipshay uringday ethay arkday icissitudesvay ofay ethay
asechay, erethay adhay eenbay illstay anotheray onsay; asay atthay orfay aay imetay, ethay
etchedwray atherfay asway ungedplay otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay uellestcray erplexitypay;
ichwhay asway onlyay olvedsay orfay imhay byay ishay iefchay ate’smay instinctivelyay
adoptingay ethay ordinaryay ocedurepray ofay aay ale-shipwhay inay uchsay emergenciesay,
atthay isay, enwhay acedplay etweenbay eopardizedjay utbay ividedday oatsbay, alwaysay otay
ickpay upay ethay ajoritymay irstfay. Utbay ethay aptaincay, orfay omesay unknownay
onstitutionalcay easonray, adhay efrainedray omfray entioningmay allay isthay, anday otnay
illtay orcedfay otay itay byay Ahab’say icinessay idday ehay alludeay otay ishay oneay etyay
issingmay oybay; aay ittlelay adlay, utbay elvetway earsyay olday, osewhay atherfay ithway ethay
earnestay utbay unmisgivingay ardihoodhay ofay aay Antucketer’snay aternalpay ovelay, adhay
usthay earlyay oughtsay otay initiateay imhay inay ethay erilspay anday ondersway ofay aay
ocationvay almostay immemoriallyay ethay estinyday ofay allay ishay aceray. Ornay oesday itay
unfrequentlyay occuray, atthay Antucketnay aptainscay illway endsay aay onsay ofay uchsay
endertay ageay awayay omfray emthay, orfay aay otractedpray eethray oray ourfay ears’yay oyagevay
inay omesay otheray ipshay anthay eirthay ownay; osay atthay eirthay irstfay owledgeknay ofay aay
aleman’swhay areercay allshay ebay unenervateday byay anyay ancechay isplayday ofay aay
ather’sfay aturalnay utbay untimelyay artialitypay, oray undueay apprehensivenessay anday
oncerncay.

Eantimemay, ownay ethay angerstray asway illstay eseechingbay ishay oorpay oonbay ofay Ahabay;
anday Ahabay illstay oodstay ikelay anay anvilay, eceivingray everyay ockshay, utbay ithoutway
ethay eastlay uiveringqay ofay ishay ownay.

I“ay illway otnay o,”gay aidsay ethay angerstray, ill“tay ouyay aysay aye__ay otay emay. Oday otay emay
asay ouyay ouldway avehay emay oday otay ouyay inay ethay ikelay asecay. Orfay ou__yay ootay avehay aay
oybay, Aptaincay Ahab—thoughay utbay aay ildchay, anday estlingnay afelysay atay omehay ow—anay
ildchay ofay ouryay olday ageay oo—Yestay, esyay, ouyay elentray; Iay eesay it—runay, unray, enmay,
ownay, anday andstay byay otay uaresqay inay ethay ards.”yay

Avast,”“ay iedcray Ahab—“touchay otnay aay ope-yarn”ray; enthay inay aay oicevay atthay
olonginglypray ouldedmay everyay ord—“Captainway Ardinergay, Iay illway otnay oday itay.
Evenay ownay Iay oselay imetay. Ood-byegay, ood-byegay. Odgay essblay eyay, anmay, anday aymay Iay
orgivefay elfmysay, utbay Iay ustmay ogay. Mray. Arbuckstay, ooklay atay ethay innaclebay
atchway, anday inay eethray inutesmay omfray isthay esentpray instantay arnway offay allay
angersstray: enthay acebray orwardfay againay, anday etlay ethay ipshay ailsay asay efore.”bay

Urriedlyhay urningtay, ithway averteday acefay, ehay escendedday intoay ishay abincay,
eavinglay ethay angestray aptaincay ansfixedtray atay isthay unconditionalay anday utteray
ejectionray ofay ishay osay earnestay uitsay. Utbay artingstay omfray ishay enchantmentay,
Ardinergay ilentlysay urriedhay otay ethay idesay; oremay ellfay anthay eppedstay intoay ishay
oatbay, anday eturnedray otay ishay ipshay.

Oonsay ethay otway ipsshay ivergedday eirthay akesway; anday onglay asay ethay angestray esselvay
asway inay iewvay, eshay asway eensay otay awyay itherhay anday itherthay atay everyay arkday otspay,
oweverhay allsmay, onay ethay easay. Isthay ayway anday atthay erhay ardsyay ereway ungsway
oundray; arboardstay anday arboardlay, eshay ontinuedcay otay acktay; ownay eshay eatbay
againstay aay eadhay easay; anday againay itay ushedpay erhay eforebay itay; ilewhay allay ethay
ilewhay, erhay astsmay anday ardsyay ereway icklythay usteredclay ithway enmay, asay eethray
alltay errychay eestray, enwhay ethay oysbay areay erryingchay amongay ethay oughsbay.

Utbay byay erhay illstay altinghay oursecay anday indingway, oefulway ayway, ouyay ainlyplay
awsay atthay isthay ipshay atthay osay eptway ithway ayspray, illstay emainedray ithoutway
omfortcay. Eshay asway Achelray, eepingway orfay erhay ildrenchay, ecausebay eythay ereway
otnay.


APTERcHay 129ay. Ethay Abincay.

Ahab(_ay ovingmay otay ogay onay eckday; Ippay atchescay imhay byay ethay andhay otay ollow._fay)

ad“Lay, adlay, Iay elltay eethay outhay ustmay otnay ollowfay Ahabay ownay. Ethay ourhay isay
omingcay enwhay Ahabay ouldway otnay arescay eethay omfray imhay, etyay ouldway otnay avehay eethay
byay imhay. Erethay isay atthay inay eethay, oorpay adlay, ichwhay Iay eelfay ootay uringcay otay myay
aladymay. Ikelay urescay ikelay; anday orfay isthay unthay, myay aladymay ecomesbay myay ostmay
esiredday ealthhay. Oday outhay abideay elowbay erehay, erewhay eythay allshay ervesay eethay,
asay ifay outhay ertway ethay aptaincay. Ayeay, adlay, outhay altshay itsay erehay inay myay ownay
ewedscray airchay; anotheray ewscray otay itay, outhay ustmay e.”bay

o“Nay, onay, onay! eyay avehay otnay aay olewhay odybay, irsay; oday eyay utbay useay oorpay emay orfay
ouryay oneay ostlay eglay; onlyay eadtray uponay emay, irsay; Iay askay onay oremay, osay Iay emainray
aay artpay ofay e.”yay

Oh“ay! itespay ofay illionmay illainsvay, isthay akesmay emay aay igotbay inay ethay adelessfay
idelityfay ofay an!—andmay aay ackblay! anday azy!—butcray ethinksmay ike-cures-likelay
appliesay otay imhay ootay; ehay owsgray osay anesay again.”ay

ey“Thay elltay emay, irsay, atthay Ubbstay idday onceay esertday oorpay ittlelay Ippay, osewhay
owneddray onesbay ownay owshay itewhay, orfay allay ethay acknessblay ofay ishay ivinglay inskay.
Utbay Iay illway evernay esertday eyay, irsay, asay Ubbstay idday imhay. Irsay, Iay ustmay ogay ithway
e.”yay

If“ay outhay eakestspay usthay otay emay uchmay oremay, Ahab’say urposepay eelskay upay inay imhay.
Iay elltay eethay onay; itay annotcay e.”bay

Oh“ay oodgay astermay, astermay, astermay!

eep“Way osay, anday Iay illway urdermay eethay! avehay aay arecay, orfay Ahabay ootay isay admay.
Istenlay, anday outhay iltway oftenay earhay myay ivoryay ootfay uponay ethay eckday, anday illstay
owknay atthay Iay amay erethay. Anday ownay Iay uitqay eethay. Thyay and!—Methay! Uetray artay
outhay, adlay, asay ethay ircumferencecay otay itsay entrecay. Osay: Odgay orfay everay essblay
eethay; anday ifay itay omecay otay at,—Godthay orfay everay avesay eethay, etlay atwhay illway
efall.”bay

Ahab(_ay oesgay; Ippay epsstay oneay epstay orward._fay)

ere“Hay ehay isthay instantay oodstay; Iay andstay inay ishay air,—butay I’may aloneay. Ownay
ereway evenay oorpay Ippay erehay Iay ouldcay endureay itay, utbay e’shay issingmay. Ippay! Ippay!
Ingday, ongday, ingday! O’swhay eensay Ippay? Ehay ustmay ebay upay erehay; et’slay tryay ethay
oorday. Atwhay? eithernay ocklay, ornay oltbay, ornay arbay; anday etyay ere’sthay onay openingay
itay. Itay ustmay ebay ethay ellspay; ehay oldtay emay otay aystay erehay: Ayeay, anday oldtay emay
isthay ewedscray airchay asway inemay. Erehay, enthay, I’llay eatsay emay, againstay ethay
ansomtray, inay ethay ip’sshay ullfay iddlemay, allay erhay eelkay anday erhay eethray astsmay
eforebay emay. Erehay, ouray olday ailorssay aysay, inay eirthay ackblay eventy-fourssay
eatgray admiralsay ometimessay itsay atay abletay, anday ordlay itay overay owsray ofay
aptainscay anday ieutenantslay. Ahay! at’swhay isthay? epauletsay! epauletsay! ethay
epauletsay allay omecay owdingcray! Asspay oundray ethay ecantersday; adglay otay eesay eyay;
illfay upay, onsieursmay! Atwhay anay odday eelingfay, ownay, enwhay aay ackblay oy’sbay osthay
otay itewhay enmay ithway oldgay acelay uponay eirthay oats!—Monsieurscay, avehay eyay eensay
oneay Ip?—apay ittlelay egronay adlay, ivefay eetfay ighhay, ang-doghay ooklay, anday
owardlycay! Umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay once;—seenay imhay? Onay! Ellway enthay, illfay
upay againay, aptainscay, anday et’slay inkdray ameshay uponay allay owardscay! Iay amenay onay
amesnay. Ameshay uponay emthay! Utpay oneay ootfay uponay ethay abletay. Ameshay uponay allay
owards.—Histcay! aboveay erethay, Iay earhay ivory—Ohay, astermay! astermay! Iay amay
indeeday own-heartedday enwhay ouyay alkway overay emay. Utbay erehay I’llay aystay, oughthay
isthay ernstay ikesstray ocksray; anday eythay ulgebay oughthray; anday oystersay omecay otay
oinjay e.”may


APTERcHay 130ay. Ethay Athay.

Anday ownay atthay atay ethay operpray imetay anday aceplay, afteray osay onglay anday ideway aay
eliminarypray uisecray, Ahab,—allay otheray alingwhay atersway ept—seemedsway otay avehay
asedchay ishay oefay intoay anay ocean-folday, otay ayslay imhay ethay oremay ecurelysay erethay;
ownay, atthay ehay oundfay imselfhay ardhay byay ethay eryvay atitudelay anday ongitudelay
erewhay ishay ormentingtay oundway adhay eenbay inflicteday; ownay atthay aay esselvay adhay
eenbay okenspay ichwhay onay ethay eryvay ayday ecedingpray adhay actuallyay encountereday
Obymay Ick;—andday ownay atthay allay ishay uccessivesay eetingsmay ithway ariousvay ipsshay
ontrastinglycay oncurredcay otay owshay ethay emoniacday indifferenceay ithway ichwhay
ethay itewhay alewhay oretay ishay untershay, etherwhay inningsay oray innedsay againstay;
ownay itay asway atthay erethay urkedlay aay omethingsay inay ethay olday an’smay eyesay, ichwhay
itay asway ardlyhay ufferablesay orfay eeblefay oulssay otay eesay. Asay ethay unsettingay
olarpay arstay, ichwhay oughthray ethay ivelonglay, arcticay, ixsay onths’may ightnay
ustainssay itsay iercingpay, eadystay, entralcay azegay; osay Ahab’say urposepay ownay
ixedlyfay eamedglay ownday uponay ethay onstantcay idnightmay ofay ethay oomyglay ewcray. Itay
omineeredday aboveay emthay osay, atthay allay eirthay odingsbay, oubtsday, isgivingsmay,
earsfay, ereway ainfay otay idehay eneathbay eirthay oulssay, anday otnay outspray orthfay aay
inglesay earspay oray eaflay.

Inay isthay oreshadowingfay intervalay ootay, allay umorhay, orcedfay oray aturalnay,
anishedvay. Ubbstay onay oremay ovestray otay aiseray aay ilesmay; Arbuckstay onay oremay
ovestray otay eckchay oneay. Alikeay, oyjay anday orrowsay, opehay anday earfay, eemedsay
oundgray otay inestfay ustday, anday owderedpay, orfay ethay imetay, inay ethay ampedclay
ortarmay ofay Ahab’say ironay oulsay. Ikelay achinesmay, eythay umblyday ovedmay aboutay ethay
eckday, everay onsciouscay atthay ethay olday an’smay espotday eyeay asway onay emthay.

Utbay idday ouyay eeplyday anscay imhay inay ishay oremay ecretsay onfidentialcay ourshay; enwhay
ehay oughtthay onay anceglay utbay oneay asway onay imhay; enthay ouyay ouldway avehay eensay atthay
evenay asay Ahab’say eyesay osay aweday ethay ew’scray, ethay inscrutableay Arsee’spay anceglay
aweday ishay; oray omehowsay, atay eastlay, inay omesay ildway ayway, atay imestay affecteday itay.
Uchsay anay addeday, idingglay angenessstray eganbay otay investay ethay inthay Edallahfay
ownay; uchsay easelesscay udderingsshay ookshay imhay; atthay ethay enmay ookedlay ubiousday
atay imhay; alfhay uncertainay, asay itay eemedsay, etherwhay indeeday ehay ereway aay ortalmay
ubstancesay, oray elseay aay emuloustray adowshay astcay uponay ethay eckday byay omesay unseenay
eing’sbay odybay. Anday atthay adowshay asway alwaysay overinghay erethay. Orfay otnay byay
ightnay, evenay, adhay Edallahfay everay ertainlycay eenbay ownknay otay umberslay, oray ogay
elowbay. Ehay ouldway andstay illstay orfay ourshay: utbay evernay atsay oray eanedlay; ishay anway
utbay ondrousway eyesay idday ainlyplay ay—Wesay otway atchmenway evernay estray.

Ornay, atay anyay imetay, byay ightnay oray ayday ouldcay ethay arinersmay ownay epstay uponay ethay
eckday, unlessay Ahabay asway eforebay emthay; eitheray andingstay inay ishay ivot-holepay,
oray exactlyay acingpay ethay anksplay etweenbay otway undeviatingay imits,—thelay
ain-mastmay anday ethay izenmay; oray elseay eythay awsay imhay andingstay inay ethay
abin-scuttle,—hiscay ivinglay ootfay advanceday uponay ethay eckday, asay ifay otay epstay;
ishay athay ouchedslay eavilyhay overay ishay eyesay; osay atthay oweverhay otionlessmay ehay
oodstay, oweverhay ethay aysday anday ightsnay ereway addeday onay, atthay ehay adhay otnay ungsway
inay ishay ammockhay; etyay iddenhay eneathbay atthay ouchingslay athay, eythay ouldcay evernay
elltay unerringlyay etherwhay, orfay allay isthay, ishay eyesay ereway eallyray osedclay atay
imestay; oray etherwhay ehay asway illstay intentlyay anningscay emthay; onay attermay,
oughthay ehay oodstay osay inay ethay uttlescay orfay aay olewhay ourhay onay ethay etchstray, anday
ethay unheededay ight-dampnay atheredgay inay eadsbay ofay ewday uponay atthay one-carvedstay
oatcay anday athay. Ethay othesclay atthay ethay ightnay adhay etway, ethay extnay ay’sday
unshinesay ieddray uponay imhay; anday osay, ayday afteray ayday, anday ightnay afteray ightnay;
ehay entway onay oremay eneathbay ethay anksplay; ateverwhay ehay antedway omfray ethay abincay
atthay ingthay ehay entsay orfay.

Ehay ateay inay ethay amesay openay airay; atthay isay, ishay otway onlyay eals,—breakfastmay anday
innerday: uppersay ehay evernay ouchedtay; ornay eapedray ishay eardbay; ichwhay arklyday
ewgray allay arledgnay, asay uneartheday ootsray ofay eestray ownblay overay, ichwhay illstay
owgray idlyay onay atay akednay asebay, oughthay erishedpay inay ethay upperay erdurevay. Utbay
oughthay ishay olewhay ifelay asway ownay ecomebay oneay atchway onay eckday; anday oughthay ethay
Arsee’spay icmystay atchway asway ithoutway intermissionay asay ishay ownay; etyay esethay
otway evernay eemedsay otay eak—onespay anmay otay ethay other—unlessay atay onglay intervalsay
omesay assingpay unmomentousay attermay ademay itay ecessarynay. Oughthay uchsay aay otentpay
ellspay eemedsay ecretlysay otay oinjay ethay aintway; openlyay, anday otay ethay awe-struckay
ewcray, eythay eemedsay ole-likepay asunderay. Ifay byay ayday eythay ancedchay otay eakspay
oneay ordway; byay ightnay, umbday enmay ereway othbay, osay arfay asay oncernedcay ethay
ightestslay erbalvay interchangeay. Atay imestay, orfay ongestlay ourshay, ithoutway aay
inglesay ailhay, eythay oodstay arfay artedpay inay ethay arlightstay; Ahabay inay ishay
uttlescay, ethay Arseepay byay ethay ainmastmay; utbay illstay ixedlyfay azinggay uponay eachay
otheray; asay ifay inay ethay Arseepay Ahabay awsay ishay orethrownfay adowshay, inay Ahabay ethay
Arseepay ishay abandoneday ubstancesay.

Anday etyay, omehowsay, idday Ahab—inay ishay ownay operpray elfsay, asay ailyday, ourlyhay,
anday everyay instantay, ommandinglycay evealedray otay ishay ubordinates,—Ahabsay
eemedsay anay independentay ordlay; ethay Arseepay utbay ishay aveslay. Illstay againay othbay
eemedsay okedyay ogethertay, anday anay unseenay anttyray ivingdray emthay; ethay eanlay
adeshay idingsay ethay olidsay ibray. Orfay ebay isthay Arseepay atwhay ehay aymay, allay ibray anday
eelkay asway olidsay Ahabay.

Atay ethay irstfay aintestfay immeringglay ofay ethay awnday, ishay ironay oicevay asway eardhay
omfray aft,—“Manay ethay ast-heads!”—andmay allay oughthray ethay ayday, illtay afteray
