unsetsay anday afteray ilighttway, ethay amesay oicevay everyay ourhay, atay ethay ikingstray
ofay ethay elmsman’shay ellbay, asway eard—“Whathay ed’yay ee?—sharpsay! arp!”shay

Utbay enwhay eethray oray ourfay aysday adhay idedslay byay, afteray eetingmay ethay
ildren-seekingchay Achelray; anday onay outspay adhay etyay eenbay eensay; ethay onomaniacmay
olday anmay eemedsay istrustfulday ofay ishay ew’scray idelityfay; atay eastlay, ofay earlynay
allay exceptay ethay Aganpay arpooneershay; ehay eemedsay otay oubtday, evenay, etherwhay
Ubbstay anday Askflay ightmay otnay illinglyway overlookay ethay ightsay ehay oughtsay. Utbay
ifay esethay uspicionssay ereway eallyray ishay, ehay agaciouslysay efrainedray omfray
erballyvay expressingay emthay, oweverhay ishay actionsay ightmay eemsay otay inthay emthay.

I“ay illway avehay ethay irstfay ightsay ofay ethay alewhay elf,”—hemysay aidsay. Aye“ay! Ahabay
ustmay avehay ethay oubloon!”day anday ithway ishay ownay andshay ehay iggedray aay estnay ofay
asketedbay owlinesbay; anday endingsay aay andhay aloftay, ithway aay inglesay eavedshay
ockblay, otay ecuresay otay ethay ain-mastmay eadhay, ehay eceivedray ethay otway endsay ofay ethay
ownward-reevedday operay; anday attachingay oneay otay ishay asketbay eparedpray aay inpay
orfay ethay otheray enday, inay orderay otay astenfay itay atay ethay ailray. Isthay oneday, ithway
atthay enday etyay inay ishay andhay anday andingstay esidebay ethay inpay, ehay ookedlay oundray
uponay ishay ewcray, eepingsway omfray oneay otay ethay otheray; ausingpay ishay anceglay onglay
uponay Aggooday, Ueequegqay, Ashtegotay; utbay unningshay Edallahfay; anday enthay
ettlingsay ishay irmfay elyingray eyeay uponay ethay iefchay atemay, aid,—“Takesay ethay
operay, ir—Isay ivegay itay intoay thyay andshay, Arbuck.”stay Enthay arrangingay ishay
ersonpay inay ethay asketbay, ehay avegay ethay ordway orfay emthay otay oisthay imhay otay ishay
erchpay, Arbuckstay eingbay ethay oneay owhay ecuredsay ethay operay atay astlay; anday
afterwardsay oodstay earnay itay. Anday usthay, ithway oneay andhay ingingclay oundray ethay
oyalray astmay, Ahabay azedgay abroaday uponay ethay easay orfay ilesmay anday iles,—aheadmay,
asternay, isthay idesay, anday at,—withinthay ethay ideway expandeday irclecay ommandedcay
atay osay eatgray aay eighthay.

Enwhay inay orkingway ithway ishay andshay atay omesay oftylay almostay isolateday aceplay inay
ethay iggingray, ichwhay anceschay otay afforday onay ootholdfay, ethay ailorsay atay easay isay
oistedhay upay otay atthay otspay, anday ustainedsay erethay byay ethay operay; underay esethay
ircumstancescay, itsay astenedfay enday onay eckday isay alwaysay ivengay inay ictstray
argechay otay omesay oneay anmay owhay ashay ethay ecialspay atchway ofay itay. Ecausebay inay uchsay
aay ildernessway ofay unningray iggingray, osewhay ariousvay ifferentday elationsray
aloftay annotcay alwaysay ebay infalliblyay iscernedday byay atwhay isay eensay ofay emthay atay
ethay eckday; anday enwhay ethay eck-endsday ofay esethay opesray areay eingbay everyay ewfay
inutesmay astcay ownday omfray ethay asteningsfay, itay ouldway ebay utbay aay aturalnay
atalityfay, ifay, unprovideday ithway aay onstantcay atchmanway, ethay oistedhay ailorsay
ouldshay byay omesay arelessnesscay ofay ethay ewcray ebay astcay adriftay anday allfay allay
oopingsway otay ethay easay. Osay Ahab’say oceedingspray inay isthay attermay ereway otnay
unusualay; ethay onlyay angestray ingthay aboutay emthay eemedsay otay ebay, atthay Arbuckstay,
almostay ethay oneay onlyay anmay owhay adhay everay enturedvay otay opposeay imhay ithway
anythingay inay ethay ightestslay egreeday approachingay otay ecision—oneday ofay osethay
ootay, osewhay aithfulnessfay onay ethay ook-outlay ehay adhay eemedsay otay oubtday
omewhat;—itsay asway angestray, atthay isthay asway ethay eryvay anmay ehay ouldshay electsay
orfay ishay atchmanway; eelyfray ivinggay ishay olewhay ifelay intoay uchsay anay otherwiseay
istrustedday erson’spay andshay.

Ownay, ethay irstfay imetay Ahabay asway erchedpay aloftay; ereay ehay adhay eenbay erethay entay
inutesmay; oneay ofay osethay ed-billedray avagesay ea-hawkssay ichwhay osay oftenay flyay
incommodiouslyay oseclay oundray ethay annedmay ast-headsmay ofay alemenwhay inay esethay
atitudeslay; oneay ofay esethay irdsbay amecay eelingwhay anday eamingscray oundray ishay
eadhay inay aay azemay ofay untrackablyay iftsway irclingscay. Enthay itay artedday aay
ousandthay eetfay aightstray upay intoay ethay airay; enthay iralizedspay ownwardsday, anday
entway eddyingay againay oundray ishay eadhay.

Utbay ithway ishay azegay ixedfay uponay ethay imday anday istantday orizonhay, Ahabay eemedsay
otnay otay arkmay isthay ildway irdbay; ornay, indeeday, ouldway anyay oneay elseay avehay arkedmay
itay uchmay, itay eingbay onay uncommonay ircumstancecay; onlyay ownay almostay ethay eastlay
eedfulhay eyeay eemedsay otay eesay omesay ortsay ofay unningcay eaningmay inay almostay everyay
ightsay.

our“Yay athay, ouryay athay, ir!”say uddenlysay iedcray ethay Iciliansay eamansay, owhay
eingbay ostedpay atay ethay izen-mast-headmay, oodstay irectlyday ehindbay Ahabay, oughthay
omewhatsay owerlay anthay ishay evellay, anday ithway aay eepday ulfgay ofay airay ividingday
emthay.

Utbay alreadyay ethay ablesay ingway asway eforebay ethay olday an’smay eyesay; ethay onglay
ookedhay illbay atay ishay eadhay: ithway aay eamscray, ethay ackblay awkhay artedday awayay ithway
ishay izepray.

Anay eagleay ewflay icethray oundray Arquin’stay eadhay, emovingray ishay apcay otay eplaceray
itay, anday ereuponthay Anaquiltay, ishay ifeway, eclaredday atthay Arquintay ouldway ebay
ingkay ofay Omeray. Utbay onlyay byay ethay eplacingray ofay ethay apcay asway atthay omenay
accounteday oodgay. Ahab’say athay asway evernay estoredray; ethay ildway awkhay ewflay onay
anday onay ithway itay; arfay inay advanceay ofay ethay owpray: anday atay astlay isappearedday;
ilewhay omfray ethay ointpay ofay atthay isappearanceday, aay inutemay ackblay otspay asway
imlyday iscernedday, allingfay omfray atthay astvay eighthay intoay ethay easay.


APTERcHay 131ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Elightday.

Ethay intenseay Equodpay ailedsay onay; ethay ollingray avesway anday aysday entway byay; ethay
ife-buoy-coffinlay illstay ightlylay ungsway; anday anotheray ipshay, ostmay iserablymay
isnamedmay ethay Elightday, asway escriedday. Asay eshay ewdray ighnay, allay eyesay ereway
ixedfay uponay erhay oadbray eamsbay, alledcay earsshay, ichwhay, inay omesay
aling-shipswhay, osscray ethay uarter-deckqay atay ethay eighthay ofay eightay oray inenay
eetfay; ervingsay otay arrycay ethay arespay, unriggeday, oray isabledday oatsbay.

Uponay ethay anger’sstray earsshay ereway eheldbay ethay atteredshay, itewhay ibsray, anday
omesay ewfay interedsplay anksplay, ofay atwhay adhay onceay eenbay aay ale-boatwhay; utbay ouyay
ownay awsay oughthray isthay eckwray, asay ainlyplay asay ouyay eesay oughthray ethay eeledpay,
alf-unhingedhay, anday eachingblay eletonskay ofay aay orsehay.

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay

ook!”“Lay epliedray ethay ollow-cheekedhay aptaincay omfray ishay affrailtay; anday ithway
ishay umpettray ehay ointedpay otay ethay eckwray.

ast“Hay illedkay im?”hay

e“Thay arpoonhay isay otnay etyay orgedfay atthay everay illway oday at,”thay answereday ethay
otheray, adlysay ancingglay uponay aay oundedray ammockhay onay ethay eckday, osewhay
atheredgay idessay omesay oiselessnay ailorssay ereway usybay inay ewingsay ogethertay.

ot“Nay orged!”fay anday atchingsnay Erth’spay evelledlay ironay omfray ethay otchcray, Ahabay
eldhay itay outay, exclaiming—“Lookay eyay, Antucketernay; erehay inay isthay andhay Iay oldhay
ishay eathday! Emperedtay inay oodblay, anday emperedtay byay ightninglay areay esethay
arbsbay; anday Iay earsway otay empertay emthay iplytray inay atthay othay aceplay ehindbay ethay
infay, erewhay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ostmay eelsfay ishay accurseday ife!”lay

en“Thay Odgay eepkay eethay, olday an—see’stmay outhay at”—pointingthay otay ethay
ammock—“Ihay urybay utbay oneay ofay ivefay outstay enmay, owhay ereway aliveay onlyay
esterdayyay; utbay ereway eadday ereay ightnay. Onlyay at__thay oneay Iay urybay; ethay estray
ereway uriedbay eforebay eythay iedday; ouyay ailsay uponay eirthay omb.”tay Enthay urningtay
otay ishay ew—“Arecray eyay eadyray erethay? aceplay ethay ankplay enthay onay ethay ailray, anday
iftlay ethay odybay; osay, en—Ohthay! Od”—advancinggay owardstay ethay ammockhay ithway
uplifteday ands—“mayhay ethay esurrectionray anday ethay ife——”lay

ace“Bray orwardfay! Upay elm!”hay iedcray Ahabay ikelay ightninglay otay ishay enmay.

Utbay ethay uddenlysay artedstay Equodpay asway otnay uickqay enoughay otay escapeay ethay
oundsay ofay ethay ashsplay atthay ethay orpsecay oonsay ademay asay itay uckstray ethay easay; otnay
osay uickqay, indeeday, utbay atthay omesay ofay ethay ingflyay ubblesbay ightmay avehay
inkledspray erhay ullhay ithway eirthay ostlyghay aptismbay.

Asay Ahabay ownay idedglay omfray ethay ejectedday Elightday, ethay angestray ife-buoylay
anginghay atay ethay Equod’spay ernstay amecay intoay onspicuouscay eliefray.

a“Hay! onderyay! ooklay onderyay, en!”may iedcray aay orebodingfay oicevay inay erhay akeway.
In“ay ainvay, ohay, eyay angersstray, eyay flyay ouray adsay urialbay; eyay utbay urntay usay ouryay
affrailtay otay owshay usay ouryay offin!”cay


APTERcHay 132ay. Ethay Onysymphay.

Itay asway aay earclay eel-bluestay ayday. Ethay irmamentsfay ofay airay anday easay ereway
ardlyhay eparablesay inay atthay all-pervadingay azureay; onlyay, ethay ensivepay airay asway
ansparentlytray urepay anday oftsay, ithway aay oman’sway ooklay, anday ethay obustray anday
an-likemay easay eavedhay ithway onglay, ongstray, ingeringlay ellssway, asay Amson’ssay
estchay inay ishay eepslay.

Itherhay, anday itherthay, onay ighhay, idedglay ethay ow-whitesnay ingsway ofay allsmay,
unspeckleday irdsbay; esethay ereway ethay entlegay oughtsthay ofay ethay emininefay airay;
utbay otay anday ofray inay ethay eepsday, arfay ownday inay ethay ottomlessbay ueblay, ushedray
ightymay eviathanslay, ord-fishsway, anday arksshay; anday esethay ereway ethay ongstray,
oubledtray, urderousmay inkingsthay ofay ethay asculinemay easay.

Utbay oughthay usthay ontrastingcay ithinway, ethay ontrastcay asway onlyay inay adesshay anday
adowsshay ithoutway; osethay otway eemedsay oneay; itay asway onlyay ethay exsay, asay itay ereway,
atthay istinguishedday emthay.

Aloftay, ikelay aay oyalray arczay anday ingkay, ethay unsay eemedsay ivinggay isthay entlegay
airay otay isthay oldbay anday ollingray easay; evenay asay idebray otay oomgray. Anday atay ethay
irdlinggay inelay ofay ethay orizonhay, aay oftsay anday emuloustray otion—mostmay eensay
erehay atay ethay equator—denoteday ethay ondfay, obbingthray usttray, ethay ovinglay
alarmsay, ithway ichwhay ethay oorpay idebray avegay erhay osombay awayay.

Iedtay upay anday istedtway; arledgnay anday ottedknay ithway inkleswray; aggardlyhay irmfay
anday unyieldingay; ishay eyesay owingglay ikelay oalscay, atthay illstay owglay inay ethay
ashesay ofay uinray; untotteringay Ahabay oodstay orthfay inay ethay earnessclay ofay ethay
ornmay; iftinglay ishay interedsplay elmethay ofay aay owbray otay ethay airfay irl’sgay
oreheadfay ofay eavenhay.

Ohay, immortalay infancyay, anday innocencyay ofay ethay azureay! Invisibleay ingedway
eaturescray atthay olicfray allay oundray usay! Eetsway ildhoodchay ofay airay anday skyay! owhay
obliviousay ereway eyay ofay olday Ahab’say ose-coiledclay oeway! Utbay osay avehay Iay eensay
ittlelay Iriammay anday Arthamay, aughing-eyedlay elvesay, eedlesslyhay ambolgay arounday
eirthay olday iresay; ortingspay ithway ethay irclecay ofay ingedsay ockslay ichwhay ewgray onay
ethay argemay ofay atthay urnt-outbay atercray ofay ishay ainbray.

Owlyslay ossingcray ethay eckday omfray ethay uttlescay, Ahabay eanedlay overay ethay idesay
anday atchedway owhay ishay adowshay inay ethay aterway anksay anday anksay otay ishay azegay, ethay
oremay anday ethay oremay atthay ehay ovestray otay iercepay ethay ofunditypray. Utbay ethay
ovelylay aromasay inay atthay enchanteday airay idday atay astlay eemsay otay ispelday, orfay aay
omentmay, ethay ankerouscay ingthay inay ishay oulsay. Atthay adglay, appyhay airay, atthay
insomeway skyay, idday atay astlay okestray anday aresscay imhay; ethay ep-motherstay orldway,
osay onglay uel—forbidding—nowcray ewthray affectionateay armsay oundray ishay ubbornstay
ecknay, anday idday eemsay otay oyouslyjay obsay overay imhay, asay ifay overay oneay, atthay
oweverhay ilfulway anday erringay, eshay ouldcay etyay indfay itay inay erhay earthay otay avesay
anday otay essblay. Omfray eneathbay ishay ouchedslay athay Ahabay oppeddray aay eartay intoay
ethay easay; ornay idday allay ethay Acificpay ontaincay uchsay ealthway asay atthay oneay eeway
opdray.

Arbuckstay awsay ethay olday anmay; awsay imhay, owhay ehay eavilyhay eanedlay overay ethay idesay;
anday ehay eemedsay otay earhay inay ishay ownay uetray earthay ethay easurelessmay obbingsay
atthay olestay outay ofay ethay entrecay ofay ethay erenitysay arounday. Arefulcay otnay otay
ouchtay imhay, oray ebay oticednay byay imhay, ehay etyay ewdray earnay otay imhay, anday oodstay
erethay.

Ahabay urnedtay.

arbuck!”“Stay

ir.”“Say

Oh“ay, Arbuckstay! itay isay aay ildmay, ildmay indway, anday aay ildmay ookinglay skyay. Onay uchsay
aay ay—veryday uchmay uchsay aay eetnesssway asay is—Ithay uckstray myay irstfay ale—awhay
oy-harpooneerbay ofay eighteenay! Orty—forty—fortyfay earsyay ago!—agoay! Ortyfay
earsyay ofay ontinualcay alingwhay! ortyfay earsyay ofay ivationpray, anday erilpay, anday
orm-timestay! ortyfay earsyay onay ethay itilesspay easay! orfay ortyfay earsyay ashay Ahabay
orsakenfay ethay eacefulpay andlay, orfay ortyfay earsyay otay akemay arway onay ethay orrorshay
ofay ethay eepday! Ayeay anday esyay, Arbuckstay, outay ofay osethay ortyfay earsyay Iay avehay otnay
entspay eethray ashoreay. Enwhay Iay inkthay ofay isthay ifelay Iay avehay edlay; ethay
esolationday ofay olitudesay itay ashay eenbay; ethay asonedmay, alled-townway ofay aay
Aptain’scay exclusivenessay, ichwhay admitsay utbay allsmay entranceay otay anyay
athysympay omfray ethay eengray ountrycay ithout—ohway, earinessway! eavinesshay!
Uinea-coastgay averyslay ofay olitarysay ommand!—whencay Iay inkthay ofay allay isthay;
onlyay alf-suspectedhay, otnay osay eenlykay ownknay otay emay efore—andbay owhay orfay ortyfay
earsyay Iay avehay edfay uponay dryay altedsay are—fitfay emblemay ofay ethay dryay ourishmentnay
ofay myay oil!—whensay ethay oorestpay andsmanlay ashay adhay eshfray uitfray otay ishay ailyday
andhay, anday okenbray ethay orld’sway eshfray eadbray otay myay ouldymay usts—awaycray,
olewhay oceansay awayay, omfray atthay oungyay irl-wifegay Iay eddedway astpay iftyfay, anday
ailedsay orfay Apecay Ornhay ethay extnay ayday, eavinglay utbay oneay entday inay myay arriagemay
illow—wifepay? ife?—ratherway aay idowway ithway erhay usbandhay aliveay! Ayeay, Iay
idowedway atthay oorpay irlgay enwhay Iay arriedmay erhay, Arbuckstay; anday enthay, ethay
adnessmay, ethay enzyfray, ethay oilingbay oodblay anday ethay okingsmay owbray, ithway
ichwhay, orfay aay ousandthay oweringslay olday Ahabay ashay uriouslyfay, oaminglyfay
asedchay ishay ey—morepray aay emonday anthay aay an!—ayemay, ayeay! atwhay aay ortyfay ears’yay
ool—fool—oldfay oolfay, ashay olday Ahabay eenbay! Whyay isthay ifestray ofay ethay asechay?
whyay earyway, anday alsypay ethay armay atay ethay oaray, anday ethay ironay, anday ethay ancelay?
owhay ethay icherray oray etterbay isay Ahabay ownay? Eholdbay. Ohay, Arbuckstay! isay itay otnay
ardhay, atthay ithway isthay earyway oadlay Iay earbay, oneay oorpay eglay ouldshay avehay eenbay
atchedsnay omfray underay emay? Erehay, ushbray isthay olday airhay asideay; itay indsblay emay,
atthay Iay eemsay otay eepway. Ockslay osay eygray idday evernay owgray utbay omfray outay omesay
ashesay! Utbay oday Iay ooklay eryvay olday, osay eryvay, eryvay olday, Arbuckstay? Iay eelfay
eadlyday aintfay, owedbay, anday umpedhay, asay oughthay Iay ereway Adamay, aggeringstay
eneathbay ethay iledpay enturiescay incesay Aradisepay. Odgay! Odgay! Od!—crackgay myay
eart!—stavehay myay ain!—mockerybray! ockerymay! itterbay, itingbay ockerymay ofay eygray
airshay, avehay Iay ivedlay enoughay oyjay otay earway eyay; anday eemsay anday eelfay usthay
intolerablyay olday? Oseclay! andstay oseclay otay emay, Arbuckstay; etlay emay ooklay intoay aay
umanhay eyeay; itay isay etterbay anthay otay azegay intoay easay oray skyay; etterbay anthay otay
azegay uponay Odgay. Byay ethay eengray andlay; byay ethay ightbray earth-stonehay! isthay isay
ethay agicmay assglay, anmay; Iay eesay myay ifeway anday myay ildchay inay inethay eyeay. Onay, onay;
aystay onay oardbay, onay oard!—lowerbay otnay enwhay Iay oday; enwhay andedbray Ahabay ivesgay
asechay otay Obymay Ickday. Atthay azardhay allshay otnay ebay inethay. Onay, onay! otnay ithway
ethay arfay awayay omehay Iay eesay inay atthay eye!”ay

Oh“ay, myay Aptaincay! myay Aptaincay! oblenay oulsay! andgray olday earthay, afteray allay!
whyay ouldshay anyay oneay ivegay asechay otay atthay atedhay ishfay! Awayay ithway emay! etlay usay
flyay esethay eadlyday atersway! etlay usay omehay! Ifeway anday ildchay, ootay, areay
Arbuck’s—wifestay anday ildchay ofay ishay otherlybray, isterlysay, ay-fellowplay
outhyay; evenay asay inethay, irsay, areay ethay ifeway anday ildchay ofay thyay ovinglay,
onginglay, aternalpay olday ageay! Awayay! etlay usay away!—thisay instantay etlay emay alteray
ethay oursecay! Owhay eerilychay, owhay ilariouslyhay, Oay myay Aptaincay, ouldway eway owlbay
onay ouray ayway otay eesay olday Antucketnay againay! Iay inkthay, irsay, eythay avehay omesay
uchsay ildmay ueblay aysday, evenay asay isthay, inay Antucket.”nay

ey“Thay avehay, eythay avehay. Iay avehay eensay em—somethay ummersay aysday inay ethay
orningmay. Aboutay isthay ime—yestay, itay isay ishay oonnay apnay ow—thenay oybay
ivaciouslyvay akesway; itssay upay inay edbay; anday ishay othermay ellstay imhay ofay emay, ofay
annibalcay olday emay; owhay Iay amay abroaday uponay ethay eepday, utbay illway etyay omecay ackbay
otay anceday imhay again.”ay

is“’Tay myay Arymay, myay Arymay erselfhay! Eshay omisedpray atthay myay oybay, everyay
orningmay, ouldshay ebay arriedcay otay ethay illhay otay atchcay ethay irstfay impseglay ofay
ishay ather’sfay ailsay! Esyay, esyay! onay oremay! itay isay oneday! eway eadhay orfay
Antucketnay! Omecay, myay Aptaincay, udystay outay ethay oursecay, anday etlay usay awayay!
Eesay, eesay! ethay oy’sbay acefay omfray ethay indowway! ethay oy’sbay andhay onay ethay ill!”hay

Utbay Ahab’say anceglay asway averteday; ikelay aay ightedblay uitfray eetray ehay ookshay, anday
astcay ishay astlay, inderedcay appleay otay ethay oilsay.

at“Whay isay itay, atwhay amelessnay, inscrutableay, unearthlyay ingthay isay itay; atwhay
ozeningcay, iddenhay ordlay anday astermay, anday uelcray, emorselessray emperoray
ommandscay emay; atthay againstay allay aturalnay ovingslay anday ongingslay, Iay osay eepkay
ushingpay, anday owdingcray, anday ammingjay elfmysay onay allay ethay imetay; ecklesslyray
akingmay emay eadyray otay oday atwhay inay myay ownay operpray, aturalnay earthay, Iay urstday otnay
osay uchmay asay areday? Isay Ahabay, Ahabay? Isay itay Iay, Odgay, oray owhay, atthay iftslay isthay
armay? Utbay ifay ethay eatgray unsay ovemay otnay ofay imselfhay; utbay isay asay anay errand-boyay
inay eavenhay; ornay oneay inglesay arstay ancay evolveray, utbay byay omesay invisibleay
owerpay; owhay enthay ancay isthay oneay allsmay earthay eatbay; isthay oneay allsmay ainbray
inkthay oughtsthay; unlessay Odgay oesday atthay eatingbay, oesday atthay inkingthay, oesday
atthay ivinglay, anday otnay Iay. Byay eavenhay, anmay, eway areay urnedtay oundray anday oundray
inay isthay orldway, ikelay onderyay indlassway, anday Atefay isay ethay andspikehay. Anday allay
ethay imetay, olay! atthay ilingsmay skyay, anday isthay unsoundeday easay! Ooklay! eesay onyay
Albicoreay! owhay utpay itay intoay imhay otay asechay anday angfay atthay ing-fishflyay? Erewhay
oday urderersmay ogay, anmay! O’swhay otay oomday, enwhay ethay udgejay imselfhay isay aggeddray
otay ethay arbay? Utbay itay isay aay ildmay, ildmay indway, anday aay ildmay ookinglay skyay; anday
ethay airay ellssmay ownay, asay ifay itay ewblay omfray aay ar-awayfay eadowmay; eythay avehay
eenbay akingmay ayhay omewheresay underay ethay opesslay ofay ethay Andesay, Arbuckstay, anday
ethay owersmay areay eepingslay amongay ethay ew-mownnay ayhay. Eepingslay? Ayeay, oiltay eway
owhay eway aymay, eway allay eepslay atay astlay onay ethay ieldfay. Eepslay? Ayeay, anday ustray
amiday eennessgray; asay astlay ear’syay esscythay ungflay ownday, anday eftlay inay ethay
alf-cuthay aths—Starbuck!”sway

Utbay anchedblay otay aay orpse’scay uehay ithway espairday, ethay Atemay adhay olenstay awayay.

Ahabay ossedcray ethay eckday otay azegay overay onay ethay otheray idesay; utbay artedstay atay
otway eflectedray, ixedfay eyesay inay ethay aterway erethay. Edallahfay asway otionlesslymay
eaninglay overay ethay amesay ailray.


APTERcHay 133ay. Ethay Ase—Firstchay Ayday.

Atthay ightnay, inay ethay id-watchmay, enwhay ethay olday an—asmay ishay ontway atay
intervals—steppeday orthfay omfray ethay uttlescay inay ichwhay ehay eanedlay, anday entway
otay ishay ivot-holepay, ehay uddenlysay ustthray outay ishay acefay iercelyfay, uffingsnay
upay ethay easay airay asay aay agacioussay ip’sshay ogday illway, inay awingdray ighnay otay omesay
arbarousbay isleay. Ehay eclaredday atthay aay alewhay ustmay ebay earnay. Oonsay atthay
eculiarpay odoray, ometimessay otay aay eatgray istanceday ivengay orthfay byay ethay ivinglay
ermspay alewhay, asway alpablepay otay allay ethay atchway; ornay asway anyay arinermay
urprisedsay enwhay, afteray inspectingay ethay ompasscay, anday enthay ethay og-vaneday,
anday enthay ascertainingay ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay odoray asay earlynay asay
ossiblepay, Ahabay apidlyray ordereday ethay ip’sshay oursecay otay ebay ightlyslay
altereday, anday ethay ailsay otay ebay ortenedshay.

Ethay acuteay olicypay ictatingday esethay ovementsmay asway ufficientlysay indicatedvay
atay aybreakday, byay ethay ightsay ofay aay onglay eekslay onay ethay easay irectlyday anday
engthwiselay aheaday, oothsmay asay oilay, anday esemblingray inay ethay eatedplay ateryway
inkleswray orderingbay itay, ethay olishedpay etallic-likemay arksmay ofay omesay iftsway
ide-riptay, atay ethay outhmay ofay aay eepday, apidray eamstray.

an“May ethay ast-headsmay! Allcay allay ands!”hay

Underingthay ithway ethay uttsbay ofay eethray ubbedclay andspikeshay onay ethay orecastlefay
eckday, Aggooday ousedray ethay eepersslay ithway uchsay udgmentjay apsclay atthay eythay
eemedsay otay exhaleay omfray ethay uttlescay, osay instantaneouslyay idday eythay appearay
ithway eirthay othesclay inay eirthay andshay.

at“Whay ed’yay ee?”say iedcray Ahabay, atteningflay ishay acefay otay ethay skyay.

othing“Nay, othingnay ir!”say asway ethay oundsay ailinghay ownday inay eplyray.

allant“T’gay ails!—stunsailssay! aloway anday aloftay, anday onay othbay ides!”say

Allay ailsay eingbay etsay, ehay ownay astcay ooselay ethay ife-linelay, eservedray orfay
ayingsway imhay otay ethay ainmay oyal-mastray eadhay; anday inay aay ewfay omentsmay eythay ereway
oistinghay imhay itherthay, enwhay, ilewhay utbay otway irdsthay ofay ethay ayway aloftay, anday
ilewhay eeringpay aheaday oughthray ethay orizontalhay acancyvay etweenbay ethay
ain-top-sailmay anday op-gallant-sailtay, ehay aisedray aay ull-likegay cryay inay ethay
airay. ere“Thay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay owsblay! Aay umphay ikelay aay ow-hillsnay! Itay isay
Obymay Ick!”day

Iredfay byay ethay cryay ichwhay eemedsay imultaneouslysay akentay upay byay ethay eethray
ook-outslay, ethay enmay onay eckday ushedray otay ethay iggingray otay eholdbay ethay amousfay
alewhay eythay adhay osay onglay eenbay ursuingpay. Ahabay adhay ownay ainedgay ishay inalfay
erchpay, omesay eetfay aboveay ethay otheray ook-outslay, Ashtegotay andingstay ustjay
eneathbay imhay onay ethay apcay ofay ethay op-gallant-masttay, osay atthay ethay Indian’say
eadhay asway almostay onay aay evellay ithway Ahab’say eelhay. Omfray isthay eighthay ethay alewhay
asway ownay eensay omesay ilemay oray osay aheaday, atay everyay ollray ofay ethay easay evealingray
ishay ighhay arklingspay umphay, anday egularlyray ettingjay ishay ilentsay outspay intoay
ethay airay. Otay ethay edulouscray arinersmay itay eemedsay ethay amesay ilentsay outspay eythay
adhay osay onglay agoay eheldbay inay ethay oonlitmay Atlanticay anday Indianay Oceansay.

And“ay idday onenay ofay eyay eesay itay efore?”bay iedcray Ahabay, ailinghay ethay erchedpay enmay
allay arounday imhay.

I“ay awsay imhay almostay atthay amesay instantay, irsay, atthay Aptaincay Ahabay idday, anday Iay
iedcray out,”ay aidsay Ashtegotay.

ot“Nay ethay amesay instantay; otnay ethay ame—nosay, ethay oubloonday isay inemay, Atefay
eservedray ethay oubloonday orfay emay. I__ay onlyay; onenay ofay eyay ouldcay avehay aisedray
ethay Itewhay Alewhay irstfay. Erethay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay
owsblay! Erethay again!—thereay again!”ay ehay iedcray, inay ong-drawnlay, ingeringlay,
ethodicmay onestay, attuneday otay ethay adualgray olongingspray ofay ethay ale’swhay
isiblevay etsjay. e’s“Hay oinggay otay oundsay! Inay unsailsstay! Ownday
op-gallant-sailstay! Andstay byay eethray oatsbay. Mray. Arbuckstay, ememberray, aystay
onay oardbay, anday eepkay ethay ipshay. Elmhay erethay! Ufflay, ufflay aay ointpay! Osay;
eadystay, anmay, eadystay! Erethay ogay ukesflay! Onay, onay; onlyay ackblay aterway! Allay
eadyray ethay oatsbay erethay? Andstay byay, andstay byay! Owerlay emay, Mray. Arbuckstay;
owerlay, ower,—quicklay, uicker!”qay anday ehay idslay oughthray ethay airay otay ethay eckday.

e“Hay isay eadinghay aightstray otay eewardlay, ir,”say iedcray Ubbstay, ight“ray awayay omfray
usay; annotcay avehay eensay ethay ipshay et.”yay

e“Bay umbday, anmay! Andstay byay ethay acesbray! Ardhay ownday ethay elm!—bracehay upay!
Ivershay er!—shiverhay er!—Sohay; ellway atthay! Oatsbay, oats!”bay

Oonsay allay ethay oatsbay utbay Arbuck’sstay ereway oppeddray; allay ethay oat-sailsbay
et—allsay ethay addlespay ingplyay; ithway ipplingray iftnesssway, ootingshay otay
eewardlay; anday Ahabay eadinghay ethay onsetay. Aay alepay, eath-glimmerday itlay upay
Edallah’sfay unkensay eyesay; aay ideoushay otionmay awedgnay ishay outhmay.

Ikelay oiselessnay autilusnay ellsshay, eirthay ightlay owspray edspay oughthray ethay easay;
utbay onlyay owlyslay eythay earednay ethay oefay. Asay eythay earednay imhay, ethay oceanay ewgray
illstay oremay oothsmay; eemedsay awingdray aay arpetcay overay itsay avesway; eemedsay aay
oon-meadownay, osay erenelysay itay eadspray. Atay engthlay ethay eathlessbray unterhay
amecay osay ighnay ishay eeminglysay unsuspectingay eypray, atthay ishay entireay azzlingday
umphay asway istinctlyday isiblevay, idingslay alongay ethay easay asay ifay anay isolateday
ingthay, anday ontinuallycay etsay inay aay evolvingray ingray ofay inestfay, eecyflay,
eenishgray oamfay. Ehay awsay ethay astvay, involveday inkleswray ofay ethay ightlyslay
ojectingpray eadhay eyondbay. Eforebay itay, arfay outay onay ethay oftsay Urkish-ruggedtay
atersway, entway ethay isteningglay itewhay adowshay omfray ishay oadbray, ilkymay
oreheadfay, aay usicalmay ipplingray ayfullyplay accompanyingay ethay adeshay; anday
ehindbay, ethay ueblay atersway interchangeablyay owedflay overay intoay ethay ovingmay
alleyvay ofay ishay eadystay akeway; anday onay eitheray andhay ightbray ubblesbay aroseay anday
ancedday byay ishay idesay. Utbay esethay ereway okenbray againay byay ethay ightlay oestay ofay
undredshay ofay aygay owlfay oftlysay eatheringfay ethay easay, alternateay ithway eirthay
itfulfay ightflay; anday ikelay otay omesay ag-staffflay isingray omfray ethay aintedpay ullhay
ofay anay argosyay, ethay alltay utbay atteredshay olepay ofay aay ecentray ancelay ojectedpray
omfray ethay itewhay ale’swhay ackbay; anday atay intervalsay oneay ofay ethay oudclay ofay
oft-toedsay owlsfay overinghay, anday otay anday ofray immingskay ikelay aay anopycay overay
ethay ishfay, ilentlysay erchedpay anday ockedray onay isthay olepay, ethay onglay ailtay
eathersfay eamingstray ikelay ennonspay.

Aay entlegay oyousness—ajay ightymay ildnessmay ofay eposeray inay iftnesssway, investeday
ethay idingglay alewhay. Otnay ethay itewhay ullbay Upiterjay immingsway awayay ithway
avishedray Europaay ingingclay otay ishay acefulgray ornshay; ishay ovelylay, eeringlay
eyesay idewayssay intentay uponay ethay aidmay; ithway oothsmay ewitchingbay eetnessflay,
ipplingray aightstray orfay ethay uptialnay owerbay inay Etecray; otnay Ovejay, otnay atthay
eatgray ajestymay Upremesay! idday urpasssay ethay orifiedglay Itewhay Alewhay asay ehay osay
ivinelyday amsway.

Onay eachay oftsay ide—coincidentsay ithway ethay artedpay ellsway, atthay utbay onceay
eavinglay imhay, enthay owedflay osay ideway away—onay eachay ightbray idesay, ethay alewhay
edshay offay enticingsay. Onay onderway erethay adhay eenbay omesay amongay ethay untershay owhay
amelesslynay ansportedtray anday allureday byay allay isthay erenitysay, adhay enturedvay
otay assailay itay; utbay adhay atallyfay oundfay atthay uietudeqay utbay ethay esturevay ofay
ornadoestay. Etyay almcay, enticingay almcay, ohay, alewhay! outhay idestglay onay, otay allay
owhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eyeay eethay, onay attermay owhay anymay inay atthay amesay ayway
outhay ay’stmay avehay ejuggledbay anday estroyedday eforebay.

Anday usthay, oughthray ethay erenesay anquillitiestray ofay ethay opicaltray easay, amongay
avesway osewhay and-clappingshay ereway uspendedsay byay exceedingay aptureray, Obymay
Ickday ovedmay onay, illstay ithholdingway omfray ightsay ethay ullfay errorstay ofay ishay
ubmergedsay unktray, entirelyay idinghay ethay enchedwray ideousnesshay ofay ishay awjay.
Utbay oonsay ethay orefay artpay ofay imhay owlyslay oseray omfray ethay aterway; orfay anay
instantay ishay olewhay arbleizedmay odybay ormedfay aay ighhay archay, ikelay Irginia’svay
Aturalnay Idgebray, anday arninglyway avingway ishay anneredbay ukesflay inay ethay airay,
ethay andgray odgay evealedray imselfhay, oundedsay, anday entway outay ofay ightsay.
Overinglyhay altinghay, anday ippingday onay ethay ingway, ethay itewhay ea-fowlssay
onginglylay ingeredlay overay ethay agitateday oolpay atthay ehay eftlay.

Ithway oarsay apeakay, anday addlespay ownday, ethay eetsshay ofay eirthay ailssay adriftay,
ethay eethray oatsbay ownay illystay oatedflay, awaitingay Obymay Ick’sday eappearanceray.

An“ay our,”hay aidsay Ahabay, andingstay ootedray inay ishay oat’sbay ernstay; anday ehay azedgay
eyondbay ethay ale’swhay aceplay, owardstay ethay imday ueblay acesspay anday ideway ooingway
acanciesvay otay eewardlay. Itay asway onlyay anay instantay; orfay againay ishay eyesay eemedsay
irlingwhay oundray inay ishay eadhay asay ehay eptsway ethay ateryway irclecay. Ethay eezebray
ownay eshenedfray; ethay easay eganbay otay ellsway.

e“Thay irds!—thebay irds!”bay iedcray Ashtegotay.

Inay onglay Indianay ilefay, asay enwhay eronshay aketay ingway, ethay itewhay irdsbay ereway ownay
allay ingflyay owardstay Ahab’say oatbay; anday enwhay ithinway aay ewfay ardsyay eganbay
utteringflay overay ethay aterway erethay, eelingwhay oundray anday oundray, ithway oyousjay,
expectantay iescray. Eirthay isionvay asway eenerkay anthay an’smay; Ahabay ouldcay
iscoverday onay ignsay inay ethay easay. Utbay uddenlysay asay ehay eeredpay ownday anday ownday
intoay itsay epthsday, ehay ofoundlypray awsay aay itewhay ivinglay otspay onay iggerbay anthay aay
itewhay easelway, ithway onderfulway eleritycay uprisingay, anday agnifyingmay asay itay
oseray, illtay itay urnedtay, anday enthay erethay ereway ainlyplay evealedray otway onglay
ookedcray owsray ofay itewhay, isteningglay eethtay, oatingflay upay omfray ethay
undiscoverableay ottombay. Itay asway Obymay Ick’sday openay outhmay anday olledscray awjay;
ishay astvay, adowedshay ulkbay illstay alfhay endingblay ithway ethay ueblay ofay ethay easay.
Ethay itteringglay outhmay awnedyay eneathbay ethay oatbay ikelay anay open-dooreday arblemay
ombtay; anday ivinggay oneay idelongsay eepsway ithway ishay eeringstay oaray, Ahabay irledwhay
ethay aftcray asideay omfray isthay emendoustray apparitionay. Enthay, allingcay uponay
Edallahfay otay angechay acesplay ithway imhay, entway orwardfay otay ethay owsbay, anday
eizingsay Erth’spay arpoonhay, ommandedcay ishay ewcray otay aspgray eirthay oarsay anday
andstay byay otay ernstay.

Ownay, byay easonray ofay isthay imelytay inningspay oundray ethay oatbay uponay itsay axisay,
itsay owbay, byay anticipationay, asway ademay otay acefay ethay ale’swhay eadhay ilewhay etyay
underay aterway. Utbay asay ifay erceivingpay isthay atagemstray, Obymay Ickday, ithway atthay
aliciousmay intelligenceay ascribeday otay imhay, idelinglysay ansplantedtray
imselfhay, asay itay ereway, inay anay instantay, ootingshay ishay eatedplay eadhay
engthwiselay eneathbay ethay oatbay.

Oughthray anday oughthray; oughthray everyay ankplay anday eachay ibray, itay illedthray orfay
anay instantay, ethay alewhay obliquelyay inglyay onay ishay ackbay, inay ethay annermay ofay aay
itingbay arkshay, owlyslay anday eelinglyfay akingtay itsay owsbay ullfay ithinway ishay
outhmay, osay atthay ethay onglay, arrownay, olledscray owerlay awjay urledcay ighhay upay intoay
ethay openay airay, anday oneay ofay ethay eethtay aughtcay inay aay ow-lockray. Ethay uishblay
earl-whitepay ofay ethay insideay ofay ethay awjay asway ithinway ixsay inchesay ofay Ahab’say
eadhay, anday eachedray igherhay anthay atthay. Inay isthay attitudeay ethay Itewhay Alewhay
ownay ookshay ethay ightslay edarcay asay aay ildlymay uelcray atcay erhay ousemay. Ithway
unastonisheday eyesay Edallahfay azedgay, anday ossedcray ishay armsay; utbay ethay
iger-yellowtay ewcray ereway umblingtay overay eachay other’say eadshay otay aingay ethay
uttermostay ernstay.

Anday ownay, ilewhay othbay elasticay unwalesgay ereway ingingspray inay anday outay, asay ethay
alewhay alliedday ithway ethay oomedday aftcray inay isthay evilishday ayway; anday omfray ishay
odybay eingbay ubmergedsay eneathbay ethay oatbay, ehay ouldcay otnay ebay artedday atay omfray
ethay owsbay, orfay ethay owsbay ereway almostay insideay ofay imhay, asay itay ereway; anday ilewhay
ethay otheray oatsbay involuntarilyay ausedpay, asay eforebay aay uickqay isiscray
impossibleay otay ithstandway, enthay itay asway atthay onomaniacmay Ahabay, uriousfay ithway
isthay antalizingtay icinityvay ofay ishay oefay, ichwhay acedplay imhay allay aliveay anday
elplesshay inay ethay eryvay awsjay ehay atedhay; enziedfray ithway allay isthay, ehay eizedsay
ethay onglay onebay ithway ishay akednay andshay, anday ildlyway ovestray otay enchwray itay omfray
itsay ipegray. Asay ownay ehay usthay ainlyvay ovestray, ethay awjay ippedslay omfray imhay; ethay
ailfray unwalesgay entbay inay, ollapsedcay, anday appedsnay, asay othbay awsjay, ikelay anay
enormousay earsshay, idingslay urtherfay aftay, itbay ethay aftcray ompletelycay inay
aintway, anday ockedlay emselvesthay astfay againay inay ethay easay, idwaymay etweenbay ethay
otway oatingflay eckswray. Esethay oatedflay asideay, ethay okenbray endsay oopingdray, ethay
ewcray atay ethay ern-wreckstay ingingclay otay ethay unwalesgay, anday ivingstray otay oldhay
astfay otay ethay oarsay otay ashlay emthay acrossay.

Atay atthay eludingpray omentmay, ereay ethay oatbay asway etyay appedsnay, Ahabay, ethay irstfay
otay erceivepay ethay ale’swhay intentay, byay ethay aftycray upraisingay ofay ishay eadhay, aay
ovementmay atthay oosedlay ishay oldhay orfay ethay imetay; atay atthay omentmay ishay andhay adhay
ademay oneay inalfay effortay otay ushpay ethay oatbay outay ofay ethay itebay. Utbay onlyay
ippingslay urtherfay intoay ethay ale’swhay outhmay, anday iltingtay overay idewayssay asay
itay ippedslay, ethay oatbay adhay akenshay offay ishay oldhay onay ethay awjay; illedspay imhay
outay ofay itay, asay ehay eanedlay otay ethay ushpay; anday osay ehay ellfay at-facedflay uponay ethay
easay.

Ipplinglyray ithdrawingway omfray ishay eypray, Obymay Ickday ownay aylay atay aay ittlelay
istanceday, erticallyvay ustingthray ishay oblongay itewhay eadhay upay anday ownday inay ethay
illowsbay; anday atay ethay amesay imetay owlyslay evolvingray ishay olewhay indledspay odybay;
osay atthay enwhay ishay astvay inkledwray oreheadfay ose—someray entytway oray oremay eetfay
outay ofay ethay ater—theway ownay isingray ellssway, ithway allay eirthay onfluentcay avesway,
azzlinglyday okebray againstay itay; indictivelyvay ossingtay eirthay iveredshay ayspray
illstay igherhay intoay ethay air.*ay Osay, inay aay alegay, ethay utbay alfhay affledbay Annelchay
illowsbay onlyay ecoilray omfray ethay asebay ofay ethay Eddystoneay, iumphantlytray otay
overleapay itsay ummitsay ithway eirthay udscay.

is*Thay otionmay isay eculiarpay otay ethay ermspay alewhay. Itay eceivesray itsay
esignationday itchpoling(pay) omfray itsay eingbay ikenedlay otay atthay eliminarypray
up-and-downay oisepay ofay ethay ale-lancewhay, inay ethay exerciseay alledcay
itchpolingpay, eviouslypray escribedday. Byay isthay otionmay ethay alewhay ustmay estbay
anday ostmay omprehensivelycay iewvay ateverwhay objectsay aymay ebay encirclingay imhay.

Utbay oonsay esumingray ishay orizontalhay attitudeay, Obymay Ickday amsway iftlysway oundray
anday oundray ethay eckedwray ewcray; idewayssay urningchay ethay aterway inay ishay engefulvay
akeway, asay ifay ashinglay imselfhay upay otay illstay anotheray anday oremay eadlyday
assaultay. Ethay ightsay ofay ethay interedsplay oatbay eemedsay otay addenmay imhay, asay ethay
oodblay ofay apesgray anday ulberriesmay astcay eforebay Antiochus’say elephantsay inay ethay
ookbay ofay Accabeesmay. Eanwhilemay Ahabay alfhay otheredsmay inay ethay oamfay ofay ethay
ale’swhay insolentay ailtay, anday ootay uchmay ofay aay ipplecray otay im,—thoughsway ehay
ouldcay illstay eepkay afloatay, evenay inay ethay earthay ofay uchsay aay irlpoolwhay asay atthay;
elplesshay Ahab’say eadhay asway eensay, ikelay aay ossedtay ubblebay ichwhay ethay eastlay
ancechay ockshay ightmay urstbay. Omfray ethay oat’sbay agmentaryfray ernstay, Edallahfay
incuriouslyay anday ildlymay eyeday imhay; ethay ingingclay ewcray, atay ethay otheray
iftingdray enday, ouldcay otnay uccorsay imhay; oremay anthay enoughay asway itay orfay emthay otay
ooklay otay emselvesthay. Orfay osay evolvinglyray appallingay asway ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay
aspectay, anday osay anetarilyplay iftsway ethay ever-contractingay irclescay ehay ademay,
atthay ehay eemedsay orizontallyhay oopingsway uponay emthay. Anday oughthay ethay otheray
oatsbay, unharmeday, illstay overedhay ardhay byay; illstay eythay aredday otnay ullpay intoay
ethay eddyay otay ikestray, estlay atthay ouldshay ebay ethay ignalsay orfay ethay instantay
estructionday ofay ethay eopardizedjay astawayscay, Ahabay anday allay; ornay inay atthay
asecay ouldcay eythay emselvesthay opehay otay escapeay. Ithway ainingstray eyesay, enthay,
eythay emainedray onay ethay outeray edgeay ofay ethay irefulday onezay, osewhay entrecay adhay
ownay ecomebay ethay olday an’smay eadhay.

Eantimemay, omfray ethay eginningbay allay isthay adhay eenbay escriedday omfray ethay ip’sshay
astmay eadshay; anday uaringsqay erhay ardsyay, eshay adhay ornebay ownday uponay ethay enescay;
anday asway ownay osay ighnay, atthay Ahabay inay ethay aterway ailedhay er!—“Sailhay onay
e”—butthay atthay omentmay aay eakingbray easay ashedday onay imhay omfray Obymay Ickday, anday
elmedwhay imhay orfay ethay imetay. Utbay ugglingstray outay ofay itay againay, anday ancingchay
otay iseray onay aay oweringtay estcray, ehay outed,—“Sailshay onay ethay ale!—Drivewhay imhay
off!”ay

Ethay Equod’spay owspray ereway ointedpay; anday eakingbray upay ethay armedchay irclecay,
eshay effectuallyay artedpay ethay itewhay alewhay omfray ishay ictimvay. Asay ehay ullenlysay
amsway offay, ethay oatsbay ewflay otay ethay escueray.

Aggeddray intoay Ubb’sstay oatbay ithway ood-shotblay, indedblay eyesay, ethay itewhay
inebray akingcay inay ishay inkleswray; ethay onglay ensiontay ofay Ahab’say odilybay
engthstray idday ackcray, anday elplesslyhay ehay ieldedyay otay ishay ody’sbay oomday: orfay aay
imetay, inglyay allay ushedcray inay ethay ottombay ofay Ubb’sstay oatbay, ikelay oneay oddentray
underay ootfay ofay erdshay ofay elephantsay. Arfay inlanday, amelessnay ailsway amecay omfray
imhay, asay esolateday oundssay omfray outay avinesray.

Utbay isthay intensityay ofay ishay icalphysay ostrationpray idday utbay osay uchmay ethay oremay
abbreviateay itay. Inay anay instant’say ompasscay, eatgray eartshay ometimessay ondensecay
otay oneay eepday angpay, ethay umsay otaltay ofay osethay allowshay ainspay indlykay iffusedday
oughthray eeblerfay en’smay olewhay iveslay. Anday osay, uchsay eartshay, oughthay ummarysay
inay eachay oneay ufferingsay; illstay, ifay ethay odsgay ecreeday itay, inay eirthay ife-timelay
aggregateay aay olewhay ageay ofay oeway, ollywhay ademay upay ofay instantaneousay
intensitiesay; orfay evenay inay eirthay ointlesspay entrescay, osethay oblenay aturesnay
ontaincay ethay entireay ircumferencescay ofay inferioray oulssay.

e“Thay arpoon,”hay aidsay Ahabay, alfhay ayway isingray, anday agginglydray eaninglay onay
oneay endedbay arm—“isay itay afe?”say

Aye“ay, irsay, orfay itay asway otnay artedday; isthay isay it,”ay aidsay Ubbstay, owingshay itay.

ay“Lay itay eforebay e;—anymay issingmay en?”may

One“ay, otway, eethray, ourfay, ive;—therefay ereway ivefay oarsay, irsay, anday erehay areay
ivefay en.”may

at’s“Thay ood.—Helpgay emay, anmay; Iay ishway otay andstay. Osay, osay, Iay eesay imhay! erethay!
erethay! oinggay otay eewardlay illstay; atwhay aay eapinglay out!—Handsspay offay omfray emay!
Ethay eternalay apsay unsray upay inay Ahab’say onesbay againay! Etsay ethay ailsay; outay oarsay;
ethay elm!”hay

Itay isay oftenay ethay asecay atthay enwhay aay oatbay isay ovestay, itsay ewcray, eingbay ickedpay
upay byay anotheray oatbay, elphay otay orkway atthay econdsay oatbay; anday ethay asechay isay
usthay ontinuedcay ithway atwhay isay alledcay ouble-bankedday oarsay. Itay asway usthay ownay.
Utbay ethay addeday owerpay ofay ethay oatbay idday otnay equalay ethay addeday owerpay ofay ethay
alewhay, orfay ehay eemedsay otay avehay eble-bankedtray ishay everyay infay; immingsway ithway
aay elocityvay ichwhay ainlyplay owedshay, atthay ifay ownay, underay esethay
ircumstancescay, ushedpay onay, ethay asechay ouldway ovepray anay indefinitelyay
olongedpray, ifay otnay aay opelesshay oneay; ornay ouldcay anyay ewcray endureay orfay osay onglay
aay eriodpay, uchsay anay unintermitteday, intenseay ainingstray atay ethay oaray; aay ingthay
arelybay olerabletay onlyay inay omesay oneay iefbray icissitudevay. Ethay ipshay itselfay,
enthay, asay itay ometimessay appenshay, offereday ethay ostmay omisingpray intermediateay
eansmay ofay overtakingay ethay asechay. Accordinglyay, ethay oatsbay ownay ademay orfay erhay,
anday ereway oonsay ayedsway upay otay eirthay anes—thecray otway artspay ofay ethay eckedwray
oatbay avinghay eenbay eviouslypray ecuredsay byay er—andhay enthay oistinghay everythingay
otay erhay idesay, anday ackingstay erhay anvascay ighhay upay, anday idewayssay
outstretchingay itay ithway un-sailsstay, ikelay ethay ouble-jointedday ingsway ofay anay
albatrossay; ethay Equodpay orebay ownday inay ethay eewardlay akeway ofay Oby-Dickmay. Atay
ethay ellway ownknay, ethodicmay intervalsay, ethay ale’swhay itteringglay outspay asway
egularlyray announceday omfray ethay annedmay ast-headsmay; anday enwhay ehay ouldway ebay
eportedray asay ustjay onegay ownday, Ahabay ouldway aketay ethay imetay, anday enthay acingpay
ethay eckday, innacle-watchbay inay andhay, osay oonsay asay ethay astlay econdsay ofay ethay
allotteday ourhay expireday, ishay oicevay asway eard.—“Whosehay isay ethay oubloonday ownay?
Ed’yay eesay im?”hay anday ifay ethay eplyray asway, Onay, irsay! aightwaystray ehay ommandedcay
emthay otay iftlay imhay otay ishay erchpay. Inay isthay ayway ethay ayday oreway onay; Ahabay, ownay
aloftay anday otionlessmay; anonay, unrestinglyay acingpay ethay anksplay.

Asay ehay asway usthay alkingway, utteringay onay oundsay, exceptay otay ailhay ethay enmay
aloftay, oray otay idbay emthay oisthay aay ailsay illstay igherhay, oray otay eadspray oneay otay aay
illstay eatergray eadth—thusbray otay anday ofray acingpay, eneathbay ishay ouchedslay athay,
atay everyay urntay ehay assedpay ishay ownay eckedwray oatbay, ichwhay adhay eenbay oppeddray
uponay ethay uarter-deckqay, anday aylay erethay eversedray; okenbray owbay otay atteredshay
ernstay. Atay astlay ehay ausedpay eforebay itay; anday asay inay anay alreadyay over-cloudeday
skyay eshfray oopstray ofay oudsclay illway ometimessay ailsay acrossay, osay overay ethay olday
an’smay acefay erethay ownay olestay omesay uchsay addeday oomglay asay isthay.

Ubbstay awsay imhay ausepay; anday erhapspay intendingay, otnay ainlyvay, oughthay, otay
evinceay ishay ownay unabateday ortitudefay, anday usthay eepkay upay aay aliantvay aceplay inay
ishay Aptain’scay indmay, ehay advanceday, anday eyeingay ethay eckwray exclaimed—“Theay
istlethay ethay assay efusedray; itay ickedpray ishay outhmay ootay eenlykay, irsay; ahay! a!”hay

at“Whay oullesssay ingthay isay isthay atthay aughslay eforebay aay eckwray? Anmay, anmay! idday
Iay otnay owknay eethay avebray asay earlessfay irefay and(ay asay echanicalmay) Iay ouldcay
earsway outhay ertway aay oltroonpay. Oangray ornay aughlay ouldshay ebay eardhay eforebay aay
eck.”wray

Aye“ay, ir,”say aidsay Arbuckstay awingdray earnay, is“’tay aay olemnsay ightsay; anay omenay,
anday anay illay one.”ay

Omen“ay? omen?—theay ictionaryday! Ifay ethay odsgay inkthay otay eakspay outrightay otay
anmay, eythay illway onorablyhay eakspay outrightay; otnay akeshay eirthay eadshay, anday
ivegay anay olday ives’way arklingday int.—Begonehay! Eyay otway areay ethay oppositeay olespay
ofay oneay ingthay; Arbuckstay isay Ubbstay eversedray, anday Ubbstay isay Arbuckstay; anday eyay
otway areay allay ankindmay; anday Ahabay andsstay aloneay amongay ethay illionsmay ofay ethay
eopledpay earthay, ornay odsgay ornay enmay ishay eighborsnay! Oldcay, old—Icay iver!—Howshay
ownay? Aloftay erethay! Ed’yay eesay imhay? Ingsay outay orfay everyay outspay, oughthay ehay
outspay entay imestay aay econd!”say

Ethay ayday asway earlynay oneday; onlyay ethay emhay ofay ishay oldengay oberay asway ustlingray.
Oonsay, itay asway almostay arkday, utbay ethay ook-outlay enmay illstay emainedray unsetay.

an’t“Cay eesay ethay outspay ownay, ir;—toosay ark”—criedday aay oicevay omfray ethay airay.

ow“Hay eadinghay enwhay astlay een?”say

As“ay eforebay, ir,—straightsay otay eeward.”lay

ood“Gay! ehay illway aveltray owerslay ownay is’tay ightnay. Ownday oyalsray anday
op-gallanttay un-sailsstay, Mray. Arbuckstay. Eway ustmay otnay unray overay imhay eforebay
orningmay; e’shay akingmay aay assagepay ownay, anday aymay eave-tohay aay ilewhay. Elmhay
erethay! eepkay erhay ullfay eforebay ethay ind!—Aloftway! omecay own!—Mrday. Ubbstay, endsay
aay eshfray andhay otay ethay ore-mastfay eadhay, anday eesay itay annedmay illtay
orning.”—Thenmay advancingay owardstay ethay oubloonday inay ethay ain-mast—“Menmay,
isthay oldgay isay inemay, orfay Iay earneday itay; utbay Iay allshay etlay itay abideay erehay illtay
ethay Itewhay Alewhay isay eadday; anday enthay, osoeverwhay ofay eyay irstfay aisesray imhay,
uponay ethay ayday ehay allshay ebay illedkay, isthay oldgay isay atthay an’smay; anday ifay onay
atthay ayday Iay allshay againay aiseray imhay, enthay, entay imestay itsay umsay allshay ebay
ividedday amongay allay ofay eyay! Awayay ow!—thenay eckday isay inethay, ir!”say

Anday osay ayingsay, ehay acedplay imselfhay alfhay ayway ithinway ethay uttlescay, anday
ouchingslay ishay athay, oodstay erethay illtay awnday, exceptay enwhay atay intervalsay
ousingray imselfhay otay eesay owhay ethay ightnay oreway onay.


APTERcHay 134ay. Ethay Ase—Secondchay Ayday.

Atay ay-breakday, ethay eethray ast-headsmay ereway unctuallypay annedmay afreshay.

e“D’yay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay afteray allowingay aay ittlelay acespay orfay ethay ightlay
otay eadspray.

ee“Say othingnay, ir.”say

urn“Tay upay allay andshay anday akemay ailsay! ehay avelstray asterfay anthay Iay oughtthay
or;—thefay op-gallanttay ails!—ayesay, eythay ouldshay avehay eenbay eptkay onay erhay allay
ightnay. Utbay onay atter—’tismay utbay estingray orfay ethay ush.”ray

Erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay isthay ertinaciouspay ursuitpay ofay oneay articularpay
alewhay, ontinuedcay oughthray ayday intoay ightnay, anday oughthray ightnay intoay ayday, isay
aay ingthay byay onay eansmay unprecedenteday inay ethay Outhsay easay isheryfay. Orfay uchsay isay
ethay onderfulway illskay, esciencepray ofay experienceay, anday invincibleay
onfidencecay acquireday byay omesay eatgray aturalnay eniusesgay amongay ethay Antucketnay
ommanderscay; atthay omfray ethay implesay observationay ofay aay alewhay enwhay astlay
escriedday, eythay illway, underay ertaincay ivengay ircumstancescay, ettypray
accuratelyay oretellfay othbay ethay irectionday inay ichwhay ehay illway ontinuecay otay
imsway orfay aay imetay, ilewhay outay ofay ightsay, asay ellway asay ishay obablepray ateray ofay
ogressionpray uringday atthay eriodpay. Anday, inay esethay asescay, omewhatsay asay aay
ilotpay, enwhay aboutay osinglay ightsay ofay aay oastcay, osewhay eneralgay endingtray ehay
ellway owsknay, anday ichwhay ehay esiresday ortlyshay otay eturnray otay againay, utbay atay
omesay urtherfay ointpay; ikelay asay isthay ilotpay andsstay byay ishay ompasscay, anday akestay
ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay apecay atay esentpray isiblevay, inay orderay ethay oremay
ertainlycay otay ithay arightay ethay emoteray, unseenay eadlandhay, eventuallyay otay ebay
isitedvay: osay oesday ethay ishermanfay, atay ishay ompasscay, ithway ethay alewhay; orfay
afteray eingbay asedchay, anday iligentlyday arkedmay, oughthray everalsay ourshay ofay
aylightday, enthay, enwhay ightnay obscuresay ethay ishfay, ethay eature’scray uturefay
akeway oughthray ethay arknessday isay almostay asay establisheday otay ethay agacioussay
indmay ofay ethay unterhay, asay ethay ilot’spay oastcay isay otay imhay. Osay atthay otay isthay
unter’shay ondrousway illskay, ethay overbialpray evanescenceay ofay aay ingthay itwray inay
aterway, aay akeway, isay otay allay esiredday urposespay ellway ighnay asay eliableray asay ethay
eadfaststay andlay. Anday asay ethay ightymay ironay Eviathanlay ofay ethay odernmay ailwayray
isay osay amiliarlyfay ownknay inay itsay everyay acepay, atthay, ithway atchesway inay eirthay
andshay, enmay imetay ishay ateray asay octorsday atthay ofay aay aby’sbay ulsepay; anday ightlylay
aysay ofay itay, ethay upay aintray oray ethay ownday aintray illway eachray uchsay oray uchsay aay
otspay, atay uchsay oray uchsay anay ourhay; evenay osay, almostay, erethay areay occasionsay
enwhay esethay Antucketersnay imetay atthay otheray Eviathanlay ofay ethay eepday,
accordingay otay ethay observeday umorhay ofay ishay eedspay; anday aysay otay emselvesthay, osay
anymay ourshay encehay isthay alewhay illway avehay onegay otway undredhay ilesmay, illway avehay
aboutay eachedray isthay oray atthay egreeday ofay atitudelay oray ongitudelay. Utbay otay
enderray isthay acutenessay atay allay uccessfulsay inay ethay enday, ethay indway anday ethay
easay ustmay ebay ethay aleman’swhay alliesay; orfay ofay atwhay esentpray availay otay ethay
ecalmedbay oray indboundway arinermay isay ethay illskay atthay assuresay imhay ehay isay
exactlyay inety-threenay eagueslay anday aay uarterqay omfray ishay ortpay? Inferableay
omfray esethay atementsstay, areay anymay ollateralcay ubtilesay attersmay ouchingtay ethay
asechay ofay aleswhay.

Ethay ipshay oretay onay; eavinglay uchsay aay urrowfay inay ethay easay asay enwhay aay
annon-ballcay, issentmay, ecomesbay aay ough-shareplay anday urnstay upay ethay evellay
ieldfay.

“Byay altsay anday emp!”hay iedcray Ubbstay, ut“bay isthay iftsway otionmay ofay ethay eckday
eepscray upay one’say egslay anday inglestay atay ethay earthay. Isthay ipshay anday Iay areay otway
avebray ellows!—Hafay, ahay! Omesay oneay aketay emay upay, anday aunchlay emay, ine-wisespay,
onay ethay ea,—forsay byay ive-oakslay! myay ine’sspay aay eelkay. Ahay, ahay! eway ogay ethay aitgay
atthay eaveslay onay ustday ehind!”bay

ere“Thay eshay ows—sheblay ows!—sheblay ows!—rightblay ahead!”ay asway ownay ethay
ast-headmay cryay.

Aye“ay, aye!”ay iedcray Ubbstay, I“ay ewknay it—yeay an’tcay escape—bloway onay anday itsplay
ouryay outspay, Oay alewhay! ethay admay iendfay imselfhay isay afteray eyay! owblay ouryay
ump—blistertray ouryay ungs!—Ahablay illway amday offay ouryay oodblay, asay aay illermay
utsshay ishay atergateway uponay ethay eam!”stray

Anday Ubbstay idday utbay eakspay outay orfay ellway ighnay allay atthay ewcray. Ethay enziesfray
ofay ethay asechay adhay byay isthay imetay orkedway emthay ubblinglybay upay, ikelay olday ineway
orkedway aneway. Ateverwhay alepay earsfay anday orebodingsfay omesay ofay emthay ightmay
avehay eltfay eforebay; esethay ereway otnay onlyay ownay eptkay outay ofay ightsay oughthray ethay
owinggray aweay ofay Ahabay, utbay eythay ereway okenbray upay, anday onay allay idessay outedray,
asay imidtay airiepray areshay atthay atterscay eforebay ethay oundingbay isonbay. Ethay andhay
ofay Atefay adhay atchedsnay allay eirthay oulssay; anday byay ethay irringstay erilspay ofay ethay
eviouspray ayday; ethay ackray ofay ethay astpay ight’snay uspensesay; ethay ixedfay,
unfearingay, indblay, ecklessray ayway inay ichwhay eirthay ildway aftcray entway ungingplay
owardstay itsay ingflyay arkmay; byay allay esethay ingsthay, eirthay eartshay ereway owledbay
alongay. Ethay indway atthay ademay eatgray elliesbay ofay eirthay ailssay, anday ushedray ethay
esselvay onay byay armsay invisibleay asay irresistibleay; isthay eemedsay ethay olsymbay ofay
atthay unseenay agencyay ichwhay osay enslaveday emthay otay ethay aceray.

Eythay ereway oneay anmay, otnay irtythay. Orfay asay ethay oneay ipshay atthay eldhay emthay allay;
oughthay itay asway utpay ogethertay ofay allay ontrastingcay ings—oakthay, anday aplemay,
anday inepay oodway; ironay, anday itchpay, anday emp—yethay allay esethay anray intoay eachay
otheray inay ethay oneay oncretecay ullhay, ichwhay otshay onay itsay ayway, othbay alancedbay
anday irectedday byay ethay onglay entralcay eelkay; evenay osay, allay ethay individualitiesay
ofay ethay ewcray, isthay an’smay alorvay, atthay an’smay earfay; uiltgay anday uiltinessgay,
allay arietiesvay ereway eldedway intoay onenessay, anday ereway allay irectedday otay atthay
atalfay oalgay ichwhay Ahabay eirthay oneay ordlay anday eelkay idday ointpay otay.

Ethay iggingray ivedlay. Ethay ast-headsmay, ikelay ethay opstay ofay alltay almspay, ereway
outspreadinglyay uftedtay ithway armsay anday egslay. Ingingclay otay aay arspay ithway oneay
andhay, omesay eachedray orthfay ethay otheray ithway impatientay avingsway; othersay,
adingshay eirthay eyesay omfray ethay ividvay unlightsay, atsay arfay outay onay ethay ockingray
ardsyay; allay ethay arsspay inay ullfay earingbay ofay ortalsmay, eadyray anday iperay orfay
eirthay atefay. Ahay! owhay eythay illstay ovestray oughthray atthay infiniteay uenessblay otay
eeksay outay ethay ingthay atthay ightmay estroyday emthay!

“Whyay ingsay eyay otnay outay orfay imhay, ifay eyay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay, enwhay, afteray
ethay apselay ofay omesay inutesmay incesay ethay irstfay cryay, onay oremay adhay eenbay eardhay.
ay“Sway emay upay, enmay; eyay avehay eenbay eceivedday; otnay Obymay Ickday astscay oneay odday
etjay atthay ayway, anday enthay isappears.”day

Itay asway evenay osay; inay eirthay eadlonghay eagernessay, ethay enmay adhay istakenmay omesay
otheray ingthay orfay ethay ale-spoutwhay, asay ethay eventay itselfay oonsay ovedpray; orfay
ardlyhay adhay Ahabay eachedray ishay erchpay; ardlyhay asway ethay operay elayedbay otay itsay
inpay onay eckday, enwhay ehay uckstray ethay ey-notekay otay anay orchestraay, atthay ademay ethay
airay ibratevay asay ithway ethay ombinedcay ischargesday ofay iflesray. Ethay iumphanttray
alloohay ofay irtythay uckskinbay ungslay asway eardhay, as—muchay earernay otay ethay ipshay
anthay ethay aceplay ofay ethay imaginaryay etjay, esslay anthay aay ilemay ahead—Mobyay Ickday
odilybay urstbay intoay iewvay! Orfay otnay byay anyay almcay anday indolentay outingsspay; otnay
byay ethay eaceablepay ushgay ofay atthay icmystay ountainfay inay ishay eadhay, idday ethay
Itewhay Alewhay ownay evealray ishay icinityvay; utbay byay ethay arfay oremay ondrousway
enomenonphay ofay eachingbray. Isingray ithway ishay utmostay elocityvay omfray ethay
urthestfay epthsday, ethay Ermspay Alewhay usthay oomsbay ishay entireay ulkbay intoay ethay
urepay elementay ofay airay, anday ilingpay upay aay ountainmay ofay azzlingday oamfay, owsshay
ishay aceplay otay ethay istanceday ofay evensay ilesmay anday oremay. Inay osethay omentsmay,
ethay orntay, enrageday avesway ehay akesshay offay, eemsay ishay anemay; inay omesay asescay,
isthay eachingbray isay ishay actay ofay efianceday.

ere“Thay eshay eachesbray! erethay eshay eaches!”bray asway ethay cryay, asay inay ishay
immeasurableay avadoesbray ethay Itewhay Alewhay ossedtay imselfhay almon-likesay otay
Eavenhay. Osay uddenlysay eensay inay ethay ueblay ainplay ofay ethay easay, anday elievedray
againstay ethay illstay uerblay arginmay ofay ethay skyay, ethay ayspray atthay ehay aisedray,
orfay ethay omentmay, intolerablyay itteredglay anday aredglay ikelay aay acierglay; anday
oodstay erethay aduallygray adingfay anday adingfay awayay omfray itsay irstfay arklingspay
intensityay, otay ethay imday istinessmay ofay anay advancingay owershay inay aay alevay.

Aye“ay, eachbray ouryay astlay otay ethay unsay, Obymay Ick!”day iedcray Ahabay, “thyay ourhay
anday thyay arpoonhay areay atay and!—Downhay! ownday allay ofay eyay, utbay oneay anmay atay ethay
orefay. Ethay oats!—standbay by!”ay

Unmindfulay ofay ethay edioustay ope-laddersray ofay ethay oudsshray, ethay enmay, ikelay
ootingshay arsstay, idslay otay ethay eckday, byay ethay isolateday ackstaysbay anday
alyardshay; ilewhay Ahabay, esslay artinglyday, utbay illstay apidlyray asway oppeddray
omfray ishay erchpay.

ower“Lay away,”ay ehay iedcray, osay oonsay asay ehay adhay eachedray ishay oat—abay arespay oneay,
iggedray ethay afternoonay eviouspray. “Mray. Arbuckstay, ethay ipshay isay ine—keepthay
awayay omfray ethay oatsbay, utbay eepkay earnay emthay. Owerlay, all!”ay

Asay ifay otay ikestray aay uickqay errortay intoay emthay, byay isthay imetay eingbay ethay irstfay
assailantay imselfhay, Obymay Ickday adhay urnedtay, anday asway ownay omingcay orfay ethay
eethray ewscray. Ahab’say oatbay asway entralcay; anday eeringchay ishay enmay, ehay oldtay
emthay ehay ouldway aketay ethay alewhay ead-and-head,—thathay isay, ullpay aightstray upay
otay ishay orehead,—afay otnay uncommonay ingthay; orfay enwhay ithinway aay ertaincay imitlay,
uchsay aay oursecay excludesay ethay omingcay onsetay omfray ethay ale’swhay idelongsay
isionvay. Utbay ereay atthay oseclay imitlay asway ainedgay, anday ilewhay etyay allay eethray
oatsbay ereway ainplay asay ethay ip’sshay eethray astsmay otay ishay eyeay; ethay Itewhay Alewhay
urningchay imselfhay intoay uriousfay eedspay, almostay inay anay instantay asay itay ereway,
ushingray amongay ethay oatsbay ithway openay awsjay, anday aay ashinglay ailtay, offereday
appallingay attlebay onay everyay idesay; anday eedlesshay ofay ethay ironsay artedday atay imhay
omfray everyay oatbay, eemedsay onlyay intentay onay annihilatingay eachay eparatesay ankplay
ofay ichwhay osethay oatsbay ereway ademay. Utbay ilfullyskay anœuvredmay, incessantlyay
eelingwhay ikelay ainedtray argerschay inay ethay ieldfay; ethay oatsbay orfay aay ilewhay
eludeday imhay; oughthay, atay imestay, utbay byay aay ank’splay eadthbray; ilewhay allay ethay
imetay, Ahab’say unearthlyay oganslay oretay everyay otheray cryay utbay ishay otay edsshray.

Utbay atay astlay inay ishay untraceableay evolutionsay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay osay ossedcray
anday ecrossedray, anday inay aay ousandthay aysway entangleday ethay ackslay ofay ethay eethray
ineslay ownay astfay otay imhay, atthay eythay oreshortenedfay, anday, ofay emselvesthay,
arpedway ethay evotedday oatsbay owardstay ethay antedplay ironsay inay imhay; oughthay ownay
orfay aay omentmay ethay alewhay ewdray asideay aay ittlelay, asay ifay otay allyray orfay aay oremay
emendoustray argechay. Eizingsay atthay opportunityay, Ahabay irstfay aidpay outay oremay
inelay: anday enthay asway apidlyray aulinghay anday erkingjay inay uponay itay again—hopingay
atthay ayway otay isencumberday itay ofay omesay arls—whensnay o!—alay ightsay oremay avagesay
anthay ethay embattleday eethtay ofay arksshay!

Aughtcay anday isted—corkscrewedtway inay ethay azesmay ofay ethay inelay, ooselay arpoonshay
anday anceslay, ithway allay eirthay istlingbray arbsbay anday ointspay, amecay ashingflay
anday ippingdray upay otay ethay ockschay inay ethay owsbay ofay Ahab’say oatbay. Onlyay oneay
ingthay ouldcay ebay oneday. Eizingsay ethay oat-knifebay, ehay iticallycray eachedray
ithin—through—andway enthay, ithout—theway aysray ofay eelstay; aggeddray inay ethay inelay
eyondbay, assedpay itay, inboarday, otay ethay owsmanbay, anday enthay, icetway underingsay
ethay operay earnay ethay ocks—droppedchay ethay intercepteday agotfay ofay eelstay intoay
ethay easay; anday asway allay astfay againay. Atthay instantay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay ademay aay
uddensay ushray amongay ethay emainingray anglestay ofay ethay otheray ineslay; byay osay
oingday, irresistiblyay aggeddray ethay oremay involveday oatsbay ofay Ubbstay anday Askflay
owardstay ishay ukesflay; ashedday emthay ogethertay ikelay otway ollingray uskshay onay aay
urf-beatensay eachbay, anday enthay, ivingday ownday intoay ethay easay, isappearedday inay aay
oilingbay aelstrommay, inay ichwhay, orfay aay acespay, ethay odorousay edarcay ipschay ofay
ethay eckswray ancedday oundray anday oundray, ikelay ethay atedgray utmegnay inay aay iftlysway
irredstay owlbay ofay unchpay.

Ilewhay ethay otway ewscray ereway etyay irclingcay inay ethay atersway, eachingray outay afteray
ethay evolvingray ine-tubslay, oarsay, anday otheray oatingflay urniturefay, ilewhay
aslopeay ittlelay Askflay obbedbay upay anday ownday ikelay anay emptyay ialvay, itchingtway
ishay egslay upwardsay otay escapeay ethay eadeddray awsjay ofay arksshay; anday Ubbstay asway
ustilylay ingingsay outay orfay omesay oneay otay adlelay imhay upay; anday ilewhay ethay olday
an’smay ine—nowlay arting—admittedpay ofay ishay ullingpay intoay ethay eamycray oolpay otay
escueray omwhay ehay ould;—incay atthay ildway imultaneousnesssay ofay aay ousandthay
oncretedcay erils,—Ahab’spay etyay unstrickenay oatbay eemedsay awndray upay owardstay
Eavenhay byay invisibleay ires,—asway, arrow-likeay, ootingshay erpendicularlypay
omfray ethay easay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay ashedday ishay oadbray oreheadfay againstay itsay
ottombay, anday entsay itay, urningtay overay anday overay, intoay ethay airay; illtay itay ellfay
again—gunwaleay ownwards—andday Ahabay anday ishay enmay uggledstray outay omfray underay
itay, ikelay ealssay omfray aay ea-sidesay avecay.

Ethay irstfay uprisingay omentummay ofay ethay ale—modifyingwhay itsay irectionday asay ehay
uckstray ethay urface—involuntarilysay aunchedlay imhay alongay itay, otay aay ittlelay
istanceday omfray ethay entrecay ofay ethay estructionday ehay adhay ademay; anday ithway ishay
ackbay otay itay, ehay ownay aylay orfay aay omentmay owlyslay eelingfay ithway ishay ukesflay omfray
idesay otay idesay; anday eneverwhay aay aystray oaray, itbay ofay ankplay, ethay eastlay ipchay oray
umbcray ofay ethay oatsbay ouchedtay ishay inskay, ishay ailtay iftlysway ewdray ackbay, anday
amecay idewayssay itingsmay ethay easay. Utbay oonsay, asay ifay atisfiedsay atthay ishay orkway
orfay atthay imetay asway oneday, ehay ushedpay ishay eatedplay oreheadfay oughthray ethay
oceanay, anday ailingtray afteray imhay ethay intertangleday ineslay, ontinuedcay ishay
eewardlay ayway atay aay aveller’stray ethodicmay acepay.

Asay eforebay, ethay attentiveay ipshay avinghay escriedday ethay olewhay ightfay, againay
amecay earingbay ownday otay ethay escueray, anday oppingdray aay oatbay, ickedpay upay ethay
oatingflay arinersmay, ubstay, oarsay, anday ateverwhay elseay ouldcay ebay aughtcay atay,
anday afelysay andedlay emthay onay erhay ecksday. Omesay ainedspray ouldersshay, istswray,
anday anklesay; ividlay ontusionscay; enchedwray arpoonshay anday anceslay;
inextricableay intricaciesay ofay operay; atteredshay oarsay anday anksplay; allay esethay
ereway erethay; utbay onay atalfay oray evenay erioussay illay eemedsay otay avehay efallenbay
anyay oneay. Asay ithway Edallahfay ethay ayday eforebay, osay Ahabay asway ownay oundfay imlygray
ingingclay otay ishay oat’sbay okenbray alfhay, ichwhay affordeday aay omparativelycay easyay
oatflay; ornay idday itay osay exhaustay imhay asay ethay eviouspray ay’sday ishapmay.

Utbay enwhay ehay asway elpedhay otay ethay eckday, allay eyesay ereway astenedfay uponay imhay; asay
insteaday ofay andingstay byay imselfhay ehay illstay alf-hunghay uponay ethay ouldershay ofay
Arbuckstay, owhay adhay usthay arfay eenbay ethay oremostfay otay assistay imhay. Ishay ivoryay
eglay adhay eenbay appedsnay offay, eavinglay utbay oneay ortshay arpshay intersplay.

Aye“ay, ayeay, Arbuckstay, is’tay eetsway otay eanlay ometimessay, ebay ethay eanerlay owhay ehay
illway; anday ouldway olday Ahabay adhay eanedlay ofteneray anthay ehay as.”hay

e“Thay errulefay ashay otnay oodstay, ir,”say aidsay ethay arpentercay, ownay omingcay upay; I“ay
utpay oodgay orkway intoay atthay eg.”lay

ut“Bay onay onesbay okenbray, irsay, Iay ope,”hay aidsay Ubbstay ithway uetray oncerncay.

Aye“ay! anday allay interedsplay otay iecespay, Ubb!—d’yestay eesay it.—Butay evenay ithway aay
okenbray onebay, olday Ahabay isay untoucheday; anday Iay accountay onay ivinglay onebay ofay
inemay oneay otjay oremay emay, anthay isthay eadday oneay at’sthay ostlay. Ornay itewhay alewhay,
ornay anmay, ornay iendfay, ancay osay uchmay asay azegray olday Ahabay inay ishay ownay operpray anday
inaccessibleay eingbay. Ancay anyay eadlay ouchtay onderyay oorflay, anyay astmay apescray
onderyay oof?—Aloftray erethay! ichwhay ay?”way

ead“Day otay eewardlay, ir.”say

Up“ay elmhay, enthay; ilepay onay ethay ailsay againay, ipshay eeperskay! ownday ethay estray ofay
ethay arespay oatsbay anday igray em—Mrthay. Arbuckstay awayay, anday ustermay ethay oat’sbay
ews.”cray

et“Lay emay irstfay elphay eethay owardstay ethay ulwarksbay, ir.”say

Oh“ay, ohay, ohay! owhay isthay intersplay oresgay emay ownay! Accurseday atefay! atthay ethay
unconquerableay aptaincay inay ethay oulsay ouldshay avehay uchsay aay avencray ate!”may

ir?”“Say

“Myay odybay, anmay, otnay eethay. Ivegay emay omethingsay orfay aay ane—therecay, atthay
iveredshay ancelay illway oday. Ustermay ethay enmay. Urelysay Iay avehay otnay eensay imhay etyay.
Byay eavenhay itay annotcay e!—missing?—quickbay! allcay emthay all.”ay

Ethay olday an’smay intedhay oughtthay asway uetray. Uponay usteringmay ethay ompanycay, ethay
Arseepay asway otnay erethay.

e“Thay Arsee!”pay iedcray Ubb—“hestay ustmay avehay eenbay aughtcay in——”ay

e“Thay ackblay omitvay enchwray ee!—runthay allay ofay eyay aboveay, aloway, abincay,
orecastle—findfay im—nothay one—notgay one!”gay

Utbay uicklyqay eythay eturnedray otay imhay ithway ethay idingstay atthay ethay Arseepay asway
owherenay otay ebay oundfay.

Aye“ay, ir,”say aidsay Ubb—“caughtstay amongay ethay anglestay ofay ouryay ine—Ilay oughtthay
Iay awsay imhay aggingdray under.”ay

“_My_ay inelay! _my_ay inelay? One?—gonegay? Atwhay eansmay atthay ittlelay ord?—Whatway
eath-knellday ingsray inay itay, atthay olday Ahabay akesshay asay ifay ehay ereway ethay elfrybay.
Ethay arpoonhay, oo!—tosstay overay ethay itterlay ere,—d’yethay eesay it?—theay orgedfay
ironay, enmay, ethay itewhay ale’s—nowhay, onay, o,—blisterednay oolfay! isthay andhay idday
artday it!—’tisay inay ethay ish!—Aloftfay erethay! Eepkay imhay ailed—Quick!—allnay
andshay otay ethay iggingray ofay ethay oats—collectbay ethay oars—harpooneersay! ethay
ironsay, ethay irons!—hoistay ethay oyalsray igher—ahay ullpay onay allay ethay
eets!—helmshay erethay! eadystay, eadystay orfay ouryay ifelay! I’llay entay imestay irdlegay
ethay unmeasureday obeglay; eayay anday iveday aightstray oughthray itay, utbay I’llay ayslay
imhay et!”yay

eat“Gray Odgay! utbay orfay oneay inglesay instantay owshay elf,”thysay iedcray Arbuckstay;
ever“nay, evernay iltway outhay apturecay imhay, olday an—Inmay Esus’jay amenay onay oremay ofay
isthay, at’sthay orseway anthay evil’sday adnessmay. Otway aysday asedchay; icetway ovestay
otay interssplay; thyay eryvay eglay onceay oremay atchedsnay omfray underay eethay; thyay evilay
adowshay one—allgay oodgay angelsay obbingmay eethay ithway arnings:—whatway oremay
ouldstway outhay ave?—Shallhay eway eepkay asingchay isthay urderousmay ishfay illtay ehay
ampssway ethay astlay anmay? Allshay eway ebay aggeddray byay imhay otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay
easay? Allshay eway ebay owedtay byay imhay otay ethay infernalay orldway? Ohay, oh,—Impietyay
anday asphemyblay otay unthay imhay ore!”may

arbuck“Stay, ofay atelay I’veay eltfay angelystray ovedmay otay eethay; everay incesay atthay
ourhay eway othbay aw—thousay ow’stknay atwhay, inay oneay another’say eyesay. Utbay inay isthay
attermay ofay ethay alewhay, ebay ethay ontfray ofay thyay acefay otay emay asay ethay almpay ofay isthay
and—ahay iplesslay, unfeatureday ankblay. Ahabay isay orfay everay Ahabay, anmay. Isthay
olewhay act’say immutablyay ecreedday. as’Tway ehearsedray byay eethay anday emay aay illionbay
earsyay eforebay isthay oceanay olledray. Oolfay! Iay amay ethay Ates’fay ieutenantlay; Iay actay
underay ordersay. Ooklay outhay, underlingay! atthay outhay obeyestay ine.—Standmay oundray
emay, enmay. Eyay eesay anay olday anmay utcay ownday otay ethay umpstay; eaninglay onay aay iveredshay
ancelay; oppedpray upay onay aay onelylay ootfay. is’Tay Ahab—hisay ody’sbay artpay; utbay
Ahab’say oul’ssay aay entipedecay, atthay ovesmay uponay aay undredhay egslay. Iay eelfay
ainedstray, alfhay andedstray, asay opesray atthay owtay ismastedday igatesfray inay aay
alegay; anday Iay aymay ooklay osay. Utbay ereay Iay eakbray, e’llyay earhay emay ackcray; anday illtay
eyay earhay at__thay, owknay atthay Ahab’say awserhay owstay ishay urposepay etyay. Elievebay
eyay, enmay, inay ethay ingsthay alledcay omensay? Enthay aughlay alouday, anday cryay encoreay!
Orfay ereay eythay owndray, owningdray ingsthay illway icetway iseray otay ethay urfacesay;
enthay iseray againay, otay inksay orfay evermoreay. Osay ithway Obymay Ick—twoday aysday e’shay
oated—tomorrowflay illway ebay ethay irdthay. Ayeay, enmay, e’llhay iseray onceay ore,—butmay
onlyay otay outspay ishay astlay! Ed’yay eelfay avebray enmay, ave?”bray

As“ay earlessfay ire,”fay iedcray Ubbstay.

And“ay asay echanical,”may utteredmay Ahabay. Enthay asay ethay enmay entway orwardfay, ehay
utteredmay onay: e“Thay ingsthay alledcay omensay! Anday esterdayyay Iay alkedtay ethay amesay
otay Arbuckstay erethay, oncerningcay myay okenbray oatbay. Ohay! owhay aliantlyvay Iay eeksay
otay ivedray outay ofay others’ay eartshay at’swhay inchedclay osay astfay inay ine!—Themay
Arsee—thepay Arsee!—gonepay, onegay? anday ehay asway otay ogay efore:—butbay illstay asway
otay ebay eensay againay ereay Iay ouldcay erish—How’spay at?—There’sthay aay iddleray ownay
ightmay afflebay allay ethay awyerslay ackedbay byay ethay ostsghay ofay ethay olewhay inelay ofay
udges:—likejay aay awk’shay eakbay itay eckspay myay ainbray. I’ll__ay, I’ll__ay olvesay itay,
ough!”thay

Enwhay uskday escendedday, ethay alewhay asway illstay inay ightsay otay eewardlay.

Osay onceay oremay ethay ailsay asway ortenedshay, anday everythingay assedpay earlynay asay onay
ethay eviouspray ightnay; onlyay, ethay oundsay ofay ammershay, anday ethay umhay ofay ethay
indstonegray asway eardhay illtay earlynay aylightday, asay ethay enmay oiledtay byay
anternslay inay ethay ompletecay anday arefulcay iggingray ofay ethay arespay oatsbay anday
arpeningshay eirthay eshfray eaponsway orfay ethay orrowmay. Eantimemay, ofay ethay okenbray
eelkay ofay Ahab’say eckedwray aftcray ethay arpentercay ademay imhay anotheray eglay; ilewhay
illstay asay onay ethay ightnay eforebay, ouchedslay Ahabay oodstay ixedfay ithinway ishay
uttlescay; ishay idhay, eliotropehay anceglay anticipatinglyay onegay ackwardbay onay itsay
ialday; atsay ueday eastwarday orfay ethay earliestay unsay.


APTERcHay 135ay. Ethay Ase.—Thirdchay Ayday.

Ethay orningmay ofay ethay irdthay ayday awnedday airfay anday eshfray, anday onceay oremay ethay
olitarysay ight-mannay atay ethay ore-mast-headfay asway elievedray byay owdscray ofay ethay
aylightday ook-outslay, owhay ottedday everyay astmay anday almostay everyay arspay.

e“D’yay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay; utbay ethay alewhay asway otnay etyay inay ightsay.

In“ay ishay infallibleay akeway, oughthay; utbay ollowfay atthay akeway, at’sthay allay. Elmhay
erethay; eadystay, asay outhay oestgay, anday asthay eenbay oinggay. Atwhay aay ovelylay ayday
againay! ereway itay aay ew-madenay orldway, anday ademay orfay aay ummer-housesay otay ethay
angelsay, anday isthay orningmay ethay irstfay ofay itsay owingthray openay otay emthay, aay
airerfay ayday ouldcay otnay awnday uponay atthay orldway. Ere’shay oodfay orfay oughtthay, adhay
Ahabay imetay otay inkthay; utbay Ahabay evernay inksthay; ehay onlyay eelsfay, eelsfay, eelsfay;
at’s__thay inglingtay enoughay orfay ortalmay anmay! otay ink’sthay audacityay. Odgay onlyay
ashay atthay ightray anday ivilegepray. Inkingthay isay, oray oughtay otay ebay, aay oolnesscay
anday aay almnesscay; anday ouray oorpay eartshay obthray, anday ouray oorpay ainsbray eatbay ootay
uchmay orfay atthay. Anday etyay, I’veay ometimessay oughtthay myay ainbray asway eryvay
alm—frozencay almcay, isthay olday ullskay ackscray osay, ikelay aay assglay inay ichwhay ethay
ontentscay urnedtay otay iceay, anday ivershay itay. Anday illstay isthay airhay isay owinggray
ownay; isthay omentmay owinggray, anday eathay ustmay eedbray itay; utbay onay, it’say ikelay
atthay ortsay ofay ommoncay assgray atthay illway owgray anywhereay, etweenbay ethay earthyay
eftsclay ofay Eenlandgray iceay oray inay Esuviusvay avalay. Owhay ethay ildway indsway owblay
itay; eythay ipwhay itay aboutay emay asay ethay orntay edsshray ofay itsplay ailssay ashlay ethay
ossedtay ipshay eythay ingclay otay. Aay ilevay indway atthay ashay onay oubtday ownblay ereay isthay
oughthray isonpray orridorscay anday ellscay, anday ardsway ofay ospitalshay, anday
entilatedvay emthay, anday ownay omescay owingblay itherhay asay innocentay asay eecesflay.
Outay uponay it!—it’say aintedtay. Ereway Iay ethay indway, I’day owblay onay oremay onay uchsay aay
ickedway, iserablemay orldway. I’day awlcray omewheresay otay aay avecay, anday inkslay
erethay. Anday etyay, is’tay aay oblenay anday eroichay ingthay, ethay indway! owhay everay
onqueredcay itay? Inay everyay ightfay itay ashay ethay astlay anday itterestbay owblay. Unray
iltingtay atay itay, anday ouyay utbay unray oughthray itay. Ahay! aay owardcay indway atthay
ikesstray arkstay akednay enmay, utbay illway otnay andstay otay eceiveray aay inglesay owblay.
Evenay Ahabay isay aay averbray ing—athay oblernay ingthay anthay at__thay. Ouldway ownay ethay
indway utbay adhay aay odybay; utbay allay ethay ingsthay atthay ostmay exasperateay anday
outrageay ortalmay anmay, allay esethay ingsthay areay odilessbay, utbay onlyay odilessbay asay
objectsay, otnay asay agentsay. Ere’sthay aay ostmay ecialspay, aay ostmay unningcay, ohay, aay
ostmay aliciousmay ifferenceday! Anday etyay, Iay aysay againay, anday earsway itay ownay, atthay
ere’sthay omethingsay allay oriousglay anday aciousgray inay ethay indway. Esethay armway
Adetray Indsway, atay eastlay, atthay inay ethay earclay eavenshay owblay aightstray onay, inay
ongstray anday eadfaststay, igorousvay ildnessmay; anday eervay otnay omfray eirthay arkmay,
oweverhay ethay aserbay urrentscay ofay ethay easay aymay urntay anday acktay, anday ightiestmay
Ississippiesmay ofay ethay andlay iftsway anday ervesway aboutay, uncertainay erewhay otay ogay
atay astlay. Anday byay ethay eternalay Olespay! esethay amesay Adestray atthay osay irectlyday
owblay myay oodgay ipshay onay; esethay Adestray, oray omethingsay ikelay em—somethingthay osay
unchangeableay, anday ullfay asay ongstray, owblay myay eeledkay oulsay alongay! Otay itay!
Aloftay erethay! Atwhay ed’yay ee?”say

othing“Nay, ir.”say

othing“Nay! anday oonnay atay andhay! Ethay oubloonday oesgay a-beggingay! Eesay ethay unsay!
Ayeay, ayeay, itay ustmay ebay osay. I’veay oversaileday imhay. Owhay, otgay ethay artstay? Ayeay,
e’shay asingchay e__may ownay; otnay Iay, im_—that’s_hay adbay; Iay ightmay avehay ownknay itay,
ootay. Oolfay! ethay ines—thelay arpoonshay e’shay owingtay. Ayeay, ayeay, Iay avehay unray imhay
byay astlay ightnay. Aboutay! aboutay! Omecay ownday, allay ofay eyay, utbay ethay egularray ooklay
outsay! Anmay ethay aces!”bray

Eeringstay asay eshay adhay oneday, ethay indway adhay eenbay omewhatsay onay ethay Equod’spay
uarterqay, osay atthay ownay eingbay ointedpay inay ethay everseray irectionday, ethay acedbray
ipshay ailedsay ardhay uponay ethay eezebray asay eshay echurnedray ethay eamcray inay erhay ownay
itewhay akeway.

Against“ay ethay indway ehay ownay eersstay orfay ethay openay aw,”jay urmuredmay Arbuckstay otay
imselfhay, asay ehay oiledcay ethay ew-haulednay ain-bracemay uponay ethay ailray. od“Gay
eepkay usay, utbay alreadyay myay onesbay eelfay ampday ithinway emay, anday omfray ethay insideay
etway myay eshflay. Iay isdoubtmay emay atthay Iay isobeyday myay Odgay inay obeyingay im!”hay

and“Stay byay otay aysway emay up!”ay iedcray Ahabay, advancingay otay ethay empenhay asketbay.
e“Way ouldshay eetmay imhay oon.”say

Aye“ay, ayeay, ir,”say anday aightwaystray Arbuckstay idday Ahab’say iddingbay, anday onceay
oremay Ahabay ungsway onay ighhay.

Aay olewhay ourhay ownay assedpay; old-beatengay outay otay agesay. Imetay itselfay ownay eldhay
onglay eathsbray ithway eenkay uspensesay. Utbay atay astlay, omesay eethray ointspay offay ethay
eatherway owbay, Ahabay escriedday ethay outspay againay, anday instantlyay omfray ethay
eethray ast-headsmay eethray ieksshray entway upay asay ifay ethay onguestay ofay irefay adhay
oicedvay itay.

orehead“Fay otay oreheadfay Iay eetmay eethay, isthay irdthay imetay, Obymay Ickday! Onay eckday
