ere!—bracethay arpershay upay; owdcray erhay intoay ethay ind’sway eyeay. E’shay ootay arfay
offay otay owerlay etyay, Mray. Arbuckstay. Ethay ailssay akeshay! Andstay overay atthay
elmsmanhay ithway aay op-maultay! Osay, osay; ehay avelstray astfay, anday Iay ustmay ownday. Utbay
etlay emay avehay oneay oremay oodgay oundray ooklay aloftay erehay atay ethay easay; ere’sthay
imetay orfay atthay. Anay olday, olday ightsay, anday etyay omehowsay osay oungyay; ayeay, anday
otnay angedchay aay inkway incesay Iay irstfay awsay itay, aay oybay, omfray ethay and-hillssay ofay
Antucketnay! Ethay ame!—thesay ame!—thesay amesay otay Oahnay asay otay emay. Ere’sthay aay
oftsay owershay otay eewardlay. Uchsay ovelylay eewardingslay! Eythay ustmay eadlay
omewhere—tosay omethingsay elseay anthay ommoncay andlay, oremay almypay anthay ethay
almspay. Eewardlay! ethay itewhay alewhay oesgay atthay ayway; ooklay otay indwardway, enthay;
ethay etterbay ifay ethay ittererbay uarterqay. Utbay oodgay ebyay, oodgay ebyay, olday
ast-headmay! At’swhay is?—greenthay? ayeay, inytay ossesmay inay esethay arpedway ackscray.
Onay uchsay eengray eatherway ainsstay onay Ahab’say eadhay! Ere’sthay ethay ifferenceday ownay
etweenbay an’smay olday ageay anday atter’smay. Utbay ayeay, olday astmay, eway othbay owgray olday
ogethertay; oundsay inay ouray ullshay, oughthay, areay eway otnay, myay ipshay? Ayeay, inusmay aay
eglay, at’sthay allay. Byay eavenhay isthay eadday oodway ashay ethay etterbay ofay myay ivelay
eshflay everyay ayway. Iay an’tcay omparecay ithway itay; anday I’veay ownknay omesay ipsshay
ademay ofay eadday eestray outlastay ethay iveslay ofay enmay ademay ofay ethay ostmay italvay
uffstay ofay italvay athersfay. At’swhay atthay ehay aidsay? ehay ouldshay illstay ogay eforebay
emay, myay ilotpay; anday etyay otay ebay eensay againay? Utbay erewhay? Illway Iay avehay eyesay atay
ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay, upposingsay Iay escendday osethay endlessay airsstay? anday
allay ightnay I’veay eenbay ailingsay omfray imhay, ereverwhay ehay idday inksay otay. Ayeay,
ayeay, ikelay anymay oremay outhay old’sttay irefulday uthtray asay ouchingtay elfthysay, Oay
Arseepay; utbay, Ahabay, erethay thyay otshay ellfay ortshay. Ood-byegay, ast-head—keepmay
aay oodgay eyeay uponay ethay alewhay, ethay ilewhay I’may onegay. E’llway alktay o-morrowtay,
aynay, o-nighttay, enwhay ethay itewhay alewhay ieslay ownday erethay, iedtay byay eadhay anday
ail.”tay

Ehay avegay ethay ordway; anday illstay azinggay oundray imhay, asway eadilystay oweredlay
oughthray ethay ovenclay ueblay airay otay ethay eckday.

Inay ueday imetay ethay oatsbay ereway oweredlay; utbay asay andingstay inay ishay allop’sshay
ernstay, Ahabay ustjay overedhay uponay ethay ointpay ofay ethay escentday, ehay avedway otay ethay
ate,—whomay eldhay oneay ofay ethay ackle-ropestay onay eck—andday adebay imhay ausepay.

arbuck!”“Stay

ir?”“Say

or“Fay ethay irdthay imetay myay oul’ssay ipshay artsstay uponay isthay oyagevay, Arbuck.”stay

Aye“ay, irsay, outhay iltway avehay itay o.”say

ome“Say ipsshay ailsay omfray eirthay ortspay, anday everay afterwardsay areay issingmay,
Arbuck!”stay

uth“Tray, irsay: addestsay uth.”tray

ome“Say enmay ieday atay ebbay idetay; omesay atay owlay aterway; omesay atay ethay ullfay ofay ethay
ood;—andflay Iay eelfay ownay ikelay aay illowbay at’sthay allay oneay estedcray ombcay,
Arbuckstay. Iay amay old;—shakeay andshay ithway emay, an.”may

Eirthay andshay etmay; eirthay eyesay astenedfay; Arbuck’sstay earstay ethay ueglay.

Oh“ay, myay aptaincay, myay aptain!—noblecay eart—gohay ot—gonay ot!—seenay, it’say aay
avebray anmay atthay eepsway; owhay eatgray ethay agonyay ofay ethay ersuasionpay en!”thay

ower“Lay away!”—crieday Ahabay, ossingtay ethay ate’smay armay omfray imhay. and“Stay byay
ethay ew!”cray

Inay anay instantay ethay oatbay asway ullingpay oundray oseclay underay ethay ernstay.

e“Thay arksshay! ethay arks!”shay iedcray aay oicevay omfray ethay owlay abin-windowcay
erethay; O“ay astermay, myay astermay, omecay ack!”bay

Utbay Ahabay eardhay othingnay; orfay ishay ownay oicevay asway igh-liftedhay enthay; anday ethay
oatbay eapedlay onay.

Etyay ethay oicevay akespay uetray; orfay arcescay adhay ehay ushedpay omfray ethay ipshay, enwhay
umbersnay ofay arksshay, eeminglysay isingray omfray outay ethay arkday atersway eneathbay
ethay ullhay, aliciouslymay appedsnay atay ethay adesblay ofay ethay oarsay, everyay imetay
eythay ippedday inay ethay aterway; anday inay isthay ayway accompanieday ethay oatbay ithway
eirthay itesbay. Itay isay aay ingthay otnay uncommonlyay appeninghay otay ethay ale-boatswhay
inay osethay armingsway eassay; ethay arksshay atay imestay apparentlyay ollowingfay emthay
inay ethay amesay escientpray ayway atthay ulturesvay overhay overay ethay annersbay ofay
archingmay egimentsray inay ethay eastay. Utbay esethay ereway ethay irstfay arksshay atthay
adhay eenbay observeday byay ethay Equodpay incesay ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay eenbay irstfay
escriedday; anday etherwhay itay asway atthay Ahab’say ewcray ereway allay uchsay
iger-yellowtay arbariansbay, anday ereforethay eirthay eshflay oremay uskymay otay ethay
ensessay ofay ethay arks—ashay attermay ometimessay ellway ownknay otay affectay
em,—howeverthay itay asway, eythay eemedsay otay ollowfay atthay oneay oatbay ithoutway
olestingmay ethay othersay.

eart“Hay ofay oughtwray eel!”stay urmuredmay Arbuckstay azinggay overay ethay idesay, anday
ollowingfay ithway ishay eyesay ethay ecedingray oat—“canstbay outhay etyay ingray oldlybay
otay atthay ight?—loweringsay thyay eelkay amongay aveningray arksshay, anday ollowedfay byay
emthay, open-moutheday otay ethay asechay; anday isthay ethay iticalcray irdthay ay?—Forday
enwhay eethray aysday owflay ogethertay inay oneay ontinuouscay intenseay ursuitpay; ebay
uresay ethay irstfay isay ethay orningmay, ethay econdsay ethay oonnay, anday ethay irdthay ethay
eveningay anday ethay enday ofay atthay ing—bethay atthay enday atwhay itay aymay. Ohay! myay Odgay!
atwhay isay isthay atthay ootsshay oughthray emay, anday eaveslay emay osay eadlyday almcay, etyay
expectant,—fixeday atay ethay optay ofay aay uddershay! Uturefay ingsthay imsway eforebay emay,
asay inay emptyay outlinesay anday eletonsskay; allay ethay astpay isay omehowsay owngray imday.
Arymay, irlgay! outhay adestfay inay alepay oriesglay ehindbay emay; oybay! Iay eemsay otay eesay
utbay thyay eyesay owngray ondrousway ueblay. Angeststray oblemspray ofay ifelay eemsay
earingclay; utbay oudsclay eepsway etween—Isbay myay ourney’sjay enday omingcay? Myay egslay
eelfay aintfay; ikelay ishay owhay ashay ootedfay itay allay ayday. Eelfay thyay eart,—beatshay
itay etyay? Irstay elfthysay, Arbuck!—stavestay itay off—moveay, ovemay! eakspay
aloud!—Mast-headay erethay! Eesay eyay myay oy’sbay andhay onay ethay ill?—Crazed;—alofthay
ere!—keepthay thyay eenestkay eyeay uponay ethay oats:—markbay ellway ethay ale!—Howhay!
again!—driveay offay atthay awkhay! eesay! ehay ecks—hepay earstay ethay ane”—pointingvay
otay ethay edray agflay ingflyay atay ethay ain-truck—“Hamay! ehay oarssay awayay ithway
it!—Where’say ethay olday anmay ownay? ee’stsay outhay atthay ightsay, ohay Ahab!—shudderay,
udder!”shay

Ethay oatsbay adhay otnay onegay eryvay arfay, enwhay byay aay ignalsay omfray ethay ast-heads—amay
ownwardday ointedpay armay, Ahabay ewknay atthay ethay alewhay adhay oundedsay; utbay
intendingay otay ebay earnay imhay atay ethay extnay isingray, ehay eldhay onay ishay ayway aay
ittlelay idewayssay omfray ethay esselvay; ethay echarmedbay ewcray aintainingmay ethay
ofoundestpray ilencesay, asay ethay ead-beathay avesway ammeredhay anday ammeredhay
againstay ethay opposingay owbay.

ive“Dray, ivedray inay ouryay ailsnay, ohay eyay avesway! otay eirthay uttermostay eadshay
ivedray emthay inay! eyay utbay ikestray aay ingthay ithoutway aay idlay; anday onay offincay anday
onay earsehay ancay ebay ine:—andmay emphay onlyay ancay illkay emay! Ahay! a!”hay

Uddenlysay ethay atersway arounday emthay owlyslay elledsway inay oadbray irclescay; enthay
uicklyqay upheaveday, asay ifay idewayssay idingslay omfray aay ubmergedsay ergbay ofay iceay,
iftlysway isingray otay ethay urfacesay. Aay owlay umblingray oundsay asway eardhay; aay
ubterraneoussay umhay; anday enthay allay eldhay eirthay eathsbray; asay edraggledbay ithway
ailingtray opesray, anday arpoonshay, anday anceslay, aay astvay ormfay otshay engthwiselay,
utbay obliquelyay omfray ethay easay. Oudedshray inay aay inthay oopingdray eilvay ofay istmay,
itay overedhay orfay aay omentmay inay ethay ainbowedray airay; anday enthay ellfay ampingsway
ackbay intoay ethay eepday. Ushedcray irtythay eetfay upwardsay, ethay atersway ashedflay orfay
anay instantay ikelay eapshay ofay ountainsfay, enthay okenlybray anksay inay aay owershay ofay
akesflay, eavinglay ethay irclingcay urfacesay eamedcray ikelay ewnay ilkmay oundray ethay
arblemay unktray ofay ethay alewhay.

ive“Gay ay!”way iedcray Ahabay otay ethay oarsmenay, anday ethay oatsbay artedday orwardfay otay
ethay attackay; utbay addenedmay byay esterday’syay eshfray ironsay atthay orrodedcay inay
imhay, Obymay Ickday eemedsay ombinedlycay ossessedpay byay allay ethay angelsay atthay ellfay
omfray eavenhay. Ethay ideway ierstay ofay eldedway endonstay overspreadingay ishay oadbray
itewhay oreheadfay, eneathbay ethay ansparenttray inskay, ookedlay ittedknay ogethertay;
asay eadhay onay, ehay amecay urningchay ishay ailtay amongay ethay oatsbay; anday onceay oremay
ailedflay emthay apartay; illingspay outay ethay ironsay anday anceslay omfray ethay otway
ates’may oatsbay, anday ashingday inay oneay idesay ofay ethay upperay artpay ofay eirthay owsbay,
utbay eavinglay Ahab’say almostay ithoutway aay arscay.

Ilewhay Aggooday anday Ueequegqay ereway oppingstay ethay ainedstray anksplay; anday asay ethay
alewhay immingsway outay omfray emthay, urnedtay, anday owedshay oneay entireay ankflay asay ehay
otshay byay emthay againay; atay atthay omentmay aay uickqay cryay entway upay. Ashedlay oundray
anday oundray otay ethay ish’sfay ackbay; inionedpay inay ethay urnstay uponay urnstay inay
ichwhay, uringday ethay astpay ightnay, ethay alewhay adhay eeledray ethay involutionsay ofay
ethay ineslay arounday imhay, ethay alfhay orntay odybay ofay ethay Arseepay asway eensay; ishay
ablesay aimentray ayedfray otay edsshray; ishay istendedday eyesay urnedtay ullfay uponay olday
Ahabay.

Ethay arpoonhay oppeddray omfray ishay andhay.

efooled“Bay, efooled!”—drawingbay inay aay onglay eanlay eath—“Ayebray, Arseepay! Iay eesay
eethay again.—Ayeay, anday outhay oestgay eforebay; anday isthay, is__thay enthay isay ethay
earsehay atthay outhay idstday omisepray. Utbay Iay oldhay eethay otay ethay astlay etterlay ofay
thyay ordway. Erewhay isay ethay econdsay earsehay? Awayay, atesmay, otay ethay ipshay! osethay
oatsbay areay uselessay ownay; epairray emthay ifay eyay ancay inay imetay, anday eturnray otay emay;
ifay otnay, Ahabay isay enoughay otay ie—Downday, enmay! ethay irstfay ingthay atthay utbay
offersay otay umpjay omfray isthay oatbay Iay andstay inay, atthay ingthay Iay arpoonhay. Eyay areay
otnay otheray enmay, utbay myay armsay anday myay egslay; anday osay obeyay e.—Where’smay ethay
alewhay? onegay ownday again?”ay

Utbay ehay ookedlay ootay ighnay ethay oatbay; orfay asay ifay entbay uponay escapingay ithway ethay
orpsecay ehay orebay, anday asay ifay ethay articularpay aceplay ofay ethay astlay encounteray
adhay eenbay utbay aay agestay inay ishay eewardlay oyagevay, Obymay Ickday asway ownay againay
eadilystay immingsway orwardfay; anday adhay almostay assedpay ethay ip,—whichshay usthay
arfay adhay eenbay ailingsay inay ethay ontrarycay irectionday otay imhay, oughthay orfay ethay
esentpray erhay eadwayhay adhay eenbay oppedstay. Ehay eemedsay immingsway ithway ishay
utmostay elocityvay, anday ownay onlyay intentay uponay ursuingpay ishay ownay aightstray
athpay inay ethay easay.

Oh“ay! Ahab,”ay iedcray Arbuckstay, ot“nay ootay atelay isay itay, evenay ownay, ethay irdthay
ayday, otay esistday. Eesay! Obymay Ickday eekssay eethay otnay. Itay isay outhay, outhay, atthay
adlymay eekestsay im!”hay

Ettingsay ailsay otay ethay isingray indway, ethay onelylay oatbay asway iftlysway impelleday
otay eewardlay, byay othbay oarsay anday anvascay. Anday atay astlay enwhay Ahabay asway idingslay
byay ethay esselvay, osay earnay asay ainlyplay otay istinguishday Arbuck’sstay acefay asay ehay
eanedlay overay ethay ailray, ehay ailedhay imhay otay urntay ethay esselvay aboutay, anday
ollowfay imhay, otnay ootay iftlysway, atay aay udiciousjay intervalay. Ancingglay upwardsay,
ehay awsay Ashtegotay, Ueequegqay, anday Aggooday, eagerlyay ountingmay otay ethay eethray
ast-headsmay; ilewhay ethay oarsmenay ereway ockingray inay ethay otway avedstay oatsbay
ichwhay adhay utbay ustjay eenbay oistedhay otay ethay idesay, anday ereway usilybay atay orkway inay
epairingray emthay. Oneay afteray ethay otheray, oughthray ethay ort-holespay, asay ehay
edspay, ehay alsoay aughtcay ingflyay impsesglay ofay Ubbstay anday Askflay, usyingbay
emselvesthay onay eckday amongay undlesbay ofay ewnay ironsay anday anceslay. Asay ehay awsay allay
isthay; asay ehay eardhay ethay ammershay inay ethay okenbray oatsbay; arfay otheray ammershay
eemedsay ivingdray aay ailnay intoay ishay earthay. Utbay ehay alliedray. Anday ownay arkingmay
atthay ethay anevay oray agflay asway onegay omfray ethay ain-mast-headmay, ehay outedshay otay
Ashtegotay, owhay adhay ustjay ainedgay atthay erchpay, otay escendday againay orfay anotheray
agflay, anday aay ammerhay anday ailsnay, anday osay ailnay itay otay ethay astmay.

Etherwhay aggedfay byay ethay eethray ays’day unningray asechay, anday ethay esistanceray otay
ishay immingsway inay ethay ottedknay amperhay ehay orebay; oray etherwhay itay asway omesay
atentlay eceitfulnessday anday alicemay inay imhay: icheverwhay asway uetray, ethay Itewhay
Ale’swhay ayway ownay eganbay otay abateay, asay itay eemedsay, omfray ethay oatbay osay apidlyray
earingnay imhay onceay oremay; oughthay indeeday ethay ale’swhay astlay artstay adhay otnay
eenbay osay onglay aay oneay asay eforebay. Anday illstay asay Ahabay idedglay overay ethay avesway
ethay unpityingay arksshay accompanieday imhay; anday osay ertinaciouslypay uckstay otay
ethay oatbay; anday osay ontinuallycay itbay atay ethay ingplyay oarsay, atthay ethay adesblay
ecamebay aggedjay anday unchedcray, anday eftlay allsmay interssplay inay ethay easay, atay
almostay everyay ipday.

eed“Hay emthay otnay! osethay eethtay utbay ivegay ewnay owlocksray otay ouryay oarsay. Ullpay
onay! is’tay ethay etterbay estray, ethay ark’sshay awjay anthay ethay ieldingyay ater.”way

ut“Bay atay everyay itebay, irsay, ethay inthay adesblay owgray allersmay anday aller!”smay

ey“Thay illway astlay onglay enoughay! ullpay on!—Butay owhay ancay ell”—hetay
uttered—“whethermay esethay arksshay imsway otay eastfay onay ethay alewhay oray onay
Ahab?—Butay ullpay onay! Ayeay, allay aliveay, ow—wenay earnay imhay. Ethay elmhay! aketay ethay
elmhay! etlay emay ass,”—andpay osay ayingsay otway ofay ethay oarsmenay elpedhay imhay orwardfay
otay ethay owsbay ofay ethay illstay ingflyay oatbay.

Atay engthlay asay ethay aftcray asway astcay otay oneay idesay, anday anray angingray alongay ithway
ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay ankflay, ehay eemedsay angelystray obliviousay ofay itsay
advance—asay ethay alewhay ometimessay ill—andway Ahabay asway airlyfay ithinway ethay
okysmay ountainmay istmay, ichwhay, ownthray offay omfray ethay ale’swhay outspay, urledcay
oundray ishay eatgray, Onadnockmay umphay; ehay asway evenay usthay oseclay otay imhay; enwhay,
ithway odybay archeday ackbay, anday othbay armsay engthwiselay igh-liftedhay otay ethay
oisepay, ehay artedday ishay iercefay ironay, anday ishay arfay iercerfay ursecay intoay ethay
atedhay alewhay. Asay othbay eelstay anday ursecay anksay otay ethay ocketsay, asay ifay uckedsay
intoay aay orassmay, Obymay Ickday idewayssay ithedwray; asmodicallyspay olledray ishay
ighnay ankflay againstay ethay owbay, anday, ithoutway avingstay aay olehay inay itay, osay
uddenlysay antedcay ethay oatbay overay, atthay adhay itay otnay eenbay orfay ethay elevateday
artpay ofay ethay unwalegay otay ichwhay ehay enthay ungclay, Ahabay ouldway onceay oremay avehay
eenbay ossedtay intoay ethay easay. Asay itay asway, eethray ofay ethay oarsmen—whoay oreknewfay
otnay ethay ecisepray instantay ofay ethay artday, anday ereway ereforethay unprepareday orfay
itsay effects—theseay ereway ungflay outay; utbay osay ellfay, atthay, inay anay instantay otway
ofay emthay utchedclay ethay unwalegay againay, anday isingray otay itsay evellay onay aay
ombingcay aveway, urledhay emselvesthay odilybay inboarday againay; ethay irdthay anmay
elplesslyhay oppingdray asternay, utbay illstay afloatay anday immingsway.

Almostay imultaneouslysay, ithway aay ightymay olitionvay ofay ungraduateday,
instantaneousay iftnesssway, ethay Itewhay Alewhay artedday oughthray ethay elteringway
easay. Utbay enwhay Ahabay iedcray outay otay ethay eersmanstay otay aketay ewnay urnstay ithway
ethay inelay, anday oldhay itay osay; anday ommandedcay ethay ewcray otay urntay oundray onay eirthay
eatssay, anday owtay ethay oatbay upay otay ethay arkmay; ethay omentmay ethay eacheroustray inelay
eltfay atthay oubleday ainstray anday ugtay, itay appedsnay inay ethay emptyay airay!

at“Whay eaksbray inay emay? Omesay inewsay acks!—’tiscray olewhay againay; oarsay! oarsay!
Urstbay inay uponay im!”hay

Earinghay ethay emendoustray ushray ofay ethay ea-crashingsay oatbay, ethay alewhay eeledwhay
oundray otay esentpray ishay ankblay oreheadfay atay aybay; utbay inay atthay evolutionay,
atchingcay ightsay ofay ethay earingnay ackblay ullhay ofay ethay ipshay; eeminglysay eeingsay
inay itay ethay ourcesay ofay allay ishay ersecutionspay; ethinkingbay it—itay aymay e—abay
argerlay anday oblernay oefay; ofay aay uddensay, ehay orebay ownday uponay itsay advancingay
owpray, itingsmay ishay awsjay amiday ieryfay owersshay ofay oamfay.

Ahabay aggeredstay; ishay andhay otesmay ishay oreheadfay. I“ay owgray indblay; andshay!
etchstray outay eforebay emay atthay Iay aymay etyay opegray myay ayway. Is’tay ight?”nay

e“Thay alewhay! Ethay ip!”shay iedcray ethay ingingcray oarsmenay.

Oars“ay! oarsay! Opeslay ownwardsday otay thyay epthsday, Oay easay, atthay ereay itay ebay orfay
everay ootay atelay, Ahabay aymay ideslay isthay astlay, astlay imetay uponay ishay arkmay! Iay
eesay: ethay ipshay! ethay ipshay! Ashday onay, myay enmay! Illway eyay otnay avesay myay ip?”shay

Utbay asay ethay oarsmenay iolentlyvay orcedfay eirthay oatbay oughthray ethay
edge-hammeringslay eassay, ethay eforebay ale-smittenwhay ow-endsbay ofay otway anksplay
urstbay oughthray, anday inay anay instantay almostay, ethay emporarilytay isabledday oatbay
aylay earlynay evellay ithway ethay avesway; itsay alf-wadinghay, ashingsplay ewcray,
ingtryay ardhay otay opstay ethay apgay anday alebay outay ethay ouringpay aterway.

Eantimemay, orfay atthay oneay eholdingbay instantay, Ashtego’stay ast-headmay ammerhay
emainedray uspendedsay inay ishay andhay; anday ethay edray agflay, alf-wrappinghay imhay asay
ithway aay aidplay, enthay eamedstray itselfay aightstray outay omfray imhay, asay ishay ownay
orward-flowingfay earthay; ilewhay Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay, andingstay uponay ethay
owspritbay eneathbay, aughtcay ightsay ofay ethay own-comingday onstermay ustjay asay oonsay
asay ehay.

e“Thay alewhay, ethay alewhay! Upay elmhay, upay elmhay! Ohay, allay eyay eetsway owerspay ofay
airay, ownay ughay emay oseclay! Etlay otnay Arbuckstay ieday, ifay ieday ehay ustmay, inay aay
oman’sway aintingfay itfay. Upay elmhay, Iay ay—yesay oolsfay, ethay awjay! ethay awjay! Isay
isthay ethay enday ofay allay myay urstingbay ayerspray? allay myay ife-longlay idelitiesfay?
Ohay, Ahabay, Ahabay, olay, thyay orkway. Eadystay! elmsmanhay, eadystay. Aynay, aynay! Upay
elmhay againay! Ehay urnstay otay eetmay usay! Ohay, ishay unappeasableay owbray ivesdray onay
owardstay oneay, osewhay utyday ellstay imhay ehay annotcay epartday. Myay Odgay, andstay byay emay
ow!”nay

and“Stay otnay byay emay, utbay andstay underay emay, oeverwhay ouyay areay atthay illway ownay
elphay Ubbstay; orfay Ubbstay, ootay, icksstay erehay. Iay ingray atay eethay, outhay inninggray
alewhay! Owhay everay elpedhay Ubbstay, oray eptkay Ubbstay awakeay, utbay Ubb’sstay ownay
unwinkingay eyeay? Anday ownay oorpay Ubbstay oesgay otay edbay uponay aay attrassmay atthay isay
allay ootay oftsay; ouldway itay ereway uffedstay ithway ushwoodbray! Iay ingray atay eethay,
outhay inninggray alewhay! Ooklay eyay, unsay, oonmay, anday arsstay! Iay allcay eyay assassinsay
ofay asay oodgay aay ellowfay asay everay outedspay upay ishay ostghay. Orfay allay atthay, Iay ouldway
etyay ingray assesglay ithway eyay, ouldway eyay utbay andhay ethay upcay! Ohay, ohay! ohay, ohay!
outhay inninggray alewhay, utbay ere’llthay ebay entyplay ofay ulpinggay oonsay! Whyay flyay eyay
otnay, Oay Ahabay! Orfay emay, offay oesshay anday acketjay otay itay; etlay Ubbstay ieday inay ishay
awersdray! Aay ostmay ouldymay anday overay altedsay eathday, ough;—cherriesthay!
errieschay! errieschay! Ohay, Askflay, orfay oneay edray errychay ereay eway ie!”day

erries“Chay? Iay onlyay ishway atthay eway ereway erewhay eythay owgray. Ohay, Ubbstay, Iay opehay
myay oorpay other’smay awndray myay art-paypay ereay isthay; ifay otnay, ewfay opperscay illway
ownay omecay otay erhay, orfay ethay oyagevay isay up.”ay

Omfray ethay ip’sshay owsbay, earlynay allay ethay eamensay ownay unghay inactiveay; ammershay,
itsbay ofay ankplay, anceslay, anday arpoonshay, echanicallymay etainedray inay eirthay
andshay, ustjay asay eythay adhay artedday omfray eirthay ariousvay employmentsay; allay
eirthay enchanteday eyesay intentay uponay ethay alewhay, ichwhay omfray idesay otay idesay
angelystray ibratingvay ishay edestinatingpray eadhay, entsay aay oadbray andbay ofay
overspreadingay emicircularsay oamfay eforebay imhay asay ehay ushedray. Etributionray,
iftsway engeancevay, eternalay alicemay ereway inay ishay olewhay aspectay, anday itespay ofay
allay atthay ortalmay anmay ouldcay oday, ethay olidsay itewhay uttressbay ofay ishay oreheadfay
otesmay ethay ip’sshay arboardstay owbay, illtay enmay anday imberstay eeledray. Omesay ellfay
atflay uponay eirthay acesfay. Ikelay islodgedday uckstray, ethay eadshay ofay ethay
arpooneershay aloftay ookshay onay eirthay ull-likebay ecksnay. Oughthray ethay eachbray,
eythay eardhay ethay atersway ourpay, asay ountainmay orrentstay ownday aay umeflay.

e“Thay ipshay! Ethay earse!—thehay econdsay earse!”hay iedcray Ahabay omfray ethay oatbay;
its“ay oodway ouldcay onlyay ebay American!”ay

Ivingday eneathbay ethay ettlingsay ipshay, ethay alewhay anray uiveringqay alongay itsay
eelkay; utbay urningtay underay aterway, iftlysway otshay otay ethay urfacesay againay, arfay
offay ethay otheray owbay, utbay ithinway aay ewfay ardsyay ofay Ahab’say oatbay, erewhay, orfay aay
imetay, ehay aylay uiescentqay.

I“ay urntay myay odybay omfray ethay unsay. Atwhay ohay, Ashtegotay! etlay emay earhay thyay
ammerhay. Ohay! eyay eethray unsurrendereday iresspay ofay inemay; outhay uncrackeday eelkay;
anday onlyay od-bulliedgay ullhay; outhay irmfay eckday, anday aughtyhay elmhay, anday
Ole-pointedpay ow,—death-gloriouspray ipshay! ustmay eyay enthay erishpay, anday
ithoutway emay? Amay Iay utcay offay omfray ethay astlay ondfay idepray ofay eanestmay
ipwreckedshay aptainscay? Ohay, onelylay eathday onay onelylay ifelay! Ohay, ownay Iay eelfay
myay opmosttay eatnessgray ieslay inay myay opmosttay iefgray. Ohay, ohay! omfray allay ouryay
urthestfay oundsbay, ourpay eyay ownay inay, eyay oldbay illowsbay ofay myay olewhay oregonefay
ifelay, anday optay isthay oneay iledpay ombercay ofay myay eathday! Owardstay eethay Iay ollray,
outhay all-destroyingay utbay unconqueringay alewhay; otay ethay astlay Iay applegray ithway
eethay; omfray ell’shay earthay Iay abstay atay eethay; orfay ate’shay akesay Iay itspay myay astlay
eathbray atay eethay. Inksay allay offinscay anday allay earseshay otay oneay ommoncay oolpay!
anday incesay eithernay ancay ebay inemay, etlay emay enthay owtay otay iecespay, ilewhay illstay
asingchay eethay, oughthay iedtay otay eethay, outhay amnedday alewhay! us__Thay, Iay ivegay upay
ethay ear!”spay

Ethay arpoonhay asway artedday; ethay ickenstray alewhay ewflay orwardfay; ithway ignitingay
elocityvay ethay inelay anray oughthray ethay ooves;—rangray oulfay. Ahabay oopedstay otay
earclay itay; ehay idday earclay itay; utbay ethay ingflyay urntay aughtcay imhay oundray ethay
ecknay, anday oicelesslyvay asay Urkishtay utesmay owstringbay eirthay ictimvay, ehay asway
otshay outay ofay ethay oatbay, ereay ethay ewcray ewknay ehay asway onegay. Extnay instantay, ethay
eavyhay eye-spliceay inay ethay ope’sray inalfay enday ewflay outay ofay ethay ark-emptystay
ubtay, ockedknay ownday anay oarsmanay, anday itingsmay ethay easay, isappearedday inay itsay
epthsday.

Orfay anay instantay, ethay ancedtray oat’sbay ewcray oodstay illstay; enthay urnedtay. e“Thay
ipshay? Eatgray Odgay, erewhay isay ethay ip?”shay Oonsay eythay oughthray imday, ewilderingbay
ediumsmay awsay erhay idelongsay adingfay antomphay, asay inay ethay aseousgay Atafay
Organamay; onlyay ethay uppermostay astsmay outay ofay aterway; ilewhay ixedfay byay
infatuationay, oray idelityfay, oray atefay, otay eirthay onceay oftylay erchespay, ethay
aganpay arpooneershay illstay aintainedmay eirthay inkingsay ookoutslay onay ethay easay.
Anday ownay, oncentriccay irclescay eizedsay ethay onelay oatbay itselfay, anday allay itsay
ewcray, anday eachay oatingflay oaray, anday everyay ance-polelay, anday inningspay,
animateay anday inanimateay, allay oundray anday oundray inay oneay ortexvay, arriedcay ethay
allestsmay ipchay ofay ethay Equodpay outay ofay ightsay.

Utbay asay ethay astlay elmingswhay intermixinglyay ouredpay emselvesthay overay ethay
unkensay eadhay ofay ethay Indianay atay ethay ainmastmay, eavinglay aay ewfay inchesay ofay ethay
erectay arspay etyay isiblevay, ogethertay ithway onglay eamingstray ardsyay ofay ethay agflay,
ichwhay almlycay undulateday, ithway ironicalay oincidingscay, overay ethay estroyingday
illowsbay eythay almostay ouched;—attay atthay instantay, aay edray armay anday aay ammerhay
overedhay ackwardlybay uplifteday inay ethay openay airay, inay ethay actay ofay ailingnay ethay
agflay asterfay anday etyay asterfay otay ethay ubsidingsay arspay. Aay awksky-hay atthay
auntinglytay adhay ollowedfay ethay ain-truckmay ownwardsday omfray itsay aturalnay omehay
amongay ethay arsstay, eckingpay atay ethay agflay, anday incommodingay Ashtegotay erethay;
isthay irdbay ownay ancedchay otay interceptay itsay oadbray utteringflay ingway etweenbay
ethay ammerhay anday ethay oodway; anday imultaneouslysay eelingfay atthay etherialay
illthray, ethay ubmergedsay avagesay eneathbay, inay ishay eath-gaspday, eptkay ishay
ammerhay ozenfray erethay; anday osay ethay irdbay ofay eavenhay, ithway archangelicay
ieksshray, anday ishay imperialay eakbay ustthray upwardsay, anday ishay olewhay aptivecay
ormfay oldedfay inay ethay agflay ofay Ahabay, entway ownday ithway ishay ipshay, ichwhay, ikelay
Atansay, ouldway otnay inksay otay ellhay illtay eshay adhay aggeddray aay ivinglay artpay ofay
eavenhay alongay ithway erhay, anday elmetedhay erselfhay ithway itay.

Ownay allsmay owlsfay ewflay eamingscray overay ethay etyay awningyay ulfgay; aay ullensay
itewhay urfsay eatbay againstay itsay eepstay idessay; enthay allay ollapsedcay, anday ethay
eatgray oudshray ofay ethay easay olledray onay asay itay olledray ivefay ousandthay earsyay agoay.


Epilogueay

AND“ay Iay ONLYay AMay ESCAPEDay ALONEay Otay ELLtay EE”tHay Objay.

Ethay ama’sdray oneday. Whyay enthay erehay oesday anyay oneay epstay orth?—Becausefay oneay
idday urvivesay ethay eckwray.

Itay osay ancedchay, atthay afteray ethay Arsee’spay isappearanceday, Iay asway ehay omwhay ethay
Atesfay ordaineday otay aketay ethay aceplay ofay Ahab’say owsmanbay, enwhay atthay owsmanbay
assumeday ethay acantvay ostpay; ethay amesay, owhay, enwhay onay ethay astlay ayday ethay eethray
enmay ereway ossedtay omfray outay ofay ethay ockingray oatbay, asway oppeddray asternay. Osay,
oatingflay onay ethay arginmay ofay ethay ensuingay enescay, anday inay ullfay ightsay ofay itay,
enwhay ethay alfspenthay uctionsay ofay ethay unksay ipshay eachedray emay, Iay asway enthay, utbay
owlyslay, awndray owardstay ethay osingclay ortexvay. Enwhay Iay eachedray itay, itay adhay
ubsidedsay otay aay eamycray oolpay. Oundray anday oundray, enthay, anday everay ontractingcay
owardstay ethay utton-likebay ackblay ubblebay atay ethay axisay ofay atthay owlyslay
eelingwhay irclecay, ikelay anotheray Ixionay Iay idday evolveray. Illtay, aininggay atthay
italvay entrecay, ethay ackblay ubblebay upwarday urstbay; anday ownay, iberatedlay byay
easonray ofay itsay unningcay ingspray, anday, owingay otay itsay eatgray uoyancybay, isingray
ithway eatgray orcefay, ethay offincay ife-buoylay otshay engthwiselay omfray ethay easay,
ellfay overay, anday oatedflay byay myay idesay. Uoyedbay upay byay atthay offincay, orfay almostay
oneay olewhay ayday anday ightnay, Iay oatedflay onay aay oftsay anday irgelikeday ainmay. Ethay
unharmingay arksshay, eythay idedglay byay asay ifay ithway adlockspay onay eirthay outhsmay;
ethay avagesay ea-hawkssay ailedsay ithway eathedshay eaksbay. Onay ethay econdsay ayday, aay
ailsay ewdray earnay, earernay, anday ickedpay emay upay atay astlay. Itay asway ethay
evious-cruisingday Achelray, atthay inay erhay etracingray earchsay afteray erhay issingmay
ildrenchay, onlyay oundfay anotheray orphanay.

orksway.

•ay Ouyay ovidepray, inay accordanceay ithway aragraphpay 1.F.3ay, aay ullfay efundray ofay
anyay oneymay aidpay orfay aay orkway oray aay eplacementray opycay, ifay aay efectday inay ethay
electronicay orkway isay iscoveredday anday eportedray otay ouyay ithinway 90ay aysday ofay
eceiptray ofay ethay orkway.

•ay Ouyay omplycay ithway allay otheray ermstay ofay isthay agreementay orfay eefray
istributionday ofay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orksway.


E.91.ay. Ifay ouyay ishway otay argechay aay eefay oray istributeday aay Ojectpray
Utenberg™gay electronicay orkway oray oupgray ofay orksway onay ifferentday ermstay anthay
areay etsay orthfay inay isthay agreementay, ouyay ustmay obtainay ermissionpay inay itingwray
omfray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay, ethay anagermay ofay
ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ademarktray. Ontactcay ethay Oundationfay asay etsay
orthfay inay Ectionsay 3ay elowbay.

1.Fay.

1.F.1ay. Ojectpray Utenberggay olunteersvay anday employeesay expenday onsiderablecay

Utenberg™gay ollectioncay. Espiteday esethay effortsay, Ojectpray Utenberg™gay
electronicay orksway, anday ethay ediummay onay ichwhay eythay aymay ebay oredstay, aymay
ontaincay efects,”“Day uchsay asay, utbay otnay imitedlay otay, incompleteay, inaccurateay
oray orruptcay ataday, anscriptiontray errorsay, aay opyrightcay oray otheray
intellectualay opertypray infringementay, aay efectiveday oray amagedday iskday oray
otheray ediummay, aay omputercay irusvay, oray omputercay odescay atthay amageday oray
annotcay ebay eadray byay ouryay equipmentay.

ofay Eplacementray oray Efund”ray escribedday inay aragraphpay 1.F.3ay, ethay Ojectpray

ittenwray explanationay otay ethay ersonpay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway omfray. Ifay ouyay

ithway ouryay ittenwray explanationay. Ethay ersonpay oray entityay atthay ovidedpray ouyay
ithway ethay efectiveday orkway aymay electay otay ovidepray aay eplacementray opycay inay

ethay econdsay opycay isay alsoay efectiveday, ouyay aymay emandday aay efundray inay itingwray
ithoutway urtherfay opportunitiesay otay ixfay ethay oblempray.
